# language_name:        Sekpele
# closest ISO 639-3:    lip
# year_short:           2008
# year_long:            Not available
# title:                The New Testament in Sekpele
# URL:                  http://www.bible.is/LIPWBT/Matt/1
# copyright_short:      © Wycliffe Bible Translators 2008
# copyright_long:       This Bible text is brought to you by Wycliffe Bible Translators, Inc.<br>TEXT: © 2008 Wycliffe Bible Translators, Inc. FONT: © 1997-2013, SIL International http://bit.ly/1uKBBMx
40001001	Aye nyamfo ni bana ba ǝsuǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu lɛbɔ utsyi , nya David ni ufluflu wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi Abraham eto kafo .
40001002	Idu lǝ Abraham ibǝ Oka David ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ antomǝ ba ntǝkǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Abraham léle Isak wǝ léle Yakob wǝ léle
40001003	Yuda ku wǝ bayimisani . Yuda ku wǝ usiǝ Tamai léle Perez ku Zera , nya Perez léle Hezron . Hezron léle Aram , nya wuntsya léle Aminadab .
40001004	Aminadab léle Naheson wǝ léle Salmon .
40001005	Salmon ku Rahab léle Boaz , nya Boaz ku Rut léle Obed . Obed léle Isai ,
40001006	nya Isai léle Oka David . Nya idu lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ isu lefe nǝ Babiloniafɔ dítsyi lema lǝ Israel bebi ǝsuǝ nya bǝmuǝ mǝ bésuko mǝ kasɔɔ , mǝ antomǝ ba dítǝkǝ lǝ betsyuǝ ǝsuǝ ni mba lǝǝbǝ mfo nɛ . Oka David ku usio wǝ lídi Uria eto usiǝ wǝ ɔ́lɛ ófo úfii , ále Salomo .
40001007	Salomo ále Rehoboam wǝ léle Abiya . Abiya tsya léle Asa ,
40001008	nya Asa léle Yosefat . Yosefat léle Yoram wǝ léle Uziya .
40001009	Uziya léle Yotam wǝ léle Ahaz wǝ léle Hezekiya wǝ léle Manase .
40001010	Manase léle Amon , nya Amon léle Yosiya wǝ léle
40001011	Yekoniya ku wǝ bayimisani lǝ Babilonia lɛkɛfe .
40001012	Idu lefe nǝ Israel bebi ditsyi Babilonia bǝbǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bále Yesu , mba bále ku mǝ antomǝ eto aye ni mba lǝǝbǝ mfo nɛ . Yekoniya léle Sealtiel wǝ léle Zerubabel wǝ léle
40001013	Abihud , nya wuntsya léle Elyakim . Elyakim léle Azur ,
40001014	nya Azur léle Sadok wǝ léle Akim wǝ léle Elihud .
40001015	Elihud léle Eleazar , nya Eleazar léle Matan , nya wuntsya léle
40001016	Yakob wǝ léle Yosef wǝ dífi Maria wǝ léle Yesu wǝ baakpo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
40001017	Itǝ eso idu lǝ Abraham isu Oka David eto lelefe eyifo alefe lefosi ana , nya idu lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ isu lefe nǝ Babiloniafɔ dímuǝ Israel bebi besuko mǝ kasɔ lǝ Babiloniaa , eyifo alefe lefosi ana . Nya isi idu lefe nǝmfó ibǝ lefe nǝ bále Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , eyifo alefe lefosi ana .
40001018	Nnyǝ mǝ ɛyɛ fɛ bále Yesu Kristo . Bátɔ Maria bǝtǝ Yosef , tsya fɛ bookpa wǝǝ , Maria ǝnyǝ nkǝ ufi ɔlɛ kafo . Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale dítǝ íbǝ itǝ nko .
40001019	Yosef eyifo utidi sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ se wóanla nkǝ woakpo Maria eto ǝnǝmi kasɔ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto ǝnǝmi esoo , úbu disi nkǝ lǝ oyani wǝ kpoo kalɔkalɔ .
40001020	Lefe nǝ úfi nsusu bomfoo , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ lǝ kola kǝmiǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Yosef , Oka David eto kafo eto ubi , mante sikpi ku fǝ usiǝ Maria bokpa kesuko fǝ ɔflɔ . Itsyise kafo ka ɔnlɛ mfoo , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ itsyi .
40001021	Nya woole ubisaibi . Nya fǝ Yosef luutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝ Yesu , itsyise wǝ ni nwǝ luulǝkǝ wǝ betidi utsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
40001022	Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ lǝ Maria ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ nkǝ yuubǝ itǝ sitinti . Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
40001023	“ Kebitɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka lenyi osani ǝbɔlɛ kafo nya woole ubisaibi . Nya betidi lookpo wǝ bǝnkǝ Imanuel . ” Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ Onanto si ko bo .
40001024	Lǝ nyaso se Yosef lésanklii , ókpa Maria , úyifo wǝ usiǝ fe kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ .
40001025	Fɛɛ Yosef ku Maria mánte bǝtsyuǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝ isu ese lefe nǝ óle wǝ ubisaibi ǝmǝ . Nya Yosef dítǝkǝ wǝ diye nkǝ Yesu .
40002001	Bále Yesu lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Betlehem lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Oka Herodes díkedi seka lǝ ke ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , babesibe bǝtsyuǝ ba léte asa ɛyɛ lǝ olalɛlɛ befandebi eto ǝtsyǝbi ǝsuǝ etsyi kofekatokɔ bǝbǝ Yerusalem .
40002002	Nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti bále ubi wǝ luudi Yudafɔ eto oka ǝmǝ ? Búnyǝ wǝ sefandebi lǝ kofekatokɔ . Nya búbǝ boǝ boesumu wǝ . ”
40002003	Lefe nǝ Oka Herodes lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , difufu ǝmuǝ wǝ ku betidi ba kenke lɛkɛ lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
40002004	Nyaso ókpadi Onanto eto besunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Sieti boole Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ? ”
40002005	Mfó nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Betlehem lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ , itsyise nko Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ ,
40002006	‘ Fǝ Betlehem lǝ Yuda eto kasɔ , emenyifo ɔkɛkɛ lǝ Yuda eto kǝmǝnkplɛ nti . Itsyise lǝ fǝǝ , nya nwǝ luudi ɔtɔnkotɔnko wǝ lɔɔyɛnko mɔ betidi Israelfɔɔ , lɔɔbɔ utsyi nɛ . ’ ”
40002007	Nyaso Oka Herodes ákpadi bafɔ ba dítsyi kofekatokɔ bamǝ bǝbǝ mfó nya ókpe disi ku mǝ kabiɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ ɔ́nɔ lefe nǝ tutuutu sefandebi siamǝ lɛbɔ bǝnyǝ .
40002008	Mfó fɛ útǝ mǝ kusu nya bédu bésu Betlehem . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu lǝ bisu bɛbɛbɛ dikpefi nǝmǝ kukɔnɔ . Nya lǝ binyǝ wǝǝ , lǝ bisinkli bibǝ bɛtɛyi mɛ , bǝ lǝ mintsya lǝ nsu nsumu wǝ . ”
40002009	Nyamfo eto kamaa , bafɔ bamǝ áyifɛ kusu bédu . Nya se bántɔɔ , besi bǝnyǝ sefandebi siamǝ fe nsia bǝnyǝ lǝ kofekatokɔ mfó ke . Nya se bǝnyǝ see , bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Sefandebi siamǝ áyɛnko mǝ sisu síńyǝ lǝ kaka ubi ǝmǝ nlabe .
40002010	
40002011	Nya se bédufǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya bǝnyǝ ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe Mariaa , báse akonki nya básumu wǝ . Nya basini mǝ kabɔtɔ nya bǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lefo koya , nnya ni sika ku lufui ku uyudu .
40002012	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte mǝ lǝ kola kǝmiǝ nkǝ bénsisinkli bayɛ Oka Herodes ɔflɔ . Nyaso báyɛ kusu bamba bésinkli bésu mǝ kasɔ .
40002013	Se babesibe bamǝ dísinkli bédu eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Yosef lǝ kola kǝmiǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oka Herodes ebutǝ nkǝ bati dikpefi nǝmǝ kama lǝ balo wǝ . Nyaso taka , lǝ etsyetsyiko dikpefi nǝmǝ ku ni ambe esuko Egipte eto kasɔ . Bisiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ mɔɔtɛyi fǝ minkǝ bisinkli bibǝ . ”
40002014	Ketsye kamfoo , Yosef átaka úfi ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe útsyetsyiko bésu Egipte eto kasɔ .
40002015	Nya bǝsiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ Oka Herodes díkpǝ . Kase bákɛ mfó ǝbǝ itǝ lǝ asa nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bɛnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Egipte kee , mínkpadi mɔ ubi míntsyiko . ”
40002016	Lefe nǝ Oka Herodes dínyǝ nkǝ bafɔ ba dítsyi kofekatokɔ mfó áwɛ wǝ bákpee , kafo ányi wǝ tinti . Nyaso útǝ nkǝ wǝ bamamanyǝ su Betlehem ku kaka letsyilama mfó kenke lǝ balo bebisaibi ba díkafo alɛ ǝnuǝ ku ibǝ kasɔ lǝ kase bafɔ bamǝ léte lefe nǝ sefandebi siamǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ séte .
40002017	Mmǝ ibǝ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yeremiya eto lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝǝ , ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti , nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ ,
40002018	“ Bánɔ bofa butsyuǝ lǝ Rama ini kekuwiwi ku kaminsǝ eto kɔsɔ kekleke . Rahel lɛ keku buwi itǝ wǝ bebi . Nya ɔnnlɛ bɔtɔnɔ nkǝ bammansǝ wǝ lɛkɔ , itsyise bebi bamǝ ǝkpǝ eso . ”
40002019	Se Oka Herodes díkpǝ eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Yosef lǝ kola kǝmiǝ lǝ Egipte .
40002020	Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka , lǝ efi ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe lǝ bisinkli bisu Israel eto kasɔ , itsyise mba léla bǝ baalo ubi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ . ”
40002021	Lǝ nyaso Yosef átaka nya ókpa dikpefi nǝmǝ ku ni ambe nya bédu bésu Israel eto kasɔ .
40002022	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Yosef lɛnɔ nkǝ Arkelao , wǝ ni Oka Herodes eto ubi , béfi bǝtsyǝ seka lǝ Yudea lǝ wǝ anto eto kɛnyɛɛ , óte sikpi ku mfó busu . Nya se Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ díkǝ wǝ ato lǝ kola kǝmiǝ nkǝ wensu mfoó , ófloma kusu údu úsu Galilea eto lɛkpɔ mfo .
40002023	Nya se úsu mfoó , úsu úsiǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret . Nya mǝ eto mfó busiǝ ǝtǝ bǝ Onanto eto Bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ditiki nǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ , “ Bookpo wǝ bǝ Nasaretnyǝ , ” ǝbǝ ítǝ sitinti .
40003001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ésu mfiminti lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ , nya útsyiko letsya bobe katɛyi
40003002	nkǝ , “ Bítsyi mi akɔɛsi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ , itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi eboyo selo . ”
40003003	Yohanes ǝmfo ni utidi wǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ lɛ bofa bembembe lǝ mfiminti katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bɛlɔ Bonamute eto kusu bitsyǝ . Bɛtsyɔnsǝ wǝ kusu bitsyǝ itǝ wǝ bɔyɛ ! ’ ”
40003004	Nya awu nnya Yohanes lékpee , ɔtɔmini ku lekoko eto bise béfi bédi nnya . Nya úfi kubukikue eto abɔsu ókle nkɛ . Nya wǝ didisa dídi bekpǝsǝ ku bablɔ .
40003005	Nya betidi dítsyi Yerusalem eto umǝ ku Yudea eto kasɔ ku Yordan eto Ketu eto lekpake mfó kenke bǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
40003006	Bǝlǝkǝ mǝ asa bua kasɔ nya úflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Yordan eto ketu kafo .
40003007	Se Yohanes dínyǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ kpǝ ba díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ uflǝsǝ mǝ ntuu , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mba nte fe bawa eto befluflu ! Owoe lɛlɛ mi kɔlɛ nkǝ bitsyetsyi lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nlɛ bubǝ eto kɛnyɛ ?
40003008	Beté lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ biǝnkǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ .
40003009	Nya biembu biǝ se ini Abraham eto befluflu bini esoo , Onanto embunǝ mi koto . Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto ebofo befluflu bulǝkǝ ketsyiko aba nyamfo ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ Abraham .
40003010	“ Bebe se banlɛ kefiebi bǝńyǝ bǝ baala eyi nyamǝ taa keyudu ke . Kuyi saa ko laanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , boola ko befi bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ .
40003011	“ Mɔɔ , ntu mǝǝflǝsǝ mi nnya nlɛ bote bǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , wǝ ebufi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ku ute uflǝsǝ mi ntu . Ɔmɔ oso mɛ , nya mǝnńyǝ ntǝ bǝ nyifo wǝ keyifo kulaa tsya .
40003012	Utsyi wǝ kɔfɛ ko wuufi ɔflɛ wǝ kamɔ ulǝkǝ kofo fɛ lǝ ufi ke okpo lǝ unwu . Fɛɛ kofo ko luubuu , wootonsǝ ko lǝ utǝ wǝ laanni kulefe kulefe , kǝmiǝ ! ”
40003013	Lefe nǝmfoó , Yesu etsyi Galilea eto kasɔ úbǝ Yohanes ɔflɔ lǝ Yordan eto Ketu nkǝ lǝ Yohanes lǝ uflǝsǝ wǝ ntu .
40003014	Fɛɛ se Yohanes mánla nkǝ lǝ uflǝsǝ Yesu ntu esoo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bomu ele bǝ mbǝ fǝ ɔflɔ , nya inni fǝ ele bǝ bǝ mɔ ɔflɔ fǝ mflǝsǝ fǝ ntu . ”
40003015	Fɛɛ Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝǝ , tɔnɔ lǝ eyifo nnya nko te mɔmɔ . Itsyise nko fɛ yuutǝ buyifo lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto lelabi nɛ . ” Nyaso Yohanes átɔnɔ útǝ wǝ .
40003016	Nya se Yohanes díflǝsǝ Yesu ntu ólosǝ koo , ɔ́bɔ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ , nya mfó ǝmǝ kato léna nwaa nya úńyǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ bɔyifǝ kǝbǝ kasɔ fe lɛblɛkpa seka díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
40003017	Nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ dítsyi kato ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝmfo ni mɔ Ubi Lala wǝ mankeko , wǝ eto asa leedufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ tinti nɛ . ”
40004001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ákpa Yesu dísuko mfiminti bǝ lǝ Obonsam lǝ oto wǝ obe .
40004002	Nya se Yesu lékle kɛnyɛ itǝ eyifosi anaa , kukpɛnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
40004003	Mfó nya olontidi ǝmǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto Ubi fenii , tɛyi abambi nyamfo lǝ efiani didisa . ”
40004004	Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Inni didisa mate lǝǝntǝ utidi nkpǝ . Bomu ditiki saa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ , ni lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ sitinti nɛ . ’ ”
40004005	Mfó nya Obonsam ǝmǝ lékpa Yesu úsuko Yerusalem , Umǝ Kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsu útǝkǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto kaka nso botaka eto disinti .
40004006	Mfó ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto Kosate eto Ubi fenii , sa ǝbǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ kasɔ . Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebotsyese wǝ batɔnkpe nkǝ bakɔbe fǝ lǝ ani bǝ lǝ fǝ kokpa lǝ kɔyɛ butusǝ lǝ abambi ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
40004007	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ ke lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Manto fǝ Onamute Onanto abe . ’ ”
40004008	Mfó nya Obansam ǝmǝ lékpa Yesu úsuko kɔtini ko letaka eto disinti nya óte wǝ kawunsiǝ eto sekakedikɔ kenke ku ke diyǝnde .
40004009	Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Muufi asa nnyamfo kenke ntǝ fǝ , lǝ ebose akonki esumu mɛ . ”
40004010	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Satana , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ Onamute Onanto hã ele bǝ se akonki ǝtǝ , esumu . ’ ”
40004011	Mfó nya Obonsam dídu lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ , nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe díbǝ bawunsǝ ko wǝ .
40004012	Se Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes béti bákpe lǝ diyoo , údu úsu Galilea .
40004013	Wǝnsiǝ lǝ Nasaret , bomu údu úsu úsiǝ lǝ Kapernaum , ni umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ Galilea eto Ditumbu kplɛ ɔflɔ lǝ Sebulon ku Naftali eto lekpake mfó .
40004014	Úsiǝ mfo nya Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ díbǝ kǝtǝ nkǝ ,
40004015	“ Sebulon eto kasɔ ku Naftali eto kasɔ eto betidi ba nkpǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ , lǝ lekpo eto kusu ɔflɔ lǝ Yordan eto Ketu eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kaka betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ luunyǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ! Nya mba nkpe lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ kǝmiǝ , Onanto eto diyǝnde ebuyǝnde lekpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40004016	
40004017	Ídu lǝ lefe nǝmfó Yesu étsyiko letsya bobe katɛyi nkǝ , “ Bisinkli lǝ mi abua kama itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi ebɔfi . ”
40004018	Nya se Yesu lɛyɛ lǝ Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ ba ni mba laata asabu . Mǝ ni Simon wǝ baakpo Petro ku wǝ ɔyimisani Andrea ba díkata asabu lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ .
40004019	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bitǝkǝko mɛ , idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , moote mi kase biulǝkǝ betidi bitǝ Onanto . ”
40004020	Mfó báyani mǝ asabu bǝtsyǝ nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bédu .
40004021	Nya se ɔ́yɛ sɛkɛ úsu sɛtɔɔ , usi únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ ba baakpo Yakobo ku Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi . Mǝ ku mǝ anto Sebedeo ǝmǝ ákɛ lǝ ɔklɔ kafo bákalɔ mǝ asabu fɛ Yesu lékpadi mǝ .
40004022	Lamfolamfoo , báyani mǝ anto ku ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bédu .
40004023	Yesu áyɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kenke nya óte asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ . Nya óbe Onanto eto Sekadidi eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Nya ótsya betidi ba efimbi ate ate nlɛ bulǝ kenke .
40004024	Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ wǝ diye ku ditiki nǝmǝ áyɛ éfia Siria eto kasɔ kenke . Nyaso betidi ákpa mǝ befimfi ba efimbi ate ate nlɛ bulǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Mǝ bǝtsyuǝǝ , awɔnɔ bua dísiǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe mǝ bulǝ . Bǝtsyuǝ kǝkpǝkasankli eto bufi díkǝlǝ nya bǝtsyuǝǝ , ani ku akpa díkpǝ mǝ . Yesu átsya mǝmblɛ kenke .
40004025	Sitiditu kplɛ sia ditsyi Galilea eto kasɔ ku Kǝmǝ Lefosi ka nkpe mfó ku Yerusalem ku Yudea eto kasɔ ku nsɔ bo nkpe lǝ Yordan eto Ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse ǝbǝ bǝtǝkǝ ko wǝ .
40005001	Se Yesu dínyǝ sitiditu sia dítǝkǝko wǝǝ , óbe úsu kɔtini kato nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
40005002	Nya útsyiko mǝ asa bote nkǝ ,
40005003	“ Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba nyi bǝ beyifo bakombo lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mǝ sele .
40005004	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba leewi kaminsǝku . Mǝ Onanto loomansǝ lɛkɔ nɛ .
40005005	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . Mǝǝ ni mba luudi sɛkplɛ lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ .
40005006	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laakplatsya keklekle bǝ bǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Mǝ ni mba luunyǝ asa nnya luuyuǝsǝ mǝ kafo nɛ .
40005007	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba lǝǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ kaminsǝ . Onanto ebunyǝ mǝ kaminsǝ .
40005008	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba eto ketu lekpa kɛnkɛ . Mǝ luunyǝ Onanto nɛ .
40005009	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laalɔ bǝtsyuǝ nti kaboko diyuǝ . Onanto ebokpo mǝ wǝ bebi tinti .
40005010	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba eto kama baati kate ohiã se bensi nkpǝ sɛɛ ekeyifo lǝ Onanto lelabi ǝsuǝ eso . Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mǝ sele .
40005011	“ Onanto ákpo mi atsyɔ lǝ betidi aaka mi , kate mi ohiã nya baatɛyi bidia saa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ se bitǝkǝko mɛ eso .
40005012	Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ beto keyudu , itsyise mi kayofofo fui lǝ Onanto eto kato . Nko ke ete báte Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lɛtɔ mi sɛtɔ ohiã nɛ .
40005013	“ Bite fe mmba bitǝ betidi ba kenke . Fɛɛ lǝ kamini ábɔ lǝ mmba bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnsiǝmbofo kamini bokpe lǝ mu bio . Nya se bunsibǝ kutǝkǝ saa esoo , buwui hã ele bǝ befi mu bewui lǝ betidi lǝ bayɛ lǝ mu ǝsuǝ bafe .
40005014	“ Biyifo fe diyǝnde bitǝ kawunsiǝ kenke . Umǝ wǝ bála bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , ambiɔ .
40005015	Kuutsyuǝ saa anto okandiɛ kefi asa keti wǝ . Bomu bufi beefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ ǝsuǝ kaka wuutǝ diyǝnde utsyuǝ saa wǝ nkpe lǝ diyo nǝmǝ .
40005016	Nko ke ele bǝ mi okandiɛ yǝnde utǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ nɛ . Bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ asa sɛɛ nnya bieyifo lǝ befi atɛsǝ bǝtǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato . ”
40005017	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Biembu biǝ mbǝ miǝ maninsǝ Moses eto afi nnya ókpe , nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi léte . Mǝmbǝ miǝ maaninsǝ nnya kon . Bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ mbǝ mflɔsǝ nnya .
40005018	Nya nla miǝ bete sitinti minkǝ , lǝ kase kato ku kasɔ nsi nkpee , kulesa saa embɔbɔ lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ lesa saa luubǝ elo .
40005019	Lǝ nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ ataka uńyǝ lǝ kɔfi komǝ eto lesa sɛkɛ ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nya ote betidi bamba nkǝ mǝ tsya yifo nkoo , boofi wǝ fe ɔfɛfɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ke luuyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ nya woote betidi bamba tsya nkǝ beyifo nkoo , boofi wǝ fe ɔkplɛnyǝ tinti lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
40005020	Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi wuee minkǝ , fɛ biofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝǝ , ele bǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bo lɛlɛkɛ bonso kase kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ kulaa tsya nsi .
40005021	“ Kɔɔ bɛnɔ bátɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Manlo utidi . ’ Nya utidi wǝ leeyifo nkoo , ele bǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo .
40005022	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke luunyǝ ɔblɔ lǝ wǝ ɔyimi ǝsuǝǝ , bookponko wǝ lekpo . Nya utidi wǝ tsya lɔɔtɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Eyifo utidi bimbaa , ’ bookpa wǝ besuko beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Nya utidi wǝ lɔɔtɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Eyifo ubukii , ’ Onanto ebunǝ wǝ koto lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
40005023	Nyaso lǝ ibǝ bǝ efi fǝ ǝtǝsa atɔnko lǝ Onanto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , nya fakloma fǝ lesatsyuǝ kpe lǝ fǝ ku fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lenti ,
40005024	yani fǝ kedi kamǝ ǝtsyǝ lǝ Disumuyo mfó lǝ esu lǝ fonko fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ bekpo ntu lǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti fɛ lǝ efi fǝ kedi kamǝ esu ǝtǝ Onanto .
40005025	“ Lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ weefi fǝ usuko kɔfi ɔflɔɔ , bɛbɛ lefe lǝ fonko wǝ lǝ bɛlɔ bǝtsyuǝ nti . Lenni nkoo , lǝ fonko wǝ esu lekpo etii , utidi ǝmfo ebufi fǝ okpe lǝ okponkpo eto ani . Nya wuntsya luufi fǝ okpe mba lɛmuǝ betidi eto ani nya bookpe fǝ lǝ diyo .
40005026	Nya nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi kasini minkǝ ebɔkɛ lǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ foofo kayo ka fensi alosǝ .
40005027	“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Yanle bǝ bǝsǝ ku bǝsiǝ fe bǝtsyuǝ kama . ’
40005028	Fɛɛ mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ utsyuǝ saa kee loobe usionko nya wɔɔkɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛɛ , ókpo wǝ lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ koko .
40005029	Nyaso lǝ fǝ kodiani eto dinǝmi ǝǝtǝ nkǝ dufǝ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝǝ , lǝkǝ ni ato akpe . Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ nyansǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ enso bǝ befi fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke bato bakpe lǝ utemanlo kǝmiǝ .
40005030	Nya lǝ fǝ kodiani ǝǝtǝ fǝǝyifo lebuaa , la ko ato akpe . Ɛlɛkǝ itǝ fǝ eso bǝ nyansǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa lɔni enso bǝ fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke dufǝ lǝ utemanlo kǝmiǝ .
40005031	“ Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Utsyuǝ saa ke lɔɔni wǝ usiǝǝ , ele bǝ utǝ wǝ kukue nkǝ ɔ́ni wǝ . ’
40005032	Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ osani utsyuǝ áni wǝ usiǝ , nya yanyɛ lǝ disenkpo ǝsuǝ esoo , osani ǝmǝ dítǝ usio ǝmǝ lekpo kusǝ . Nya dimanyɛ lǝ osani wǝ ke luufi usio ǝmǝ tsya ákpo kusiǝ .
40005033	“ Kɔɔ bɛnɔ tsya bátɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mankpadi asa esi etudi kɛnyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Bomu yifo lǝ ntamu bo faka fǝtǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ . ’
40005034	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ mankpadi asa ǝtsyǝ kɛnyɛ saa . Mankpadi asa nnya nkpe kato itsyise Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ni mfó .
40005035	Mankpadi asa nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ tsya itsyise Onanto eto akpa eto kǝtǝkɔ ini . Nya mankpadi Yerusalem , itsyise mfó ni baka eto Oka wǝ ni Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto umǝ nɛ .
40005036	Mankpadi fǝ disi tsya itsyise ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale foofo fǝ disi eto sɛwɔni eto lɛ ɔni buyifo uflubi lee ona .
40005037	Tǝ lǝ mi ee lǝ iyifo ee , nya lǝ mi oowo lǝ iyifo oowo ete . Lesa bamba sa enso nyamfo eto bɔtɛyii , etsyi lǝ olontidi ǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
40005038	“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bafo dinǝmi lǝ dinǝmi eto kɛnyɛ , nya lɛnyi lǝ lɛnyi eto kɛnyɛ . ’
40005039	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mantisǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto kabua ka úyifo eto oko . Lǝ utsyuǝ ásɔ fǝ lǝ kodianitosii , tsyi nkonse tsya ǝtǝ wǝ .
40005040	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woasama fǝ lǝ ofo fǝ awu katoo , wuninsǝ fǝ kafia tsya ǝtǝ wǝ .
40005041	Nko ke lǝ ǝsuǝalenyǝ eto utsyuǝ anyikǝ fǝ okpe nkǝ tsyi wǝ bikǝ lǝ bɛyɛ disunkpo lɔnii , yɛnko wǝ nnya ǝnuǝ .
40005042	Lǝ utsyuǝ atɔ fǝ lesatsyuǝ , fi ni ǝtǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utsyuǝ tsya atɔ nkǝ dia lesa ǝtǝ wǝ , dia ni ǝtǝ wǝ .
40005043	“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ La fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ ekisi fǝ olo ! ’
40005044	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bela mi balo lǝ beto ola lǝ mba leekisi mi eto disi .
40005045	Bǝ lǝ befiani Onanto wǝ nkpe kato eto bebi tinti . Itsyise wǝ lǝǝtǝ kofe laafa kǝtǝ betidi bua ku mba leeyifo kasɛɛ kenke tsyɛtsyɛɛtsyɛ . Nya ɔsɔmi tsya laani kǝtǝ betidi ba leeyifo kasɛɛ ku mba leenyifo kasɛɛ ta .
40005046	Lǝ betidi ba laala mi ete mi tsya laalaa , nte kayofofo ka Onanto luutǝ mi . Nko ke te mba laafo umǝnko kula tsya leeyifo nɛ .
40005047	Nya lǝ mi bayɛtsyuǝ mate ete biǝsiǝsǝǝ , nyalɛ bienyifo tɔ kulesa nǝ eto ani ele bǝ basɔ mi . Mamfokanɔfɔ tsya eyifo nko ke .
40005048	Bomuu , bɛflɔ fe kase mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato lɛflɔ seka .
40006001	“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ bienyifo kesumu eto kasɛɛ ka ele bǝ biyifo bilǝkǝ bete lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ . Itsyise lǝ biyifo nkoo , biensiembunyǝ kayofofo saa itsyi lǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato ɔflɔ .
40006002	Nyaso lǝ ǝtǝ okombo utsyuǝ lesatsyuǝǝ , mambe nya letsya lǝ betidi lǝ banɔ fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo lǝ ntsyakɔ ku lǝ umǝ eto kabia . Beeyifo nko bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ batɛsǝ mǝ . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ boonyǝ mǝ kayofofo koko .
40006003	Nyaso fǝǝ , lǝ awunsǝko okomboo , yifo nko bǝ fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ kulaa tsya embote lesa nǝ feyifo .
40006004	Itǝ bǝ iyifo abiɔnsa nya kuutsyuǝ saa lembunyǝ enso fǝ Anto Onanto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ asanyata , bǝ lǝ ofo fǝ nya kayo .
40006005	“ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , bienyifo fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo . Baala buńyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kalakatokɔ ku lǝ obia bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ unyǝ mǝ . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , boofo mǝ kayofofo saa koko .
40006006	Fɛɛ lǝ alɛ ola botoo , dufǝ lǝ fǝ diyo kǝmiǝ lǝ eti siku lǝ ato ola ǝtǝ fǝ Anto wǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝǝnnyǝ . Nya fǝ Anto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ fǝ eyifosa kulakula saa , ebofo fǝ nya kayo .
40006007	“ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , biendi etiki kpenkpenkpe katɛyi , kalɔ bɔtɛyi fe kase bamamonyǝ leeyifo . Beebu bǝ lǝ batɛyi etiki kpenkpenkpee , nya mǝ bǝfiǝ loofo mǝ olatoto nɛ .
40006008	Bienyifo fe mǝ , itsyise Mi Anto Onanto yi asa nnya behiã fɛ biatɔ wǝ .
40006009	Nyaso nnyǝ mmǝ ele bǝ beto ola , ‘ Boanto wǝ nkpe kato , tǝ lǝ bakpasǝ fǝ diye .
40006010	Fǝ sekakedidi lǝ sibǝ . Beyifo lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo fe kase inte kato .
40006011	Tǝ bo bo mmi eto didisa .
40006012	Fi bo abua atsyɛ bo fe kase bo tsya leefi katsyɛ mba laata bo kebu .
40006013	Mǝntǝ lǝ budufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ , lǝǝlǝkǝ bo etsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Itsyi sekadidi ku ǝsuǝale ku diyǝnde eyifo fǝ ale lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ . ’
40006014	“ Nya lǝ bifi mi bǝtsyuǝ eto botakebu bɛtsyɛ mǝǝ , mi Anto Onanto tsya ebufi mi ale tsya ɔtsyɛ mi .
40006015	Fɛɛ lǝ biemfi mi bǝtsyuǝ eto botakebu bɛtsyɛ mǝǝ , mi Anto Onanto tsya embufi mi botakebu ɔtsyɛ mi .
40006016	“ Nya lǝ békle kɛnyɛɛ , mǝnyǝnkisǝ ǝnǝmi eyifo fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo seka . Beenyǝnkisǝ ǝnǝmi sekasitsyuǝ bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa luunyǝ mǝ nkǝ balɛ kɛnyɛ bokle . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi wuee minkǝ boofo mǝ kayofofo saa bálosǝ .
40006017	Lǝ bɛlɛ kɛnyɛ bokle nɛ , biflǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ besadi disi .
40006018	Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ betidi embote bǝnkǝ bɛlɛ kɛnyɛ bokle . Bomu bǝ lǝ mi Anto wǝ boǝnnyǝ hã lǝ ote . Bǝ lǝ mi Anto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ lesa saa , lǝ ofo mi nya kayo .
40006019	“ Bianlɔ ǝsuǝ eto bikǝ bitsyǝ lǝ kasɔ kamfo , kaka balɛ ku kosansa laabiasǝ bikǝ nya beyu tsya laaba biku kedufǝ ayo keyu mi .
40006020	Bomu bɛlɔ mi bikǝ bitsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Mfoo , balɛ embobiasǝ mi nye beto kosonsa nya beyu tsya lemboba siku beyu mi .
40006021	Itsyise kaka fǝ bikǝ bia lefo koya ntee , mfo fuufi fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝtǝkǝ nɛ .
40006022	“ Ǝnǝmi eyifo fe okandiɛ itǝ utidi . Lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi alɛkɛɛ , fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke ebokpa fe okandiɛ .
40006023	Fɛɛ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi annlɔ kǝnyǝǝ , fǝ utidi eto umu ǝmǝ kenke ebɔkɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Nyaso lǝ diyǝnde nǝ nkpe lǝ fǝ afiani ketuntuu , fǝ ketuntu kamǝ ebɔkɛ ale tinti .
40006024	“ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo banamute inuǝ busumu . Woola ɔni , ukisi unuǝfǝ . Uutsyue ɔni koto nya wɔɔni unuǝfǝ . Ǝmbofo Onanto ku atabi bɔkɔ kesumu .
40006025	Nyamfo eso minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bianso mi nsusu bufi kǝtǝkǝ lǝ lesa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ nye asa nnya biɔlɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nkpǝ afo koya eso didisa . Nya ǝsuǝ eto uyi tsya lefo koya eso asa nnya biɔlɛ .
40006026	Bebe baklɔbɛ , baamfo kakuɛ nya bǝmlǝkǝ edisa nye eyibibi kǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kewũ , fɛɛ mi Anto Onanto aabe mǝ ! Nya ntsyǝ fǝ woombobe mi enso mǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe befo koya benso mǝ .
40006027	Nya mi utsyuǝ ebofo nkpǝ busiǝ diyi lɔni kasonsǝ kaso kase elee , lǝ ufi nya okpe lǝ wǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ kekleke nko ?
40006028	“ Bibu bebe kase dituwinimi lǝ dimǝ laanɔ bobee . Kaanta olokotutu nya keendi kafia kefi keti ǝsuǝ .
40006029	Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Oka Salomo kulaa tsya lǝ wǝ kɔlɔkɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , mánnɔ bobe fe dituwinimi nǝ lǝǝmǝ mfó .
40006030	Lǝ nko Onanto lǝǝtǝ sefa kɔlɔkɔ komfo eto oklee , sefa sia lǝǝńyǝ mmi ete nya kǝsiǝsǝ ete baala se kato kakpé lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝǝ , ntsyǝ Onanto lembutǝ bo alɛsa kpǝ enso sefa eto ale ? Ntsyǝ wǝmbutǝ mi kɔlɔkɔ enso ? Bimbǝ bofokanɔ kpǝ !
40006031	“ Lǝ nyaso biensisiǝ bikebu disi katɔ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Sieti buunyǝ lesaatsyuǝ budi nye lesaatsyuǝ bunǝ nye lesaatsyuǝ bɔlɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ? ’
40006032	Asa nyamfo eyifo asa nnya bamamonyǝ lǝǝsiǝ kebu disi ketsyiko . Mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato yi nkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebohiã mi .
40006033	Bomu bitǝ lǝ mi abɛbɛsa tutɛ lǝ idi kase Onanto luudi seka lǝ mi ǝsuǝ le befiani basɛɛ . Nya wuufi asa bamba nya kenke loofe itǝ mi tsya , utǝ mi .
40006034	Nyaso biǝnsiǝ bikebu disi itsyi lǝ kusɛ ko nlɛ bubǝ ǝsuǝ . Diyi nǝmfó tsya ebubǝ ku ni bulǝ . Yanle bǝ bufi bulǝ bamba bokpe lǝ mi eto bole ǝsuǝ .
40007001	“ Mankponko betidi bamba lekpo bǝ lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ fǝ lekpo bokponko .
40007002	Kase faaklá asa yeeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko ke eto okle Onanto looklá utǝ fintsya nɛ !
40007003	“ Ntsyǝ fɛ fanlɛ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto dinǝmi bobe fɛ fannlɛ dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ léle bunyǝ ?
40007004	Ntsyǝ fɛ foofo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Lekpakpa , tǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi , ’ se dikubi kplɛ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ kosate eto lele ǝsuǝ ?
40007005	Fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi ! Ka dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi bulǝkǝ fɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ kusu ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto lele kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ wǝ lǝ dinǝmi .
40007006	“ Biemfi asa nnya diyifo kɛnkɛ beto bitǝ bakpa . Lǝ bifi bitǝ mǝǝ , mǝ bomu ebɔtsyi bawuninsǝ bǝnǝ mi . Biemfi mi atsyabi nya lefo koya beto bekpe bakplako . Lǝ bifi bitǝ mǝǝ , bɔɔnwɔ nya ku mǝ akpa bakpe lǝ kota .
40007007	“ Bɛtɔ asa lǝ befi bǝtǝ mi . Bɛbɛbɛ asa lǝ binyǝ . Bɛsɔ siku lǝ basini mi .
40007008	Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ laatɔ asaa , bǝǝtǝ wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabɛbɛɛ , wǝǝnyǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa , wǝ lɛsɔ sikuu , bɔɔsini wǝ .
40007009	“ Minti eto Owoe lǝ wǝ ubi atɔ wǝ abolo , wuufi lebambi utǝ wǝ ?
40007010	Nye lǝ ɔtɔ wǝ lɛkpɛ , wuufi owa utǝ wǝ ?
40007011	Mimba ni babuayifo kulaa yi kase buifi asa sɛɛ bitǝ mi bebi . Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ ku Boanto wǝ nkpe kato itǝ bo ? Ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ weembufi wǝ asa , asa sɛɛ , utǝ betidi ba laatɔ wǝ ?
40007012	Asa nnya biala biǝ betidi bamba yifo bǝtǝ mii , mitsya yifo nnya bitǝ mǝ nko . Nyamfo ete Moses eto kɔfi ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nlɛ bote nɛ .
40007013	“ Bɛyɛ lǝ kesie kɛkɛ befe bidufǝ kǝmiǝ . Itsyise lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kesie ka lɛmɔ ku kusu ko disensǝ ko diyuǝ ku bɔyɛɛ , yookpa mi isuko katsylɔkɔ ka ni ute kǝmiǝ . Nya ko ǝsuǝ betidi kpǝ nyɛ nɛ .
40007014	Fɛɛ nkpǝ eto kusu afɛ , nya ko bɔyɛ kesu mfó kpe ale , nya betidi esiani hã lǝǝnyǝ ko .
40007015	“ Bebe mi ǝsuǝ sinini lǝ bidiabidia eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ . Bǝǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ fe basamu seka lǝ dinyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ kǝmiǝǝ , baso bekiti .
40007016	Biunyǝ mǝ bitsyǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ . Kanyi aannwɔ eyibibi nnya bedi . Nya otonkpa anwɔ nnya bendi .
40007017	Nko ini bǝ kuyi sɛɛ saa aanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ . Nya kuyi bua saa aanwɔ ebibi bua .
40007018	Kuyi sɛɛ saa aannwɔ ebibi bua nko ke kuyi bua saa laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ nɛ .
40007019	Kuyi saa ko laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , baala ko kefi kakpe lǝ ute .
40007020	Nyaso badiantidi ba lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kɛnyɛɛ , biunyǝ mǝ bitsyǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
40007021	“ Inni utsyuǝ saa ke laakpadi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , Bonamutee , ’ luudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Bomu betidi ba leeyifo mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato eto alasa luudufǝ mfó .
40007022	Lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ayoo , betidi kpǝ bɔtɛyi mɛ bǝ , ‘ Bonamute , Bonamute ! Lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ nya búdi fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nya búyifo ayanisa kpǝ bóla awɔnɔ bua kpǝ búlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ’
40007023	Mfó nya mɔɔtɛyi mǝ minkǝ , ‘ Minyi mi kulaa o-o ! Bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , mi babuayifotidi . ’
40007024	“ Nyaso utidi wǝ ke laanɔ mɔ etiki nya weeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ni obesibe nɛ . Ute fe utidi wǝ léto wǝ diyo uńyǝnsǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ .
40007025	Ɔsɔmi áni nya ntu díyi boba bokpo , nya ufiebi kekleke lɛsɔ ɔyɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ófe . Fɛɛ díamba itsyise óto ni utǝkǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ .
40007026	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ etiki fɛ woanyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , okateko ubuki . Ute fe utidibuki wǝ léto wǝ diyo uńyǝnsǝ lǝ kɔwinimi ǝsuǝ .
40007027	Ɔsɔmi áni nya ntu díyi bóba bókpo mfó , nya ufiebi kekleke lɛsɔ ɔ́yɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ófe , nya léba kploo lékpo lǝ kasɔ . ”
40007028	Se Yesu léte asa nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , wǝ asatete eyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
40007029	Wǝ asatete ményifo fe kase afi eto bateasa laate . Bomu óte asa fe nwǝ nkpe ǝsuǝale lǝ asa nnya óte ǝsuǝ .
40008001	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛyifǝ kɔtini komǝ úbǝ kasɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
40008002	Mfó nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bufi sía bufi díbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ! Lǝ alaa , ebofo butǝ bǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ le . ”
40008003	Yesu ǝnǝ wǝ kɔni útidi wǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nla . Fǝ ǝsuǝ le . ” Lamfolamfo bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ utidi ǝmǝ .
40008004	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Be kukɔnɔ , nya mensu atɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa kulesa . Bomu fi fǝ ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto usumunyǝ wǝ luudi fǝ adansiɛ nkǝ fǝ bufi ǝyuǝ fǝ sitinti . Nya lǝ efi kedi ka Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ ǝtǝ . Bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ote nkǝ bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ sitinti . ”
40008005	Se Yesu dídufǝ Kapernaun eto umǝǝ , Romafɔ eto Omamanyǝ Ninǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ ,
40008006	“ Bonamute ! Mɔ uyifoyifo lɛ bufi kekleke . Olabe lǝ diyo ɔnnlɛ bofo botaka . ”
40008007	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muusu lɛ nsu ntsya wǝ . ”
40008008	Omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , oolo ! Yǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ mɔ diyo . Tɛyi ditiki lɔni ete mɔ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto bufi ebuyuǝ wǝ .
40008009	Mintsya eyifo nwǝ nkpe lǝ beninǝ eto kalɔ , nya bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya nkpe mɛ kalɔ . Lǝ ntɛyi utsyuǝ miǝ , ‘ Suu ’ weesu . Nya lǝ ntɛyi obamba tsya miǝ , ‘ Bǝǝ , ’ wǝǝbǝ . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mɔ uyifoyifo miǝ , ‘ Yifo nǝmfoo , ’ weeyifo ni . ”
40008010	Se Yesu lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , íyifo wǝ yanii nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ Israelbebi nti kulaa tsyaa , mǝnnyǝ tɔ bofokanɔ kplɛ bomfo eto okle !
40008011	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ betidi kpǝ ebutsyi kofekatokɔ ku ko diyokedufǝkɔ bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ bedi lesa ku Abraham , Isak ku Yakob lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
40008012	Fɛɛ mimba ni sekakedikɔ siamǝ eto bebii , boofi mǝ batobakpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lǝ se kama mfo . Mfó boowi nku bayimi anyi . ”
40008013	Nya kamaa , nya Yesu lɛtɛyi bamamanyǝ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Du esu diyo , yuubǝ itǝ fǝ fe kase fáfo fánɔ ǝsuǝ . ” Nya omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ eto uyifoyifo eto ǝsuǝ dímuǝ wǝ ale lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ ke .
40008014	Se Yesu dísu Petro eto diyoo , únyǝ nkǝ atikesi ǝmuǝ Petro eto usiǝambe kekleke , nya onlabe .
40008015	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛkɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni nya atikesi nyamǝ léyani wǝ nya ótaka úsu úyifo wǝ afɔ .
40008016	Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , bákpa betidi kpǝ ba awɔnɔ bua díkǝlǝ báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu lǝ ditikididi lɔni ǝsuǝǝ , óla awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ótsya befimfi bamǝ kenke mǝ efimbi .
40008017	Úyifo nyamfo bǝ lǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Wǝ kosate átsya bo kǝsuǝfi , nya ótsya bo efimbi kenke . ”
40008018	Lefe nǝ Yesu dínyǝ betidi kpǝ ba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ nkǝ , bǝtǝ lǝ bayila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ besu ni lekpake nǝnse .
40008019	Afi eto oteasa utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó . Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , muutǝkǝko fǝ nsu kaka ke fantɔ . ”
40008020	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpaflɔbɛ kpe ǝbiǝ nnya eto kafo baalabe , nya baklɔbɛ nkpe ayo . Fɛɛ Utidi Eto Ubii , ǝmbǝ kaka wuuluǝ wǝ disi . ”
40008021	Nya utidi bamba utsyuǝ wǝ ni okasebi lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu mbikǝ mɔ anto fɛ . ”
40008022	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . Tǝ mba nsi nkpǝ fe bekpǝnkpǝ lǝ besu bebikǝ mǝ bekpǝnkpǝtsyuǝ . ”
40008023	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ kafo .
40008024	Yanklɛ ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔnlɛ ntu bɔsɔ kakpo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya íyifo fe woonya udufɔ lǝ ntu kasɔ . Fɛɛ Yesu wǝǝ lábe selabe .
40008025	Bakasebi bamǝ ésu básanklisǝ wǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝkǝ bo ! Boǝbǝ bukpǝ lo . ”
40008026	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ sikpi bote nko ? Mi mba eto bofokanɔ lemfui ! ” Mfó nya ótaka úúnyǝ nya ókpe ufiebi ku ntu bomǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bǝyuǝ kɛnyɛ . Nya lesa saa díyuǝ kɛnyɛ kananana .
40008027	Iyifo utsyuǝ saa mfó yanii . Nya bátɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Nte utidi wǝ eto okle ni nwǝ mfo ? Ufiebi ku ntu kulaa tsya eetsyue wǝ koto ! ”
40008028	Se Yesu lɛyila ditumbukplɛ úsu ni lekpake nǝnse údufǝ Gadara eto kasɔɔ , betidi inuǝ ba ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua nsi ábɔ betsyi lǝ edi nti bǝbǝ bátsyako wǝ . Nya se bakɛ sikpi tinti esoo , kuutsyuǝ saa mánkatɔnɔ nkǝ woayɛ kusu komfo ofe .
40008029	Lamfolamfo , báfa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ Onanto eto Ubi , be nkpe lǝ bonko fǝ lenti mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ etsyiko bo koto bunǝ katɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyoo ? ”
40008030	Bakplako eto lekpa kplɛ ditsyuǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ mfó ɔflɔ békedi lesa .
40008031	Nyaso awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ebola bo ǝlǝkǝ lǝ mfoo , nyalɛ la bo esu akpe lǝ bakplako eto lekpa kplɛ nǝ ńyǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40008032	Mfó Yesu dínyǝnki ókpe mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bidu bisu . ” Nyaso bédu mfó bésu bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bakplako bamǝ kenke dítsyetsyi báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi bésu bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bǝnǝ ntu bǝkpǝ .
40008033	Lǝ nyaso mba laase bakplako bamǝ étsyetsyi besu umǝ . Bátɛyi lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ku betidi ba awɔnɔ bua disiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ .
40008034	Nyaso utsyuǝ saa lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ésu nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ Yesu . Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ .
40009001	Yesu édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya usinkli ɔ́yɛ lǝ ditumbukplɛ ǝsuǝ úsu wǝ umǝ .
40009002	Mfó nya bákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ lǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Se Yesu dínyǝ nkǝ báfo bánɔ tinti esoo , ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ léba onkpo kasɔ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , kpe utu . Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ . ”
40009003	Mfó afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba díńyǝ mfó lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo lǝ mbusiotiki budi . ”
40009004	Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ nsusu bomfo utsyǝ lekpo nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ nsusu bua bomfo eto okle bufi ?
40009005	Nya nte etiki nnya eto bɔtɛyi diyuǝ enso , ‘ Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ , ’ lee batɛyi bǝ ‘ Taka , lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
40009006	Bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ nte mi miǝ Utidi Eto Ubi kpe ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ ufi abua ɔtsyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ mfoo , ” ɔ́tɛyi utidi ǝmǝ léba onkpo kasɔ mfó nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ edu esu diyo . ”
40009007	Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ létaka nnya úfi wǝ belabekǝ nnya údu úsu diyo .
40009008	Lefe nǝ betidi bamfó dínyǝ nyamfoo , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ nnya bátɛsǝ Onanto bǝ úfi ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle útǝ betidi .
40009009	Yesu édu mfó nya se ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ nwǝ laafo umǝnko utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Mateo wǝ nsi lǝ wǝ keyifokɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Mateo létaka útǝkǝko wǝ .
40009010	Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ lesa budi lǝ Mateo eto diyoo , mba laafo umǝnko kpǝ ku babuayifo bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bákɔ ku Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ǝsuǝ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó .
40009011	Mfó nya Farisifɔ ba dínyǝ nyamfoo , lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi bǝnkǝ , “ Beso mi oteasa ku mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo leedi lesa kakɔ ? ”
40009012	Yesu ánɔ lesa nǝ bátɛyi nyaso útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni befimfi hã .
40009013	Bisu lǝ bisu bɛbɛbɛ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto kasɔ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ maabɛbɛ , nya inni bebukilolo kǝtǝ kedi . ’ Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mimbǝ . ”
40009014	Mfó nya Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto bakasebi díbǝ bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bonko Farisifɔ laakle kɛnyɛ lǝ lefe lefe ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ fǝ bakasebi laankle kɛnyɛ ? ”
40009015	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bibubibu biǝ okafɔsǝ eto baklobo ba nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ yifo mǝ ǝsuǝ yooyooyoo ku kaminsǝ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe onkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ ? Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko kulefe ! Fɛɛ diyi ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ ǝsuǝ bookpa okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ bedunko lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bookle kɛnyɛ bǝsiǝ .
40009016	“ Kuutsyuǝ saa emfi kafia eto lefianku fɔfɔ katale kǝtǝkǝ lǝ kakoko ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lefianku fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ebunǝ ni ǝsuǝ dilǝkǝ lǝ lekoko nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ dibiǝ koko nǝmǝ ebola disensǝ lekpe .
40009017	“ Nko ke kuutsyuǝ saa leemfi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe koko kafo itsyise nte bomǝ ebɔkpɔ itǝ otobǝ ǝmǝ eboba nya nte bomǝ luuwi nya otobe ǝmǝ loobia . Bomu beefi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe fɔfɔ kafo . Nya asakpa ǝnuǝ nyamǝ ebutsyǝ kukɔnɔ . ”
40009018	Lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ mǝ etiki budinkoo , Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya óse akonki , ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi ǝkpǝ mɔmɔmɔmɔ , tsya bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ efi fǝ ani ǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ otaka . ”
40009019	Nyaso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko wǝ ku wǝ bakasebi .
40009020	Se ɔntɔɔ , usionko utsyuǝ wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo lǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama nya útidi wǝ awu eto kotosi .
40009021	Úyifo nko nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ntidi wǝ awu koo , mɔ bufi ebɔyɛ mɛ . ”
40009022	Yesu átsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ únyǝ wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muǝ utu alɛ , mɔ ubi . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ” Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ tututuu , bufí bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
40009023	Nnya kamaa , Yesu ésu katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo nya se únyǝ mba leefe nkpatsyaku ku mba nlɛ bofa kewi nkuu ,
40009024	ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa bɔ usu lekple , disiobi nǝmǝ mǝnkpǝ , bomu selabe ete onlabe . ” Mfo bétsyiko wǝ bumǝ .
40009025	Nya se bála betidi bamǝ babɔsɛɛ , Yesu édufǝ diyo nǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ nlabe , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni , nya ótaka úsiǝ .
40009026	Ditiki nǝmfo ésensǝ léba lékpo lǝ kasɔ kamǝ eto lekpake nǝmfó kenke .
40009027	Se Yesu dídu mfó ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , bǝnǝmba inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ átaka bǝtǝkǝko wǝ ku kudu bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Oka , David eto ubi ! Nyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
40009028	Nya se Yesu dísu údufǝ diyoo , bǝnǝmba inuǝ bamǝ edufǝ mfó . Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo bɛnɔ biǝ moofo mi botsya ? ” Mfó bǝmǝnkli kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛɛ ! Bofo bɔnɔ . ”
40009029	Mfó nya Yesu dítidi mǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ fe kase befo bɛnɔ . ”
40009030	Nya ete mǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini . Nya Yesu díkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa nyamfo . ”
40009031	Fɛɛ se bédu mfóo , bábe ditiki nǝmfo letsya utidi sa anɔ lǝ lɛkpɔ nǝmfó kenke itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
40009032	Se betidi bamfo dídu bantɔɔ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua dítǝ ɔnnlɛ etiki bofo budi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ .
40009033	Óla lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ dítsyiko etiki budi . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba ńyǝ mfó yanii , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boǝnnyǝ tɔ nyamfo eto okle bunyǝ kulefe lǝ Israel eto kasɔ ! ”
40009034	Fɛɛ Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Awɔnɔ bua eto oka wǝ lǝǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale , nya úfi ɔnlɛ awɔnɔ bua nyamfó bola kǝlǝkǝ nɛ . ”
40009035	Yesu áyɛ ótsyilama kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo nkpe lǝ lekpake nǝ lɛfi mfó . Óte asa lǝ Yedafɔ eto ntsyakɔ . Óbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya óte asa itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ótsya betidi efimbi efimbi kenke .
40009036	Nya se únyǝ sitiditu siamǝǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo itsyise ǝsuǝ ába mǝ , nya bánkɛ ɔwɔnsǝkotsyuǝ saa , nya beyifo fe basamu ba lǝmbǝ obebe .
40009037	Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bɛkuɛnke bia díkayo bulǝkǝ fui , fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ emfui .
40009038	Nyaso bɛlɛ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lekpakpa lǝ otsyese beyifoyifo lǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ bɛkuɛnkǝ biamǝ . ”
40010001	Yesu ákpadi wǝ batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ɔ́kɔ nya útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bala awɔnɔ bua bǝlǝkǝlǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya lǝ batsya mǝ efimbi , efimbi saa tsya .
40010002	Batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto aye ni Simon wǝ bensi baakpo Petro ku wǝ ɔyimi Andrea ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimi wǝ baakpo Yohanes baa ni Sebedeo eto bebi
40010003	ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Toma ku Mateo wǝ laafo umǝnko ku Yakobo wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi ku Tadeo
40010004	ku Simon wǝ ditsyi Kana ku Yuda Iskariot wǝ dídu Yesu útǝ .
40010005	Yesu ǝtsyǝ lefosi betidi inuǝ bamfo kusu nya ótsyese mǝ nya úkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biensu betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto kasɔ nye bidufǝ Samariafɔ eto umǝ saa tsya kafo .
40010006	Bomu bisu Israel bebi ba diyifo fe basamu ba lénya kusu ɔflɔ .
40010007	Bisu bebe letsya biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto eto Sekakedidi eboyo selo . ’
40010008	Betsya befimfi lǝ betakasǝ mba díkpǝ . Betsya mba nlɛ bufisia bufi , lǝ bela awɔnɔ bua bitsyiko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Bíanya ǝsuǝale nyamfo bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ nyaso mi tsya biemfi nnya bete befo atabi .
40010009	Bientsyi atabi saa lǝ mi katobe .
40010010	Mi kuutsyuǝ mentsyi otobe fe mba laatɔ asa , awu nuǝfǝ , afɔkpa nye ɔlɛ uyi ɔyɛ kusu . Uyifoyifo ǝńyǝ utǝ lesa nǝ wuudi .
40010011	“ Lǝ bidufǝ umǝ nye kebuto kǝtsyuǝǝ , bɛbɛbɛ utidi sɛɛ wǝ loola nkǝ woafo mi . Bɛsɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ bɛkɛ mfo isu ese lefe nǝ biudu .
40010012	Lǝ bidufǝ diyo ditsyuǝ , bisiǝsǝ mǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ mi . ’
40010013	Lǝ báfo mi ku kafo faa , bitǝ lǝ mi diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamfó lǝ kǝsiǝ ku diyo nǝmfó kenke eto utsyuǝ saa . Nya lǝ bamfo mii , diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamfó bǝ mi ɔflɔ .
40010014	Nya lǝ diyo nye umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi mámfo mi nye báni bámfo mi ditikii , nyalɛ bidu mfó lǝ bɛflɛ mi nkpafo eto site bekpo lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
40010015	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝ Onanto lookponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ Sodom ku Gomora eto betidi kaminsǝ kulaa tsya oso umǝ ǝmfo eto bale .
40010016	“ Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ ! Nlɛ mi botsyese fe basamu lǝ bekiti eto nti . Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ fe bawa seka , nya bɛlɛ mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ fe ablonima .
40010017	Bebe mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , itsyise betidi ebumuǝ mi , bakpa mi besuko akpokakpokɔ . Bɔɔblɛ mi lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ .
40010018	Lǝ mɔ disi esoo , bookponko mi akpo lǝ Aba eto beninǝ ku baka eto ǝnǝmi . Lǝ mfóo , bɛtɛyi mǝ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
40010019	Lǝ bákpa mi bésuko lekpokakpokɔɔ , biembu disi lǝ lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi , nye kase biɔtɛyi nnya . Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ayoo , boote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi .
40010020	Itsyise inni mi loote etiki nnya buidi , bomu mi Anto Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ luudi etiki ɔyɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
40010021	“ Betidi ebudu mǝ bayimi bǝtǝ bǝ balo . Nya antomǝ tsya luuyifo nko ke ku mǝ bebi . Bebi ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ antomǝ ǝsuǝ bedu mǝ bǝtǝ bǝ balo .
40010022	Utsyuǝ saa ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luuńyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese kalosǝkɔɔ , boofo wǝ lǝ nkpǝ .
40010023	Lǝ bati mi kama lǝ umǝ ɔnii , bitsyetsyi bisu umǝ bamba . Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , biembuyifo mi keyifo belosǝ lǝ Israel eto kǝmǝ ka kenke fɛ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi luubǝ .
40010024	“ Okasebi saa aanso wǝ oteasa . Odomunyǝ saa tsya aanso wǝ onamute .
40010025	Nyasoo , ele bǝ imi , okasebi saa nkǝ wuubǝ utsyǝ fǝ wǝ oteasa seka . Nya ndomunyǝ tsya luubǝ utsyǝ fe wǝ onamute . Nya lǝ bákpadi oyosate utsyuǝ bǝ Awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko nyaalɛ nte aye bua nya eto okle bembokpo diyo nǝmǝ eto bebi ?
40010026	“ Nyaso biante betidi sikpi , itsyise lesa saa nǝ ǝsuǝ béti asa bakulaa , bɔɔsini asa lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , nya asakulakula saa ebɔbɔɔ lekple banɔ .
40010027	Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ ketuntu lefee , bɛtɛyi nnya lǝ kalekpakpa ǝsuǝ . Nya lesa nǝ batɛyi mi lǝ kawɛ ǝsuǝ , bebe nya letsya lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔnɔ .
40010028	Biante mba ini etidisuǝ ete boofo bolo fɛ bembofo okla bolo sikpi . Bomu bete Onanto wǝ loofo utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ bolo lǝ ute wǝ laatonsǝ asa sikpi .
40010029	Lǝ efi kablɛ kanii , foofo ntsyuɛ nnuǝ boya tsyaa , ke kani kplo embukpǝ lǝ inni Boanto Onanto eto lelabi .
40010030	Nya mimii , Onanto yi mi disi eto sɛwɔni eto leklabi kenke .
40010031	Nyaso biante sikpi , itsyise befo koya beso baklɔbɛ kpǝ .
40010032	“ Utsyuǝ saa wǝ luulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ betidi nti ɔtɛyi nkǝ uyifo mɔ olee , mintsya ebofo wǝ fe moole lǝ mɔ Anto Onanto eto ǝnǝmi kato .
40010033	Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ áni mɛ lǝ betidi ba tã eto ǝnǝmii , mintsya ebɔni wǝ lǝ mɔ Anto wǝ kato eto ǝnǝmi .
40010034	“ Biembu biǝ mbǝ diyuǝ kabokokɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ . Owo lo ! Mǝmbǝ diyuǝ kabokokɔ , bomu kabia !
40010035	Mbǝ miǝ mǝǝnǝ kabia nkpe ‘ lǝ bebisaibi ku mǝ antomǝ lenti , lǝ bebisiobi ku mǝ ambemǝ lenti , lǝ bebisiǝ ku mǝ bese ambe mǝ lenti .
40010036	Nya utidi eto olo sitintii , ebutsyi wǝ kosate eto diyo kafo . ’
40010037	“ Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laala wǝ anto nye ambe oso mɛɛ , mǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi . Nko ke ini bǝ utsyuǝ saa ke laala wǝ ubisaibi nye ubisiobi kulaa tsya oso mɛɛ , yǝnńyǝ itǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
40010038	Utsyuǝ saa ke dímentsyi wǝ uyikabie ɔyɛ mɔ kayɛkɔ utǝkǝko mɛɛ , mǝnńyǝ utǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
40010039	Utsyuǝ saa ke lela nkǝ waata wǝ nkpǝ eto disii , ebonyansǝ mu . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko esoo , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo sitinti .
40010040	“ Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo mii , mɔ ofo . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke loofo mɛɛ , ofo nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya .
40010041	Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi nkǝ uyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi esoo , ebunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kayofofo ka woofo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ itsyise uyifo ɔsɛɛnyǝ esoo , wǝ ku utidi ǝmǝ ebofo kayofofo itsyi lǝ keyifo ka úyifo eso .
40010042	Bebe nyamfo kukɔnɔ bǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luutǝ ntu yududu eto lɛkɔbetɔ mɔ bakasebi bamfo eto utsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nti lǝ mɔ disii , ebunyǝ kayofofo lǝ nnya eso kokooko . ”
40011001	Lefe nǝ Yesu dílǝkǝ wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamfo útsyǝ mǝ kusu ólosǝǝ , údu mfó úsu óte asa nnya óbe nnya letsya lǝ kǝmǝ kamǝ ku nka letsyilama mfó .
40011002	Lefe nǝmǝǝ , se Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes wǝ nkpe lǝ Aba eto diyo lɛnɔ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ buyifoo , ókpe wǝ bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ Yesu ɔflɔ .
40011003	Bésu bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo . Fǝ ni utidi wǝ Yohanes lɛtɛyi nkǝ ǝǝbǝ bubǝǝ , lee bobe obamba kusu ? ”
40011004	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bisu bɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nnya bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ ku nnya bɛnlɛ bunyǝ .
40011005	Bǝnǝmba lɛ bunyǝ , nya mba leba bankpo lǝ kasɔ lɛ bɔyɛ . Mba nlɛ bufisia bufi eto ǝsuǝ lɛ bokpa , batoti lɛ bɔnɔ , balɛ bekpǝnkpǝ botakasǝ kǝnyǝnsǝ , nya banlɛ bakombo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyi .
40011006	Diyuǝ itǝ mba dimǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
40011007	Se Yohanes eto bakasebi bamǝ dídu bantɔɔ , Yesu édi betidi bamǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Yohanes ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Se bísu Yohanes ɔflɔ lǝ mfimintii , be béfo bɛnɔ biǝ biunyǝ ? Lefanto nǝ ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ kafe lee ?
40011008	Be bísu kabekɔ fɛɛ ? Utidi wǝ nkpe bikǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ bia laanɔ bobe lee ? Betidi ba laakpe bikǝ biamfo eto oklee , Lekayo baakɛ .
40011009	Bɛtɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ kon bísu kabekɔ ! Biǝ biesu bebe Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi lee ? Ee , lǝ sitinti wǝ uni nɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ bínyǝǝ , so Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kulaa tsya .
40011010	Itsyise Yohanes ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝnkǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ ɔtɔnkpe ntɔnsǝ fǝ bubǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔlɔ fǝ kusu utsyǝ . ’
40011011	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes amɔ oso utsyuǝ saa wǝ usio léle lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Fɛɛ nwǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔɔ , amɔ oso Yohanes ǝmǝ .
40011012	Idu lǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto lefe ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , balɛ bota kekleke ku kǝnǝmisɛ lǝ kato eto sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mba ńyǝ lǝ se ǝsuǝ ku kǝnǝmisɛ tinti lɛ bokplatsya bǝ beeti se bubǝ kusu .
40011013	Ibǝ ese lǝ Yohanes eto lefee , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku Moses eto afi edi etiki itsyi lǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
40011014	Nya lǝ bela biǝ biafo mɔ dítiki bɛnɔɔ , Yohanes ni Elia , wǝǝ eto bubǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ .
40011015	Nwǝ ato nkpee , utsyue ato lǝ ɔnɔ .
40011016	“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , be muufi mmi eto betidi nkatesǝ ko ? Beyifo fe bekpefi ba laakpe kɔyɛ lǝ asi . Lekpa lɔni afa kakpadi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ katɛyi nkǝ ,
40011017	‘ Búse kusiǝkpakpa eto ese butǝ mi , Fɛɛ bɛni kewui buwui . Bóto keku eto ese butǝ mi , Fɛɛ bienwi nku . ’
40011018	Itsyise lefe nǝ Yohanes díbǝǝ , ókle kɛnyɛ nya wǝnnǝ nte . Nya utsyuǝ saa lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Utsyi lɛwɔnɔ bua . ’
40011019	Fɛɛ se Utidi Eto Ubi díbǝǝ , údi únǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Be utidi ǝmfo ! Uyifo udikpuu ku utenǝ , mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ ! ’ Fɛɛ utidi eto eyifosa ǝsuǝǝ , nya woǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto kobe ko nkpe wǝ kate nɛ . ”
40011020	Kǝmǝ ka ǝsuǝ Yesu díyifo ayanisa kpǝ eto betidi mántsyi báwuninsǝ bafo banɔ . Nyaso ílǝ wǝ itǝ mǝ .
40011021	Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ fǝ Korasim ! Nya mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ fǝ Betsaida ! Lǝ ayanisa nnya béyifo lǝ mi ete béyifo lǝ Tiro ku Sidon innii , eni mfó eto betidi ebɔtsyi bawuninsǝ kokoko , befi atoku eto mfia beti , bediki ntɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ ete bǝ bani mǝ abua .
40011022	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ kaminsǝ eso mi .
40011023	Nya fǝ Kapernaum , bubu fanlɛ fǝ Onanto ebobesǝ fǝ kato ? Boobokosǝ fǝ kasɔ bato fǝ bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ ke ! Lǝ ayanisa nnya minyifo lǝ fǝ ete mínyifo lǝ Sodom , eni usi okpe eyo mmi !
40011024	Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ lekpo yi fɛfɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ Sodom kaminsǝ tinti oso fǝ ! ”
40011025	Lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Anto , kato ku kasɔ eto Onamute . Maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise ǝlǝkǝ asa nnya lɛkula babesibe ku bekuente áté mba lennyi kulesa .
40011026	Ee , Anto , sitinti , nko fála fǝ ibǝ itǝ nɛ .
40011027	“ Mɔ Anto éfi asa nnya kenke útǝ mɛ . Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi Ubi ǝmǝ enso Anto . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa enyi Anto ǝmǝ enso Ubi ǝmǝ ku mba Ubi ǝmǝ laala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ oté .
40011028	“ Bibǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mimba ntsyi bike kinkinki bia nlɛ mi bulǝ , lǝ ntǝ lǝ bitsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
40011029	Bibǝ lǝ busie mɔ bitsyike butǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bekase asa bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ , itsyise nkpe lefonǝ nya mimbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
40011030	Itsyise bitsyikǝ bia muutsyisǝ mi ǝyuǝ , nya bitsyikǝ bia muutsyisǝ mi tsya eyifo fomfloo . ”
40012001	Lǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ésu báyɛ akpa eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ kafo báfe lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . Se kukpɛnsǝ lɛlɛ wǝ bakasebi bamǝǝ , bétsyiko edisa nyamǝ bufǝsǝ kayimi .
40012002	Se Farisifɔ bamǝ dínyǝ nyamfoo , bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ bakasebi éyifo lesa nǝ díńyǝ lǝ bo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto afi ǝsuǝ ! ”
40012003	Mfó Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo lǝ lefe nǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ betidi ?
40012004	Údufǝ Onanto eto diyo , nya wǝ ku wǝ betidi dífi lesa nǝ bákpo atsyɔ bǝtǝ Onanto bédi , lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu nko , ini mba lǝǝtǝ Onanto kedi hã nkpe kusu beedi lebolo nǝmǝ .
40012005	Nye bíankla lǝ Moses eto afi biǝnkǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi saa , besumunyǝ ba nkpe lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo ékeyifo asa nnya díńyǝ lǝ diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , tsya fɛɛ bánlo mǝ dikpi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ?
40012006	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝǝ , lesaatsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo nǝ lɛmɔ lenso Disumuyo Kplɛ .
40012007	Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , ‘ Kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ni lesa nǝ maabɛbɛ , inni bebuki eto keditǝtǝ . ’ Lǝ bǝ bɛnɔ nyamfo kasɔ tutuutuu , eni biembokpo akpofukutu belo betidi ekpi .
40012008	Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto Onamute . ”
40012009	Mfó nya Yesu dídu úsu Yudafɔ eto Katsyakɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
40012010	Mfóo , úsu únyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ eto kɔni , kɔni díkpǝ . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó ba léla bǝ bábɛbɛ etiki bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ óta kɔfi ubu , nyaso bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝ batsya ufimfi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ? ”
40012011	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ mi utsyuǝ eto osamu ákpia údufǝ lǝ dibiǝku ǝsuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , wǝmbunǝ wǝ ulǝkǝ ?
40012012	Fɛɛ utidi afo koya oso osamu ! Nyalɛ , bo kɔfi mǝntǝ bo kusu nkǝ bɔwunsǝko kuutsyuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . ”
40012013	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi osani wǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue . ” Únǝ ko útsyue , nya kɔni komǝ disi kótsya wǝ fe kase kunuǝfǝ komǝ nte .
40012014	Nya Farisifɔ ba díńyǝ mfó dídu nya béfi nsusu bǝ boolo Yesu .
40012015	Se Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bákle kɛnyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , údu mfó , nya betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ . Ótsya befimfi kenke .
40012016	Nya úti mǝ kusu nkǝ bǝntǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bate bǝ wǝ uni .
40012017	Ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nko bǝ lǝ Onanto eto nnya ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ sitinti nkǝ ,
40012018	“ Nwǝ mfo ni mɔ uyifoyifo wǝ mínlǝkǝ mintsyǝ , nwǝ maala , nya mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ tinti . Muutǝ mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ lǝ dibǝ disiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woobe mɔ lekpokponkpo letsya utǝ kawunsiǝ kenke .
40012019	Weembunǝ etiki ku betidi nye ofã kuutsyuǝ , nya bǝmbɔnɔ wǝ etiki ku bofa lǝ obia .
40012020	Wɔɔkɛ dibusǝ utǝ mba lǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wuunyǝ mba diyifole saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kaminsǝ . Wɔɔlɛnko nko kekleke isu ese lefe nǝ mɔ ɔnukualɛ eto lekpokponkpo luutǝkǝ kato .
40012021	Nya betidi ba kenke luufi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ . ”
40012022	Mfó nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ lékpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ awɔnɔ bua nlɛ bulǝ , wǝ ni unǝmba nya uyifo nwǝ lendi etiki tsya báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu átsya wǝ itǝ ófo etiki budi , kǝnyǝ asa tsya .
40012023	Ayanisa nnya Yesu díyifo mfó éyifo betidi bamfó yanii , nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni nwǝmfo ni Oka David eto ufluflu wǝ bákpo ɔhile bǝtsyǝ ? ”
40012024	Se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Woala ɔwɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝale nya awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko Beelsebul dítǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40012025	Yesu áte mǝ nsusu nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sekakedikɔ saa sia laama akpa akpa , kǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ebɔkɛ sɛklɛ . Nya umǝ nye diyo saa nǝ laama akpa akpa kǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , eboba lǝ akpa .
40012026	Nyaso lǝ lekpa lɔni lɛ lekpa nuǝfǝ bɔkpɔnko lǝ Obonsam eto sekakedikɔɔ , ete bǝnkǝ dioba akpa , nya diǝmbɔklɛ fɛ dioba lekpo lǝ kasɔ .
40012027	Lǝ bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝ awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ maayɛ kala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ bawe eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ mba ntǝkǝko mi laayɛ kala mǝ kǝlǝkǝ ? Lesa nǝ mi kosate eto mba ntǝkǝko mi leeyifoo , lǝ bote bǝ bɛnlɛ sitinti bɔtɛyi .
40012028	Inni Beelsebul bomuu , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ni lǝǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale bǝ nla awɔnɔ bua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi ébutsyǝ kasɔ lǝ mi nti koko .
40012029	“ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo botaka kedufǝ lǝ ǝsuǝaletidi eto diyo ete utsyiko wǝ bikǝ butsyi , lenni bǝ ófo ǝsuǝaletidi ǝmǝ bumuǝ kakle fɛ woofo budufǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ketsyi wǝ bikǝ .
40012030	“ Utidi wǝ ke lentǝkǝko mɛɛ , uńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya nwǝ ke lanwunsǝko mɛ lǝ bɔsɛketsyue ǝsuǝ eesensǝ nnya .
40012031	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , boofi abua saa béyifo ku etiki bua saa bédi batsyɛ mǝ , fɛɛ nwǝ ke luudi etiki nnya diíyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ alɛɛ , bembufi nnya batsyɛ wǝ .
40012032	Nya utsyuǝ wǝ ke luudi etiki uńyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝǝ , boofo bufi katsyɛ wǝ , fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke luudi etiki uńyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , bembufi batsyɛ wǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo lee mbo luubǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
40012033	“ Kuyi sɛɛ saa aanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , nya kuyi bua saa tsya aanwɔ ebibi bua . Bǝǝtsyǝ kuyi lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ ebibi nnya koanwɔ ǝsuǝ .
40012034	Mimba lɛbɔ bitsyi lǝ bawa eto kafo ǝsuǝ ! Asa sɛɛ aambɔ ketsyi lǝ mi kɛnyɛ ! Itsyise lesa nǝ diyi mi ketu ǝsuǝǝ , nnya mi kɛnyɛ lǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ .
40012035	Utidi sɛɛ , asa sɛɛ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ nya ini nnya wǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ . Nya utidi bua tsyaa , abua nnya nkpe lǝ wǝǝ , nnya wǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ .
40012036	Nla miǝ ekpa ko mi wee bǝ , lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , utsyuǝ saa ebutǝ etiki bimba saa nnya lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto nkunta .
40012037	Itsyise fǝ kosate eto etiki nnya lɛbɔ fǝ lǝ kɛnyɛɛ , nya buufi bakponko fǝ lekpo balofǝ dikpi lee bǝtǝ fǝ lɛbɛ nɛ . ”
40012038	Mfó nya afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bola boǝ yifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ até lǝ bobe . ”
40012039	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bebe , mi mmi eto betidi ba leesumu bǝfiǝ ku asa bimba . Bela biǝ biǝnyǝ ayanisa itsyi mɔ ɔflɔ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ ayanisa saa enso nnya dítsyi Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yona ɔflɔ .
40012040	Fe kase Yona dísiǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku ntsye ntsyǝ lǝ lɛkpɛ kplɛ ditsyuǝ eto kafoo , nko ke Utidi Eto Ubi tsya lɔɔkɛ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku ntsye ntsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ kǝmiǝ nɛ .
40012041	Lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Ninive eto betidi ebuńyǝ balo mi dikpi itsyise bátsyi bawuninsǝ se bánɔ Yona lébe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mi , utsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo wǝ lɛmɔ onso Yona .
40012042	Lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Besio eto Oka wǝ dítsyi Ɔnwɛdikue ebotaka uńyǝ olo mi dikpi , itsyise ɔ́yɛ utsyi taa mfó úsu Oka Salomo ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ usu ɔnɔ Oka Salomo eto abesibetiki . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lesatsyuǝ nǝ nso Oka Salomo eto kobe kpe mi lenti mfo .
40012043	“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ bala lɛwɔnɔ bua bǝlǝkǝ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝǝ , diesukayɛ nlebe nlebe bo lekoe kabɛbɛ kasɔnɔkɔ . Nya lǝ diǝnnyǝ kedufǝkɔ saa ,
40012044	diatɛyi ni ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Muusinkli nsu kaka mínsiǝ kɔ . ’ Lǝ dibǝ dinyǝ nkǝ mfó te fufuu , bákpa mfó nya betsyue bikǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ ni kafoo .
40012045	Diesinkli kesu kakpa awɔnɔ bua akuanse bamba nnya nkpe ale enso ni nya beesinkli kesu kǝsiǝ mfó . Nya lǝ kalokɔɔ , utidi ǝmǝ eto asayifoyifo aabia kaso nnya kɔ . Nko yuutsyǝ itǝ mi mmi eto betidi bua bamfo nɛ . ”
40012046	Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi nlɛ etiki budi ku betidi bamǝǝ , wǝ ambe ku wǝ bayimisani ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ lekple mfó nya bála bǝ bedinko wǝ etiki .
40012047	Nya betidi ba díńyǝ mfó eto ɔni dísu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bebe , fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimisani ńyǝ lǝ lekple bǝ bala bǝ beedinko fǝ etiki . ”
40012048	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ambe nya bawe ni mɔ bayimisani ? ”
40012049	Nya óté wǝ bakasebi kɔni ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ambe ku mɔ bayimisani !
40012050	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato eto lelabii , wǝ ni mɔ ɔyimisani ku mɔ ɔyimisio ku mɔ ambe nɛ . ”
40013001	Diyi nǝmfó kee , Yesu édu lǝ diyo úsu lekpo kɛnyɛ . Úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ útsyiko asa boté .
40013002	Betidi ba díbǝ bátsyilama wǝ efui tinti eso údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ , nya sitiditu siamǝ díńyǝ lǝ utuflɔ mfó .
40013003	Údi mǝ etiki kpǝ ɔ́yɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , utsyuǝ uni ésu úsǝ eyibibi lǝ ɔkuɛ .
40013004	Se ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ nya baklɔbɛ díbǝ básɛ nnya bámini .
40013005	Eyibibi nyamǝ ǝtsyuǝ tsya álo ékpo lǝ abanse ǝsuǝ , kaka sitǝ lemfui . Íkǝ mlǝ itsyise site siamǝ memfui .
40013006	Fɛɛ se kofe lefaa , eyibibi nyamǝ díkǝǝ , áblobe nya íkpǝ itsyise nnya keyudu méndufǝ isu kasɔ etsyo .
40013007	Eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ biyu nti . Nya se íkee , biyu biamǝ áto íti nnya .
40013008	Fɛɛ eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya se íkǝ ébee , ɛnwɔ ebibi . Ǝtsyuǝ anwɔ kolofa , ǝtsyuǝ tsya awosi akua , nya ǝtsyuǝ tsya lɛnwɔ awosi ǝtsyǝ . ”
40013009	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa nkpee , nɔ ! ”
40013010	Nya Yesu eto bakasebi díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso feedi betidi etiki kayɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ ? ”
40013011	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mimii , béfi kato eto sekakedikɔ eto asakulakula bǝtǝ mi , fɛɛ inni betidi bamba .
40013012	Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ nya wɔɔkɛ kpǝ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
40013013	Nnya eso meedi mǝ etiki kayɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ ni nkǝ , balɛ asa bunyǝ ku ǝnǝmi , fɛɛ bǝǝnnyǝ kǝtsyǝ lekpo . Balɛ bɔnɔ , tsya fɛɛ baannɔ nye banɔ kasɔ .
40013014	Nyaso Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto nnya ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ ǝbǝ itǝ nko bǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfo ebɔnɔ bãã , fɛɛ bǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ ! Boonyǝ asa bãã , fɛɛ bǝmbunyǝ ekpanko mǝ
40013015	Itsyise disi ǝkpǝ betidi bamfó . Lenni nko inii , eni mǝ ǝnǝmi ebunyǝ asa wuee . Mǝ ato tsya ebɔnɔ asa nnya mǝ nsusu tsya lɔɔnɔ asa kasɔ , nya bɔɔtsyi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝ mɛ , nko Onanto lɛtɛyi nɛ , nya mootsya mǝ bufi . ’
40013016	Fɛɛ mii , disiɛkpɛ kpe mi tinti , itsyise mi ǝnǝmi ǝǝnyǝ asa nnya mi ato tsya laanɔ asa .
40013017	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku basɛɛ kpǝ ábɛbɛ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya bɛnlɛ buunyǝ , fɛɛ bǝnyǝ nya lǝ banɔ asa nnya bɛnlɛ bɔɔnɔ , fɛɛ bánnɔ . ”
40013018	Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ lǝ nlǝkǝ nwǝ dísǝ eyibibi eto lekpá eto kasɔ nte mi .
40013019	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi eto letsyabebe fɛ woannɔ ni kasɔɔ , eyifo fe eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ usunte ɔflɔ nya olontidi ǝmǝ lǝǝbǝ kǝnǝ nnya báto mfó kǝlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi .
40013020	Eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kabansesɔɔ , ńyǝ itǝ betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baafo ni ku disuǝyuǝ lamfolamfo .
40013021	Fɛɛ se dianyɛ kedufǝ lǝ mǝ ketu kesu kǝmiǝ esoo , diǝnsiǝ lǝ mǝ kaklɛ . Nyaso lǝ bulǝ nye kamatiti kǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ iku lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ esuǝǝ , yealo mǝ ani lamfolamfo nya bǝǝtǝ disi .
40013022	Eyibibi nnya dídufǝ lǝ biyu nti ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ disibubu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ ku ke setabikɛ sia laawɛ utidi kakpee , aato keti ditiki nǝmǝ , itǝ diannwɔ ebibi .
40013023	Nya eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baanɔ ni kasɔ . Nya dianwɔ ebibi , ǝtsyuǝ kolofa , ǝtsyuǝ awosi akua , nya ǝtsyuǝ tsya awosi ǝtsyǝ . ”
40013024	Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpá bamba nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale utsyuǝ wǝ díse eyibibi sɛɛ lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ .
40013025	Lǝ ketsye eto lefe nǝ utsyuǝ saa nlabe selabee , olontidi utsyuǝ ésu úsǝ eyibibi wuliwuli ókpo lǝ akpa nyamǝ nti nya údu .
40013026	Se eyibibi nyamǝ lébe itsyiko bɔnwɔɔ , sefa sia olontidi ǝme dísu úse ókpo lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ tsya étsyiko ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ kate .
40013027	“ Mfó nya ɔkuɛnsate eto beyifoyifo dísu bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Boanto , búnyǝ boǝ eyibibi sɛɛ fesǝ lǝ fǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . Nya se sefa siamfo dítsyi ? ’
40013028	“ Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Olontidi utsyuǝ díyifo nyamfo nɛ . ’ “ Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Ala fǝ busu busu sefa siamǝ bulǝkǝ ? ’
40013029	“ Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Owo , itsyise lǝ bisu sefa siamǝ kesukɔ kǝlǝkǝǝ , biofo akpa eto ǝtsyuǝ tsya busu kǝlǝkǝ ku sefa siamǝ .
40013030	Bitǝ lǝ sefa siamǝ ku akpa nyamǝ lǝ ińyǝ isu ese dilǝkǝfe . Lefe nǝmfóo , muutǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ tɔ̃ baka sefa siamǝ bulǝkǝ kakle etsyu , etsyu batonsǝ fɛ lǝ batɔ bǝlǝkǝ akpa nyamǝ . Nya lǝ bekpa ebibi nyamǝ bekpo lǝ mɔ kenwu ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
40013031	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpá bamba ditsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale utidi wǝ léto diyibibi kɛkɛ ditsyuǝ lǝ wǝ kasɔ .
40013032	Diyifo diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ ni bǝtsyuǝ nti . Fɛɛ lǝ díkǝ lébee , diamɔ kafiani kuyi ko laaso bɔmɔ lǝ ko bǝtsyuǝ kenke nti . Diesense kalɛ nya baklɔbɛ lǝǝbǝ kato ayo lǝ ko kalɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
40013033	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa bamba nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ nte . Site fe usio wǝ dífi ǝyǝnkisǝsa otsyakasǝ ku ntabinamfo eto utu utsyuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ nnamfo wɔwɔ bomǝ kenke letaka . ”
40013034	Yesu éfi akpá óte betidi bamǝ asa nyamfo kenke . Wéndi mǝ etiki saa nnya dímanyɛ lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ .
40013035	Úyifo nko itǝ lǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Muudi mǝ etiki nyɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ . Muudi mǝ etiki nnya nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝ idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke . ”
40013036	Yesu édu lǝ betidi bamǝ ɔflɔ nya úsu diyo . Nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ lekpá nǝ fátɛyi bo itsyi lǝ sefa wunyɛwunyɛ sia lɛkɛ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ kasɔ ate bo . ”
40013037	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nwǝ dísǝ eyibibi sɛɛ nyamǝ ni mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi .
40013038	Ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ni kawunsiǝ . Nya eyibibi sɛɛ nyamǝ ni mba nkpe lǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ . Sefa siamǝ ni betidi ba ni olontidi ǝmǝ eto bale .
40013039	Nya olontidi wǝ dísǝ sefa bua siamǝ ni Obonsam . Bidikǝ dilǝkǝfe ni kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ . Nya mba lǝǝlǝkǝ bidike biamǝ ni Onanto eto batɔnkpe .
40013040	“ Fe kase baakpa sefa kǝtsyǝ ditsyu katonsǝǝ , nko ke yuubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ nɛ .
40013041	Mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebotsyese mɔ batɔnkpe lǝ bǝlǝkǝ asa nnya lǝǝtǝ boeyifo abua ku babuayifo kenke betsyiko Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
40013042	Boofi mǝmblɛ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ . Mfó boowi nku bayimi animi !
40013043	Nya Onanto eto betidi luuyǝnde fe kofe lǝ mǝ Onanto eto umǝ . Mba ato nkpee , tsyue ato lǝ banɔ !
40013044	“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale bikǝ bia lefo koya béfi bákula lǝ ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ , nya utsyuǝ dísu ɔ́kɛ nnya nya úsi úfi ɔ́kula . Únyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , nyaso úsu úfi wǝ lesa saa óte nya úfí úsu óya ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . ”
40013045	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale nwǝ laate bikǝ wǝ nlɛ atsyabi nnya laanɔ bobe tinti bɔbɛbɛ .
40013046	Se úsu únyǝ ɔni wǝ lefo koya tinti onsoo , úfi lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ úsu óte nya úsu óya otsyabi ǝmǝ . ”
40013047	Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ esi sele asabu nnya báta bákpo lǝ lekpo , nnya bǝlǝkǝ akpɛ ate ate kpǝ .
40013048	Nya lefe nǝ asabu nyamǝ díyii , bǝnǝ nnya bábɔnko lǝ ntu báboko ditukpenkpe nya bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ nya básɛ akpɛ nyamǝ bǝlǝkǝ . Básɛ edidi bákpo lǝ etsyitsya , nya básɛ nnya beendi béwui .
40013049	Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ nɛ . Onanto eto batɔnkpe ebubǝ bǝlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ betsyiko lǝ babua nti .
40013050	Nya booto babuayifo bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ . Mfó nya nkuwiwi ku anyiyimiyimi lɔɔkɛ . ”
40013051	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ asa nyamfo kasɔ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Ee . ”
40013052	Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , afi eto oteasa saa wǝ léfiani Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto okasebi , ale Onamute utsyuǝ wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ bike fɔfɔ ku bekoko lǝ mi kakulakɔ kaboko lekple . ”
40013053	Nya se Yesu lɛtɛyi akpá nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , údu mfo .
40013054	Úsinkli úsu mǝ umǝ , nya óte asa lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ . Nya betidi ba lɛnɔ wǝ asatetee , íyifo mǝ yanii , nya bátɔ bǝ , “ Sieti nwǝ mfo lékase kobe komfo eto okle útsyiko ? Nya sie únyǝ ǝsuǝale nnya ufi ɔnlɛ ayanisa nyamfo buyifo kate ?
40013055	Inni wǝ ni nwǝ laawoe keyi eto ubi ǝmǝ lee ? Nya eni Maria tsya ni wǝ ambe , nya wǝ bayimisani tsya ni Yakob , Yosef , Simon ku Yuda , nya wǝ bayimisio kenke tsya nkpe bo lenti mfo lee ?
40013056	Nya lǝ sieti ɔkɛ wǝ kobe ku ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle utsyiko ? ”
40013057	Nko ini bǝ wǝ asa eyifo mǝ kɛnyɛlele , nyaso báni wǝ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi kpe dibu lǝ kalebe saa , enso wǝ umǝ ku wǝ batokpenyǝ hã eto nti bǝ beembu wǝ . ”
40013058	Se bámfo bánɔ esoo , Yesu ményifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
40014001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Herodes wǝ dídi Seka Lǝ Galilea eto kasɔɔ , ánɔ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
40014002	Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ beyifoyifo nkǝ , “ Utidi emfo ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes wǝ bátakǝsǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , nyaso onkpe ǝsuǝale weeyifo ayanisa kate nɛ . ”
40014003	Ɔ́tɛyi nko itsyise Herodes ni nwǝ dítǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo . Úyifo nko lǝ Herodia wǝ ni wǝ ɔyimi Filipo eto usiǝ eso .
40014004	Itsyise Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes átɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Onanto eto kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ fi fǝ ɔyimi eto usiǝ Herodia . ”
40014005	Nyamfo eso Herodes ála nkǝ lǝ balo Yohanes . Fɛɛ óte Yudafɔ eto betidi sikpi , itsyise bébu Yohanes fe Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
40014006	Diyi lɔnii , se Herodes nlɛ wǝ leleyi budii , ókpadi betidi bǝbǝ . Nya Herodia eto ubisiobi díbǝ uwi kewi lǝ betidi kpǝ bamǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Nyamfo ákpe Herodes disuǝyuǝ tinti .
40014007	Mfó útsyǝ kɛnyɛ útǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ lesa saa bǝ muutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ ke fatɔ ! ”
40014008	Wǝ ambe ǝtǝ ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mɛ mɔmɔ mɔmɔ mfoo , Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto disi nǝ béfi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
40014009	Lesa nǝ disiobi nǝmfo lɛtɔ ǝlǝ Herodes efensɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ ka úkǝtsyǝ lǝ wǝ beninǝ ku mba ókpadi óboko mfó eto ǝnǝmi esoo , útǝ nkǝ beyifo lǝ disiobi nǝmǝ eto nnya ɔtɔ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ wǝ .
40014010	Nyaso ókpe utidi úsu óla Yohanes wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ Aba eto diyo eto disi .
40014011	Béfi disi nǝmǝ nkpe lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ disiobi nǝmǝ nya wuntsya dífi ni úsu útǝ wǝ ambe .
40014012	Yohanes eto bakasebi ǝbǝ bétsyi wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bésu bébike , nya bésu bátɛyi Yesu .
40014013	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bálo Yohanes , úsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ údu mfó úsu kaka lɛbiɔ . Fɛɛ se betidi lɛnɔ nkoo , bédu lǝ mǝ kǝmǝ , báyɛ akpa bésu kaka onkpe .
40014014	Mfó nya Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo . Nya se únyǝ sitiditu siamǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo nya ótsya mba ni befimfi .
40014015	Ditsyitsyo nǝmfóo , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Kale ebolo , nya mfo tsya atsyo ku umǝ . Nyaso yani betidi bamfo lǝ besu mbuto bo nkpe mfó lǝ besu baya lesatsyuǝ bedi . ”
40014016	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ bedu . Mi kosatee , bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ”
40014017	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ nte bo ete ni abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . ”
40014018	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi nnya beboko mɛ mfo . ”
40014019	Ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamfó nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ sefa ǝsuǝ . Nya ufi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ nyamǝ , nya óbesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Úbudi abolo nyamǝ nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi . Nya bakasebi bamǝ tsya dífi nnya bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
40014020	Utsyuǝ saa édi úmi . Nya se wǝ bakasebi lɛsɛ nnya bédi díbuu , íyi etsyitsya lefosi ǝnuǝ .
40014021	Basani ba dídi lesa nǝmǝ eyifo fe basani akpi anɔ . Fɛɛ bánkla besio ku bekpefi bákpe lenti .
40014022	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ bakasebi lébe bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ bákatɔ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Wǝ akɛ mfó nkǝ lǝ utsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu .
40014023	Se útsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu olosǝǝ , wǝ mate ábe úsu kɔtini kato úsu óto ola . Se ketsye lefe léyoo , wǝ mate hã ákɛ mfó .
40014024	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ébɔyɛ ótsyo . Ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ kekleke ketinkǝsǝ kufuǝ komǝ , nya ntu nlɛ bɔsɔ kedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo fe wuufusǝ .
40014025	Nya fe kolensiǝntu kplɛ eto abombo ǝtsyǝ ku olosiǝ eto abombo akua nti sekaa , Yesu áyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ úbǝ údufǝ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ .
40014026	Lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ mfóo , báte sikpi nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔkɔ uni ! ” Nyaso bétsyiko bofa ku sikpi bembembe !
40014027	Fɛɛ Yesu édi mǝ etiki lamfolamfo ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bekpe utu ! Mɔ uni ! Biante sikpi ! ”
40014028	Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ fǝ uni sitintii , tǝ lǝ nyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ mbǝ ntu fǝ . ”
40014029	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ” Nya Petro lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya útsyiko bɔyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ kesu Yesu ɔflɔ .
40014030	Fɛɛ se únyǝ kase ufiebi ǝmǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ alee , sikpi ǝmuǝ wǝ nya útsyiko bonya kedufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ kǝmiǝ . Mfó nya Petro lefã ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , fo ǝtǝ mɛ ! ”
40014031	Lamfolamfo Yesu ǝnǝ kɔni útsyue , ɔ́kɔbe wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ ǝmbǝ ale ! Beso fáyaki ? ”
40014032	Se mǝ inuǝ bamǝ dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafoo , ufiebi ǝmǝ ko lɛyɛ bɔsɔ .
40014033	Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ lése akonki básumu wǝ . Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ubi feni sitinti ! ”
40014034	Se báyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ báyo ditukpenkpe nǝ nsee , báyifǝ lǝ Genesaret eto kasɔ .
40014035	Mfoó , betidi bamǝ ǝnyǝ Yesu bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nyaso bésu bákpa befimfi ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekpake nǝmfó báboko Yesu ɔflɔ .
40014036	Bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ utǝ lǝ befimfi lǝ betidi wǝ awu eto atosi ete . Nya mba kenke dítidi wǝ awu eto atosii , mǝ bufi ǝyuǝ mǝ .
40015001	Nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Yerusalem díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
40015002	“ Beso fɛ fǝ bakasebi leenyifo lǝ bo banamǝ eto akpa ǝsuǝ ? Bǝǝmflǝ mǝ ani kukɔnɔ fe kase bo akpa laate fɛ beedi lesa ! ”
40015003	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya beso biani nya bienyifo lǝ Onanto eto afí ǝsuǝ fɛ biǝtǝkǝko mi batekoko , banakoko eto asatete kama ?
40015004	Itsyise Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . Nya utidi wǝ laakpadi wǝ anto ku ambe diye bua ditsyuǝǝ , ele bǝ balo wǝ . ’
40015005	Fɛɛ mi áte biǝ utidi nwǝ lesatsyuǝ nte nkǝ woofo ni bufi kawunsǝko wǝ anto nye ambe fɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mfi lesa nǝmfo ntsyǝ kɛnyɛ miǝ muufi ni ntǝ Onanto . ’
40015006	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , yensi fe bǝ bebu mǝ anto mǝ . Kusu komfo ǝsuǝ nya biayɛ kani Onanto eto kɔfi itǝ lǝ bitǝkǝko mi kosate eto asatete kama nɛ .
40015007	Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Asa nnya Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi útsyǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
40015008	Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfo efi mǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki fufu balɛ mɛ dibu butǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ utu kǝmiǝǝ , baanla mɛ .
40015009	Bimba ete beeyifo mɔ keyifo . Itsyise kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto asa ete baate lǝ mɔ ale eto kɛnyɛ . ’ ”
40015010	Mfó nya Yesu lékpadi sitiditu siamǝ oboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ asa nyamfo kasɔ !
40015011	Inni lesa nǝ leedufǝ utidi eto kɛnyɛ laabiasǝ wǝ , bomu etiki nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , nnya laabiasǝ wǝ nɛ . ”
40015012	Nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Eyi fǝnkǝ se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya fátɛyii , éla mǝ kɛnyɛ lele tinti ? ”
40015013	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kuyi saa kuyi ko mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe Kato dímantoo , boosu ko bewi .
40015014	Nyaso biankpe mǝ kɛnyɛ . Bete fe bǝnǝmba ba nyɛnko bǝnǝmba bamba . Nya lǝ unǝmba ɔni yɛnko unǝmba bambaa , mǝ inuǝ ba tã ebudu banɔ bedufǝ lǝ kubiǝ kafo . ”
40015015	Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ lekpa nǝmfo kasɔ ate bo . ”
40015016	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ betidi ba laannɔ asa kasɔ ete binsi binii ?
40015017	Binyi biǝ lesa saa nǝ didufǝ utidi lǝ kɛnyɛ , ayɛ kedufǝ wǝ lǝ kafo , nya weesie ni kabɔsǝ fe ɔflɔ kewi ?
40015018	Fɛɛ etiki nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ , aabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya nyamfo lǝǝtǝ utidi laanansǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kesumu eto kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ .
40015019	Itsyise itsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ nya diǝtǝ weeyifo asa bua fe ditidilo , sɛsɔnɔdi nye disenkpo , setsyetɔ , kuyu ku bidiatɛyitɛyi ku betidi eto ayebiasǝbiasǝǝ , laabɔ ketsyi nɛ .
40015020	Asa nyamfo eto kakle laanansǝ utidi nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ utidi mǝmflǝ kɔni fɛ udi lesa fe kase Farisifɔ laatee , nyamfo aannansǝ utidi . ”
40015021	Yesu édu mfó úsu lekpake nǝ lɛfi kǝmǝnkplɛ inuǝ ka ni Tiro ku Sidon ɔflɔ .
40015022	Mfó nya Kana eto usio utsyuǝ díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ , nya ókafã bembembe kalɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , Oka David eto kafo eto ubi , nyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝbǝ disi lǝ mɔ ubisiobi ǝsuǝ nya dítǝ ɔnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ fefe ! ”
40015023	Fɛɛ Yesu ménfe kɛnyɛ ɔtɛyi wǝ kulesa . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi lɛnyi besu balɛ wǝ lekpakpa bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ La wǝ lǝ udu , itsyise utǝkǝko bo ɔlɛ bofã ketisǝ bo ato ! ”
40015024	Nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Israel bebi nte fe basamu ba lénya ɔflɔ hã Onanto lékpe mɛ nkǝ nsu . ”
40015025	Mfó nya usio ǝmfo díbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , wunsǝko mɛ ! ”
40015026	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Yanlɛkɛ bǝ befi bekpefi eto didisa bato bakpe mǝ bakpa . ”
40015027	Usio ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , ite nko sitinti . Fɛɛ bakpa bamǝ tsya aafo didisa wɛlɛwɛlɛ nǝ lélo lékpo kasɔ lǝ mǝ onamute eto ɔpunu kalɔ budii . ”
40015028	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Eyifo usio wǝ nkpe bofokanɔ tinti ! Lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛɛ , lǝ ibǝ itǝ fǝ . ” Nyaso lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutu wǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ ǝmuǝ ale .
40015029	Yesu édu mfó , nya ɔyɛ lǝ Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ óbe kɔtini kutsyuǝ nya úsiǝ kasɔ .
40015030	Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bákpa mba léba bankpoo kasɔ , bǝnǝmba , abafa , bamumu , ku befimfi bamba kpǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ , nya ótsya mǝ bufi .
40015031	Iyifo betidi bamǝ yanii se bǝnyǝ bamumu nlɛ etiki budi , mba léba bankpoo kasɔ nlɛ botaka kayɛ , abafa nlɛ bɔyɛ , bǝnǝmba nlɛ asa bunyǝ nya bátɛsǝ Israel eto Onanto .
40015032	Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitiditu siamfo eto asa lɛ mɛ kaminsǝ , itsyise bǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ diyi tsyǝfǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nɛ , nya kulesa ente mɔmɔ boodi . Manla miǝ lǝ yani mǝ lǝ bedu ku kafo fufu , lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ isu enako mǝ lǝ kusu . ”
40015033	Wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti buunyǝ didisa butǝ mǝ lǝ mfimnti mfo bǝ lǝ betidi ba kpenkpe mfo lǝ bedi bemi ? ”
40015034	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Didisa lesia nte mi ? ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo akuanse ku akpɛ kɛkɛ asiani ete nte . ”
40015035	Nyaso Yesu átɛyi sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ .
40015036	Úfi abolo akuanse ku akpɛ nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ . Nya bésie nnya bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
40015037	Mǝmblɛ édi lesa nǝmǝ bemi . Nya se básɛ nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya díbuu , íyi etsyitsya akuanse .
40015038	Basani ba dídi lesa nǝmǝ eboyo akpi ana . Fɛɛ bánkla besio ku bekpefi bakpe lenti .
40015039	Se Yesu dítsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu olosǝǝ , údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya údu úsu Magadan eto lekpake eti .
40016001	Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bato wǝ babe . Nyaso bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ ate bo lǝ bote boǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ sitinti . ”
40016002	Fɛɛ Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kofe lɛ diyo budufǝ nya binyǝ asɔmiloku lɛsɛ hǝǝ , biatɛyi biǝnkǝ kalesɛ ebusiǝ kusɛɛ .
40016003	Nya kolesiǝntu lǝ kofe lɛ boto nya kawunsiǝ ditsyiko bona tũũ , biatɛyi biǝnkǝ ɔsɔmi ǝbǝ bɔni . Bialɛ ola akafo bote kase kawunsiǝ luubǝ kǝtsyǝ lǝ binyǝ asɔmiloku eto ditsyǝbi . Fɛɛ beso biǝmbofo asa nnya luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ bote !
40016004	Mi mmi eto betidi bua ba leesumu bǝfiǝ ! Bela biǝ nyifo ayanisa nte mi lǝ binyǝ ? Kulefe , membuyifo ! Ayanisa nnya eto okle boote mi ete ni nnya díbǝ lǝ Yona ǝsuǝ . ” Nyaso ótaka údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
40016005	Se bakasebi bamǝ lɛyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bésu ni lekpake nǝ nsee , bǝnyǝ bǝ báta ǝsuǝ béntsyi dídisa saa bésuko .
40016006	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ eto ǝyǝnkisǝsa nnya baakpe lǝ asa ǝsuǝ . ”
40016007	Mfó nya bétsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nnya bóentsyi didisa saa eso ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mmǝǝ . ”
40016008	Yesu áte lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi , nyaso ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ mi nti itsyi lǝ didisa nǝmǝ bíentsyi eso ǝsuǝ ? Mi bofokanɔ emfui !
40016009	Nyaso biannɔ tɔ asa kasɔ ? Biankloma tɔ lefe nǝ mínsie abolo anɔ míntǝ betidi akpi anɔ dídi bémi ? Nya etsyitsya asia nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ dibu díyi ?
40016010	Nya abolo akuanse nya mímfi míntǝ betidi akpi anaa , etsyitsya asia díyi se békpa nnya díbu ?
40016011	Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ biannɔ kasɔ biǝ inni didisa ǝsuǝ míndi mi etiki mintsyiko ? Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ lǝ mǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ ! ”
40016012	Nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ kasɔ bǝ inni ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ nɛ . Bomu lǝ asa nnya Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ laate ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ .
40016013	Yesu ésu lekpake nǝ lɛfi Kaisarea Filipi eto umǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Owoe betidi laatɛyi bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ni ? ”
40016014	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ bǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Bǝtsyuǝ tsya bǝ fǝ ni Elia , nya babamba tsya bǝ Yeremiya nye Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi bamba utsyuǝ feni . ”
40016015	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya mi nkpǝ ? Owoe biatɛyi biǝ wǝ mini ? ”
40016016	Simon Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Fǝ ni Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ eto Ubi . ”
40016017	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Simon , Yona eto ubi , átɛyi nnya ɛlɛkɛ . Itsyise ɔnukualɛ ǝmfo mámbɔ utsyi lǝ utidinini saa eto kɛnyɛ . Bomu mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe katoo , wǝ dílǝkǝ nnya óte fǝ nɛ .
40016018	Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ fǝ Petro , fǝ diye ni leba . Nya leba nǝmfo ǝsuǝ mooto mɔ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ ńyǝnsǝ , nya ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale kulaa tsya embutǝkǝ ni kato .
40016019	Muufi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kasafui ntǝ fǝ . Lesa saa nǝ fookle lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bookle ni kato . Nya lesa saa nǝ foonyankli lǝ kasɔ mfoo , boonyankli ni tsya kato . ”
40016020	Mfó nya Yesu lékpe wǝ bakasebi kɔfi nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyǝ saa biǝnkǝ mɔ ni Nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
40016021	Idu lǝ lefe nǝmfó ɛntɔɔ , Yesu étsyiko wǝ bakasebi etiki bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ nsu Yerusalem lǝ nsu nyǝ kanyi lǝ beninǝ , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku lǝ afi eto bateasa eto ani . Boolo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ mɛ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nsinkli mbǝ nkpǝ . ”
40016022	Petro ákpa wǝ úsuko lɛkpɔ , nya utsyiko buyǝnki kakpe wǝ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Kulefe , Bonamute ! Nyamfo eto okle okakaaka ! Yǝmbǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe , kulefe ! ”
40016023	Yesu átsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ ɔ́tɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Obonsam , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! Eyifo nwǝ eto eyifosa dińyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise fǝ nsusu bomfo menyifo Onanto eto nle , bomu utidinini eto nle . ”
