40016024	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ɔni wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ .
40016025	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laala nkǝ waata wǝ nkpǝ eto disii , woonyansǝ mu . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ mu .
40016026	Nte kutǝkǝ ko utidi luunyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ kenke afiani wǝ bele nya ónyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ . Nye be utidi luufi oflomako bǝ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
40016027	Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ebubǝ ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ , nya moofo utsyuǝ saa kayo lǝ keyifo ka úyifo ǝsuǝ .
40016028	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee minkǝ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo ba lembukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi dibǝ fe Oka . ”
40017001	Eyi akua kamaa , Yesu ákpa Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimi Yohanes mate úsuko kɔtini ko letaka eto disi kato .
40017002	Se bǝńyǝ mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝ Yesu eto ǝsuǝ áfloma . Wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛ buyǝnde fe kofe , nya awu nnya onkpe diflubi futututu ɛnlɛ boto lǝ ǝnǝmi .
40017003	Mfó nya bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ dínyǝ Moses ku Elia banlɛ etiki budi ku Yesu .
40017004	Nya Petro lébesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ɛlɛkɛ tinti bǝ búbǝ mfo ! Lǝ aalaa , mooto ebu ǝtsyǝ . Fǝ lɔni , Moses lɔni nya Elia tsya lɔni . ”
40017005	Se ɔnlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyii , lɛsɔmiloku nǝ nlɛ buyǝnde ábɔ díti mǝ , nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi lɛsɔmiloku nǝmǝ kǝmiǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ Ubi lala , wǝ ǝsuǝ mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Bitsyue wǝ koto ! ”
40017006	Se bakasebi itsyǝ bamfo lɛnɔ ɔkɔɛ ǝmfoo , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti nya béfi ǝnǝmi béfusǝ kasɔ .
40017007	Yesu ésu mǝ ɔflɔ nya útidi mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Betaka bińyǝ ! Biante sikpi ! ”
40017008	Se bátakasǝ ǝnǝmi bábe katoo , bǝnnyǝ kuutsyuǝ saa enso Yesu mate hã .
40017009	Se banlɛ bɔyifǝ lǝ kɔtini komǝ kǝbǝ kasɔɔ , Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kutsyuǝ saa lesa nǝ bínyǝ mfo isu ese lefe nǝ batakasǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ mimbǝ . ”
40017010	Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso afi eto bateasa laatɛyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ Elia ka bubǝ ɔtɔnsǝ ? ”
40017011	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Sitinti ele bǝ Elia ka bubǝ ɔtɔnsǝ bǝ lǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ .
40017012	Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Elia ébubǝ koko , tsya bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya béyifo wǝ disale nǝ kee bála . Nko ke booyifo mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya disiale nɛ . ”
40017013	Mfó bakasebi bamǝ léte bǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ɔnlɛ .
40017014	Lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi díbǝ báyo sitiditu siamǝ ɔflɔ , osani utsyuǝ ǝbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ .
40017015	Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nyǝ mɔ ubisaibi ǝmfo kaminsǝ ! Ɔlɛ budukanɔ eto bufi bufi nya ɔnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ tinti . Lefe kpǝ weedu kanɔ kedufǝ lǝ ute nye ntu ǝsuǝ tsya .
40017016	Nkpa wǝ mboko fǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ bámfo wǝ botsya . ”
40017017	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mii , mmi eto betidi , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ nya bitidi ato mǝ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ nkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto lefe ele bǝ mfi nnǝ mi ! Bekpa osaibi ǝmǝ beboko mɛ mfo ! ”
40017018	Mfó Yesu léto ɔkɔɛ ókpe lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ nlɛ dikpefi nǝmǝ bulǝ nya lɛbɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ! Nya bufi bomǝ díyuǝ wǝ lamfolamfo .
40017019	Kamaa , bakasebi bamǝ mate ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bóamfo lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ bola kǝlǝkǝ ? ”
40017020	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi bofokanɔ mǝmmuǝ ale . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ mi bofokanɔ te fenkǝ diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ kenkee , ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ bǝ biofo kɔtini komfo bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Nyi mfo , esu mǝ ! ’ Nya yuubǝ itǝ . Kulesa ǝmbǝ biǝmbofo buyifo .
40017021	Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ olatoto ku kɛnyɛklekle ǝsuǝ hã fɛ biofo lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo eto okle bola kǝlǝkǝ . ”
40017022	Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamǝ kenke díbǝ bátsya lǝ Galilea , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Boofi Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe betidi lǝ ani ,
40017023	nya boolo wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ oboko nkpǝ . ” Nyamfo álo bakasebi bamǝ ani .
40017024	Lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi díbǝ bédufǝ Kapernaum , Yudafɔ eto mba laafo Disumuyo eto oko ǝbǝ bátɔ Petro bǝnkǝ , “ Mi oteasa tsya aafó Disumuyo eto oko ǝmǝ ? ”
40017025	Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , woafó . ” Nya se Petro dísu údufǝ diyo , Yesu áka wǝ bɔtɔ nkǝ , “ Simon , be ni fǝ nsusu ? Bawoe eto ani ele bǝ bafo oko bǝtǝ kawunsiǝ eto baka ? Bǝmǝnyǝ eto ani lee bafɔ ? ”
40017026	Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bafɔ . ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ ete bǝ yanle bǝ bǝmǝnyǝ fo oko saa nɛ .
40017027	Fɛɛ se boanla boǝ boata kuutsyuǝ saa bubu esoo , su ditumbukplɛ eto kɛnyɛ lǝ ata osakɛ . Lɛkpɛ tutɛ nǝ fuulǝkǝǝ , ebunyǝ atabi lǝ ni kɛnyɛ nnya looyo afo boofǝ eto oko ǝmǝ . Lǝkǝ nya , lǝ esu afo bokufǝ eto oko . ”
40018001	Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ? ”
40018002	Lǝ nyasoo , Yesu ákpadi dikpefi kɛkɛ ditsyuǝ úbǝ úńyǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
40018003	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ biamfloma mi ditsyǝbi biyifo fe bekpefii , biembudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
40018004	Utidi wǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔɔ , wǝ ni utidi wǝ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe dikpefi nǝmfo eto okle .
40018005	“ Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ loofo bekpefi bamfo eto utsyuǝ lǝ mɔ disii , mɔɔ ini ófo .
40018006	“ Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ ebutǝ bekpefi ba léfo mɛ bánɔ mfo eto ɔni kplo lǝ onya kusu lǝ mɔ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso lǝ befi ukue batsyasǝ lǝ kukuǝ kplɛ bakpe wǝ lǝ simuǝ bato wǝ bakpe lǝ lekpo eto kaka letsyo , lǝ unǝ ntu ukpǝ .
40018007	“ Mbɔbɔɛ itǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa nnya loofo butǝ utidi dufǝ lǝ lebua lǝ onya kusu ! Asa nyamfo eto okle ebubǝ kokooko . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ nyamfo lɔɔyɛ ibǝ .
40018008	Lǝ fǝ kɔni nye kokpa ǝǝtǝ feeyifo lebua , la ko ǝlǝkǝ ato akpe . Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ yɛ edufǝ lǝ nkpǝ kǝmiǝ kɔni kɔnwɛ nye kokpa kɔnwɛ enso bǝ yɛ ani ǝnuǝ nye akpa ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
40018009	Nya lǝ fǝ dinǝmi ǝǝtǝ feeyifo lebua , lǝkǝ ni ato akpe ! Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ nyǝ nkpǝ ku dinǝmi lɛwɛ enso bǝ kɛ ǝnǝmi ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
40018010	“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biemfi ekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ fe mba dimanle kulesa . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ bakpe Onanto eto batɔnkpe kato ba lǝǝnyǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto ǝnǝmi lefe saa lǝ mǝ kutsyǝ .
40018011	Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ǝbǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo betidi ba lénya kusu lǝ nkpǝ .
40018012	“ Lǝ utsyuǝ kpe basamu kolofa kɔni , nya ɔni lénya lǝ mǝ ntii , be bibu biǝ wuuyifo ? Weemboyani awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ bamǝ utsyǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ mfó bekedi , nya wuusu ɔbɛbɛ ɔni ǝme lénya ?
40018013	Nya lǝ únyǝ wǝǝ , mɔtɛyi mi miǝ wuunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ enso awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ba dímanya mfó ǝsuǝ .
40018014	Nko ke inte itǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato nɛ , nkǝ woannla nkǝ bekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ lǝ onya .
40018015	“ Lǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ áta fǝ úbuu , su wǝ ɔflɔ , lǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ botakebu ate wǝ . Nya tǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ɛkɛ lǝ fonko wǝ eto nti ete . Lǝ ɔ́nɔ fǝ kasɔɔ , te fǝ esinkli eyifo lɔni ku fǝ ɔyimi nɛ .
40018016	Fɛɛ lǝ wǝmbɔnɔ fǝ kasɔɔ , tǝ lǝ betidi inuǝ nye itsyǝ lǝ banɔ ko mi lǝ adansiɛ seka eso , fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi .
40018017	Nya lǝ mfó tsya ɔni woannɔ kasɔɔ , nyalɛ tǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lǝ banɔ . Nya lǝ mfó tsya woannɔ kasɔɔ , lǝkǝ ato lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe utidi wǝ lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ nye nwǝ laafo umǝnko .
40018018	“ Nyaso nlɛ mimblɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ lesa saa nǝ biokle lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bookle ni kato . Nya lesa saa ke bionyankli lǝ kasɔ mfoo , boonyakli ni kato tsya .
40018019	“ Nya nsi nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi tsya minkǝ , lǝ mi inuǝ eto kɛnyɛ eyifo kani lǝ kasɔ mfo bɛnlɛ lesaatsyuǝ bɔtɔɔ , mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato ebuyifo ni utǝ mi .
40018020	Itsyise kaka mi inuǝ nye itsyǝ letsya lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , nkpe mi lenti . ”
40018021	Nya Petro lɛnyi ɔ́fi Yesu nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ ata mɛ ubuu , sesia ele bǝ mfi ntsyɛ wǝ ? Sekuanse lee ? ”
40018022	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni sekuanse ete ! Bomu awosi akuanse eto sekuanse .
40018023	“ Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te fe Oka wǝ lela nkǝ weebu nkunta ku wǝ beyifoyifo .
40018024	Kase útsyǝ kasɔ koo , bákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ nsi wǝ kayo kplɛ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
40018025	Kulesa ente wǝ wuufi ofo kayo kamǝ esoo , oka ǝmǝ ǝtǝ nkǝ bate wǝ ku wuusiǝ ku wǝ bebi ku lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ lǝ befi bafo kayo kamǝ .
40018026	“ Itǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo áse akonki lǝ oka ǝmǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ ko mɛ , moofo fǝ kayo kamǝ kenke . ’
40018027	Wǝ asa ǝnǝ oka ǝmǝ kafo , nyaso úfi kayo kamǝ kenke ɔ́tsyɛ wǝ nya óyani wǝ údu .
40018028	“ Nya se uyifoyifo ǝmfo díduu , ótsyako wǝ uyifotsyuǝ , wǝ dísiǝ wǝ sika flubia sɛkɛ eto kayo . Mfó nya úmuǝ wǝ lǝ ale ǝsuǝ lǝ simuǝ ku lɛkɔɛlonlobi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fo mɛ kayo ka fensi mɛ ! ’
40018029	“ Wǝ uyifotsyuǝ ǝmǝ álɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ ko mɛ , moofo fɛ kayo ka kenke minsi fǝ ! ’
40018030	“ Fɛɛ ɔ́ni nya útǝ nkǝ beti wǝ bakpe lǝ Aba eto diyo isu ese lefe nǝ woofo kayo ka kenke unsi wǝ .
40018031	Se wǝ beyifotsyuǝ dínyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , ílǝ mǝ tinti nya bésu bátɛyi Oka ǝmǝ lesa saa nǝ díbǝ .
40018032	“ Nyaso ókpadi wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ndomunyǝ bua ! Mfi fǝ kayo ka fensi mɛ kenke ntsyɛ fǝ itsyise álɛ mǝ lekpakpa eso .
40018033	Kase mínyǝ fǝ kaminsǝǝ , nko ke ele bǝ eni fintsya nyǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ uyifoyifo kaminsǝ nɛ . ’
40018034	Kafo ányi Oka ǝmǝ tinti nya útǝ nkǝ bǝnǝ wǝ koto bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo isu ese lefe nǝ woofo kayo kamǝ kenke olosǝ . ”
40018035	Mfó Yesu lélosǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato luuyifo utsyuǝ saa lǝ mi nti wǝ lembufi ɔtsyɛ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ itsyi taa wǝ lɛkɔɛsi ke nɛ . ”
40019001	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfo ólosǝǝ , údu lǝ Galilea úsu Yudea eto lɛkpɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ Yordan eto ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse .
40019002	Betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ nya ótsya mǝ efimbi , efimbi mfó .
40019003	Mfó nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ baato wǝ babe , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ osani ni wǝ usiǝ lǝ kusu saa ola ǝsuǝ ? ”
40019004	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Biankla tɔ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ bǝ taa ketsyikokɔɔ , nwǝ díyifo kawunsiǝǝ , usio ku osani úyifo betidi ?
40019005	Nya Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani luudu lǝ wǝ anto ku ambe utsyǝ nya wuufi kusiǝ , nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ loofiani utidi ɔni . ’
40019006	Itsyise lǝ nnya kamaa , bensiyifo betidi inuǝ . Bomu bafiani utidi ɔni . Nyaso yanle bǝ utidi sense lesa nǝ Onanto dífi ɔ́kɔ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ . ”
40019007	Farisifɔ bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ beso Moses dítǝ kusu nkǝ ele bǝ osani tǝ wǝ usiǝ kukue nkǝ ɔlɛ wǝ bɔni fɛ lǝ ɔni wǝ ? ”
40019008	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi letotidi eso Moses dítǝ kusu nkǝ bɛni bese ku bǝsiǝ nɛ . Yɛntsyǝ nko lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ .
40019009	Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ osani wǝ ke lɛni wǝ usiǝ , nya inni lǝ disenkpo eso nya úsu úfi usio bambaa , ókpo kusiǝ . ”
40019010	Wǝ bakasebi átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ nko usǝ ku usiǝ eto nti eto etiki ntee , nyalɛ ɛlɛkɛ eso lǝ bemfi kusiǝ nye bǝnsiǝ kusǝ . ”
40019011	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni utsyuǝ saa loofo asatete nyamfo bofo nko , enso mba Onanto dítǝ nnya nko hã .
40019012	Esu kpǝ kpe nyaso betidi leemfi bǝsiǝ . Bǝtsyuǝ nko bále mǝ nɛ . Bǝtsyuǝǝ , betidi díyifo mǝ nko . Bǝtsyuǝ tsya emfi bǝsiǝ itsyise bala bǝ beefi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto keyifo . Nwǝ loofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bufi kǝtǝ asatete nyamfoo , tǝ lǝ uyifo nko . ”
40019013	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa bekpefi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ufi ani utǝkǝ lǝ mǝ , lǝ oto ola utǝ mǝ , fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ényenki bákpe betidi bamǝ .
40019014	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ bekpefi kusu lǝ bǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , nya bienti mǝ kusu , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo fǝ mba laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe ekpefi bamfo eto okle eto kale . ”
40019015	Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ókpo mǝ atsyɔ , nya údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
40019016	Osani utsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ diyi lɔni nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , nte lesa sɛɛ nǝ ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
40019017	Mfó Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Beso fanlɛ mɛ kasɛɛ ka ele bǝ beyifo bɔtɔ ? Utidi ɔni hã nkpe wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ . Lǝ ala fǝ ǝǝnyǝ nkpǝ manloo , yɛ lǝ Onanto eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40019018	Ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Nte afi nnya ? ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Manlo utidi , mendi sɛsɔnɔ , menyu , manla fuutsyuǝ kɛnyɛ ,
40019019	bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe , nya lǝ ala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40019020	Mfó nya okosobi ǝmfo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbuyifo lǝ afi nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝ . Be disi ibu bǝ nyifo ? ”
40019021	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ aala fǝ aaflɔɔ , su lǝ esu efi fǝ lesa saa nǝ nte fǝ ate . Nya lǝ efi atabi nnya fǝnyǝ esu ǝtǝ bakombo , nya fuunyǝ bikǝ ǝtsyǝ kato nɛ . Nyamfo eto kamaa , sinkli ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
40019022	Fɛɛ se okosobi ǝmǝ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , údu ku bulǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Itsyise bikǝ kpǝ akɛ wǝ .
40019023	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee minkǝ , yɔɔkɛ ale itǝ batabinyǝ bǝ bedufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
40019024	Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi bio minkǝ , iyuǝ itǝ ɔtɔmini ku lekoko bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ okabikǝ eto ofo ofe enso bǝ otabinyǝ dufǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
40019025	Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , íyifo mǝ yanii , nyaso bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe ko luunyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
40019026	Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kawunsiǝ eto utidi saa ǝmbofo nyamfo buyifo . Fɛɛ Onanto , wǝ ebofo lesa saa buyifo . ”
40019027	Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bee ! Bóayani lesa saa bútsyǝ bǝ lǝ butǝkǝko fǝ . Be bo luunyǝ ? ”
40019028	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lefe nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ lǝ mɔ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ mbǝ nsiǝ lǝ mɔ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ kamǝǝ , mi lefosi inuǝ ba dítǝkǝko mɛ tsya ebusiǝ lǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bekponko Israel bebi eto lefosi mmfo nnuǝ bomǝ lekpo .
40019029	Nyaso utsyuǝ saa wǝ léyani diyo nye bayimisani nye bayimisio nye anto nye ambe nye bebi nye kakuɛ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ utǝkǝko mɛ esoo , ebunyǝ nnya kayofofo kolofa ku kama . Nya Onanto ebutǝ wǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalosǝkɔ .
40019030	Fɛɛ betidi kpǝ ba ntɔ sɛtɔ mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe kama . Nya mba ntǝkǝ kama mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe batɔ sɛtɔ .
40020001	“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale eyibibi eto ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ wǝ létaka ku olesiǝtu nkǝ weesu ɔbɛbɛ diyi eto beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ lǝ beyifo keyifo bǝtǝ wǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ .
40020002	Ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ ku beyifoyifo bamǝ átɔnɔ lǝ diyi eto keyifo eto kayofofo ǝsuǝ , ini sika flubia sɔni eto atabi , nya bédu bésu eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ .
40020003	“ Se ɛsɔ abombo ɔwɔnɔmbǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ esi úsu asi nya únyǝ se basani bǝtsyuǝ ńyǝ mfó banlɛ kulesa buyifo .
40020004	Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mi tsya su biyifo keyifo lǝ mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ lǝ mfo mi kayo ka dińyǝ itǝ . ’
40020005	Nyaso bésu ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . “ Nya lǝ lefosi abombo ǝnuǝ ku lǝ kakɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ eto lefee , usi úyifo nko ke .
40020006	Se ibu sɛkɛ lǝ abombo anɔ lǝ ɛsɔɔ , usi úsu asi mfó nya únyǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ nsi ńyǝ mfó . Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beso binyǝ mfo diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ bɛnlɛ diyi bobiasǝ keyifo menyifo menyifo ? ’
40020007	“ Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝntǝ bo keyifo nkǝ buyifo . ’ “ Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nyalɛ , mi tsya su mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ bisu biyifo keyifo . ’
40020008	“ Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ átɛyi beyifoyifo eto uninǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kpadi beyifoyifo bamǝ lǝ afo mǝ kayo , tsyiko lǝ mba díbǝ fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ esu alosǝ lǝ mba leka bubǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
40020009	“ Báfo betidi ba díbǝ keyifo ku ditsyitsyo eto abombo anɔ eto utsyuǝ saa sika flubia sɔni sɔni .
40020010	Nya se éyo mba leka keyifo bubǝ ku olesiǝǝ , bébu bǝ boofo mǝ kayo baso mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Fɛɛ mǝ tsya eto utsyuǝ saa áfo diyi eto kayofofo kani kamǝ , ini sika flubia sɔni .
40020011	Se báfo atabi nyamǝǝ , betsyiko bunyenki kakpe ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ ,
40020012	‘ Betidi fɛfɛ ba báfo éyifo keyifo lebombosɔsɔ lɔni hã , nya bomba mfo díńyǝ lǝ kofe buyifo keyifo diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ tsyaa , kayofofo kani ete bǝtǝ bo ! ’
40020013	“ Mfó ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ ɔni nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyimitsyuǝ , nɔ . Mántafa fǝ . Lee , inni diyi lɔni eto keyifo eto kayofofo ka ni sika flubia sɔni ǝsuǝ bókpe asi ?
40020014	Nyaso fo fǝ kayofofo lǝ edu esu diyo . Iyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ mǝǝtǝ utidi fɛfɛ ǝmfo kayofofo fe kase mínkǝtǝ fǝ ke .
40020015	Lee , mimbǝ kusu meeyifo ku mɔ atabi kase maala ? Lee , mɔ kafoɛkpɛ ka meeyifo nlɛ fǝ ǝnǝmi bɔsɛ ? ’ ”
40020016	Nyaso Yesu álosǝ ɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi ba ni bafɛfɛ ebofiani betutɛ nya mba ni betutɛ loofiani bafɛfɛ . ”
40020017	Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ lɛyɛ bantɔ lǝ Yerusalem , ókpa mǝ úsuko lɛkpɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
40020018	“ Bɛnɔ , bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem kaka boomuǝ Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani . Nya boolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi .
40020019	Nya boofi wǝ bakpe lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani bǝ bakpe wǝ kofani , bablɛ wǝ , basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
40020020	Nya Sebedeo eto usiǝ lékpa wǝ bebi inuǝ óboko nya base akonki lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ ɔwunsǝko mǝ .
40020021	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ? ” Mfó usio ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tsyǝ mɛ kɛnyɛ fǝnkǝ lǝ edufǝ lǝ fǝ sekakedikɔɔ , ebusiǝsǝ mɔ bebisaibi inuǝ bamfo , ɔni lǝ fǝ kodiani nya unuǝfǝ lǝ fǝ kǝmǝni . ”
40020022	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔtɔ . Kanyi ka mǝǝbǝ bunyǝǝ , mi tsya ebofo ke butsyi ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Ee , boofo . ”
40020023	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti , biofo butsyi . Fɛɛ mimbǝ kusu mǝǝlǝkǝ futsyǝ luusiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani nye kǝmǝni . Nsiǝkɔ bomfo te ítǝ betidi ba mɔ Anto lɛlɔ utsyǝ itǝ mǝ . ”
40020024	Lefe nǝ bakasebi lefosi fɛfɛ lɛnɔ bayimi inuǝ bamfo eto etiki nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti !
40020025	Nyaso Yesu ákpadi mǝ ɔkɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi biǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto baka kpe ǝsuǝale kenke lǝ mǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya mǝ batɔnkotɔnko tsya nkpe ǝsuǝale kekleke lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
40020026	Fɛɛ inni nko ele bǝ itsyǝ lǝ mimba lefo bɛnɔ nti . Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti aala nkǝ weeyifo ɔkplɛnyǝ , ele bǝ uyifo uyifoyifo utǝ bafɛfɛ .
40020027	Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti aala nkǝ weeyifo ututɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ uyifoyifo utǝ bafɛfɛ kenke .
40020028	Nko ke ini nɛ bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , mǝmbǝ miǝ besumu mɛ . Bomu bǝ lǝ nsumu nya lǝ mfi mɔ nkpǝ ntǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi . ”
40020029	Kase Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi nlɛ budu lǝ Yeriko eto umǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko mǝ .
40020030	Bǝnǝmba inuǝ ba nsi lǝ kusu ɔflɔɔ , ánɔ bǝ Yesu ǝbǝ ɔlɛ bofe , nyaso bétsyiko bofa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , Oka David eto ubi ! Nnyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
40020031	Betidi bamǝ átɛyi bǝnǝmba bamǝ bǝnkǝ bedika . Fɛɛ mfe bomu báfa bembembe enso bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , Oka David eto ubi ! Nyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
40020032	Yesu ǝkǝnǝ únyǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be bela biǝ nyimfo ntǝ mi ? ”
40020033	Mfó bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Anto , bola boǝ tǝ lǝ bunyǝ asa . ”
40020034	Mǝ asa ǝnǝ Yesu kafo nya utidi mǝ ǝnǝmi . Lamfolamfo , mǝ ǝnǝmi ásini nya bǝnyǝ asa , nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
40021001	Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛnyi bafi Yerusalem nya bédufǝ Betfage lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ála wǝ bakasebi inuǝ ɔ́tɔnsǝ .
40021002	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikatɔ lǝ kebuto ka nkpe sɛtɔ mfó . Mfóo , biunyǝ ɔflimu wǝ nńyǝ lǝ ukuǝ nya wǝ ubi nńyǝ wǝ lǝ akɔ . Nyankli wǝ ku ukuǝ lǝ akpa mǝ aboko mɛ .
40021003	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ átɔ mi lesaatsyuǝǝ , bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute lɛ mǝ bohiã . ’ Ete booyani mǝ lamfolamfo bǝtǝ mi . ”
40021004	Nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ ,
40021005	“ Bɛtɛyi Sion eto umǝnkplɛ eto betidi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bebe , mi Oka lɛ mi ɔflɔ bubǝ ! Obokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya unsi lǝ ɔflimu ku ubi ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ . ’ ”
40021006	Nyaso bakasebi inuǝ bamfó ésu nya béyifo fe kase Yesu lékpe mǝ nkǝ beyifo .
40021007	Bákpa ɔflimu ku ubi ǝmǝ báboko , nya béfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nya Yesu lébe úsiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
40021008	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ keyudu boto . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya léla sekabe ku keyilɛ bésensǝ bákpo lǝ kusu .
40021009	Nya betidi ba ntɔ ku mba ntǝkǝ kenke nlɛ bofa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , itǝ Oka David eto ubi wǝ nlɛ bubǝ o-o ! Atɛsǝ itǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye usuǝ ! Yuu , yuuduu itǝ Onanto ! ”
40021010	Lefe nǝ Yesu dídufǝ Yerusalem , umǝ ǝmǝ kenke ko dítinkǝ . Nya betidi lɛtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe uni ? ”
40021011	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesu wǝ dítsyi Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ nɛ ! ”
40021012	Yesu ésu údufǝ Disumuyo Kplɛ nya óla betidi ba kenke nlɛ bikǝ bote ku booya mfó úlǝkǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ . Úkǝ kapunu ka betidi nlɛ atabi bofloma ku mba laate ablonima eto akpomɛ uwui .
40021013	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bookpo mɔ diyo nkǝ , ola katokɔ . ’ Fɛɛ mi efi ni bíyifo beyu eto kabiɔkɔ ! ”
40021014	Nya bǝnǝmba ku abafa díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ Disumuyo mfó nya Yesu létsya mǝ bufi .
40021015	Se besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa dínyǝ ayanisa nya Yesu nlɛ buyifo ku bekpefi ba nlɛ kudu bokpo katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Oka David eto ubi , ” lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti .
40021016	Nyaso bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Alɛ lesa nǝ bekpefi bamǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó bɔnɔ ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ bɔnɔ . Nya nyi tsya minkǝ békla nyamfo lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ , ‘ Ǝtǝ bekpefi ku bebisambi fǝ befi atɛsǝ nnya lɛflɔ tinti bǝtǝ fǝ . ’ ”
40021017	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bamfó ɔflɔ nya úsu údufǝ Betania eto umǝ kaka úsu ólabe .
40021018	Se kale dísiǝ nya se úsinkli ɔnlɛ umǝ bubǝ ku olesiǝǝ , kukpǝnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
40021019	Únyǝ kudiyi kutsyuǝ lǝ kusu ɔflɔ mfó nya ɔ́tsyi úsu ko ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ wǝnnyǝ kulesa lǝ ko enso ko afanto . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi kuyi komǝ nkǝ , “ Ensiembɔnwɔ ebibi kulefe tsya . ” Lamfolamfo kudiyi komǝ áblobe .
40021020	Se bakasebi bamǝ dínyǝ nkoo , éyifo mǝ yanii . Nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Be dítǝ bǝ kudiyi komfo léblobe nko mmǝ ? ”
40021021	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bekpe bofokanɔ bo lǝmbǝ kayakii , biofo nnya mínyifo kudiyi komfo buyifo . Fɛɛ inni nyamfo mate . Bomu biofo kɔtini komfo bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Nyi lǝ mfo esu edufǝ lǝ lekpo kafo , ’ nya yuubǝ itǝ nko .
40021022	Nya lesa saa nǝ biɔtɔ Onanto lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , biunyǝ ni . ”
40021023	Se Yesu dísinkli úbǝ Disumuyo Kplɛ mfó nya ɔnlɛ asa botee , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ǝsuǝale nnya fankpe feeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle ? Nya owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale nyamfo ? ”
40021024	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mintsya mɔɔtɔ mi ditiki lɔni hã nnɔ . Nya lǝ bitǝ mɛ mbuayɛɛ , mɔɔtɛyi mi ǝsuǝale nnya minkpe meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle .
40021025	Owoe ɔflɔ Yohanes léfo ǝsuǝale fɛ úflǝsǝ betidi ntuu ? Onanto ɔflɔ lee , nye lǝ utidi ɔflɔ ? ” Mfó bétsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ kanɔ bǝ , “ Be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ Onanto ɔflɔɔ , wɔɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Nyalɛ beso biamfo Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
40021026	Fɛɛ lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ utidi ɔflɔɔ , bɔlɛ sikpi bote lesa nǝ betidi luuyifo , itsyise mǝmblɛ áfo bánɔ bǝ Yohanes eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi . ”
40021027	Nyaso bǝtǝ Yesu mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bunyi kaka ófo ǝsuǝale utsyiko . ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mintsya lɛmbɔtɛyi mi kaka mímfo ǝsuǝale mintsyiko fɛ meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle nɛ . ”
40021028	“ Ntsyǝ bibu itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ? Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ wǝ lɛkɛ bebisaibi inuǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi uninǝle nkǝ , ‘ Ubi , su eyifo keyifo lǝ mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ mmi . ’
40021029	“ Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Mǝmbǝ busu . ’ Fɛɛ kamaa , ɔ́tsyi wǝ nsusu ɔ́wuninsǝ nya úsu .
40021030	“ Anto ǝmǝ ésu wǝ ubi nuǝfǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nko ke . Wǝ átɔnɔ nkǝ , ‘ Yo o-o , nto , muusu . ’ Fɛɛ wénsu .
40021031	“ Mǝ inuǝ bamǝ eto ntii , mǝ owoe díyifo lǝ mǝ anto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Uninǝle ǝmǝ . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ beyu ku basɔnɔdi lɛ mi bofe kaaka mi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝ .
40021032	Itsyise Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ote mi kusu sɛɛ ko biɔyɛ , fɛɛ bíamfo wǝ bɛnɔ . Fɛɛ beyu ku basɔnɔdi bomu áfo wǝ bánɔ . Nya se bínyǝ nyamfo bítsyǝ lekpo tsyaa , bíamfloma mi nsusu biǝ biafo wǝ bɛnɔ .
40021033	“ Bɛnɔ lekpa bamba nǝmfo . Ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ wǝ léfo eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ , nya ókpe ɔkpɔ otsyilama wǝ . Óto kaka beeke eyibibi eto nte kǝlǝkǝ nya óto nwǝ laase ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ eto kǝsiǝkɔ . Nya úfi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ani nkǝ bakase wǝ , nya údu úsu kusu .
40021034	Se lefe léyo bǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , ɔkuɛnsate ǝmfo ákpe wǝ ndomufɔ nkǝ besu bafo wǝ kedikɔ baboko wǝ .
40021035	“ Ɔkuɛmfo eto beyifoyifo bamfo ǝmuǝ wǝ ndomufɔ bamfo nya báblɛ ɔni , bálo ɔni , nya bákpɔ ɔni tsya aba .
40021036	Nyamfo eto kamaa , osate ǝmǝ esi ótsyese ndomufɔ bamba ba nso mba kɔ utu . Nya beyifoyifo bamǝ disi béyifo mǝ tsya nko ke .
40021037	Kalosǝkɔɔ , óla wǝ kosate eto ubi ótsyese mǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu mɔ ubi babe . ’
40021038	“ Fɛɛ se beyifoyifo bamǝ dínyǝ wǝ ubi ǝmfoo , bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ ɔkuɛmfo eto ubi wǝ lǝǝkǝ bikǝ biamǝ budii . Bibǝ lǝ bolo wǝ lǝ bɔlɛ wǝ kedikɔ bofo . ’
40021039	Nyaso bǝmuǝ wǝ nya báto wǝ bakpe lǝ ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ eto kama , nya bálo wǝ . ”
40021040	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , lǝ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ ǝbǝǝ , be wuuyifo beyifoyifo bamǝ ? ”
40021041	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Woolo betidi bua bamfó kaminsǝ mǝnyǝmǝnyǝ , ufi eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ okpe beyifoyifo bamba ba luutǝ wǝ , wǝ kutsyǝ lǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝ . ”
40021042	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla tɔ lesa nǝ nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti . Bonamute ni nwǝ díyifo nyamfo . Sitintii , iyifo lesa nǝ laanɔ bobe tinti ! ’ ”
40021043	Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ boofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ mi ani befi bǝtǝ betidi ba lɔɔnwɔ ebibi nnya lɛlɛkɛ .
40021044	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke lɔɔtsyinini udu ɔnɔ lǝ leba nǝ báni mfó ǝsuǝǝ , wuufǝsǝ blublublu . Nya lǝ ibǝ bǝ leba nǝmǝ tsya asɔ utsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dioba wǝ dikuǝ wǝ blublublu . ”
40021045	Lefe nǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ lɛnɔ Yesu eto akpá nyamfoo , báte bǝ mǝ ɔnlɛ .
40021046	Nyaso bála bǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ báté sitiditu siamǝ sikpi , itsyise mǝmblɛ kenke ébu Yesu fe Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
40022001	Yesu esi óté mǝ asa ɛyɛ lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
40022002	“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te fe mmǝ . Lefe lɔnii , Oka utsyuǝ édi kusiǝkpakpa eto diyisɛɛ útǝ wǝ ubisaibi .
40022003	Óla wǝ beyifoyifo ókpe nkǝ besu bakpo betidi ba ókla utsyǝ nkǝ bafe bǝbǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Fɛɛ bánla bǝ bǝǝbǝ .
40022004	“ Nyaso óla wǝ beyifoyifo bamba ókpe nkǝ batɛyi betidi ba ókla utsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Lesalidife nǝmǝ eboyo ! Bálo mɔ banantsyui ku banatsyui eto akpɔ nnya nkpe ayinkua bufi bɔlɛ mi kama bobe . Nya búkalɔ lesa saa bútsyǝ . Nyaso bibǝ kusiǝ komǝ kakpakɔ ! ’
40022005	“ Fɛɛ mbamǝ bákla eto kuutsyuǝ saa mémbu wǝ úbǝ . Bomu bédu bésu nlebe bamba bo bála . Ɔni édu úsu wǝ ɔkuɛ , nya obamba tsya dídu usu wǝ bikǝkatekɔ .
40022006	Nya babamba tsya dímuǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ nya báblɛ mǝ nya bálo mǝ .
40022007	Oka ǝmǝ ǝnyǝ ɔblɔ tinti , nya ótsyese wǝ bamamanyǝ nya bésu bálo bewudifɔ bamǝ kenke nya bátonsǝ mǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ .
40022008	“ Nyaso ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ubi eto kusiǝkpakpa eto diyisɛɛ didi nǝmǝ eto lefe éboyo . Fɛɛ betidi ba mínkla miǝ bǝbǝ diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ mǝnńyǝ itǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ .
40022009	Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , bisu umǝ eto kesunte lǝ bekpadi utsyuǝ saa wǝ ke biunyǝ biǝ bǝbǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ mfo . ’
40022010	Mfó nya beyifoyifo bamǝ dísu kesunte nya bákpadi utsyuǝ saa wǝ bǝnyǝ , babua ku basɛɛ kenke nya kusiǝkpakpa eto diyo nǝmǝ díyi kenke .
40022011	“ Nya se Oka ǝmǝ díbǝ diyo nǝmǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ obe betidi ba díbǝ mfóo , únyǝ osani wǝ dímankpe awu nnya baakpe kesu kusiǝkakpakɔ .
40022012	Oka ǝmǝ átɔ wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔhɔ , ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ ǝbǝ mfo se fǝmankpe kusiǝkakpa eto awu ? ’ Fɛɛ wámfo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ .
40022013	“ Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ beyifoyifo nkǝ , ‘ Bekpe wǝ amla lǝ ani ku akpa , lǝ beto wǝ bekpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lekple . Mfó wuuwi keku ɔyimi animi nɛ . ’ ”
40022014	Nya Yesu lélosǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto ákpadi betidi kpǝ , fɛɛ esiani ete úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ nti . ”
40022015	Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ésu bákpe disi lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ Yesu ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto etikididi ǝsuǝ .
40022016	Nyaso bátsyese mǝ bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi ba ntekeko Herodes eto ditsyukpa kama lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya se bésuu , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ eyifo ɔnukualɛtidi nya faate Onanto bofokanɔ eto asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ sitinti , itsyise aambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi keyifo lesa saa . Nya ememfi kukǝtsyuǝ lǝ betidi eto etikididi ǝsuǝ tsya .
40022017	Nyaso tɛyi bo lesa nǝ febu . Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ bofó umǝnko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ lee , yǝntǝ kusu nko ? ”
40022018	Fɛɛ se Yesu mfe nyi mǝ nsusu bua esoo , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Beso biala biǝ biato mɛ bebe ?
40022019	Bete mɛ atabi nnya biefi kafo umǝnko ǝmǝ lǝ mbe . ” Béfi atabi nyamǝ báboko wǝ .
40022020	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe báta bǝtǝkǝ mfo , nya owoe eto diye báwɔni bǝtǝkǝ mfo ? ”
40022021	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ale ini . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi lesa nǝ ni Kaisare eto ale bitǝ Kaisare . Lǝ bífi lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto léle bitǝ Onanto . ”
40022022	Se bánɔ nyamfo , íyifo mǝ yanii nya bédu wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ .
40022023	Diyi nǝmfo kee , Sadukifɔ ba laatɛyi bǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ensiembotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝǝ , ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ ku etiki ǝtsyuǝ .
40022024	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , Moses átɛyi bo nkǝ , lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya óyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya wonko wǝ dímanle bebii , elebɛ osani ǝmǝ eto ɔyimisani fi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ ufi . Lǝ wonko wǝ ale bebii , boofi bebi bamǝ fe osani ǝmǝ díkpe eto bebi .
40022025	Mɔmɔɔ , ibǝ bǝ bayimisani ekuanse ǝsiǝ lǝ bo nti mfo . Ɔyimisani ninǝ kenke éfi usio , nya wonko wǝ mánle fɛ osani ǝmǝ díkpǝ . Nya wǝ ɔyimisani wǝ ntǝkǝ wǝ kama dífi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ .
40022026	Nko ibǝ ɔyimisani nuǝfǝ ku utsyǝfǝ isu ese okuansele mǝmblɛ dífi usio ǝmǝ bafia nya mǝ nti kuutsyuǝ ku usio ǝmǝ mánle fɛ békpǝ .
40022027	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , usio ǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ úkpǝ .
40022028	Mɔmɔɔ , lǝ diyi nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝǝ , owoe eto usiǝ wuudi se mǝmblɛ kenke díkefi wǝ bǝnyǝ ? ”
40022029	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bénya kusu tinti . Itsyise biannɔ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ kasɔ , nya binyi kulesa lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
40022030	Lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ esi bataka bǝbǝ nkpǝǝ , bootsyǝ fe Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba nkpe lǝ Onanto eto kato , nya bembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsiǝ besǝ tsya .
40022031	Nya bíankla asa nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi mi itsyi lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ eto botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝsuǝ ? Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
40022032	‘ Mɔ ni Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob eto Onanto ! ’ Uyifo mba nkpe nkpǝ eto Onanto inni mba díkekpǝ . ”
40022033	Se sitiditu siamǝ lɛnɔ asa yamfoo , íyifo mǝ yanii , lǝ wǝ asatete ǝsuǝ .
40022034	Se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ bǝ Yesu asɔ Sadukifɔ kasɔɔ , bésu bátsya .
40022035	Nya mǝ ɔni wǝ ni afi eto oteasa , ála nkǝ lǝ ɔtɔ Yesu etiki ǝtsyuǝ lǝ umuǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ etiki ǝsuǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
40022036	“ Oteasa , nte kɔfi ko nso bofe lǝ afi nyamǝ kenke nti ? ”
40022037	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ La fǝ Onamute wǝ ni fǝ Onanto ku fǝ utu kenke ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke .
40022038	Kɔfi komfo ni kɔkplɛ kenke ko nso bofe tsya nɛ .
40022039	Kunuǝfǝ ko lefe lele ko ni , ‘ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
40022040	Moses eto kɔfi komǝ ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asatete kenke kpǝsǝ lǝ afi ǝnuǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
40022041	Se Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ létsyaa , Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ ,
40022042	“ Ntsyǝ ni mi nsusu lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ Ǝsuǝ ? Owoe eto ubi uni ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Oka David eto ubi uni . ”
40022043	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nko inii , ntsyǝ fɛ Oka David ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , lékpadi wǝ nkǝ Onamute . Oka David átɛyi nkǝ ,
40022044	‘ Bonamute átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Siǝ mfo lǝ mɔ kodiani isu ese lefe nǝ muutǝ efi fǝ akpa ǝtǝkǝ fǝ balo lǝ disinti . ” ’
40022045	Nya lǝ Oka David ákpo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nkǝ Onamutee , ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ Nwǝ ǝmǝ esi uyifo Oka David eto ubi ? ”
40022046	Mǝ nti eto kuutsyuǝ mámfo Yesu mbuayɛ butǝ . Nya idu dinǝmfo entɔɔ , mǝ kuutsyuǝ ménsifo wǝ ditiki saa bɔtɔ .
40023001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édi sitiditu siamǝ ku wǝ bakasebi etiki .
40023002	Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ kpe ǝsuǝale , bǝ baté Moses eto kɔfi komǝ .
40023003	Nyaso ele bǝ biyifo lǝ lesa nǝ ke batɛyi mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ . Fɛɛ biǝntǝkǝko mǝ eyifosa kama itsyise bǝǝnsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ asa nnya baate ǝsuǝ .
40023004	Baakle bikǝ bia nkpe kalende ku nkpe ale ku butsyi ketsyisǝ betidi , tsya fɛɛ bembokpe fǝ lɛ kɔni etsyi bikǝ biamǝ .
40023005	“ Beeyifo lesa saa bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ . Be Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto etiki nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ mǝ nto ku anii , be kase báwɔni nya ɛmɔɔ , ku kase bankpimi nnyaa ! Be kase tsya aboyo nnya mfaka lǝ mǝ awu nnya bankpe eto nyɛ ǝsuǝ dikulǝǝ !
40023006	Baala nkplɛkɔ sɛɛ busiǝ lǝ eyi kedikɔ ku nsiǝkɔ bo bebu bǝtsyǝ bakplɛnyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ .
40023007	Baala bǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mǝ kǝbǝ kasɔ ku dibu lǝ asi bakpadi mǝ bǝ Oteasa .
40023008	“ Yanle bǝ bakpadi mi bǝ Oteasa itsyise mimblɛɛ , bayimi bini lǝ bǝtsyuǝ nya Oteasa ɔni kplo nkpe mi .
40023009	Nya yanle bǝ bekpadi kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ kasɔ mfo biǝ mi Anto , itsyise Anto ɔni hã nkpe mi lǝ kato .
40023010	Biǝntǝ bakpadi mi Ɔtɔnkotɔnko , itsyisee Ɔtɔnkotɔnko ɔni hã ete nkpe bo , wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
40023011	Nwǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ lǝ mi nti yifo nwǝ ni mi uyifoyifo .
40023012	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabesǝ ǝsuǝ katoo , boobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya nwǝ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , boobesǝ wǝ kato .
40023013	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Mi díti Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kusu bekpe betidi , nya mi kosate endufǝ mfó , nya bieti betidi bamba ba nlɛ bokplatsya kekleke tsya kusu biǝ bendufǝ .
40023014	Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ni ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi . Biesu bakɔbǝsiǝ ɔflɔ biǝ biawunsǝko mǝ , fɛɛ biawɛ mǝ kalɛ mǝ lesa saa kafo . Nya biato kala kɛntsyɛ bimba . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mi kotonǝnǝ ebɔkɛ ale eso !
40023015	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Biayila lekpo akpa akpa ku biayɛ kafe lǝ nsɔ nsɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ bilǝkǝ utidi ɔni eto okla bitǝ Onanto . Nya lǝ befo utsyuǝ buyifo nkoo , biatǝ woabia nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ udufǝ lǝ ditefɛnku nǝme kǝmiǝ enso mi kosate kulaa tsya !
40023016	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , bǝnǝmba ba ni batɔnkotɔnko ! Biatɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lǝ utsyuǝ akpadi Disumuyo eto diyee , yeambiasǝ kulesa . Fɛɛ lǝ okpadi sika sia nte lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , nnya akle wǝ bǝ uyifo lǝ akpadi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ kokooko . ’
40023017	Bǝnǝmba eto bamumu ! Nte nnya nso bofe , sika siamǝ lee , Disumuyo ka dítǝ sika siamǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ ?
40023018	Biate tsya biǝ , ‘ Lǝ utsyuǝ ataninko Disumuyo eto lebaa , kataninko kamǝ mankle wǝ , fɛɛ lǝ otaninko ǝtǝsa nnya ntǝkǝ lǝ Disumuyo eto leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nnya akle wǝ . ’
40023019	Nya ntsyǝ béba ǝnǝmi mmǝ ! Nte nnya nso bofe , ǝtǝsa nnyamǝ lee , Disumuyo eto leba nǝ dítǝ ǝtǝsa nnyamǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ .
40023020	Nyaso lǝ utidi éfi Disumuyo eto leba nǝmǝ óka ntamuu , ɔlɛ mu boka ɛyɛ lǝ keditǝtǝ eto leba nǝmǝ ku keditǝtǝ kenke ka ntǝkǝ lǝ leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
40023021	Nya lǝ óka ntamu okpadi Disumuyo Kplɛɛ , ɔlɛ mu boka kakpadi Disumuyo ku Onanto we nsi lǝ mfó tsya .
40023022	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ákpadi katoo , ɔlɛ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ku nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ni bokpadi .
40023023	“ Mǝǝtǝ mi mbɔbɔɛ , mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Biefi kayoma eto bekolenkǝ bia laanyi fififi bia biakpe eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ Onanto , fɛɛ bɛni nya bienyifo lǝ kɔfi eto asa tete nnya nso bofe ǝsuǝ , nnya ni bɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , ku ɔnukualɛdidi . Nyamfo ele bǝ biyifo bifi bekpe lǝ afɛfɛ nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
40023024	Mi batɔnkotɔnko ba ni bǝnǝmba ! Biayɛ ekubi kǝlǝkǝ lǝ nte ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ asa nnya biamini amɔ eso ɔtɔmini ku lekoko .
40023025	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Biǝflǝ mi akɔbe ku kakpɛ eto kama , fɛɛ nnya kafoo eyi ku asa bua fe kase mi tsya lebia nya biyi ku asa nnya béfo lǝ ǝsuǝale ku lǝ mɔ hã ete eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ ǝsuǝ .
40023026	Fǝ Farisinyǝ unǝmba , tsyiko fǝ lɛkɔbe buflǝ lǝ kafo , ete ni kama tsya ebole kɛnkɛnkɛ .
40023027	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Bite fe edi nnya bákua bǝńyǝnsǝ laanɔ bobe . Fɛɛ nnya kǝmiǝ eyi ku bakɔ bubu ku ekubi biabia .
40023028	Nko ke bele betidi ba lɛlɛkɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi , fɛɛ biyi ku kawɛ ku ditsyǝbi bua .
40023029	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Bieku edi sɛɛ kǝtǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba dísiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ nya bialɔ nnya kukɔnɔ .
40023030	Nya biatɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lǝ nnya ete busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bo banamǝ dísiǝǝ , eni bienyifo lesa nǝ béyifo , balo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi . ’
40023031	Nyaso befo nnya sitinti biǝ , mi eyifosa afo nnya ekpe bǝ biyifo mba lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto befluflu .
40023032	Nyaso bisukosǝ lǝ belosǝ lesamǝ mi banamǝ dítsyǝ kasɔ .
40023033	“ Mi betidi bua , biyifo fe bawa eto bebi eto bebi ! Bibu biǝ biofo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ lǝ ditefɛnku manlo ǝsuǝ ?
40023034	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mootsyese mi Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , babesibe ku bateasa , Biolo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , bɛsɔ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ uyikabie , nya biɔblɛ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ Disumuyo , nya biutǝkǝko mǝ idu lǝ umǝ isu umǝ .
40023035	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kotonǝnǝ itǝ mba lélo betidi ba dímenyifo kabua saa ebutǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , idu lǝ Abel wǝ dímenyifo ɔsɛɛ nyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi eto kɔtɔ , isu Sakaria , Barakia eto ubi , nwǝ belo lǝ Disumuyo ku kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba eto nti eto kɔtɔ .
40023036	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kɔtɔ komfó kenke tǝkǝ mmi mba nsi nkpǝ mmi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
40023037	“ Yerusalem , Yerusalem , fǝ lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya fákpɔ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba ótsyese aba ! Nla sesia sesia miǝ maasɔ fǝ betidi lebo lǝ mɔ akɔ , fe kase ukusɛsiǝle laakpa wǝ bebi kakpe lǝ wǝ mbamba kalɔ , fɛɛ biǝntǝ kusu nko .
40023038	Lǝ nnya esoo , fǝ Disumuyo ebubu kǝtsyǝ fufu .
40023039	Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi miǝ , biensi embunyǝ mɛ bio isu se lefe nǝ bɛtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Onanto kpo nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ atsyɔ . ’ ”
40024001	Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ Disumuyo mfo ɔntɔɔ , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ baaté wǝ kase báto Disumuyo nǝmǝ ku ke ayo kenke .
40024002	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛlɔ bebe nyamfo kukɔnɔ . Itsyise nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ booba ayo nyamfo kenke , bǝ lɛ leba lɔni embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Boosensǝ nyamblɛ bewui . ”
40024003	Se Yesu dísu unsi lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ buɛɛ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lefe nǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ luubǝ ku lesa nǝ luubǝ nnya loote bǝ fǝ businkli kǝbǝ eto lefe eboyo . ”
40024004	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ mi okpe .
40024005	Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ ba luufi mɔ diye bǝbǝ batɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Nwǝ Ǝmǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ , ’ bǝ lǝ bawɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
40024006	Biɔnɔ ama eto kudu ku ama eto etiki lǝ katsyontsyokɔ ku kaka lɛfi . Fɛɛ bíǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ekpe mi sikpi . Ele bǝ asa nyamfo bǝ , fɛɛ yante bǝ kalosǝkɔ eboyo tɔ .
40024007	Nsɔ eto betidi ebɔkpɔ ama ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya sekakedikɔ ebotaka sińyǝ lǝ se utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya kukpɛnsɛ luubǝ lǝ nlebe kpǝ . Nya nsɔ tsya luutinkǝ lǝ nlebe nlebe .
40024008	Nyamfo kenke ebuyifo fe kase kalelefo lǝǝtsyǝ usio kasɔ ku bunǝ .
40024009	“ Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , boomuǝ mi befi mi bakpe lǝ ani bǝtǝ bǝ bate mi ohiã , nya boolo mi kulaa tsya . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso .
40024010	Betidi kpǝ ebonyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ . Boofi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bakpe lǝ ani bǝtǝ balo nya bookisi mǝ bayimi bǝtsyuǝ .
40024011	Betidi kpǝ ebɔbɔ batɛyi bidia bǝnkǝ mǝ ni Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya bɔɔwɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
40024012	Abuayifoyifo ebufui ekpe nya mba dikafo banɔ kpǝ eto lelabi itǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɔɔni .
40024013	Fɛɛ nwǝ luunyǝ kekleke isu ese kalosǝkɔ , ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
40024014	Boobe Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ kawunsiǝ bafia , itǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ uńyǝ kusu ɔnɔ ni , nnya kama fɛ kalosǝkɔ luubǝ nɛ .
40024015	“ Buinyǝ ekpinsa nyamǝ luubǝ ińyǝ lǝ kakɛnkɛkɔ kamǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi Daniel lɛtɛyi útsyǝ . Yuuńyǝ lǝ kakɛkɛnkɔ kamǝ . Nya fǝ ke lékla kukue komfoo , nɔ nyamfo kasɔ wuee .
40024016	“ Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , mimba nkpe lǝ Yuda eto kasɔ , tsyetsyi besu atini ǝsuǝ .
40024017	Utidi wǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ diyo disi , wanyifǝ ubǝ kasɔ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi kulesa lǝ wǝ diyo kafo .
40024018	Utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ ɔkuɛ mensi sinkli ubǝ oto nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi wǝ kafia .
40024019	Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ bafonlɛ ku bebiambe ba nlɛ bebisambi bɔyimisǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
40024020	Bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa biǝ mmi ditsyetsyife nǝmǝ mǝntǝkǝ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nye Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
40024021	Itsyise kayinyǝnyǝ kekleke ka luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ke okle mǝmbǝ tɔ kǝnyǝ itsyi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ketsykokɔ ke . Nya ke okle tsya ensiembubǝ kǝnyǝ .
40024022	Fɛɛ Onanto ébose nnya uyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu . Lenni nko esoo , eni utidi sa embubu usiǝ lǝ nkpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ betidi ba Onanto díkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu .
40024023	“ Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ átɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nkpe mfo o-o , ’ nye ‘ Nnyǝ wǝ nkpe mmǝǝ , ’ mamfo wǝ anɔ .
40024024	Itsyise badia ba laatɛyi bǝ mǝ ni mba Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ku mba tsya bǝ mǝ ni Onanto Eto Bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ebotaka bǝbǝ . Nya booyifo ayanisa kplɛ kplɛ kpǝ bate , bǝ lǝ boofo kulaa tsya , bɔɔwɛ betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ bakpe .
40024025	Bɛnɔ biǝ mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo ntɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
40024026	“ Nye lǝ betidi átɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Okpe lǝ mfimintii , ’ biensu bebe . Nye lǝ bátɛyi mi bǝ ‘ Okpe lǝ diyo kafo mfoo , ’ biamfo bɛnɔ .
40024027	Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ ebutsyǝ fe kase kato laato ɔsi mia mia , lǝ kofekatokɔ kǝnyǝndǝ kakpo lǝ kofe eto diyokedufǝkɔ seka .
40024028	Kaka lesakpǝnkpǝ ntee , mfo ebintsyǝ lǝǝsiǝ nɛ .
40024029	“ Lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto kamaa , kofe ebona tũũ , nya kofande tsya ensiembuyǝnde , nya befandebi loolo bitsyi kato , nya kato eto ǝsuǝale luutinkǝ nya yɔɔnyi lǝ nnya ńyǝnkɔ .
40024030	“ Nya Utidi Eto Ubi eto ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ lɔɔbɔ bǝnyǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ . Nya kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke luuwi nku lǝ bǝnyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ntǝkǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ lǝ diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
40024031	Buufe kakpatsyaku kplɛ nya wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ , nya bookpa betidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto disi lɔni isu disi nǝ .
40024032	“ Bekase asa itsyi lǝ kudiyi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase koata kabɔ afanto fɔfɔ . Lefe nǝ binyǝ kudiyi ditsyiko bota kǝlǝkǝ afantoo , biate biǝ kasɔminte boyo kalo .
40024033	Nko ke lǝ binyǝ asa nnya kenke mínkatɛyi míntɔnsǝǝ , bete biǝ kalosǝkɔ kamǝ eboyo kalo .
40024034	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ fɛ mba nsi nkpǝ mfo luukpǝ balo .
40024035	Kato ku kasɔ ebubǝ kafe , fɛɛ mɔ etiki embubǝ efe kulefe .
40024036	“ Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi diyi nye lefe nǝmǝ kalosǝkɔ luubǝ . Onanto eto Batɔnkpe nye Ubi ǝmǝ kulaa tsya enyi . Anto hã nyi .
40024037	Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ ebuyifo fe kase íbǝ lǝ Noa eto lefe .
40024038	Lǝ lefe nǝ lɛtɔ ntu eto buyi bomǝǝ , betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ , basani ku besio ákakpa bǝtsyuǝ isu ese diyi fɛfɛ nǝ Noa dídufǝ lǝ kufue komǝ kafo .
40024039	Fɛɛ bánte lesa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ isu ese lefe nǝ ɔsɔmi lɛni , ntu díyi bókpa mǝmblɛ kenke búdunko . Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi eto dibǝfe tsya nɛ .
40024040	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , basani inuǝ ebuńyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ bekeyifo keyifo fɛ wookpa ɔni udunko nya uubu ɔni bǝtsyǝ .
40024041	Besio inuǝ ebuńyǝ bǝkǝkuǝ antabi , fɛɛ Onanto ebutsyi ɔni udunko nya uubu ɔni utsyǝ .
40024042	“ Nyaso bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ , itsyise binnyi diyi nǝ mi Onamute luubǝ .
40024043	Lǝ oyosate áte dinǝ uyu luubǝ wǝ keyukɔ , eni wuutǝkǝ ǝnǝ ukase ni . Nya weembutǝ kusu nkǝ uyu ǝmǝ dufǝ , oba wǝ diyo uyu wǝ .
40024044	Nko ke ele bǝ fintsya muǝ ǝsuǝ ǝtsyǝ , itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fannlɛ wǝ kusu bobe .
40024045	“ Owoe ni uyifoyifo sɛɛ wǝ ni obesibe ? Wǝ ni uyifoyifo wǝ , wǝ Onamute dífi útsyǝ lǝ wǝ beyifotsyuǝ eto kɛnyɛ , nkǝ úkǝtǝ mǝ lesa lǝ lefe ǝsuǝ .
40024046	Nte disuǝyuǝ nǝ eto okle yuudi itǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo lǝ wǝ Onamute ǝbǝ unyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ buyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ !
40024047	Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onamute ǝmfo ebufi uyifoyifo ǝmfo utsyǝ lǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke eto kɛnyɛ .
40024048	Fɛɛ lǝ uyifoyifo bua unii , wɔɔtɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute embubǝ mɔmɔ ! ’
40024049	Nyaso wuutsyiko wǝ beyifoyifotsyuǝ bɔblɛ , nya ukedi , ukǝnǝ ku betekpe .
40024050	Nya wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ ebubǝ lǝ diyi lɔni nǝ ɔnlɛ wǝ kusu bobe ku lefe nǝ unnyi .
40024051	Onamute ǝmǝ ebunǝ wǝ koto sitinti . Nya wuunǝ wǝ koto kekleke fe kase ińyǝ itǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi seka ! Mfó nya wuuwi keku wɔɔyimi animi !
40025001	“ Lefe nǝmfóo , mmǝ seka Onanto eto sekakedikɔ luutsyǝ nɛ . Yuutsyǝ fe mbitɛ lefosi ba léto mǝ kakandiɛ bǝ beesu batsyako ɔkafɔse utsyuǝ .
40025002	Mǝ nti eto ɛnɔ eeninǝ , nya ɛnɔ fɛfɛ tsya eyifo babesibe .
40025003	Ɛnɔ ba leeninǝ étsyi kakandiɛ , fɛɛ béntsyi nnuǝbi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ báwunisǝ .
40025004	Nya babesibe bamǝ alɛɛ , mǝ étsyi nnuǝbi báwunsǝ lǝ mǝ asa ǝsuǝ ku kakandiɛ kamǝ .
40025005	Se Okafɔse ǝmǝ léfe kama ku bubǝ esoo , mbitɛ bomǝ étsyiko selabe butinkǝ nya bálabe selabe .
40025006	“ Ntsyenti lefee , bánɔ kudu bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ okafɔse ǝmǝ nlɛ bubǝ ! Betaka , bibǝ betsyako wǝ ! ’
40025007	“ Mfó nya mbitɛ bomǝ létaka nya bábesǝ mǝ kakandiɛ eto ute kato .
40025008	Nya mba leeninǝ lɛtɛyi babesibe bamǝ bǝ , ‘ Bitǝ bo mi nnuǝbi bomǝ eto ntsyuǝ itsyise bo kakandiɛ lɛ bɔni . ’
40025009	“ Nya babesibe bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo nnuǝbi emboyo itǝ bo ku mi , nyaso bisu mba laate ɔflɔ , lǝ bisu beya butsyuǝ bitǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
40025010	“ Nya kase bésu mu kayakɔ koo , okafɔse ǝmǝ ǝbǝ údufǝ . Mbitɛ ɛnɔ ba dímuǝ ǝsuǝ ǝkǝko wǝ bédufǝ lǝ kaka banlɛ kusiǝ komǝ bokpa mfó nya béti siku .
40025011	“ Kamaa , mbitɛ fɛfɛ bomǝ tsya ǝbǝ bédufǝ nya bétsyiko siku bɔsɔ katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Boanto , Boanto ! Sini bo lǝ budufǝ ! ’
40025012	“ Nya okafɔse ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kulefe , minnyi mi ! ’ ”
40025013	Mfó nya Yesu lélosǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyaso bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyuǝ , itsyise binyi diyi nye lefe nǝ muubǝ .
40025014	“ Lefe nǝmfóo , Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ebutsyǝ fe mmǝ . Lefe lɔnii , Osani utsyuǝ akɛ , wǝ léla nkǝ lǝ usu kusu kutsyuǝ nyaso ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya úfi wǝ bikǝ ókpe mǝ lǝ ani .
40025015	Útǝ utsyuǝ saa lesa nǝ wuukefi keyifo lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ , nya ɔnii , útǝ wǝ sika eto atabi akpi anɔ . Nya obambaa , útǝ wǝ akpi ǝnuǝ . Utsyǝfǝǝ , útǝ wǝ kɔkpi kɔni . Nya údu úsu wǝ kusu komǝ .
40025016	Uyifoyifo wǝ léfo atabi eto akpi anɔɔ , ésu ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya únyǝ akpi anɔ útǝkǝsǝ .
40025017	Nko ke nwǝ bǝtǝ akpi ǝnuǝ tsya dínyǝ akpi ǝnuǝ útǝkǝsǝ .
40025018	Fɛɛ uyifoyifo wǝ bǝtǝ sika eto atabi kɔkpi kɔnwɛɛ , úsu úku dibiǝ nya úfi wǝ Onamute eto atabi nyamǝ ɔ́kula mfó .
40025019	“ Lǝ lefe kɛntsye eto kamaa , beyifoyifo bamfo eto Onamute ǝmǝ ésinkli úbǝ nya údufǝ lǝ nkunta ku mǝ .
40025020	Uyifoyifo wǝ léfo sika eto atabi akpi anɔ , éfi akpi anɔ bamba óboko nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , ǝtǝ mɛ sika eto akpi anɔ , nya mínyǝ akpi anɔ bamba mínkpe . ’
40025021	“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Alɔ éyifo , uyifoyifo sɛɛ . Éyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nya fálɛ asa sɛkɛ ola , nyaso muufi fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ asa kpǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Dufǝ ǝbǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
40025022	“ Nya uyifoyifo nuǝfǝ wǝ bǝtǝ sika eto akpi ǝnuǝ tsya díbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , ǝtǝ mɛ sika eto atabi akpi ǝnuǝ nya mínyǝ akpi ǝnuǝ bamba mínkpe . ’
40025023	“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Uyifoyifo sɛɛ , éyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tinti ! Se fálɛ asa sɛkɛ ola lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ esoo , muufi fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ kpǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
40025024	“ Mfó nya uyifoyifo wǝ léfo sika eto atabi kɔkpi kɔnwɛ tsya díbe nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nyi minkǝ eyifo utidi wǝ eto asa nkpe ale nnya fǝǝfǝsǝ asa lǝ kaka fámanto kuǝtsyuǝ . Nya faalɛ asa lǝ kaka fémense kulesa .
40025025	Nya se mínte sikpi esoo , mfi fǝ atabi nyamǝ nya mínku dibiǝ mímfi nnya mínkpe . Nyaso nyǝ fǝ atabi ni nyamfo . ’
40025026	“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ uyifoyifo bua , ɔflɔ́ . Eyi fǝ meefi lesa kaka lǝ mánkpe nya mǝǝfǝsǝ asa lǝ kaka mánto kulesa .
40025027	Nyalɛ beso fémemfi mɔ atabi ésuko atabi kǝtsyǝkɔ bǝ lǝ mbǝǝ , lǝ nnyǝ nnya kutǝkǝ ? ’
40025028	“ Mfó nya onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔmɔ , lɛ atabi nyamfo afo lǝ wǝ ani lǝ befi nnya bitǝ nwǝ nkpe akpi lefosi . ’
40025029	Itsyise utidi wǝ nkpe asaa , wǝ ke bonsi boofi ditsyuǝ bakpe bawunsǝ nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , sɛkɛɛ nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ ni bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
40025030	Nya uyifoyifo bimba ǝmfo alɛɛ , beto wǝ bekpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lǝ lekple . Kaka mfóo , wuwi keku unǝ wǝ animi .
40025031	“ Lefe nǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ luubǝ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenkee , wuusiǝ lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ .
40025032	Nya kawunsiǝ eto ese eto betidi kenke lɔɔbɔ bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya wuusǝnsǝ mǝ lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ fe kase nwǝ laayɛnko bebuki leesǝnsǝ basamu kǝlǝkǝ lǝ bate nti .
40025033	Wuuńyǝsǝ betidi sɛɛ lǝ wǝ kodiani , nya wuutǝ mba ni betidi bua ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kǝmǝni .
40025034	“ Nya Oka ǝmǝ lɔɔtɛyi mba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ kodiani nkǝ , ‘ Bibǝ , mi mba mɔ anto lékpo atsyɔ ! Bibǝ bidufǝ lǝ sekakedikɔ ka bálɔ bǝtsyǝ itǝ mi idu taa kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ ke .
40025035	Kukpɛnsɛ álɛ mɛ nya bítǝ mɛ lesa míndi , utukuɛ álɛ mɛ , nya bítǝ mɛ ntu mínnǝ . Nyifo ɔfɔ nya béfo mɛ békpe lǝ mi ayo .
40025036	Lefe nǝ mínyɛ leyaa , bítǝ mɛ kafia nti . Nya lefe nǝ mínlɛ bufii , bɛlɛ mɛ ola . Lefe nǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo , bíbǝ bebe mɛ . ’
40025037	“ Mfó nya betidi sɛɛ bamǝ lɔɔtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , dimanfe búnyǝ kukpɛnsɛ nlɛ fǝ fɛ bútǝ lesa fédi , nye bútǝ fǝ ntu fǝnǝ ?
40025038	Dimanfe búnyǝ fǝ ɔfɔ fɛ bófo fǝ nye fányɛ leya bútǝ fǝ kafia féti ?
40025039	Dimanfe bɔ́nɔ bǝ alɛ bufi nye bǝ akɛ lǝ diyo fɛ búbǝ bóbe fǝ ? ’
40025040	“ Mfó nya Oka ǝmǝ luutǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lefe saa nǝ fáwunsǝko utsyuǝ wǝ lǝmbǝ dibu saa lǝ mɔ bayimi bamfo ntii , mɔ féyifo fǝtǝ . ’
40025041	“ Mfó wɔɔtɛyi mba ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kǝmǝni nkǝ , ‘ Bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , mi mba Onanto díkudi ! Bisu bidufǝ lǝ ditefɛnku manlo nǝ Onanto létsyaka útǝ Obonsam ku wǝ batɔnkpe !
40025042	Kukpɛnsɛ álɛ mɛ , fɛɛ bɛni bíǝntǝ mɛ lesa ndi . Utukuɛ álɛ mɛ , fɛɛ bíǝntǝ mɛ ntu nko ke .
40025043	Nyifo ɔfɔ wǝ díbǝ ɔ́sɔnɔ mi , tsya bíamfo mɛ . Nyɛ leya tsya bíenti mɛ kafia . Nnɔ bufi , bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo , fɛɛ bíǝmbǝ bisiǝsǝ mɛ . ’
40025044	“ Mfó buutǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Boanto , lemanfe búnyǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ fǝ , nye ututkuɛ lɛ fǝ , nye féyifo ɔfɔ , nye fányɛ leya , nye fanlɛ bufi , nye fakɛ lǝ diyo fɛ bóǝmbǝ bobe nye bɔ́wunsǝko fǝ ? ’
40025045	“ Oka ǝmǝ ebutǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe bíenyifo kasɛɛ bítǝ betidi ba bíembu kulesa lǝ mɔ bǝtsyuǝ bamfo ntii , mɔ uni bíenyifo kulesa bitǝ ! ’ ”
40025046	Yesu átɛyi ólosǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso boofi mba mfo batsyese kanyi kǝnyǝkɔ itǝ manlo manlo . Nya betidi sɛɛ bamfóo , mǝ ebunyǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ kulefe kulefe . ”
40026001	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
40026002	“ Iyifo mi bote bǝnkǝ ibu eyi ǝnuǝ lǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi nǝmǝ lǝ leyoo , nya boofi Utidi Eto Ubi bǝtǝ bǝ basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ . ”
40026003	Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ dísu bátsya lǝ Usumunyǝ ninǝ Kenke Kayafa eto diyo .
40026004	Befi nsusu bǝ boomuǝ Yesu kalɔkalɔ lǝ balo wǝ .
40026005	Bátɛyi tsya bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ bumuǝ wǝ lǝ diyi nǝmǝ budi kǝmiǝ , lenni nko betidi bamǝ ebunyǝnki bataka bǝńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
40026006	Yesu ésu Simon wǝ dífi bufi sia eto diyo lǝ Betania .
40026007	Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ budii , usio utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , wǝ dítsyi nnuǝbi alabasta eto dituntu nǝ ókpo nnuǝbi tɔ bo laanyi fififi , bo léfo koya tinti óboko mfó , nya úfi mu ókpo Yesu lǝ disi .
40026008	Se Yesu eto bakasebi dínyǝ nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ . Bátɔ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso óbiasǝ nnuǝbi bomfo nko ?
40026009	Boofo nnuǝbi bomfó boté itǝ koya kplɛ , befi atabi nyamǝ bǝtǝ bakombo ! ”
40026010	Se Yesu lɛnɔ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyii , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ usio ǝmfo bule ? Lesa sɛɛ dini úyifo útǝ mɛ .
40026011	Bakombo kpe mi lenti lefe saa . Fɛ , mɔɔ inni lefe saa mɔɔkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ .
40026012	Se usio ǝmfo dífi nnuǝbi bomfo ókpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , ɔ́lɔ mɛ utsyǝ itǝ mɔ bubike .
40026013	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kawunsiǝ eto kaka ke boobe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsyaa , boofi nnya usio ǝmfo díyifo bakakloma wǝ . ”
40026014	Mfó nya bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni , wǝ baakpo Yuda Iskariot dísu besumunyǝ ninǝ ɔflɔ .
40026015	Nya úsu ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be biutǝ mɛ lǝ ndu Yesu ntǝ mi ? ” Bákla sika flubia fosi ǝtsyǝ béfi bǝtǝ wǝ .
40026016	Idu lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , útsyiko esu bɔbɛbɛ kase wuudu Yesu utǝ mǝ .
40026017	Lǝ Abolo Menyenki eto Eyididi eto diyi tutɛ ǝsuǝǝ , bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sie faala fǝ bɔlɔ butsyǝ butǝ fǝ itǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyi nǝmǝ budi ? ”
40026018	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu osani utsyuǝ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝ , ‘ Oteasa nkǝ , “ Mɔ lefe éboyo . Mɔ ku mɔ bakasebi ebudi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmǝ lǝ fǝ diyo . ” ’ ”
40026019	Bakasebi bamǝ éyifo fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ , nya bánwa Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
40026020	Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ itǝ lesa budi .
40026021	Lǝ lesa nǝmǝ kedikɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mi nti eto ɔni ebudu mɛ utǝ . ”
40026022	Ditiki nǝmfo ǝlǝ bakasebi bamǝ tinti nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔtɔ ɔni ɔni bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , mɔ fanlɛ lee ? ”
40026023	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni kedi uni luudu mɛ utǝ .
40026024	Mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebukpǝ fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ utidi wǝ luudu Utidi Eto Ubi utǝ . Lǝ nnya ete bánle utidi ǝmǝ eni ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso . ”
40026025	Yuda wǝ lǝǝbǝ Yesu budu kǝtǝ tsya átɔ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , sitinti inni mɔ fanlɛ , lee ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ lɛtɛyi . ”
40026026	Se banlɛ lesa budii , Yesu éfi abolo , nya ɔ́sɔ ani nya úbudi wǝ nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Befo lǝ bidi . Nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . ”
40026027	Nya úfi lɛkɔbe ku nte nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úfi útǝ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimblɛ fo binǝ .
40026028	Nyǝ mɔ kɔtɔ ko ni kakle lǝ Onanto ku wǝ betidi eto nti . Kɔtɔ ko minfi minlɛ bokpo kasɔ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi , bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ .
40026029	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , mensiembunǝ nte bomfo eto okle isu ese lefe nǝ mɔ ku mi luunǝ nte fɔfɔ lǝ mɔ Anto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
40026030	Nyamfo eto kamaa , bésǝ kusǝ bátɛsǝ Onanto , nya bédu bésu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ .
40026031	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mmi eto ketsye kamfoo , mimblɛ ebutsyetsyi bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , nya mɔ mate luubu . Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebolo nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ basamu bamǝ nya basamu bamǝ luusǝnsǝ . ’
40026032	Fɛɛ lǝ batakasǝ mɛ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , mɔɔtɔ mi sɛtɔ nsu Galilea . ”
40026033	Petro éfe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Lǝ bafɛfɛ kenke ani fǝ tsyaa , memboyani fǝ ntsyǝ kulefe ! ”
40026034	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ ketsye kamfo fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ , ǝbɔtɛyi sitsyǝ fǝnkǝ enyi mɛ . ”
40026035	Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mǝmbɔni fǝ kulefe , lǝ ibǝ bǝ bonko fǝ kpe kulaa tsya . ” Nya bakasebi fɛfɛ kenke tsya lɛtɛyi nko .
40026036	Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dísu kaka baakpo Getsemane , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisiǝ mfo lǝ nsu sɛtɔ mǝ nsu nto ola . ”
40026037	Ókpa Petro ku Sebedeo eto bebi inuǝ bamǝ ɔ́yɛnko . Údufǝ lǝ kawɛndo ǝsuǝ , nya útsyiko butinkǝ kekleke .
40026038	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kanyi ka nkpe mɛ lǝ utu fui tinti bǝ kába mɛ ǝsuǝ . Bisiǝ mfo lǝ bikase ku mɛ . ”
40026039	Ɔ́yɛ úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya ókpo lǝ kasɔ úfusǝ ǝnǝmi , nya óto ola nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , lǝ yɔɔlɛkɛɛ , takasǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ menyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ bomu lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
40026040	Se úsinkli úsu bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ , únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe , nya ɔ́tɔ Petro nkǝ , “ Nyaso mi basini bamfo embofo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ ku mɛ itǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni hã ete ?
40026041	Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ beto ola bǝ biembudufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛ bola , fɛɛ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ayɔkpɔ . ”
40026042	Yesu esi úsu dinuǝfǝ úsu oto ola ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , lǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝ mǝǝbǝ bunǝ mfo embofe mɛ , nya iyifo fǝ lelabi bǝ nnǝ ni kokooko , nyalɛ tǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
40026043	Se úsinkli úbǝ bioo , únyǝ nkǝ bakasebi bamǝ si balɛ selabe ko , nya bannlɛ ǝnǝmi bofo buminkli kulaa tsya .
40026044	Yesu esi údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ ditsyǝfǝ úsu óto ola fe kase óto ibǝ éfe .
40026045	Nya úsinkli úbǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisi belabe selabe bɛlɛ ɔnwɛ butsyǝ ? Bebe ! Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ befi Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ bakpe lǝ betidi bua eto ani .
40026046	Betaka lǝ budu . Bebee , nwǝ nlɛ mɛ budu kǝtǝ ebɔfi . ”
40026047	Yesu ǝńyǝ ɔlɛ mǝ etiki budinko fɛ Yuda wǝ ni lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni díbǝ údufǝ . Betidi ba ni besumunyǝ ninǝ ku batɔnkotɔnko ba bǝlǝkǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ , nya béntsyi nlande ku keyi .
40026048	Udundukǝtǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ báte batɔnsǝ bǝ , “ Utidi wǝ mɔɔbuta nsiǝsǝǝ , wǝ ni utidi wǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ nɛ . Bimuǝ wǝ . ”
40026049	Yuda ésu Yesu ɔflɔ nya lǝ kase únyǝ wǝ koo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , diyuǝsǝ itǝ fǝ . ” Mfó nya ɔ́buta wǝ .
40026050	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ɔhɔ , kɔse lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ fǝbǝ keyifokɔ ! ” Mfó nya betidi bamǝ díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bǝmuǝ wǝ nya bákɔbe wǝ kekleke .
40026051	Mba ntǝkǝko Yesu eto ɔni ǝlǝkǝ wǝ kalande nya ówe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ eto ndomunyǝ eto koto .
40026052	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ kalande akpe lǝ ke kakpekɔ . Betidi ba leetsyi kalande lǝ betidi ǝsuǝǝ , kalande ǝsuǝ baayɛ kǝkpǝ .
40026053	Biante biǝ moofo bɔwunsǝko bɔtɔ ketsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔ lee , nya lamfolamfoo , wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe eto bamamanyǝ eto akpa lefosi ǝnuǝ itsyi kato ?
40026054	Fɛɛ lǝ ibǝ nkoo , ntsyǝ fɛ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue luubǝ itǝ ? ”
40026055	Nya Yesu dítsyi ǝnǝmi útǝ sitiditu siamǝ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bitsyi keyi ku nlande bibǝ biǝ bibǝ mɛ kǝmuǝkɔ fe nwǝ ńyǝ lǝ Aba ǝsuǝ ? Diyi saa , nkɛ lǝ Onanto eto kesumuyo mfó nkate asa , fɛɛ bíǝmmuǝ mɛ .
40026056	Asa nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ nko bǝ lǝ asa nnya bǝnyǝlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ” Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi kenke dítsyetsyi bédu lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
40026057	Mba dímuǝ Yesu ákpa wǝ bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Kayafa eto diyo kaka besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa létsya bensi .
40026058	Petro ǝtǝko mǝ kama kama úsu taa Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto lekpata kafo . Úsu úsiǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ obe kase ditiki nǝmǝ dubǝ ibǝ .
40026059	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku bakponkpo ba dísiǝ mfó kenke ábɛbɛ betidi ba luubǝ bala etiki bǝtǝkǝ Yesu lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu balo wǝ .
40026060	Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ kulesa saa , ite bǝ betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bála bidia bǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ tsyafɛ . Betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ
40026061	nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mooba Onanto eto kesumuyo nǝmfo , nya lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli nto ni nńyǝnsǝ . ’ ”
40026062	Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke átaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Anlɛ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi kǝtǝkǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfo bɔnɔ ? Ǝmbǝ Kulesa fɔɔtɛyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
40026063	Fɛɛ Yesu édi bi , wóantɛyi kulesa . Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ esi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto wǝ nsi nkpe eto diye ǝsuǝǝ , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ tɛyi bo lǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
40026064	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , ite fǝ kase fátɛyi . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , buinyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi se unsi lǝ Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto kodiani . Nya biunyǝ se unsi lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ utsyi kato ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
40026065	Lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ áfuadi wǝ awu ku lɛblɔfi nya ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Édi mbusiotiki ! Boensihiã badansiɛ saa ! Bíɔnɔ mbusiotiki nnya údi mfo !
40026066	Ntsyǝ bibu ? ” Mǝmblɛ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Údi dikpi nya uńyǝ utǝ ukpǝ ! ”
40026067	Nya bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi nya báblɛ wǝ . Nya mba lɛsɔ wǝ lǝ atosi ,
40026068	átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ fenii , tɛyi bo futsyǝ lɛsɔ fǝ ! ”
40026069	Petro ǝsiǝ lǝ lekple lǝ kpakpaakpe mfó fɛ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto usumubisiobi díbǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu wǝ ditsyi Galilea eto kasɔ . ”
40026070	Fɛɛ ɔ́ni nnya lǝ betidi bamfo kenke eto ǝnǝmi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mante lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ! ”
40026071	Nya údu mfó úsu úńyǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto kesie . Usumubisiobi bamba tsya ǝnyǝ Petro nya ɔ́tɛyi mba díńyǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Wuntsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
40026072	Bio Petro esi ɔ́ni nya óka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Minyi osani ǝmǝ ko ! ”
40026073	Yanklɛ fɛ mba ńyǝ mfo díbǝ bátɛyi Petro bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛkpɛ mǝ ɔni feni , itsyise fǝ etikididi ǝǝlǝkǝ fǝ kate wuee . ”
40026074	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ lesa saa bǝ ɔnukualɛ minlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto lǝ unǝ mɛ koto lǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi ! ” Lefe nǝmfo tutuutu nnya ukusɛ dítǝ kɛnyɛ .
40026075	Nya Petro lékloma lesa nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ǝbɔtɛyi sitsyǝ fǝnkǝ enyi mɛ . ” Ɔ́bɔ úsu lekple nya úwi keku kekleke .
40027001	Se kale dísiǝ ku olesiǝtu , Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ kenke átsya nya báse uyi bǝ boolo Yesu .
40027002	Bákpe wǝ lǝ amena nya bákpa wǝ bésu bákpe Romafɔ eto Aba eto Uninǝ Pilato lǝ ani .
40027003	Se Yuda , wǝ dídu Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bálo wǝ dikpǝnkpii , ífi wǝ tinti , nya úsinkliko sika flubia awosi ǝtsyǝ nyamǝ úsuko besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ bamǝ .
40027004	Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyifo kabua bǝ mfi utidi wǝ dímenyifo kabua ntǝ miǝ balo ! ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyamfo manka bo nkpǝ . Fǝ etiki ni nyamfó ! ”
40027005	Yuda éfi atabi nyamǝ óto ókpe lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo mfó , nya usu ókpe ukuǝ úkpe .
40027006	Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ bamfó lɛsɛ atabi nyamǝ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atabi nyamfo eyifo kɔtɔ eto atabi , nya iyifo lesa nǝ ńyǝ lǝ bo kesumu eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ bǝ bufi atabi nyamfo bokpe lǝ bo kesumu eto otobe . Bo kɔfi eti nyamfo kusu . ”
40027007	Se bákpe disii , báse nya uyi bǝnkǝ befi atabi nyamǝ bésu báya Asa eto Otonto eto Kasɔ itǝ bafɔ eto kebikekɔ .
40027008	Nyamfo esoo , bǝtǝkǝ kasɔ kamǝ diye bǝ Kɔtɔ eto Kasɔ ibǝ ese lǝ mmi .
40027009	Itǝ lesa nǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yeremia lɛtɛyi útsyǝ díbǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Béfi sika flubia eto atabi fosi ǝtsyǝ , nya Israelfɔ lɛtɔnɔ bǝ boofo lǝ wǝ disi
40027010	béfi báya Otonto eto Kasɔ , fe kase Bonamute léla nkǝ nyifo . ”
40027011	Bákpa Yesu báboko Romafɔ eto Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ Pilato eto ǝnǝmi . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee . Átɛyi kukɔnɔ . ”
40027012	Fɛɛ wántɛyi kulesa itsyi lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ eto nyɛ bo banlɛ bola kǝtǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
40027013	Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mfo manka fǝ lee ? ”
40027014	Fɛɛ íyifo Aba eto uninǝ ǝmǝ yani tinti se Yesu lɛni wémfe kɛnyɛ útǝ mbuayɛ saa .
40027015	Ídi Aba eto uninǝ lesa nǝ úkeyifo lɛlɛ saa lǝ bǝǝbǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyi budi , bǝ oyani mba béti bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo eto ɔni wǝ betidi kpǝ bamǝ lɛtɔ , utǝ mǝ .
40027016	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , mba bákpe lǝ diyo mfó eto ɔni akɛ , wǝ betidi nyi kukɔnɔ nya baakpo wǝ bǝ Baraba .
40027017	Nyaso lefe nǝ betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe biala biǝ nyani ntǝ mi ? Baraba lee , lee Yesu wǝ betidi laakpo bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ? ”
40027018	Úyifo nko itsyise óte nkǝ kekisi eso Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamfo lékpa wǝ báboko .
40027019	Lefe nǝ Pilato nsi ɔnlɛ lekpo nǝmǝ bokpoo , wǝ usiǝ átsyese wǝ ɔtɔnkpe nkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ fǝ ani lǝ utidi wǝ dímenyifo kabua saa mfo eto etiki ǝsuǝ , itsyise nsiǝ kola kǝnǝ eto ketsye itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya dítǝ sikpi dímuǝ mɛ tinti ! ”
40027020	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ábiasǝ betidi ba létsya mfo eto ato bǝnkǝ batɔ Pilato lǝ oyani Baraba utǝ mǝ lǝ balo Yesu .
40027021	Fɛɛ Pilato átɔ betidi ba létsya mfó nkǝ , “ Betidi inuǝ bamfo eto nti , nte nwǝ bela biǝ nyani ntǝ mi ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Baraba ! ”
40027022	Nya Pilato dísi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo ku Yesu wǝ baakpo bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ mɔmɔ ? ” Mǝmblɛ kenke ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ ! ”
40027023	Fɛɛ Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kabua ka úyifo ? ” Mfóo , bétsyiko bofa bembembe katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
40027024	Se Pilato dínyǝ nkǝ wensiembofo kulesa buyifo lenni bulǝ ebubǝǝ , úfi ntu nya úflǝ ani lǝ sitiditu nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ani , nnyǝ mɔ akpa , mɔ ani ǝmbǝ lǝ osani ǝmfo eto bolo ǝsuǝ ! Mi etiki ini . ”
40027025	Sitiditu siamǝ kenke ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ukpǝ bǝ utǝkǝ lǝ bo ku bo bebi lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
40027026	Mfó nya Pilato léyani Baraba útǝ mǝ . Nya se útǝ báblɛ Yesu bálosǝ , óyani wǝ útǝ nkǝ básɔ wǝ lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ .
40027027	Nya Pilato eto bamamanyǝ lékpa Yesu bésuko Aba eto uninǝ eto diyo , nya bamamanyǝ ba kenke díbǝ bátsyilama wǝ .
40027028	Bǝlǝkǝ wǝ awu lǝ ǝsuǝ nya béfi awu sia bákpe wǝ .
40027029	Nya béfi biyu bédi lekpakpa bétsyisǝ wǝ lǝ disi fɛ béfi uyi bákpe wǝ lǝ kodiani . Nya báse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi fe oka seka nya bǝmǝ wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , ! Yudafɔ eto Oka lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ kɛntsyɛɛ ! ”
40027030	Bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bálɛ uyi ǝmǝ báfo básɔ wǝ lǝ disi .
40027031	Se bǝmǝ wǝ bálosǝ nkoo , bǝlǝkǝ wǝ awu sia nyamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya besi béfi wǝ awu nyamǝ bákpe wǝ . Nya bákpa wǝ báyɛnko bésu wǝ kasɔkɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
40027032	Lefe nǝ bédu lǝ umǝ báyɛ bantɔɔ , bátsyako osani utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi Kirene wǝ baakpo Simon . Bamamanyǝ bamǝ áhiɛ wǝ bǝ ofo Yesu eto uyikabie komǝ utsyi .
40027033	Nya bésu báyo kaka baakpo Golgata eto kasɔnɔnɔ ni Ditidisikɔbe ku kalua .
40027034	Bǝtǝ Yesu nte bo bátsyakasǝ ku kofa ko nkpe kalo bǝ unǝ . Fɛɛ se útu mu óbee , ɔ́ni wǝnnǝ mu .
40027035	Mfó nya bamamanyǝ bamǝ lɛsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ , nya bákpo asa basɛɛ fɛ bésie wǝ awu bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
40027036	Nya kamaa , bǝsiǝ mfó bákase wǝ .
40027037	Lǝ wǝ disi katoo , báwɔni asa bámanklasǝ lǝ uyi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nnya báwɔni bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ eso bálo wǝ ni bǝ , “ Nnyǝ Yesu , Nwǝ Ni Yudafɔ Eto Oka . ”
40027038	Básɔ beyu inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bákɔ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Ɔni áfaka lǝ wǝ sediani nya ɔni tsya léfaka lǝ wǝ simǝni .
40027039	Betidi ba kenke lɛyɛ mfó étinkǝsǝ mǝ esi nya báka Yesu fefe .
40027040	Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni nwǝ lɛtɛyi fǝnkǝ eboba Desumuyo Kplɛ akpo lǝ kasɔ , esinkli ato ni ǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ ! Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ Onanto eto Ubi feni ! Yifǝ lǝ uyikabie komǝ ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ . ”
40027041	Nko ke besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ tsya dímǝ wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
40027042	“ Ófo betidi bamba lǝ nkpǝ , fɛɛ wǝmbofó wǝ ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ ! Lǝ Yudafɔ eto Oka unii , ɔyifǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ mɔmɔ ubǝ , lǝ bofo wǝ bɔnɔ !
40027043	Ófó Onanto ɔ́nɔ , nya waakpadi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ Onanto eto Ubi . Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Onanto aala wǝǝ , lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ mɔmɔ lǝ bobe ! ”
40027044	Nko ken beyu ba ku wǝ básɔ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ tsya léka wǝ nɛ .
40027045	Idu lǝ kakɔmi eto abombo lefosi ǝnuǝǝ , kawunsiǝ kenke ána tũũ isu ese lǝ ketsyitsyokɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ .
40027046	Fe abombo ǝtsyǝ etii , Yesu áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Eli , Eli , lama sabaktani ? ” Nyamfo eto kasɔ ni , “ Mɔ Onanto , mɔ Onanto ! Beso fáyani mɛ fǝtsyǝ ? ”
40027047	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔlɛ Elia bokpadi ! ”
40027048	Mǝ ɔni étsyetsyi nya úfi okosa wǝ bákpe lǝ nte eto sonkpe , nya úfi mu ku uyi úsuko nkǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ lǝ unǝ .
40027049	Fɛɛ betidi bamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bińyǝ lǝ bobe ! Bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Elia ebubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko kuyi komfo ǝsuǝ . ”
40027050	Yesu esi ófa bembembe nya úkpǝ .
40027051	Lamfolamfoo , Disumuyo Kplɛ eto kafia kplɛ dísie lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ itsyi kato ibǝ kasɔ . Nya kasɔ kamǝ kenke dítinkǝ , nya aba léba .
40027052	Edi ásini , nya Onanto eto betidi kɛnkɛ kpǝ ba díkekpǝ létaka bǝbǝ nkpǝ .
40027053	Bábɔ lǝ mǝ edi kafo nya se Yesu létaka útsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝǝ , bésu Yudafɔ eto Umǝ Kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ kafo kaka betidi kpǝ dínyǝ mǝ .
40027054	Se Omamanyǝ ninǝ ku bamamanyǝ ba díńyǝ bákase Yesu dínyǝ kase kasɔ dítinkǝ ku asa nnya díbǝ mfó kenkee , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti ! Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo éyifo Onanto eto Ubi . ”
40027055	Besio kpǝ ba dítsyi Galilea ba díkawunsǝko Yesu ǝńyǝ lǝ kɔsɛsɛ bákabe asa nnya díbǝ .
40027056	Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ni Maria Magdalene , ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo ku Yosef eto ambe ku Sebedeo eto usiǝ .
40027057	Se éyo ditsyitsyo lefee , otabinyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Yosef , nya úyifo Yesu eto okasebi wǝ ditsyi Arimatea ǝbǝ .
40027058	Úsu Pilato ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo Yesu eto ɔkɔ . Pilato ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ befi ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bǝtǝ Yosef .
40027059	Nyaso Yosef áfo ɔkɔ ǝmǝ nya úfi kafia flubia kǝtsyuǝ úmli wǝ .
40027060	Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ kebikekɔ lǝ wǝ kosate eto kudi fɔfɔ ko bǝlǝkǝ lǝ koba kǝmiǝ . Nya ominansǝ leba nǝ lɛmɔ úti ko kɛnyɛ nya údu .
40027061	Maria Magdalene ku Maria nuǝfǝ ǝsiǝ mfó balɛ kudi komǝ bobe .
40027062	Nya se kale disiǝ nya ini Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii esoo , usumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ ésu Pilato ɔflɔ .
40027063	Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Uninǝ , lefe nǝ odiantidi ǝmǝ dísiǝ nkpǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nkpǝǝ , bootakasǝ mɛ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama . ’
40027064	Nyaso tǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ lǝ base kudi komǝ kukɔnɔ isu ese diyi tsyǝfǝ nǝmǝ , kase wǝ bakasebi lembusu beyu ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bedunko batɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ . Lǝ ibǝ nkoo , sidia sia bɔɔtɛyi ǝbɔkɛ seso nsia kɔ . ”
40027065	Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ lǝ besu base kudi komǝ fe kase boofo . ”
40027066	Nyaso bésu bálɔ béti leba nǝ béti lǝ kudi komǝ kɛnyɛ kekleke bǝtsyǝ ko lekpo , bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ etidi ni lǝ bǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya bǝtsyǝ bamamanyǝ bǝ base ko .
40028001	Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto kamaa , ǝni Kɔsida eto kolensiǝntoo , Maria Magdalene ku Maria nuǝfǝ ésu bǝ besu babe kudi komǝ .
40028002	Lamfolamfoo , kasɔ étinkǝ kekleke . Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ áyifǝ utsyi kato úbǝ ɔ́minansǝ leba kplɛ nǝmǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ .
40028003	Wǝ ditsyǝbi ékeyǝnde fe kase ɔsi laato nya wǝ awu diflubi futututu fe aklala seka .
40028004	Sikpi ǝmuǝ mba nlɛ mfó bose nya bétinkǝ tinti , nya bákpo kasɔ mfó fe bukpǝ békpe .
40028005	Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfó édinko besio bamǝ etiki nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Nnyi miǝ Yesu wǝ básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ .
40028006	Umbǝ mfo ! Bátakasǝ wǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi ɔtɔnsǝ . Bibǝ bebe kaka ólabee .
40028007	Mɔmɔɔ , bisu mlǝ lǝ bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi biǝ , ‘ Bátakasǝ wǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , nya ɔntɔ mi sɛtɔ úsu Galilea . Mfó biunyǝ wǝ nɛ . ’ Bekloma nnya míntɛyi mi mfo . ”
40028008	Nyaso bédu lǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ lǝ sikpitete ku disuǝyuǝ tsya ǝsuǝ . Nya bétsyetsyi bǝ beesu batɛyi wǝ bakasebi .
40028009	Lamfolamfoo , Yesu átsyako mǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ itǝ mi . ” Báyɛ bétu wǝ bábokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bákɔbe wǝ lǝ akpa nya bésumu wǝ .
40028010	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi . Bisu bɛtɛyi mɔ bayimi biǝ besu Galilea , mfó buunyǝ mɛ nɛ . ”
40028011	Lefe nǝ besio bamfó dísinkli bantɔɔ , bamamanyǝ ba lése kudi komǝ ésu umǝ nya bátɛyi besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ asa nnya kenke díbǝ mfó .
40028012	Besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ákpe disi béfi nsusu . Bǝtǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ atabi eto akplɛ ,
40028013	nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ lefe nǝ bélabe selabe ku ketsyee , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ béyu wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bédunko .
40028014	Nya lǝ Romafɔ eto Aba eto uninǝ anɔ nyamfoo , buutǝ ɔnɔ kasɔ boǝ inni mi díyifo kulesa , nyaso yanle bǝ balo mi dikpi . ”
40028015	Bamamanyǝ bamǝ áfo atabi nyamǝ nya béyifo fe kase bátɛyi mǝ . Nyaso nyamfo ni ditiki nǝ lɛyɛ létsyilama Yudafɔ ntii taa mmi nɛ .
40028016	Lǝ nnya eto kamaa , bakasebi lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ábe bésu kɔtini ko nkpe lǝ Galilea ǝsuǝ kaka Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ utsyǝ .
40028017	Se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bésumu wǝ , ite bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ áyaki tsya .
40028018	Yesu ányi ɔfi mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto éfi kato ku kasɔ kenke eto ǝsuǝale útǝ mɛ .
40028019	Nyaso bisu kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ɔflɔ lǝ biyifo mǝ mɔ bakasebi . Biflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Anto ku Ubi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto diye ǝsuǝ ,
40028020	nya bete mǝ bǝ betsyue lesa saa nǝ mínte mi koto . Nya lǝ sitintii , mɔɔkɛ ku mi lefe saa , isu ese lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ . ”
41001001	Nyamfo ni Ditiki Sɛɛ itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Onanto kosate eto ubi ǝsuǝ eto ketsyikokɔ .
41001002	Lǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ nǝ léfe mǝǝ , Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi Yesaya áwɔni utsyǝ nkǝ Onanto átɛyi wǝ ubi nkǝ , “ Mootsyese ɔtɔyɛ ntɔnsǝ . Wǝ lɔɔlɔ betidi utsyǝ itǝ fǝ bubǝ .
41001003	Ǝbɔnɔ se nkomǝ eto utidi ǝmfo luusu kabe letsya lǝ mfiminti akatɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ . Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ wǝ bubǝ . ’ ”
41001004	Nko eto ɔtɔyɛ ǝmǝ ni Yohanes . Wǝ ni díbǝ ɔkɛ lǝ mfiminti kaka úkǝflǝsǝ betidi ntu lǝ ketu fe kase Yudafɔ leeyifo . Nya ɔnlɛ bofa kabe letsya nkǝ ele bǝ betidi tsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ lǝ bayɛ asa bua buyifo lǝ bafo ntu flǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ .
41001005	Betidi kpǝ etsyi Yudea eto kasɔ ku mǝ umǝnkplɛ wǝ baakpo Yerusalem nya bésu mfiminti bomfó bǝ lǝ banɔ Yohanes eto kɔtɔ ko bákpe wǝ eto etiki . Bǝlǝkǝ mǝ abua báte Onanto nya Yohanes díflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ ketu ka baakpo Yordan .
41001006	Yohanes ákpe ɔflimu eto bisǝ eto awudindi nya úfi kubukikuǝ eto abɔsu ókle wǝ nkɛ . Didisa nǝ úkǝdi didi bablɔ ku bǝkpǝsǝ .
41001007	Wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ ditsya bobe ni nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , so mɛ famfamfa nya yǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nyifo wǝ keyifo blɛmblɛ .
41001008	Mɔɔ , ntu eto buflǝsǝ eto lekpa ete maafo buyifo . Fɛɛ wǝ ebufi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ uflǝsǝ mi ntu . ”
41001009	Yanklɛ fɛ Yesu ditsyi umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , ubǝ udufǝ , nya Yohanes díyifo wǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Yordan .
41001010	Lǝ kase Yesu nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ kabe katoo , únyǝ nkǝ Onanto eto kato lɛ bɔsini nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lɛyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lɛblɛkpa eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ .
41001011	Nya bánɔ ɔkuɛ ditsyi kato ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni mɔ ubi wǝ mankeko , nya mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ fǝ . ”
41001012	Lamfolamfo , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ákpa Yesu úsuko mfiminti bomǝ kafo .
41001013	Wǝ mate ǝsiǝ mfó eyifosi ana . Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Obonsam áto Yesu óbe . Nya Onanto eto batɔyɛ díbǝ bawunsǝ ko wǝ .
41001014	Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyoo , Yesu édu mfó úsu Galilea úsu údi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfó .
41001015	Ɔkɛ mfó katɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe sɛɛ nǝmǝ eboyo . Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto lefe ǝbɔfi . Bisinkli lǝ mi asa bua eto kama lǝ befo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɛnɔ . ”
41001016	Se Yesu nlɛ botsyilama lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝ nkpe lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ ɔflɔɔ , únyǝ mba lǝǝlǝkǝ akpɛ inuǝ , ba ni Simon ku wǝ ɔyimisani Andreas , ba nlɛ mǝ asabu bota mfó .
41001017	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bitǝkǝko mɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , nya moote mi kase biulǝkǝ betidi bitǝ Onanto . ”
41001018	Lamfolamfo báyani mǝ asabu bǝtsyǝ nya bátaka bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
41001019	Ɔ́yɛ úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi ba ni Yakobo ku Yohanes . Besi mǝ ɔklɔ kafo balɛ mǝ asabu bɔlɔ .
41001020	Kase Yesu dínyǝ mǝ koo , ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝ . Mǝ tsya átaka akpa akpa báyani mǝ anto Sebedeo ku wǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo bǝtǝkǝko Yesu .
41001021	Yesu ku mba ntǝkǝko wǝ ésu bédufǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Kapernaum . Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ mǝ mfó eto busu ǝsuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya útsyiko mǝ Anantotiki bote .
41001022	Iyifo mba kenke lɛnɔ wǝ asatete nyamǝ yanii , itsyise ɛbɔ lete lǝ mba laate asa itsyi lǝ Yudafɔ eto afi ǝsuǝ . Bomu wǝ asatete eyifo nnya nkpe kalende nya itsyi taa wǝ utu kǝmiǝ .
41001023	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutuu , osani utsyuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nsi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ akɛ lǝ katsyakɔ kamǝ mfó ,
41001024	nya ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ , be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ atsylɔsǝ bo lee ? Nyi futsyǝ feni . Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ wǝ ótsyese nɛ . ”
41001025	Yesu éti lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ kusu nya ókpe ni kɔfi nkǝ , “ Dika , nya lǝ abɔ lǝ osani ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
41001026	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo étinkǝsǝ osani ǝmǝ keklekle nya dítǝ ófa bǝmbǝǝmbǝ fɛ lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41001027	Itǝ iyifo mba kenke díńyǝ mfó yanii , nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte asatete fɔfɔ nnya eto okle nɛ ? Utidi ǝmfo kpe ǝsuǝale woafo etiki budi ku awɔnɔ bua nya beetsyue wǝ etiki ato . ”
41001028	Itǝ esoo , Yesu eto diye áyɛ letsyo lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kenke .
41001029	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ku Yakobo ku Yohanes édu lǝ katsyakɔ kamǝ nya bésu Simon ku Andreas eto diyo .
41001030	Se bésu bédufǝ mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , Simon eto usiǝambe áyila , atikesi ǝmuǝ wǝ olabe .
41001031	Nyaso Yesu ésu wǝ ɔflɔ , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni ótakasǝ úńyǝnsǝ . Lamfolamfo wǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ nya ótaka útǝ mɛ lesa bédi .
41001032	Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , betidi ákpa befimfi kenke ku mba awɔnɔ bua díkakpe bulǝ kpǝ báboko Yesu bǝ lǝ otsya mǝ bufi .
41001033	Nya umǝ ǝmǝ kenke eto betidi díbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ kesie mfó bánlɛ bobe .
41001034	Yesu átsya betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bufi ateate bufi nya óla awɔnɔ bua lǝ betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ ku mba awɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise Yesu yi nkǝ awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ yi futsyǝ uni , nyaso wántɔnɔ nkǝ awɔnɔ nyamǝ tɛyi kulesa itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41001035	Kolensiǝnto fɛ kale luusiǝǝ , Yesu átaka ɔ́bɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ . Úsu kaka kutsyuǝ saa lǝmbǝ nya óto ola útǝ Onanto .
41001036	Kamaa , Simon ku wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ésu bábɛbɛ Yesu .
41001037	Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ǝbǝ ɔlɛ fǝ bɔbɛbɛ . ”
41001038	Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ busu umǝ bamba . Efe bǝ ndi Anantotiki lǝ mfó tsya , itsyise nyamfo ni mɔ keyifo ka mimbǝ keyifokɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
41001039	Nyaso ɔ́yɛ ótsyilama Galilea eto kasɔ kenke , nya úkedi Anantotiki nyamǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kpǝ nya óla awɔnɔ bua ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ tsya .
41001040	Osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bufisia bufi ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Óse akonki ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ lǝ ɔwunsǝko wǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ alaa , ebofo mɛ botsya nya yuuyuǝ mɛ tsya . ”
41001041	Wǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝnǝ Yesu kafo , nyaso únǝ wǝ kɔni nya útidi wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nla nko . Fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke lǝ yele . ”
41001042	Lamfolamfo bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
41001043	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ udu , nya ókpe wǝ kɔfi keklekle nkǝ ,
41001044	“ Mǝnńyǝ lǝ kusu atɛyi betidi nnya dibǝ , bomu su lǝ efi fǝ ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto Usumunyǝ . Lǝ efi nkpata bo Mose eto kɔfi lɛtɔ esuko . Nyamfo luulǝkǝ ete bǝnkǝ bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ nɛ . ”
41001045	Tsya lefe nǝ nwǝ ǝmǝ dídu ɔntɔɔ , útsyiko bofa katɛyi kase Yesu létsya wǝ . Lǝ nnya esoo , Yesu ménsifo umǝ saa busu , itsyise betidi kpǝ lɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Nyamfo esoo , Yesu kosate átsyimɛ lǝ umǝmflɔ kaka kuutsyǝ lǝmbǝ . Nya betidi ditsyi nlebe nlebe kpǝ , bǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó .
41002001	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , úsinkli úsu Kapernaum nya lǝ wǝ businki kǝbǝ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ánɔ bǝ úsinkli úbǝ oto .
41002002	Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ diyo nǝ ɔkɛ , ku ni kayoma kenke . Nya ɔkɛ mfó úkedi mǝ etiki .
41002003	Mfó nya betidi ena léboko ufimfi wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ wǝ ɔflɔ .
41002004	Nya se banlɛ kusu bunyǝ lǝ bayɛnko wǝ lǝ kesie bedufǝnko wǝ diyo kafo lǝ kase betidi mfui esoo , bésu bábe letsya bǝlǝkǝ ofo nya báyɛnko ufimfi ǝmǝ ku wǝ belabekǝ báyifǝsǝ bǝtsyǝ le Yesu eto akɔ .
41002005	Se Yesu dínyǝ kase sɔ̃ɔ̃ báfo bánɔ bǝ woofo ufimfi ǝmǝ botsya esoo , Yesu átɛyi nwǝ léba onkpo kasɔ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ . ”
41002006	Fɛɛ afi eto bateasa ba lɛkɛ mǝ lenti mfó ebu lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
41002007	“ Beso woatɛyi nko ? Ɔlɛ mbusiotiki budi . Onanto hã laafo abua bufi katsyɛ ! ”
41002008	Yesu áte mǝ nsusu nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ nyamfo lǝ mi ?
41002009	Nte nya diyuǝ enso bɔtɛyi , ‘ Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ , ’ lee ‘ Taka lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
41002010	Nyaso lǝ itǝ bǝ befo bɛnɔ biǝ Utidi Eto Ubii , nkpe ǝsuǝale bǝ mfi betidi eto abua ntsyɛ le kawunsiǝ kamfo . Bɛnɔ ? ” Mfó ǝmǝǝ , Yesu esi útsyi wǝ ǝnǝmi útǝ ufimfi ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
41002011	“ Taka lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ esu diyo . ”
