41002012	Nya osani ǝmfo létaka lamfolamfo úfi wǝ okla nya údu lǝ betidi bamǝ ńyǝ mfó nti . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba kenke nyǝ mfó yanii . Nya ítǝ béfi atǝsǝ banlɛ Onanto butǝ . Mǝmblɛ átɛyi bǝ bǝnnyǝ tɔ nyamfo eto okle bǝnyǝ .
41002013	Nya Yesu disi údu úsu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ kɛnyɛ nya betidi bamǝ kenke díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya óte mǝ Anantotiki .
41002014	Kase ɔ́nlɛ bɔyɛ kafe lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ mfóo , úsu únyǝ Lewi wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi wǝ nsi lǝ kaka woafo umǝnko . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ ! ” Nyaso Lewi átaka kpla nya útǝkǝko wǝ .
41002015	Ketsyitsyokɔmii , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ku betidi kpǝ ba ntǝkǝko wǝ , ésu Lewi eto bǝ lǝ besu bedi lesa ku wǝ . Mba dítǝkǝko wǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ éyifo mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo .
41002016	Nya afi eto bateasa ba ni Yudafɔ eto lekpa nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ tsya akɛ mfó . Nyaso lefe nǝ afi eto bateasa ba ni Farisifɔ bamǝ dínyǝ bǝ Yesu si ɔ́lɛ lesa budi ku babuayifo , bátɔ wǝ bakasebi bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝso wonko mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo nsi banlɛ lesa budi ? ”
41002017	Se Yesu lɛnɔ etiki nnya bánlɛ budii , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni befimfi hã . Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mimbǝ . ”
41002018	Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ se Yohanes ku wǝ bakasebi ku Farisifɔ lɛkɛ lǝ kɛnyɛkekle ǝsuǝǝ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fɛ fǝ bakasebi laankle kɛnyɛ fe kase Yohanes eto bakasebi ku Farisifɔ laakle ? ”
41002019	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ lǝ lekpa seka ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ Okafɔsǝ eto bakloboo , bani lesa budi lǝ kusiǝ kakpakɔ kamǝ ? Lee , yanle bǝ bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ nkpe mǝ lentii ?
41002020	Yuubǝ diyi ditsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ lǝ mǝ nti , baklobo bamǝ ebokle kɛnyɛ beyifo yoyoyo .
41002021	Kuutsyuǝ saa emfi lefianku fɔfɔ kaka kama lǝ kafia koko ka nlɛ bola ǝsuǝ , lefianku fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ebunǝ kafia koko kamǝ kala lǝ bǝflǝ kǝ , nya luutǝ dibiǝ koko nǝmǝ sǝnsǝ lɛmɔ leso kɔ .
41002022	Nnya kamaa , bankpo ntǝ fɔfɔ lǝ kubukikuǝtobe koko wǝ bákakpo ntǝ bǝnyǝ kafo . Ntǝ fɔfɔ bomǝ ebɔkpɔ bobe kato itǝ bǝ kubukikuetobe koko ǝmǝ ebola itǝ bǝ ntǝ ku kubukikuǝtobe ǝmǝ ebuyifo asɔsɔ . Bomu ntǝ fɔfɔɔ , ubukikuǝtobe fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ baakpo mu . ”
41002023	Lefe lɔni lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi nyɛ lǝ anta eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ banlɛ bofee , bǝfǝsǝ anta ǝtsyuǝ balɛ bɔyimi .
41002024	Nyaso Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fǝ bakasebi lǝǝyifo nko ? Bo kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ beyifo nko lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . ”
41002025	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biankla lǝ Onanto eto Kukuǝ Kɛnkɛ eto Awɔnisa lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo ? Lǝ lefe nǝ kukpǝnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ bayɛtsyuǝǝ , Oka David ésu kaka bǝǝtǝ Onanto kedi lǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ baakpo Abiatar eto lefe . Úlǝkǝ didisa kɛnkɛ nǝ ntǝ mfó itǝ mba lǝǝtǝ wǝ kedi hã lǝ Disumuyo údi nya útǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ tsya ditsyuǝ bédi . Moses eto kɔfi mǝntǝ nkomǝ eto diyifobi nǝmfo kusu , tsya bántɛyi mǝ kulesa . ”
41002026	
41002027	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝtsyǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi itǝ utidi eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ . Inni utidi bǝtsyǝ itǝ diyi nǝmǝ eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ .
41002028	Nyaso mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubii , mɔ ke ni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto Onamute . ”
41003001	Lǝ lefe bamba ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu esi úsu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ . Utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ konyoma .
41003002	Betidi ba lɛkɛ mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ ńyǝ balɛ bobe lǝ wootsya utidi ǝmǝ lǝ ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ babe lǝ buunyǝ etiki lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41003003	Yesu ákpadi utidi ǝmǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ útsyǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
41003004	Nya útsyi wǝ ǝnǝmi útǝ betidi bamǝ kenke nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi yifo kasɛɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi , lee Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eyifo diyi nǝ utidi loobiasǝ asa ? Iyifo diyi nǝ bǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , lee iyifo diyi nǝ baa biasǝ nkpǝ ? ” Fɛɛ bámfo wǝ kulesa bɔtɛyi .
41003005	Yesu étsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya óbe mǝ ku lɛblɔfi itsyise ílǝ wǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi se bánla bǝ baawunsǝko mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eso . Nya ɔ́tɛyi ufimfi ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue . ” Únǝ ko útsyue . Nya ete kɔni komǝ létsya wǝ .
41003006	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Farisifɔ bamǝ édu nya bésu bátsya ku Herod eto betidi nya bákpe disi lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ balo Yesu .
41003007	Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛyɛ bésu Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ . Nya sitiditu kplɛ sia ditsyi Galilea ku Yudea ku Yerusalem ku Idumia eto kasɔ ku mba ditsyi Yordan eto ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse ku mba ditsyi Tiro ku Sidon tsya ǝtǝko wǝ bǝbǝ . Nnya ni bǝnkǝ wǝ ayanisa nnya ɔnlɛ buyifo ǝbɔyɛ etsyo nyaso betidi kpǝ ála bǝ befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝnyǝ wǝ .
41003008	
41003009	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó se Yesu díkatsya betidi kpǝ esoo , befimfi kpǝ lɛ bokplatsya bǝ lǝ betidi wǝ ko lǝ bǝmuǝ ale . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ babɛbɛ ɔklɔ bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ utuflɔ , itǝ bǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ ǝbǝ befuii , woofo bobe kǝdufǝ lǝ wǝ kafo .
41003010	
41003011	Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝsiǝ lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba díbǝ mfó ǝsuǝ . Lǝ bǝnyǝ , bǝnyǝ Yesu koo , békedu kanɔ nya bákafa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi . ”
41003012	Nya Yesu káninko mǝ nkǝ bǝntǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bate futsyǝ uni .
41003013	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ábe úsu kɔtini disi . Nya mfóo , ókpadi mba óla nkǝ bakɛ ko wǝ .
41003014	Betidi bamfo ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya úlǝkǝ lefosi inuǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya útǝkǝ mǝ diye nkǝ batɔnkpe . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlǝkǝ mi minkǝ bɛkɛ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ lefe saa . Mootsyese mi lǝ bisu bidi Anantotiki .
41003015	Nya biɔkɛ ǝsuǝale bela awɔnɔ bua bitsyiko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
41003016	Betidi lefosi inuǝ ba úlǝkǝ eto aye ni Simon wǝ Yesu dítǝ diye nkǝ Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimisani kɛkɛ Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi ba Yesu dítǝkǝ diye nkǝ Boanerges eto kasɔ ni nkǝ , beedi etiki ku utǝ fe kase kato laafa kekumi bembembe , bafɛfɛ ni Andreas ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Toma ku Yakobo wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi ku Tadeo ku Simon wǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefe léta mǝ kasɔ disi ku Yuda Iskariot , nwǝ luubǝ ulǝkǝ Yesu utǝ .
41003017	
41003018	
41003019	
41003020	Se Yesu dídu mfóo , údu úsu diyo ditsyuǝ . Nya betidi kpǝ esi bǝbǝ mǝ ɔflɔ mfó . Itǝ bǝ ibǝ ɛkɛ ale itǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi bǝ bánkɛ lefe kulaa tsya lǝ bedi lesa .
41003021	Se wǝ kosate eto betidi lɛnɔ nkoo , bésu bǝ lǝ besu bǝnǝ wǝ besuko diyo , itsyise bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Disi abia wǝ . ”
41003022	Nya afi eto bateasa ba ditsyi Yerusalem lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝbǝ disi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Nya awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ni nwǝ dítǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale fɛ ɔnlɛ awɔnɔ bua nyamfó bola kabɔnko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
41003023	Nyaso Yesu ákpadi betidi bamǝ nya údi etiki ko mǝ lǝ lekpa ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ Obonsam ebofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bola ketsyiko lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ ?
41003024	Lǝ ibǝ bǝnkǝ sekakedikɔ áma se ǝsuǝ lǝ akpaa , nya akpa akpa nyamǝ nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ntii , nkomǝ eto sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝmbofo buńyǝ .
41003025	Lǝ diyo ditsyuǝ eto betidi ǝsǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , anto ku anto nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , diyo nǝmfó ǝmbofo buńyǝ .
41003026	Nyaso lǝ Obonsam ataka uńyǝ ɔnlɛ bɔkpɔ ku wǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ sekakedikɔ sia lema akpa akpaa , sekakedikɔ siamfó ebusǝnsǝ nya wǝ sekakedidi ebolo .
41003027	“ Iyifo etiki eto ɔnukualɛ bǝ utidi ǝmbofo botaka kesu ketu ǝsuǝaletidi lǝ wǝ diyo , ketsyi wǝ bikǝ . Fɛ woofo budufǝ lǝ wǝ diyo nǝmǝǝ , tsyisɛ umuǝ ǝsuǝaletidi ǝmǝ okle .
41003028	“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onanto ebufi lebua saa nǝ betidi díyifo ku diye bua saa nǝ baakpadi Onanto ɔtsyɛ .
41003029	Fɛɛ diye bua saa nǝ utidi lookpadi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛɛ , Onanto ǝmbufi ni ɔtsyɛ wǝ kulefe . Itsyise wuufi lebua nǝmfo fenkǝ lebua nǝ wembotasuǝ . ”
41003030	Yesu átɛyi nyamfo nko itsyise betidi bǝnkǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua kpe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41003031	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bayimisani ku wǝ ambe ǝbǝ mfó . Bǝńyǝ lǝ lekple nya bákpe wǝ utidi bǝ bahiã wǝ .
41003032	Nyaso betidi ba létsyilama wǝ átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Be , fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimisani ńyǝ lǝ lekple bǝ bǝ . ”
41003033	Nyaso Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ambe ? Bawoe ni mɔ bayimisani ? ”
41003034	Nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi nya óbe betidi ba nsi letsyilama wǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bee , nyǝ mbamfo ni mɔ ambe nye mɔ bayimisani .
41003035	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo Onanto eto lelabii , wǝ ni mɔ ɔyimisani nye mɔ ɔyimisio , nye mɔ ambe nɛ . ”
41004001	Yesu esi ésu Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ flɔ nya ɔnlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bote . Nya lǝ kase betidi ba létsyilama wǝ mfui esoo , údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ kafo lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ , nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Nya betidi bamǝ díńyǝ lǝ ntu kɛnyɛ fɛ Yesu dídi ko mǝ etiki .
41004002	Lefe kpǝ lǝ wǝ asatete ǝsuǝǝ , údi etiki ɔ́yɛnko lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ lǝ ufi ulǝkǝ asa nnya óla nkǝ loote mǝ kasɔ . Asa nnya óte mǝ ni nkǝ .
41004003	“ Bɛnɔ ! Lefe lɔnii , ɔkuɛmfo ɔni ésu ɔkuɛ nkǝ lǝ usu usiǝ eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ .
41004004	Lǝ lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ usunte ɔflɔ , nya baklɔbɛ díbǝ básɛ nnya bámini .
41004005	Ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ aba ǝsuǝ , kaka sitǝ lemfui . Nyaso eyibibi nyamfo ǝkǝ mlǝ .
41004006	Fɛɛ se kofe lébe kɛnyɛɛ , éblobe nya íkpǝ . Nnya ni bǝ , nnya keyudu mǝnnyǝ didisa itsyi lǝ aba nyamǝ eso .
41004007	Eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ ésu ékpo lǝ biyu nti . Nya kanyi kamǝ léto kéti nnya . Nyaso yámfo bɔnwɔ .
41004008	Nya íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya íkǝ , nya yébe kukɔnɔ nya yɛnwɔ ebibi . Nya ǝtsyuǝ lɛnwɔ ebibi fosi ǝtsyǝ , ebibi fosi akua , ǝtsyuǝ lɛnwɔ kolofa . ”
41004009	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso fǝ ke nkpe atoo , tsyuǝ ato kukunɔ lǝ anɔ . ”
41004010	Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu mate insii , wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ku mba lǝǝtǝkǝko wǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝ ulǝkǝ lekpa nǝmǝ kasɔ ote mǝ .
41004011	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimii , béfi Onanto sekakedikɔ eto akulasa bǝtǝ mi . Fɛɛ mba díbuu , nye bafɛfɛ ba lentǝkǝko mɛ , ǝbɔnɔ mɔ asatete nyamǝ ɛyɛ lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ hã .
41004012	Nyaso íbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Buukabe tsyaa , bǝǝmbunyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Buukǝtsyue ato tsyaa , bǝǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ . Nnya ni bǝ lǝ banɔ nye bǝnyǝ tsyaa , bǝǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ . lǝ betsyi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝ Onanto , bǝ lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ . ’ ”
41004013	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biannɔ lekpa nǝmfo eto kasɔ ? Ntsyǝ fɛ biofo lekpa bamba saa kasɔ bɔnɔ ?
41004014	Ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ lɛ Onanto eto etiki busǝnsǝ .
41004015	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ale kase eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ luubǝ ekpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ . Lǝ kase banlɛ bɔnɔɔ , ete Obonsam ǝǝbǝ nya wǝǝnwǝ nnya kǝlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
41004016	Betidi bamba tsya ale eyibibi nnya lǝǝbǝ kakpo lǝ aba ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ banlɛ nnya bɔnɔɔ , yeakpe mǝ disuǝyuǝ .
41004017	Tsya ditiki nǝmǝ eto keyudu ǝnńyǝ kasɔ kukɔnɔ . Baafo kanɔ itǝ lefe kliminti ete . Nya lefe nǝ ke kǝnǝ nye bulǝ sɛkɛ díbǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ esoo , beesinkli kama .
41004018	“ Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ tsya te fe eyibibi nnya díbǝ íkǝ lǝ kanyi nti . Nya mbamfó ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ .
41004019	Fɛɛ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bulǝ ku atabi bɔbɛbɛ kekleke ku ǝsuǝ eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ ku kawunsiǝ eto kamini bɔbɛbɛ aafo mǝ ketu . Nyamfo laakle kemli ditiki nǝmǝ itǝ bǝ diamfo ebibi bɔnwɔ .
41004020	“ Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ te fe eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Baafo etiki nyamǝ ku utu faa , nya baanwɔ ebibi kpǝ . Ǝtsyuǝ aanwɔ ebibi fosi ǝtsyǝ , nye awosi akua nye kolofa . ”
41004021	Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi aato okandiɛ kefi kakpe lǝ ditsyitsya kalɔ nye lǝ mpa kalɔ ? Inni okandiɛ eto kǝtǝkǝkɔ baato okandiɛ kǝtǝkǝ ?
41004022	Lesa nǝ ke nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝǝ , ǝbɔbɔ lǝ lekple utidi saa nyǝ . Lesa nǝ ke nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝ ǝbɔbɔ tɛnklɛ utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
41004023	Nyaso lǝ bekpe atoo , bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! ”
41004024	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bifi mi ato bekpe kukɔnɔ lǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Kase faakla asa yeeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko ke eto okle Onanto lookla utǝ fintsya nɛ !
41004025	Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani . ”
41004026	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale osani wǝ laato eyibibi .
41004027	Diyi saa woalabe kataka , nya nkomǝ eto eyibibi nyamǝ nlɛ bukǝ kabe . Fɛɛ unnyi kase asa nlɛ butsyǝ nkomǝ .
41004028	Nnya ni bǝnkǝ kasɔ ka báto diyibibi nǝmǝǝ , ke laalɛ ni ola nko . Tutɛ , lǝ díkǝǝ , díabɔ afanto , nya uyi laabɔ . Nya lǝ ébee , yeawɔ ebibi kpǝ .
41004029	Lǝ ebibi nyamǝ ábe ɛsɛɛ , ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ ǝbǝ kala nnya . Itsyise nnya lɛlɛfe eboyo . ”
41004030	Yesu átɔ nkǝ , “ Be muufi nkatesǝ ku Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Nte lekpa nǝ ele bǝ mfi nlǝkǝ nyamfo eto kasɔ ?
41004031	Ite fenkǝ utidi éfi diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ úsu óto .
41004032	Lefe ditsyuǝ eto kamaa , diǝkǝ kafiani kuyi . Nya nkomǝ eto kuyi komfo laamɔ kaso ɔkuɛ eto ediyi fɛfɛ kenke . Koata kalɛ kpǝ . Nya baklɔbɛ laato ayo lǝ kuyi komǝ eto kalɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
41004033	Yesu édi mǝ etiki nyamfo lǝ kase utsyuǝ sa loofo kasɔ bɔnɔ .
41004034	Etiki saa wuudi mǝǝ , woatɛyi nnya kayɛ lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ itǝ kusu bǝ wonko wǝ bakasebi bamǝ hã sii , nya fɛ wǝǝlǝkǝ nnya kasɔ kate mǝ nɛ .
41004035	Diyi nǝmfó eto ditsyitsyo lefee , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bɔyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmfo busu ni lekpake nǝ nse . ”
41004036	Nyaso bédu lǝ betidi ǝto ditsyukpa nǝmfo ɔflɔ bésu bedufǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ wǝ Yesu dísiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila . Kaklɔ bamba tsya ǝńyǝ mfó .
41004037	Yanklɛ fɛ ufiebi ko dítsyiko bɔsɔ bembembe nya ɔ́sɔ ntu ókpo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya ibu sɛkɛ lǝ ntu lǝ buyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ lǝ onya udu fǝ lǝ ntu kasɔ .
41004038	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto kama , úfi wǝ disi útǝkǝ lǝ esunde ǝsuǝ nya ɔnlɛ selabe . Nyaso básanklisǝ wǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ɛnlɛ fǝ bulǝ bǝnkǝ boǝbǝ bukpǝ ? ”
41004039	Yesu átaka úńyǝ nya ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ufiebi , yɛ bɔsɔ ! ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi ntu bomǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Ntu yɛ bonwa ! ” Nya ufiebi ǝmǝ disinkli ɔ́yɛ bɔsɔ , nya ntu bomǝ eto ǝnǝmi disinkli búyuǝ buɛɛ kananaa .
41004040	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Beso biate sikpi mmǝ ? Bíamfo tɔ bɛnɔ ? ”
41004041	Sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ sefensǝ , nya bétsyiko mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko ni utidi ǝmfo ? Bǝ ntu bomǝ ku ufiebi kenke etsyue wǝ etiki koto ! ”
41005001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ eto situma sia nse lǝ Gerasefɔ eto kasɔ .
41005002	Le kase Yesu lɛbɔ le ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo koo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝbǝ ótsyako wǝ . Osani ǝmfo ábɔ lǝ edi nnya lɛfi mfó nti .
41005003	Itsyise mfó úkǝsiǝ nɛ . Lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mmǝǝ , betidi ba kenke mámfo wǝ bumuǝ kakpe lǝ amana .
41005004	Lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bákafo wǝ ani ku akpa bokle . Fɛɛ wókala nnya bufǝsǝ kabɔ . Utidi ǝmfo akɛ ǝsuǝale tinti , itǝ bǝ kutsyuǝ saa mánkamfo wǝ bumuǝ kǝtsyǝ .
41005005	Kǝtsyǝ ku kakɔmi kenke úkatsyilama lǝ betidi eto edi ku atini nyamǝ nti , nya úkakpo kudu , ékefi abambi katsya wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41005006	Utidi ǝmfo ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ fɛ únyǝ Yesu . Nyaso útsyetsyi úsu óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi .
41005007	Nya ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto Fanlonlo eto Ubi ! Be nkpe lǝ mɔ ku fǝ lenti mfo ? Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , se mɛ uyi lǝ Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ fǝnkǝ embunǝ mɛ koto ! ”
41005008	Ɔ́tɛyi nkomǝ , itsyise ɔ́nɔ bǝ Yesu Yesu áto ɔkuɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua bɔ lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . ”
41005009	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ baakpo fǝ ? ” Nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ baakpo omantsya itsyise bomba nkpe lǝ nwǝ mfo ǝsuǝǝ , bufui . ”
41005010	Nya ɔ́lɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ woanla mǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ .
41005011	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bakplako kpǝ ǝńyǝ lɛ kɔtini komǝ ɔflɔ balɛ budi .
41005012	Nya awɔnɔ nyamfo lɛlɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ La bo akpe lǝ bakplako ba ńyǝ lǝ mmǝ , lǝ budu budufǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
41005013	Nya ɔ́tɔnɔ útǝ mǝ , nya awɔnɔ nyamǝ lɛbɔ lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ nya bédu bésu bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bakplako bamǝ kenke , ba eto utu luuyifo fe akpi ǝnuǝǝ , dítsyetsyi bésu báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi bésu bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ nya bánya bátsylɔ kenke .
41005014	Nya mba nlɛ bakplako bamǝ bobee , dítsyetsyi bésu umǝ ǝmǝ ku mba lɛkɛ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya bésu batɛyi betidi ba kenke lesa nǝ díbǝ . Mba bátɛyi ésu mfó , bésu bábe lesa nǝ díbǝ .
41005015	Nya lefe nǝ bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ utidi wǝ awɔnɔ bua kpǝ dísiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya únsi lǝ kasɔ , ónkpe awu , íkakpa ko wǝ . Nya sikpi dímuǝ mǝmblɛ kenke .
41005016	Betidi ba leka wǝ búnyǝǝ , átɛyi lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ku bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
41005017	Nyaso bálɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ .
41005018	Lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ budufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua dísiǝǝ , alɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Tɔnɔ lǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ lǝ bukayɛ katsyilama . ”
41005019	Fɛɛ Yesu mántɔnɔ . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sinkli esu fǝ betidi ɔflɔ lǝ atɛyi mǝ kase Onamute ǝmǝ lɛwunsǝ ko fǝ ku kase únyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ . ”
41005020	Nyaso osani ǝmfo édu úsu ótsyilama Kǝmǝ Lefosi kamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamǝ lesa saa nǝ Yesu díyifo útǝ wǝ . Nya íyifo mba lɛnɔ nnya yanii .
41005021	Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ úsinkli úsu ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto Yudafɔ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Se úsu údufǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ mfóo , betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ .
41005022	Nya Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ɔni utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Yairo ǝbǝ mfó . Se únyǝ Yesuu , óse akonki lǝ wǝ akɔ .
41005023	Nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa kekleke nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi kɛkɛ lɛ bufi kekleke . Nyaso bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ efi fǝ kɔni ǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ imuǝ wǝ ale lǝ ɔkɛ nkpǝ . ”
41005024	Nyaso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko wǝ . Nya lǝ kase betidi ba díkǝko Yesu difui esoo , bátsyilama wǝ se bántɔ .
41005025	Nya usio utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ mǝ nti , wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo lǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ .
41005026	Ɔkɛ lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe mba leeyifo afa díkǝtǝ wǝ afa kulaatsya . Wóbiasǝ wǝ atabi kenke ótsya bufi bomfo , tsya bufi bomǝ mányuǝ wǝ . Kato bomu bóbe .
41005027	Ɔ́nɔ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ , nyaso útǝkǝko betidi ba dítǝkǝko Yesu kama .
41005028	Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mfó wǝ awu butidi koo , eni bufi bomǝ ǝbɔyɛ mɛ . ”
41005029	Nyaso lefe nǝ útidi Yesu eto awuu , kɔtɔ komǝ díkakpo wǝǝ , ála kplo lamfolamfo ! Nya únyǝ utsyǝ lekpo lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ wǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ , nyaso kanyi ka ɔnlɛ bunyǝǝ , álo .
41005030	Lamfolamfo Yesu áte nkǝ ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ábɔ wǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso úkǝnǝ úńyǝ , nya ɔ́tsyi ɔwuninsǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ betidi bamǝ ntǝkǝko wǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni futsyǝ dítidi mɛ awu ? ”
41005031	Wǝ bakasebi bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be kase betidi bamfo letsyilama fǝ . Beso faatɔ fǝ , owoe ni futsyǝ dítidi fǝ ? ”
41005032	Tsyaa , Yesu esi úkǝnǝ úńyǝ ɔlɛ ǝnǝmi botsyilamasǝ kabe lǝ woofo futsyǝ dítidi wǝ bunyǝ .
41005033	Usio ǝmǝ mfó ǝnyǝ utsyǝ lekpo nkǝ lesatsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso lǝ sikpitete ku ketinkǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́bɔ úbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , lesa nǝ díbǝ .
41005034	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi , fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . Su lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fǝ kanyi ensiǝmbu sinkli kǝbǝ bio . ”
41005035	Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyii , batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ étsyi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo bǝbǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ koko . Beso fensi fanlɛ Oteasa ǝmfo bulǝ ? ”
41005036	Yesu méntsyue ditiki nǝ mba nlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó ato . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi Yairo nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi , fo anɔ ete . ”
41005037	Nya Yesu lékpa Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimisani Yohanes mate hã , nya bésu Yairo eto diyo .
41005038	Nya lefe nǝ bédufǝ diyo nǝmǝ , nya Yesu dínyǝ kase banlɛ kanyi bunyǝ kakpo edu kewi nkuu ,
41005039	údufǝ lǝ mǝnti nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be léboko kudu komfo bokpo ? Beso bɛnlɛ nku ? Dikpefi nǝmfó ménkpǝ . Selabe ete onlabe . ”
41005040	Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , betidi ba ńyǝ mfó étsyiko wǝ bumǝ . Nyaso Yesu ǝtǝ nkǝ mǝmblɛ bɔ besu lekple , nya útǝ ubi ǝmǝ eto anto ku ambe ku wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ nkǝ bedufǝ kaka ubi ǝmǝ díkpe ónlabe lǝ kasɔ .
41005041	Yesu ákɔbe usiobi kɛkɛ ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Talita Koumu . ” Nya kasɔ lǝ sele siamǝ ni nkǝ , “ Disiobi , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , taka ǝńyǝ ! ”
41005042	Lamfolamfo , disiobi nǝmǝ nǝ dikafo lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝǝ , átaka úńyǝ nya útsyiko bɔyɛ katsyilama . Se íbǝ nkoo , íyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
41005043	Nyaso Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ bantɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa . Nya kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ udi . ”
41006001	Yesu édu mfó úsu wǝ umǝ kaka úsiǝ óbe , ku wǝ bakasebi .
41006002	Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝǝ , úsu ɔlɛ Anantotiki búdi lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó . Nyaso íyifo betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ wǝ asatetee yanii . Bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti ókase etiki nyamfo eto okle utsyiko ? Nte kobe ko eto okle nkpe wǝ bǝ woafo ayanisa nyamfo eto okle buyifo ?
41006003	Inni wǝ ni Maria eto ubi wǝ ni nwǝ laawe keyi ? Lee inni wǝ ni Yakobo ku Yose ku Yuda ku Simon eto ɔyimisani ? Nya wǝ bayimisio tsya nkpe mfo ! ” Nyaso betidi bamfo mámfo wǝ .
41006004	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi kpe dibu lǝ nlebe kpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝǝ , lǝ wǝ betidi ntii , ku lǝ wǝ kosate eto diyo eto betidi eto ǝnǝmii , umbǝ dibu saa . ”
41006005	Nnya ni bǝnkǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝ eto betidi mámfo wǝ banɔ , etiki nyamfo éyifo Yesu yanii tinti . Lǝ nyamfo eso wóamfo ayanisa kpǝ buyifo mfó enso nnya úfi wǝ ani útǝkǝ befimfi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya mǝ bufi díyuǝ mǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu átsyilama mbuto bo letsyilama mfó , kate Anantotiki nyamǝ .
41006006	
41006007	Nya ókpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ utsyǝ , nya óla mǝ ótsyese inuǝ inuǝ . Útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ baso awɔnɔ bua ani .
41006008	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kuutsyuǝ saa manlɛ kulesa usuko kusu komǝ , enso uyi wǝ baalɛɛ kɔni hã . Bientsyi didisa nye otobe fenkǝ mba laatɔ asa kafe . Bientsyi atabi lǝ mi katobe .
41006009	Bekpe mi afɔkpa , tsya bientsyi akpesa bamba saa enso nnya benkpe . ”
41006010	Usi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kaka kee bafo mii , bɛkɛ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ biuudu .
41006011	Lǝ bídufǝ umǝ utsyuǝ nya betidi bamfó dímamfo mi nye báni bǝ beembutsyue mi ditiki kotoo , bidu lǝ bɛflɛ mi nkpafo eto sitǝ bekpo mfó . Nyamfo loote Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eto ditsyǝbi nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ itǝ mǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . ”
41006012	Nyaso bakasebi bamǝ édu bésu bátsyilama bédi Anantotiki nyamǝ budi kafe bǝ utsyuǝ saa sinkli lǝ abuayifoyifo kama .
41006013	Bála awɔnɔ bua kpǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Nya bédiki befimfi kpǝ nnuǝbi itǝ bǝmuǝ ale .
41006014	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Oka Herodes ákanɔ asa nnya kenke nlɛ búbǝ bɔ́nɔ , itsyise Yesu eto diye áyɛ letsyo ésu kalebe saa . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yohanes wǝ ni ntuflǝsǝtidi ésinkli úbǝ nkpǝ ! Nyaso onkpe ǝsuǝale ɔnlɛ ayanisa buyifo nɛ ! ”
41006015	Bǝtsyuǝ tsya ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia . ” Betsyuǝ tsya bǝ , “ Wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi , itsyise útǝ fe Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ɔni . ”
41006016	Lefe nǝ Herodes lɛnɔ nyamfóo , wuntsya átɛyi nkǝ , “ Yohanes wǝ útǝ bála disi uni disi ósankli utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ ! ”
41006017	Ɛtɔnsǝǝ , Herodes kosate dítǝ kusu nkǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes , nya útǝ kusu nkǝ bakle wǝ , befi wǝ bakpe lǝ diyo . Herodes éyifo nyamfo itsyi lǝ Herodia wǝ úsu úfi , wǝ dídi wǝ ɔyimi Filipo eto usiǝ eso .
41006018	Yohanes ákatɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Yanlɛkɛ bǝ fo fǝ ɔyimisani eto usiǝ efi . ”
41006019	Nyaso Yohanes eto etiki ǝkǝlǝ Herodia , nyaso úkǝkisi wǝ . Nya ɔ́bɛbɛ kusu nkǝ lǝ olo wǝ .
41006020	Tsyaa , wámfo kusu bunyǝ lǝ Herodes eso . Itsyise Herodes áte Yohanes sikpi se unyi nkǝ Yohanes éyifo ɔnukualɛtidi ku utidi wǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ eso . Nyaso úkase wǝ . Lefe kpǝ , óla nkǝ lǝ úkanɔ wǝ asatete , ite bǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ káto wǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi lɛ ɔ́nɔ nnya tsya fɛ .
41006021	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , íbǝ bǝ Herodia ǝnyǝ kusu ko ɔnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ . Diyi nǝmfó didi Herodes eto leleyi . Herodes ákpadi wǝ beninǝtidi lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ ku wǝ bamamanyǝ eto beninǝ ku Galilea eto kasɔ eto beninǝ kplɛkplɛ lǝ wǝ lesakedikɔ .
41006022	Herodia eto kebitɛ ǝbǝ mfó úwi kewi ókpe disuǝyuǝ nya Oka Herodes ku wǝ bahɔ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó tinti . Nyaso Oka Herodes átɔ kebitɛ kamǝ nkǝ , “ Be faala fǝ lǝ ntǝ fǝ ? ”
41006023	Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ mɔ lekankpomɛ , minkǝ muutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ ke fɔɔtɔ mɛ , lǝ mɔ sekakedikɔ eto kutsyǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
41006024	Nyaso usiobi ǝmfo átaka úsu ɔ́tɔ wǝ ambe nkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ ntɔ ? ” Nya wǝ ambe lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tɔ wǝ Yohanes Ntuflǝsǝtidi eto disi . ”
41006025	Disiobi nǝmfo ésinkli kpla dísu diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya ɔ́tɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Nla minkǝ la Yohanes Ntuflǝsǝtidi eto disi ǝtǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ mɔmɔmɔmɔ ! ”
41006026	Nyamfo ába oka Herodes lɛkɔɛsi , fɛɛ wǝnsiǝmbofo ntamu bo óka utsyǝ lǝ beninǝtidi bamfó eto ǝnǝmi butu .
41006027	Lǝ nyaso ókpe wǝ oblafɔ lamfolamfo nkǝ usu ola Yohanes eto disi lǝ ufi oboko . Nya oblafɔ ǝmfó dídu úsu Aba eto diyo nǝ baakpe betidi , mfó úsu óla Yohanes eto disi .
41006028	Kamaa , úfi disi nǝmǝ útǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ nya úfi ni oboko disiobi nǝmǝ . Nya wuntsya dífi ni úsu útǝ wǝ ambe .
41006029	Lefe nǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , bésu báfo wǝ ɔkɔ bésu bébikǝ .
41006030	Batɔnkpe ba Yesu lékpe nkǝ besu batsyilama lekpake mfóo , ésinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ nnya kenke bésu beyifo ku asa nnya báte .
41006031	Nya kaka mǝ ku Yesu lɛsɔnɔ eto betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ búbǝ kédu étsyiko bufui . Nyaso Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi mánkɛ lefe lǝ bedi lesa kula tsya . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bo hã lǝ busu kaka lɛbiɔ lǝ busiǝ mfó butsyǝ ɔnwɛ sɛkɛ . ”
41006032	Nyaso bésu bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ lǝ besu kaka betidi lǝmbǝ .
41006033	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ bántɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya bétsyetsyi bátɔ sɛtɔ bésu baka mfó budufǝ fɛ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dísu bédufǝ mfó .
41006034	Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ únyǝ sitiditu siamǝǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo itsyise bǝtsyǝ fe basamu ba lǝmbǝ obebe . Nyaso útsyiko mǝ asa kpǝ bote itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
41006035	Lefe nǝ ditsyitsyo léyoo , wǝ bakasebi ányi bésu wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kale bolo . Nya kase mfo diyifo ntɛntii , bǝǝmbunyǝ kulesa bedi .
41006036	Nyaso lǝkǝ mǝmblɛ kusu lǝ bedu . Lǝ bedufǝ kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo lɛfi mfoo , boofó lesatsyuǝ bunyǝ kaya kedi . ”
41006037	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kosatee , bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyamfó ebofo fe utsyuǝ eto afa mflamfla eto kayofofo ! Ala fǝ bobiasǝ nyamfo lǝ mǝ budi ǝsuǝ ? ”
41006038	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Abolo asia bɛnlɛ ? Bisu bebe ! ” Nya se bésu bábee , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ ete ntǝ . ”
41006039	Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bǝtǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ kenke lǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ sefa siamǝ ǝsuǝ mfó lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa ǝsuǝ .
41006040	Nyaso betidi bamfo kenke ǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa ǝsuǝ ǝtsyuǝ fe betidi kolofa nya ǝtsyuǝ fe betidi awosi anɔ .
41006041	Nya Yesu dífi abolo ku akpɛ nyamǝ , nya se óbe kato , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Nya úbudi abolo nyamǝ nya úfi nnya útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bǝsiǝ bǝtǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa nyamǝ . Nya úsiǝ akpɛ nyamɛ tsya nko útǝ mǝ .
41006042	Mba kenke lɛkɛ mfó édi bémi .
41006043	Nya se wǝ bakasebi lɛsɛ didisa nǝ díbu bakɔɔ , díyi lefosi etsyitsya kplɛ ǝnuǝ .
41006044	Nya mba dídi lesa nǝmfo eto basani mate éyifo betidi akpi anɔ .
41006045	Lamfolamfo Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ lǝ besu umǝ wǝ baakpo Betsaida , lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Nya útǝ nkǝ sitiditu siamǝ sǝnsǝ sidu .
41006046	Nyamfo eto kamaa , wuntsya édu óbe kɔtini komǝ nkǝ lǝ usu oto ola .
41006047	Se éyo ketsyee , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ áyo ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto ntinti , Yesu mate hã díbu uńyǝ mfó .
41006048	Únyǝ nkǝ wǝ betidi édufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ ku kase bánlɛ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bofo bonwa itsyise ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ kǝlǝ mǝ . Nyaso lǝ kolensiǝnto kplɛɛ , Yesu áyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ úsu mǝ ɔflɔ eti nkǝ lǝ ɔyɛ ofe .
41006049	Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔkɔ ni . ”
41006050	Mǝmblɛ áte sikpi se bǝnyǝ wǝ . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ lamfolamfo nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Mɔ uni ! Bimuǝ utu bɛlɛ ! ”
41006051	Nya óbe údufǝ lǝ mǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya ete ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛyɛ bɔsɔ . Nyamfo éyifo wǝ bakasebi yanii ku kafɔsu .
41006052	Itsyise bánte kase ko íbǝ fɛ útǝ betidi akpi anɔ bamfo lesa bédi banɔ . Mǝ nsusu mánkpa ko mǝ lǝ nyamfó ǝsuǝ , itsyise bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
41006053	Se bédufǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nsee , báyifǝ lǝ Genesaret eto kasɔ . Nya bátsyasǝ mǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ mfó .
41006054	Kase báyifǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ koo , betidi ǝtsyǝ Yesu lekpo .
41006055	Nyaso betidi bamǝ étsyetsyi bésu bátɛyi mǝ betidi kenke lǝ kasɔ kamǝ . Nya kaka ke bánɔ bǝ Yesu kpee , bétsyi befimfi lǝ mǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
41006056	Nya kaka ke Yesu dísu koo , umǝ ni o-o , kebuto keni o-o , betidi ko díketsyi mǝ befimfi kaboko obia nya bánlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ utǝ lǝ betidi wǝ awu eto atosi ete . Nya mba dítidi nnyaa , ǝmuǝ ale .
41007001	Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa ba dítsyi Yerusalem ǝbǝ bátsyilama Yesu .
41007002	Bǝnyǝ bǝ wǝ bakasebi si balɛ lesa budi nya bǝtsyuǝ mǝmflǝ mǝ ani fe kase Farisifɔ laate betidi bǝ ele bǝ bǝflǝ .
41007003	Bǝnyǝ nyamfo bǝtsyǝ lekpo itsyise Farisifɔ ku Yudafɔ fɛfɛ kenke eeyifo lǝ mǝ batekoko , banakoko eto akpa nnya báyani bǝtsyǝ nya báte mǝ ǝsuǝ .
41007004	Nya lǝ báya lesa saa betsyiko bikǝkatekɔ tsyaa , ele bǝ bǝflǝ mǝ ani fɛ lǝ bedi . Nya ele bǝ beyifo lǝ afi kpǝ nnya bǝbǝ bétu , fe kase bǝǝflǝ akɔbe ku ekplibi ku kalɔtsyi .
41007005	Lǝ nyaso Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fǝ mba ntǝkǝko fǝ lǝǝnyifo lǝ bo batekoko ku banakoko eto akpa ǝsuǝ ? Nya banlɛ asa budi lǝ mǝ ani mǝflǝmflǝmflǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
41007006	Yesu ǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Lesa nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛwɔni ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , íbǝ ítǝ sitinti ! Ɔ́tɛyi bo nkǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfoo , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto dibu ete bǝǝtǝ mɛ , banla mɛ itsyi lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi .
41007007	Bimba ete ini bǝ bálɛ mɔ lelabi buyifo . Baate kawunsiǝ eto afi nnya betidi dítsyǝ fenkǝ mɔ afi ini . ’
41007008	Nnya lete bǝ bifi mɔ kɔfi bɛkula nya bɛnlɛ mi kawunsiǝ mfo eto akpa boté . ”
41007009	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bekpe awɛsu ǝtsyuǝ nnya biefi akayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kani Onanto eto kɔfi budi , keyifo batekoko ku banakoko eto akpa .
41007010	Onanato eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Moses áwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . Ɔ́tɛyi tsya nkǝ fǝǝ ke léka fǝ anto ku fǝ ambee , ele bǝ balo fǝ . ’
41007011	Fɛɛ biatɛyi biǝnkǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi ebofo lesa bɔni butǝ wǝ anto ku ambe ba lesa lehiã , ku nsusu bǝ lesa nǝmǝ eyifo kɛnkɛ , kato taflatsyǝ ku nsusu bǝ wuufi lesa nǝmǝ utǝ Onanto bomu eso .
41007012	Nya ɛyɛ le bo akpa ǝsuǝǝ , boata Onanto eto kɔfi kebu .
41007013	Nko ini bǝ biefi mi bana eto akpa kaninsǝ Onanto eto afi . Nya bieyifo asa bamba kpǝ tsya fe nyamfo eto okle . ”
41007014	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu esi ókpadi sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ bányi bafi wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimblɛ kenke bitsyue mɛ ato lǝ bɛnɔ kasɔ .
41007015	Lesa nǝ ke utsyuǝ dídi ókpe lǝ kafo ǝmbutǝ obiasǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ ke ditsyi lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi ɔtɛyii , nnya ni lesa nǝ lǝǝtǝ weeyifo lebua nɛ .
41007016	Mimblɛ kenke bitsyuǝ ato lǝ bɛnɔ mɛ kasɔ . ”
41007017	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , se údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ úsu diyoo , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ulǝkǝ lekpa nǝmǝ eto kasɔ ote mǝ .
41007018	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biannɔ lekpa nǝmfo kasɔɔ , nyalɛ mi nsusu ǝmbǝ kulesa kasɔ bofo bɔnɔ ! Ekpa bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ didufǝ lǝ utidi kafoo , ǝmbutǝ utidi ǝmǝ yifo lebua ,
41007019	itsyise yeendufǝ lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Wǝ kafo bomu yuudufǝ nya yɔɔyɛ ɛbɔ lǝ wǝ kafo fe lesa biabia . ” Nyaso nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi mfoo , ate bǝnkǝ didisa saa alɛkɛ itǝ budi .
41007020	Nya úsukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ utsyuǝ eto lɛkɔɛsii , ni laabiasǝ utidi nɛ .
41007021	Itsyise nsusu bua saa aabɔ ketsyi lǝ utidi eto lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ nya mu lǝǝtǝ wǝǝyifo asa bua nɛ . Asa nyamfó ni fenkǝ , lɛsɔnɔdi ku kuyu ku ditilo ku disǝnkpo , kusiǝ kamafefe ku sidikpuu ,
41007022	ku nsusu bua fifi ku kawɛ ku disiale , sidia tɛyitɛyi kabiasǝ utidi eto diye ku nsusu bua kekleke fifi lǝ sisǝ ku sisiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝǝnǝ utidi kakpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ , ǝnǝmi sɛsǝsɛsǝ lǝ utidi bamba eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ , diye biasǝbiasǝ , ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ , ebukisa yifoyifo , koto mentsyue mentsyue .
41007023	Asa bua nyamfo kenke aabɔ ketsyi lǝ utidi eto lɛkɔɛsi , nya laabiasǝ utidi nɛ . ”
41007024	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu úsu umǝ utsyuǝ lǝ Tiro eto kasɔ . Úsu diyo ditsyuǝ kaka wóanla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa te nkǝ okpe mfó , tsyafɛ wóamfo bɔbiɔ .
41007025	Mfóo , se usio utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nlɛ wǝ ubi bulǝ lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu kpe lǝ mfóo , úbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ akpa akpa nya óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
41007026	Usio ǝmfo enni Yudanyǝ . Bále wǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Foinike lǝ Siria eto kasɔ . Nya ɔ́lɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ ola lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ɔbɔnko lǝ wǝ ubi ǝsuǝ .
41007027	Nya Yesu lékpasǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Tutɛɛ , tǝ bekpefi lesa etɔ . Yanlɛkɛ bǝ befi bekpefi eto lesa bǝtǝ bakpa . ”
41007028	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ usio ǝmfo ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ao , mɔ Onamute , bakpa bamǝ lǝ ɔpunu kalɔ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfóo , ebunyǝ lesa nǝ bekpefi bamǝ nlǝ budi eto nǝ lookpoo kasɔ bedi . ”
41007029	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kase fǝtǝ mbuayɛ mfo esoo , du esu diyo . Ebunyǝ se lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkayani fǝ ubi ǝmǝ . ”
41007030	Nyaso usio ǝmfo édu úsu diyo . Lǝ mfóo , únyǝ nkǝ wǝ ubi labe lǝ wǝ kalabekɔ , nya lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ lénsisi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
41007031	Se Yesu lídu lǝ Tiro eto lekpake mfóo , ɔ́yɛ lǝ Sidon úsu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ kama kaka Kǝmǝ Lefosi kamǝ nkpe eti .
41007032	Nya mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa utidi utsyuǝ wǝ ni ototi ku ɔmumu báboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ utǝkǝ ani lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41007033	Nyaso Yesu ákpa wǝ usuko lɛkpɔ kaka betidi ku kudu lǝmbǝ , nya úfi wǝ animi ókpe wǝ lǝ ato . Útufǝ ntufǝ ókpo lǝ wǝ animi nya ɔ́kɔbe utidi ǝmǝ eto odiakami .
41007034	Nya Yesu lébesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi óbe kato nya ɔ́wɔnɔ fũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Hefata , ” eto kasɔ ni bǝǝ , “ Sini ! ”
41007035	Lamfolamfo , osani ǝmǝ eto ato ásini nya wǝ odiakami tsya lényankli nya ófo etiki budi .
41007036	Yesu ákpe betidi ba dinyǝ mfó kɔfi nkǝ bántɛyi utidi saa kulesa , itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ bǝnyǝ mfó . Fɛɛ bimbaa ete ɔ́ninko mǝ , itsyise kase ókpe mǝ kɔfii , nko kǝ banlɛ nnya bokpantsyasǝ nɛ .
41007037	Nya betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ asa nyamfóo , iyifo mǝ naa efensǝ ! Nya bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Wǝǝyifo lesa saa kukɔnɔ . Wǝǝtǝ bamumu leedi etiki , nya batoti tsya laanɔ asa ! ”
41008001	Lǝ eyi nyamfó ǝsuǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bátsya mfó . Nya se kulesa dímǝntsyǝ boodi esoo , Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ akɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
41008002	“ Betidi bamfo eto asa lɛ mɛ kaminsǝ , itsyise eyi ǝtsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ni nyamfo se bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ nɛ . Nya mɔmɔɔ , kulesa ente boodi .
41008003	Lǝ nyani mǝ beluu , kukpɛnsɛ ebɔlɛ mǝ kola disi lǝ kusu itsyise mǝ bǝtsyuǝ etsyi katsyontsyokɔ . ”
41008004	Nya wǝ bakasebi lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se utidi luunyǝ lesa utǝ betidi bamfo lǝ mfiminti mfo bǝ bedi bemi ? ”
41008005	Mfó Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Abolo asia nte mi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo akuanse . ”
41008006	Yesu átɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ . Nya úfi abolo akuanse nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ befi bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ kenke . Nya mǝ tsya dífi nnya bésiǝ bǝtǝ mǝ .
41008007	Akpɛ asiani tsya ǝtsyǝ . Yesu éfi nnya tsya nya ɔ́sɔ ani . Nya úfi nnya útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ besiǝ nnya tsya bǝtǝ mǝ .
41008008	Betidi bamfó kenke édi bémi . Betidi bamǝ eto utu ebuyifo akpi ana . Se bédi bálosǝǝ , bakasebi bamǝ ásɛ abolo wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya díbu nya íyi etsyitsya kplɛkplɛ akuanse . Nnya kamaa , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ betidi bamfo kenke kusu nya bédu .
41008009	
41008010	Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ báyila ditumbukplɛ bésu Dalmanuta eto lekpake .
41008011	Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bétsyiko wǝ etiki bunǝnko lǝ befi bato wǝ babe . Nyaso bátɛyi wǝ bǝ uyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ ote mǝ lǝ bate bǝ Onanto ɔflɔ útsyi úbǝ .
41008012	Nyamfo ǝlǝ Yesu tinti nya óla ɔwɔnɔ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso kon mmi eto betidi laabɛbɛ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ ayanisa fɛ lǝ bafo banɔ ? Kulefe , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , membuyifo ayanisa nnya eto okle bela biǝ biǝnyǝ mfo ! ”
41008013	Nya údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ , nya úsinkli údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya ɔ́yila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ úsu ni lekpake nǝ nse .
41008014	Kase banlɛ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyilaa , wǝ bakasebi bamǝ áta ǝsuǝ béntsyi abolo kpǝ .
41008015	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bekpe kobe lǝ bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ etiki itsyi lǝ oka Herodes ku Farisifɔ eto ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ . ”
41008016	Lefe nǝmfóo , mǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ dínyǝ mfó bánlɛ etiki búdi katɛyi bǝ , “ Lee nnya buuntsyi abolo kpǝ eso ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkoo ? ”
41008017	Fɛɛ se Yesu nyi etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi esoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ etiki lǝ abolo butsyi ǝsuǝ ? Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , biǝnyǝtɔ nye bɛnɔ kasɔ ? Bitidi ato ko !
41008018	Bekpe ǝnǝmi , tsya fɛ biǝnnyǝ ! Bekpe ato , tsya fɛ biannɔ !
41008019	Bíankloma lefe nǝ ménsie abolo anɔ míntǝ betidi akpi anɔ dídi ? Etsyitsya kplɛ asia nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbu díyi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lefosi etsyitsya ǝnuǝ . ”
41008020	Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya lǝ lefe nǝ mínsiǝ abolo akuanse míntǝ betidi akpi anaa , nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbuu , etsyitsya asia íyi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Akuanse . ”
41008021	Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , biante tɔ futsyǝ mini ? ”
41008022	Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dídufǝ Betsaida , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa unǝmba utsyuǝ báboko Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ufi wǝ kɔni utǝkǝ lǝ wǝ .
41008023	Yesu ákɔbe nwǝ ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ókpa wǝ ɔ́bɔnko lǝ umǝ nti . Se útufǝ ntufǝ ókpo lǝ unǝmba ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmii , úfi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Alɛ lesatsyuǝ bunyǝǝ ? ”
41008024	Nya utidi ǝmǝ létakasǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi óbe kato nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ee , nlɛ betidi bunyǝ , tsya beyifo fe eyi . Fɛɛ balɛ bɔyɛ katsyilama . ”
41008025	Nya Yesu disi útidi wǝ ǝnǝmi . Lǝ lefe nuǝfǝ nǝmfoo , utidi ǝmǝ ásini wǝ ǝnǝmi kukɔnɔ , nya wǝ ǝnǝmi lékpa , nya únyǝ lesa saa kukɔnɔ .
41008026	Nya Yesu dílǝkǝ wǝ kusu nkǝ udu usu wǝ diyo , wensisinkli usu umǝ ǝmǝ nti .
41008027	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu mfó bésu kebuto kǝtsyuǝ ka lɛfi Kaisarea Filipi eto kasɔ eti . Nya lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu bantɔɔ , Yesu édi mǝ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bɛtɛyi mɛ , futsyǝ betidi laatɛyi bǝ wǝ mini ? ”
41008028	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto mba lǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto mba kɔ eto okle ɔni . ”
41008029	Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimi nkpǝ , owoe biebu biǝ wǝ mini ? ” Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni nwǝ Onanto lékpo ɔhile útsyǝ . ”
41008030	Nya Yesu díkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ bántɛyi ku utsyuǝ saa , lesa nǝ benyi itsyi lǝ wǝ mfo .
41008031	Nya Yesu dítsyiko wǝ bakasebi asa ǝtsyuǝ bóte , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ bǝ Utidi Eto Ubi nyǝ kanyi lǝ Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani , bani wǝ . Boolo wǝ , tsya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝǝ wootaka . ”
41008032	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nyamfo ókpasǝ , bǝ lǝ banɔ kasɔ . Nya Petro lékpa wǝ usuko ɔflɔ wonko wǝ inuǝ , nya ɔ́ninko wǝ .
41008033	Tsyaa , se Yesu díkǝnsǝ óbe wǝ bakasebii , údi etiki ku lɛblɔfi ókpe Petro nkǝ , “ Obansam , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! ” Nya ɔlɔ bɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Anla asa nnya Onanto lala , bomu nnya betidinini lala ! ”
41008034	Nyaso Yesu ákpadi betidi eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ ku wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ato ku wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ alasa ǝsuǝ nya lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ .
41008035	Itsyise nwǝ ke lela nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , woo nyansǝ mu . Nya utidi wǝ ke loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ disi ku lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo esoo , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
41008036	Nte kutǝkǝ ko utudi luunyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ kenke afiani wǝ bele fɛ wǝnnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
41008037	Nye be utidi luufi ofloma ko bǝ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
41008038	Mɔmɔ mfoo , betidi kpǝ lǝ asa bua buyifo ketsyi kama kakpe Onanto . Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ efi mɔ ku mɔ asatete fe afanisa mɔmɔɔ , wuuntsya ebudi kofani lǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ɔflɔ lǝ lefe nǝ muubǝ ku Onanto eto Batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ ku lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . ”
41009001	Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ǝmbukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ biunyǝ Onanto ǝmǝ eto sekakedikɔ luubǝ ku ǝsuǝale . ”
41009002	Eyi akua eto kamaa , Yesu ákpa Petro , ku Yakobo ku Yohanes bésu kɔtini kutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Mǝ hã dísu bǝsiǝ mfó . Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamfo ńlɛ bobee , bǝnyǝ bǝ Yesu eto ditsyǝbi áfloma .
41009003	Nya wǝ awu nnya onkpe léfloma íflubi futututu enso kase utidi luuflǝ wǝ bikǝ ku ntu biole nya bɛnlɛ buyǝnde .
41009004	Nya bǝnyǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba koko , Mose ku Elia lɛbɔ bánlɛ etiki budi ku Yesu .
41009005	Sikpi ǝmuǝ bakasebi bamǝ kenke itsyise bánte lesa nǝ bánlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya Petro wǝ dímante lesa nǝ woatɛyi , lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , bo mfo eto bubǝ alɛkɛ tinti . Tǝ lǝ boto ebu ǝtsyǝ . Lɔni itǝ fǝ , lɔni itǝ Mose , nya lɔni tsya itǝ Elia . ”
41009006	
41009007	Nya lɛsɔmiloku ditsyuǝ díbǝ díti mǝmblɛ kenke , nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ asɔmiloku nyamǝ ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni mɔ ubi lala wǝ mankeko . Bitsyue wǝ koto . ”
41009008	Akpaakpa mfóo , bátsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi tsya bǝnyǝ kuutsyuǝ saa enso Yesu hã ńyǝ ku mǝ mfó .
41009009	Lefe nǝ bésinkli banlɛ kɔtini komǝ bɔyifǝ kǝbǝ kasɔɔ , Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyuǝ lesa nǝ bínyǝ mfo isu ese bǝ , mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ataka ntsyi ɔkɔmǝ mbǝ . ”
41009010	Béti etiki nyamfo bákpe lǝ mǝ nti , fɛ lǝ mǝ mate sii , nya bákatɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be ni bǝ wootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ eto kasɔ ? ”
41009011	Nya bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso afi eto bateasa bamǝ laatɛyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia tɔ Kristo eto bubǝ ? ”
41009012	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti baatɛyi . Ele bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia tɔ Kristo eto bubǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ . Fɛɛ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ tsya bǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ebudi ohiã tinti nya bɔɔni wǝ . Be bibu biǝ nyamfo tsya lɛ bote ?
41009013	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia búbǝ koko . Fɛɛ betidi mámfo wǝ ku dibu . Bomu béyifo wǝ kase ke bála . Nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto bɛnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ . ”
41009014	Lefe nǝmfóo , se Yesu ku bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ dísinkli bǝbǝ bakasebi fɛfɛ ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ bǝ betidi kpǝ ńyǝ bátsyilama mǝ , nya afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ nlɛ mǝ etiki bunǝ nko .
41009015	Se betidi bamfó kenke dínyǝ Yesu nlɛ bubǝǝ , íyifo mǝ yanii , nya bétsyetsyi bésu bátsyako wǝ bǝsiǝsǝ wǝ .
41009016	Yesu ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kǝnǝ ka mi ku mǝ nlɛ ? ”
41009017	Nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ ńyǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , nkpa mɔ ubi mboko fǝ ɔflɔ , itsyise lɛwɔnɔ bua si wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ waamfo etiki budi .
41009018	Lefenǝ ke lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo nlɛ wǝ bulǝǝ , dietsyi wǝ kasɔ lǝ kasɔ , nya efu laabɔ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ nya woayimi anyi , nya wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke laasie kǝklǝkǝ . Nya mínkpa wǝ mimboko fǝ bakasebi minkǝ lǝ batsya wǝ , fɛ bamfo . ”
41009019	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ei ! Mii , mmi eto betidi , mi bofo kanɔ ǝmbǝ ale ! Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ bonko mi yɛ fɛ lǝ befo bɛnɔ ? Nye nte lefe kɛntsyɛ nǝ ele bǝ nyɛnko mi fɛ lǝ bɛnɔ asa kasɔ ? Bekpa ubi ǝmǝ beboko mɛ ! ”
41009020	Nya bákpa wǝ búsuko Yesu . Nya kase lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo dínyǝ Yesu ko , dítinkǝsǝ ubi ǝmǝ nya dínǝ wǝ lɛɛsɔ lǝ kasɔ lɛnlɛ bowaninsǝ , akaminansǝ lǝ kasɔ , nya efu nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
41009021	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ anto nkǝ , “ Se ítsyiko wǝ buyifo mǝǝ , yɔ́ɔ klɛ ? ” Osani ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ítsyǝ wǝ kasɔ lǝ wǝ sikpefi lefe ke .
41009022	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ aakplatsya sesiasesia nkǝ lǝ lelo wǝ , lǝ ibǝ nkoo , dietǝ nkǝ lǝ udu ɔnɔ udufǝ lǝ utǝ nye ntu ǝsuǝ . Nlɛ fǝǝ lekpakpa , nyǝ bo kaminsǝ , lǝ ebofo lǝ awunsǝ ko bo ! ”
41009023	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso faatɛyi mɛ fǝnkǝ lǝ moofo ? Lesasa ebofo bubǝ kǝtǝ lǝ afo mɛ ɔnɔ . ”
41009024	Lamfolamfo , ubi ǝmǝ eto anto átɛyi bembembe nkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ , tsyaa bumbǝ ale kpǝ . Wunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ bofo kanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale . ”
41009025	Nya lefe nǝ Yesu dínyǝ nkǝ betidi kpǝ lǝ bɔkpɔ lǝ banyi bafi mǝǝ , údi lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo etiki nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ lǝǝtǝ betidi lannɔ ku leendi etiki , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ bɔ lǝ ubi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ , nya mensi sinkli edufǝ lǝ wǝ kulefe kulefe bio ! ”
41009026	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo áfa bembembe , nya dítinkǝsǝ wǝ kekleke nya lɛbɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Ubi ǝmfo álabe mfó fe bukpǝ ukpǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ ńyǝ mfó nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ukpǝ ! ”
41009027	Nya Yesu lɛkɔbe ubi ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ótaka úńyǝ .
41009028	Lǝ nyamfo eto kama se Yesu dídufǝ diyo ditsyuǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ buɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bo dímamfo lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
41009029	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Siankpa utidi ǝmǝ éboto ola sesia sesia sesia nya ókle kɛnyɛɛ , nya fɛ woofo lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo eto okle bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
41009030	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu mfó báyɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Yesu mánla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa te kaka onkpe ,
41009031	itsyise úkate wǝ bakasebi asa . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ ebufi Betidi kenke eto Ubi utǝ , nya wuufi wǝ utǝ betidi nkǝ balo . Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , wuusinkli otaka ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
41009032	Tsya bánnɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mfo eto kasɔ , nya báte sikpi ku kase bɔɔtɔ wǝ ditiki nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mfo eto kasɔ .
41009033	Se bésu bédufǝ Kapernaum eto umǝǝ , bésu bédufǝ diyo lɔni . Mfóo , Yesu átɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nte ditiki nǝ bɛnlɛ bunǝ lǝ mi nti se bɔ́nlɛ bubǝ ? ”
41009034	Tsya bǝntǝ wǝ mbuayɛ saa . Itsyise se bánlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝkǝnǝ etiki bǝ bala bǝ baate utsyǝ wǝ ni ɔkplɛ kenke lǝ mǝ nti .
41009035	Nya Yesu dísiǝ lǝ kasɔ nya ókpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi futsyǝ lela nkǝ weedi ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ mi ntii , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ fenkǝ nwǝ lǝmbǝ kulesa nti , nya wuusumu wǝ bǝtsyuǝ . ”
41009036	Nya útǝ dikpefi díbǝ únyǝ lǝ mǝ sɛtɔ . Nya útsyi dikpefi nǝmfo útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ akpa nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
41009037	“ Utsyuǝ saa léfo dikpefi lǝ mɔ disii , mɔ ni ófo . Nya utsyuǝ saa loofo mɛɛ , inni mɔ mate ete ofo . Bomu ófo mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsya . ”
41009038	Nya , okasebi wǝ baakpo Yohanes lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , búnyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ awɔnɔ bua bóla lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ . Nya búti wǝ kusu buǝ usinkli ɔyɛ , itsyise umbǝ lǝ bo nti . ”
41009039	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bienti wǝ kusu , itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo ayanisa lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , ǝmbudi mɔ etiki bua .
41009040	Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ lǝǝnnyǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝǝ , bonko wǝ eyifo bani .
41009041	“ Nya mǝtǝ lǝ bete biǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luutǝ mi ntu nkǝ binǝ itsyise biyifo mɔ balee , Onanto ebofo wǝ nnya kayo .
41009042	“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝtǝ bǝ dikpefi nǝ díkǝnyǝ bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ ésinkli kama lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ kotonǝnǝ tinti . Lǝ befi ukuǝ bátsyasǝ lǝ lebambi kplɛ ǝsuǝ befi bakpe wǝ lǝ simuǝ befi wǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditumbukplɛ , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso .
41009043	“ Nyaso lǝ fǝ kɔni kɔni abiasǝ fǝ bofokanɔɔ , tɔnɔ lǝ ala ko ǝlǝkǝ ! Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ yɛ kɔni kɔwɛ esu nkpǝ manlo kǝmiǝ enso bǝ kɛ ani ǝnuǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ oto fǝ okpe lǝ ditǝfɛnku ǝsuǝ kaka baatonsǝ asa bua .
41009044	
41009045	Nyaso lǝ fǝ kokpa kɔni laabiasǝ fǝ bofokanɔɔ , la ko ǝlǝkǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ kɛ kokpa kɔwɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo , enso bǝ akpa ǝnuǝ kɛ fǝ lǝ bato fǝ bakpe lǝ utǝ ǝmǝ kǝmiǝ .
41009046	
41009047	Nya lǝ fǝ dinǝmi aakpa fǝ kesuko asa bua kǝmiǝǝ , nǝ ni ǝlǝkǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso lǝ akpe dinǝmi lɛwɛ nya fedufǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ enso bǝ kɛ ǝnǝmi ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ utǝ manlo kǝmiǝ ,
41009048	wǝ eto asa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Ekuklubi nnya laabiasǝ asa mfóo , ǝǝnkpǝ kulefe . Nya ute wǝ laatonsǝ asa mfóo , aanni kulefe . ’
41009049	Itsyise fe kase beefi mba kakpe lǝ didisa dialɛkɛɛ , nko kǝ Onanto leefi kanyinyǝnyǝ eto utǝ kakpasǝ wǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nɛ .
41009050	“ Mba alɛkɛ . Fɛ lǝ bóyansǝ mu kamini , ǝnsiǝmbofo kamini bokpe lǝ mu bio . Nyaso , tǝ mba eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ lǝ bɔkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ bisiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ . ”
41010001	Nya se Yesu dídu mfó , ɔ́yila Yordan eto ketu úsu Yudea eto kasɔ . Betidi kpǝ esi bǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ mfó tsya , nya úkate mǝ asa mfó itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase úkala buyifo .
41010002	Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ itǝ kusuu , lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ Onanto eto kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝnkǝ osani ɔni wǝ usiǝ ? ”
41010003	Nya Yesu tsya lítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kɔfi ko Mose lékpe mi ? ”
41010004	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Mose ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ osani wǝ ke lensianla wǝ usiǝǝ , ɔwɔni kukuǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ bote fɛ lǝ oyani wǝ . ”
41010005	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Moses wǝǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi áwɔni nyamfo nko útǝ mi itsyi lǝ mi letotidi eso .
41010006	Taa kawunsiǝ eto diyifofee , Onanto éyifo osani ku usio , fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Kukue Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
41010007	Awɔnisa Eto Kukuǝ Kɛnkɛ átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani du lǝ wǝ anto ku ambe ɔflɔ usu ɔkɔ ku wǝ usiǝ ,
41010008	nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ loofiani ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni . ’ Nyaso lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , bafiani utidi ɔni . Inni inuǝ !
41010009	Nyaso betidi ba Onanto lɛkɔ banii , kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi saa ǝmbǝ kusu wǝǝsǝnsǝ mǝ nti . ”
41010010	Kama se bésu bédufǝ lǝ diyo kǝmiǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ asa itsyi lǝ lǝsanǝ ɔ́tɛyi lǝ kɔfi komfó ǝsuǝ .
41010011	Yesu ǝlǝkǝ kasɔ óte mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani wǝ looyani wǝ usiǝ usu nya úfi obambaa , udi kɔsɔnɔ , ota wǝ usiǝ koko ǝmǝ ubu .
41010012	Nko ke lǝ usio ani wǝ usiǝ nya usu usiǝko úsiǝ kusǝ bamba tsyaa , wuntsya akpo kusǝ óta wǝ usiǝ koko ǝmǝ úbu . ”
41010013	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutuu , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa mǝ bebi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ufi wǝ ani utǝkǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ okpo mǝ atsyɔ . Fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ǝnyǝnki bákpe mǝ .
41010014	Se Yesu dínyǝ nyamfoo , kafo ányi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ ekpefi lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ , bienti mǝ kusu . Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ tǝ itǝ mba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe kase ekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo leeyifo .
41010015	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ utidi wǝ ke lǝmbofo Onanto eto Sekadidi fe kase dikpefi kɛkɛ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , wǝmbudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ kulefe . ”
41010016	Nya ɔ́buta dikpefi saa , útǝkǝ wǝ kɔni nya ókpo mǝ atsyɔ .
41010017	Lefe nǝ Yesu létaka úńyǝ lǝ uluu , osani utsyuǝ étsyetsyi úbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa Sɛɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
41010018	Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Eyi lesa nǝ eso fakpadi mɛ fǝ , ɔsɛɛ ? Utidi saa meenyifo ɔsɛɛ , enso Onanto .
41010019	Eyi Onanto eto afi nnya kenke . Manlo utidi , mankpo kusǝ nye mamfe fǝ usiǝ kama , menyu , mantɛyi sidia lǝ fuutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ nye ala wǝ kɛnyɛ , manwɛ utidi lǝ afo wǝ bikǝ , bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . ”
41010020	Osani ǝmfo esi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , idu lǝ mɔ sikpefi ibǝ ese lǝ mii , nlɛ afi nyamfo kenke budi . ”
41010021	Yesu ábe wǝ ku lelabi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lesakpa lɔni hã dibu ele bǝ yifo . Su lǝ esu efi fǝ bikǝ bia kenke nte fǝ ate , lǝ efi atabi nyamfó efi ǝtǝ bakombo . Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , ebofiani otabinyǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Nyamfo eto kamaa , du lǝ ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ lefe saa ! ”
41010022	Se osani ǝmfo lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , élo wǝ ani nnya údu ku nkuɛnlo , itsyise bikǝ kpǝ kpe wǝ .
41010023	Yesu átsyi ɔwininsǝ nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe wǝ bakasebi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ekpe ale tinti fɛ batabinyǝ loofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝ . ”
41010024	Ditiki nǝmfo ábiasǝ wǝ bakasebi bamfo eto nsusu . Fɛɛ Yesu esi átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bebi , bɛnɔ kase enkpe ale itǝ batabinyǝ bǝ bǝnyǝ kusu bedufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ !
41010025	Mǝ mfó budufǝ kpe ale eso kase ɔdɔmini ku lekoko lɔɔyɛ lǝ okaasa eto ofo ofe ! ”
41010026	Se ɔ́tɛyi mǝ ditiki nǝmfoo , isi ébiasǝ mǝ nsusu ekpe blɛmblɛ ! Nya banlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe ko luunyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
41010027	Nyaso Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa ǝmbǝ loofo nyamfo buyifo . Fɛɛ wǝ Onantoo , wǝ ebofo lesa saa buyifo . ”
41010028	Nya Petro dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bóyani bo lesa saa butsyǝ bubǝ butǝkǝko fǝ ! ”
41010029	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkɛ mimi ebunyǝ bikǝ kpǝ enso mbia béyani bitsyǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ léyani wǝ oto nye bayimisani nye bayimisio , nye ambe , nye anto , nye wǝ bebi , nye wǝ ɔkuɛ útsyǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko esoo , nya lǝ usǝnsǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfoo ,
41010030	wuunyǝ asa nyamfó eto nnya kolofa ku kama lǝ kasɔ kamfo . Wuunyǝ kato ku bayimisani ku bayimisio , ku ambemǝ ku bebi ku kakuɛ kpǝ . Fɛɛ betidi ebokpe wǝ bulǝ tsya . Nya nyamfo eto kamaa , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo lǝ kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ ka luubǝ .
41010031	Fɛ betidi kpǝ ba ntɔ sɛtɔ mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe kama . Nya mba nkpe kama mɔmɔɔ , mǝ loofe batɔ sɛtɔ nɛ . ”
41010032	Lǝ lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu baatɔ lǝ Yerusalem eeto umǝǝ , Yesu átɔ sɛtɔ fɛ wǝ bakasebi dítǝkǝ . Nya bulǝ butsyuǝ eto okle dídufǝ lǝ bakasabi bamfó ǝsuǝ nya sikpi dímuǝ betidi ba ntǝkǝko mǝ tsya . Yesu esi ókpadi wǝ bakasebi nya ókpa mǝ úsuko kaka kudu lǝmbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ asa nnya lǝǝbǝ wǝ butu .
41010033	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ ! Bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ kaka boomuǝ mɛ , mɔɔ ni Utidi Eto Ubi , nya boofi mɛ bakpe lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani . Boolo mɛ dikpǝkpi nya buufi mɛ bakpe lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani .
41010034	Nya bookpe mɛ kɔfiɔ , nya bootufǝ ntufǝ bakpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , bablɛ mɛ , balo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli ntaka mbǝ nkpǝ bio . ”
41010035	Nya Sebedeo eto bebi ba ni Yakobo ku Yohanes díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bankǝ , “ Oteasa , bokpe kǝtsyuǝ boǝ boatɛyi lǝ eyifo ǝtǝ bo . ”
41010036	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ini ? ”
41010037	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ fǝ lekankpomɛ lǝ fǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , bo tsya aala boǝ lǝ bubǝ busiǝ lǝ fǝ akɔ mfó . Bo ɔni lǝ usiǝ lǝ fǝ kodiani nya unuǝfǝ tsya lǝ usiǝ lǝ fǝ kǝmǝni . ”
41010038	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔtɔ ! Befo bɛnɔ biǝ biofo ntu bunǝ lǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝ mǝǝnǝ ǝsuǝ ? Nya biofo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝ moofo lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo bofoo ? ”
41010039	Nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Boofo . ” Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ee , biofo bunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe bua nǝ eto okle mǝǝnǝ , nnya biofo ntu flǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝ eto okle maafo mfo .
41010040	Fɛɛ mimbǝ kusu bǝ nlǝkǝ utidi wǝ luusiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani nye kǝmǝni . Mɔ Anto wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ betidi ba úkalɔ mfó utsyǝ útǝ . ”
41010041	Lefe nǝ bakasebi lefosi fɛfɛ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bǝnyǝ ɔblɔ bákpe Yakobo ku Yohanes .
41010042	Nyaso Yesu ákpadi mǝmblɛ kenke utsyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi biǝnkǝ Aba eto beninǝ kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ mǝ kalɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya nkomǝ eto beninǝ tidi bamfó akɛ ale ǝkǝlǝkǝ kayinkǝ mba nkpe mǝ kalɔ .
41010043	Fɛɛ yanle bǝ itsyǝ nko lǝ mi nti . Lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ aala nkǝ weedi ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ obokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ usumu bafɛfɛ .
41010044	Nya lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woafo diye kplɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ lǝǝnnǝ ǝsuǝ , laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kabɛbɛ bafɛfɛ eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ .
41010045	Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi kulaa tsya mǝmbǝ nkǝ besumu mɛ . Bomu bǝ lǝ usumu betidi lǝ ufi wǝ nkpǝ utǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto dilǝkǝ . ”
41010046	Nnya kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ésu Yeriko . Nya se banlɛ budu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko mǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bányɛ kusuu , báfe unǝmba utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Bartimeo eto kasɔ ni Timeo eto ubi . Nya unsi mfó ɔnlɛ asa bɔtɔ .
41010047	Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ uni nlɛ bofee , ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu ! David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
41010048	Betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bofe mfó ǝnyǝnki bákpe wǝ bǝnkǝ usinkli ɔyɛ kudu komǝ . Tsya mfe fɛ usi ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
41010049	Nya se Yesu lɛnɔ nkoo , úkǝnǝ úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bekpadi wǝ bitǝ mɛ . ” Nyaso bákpadi unǝmba ǝmfo bátɛyi bǝ , “ Nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ! Taka mlǝ , itsyise ɔlɛ fǝ bokpadi . ”
41010050	Lamfolamfo , úlǝkǝ wǝ awu kato óto ókpe , nya ótaka úńyǝ , nya úsu Yesu flɔ .
41010051	Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be faala fǝ nyifo ntǝ fǝ ? ” Unǝmba ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tǝ lǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsini lǝ nkǝnyǝ ! ”
41010052	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ” Nya lamfolamfo , wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini nya útsyiko asa bunyǝ . Nya útǝkǝko Yesu , nya mǝmblɛ lídu .
41011001	Lefe nǝ bányi bafi Yerusalem nya bédufǝ Betfage ku kaka letsyilama Betania mfóo , báyo Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini . Nya mfó Yesu lékpe wǝ bakasebi inuǝ nkǝ beákatɔ .
41011002	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bidufǝ umǝ tutɛɛ , biunyǝ biǝnkǝ bátsyasǝ ɔflimubi wǝ ku ukuǝ , wǝ ku utsyuǝ saa dímǝsiǝ tɔ unyǝ . Benyankli wǝ lǝ ukuǝ lǝ bifi wǝ beboko mɛ .
41011003	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ átɔ mi nkǝ , ‘ Beso bɛnlɛ wǝ bulǝkǝ ? ’ bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝ mi Onamute ahiã wǝ , nya businkli bufi wǝ boboko mlɛ . ”
41011004	Nyaso betidi inuǝ bamfo ésu nya bǝnyǝ bǝ ɔflimubi ńyǝ lǝ ukuǝ , úńyǝ lǝ futsyǝ eto kǝsiǝ . Nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ ku ukuǝ ǝmǝ .
41011005	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ńyǝ mfó átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be bɛnlɛ wǝ bonyankli keyifo ko ? ”
41011006	Bátɛyi mǝ fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya mǝ tsya dítǝ mǝ kusu bǝ banyankli wǝ .
41011007	Se báboko Yesu ubuki ǝmfoo , béfi mǝ mfia bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya Yesu lébe úsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
41011008	Betidi kpǝ éfi mǝ mfia bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ , bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝfǝsǝ kalɛ ku afanto lǝ kaflɔ bésense bákpo lǝ kusu bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ ofe .
41011009	Betidi ba kenke ntɔ sɛtɔ ku mba ntǝkǝ kamaa káfa bembembe kákatɛyi bǝ , “ Hosiana ! Bɔlɛ atɛsǝ butǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ .
41011010	Bifi atɛsǝ bitǝ bo ona Oka David eto sekakedikɔ sia nlɛ bubǝ . Hosiana itǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe kato fanlofanlo . ”
41011011	Se údufǝ Yerusalem , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo . Nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́lɛ ola óbe lesa saa nǝ nkpe mfó . Fɛɛ se kale mfe nlɛ bolo esoo , údu úsu Betania ku wǝ bakasebi .
41011012	Se kale dísiǝ , bédu lǝ Umǝ Betania bánlɛ bubǝǝ nya kukpɛnsɛ étsyiko Yesu bɔlɛ .
41011013	Únyǝ kɔsɛsɛ nkǝ kuyi kutsyuǝ ko laawɔ eyibibi baakpo fiki ko léta afanto kpǝ nyǝ mfó . Nyaso úsu nkǝ weesu obe lǝ kɔ́nwɔ ebibi . Fɛɛ se úsu údufǝ kuyi komǝ kalɔɔ , únyǝ nkǝ kóanwɔ ebibi saa . Afanto hã kóto . Lefe nǝ ele bǝ kusi kɔnwɔ tsya mányo tɔ .
41011014	Nyaso Yesu édi kuyi komǝ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ensiembɔnwɔ ebibi bio . ” Wǝ bakasebi ánɔ se ɔ́tɛyi nko .
41011015	Se bésu bédufǝ Yerusalem , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo , nya útsyiko betidi ba nlɛ asa bote ku mba nlɛ bikǝ bote lǝ diyo nǝmǝ bola , úkǝ mba nlɛ atabi bofloma eto kapunu úwi . Nya úkǝ mba nsi banlɛ ablonima tsya bote eto akpomɛ úwi itsyise wóanla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ubǝ ukayɛ lǝ Disumuyo ɔflɔ mfó kafe ku mǝ bikǝ .
41011016	Nya wóantɔnɔ nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa fi kulesa úbǝ katekɔ lǝ kesumukɔ eto diyo nǝmǝ mfó .
41011017	Nya óte betidi bamfó asa ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bawɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bookpo mɔ diyo , diyo nǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi luubǝ bato ola bǝtǝ Onanto . ’ Fɛɛ mimi éfi ni bíyifo beyu eto kabiɔkɔ katafa betidi . ”
41011018	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ba lɛkɛ mfó ánɔ etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi . Nyaso bábɛbɛ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ balo wǝ . Tsyaa balɛ sikpi bote ɛyɛ lǝ kase betidi ba tã laala wǝ asatete eso .
41011019	Se éyo ditsyitsyo lefee , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ǝmǝ .
41011020	Se kale dísiǝ eto olesiǝǝ , nya se bányɛ lǝ kusu bánlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝnyǝ bǝ kudiyi komǝ ébukpǝ koko kenke taa ko keyudu ke .
41011021	Petro ákloma lesa nǝ díbǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be kuyi komǝ fékudii , kúkpǝ ! ”
41011022	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo Onanto bɛnɔ .
41011023	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ lɔɔtɛyi kɔtini komfo nkǝ kɔnyi kusu kudufǝ lǝ lekpoo , nya wanyaki lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi , nya ófo ɔ́nɔ nkǝ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi ebubǝ itǝǝ , Onanto ebuyifo nnya utǝ wǝ .
41011024	Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lesa nǝ ke biɔtɔ Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝǝ , befo bɛnɔ biǝ dioka mi kɔni . Onanto ebuyifo lesa nǝ mǝ utǝ mi .
41011025	Nya lǝ bibǝ ola katokɔ kǝtǝ Onanto nya bekloma biǝ utidi utsyuǝ áta mi úbuu , bifi bɛtsyɛ wǝ itǝ bǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato tsyaa , lǝ ufi mi asa bua ɔtsyɛ mi .
41011026	Fɛɛ lǝ biemfi bɛtsyɛ wǝǝ , mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato tsya ǝmbufi ɔtsyɛ mi . ”
41011027	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édufǝ Yerusalem . Nya Yesu nyɛ lǝ kesumukɔ mfó botsyilamaa , nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
41011028	Nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale fɛ feeyifo asa nyamfo ? Nya owoe tsya dítǝ fǝ kusu nko ? ”
41011029	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tutɛɛ , mɔɔtɔ mi ditiki lɔni hã . Nya lǝ bitǝ ni mbuayɛɛ , mɔɔtɛyi mi nwǝ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ minlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo .
41011030	Bɛtɛyi mɛ kaka Yohanes léfo ǝsuǝale utsyiko fɛ úflǝsǝ betidi ntu ? Ǝsuǝale nyamǝǝ , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi lee utidi ete dítǝ wǝ kusu ? ”
41011031	Bétsyiko etiki nyamfo bunǝ lǝ mǝ nti , nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ele bǝ bɔtɛyi kɛɛ ? Lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ nkomǝ eto ǝsuǝale nyamǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔɔ , wɔɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nko inii , beso bíamfo Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
41011032	Fɛɛ lǝ bɔtɛyi wǝ boǝ , utidi ete letsyese wǝ tsyaa ! ” Balɛ sikpi bote kase bɔtɛyi nko tsya itsyise utsyuǝ saa áfo ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yohanes eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
41011033	Nyaso bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bunyi . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mintsya ǝmbɔtɛyi mi itsyi lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya minkpe eso fɛ maafo nyamfo buyifo ! ”
41012001	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nkǝ , “ Lefe lɔnii , osani utsyuǝ áfo nte eto eyi eto ɔkuɛ . Nya ókpe ɔkpɔ ótsyilama wǝ . Nya úlǝkǝ dibiǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ kaka wuukǝkǝ eyibibi nyamǝ eto ntu ukakpo . Nya óto kalebe kani letaka kaka bookǝnyǝ bakase ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . Nya úfi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe lǝ wǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ eto ani nkǝ bakase wǝ , lǝ lesa nǝ ke bǝnyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝǝ , lǝ befi baboko lǝ besie bǝtsyuǝ . Nya údu úsu kusu .
41012002	Se lefe léyo bǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ ákpe mǝ wǝ uyifoyifo ɔni nkǝ lǝ bɔɔlɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , lǝ batsyɛ nya lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ lǝ osani ǝmǝ lǝ ofo wǝ lekpa oboko wǝ .
41012003	Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamfo ko dímuǝ wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo báblɛ nya bála wǝ bátsyese nya údu anifufu .
41012004	Nya osani ǝmfo disi ótsyese uyifoyifo bamba . Nya se úsuu , beyifoyifo bamfo lɛblɛ wǝ nya ófo lefabe lǝ disi , nya bákpe wǝ kofani tinti .
41012005	Nya osani ǝmfo disi ótsyese wǝ uyifoyifo bamba bio , nya báblɛ wuntsya nya bálo wǝ . Nnya kamaa , usi ótsyese wǝ beyifoyifo kpǝ . Nya báblɛ bǝtsyuǝ nya bálo bafɛfɛ .
41012006	“ Utidi wǝ dibu wǝ bio wootsyese wǝ ni osani ǝmfo kosate eto ubi lala . Lɛfɛfɛɛ , ótsyese wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu mɔ ubi . ’
41012007	“ Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ átɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ nwǝ luudi Bonamute eto bikǝ . Bibǝ lǝ bumuǝ wǝ bolo , lǝ bɔlɛ wǝ kedikɔ bofo bofianinsǝ bo kale . ’
41012008	Nyaso bǝmuǝ ubi ǝmfo . Nya bálo wǝ . Béfi wǝ bǝduǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ eto kama . ”
41012009	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be befo bɛnɔ biǝ osani ǝmfó ebuyifo ? Mɔɔtɛyi mi minkǝ wuusu mfó usu olo beyifoyifo bamfó , ɔlɛ ɔkuɛ ǝmfo ofo okpe betidi bambaa kɔni .
41012010	Ntɔ bíankla lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ kaka bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti .
41012011	Bonamute ni nwǝ díyifo nyamfo . Iyifo lesa nǝ laanɔ bobe sitinti ! ’ ”
41012012	Nya se bánɔ nyamfoo , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ákplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ Yesu . Itsyise bǝnyǝ bǝ lekpa nǝmǝ ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ báte sitiditu sia ńyǝ mfó sikpi . Nyaso bédu lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
41012013	Kamaa , bátsyese Farisifɔ ku Herodes eto betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ besu betsyue wǝ etikididi ato lǝ bǝnyǝ kabua lǝ wǝ esuǝ .
41012014	Se bésu wǝ ɔflɔɔ , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ fǝǝ , ɔnukualɛtidi feni . Nya eentsyi fǝ etiki kawuninsǝ lǝ ǝdufǝ betidi ǝnǝ . Aante betidi eto ǝnǝmi sikpi , ɔkplɛ lee , ɔkɛkɛ . Nya ni bǝ Onanto eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ hã faate saa kayɛnko . Nyaso tɛyi bo lǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ boko oko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare
41012015	Bofo lee boamfo ? ” Fɛɛ Yesu yi mǝ nkǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi beni , nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso biala biǝ biato mɛ bebe ? Beboko mɛ atabi lǝ mbe . ”
41012016	Báboko wǝ ani . Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe eto disi ku diye ntǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ mfo ? ” Mfó bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare ni . ”
41012017	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso bifi lesa nǝ ni Okankplɛ Kaisare eto lele bitǝ wǝ . Lǝ bifi lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto lele bitǝ Onanto . ” Lǝ nyamfo esoo , iyifo mǝ naa .
41012018	Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Mǝ laate bǝnkǝ lǝ utidi ǝkpǝǝ , woensibusinkli otaka ubǝ nkpǝ . Bǝbǝ bǝ bátɔ Yesu ditiki ditsyuǝ .
41012019	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , Moses áwɔni lǝ afi nnya útǝ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya óyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya bánle bebi saa , nyalɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmfo eto ɔyimisani , fi usio ǝmǝ ufi . Nya wǝ ku ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bale bebi . Nya bebi bamfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mǝ fe osani wǝ dimankɛ ubi saa eto bale . ’
41012020	Nya íbǝ lefe lɔni bǝ , bayimisani ekuanse ǝsiǝ . Ututǝ éfi kusiǝ nya úkpǝ le lefe nǝ bánle ubi saa .
41012021	Nya unuǝfǝ tsya dífi wǝ , nya wuntsya díkpǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe wonko usio ǝmfo dímanle ubi saa . Nko kǝ íbǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ banle ubi saa .
41012022	Nko íbǝ bǝ mǝ ekuanse ba kenke éfi usio emfo bafia . Fɛɛ mǝmblɛ kenke ǝkpǝ lefe nǝ mǝ ku usio ǝmfo dímanle bebi saa . Nnya kama kamaa , usio ǝmfo tsya ǝkpǝ .
41012023	Mɔmɔɔ , nnya ni bǝnkǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ kenke lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝǝ , mǝ nti eto owoe luudi usio ǝmfo eto usǝ se mǝ betidi ekuanse bamǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝǝ , dikefi wǝ fe kusiǝ ? ”
41012024	Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni nko ini kulaa . Nnyǝ minkǝ bíannɔ ditiki nǝmfo kasɔ , itsyise biannɔ etiki nya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ eto kasɔ nya binyi Onanto eto ǝsuǝale . Nyaso beta wǝ bibu .
41012025	Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ lootakaa , bootsyǝ fe Onanto eto batɔnkpe , nyaso bembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsǝ .
41012026	Nya lǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ eto businkli kataka ǝsuǝ , Moses áwɔni lesatsyuǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ biyu eto eyi kpufɛɛ nnya díńyǝ utǝ ǝsuǝ . Onanto lídi wǝ etiki . Lee biankloma ? Mfó ɔ́wɔni nkǝ Onanto átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob eto Onanto tsya . ’
41012027	Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ betidi ba díkǝkpǝ ebusinkli bǝbǝ nkpǝ , nya wǝ kǝ ni mǝ Onanto . Fɛɛ mi bíonya ɔnukualɛsu komfo koko ! ”
41012028	Afi eto oteasa wǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ etiki nya banlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya ánɔ nkǝ Yesu ǝtǝ etiki nyamǝ eto mbuayɛ kukɔnɔ . Nyaso ɔ́nyi úsu Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Nte kɔfi ko ni nko nso bofe lǝ afi nnya kenke nti ? ”
41012029	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kɔfi ko nso bofe ni nko báwɛni bǝnkǝ , ‘ Israel eto betidi , bɛlɔ bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! Onanto ni bo Onamute , nya Onanto ɔni hã nkpe .
41012030	Nyaso ele bǝ ala Onanto wǝ ni fǝ Onamute ku fǝ utu kenke , ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke , ku fǝ ǝsuǝale kenke . ’
41012031	Nya kɔfi ko nsi ntǝkǝ lǝ nkomfo eto kama ni bǝ , ‘ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’ Kɔfi saa ensibǝ ko ntǝkǝ afi nyamfo kato . ”
41012032	Nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , átɛyi nnya kukɔnɔ ! Lesa nǝ fátɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ bǝ Onanto ni bo Onamute , wǝ kama Onanto saa ensibǝ .
41012033	Nya ele bǝ Utidi saa la Onanto itsyi lǝ wǝ utu ku wǝ nsusu kenke ku wǝ ǝsuǝale kenke . Nya ele bǝ ola wǝ utiditsyuǝ fe kase woala wǝ ǝsuǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ utidi di afi ǝnuǝ nyamfo , eso bǝ ufi bebuki ku keditǝtǝ bamba utǝ Onanto . ”
41012034	Se Yesu dínyǝ kasɔnɔnɔ ka ǝsuǝ osani ǝmfo lɛyɛ útǝ mbuayɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ alɛɛ , ibu sɛkɛ ete lǝ edufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ” Nyamfo eto kamaa , kuutsyuǝ saa mensi kpe ɔkɔɛ nkǝ woatɔ Yesu kulesa tsya .
41012035	Lefenǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo ɔnlɛ Anantotiki bote mfóo , ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ afi eto bateasa bamǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Utidi wǝ Nlɛ Bubǝǝ , ábɔ utsyi Oka David eto kafo ?
41012036	Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ áwunsǝko Oka David átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Siǝ mfo lǝ mɔ kodiani isu ese lefe nǝ muutǝ efi fǝ akpa ǝtǝkǝ fǝ balo lǝ disinti . ” ’
41012037	Nyalɛ lǝ David kosate lǝ Utidi wǝ Nlɛ Bubǝ bokpo nkǝ wǝ Onamutee , nyalɛ ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ wǝ kosate loofo David eto kafo eto ubi budi ? ” Nya betidi kpǝ dínyǝ banlɛ etiki nnya Yesu nyǝ ɔnlɛ budi bɔnɔ ku disuǝyuǝ .
41012038	Se Yesu nlɛ betidi bamfó asa botee , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ afi eto bateasa ǝsuǝ . Baala awu kplɛ bokpe nya baala bɔyɛ kafe kaka betidi luunyǝ mǝ bǝsiǝsǝ ku dibu .
41012039	Bala nsiǝkɔ kplɛ busiǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ ku lǝ asakedikɔ .
41012040	Bǝlǝkǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ kɔhɔ . Kamaa , baalɛ mǝ bikǝ kafo . Nya bato kala kɛntsyɛɛ kate ǝsuǝ bǝ beyi Onanto . Mǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝbɔkɛ ale eso betidi fɛfɛ eto ale ! ”
41012041	Nya Yesu díkǝnǝ úsiǝ lǝ kedi kǝtǝkɔ lǝ Disumuyo kaka banlɛ atabi boko , nya únsi ɔnlɛ bobe kase betidi nlɛ bofe kesu kako asa . Batabinyǝ kpǝ áko atabi kpǝ .
41012042	Nya ɔkɔsiǝ okombo utsyuǝ tsya díbǝ ófe nya úfi atabi sɛkɛ úsu óko .
41012043	Nya Yesu lékpadi wǝ bakasebi utsyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , ɔkɔsiǝ okombo ǝmfo eto atabi nnya ókoo , édufǝ ǝnǝ eso nnya betidi bamfo kenke léko .
41012044	Sitintii , betidi bamfo kpe kɔni kalende . Fɛɛ nnya nte mǝ eto sɛkɛ ete baboko . Nya usionko ǝmfo alɛɛ , ite bǝ okombo ni tsyaa , ufi lesa nǝ ntǝ wǝ kenke úbǝ óko . Lesa nǝ ele bǝ wuufi oya lesa udii , nnya ni lesa nǝ úfi úbǝ óko mfo nɛ . ”
41013001	Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfóo , wǝ bakasebi eto ɔni átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be aba nnya laanɔ bobe mfo beefi báto diyo kplɛ nǝmfo ku kase baato nii ! Dianɔ bobe ! ”
41013002	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛlɔ bebe diyo kplɛ nǝmfo kukɔnɔ , itsyise aba nya béfi báto ni eto lɛɛ lɔni embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ ! Diyo nǝmfo kenke eboba lekpo lǝ kasɔ nnya aba nyamfó kenke looba isensǝ ekpo . ”
41013003	Yesu édu úsu úsiǝ lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini komǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mfóo , úsiǝ ɔnlɛ Disumuyo nǝmǝ bobe katsyese . Nya Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohanes ku Andreas hã díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
41013004	“ Onamute , dimamfe ayo nyamfó looba ? Tɛyi bo asa nnya luubǝ lǝ bote boǝ lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ nkomǝ eto asa nyamfo ebubǝ ? ”
41013005	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini , nya biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe .
41013006	Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ nya bɔɔtɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ mɔ ni nwǝ bákpo ɔhile ǝmǝ , ’ nya bɔɔwɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
41013007	Nya yenyifo mi bulǝ lǝ bɛnɔ ama eto kɔsɔ lǝ mi ɔflɔ nye lǝ katsyontsyokɔ . Ele bǝ asa nyamfo eto kakle bǝ . Tsya inni nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ eboyo .
41013008	Kasɔ ka ebotaka nka lema . Nya sekakedikɔ ka ebotaka nka lema . Nsɔ ebutinkǝ lǝ kalebe saa , nya kukpɛnsǝ luubǝ . Asa nyamfo ebuyifo fe kase kalefo lǝǝnǝ usionko .
41013009	“ Ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ lǝ mi kosate bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ . Boomuǝ mi bakpa mi besuko Yudafɔ eto beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Bɔɔblɛ mi lǝ ntsyakɔ . Boolǝkǝ mi bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ baka ku nsɔ eto beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi lǝ mɔ disi eso , nya biɔtɛyi mǝ ditiki itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
41013010	Tsya fɛ kalosǝkɔ luubǝǝ , yuubǝ bǝ batɛyi kawunsiǝ eto ǝsǝ kenke eto betidi Onanto eto ditiki nǝmfo .
41013011	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ mi besuko lekpokakpokɔɔ , biembu disi bɛtɔnsǝ itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayoo , lǝ bɛtɛyi ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lookpe mi kɛnyɛ nkǝ bɛtɛyi . Itsyise inni mi kosate lǝǝbǝ etiki budi . Bomu Onanto eto Lɛwɔni loote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi .
41013012	“ Ɔyimi ebudu ɔyimi utǝ bǝ balo . Nya antomǝ tsya luuyifo nko ke ku mǝ bebi . Bebi ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ antomǝ ǝsuǝ bedu mǝ bǝtǝ bǝ balo .
41013013	Bookisi mi lǝ mɔ disi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luunyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese kalosǝkɔɔ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ kotonǝne ko bǝtsyǝ itǝ babuayifo ǝsuǝ .
41013014	“ Mɔmɔɔ , bifǝ ato lǝ bɛlɔ bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ . Lǝ binyǝ lesa nǝ Onanto leekisi nlɛ bubǝ lǝ wǝ Disumuyo kɛnkɛ , ka nlɛ mfo kɔfiɔ bokpe nya dimanle bǝ ɛkɛ mfoo , betidi ba nkpe lǝ Yuda tsyetsyi besu babiɔ lǝ atini ǝsuǝ .
41013015	Nwǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ditsya ǝsuǝǝ , mensi bu disi nkǝ woayifǝ ubǝ ufi kulesa lǝ wǝ diyo .
41013016	Utsyuǝ wǝ nńyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ membu disi nkǝ wǝǝsinkli ubǝ oto nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi wǝ kafia .
41013017	Lefe nǝmfó ebɔkɛ ale tinti itǝ besionko ba ni bafondɛ , nye mba nlɛ bebisambi ba nlɛ bɔyimi .
41013018	Bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa bǝ lefe nǝmǝ mǝntǝkǝ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe !
41013019	Itsyise bulǝ bo luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ǝbɔkɛ ale leso mbo ke díkǝbǝ bófe saa idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ibǝ ese mi eto lefe nǝmfo . Nya bulǝ bomfo eto okle ensiembubǝ inyǝ kulefe .
41013020	Fɛɛ Onanto ǝbɔtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu . Itsyise lenni nkoo , kuutsyuǝ saa embubu usiǝ . Tsya lǝ wǝ betidi ba úkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , wuulǝkǝ lefe nǝmǝ ubu .
41013021	“ Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ atɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ Kristo mfo , ’ nye utsyuǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ wǝ nkpe mmǝǝ , ’ mamfo anɔ !
41013022	Itsyise mba luuyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ fe Kristo nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidii , kpǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ . Booyifo ayanisa kpǝ ku asa nnya nkpe sikpi , itǝ bǝ lǝ boofoo , bɔɔwɛ Onanto eto betidi ba úkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ taa kɔ kulaa tsya bakpe .
41013023	Nyaso bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ ! Ńtɛyi mi lesa saa ntɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
41013024	“ Nya lǝ eyi nnya luutǝkǝ lǝ bulǝ bomfo eto kamaa , ‘ kofe ǝmbofa bio , nya kofande tsya lembuyǝnde .
41013025	Befandebi ebuyifo fe bofankli bɛnlɛ ketsyi kato kǝbǝ kasɔ , nya kato eto asa kenke luutinkǝ . ’
41013026	“ Lefe nǝmfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mɛ , Utidi Eto Ubi , nlɛ bubǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ . Nya muubǝ ku Onanto eto ǝsuǝale lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
41013027	Nya mootsyese mɔ kato eto batɔnkpe kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ lǝ nsu nlǝkǝ mɔ betidi ba mínkǝlǝkǝ míntsyǝ itsyi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto lekpake nǝmfo isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ ka nse .
41013028	“ Bekase asa itsyi lǝ koto ǝsuǝ . Lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ se kuyi komfó lɛ afanto fɔfɔ bulǝkǝǝ , eté mi bǝ kasɔmite ǝbɔfi .
41013029	Nko ke lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ asa nnya míntɛyi mi mfo lɛ kasɔ butsyǝ ku bubǝǝ , ete biote biǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kalosǝkɔ ǝbɔfi nnya ikǝbǝ eyo fǝ kǝsiǝ pɛɛ !
41013030	Sitinti nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ itǝ fɛ efe nǝmfo eto betidi luukpǝ balo .
41013031	Kato ku kasɔ kenke ebubǝ kafe . Fɛɛ mɔ ditiki embubǝ lefe kulefe .
41013032	“ Tsyaa , kuutsyuǝ saa enyi diyi nye lefe nǝ asa nyamfo luubǝ itǝ , Onanto eto batɔnkpe ku mɔ , Onanto eto Ubi kulaa tsya enyi , enso mɔ Anto hã nyi .
41013033	Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itsyise binyi lefe nǝ nyamfó luubǝ itǝ .
41013034	Mɔ bubǝ ebuutsyǝ fe kase osani utsyuǝ luudu lǝ wǝ umǝ nkǝ wǝǝsu kusu , nya óyani wǝ beyifoyifo utsyǝ lǝ diyo . Útǝ utsyuǝ saa keyifo ka wuukeyifo . Nnya kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ laase wǝ diyo nkǝ ɔlɔ ose wǝ diyo kekleke .
41013035	“ Nko kǝ ele bǝ mi tsya muǝ ǝsuǝ binyǝ . Itsyise binnyi lefe nǝ mi Oyosate luubǝ udufǝ . Yoofo bubǝ bǝ wuubǝ ku kakɔmi lefe , nye ntsyetsyi , nye kolensiǝnto kplɛ ko bekusɛ lǝǝtǝ kɛnyɛ , nye olesiǝ .
41013036	Lǝ ibǝ bǝ ubǝ ofuaa , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ ubǝ unyǝ mi bɛnlɛ selabe .
41013037	Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mfoo , nlɛ nnya bɔtɛyi itǝ betidi ba ta . Nnya ni bǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ . ”
41014001	Ibu eyi ǝnuǝ fɛ lǝ Yudafɔ lǝ bedi mǝ eyi nnya baakpo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila ku Nnamfokuã Eto Abolo Eto Eyi , nyna beefi kakloma mǝ budu lǝ Egipte . Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó békebu disi lǝ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ kalɔkalɔ bǝmuǝ Yesu balo .
41014002	Bátɛyi lǝ mǝ nti bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko lǝ eyisɛ nyamǝ eto lefe . Itsyise lenni nkoo , betidi ebunyǝ ɔblɔ bataka bǝńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ibǝ ekpe bule . ”
41014003	Yesu ésu Betania eto umǝ lǝ Simon wǝ díkefi bufisia únyǝ eto diyo . Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu nsi mfó ɔ́nlɛ lesa budii , usionko utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi eto dituntu nǝ baakpo alabasta ǝbǝ mfó . Baakpo nnuǝbi bomfó , bo lefo koya tintii bǝ naadi . Usionko ǝmfo ásini dituntu nǝmǝ nya ɔ́wuninsǝ nnuǝbi bomǝ ókpo Yesu lǝ disi .
41014004	Nyamfo ǝlǝ betidi ba díńyǝ mfó . Nya kafo lɛnyi mǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso woabiasǝ nnuǝbi bomfo nko ?
41014005	Eni ofo mu bote kǝnyǝ fe lɛlɛ wɔlɔlɔ eto kayo , ufi usu utǝ bakombo . ” Nyaso béyǝnki bákpe wǝ bákpo wǝ kudu .
41014006	Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beyani wǝ kpoo ! Be so biayani wǝ lǝ bɛyɛ wǝ bulǝ ? Lesa sɛɛ úyifo útǝ mɛ .
41014007	Bakombo kpe mi lenti lefe saa . Nya biofo mǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ lefe nǝ ke beela . Mɔ alɛɛ , inni lefe saa mɔɔkɛ mi lenti .
41014008	Usionko ǝmfo éyifo lesa nǝ wofo buyifo . Úfi nnuǝbi bomfo ókpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́lɔ mɛ utsyǝ itǝ muukpǝ fɛ buubikǝ mɛ .
41014009	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kaka ke boobe Onanto eto ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , bɔɔtɛyi nnya usionko ǝmfo tsya díyifo mfo kefi kakloma wǝ . ”
41014010	Nyaso Yuda Iskariot wǝ ni Yesu eto bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔnii , ésu besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ woote Yesu udi utǝ mǝ .
41014011	Ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ mǝ tinti se bánɔ etiki nnya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ , nya mǝ tsya lɛtɛyi bǝ buutǝ wǝ atabi . Nyaso Yuda ákabɛbɛ kusu ko wɔɔnyɛ ote mǝ kase boomuǝ wǝ .
41014012	Lǝ diyi tutɛ lǝ Nnamfokuã eto Diyididi nǝ baalo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila Eto Asamubi lǝ mǝ lekpa ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se faala fǝ bɔlɔ butsyǝ itǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛ nǝmǝ eto budi ? ”
41014013	Nyaso Yesu ǝlǝkǝ bakasebi inuǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi bisu umǝnkpɛ ǝmǝ nya biotsyako utsyuǝ wǝ ntsyi ntu ku ɔlɔtsyi . Bitǝkǝko wǝ bisu diyo nǝ ǝsuǝ wuudufǝ .
41014014	Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi Oyosate ǝmǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Oteasa ǝmǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , te bo diyo nǝ kafo wonko wǝ bakasebi luubǝ bedi mǝ lesa lǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila Eto Diyisɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
41014015	Mfóo , woote mi diyo nǝ lɛmɔ kafo lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto abanslo kaka bálɔ asa bǝtsyǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ bo . ”
41014016	Bakasebi bamfo édu búsu umǝ , nya bǝnyǝ lesa saa fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya béyifo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila ǝmfo eto lesa nǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
41014017	Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ésu mfó .
41014018	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bénsi bánlɛ búdii , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi ɔni wǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ kedi lesa mfoo , ebote mɛ udi . ”
41014019	Ditiki nǝmfo éyifo mǝ buɛɛ ku sikpi , nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔtɔ ɔni , ɔni , bǝnkǝ , “ Sitinti , nyi miǝ inni mɔ ni fanlɛ , lee mɔ ni ? ”
41014020	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi lefosi inuǝ eto ɔni ni . Nya ni bǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni mfo kedi .
41014021	Mɔ , wǝǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi ebukpǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ ilǝ mɛ itǝ futsyǝ ǝmǝ itsyise woǝbǝ ohiã bunyǝ fefe . Lǝ nnya ete bánle utsyǝ ǝmfóo , eni yɔɔlɛkɛ eso ! ”
41014022	Lǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bánlɛ lesa búdii , Yesu éfi abolo ǝtsyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ úkasɔ Onanto anii , úbudi nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya úsie ni útǝ wǝ bakasebi . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo nyamfo lǝ bidi . Nyamfo ni mɔ usuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . ”
41014023	Nya úfi lɛkɔbe ku nte , nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto anii , úfi útǝ mǝ nya bǝnǝ .
41014024	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni mɔ kɔtɔ ko muufi ntǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi , ko Onanto luufi uyifo ketsyue fɔfɔ lǝ wǝ ku wǝ betidi eto nti .
41014025	Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mensiǝmbunǝ nte fɔfɔ bomfo bio , isu ese lefe nǝ muunǝ nte fɔfɔ bomfo eto okle lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
41014026	Nya bése kusǝ béfi bátɛsǝ Onanto nya bédu bésu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini .
41014027	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Mi utsyuǝ saa ebutsyetsyi óyani mɛ utsyǝ . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ ‘ Moolo nwǝ laase basamu bamǝ , nya wǝ basamu luusǝnsǝ . ’
41014028	Fɛɛ lǝ ntaka ntsyi lǝ ɔkɔmǝ mbǝǝ , mɔɔtɔ mi nsu Galilea . ”
41014029	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛ mǝmbutsyetsyi ndu fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ kulefe , lǝ ibǝ bǝ bafɛfɛ kenke ebuyifo nko kulaa tsya . ”
41014030	Yesu átɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝ lǝ kǝtsyǝ kamfoo , fǝ kosate ǝbɔni mɛ sitsyǝ . ”
41014031	Petro esi óse wǝ uyi óka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝnkǝ balo bonko fǝ tsyaa , mǝmbɔni fǝ ntɛyi minkǝ minyi fǝ . ” Nnya ke wǝ bakasebi bamǝ tsya lɛtɛyi nɛ .
41014032	Nya bédu Getsemane . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bisiǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo lǝ nsu nto ola . ”
41014033	Nya ókpa Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohanes ɔ́yɛnko . Nya se lesa nǝ nlɛ wǝ bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nlɛ wǝ bulǝ esoo ,
41014034	ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wininsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo lɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ utu ku kanyinyǝnyǝ itǝ ukpǝ . Bianlabe selabe . Bińyǝ bisǝkǝ mɛ mfo . ”
41014035	Se ɔ́nyi úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛɛ , ókpo lǝ kasɔ nya óto ola ɔ́lɛ wǝ anto lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Lǝ yuuyifo fǝ lelabii , nyalɛ tǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ bofe mɛ . ”
41014036	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , Onanto ! Aafo lesa saa buyifo . Lǝ aalaa , nyalɛ takasǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Tsya inni lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ bomu lǝ fǝ lele ǝsuǝ . ”
41014037	Lefe nǝ úsinkli úbǝ wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔɔ , úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe . Nya ɔ́tɔ Simon Petro nkǝ , “ Simon , selabe fanlɛɛ ? Ǝmbofo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni kplon tsya ete ? ”
41014038	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ bisiǝ bikato ola bǝ biǝmbudufǝ lǝ botoo kabe ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛ bola , fɛɛ ǝsuǝale ǝmbǝ . ”
41014039	Úsinkli úsu bio nkǝ weesu oto ola fe ditutɛ ke .
41014040	Úsinkli úbǝ wǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ bio nya usi úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ besi bálɛ selabe . Bánlɛ mǝ ǝnǝmi bofo buminkli . Nya bánte lesa nǝ bɔtɛyi wǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
