41014041	Se úsinkli úbǝ ditsyǝfǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bola bela biǝ bialabe bitsyǝ ɔnwɛ ? Isiǝ , betaka ! Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo . Bebe ! Ubǝ mɔ , Onanto eto Ubi , bufi kakpe babuayifo eto ani . Bebe mǝǝ , se baankpee kusu banlɛ bubǝ .
41014042	Betaka lǝ busu botsyako mǝ . Bebe nwǝ dífi mɛ ókpe mǝ lǝ ani nlɛ bubǝǝ . ”
41014043	Mǝ ku Yesu si bǝńyǝ mfó bálɛ etiki fɛ Yuda wǝ ni lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni díbǝ . Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ ǝmǝ eto beninǝ kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ bǝbǝ . Bétsyi keyi ku nlanle .
41014044	Nwǝ dídu wǝ útǝ mfóo , ébɔtɛyi betidi bamfo utsyǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ biunyǝ muusiǝsǝ mfiɔ lǝ kolaa , wǝ ni nwǝ ǝmǝ nɛ . Bimuǝ wǝ , lǝ bekpa wǝ bidunko . ”
41014045	Nyaso se Yuda lɛyɛ úsu útu Yesu , ókpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa ! ” Nya ɔ́fiɔ wǝ lǝ kola .
41014046	Nyaso bǝmuǝ Yesu nya bákɔbe wǝ kekleke .
41014047	Nya mba díńyǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ eto ɔni dílǝkǝ wǝ kalanle nya óla Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto odomunyǝ eto koto .
41014048	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bitsyi keyi ku nlanle fɛ lǝ bibǝ bimuǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuale ǝsuǝ fe uyu mini ?
41014049	Bo ku mi ete lɛkɛ lǝ Disumuyo mfó diyi saa , nya minkɛ mfó mínkate Anantotiki nyamǝ mfó tsya bíǝmmuǝ mɛ . Bǝ lǝ kase Onanto eto Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝǝ , lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
41014050	Nya wǝ bakasebi kenke dítsyetsyi báyani wǝ bǝtsyǝ .
41014051	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ mfoo , okosobi utsyuǝ wǝ nti kafia ǝsuǝ ntǝkǝko wǝǝ , ǝnyǝ lesa nǝ kenke díbǝ . Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ála lǝ bǝmuǝ okosobi ǝmfo . Fɛ ini wǝ kafia ete bákɔbe , nya ɔ́kpɔ
41014052	ɔ́bɔ mǝ lǝ ani . Nya útsyǝtsyi údu leyaleya . Nya óyani wǝ kafia ókpe mǝ lǝ ani .
41014053	Nya bákpa Yesu bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto diyo . Mfó nya besumunyǝ beninǝ bamǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa létsya bénsi . Mǝ ni Yudafɔ eto beninǝ .
41014054	Petro ǝtǝkǝko mǝ kama kama nya úsu údufǝ lǝ usumunyǝ ninǝ eto diyo nǝmǝ . Nya úsu úsiǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ ɔ́nlɛ ute bɔyifǝ .
41014055	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ kenke ba dísiǝ mfó ákplatsya babe lǝ boofo kabua kǝtsyuǝ bunyǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ lǝ bayɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ balo . Tsya bámfo kabua saa bunyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
41014056	Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bedi etiki bátɛyi bidia lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , tsyaa mba díbǝ eto etiki áta ibu lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
41014057	Nya bǝtsyuǝ létaka bátɛyi nya bála wǝ kɛnyɛ bǝnkǝ ,
41014058	“ Bɔnɔ bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mooba Onanto eto Disumuyo nǝ báto mfo , tsya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli nto lebamba nǝ bémfi betidi eto ani báto . ’ ”
41014059	Fɛɛ mǝ tsya eto etikididi mánkate ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ale .
41014060	Usumunyǝ ninǝ kenke átaka úńyǝ lǝ mǝ nti nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Anlɛ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɔ bɔnɔ ? Embutǝ mbuayɛ ? Be nkpe fǝ fɔɔtɛyi ? ”
41014061	Tsya Yesu édi bi , wémfǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi kulesa . Usumunyǝ ninǝ kenke ǝmfo esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ mǝ Bákpo Ɔhile , Onanto ǝmǝ boatɛsǝ eto Ubi ? ”
41014062	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni . Nya biuunyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi se unsi lǝ Ǝsuǝaletidi Onanto eto kodiani . Nya biunyǝ se unsi lǝ asɔmiloku utsyi kato ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
41014063	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó tututuu , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo kosate ko léfuadi wǝ awu ku lɛblɔfi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝnkǝ bee ? Badansiɛ sa nńsife itǝ bo bio itsyi lǝ mba ńyǝ mfo kama !
41014064	Údi mbusiotiki úńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ! Ntsyǝ binyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? ” Nya mǝmblɛ lɛtɔnɔ bálo wǝ dikpi bǝ ele bǝ ukpǝ .
41014065	Mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ étsyiko ntufǝ butufǝ kákpo Yesu . Nya bákle wǝ ǝnǝmi nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔsɔ . Nya bánlɛ wǝ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo futsyǝ lɛsɔ fǝ ! ” Nya bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ lékpa Yesu bédunko , nya básɔ wǝ lǝ atosi .
41014066	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Petro ébubǝ úsi lǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ eto diyo fɛ usiobi wǝ nkpe wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ díbǝ .
41014067	Lefe nǝ únyǝ Petro nsi lǝ uté ɔflɔ ɔnlɛ wǝ bɔyifǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya ébutǝkǝko Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ ǝnyǝ ! ”
41014068	Nya Petro dítudi kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bee ? Mánnɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo eto kasɔ ! ” Nya ótaka údu úsu úńyǝ lǝ kesiǝ ɔflɔ . Kase óyo kǝsiǝ kamǝ ko ukusǝ ko dítǝ kɛnyɛ .
41014069	Usiobi ǝmfo esi úbǝ mfó úbǝ óbe wǝ , nya usi útsyiko betidi ba díńyǝ mfó bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Osani ǝmfo eyifo mǝ nti eto ɔni ! ”
41014070	Tsya Petro esi útudi kɛnyɛ nko ke . Yanklɛ fɛ mba ńyǝ mfó lɛtɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ ani fǝ enni mǝ ɔni , itsyise fintsya etsyi Galilea eto kasɔ . ”
41014071	Nya Petro léfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ Onanto bǝ lǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyii , lǝ unǝ mɛ koto ! Minyi utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko mfo ! ”
41014072	Lamfolamfo , ukusɛ ko disi útǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝ , nya Petro lékloma nkǝ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝǝ , ǝbutudi kɛnyɛ sitsyǝ fǝ enyi mɛ . ” Nya ílǝ Petro lǝ utu nya úwi keku .
41015001	Olesiǝnto ǝmfóo , besumunyǝ ninǝ , átsya ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko kenke . Se béfi nsusu lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝ ku kase bɔɔyɛ ku nnya . Bákle Yesu nya bákpa wǝ bésuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ itǝ Romafɔ eto Aba wǝ baakpo Pilato ɔflɔ .
41015002	Mfóo , Pilato átɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ? ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ee , lǝ kase fanlɛ bɔtɛyi . ”
41015003	Besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ála etiki kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ Yesu .
41015004	Nyaso Pilato esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ǝmbulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ etiki saa ǝsuǝ ? Tsyue koto lanɔ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
41015005	Tsya , Yesu ménsitɛyi kulesa , nyaso íyifo Pilato yanii !
41015006	Lefe saa lǝ eyo nkomǝ eto diyididi ǝsuǝǝ , íyifo Pilato eto lekpa nǝ ókayani betidi bua ba bákpe lǝ diyo eto ɔni wǝ bála kǝtǝ mǝ .
41015007	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , bǝmuǝ osani wǝ baakpo Baraba bákpe le diyo . Úyifo futsyǝ lɛkɛ lǝ betidi ba létaka bǝnyǝ lǝ Romafɔ eto Aba ǝsuǝ nti . Nya lǝ kudu ko bákpo bǝlǝ betidi ku betidi ba bálo esoo , bǝmuǝ wǝ ku mba dítǝkǝko wǝ bákpe lǝ a Aba eto diyo .
41015008	Nyaso se betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , bátɛyi Pilato bǝnkǝ okloma kase wǝǝnyǝ mba baakpe lǝ ayo kaminsǝ fe kase wókala buyifo lɛlɛ saa .
41015009	Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bela biǝnkǝ nyani Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ntǝ mi ? ”
41015010	Pilato átɔ mǝ nko itsyise óte nkǝ kekisi ǝsuǝ eso besumunyǝ ninǝ lékpa Yesu báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
41015011	Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ lídi betidi bamǝ bákpe bǝnkǝ bátɛyi Pilato bǝnkǝ , óyani Baraba bomu utǝ mǝ .
41015012	Pilato esi údi betidi eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ etiki nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be bela biǝ nyifo ku utidi ǝmǝ biakpo biǝ Yudafɔ eto Oka mfo ? ”
41015013	Nya báfa bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
41015014	Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kabua ka úyifo eso ? ” Tsya , mǝmblɛ esi báfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
41015015	Se Pilato léla nkǝ weeyifo lǝ mǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ esoo , óyani Baraba útǝ mǝ . Nya útǝ béfi kekuefiofio báblɛ Yesu , nya úfi wǝ ókpe lǝ bamamanyǝ eto ani nkǝ besu basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
41015016	Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ákpa Yesu bésuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ eto diyo nya bákpadi bamamanyǝ fɛfɛ bǝ bǝbǝ mfó .
41015017	Nya béfi kafia sia eto awu bákpe Yesu fe Oka nya béyifo biyu eto lekpakpa béti wǝ lǝ disi fe lekankpakpa .
41015018	Nya banlɛ wǝ kɔfiɔ bokpe ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , ! Yudafɔ eto Oka lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ kɛntsyɛɛ ! ”
41015019	Básɔ wǝ lǝ disi ku lekete nya bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya báse akonki lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bákpe disi kasɔ ku dibu bǝtǝ wǝ .
41015020	Se bǝmǝ wǝ nya bákpe wǝ kofani bálosǝǝ , bǝlǝkǝ awu sia nyamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bésinkliko nnya ókpe kɔ bákpe wǝ . Nya bákpa wǝ bésuko kaka bɔsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
41015021	Lefe nǝ bántɔɔ , bátsyako osani wǝ baakpo Simon wǝ ditsyi dibutu ɔ́ntɔ lǝ Yerusalem . Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamǝ áhiɛ wǝ bǝnkǝ ɔwunsǝko Yesu lǝ utsyinko wǝ uyikabie ǝmǝ . Simon ǝmfó etsyi Sireni eto kasɔ , nya wǝ bebi ni Aleksandra ku Rufo .
41015022	Bákpa Yesu bésuko kaka baakpo Ditidisikɔbe .
41015023	Mfó bǝtǝ wǝ nte bo bátsyakasǝ ku kofa ko loobokosǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamǝ kasɔ bǝ unǝ , fɛɛ Yesu áni wǝnǝǝ .
41015024	Nnya kamaa , bamamanyǝ bamǝ ásɔ wǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya béfi afetu bákpo básɛ lǝ bate lekpa nǝ luutu utsyuǝ saa fɛ bésense awu nyamǝ bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
41015025	Básɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ lǝ olesiǝ ǝmfó eto abombo ɔwɔnɔmbǝ lefe .
41015026	Nya báwɔni asa lɛ otabo kɛkɛ ǝsuǝ básɔ lǝ wǝ disi kato nnya nlɛ bote lesa nǝ eso bálo wǝ ni bǝnkǝ , “ Ǝnyǝ Yudafɔ Eto Oka . ”
41015027	Nya básɔ beyu inuǝ tsya lǝ eyi ǝsuǝ báwunsǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Ɔni áfaka lǝ wǝ kodiani eto kutsyǝ nya ɔni tsya léfaka lǝ kǝmǝni .
41015028	
41015029	Mba kenke lɛyɛ mfó bafe étinkǝsǝ mǝ esi bákpe Yesu kɔfiɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛhɛɛ ! Inni fǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ eboba bo Disumuyo kplɛ akpo lǝ kasɔ esinkli ato kǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ kɛɛ ?
41015030	Yifǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko ukpǝ eto ani lǝ bobe ! ”
41015031	Nko kǝ basumufɔ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bamǝ tsya dímǝ wǝ bátɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Úlǝkǝ betidi bamba utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ wembofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ ketsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ !
41015032	Lǝ wǝ baakpo Israelfɔ eto oka , wǝ ni Kristo ǝmǝǝ , wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ sitintii , ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ɔyifǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ubǝ kasɔ bǝ lǝ bofo bɔnɔ ! ” Betidi inuǝ ba básɔ bafakasǝ lǝ eyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Yesu mfóo , tsya áka wǝ .
41015033	Se éyo kakɔmi lefee , kasɔ mfó kenke ko léna . Nya ítsyǝ nko ísu ése abombo etsyǝ .
41015034	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Eli , Eli , lama sabaktani ? ” Etiki nyamfo eto kasɔ ni bǝ , “ Mɔ Onanto , mɔ Onanto ! Beso fáyani mɛ fǝtsyǝ ? ”
41015035	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi , nya bátɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , “ Ɔlɛ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia bokpadi . ”
41015036	Mǝ ɔni étsyetsyi úsu úfi okosa wǝ bákpe lǝ ntǝ eto sonkpe ǝsuǝ nya óbesǝ wǝ kato ku uyi útǝ Yesu nkǝ unǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi bafɛfɛ nkǝ , “ Bińyǝ lǝ bobe ! Bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia ebubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ uyikabie komfo ǝsuǝ ! ”
41015037	Nya Yesu léfa bembembe nya úkpǝ .
41015038	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ tutuutuu , kafia kplɛ ka léfakanya kéti Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke eto ǝnǝmii , léfuadi lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ itsyii kato ibǝ kasɔ .
41015039	Nya se omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lɛnɔ Yesu eto bofa nya únyǝ kase úkpǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitinti utidi ǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto Ubi . ”
41015040	Besionko bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ bákabe . Maria Magdalene ku Salome ku Maria nwǝ eto bebi ni Yakobo kɛkɛ ku Yosef , akɛ mǝ lenti .
41015041	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Galileaa , mǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ bákawunsǝ ko wǝ nɛ . Besionko bamba kpǝ ba dítǝkǝko wǝ bésu Yerusalem tsya ǝńyǝ mfó .
41015042	Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ lǝ diyi nǝ bǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ kofe edufǝ diyoo , lǝ bedi Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto diyi . Nya se kale nlɛ boloo ,
41015043	Yudafɔ eto okponkpo ɔni wǝ baakpo Yosef wǝ ditsyi Arimatea eto uninǝ , ákpe ɔkɔɛ úsu únyǝ Pilato . Yosef éyifo Yudafɔ eto Uninǝ kplɛ wǝ lɛkɛ dibu nya úkabe kusu itǝ Onanto eto Sekakedidi eto bubǝ . Se óyo Pilato ɔflɔɔ , ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ utǝ wǝ kusu lǝ usu ulǝkǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ usu ubikǝ fɛ lǝ eyo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝmǝ .
41015044	Se Pilato lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu ébukpǝ kokoo , íyifo wǝ naa . Nyaso ókpadi wǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ etsyuesa nyamfó eto kɛnyɛ , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ lǝ sitinti ini bǝ Yesu ébukpǝ koko .
41015045	Nya se uninǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ ɔnukualɛ inii , Pilato ǝtǝ Yosef kusu nkǝ usu ulǝkǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
41015046	Nya Yosef dísu úlǝkǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ nya úfi kafia kpaa fɔfɔ ka óya úmli wǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ kudi ko bǝlǝkǝ lǝ koba kǝmiǝ bǝtsyǝ koko lǝ kɔtini ɔflɔ . Nya útǝ nkǝ baminansǝ leba kplɛ lɔni beti lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
41015047	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Maria Magdalene ku Maria wǝ ni Yosef eto ambe ǝńyǝ mfó nya bábe kaka bébikǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
41016001	Kǝsiǝsǝ eto ditsyitsyoo , lefe nǝ békedi Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bálosǝǝ , Maria Magdalene ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo eto ambe ku Salome ésu báya nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi bǝnkǝ beesu bediki Yesu eto ɔkɔ .
41016002	Nyaso se kale dísiǝ kɔsida eto olesiǝǝ , bátaka bésu kudi komǝ eti .
41016003	Se bántɔɔ , bákatɔ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe buunyǝ lɔminansǝ leba kplɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ utǝ bo ? ” Bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ nko itsyise leba nǝmǝ amɔ tinti . Nya se bésu bédufǝ mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ futsyǝ ébubǝ ɔ́minansǝ leba nǝmǝ lǝ mfó .
41016004	
41016005	Nyaso se bédufǝ kudi komǝ kafoo , bǝnyǝ okosobi utsyuǝ se únsi lǝ kodiani . Nya ónkpe awu nnya diflubi futututu ! Difufu ǝmuǝ mǝ .
41016006	Nya okosobi ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Nyi minkǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ , nwǝ básɔ báfakǝsǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Umbǝ mfo ! Ótaka okpe nkpǝ ! Bebe ! Mfo bálabesǝ wǝ nɛ .
41016007	Nyaso bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi ku Petro tsya biǝnkǝ , ‘ Yesu tɔ mi sɛtɔ , ɔtɔ lǝ Galilea . Mfó ti biunyǝ wǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi mi utsyǝ . ’ ”
41016008	Nyamfo ákpe besionko bamǝ difufu , nya bédu lǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ ku ketinkǝ , bánte lesa nǝ beeyifo , nya bákpe etsyi ani . Kase bánkpe lǝ kusu bántɔɔ , bántɛyi kuutsyuǝ kulesa , itsyise sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ .
41016009	Se Yesu létaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ Kɔsida komfo eto olesiǝǝ , utidi tutɛ wǝ úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte ni Maria Magdalenyǝ , nwǝ ǝsuǝ óla awɔnɔ bua akuanse utsyiko lǝ lefe nǝ ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
41016010	Úsu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu eto bayɛtsyuǝ ba nlɛ nku buwi lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝmǝ eso .
41016011	Nya se Maria lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ Yesu kpe nkpǝ nya únyǝ wǝǝ , bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
41016012	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte bakasebi inuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu bántɔ . Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ betsyǝ lekpo mlǝ .
41016013	Kama se bésu bátee , bésinkli bésu bátɛyi bafɛfɛ . Tsyaa , mbamǝ mámfo mǝ bánɔ .
41016014	Fɛfɛfɛɛ , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ lefosi bakasebi ɔnwɛ lǝ lefe nǝ bénsi bánlɛ budi . Nyaso únyenki ókpe mǝ lǝ kase mǝ bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale , nya betidi ato fefe , se bamfó betidi ba díkǝnyǝ wǝ se ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ bofo kanɔ .
41016015	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ bebe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ditsya bitǝ betidi ba kenke .
41016016	Utidi wǝ lefo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ɔnɔ nya utǝ bǝǝflǝsǝ wǝ ntuu , Onanto ebufi wǝ abua ɔtsyǝ wǝ . Nya utidi wǝ dimamfo ɔnɔɔ , Onanto embofo wǝ .
41016017	Nya Onanto ebutǝ bafokanɔfɔ lǝ mɛɛ , ǝsuǝale beyifo ayanisa kpǝ . Boola awɔnɔ bua lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ . Bɔɔtɛyi belebele kpǝ bia benyi .
41016018	Nya lǝ bǝmuǝ owa nye bǝnǝ kenii , yembuyifo mǝ kabua saa . Lǝ bǝtǝkǝ befimfi anii , boomuǝ ale . ”
41016019	Lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu dídi mǝ etiki ólosǝ mfó eto kamaa , Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato kaka wuunsi lǝ kakplɛkɔ lǝ wǝ Anto ɔflɔ lǝ kodiani .
41016020	Nya wǝ batɔnkpe létsyilama nlebe saa kenke bátɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Nya Onamute ǝmǝ dísiǝ ko mǝ ɔ́wunsǝko mǝ nya béyifo ayanisa nnya lete bǝ mǝ ditiki nǝmǝ eyifo ɔnukualɛ ɛyɛ lǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya béyifo ǝsuǝ .
42001001	Mɔ ɔyimisani Tiofilo , betidi kpǝ ákplatsya kase boofo , lǝ bawɔni lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bo nti bǝtsyǝ .
42001002	Báwɔni nnya fe kase betidi ba dínyǝ asa nyamfó lɛtɛyi bo idu lǝ nnya kasɔ ketsyikokɔ nya bábe Onanto eto Ditiki nǝmǝ letsya báte tsya .
42001003	Nyaso , Tiofilo lala , se míndufǝ lǝ asa nyamfo mínto nnya mímbe kenke idu lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke esoo , mfi nsusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ minkǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ nwɔni asa nyamfo lǝ ekpa ɛyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ mfi ntǝ fǝ .
42001004	Nlɛ nyamfo buyifo nko bǝ lǝ ǝnyǝ ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ bǝ lǝ ate asa nnya báte fǝ .
42001005	Lǝ lefe nǝ Herodes lídi seka lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto eto usumunyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Sakaria akɛ mfó . Ɔ́bɔ utsyi lǝ besumunyǝ ba lǝǝtǝ kedi eto ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Abia ǝsuǝ . Sakaria eto usiǝ wǝ baakpo Elisabet tsya ábɔ utsyi lǝ Onanto eto Usumunyǝ wǝ baakpo Aaron éto kafo ǝsuǝ .
42001006	Usǝ ku usiǝ bamfo ǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . Nya béyifo lǝ wǝ afi kenke ǝsuǝ kukunɔ .
42001007	Ubi saa mankɛ mǝ , itsyise Elisabet anle . Nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ tsya ébobe báfe .
42001008	Diyi lɔnii , Sakaria akɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ ɔlɛ wǝ Kesumuyifo buyifo itsyise wǝ ditsyukpa ítu .
42001009	Nya lǝ mǝ kesumu eto lekpa ǝsuǝǝ , bákpo básɛ bǝnyǝ bǝ Sakaria ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ ítǝkǝ . Nyaso wǝ ni nwǝ bǝlǝkǝ bǝ usu otonsǝ elufui utǝ Onanto lǝ Kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya údufǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ .
42001010	Nya lefe nǝ ɔkɛ mfó ɔnlɛ elufui botonsǝǝ , betidi fɛfɛ ǝńyǝ lǝ lekple balɛ ola boto .
42001011	Mfó Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ kaka ɔnlɛ elufui botonsǝ eto sediani dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ .
42001012	Se Sakaria dínyǝ wǝǝ , óyakla nya óte sikpi tinti .
42001013	Fɛɛ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe emfó átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sakaria , mante sikpi ! Onanto ánɔ fǝ olatoto , nya fǝ usiǝ Elisabet ebole ubisaibi utǝ fǝ . Nya fuutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝnkǝ Yohanes .
42001014	Lǝ wǝ bole ǝsuǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Nko ke tsya betidi kpǝ luunyǝ disuǝyuǝ nɛ .
42001015	Woofiani utidi kplɛ lǝ Bonamute eto ǝnǝmi . Yanle bǝ unǝ ntǝ bo nkpe ale nye ntǝ saa eto okle tsya . Nya idu lǝ wǝ lelefee , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebusiǝ ko wǝ .
42001016	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Israel bebi ebusinkli bǝbǝ mǝ Onamute Onanto ɔflɔ .
42001017	Wǝ ni nwǝ lɔɔtɔ Bonamute eto bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ku utu bokpe ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia dítsyǝ . Nya wuutǝ diyuǝ luubǝ bebi ku antomǝ nti . Nya wuunǝ koto tsyuetsyue okpe lǝ betidi ba ditidi ato ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bekefi nsusu sɛɛ bayɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ Bonamute eto betidi lǝ bǝsiǝ bakabe kusu itǝ wǝ bubǝ . ”
42001018	Mfó nya Sakaria lɛtɔ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfó nkǝ , “ Be luutǝ bǝ mfo nyamfo nnɔ ? Itsyise mbobe mfiani uninǝsǝ nya mɔ usiǝ tsya díkafiani uninǝsiǝ . ”
42001019	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni Gabriel wǝ lǝǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Wǝ létsyese mɛ nkǝ ntɛyi fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo .
42001020	Fɛɛ ámamfo mɔ kɛnyɛ eto dikiti nǝmfo ánɔ . Ite bǝ ámamfo anɔ tsyaa , yuubǝ itǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto dítsyue útsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Se fámamfo ánɔ eso ebofiani ɔmumu isu ese lefe nǝ diyi nǝmǝ léyo fɛ fǝ odiakami looyankli edi etiki . ”
42001021	Lǝ lefe nǝ asa nyamfo kenke díbǝǝ , íyifo betidi ba kenke díńyǝ bensekǝ Sakaria lǝ lekple mfó yanii , itsyise bánte lesa nǝ eso éfo wǝ lefe kpǝ nko lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ nko .
42001022	Se ɔ́bɔ úbǝ lekplee , wénsifo mǝ etiki budinko . Nyaso bǝnyǝ bǝ únyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó . Nyaso ɔ́nnlɛ etiki bofo budi nɛ , ini ani ete úfi ɔ́nlɛ mǝ etiki budi .
42001023	Se Sakaria eto kesumu eto lefe léloo , úsinkli úsu diyo .
42001024	Nyamfó eto kamaa , Elisabet ésu ɔ́lɛ kafo , itǝ eso wénsikabɔ kesu umǝ bio . Nya ɔ́kula ǝsuǝ itǝ afa anɔ sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
42001025	Lǝ nnya eso Elisabet átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , be asa nnya Bonamute díyifo útǝ mɛɛ , nya úlǝkǝ kofani lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . ”
42001026	Lǝ Elisabet eto kafolɛlɛ eto kofa kuande ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto átsyese wǝ ɔtɔnkpe Gabriel nkǝ usu umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ .
42001027	Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo étsyi kɛnyɛ úsuko kebitɛ ka bátɔ bǝtǝ osani wǝ baakpo Yosef wǝ ditsyi Oka David eto kafo . Kebitɛ kamǝ eto diye ni Maria .
42001028	Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo ǝbǝ Maria ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nsiǝsǝ fǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ! Fǝǝ bǝnǝ kafo ! Bonamute si ko fǝ . ”
42001029	Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo eto kɛnyɛ ka óboko éyifo Maria yanii , nya itǝ wǝ disibubu lǝ kǝsiǝ kamǝ ǝsuǝ .
42001030	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Maria , mante sikpi . Onanto ǝnǝ fǝ kafo tinti .
42001031	Ebɔlɛ kafo nya foole ubisaibi , nya fuutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝ Yesu .
42001032	Woofo diye tinti nya bookpo wǝ bǝ Onanto wǝ ni Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto ubi . Nya Boanto Onanto luutǝ nkǝ ubi ǝmǝ di seka fe wǝ ona Oka David ke .
42001033	Nya wuudi seka lǝ Yakob eto kafo eto bebi ǝsuǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya wǝ sekakedikɔ embolo kulefe kulefe . ”
42001034	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Maria átɔ Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ nyamfo loofo bubǝ kǝtǝ , se minyi osani ? ”
42001035	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebɔyifǝ disiǝ lǝ fǝ nya Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto ǝsuǝale loola disiǝ lǝ fǝ . Nyaso ubi wǝ foole ebuyifo Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ nya bookpo wǝ bǝ Onanto eto Ubisaibi .
42001036	Mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ lǝ ate fǝ , fǝ otokpenyǝ wǝ baakpo Elisabet wǝ ni uninǝsiǝ wǝ baakpo okonɔ , fe ɔ́lɛ kafo kofa kuande nɛ .
42001037	Itsyise kulesa ǝmbǝ ale itǝ Onanto eto buyifo . ”
42001038	Nya Maria lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bee , Boanto Onanto eto uyifoyifo mini . Utǝ ibǝ itǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase fátɛyi . ” Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ dídu .
42001039	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Maria ǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝ nya ɔ́kɔse úsu Yudea eto umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ atini nti . Usu Sakaria eto diyo nya úsiǝsǝ Elisabet .
42001040	
42001041	Se Elisabet lɛnɔ Maria eto kǝsiǝ kamǝǝ , ubi wǝ lɛkɛ wǝ lǝ kafo ko lɛkpɔ , nya Elisabet díyi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kenke .
42001042	Mfó nya óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bákpo fǝ atsyɔ lǝ besio kenke nti , nya bákpo ubi wǝ fǝǝbǝ bole tsya atsyɔ !
42001043	Fɛɛ ntsyǝ minyǝ disi ɛkpɛ mmǝ bǝ mɔ Onamute eto ambe lǝ ubǝ mɔ ɔflɔ ?
42001044	Akpa akpa se mínɔ fǝ kǝsiǝǝ , ubi wǝ nkpe mɛ lǝ kafo ábe ósa ku disuǝyuǝ .
42001045	Disuǝyuǝ itǝ fǝ sitinti , itsyise áfo kɛnyɛ ka Bonamute létsyese fǝ ánɔ bǝ yuubǝ itǝ nko . ”
42001046	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , nya Maria lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ okla lɛ mɔ Onamute bɔtɛsǝ .
42001047	Nya mɔ lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ lǝ fǝ Onanto wǝ ni mɔ Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ ,
42001048	itsyise ókloma únǝ mɛ kafo , mɔ , wǝ uyifoyifo wǝ dimanle kulesa . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ebokpo mɛ bǝ nwǝ bákpo atsyɔ .
42001049	Itsyise Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke éyifo asa kplɛ útǝ mɛ , nya wǝ diye eyifo kɛnkɛ .
42001050	Wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ kpe lefe saa itǝ wǝ bebi eto bebi ba kenke lǝǝtǝ wǝ dibu .
42001051	Wǝ kɔni éyifo asa kplɛ , nya úsensǝ mba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ mǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
42001052	Óbokosǝ baka kplɛ kasɔ lǝ mǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ , nya óbesǝ mba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , kato .
42001053	Útǝ nkǝ betidi ba kukpɛnsɛ nlɛ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ asa sɛɛ bedi bemi tɔ , nya óla batabinyǝ ótsyese ani fufu .
42001054	Ókloma kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ útǝ bó bana eto bana , nya úbǝ ɔnlɛ Israel eto kuse eto betidi kenke bɔwunsǝko .
42001055	Ókloma ɔlɛ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ bufi kǝtǝ Abraham ku wǝ bebi eto bebi isu manlo manlo ! ”
42001056	Maria ákɛ lǝ Elisabet ɔflɔ fenkǝ afa ǝtsyǝ fɛ úsinkli úsu oto .
42001057	Se Elisabet eto ubi eto lelefe léyoo , óle ubisaibi .
42001058	Nya Elisabet eto bayotsya ku wǝ batokpenyǝ lɛnɔ asa sɛɛ nnya Bonamute ǝmǝ díyifo útǝ wǝ . Nya mǝmblɛ dínyǝnko wǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
42001059	Se ubi ǝmǝ léfo eyi mflamflaa , bǝbǝ bǝnkǝ baala wǝ lelo nya bála bǝ lǝ befi wǝ anto eto diye Sakaria bǝtǝkǝ wǝ .
42001060	Fɛɛ wǝ ambe mántɔnɔko mǝ nko nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa o-o ! Bifi diye Yohanes bitǝkǝ wǝ . ”
42001061	Mfó bétsyiko etiki bunǝ ku wǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ otokpenyǝ saa ǝmbǝ baakpo nko . ”
42001062	Nya bátɔ wǝ anto lǝ ani eto eyifosa ǝsuǝ bǝ ote diye nǝ woala nkǝ bǝfi bǝtǝkǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ .
42001063	Mfó nya Sakaria léfo leba nǝ ǝsuǝ baawɔni asa kǝtǝkǝ nya ɔ́wɔni nkǝ , “ Wǝ diye ni Yohanes . ” Nya íyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
42001064	Lamfolamfo Sakaria étsyiko etiki budi nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto .
42001065	Sikpi ǝmuǝ mba wonko mǝ nsi lǝ koyotsya nya ítǝ ditiki nǝmfo dísensǝ dísu kǝmǝ kpǝ lǝ Yudea eto atini ǝsuǝ mfó kenke .
42001066	Betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ asa nyamfo etsyiko disi bubu katɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte utidi wǝ eto okle ubi ǝmfo luubǝ ofiani ? ” Itsyise ílǝkǝ ete wuee bǝ , Bonamute eto kɔni tǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42001067	Mfó nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ ubi ǝmǝ eto anto Sakaria ǝsuǝ nya údi Onanto etiki ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ ,
42001068	“ Atɛsǝ itǝ Bonamute , Israel eto Onanto , itsyise úbǝ nkǝ woawunsǝko wǝ kuse nya lǝ ulǝkǝ mǝ .
42001069	Úlǝkǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ Kplɛ útǝ bo lǝ Oka David wǝǝ ni wǝ eto uyifoyifo eto kafo eto ubi .
42001070	Útsyǝ kɛnyɛ kamfó kokooko ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
42001071	wuulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ balo ku mba leekisi bo kenke eto ani .
42001072	Ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuunyǝ bo banamǝ kaminsǝ nya wookloma kɛnyɛ ka ókle ku mǝ .
42001073	Nya ɔ́tɛyi bo anto Abraham kɛnyɛ klekle kamfo utsyǝ nkǝ ,
42001074	wuulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ bo balo eto ani , nya wookpe bo ǝsuǝale busumu wǝ sikpi manté manté .
42001075	Nya wuuyifo bo kɛnkɛ bǝ lǝ buyifo mba nyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ bo nkpǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
42001076	Nya fǝ , mɔ ubi , bookpo fǝ bǝnkǝ Onanto wǝ nso kenke eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi . Ɛbɔtɔ̃ Onamute ǝmǝ eto bubǝ nya fɔɔlɔ kusu ǝtsyǝ itǝ wǝ .
42001077	Nya ebutǝ wǝ betidi te bǝ boonyǝ bofokǝtǝ itsyise boofi mǝ abua batsyɛ mǝ .
42001078	Bo Onanto kpe lefonǝ nya woabe bo ku kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ . Wuutǝ bofokǝtǝ eto diyǝnde bǝ itǝ bo itsyi kato .
42001079	Nya wuutǝ diyǝnde nǝmfo nkǝ dibǝ ditǝ lekpasǝ itǝ mba nkpe lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ ku mba nkpe lǝ ukpǝ eto sikpitete ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ okpa bo ɔyɛnko udufǝnko diyuǝ eto kusu ǝsuǝ . ”
42001080	Nya ubi ǝmǝ lébe nya ɔkɛ ale lǝ ǝsuǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya úsiǝ lǝ mfiminti isu ese lefe nǝ ɔ́bɔ úbǝ Israel eto kuse eto ǝnǝmi .
42002001	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Romamfɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare Augusto ǝtǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bawɔni betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ Roma eto sekakedikɔ eto kasɔ eto aye .
42002002	Nya ni betidi eto aye wɔniwɔni tutɛ nɛ , lǝ Aba eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Kirenio eto Sekadidi lǝ Siria eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ .
42002003	Nyaso utidi saa ésu wǝ umǝ lǝ usu ɔwɔni wǝ diye .
42002004	Lefe nǝmfo nya Yosef tsya létaka útsyi Nasaret eto umǝ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ úsu Betlehem eto umǝ lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ kaka bále Oka David . Yosef ésu mfó itsyise uyifo Oka David eto kafo eto ubi .
42002005	Ókpa Maria wǝ bátɔ bǝtǝ wǝ nya ɔnlɛ kafo tsya ɔ́yɛnko nkǝ lǝ ɔwɔni wǝ diye .
42002006	Nya lefe nǝ bakɛ lǝ Betlehem mfóo , lefe áyo Maria bǝ ole .
42002007	Óle wǝ ubi tutɛ wǝ ni osaibi lǝ diyo nǝ bebuki laalabe . Nya úfi kafia úmini wǝ , nya úfi wǝ ólabesǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ bebuki bamfó leedi lesa , itsyise kasɔnɔkɔ mánkɛ lǝ bafɔ eto kedufǝkɔ .
42002008	Lǝ kasɔ kamǝ ǝsuǝ mfóo , mba laabe basamu bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfo kabe mǝ bebuki ketsye ka kenke .
42002009	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte mǝ nya Onanto ǝmǝ eto diyǝnde ǝyǝnde ekpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eso bate sikpi tinti !
42002010	Fɛɛ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi . Mboko mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ looboko disuǝyuǝ ku diyuǝ tinti itǝ betidi ba kenke .
42002011	Nya lǝ mmi eto diyi nǝmfoo , bále Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ ni Bonamute Kristo bǝtǝ mi lǝ Oka David eto umǝ .
42002012	Nya lesa nǝ biufi binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpoo , ni bǝ biunyǝ ubisambi wǝ béfi kafia bémli nya onlabe lǝ bebuki eto kedikɔ . ”
42002013	Lefe nǝmfo tutuutu , Onanto eto batɔnkpe eto ditsyukpa kplɛ lɔni étsyi kato díbǝ bǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte , nya bákɔ ku ɔtɔnkpe ɔni ǝmfó nya banlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
42002014	“ Dibu ku atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe kato fanlofanlo , nya diyuǝsǝ itǝ kasɔ eto betidi ba kenke lǝǝdufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ ! ”
42002015	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe bamfo dídu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ bésinkli bésu katoo , mba laabe basamu bamǝ átɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ busu Betlehem lǝ busu bobe asa nnya díbǝ fe kase Boanto dílǝkǝ óte bo . ”
42002016	Nyaso bákɔse bésu nya bǝnyǝ Maria ku Yosef ku ubisambi wǝ nlabe lǝ bebuki eto kedikɔ mfó .
42002017	Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝ nkoo , bátɛyi lesa saa nǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ itsyi lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
42002018	Lefe nǝmfo se betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ mba laabe basamu bamǝ eto etiki nyamfoo , íyifo mǝ yani tinti .
42002019	Maria ákloma asa nyamfo kenke nya úkebu disi ketsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ etsyo .
42002020	Lefe nǝmfóo , se mba laabe basamu bamǝ dísinklii , bátɛsǝ Onanto lǝ lesa saa nǝ bánɔ ku bǝnyǝ tsya ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamblɛ kenke ǝbǝ itǝ pɛpɛɛpɛ fe kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ .
42002021	Nya lǝ diyi mflamflale ǝsuǝ , se lefe léyo bǝ bala ubi ǝmǝ leloo , bǝtǝkǝ wǝ diye bǝnkǝ Yesu fe kase Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝ fɛ bálɛ wǝ kafo .
42002022	Lefe áyo itǝ bǝ Yosef ku Maria yifo ǝsuǝ eto okla buflǝ eto lekpa fe kase Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ . Nyaso bákpa ubisambi ǝmǝ tsya bésuko Yerusalem bǝ lǝ befi wǝ bakpe Bonamute lǝ ani .
42002023	Nko ini báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kɔfi eto kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ubisaibi tutɛ ku ubuki sende tutɛ saa , ele bǝ bǝlǝkǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ kutsyǝ befi bakpe Bonamute lǝ ani . ”
42002024	Nyaso bésu Yerusalem bǝ lǝ befi kedi bǝtǝ Bonamute lǝ kase kɔfi lɛtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ablonima ǝnuǝ nye ablɛkpa ǝnuǝ beefi kǝtǝ kedi kamǝ .
42002025	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Simeon ákɛ lǝ Yerusalem . Nya úyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ laate Onanto sikpi nya uńyǝ ɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Israel eto bulǝkǝ . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dísiǝko wǝ ,
42002026	nya lése wǝ uyi nkǝ weembukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ eto lefe uunyǝ Onanto eto Nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ , wǝ eto etiki Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ .
42002027	Lefe nǝmfoo , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ ákpa Simeon úsuko Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó . Nya se anto ku ambe bamǝ lékpa ubisambi Yesu ǝmǝ bésukoo , bátɛyi bǝ bǝbǝ bǝ beyifo lesa saa nǝ ele bǝ beyifo bǝtǝ wǝ fe kase kɔfi létee ,
42002028	Simeon áfo ubisambi ǝmǝ ɔ́lɛ lǝ wǝ ani , nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
42002029	“ Boanto Onanto , mɔmɔɔ , se fékeyifo lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ebofo mɛ kusu bulǝkǝ , mɔ fǝ usumunyǝ , bǝ lǝ nsu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
42002030	Mɔ kosate ébufi mɔ ǝnǝmi nnyǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝmǝ
42002031	fǝtǝ fǝ ubǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto betidi kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ ku dinǝmi .
42002032	Wǝ ni diyǝnde nǝ luulǝkǝ lesa nǝ faala lǝ lekple lete betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya wuufi dibu oboko fǝ kusǝ Israel eto betidi eto nti . ”
42002033	Asa nnya Simeon lɛtɛyi mfo éyifo Yosef ku Maria yanii .
42002034	Nya Simeon lékpo mǝ atsyɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi ubi ǝmǝ eto ambe Maria nkǝ , “ Ubi ǝmfo eyifo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Nya wǝ ni Ofomfokǝtǝ nye budukanɔ itǝ Israel bebi kpǝ . Uyifo lekpotsyǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ , nya betidi kpǝ lootaka bǝnyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42002035	Nya wuutǝ nkǝ betidi kpǝ lǝkǝ mǝ nsusu bo bakula bate utsyuǝ saa nyǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ esoo , ebunyǝ kanyi fe kase lesiabi laase utidi eto utu kedunsǝ . ”
42002036	Mfó ǝmǝǝ , usio ɔni utsyuǝ wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi ákɛ mfo baakpo bǝ Hana . Nya wǝ anto Fanuel étsyi Aser eto kafo . Alɛ akuanse hã úsiǝ ku wǝ usǝ fɛ usǝ ǝmǝ díkpǝ . Nya úyifo ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ lébe bembembe . Ófo alɛ fosi mflamfla alɛ ana . Úkesu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfo lefe saa , ákatɛsǝ Onanto ketsye ku kakɔmi nya úkato ola kákle kɛnyɛ tsya .
42002037	
42002038	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó tutuutuu , wuntsya ǝbǝ ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ betidi ba kenke ńyǝ banlɛ Onanto kusu bobe bǝ wuulǝkǝ Yerusalem .
42002039	Nya se Yosef ku Maria lélosǝ mǝ lekpa nǝmǝ buyifo fe kase Onanto eto kɔfi letee , bésinkli bésu mǝ umǝ Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ .
42002040	Ubi ǝmǝ ábe ɔ́bɔ disi nya ɔ́kɛ ǝsuǝale , nya óte kobe tinti . Nya Onanto dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42002041	Lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛɛ , Yesu eto anto ku ambǝ ékesu Yerusalem késu kédi diyi nǝ baakpo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila .
42002042	Nyaso se Yesu léfo lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝǝ , bési bésu Yerusalem fe kase békeyifo kɔ seka .
42002043	Nya se bédi diyi nǝmǝ bálosǝ nya banlɛ businkli kesu mǝ umǝǝ , Yesu wǝ esi ɔ́kɛ kama lǝ Yerusalem mfó . Fɛɛ wǝ anto ku ambe mánte nko .
42002044	Mǝ ébu bǝnkǝ ɔkɛ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti nyaso bédu báyɛ diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ eto kusu fɛ bétsyiko wǝ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ bahɔ ku batokpenyǝ nti .
42002045	Nya se bǝnnyǝ wǝ esoo , bésinkli bésu Yerusalem bésu balɛ wǝ bɔbɛbɛ .
42002046	Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝǝ , bésu bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo kaka wǝ ku Yudafɔ eto bateasa nsi . Mfó úsiǝ ɔnlɛ mǝ asa nnya bánlɛ bɔtɛyi ato butsyue nya ɔnlɛ mǝ etiki bɔtɔ lɔni lɔni kanɔ .
42002047	Nya mba lɛnɔ asa nnya díkabɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , íyifo mǝ yanii lǝ wǝ asa kasɔnɔnɔ kpǝ ku kase úfi ɔnlɛ asa nnya bátɔ wǝ kasɔ bulǝkǝ eso .
42002048	Íyifo wǝ anto ku ambǝ mǝ yanii se bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ mfo nko . Nya wǝ ambe lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , ntsyǝso féyifo bo nyamfo eto okle ? Mɔ ku fǝ nto kenke ákɛ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ nya búsu bɔnlɛ botsyilama kabɛbɛ fǝ . ”
42002049	Mfo nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Beso ibǝ bǝ bísu bɛlɛ botsyilama kabɛbɛ mɛ ? Binyi biǝ mɔ Anto eto diyo ele bǝ nkɛ lee ? ”
42002050	Fɛɛ mǝǝ , bánnɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mfó eto kasɔ .
42002051	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝkǝko mǝ nya bédu bésu Nasaret , nya óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ útǝ mǝ . Nya asa nyamfo kenke lɛkɛ lǝ wǝ ambe eto nsusu kǝmiǝ ɛɛyɛ etsyo .
42002052	Nya Yesu lebe ɔ́bɔ disi lǝ kobetete ku lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ófo diye lǝ betidi kenke ku lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
42003001	Íyifo lɛlɛ lefosi nɔnde se Okankplɛ Kaisare Tiberio lídi seka , Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yohanes wǝ ni Sakaria eto ubi wǝ léfo kɛnyɛ utsyiko Onanto ɔflɔ lǝ lefe nǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ mfiminti . Nya Pontio Pilato lídi Aba eto unyɛsiǝ lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya Herodes díkedi seka lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmǝ mfóo , Herodes eto ɔyimisani Filipo tsya lídi seka lǝ kasɔ ka baakpo Iturea ku Trakoniti eto lekpake ǝsuǝ . Nya Lisania tsya díkedi seka lǝ Abilene eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Annas ku Kayafa ni Onanto eto Besumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke .
42003002	
42003003	Nyaso Yohanes áyɛ ótsyilama Yordan eto Ketu eto ditukpenkpe ku lekpake mfó kédi Anantotiki kátɛyi nkǝ , “ Bitsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ lǝ befo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mi abua ɔtsyɛ mi . ”
42003004	Nya nko seka ini báwɔni lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kukue banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ kpe lǝ mfiminti ɔlɛ bofa katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ Bonamute . Bimuǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ wǝ bubǝ .
42003005	Biti okplo saa okplo nya beba atini ku akpenkpe kenke bekatesǝ . Lǝ bɛtsyɔnsǝ esu nya lebo . Nya nlebe bo diyifo kplobi kplobii , biyifo mu tsyɛtsyɛtsyɛ .
42003006	Nya betidi kenke luunyǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ Onanto letsyese nɛ ! ’ ”
42003007	Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bǝ Yohanes flǝsǝ mǝ ntu . Fɛɛ Yohanes átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mba nte fe bawa eto befluflu ! Owoe lɛlɛ mi kɔlɛ nkǝ bitsyetsyi lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nlɛ bubǝ eto kɛnyɛ ?
42003008	Bete lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ biǝnkǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ . Nya biembu biǝ se ini Abraham eto befluflu bini esoo , Onanto embunǝ mi koto . Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto ebofo befluflu bulǝkǝ ketsyiko aba nyamfo ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ Abraham .
42003009	Bebe se banlɛ kefiebi bǝńyǝ bǝ baala eyi nyamǝ taa keyudu ke . Kuyi saa ko laanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , boola ko befi bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ . ”
42003010	Nyaso betidi bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛɛ , be ele bǝ buyifo mɔmɔ ? ”
42003011	Mfó nya útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe awu leyo lekpe sinuǝǝ , ufi lekpe lɔni utǝ utidi wǝ lǝmbǝ kuǝtsyuǝ . Nya utidi wǝ didisa nte tsyaa , usie ni nko ke . ”
42003012	Mba laafo umǝnko bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝbǝ bǝ bǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu . Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , be ele bǝ buyifo ? ”
42003013	Mfó nya Yohanes lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biamfo umǝnko besonsǝ kase kɔfi dítǝ mi kusu nkǝ befo . ”
42003014	Bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya bo nkpǝ ? Be ele bǝ buyifo ? ” Mfó ɔ́tɛyi mǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ mi kayo ka banlɛ mi bofo lǝ kemi mi . Nya lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , biensu bɛnyinkǝ utidi kuutsyuǝ bekpe lǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ befo wǝ atabi saa , nye bela utidi kuutsyuǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ belo wǝ dikpi . ”
42003015	Betidi bamfo eto kusubebe esi ébe kato ekpe nya békebu bǝ Yohanes nkpa ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , wǝ bǝńyǝ banlɛ kusu bobe .
42003016	Nyaso Yohanes ákpasǝ mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , ntu ete meefi kǝflǝsǝ mi . Fɛɛ utidi utsyuǝ tǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔlɛ bubǝ wǝ lɛmɔ nya onkpe ǝsuǝale onso mɛ famfamfa ! Mǝńyǝ tsya kon ntǝ bǝ mbǝ kasɔ miǝ maanyankli wǝ afokpa eto kekue lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ ntǝ wǝ tsya . Nya utidi ǝmfo ebufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ku uté uflǝsǝ mi fe ntu .
42003017	Ɔlɛ wǝ kɔfɛ ko wuufi ɔflɛ wǝ kamɔ ulǝkǝ kofo uwí nya wookpa kamɔ kosate okpo lǝ unwũ . Fɛɛ kofo saa kofoo , wootonsǝ ko lǝ ute wǝ lɛmbɔni kulefe kulefe . ”
42003018	Nya Yohanes lídi betidi Anantotiki lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́lɛ mǝ kɔlɛ nkǝ batsyi mǝ ditsyǝbi ku mǝ nkpǝ bo bensi bawuninsǝ .
42003019	Nya se Oka Herodes wǝ ni Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ lɛlɛ wǝ ɔyimi eto usiǝ wǝ baakpo Herodia ófo lǝ ǝsuǝale ku lǝ asa bua kpǝ nya úyifo esoo , Yohanes ǝnyǝnki okpe wǝ .
42003020	Idu ɛkɔ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , útǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes béti bákpe lǝ diyo .
42003021	Se Yohanes díflǝsǝ betidi kenke ntu ólosǝǝ , úflǝsǝ Yesu tsya ntu . Nya se Yesu nlɛ ola botoo , kato ásini .
42003022	Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ eto ditsyǝbi nte fe lɛblɛkpaa , áyifǝ díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya bánɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ wǝ dítsyi kato díkatɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni mɔ Ubi lala . Fǝ asa eedufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ tinti . ”
42003023	Yesu áfo fe alɛ fosi ǝtsyǝ fɛ útsyǝ wǝ keyifo kasɔ . Betidi eto nsusu ni bǝ wǝ anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Eli
42003024	wǝ eto anto ni Mata wǝ eto anto ni Lewi wǝ eto anto ni Melki wǝ eto anto ni Yanai wǝ eto anto ni Yosef
42003025	wǝ eto anto ni Matatia wǝ eto anto ni Amos wǝ eto anto ni Nahum wǝ eto anto ni Hesli wǝ eto anto ni Nagai
42003026	wǝ eto anto ni Mahat wǝ eto anto ni Matatia wǝ eto anto ni Semein wǝ eto anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Yoda
42003027	wǝ eto anto ni Yohanan wǝ eto anto ni Resa wǝ eto anto ni Sorobabel wǝ eto anto ni Sealtiel wǝ eto anto ni Neri
42003028	wǝ eto anto ni Melki wǝ eto anto ni Adi wǝ eto anto ni Kosam wǝ eto anto ni Elmadam wǝ eto anto ni Er .
42003029	wǝ eto anto ni Yosua wǝ eto anto ni Elieser wǝ eto anto ni Yorim wǝ eto anto ni Matat wǝ eto anto ni Lewi
42003030	wǝ eto anto ni Simeon wǝ eto anto ni Yuda wǝ eto anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Yonam wǝ eto anto ni Eliakim
42003031	wǝ eto anto ni Melea wǝ eto anto ni Mena wǝ eto anto ni Matata wǝ eto anto ni Natan wǝ eto anto ni David
42003032	wǝ eto anto ni Isai wǝ eto anto ni Obed wǝ eto anto Boas wǝ eto anto ni Salmon wǝ eto anto ni Naheson
42003033	wǝ eto anto ni Aminadab wǝ eto anto ni Admin wǝ eto anto ni Arni wǝ eto anto ni Hesron wǝ eto anto ni Peres wǝ eto anto ni Yuda
42003034	wǝ eto anto ni Yakob wǝ eto anto ni Isak wǝ eto anto ni Abraham wǝ eto anto ni Tara wǝ eto anto ni Nahor
42003035	wǝ eto anto ni Serug wǝ eto anto ni Regu wǝ eto anto ni Peleg wǝ eto anto ni Eber wǝ eto anto ni Sala
42003036	wǝ eto anto ni Kainan wǝ eto anto ni Arfaksad wǝ eto anto ni Sem wǝ eto anto ni Noah wǝ eto anto ni Lamek
42003037	wǝ eto anto ni Metusala wǝ eto anto ni Henok wǝ eto anto ni Yared wǝ eto anto ni Mehaleel wǝ eto anto ni Kainan
42003038	wǝ eto anto ni Enos wǝ eto anto ni Set wǝ eto anto ni Adam wǝ eto anto ni Onanto .
42004001	Se Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu édu lǝ Yordan eto Ketu mfó . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lékpa wǝ dísuko mfiminti kaka kuutsyuǝ lǝmbǝ .
42004002	Mfo nya Obonsam lékplatsya óto wǝ óbe lǝ eyifosi ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝmfó kenke , Yesu méndi kulesa nyaso lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , kukpɛnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
42004003	Mfó nya Obonsam lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto Ubi fenii , tɛyi lebambi nǝmfo lǝ efiani didisa . ”
42004004	Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Inni didisa mate lǝǝtǝ utidi nkpǝ . ’ ”
42004005	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Obonsam esi ókpa wǝ úsuko kaka letaka fanlofanlo . Nya óte wǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ku nnya sekakedikɔ kenke lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ .
42004006	Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muufi kawunsiǝ eto ǝsuǝale ku ke setabikɛ ntǝ fǝ , itsyise befi nnya bǝtǝ mɛ , nya moofo nnya bufi kǝtǝ nwǝ ke minla .
42004007	Nyaso asa nyamfo kenke ebofiani fǝ ale lǝ akpe disi kasɔ esumu mɛ . ”
42004008	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute Onanto hã ele bǝ utidi fi dibu utǝ , okpe disi kasɔ usumu . ’ ”
42004009	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Obonsam ákpa Yesu úsuko Yerusalem lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto kaka nso botaka nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto ubi fenii , yani fǝ ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ asɔ lǝ kasɔ .
42004010	Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ wǝ batɔnkpe ńyǝ bakase fǝ . ’
42004011	‘ Bɔɔkɔbe fǝ lǝ ani , itǝ bǝ embutusǝ kokpa lǝ leba ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya . ’ ”
42004012	Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Manto fǝ Onamute Onanto abe . ’ ”
42004013	Se Obonsam léto Yesu óbe nko ólosǝǝ , údu wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́yɛ wǝ bulǝ itǝ lefe ditsyuǝ .
42004014	Nya Yesu dísinkli úsu Galilea eto kasɔ nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale lɛkɛ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝ diye dísensǝ isu lekpake nǝmfó kenke .
42004015	Óte asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ nya utidi saa lɛtɛsǝ wǝ asatete .
42004016	Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Nasaret eto umǝ wǝ úsiǝ óbe . Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , úsu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ fe kase woala buyifo . Nya ótaka úńyǝ nkǝ lǝ okla asa lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
42004017	Mfó nya béfi Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kukue bǝtǝ wǝ . Ɔ́sini kukue komǝ nya útsyiko bokla lǝ kaka báwɔni bǝnkǝ ,
42004018	“ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ si mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , bédiki mɛ nnuǝbi , itsyise úlǝkǝ mɛ nkǝ mfó Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo mboko bakombo . Nya ótsyese mɛ nkǝ nsu mbe bulǝkǝ eto letsya ntǝ betidi ba bǝmuǝ bakpe lǝ diyo . Nya mba eto ǝnǝmi lébaa , lǝ bǝnyǝ asa . Nya betidi ba báyinkǝ bakpe lǝ kasɔ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ , lǝ bǝnyǝ bɔbɔkafe .
42004019	Nya lǝ ntǝ lǝ bate bǝ Onanto eto lefe nǝ wuulǝkǝ wǝ betidi eboyo . ”
42004020	Nya Yesu díti kukue ko mǝ , nya úsinkli ko útǝ wǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Betidi bamǝ kenke éfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya bǝńyǝ banlɛ wǝ bobe kpoo .
42004021	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nnya eto etiki bɛnɔ mínkla mfoo , ibǝ itǝ lǝ mmi eto diyi nǝmfo . ”
42004022	Nya wǝ etiki nnya údi ǝmuǝ mǝ lǝ utu tinti nya kase odiakami tsya létaka wǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝǝ , ǝtǝ iyifo mǝ yanii . Nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni Yosef eto ubi ni nwǝ mfo , fɛɛ ? ”
42004023	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ biɔtɛyi mɛ lekpa lǝ nnya minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ǝsuǝ biǝ , ‘ Ofate , tsya fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’ Nya binsi biɔtɛyi mɛ tsya biǝ , ‘ Asa nnya eto okle bɔ́nɔ bǝ éyifo lǝ Kapernaum , yifo nnya lǝ fǝ kosate eto umǝ mfo tsya . ’ ”
42004024	Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , bǝǝntǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kuutsyuǝ dibu lǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝ .
42004025	Ɛkpɛ ini bǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ kpǝ ákɛ lǝ Israel eto kasɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia lɛkɛ . Nya ɔsɔmi lɛyɛ bɔni itǝ alɛ ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ . Nya kukpɛnsɛ kplɛ díbǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
42004026	Fɛɛ Onanto mánkpe Elia kɔtɔ nkǝ usu kutsyuǝ saa ɔflɔ lǝ Israel , enso ɔkɔsiǝ utsyuǝ lǝ Sarep eto umǝ lǝ Sidon eto kasɔ .
42004027	Nya tsyaa , betidi kpǝ ákɛ ba díkefi bufisia lǝ Israel eto kasɔ lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elisa eto lefe . Fɛɛ wántsya mǝ kuutsyuǝ enso Naeman wǝ ditsyi Siria eto kasɔ mate hã . ”
42004028	Se betidi ba lɛkɛ mfó lɛnɔ nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti .
42004029	Nya bátaka bǝńyǝ nya bála Yesu bǝlǝkǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo bésu bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kɔtini ko ǝsuǝ bála umǝ ǝmǝ eto kotosi ku nsusu bǝ lǝ bǝkǝ wǝ bakpe lǝ kukpio kafo .
42004030	Fɛɛ Yesu áyɛ lǝ mǝ nti ɔ́bɔ údu .
42004031	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu úsu Kapernaum eto umǝ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Mfó nya útsyiko betidi asa bote lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
42004032	Nya lǝ wǝ etikididi ku ǝsuǝale esoo , wǝ asatete éyifo betidi bamǝ yanii .
42004033	Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua dísiǝ . Nya ófa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
42004034	“ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ , be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ atsylɔsǝ bo lee ? Nyi futsyǝ feni . Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ wǝ ótsyese nɛ ! ”
42004035	Mfó nya Yesu léla Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yɛ kudu bokpo ! Lǝ abɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ! ” Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ étsyi osani ǝmǝ ɔ́sɔ lǝ kasɔ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi , nya lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ dídu . Fɛɛ utidi ǝmǝ mámfo lefabe saa .
42004036	Iyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii nya bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte etiki nnya eto okle ni nyamfo ? Utidi ǝmfo kpe ǝsuǝle nya wǝǝkumi kakpe awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
42004037	Nya asa nnya bátɛyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ mfóo , dísensǝ ɛyɛ ísu kuse komfó kenke .
42004038	Yesu édu lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó úsu Simen eto diyo . Atikesi ǝmuǝ Simon eto usiǝambe élabesǝ kekleke . Nya bǝtǝ Yesu léte .
42004039	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , úsu úńyǝ lɛ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ wǝ kalabekɔ , nya óla bufi bomǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bufi bomǝ lɛyɛ wǝǝ , ótaka nya útsyiko lesa bonwa kǝtǝ mǝ .
42004040	Nya se kofe nlɛ diyo budufǝǝ , bákpa befimfi ba nlɛ bufi ate ate kenke báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya úfi ani útǝkǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ɔni , ɔni nya ótsya mǝmblɛ bufi .
42004041	Awɔnɔ bua kpǝ eto kakle tsya ábɔ lǝ betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ nya báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi kosate ǝmǝ ! ” Fɛɛ Yesu éti awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ kusu nya wǝntǝ kusu nkǝ batɛyi kulesa , itsyise béyi bǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
42004042	Se kale disiǝǝ , Yesu édu lǝ umǝ ǝmfó úsu kaka lɛbiɔ . Mfó nya betidi dítsyiko wǝ bɔbɛbɛ katsyilama . Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bákplatsya bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ budu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
42004043	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ nsu ndi etiki lǝ kǝmǝ bamba tsya itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Sekakedidi ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo eso Onanto létsyese mɛ nɛ . ”
42004044	Nyaso údi Anantotiki lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kenke lǝ kasɔ kamǝ .
42005001	Diyi lɔnii , se Yesu díńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝ baakpo bǝ Genesaret ɔflɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ákpɔ bǝ lǝ banyi bafi wǝ lǝ banɔ Anantotiki nnya ɔnlɛ budi .
42005002	Yesu ǝnyǝ nkǝ kaklɔ inuǝ ńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ mfó nya mba laata asabu kǝlǝkǝ akpɛ ébudu bésu mǝ asabu kǝflǝkɔ .
42005003	Nya Yesu lébe údufǝ lǝ Simon eto ole kafo , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , onwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ usuko ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ sɛkɛ . Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya óte betidi bamǝ asa .
42005004	Se óte mǝ asa ólosǝǝ , Yesu átɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Nwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ esuko kaka ntu letsyo sɛkɛɛ , lǝ fonko fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ beta mi asabu lǝ bilǝkǝ binǝ . ”
42005005	Nya Simon dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ketsye kamfo kenke búyifo keyifo kekleke tsya bóǝnlǝkǝ kulesa . Fɛɛ lǝ kase fátɛyi esoo , muutǝ lǝ bota asabu nyamǝ . ”
42005006	Se báta asabu nyamǝǝ , bǝlǝkǝ akpɛ kpǝ itǝ bǝ asabu nyamǝ étsyiko bola .
42005007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , básɔ ani bákpadi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba nkpe lǝ ɔklɔ nuǝfǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝko mǝ . Bǝbǝ nya bǝnǝ asabu nyamǝ bǝlǝsǝ nya binǝ biamǝ díyi kaklɔ inuǝ kamǝ kinkinki ibu sɛkɛ lǝ kanya kedufǝ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ .
42005008	Se Simon Petro dínyǝ nnya díbǝ mfoo , óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , mannyi ǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , itsyise obuayifo mini . ”
42005009	Binǝ kpǝ bia bǝlǝkǝ mfó esoo , íyifo wǝ ku wǝ bǝtsyuǝ yanii .
42005010	Nko ke íyifo Simon eto bayɛtsyuǝ , Yakobo ku Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi tsya nɛ . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , mfe betidi fuukǝlǝkǝ . ”
42005011	Se báyo ditukpenkpee , báyani lesa saa bǝtsyǝ nya bédu bǝtǝkǝko Yesu .
42005012	Lefe lɔnii , Yesu ésu umǝ utsyuǝ kaka utidi utsyuǝ nlɛ bufisia bufi . Nya se utidi ǝmfo dínyǝ Yesu , ókpo kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ! Lǝ aalaa , ebofo butǝ mɔ bufi bomfo yuǝ mɛ . ”
42005013	Yesu ǝnǝ kɔni útidi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nla nko . Lǝ nyasoo , bufi bomǝ yuǝ fǝ . ” Lamfolamfo , bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
42005014	Mfó nya Yesu lékpe wǝ kɔfi nkǝ , “ Mantɛyi utidi sa nyamfo . Bomu yɛ tentente lǝ edu lǝ efi ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto usumunyǝ . Wǝ loobe fǝ unyǝ nkǝ ǝmuǝ ale nya uudi fǝ adansiɛ itǝ utidi saa nkǝ sitintii , bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ . Nya lǝ efi lɛninsɔ ǝtǝ fe kase Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ . ”
42005015	Fɛɛ Yesu eto etiki nyamfo ésensǝ ɛyɛ etsyo . Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ bǝ lǝ banɔ wǝ asatete nya lǝ ótsya mǝ bufi bo nlɛ mǝ bulǝ .
42005016	Fɛɛ ɔ́kabɔ kesu kaka lɛbiɔ úsu úkato ola .
42005017	Diyi lɔni se Yesu lɛkɛ mfó ókaté asaa , Yudafɔ eto ditsyukpa lɔni nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba ditsyi nlebe nlebe lǝ Galilea ku Yudea eto nsɔ ku Yerusalem ǝbǝ mfó . Nya Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nnya Yesu leefi katsya befimfi tsya ǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
42005018	Nya mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ étsyi utidi wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ lǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya bábɛbɛ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ befi wǝ bedufǝnko diyo kafo lǝ befi wǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi .
42005019	Fɛɛ betidi bamǝ eto etu esoo , bámfo kusu bunyǝ . Nko esoo , bétsyi wǝ báyɛnko lǝ diyo eto letsya . Nya bǝlǝkǝ ofo lǝ letsya ǝsuǝ nya báyifǝsǝ wǝ ku wǝ belabekǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi lǝ betidi bamǝ eto nti lǝ diyo kafo mfó .
42005020	Nya se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ bofokanɔ esoo , ɔ́tɛyi utidi ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Osani , mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ ! ”
42005021	Mfó nya Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa dítsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝ , “ Owoe ni nwǝ mfo leedi mbusiotiki kefi wǝ ǝsuǝ kakatesǝ ko Onanto nko ! Onanto hã ni futsyǝ wǝ loofo utidi eto abua bufi katsyɛ wǝ ! ”
42005022	Nya se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ nsusu útsyǝ lekpo esoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ nsusu bomfo eto okle bufi ?
42005023	Nte nnya nso buyuǝ ku bɔtɛyi , ‘ Befi fǝ abua bátsyǝ fǝ , ’ lee ‘ Taka ǝńyǝ lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
42005024	Muulǝkǝ nte mi miǝ Utidi Eto Ubi kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo bǝ ufi abua ɔtsyɛ . ” Nyaso ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ léba oonkpo kasɔ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ taka lǝ efi fǝ okla lǝ esu diyo ! ”
42005025	Mfo ǝmǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ átaka uńyǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ eto ǝnǝmi nya úfi wǝ okla , nya údu ɔ́ntɔ lǝ diyo ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ .
42005026	Nyamfó éyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii ! Nya se sikpi dímuǝ mǝmblɛ kenke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ esoo , bátɛsǝ Onanto nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ayanisa nnya búnyǝ mfo mmi mǝǝ ? ”
42005027	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ábɔ útsyi lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya únyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ laafo umǝnko wǝ baakpo Lewi nkpe lǝ wǝ keyifokɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
42005028	Lewi áyani lesa saa útsyǝ nya ótaka útǝkǝko wǝ .
42005029	Lewi ǝtǝ bánwa lesa kǝn nya úfi útsyue ɔpunu ókpe Yesu disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ diyo . Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ mfó ku mba laafo umǝnko tsya .
42005030	Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa ba díbǝ katsyakɔ mfó étsyiko etiki bunǝ ku Yesu eto bakasebi katɛyi bǝ , “ Beso biedi kǝnǝ ku mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo bamfo ? ”
42005031	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni Onanto hã .
42005032	Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mímbǝ . ”
42005033	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi aakle kɛnyɛ nya baato ola , nya mba ntǝkǝko Farisifɔ tsya leeyifo nko , fɛɛ fǝ bale leedi kǝnǝ lefe saa ? ”
42005034	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bubu bibu biǝnkǝ baklobo ebofo kɛnyɛ bokle lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ nkpe lǝ mǝ lenti ? Kulefe ! Yembubǝ itǝ nkomǝ !
42005035	Fɛɛ diyi ditsyuǝ ebubǝ ni lefe nǝ bookpa okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ bedunko lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , insini utidi saa luubǝ ɔtɛyi mǝ fɛ bookle kɛnyɛ . ”
42005036	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Utidi kuutsyuǝ embofuadi kafia fɔfɔ ufi otale kakoko . Lǝ utsyuǝ éyifo nkoo , ebunyǝ fǝ obiasǝ kafia fɔfɔ kamǝ . Nya kakoko kamfó tsya ku kafɔfɔ kamǝ ǝmbɔlɛkɛ itǝ boka kǝtǝkǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
42005037	Nya bemfi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe . Lenni nkoo , nte fɔfɔ bomǝ ebɔkpɔ bobe kato nnya luutǝ kubukikuetobe komǝ la nya nte bomǝ tsya luuwui buyifo nsɔsɔ .
42005038	Nyasoo , ntǝ fɔfɔ beefi kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ .
42005039	Nya mɔmɔ tsyaa , utidi kuutsyuǝ ǝnnǝ nte koko kesi kala nkǝ wǝǝnǝ mfɔfɔ lamfolamfo , etsyisee , wɔɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Ntutɛ , bo ni nkokoo , alɛkɛ boso ! ’ ”
42006001	Lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lɔnii , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ákayɛ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ ko lɛyɛ lǝ anta eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ kafo kafe . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi dítsyiko anta nnya ńyǝ mfó bufǝsǝ kǝfǝ akayimi .
42006002	Mfó nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ lesa nǝ bo kɔfi dimǝntǝ bo kusu nkǝ buyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ buyifo ? ”
42006003	Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo lǝ lefe nǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ ?
42006004	Oka David ésu údufǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ úsu úfi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ Onanto kedii , údi . Nya útǝ wǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya ni ditsyuǝ bédi lǝ lefe nǝ iyifo botakebu lǝ bo kɔfi ǝsuǝ bǝ utidi bamba lǝ udi lesa nǝmfo . Kuutsyuǝ sa ǝmbǝ kusu enso Onanto eto Usumunyǝ hã . ”
42006005	Lǝ nnya kalosǝkɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi Eto Ubii , wǝ ni Onamute itǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nɛ . ”
42006006	Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bamba ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya ɔnlɛ asa bote . Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ eto kodiani díkpǝ konyoma .
42006007	Nya se kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ díkabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ Yesu bǝ óta kɔfi ubu esoo , béfi ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kekleke balɛ bobe lǝ wootsya bufi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
42006008	Fɛɛ se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ nsusu utsyǝ lekpo esoo , ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ abɔ ǝbǝ sɛtɔ mfo . ” Nya osani ǝmǝ létaka úbǝ úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
42006009	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be kɔfi dítǝ bo kusu nkǝ buyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ? Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ buyifo kasɛɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lee bǝ buyifo kabua ? Nye , ɛlɛkɛ bǝ bafo utidi lǝ nkpǝ lee babiasǝ mu bomu ? ”
42006010	Yesu átsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue , nya úyifo nko . ” Nya wǝ kɔni komǝ létsya wǝ .
42006011	Nyaso mǝmblɛ kenke éyenki ku lɛblɔfi nya bétsyiko nsusu bufi lǝ lesa nǝ boofo Yesu buyifo ǝsuǝ .
42006012	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu ábe úsu kɔtini disi . Ɔ́kɛ mfó óto ola útǝ Onanto ketsye kamfó kenke .
42006013	Se kale dísiǝǝ , ókpadi wǝ bakasebi kenke útsyǝ nya úlǝkǝ lefosi inuǝ ba útǝkǝ diye nkǝ wǝ Batɔnkpe .
42006014	Mǝ ni Simon wǝ útǝkǝ diye nkǝ Petro ku wǝ ɔyimi Andreas ku Yakobo , Yohanes ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ,
42006015	ku Mateo ku Tomas , ku Alfeo eto ubi Yakobo ku Simon wǝ baakpo bǝ utidi wǝ laakpɔ kǝtǝ wǝ umǝ
42006016	ku Yakobo eto ubi Yuda ku Yuda Iskariot wǝ léfiani nwǝ lídu Yesu útǝ .
42006017	Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ batɔnkpe lɛyifǝ bétsyi kɔtini koǝ eto disi bǝbǝǝ , bǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ kaka diyifo tsyɛ tsyɛ tsyɛ nya mba dítǝkǝko wǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ ákɛ mfó nya sitiditu kplɛ sia dítsyi Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ kenke ku Yerusalem eto kǝmǝ ka lɛfi lekpo kɛnyɛ ka ni Tiro ku Sidon .
42006018	Bǝbǝ bǝ lǝ banɔ asa nnya Yesu díkate ku lǝ otsya mǝ efimbi kpǝ nnya banlɛ . Betidi ba awɔnɔ bua díkelǝ tsya ǝbǝ nya ótsya mǝ bufi .
42006019	Betidi bamfo kenke ákplatsya bǝ lǝ betidi Yesu lǝ mǝ efimbi lǝ ɛyɛ mǝ , itsyise ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ eto okle ákabɔ ketsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ nnya díkatsya betidi bamǝ kenke .
42006020	Yesu átakasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe wǝ bakasebi , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mi bakombo , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mi kale !
42006021	Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mimba kukpɛnsǝ nlɛ mɔmɔ , itsyise biumi ! Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mimba nlɛ nku mɔmɔ , itsyise biumǝ simǝ !
42006022	Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mi lǝ betidi eekisi mi , nya baani mi , nya baaka mi , nya baatɛyi mi bǝnkǝ bekpe ditsyǝbi bua lǝ mɔ wǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi eso !
42006023	“ Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ , lǝ biwi kewi ku disuǝyuǝ , itsyise Onanto ebutǝ mi kayofofo kplɛ lǝ Onanto eto oto kato . Itsyise asa nyamfo eto okle mǝ bana díyifo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lɛkɛ kɔ kenke nɛ .
42006024	Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ mi batabinyǝ , itsyise bíofo mi disuǝyuǝ eto kayofofo lǝ kasɔ mfo !
42006025	Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mimba díkedi bími mɔmɔ , itsyise kukpɛnsɛ ɛbɔlɛ mi ! Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mimba nlɛ simǝ bumǝ mɔmɔ , itsyise mi asa ebɔkɛ kaminsǝ nya biuwi nku !
42006026	Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi mba betidi kenke laatɛsǝ mɔmɔ , itsyise nko ke ibǝ bǝ mǝ banamǝ lɛtɛsǝ betidi ba lɛwɛ betidi bǝ mǝ ni Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nɛ .
42006027	“ Fɛɛ mimba nlɛ mɔ etiki bɔnɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bela mi balo lǝ biyifo kasɛɛ bitǝ mǝ .
42006028	Nya betidi ba leekudi mii , bekpo mǝ atsyɔ . Nya betidi ba laalo fǝ sɛsi nye beeyifo disialee , to ola lǝ mǝ disi .
42006029	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ásɔ fǝ lǝ kotosii , tsyi nkonse tsya ǝtǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ éfi fǝ awu katoo , tǝ lǝ ufi nnya kalɔ tsya lǝ woala .
42006030	Utidi saa wǝ laadia asa lǝ fǝ ɔflɔɔ , tǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utsyuǝ éfi fǝ lǝsatsyuǝǝ , mantɛyi fǝ usinkliko ni oboko .
42006031	Lesa nǝ faala fǝ beyifo bǝtǝ fǝǝ , ni ke ele bǝ fintsya yifo ǝtǝ betidi nɛ .
42006032	“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ betidi ba laala mi ete mi tsya laalaa , nte atɛsǝ nye lɛninsɔ nǝ biunyǝ bitsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Mba ni babuayifo tsya aala betidi ba laala mǝǝ .
42006033	Nya lǝ betidi ba díyifo fǝ kasɛɛ ete fintsya leeyifo kasɛɛ kǝtǝǝ , nte lɛninsɔ nǝ ele bǝ befi bǝtǝ fǝ ? Mba ni babuayifo tsya eeyifo nkoo .
42006034	Nya lǝ betidi ba ni mba leesinkli kǝbǝ kǝtsyǝ fǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ hã faadia asa kǝtǝǝ , beso faala fǝ batɛsǝ fǝ ? Babuayifo tsya aaba kǝtǝ mǝ bayɛtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bǝtsyǝ mǝ nnya lǝ kɛnyɛ !
42006035	Bomuu , bela mi balo lǝ biyifo mǝ kasɛɛ . Beba asa bitǝ mǝ , nya biambe kusu biǝ besinkliko kulesa bǝbǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ kokooko . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , biunyǝ kayofofo kplɛ lǝ nnya disi . Nya bookpo mi bǝ Onanto wǝ ni Onanto Fanlofanlo eto bebi . Itsyise Onanto kpe kafoɛkpɛ itǝ mba lǝǝnnyǝ kasɛɛ kǝtsyǝ lekpo ku mba nkpe disiale kulaa tsya .
42006036	Biyifo mba lǝǝnyǝ asa kaminsǝ fe kase mi Anto Onanto lǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ .
42006037	“ Biankponko betidi bamba akpo lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ mi lekpo bokponko . Bianlo betidi dikpi , lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ mi dikpi bolo , bifi asa bɛtsyɛ betidi lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ufi ɔtsyɛ mi .
42006038	Ele bǝ bitǝ betidi asa bǝ lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ utǝ mi asa . Lǝ sitintii , Onanto ebuyisǝ mi kenwu keyi kaba kakpo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ eso . Kase faaklá asa yeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko eto okle ke Onanto looklá utǝ fǝ nɛ . ”
42006039	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nkǝ , “ Unǝmba anyɛnko wǝ unǝmbatsyuǝ . Lenni nkoo , mǝ inuǝ ba tã ebudu banɔ bedufǝ lǝ dibiǝ kafo .
42006040	Okasebi saa ante kaso wǝ oteasa . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ okasebi ǝmǝ lelosǝ asa bokasee , wǝǝtsyǝ fe wǝ oteasa ke .
42006041	“ Ntsyǝ fɛ fanlɛ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ dinǝmi bobe fɛ fannlɛ dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ lele bunyǝ ?
42006042	Ntsyǝ fɛ foofo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Lekpakpa , tǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi ’ se dikubi kplɛ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ kosate eto lele ǝsuǝ ? Fǝ , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi ! Ka dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi bulǝkǝ fɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ kusu ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto lele kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ lele .
42006043	“ Kuyi sɛɛ aannwɔ ebibi bua , nya kuyi bua tsya laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ .
42006044	Kuyi saa eto ebibi ǝsuǝ beefi kǝtsyǝ ko lekpo . Banlɛ koto eto awɔnsa lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ , nya banlɛ awɔnsa nya beedi lǝ otonkpa tsya ǝsuǝ .
42006045	Utidi sɛɛ saa , asa sɛɛ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ nnya leetsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya utidi bua tsya lǝǝlǝkǝ asa bua kate ketsyiko lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Itsyise asa nnya nkpe lǝ utidi eto utu kǝmiǝǝ , nnya ni lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nɛ .
42006046	“ Beso biakpadi mɛ biǝ Bonamute , Bonamute , fɛ bienyifo lǝ lesa nǝ maatɛyi mi ǝsuǝ ?
42006047	Utidi saa wǝ lǝǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ nya wǝǝbǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ɔnɔ lesa nǝ maatɛyi nya weeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , moote mi futsyǝ eto okle uni .
42006048	Ute fe utidi wǝ laato diyo nya óba kakplo nya óse ni unyǝnsǝ lǝ aba ǝsuǝ fɛ óto diyo nǝmǝ unyǝnsǝ . Se ketu díyi nya káyɛ mfó káfee , kulesa ményifo diyo nǝmǝ , itsyise dińyǝ lǝ kǝńyǝkɔ sɛɛ .
42006049	Fɛɛ utidi saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ ditiki nya woenyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝǝ , uyifo fe utidi wǝ léto diyo nya wánse ni lǝ kasɔ ka nkpe ale ǝsuǝ nya wénku kasɔ fɛ útsyiko ofatiǝ ǝmǝ bose lǝ umuǝ sui . Nyaso lefe nǝ ketu díyi kába káyɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ káfee , léba kenke lékpo lǝ kasɔ ! ”
42007001	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi betidi bamfo asa nyamfo kenke olosǝǝ , údu úsu Kapernaum .
42007002	Romafɔ eto omamanyǝninǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfó nya ɔkɛ uyifoyifo wǝ eto asa óla tinti . Uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ánɔ bufi kekleke , nya ɔkɛ lǝ ukpǝ ku menkpǝ eto nti .
42007003	Se uninǝ ǝmfo lɛnɔ Yesu eto kɔsɔɔ , ókpe Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ batɛyi wǝ lǝ ubǝ otsya wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ utǝ wǝ .
42007004	Bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa kekleke bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo ǝńyǝ utǝ bǝ wunsǝko wǝ ,
42007005	itsyise woala bo kuse eto betidi . Nya wǝ kosate léto bo katsyakɔ útǝ bo . ”
42007006	Lǝ nyamfo eso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko mǝ . Yesu ménsitsyonko diyo nǝmǝ fɛ uninǝ ǝmfo lékpe wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ besu batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto , mensilǝ ǝsuǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ . Itsyise mɔɔ , mǝnńyǝ ntǝ bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ mɔ diyo .
42007007	Nya mǝnńyǝ ntǝ tsya bǝ mbǝ ntsyako fǝ , nńyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi . Nyasoo , fǝ tɛyi ditiki ete , mɔ uyifoyifo eto ǝsuǝ ebumuǝ ale .
42007008	Mintsya nyifo uninǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ beninǝ ba nsi nso mɛ eto ǝsuǝale eto kalɔ . Nya nkpe bamamanyǝ ba nkpe mɛ kalɔ . Lǝ ntɛyi nwǝ miǝkǝ , ‘ Su , ’ woesu . Nya lǝ ntɛyi obamba tsya miǝ , ‘ Bǝ , ’ wǝǝbǝ . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mɔ uyifoyifo miǝ , ‘ Yifo mmǝǝ , ’ woǝyifo . ”
42007009	Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , íyifo Yesu yanii . Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ ɔ́tɛyi sitiditu sia ba dítǝkǝko wǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ mǝnyǝ tɔ bofokanɔ bomfo eto okle lǝ Israelfɔ nti tɔ kulatsya ! ”
42007010	Mfó ǝmǝ nya betidi ba bátsyese mfó dísinkli bésu oto nya bǝnyǝ bǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto bufi ǝyuǝ wǝ .
42007011	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Naim , nya wǝ bakasebi ku betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ bésu .
42007012	Lefe nǝ óyo umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabɔsiee , ótsyako bǝtsyuǝ ba nlɛ keku nya banyɛ banlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Ɔkɔsiǝ eto ubi ɔni kplo eto ɔkɔ ni wǝ béntsyi banlɛ bɔbɔnko bantɔ kebikǝkɔ nɛ . Nya umǝ eto betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ .
42007013	Se Yesu dínyǝ usio ǝmfoo , wǝ asa álɛ wǝ kaminsǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sinkli ayɛ keku . ”
42007014	Yesu édufǝ mǝ lenti nya útidi ɔkɔ ǝmǝ , nya mba ntsyi wǝ ǝmǝ díńyǝ . Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Okosobi ! Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ taka ! ”
42007015	Nya ɔkɔ ǝmǝ létaka úsiǝ nya útsyiko etiki budi . Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ókpe wǝ ambe lǝ kɔni .
42007016	Íyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii ku sikpi tinti , nya bátɛsǝ Onanto . Lǝ nyamfo eso bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ ale tinti ǝbǝ údufǝ bo lenti ! Onanto áyifǝ úbǝ nkǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ betidi ! ”
42007017	Yesu eto etiki nyamfó esensǝ éba ékpo lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ku lekpake nǝmfo kenke .
42007018	Lefe nǝmfóo , se Yohanes eto bakasebi lɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nyamfoo , ókpadi inuǝ lǝ mǝ nti ,
42007019	nya óla mǝ ótsyese Bonamute Yesu ɔflɔ ku kɛnyɛ kamfo nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni utidi wǝ bǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ lee , lee buńyǝ bukabe utidi bamba kusu ? ”
42007020	Nyaso se bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔɔ , batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ni nwǝ lékpe bo nkǝ bubǝ bɔtɔ fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ni utidi wǝ bǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ lee , lee buńyǝ bukabe utidi bamba kusu ? ’ ”
42007021	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu átsya betidi kpǝ bufi nya óla awɔnɔ bua , nya útǝ bǝnǝmba kpǝ dínyǝ asa .
42007022	Mfoti ǝmǝ nya útǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɛyi Yohanes eto batɔnkpe nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bisu bɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nnya bínyǝ ku nnya bɛnɔ banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝnǝmba lɛ bunyǝ , mba léba bankpoo kasɔ lɛ bɔyɛ kafe , mba nlɛ bufisia bufi eto ǝsuǝ lɛ bokpa , batoti lɛ asa bɔnɔ , bǝkpǝnkpǝ lɛ botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ , nya maatɛyi bakombo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
42007023	Disuǝyuǝ itǝ utidi wǝ dímǝnnyǝ kabua lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
42007024	Se Yohanes eto batɔnkpe dídu eto kamaa , Yesu étsyiko etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ Yohanes ǝsuǝ kate betidi bamfó nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ bɛbɔ bisu kaka Yohanes nkpe lǝ mfiminti mfóo , be ni lesa nǝ bibu biǝ biusu binyǝ ? Utidi wǝ nte fe lefanto nǝ ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ ketinkǝsǝ lee ?
42007025	Be tutuutu ni lesa nǝ bísu kabekɔ ? Lee Utidi wǝ nkpe awu nnya laanɔ bobe ? Betidi ba laakpe awu nnya lefo koya nya beedi nkpǝǝ , mǝ kakɛnkɔ ni bakankplɛ eto ayo .
42007026	Bɛtɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ bísu kabekɔ ! Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ bísu kabekɔ ? Lǝ sitintii , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ oso Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
42007027	Itsyise Yohanes ǝsuǝ eto etiki nya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi ni nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ ɔtɔnkpe ntɔnsǝ fǝ bubǝ , nya wɔɔtɔ ɔlɔ kusu utsyǝ utǝ fǝ bubǝ . ’ ”
42007028	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Yohanes so utidi saa wǝ bale lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ni ɔkɛkɛ kulaa tsya lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ , so Yohanes . ”
42007029	Ɛtɔnsǝǝ , betidi bamǝ kenke ánɔ Yohanes eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ údi nya titlu mǝ ku mba laafo umǝnko tsya áfo lesa nǝ Onanto nlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko mǝ ɔflɔɔ , ku mǝ ketu kenke nya Yohanes díflǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
42007030	Fɛɛ Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa kplɛ áni lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto ketsyue itǝ mǝ nya bántɔnɔ bǝ Yohanes flǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
42007031	Yesu ésukosǝ wǝ etiki sɛtɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , be ele bǝ mfi mi mmi eto betidi nkatesǝ ko kɛɛ ? Ntsyǝ bente kɛɛ ?
42007032	Bete fe bekpefi kɛkɛ ba laakpe kɔyɛ lǝ obia . Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɛ kudu bokpo katɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , ‘ Búsǝ kusiǝkpakpa eto ǝsǝ bútǝ mi , fɛɛ bíenwui kewui ! Búsǝ keku eto ǝsǝ bútǝ mi , tsya bíenwi nku . ’
42007033	Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ǝbǝ , nya ókle kɛnyɛ , nya wǝnnǝ ntǝ saa tsya , fɛɛ bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lɛwɔnɔ bua si wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
42007034	Nya Utidi Eto Ubi tsya díbǝ nya wǝǝ , údi únǝ . Nya bɛnlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bebe udikpu ku utǝnǝ ǝmfoo ! Uyifo mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ ! ’
42007035	Fɛɛ betidi ba kenke lǝǝtǝkǝko Onanto eto kobe kamaa , balɛ bulǝkǝ kate lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ bǝ nnya ni kobe tinti nɛ . ”
42007036	Farisinyǝ utsyuǝ ákpadi Yesu nkǝ ubǝ udi lesa lǝ wǝ diyo . Nya se Yesu dísu mfóo , úsiǝ kasɔ lǝ ɔpunu ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ udi lesa .
42007037	Usio wǝ dísiǝ nkpǝ bua utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Nyaso se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu ǝbǝ Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo lesakedikɔɔ , úfi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi bo nkpe lǝ dituntu nǝ laanɔ bobe ǝsuǝ úsuko mfó .
42007038	Úsu úńyǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya úwi binǝntu okpo wǝ lǝ akpa . Nya usio ǝmǝ dífi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si binǝntu bia lékpo lǝ Yesu eto akpa mfoo , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ akpa ɔnlɛ bɔfiɔ ku lelabi . Nya úfi nnuǝbi bomǝ ókpo lǝ Yesu eto akpa tsya .
42007039	Se Farisinyǝ wǝ lékpadi Yesu dínyǝ nyamfoo , úbu disi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utidi ǝmfo ete ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi tintii , eni ele bǝ ote usio wǝ eto okle díbǝ ɔnlɛ wǝ butidi mfo , eni óte nkpǝ bua bo tsya unsi ! ”
42007040	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Simon , nkpe lesatsyuǝ nǝ minla miǝ matɛyi fǝ . ” Nya Simon lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tɛyi mɛ . ”
42007041	Yesu ǝtsyǝ kasɔ ɔ́tɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ mfo wǝ díkaba atabi ukǝtǝ betidi , nya betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ dísiǝ wǝ kayo . Ɔni dísiǝ wǝ sika eto atabi akpi alofa anɔ . Nnya unuǝfǝ dísiǝ wǝ atabi akpi fosi anɔ .
42007042	Se kulesa dímǝtsyǝ mǝ boofo kayo kamǝ esoo , úfi kayo kamǝ kenke ɔ́tsyɛ mǝ . Nya betidi inuǝ bamfo eto ntii , owoe fafo fanɔ fǝ woola otabinyǝ ǝmfo oso ? ”
42007043	Nya Simon lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ miǝ utidi wǝ úfi kayo ka nso utu ɔ́tsyɛ . ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi ɛlɛkɛ . ”
42007044	Yesu étsyi ɔwuninsǝ óbe usio ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Alɛ usio ǝmfo bunyǝ ? Se mímbǝ fǝ ɔflɔɔ , ǝmǝntǝ mɛ ntu fǝ mflǝ akpa . Fɛɛ usio ǝmfo éfi wǝ binǝntu úflǝ mɛ akpa , nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si nnya .
42007045	Ámamfo mɛ ku disuǝyuǝ abuta mɛ alɛ . Fɛɛ idu lǝ lefe nǝ mímbǝ mfo , wóanyɛ tɔ mɔ akpa bɔlɛ kafiɔ .
42007046	Fǝǝ , ǝmǝntǝ mɛ nnuǝbi saa fǝ mfi nkpo lǝ disi . Fɛɛ wǝ éfi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi ókpo mɛ lǝ akpa .
42007047	Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lelabi nǝ úlǝkǝ óte mɛ esoo , ófo abua kpǝ nya úyifo kenke eto bufikatsyɛ . Nya utidi wǝ díyifo abua sɛkɛ béfi bátsyɛ wǝ , nko ke wǝ lelabi tsya lɛfɛ nɛ . ”
42007048	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Befi fǝ abua batsyɛ fǝ . ”
42007049	Se betidi ba tsya dísiǝ lǝ kedikɔ mfo lɛnɔ Yesu eto asa nnya ɔ́tɛyii , batɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni nwǝ mfo wǝ laafo betidi eto abua kulaa tsya bufi katsyɛ ? ”
42007050	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ bofokanɔ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ , nyaso du esu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
42008001	Nya lefe ditsyuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu átsyilama nti bomfo úsu kǝmǝ ku mbuto ntsyuǝ . Nya úkedi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ ba úlǝkǝ tsya ǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
42008002	Besio ba Yesu létsya bufi akpa akpa ku mba óla awɔnɔ bua úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝkǝtǝkǝko wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ nti ni Maria wǝ baakpo Magdalanyǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua akuanse úlǝkǝ .
42008003	Usio bamba tsya ákɛ lǝ mǝ nti mfó wǝ baakpo bǝ Yohana nwǝ eto usǝ baakpo Kusa wǝ díyifo keyifo lǝ Oka Herodes eto lekpokakpokɔ nya údi uninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ díkabe mfó . Besio kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku nwǝ baakpo Susana tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu nya banlɛ mǝ asa bufi kawunsǝ ko wǝ ku wǝ bakasebi .
42008004	Betidi kpǝ éketsyi kǝmǝ ate ate ate kǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Nnya lǝ lefe nǝ betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ ,
42008005	“ Ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ ésu nkǝ wǝǝsǝ eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ekpo lǝ kusu nya betidi lémankli nya , nya baklɔbɛ lɛsɛ nnya bamini .
42008006	Ǝtsyuǝ tsya álo ekpo lǝ akpankplamboe ǝsuǝ . Nya se íkǝǝ , yǝnyǝ ntu ku sitǝ sɛɛ . Nyaso yɛylɔbe nya íkpǝ .
42008007	Eyibibi nyamǝ ǝtsyuǝ édufǝ lǝ biyufa nti . Nya biyufa biamǝ lébe bíti eyibibi nyamǝ , nya békle nnya kenke itǝ íkpǝ .
42008008	Nya abamba dísu ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya se íkǝǝ , ɛnwɔ ebibi alofa , alofa . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso fǝǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa nkpee , tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! ”
42008009	Yesu eto bakasebi átɔ wǝ lekpá nǝmfó eto kasɔ .
42008010	Mfó ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto éfi wǝ sekakedikɔ eto asakulakula eto kobe útǝ mi . Fɛɛ betidi bambaa , akpá ǝsuǝ bɔɔnɔ nnya itǝ bǝ , ‘ balɛ bunyǝ tsyaa , bembunyǝ . Nya balɛ bɔnɔ tsyaa , bǝmbǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ . ’
42008011	“ Lekpá nǝ míntɛyi eto kasɔ ni bǝ , eyibibi nyamǝ ni Onanto eto ditiki .
42008012	Nya eyibibi nnya díbǝ ekpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ te fe betidi ba laanɔ , fɛ Obonsam ǝbǝ kǝlǝkǝ ditiki nǝmǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi . Nya wǝǝtǝ nkǝ bembofo bofo kanɔ bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ofo mǝ bulǝkǝ .
42008013	Nya , nnya díbǝ ékpo lǝ akpankplamboe ǝsuǝǝ , te fe betidi ba lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya báfo ni ku disuǝyuǝ lamfolamfo , fɛɛ díendufǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi sitinti . Nyaso baafo kanɔ itǝ lefe kliminti hã . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ botokabe sɛkɛ díbǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bǝǝtǝ disi .
42008014	Eyibibi nya lékpo lǝ biyufa ntii , te fe betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ , fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto bulǝ ku kǝ asa eto bɔbɛbɛ ku kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kamini eesensǝ keti mǝ , nya yǝǝntǝ kusu bǝ ebibi nyamǝ be , ɛsɛ lǝ balɛ nnya .
42008015	Nya eyibibi nnya díbǝ ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , te fe betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baafo ni kakpe lǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya baabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya bǝǝńyǝ kekleke isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ itǝ bǝ baawɔ ebibi kpǝ .
42008016	“ Utidi kuutsyuǝ anto okandiɛ kefi asa keti wǝ nye ufi wǝ usu okpe lǝ lesa kalɔ . Bomu weefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ kaka betidi ba lǝǝbǝ mfó luunyǝ asa wuee .
42008017	Lesa saa nǝ béfi bákula lǝ kalebe saa , ebɔbɔ lǝ lekple bǝnyǝ . Nya lesa nǝ ke béti bákpee , ebɔbɔ lǝ lekple bǝnyǝ .
42008018	“ Bebe ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ etiki nnya bianɔ ǝsuǝ . Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ . Nya utidi wǝ ke kulesa lentee , nnya úbu nkǝ ite wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani . ”
42008019	Yesu eto bayimi ku mǝ ambe ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , fɛɛ bamfó kusu bunyǝ bǝnyǝ Yesu itsyi lǝ sitiditu sia eso .
42008020	Utidi utsyuǝ ésu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimi ńyǝ lǝ lekple balɛ fǝ bɔbɛbɛ . ”
42008021	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ambe ku mɔ bayimi ni mba laanɔ Onanto eto ditiki nya beeyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝ . ”
42008022	Diyi lɔnii , Yesu édufǝ ɔklɔ kafo ku wǝ bakasebi . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bɔyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ busu lekpake nǝ nse . ” Nyaso bédu bésu .
42008023	Se bányɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ bantɔɔ , Yesu álabe selabe . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke nya ntu dítsyiko bɔsɔ kedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo itǝ bǝ bédufǝ lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti .
42008024	Bakasebi bamǝ ésu básanklisǝ Yesu nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto ! Boanto ! Boǝbǝ bukpǝ ! ” Mfó nya Yesu létaka úńyǝ nya óto ɔkɔɛ uti ufiebi ku ntu bo nlɛ bonwa kakpanka , nya nyamblɛ díyuǝ kɛnyɛ nya lesa saa diyuǝ kanana .
42008025	Nya ɔ́tɔ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bimbǝ bofokanɔ ? ” Fɛɛ iyifo mǝ naa , nya sikpi tsya dímuǝ mǝ . Nya bátɔ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko ni utidi ǝmfo ? Woedi ufiebi ku lekpo etiki nya yetsyue wǝ koto ! ”
42008026	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi áyila bésu bédufǝ Gadara eto kasɔ lǝ ditumbukplɛ eto lekpake nǝ nkpiɔ Galilea eto kasɔ .
42008027	Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ koo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ awɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ étsyi umǝ ǝmǝ úbǝ ótsyako wǝ . Yóofo lefe kpǝ se utidi ǝmfo díkayɛ leyaleya katsyilama . Nya wóakatɔnɔ nkǝ woǝsiǝ lǝ diyo enso lǝ edi nti .
42008028	Se únyǝ Yesuu , ófa nya óto wǝ ǝsuǝ ókpo lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bembembe nkǝ , “ Yesu , Onanto Fanlofanlo eto Ubi ! Be nkpe lǝ bonko ku fǝ lenti mfo ? Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , mǝnnǝ mɛ koto ! ”
42008029	Utidi ǝmfo átɛyi nyamfo , itsyise Yesu áto ɔkuɛ ókpe lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ mfó , nya ɔ́tɛyi ni nkǝ , “ Bɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ” Lefe kpǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsiǝ utidi ǝmǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ bákle wǝ ani ku akpa kulaa tsya bákpe wǝ lǝ amanaa , úkǝfǝsǝ amana nyamǝ nya lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkǝnǝ wǝ kesuko mfiminti .
42008030	Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ baakpo fǝ ? ” Mfó nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ baakpo bǝ Omantsya . ” Ɔ́tɛyi nko itsyise awɔnɔ bua kpǝ dídufǝ ísiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
42008031	Mfóo , awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa yǝnkǝ woanla nnya otsyese kaka awɔnɔ bua lǝǝsiǝ kǝnyǝ kanyi .
42008032	Mfóo , bakplako kpǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ békedi . Nya awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ lɛlɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ utǝ lǝ bedufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ kusu .
42008033	Nyaso bábɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝmblɛ dítsyetsyi báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi nya bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ nya bánya bátsylɔ kenke .
42008034	Lefe nǝ betidi ba díkabe bakplako bamǝ dínyǝ asa nnya díbǝ mfóo , bétsyetsyi bésu bátɛyi betidi ba lɛkɛ lǝ umǝ ku mbuto bo letsylama mfó kenke .
42008035	Nya betidi bamǝ lɛbɔ bésu bǝ lǝ besu babe lesa nǝ díbǝ . Nya se bésu báyo Yesu ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ osani wǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua utsyiko nya unsi lǝ Yesu eto akɔ untǝkǝ ǝnǝ wuee nya onkpe awu lǝ ǝsuǝ unsi kpoo . Mfóo , mǝmblɛ áte sikpi .
42008036	Betidi ba dínyǝ kase asa nyamfó díbǝǝ , átɛyi mba mfó kase Yesu létsya utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua dísiǝ fɛ íkakpa wǝ .
42008037	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Gadare eto kasɔ eto betidi átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ , itsyise sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti . Nyaso Yesu édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ údu .
42008038	Mfó nya utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua úlǝkǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Tǝ kusu lǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ . ” Fɛɛ Yesu mántɔnɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
42008039	“ Sinkli esu oto lǝ esu atɛyi lesa nǝ Onanto diyifo útǝ fǝ . ” Lǝ nyaso utidi ǝmfó ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ka nkpe mfó úkatɛyi asa nnya kenke Yesu díyifo útǝ wǝ .
42008040	Lefe nǝ Yesu dísinkli úsu ɔ́yila ditumbukplɛ nǝ nkpe mfó , betidi bamfó áfo wǝ kukɔnɔ , itsyise mǝmblɛ ǝsiǝ bákabe wǝ kusu .
42008041	Mfó nya osani wǝ baakpo Yairo wǝ lídi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ɔni ǝbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto akɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ utǝkǝko wǝ lǝ besu wǝ diyo ,
42008042	itsyise wǝ ubisiobi ɔni wǝ díkafo fe alɛ lefosi ǝnuǝ , labe ɔlɛ bufi nya okpe lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti . Se Yesu lɛyɛ ɔntɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ báma wǝ bákpe .
42008043	Nya lǝ betidi bamfó ntii , usio wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo itǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ tsya akɛ mǝ lenti . Usio ǝmfo ábiasǝ wǝ atabi kenke nkǝ lǝ otsya wǝ bufi bomǝ , fɛɛ ókplatsya ɔ́nɔ .
42008044	Ɔ́yɛ buɛɛ lǝ Yesu eto kama lǝ betidi nti nya útidi wǝ awu eto kotosi . Lamfolamfo kɔtɔ komǝ áyɛ wǝ bokpo .
42008045	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ nkǝ , “ Owoe dítidi mɛ ? ” Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa mántɔnɔ . Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , be kase betidi kpǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ nya bama fǝ bakpe ! ”
42008046	Tsyaa , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyi miǝ utidi utsyuǝ étidi mɛ , itsyise ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ábɔ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
42008047	Se usio ǝmǝ léte nkǝ wǝmbofo ǝsuǝ bɔbiɔsǝ esoo , útsyiko butinkǝ nya óse akonki ókpe disi kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi lesa nǝ eso útidi Yesu eto awu lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nya úlǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi lesa nǝ eso útidi wǝ awu ku kase bufi bomǝ lɛyɛ wǝ lamfolamfo .
42008048	Lǝ nyamfo eso Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi , fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . Su lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
42008049	Lefenǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ etiki budii , ɔtɔyɛ ɔni ǝbǝ údufǝ wǝ dítsyi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Yairo ɔflɔ . Nya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ koko , nyaso yɛ oteasa ǝmǝ bulǝ . ”
42008050	Fɛɛ Yesu ánɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Yairo nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi . Fǝ fo anɔ fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ ale . ”
42008051	Lǝ lefe nǝ bésu bédufǝ Yairo eto diyo mfóo , wǝntǝ utidi saa kusu nkǝ udufǝ diyo kafo enso Petro ku Yohanes ku Yakobo ku ubisiobi ǝmǝ eto anto ku ambe hã .
42008052	Nya betidi kpǝ díńyǝ mfó banlɛ nku buwi ku kudu lǝ ubi ǝmǝ eso . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biensiwi keku . Ubi ǝmǝ mǝnkpǝ . Selabe ete ɔnlɛ . ”
42008053	Mfóo , nya mǝmblɛ dímǝ wǝ , itsyise mǝ yi bǝnkǝ úkpǝ .
42008054	Yesu ákɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni nya ókpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , taka ǝńyǝ ! ”
42008055	Usiobi ǝmǝ ésinkli úbǝ nkpǝ nya ótaka úńyǝ lamfolamfo . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ bǝtǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ udi .
42008056	Asa nyamfo kenke éyifo wǝ antomǝ yanii , fɛɛ Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ bantɛyi utidi saa lesa nǝ díbǝ mfó .
42009001	Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamfó óboko wǝ akɔ nya útǝ mǝ kusu ku ǝsuǝale lǝ befi bala awɔnɔ bua kenke ku lǝ batsya efimbi akpa akpa tsya .
42009002	Nya óla mǝ ótsyese nkǝ besu bedi betidi etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ batsya befimfi bufi .
42009003	Fɛ booduu , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bientsyi kulesa bisuko lǝ mi esu bɔyɛ ǝsuǝ fe uyilɛlɛ nye fe mba laadia asa eto katobe nye didisa nye atabi . Nya bientsyi akpesa bamba kulaa tsya .
42009004	Diyo nǝ kee baafo mii , bisiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ ke biudu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
42009005	Nya kaka ke bamfo mii , bidu lǝ umǝ ǝmfó lǝ bɛflɛ mi akpa eto utembu bekpo mfó . Nyamfo loote Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eto ditsyǝbi nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ itǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . ”
42009006	Nya bakasebi bamǝ dídu bésu bátsyilama mbuto bomǝ kenke nya bédi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ , bátsya befimfi kalebe saa tsya .
42009007	Se Oka Herodes wǝ nlɛ seka budi lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya kenke nlɛ bubǝǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝlǝ wǝ itsyise betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ni nwǝ disi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ .
42009008	Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Elia ni nwǝ disi úsinkli úbǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi koko bǝtsyuǝ eto ɔni uni wǝ dísinkli úbǝ nkpǝ .
42009009	Mfó nya Oka Herodes lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ dítǝ kusu miǝ bala Yohanes eto disi , nyaso owoe uni wǝ disi úbǝ ɔnlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo nya maanɔ wǝ diye mfo ? ” Nyaso Oka Herodes kábɛbɛ kusu ko wɔɔyɛ lǝ unyǝ Yesu .
42009010	Se bakasebi bamǝ dísinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi Yesu lesa saa nǝ béyifo . Mfó nya ókpa mǝ hã ɔ́yɛnko nya bédu bésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Betsaida .
42009011	Se betidi kpǝ lɛnɔ nkoo , bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bésu mfó . Yesu tsya áfo mǝ nya údi mǝ etiki utsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ótsya mba bufi nlɛ bulǝ .
42009012	Se kale nlɛ boloo , lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tǝ lǝ betidi bamfo lǝ bedu lǝ besu mbuto bo nkpe lǝ lekpake mfó , lǝ babɛbɛ lesa ku kasɔnɔkɔ , itsyise mfo eyifo ntɛnti . ”
42009013	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ” Mfó nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Didisa nǝ bɔnlɛ mfo eyifo abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . Ala fǝ busu boya lesa boboko betidi kpenkpe bamfo ? ”
42009014	Nya basani bamǝ eyifo akpi anɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa fe betidi awosi anɔ anɔ . ”
42009015	Nya se bakasebi bamǝ ditǝ bǝsiǝ nko ,
42009016	Yesu éfi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ nyamǝ nya óbesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato . Ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ befi besiǝ bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
42009017	Nya mǝmblɛ dídi bémi nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛsɛ nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbu nya íyi etsyitsya lefosi ǝnuǝ .
42009018	Diyi lɔni se Yesu mate nlɛ ola botoo , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe betidi laatɛyi bǝ wǝ mini ? ”
42009019	Mfó nya bǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ aatɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Betsyuǝ tsya bǝ Elia . Nya bǝtsyuǝ laatɛyi bǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi koko eto ɔni wǝ disi úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ feni . ”
42009020	Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya mimii , owoe biebu biǝ wǝ mini ? ” Mfó nya Petro dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . ”
42009021	Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ bántɛyi utidi saa ditiki nǝmfo .
42009022	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , nyǝ kanyi tinti lǝ beninǝ ku besumunyǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani nya bɔɔni mɛ boolo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ esuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ mɛ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ mbǝ nkpǝ . ”
42009023	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝmblɛ kenke nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ato ku wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ alasa ǝsuǝ nya lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ diyi saa .
42009024	Itsyise utidi saa wǝ laala nkǝ waata wǝ disi eto nkpǝ , woonyansǝ mu . Nya utidi saa wǝ loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ nkǝ lǝ utǝkǝko mɛ , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
42009025	Nte kutǝkǝ ko utidi luunyǝ lǝ únyǝ kawunsiǝ ka kenke eto bikǝ nya ónyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
42009026	Lǝ mɔ ku mɔ asa nnya maate kenke álɛ utidi utsyuǝ kofanii , wǝ tsya ebɔlɛ Utidi Eto Ubi kofani lǝ lefe nǝ uubǝ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku wǝ Anto eto diyǝnde ku batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ kenke eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
