42009027	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ba nkpe mfoo , embukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ Onanto sekadidi siamǝ . ”
42009028	Fe Kɔsida kɔni eto kama se Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfoo , ókpa Petro ku Yohanes ku Yakobo ɔ́yɛnko bésu bábe kɔtini besu ko disinti ola katokɔ .
42009029	Se ɔnlɛ ola botoo , wǝ ǝnǝmi eto ditsyǝbi afloma nya wǝ awu nnya onkpe léfloma iflubi futututu ɛnlɛ boto lǝ ǝnǝmi .
42009030	Lamfolamfoo , betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ ba ni Moses ku Elia nya banlɛ wǝ etiki budinko .
42009031	Bábɔ ku Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde nya bédi etiki ku Yesu itsyi lǝ kusu ko diyifo Onanto eto lelabi nkǝ ɔyɛ lǝ ko ǝsuǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ Yerusalem .
42009032	Petro ku wǝ bǝtsyuǝ álabe selabe sio sio sio , tsya básankli bǝnyǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu lɛkɛ ku betidi inuǝ ba wonko mǝ díńyǝ mfó .
42009033	Se betidi inuǝ bamfo nlɛ budu lǝ Yesu flɔɔ , Petro átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bo mfo bubǝ alɛkɛ itǝ bo tinti ! Tǝ lǝ boto ebu ǝtsyǝ mfo . Lɔni itǝ fǝ , lɔni itǝ Moses , nya lɔni tsya itǝ Elia . ” Nya asa nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo kenkee , wóante lefe nǝ ɔ́tɛyi nnya tsya .
42009034	Lefe nǝ úńyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budii , lɛtɔntɔ ábɔ díti mǝ kenke . Nya bakasebi bamǝ léte sikpi lǝ lefe nǝ lɛtɔntɔ nǝmfo léba lékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
42009035	Mfó ǝmǝ bánɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lǝ lɛtɔntɔ nǝmǝ kafo wǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ nwǝ mfo ni mɔ Ubi Wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ . Bitsyue wǝ ditiki koto ! ”
42009036	Se ditiki eto ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ lélaa , bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ Yesu mate ete díńyǝ mfó . Bakasebi bamǝ éfi nnya bǝnyǝ mfó bákula , bántɛyi utidi saa nnya kulesa lǝ lefe nǝmǝ .
42009037	Se kale dísiǝǝ , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ áyifǝ betsyi kɔtini komǝ ǝsuǝ bǝbǝ kasɔ . Nya bǝbǝ bétu betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
42009038	Mfó ǝmǝ nya osani utsyuǝ léfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Oteasa ! Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , be mɔ ubi ǝmfo ! Wǝ ete ni mɔ ubi nɛ !
42009039	Lɛwɔnɔ bua ditsyuǝ ǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya diǝtǝ woafa bembembe . Diǝtinkǝsǝ wǝ kekleke kǝmuǝ wǝ kasɔ lǝ kasɔ nya waafo afabe nya efu laabɔ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ . Yeeyifo wǝ nko kekleke kaklɛ fɛ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ laataka lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42009040	Nlɛ fǝ bakasebi lekpakpa minkǝ bala lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ bǝtǝ mɛ , fɛɛ bámfo ni bola . ”
42009041	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mmi eto betidi , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ nya bitidi ato mmǝ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ mfi nkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ isu ese ? Nya nte lefe nǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ele bǝ nkpe utu ntǝ mi fɛ lǝ ndu mi lǝ ɔflɔ . ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa fǝ ubi ǝmǝ aboko mfo . ”
42009042	Kase ubi ǝmǝ nlɛ bubǝ koo , lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ko dísiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ dímuǝ wǝ lɛsɔ lǝ kasɔnti nya dítinkǝsǝ wǝ . Mfó nya Yesu díti lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ kusu nya ótsya ubi ǝmǝ nya úfi wǝ útǝ wǝ anto .
42009043	Onanto eto ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamfo éyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii . Yesu eto eyifosa kenke édufǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ iyifo mǝ yanii lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
42009044	“ Bianta lesa nǝ mǝǝbǝ mi bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ ! Nyamblɛ ebubǝ itǝ itsyi lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝ , buufi wǝ bakpe lǝ betidi eto ani . ”
42009045	Fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ mánnɔ asa nyamfo eto kasɔ . Iyifo lesa nǝ béfi bákula mǝ , fɛɛ báte sikpi lǝ kase bɔɔtɔ wǝ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ banɔ kasɔ .
42009046	Kǝnǝ kǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ kédufǝ lǝ bakasebi bamǝ nti itsyi lǝ futsyuǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ onso lǝ mǝ nti .
42009047	Nya se Yesu léte mǝ nsusu esoo , úfi dikpefi ditsyuǝ úbǝ úńyǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
42009048	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke loofo dikpefi nǝmfo lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , ófo mintsya . Nya utidi wǝ loofo mɛɛ , oofo utidi wǝ létsyese mɛ . Itsyise utidi wǝ laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kenke lǝ mi ntii , wǝ ni utidi wǝ nso kenke nɛ . ”
42009049	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yohanes lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , búnyǝ utidi ɔni wǝ nlɛ awɔnɔ bua bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ nya bɔ́tɛyi wǝ boǝnkǝ úsinkli ɔyɛ , itsyise umbǝ bo lenti . ”
42009050	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bienti wǝ kusu , bete biǝnkǝ uńyǝ mi kama . ”
42009051	Nya se lefe nǝ ele bǝ Onanto kpa Yesu usuko kato nlɛ boyoo , Yesu áse uyi nkǝ wuusu Yerusalem .
42009052	Ótsyese batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ bátɔ bésu umǝ utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ Samaria eto kasɔ lǝ besu bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ itǝ wǝ bubǝ .
42009053	Fɛɛ se umǝ ǝmfo eto betidi léte bǝ wɔɔyɛ mfo ofe lǝ ɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem esoo , bámfo wǝ .
42009054	Mfó se bakasebi ba ni Yohanes ku Yakobo dínyǝ nko esoo , bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , aala fǝ bokpadi ute utsyi kato ubǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ ? ”
42009055	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ , úyenki ókpe mǝ .
42009056	Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi bamǝ léfe bésu umǝ bamba .
42009057	Se banyɛ bantɔɔ , osani utsyuǝ átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Muutǝkǝko fǝ nsu kaka ke fantɔ . ”
42009058	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpaflɔbɛ kpe ǝbiǝ nnya kafo baalabe , nya baklɔbɛ nkpe ayo . Fɛɛ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmbǝ kaka wuuluǝ wǝ disi . ”
42009059	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi utidi bamba nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . ” Fɛɛ utidi ǝmfo nkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu mbikǝ mɔ anto fɛ . ”
42009060	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mba nsi nkpǝ fe bekpǝnkpǝ lǝ besu bebikǝ mǝ bekpǝnkpǝ tsyuǝ . Nya mii , bisu bikatɛyi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto ditiki nǝmǝ . ”
42009061	Utidi ɔni tsya nkǝ , “ Bonamute , muutǝkǝko fǝ . Fɛɛ tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu nkla mɔ betidi fɛ . ”
42009062	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nwǝ ditsyǝ keyifo kasɔ ku dinwuǝ , fɛ weesinkli kabe kamaa , mǝńyǝ utǝ keyifo kǝtǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
42010001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Bonamute ǝlǝkǝ betidi fosi akuanse ku inuǝ bamba nya óla mǝ ótsyese inuǝ , inuǝ nkǝ besu kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo útsyue útsyǝ nkǝ lǝ usu ɔyɛ ofe .
42010002	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛkuɛnkǝ bia díkayo bulǝkǝ fui , fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ emfui . Nyaso bɛlɛ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lekpakpa lǝ otsyese beyifoyifo lǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ bɛkuɛnkǝ biamǝ .
42010003	Bisu ! Nlɛ mi botsyese fe asamubi lǝ bekiti eto nti .
42010004	Bientsyi atabitobe nye asatɔtɔ eto katobe nye afokpa , nya biǝnńyǝ lǝ kusu bisiǝsǝ kuutsyuǝ saa .
42010005	“ Diyo saa biudufǝ , bisiǝsǝ mǝ bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ diyo nǝmfo ku ni betidi . ’
42010006	Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ wǝ laala diyuǝ kpe lǝ mfóo , bitǝ lǝ mi diyuǝ lǝ ditǝkǝko futsyǝ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ mfóo , bidu ku mi diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamǝ .
42010007	Bisiǝ lǝ diyo nǝ ke bɛsɔnɔ . Nya lesa saa nǝ ke boofi bǝtǝ mi , bidi lǝ binǝ faa . Itsyise uyifoyifo saa , ǝńyǝ itǝ kayofofo . Biekedu lǝ diyo lɔni bisu lebamba .
42010008	“ Nya umǝ saa wǝ báfo mii , bidi lesa saa nǝ bootǝ mi .
42010009	Betsya befimfi ba nkpe lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Nya bɛtɛyi umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto eto sekakedidi ebɔfi mi . ’
42010010	Fɛɛ lǝ bisu umǝ utsyuǝ nya báni bámfo mii , bidu bisu obia nti lǝ bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ ,
42010011	‘ Mi umǝ ǝmfo eto utembu bo nkpo bo lǝ akpa kulaa tsyaa , nnyǝ mu bɔ́flɛ bókpo mi mfo . Fɛɛ bekloma biǝ Onanto eto sekadidi eto lefe ebɔfi mi ! ’
42010012	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti kekleke minkǝ lǝ diyi nǝ bookponko betidi lekpo ayoo , Onanto ebunyǝ Sodom eto umǝ kulaa tsya kaminsǝ eso umǝ ǝmfo .
42010013	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Korasimfɔ ! Nya mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Betsaidafɔ ! Itsyise lǝ ayanisa nnya mínyifo lǝ mi nti ete mínyifo lǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ bua inii , eni bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ , béfi afianku báyimi , bédiki ntɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya léte bǝnkǝ báni abua nnya béyifo !
42010014	Onanto ebunyǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ kaminsǝ eso mi lǝ Lekpoyi ǝsuǝ .
42010015	Nya fǝ Kapernaum eto umǝ , bubu fanlɛ fǝ babesǝ fǝ ku fǝ betidi kato eso ? Bɔɔtsylɔsǝ mi , bato mi bakpe lǝ ute ! ”
42010016	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke lɔɔnɔ mi ditikii , mɔ ditiki ɔnɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ lɛni mii , mɔ ɔ́ni . Nya utidi saa wǝ lɛni mɛ , wote nkǝ ɔ́ni Onanto wǝ létsyese mɛ . ”
42010017	Betidi fosi akuanse ku inuǝ bamǝ ésinkli bǝbǝ ku disuǝyuǝ . Nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , awɔnɔ bua kulaa tsya étsyue bo ditiki koto se bóla nnya búlǝkǝ lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ . ”
42010018	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ Obonsam se ófankli útsyi kato úbǝ kasɔ fe ofamfa seka .
42010019	Bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! Ntǝ mi ǝsuǝale bǝ biofo buńyǝ lǝ bawa ku bakpoe ǝsuǝ . Ku lǝ beso olontidi eto ǝsuaǝle kenke ani nya kulesa saa embuyifo mi .
42010020	Fɛɛ yenyifo mi disuǝyuǝ bǝ awɔnɔ bua etsyue mi ditiki ato . Bomu binyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ Onanto áwɔni mi aye ókpe lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kato . ”
42010021	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ákpe disuǝyuǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ kenke nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Anto , kato ku kasɔ eto Onamute , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise asa nnya féfi fákula bekuente ku babesibe , ǝlǝkǝ nnya áte mba lenni kulesa ku mba nte fe bekpefi . Sitintii , Anto , nko nkpe fǝ ɔkɔɛ nɛ . ”
42010022	Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto éfi asa nnya kenke utǝ mɛ . Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi nwǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ , enso Onanto mate hã . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa lenyi utidi wǝ Anto ǝmǝ tsya ni , enso wǝ Ubi ɔni kplo wǝ mate hã ku betidi ba Ubi ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ nkǝ bate Anto ǝmǝ tsya . ”
42010023	Nya Yesu lɛtsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ óbe wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mate buɛɛ nkǝ , “ Ǝsuǝ yuǝ mi sitinti bǝ bɛlɛ asa nnya bɛnlɛ bunyǝ mfo bunyǝ !
42010024	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kpǝ ku baka tsya ála bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ , nya lǝ bánnɔ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ , fɛɛ bɔ́nnɔ . ”
42010025	Kɔfi eto oteasa utsyuǝ ǝbǝ nkǝ woato Yesu obe . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
42010026	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be Asawɔniwɔni Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi ? Nya ntsyǝ faanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ kasɔ ? ”
42010027	Nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ La Bonamute Onanto ku fǝ utu kenke , ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ ǝsuǝale kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke tsya , nya laala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe fǝ ǝsuǝ ke . ”
42010028	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi ɛlɛkɛ nko . Yifo nko ete ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo . ”
42010029	Fɛɛ se kɔfi eto oteasa ǝmǝ léla lǝ utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛbɛ esoo , usi ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ ? ”
42010030	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ étsyi Yerusalem ɔ́tɔ lǝ Yeriko nya beyu dímuǝ wǝ lǝ kusu . Báblɛ wǝ nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyani wǝ betsyǝ mfó lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti .
42010031	Íbǝ bǝ Onanto eto usumunyǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔlɛ bɔyɛ kafe lǝ kusu komǝ mfó . Fɛɛ se únyǝ utidi ǝmfo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ , ɔ́yɛ lǝ lekpake bamba fe údu .
42010032	Nko kǝ Lewinyǝ , utsyuǝ tsya díbǝ ɔ́yɛ mfo ɔnlɛ bofe . Nya se únyǝ osani ǝmǝ , wuntsya áyɛ lǝ ɔflɔ bamba ófe údu .
42010033	Fɛɛ Samarianyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dibǝ ɔ́yɛ lǝ kusu mfo ɔnlɛ bofe , ǝbǝ útu utidi ǝmǝ . Nya se únyǝ wǝ , wǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo .
42010034	Ɔ́yɛ úsu wǝ ɔflɔ nya úfi nnuǝbi ku ntǝ ókpo lǝ wǝ afabe nyamǝ ǝsuǝ nya ókle nnya kenke , nya útsyi osani ǝmǝ útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ubuki ǝsuǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsuko bafɔ eto kasɔnɔkɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ ola óbe wǝ .
42010035	Se kale disiǝ , úlǝkǝ atabi ǝtsyuǝ útǝ nwǝ laabe bafɔ eto kasɔnɔkɔ kamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kalɛ wǝ ola . Nya lǝ nsinkli mbǝ nlɛ bofe mfoo , moofo fǝ lesa nǝ ke fesi fábiasǝ lǝ wǝ bobe ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
42010036	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ afi eto oteasa ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nya lǝ fǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ , betidi itsyǝ bamfo nti eto owoe lǝ fǝ ǝnyǝsa ǝsuǝ , ni utidi wǝ didufǝ lǝ bewudifɔ bamfo eto ani eto ɔyimitsyuǝ ? ”
42010037	Afi eto oteasa ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ dinyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya su lǝ esu eyifo nko . ”
42010038	Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛyɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ , bésu bedufǝ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ . Usio utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Marta ákpa wǝ úsuko wǝ diyo .
42010039	Ɔyimisio utsyuǝ akɛ Marta wǝ baakpo Maria . Usio ǝmfo ǝsiǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔnlɛ wǝ asa nnya ɔnlɛ bote bɔnɔ .
42010040	Diyo bobe eto asa nnya dísu ítǝkǝ lǝ Marta mate ǝsuǝ étsyiko wǝ bulǝ . Nya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , yenyifo fǝ kulesa bǝ mɔ ɔyimisio áyani diyo bobe eto asa buyifo nyamfó kenke utǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ? Tɛyi wǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔwunsǝko mɛ ! ”
42010041	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ O Marta ! Be kase fanlɛ ǝsuǝ bulǝ lǝ asa kpǝ ǝsuǝ .
42010042	Fɛɛ lesa lɔni ete loohiã bǝ babɛbɛ . Nya lesa nǝmǝ ni nǝ Maria dílǝkǝ nɛ . Nya bensiembofo ni lǝ wǝ ani . ”
42011001	Diyi lɔnii , Yesu ákɛ lǝ kalebe kǝtsyuǝ ókato ola . Se ólosǝ , wǝ bakasebi eto ɔni , ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , te bo kase buukato ola fe kase Yohanes léte wǝ bakasebi . ”
42011002	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo Anto , tǝ lǝ bakpasǝ fǝ diye . Fǝ sekadidi lǝ sibǝ . Beyifo lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo fe kase inte kato .
42011003	Tǝ bo bo diyi saa eto didisa .
42011004	Nya lǝ efi bo abua atsyɛ bo , fe kase bo tsya leefi katsyɛ utidi saa wǝ laata bo kebu . Nya mǝntǝ lǝ budufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ nya le ǝlǝkǝ bo etsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
42011005	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ áyɛ úsu wǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ eto diyo ku ntsyenti úsu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyɛtsyuǝ , dia ǝlǝmbo ǝtsyǝ ǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ ,
42011006	itsyise mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ ɔni etsyi kusu ubǝ ɔsɔnɔ mɛ mɔmɔ . Nya didisa saa ente muutǝ wǝ ! ’
42011007	“ Nya fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mǝmbǝ ǝlǝ mɛ ! Bonko mɔ bebi ebolabe nya búti siku lǝ diyo . Mensi embofo botaka mɔmɔ kǝbǝ kǝtǝ fǝ kulesa . ’
42011008	Lǝ íbǝ bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , be ni lesa nǝ fuuyifo ? Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ mǝ sɛyɛtsyuǝ mate esoo , wǝmbotaka . Fɛɛ lǝ kase fǝnyǝ fanlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ hã esoo , wootaka utǝ fǝ lesa saa nǝ fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ .
42011009	“ Bɛtɔ asa lǝ befi bǝtǝ mi . Bɛbɛbɛ asa lǝ binyǝ . Bɛsɔ siku lǝ basini mi .
42011010	Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ laatɔ asaa , bǝǝtǝ wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabɛbɛɛ , wǝǝnyǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laasɔ sikuu , bɔɔsini wǝ .
42011011	“ Nya mimba ni bebiantomǝǝ , biefi owa kǝtǝ lǝ lɛkpɛ nǝ ubi lɛtɔ mi eto kɛnyɛ ?
42011012	Nye okpoe bomu biefi kǝtǝ wǝ lǝ dikusɛmfɔ nǝ ɔ́tɔ eto kɛnyɛ ?
42011013	Mimba ni babuayifo kulaa tsya yi kase buifi asa sɛɛ bitǝ mi bebi . Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ ku Boanto wǝ nkpe kato itǝ bo ? Ntsyǝ yoofó bubǝ bǝ wǝmbufi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ utǝ betidi ba laatɔ wǝ ? ”
42011014	Lefe lɔnii , Yesu ákala lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ lǝǝndi etiki ketsyiko lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso se lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛbɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ko , utidi ǝmǝ étsyiko etiki budi . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba díńyǝ mfó yanii .
42011015	Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Awɔnɔ bua kenke eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Beelsebul eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ woafo nya bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
42011016	Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya léla bǝ baato Yesu babe eso bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ úyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ ote nkǝ Onanto ɔflɔ utsyi .
42011017	Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ ate mǝ nsusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sekakedikɔ saa sia lema akpa akpa nya mǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , sekakedikɔ siamfo eboba . Nya diyo nǝ ke eto betidi lǝǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , diyo nǝmǝ eboba .
42011018	Nyaso lǝ boma kpe lǝ Obonsam eto sekakedikɔɔ , ntsyǝ fɛ wǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ luunyǝ ? Bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ maala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Beelsebul eto ǝsuǝale nnya wǝǝtǝ mɛ eso .
42011019	Nya lǝ Beelsebul ǝsuǝ maala mǝǝ , bawoe ǝsuǝ mba ntǝkǝko mi laayɛ kala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ ? Mi kosate eto mba ntǝkǝko mi lɛ bulǝkǝ kate nkǝ bidia baatɛyi .
42011020	Owo lo ! Onanto eto ǝsuǝale bomu ǝsuǝ maala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ . Nyalɛ nyamfo lɛ bulǝkǝ kate mi wuee nkǝ , Onanto eto sekakedidi ébubǝ sékpe lǝ mi nti koko .
42011021	“ Lǝ ǝsuǝaletidi utsyuǝ ǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ bemamakǝ uńyǝ ɔlɛ wǝ diyo bosee , te fǝ bike bia nte wǝ embonya .
42011022	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi wǝ nkpe ale nso wǝ ǝbǝ nkǝ woakpɔ ku wǝ nya óso wǝ anii , woalɛ wǝ bemamakǝ bia ǝsuǝ ufi wǝ disi utǝkǝ kafo nya woalɛ utidi ǝmǝ eto bikǝ kafo kesiǝ kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
42011023	“ Utidi wǝ ke lǝmbǝ lǝ mɔ lekpakee , te fǝ uńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ sitinti . Nya utidi wǝ ke laankpa asa kǝtsyǝ ditsyu ku mɛ , te fǝ ɔlɛ nnya busense kewi .
42011024	“ Lǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua ábɔ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝǝ , diesu katsyilama nlebe nlebe bo lekoe kabɛbɛ kaka diɔkɛ ditsyǝ ɔnwɛ . Nya lǝ díǝnnyǝ kedufǝkɔɔ , diatɛyi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Muusinkli nsu mɔ diyo nǝ mínsiǝ kɔ . ’
42011025	Nyaso diesinkli kesu kabe ǝkǝnyǝ nkǝ bákpa diyo nǝmǝ kafo kɛnkɛnkɛ nya lesa saa nte kukɔnɔ .
42011026	Lǝ nnya esoo , diabɛbɛ awɔnɔ bua akuanse nnya nkpe disiale enso ni nya bǝǝbǝ bǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ mfo . Lǝ kalosǝkɔ , utidi ǝmfo eto nkpǝ bo woǝsiǝ abia kaso mbo úsiǝ kɔ kulaa tsya . ”
42011027	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfoo , usio utsyuǝ wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto lǝ okpo usio wǝ lélé fǝ ku nwǝ dítǝ fǝ lɛmi fáyimi atsyɔ ! ”
42011028	Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba laanɔ Onanto eto ditiki nya beeyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝ , mǝ bomu ele bǝ bǝnyǝ disuǝnyuǝ nɛ ! ”
42011029	Nya se betidi bamǝ dítsyiko bufui lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe kase mi mmi eto betidi nkpe sibusufɔ ! Ayanisa eto bulǝkǝ kate nya baala bǝ bǝǝnyǝ , fɛɛ bembunyǝ anyinisa saa enso nya díbǝ lǝ Yona ǝsuǝ seka .
42011030	Fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yona eto ale díbǝ itǝ lǝ Ninivefɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke Utidi eto Ubi tsya eto ale luubǝ fe ditsyǝbi itǝ mmi eto betidi nɛ .
42011031	Nya lǝ diyi fɛfɛ eto Lekpoyi ǝsuǝǝ , Besio eto Oka wǝ dítsyi Ɔnwɛdikue ebotaka uńyǝ nya woote mi lɛnimi lǝ lɛwɔ olo mi dikpi , itsyise ótaka útsyi lǝ wǝ kasɔ ka letso famfamfa úsu nkǝ lǝ ɔnɔ Oka Salomo eto kobetete eto asa . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ utidi wǝ nso Salomoo , wǝ ni nwǝ mfo nɛ .
42011032	Ninivefɔ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ nya boolo mi mmi eto betidi bamfo dikpi . Itsyise lefe nǝ Yona lɛtɛyi mǝ Onanto eto ditikii , bátsyi báwuninsǝ nya báyɛ mǝ abua buyifo . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utidi ɔni utsyuǝ kpe lǝ mi nti mfo wǝ lɛmɔ onso Yona kulaa tsya !
42011033	“ Utidi kuutsyuǝ saa anto okandiɛ kefi kakula nye kakpe lǝ asa kalɔ . Bomu weefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ kaka betidi ba lǝǝbǝ mfó luunyǝ asa wue .
42011034	Utidi eto ǝnǝmi eyifo fe okandiɛ itǝ wǝ utidi ǝmǝ . Lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnyǝ asa kukɔnɔɔ , fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke tsya , yuutǝ ǝnyǝ asa ekpa kenke . Fɛɛ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝmbǝ kɔnɔɔ , te fǝ fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke kpe lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ .
42011035	Nyaso lɔ abe fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ bǝ diyǝnde nǝ nkpe fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mamfiani ketuntu .
42011036	Lǝ diyǝnde akpasǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke nya fǝ kukalebe saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝǝ , te fǝ fǝ kalebe saa ebunyǝ lekpasǝ fe kase okandiɛ lǝǝyǝnde nya wǝ diyǝnde laakpo fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ seka . ”
42011037	Se Yesu dídi etiki ólosǝǝ , Farisinyǝ ɔni utsyuǝ ákpadi wǝ nkǝ ubǝ udi lesa lǝ wǝ diyo . Mfó nya úsu úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ lǝ udi lesa .
42011038	Íyifo Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ buɛ se únyǝ nkǝ Yesu mǝmflǝ kɔni fe kase mǝ lekpa lete fɛ útsyiko budi .
42011039	Nyaso Bonamute Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , mi Farisifɔ biǝflǝ mi kedikpɛ ku akɔbe eto kama , fɛɛ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , biyi ku lefomfi ku asa buayifoyifo sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
42011040	Bieninǝ ! Inni Onanto ǝmǝ ete ni nwǝ díyifo asa nnya kenke eto kafo ku kama lee ntsyǝ ?
42011041	Bifi lesa saa nǝ nkpe lǝ mi kakpɛ ku akɔbe kafo bitǝ bakombo bǝ lǝ mi lesa saa lǝ ele kɛnkɛnkɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
42011042	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Farisifɔ ! Biefi mi edisa ku mi nyoma eto bekolenkǝ ku seko ku afantosi akpa akpa , nnya laanyi fififi eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ Onanto . Fɛɛ bɛni asa sɛɛ buyifo lǝ kɔnukualɛsu ǝsuǝ nya biannla Onanto tsya . Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ele bǝ biyifo bɛkɔ lǝ nnya bímfi bɛnlɛ buyifo koko , nya yanle bǝ bilǝkǝ ku kuǝtsyuǝ bitsyɛ kama .
42011043	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Farisifɔ ! Itsyise biala biǝ biǝsiǝ lǝ nsiǝkɔ kplɛ bo nso lǝ ntsyakɔ . Nya biala biǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mi ku dibu lǝ obia .
42011044	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , itsyise bite fe edi nnya mbikǝ lǝ kasɔ bǝǝnyǝ kǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya betidi laayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kafe itsyise baante nko . ”
42011045	Mfó ǝmǝ kɔfi eto oteasa ɔni lǝ mǝ nti átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , lǝ atɛyi nyamfo nkoo , áka bontsya . ”
42011046	Nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa tsya . Itsyise bietsyisǝ betidi bikǝ bia bembofo butsyi . Nya biemfi nsusu kabe biǝ biawunsǝko mǝ lǝ mi butsyi ǝsuǝ .
42011047	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi sitinti , itsyise béto edi kukɔnɔ bitǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi . Fɛɛ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bamfoo , lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mi bana mǝ lélo mǝ .
42011048	Nya mi kosatee , bɛtɔnɔ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ biǝ lesa nǝ mi anto mǝ díyifo álɛkɛ . Mǝ lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bamǝ nya mi léto mǝ edi .
42011049	Nyamfo eso Onanto lǝ wǝ kobetete ǝsuǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku batɔnkpe nya boolo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nya bootǝkǝko bǝtsyuǝ kama . ’
42011050	Nyaso mi mmi eto betidi kenkee , boonǝ mi koto lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba kenke bálo idu taa kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ kǝ .
42011051	Idu lefe nǝ bálo Abel ibǝ eyo Sakaria wǝ bálo lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ku kakɛnkɛkɔ eto nti . Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , Onanto ebunǝ mi , mmi eto betidi ato lǝ nyamfo kenke eso !
42011052	“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi kɔfi eto bateasa ! Itsyise diyo nǝ kafo kobe nkpee , bíti ni siku bílǝkǝ safui bídunko . Fɛɛ mi kosate áni biǝ biembudufǝ lǝ ni kafo . Nya bieti betidi bamba ba nlɛ bokplatsya bǝ beedufǝ lǝ ni tsya kusu . ”
42011053	Se Yesu dídu lǝ kaka mfóo , Farisifɔ ku kɔfi eto bateasa étsyiko bunyǝnki nya bátɔ wǝ etiki kpǝ ku lɛblɔfi .
42011054	Nya banlɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ bǝ ɔtɛyi kabua .
42012001	Se betidi akpi akpi bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ bátsya mfóo , itǝ bǝ bétsyiko bǝtsyuǝ bukǝ kamanklii , Yesu étsyiko wǝ bakasebi etiki budi katɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ eto bidiabidia eto asayifoyifo nnya laayansǝ betidi ǝsuǝ .
42012002	Lesa saa nǝ betidi díyifo bákula , ǝbɔbɔ lǝ lekple utidi saa nyǝ wuǝ , nya akulasa saa ǝbɔbɔ bate .
42012003	Nyaso lesa saa nǝ ke bátɛyi lǝ kaka lenaa , diɔbɔ lǝ lekple banɔ . Nya asa nnya bátɛyi lǝ kawɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ diyo kǝmiǝǝ , boolǝkǝ nnya babe letsya utsyuǝ saa nɔ .
42012004	“ Bayɛtsyuǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , bianté sikpi betidi ba laafo etidisuǝ ete bolo nya bensiembofo kulesa buyifo lǝ nnya kama .
42012005	Utidi wǝ ele bǝ bete sikpii , muulǝkǝ wǝ nte mi . Bete sikpi Onanto wǝ lǝ ólo fǝ ólosǝǝ , nya unsi onkpe ǝsuǝale uufi fǝ oto okpe lǝ ditefɛnku nǝ lǝǝnyǝ lefe saa kǝmiǝ . Befo mɛ bɛnɔ biǝ , wǝ ni utsyuǝ ele bǝ bete sikpi nɛ .
42012006	Inni pɛsewa inuǝ ete baate ntsyuɛ nnɔɔ ? Fɛɛ Onanto anta mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ .
42012007	Mi disi eto sɛwɔni kulaa tsya , Onanto yi se leklambi . Nyasoo , biensite sikpi itsyise befo koya beso baklɔbɛ kpǝ .
42012008	“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kasini minkǝ , utidi wǝ ke lɔɔtɛyi lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi nkǝ uyifo mɔ olee , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya ebofo wǝ fe wǝ ole lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe eto ǝnǝmi .
42012009	Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lɔɔni mɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmii , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya ebɔni wǝ lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
42012010	Nya utidi saa wǝ lɔɔtɛyi lesatsyuǝ uńyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebufi ɔtsyɛ wǝ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ luudi mbusiotiki lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embufi nnya ɔtsyɛ wǝ kulefe .
42012011	“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bakpa mi besuko Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nye baka eto ǝnǝmi bǝ baakponko mi lekpoo , biǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ mi lǝ lesa nǝ biusu bɛtɛyi ǝsuǝ nye kase biota mi ǝsuǝ disi .
42012012	Itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayo . ”
42012013	Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ mfo lǝ betidi nti wǝ lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tɛyi mɔ ɔyimi fǝnkǝ usie bo anto eto bikǝ bia utsyǝ bo lǝ mfo mɔ bele . ”
42012014	Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , owoe dítǝ mɛ kusu nkǝ nsie bikǝ nye nyifo okponkpo lǝ mi inuǝ eto bikǝ busie ǝsuǝ ? ”
42012015	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ bikǝtanta ku kunǝnkpǝ saa eto okle ǝsuǝ , itsyise utidi eto nkpǝ sitinti manyɛ lǝ bikǝ bia nkpe wǝ , lǝ uyifo otabinyǝ kulaa tsya ǝsuǝ . ”
42012016	Yesu ésukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝǝ , “ Otabinyǝ utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ wǝ lɛkɛ nsɔ kpǝ bo lɛlɛkɛ bidikǝ tinti .
42012017	Lǝ nyamfo eso úfi nsusu nkǝ , ‘ Se mǝnnyǝ kaka muutsyǝ mɔ bidikǝ biamfoo , be ele bǝ nyifo ?
42012018	“ ‘ Lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo ni bǝ mooba mɔ kenwu ka kɔ nya mooto kafɔfɔ ka lɔɔmɔ eso nka kɔ . Mfó muunyǝ kǝtsyǝkɔ itǝ mɔ bidikǝ ku bikǝ kenke .
42012019	Nya mɔɔtɛyi mɔ ǝsuǝ minkǝ disiɛkpɛ kpe mɛ . Nkpe asa sɛɛ kpǝ nnya mɔɔlɔ ntsyǝ itǝ alɛ kpǝ . Muusiǝ ntsyǝ ɔnwɛ nya muudi , nnǝ nya muudi nkpǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ . ’
42012020	“ Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ utidimumu ! Ketsye kamfo hã moofo fǝ nkpǝ lǝ fǝ ani . Nya owoe luudi asa nnya fála fǝ alɔ ǝtsyǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mfo ? ’ ”
42012021	Mfó nya Yesu lélosǝ wǝ etiki nkǝ , “ Mmǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ betidi ba laabɛbɛ asa kpǝ kǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo nya baanlɔ kulesa kǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto nɛ . ”
42012022	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ biankpɔnko ǝsuǝ lǝ lesa nǝ biudi bisiǝ nkpǝ nye lesa nǝ biɔlɛ ǝsuǝ .
42012023	Nkpǝ afo koya boso didisa , nya etidisuǝ tsya afo koya eso lesa nǝ bɔɔlɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ
42012024	Bɛlɛ ǝnǝmi bebe baklɔbɛ ba laamfó ɔkɔɛ nya bǝǝmfǝsǝ nye bǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ tsya . Bǝmbǝ kenwu nye bikǝ kǝtsyǝkɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝǝtǝ mǝ didisa ! Nya mimba lefo koya benso baklɔbɛ nkpǝ !
42012025	Nya mi utsyuǝ ebofo nkpǝ busiǝ diyi lɔni kplo kasonsǝ alɛ nnya ele bǝ usiǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lekplatsya ǝsuǝ ?
42012026	Nya lǝ biembofo kulesa buyifo lǝ asa kɛkɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , beso bia bakplatsya kele ǝsuǝ lǝ asa bamba tsya ǝsuǝ ?
42012027	“ Bibu bebe kase dituwinimi lǝǝmǝ kanɔ bobee . Kaanta olokotutu nya keendi kafia kefi keti ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Oka Salomo kulaa tsya lǝ wǝ kɔlɔkɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , mánnɔ bobe fe dituwunimi nǝ lǝǝmǝ mfó .
42012028	Lǝ Onanto lǝǝtǝ sefa kɔlɔkɔ komfo eto oklee , sefa sia lǝǝńyǝ mmi ete nya lǝ kǝsiǝsǝ ete baala se kato kakpé lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝǝ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ Onanto ǝmfo kǝ embutǝ mi alɛsa nnya lǝmboso sefa eto ale nyamǝ ? Be dítǝ eso mi bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale mmǝ ?
42012029	Nyaso biante sikpi lǝ bɛsɛsǝ ǝnǝmi bikatɔ biǝnkǝ be biudi nye be biunǝ .
42012030	Itsyise betidi ba dímamfo Onanto bánɔɔ , mǝ ni mba leefi mǝ ǝnǝmi kǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Mi Anto yi nkǝ asa nyamfo kenke afe itǝ mi .
42012031	Bomu bikebu disi ketsyiko lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ nya uufi nyamfo kenke utǝ mi .
42012032	“ Mi ditsyukpa kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝko mɛ , biante sikpi . Itsyise iyifo Onanto eto lelabi bǝ utǝ mi kǝsiǝkɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ .
42012033	Bifi mi bikǝ bia nte mi bisu bete lǝ bifi atabi nyamǝ bitǝ bakombo . Lǝ bɛbɛbɛ otabitobe wǝ lǝǝmbobia bitsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Mfóo , nya mi bikǝ bia lefo koya luutsyǝ kpoo nya biembolo kulefe . Itsyise uyu saa ǝmbofo budufǝ mfo nya balɛ lembobiasǝ mi .
42012034	Itsyise kaka fǝ bikǝ bia lefo koya ntee , mfo mi ketu tsya luusiǝ nɛ .
42012035	“ Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itǝ lesa nǝ ke luubǝ , lǝ mi kakandiɛ lǝ kǝkǝnyǝ . Nya biǝntǝ lǝ mi okandiɛ lǝ ɔni .
42012036	Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bińyǝ fe kase beyifoyifo lǝǝńyǝ kǝsǝkǝ mǝ Onamute wǝ luutsyi kusiǝ kakpakɔ ubǝ . Lǝ ubǝ ɔsɔ sikuu , lǝ basini bǝtǝ wǝ lamfolamfo .
42012037	Beyifoyifo ba Onamute luubǝ unyǝ nkǝ bǝńyǝ balɛ bose itǝ wǝ bubǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ! Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , wɔɔwuninsǝ kafia lǝ lɛmɔkɔsi ɔtsyimi , nya wuutǝ nkǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ wǝ kedikɔ , nya wǝ kosate luutǝ mǝ lesa bedi .
42012038	Lǝ ibǝ bǝ ntsyenti nye kolensiǝnto kplɛ úbǝ nya únyǝ mǝ se bǝńyǝ bensǝkǝ wǝ bubǝǝ , nte disuǝyuǝ nǝ eto okle wookpe mǝ !
42012039	Mɔmɔɔ , bete biǝ lǝ oyosate ebote lefe nǝ uyu luubǝ uyu wǝǝ , eni wǝmbutǝ wǝ kusu nkǝ oba udufǝ wǝ diyo .
42012040	Nyaso nko ele bǝ itsyǝ mi tsya bǝ bińyǝ bikabe kusu nɛ , itsyise mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebubǝ udufǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bɛnnlɛ wǝ kusu bobe . ”
42012041	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Petro lɛtɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bo fanlɛ lekpa nǝmfo bɔtɛyi kǝtǝ , lee dińyǝ itǝ utidi saa ? ”
42012042	Nya Yesu ditǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Uyifoyifo ni nwǝ ntǝkǝ ǝnǝ nya weeyifo keyifo lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto kusu ǝsuǝ , wǝ ni nwǝ wǝ Onamute leefi kǝtsyǝ lǝ wǝ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ eto kɛnyɛ nɛ . Nya wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ wǝ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ mǝ didisa lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
42012043	Bebe , lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ afo nya woeyifo ke kukɔnɔ fɛ wǝ Onamute díbǝǝ , wuunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ !
42012044	Sitintii , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ wǝ Onamute ǝmfó ebufi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ utsyǝ lǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke eto kɛnyɛ .
42012045	“ Fɛɛ lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute ésu kusu wǝǝmbubǝ mlǝ , ’ nyaso útsyiko budi kǝnǝ kǝkpǝ ntǝ nya woablɛ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ ba ni basani ku besio kenke ku disialee ,
42012046	wǝ Onamute ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ uyifoyifo lenyi , ɔnnlɛ kusu bobe . Mfó Onamute ǝmǝ ebunǝ wǝ koto kekleke ko dinyǝ itǝ mba ditidi ato bamfó eto okle .
42012047	“ Uyifoyifo wǝ nyi lesa nǝ wǝ Onamute laala nkǝ uyifo utǝ wǝ fɛ woani ni buyifo se woanla nkǝ woeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ esoo , ablɛ hã buukablɛ wǝ nya luutǝ ofo afabe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42012048	Fɛɛ uyifoyifo wǝ lennyi lesa nǝ wǝ Onamute laala nkǝ uyifo fɛ uyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ kotonǝnǝ , sɛkɛ ete boonǝ wǝ koto . Utidi saa wǝ bǝtǝ asa kpǝǝ , nko ke ele bǝ uyifo asa kpǝ nɛ . Nyaso utidi saa wǝ bǝtǝ asa kpǝ isi ensoo , nko ke ele bǝ uyifo keyifo isi eso nɛ .
42012049	“ Mfi Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nte fe ute seka mboko kawunsiǝ . Nya nla sitinti minkǝ eni utsyiko buńyǝ koko .
42012050	Ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto bulǝ kplɛ butsyuǝ kpe ele bǝ mfo fe kase ketu leetsyi utidi kedunko . Nya membunyǝ lɛwɔnɔ nsiǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bulǝ bomfó díbǝ bófe .
42012051	Bíbu biǝ mbǝ kawunsiǝ miǝ mǝǝtǝ mi diyuǝ ? Owo lo ! Inni diyuǝsǝ , bomu nti busǝnsǝ eso .
42012052	Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , ayo nnya fe kaka betidi ɛnɔ nkpee , boosensǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Inuǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ itsyǝ ǝsuǝ nya itsyǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ inuǝ ǝsuǝ .
42012053	Ubianto ebotaka uńyǝ lǝ wǝ bebisaibi ǝsuǝ , nya bebisaibi lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ anto ǝsuǝ . Ambemǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bebisiobi ǝsuǝ , nya bebisiobi tsya lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ambemǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝsǝambe mǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bebisaibi eto bǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bebi eto bǝsiǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bǝsǝambemǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
42012054	Yesu átɛyi betidi bamfó tsya nkǝ , “ Lǝ binyǝ biǝ lɛsɔmiloku ana ditsyi kofe eto diyo kedufǝkɔ lǝ difule lɛlɛ bubǝǝ , biatɛyi mfó ǝmǝ biǝ ɔsɔmi ebubǝ ɔni . Nya yǝǝbǝ kǝtǝ nko .
42012055	Nya lǝ binyǝ biǝ ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ ketsyi Ɔnwɛdukuǝ eti ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , biatɛyi biǝ utefofo nye diwi ɛbɔkɛ . Nya yǝǝbǝ kǝtǝ nko .
42012056	Ǝnǝmi , ǝnǝmi eto betidi , lǝ binyǝ kato ku kasɔ eto ditsyǝbii , biate lefe nǝ ɛnlɛ bote , beso bɛnnlɛ mɔmɔ eto lefe kasɔ bɔnɔ kǝlǝkǝ kate ?
42012057	“ Beso biamfo budufǝ lǝ asa kǝmiǝ kabe lɛsɛ nǝ ele bǝ biyifo ?
42012058	Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ákpadi fǝ etiki lǝ lekpokakpokɔ nkǝ fonko wǝ ákɛ etiki ǝtsyuǝǝ , yɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ lǝ alɔ etiki nyamǝ ǝtsyǝ fɛ lǝ bidufǝ lekpokakpokɔ . Leni nkoo , wuufi fǝ utǝ bakponkpo nya mba lǝǝmuǝ betidi luufi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ diyo .
42012059	Nya nlɛ fǝ butǝ bote minkǝ ebɔkɛ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ fafó fǝ kotonǝnǝ eto kayo kenke falosǝ . ”
42013001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó ba lɛtɛyi Yesu kase Pilato lélo Galileafɔ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkǝtǝ Onanto kedi .
42013002	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibu biǝnkǝ se bálo Galileafɔ bamfo nko esoo , mǝ abua nnya béyifo amɔ eso Galileafɔ fɛfɛ kenke ?
42013003	Owo lo ! Inni nko ini kon ! Fɛɛ nnya míntɛyi mi ni bǝ , lǝ bianyɛ mi asa bua buyifoo , nko ke mi tsya luubǝ bikpǝ nɛ .
42013004	Nya betidi lefosi mflamfla ba Siloa eto diyo kplɛ nǝmǝ léba lékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝkpǝǝ , bibu biǝ lǝ nyamfo eso beyifo babuatidi banso mba nsi lǝ Yerusalem mfó kenke ?
42013005	Owo lo ! Inni nko ini kon ! Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bientsyi mi akɔɛsi bɛwuninsǝ , nko ke mimblɛ kenke luubǝ bikpǝ fe mǝ ke nɛ . ”
42013006	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefe mǝ , osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ lɛkɛ kudiyi kutsyuǝ lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Úsu nkǝ lǝ usu ɔbɛbɛ kuyi komǝ eto ebibi , fɛɛ wǝnnyǝ ku ǝtsyuǝ .
42013007	Mfó ǝmǝ ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ laabe wǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Alɛ ǝtsyǝ ni nyamfo nɛ se mǝǝbǝ mfo kǝbǝ kabɛbɛ kuyi komfo eto ebibi kanɔ nɛ . La ko akpo kasɔ , itsyise kumbǝ kutǝkǝ saa itǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ kuńyǝ mfo . ’
42013008	“ Fɛɛ nwǝ laabe ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , yani ko lǝ kusi kunyǝ lɛlɛ lɔni kplo lǝ bobe . Muuku ko kalɔ ntsyilama nkpo asa nnya lɔɔlɛkǝsǝ kasɔ kamǝ lǝ bobe .
42013009	Nya lǝ kofó ebibi kpǝ bɔnwɔɔ , ɛlɛkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ koamfo bɔnwɔ lɛlɛ nǝ luubǝ , ebofo ko bola kakpo kasɔ . ’ ”
42013010	Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lɔni ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ákɛ mfó úkate asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
42013011	Nya usio utsyuǝ tsya ákɛ mfó wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua ditsyuǝ díkǝlǝ fe lefosi alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝtǝ bǝ usio ǝmǝ ǝnwǝ úkǝnǝ lefe saa eso woamfo bɔtsyɔ kǝńyǝ tente .
42013012	Se Yesu dínyǝ wǝǝ , ókpadi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Usio , báyankli fǝ lǝ fǝ bufi ǝsuǝ ! ”
42013013	Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ usio ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Lamfolamfo , usio ǝmǝ átaka úńyǝ ɔ́tsyɔ nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto .
42013014	Nwǝ laabe Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ ǝnyǝ ɔblɔ tinti lǝ kase Yesu létsya ufimfi ǝmǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ eso . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamfó kenke nkǝ , “ Bokpe eyi akua nnya ele bǝ bufi buyifo bo nyifo . Nyaso bekpe eyi nyamfo bǝ lǝ lesatsyuǝ lɛ mii , bibǝ lǝ batsya mi , inni lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ! ”
42013015	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Bonamute dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi , mii , biǝlǝkǝ bebuki ba leeyifo mi keyifo nye leetsyi mi bikǝ ketsyiko lǝ kakuɛ nya biakpa mǝ kesuko ntu kǝnǝkɔ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
42013016	Nya mɔmɔɔ , biǝnyǝ Abraham eto ketsyikɔ eto ubi sionko wǝ ńyǝ mfo , wǝ Obonsam dífi kǝkuǝ ókle lefosi alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ ni nyamfo . Yenyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ bǝ bǝlǝkǝ wǝ lǝ kǝkuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ? ”
42013017	Etiki nnya Yesu dílǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi mfo ǝtǝ bǝ kofani ǝmuǝ wǝ balo , nya betidi bamba dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ anyinisa nnya kenke ɔnlɛ bulǝkǝ kate eso .
42013018	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi kase Onanto eto Sekadidi laayɛ kesensǝ ? Nya be ele bǝ bufi nnya bokatesǝ ko ?
42013019	Bebe ! Osani utsyuǝ éfi diyibibi ditsyuǝ nǝ nso bɔfɛ óto lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Se diyibibi nǝmǝ díkǝǝ , díbǝ lébe léfiani kuyi kplɛ kutsyuǝ eto kɔlɔmɔ ǝsuǝ baklɔbɛ díbǝ báto ayo bakpe . ”
42013020	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa bamba nkǝ , “ Be muufi Onanto sekadidi nkatesǝ ko ?
42013021	Usio utsyuǝ éfi ǝyǝnkisǝsa úfi ótsyakasǝ ku nnamfo eto ɔkpɛ ɔni , nya ɔ́fɔkɔtisǝ ɔ́wɔ mu isu ese lefe nǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa nyamǝ léba ídufǝ lǝ nnamfo bomǝ kenke ǝsuǝ nya dítǝ botaka . ”
42013022	Yesu ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ku mbuto kafo nya óte betidi asa lǝ lefe nǝ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
42013023	Mfó ǝmǝ nya utidi utsyuǝ lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ɛkpɛ ini bǝ betidi ba luubǝ bǝnyǝ bofo , ǝmbufui lee ntsyǝ ini ? ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ ,
42013024	“ Bekpe ale lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kesie ka nso bɔfɛ bidufǝ . Itsyise betidi kpǝ ebola sitinti bǝ baayɛ mfo lǝ bedufǝ , fɛɛ bǝmbofo budufǝ .
42013025	Lefe ebubǝ leyo itǝ buudufǝ nya Onamute ǝmǝ lootaka uńyǝ nya wuuti kesie kamǝ . Nya mimba dibu biińyǝ lǝ lekple biu kasɔ siku katɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onamute , sini bo ! ’ “ Fɛɛ Onamute ǝmǝ ebulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Minnyi mi ku kaka bitsyi ! ’
42013026	“ Nya biɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo ku fǝ lídi búnǝ , nya fáte asa lǝ bo umǝ ! ’
42013027	“ Fɛɛ usi ɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Minnyi mi ! Bidu mɛ lǝ akɔ mi babuayifotidi . ’
42013028	“ Mfo ǝmǝ nya nku buwi ku animi bunǝ lɔɔkɛ lǝ lefe nǝ biunyǝ Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob Ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto léla mi ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ biendufǝ mfó .
42013029	Betidi ebutsyi kofekatokɔ ku diyo kedufǝkɔ bǝbǝ . Nya mba ditsyi ɔnwɛ kato ku ɔnwɛ dikuǝ ebotsya nya boodi bǝnǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
42013030	Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ni bafɛfɛ , mǝ luubǝ bedi betutɛ . Nya mba ni betutɛ eto bǝtsyuǝ , mǝ luubǝ bafiani bafɛfɛ nɛ . ”
42013031	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfo kǝmiǝ , Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kɔse lǝ abɔ mfo edu mɔmɔ mɔmɔ lǝ esu kalebe bamba , itsyise Oka Herodes ala nkǝ wǝ alo fǝ . ”
42013032	Mfo ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ obiasǝtidi ǝmfó biǝnkǝ mɔ nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Mmi , moola awɔnɔ bua nlǝkǝ nya mootsya betidi efimbi , efimbi nya banlɛ isu ese kusɛɛ . Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ , moolosǝ mɔ keyifo . ’
42013033	Nyaso ele bǝ ndiǝ ndiǝ ndiǝ nyɛ nsu sɛtɔ mmi isu ese kusɛɛ ku kǝsiǝsǝ . Itsyise yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ balo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi ku utsyuǝ sa lǝ kalebesa enso lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ kafo .
42013034	“ Yerusalem , Yerusalem ! Fǝ betidi laalo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , nya biakpɔ aba Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba ótsyese mi . Lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nla miǝ lǝ nkpa fǝ betidi ntsyǝ ditsyu fe kase ukusɛsiǝle leesensǝ wǝ mbamba keti wǝ bebi , fɛɛ áni .
42013035	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ebulǝkǝ wǝ ato utsyiko lǝ umǝ ǝmfo . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mi sitinti minkǝ , biensiembunyǝ mɛ bio isu ese lefe nǝ biudi etiki bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Atɛsǝ itǝ nwǝ luubǝ lǝ Boanto Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ ! ’ ”
42014001	Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ésu Farisifɔ eto beninǝ ɔni eto diyo lǝ kaka bákpadi wǝ bǝ ubǝ udi lesa . Nya bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfo ékeyu kalɛ ola lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kekleke .
42014002	Mfó nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ eto ani ku akpa lɛfɔɔ , díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
42014003	Nya Yesu lɛtɔ kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ batsya utidi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ , lee koǝntǝ bo kusu ? ”
42014004	Fɛɛ bámfo kɛnyɛ bufǝ katɛyi kulesa . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛkɔbe utidi ǝmfo ókpa wǝ úsuko kutsyǝ nya ótsya wǝ nya útǝ wǝ kusu údu .
42014005	Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe ubi nye onantsyui nya ófankli údufǝ lǝ dibiǝ ditsyuǝ kafo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi , embunǝ wǝ ǝlǝkǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lamfolamfo ? ”
42014006	Fɛɛ bámfo wǝ ditiki eto mbuayɛ butǝ bio .
42014007	Se Yesu dínyǝ kase betidi ba bákpadi báboko mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ nlɛ nsiǝkɔ kplɛ bota kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ nkǝ ,
42014008	“ Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ákpadi fǝ nkǝ bǝ wǝ kusiǝkakpakɔ , mensu ǝsiǝ lǝ kakplɛkɔ . Itsyise ǝtsyuǝ ókpadi utidi wǝ nkpe dibu onso fǝ tsya oboko mfó .
42014009	Nya utidi wǝ lékpadi mi inuǝ ba kenke díbǝ mfó ɔ́tɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tǝ lǝ utidi ǝmfo lǝ ubǝ usiǝ mfó . ’ Yoohiã bǝ taka lǝ esu ǝsiǝ lǝ kaka lǝmbǝ dibu ku kofani .
42014010	Bomu lǝ bákpadi fǝ bakoko kalebe kǝtsyuǝ , su ǝsiǝ lǝ kaka lenni kakplɛkɔ . Nya lǝ utidi wǝ lékpadi fǝ ǝbǝǝ , mfo wɔɔtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyɛtsyuǝ , taka lǝ mfó lǝ ǝbǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ kakplɛkɔ mfo . ’ Nya nyamfo ebokpe fǝ dibu lǝ betidi bamba ba bákpadi báboko mfó kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
42014011	Itsyise utidi saa wǝ labesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , Onanto ebobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , Onanto ebobesǝ wǝ kato . ”
42014012	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi utidi wǝ lékpadi wǝ nkǝ ubǝ kedikɔ mfó nkǝ , “ Lǝ akpadi betidi fǝ bǝbǝ bedi lǝfǝ diyo , mankpadi fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ nye fǝ bayimi nye fǝ betidi nye fǝ bayotsya ba ni batabinyǝ . Itsyise mǝ tsya ebokpadi fǝ nko kǝ bǝ , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ edi . Nya lǝ ibǝ nko , nyalɛ te fǝ lesa nǝ féyifo fǝtǝ mǝǝ , eto oko banlɛ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ fǝ nɛ .
42014013	Bomu lǝ alɛ diyi nǝmfo eto okle budii , kpadi bakombo ku betidi ba lamfo bɔyɛ kukɔnɔ ku mba lɛtsyini ku benǝmba .
42014014	Nyamfo luutǝ Onanto kpo fǝ atsyɔ nɛ . Itsyise betidi bamfó ǝmbofo fǝ kayo bofo lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ kulesa . Onanto ebofo fǝ nya kayo lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ betidi sɛɛ lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ . ”
42014015	Se betidi ba nsi lǝ kedikɔ mfó eto ɔni lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfo , ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Sitinti , disuǝyuǝ ebɔkɛ lǝ betidi ba luubǝ bedi lesa lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ! ”
42014016	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ ákpadi betidi kpǝ lǝ wǝ diyi kplɛ ditsyuǝ eto lesakedikɔ .
42014017	Se lefe léyo bǝ betsyiko budi kǝnǝǝ , óla wǝ beyifoyifo ókpe nkǝ batɛyi wǝ betidi ba kenke ókla utsyǝ nkǝ bǝbǝ . Itsyise lesa saa ebɔflɔ !
42014018	“ Fɛɛ mǝmblɛ kenke étsyiko taflatsyɛ boto . Utidi tutɛ átɛyi uyifoyifo ɔni ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nya kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ nya ele bǝ nsu mbe kǝ . Nyaso tɛyi wǝ fǝnkǝ , “ Nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa , mǝmbofo bubǝ . ” ’
42014019	“ Obamba tsya nkǝ , ‘ Ńnya banantsyui lefosi ba lɔɔwunsǝko mǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ . Nya kusu mintɔ miǝ lǝ nsu nto mǝ mbe lǝ boofo keyifo buyifo . Nyamfo esoo , tɛyi wǝ fǝnkǝ , “ Nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa , mǝmbofo bubǝ . ” ’
42014020	“ Obamba tsya nkǝ , ‘ Mɔmɔ ete minkpa kusiǝ nɛ , nyaso mǝmbofo bubǝ . ’
42014021	“ Uyifoyifo ɔni ǝmǝ esinkli úsu , úsu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ Onamute asa nyamfo kenke . Mfó kafo ányi wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ tinti nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kɔse lǝ esu ǝńyǝ lǝ esu ku nlebe nlebe kenke lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ lǝ akpa bakombo ku betidi ba lɛtsyini ku bǝnǝmba ku mba kenke leba bankpo lǝ kasɔ aboko mfo . ’
42014022	“ Mfo ǝmǝ nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ dísu úyifo nko . Nya úsinkli úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ Onamute nkǝ ókpadi mǝ , fɛɛ nsiǝkɔ kpǝ esi bubu bute .
42014023	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Onamute lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Su lǝ esu ayɛ lǝ umǝ ku mbuto eto esu lǝ akpe nkɛale lǝ akpa betidi ba kenke aboko itǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo kenke lǝ diyi .
42014024	Nya nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ betidi ba kenke mínkpadi miǝ bǝbǝ lesakedikɔ fɛ báni , mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embutidi mɔ lesa nǝmfo kɛnyɛ babe ! ’ ”
42014025	Lefe ditsyuǝ se betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ dítǝkǝko Yesu , ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ ,
42014026	“ Utidi saa wǝ luubǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , ǝmbofo mɔ okasebi budi lǝ waanla mɛ kaso wǝ anto ku wǝ usiǝ ku bebi ku wǝ bayimisani ku bayimisio ku wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya .
42014027	Utsyuǝ saa ke dimentsyi wǝ uyikabie ɔyɛ mɔ kayɛkɔ utǝkǝko mɛɛ , mǝnńyǝ utǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
42014028	“ Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woato diyo kplɛ ditsyuǝ , tutɛ ele bǝ usiǝ kasɔ ubu bikǝ bia kenke loofe ku mi koya kenke obe lǝ okpe atabi nya loohiãa , bǝ woofo diyo nǝmǝ boto kalosǝ fɛ utsyǝ ni kasɔ .
42014029	Nya lǝ weenyifo nyamfo , wǝmbofo diyo nǝmǝ boto kalosǝ , lǝ ɔ́sisǝ ni kasɔ kekleke ku abambi fɛ utsyǝ kafati kasɔ boto kulaa tsya . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ luunyǝ nii , ebumǝ wǝ katɛyi nkǝ ,
42014030	‘ Utidi ǝmfo étsyiko diyo nǝmfo boto kasɔ , fɛɛ wǝmbofo ni boto kalosǝ . ’
42014031	“ Lǝ oka utsyuǝ átaka ku bamamanyǝ akpi lefosi nnya usu nkǝ woakpɔnko oka bamba wǝ nkpe bamamanyǝ akpi fosi ǝnuǝ , wuusiǝ ubu disi obe kukɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nya onkpe ebutǝ bǝ ofo wǝ olo ǝmǝ bɔkpɔnko .
42014032	Nya lǝ unyǝ nkǝ umbǝ ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle , wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe nya boosu batsya ku oka ǝmǝ lǝ lefe nǝ batsyoko bǝtsyuǝ nya bɔɔlɛ wǝǝ lekpakpa nkǝ bayɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ bafiani bayɛtsyuǝ bomu , fɛ lǝ oka ǝmfó lǝ ɔnyi ɔfi kulaa tsya . ”
42014033	Mfó ǝmǝ Yesu lélosǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ini itǝ mi bǝ mi kutsyuǝ ǝmbofo mɔ okasebi budi lǝ woenlǝkǝ wǝ ato utsyiko lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ .
42014034	“ Mba kpe alɛkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ kamini kamǝ alo lǝ mba bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , kusu ku kutsyuǝ saa ensimbǝ ǝsuǝ bookpe kamini lǝ mu bio .
42014035	Yensilɛkɛ bǝ befi mu bakpe balɛkɛsǝ kasɔ , nya yanlɛkɛ itǝ kuku kulaa tsya . Buwi ele bǝ bewi mu . “ Nyaso fǝǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa kpee , tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! ”
42015001	Diyi lɔnii , mba laafo umǝnko kpǝ ku babuatidi bamba ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ baanɔ wǝ ditiki .
42015002	Mfó nya Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa dítsyiko dinyǝfi bokpe ku wǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo aafo babuatidi nya wǝ ku mǝ leedi lesa kulaa tsya ! ”
42015003	Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ ,
42015004	“ Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti kpe basamu kolofa , nya ɔni lénya lǝ mǝ ntii , be fuuyifo ? Eboyani awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ bamfó ǝtsyǝ lǝ kedikɔ mfó , esu kabɛbɛ ɔni wǝ lénya mfó isu ese lefe nǝ fǝnyǝ wǝ .
42015005	Nya lǝ ǝnyǝ wǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , nya fuutsyi wǝ ǝtǝkǝ lǝ simuǝ .
42015006	Nya fuufi wǝ aboko oto . Nya fookpadi fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ku mba lǝ koyotsya nya fɔɔtɛyi mǝ fǝnkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti , itsyise nnyǝ mɔ osamu wǝ lénya nyaso binyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
42015007	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , nko ke disuǝyuǝ tinti lɔɔkɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ obuatidi ɔni wǝ hã lɛtsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ enso disuǝyuǝ nǝ boonyǝ lǝ fe betidi awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ba dimensihiã bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ ǝsuǝ .
42015008	“ Nya lǝ usio utsyuǝ kpe sika flubia lefosi nya ónyansǝ sɔnii , be ele bǝ uyifo ? Wooto okandiɛ , okpa wǝ diyo kafo kenke , ɔbɛbɛ se lǝ diyo eto akpɔ nnya kenke kukɔnɔ isu ese lefe nǝ unyǝ atabi nyamǝ .
42015009	Nya lǝ unyǝ see , wookpadi wǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku mba nkpe lǝ koyotsya , nya wɔɔtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti itsyise nnyǝ mɔ atabi nnya lénya nyaso binyǝ ku mɛ disuǝyuǝ . ’
42015010	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , nko ke Onanto eto batɔnkpe tsya luunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ obuatidi ɔni wǝ ditsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ eso . ”
42015011	Yesu ésukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ akɛ wǝ bebisaibi inuǝ lɛkɛ .
42015012	Nya dikpefile lɛtɛyi wǝ anto nkǝ , ‘ Nto , fi mɔ kedikɔ ka luutu mɛ lǝ fǝ bikǝ nti ǝtǝ mɛ mɔmɔ mɔmɔ . ’ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani ǝmǝ éfi wǝ bikǝ biamǝ nya úsie mi lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ útǝ wǝ bebi inuǝ bamǝ .
42015013	“ Nya lǝ eyi asiani eto kamaa , dikpefile nǝmǝ éfi asa nnya kenke dítu wǝ óte nya úfi atabi nyamǝ nya údu úsu kusu famfamfa kaka úsu úsiǝ údi nkpǝ bua bua , nya óbiasǝ wǝ atabi nyamǝ kenke .
42015014	Údi lesa saa nǝ dítsyǝ wǝ ólosǝ . Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , kukpɛnsɛ kekleke kutsyuǝ ǝbǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ kenke nyaso kukpɛnsɛ ǝbǝ kúmuǝ wǝ nya kulesa ménsibu wǝ lǝ udi .
42015015	Nyamfo esoo , úfi ǝsuǝ úsu ɔ́tsyɛ osani utsyuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ wuukeyifo keyifo saa ka ke eto okle wuutǝ wǝ nke uyifo . Nya osani ǝmǝ tsya dífi wǝ ókpe lǝ kaka wǝ bakplako nkpe banlɛ kota bɔnwɔ lǝ wǝ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ .
42015016	Kukpɛnsɛ esoo , óla nkǝ eni lǝ ɔkɛ bakplako eto didisa nǝ bǝǝtǝ mǝ mfó eto ditsyuǝ lǝ udi , fɛɛ utidi saa mǝntǝ wǝ ni .
42015017	“ Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , úsinkli údufǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi ba ni mɔ anto eto beyifoyifo , baakɛ lesa kedi kemi kulaa tsya diebu . Nya mɔ nsi mfo nya kukpɛnsɛ luubǝ kolo mɛ .
42015018	Mootaka ńyǝ nsikli nsu mɔ anto ɔflɔ , lǝ ntɛyi wǝ minkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , nyifo kabua nya mínta Onanto ku fintsya mimbu .
42015019	Mensińyǝ ntǝ bǝ kpadi mɛ fe fǝ ubi . Bomu fi mɛ fe betidi ba nlɛ keyifo buyifo kǝtǝ fǝ eto ɔni . ” ’
42015020	Mfó ǝmǝ nya ótaka nya úfi wǝ bikǝ nya ɔ́yifǝ kusu ɔntɔ lǝ wǝ anto ɔflɔ . “ Se wǝ anto dínyǝ wǝǝ , óte nkǝ wǝ ubi uni nkpe fãã ɔnlɛ bubǝ . Wǝ ubi eto asa álɛ wǝ kaminsǝ , nya útsyetsyi úsu ɔ́buta wǝ ku disuǝyuǝ .
42015021	“ Mfo nya wǝ úbi lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Anto , nyifo kabua nta Onanto ku fintsya mbu . Nya mensinyǝ ntǝ bǝ akpadi mɛ fe fǝ ubi tsya ! ’
42015022	“ Fɛɛ wǝ anto ákpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bɛkɔse ! Bifi awu nnya laanɔ bobe bibǝ bekpe wǝ . Nya lǝ bifi lɛsukpɛ ku afokpa nnya laanɔ bobe tsya bekpe wǝ lǝ ani ku akpa .
42015023	Nyamfo eto kamaa , bisu bimuǝ lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ nkpe ayinkua lǝ belo ni . Nya bitǝ lǝ budi bunye disuǝyuǝ .
42015024	Itsyise mɔ ubi ǝmfoo , búfi wǝ fe nwǝ díkpǝ . Fɛɛ úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ . Ónya nya busi búnyǝ wǝ . ’ Nyamfo eso bétsyiko diyi budi kǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
42015025	“ Lǝ lefe nǝmfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ubi ninǝ ésu nkǝ lǝ usu obe mǝ kakuɛ . Se utsyi ɔnlɛ bubǝ nya ibu sɛkɛ lǝ udufǝ otoo , ɔ́nɔ ǝsǝ sǝnsǝ ku nwui wuinwui eto kɔsɔ .
42015026	Mfo nya ókpadi beyifoyifo eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be nlɛ bubǝ lǝ oto ? ’
42015027	“ Uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ɔyimisani úsinklii úbǝ oto nya fǝ anto dítǝ bálo lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ nkpe ayinkua , itsyise usinkli ubǝ fɛ kulesa dímǝnyifo wǝ eso . ’
42015028	“ Nyamfo ǝtǝ kafo ányi wǝ ɔyimisani ninǝ ǝmǝ tinti eso ɔ́ni nkǝ wǝmbudufǝ diyo kulaa tsya . Lǝ nnya eso wǝ anto ábɔ úbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya úbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ udufǝ diyo .
42015029	Fɛɛ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ ésinkli ɔ́tɛyi wǝ anto ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beso mińyǝ minlɛ keyifo buyifo kǝteǝ fǝ alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo , fe fǝ uyifoyifo nya mǝnńyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe kulefe , nya ǝmǝntǝ mɛ kulesa fe ote kulaa tsya , fǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ ?
42015030	Fɛɛ se fǝ ubi wǝ lébiasǝ fǝ bikǝ nya úsu útǝkǝko batsyetɔ dísinkli úbǝ otoo , álo lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ dísiǝ ayinkua ǝtǝ wǝ ! ’
42015031	“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya wǝ anto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ubi , fǝ kpe mfo lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ lefe saa nya asa nnya nte mɛ kenke , eyifo fǝ ale .
42015032	Fɛɛ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ budi diyi bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ , itsyise búfi boǝ iyifo fe bukpǝ fǝ ɔyimi díkpǝ nya úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ . Iyifo fe bonya ónya nya busi búnyǝ wǝ bio . ’ ”
42016001	Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , otabinyǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ lɛkɛ uyifoyifo ɔni wǝ díkabe wǝ bikǝ . Nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi otabinyǝ ǝmǝ bǝ nwǝ laabe wǝ bikǝ mfó lɛ wǝ atabi bobiasǝ .
42016002	Lǝ nyamfo eso otabinyǝ ǝmǝ ákpadi nwǝ laabe wǝ bikǝ mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be ni nnya eto okle mínɔ itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mmǝ ? Yifo nkunta itsyi lǝ kase fanlɛ mɔ bikǝ bobe ǝsuǝ kenke aboko mɛ , itsyise ensiembofo mɔ bikǝ bobe bio tsya . ’
42016003	“ Mfó nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute ǝbǝ mɛ bola lǝ mɔ keyifokɔ . Be muuyifo ? Mimbǝ ǝsuǝale nnya mukeyifo kakuɛnyifo . Nya asa bɔtɔ tsya aalɛ mɛ kofani .
42016004	Ahaa ! Mbote lesa nǝ muuyifo ! Itǝ bǝ lǝ mɔ keyifo ábɔ mɛ lǝ ani tsyaa , lǝ mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ bafo mɛ lǝ mǝ ayo . ’
42016005	“ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ókpadi betidi ba nsi wǝ Onamute kayo ɔni , ɔni . Ɔ́tɔ ututɛ nkǝ , ‘ Kayo kasia fensi mɔ Onamute ? ’
42016006	“ Oyonyǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nnuǝ eto atase nnya lɛmɔ kolofa kɔni . ’ “ Mfó ǝmǝ nya nwǝ laabe bikǝ biamǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be fǝ kayo eto kukue mfo . Siǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ awɔni awosi anɔ fe nnya fensi nɛ . ’
42016007	“ Nko ke ɔ́tɔ oyonyǝ bamba nkǝ , ‘ Ntsyǝ ni fǝ ale ? Kayo kasia fensi ? ’ “ Oyonyǝ ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Iyifo antabi eto atoku kplɛ kolofa kɔni . ’ “ Mfo nya nwǝ laabe bikǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be fǝ kayo eto kukue mfo . Wɔni awosi mflamfla ǝtsyǝ . ’
42016008	“ Nyamfo esoo , Onamute ǝmǝ átɛsǝ nwǝ laabe bikǝ wǝ dímenyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ǝmǝ lǝ wǝ kobe ko óte mfo eso . Sitintii , betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa eto kɛnyɛɛ , mǝ etsyuesa lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya so mba difi mǝ etsyuesa bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekadidi ǝsuǝ . ”
42016009	Mfó nya Yesu dísukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi mi kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔkɛ bɛwunsǝ ko betidi . Itǝ lǝ béloo , Onanto ebofo fǝ okpe lǝ wǝ kǝsiǝkɔ .
42016010	“ Utidi wǝ laalɛ asa nnya ni akɛkɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , wǝ loofo asa nnya ni akplɛ enso tsya bɔlɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ laanyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ keyifo asa nnya ni akɛkɛ , wǝmbɔyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ uyifo asa nnya ni akplɛ enso tsya .
42016011	Lǝ nnya eso lǝ bianyɛnko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ utidi ebofo mi ɔnɔ bǝ biɔlɛ asa nnya ni lɛwɔnɔ eto ale nnya ni Onanto eto ǝtǝsa ola lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ?
42016012	Nya lǝ amanlɛ utidi bamba eto asa nnya nkpe fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ booyani fǝ kosate eto ale bǝtǝ fǝ ?
42016013	“ Uyifoyifo saa embofo banamute inuǝ busumu . Woola ɔni , ukisi unuǝfǝ . Wuutsyue ɔni koto nya ɔɔni unuǝfǝ . Ǝmbofo Onanto ku atabi bɔkɔ kesumu . ”
42016014	Lefe nǝ Farisifɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya Yesu lɛtɛyii , bǝmǝ wǝ itsyise bála atabi fefe .
42016015	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyifo betidi ba laate ǝsuǝ fe betidi sɛɛ lǝ babamba eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ Onanto yi mi akɔɛsi kafo kenke . Itsyise asa nnya lefo koya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmii , eyifo asinsa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
42016016	“ Moses eto kɔfi eto kukue ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asa nnya báwɔni bǝtsyǝǝ , éyifo mǝ keyifo isu ese Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto lefe . Nya idu lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bianɔ se baatɛyi dikiti sɛɛ nǝ ditsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya utidi saa nlɛ bokplatsya nkǝ lǝ udufǝ mfó .
42016017	Fɛɛ iyuǝ eso itǝ bǝ kato ku kasɔ lǝ enya , enso bǝ afi nyamfo eto awɔnisa eto lekpa sɛkɛ saa bɔ lǝ Onanto eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
42016018	“ Osani saa wǝ lɔɔni wǝ usiǝ nya uufi obambaa , okpo kusiǝ . Nya osani wuufi kusiǝ ko bánii , okpo kusiǝ .
42016019	“ Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝǝ , otabinyǝ sani ɔni akɛ wǝ díkalɛ bikǝ bia lefo koya tinti , nya úkǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lefe saa lǝ wǝ nkpǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
42016020	Nya okombo utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo bǝ Lasaro tsya lɛkɛ mfo . Afabe édi okombo ǝmfo ǝsuǝ kenke nya béketsyi wǝ bǝkǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ otabinyǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo eto kesie .
42016021	Úkabe kusu nkǝ lǝ otabinyǝ ǝmǝ lɛ budii , ewuliwuli nnya díkakpo lǝ kasɔ eboyo wǝ lǝ udi . Bakpa kula tsya kǝbǝ kadia wǝ afabe nyamǝ .
42016022	“ Íbǝ íbǝ bǝ Okombo ǝmǝ ésu úkpǝ nya Onanto eto bɔtɔnkpe díbǝ bétsyi wǝ bésu bǝtsyǝ lǝ Abraham eto akɔ kato . Otabinyǝ ǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ úkpǝ nya bébikǝ wǝ .
42016023	Nya lǝ ɔkɔmǝǝ , únyǝ nkǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ kanyi kǝnyǝkɔ . Mfó se óbesǝ ǝnǝmi kato , únyǝ Abraham famfamfa nya Lasaro dísiǝ wǝ lǝ akɔ .
42016024	Mfó ǝmǝ nya ókpadi bembembe ɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham ! Nyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ lǝ ǝtǝ lǝ Lasaro lǝ ufi lɛnimi oto lǝ ntu ntsyuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ufi ubǝ utǝkǝ lǝ mɔ odiakami ǝsuǝ lǝ iyuǝ ko mɛ . Itsyise nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ ute ǝsuǝ mfo ! ’
42016025	“ Fɛɛ Abraham átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ubi , kloma fǝnkǝ lǝ fǝ nkpǝ disiǝfee , áfo asa sɛɛ kpǝ tinti . Nya Lasaro wǝ alɛɛ , asa bua sɔ̃ɔ̃ ófo . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , ɔlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ nya fǝ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ .
42016026	Nya , nnya nsi nkpe lǝ nnyaa , kukpio kplɛ kutsyuǝ kpe mfo lǝ bo ku fǝ eto nti . Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woayila ubǝ mfóo , wǝǝmbofo . Nya nko ke kutsyuǝ tsya lǝmbofo bɔyɛ kedu mfó kǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo . ’
42016027	“ Mfó otabinyǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham , nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa kpe Lasaro lǝ usu mɔ anto eto .
42016028	Mfóo , nkpe bayimisani ɛnɔ . Tǝ lǝ usu ɔlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ kukɔnɔ itǝ lǝ mǝ lǝ bayɛ kaka minkpe bubǝ , kaka kanyi nkpe mfo . ’
42016029	“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya Abraham lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ bayimisani kpe Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ele bǝ betsyue mǝ koto . ’
42016030	“ Mfó nya otabinyǝ ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham , bǝmbɔnɔ mǝ ditiki ! Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ataka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ mfo úsu mǝ ɔflɔɔ , bɔɔnɔ wǝ ditiki bayɛ mǝ asa bua buyifo . ’
42016031	“ Fɛɛ Abraham átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ bǝbɔnɔ Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ditikii , lǝ yuubǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ataka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ mfo usu mǝ ɔflɔ kulaa tsyaa , bembofo wǝ ditki banɔ ! ’ ”
42017001	Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Asa nnya lǝǝtǝ utidi leeyifo lebua , ebubǝ kokooko . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ asa nyamfo lɔɔyɛ ibǝ !
42017002	Lǝ béfi kukuǝ ko lɛmɔ kutsyuǝ bátsyasǝ wǝ lǝ simuǝ nya báto wǝ bákpe lǝ lekpo kǝmiǝ kulaa tsya , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso koto ko Onanto luunǝ nwǝ luutǝ bekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto utsyuǝ yifo lebua .
42017003	Nyaso lɔ abe asa nnya feeyifo kukɔnɔ . “ Nya lǝ fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ éyifo fǝ kabua kǝtsyuǝǝ , kǝ wǝ ato . Nya lǝ údi dikpi nya ɔnɔ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , nyalɛ fi atsyɛ wǝ .
42017004	Lǝ úyifo lesa bua óta fǝ úbu sekuanse lǝ diyi lɔni ǝsuǝ nya usi usinkli úbǝ , úbǝ ɔlɛ fǝ lekpakpa sekuanse diyi nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝǝ , fi atsyɛ wǝ . ”
42017005	Yesu eto batɔnkpe álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ lǝ bo bofokanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale boso . ”
42017006	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Bonamute lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bekpe bofokanɔ bo leyo fe diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ kenkee , biofo kuyi komfo bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Su lǝ mfo lǝ esu edufǝ lǝ lekpo kǝmiǝ mǝ . ’ Nya kuuyifo nko mǝ .
42017007	“ Bibu nyamfo be be . Lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe uyifoyifo wǝ laafo ɔkuɛ kǝtǝ wǝ nye ɔnlɛ fǝ basamu bobe nya utsyi ɔkuɛ ubǝ udufǝǝ , bɔtɛyi fɔɔtɛyi wǝ fǝ ubǝ usiǝ lǝ kasɔ mlǝ lǝ udi wǝ lesa ?
42017008	Owo lo ! Bomu ebɔtɛyi wǝ fǝ , ‘ Muǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ atsyasǝ kafia lǝ nkɛ , lǝ anwa lesa , lǝ efi mɔ didisa ǝtsyǝ mɛ lǝ ndi nlosǝ fɛ lǝ fintsya lǝ edi . ’
42017009	Yanle bǝ sɔ wǝ ani se ini wǝ uyifoyifo eto keyifo ete ini .
42017010	Nko ke ini itǝ mi tsya nɛ . Lǝ biyifo lesa saa nǝ mintɛyi mi miǝ biyifoo , ele bǝ bɛtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Beyifoyifo ete buni . Nya lesa nǝ buyifoo , eyifo lesa nǝ ete ele bǝ buuyifo . ’ ”
42017011	Nya se Yesu dídu ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem , ɔ́yɛ Samaria ku Galilea eto kumǝ ǝsuǝ .
42017012	Nya se ɔnlɛ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ budufǝǝ , basani lefosi bǝtsyuǝ ba nlɛ bufisia bufi ǝbǝ batsyako wǝ . Befimfi bamfo ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ .
42017013	Nya báfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝ , “ Anto Yesu , be bo lǝ ǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
42017014	Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu lǝ bifi mi ǝsuǝ bisu bete Onanto eto nwǝ lǝǝtǝ wǝ kedi lǝ ɔlɛ ola obe mi . ” Se bányɛ bantɔɔ , bǝnyǝ bǝ mǝ bufi áyɛ mǝ .
42017015	Fɛɛ se mǝ ɔni dínyǝ nkǝ wǝ bufi ǝyuǝ wǝǝ , úsinkli úsu nya ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe .
42017016	Nya úsu óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́sɔ wǝ ani . Nya utidi ǝmǝ eyifo Samarianyǝ .
42017017	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ nkǝ , “ Nya inni betidi lefosi míntsya fɛɛ ? Se ɔwɔnɔmbǝ fɛfɛ léfe ?
42017018	Ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ utidi wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ ǝmfo hã ni nwǝ dísinkli úbǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ɔsɔ Onanto ani ? ”
42017019	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ edu . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ bufi . ”
42017020	Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ bala bǝ baate lefe nǝ kon Onanto eto sekakedikɔ luubǝ itǝ . Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Sekadidi embubǝ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ betidi loofo bunyǝ .
42017021	Kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ se mfo ! ’ nye ‘ Nnyǝ se mmǝ . ’ Itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ fe sekpe mfo lǝ mi nti . ”
42017022	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ biɔbɛbɛ biǝ biǝnyǝ diyi nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ . Fɛɛ biembunyǝ !
42017023	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ebubǝ mi nti ini mba lɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe , nnyǝ wǝ mmǝ ! ’ nye ‘ Bebe , nnyǝ wǝ mfo ! ’ Fɛɛ biensu bɛbɛbɛ mɛ mfó !
42017024	Itsyise fe kase ofamfa laafa ku ute ketsyi lekpake nǝ kesu lebamba , nko kǝ sitinti Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ luutsyǝ nɛ .
42017025	Fɛɛ ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ wooka kanyi bunyǝ tinti nya mmi eto betidi lɔɔni wǝ .
42017026	“ Asa nnya díbǝ lǝ Noa eto lefe , nnya kǝ nnya luubǝ itǝ le lefe nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ bio nɛ .
42017027	Betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ . Nya basani díkakpa bǝsiǝ nya bǝkǝtǝ besio bese isu ese diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ Noa dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ kafo . Nya ɔsɔmi lɛni nya ntubibi díyi bóba bókpo kasɔ ka kenke nya bólo betidi kenke .
42017028	“ Nko kǝ yuubǝ itǝ fe kase íbǝ lǝ Lot eto lefe tsya nɛ . Betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ , nya bákasa asi tsya . Bǝtsyuǝ ǝnyǝ bákakpe bidikǝ , nya bǝtsyuǝ díkato ayo .
42017029	Nya diyi nǝ Lot lɛbɔ lǝ Sodom , ute ku etebambi nnya nkpe lɛyimbi bua lɛwunini itsyi kato íbǝ ékpo lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya étonsǝ mɛmblɛ kenke .
42017030	“ Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lɔɔbɔ mbǝ nɛ .
42017031	Diyi nǝmfoo , utidi wǝ ńyǝ lǝ wǝ letsya ǝsuǝǝ , mensitɛyi nkǝ weesu diyo lǝ usu ufi kulesa . Nko ke ini lǝ ɔkuɛ utsyǝ ńyǝǝ , wensitɛyi nkǝ weesinkli ubǝ oto lǝ ubǝ ufi kulesa .
42017032	Bekloma lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ Lot eto usiǝ ǝsuǝ !
42017033	Utidi saa wǝ lela nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , wooyansǝ mu . Nya utidi saa wǝ leyansǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , wuusinkli unyǝ mu .
42017034	Nya ketsye kamfoo , betidi inuǝ ebolabe lǝ bikǝ biɔni ǝsuǝ , nya Onanto ebofo ɔni nya wooyani ɔni olabesǝ .
42017035	Besio inuǝ ebukǝkuǝ nnamfo lǝ kukuǝ kɔni ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto luulǝkǝ ɔni nya wooyani ɔni uńyǝnsǝ mfó .
42017036	Basani inuǝ ebuńyǝ bakafo nya wuutsyi ɔni udunko nya wooyani unuǝfǝ uńyǝnsǝ mfó . ”
42017037	Mfó ǝmǝ nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ sie ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kaka lesakpǝnkpǝ ntǝ , mfó ebintsyǝ laakpo nɛ . ”
42018001	Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi lekpa ditsyuǝ óte mǝ nkǝ ele bǝ bakato ola lefe saa nya yanle bǝ elo mǝ ani .
42018002	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Okponkpo bua utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ umǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dímankate Onanto sikpi nya wénkebu utidi tsya .
42018003	Nya lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kee , ɔkɔsiǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfo wǝ díkesu wǝ ɔflɔ úsukalɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , ‘ Lǝkǝ mɛ lǝ mɔ olo eto bulǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
42018004	“ Éfo lefe kpǝ , okponkpo ǝmǝ áni wényifo kulesa lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ite bǝ maanté Onanto sikpi nya meemfi utidi keyifo kulesa ,
42018005	lǝ bulǝ bo ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmfo nlɛ mɛ bulǝ esoo , moobe miǝ nwunsǝko wǝ nla wǝ olo eto etiki nyamǝ nlǝkǝ . Lenni nko , wǝǝmbɔyɛ bubǝ nya wǝǝmbutǝ nkɛ lɛnwɔ mfe mfe . ’ ”
42018006	Mfó nya Bonamute dísukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ lesa nǝ okponkpo bua ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi .
42018007	Nya mɔmɔɔ , yuubǝ bǝ Onanto embulǝkǝ wǝ betidi ba leewi kakpadi wǝ ketsye ku kakɔmi kato ola kǝtǝ wǝ bǝ ɔwunseko mǝǝ ? Nye bomu ebu fǝnkǝ wǝ ofe kama lǝ mǝ bulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ?
42018008	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onanto ebokpo lekpo nya wuutǝ mǝ lɛbɛ lamfolamfo . Fɛɛ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝbǝǝ , wuunyǝ betidi ba léfo wǝ bánɔ ? ”
42018009	Yesu átɛyi lekpa nǝmfo utǝ betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ kakle hã ni basɛɛ nya bensi embunyǝ utidi sa wǝ ntǝ fǝ mǝ .
42018010	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ésu Onanto eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ bǝ lǝ bato ola . Ɔni eyifo Farisinyǝ nya unuǝfǝ diyifo nwǝ laafo oko .
42018011	Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lete nya óto ola nkǝ , ‘ Onanto , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise maansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ , nya meenyifo utidi kabua , nya maankpo kusiǝ fe kase betidi bamba leeyifo . Nya maasɔ fǝ ani tsya , itsyise minte fe nwǝ laafo oko wǝ ńyǝ mmǝ tsya seka .
42018012	Maakle kɛnyɛ eyi ǝnuǝ lǝ kɔsida saa ǝsuǝ . Nya meefi lesa nǝ kee minyǝ eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ fǝ . ’
42018013	“ Fɛɛ nwǝ laafo oko ǝmǝ ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ nya wónla nkǝ woabesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato kulaa tsya . Fɛɛ úfi wǝ ani utǝkǝ lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto , be mɔ obuayifo ǝmfo lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ’ ”
42018014	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi nkǝ , se besinkli bésu ayo , nwǝ laafo oko ǝmǝ ale kɛnkɛnkɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nya inni Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , Onanto ebobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ laaboko sǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , Onanto ebobesǝ wǝ kato . ”
42018015	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ éfi mǝ bebi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ , katɛyi bǝ ufi wǝ ani utǝkǝ lǝ mǝ . Se Yesu eto bakasebi dínyǝ nyamfo , béyǝnki bákpe betidi bamǝ lǝ nnya eso .
42018016	Fɛɛ Yesu ákpadi bekpefi bamǝ óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bekpefi lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ nya bienti mǝ kusu . Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te itǝ betidi ba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe bekpefi bamfo eto okle .
42018017	Nya bekloma nyamfo biǝnkǝ , utidi saa wǝ dímamfo Onanto eto sekadidi fe dikpefi seka , wǝmbudufǝ se kafo kulefe kulefe , kulefe . ”
42018018	Yudafɔ eto uninǝ utsyuǝ átɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa sɛɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
42018019	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso faakpadi mɛ fǝ ɔsɛɛ ? Utidi kuutsyuǝ saa menyifo ɔsɛɛ enso Onanto hã .
42018020	Nyi miǝ biyi kɔfi ko laatɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mankpo kusǝ nye kusiǝ , manlo utidi , menyu , manla fǝ utsyuǝ kɛnyɛ , nya bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . ’ ”
42018021	Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ntsyue afi nyamfo kenke koto kukɔnɔ , itsyi lǝ mɔ sikpefi lefe kǝ . ”
42018022	Se Yesu lɛnɔ wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ibu lesa lɔni ele bǝ yifo . Fi bikǝ bia kenke nte fǝ ate , lǝ efi atabi nyamfó ǝtǝ bakombo . Nyamfo luutǝ ǝnyǝ bikǝ ǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kato nɛ . Nyamfo kama lǝ edu ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
42018023	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ osani ǝmǝ lɛnɔ nya mfo , ǝsuǝ ába wǝ itsyise bikǝ kpǝ kpe wǝ .
42018024	Yesu ǝnyǝ kase ǝsuǝ léba wǝ nya údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe ale itǝ otabinyǝ fɛ lǝ ofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufɔ !
42018025	Nya ekpe ale itǝ otabinyǝ bǝ lǝ udufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ , enso kase ɔtɔmli ku lekoko lɔɔyɛ lǝ okasa eto ofo ofe . ”
42018026	Mfó nya betidi ba lɛnɔ nyamfo lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe kon luunyǝ bofo ? ”
42018027	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ utidi lembofo buyifoo , iyuǝ itǝ Onanto ku buyifo . ”
42018028	Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bebe , bo áyani bo ayo eto asa kenke butsyǝ nya búbǝ búntǝkǝko fǝ . ”
42018029	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti , ɔnukualɛ uni . Nya nla miǝ bete biǝ utidi saa wǝ léyani wǝ diyo utsyǝ nye óyani wǝ usiǝ nye bayimisani nye wǝ antomǝ nye bebi utsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi esoo ,
42018030	wuunyǝ asa nyamfó eto okle kpǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo kǝmiǝ ku nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ ku lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝ tsya kǝmiǝ . ”
42018031	Yesu ákpa wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ ba úkǝlǝkǝ mate hã óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ ! Bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem , kaka asa nnya kenke Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ mɛ , Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝ , luubǝ itǝ nko .
42018032	Betidi ebufi mɛ bakpe lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani bǝ lǝ befi mɛ beyifo ǝmǝnsa . Booka mɛ nya bootufǝ ntufǝ bakpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
42018033	Bɔɔblɛ wǝ nya boolo wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nsi wootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ . ”
42018034	Nya asa nyamfo kenkee , bakasebi bamǝ mánnɔ nnya kasɔ . Etiki nyamfo eto kasɔnɔnɔ tsya akula mǝ . Bánnɔ lesa nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ mfo eto kasɔ .
42018035	Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu ńlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerikoo , unǝmba utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ kusu ɔflɔ mfó úkatɔ asa .
42018036	Se ɔ́nɔ betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bofe eto kuduu , ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Be nlɛ bubǝ ? ”
42018037	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ uni nlɛ bofe . ”
42018038	Mfó nya ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ Yesu , Oka David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
42018039	Mfó nya betidi ba ntɔ sɛtɔ dínyenki bákpe wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ údika . Fɛɛ mɔmɔ bomu óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
42018040	Lǝ nnya eso Yesu ále únyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ bakpa unǝmba ǝmǝ baboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Se úbǝ óyo wǝ ɔflɔ , Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ ,
42018041	“ Be faala fǝ nyifo ntǝ fǝ ? ” Unǝmba ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Anto , nla miǝ lǝ nsi nnyǝ asa . ”
42018042	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ sinkli ǝnyǝ asa ! Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ”
42018043	Lamfolamfo , usinkli únyǝ asa nnya útǝkǝko Yesu nya ɔ́yɛ ɔntɔ ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ . Nya se betidi kpǝ bamfó dínyǝ nyamfoo , mǝmblɛ kenke átɛsǝ Onanto .
42019001	Yesu ésu údufǝ Yeriko , nya ɔ́yɛ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo ɔntɔ .
42019002	Mfó nya mba laafo umǝnko eto uninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Sakeo lɛkɛ , nya úyifo otabinyǝ tinti .
42019003	Úkabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ lǝ unyǝ utidi wǝ kon Yesu ni . Fɛɛ se úyifo utidi kliminti esoo , ɔnlɛ kusu ku kutsyuǝ bunyǝ se betidi mfui eso .
42019004	Nyaso útsyetsyi ɔ́tɔ betidi bamfo sɛtɔ nya óbe kuyi bǝ lǝ unyǝ Yesu , itsyise óte nkǝ wuubǝ ɔyɛ mfo .
42019005	Se Yesu léyo kuyi komǝ kalɔɔ , úkǝnǝ úńyǝ nya óbesǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya ɔ́tɛyi Sakeo nkǝ , “ Sakeo , kɔse lǝ ayifǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ , itsyise fǝ diyo mɔɔsɔnɔ mi nɛ . ”
42019006	Sakeo ákɔse ɔ́yifǝ úbǝ kasɔ nya útǝ Yesu edufǝ ku disuǝyuǝ tinti .
42019007	Betidi ba dínyǝ nyamfó étsyiko etiki budi kawɔnɔnɔ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝ , “ Osani ǝmfo esukayɛ utidi ǝmfo wǝ ni obuayifo eto diyo . ”
42019008	Mfó nya Sakeo létaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Bonamute ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Anto ! Muufi mɔ bikǝ bia nkpe mɛ kenke eto kutsyǝ ntǝ bakombo . Nya betidi ba kenke eto bikǝ míntafa mímfoo , moofo mǝ nnya kayo eto sena ntsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ . ”
42019009	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mmi ǝmfo bofo ǝbǝ diyo nǝmfo , itsyise utidi wǝ mfo tsya eyifo Abraham eto kafo eto ubi .
42019010	Nya mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubii , mbǝ miǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ betidi ba kenke lénya kusu mboko nkpǝ . ”
42019011	Mfó nya betidi bamfó ńyǝ banlɛ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi bɔnɔ . Nya úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ , itsyise ofe ɔlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerusalem nya bébu bǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ ebubǝ sitinti mɔmɔ .
42019012	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani wǝ nkpe dibu utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ létaka úsu kasɔ famfamfa kǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bǝtsyǝ wǝ seka . Nya úfi nsusu nkǝ , wuusinkli ubǝ wǝ umǝ .
42019013	Fɛ úduu , ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo lefosi utsyǝ . Nya útǝ utsyuǝ saa atabi eto otobe ɔni . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bifi atabi nyamǝ beto ɔlɔ isu ese lefe nǝ muubǝ . ’
42019014	“ Fɛɛ osani ǝmfo eto umǝ eto betidi ékekisi wǝ , nyaso bátsyese batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bǝ besu batɛyi Okankplɛ nkǝ , ‘ Boanla boǝ osani ǝmfo di bo oka . ’
42019015	“ Tsya , bǝtsyǝ osani ǝmǝ seka nya usi úsinkli úbǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Lamfolamfo , útǝ bákpadi wǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ bǝbǝ bátsya lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi nkǝ lǝ ɔnɔ kutǝkǝ ko bǝnyǝ .
42019016	“ Uyifoyifo tutɛ ǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nnyǝ atabi eto etobe lefosi ntǝkǝ lǝ ɔni ǝmǝ fǝtǝ mɛ mfó ǝsuǝ . ’
42019017	“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛsǝ wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Álɔ eyifo ! Eyifo uyifoyifo sɛɛ ! Se fálɛ keyifo kɛkɛ kamfo ola fáyɛnko ke lǝ kusu sɛɛ esoo , muufi fǝ ntsyǝ seka lǝ kǝmǝ lefosi ǝsuǝ . ’
42019018	“ Uyifoyifo nuǝfǝ tsya ǝbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nnyǝ atabi eto etobe ɛnɔ ntǝkǝ lǝ ɔni wǝ fǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ ! ’
42019019	“ Nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Fǝǝ , ebudi seka lǝ kǝmǝ ɛnɔ ǝsuǝ ! ’
42019020	“ Uyifoyifo bamba ǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nyǝ fǝ atabi eto otobe ɔni wǝ fǝtǝ mɛ . Mfí nnya nkle lǝ mɔ ofiamɛ ǝsuǝ nkula .
42019021	Nte fǝ sikpi itsyise eyifo nwǝ nkpe ale . Nya feefi lesa nǝ lenni fǝ lele kafloma keyifo fǝ lele . Nya feefi didisa nǝ fǝmankpe kulaa tsya keyifo fǝ lele . ’
42019022	“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Uyifoyifo bua feni ! Fǝ kosate eto kɛnyɛ eto etiki ni nnya muufi nlo fǝ dikpi ! Eyi fǝ nyifo utidi wǝ nkpe ale . Nya meefi lesa nǝ lenni mɔ lele kafloma keyifo mɔ lele . Nya meefi lesa lǝ kaka mánkpe ku ditsyuǝ .
42019023	Nya lǝ eyi nkoo , beso fémemfi mɔ atabi esu akpe lǝ atabi kǝtsyǝkɔ ? Mfóo , nyi miǝ muunyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ nsinkli ntsyi mbǝ . ’
42019024	“ Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi ba ńyǝ mfo nkǝ , ‘ Bɛlɛ atabi nyamǝ befo lǝ wǝ ani bitǝ uyifoyifo wǝ nkpe atabi eto etobe lefosi . ’
42019025	“ Fɛɛ betidi bamfo átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , uyifoyifo ǝmfó ebunyǝ atabi eto etobe lefosi útsyǝ ! ’
42019026	“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utidi wǝ asa ntee , wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto luutǝ okpe enso nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ kulaa tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ ni bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
42019027	Nya mɔmɔɔ , binǝ mɔ balo ba dímanla bǝ ndi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ beboko mfo lǝ belo mǝ lǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi . ’ ”
42019028	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ asa nyamfo ólosǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ sɛtɔ úsu Yerusalem .
42019029	Lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ Betfage ku Betania bɔfi lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ɔflɔɔ , ótsyese wǝ bakasebi inuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ bakatɔ .
42019030	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikatɔ lǝ umǝ kɛkɛ wǝ nkpe sɛtɔ mfó . Nya lǝ bɛlɛ wǝ budufǝǝ , biunyǝ ɔflimu eto lɛkpɔ ditsyuǝ nǝ bátsyasǝ lǝ ukuǝ bǝńyǝsǝ nǝ utidi kuutsyuǝ saa dímǝnsiǝ tɔ unyǝ . Benyankli ni ku ukuǝ lǝ bifi wǝ beboko mfo .
42019031	Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ atɔ mi lesa nǝ eso bényankli nii , bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute nlɛ ni bohiã . ’ ”
42019032	Bakasebi bamǝ áyifǝ lǝ kusu bésu bǝnyǝ lesa saa fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ .
42019033	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bǝńyǝ banlɛ ubuki ǝmǝ bonyankli kǝlǝkǝǝ , ubuki ǝmǝ eto basate átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ wǝ bonyankli ? ”
42019034	Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute ahiã wǝ . ”
42019035	Nya béfi ubuki ǝmǝ báboko Yesu . Mfó nya béfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ ubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya báwunsǝko Yesu óbe úsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
42019036	Se úsiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyɛ bantɔɔ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ éfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ kusu .
42019037	Lefe nǝ Yesu ńlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerusalem lǝ kusu kaka ɔnlɛ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini bɔyifǝ kǝbǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi kpǝ bamǝ étsyiko Onanto ani bɔsɔ nya báto keyudu banlɛ bofa bembembe lǝ asa kplɛ nnya bǝnyǝ eso .
42019038	Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Oka wǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Diyuǝ lǝ lefo kato kenke . Nya diyǝnde itǝ Onanto ! ”
42019039	Mfó nya Farisifɔ ba lɛkɛ lǝ sitiditu siamǝ nti lɛtɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ninko fǝ bakasebi lǝ bayɛ kudu bokpo ! ”
42019040	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ bayɛ kudu bokpoo , aba nyamfo kosate ebutsyǝ kasɔ ku kudu bokpo . ”
42019041	Kase Yesu lɛyɛ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem kedufǝkɔɔ , nya únyǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , úwi keku lǝ wǝ disi .
42019042	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nla sitinti miǝ lǝ nnya ete biunyǝ bete mmi eto diyi nǝmfo eto lesa nǝ loohiã itǝ bǝ lǝ binyǝ diyuǝ ini ! Fɛɛ ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , bɛnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ bete !
42019043	Lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ se mi balo luuńyǝ batsyilama mi lǝ kalebe saa kenke . Nya booti ǝbiǝ kenke nya kulesa lembofo budufǝ nye kabɔ kǝbǝ lekple .
42019044	Betidi ebɔtsylɔsǝ umǝ mfo kenke nya boolo betidi ba nkpe lǝ wǝ kenke . Nya leba ku ditsyuǝ sa embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni kǝtsyǝkɔ . Itsyise bɛni nya bíǝnyǝ lǝ bete lefe nǝ Onanto díbǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo mi lǝ nkpǝ ! ”
42019045	Yesu ésu údufǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya útsyiko mba nlɛ bikǝ bote mfó bola kabɔsǝ .
42019046	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ diyoo , betidi ebokpadi ni bǝ diyo kaka betidi laato ola . ’ Nya mi dífi mfó befianisǝ beyu eto kabiɔkɔ ! ”
42019047	Diyi saa , Yesu ákate asa lǝ Onanto eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó . Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Afi eto bateasa ku betidi eto batɔnkotɔnko ála bǝ lǝ balo wǝ .
42019048	Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ , itsyise betidi kpǝ akɛ mfó ba eto ato léfo wǝ etiki nyamǝ kekleke eso .
42020001	Diyi lɔni se Yesu lɛkɛ katé betidi asa lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ , kedi mǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ eto asa , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ ǝbǝ mfó .
42020002	Mfó nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo ǝsuǝale nnya fankpe fɛ feeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle . Nya owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ ? ”
42020003	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ ntɔ mi etiki ǝtsyuǝ lǝ nnɔ .
42020004	Nte ǝsuǝale nnya Yohanes lɛkɛ fɛ úyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa útǝ betidi , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi lee , betidi bomu ɔflɔ itsyi ? ”
42020005	Mfó nya bétsyiko kǝnǝ kasɔ lǝ mǝ nti katɛyi bǝ , “ Be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ bɔ́tɛyi boǝ Onanto ɔflɔ únyǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ utsyiko , ɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Be díbǝ eso biamfó Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
42020006	Nya lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ utidi ɔflɔ ófo nnya utsyiko , katsyakɔ eto betidi bamfo kenke ebubǝ bakpɔ bo aba , itsyise mǝmblɛ kenke áfo bánɔ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ Yohanes ni nɛ . ”
42020007	Lǝ nyaso bǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boante kaka únyǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ útsyiko . ”
42020008	Mfó nya Yesu tsya lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke eso mintsya mǝmbɔtɛyi mi kaka mimfo ǝsuǝale fɛ meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle . ”
42020009	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi bǝtidi bamǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mǝ , osani utsyuǝ áfo kudiyi eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ . Se úsu kusu kutsyuǝ nkǝ lǝ usu usiǝ itǝ lefe nǝ dikulǝ esoo , úfi wǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe lǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ eto ani .
42020010	Se lefe léyo bǝ betsyiko eyibibi nyamǝ bɔlɛɛ , ótsyese wǝ uyifoyifo utsyuǝ nkǝ usu ofo wǝ kedikɔ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ beyifoyifo ɔflɔ oboko wǝ . Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ áblɛ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ nya bála wǝ babɔsɛ , nya bǝntǝ wǝ kulesa .
42020011	Lǝ nyaso ótsyese uyifoyifo bamba . Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ áblɛ wuntsya , nya bákpe wǝ kofani , nya bála wǝ bátsyese , nya bǝntǝ wǝ kulesa .
42020012	Ótsyese uyifoyifo tsyǝfǝ . Nya beyifoyifo bamǝ lɛblɛ wǝ bǝtǝkǝ wǝ afabe lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bála wǝ bǝlǝkǝ lǝ mfó .
42020013	“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lɛtɔ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be ele bǝ nyifo ? Mootsyese mɔ ubi lala nya mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu wǝ . ’
42020014	“ Fɛɛ se beyifoyifo bamǝ dínyǝ ubi ǝmǝ , bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Biǝnyǝ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ eto ubi kosate ni nwǝ mfo . Bitǝ lǝ bolo wǝ ete wǝ bikǝ biamfo kenke lǝ befiani bo bele ! ’
42020015	Nyaso bǝnǝ wǝ babɔsǝ lǝ ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya bálo wǝ . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ luuyifo beyifoyifo bamǝ mfo ?
42020016	Nla miǝ bete biǝ woolo beyifoyifo bamǝ kenke nya wuufi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ okpe lǝ beyifoyifo bamba lǝ ani . ” Se betidi bamǝ lɛnɔ nko , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko ! ”
42020017	Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nyamfo eto kasɔ nlɛ bote , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti ? ’
42020018	Utidi saa wǝ luutusǝ ɔsɔ lǝ leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , eboba wuli wuli wuli . Nya lǝ leba nǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ lɛsɔ utsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , diukuǝ wǝ muɛmuɛmuɛ . ”
42020019	Afi eto bateasa ku Onanto eto besumunyǝ eto beninǝ ákpe nkɛale bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ Yesu lamfolamfo , itsyise bǝnyǝ bǝ mǝ ɔnlɛ sitinti nyaso ɔ́tɛyi lekpa nǝmǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ báte betidi bamfo sikpi .
42020020	Lǝ nnya esoo , bákabɛbɛ kusu bamba ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Bǝlǝkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ kalɔ kalɔ . Nya bákle ku mǝ bǝnkǝ besu Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya béyifo ǝsuǝ fe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mǝ kosate léla bǝ lǝ bate itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bátsyese mǝ bǝnkǝ babio Yesu uyibi lǝ etiki ǝsuǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ befi wǝ bakpe lǝ Roma eto Aba eto uninǝ eto ani .
42020021	Lǝ nnya esoo , mba laabio kanɔ asa bamfó ésu Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝnkǝ asa nnya faatɛyi ku nnya fate kenke eyifo etiki tlolololo . Nya buyi tsya boǝ aambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ alɛ asa buyifo . Bomu aate ɔnukualɛtiki nnya ǝsuǝ Onanto laala nkǝ betidi yifo .
42020022	Lǝ nyamfo eso bola boǝ boate lǝ bo kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝ bofo umǝnko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ lee yǝntǝ kusu ? ”
42020023	Fɛɛ Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ kɔwɛsu bua útsyǝ lekpo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
42020024	“ Bifi sika flubia eto atabi beboko lǝ mbe . Owoe eto disi ku diye ntǝkǝ mfo ? ”
42020025	Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ale ini . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi lesa saa nǝ ni Okankplɛ eto lele bitǝ Okankplɛ . Nya bifi lesa saa nǝ ni Onanto eto lele bitǝ Onanto . ”
42020026	Nya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi mfóo , bamfó wǝ bumuǝ lǝ kulesa ǝsuǝ . Mǝ kɛnyɛ ǝkpǝ mǝ nya iyifo mǝ yani lǝ ditiki nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi eso .
42020027	Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ mba laatɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ensi embotakaa , ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
42020028	“ Oteasa , Moses áwɔni lǝ afi nnya útǝ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya oyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya bánle bebi saa , nyalɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmfo eto ɔyimisani , fi usio ǝmǝ ufi . Nya wǝ ku ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bale bebi . Nya bebi bamfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mǝ fe osani wǝ dimankɛ ubi saa eto bale . ’
42020029	Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ , bayimisani ekuanse akɛ . Osaibi ninǝ éfi kusiǝ nya úbǝ úkpǝ nya wǝ ku wǝ usiǝ mánle ubi saa .
42020030	Ɔyimisani nuǝfǝ tsya éfi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ .
42020031	Utsyǝfǝ tsya nko kǝ . Nya lesa nǝmǝ diyifo nko itǝ bayimisani ekuanse bamfo kenke . Mǝmblɛ kenke ǝkpǝ lǝ lefǝ nǝ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manle .
42020032	Lǝ kalosǝkɔ kenke , usio ǝmǝ kosate ǝbǝ úkpǝ .
42020033	Nya mɔmɔɔ , diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ bekpǝnkpǝ luusinkli bataka , owoe eto usiǝ usio ǝmǝ luudi se mǝmblɛ kenke dífi wǝ lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mǝ ? ”
42020034	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nkpǝ bomfo ǝsuǝ ete basani ku besio leefi bǝsiǝ kǝsiǝ bese .
42020035	Fɛɛ basani ku besio kenke ba díńyǝ itǝ bǝ bataka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ bo lensiembolo kulefee , bensiembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsiǝ bese .
42020036	Bootsyǝ fe kase Onanto eto batɔnkpe nte , nya bensiembukpǝ tsya . Beyifo Onanto eto bebi itsyise bátaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ .
42020037	Nyamfo ni ɔnukualɛ wǝ Moses dílǝkǝ ote lǝ Asawɔni Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ bekpǝnkpǝ si bootaka bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ . Itsyise lǝ lefe nǝ únyǝ lǝ kuyi ko díkǝnyǝ ute eto ǝnǝmi , ókpadi Onamute fe Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob tsya eto Onanto .
42020038	Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ mba díkekpǝ kokoo , besi nkpǝ . Nyaso uyifo mǝ Onanto tsya . ”
42020039	Mfó afi eto bateasa bamfo eto bǝtsyuǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ǝtǝ mbuayɛ kukɔnɔ ! ”
42020040	Nyamfo eto kamaa , kutsyuǝ saa ménsikpe ɔkɔɛ lǝ ɔtɔ kulesa tsya .
42020041	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ betidi lɛtɛyi bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebutsyi Oka David eto bebi eto kafo ?
42020042	Nya Oka David ǝmǝ kosate átɛyi lǝ kusǝ eto kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Si ǝsiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani eto kutsyǝ
42020043	isu ese lefe nǝ muufi fǝ balo nkpe lǝ fǝ kokpa kalɔ . ” ’
42020044	Nya lǝ Oka David ákpadi wǝ nkǝ Onamutee , ntsyǝ íbǝ fɛ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ luuyifo Oka David eto kafo eto ubi ? ”
42020045	Lǝ lefe nǝ betidi ba tã dínyǝ béketsyue ato lǝ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ bɔtɛyi , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
42020046	“ Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ afi eto bateasa ǝsuǝ . Betidi ba laala botsyilama lǝ mǝ awu kplɛ kplɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya baala bǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mǝ ku dibu lǝ asi kafo . Mǝ laala nlebe kplɛ busiǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya baala ndikɔ kpaa busiǝ lǝ eyikedikɔ .
42020047	Beesu bakɔɛsiǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bawunsǝ ko mǝ , fɛɛ baawɛ mǝ kalɛ mǝ asa kafo . Nya baato kala kǝntsyɛ , kate ǝsuǝ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nyaso mǝ kotonǝnǝ ebɔkɛ ale eso utsyuǝ saa eto kole ! ”
42021001	Lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ mfoo , Yesu ábesǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya únyǝ kase batabinyǝ leefi mǝ ǝtǝsa kesu kakpe lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto otobe kafo .
42021002	Nya únyǝ tsya kase ɔkɔsiǝ okombo utsyuǝ dífi pesewa inuǝ butsyuǝ ókpe lǝ otobe ǝmǝ kafo .
42021003	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ ɔkɔsiǝ okombo ǝmfoo , útǝ lesa nǝ nso bafɛfɛ bamfo kenke .
42021004	Itsyise babamba bamfoo , mǝǝ , lesa nǝ baala lǝ nǝ bǝǝnyǝ nti , ete ni nǝ bǝtǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ usio ǝmfo wǝ sekombo , lesa nǝ kenke ntǝ wǝ nǝ wuudi mfó , nya ni nǝ úfi útǝ mfo nɛ . ”
42021005	Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfó kedi etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya bátɛyi kase kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ laanɔ bobe ku kase aba nnya béfi báto diyo nǝmǝ laanɔ bobe ku asa nnya betidi dítǝ béfi bálɔ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
42021006	“ Lesa saa nǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ mfoo , lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ se leba saa lensiembubu lǝ ni kǝsiǝkɔ . Bomu betidi ebusense ditsyuǝ saa lekpo lǝ kasɔ . ”
42021007	Mfó nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , dimamfe yuubǝ itǝ nko ? Nya be ini buufi bunyǝ lǝ bote boǝ lefe nǝ asa nyamfo luubǝ éboyo ? ”
42021008	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbɔwɛ mi okpe . Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ batɛyi bǝnkǝ mɔ ditiki bǝbǝ bulǝkǝ kate , bookǝbǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mɔ uni , ’ nya ‘ Lefe nǝmǝ éboyo . ’ Fɛɛ biǝntǝkǝko mǝ kama .
42021009	Bíanté sikpi lǝ bɛnɔ lema eto kudu nya betidi letaka bǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Asa nyamfo eto kakle ebutsyiko bubǝ , fɛɛ inni nya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ kalosǝkɔ ebubǝ eyo elo . ”
42021010	Yesu esi úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ese ebɔkpɔ ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , nya bekakedikɔ lɔɔbɔkpɔ ku mǝ ǝsuǝ .
42021011	Kasɔ ebutinkǝ kekleke . Nya kukpɛnsɛ tsya luubǝ kekleke . Nya efimbi akpa akpa tsya luubǝ nlebe nlebe kenke . Nya ekpinsa kpǝ luutsyiko bubǝ lǝ difule ǝsuǝ .
