42021012	“ Nya fɛ asa nyamfo luubǝ ibǝ , betidi ebumuǝ mi nya bookpe mi bulǝ , bate mi ohiã . Betidi ebokpa mi besuko akpokakpokɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ nya bookpe mi lǝ ayo . Nya bookpa mi besuko baka ku Aba eto bǝnyɛsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ bakponko mi akpo lǝ mɔ disi eso .
42021013	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , kusu ebɔsini mi bǝ lǝ bidi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
42021014	Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ bɛtɔnsǝ itǝ bǝ biembulǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kusu ko biɔyɛ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ eso .
42021015	Itsyise muutǝ mi kobe ku kɛnyɛ yayaya itǝ bǝ mi balo eto kuutsyuǝ embofo buńyǝ lǝ mi ǝnǝmi nye bǝtǝ mi etiki eto mbuayɛ kulefe .
42021016	Mi anto mǝ ku bayimisani ku mi betidi ku mi bayɛtsyuǝ ebufi mi bakpe lǝ ani . Nya boolo mi bǝtsyuǝ .
42021017	Betidi ba tã ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso .
42021018	Fɛɛ mi disi eto sɛwɔnii , lɛ sɔni kplon embonya .
42021019	Bińyǝ kekleke lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ kulefe .
42021020	“ Lefe nǝ bínyǝ biǝ bamamanyǝ esu bǝńyǝ batsyilama Yerusalem , ete biote biǝ umǝ ǝmfo eto boba kakpo lǝ kasɔ eto lefe eboyo .
42021021	Lefe nǝ mfóo , betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ Yudea , ele bǝ betsyetsyi bedu besu babiɔ lǝ atini ǝsuǝ lǝ babɔ lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ . Nya betidi bakenke nkpe lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ kafo , ele bǝ babɔ lǝ wǝ bedu . Nya betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ mbuto ku kǝmǝ ka lɛfi mfo , yanle bǝ besu umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ kafo .
42021022	Itsyise lefe nǝ mfó ni kotonǝnǝ eto eyi nnya ele bǝ ibǝ fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki léte .
42021023	Yɔɔkɛ ale tinti itǝ besio ba ni bafonlɛ ku bebiambe ba nlɛ bebi bɔyimisǝ . Kanyinyǝnyǝ kekleke kǝtsyuǝ ebubǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ebubǝ betidi bamfo ǝsuǝ .
42021024	Boolo bǝtsyuǝ ku asiabi . Nya boomuǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale besuko nsɔ bamba kpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ , luudi sɛkplɛ baayinkǝ Yerusalemfɔ bakpe isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto lɛtɔnɔ utǝ mǝ .
42021025	“ Ekpinsa kpǝ ebubǝ lǝ kofe ku kofande ku befandebi eto ǝnǝmi ǝsuǝ . Nya kasɔ eto betidi kenke eboyansǝ kusubebe saa . Nya sikpi kplɛ ebubǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase lekpo eto kudu ku kase diuyǝnki nyanklaa eso .
42021026	Ǝnǝmi ebutsyiko betidi bonanko lǝ sikpi sia luumuǝ mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ befi bǝńyǝ bensǝkǝ itǝ lesa nǝ luubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ eso . Itsyise asa nnya nkpe lǝ difule ensiembuńyǝ lǝ nnya kǝńyǝnkɔ .
42021027	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Utidi Eto Ubi ebɔbɔ ubǝ lǝ difule lǝ asɔmi loku kǝmiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ ku lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
42021028	Lefe nǝ asa nyamfo mfe nlɛ bubǝǝ , bɛlɔ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ lǝ bikabe kusu , itsyise mi dilǝkǝfe ebɔfi elo . ”
42021029	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Bibu disi bitsyi lǝ kudiyi ku eyi bamba kenke ǝsuǝ bebe .
42021030	Lǝ binyǝ biǝ afanto fɔfɔ etsyiko bɔbɔɔ , bete biǝ kasɔmite eboyo elo .
42021031	Nko kǝ ini lǝ binyǝ biǝ asa nyamfo nlɛ bubǝǝ , bete biǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ eto dibǝfe fe yaala lǝ eyo .
42021032	“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ fɛ bǝtsyuǝ ba nsi nkpǝ mfo luukpǝ balo .
42021033	Kato ku kasɔ ebubǝ efe , fɛɛ mɔ etiki embubǝ efe kulefe .
42021034	“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biemfi mi lefe bitǝ budi ku sitekpe eto disuǝyuǝ mate . Nya kuutsyuǝ memfi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ bɔkpɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa ǝsuǝ . Lenni nko , diyi nǝmǝ ebubǝ ditu mi lǝ kafuafua ǝsuǝ .
42021035	Nya yuuyifo fe kase uyibibiobio lǝǝlǝkǝ ubuki seka . Etsyise yuubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi ǝsuǝ .
42021036	Nyaso bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bińyǝ bikato ola lefe saa bǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ bɛbɔ befe lǝ keni saa ǝsuǝ lǝ lesa saa nǝ luubǝ mfo ǝsuǝ lǝ itǝ bǝ biofo buńyǝ lǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi eto lekpokakpokɔ . ”
42021037	Lǝ eyi nyamfó kenke ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu éfi ɔ́lɛ betidi bamfo asa bote lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ . Nya lǝ ditsyitsyo lefee , úkesu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ékesu kalabe .
42021038	Nya olesiǝtu saa , betidi bamfo ékesu kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ lǝ banɔ wǝ asatete .
42022001	Lefe nǝ Yudafɔ leedi Nnamfokuã eto Abolo eto Diyi nǝ baakpo bǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila ebɔfi .
42022002	Fɛɛ se Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ mǝ ku afi eto bateasa díkate betidi bamfó sikpi esoo , bákabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ balo Yesu lǝ kabiɔbiɔ ǝsuǝ .
42022003	Mfó nya Obonsam dídufǝ lǝ Yuda wǝ baakpo tsya bǝ Iskariot ǝsuǝ . Nyaa uyifo Yesu eto lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni .
42022004	Nyaso Yuda ésu Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto mba laase mfó eto beninǝ ɔflɔ . Nya bédi etiki itsyi lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ fɛ boomuǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
42022005	Bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ , nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝ bootǝ wǝ atabi .
42022006	Nya Yuda tsya lɛtɔnɔ nko . Nyaso útsyiko lefe sɛɛ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ ufi Yesu okpe mǝ lǝ ani lǝ betidi bamǝ eto mante mante ǝsuǝ .
42022007	Lǝ nnya kamaa , diyi nǝ baalo basamubi itǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi itǝ Nnamfokuã eto Diyididi ǝbǝ léyo .
42022008	Nya Yesu létsyese Petro ku Yohanes ɔtɔnsǝ ku kɛnyɛ kamfo nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛlɔ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa bitsyǝ itǝ bo budi . ”
42022009	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sie faala fǝ bɔlɔ ni butsyǝ ? ”
42022010	Nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bidufǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ǝmǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ ebubǝ otsyako mi wǝ ntsyi ntu ku ɔlɔtsyi . Bitǝkǝko wǝ lǝ bidufǝ diyo nǝ wuudufǝ .
42022011	Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi oyosate ǝmǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Oteasa nkǝ bɔtɔ fǝ nkǝ , “ Nte diyo nǝ kafo ele bǝ Mɔ ku mɔ bakasebi luubǝ bedi Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa ? ” ’
42022012	Woote mi abanslo kato eto diyo kplɛ ditsyuǝ nǝ bálɔ bǝtsyǝ nya bétsyue ǝsiǝsa lǝ ni kafo bǝtsyǝ . Bɛlɔ didisa nǝmǝ bitsyǝ mfó . ”
42022013	Mfó nya báyifǝ kusu bésu bǝnyǝ lesa saa pɛpɛɛpɛ fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya bálɔ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto edisa nyamǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
42022014	Se lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ ésu bǝsiǝ kasɔ bǝ lǝ bedi lesa .
42022015	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Iyifo mɔ lelabi kokooko bǝ lǝ ndi Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmfo ku mi fɛ lǝ nnyǝ kanyi .
42022016	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mensiembudi ni bio isu ése lefe nǝ muudi ni lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
42022017	Nnya kamaa , Yesu éfi ditǝnǝkɔbe nya ɔ́sɔ ani . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Befo nyamfo lǝ binǝ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
42022018	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , mensiembunǝ ntu bo lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ wanyi eto awɔnsa ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto eto sekadidi luubǝ . ”
42022019	Nya úfi abolo utsyuǝ nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Nya úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ mǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muufi ntǝ Onanto kedi lǝ mi disi . Biyifo nyamfo bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
42022020	Nko ke tsya úfi ntǝ ku lɛkɔbe úfi utǝ mǝ lǝ didisa nǝmǝ kama nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lɛkɔbetɔ nǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto ketsyue fɔfɔ ka utsyue utsyǝ fe ditsyǝbi , nǝ ni mɔ kɔtɔ ko mookpo lǝ kasɔ lǝ mi disi .
42022021	Fɛɛ bete biǝ nwǝ dídu mɛ útǝǝ , si ɔlɛ kɔni bokpe ko mɛ lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni mfo .
42022022	Nya mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , mbǝ nlɛ bofe fe kase Onanto lése uyi utsyǝ . Fɛɛ mbɔbuɛ itǝ utidi wǝ luudu mɛ utǝ . ”
42022023	Mfó nya beetsyiko bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɔ kanɔ bǝ owoe luuyifo nyamfo .
42022024	Kǝnǝ ǝbǝ kedufǝ bakasebi bamǝ nti itsyi nwǝ luudi ɔkplɛ ǝsuǝ .
42022025	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba lenni Yudafɔɔ , mǝ baka kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ betidi ǝsuǝ kenke . Nya baka bamfo kpe diye nǝ baala bǝ betidi bamfo kakpo mǝǝ , nǝ ni bǝ ‘ Bafonǝtidi . ’
42022026	Fɛɛ inni nko ele bǝ itsyǝ lǝ mi nti . Bomu utidi wǝ ni nwǝ nso kenke lǝ mi ntii , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔkɛkɛ enso . Fɛɛ nwǝ ni ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ ofiani nwǝ leesumu betidi .
42022027	Nya owoe ni ɔkplɛnyǝ onso ? Nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ɔpunu ekedi lee , nwǝ leesumu wǝ ? Lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ɔpunu ekedi . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , nkpe mi lǝ nti fe nwǝ leesumu .
42022028	Bíokpe ɔkɔɛ koko bítǝkǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ lefe kekleke kenke ǝsuǝ .
42022029	Nya fe kase mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale nkǝ ndi sekaa , nko kǝ mintsya luutǝ mi ǝsuǝale nyamǝ eto okle nɛ .
42022030	Biudi binǝ lǝ mɔ lesakedikɔ lǝ mɔ sekakedikɔ . Nya biusiǝ lǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ bidi seka lǝ Israel eto lefosi atobi ǝnuǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
42022031	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Simon Petro nkǝ , “ Simon , Simon ! Tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! Onanto ǝtǝ Obonsam kusu nkǝ oto mimblɛ obe lǝ usense mi nti , mba nkpe kɔnɔku mba lǝmbǝ kɔnɔ lǝ fe kase ɔkuɛmfo laaflɛ kamɔ kǝlǝkǝ lǝ kofo nti .
42022032	Fɛɛ Simon , mboto ola lǝ fǝ disi bǝ lǝ fǝ bofokanɔ lǝ bɔyɛ kɛnyɛ buyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ fuusinkli ǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , kpe fǝ bayimitsyuǝ nkɛale . ”
42022033	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nńyǝ nlɛ kusu bobe miǝ bonko fǝ kenke ebolabe lǝ Aba eto diyo nya lǝ nkpǝ ku fǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
42022034	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Petro , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ ketsye kamfo fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ebutudi sitsyǝ fǝ enyi mɛ . ”
42022035	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfe se míntsyese mi kusu nya míntǝ bíentsyi otabitobe nye kusuyɛyɛtobe nye afɔkpa kuǝtsyuǝ , béhiã lesatsyuǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kulesa mánhiã bo kula kon . ”
42022036	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , utidi wǝ nkpe atabi eto otobe utsyuǝ nye kusuyɛyɛtobe utsyuǝ , ufi ɔlɛ . Nya nwǝ kalande kukǝtsyuǝ lentee , ele bǝ ufi wǝ awu nye kafia ote , lǝ usu oya ke .
42022037	Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe mfó lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bákla wǝ bákpe lǝ betidi bua ntii , ’ ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ nko lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lesa nǝ báwɔni itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , lɛ bubǝ kǝtǝ . ”
42022038	Nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bee ! Nnyǝ nlanle nnuǝ nte mfo ! ” Mfó nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Isiǝ . ”
42022039	Yesu áyɛ ɔ́bɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ nya úsu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ fe kase woala buyifo . Nya wǝ bakasebi bamǝ tsya dítǝkǝko wǝ .
42022040	Se óyo kaka ǝmǝǝ , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Beto ola , lǝ bɛyɛ disi butǝ le botokabe ǝsuǝ . ”
42022041	Nnya kamaa , óyani mǝ utsyǝ mfó ɔ́yɛ usu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya óse akonki óto ola .
42022042	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , lǝ alaa , lǝkǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝmfo etsyiko lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ menyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ fǝ lele ǝsuǝ . ”
42022043	Mfó nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe dítsyi kato úbǝ úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ nya ókpe wǝ nkɛale .
42022044	Nya lǝ kanyi kplɛ ka ɔnlɛ bunyǝ esoo , usi óto ola kekleke ókpe . Nya diwi nǝ lɛbɔ lekpo wǝ eyifo fe atɔbo nya nlɛ bola kakpo lǝ kasɔ .
42022045	Se Yesu létaka lǝ kaka ɔnlɛ ola boto mfóo , úsinkli úsu wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ . Nya úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe itsyi lǝ lɛwɛnlo nǝ ǝsuǝ bakɛ eso .
42022046	Mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ selabe ? Betaka lǝ beto ola lǝ kase biembudufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ . ”
42022047	Lefe nǝ Yesu ńyǝ ɔnlɛ etikii , betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ áyɛ bétu wǝ . Yuda wǝ ni bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni lɛtɔnko mǝ . Ɔ́yɛ úsu Yesu ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ ɔfiɔ wǝ lǝ kola .
42022048	Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi Yuda nkǝ , “ Yuda , bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ aafiɔ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lǝ kola lǝ efi mɛ akpe lǝ betidi eto ani ? ”
42022049	Lefe nǝ bakasebi ba lɛkɛ mfó ku Yesu dínyǝ lesa nǝ luubǝ ibǝ , bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bɔkpɔnko mǝ ku bo nlande lee ? ”
42022050	Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ nti eto ɔni lésiabe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto uyifoyifo eto kodianito úfǝ .
42022051	Fɛɛ Yesu áni ko mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Isiǝ ! Bitǝ mǝ kusu ! ” Mfó nya útidi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto koto nya wǝ koto dísinkli kótsya wǝ .
42022052	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi besumufɔ ninǝ ku mba laase Disumuyo eto beninǝ ku kusǝ eto beninǝ ba díbǝ mfo bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bifi keyi ku nlande bibǝ fe uwudifɔ mini ?
42022053	Bonko mi ákɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ diyi saa tsya bíatɛtsyi biǝ biǝmuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale mɛ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mi lefe léyo bǝ biyifo nko se Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale ntekǝ kato . ”
42022054	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku baka bamfó ǝmuǝ Yesu , nya béfi wǝ bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto diyo . Nya Petro tsya dítǝkǝko mǝ kama kama .
42022055	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpe ute utsyuǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto lekple , nya Petro tsya dísu úsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
42022056	Se besio eto uyifoyifo ɔni dínyǝ Petro se ute díyǝnde okpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ se usi mfóo , óbe wǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo tsya ǝǝtǝkǝko Yesu . ”
42022057	Fɛɛ Petro áni nyamfo nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Usio , minyi wǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
42022058	Lǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ eto kama , osani utsyuǝ tsya ǝnyǝ Petro wǝ únyi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya mǝ nti eto ɔnɔ feni ? ” Fɛɛ Petro esi útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , nni mɔ uni ! ”
42022059	Íyifo fe lebombosɔsɔ lɔni eto kama , osani bamba utsyuǝ tsya ébǝ únyǝ kekleke ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Kǝnǝ ku kǝtsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ osani ǝmfo tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu , itsyise Galileanyǝ uni ! ”
42022060	Fɛɛ Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , mante lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo kula kula ! ” Lamfolamfo , fe kase unsi únyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki , ukusɛ ko ditǝ kɛnyɛ .
42022061	Bonamute ǝmǝ ékensǝ óbe Petro . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Petro lékloma nkǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ ketsye kamfoo , ebutudi kɛnyɛ sitsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ fǝ enyi mɛ . ”
42022062	Petro ábɔ úsu lekple nya úwi keku kekleke .
42022063	Betidi ba díkase Yesu , ǝmǝ wǝ nya báblɛ wǝ .
42022064	Bákle wǝ ǝnǝmi nya báblɛwǝ , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe lɛsɔ fǝ ? Tɛyi bo ! ”
42022065	Nya báka wǝ lǝ esu bamba kpǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
42022066	Se kale dísiǝǝ , kusǝ komǝ eto beninǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ǝbǝ bǝsiǝ . Nya bákpa Yesu bésuko mǝ ǝnǝmi .
42022067	Nya betidi ba díbǝ batsya mfó lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lǝ fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . ” Mfo nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ntɛyi mi lesatsyuǝ tsyaa , biǝmbofo bɛnɔ .
42022068	Nya lǝ ntɔ mi etiki ǝtsyuǝ , biǝmbofo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ katɛyi mɛ kulesa .
42022069	Fɛɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , Onanto wǝ ni ǝsuǝalenyǝ kenke ebutsyǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lǝ wǝ kodiani . ”
42022070	Mfó nya mǝmblɛ lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ ? ” Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi kosate nlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ wǝ mini , nya nko ini nɛ . ”
42022071	Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yensihiã bo bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa si ubǝ udi adansiɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . Bo kosate ánɔ asa nnya ɔ́tɛyi ! ”
42023001	Nya mǝmblɛ létaka nya béfi Yesu bésuko Pilato ɔflɔ .
42023002	Mfó bétsyiko etiki butsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Búmuǝ utidi ǝmfo se ɔnlɛ bo kusǝ eto betidi bokpa kayɛnko lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔnlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , bénsiko umǝnko bǝtǝ Roma eto Okankplɛ . Nya úsi ɔ́tɛyi tsya nkǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nya uni Oka tsya . ”
42023003	Pilato átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nko ini fe kase fanlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ . ”
42023004	Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɛyi besumunyǝ ninǝ ku sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ , “ Mǝnnyǝ kulesa lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ nǝ eso ele bǝ nlo wǝ dikpi . ”
42023005	Fɛɛ mǝmǝ ǝńyǝ kekleke bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ asa nnya woate ǝtǝ botaka kǝńyǝ ǝbǝ idufǝ lǝ Yudea eto betidi kenke nti . Útsyǝ nyamfo kasɔ lǝ Galilea , nya úkaboko nnya mfo tsya . ”
42023006	Se Pilato lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Galileanyǝ ni utidi ǝmfo ? ”
42023007	Nyaso se óte nkǝ Yesu étsyi Galilea eto lekpake nǝ ǝsuǝ Herodes nlɛ seka budi esoo , úfi wǝ ótsyese Herodes ɔflɔ . Nya Herodes ǝmfo akɛ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ .
42023008	Ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ Herodes tinti se únyǝ Yesu , itsyise wɔ́ɔnɔ wǝ kɔsɔ koko nya óla nkǝ lǝ unyǝ wǝ kokooko . Nya ɔnlɛ kusu bobe nkǝ wuunyǝ Yesu lǝ uyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ lǝ obe .
42023009	Nyaso Herodes átɔ Yesu etiki kpǝ , fɛɛ Yesu ménfe kɛnyɛ utǝ mbuayɛ saa .
42023010	Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ábɔ bǝbǝ sɛtɔ nya bála nnyɛ kplɛ , kplɛ bǝtǝkǝ Yesu .
42023011	Herodes ku wǝ bamamanyǝ ákpe Yesu kɔfiɔ ku kofani . Nya béfi awu nnya lefo koya ǝtsyuǝ bákpe wǝ nya besi bákpa wǝ bésuko Pilato ɔflɔ .
42023012	Diyi nǝmfo hã ǝsuǝ nya Herodes ku Pilato léfiani bayɛtsyuǝ , itsyise kɔɔ , balo bédi lǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
42023013	Pilato ákpadi besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku betidi ba létsya mfo ɔkɔ .
42023014	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi lékpa utidi ǝmfo béboko mɛ biǝ ɔlɛ betidi bokpa kayɛnko lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ . Nya mɔmɔɔ , ńtɔ wǝ etiki lǝ mi kosate eto ǝnǝmi . Nya mǝnnyǝ kabua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase mi léla bítǝkǝ wǝ .
42023015	Herodes tsya mǝnnyǝ kulesa bua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise úsinkliko wǝ ótsyese bo . Utidi ǝmfo ményifo kulesa nǝ ele bǝ bolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi .
42023016	Nyaso muutǝ lǝ bablɛ wǝ kuyibi lǝ nyani wǝ lǝ udu . ”
42023017	Lǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto eyididi saa ǝsuǝǝ , iyifo Pilato eto ketsyue bǝ oyani mba bákpe lǝ diyo eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti utǝ mǝ .
42023018	Mǝmblɛ áfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lo wǝ ! Lǝ ayani Baraba ǝtǝ bo ! ”
42023019	Baraba ǝmfoo , bákpe wǝ lǝ diyo ɛyɛ lǝ bulǝ butsyuǝ bo ókpe únyǝ lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ku wǝ utidi wǝ ólo ǝsuǝ eso .
42023020	Nya se Pilato léla nkǝ lǝ oyani Yesu esoo , usi údi betidi bamǝ etiki .
42023021	Fɛɛ bákpo kudu bembembe bákpe lǝ wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ bǝ “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
42023022	Pilato esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ ditsyǝfǝ nkǝ , “ Nya nte kabua ka úyifo ? Mǝnnyǝ kabua ka úyifo eso ele bǝ nlo wǝ dikpǝnkpi ! Muutǝ lǝ bablɛ wǝ keyibi lǝ nyani wǝ . ”
42023023	Fɛɛ bofa ko bensi banlɛ bembembe katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ele bǝ lǝ basɔ Yesu bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . ” Nya lǝ kalosǝkɔ , bǝtǝkǝ wǝ kato .
42023024	Nyaso Pilato ála etiki nyamǝ úlǝkǝ fe kase betidi bamǝ léla .
42023025	Óyani utidi nwǝ baala útǝ mǝ . Utidi wǝ bakponkpo lékpe lǝ diyo itǝ bulǝ bo ókpe ku wǝ utidilolo eso . Nya óyani Yesu ókpe mǝ lǝ ani nkǝ lǝ beyifo lesa nǝ bála ku wǝ .
42023026	Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ákpa Yesu bédunko . Nya se bányɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ , bátsyako Kirenenyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Simon wǝ dítsyi kebuto kǝtsyuǝ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem . Bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ báyinkǝ wǝ bákpe bǝnkǝ ofo uyi wǝ Yesu ntsyi mfo utsyi lǝ utǝkǝko wǝ kama .
42023027	Betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama . Nya besio bǝtsyuǝ akɛ lǝ mǝ nti ba díkewi nku ku kaminsǝ kǝtǝ wǝ .
42023028	Yesu ékensǝ óbe nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Yerusalem eto besio , bienwi keku bitǝ mɛ . Bomu biwi lǝ mi ku mi bebi eto disi .
42023029	Itsyise lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ betidi lɔɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ bakonɔ ku mba eto belefie ubi dímǝnsiǝtɔ unyǝ ku ami nnya bányimi tɔ bǝnyǝ ! ’
42023030	Lefe nǝmfó ni lefe nǝ betidi lɔɔtɛyi atini bǝ , ‘ Beba bekpo bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ’ Nya bɔɔtɛyi akpenkpe bǝ , ‘ Bɛkula bo ! ’
42023031	Itsyise lǝ balɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo lǝ kuyi kuã ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ kuyi koya ? ”
42023032	Bákpa betidi bamba inuǝ ba ni babuayifo bésu kalokɔ ku Yesu .
42023033	Se bésu báyo kaka baakpo Ditidisikɔbee , básɔ Yesu bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya betidi inuǝ bamǝ tsyaa , básɔ mǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ keyi ǝsuǝ lǝ Yesu eto simǝni ku sediani .
42023034	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , fi atsyɛ mǝ , itsyise benyi lesa nǝ banlɛ buyifo . ” Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , bamamanyǝ bamǝ ésie Yesu eto awu bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ kase asa nnya bákpo basɛ lété ǝsuǝ .
42023035	Betidi bamǝ kenke ǝńyǝ mfó balɛ bobe nya Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ ńyǝ bánlɛ Yesu bumǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ófo betidi bamba lǝ nkpǝ , bitǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bobe , lǝ wǝ ni Kristo , Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ! ”
42023036	Nko ke bamamanyǝ bamfó tsya dímǝ wǝ nɛ . Bésu wǝ ɔflɔ nya béfi ntǝ bo nkpe kalo bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ unǝ .
42023037	Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Okaa , nyalɛ kpɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
42023038	Báwɔni etiki nyamfo lǝ wǝ disikato nya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ nɛ . ”
42023039	Babuayifo ba básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ eyi ǝsuǝ eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti áka Yesu nkǝ , “ Inni fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ? Kpɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ǝlǝkǝ bo tsya ! ”
42023040	Fɛɛ unuǝfǝ áni ko wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Aante Onanto sikpi lee ? Kotonǝnǝ kɔni eto okle befi bǝtǝ fǝ ku wǝ kenke .
42023041	Nya bo kotonǝnǝ , kɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ boo , ni ni nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bo nɛ . Fɛɛ wǝ ményifo kabua saa . ”
42023042	Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Yesu , kloma mɛ lǝ esu edufǝ fǝ sekakedikɔ ! ”
42023043	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ mmi ǝmfo kee , ebudufǝ Paradiso kafo ku mɛ . ”
42023044	Nya se éyo kakɔmi eto lefosi ǝnuǝǝ , kofe áyɛ bofa nya kale ku kawunsiǝ kenke lena tũũ itsyi lǝ kakɔmi isu ese lǝ abombo ǝtsyǝ . Nya Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto kafia ka mfaka mfo léla , késie lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ .
42023045	
42023046	Yesu áfa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe nkǝ , “ Nto , mfi mɔ lɛwɔnɔ ńkpe fǝ lǝ ani ! ” Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfó nkoo , óma kɛnyɛ .
42023047	Se omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ dínyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo eyifo utidi sɛɛ . ”
42023048	Se betidi ba díbǝ bǝ baabe lesa nǝ díbǝ nya bǝnyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , bésinkli bésu ayo nya béfi ani bétsyi lǝ esi ku kaminsǝ .
42023049	Nya betidi ba kenke léte Yesu ku besio ba dítǝkǝko wǝ ditsyi Galilea bǝbǝǝ , ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ balɛ asa nyamfo bobe .
42023050	Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó baakpo Yosef wǝ dítsyi Arimatea lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ . Uyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ betidi lǝǝtǝ dibu tinti . Nya uńyǝ ɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Onanto eto sekadidi sia nlɛ bubǝ . Ite bǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto bakponkpo nti tsyaa , wántɔnɔ ko mǝ lǝ lesa nǝ báse uyi ku lesa nǝ béyifo ǝsuǝ .
42023051	
42023052	Úsu Pilato ɔflɔ úsu ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo Yesu eto ɔkɔ .
42023053	Úlǝkǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ nya úfi kafia flubia kǝtsyuǝ úmini wǝ kenke . Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ leba kafo eto kudi kutsyuǝ ko bembikǝtɔ kuutsyuǝ bǝnyǝ .
42023054	Diyi nǝmfó eyifo Fida wǝ bǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lǝǝsiǝ kale .
42023055	Besio ba dítǝkǝko Yesu se betsyi Galilea , ǝtǝkǝko Yosef bésu kudi komǝ eti nya bésu bábe kase bébikǝ Yesu ǝmǝ .
42023056	Nya bésinkli bésu oto nya bǝkuǝ asa nnya laanyi fififi ku nnuǝbi bo beefi kediki bakɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ . Nya bǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi fe kase mǝ afi nyamǝ léte .
42024001	Lǝ Kɔsida eto olensiǝntoo , besio bamǝ ésu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ bétsyi afa nnya bálɔ bǝtsyǝ bésuko kudi komǝ ɔflɔ .
42024002	Mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ ásini kute nya leba kplɛ nǝ béfi béti mfó ámina dite kutsyǝ .
42024003	Nyaso bédufǝ bésu kudi komǝ kafo , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
42024004	Nyamfo ǝtǝ difufu ǝmuǝ mǝ . Nya ete basani inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte mǝ . Nya bikǝ bia banlɛ nlɛ buyǝnde kaba mǝ ǝnǝmi .
42024005	Sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti nyaso báse esi kasɔ bǝtǝ basani bamǝ . Nya basani bamǝ lɛtɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ utidi wǝ nkpe nkpǝ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ nti ?
42024006	Umbǝ mfo . Ótaka ! Bekloma lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mi lefe nǝ ɔkɛ lǝ Galilea nkǝ ,
42024007	ele bǝ befi Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe lǝ betidi bua eto ani . Bɔɔsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kamaa , wuusinkli otaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ . ”
42024008	Besio bamǝ ákloma wǝ etiki nyamǝ .
42024009	Nya se bésinkli bétsyi kebikǝkɔ mfó bǝbǝǝ , bésu bátɛyi bakasebi lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ku babamba kenke tsya asa nyamfo .
42024010	Besio bamǝ ni Maria Magdalene ku Yohana ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo eto ambe . Mǝ ku besio bamba ni mba lɛtɛyi batɔnkpe bamfo asa nyamfo .
42024011	Fɛɛ batɔnkpe bamǝ efi asa nnya besio bamǝ díbǝ bátɛyi mǝ fe ebukitiki . Nyaso bámfo mǝ bánɔ .
42024012	Fɛɛ Petro alɛɛ , ótaka nya útsyetsyi úsu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ . Nya se úsu óbe kudi komǝ kafoo , únyǝ mfia bo bébikǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ wénsinyǝ kulesa mfó . Nyaso usinkli úsu se íyifo wǝ yanii lǝ kase asa nyamǝ díbǝ eso .
42024013	Nya lǝ diyi nǝmfo ke ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto mba ntǝkǝko wǝ eto inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ yɛ lǝ kusu bátɔ lǝ umǝ kɛkɛ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Emaus . Nya yuutsyǝ fe esunkpo kɛntsyɛ akuanse idu mfo isu Yerusalem .
42024014	Nya banyɛ mfó banlɛ etiki budi itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ díbǝ ǝsuǝ .
42024015	Se bányɛ bánlɛ etiki budi kedufǝ lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu kosate ésu útu mǝ nya wǝ ku mǝ lɛyɛ bantɔ .
42024016	Bǝnyǝ wǝ , fɛɛ bǝntsyǝ wǝ lekpo .
42024017	Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ǝsuǝ bɛnyɛ lǝ kusu bɛnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko ? ” Bǝkǝnǝ bǝńyǝ . Nya mǝ ǝnǝmi nlɛ bote fe baminsǝtidi .
42024018	Nya mǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo Kleopa lɛtɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ fǝ mate hã ete ni ɔfɔ lǝ Yerusalem wǝ lenyi asa nnya nlɛ bubǝ lǝ eyi nnya kliminti mfo eto nti lee ? ”
42024019	Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be eto asa ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Asa nnya díbǝ lǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝsuǝ . Utidi emfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ Onanto ku betidi ba tã dínyǝ bǝ okpe ǝsuǝale tinti lǝ wǝ asayifoyifo ku asa nnya ɔ́tɛyi kenke ǝsuǝ .
42024020	Nya bo besumunyǝ ninǝ ku bo baka dífi wǝ bákpe lǝ Romamfɔ eto uninǝ lǝ ani bǝ olo wǝ dikpǝnkpi nya básɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
42024021	Fɛɛ búfi ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ boǝ wǝ loofo Israel eto betidi kenke lǝ nkpǝ . Nya mmi ni diyi tsyǝfǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ se asa nyamfo díbǝ nɛ .
42024022	Bo nti eto besio bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ bo ketu étinkǝ . Itsyise bésu wǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ ku olesiǝtu ǝmfo .
42024023	Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ . Nya bésinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi bo bǝnkǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte mǝ . Nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ Yesu kpe nkpǝ .
42024024	Bo nti eto bǝtsyuǝ ésu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ mfó nya bǝnyǝ fe kase besio bamǝ lɛtɛyi pɛpɛɛpɛ , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ kosate . ”
42024025	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bieninǝ ! Nya tsyaa , mi bofokanɔ lǝ asa nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi mi ǝsuǝ ǝmbǝ ale !
42024026	Binyi biǝnkǝ ele bǝ , Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ nyǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle fɛ lǝ udufǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ? ”
42024027	Nya Yesu dílǝkǝ asa nyamfo kasɔ óte mǝ lǝ asa nnya báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ Moses eto Ǝkue ku asa nnya kenke Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
42024028	Se íbu sɛkɛ lǝ bedufǝ umǝ kɛkɛ wǝ bántɔɔ , Yesu éyifo fe bofe ɔnlɛ kedu .
42024029	Fɛɛ báninko wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Kale ébolo kalo nyaso kɛ lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo . ” Nyaso úsu ɔ́sɔnɔ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
42024030	Úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ nkǝ lǝ udi lesa ku mǝ . Nya úfi abolo nyamǝ nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya úfi útǝ mǝ .
42024031	Mfó nya mǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini nya bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Fɛɛ ónya fĩĩ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
42024032	Bátɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ ɔ́kɛ mfó úkedinko bo etiki nya úkǝlǝkǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki kasɔ kate bo lǝ kusuu , disuǝyuǝ ditsyuǝ eto okle akɛ bo lǝ lɛkɔɛsi ! ”
42024033	Bátaka lamfolamfo nya bésinkli bésu Yerusalem . Nya bésu bǝnyǝ lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ku betidi bamba bákɔ bensi .
42024034	Nya bánlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ , “ Bonamute átaka útsyi ɔkɔmǝ sitinti , nya úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Simon . ”
42024035	Mfó nya betidi inuǝ bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ asa nnya díbǝ lǝ kusu ku kase bǝnyǝ Yesu bǝtsyǝ lekpo lefe nǝ úbudi abolo nyamǝ útǝ mǝ .
42024036	Se betidi inuǝ bamfo nlɛ mǝ etiki budii , mfó ǝmǝ Yesu kosate ǝbǝ úńyǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . ”
42024037	Báyakla nya bébu bǝnkǝ ɔkɔ banlɛ bunyǝ .
42024038	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bietinkǝ mǝ ! Beso biamfo kanɔ ?
42024039	Bebe mɔ ani ku mɔ akpa . Nya bitidi mɛ lǝ bete biǝ mɔ uni . Itsyise ɔkɔ ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku ekubi fe kase bɛnlɛ mɛ bunyǝ minte mmǝ . ”
42024040	Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , úfi wǝ ani ku akpa óte mǝ .
42024041	Lǝ kase banlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti nya asa nyamǝ díyifo mǝ yani esoo , bámfo bofo kanɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Didisa ditsyuǝ te mi mfo ? ”
42024042	Béfi lɛkpɛ sǝnsǝ báboko wǝ .
42024043	Nya ófo ni ɔ́yimi lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi mfó .
42024044	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ tututu míntɛyi mi lefe nǝ minkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ nɛ . Lesa saa nǝ báwɔni lǝ Moses eto afi eto kukue nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asa nnya báwɔni lǝ Ǝsǝnkue itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
42024045	Mfó nya ɔ́sini mǝ nsusu itǝ lǝ banɔ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki nnya nkpe mfó kasɔ .
42024046	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ mfo ebunyǝ kanyi nya wootaka utsyi bekpǝnkpǝ nti ubǝ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ .
42024047	Nya wǝ bakasebi ebobe letsya lǝ wǝ diye ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke bǝ batsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ itǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ . Nya letsyabebe nǝmfo ebutsyǝ kasɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
42024048	Mi luudi adansiɛ bilǝkǝ ditiki nǝmfo bete lǝ kalebe saa .
42024049	Nya mɔ kosate ebufi lesa nǝ mɔ Anto lɛtɛyi útsyǝ ntsyese mi . Fɛɛ ele bǝ bińyǝ bisǝkǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nyamfo lǝ Yerusalem isu ese lefe nǝ biofo nyamǝ itsyi kato . ”
42024050	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ákpa mǝ nya bédu lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ bésu Betania eti . Mfó óbesǝ ani kato nya ókpo mǝ atsyɔ .
42024051	Nya lefe nǝ tututu ɔnlɛ mǝ atsyɔ bokpo mfóo , údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato .
42024052	Báse akonki bésumu wǝ nya bésinkli bésu Yerusalem ku disuǝyuǝ tinti .
42024053	Békesu Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ mlǝ mlǝ mlǝ késu késumu Onanto kasɔ wǝ ani .
43001001	Ditiki nǝmǝ akɛ fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ . Ditiki nǝmǝ ku Onanto lɛkɛ . Nya Ni ku Onanto ni ɔni .
43001002	Ditiki nǝmǝ ku Onanto lɛkɛ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ .
43001003	Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝǝ , nya Onanto díyifo lesa saa nɛ . Bényifo kulesa nǝ wǝ dímankɛ lenti .
43001004	Ditiki nǝmǝ ǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , nya nkpǝ bomǝ ɔflɔ betidi dínyǝ diyǝnde betsyiko .
43001005	Diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝǝyǝnde kakpo lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ ketuntu kamǝ mamfotɔ diyǝnde nǝmǝ bɔninsǝ .
43001006	Onanto átsyese utidi utsyuǝ . Wǝ diye ni Yohanes .
43001007	Úbǝ nkǝ woedi betidi etiki itsyiko lǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ lǝ ofo ɔnɔ .
43001008	Inni Yohanes kosate ni diyǝnde nǝmǝ . Bomu úbǝ nkǝ lǝ udi etiki itsyi lǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
43001009	Nyamfo ni lekpasǝ kosate nǝmǝ nɛ , lekpasǝ nǝ nlɛ kawunsiǝ bubǝ nǝ luuyǝnde ditǝ utsyuǝ saa lekpasǝ .
43001010	Ditiki nǝmǝ ákɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ , nya wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ , fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto betidi mǝnnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo .
43001011	Úbǝ wǝ kosate eto betidi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ wǝ betidi mámfo wǝ .
43001012	Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ ete léfo wǝ . Nya mba kenke léfo wǝ bánɔɔ , útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nnya dítǝ báfiani Onanto eto bebi .
43001013	Bámfiani Onanto eto bebi ɛyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ nye ɛyɛ lǝ usǝ ku usiǝ eto ubilele eto ketsyue ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto kosate lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ woafo mǝ lǝ bafiani wǝ bebi .
43001014	Ditiki nǝmǝ ǝbǝ léfiani utidinini wǝ dísiǝ lǝ bo nti , nya úyi ku Onanto eto lefonǝ ku sitinti kenke . Nya búnyǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ eto okle ófo útsyiko wǝ anto ɔflɔ fe Onanto eto Ubi ɔni kplo eso .
43001015	Yohanes ǝlǝkǝ wǝ óte betidi lǝ lefe nǝ óbe letsya . Ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝmfo ni utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ míndi etiki mintsyiko minkǝ , ‘ Nwǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , amɔ oso mɛ , itsyise okpe koko fɛ bále mɛ . ’ ”
43001016	Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ kplɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ókpo bomblɛ kenke atsyɔ kpǝ .
43001017	Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ bo kɔfi komǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Moses ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ wǝ lefonǝ ku sitinti siamǝ ǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
43001018	Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ tɔ Onanto unyǝ . Wǝ ubi ɔni kplo wǝ lekate ko Onanto wǝ nsi lǝ wǝ Anto ǝmǝ eto akɔɔ , wǝ ni díbǝ úlǝkǝ futsyǝ Onanto ni óte bo nɛ .
43001019	Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem ákpe besumunyǝ ku Lewifɔ bésu Yohanes ɔflɔ . Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko feni ? ”
43001020	Mfóo , Yohanes mánni mbuayɛ butǝ bomu ókpasǝ mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . ”
43001021	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe feni ? Fǝ ni Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ ni . ” Bésukosǝ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fǝ ni Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ wuubǝ ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo lo . ”
43001022	Nyaso bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lesatsyuǝ nǝ busu bɔtɛyi mba lékpe bo kɔtɔ ! Owoe feni ? Nya be fanlɛ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
43001023	Yohanes ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ fe kase Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛwɔni utsyǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni utidi wǝ nlɛ bofa lǝ mfiminti kafe eto ɔkɔɛ katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bɛtsyɔnsǝ Bonamute eto kusu bitsyǝ itǝ wǝ bubǝ ! ’ ”
43001024	Nya betidikpekpe ba dítsyi Yudafɔ ba baakpo Farisifɔ ɔflɔ bǝbǝǝ ,
43001025	lɛtɔ Yohanes bǝ , “ Lenni fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , nye Elia , nye unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝǝ , ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo ? ”
43001026	Yohanes ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛɛ , meefi ntu keyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmfo . Fɛɛ utidi utsyuǝ ńyǝ mi lenti , wǝ binnyi .
43001027	Utǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔlɛ bubǝ nya wǝ afokpa eto kekue mǝnńyǝ ntǝ kulaa tsya bǝ nyankli . ”
43001028	Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ lǝ Betania eto umǝ lǝ Yordan eto ketu eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse . Mfó Yohanes nlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo kǝtǝ betidi nɛ .
43001029	Kǝsiǝsǝǝ , Yohanes ǝnyǝ Yesu nlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ Onanto eto Lesamubi nǝ ntsyi kawunsiǝ eto abua ɔntɔnko .
43001030	Wǝ ni utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ míntɛyi mintsyiko lefe nǝ míndi etiki míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Utidi utsyuǝ tǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝ wǝ lɛmɔ onso mɛ , itsyise okpe kokooko fɛ bále mɛ . ’
43001031	Mɔ kosate tsya mánte utidi ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ wǝ bubǝ eso mímbǝ minlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmfo buyifo bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ wǝ nte Israel eto kusǝ eto betidi . ”
43001032	Mfó nya Yohanes disi ɔ́tɛyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ miǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ áyifǝ dítsyi kato dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe lɛblɛkpa seka .
43001033	Tutɛ mánte miǝ wǝ uni . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto létsyese mɛ nkǝ mbǝ keyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Ebunyǝ se mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ lɔɔyifǝ ditsyi kato dibǝ disiǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , ete ebote fǝ wǝ ni utidi wǝ luufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ukeyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ nɛ . ’
43001034	Nya mínyǝ se íbǝ nkomǝ lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Nya minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ wǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi kosate ǝmǝ nɛ . ”
43001035	Kǝsiǝsǝǝ , Yohanes ku wǝ bakasebi inuǝ si bǝńyǝ mfó ke ,
43001036	nya únyǝ Yesu díbǝ ɔnlɛ bofe . Nya se únyǝ wǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebee , nyǝ Onanto eto Lesamubi nǝmǝǝ ! ”
43001037	Bakasebi inuǝ bamfo ánɔ nnya Yohanes lɛtɛyi nya bédu bésu bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
43001038	Se Yesu lɛtsyi ɔwuninsǝ únyǝ nkǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be biabɛbɛ ? ” Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Rabi , ” eto kasɔ ni Oteasa , “ Lekpakpa , se fankpe ? ”
43001039	Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bebe . ” Lefe nǝmfó ebutsyǝ fe ditsyitsyo eto abombo ana seka . Nyaso bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bésu kaka onkpe , nya bǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ diyi fɛfɛ nǝmǝ .
43001040	Bakasebi inuǝ ba lɛnɔ Yohanes eto ditiki nǝmǝ fɛ bǝtǝtǝko Yesuu , eto ɔni ni Andrea wǝ ni Simon Petro eto ɔyimi .
43001041	Lesa tutɛ nǝ Andrea ǝmǝ díyifo ni bǝ úsu ɔ́bɛbɛ wǝ ɔyimi , ini Simon nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Búnyǝ Mesia ǝmǝ , ” eto kasɔ ni Kristo wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
43001042	Nya ókpa Simon úsuko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu ábe wǝ tũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Simon , Yohanes eto ubi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bookpo fǝ bǝ Kefas , ” nye Petro eto kasɔ ni kobansǝ .
43001043	Kǝsiǝsiǝǝ , Yesu ála nkǝ weesu kasɔ ka baakpo bǝ Galilea . Nya se ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Filipo nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
43001044	Filipo etsyi Betsaida , umǝ wǝ Andrea ku Petro tsya ditsyi .
43001045	Se Filipo dísu únyǝ Nataniel , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Búunyǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni asa betsyiko bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ ! Wǝ ni Yosef eto ubi Yesu wǝ ditsyi Nasaret ! ”
43001046	Nataniel átɔ nkǝ , “ Lesa sɛɛ ditsyuǝ ebofo bɔbɔ ketsyi Nasaret kǝbǝǝ ? ” Filipo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe ! ”
43001047	Se Yesu dínyǝ Nataniel lɛyɛ ɔnlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ Israelnyǝ tinti nlɛ bubǝ mǝǝ , woanwɛ betidi . ”
43001048	Nataniel átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ féyifo fáte utidi wǝ eto okle mini ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fɛ Filipo díbǝ ókpadi fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fakɛ lǝ koto komǝ kalɔɔ , mbúnyǝ fǝ koko . ”
43001049	Nataniel átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , eyifo Onanto eto Ubi kosate . Fǝ ni Israelfɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ! ”
43001050	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Eni nnya míntɛyi fǝ miǝ nnyǝ fǝ lǝ koto komǝ kalɔ eso fáfo fánɔɔ ? Ebunyǝ asa nnya nsi nso nyamfo . ”
43001051	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , biunyǝ se kato lɔɔsini nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe nlɛ kato bobe kesu kayifǝ kǝbǝ mɔ , Utidi eto Ubi , ɔflɔ . ”
43002001	Lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bákpa kusiǝ kutsyuǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Yesu eto ambe Maria ákɛ mfó .
43002002	Nya bákpadi Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi tsya báboko kusiǝ kakpakɔ kamǝ .
43002003	Se nte bo banlɛ bunǝ léloo , Yesu eto ambe ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nte bo banlɛ bunǝ álo . ”
43002004	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mbe , yanle bǝ tɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo . Mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . ”
43002005	Nya Yesu eto ambe lɛtɛyi besumubi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Biyifo lesa nǝ kee wɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ biyifo . ”
43002006	Se ini lekpa ídi itǝ Yudafɔ bǝ bǝflǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , bǝtsyǝ ntu eto kalɔtsyi kplɛ ekua ka bǝlǝkǝ lǝ abansǝ ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya ketulɔtsyi ɛnɔ nye ekua leeyi ɔlɔtsyi kplɛ ɔni .
43002007	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi besumubi bamǝ nkǝ békuti ntu béyisǝ kalɔtsyi kplɛ kamǝ . Nyaso békuti ntu béyisǝ kalɔtsyi kplɛ kamǝ klɛlɛlɛlɛ .
43002008	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikuti ntu bomǝ eto ntsyuǝ bisuko utidi wǝ nsi lǝ ketsyue kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ . ” Nya békuti mu bésuko wǝ .
43002009	Se útu ntu bo léfiani nte óbee , wǝ ánte kaka nte bomǝ dítsyi . Fɛɛ besumubi ba díkuti ntu bomǝ bésuko alɛɛ , mǝmǝ áte . Nyaso nwǝ nsi lǝ ketsyue kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ ákpadi okafɔse ǝmǝ ,
43002010	nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa , nte sɛɛ woaka betidi butǝ bǝǝnǝ , nya lǝ betidi ǝnǝ bǝkpǝ eto kamaa , nya fɛ weefi mbo dimanlɛkɛ kǝtǝ betidi lǝǝnǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ fǝ ébu nsɛɛ ǝtsyǝ kama ! ”
43002011	Nnya díbǝ lǝ Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ mfóo , ni ayanisa tutɛ nnya úyifo . Úyifo nyamfo úlǝkǝ wǝ diyǝnde óte , nya wǝ bakasebi léfo wǝ bánɔ .
43002012	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ ambe , ku wǝ bayimi , ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Kapernaum nya bǝsiǝ mfó eyi asiani .
43002013	Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didife eboyo elo , nyaso Yesu ésu Yerusalem .
43002014	Se údufǝ Onanto eto Disumuyoo , únyǝ se betidi nlɛ banantsyui ku basamu ku ablonuma bote ku mba laafloma atabi tsya nsi lǝ mǝ kapunu eto akɔ .
43002015	Nyaso ófio ukuǝ nya úfi wǝ óla basamu ku banantsyui kenke ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ Disumuyo mfó . Úsensǝ mba nlɛ atabi boba eto atabi úwui nya úkǝ mǝ kapunu ókpo lǝ kasɔ .
43002016	Ɔ́tɛyi mba nlɛ ablonuma bote nkǝ , “ Bitsyi asa nyamfo bɛbɔnko lǝ mfo , nya biemfi mɔ Anto eto diyo biyifo bikǝkatekɔ . ”
43002017	Nya wǝ bakasebi lékloma nnya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto , mɔ lelabi itǝ fǝ Disumuyoo , ǝtǝ ǝnǝmi asɛ mɛ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ . ”
43002018	Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se féyifo asa nyamfo mǝǝ , nte ayanisa nnya fuuyifo ate bo bǝ akpe kusu feeyifo nnya okle ? ”
43002019	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Beba Onanto eto Disumuyo kamfo , nya mootakasǝ ke ńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
43002020	Yudafɔ bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Disumuyo ka befi alɛfosi ana alɛ akua bátoo , bɔtɛyi fanlɛ fǝ ebusinkli atakasǝ ke ǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
43002021	Fɛɛ bánte bǝ wǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko fe Onanto eto Disumuyo .
43002022	Nyaso lefe nǝ Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , nya fɛ wǝ bakasebi lékloma bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nko utsyǝ . Nyaso báfo asa nnya báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ku nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi bánɔ .
43002023	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyididi lefee , betidi kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ lǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya bǝnyǝ úyifo eso .
43002024	Fɛɛ Yesu mémfi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ mǝ , itsyise uyi betidi kenke .
43002025	Yensife bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa si ɔtɛyi wǝ kulesa itsyi lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ itsyise wǝ kosate áte lesa nǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ .
43003001	Lefe nǝmfóo , Yudafɔ eto uninǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo bǝ Nikodemo akɛ lǝ mǝ ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ nti .
43003002	Kǝtsyǝ kanii , úbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ fǝ ni nwǝ ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ fǝbǝ , itsyise kutsyuǝ saa embofo ayanisa nnya feeyifo buyifo lenni Onanto nsi ko wǝ . ”
43003003	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ bensinkli utidi balee , wǝmbunyǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ . ”
43003004	Nikodemo átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ boofo utidi wǝ díkabe businkli kale bio ? Businkli ele bǝ usinkli udufǝ lǝ wǝ ambe eto kafo fɛ lǝ besinkli bale wǝ dinuǝfǝ lee ? ”
43003005	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ bánle utidi betsyiko lǝ ntu ku Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , weembofo budufǝ lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
43003006	Utidininii , bále wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ etidisuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nnya ditsyi lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , bále wǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
43003007	Nyaso mǝntǝ lǝ iyifo fǝ naa lǝ ntɛyi fǝ miǝ ele bǝ bale fǝ bio .
43003008	Ufiebi aasɔ kesu kakake ola , nya wǝ kɔsɔ hã faanɔ , fɛɛ inni lǝ kaka utsyi ku kaka ɔntɔ . Nko inte itǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ bále ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
43003009	Mfó nya Nikodemo lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ nyamfo loofo bubǝ kǝtǝ ? ”
43003010	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa kplɛ feni lǝ Israel , ntsyǝ ibǝ fámannɔ nyamfo kasɔ ?
43003011	Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ asa nnya bunyii , nnya ǝsuǝ boedi etiki ketsyiko nɛ . Nya lesa nǝ ke búkenyǝǝ , ni ǝsuǝ boedi adansiǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ biamfo bo etiki nyamǝ kanɔ .
43003012	Lǝ ndi fǝ etiki itsyi lǝ kasɔ mfo eto asa ǝsuǝ nya fámamfo mɛ ánɔɔ , ntsyǝ foofo mɛ bofo kanɔ lǝ ndi fǝ etiki itsyi lǝ kato eto asa ǝsuǝ ?
43003013	Nya kuutsyuǝ saa ménsu tɔ kato unyǝ enso mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi wǝ ditsyi kato úbǝ kawunsiǝ mfo .
43003014	“ Fe kase Moses lébesǝ owa wǝ béfi situ béyifo kato lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ lǝ mfimintii , nko ke ele bǝ babesǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi kato nɛ ,
43003015	bǝ utidi wǝ ke léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43003016	“ Itsyise Onanto ála kawunsiǝ kamfo kon bǝnkǝ úfi wǝ Ubi ɔni kplo útǝ nkǝ utsyuǝ saa ke laafo wǝ kanɔɔ , lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ kanya , bomu lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43003017	Itsyise Onanto mántsyese wǝ Ubi kawunsiǝ nkǝ lǝ ubǝ olo ke dikpi , bomu bǝ lǝ uyifo ke Ofomfokǝtǝ .
43003018	“ Utidi wǝ ke laafo wǝ Ubi kanɔɔ , bembolo wǝ dikpi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laamfo wǝ kanɔɔ , bóolo wǝ dikpi koko itsyise wóamfo Onanto eto Ubi ɔni kplo ǝmǝ ɔnɔ eso .
43003019	Kase baayɛ kaalo dikpi nǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝ , diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝbǝ kawunsiǝ , fɛɛ betidi aala ketuntu kaso diyǝnde nǝmǝ , itsyise baala asa buayifoyifo kaso .
43003020	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo asa buaa , weekisi diyǝnde , nya woannyi kafi ni . Itsyise woate sikpi nkǝ lǝ ɔnyi ɔfi diyǝndee , yuulǝkǝ wǝ asa bua nnya weeyifo ote bǝnyǝ .
43003021	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , aanyi kafi diyǝnde , itsyise woala nkǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ lǝkǝ lete nkǝ kase unsi nkpǝ yɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
43003022	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Yudea eto lekpake mfó . Bǝsiǝ mfó itǝ lefe ditsyuǝ , nya úkeyifo betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa .
43003023	Lefe nǝmǝǝ , Yohanes tsya ákɛ lǝ Ainon lǝ Salim ɔflɔ kǝflǝsǝ betidi ntu , itsyise ntu abɔ lǝ mfó nya betidi ékesu wǝ ɔflɔ nya úkǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
43003024	Lefe nǝmfóo , bǝmmuǝ tɔ Yohanes beti bakpe lǝ aba eto diyo .
43003025	Diyi lɔnii , etikinǝnǝ ǝtsyuǝ édufǝ lǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi ku Yudanyǝ utsyuǝ eto nti itsyi lǝ ǝsuǝflǝflǝ eto lekpa ǝsuǝ .
43003026	Nyaso bǝbǝ Yohanes ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝ , “ Oteasa , akloma utidi utsyuǝ wǝ fǝ ku wǝ díńyǝ lǝ Ketu Yordan eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse , ini wǝ ǝsuǝ fédi adansiɛ fetsyiko ? Wǝ ni nwǝ mfe nlɛ betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo nɛ , nya betidi ba kenke nlɛ budu kesu wǝ ɔflɔ . ”
43003027	Yohanes átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo kulesa bɔkɛ , lenni Onanto dífi ni útǝ wǝ .
43003028	Mi kosate ni mɔ badansiɛ bǝ ntɛyi mi nkpasǝ wuee miǝ inni mɔ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto létsyese mɛ nkǝ ntɔ wǝ sɛtɔ .
43003029	Nwǝ ni Okafɔsee , wǝ ni nwǝ mbǝ Okafɔ ǝmǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ni Okafɔse ǝmǝ eto okloboo , lǝ unyǝ ɔlɛ Okafɔse ǝmǝ eto ɔkɔɛ bɔɔnɔ , yeakpe wǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Nko ǝmǝ eso mintsya nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti fe okafɔse ǝmǝ eto oklobo nɛ .
43003030	Nya nko ele bǝ wǝ diye be kato lǝ mɔ lele lǝ dibǝ kasɔ nɛ .
43003031	“ Nwǝ ditsyi kato ubǝǝ , so utsyuǝ saa . Nya nwǝ ditsyi kasɔ mfo tsyaa , kasɔ mfo eto utidi ete uni . Nya kasɔ mfo eto asa eto etiki ete weedi . Fɛɛ nwǝ ditsyi kato úbǝǝ , tǝkǝ mǝmblɛ kato .
43003032	Waatɛyi lesa nǝ úkǝnyǝ ku nnya úkanɔ mfó . Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa aamfo wǝ sedansiɛdidi siamǝ .
43003033	Fɛɛ nwǝ ke léfo wǝ kɛnyɛ kamǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , lɛ uyi bose kǝtǝ nkǝ Onanto eyifo utintinyǝ .
43003034	Nwǝ Onanto létsyesee , eedi Onanto eto etiki , itsyise Onanto éfi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ úyisǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke .
43003035	Anto ǝmǝ aala wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ nya úfi lesa saa ókpe wǝ lǝ ani nɛ .
43003036	“ Nwǝ léfo Ubi ǝmǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , kpe nkpǝ manlo . Nya nwǝ laani weentsyue Ubi ǝmǝ kotoo , weembunyǝ nkpǝ manlo bomǝ . Bomu Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ manlo ebutǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
43004001	Farisifɔ ánɔ bǝ Yesu lɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ buyifo kǝtǝ betidi , nyaso betidi kpǝ tǝkǝko wǝ baso Yohanes .
43004002	Lǝ sitintii , Yesu kosate ményifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa útǝ kuutsyuǝ saa , bomu wǝ bakasebi hã díkeyifo nko .
43004003	Se Yesu léte nkǝ Farisifɔ ánɔ ditiki nǝmfo nkoo , údu lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ úsu Galilea eto kasɔ .
43004004	Nya lǝ kusu ko ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , ele bǝ ɔyɛ Samaria eto kasɔ ofe .
43004005	Yesu ésu óyo Samaria eto umǝ wǝ baakpo Sikar , wǝ lɛfi kasɔ ka mǝ ona Yakob dítǝ wǝ ubi Yosef .
43004006	Lɛtidibo ditsyuǝ nǝ Yakob díku akɛ mfó . Nya se ílǝ Yesu fɛ úsu óyo mfó lǝ nkɔminti lefe itsyi lǝ kusu komǝ eto bɔyɛ esoo , úkǝnǝ úsiǝ lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
43004007	Nya ete Samariasio utsyuǝ díbǝ ntu kekutikɔ . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mɛ ntu lǝ nnǝ . ”
43004008	Lǝ lefe nǝ mfó ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bakasebi ébudu bésu umǝ didisa kayakɔ .
43004009	Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , “ Beso fǝ Yudanyǝ laatɔ mɔ Samariasio fǝ ntǝ fǝ ntu lǝ ǝnǝ ? ” Usio ǝmǝ átɔ nko itsyise Yudafɔ ku Samariafɔ anka .
43004010	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nnya ete fenyi lesa nǝ Onanto lǝǝtǝ ku nwǝ nlɛ fǝ bɔtɔ nkǝ tǝ wǝ ntu lǝ unǝǝ , eni fǝ bomu ebɔtɔ wǝ fǝ utǝ fǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ . ”
43004011	Usio ǝmǝ átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , ǝmbǝ lesa nǝ beefi kekuti ntu , nya lɛtidibo nǝmǝ tsya atsyo . Sie fuunyǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ bomǝ etsyiko ?
43004012	Lee fǝ nso bo Ona Yakob wǝ díku lɛtidibo nǝmfo útǝ bo , kaka wǝ ku wǝ bebi ku wǝ bebuki kenke dínǝ ntu betsyiko ? ”
43004013	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ betidi ǝnǝ ntu bomfoo , utukuɛ si wɔɔlɛ mǝ .
43004014	Fɛɛ ntu bo mɔ luutǝǝ , utukuɛ ensi ǝmbɔlɛ nwǝ luunǝ mu . Ntu bo mɔ luutǝ wǝ ebofiani nkpǝ eto ntu eto kayifǝkɔ lǝ wǝ . Ntu bomfo ebukabɔdi lǝ wǝ nya buutǝ wǝ nkpǝ manlo . ”
43004015	Usio ǝmfo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , tǝ mɛ ntu bomfo bǝ lǝ utukuɛ lǝ ɔyɛ mɛ bɔlɛ bio , nya lǝ nyɛ mfo bubǝ kekuti ntu . ”
43004016	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su akpadi fǝ usǝ lǝ bibǝ . ”
43004017	Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Minsi kusǝ . ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi sitinti fǝ ensi kusǝ .
43004018	Ébusiǝko basani ɛnɔ áfe . Nya nwǝ fǝ ku wǝ nkpe mɔmɔ kulaa tsya enni fǝ usǝ . Sitinti fátɛyi . ”
43004019	Usio emǝ átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nnyǝ miǝ eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
43004020	Bo Samariafɔɔ , bo banamǝ ésumu Onanto lǝ kɔtini komfo ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mi Yudafɔ aatɛyi biǝnkǝ Yerusalem ni kaka ele bǝ busumu Onanto . ”
43004021	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Usionko , fo mɛ anɔ fǝ lefe ditsyuǝ lǝ bubǝ nǝ betidi lensiembusumu Onanto lǝ kɔtini komfo ǝsuǝ nye lǝ Yerusalem .
43004022	Mi Samariafɔɔ , binyi lesa nǝ biesumu . Fɛɛ bo Yudafɔɔ , buyi futsyǝ boesumu . Itsyise Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ nnya bofokǝtǝ laayɛ kǝbǝ .
43004023	Fɛɛ lefe lɛ bubǝ nya díkǝbǝ tsya koko , se betidi luusumu Anto ǝmǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ku lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ku lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mǝ ni besumunyǝ ba eto okle Onanto laala nkǝ besumu wǝ nɛ .
43004024	Se Onanto ni Lɛwɔnɔ esoo , betidi ba luusumu wǝǝ , ele bǝ bayɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝale ku lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ . ”
43004025	Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , wǝ baakpo Kristoo , ebubǝ . Nya lǝ ubǝǝ , wuulǝkǝ lesa saa kasɔ ote bo . ”
43004026	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ nwǝ nlɛ etiki budi ku fǝ mfoo , mɔ ni wǝ nɛ . ”
43004027	Lefe nǝmfóo , wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ bédufǝ nya íyifo mǝ naa se bǝnyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ku usio . Fɛɛ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mántɔ usio ǝmǝ bǝ be woabɛbɛ nye bátɔ wǝ bǝ beso ɔnlɛ etiki budi ku usio ǝmǝ .
43004028	Usio ǝmǝ áyani wǝ ɔlɔtsyi ǝmǝ útsyǝ lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya údu úsu umǝ úsu ɔ́tɛyi betidi nkǝ ,
43004029	“ Bibǝ bebe osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ lesa saa nǝ mínkeyifo mínyǝ lǝ mɔ nkpǝ ! Lee wǝ ni Onanto eto nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ ? ”
43004030	Nyaso betidi bamǝ ábɔ bétsyi umǝ ǝmǝ bésu bǝ beesu bǝnyǝ wǝ .
43004031	Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bedi lesa ! ”
43004032	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpe lesa nǝ muudi nǝ ǝsuǝ binyi kulesa saa bitsyiko . ”
43004033	Nyaso bakasebi bamǝ étsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Lee utsyuǝ áboko wǝ lesa údi ? ”
43004034	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ didisa ni bǝ nyifo nwǝ lékpe mɛ eto lelabi , nya lǝ nlosǝ keyifo ka útǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo .
43004035	Biatɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Afa ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ kama fɛ lesa loobe oto . ’ Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bɛlɛ ola bebe kakuɛ eto ditsyǝbi lǝ bebe kase bidikǝ biamǝ díkabe ! Bíoyo nnya bulǝkǝ .
43004036	Onanto aafo kayo nwǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ nya waakpa mi kakpo lǝ unwu itǝ nkpǝ manlo . Lǝ nyamfo eso nwǝ laato ku nwǝ lǝǝlǝkǝǝ , mǝmblɛ ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
43004037	Nyaso nnya baatɛyi bǝ utidi ɔni laato nya obamba lǝǝlǝkǝ , eyifo sitinti .
43004038	Mɔ létsyese mi miǝ bisu bilǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ wǝ inni mi léto bikǝ biamǝ . Betidi bamba díyifo keyifo kekleke lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ lǝ mfó , nya mi dínyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ keyifo ka mǝ díyifo ǝsuǝ . ”
43004039	Samariafɔ kpǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ áfo Yesu bánɔ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya usio ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ɔ́tɛyi mɛ lesa saa nǝ mínkeyifo lǝ mɔ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ mínyǝ , ” eso .
43004040	Nyaso se Samariafɔ bamǝ díbǝ bǝnyǝ Yesu lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔɔ , bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ usiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya Yesu dísiǝ mfó eyi ǝnuǝ .
43004041	Betidi bamba kpǝ esi báfo wǝ bánɔ lǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ údi mǝ eso .
43004042	Nya bátɛyi usio ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bófo bɔ́nɔ mɔmɔ inni lǝ nnya fátɛyi bo eso , bomu bo kosate ánɔ etiki nnya údi eso , nya buyi boǝ wǝ ni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto Ofomfokǝtǝ tinti ǝmǝ . ”
43004043	Lǝ eyi ǝnuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu édu mfó úsu Galilea eto kasɔ .
43004044	Itsyise wǝ kosate ǝlǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Dibu ankɛ kǝtǝ Onanto Eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lǝ wǝ kosate eto kasɔ . ”
43004045	Fɛɛ se Yesu dísu údufǝ Galilea , betidi bamǝ áfo wǝ atuu ku disuǝyuǝ , itsyise se bésu Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyisɛɛ kedikɔ lǝ Yerusalem , bǝnyǝ asa nnya kenke úyifo .
43004046	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu ésinkli úsu Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , kaka úkatsyi ntu ɔ́wuninsǝ bófiani nte . Lefe nǝmfóo , Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dítsyi Kapernaum eto ubi ánɔ bufi .
43004047	Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu etsyi Yudea úbǝ Galilea , úsu wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ úsu Kapernaum lǝ usu otsya wǝ ubisaibi utǝ wǝ , itsyise wǝ ubi ǝmǝ fe woala lǝ ukpǝ .
43004048	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biǝnnyǝ nyifo ayanisa ntee , biamfo mɛ kanɔ . ”
43004049	Uninǝ ǝmfo álɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe mɔ ubi ǝmǝ bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ . ”
43004050	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su ! Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ nkpǝ . ” Uninǝ ǝmǝ áfo etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ ɔ́nɔ nya úsinkli údu .
43004051	Se úsinkli ɔntɔɔ , wǝ diyo eto beyifoyifo betsyuǝ átsyako wǝ lǝ kusu nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ kpe nkpǝ .
43004052	Ɔ́tɔ mǝ lefe nǝ tutuutu íyuǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ . Nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kǝnǝ ku kakɔmi lefe , fe lebombo lɛwɛ eti nnya bɔyila bomǝ léyani wǝ nɛ . ”
43004053	Ubi anto ǝmǝ ákloma nkǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ tutuutu Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ nkpǝ . ” Nya uninǝ ǝmfo ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke léfo Yesu bánɔ .
43004054	Nyamfo díyifo ayanisa nuǝfǝ nnya Yesu díyifo lǝ Galilea se utsyi Yudea eto kasɔ úsu mfó nɛ .
43005001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Yerusalem se Yudafɔ eto diyisɛɛ ditsyuǝ didife léyo .
43005002	Lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kaka baakpo Basamu eto Kesie ɔflɔɔ , ditumbu ditsyuǝ kpe mfó nǝ baakpo bǝ Betesda lǝ Hebrifɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ . Bákpo mpatampa ɛnɔ beńyǝnsǝ lǝ ditumbu nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
43005003	Mfó befimfi kpǝ ateate ba ni bǝnǝmba , mba lɛtsyini , ku mba leba bankpoo kasɔ díbǝ kakpo . Nya bǝńyǝ bensekǝ ntu bomǝ eto butinkǝsǝ butsyuǝ .
43005004	( Itsyise afe ǝtsyuǝǝ , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ kǝbǝ kémunisǝ ntu bomǝ . Nya ufimfi tutɛ wǝ ke dídufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnyǝ bufitsyantsya . )
43005005	Osani utsyuǝ kálabǝ mfó wǝ díkǝfi alɛ fosi ǝtsyǝ alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
43005006	Se Yesu dínyǝ wǝ nya unyi nkǝ onlabe lǝ ufinkla ǝsuǝ mfó itǝ alɛ kpǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ala bǝ , fǝ bufi yɛ fǝ ? ”
43005007	Ufimfi ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Uninǝ , mimbǝ kuutsyuǝ wǝ lɔɔwunsǝko mɛ ndufǝ ntu bomǝ kafo lǝ bémunisǝ mu . Lǝ nkplatsya miǝ meedufǝ tsyaa , utidi bamba éboka mɛ budufǝ koko . ”
43005008	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , fi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ edu ! ”
43005009	Lamfolamfo , osani ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ ǝmuǝ wǝ ale ! Úfi wǝ okla nya ɔ́yɛ údu . Diyi nǝ nyamfo díbǝǝ , eyifo Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
43005010	Nyaso Yudafɔ eto beninǝ átɛyi osani wǝ Yesu létsya bufi bǝnkǝ , “ Mmi eyifo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . Kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ lǝ etsyi fǝ okla . ”
43005011	Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ létsya mɛ bufi ke lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Taka ǝńyǝ , fi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ edu ! ’ ”
43005012	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni utsyǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tsyi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ ’ ? ”
43005013	Fɛɛ nwǝ bátsya bufi bomǝ mánte nkǝ utsyǝ ǝmǝ ni Yesu . Nya Yesu tsya ébonya údufǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ ba díńyǝ mfó eto nti .
43005014	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Ǝsuǝ búmuǝ fǝ ale . Nyaso mensiyifo lebua bio ! Lenni nkoo , lesa nǝ nkpe ale enso mmǝ ebuyifo fǝ ! ”
43005015	Nya osani ǝmǝ dídu nya úsu ɔ́tɛyi Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ nkǝ Yesu ni utidi wǝ létsya wǝ bufi .
43005016	Nyaso bétsyiko Yesu bulǝ , itsyise ótsya utidi bufi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ
43005017	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto si ɔlɛ keyifo buyifo lefe saa , nyaso ele bǝ mintsya yifo nko . ”
43005018	Lǝ nnya ɔ́tɛyi mfo esoo , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ esi bábɛbɛ esu kekleke bǝ baalo wǝ . Itsyise inni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ eto kɔfi ete óta úbu , bomu usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ Onanto eyifo wǝ Anto . Nya nyamfo eto kasɔ ni bǝ wǝ ku Onanto akate .
43005019	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , Onanto eto Ubi embofo kulesa buyifo lǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ wǝǝnyǝ wǝ Anto leeyifoo , ni wintsya leeyifo nɛ .
43005020	Itsyise Anto ǝmǝ aala wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ nya woate wǝ lesa saa nǝ wǝ kosate nlɛ buyifo . Nya woote wǝ asa kplɛ kpǝ enso nyamfo nnya luuyifo mimblɛ yanii .
43005021	Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ laatakasǝ bǝkpenkpe ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kaboko nkpǝǝ , nko ke Ubi ǝmǝ tsya luutǝ nkpǝ mba úlǝkǝ nɛ .
43005022	Nya Anto ǝmǝ kosate tsya ankponko kuutsyuǝ lekpo , bomu útǝ wǝ Ubi kusu nkǝ okponko betidi kenke lekpo ,
43005023	bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ufi dibu utǝ Ubi ǝmǝ fe kase bǝǝtǝ Anto ǝmǝ dibu . Futsyǝ kee dímembu Ubi ǝmǝǝ , mémbu Anto ǝmǝ létsyesǝ wǝ tsya .
43005024	“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ ditiki nya ófo nwǝ létsyese mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Bembokponko wǝ lekpo , fɛɛ ɔ́yɛ lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ ófe údufǝ lǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ koko .
43005025	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , lefe lɛ bubǝ nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ luutsyue Onanto eto Ubi koto , nya mba leetsyue we ɔkɔɛ koto ebunyǝ nkpǝ tinti . Lefe nǝmǝ kulaatsya ébubǝ koko .
43005026	Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ ni nkpǝ eto ketsyikokɔ , nko ke útǝ nkǝ wǝ Ubi tsya yifo nkpǝ eto ketsyikokɔ nɛ .
43005027	Nya útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ okponko kawunsiǝ kenke lekpo , itsyise wǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ .
43005028	“ Biǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ iyifo mi yanii , itsyise lefe lɛ bubǝ nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ba nkpe lǝ edi lɔɔnɔ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto ɔkɔɛ .
43005029	Nya bɔɔbɔ lǝ edi bǝbǝ . Mba dísiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ ebotaka bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Nya mba dísiǝ nkpǝ bua , tsya ebotaka bafo dikpilolo .
43005030	“ Mǝmbofo kulesa buyifo lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Lesa nǝ Onanto laatɛyi mɛɛ , nnya meefi kakpo lekpo nɛ . Nyaso mɔ lekpokponkpo yɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , itsyise meenyifo kulesa lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ nwǝ létsyese mǝ eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
43005031	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ nlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ mɔ kosate ǝsuǝǝ , yanle bǝ bafo lesa nǝ míntɛyi ǝmbǝ kalende .
43005032	Fɛɛ utidi bamba kpe wǝ leedi adansiɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ , nya nyi miǝ adansiɛ nnya ɔnlɛ budi lǝ mɛɛ , kpe kalende .
43005033	“ Bíokpe batɔnkpe Yohanes ɔflɔ nya úkatɛyi mi sitinti siamǝ itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
43005034	Fɛɛ mɔɔ , minlɛ bɔtɛyi miǝ utidinini eto sedansiɛdidi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ afe itǝ mɛ . Bomu ńtɛyi nyamfo bǝ lǝ binyǝ bofokǝtǝ .
43005035	Yohanes ǝtsyǝ fe okandiɛ wǝ nlɛ bunyǝ nya ɔnlɛ lekpasǝ butǝ , nya béla biǝ biǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ lekpasǝ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe sɛkɛ ete .
43005036	“ Fɛ mɔɔ , sedansiɛ sia lɛflɔ senso Yohanes eto selee , se nkpe mɛ nɛ . Itsyise keyifo ka mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo nlose , ka minlɛ buyifoo , ke nlɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ mɛɛ nɛ . Ke nlɛ bote bǝ mɔ Anto ǝmǝ létsyese mɛ .
43005037	Nya Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsyaa , wǝ kosate leedi adansiǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Bíannɔ tɔ wǝ ɔkɔɛ bɛnɔ , nya bíǝnyǝ tɔ kase unte bínyǝ .
43005038	Fɛɛ biamfo wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ kakpe lǝ mi akɔɛsi itsyise biamfo utidi wǝ ótsyese bɛnɔ .
43005039	Biakase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto asa itsyise bibu biǝ biunyǝ nkpǝ manlo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Nya ko etiki nyamfoo , lɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ !
43005040	Fɛɛ bɛni biǝ biembubǝ mɛ ɔflɔ lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ .
43005041	“ Minlɛ kasɔ mfo eto betidi eto atɛsǝ bɔbɛbɛ ,
43005042	itsyise nyi betidi ba eto okle bini , nya nyi miǝ bianla Onanto lǝ mi akɔɛsi .
43005043	Mbǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto diye ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ biamfo mɛ . Nya lǝ utidi bamba ebubǝ lǝ wǝ kosate eto diye ǝsuǝ alɛɛ , biofo wǝ .
43005044	Ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ biofo mɛ bɛnɔ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bɛnlɛ atɛsǝ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko mi bǝtsyuǝ ɔflɔ , nya biambɛbɛ atɛsǝ nnya ditsyi Onanto ɔni kplo ǝmǝ ɔflɔ ?
43005045	“ Fɛɛ biembu biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ loolo mi dikpi lǝ mɔ Anto ɔflɔ . Bomu Moses , nwǝ ǝsuǝ bífi mi kusubebe bítǝkǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ loolo mi dikpi nɛ .
43005046	Lǝ nnya ete béfo Moses bɛnɔ sitintii , eni béfo mɛ bɛnɔ , itsyise ɔ́wɔni asa utsyǝ itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
43005047	Fɛɛ se bíamfo lesa nǝ ɔ́wɔni utsyǝ bɛnɔɔ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ biofo lesa nǝ maatɛyi bɛnɔ ? ”
43006001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu áyila Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ nǝ bensi baakpo bǝ Tiberia eto Ditumbukplɛ úsu ni lekpake nǝ nse .
43006002	Nya betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ , itsyise bǝnyǝ ayanisa nnya úyifo ótsya mba nlɛ bufi eso .
43006003	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ábe bésu bǝsiǝ lǝ lekpenkpe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
43006004	Lefe nǝ Yudafɔ leedi Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi éboyo elo .
43006005	Se Yesu létakasǝ ǝnǝmi únyǝ sitiditu kplɛ sia nlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ Filipo nkǝ , “ Sieti buunyǝ didisa boya butǝ betidi bamfo kenke lǝ bedi ? ”
43006006	Fɛɛ Yesu átɔ nyamfo nkǝ lǝ ufi oto Filipo obe , ite bǝ uyi lesa nǝ wǝ kosate lǝǝbǝ buyifo tsya fɛ .
43006007	Filipo ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bufi betidi alofa ǝnuǝ eto diyi eto kayofofo eto atabi boya didisa kulaa tsyaa , diemboyo bǝ betidi bamfo eto utsyuǝ saa nyǝ sɛkɛ udi ! ”
43006008	Mfó nya Yesu eto okasebi wǝ ni Simon Petro , eto ɔyimi wǝ baakpo Andrea , lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
43006009	“ Okosobi utsyuǝ si mfo wǝ ntsyi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . Fɛɛ bǝ ni nyamfo itǝ betidi ba kpenkpe mfo ? ”
43006010	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ kaka lékpa wuee . ” Nyaso betidi bamǝ kenke ǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ . Basani mate eyifo fe akpi anɔ .
43006011	Nya Yesu dífi abolo nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani nya úsie nnya útǝ betidi bamǝ nsi mfó . Nko ke úyifo ku akpɛ nyamǝ tsya nɛ , nya mǝ utsyuǝ saa lɛkɛ kase óla .
43006012	Se bédi bémii , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛsɛ nnya díbu , bǝ lǝ ku ni ditsyuǝ saa lǝ lɛyɛ bobia . ”
43006013	Nyaso básɛ nnya díbu bakɔ . Nya nnya díbu lǝ abolo anɔ nnya bédi ǝsuǝǝ , éyi lefosi etsyitsya ǝnuǝ .
43006014	Se betidi bamǝ dínyǝ ayanisa nnya Yesu díyifoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sitinti nwǝ mfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ luubǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ ! ”
43006015	Nya , Yesu áte nkǝ bǝǝbǝ wǝ bubǝ kǝmuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ kǝtsyǝ seka . Itǝ eso úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ nti úsu ɔkɛ lǝ akpenkpe nnya nkpe mfó nti wǝ mate .
43006016	Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu eto bakasebi áyifǝ bésu ditumbukplɛ nemǝ kɛnyɛ .
43006017	Bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ nya bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila kesu Kapernaum eti . Kale ébolo , tsya fɛɛ Yesu mǝmbǝ óyotɔ mǝ ɔflɔ .
43006018	Ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto ntu étsyiko bonwa ketu flɛmflɛmflɛ , itsyise ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke .
43006019	Bakasebi bamǝ ébonwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ báyɛ fe esunkpo ǝtsyǝ nye ana ku kama fɛ bǝnyǝ se Yesu nyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , sikpi ko dímuǝ mǝ !
43006020	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi , mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Mɔ uni . ”
43006021	Mfó fɛ ǝsuǝ diyuǝ mǝ nɛ ! Nya bǝtǝ údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ nya ete bédufǝ kaka bántɔ tsya nɛ .
43006022	Se kale dísiǝǝ , betidi ba díbu bǝńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto situma sia nsee , ǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo bǝ diyi nǝ léfee , ɔklɔ ɔni hã díńyǝ lǝ utuflɔ mfó . Báte bǝ Yesu méndufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ bakasebi fɛ bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila . Bakasebi bamǝ mate ete dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo .
43006023	Nya efue bamba nnya ditsyi Tiberia eto umǝ ǝbǝ ídufǝ kaka dímantsyonko kaka bédi abolo , se Bonamute lékasɔ Onanto ani ólosǝ eto kama .
43006024	Se sitiditu nǝmǝ dínyǝ nkǝ Yesu nye wǝ bakasebi mankɛ mfó esoo , bédufǝ lǝ efue nyamǝ nya bédu bésu Kapernaum bésu banlɛ Yesu bɔbɛbɛ .
43006025	Se betidi bamǝ dínyǝ Yesu lǝ ditumbukplɛ eto lekpake nǝ nsee , bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , dimamfe fǝbǝ mfo ? ”
43006026	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , inni ayanisa nnya bínyǝ mínyifo bɛnɔ kasɔ eso bɛnlɛ mɛ bɔbɛbɛ , bomu lǝ didisa nǝ bɛkɛ bídi bími eso .
43006027	Biankplatsya itǝ didisa nǝ laabia , bomu bekplatsya itǝ didisa nǝ lambia , nǝ luutsyǝ itǝ nkpǝ manlo . Didisa nǝmfoo , ni ni nǝ Utidi Eto Ubi luutǝ mi nɛ , itsyise Anto Onanto ébutǝkǝ wǝ kɔni utsyǝ . ”
43006028	Mfó nya betidi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ buyifo lǝ ete bǝ bɔlɛ Onanto eto keyifo buyifo ? ”
43006029	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ Onanto lela nkǝ biyifo ni bǝ befo utidi wǝ ótsyese bɛnɔ . ”
43006030	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ayanisa nnya fuuyifo ate bo , bǝ lǝ bofo fǝ bɔnɔ ? Be fuuyifo ?
43006031	Bo banamǝ édi didisa nǝ baakpo mana lǝ mfiminti fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Útǝ mǝ didisa nǝ dítsyi kato nkǝ bedi . ’ ”
43006032	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ inni Moses ni nwǝ dítǝ mi didisa nǝ dítsyi kato . Bomu mɔ Anto ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ mi didisa tinti nǝ ditsyi kato .
43006033	Itsyise Onanto eto didisa ni nwǝ ditsyi kato úbǝ . Wǝ ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
43006034	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ bo didisa nǝmfo lefe saa . ”
43006035	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni didisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ nɛ . Fǝǝ ke díbǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , kukpɛnsɛ ǝmbɔlɛ fǝ kulefe , nya nwǝ léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , utukuɛ ǝmbɔlɛ wǝ kulefe kulefe .
43006036	Fɛɛ ntɛyi mi minkǝ ite bǝ bíunyǝ mɛ tsyaa , bíamfo mɛ bɛnɔ .
43006037	Utsyuǝ saa ke mɔ Anto ǝmǝ dífi útǝ mɛɛ , ebubǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , nya nwǝ díbǝ mɛ ɔflɔɔ , mǝmbɔni wǝ kulefe .
43006038	Itsyise ntsyi kato mbǝ inni bǝ lǝ nyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ nyifo lǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ eto lele ǝsuǝ .
43006039	Nya utidi wǝ létsyese mɛ eto lelabi ni nkǝ mba kenke úfi útǝ mɛ eto kutsyuǝ mannya , bomu bǝ lǝ ntakasǝ mǝ nńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43006040	Itsyise mɔ Anto eto lelabi ni nkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ dínyǝ mɔ Onanto eto Ubi nya ófo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya mootakasǝ wǝ nńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
43006041	Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ dítsyiko bɔwɔnɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ itsyise ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝ ” eso .
43006042	Nyaso bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni Yesu ǝmfo wǝ ni Yosef eto Ubi lee ? Buyi wǝ anto ku ambe . Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ woatɛyi nkǝ , utsyi kato úbǝ ? ”
43006043	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛyɛ kǝnǝ lǝ mi nti .
43006044	Kuutsyuǝ embofo mɛ ɔflɔ bubǝ lenni mɔ Anto ǝmǝ lékpa wǝ óboko mɔ ɔflɔ . Nya mootakasǝ wǝ mboko nkpǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
43006045	Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi áwɔni bǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebote mǝmblɛ kenke asa . ’ Nyaso utsyuǝ saa wǝ leetsyue ato nya woakase asa ketsyi lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔɔ , ǝǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ .
43006046	Nyamfo mante bǝ utsyuǝ ébunyǝ Anto ǝmǝ unyǝ enso nwǝ ditsyi Onanto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ hã díkǝnyǝ wǝ unyǝ .
43006047	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ nwǝ lefo ɔnɔɔ , nkpǝ manlo kpe wǝ .
43006048	Mɔ ni dídisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ .
43006049	Mi banamǝ édi lesa nǝ baakpo mana lǝ mfiminti , fɛɛ bekpǝ .
43006050	Fɛɛ didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝǝ , eyifo didisa nǝ utsyuǝ saa ke leedi nii , embukpǝ .
43006051	Mɔ ni didisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , nǝ dítsyi kato díbǝ . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leedi lesa nǝmfoo , wuusiǝ nkpǝ lefe saa . Nya didisa nǝ muufi ntǝ kawunsiɛ eto betidi bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝǝ , eyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muumfi ntǝ . ”
43006052	Nyamfo áboko kǝnǝ kekleke lǝ Yudafɔ bamǝ nti nya bátɔ bǝ , “ Ntsyǝ utidi ǝmfo loofo wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bufi kǝtǝ bo nkǝ budi ? ”
43006053	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ biendi mɔ Utidi Eto Ubi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ , binǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , biembunyǝ nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
43006054	Utsyuǝ saa ke leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya wǝǝnǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya mootakasǝ wǝ mboko nkpǝ , lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
43006055	Itsyise mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ni didisa tinti nya mɔ kɔtɔ ni ǝnǝsa tinti .
43006056	Utsyuǝ saa ke leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya wǝǝnǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , okpe lǝ mɛ , nya mintsya nsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝ .
43006057	Fe kase Anto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ mɛ nya minsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝǝ , nko ke utidi wǝ leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝǝ , luusiǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ eso nɛ .
43006058	Nyamfo ni didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝ . Dinte fe didisa nǝ eto okle mi banamǝ dídi nya bǝkpǝ . Utsyuǝ saa kee leedi didisa nǝ maatɛyi mfoo , ebusiǝ nkpǝ itǝ lefe nǝmǝ kenke . ”
43006059	Asa nyamfo Yesu léte mǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ lǝ Kapernaum nɛ .
43006060	Se Yesu eto bakasebi kpǝ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ditiki nǝmfo eto kasɔnɔnɔ kpe ale tinti ! Owoe loofo ni bofo ? ”
43006061	Ite bǝ mǝ kuutsyuǝ mémfe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi kulesa tsyaa , Yesu áte nkǝ íkǝlǝ mǝ lǝ akɔɛsi nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ǝlǝ mi ?
43006062	Nyalɛ , lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ Utidi eto Ubi ǝmǝ ɔntɔ kato kaka usiǝ kɔɔ , ntsyǝ biuyifo ?
43006063	Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ . Utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa . Etiki nnya kenke míntɛyi eyifo Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto etiki nnya lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ .
43006064	Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ kpe lǝ mi nti ba dímamfo bánɔ . ” Yesu áte taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ mba dímamfo wǝ bánɔ ku nwǝ luufi wǝ okpe kɔni .
43006065	Ɔ́tɛyi úsukosǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo eso míntɛyi mi miǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mɛ ɔflɔ bubǝ lenni Anto ǝmǝ dítǝ wǝ kusu . ”
43006066	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , mba dítǝkǝko wǝ kpǝ ésinkli lǝ wǝ kama nya bǝkǝtǝkǝko wǝ kama bio .
43006067	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ nkǝ , “ Mi tsyaa , biusinkli mɛ kama ? ”
43006068	Simon Petro ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe ɔflɔ buudu busu ? Fǝ nkpe nkpǝ manlo eto etiki nyamǝ !
43006069	Nya mɔmɔɔ , bófo bɔ́nɔ nya bunyi boǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi , wǝ ni Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
43006070	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni nwǝ dílǝkǝ mi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ tsyaa , ɔni eyifo oboatidi lǝ mi nti ! ”
43006071	Yesu átɛyi nyamfo itsyi lǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise uyifo bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ luufi wǝ okpe kɔni .
43007001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , nya wánla nkǝ weesu Yudea eto kasɔ itsyise Yudafɔ akabɛbɛ kusu lǝ balo wǝ eso .
43007002	Lefe nǝmfoo , Yudafɔ eto Mpatampa Kalɔsiǝsiǝ eto Diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ éboyo .
43007003	Nyaso Yesu eto bayimisani átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Du mfo lǝ esu Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ fǝ bakasebi lǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya fanlɛ buyifo .
43007004	Itsyise utidi wǝ laala nkǝ bate wǝǝ , enyifo asa kakula . Se fanlɛ asa nyamfo buyifoo , lǝkǝ nnya ate kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ betidi lǝ bate fǝ ! ”
43007005	Bátɛyi wǝ nko itsyise wǝ bayimisani kulaa tsya mámfo wǝ bánɔ .
43007006	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . Fɛɛ mii , lefe saa alɛkɛ itǝ mi .
43007007	Kawunsiǝ embofo mi bukisi . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , keekisi mɛ itsyise nlɛ bulǝkǝ kate minkǝ ke asayifoyifo eyi ku abuayifoyifo .
43007008	Mii , bisu diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Mɔɔ , membusu diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ itsyise mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . ”
43007009	Se ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nyamfoo , ɔ́tsyimɛ ɔkɛ lǝ Galilea mfó .
43007010	Fɛɛ se wǝ bayimisani bamǝ dídu bésu diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ eto kamaa , Yesu tsya ésu mfó , fɛɛ wǝnlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ote , ɔ́kula ǝsuǝ .
43007011	Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ákabɛbɛ wǝ lǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ ákatɔ bǝ , “ Sieti osani ǝmǝ nkpe ? ”
43007012	Betidi kpǝ lǝ sitiditu nǝmǝ nti ékedi etiki kawɛkawɛ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Uyifo utidi sɛɛ . ” Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya díkatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Ɔlɛ betidi bɔwɛ kakpe kanyansǝ ! ”
43007013	Fɛɛ se banlɛ Yudafɔ sikpi bote esoo , kuutsyuǝ mámfo nnya bulǝkǝ katɛyi lǝ betidi lǝ banɔ .
43007014	Se diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ didi eto eyi leyo ni ntinti etii , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo nya úsu óte asa mfó .
43007015	Wǝ asatete nyamǝ éyifo Yudafɔ bamǝ yanii , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti okosobi ǝmfo ditsyi ku kobe komfo eto okle , se wénsu asa kakasekɔ lǝ kukalebe saa ? ”
43007016	Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ asatete méntsyi mɔ kosate ɔflɔ . Bomu itsyi Onanto wǝ létsyese mɛ ɔflɔ .
43007017	Utidi wǝ laala nkǝ weeyifo Onanto eto lelabii , ebote lǝ asa nnya maate etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ lee , mɔ kosate eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ maate nnya .
43007018	Utidi wǝ leedi etiki itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ǝsuǝ eto atɛsǝ waabɛbɛ . Fɛ , utidi wǝ laala nkǝ waatɛsǝ nwǝ létsyese wǝǝ , weeyifo asa kayɛnko lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ nya waantɛyi sidia .
43007019	Inni Moses ni nwǝ dítǝ mi kɔfi komǝ lee ? Fɛɛ mi kuutsyuǝ entsyue kɔfi komǝ koto . Beso bela biǝ bialo mɛ ? ”
43007020	Mfó sitiditu siamǝ dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝ ! Owoe nlɛ bola nkǝ waalo fǝ ? ”
43007021	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ayanisa ani nyamfo mínyifo nya íyifo mimblɛ tã yanii mmǝ .
43007022	Moses ǝtǝ mi kɔfi nkǝ bela mi bebisaibi eto alo . Ite bǝ inni Moses uni dítsyiko nko , bomu itsyi taa mi bana lefe . Nyaso biala osaibi lelo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nɛ .
43007023	Nya lǝ boofo osaibi lelo bola lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase yembonta Moses eto kɔfi ibuu , beso biǝnyǝ ɔblɔ kakpe mɛ biǝ ntsya utidi wǝ nlɛ bufi , úmuǝ ale kenke lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ?
43007024	Biemfi ǝnyǝnsa bekpo lekpo ! Bomu bekpo etiki eto lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ sitintisu ǝsuǝ . ”
43007025	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Yerusalem átɔ bǝ , “ Inni utidi ǝmfo banlɛ bɔbɛbɛ bǝ baalo ?
43007026	Bebe wǝ ! Ɔlɛ etiki budi lǝ obianti , nya bántɛyi wǝ kulesa ! Lee , bote bákate sitinti biǝnkǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ?
43007027	Lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ǝbǝǝ , kuutsyuǝ saa embote kaka utsyi úbǝ . Fɛɛ utidi ǝmfo alɛɛ , bomblɛ yi kaka utsyi úbǝ . ”
43007028	Lefe nǝ Yesu díkate asa lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , ófa bembembe ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Inni biǝnkǝ biyi mɛ sitinti ku kaka mintsyii ? Mǝmbǝ mfo lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ ! Nwǝ létsyese mɛɛ , waantɛyi sidia . Nya mii , binyi wǝ .
43007029	Fɛɛ mɔɔ , nyi wǝ , itsyise intsyi wǝ ɔflɔ nya wǝ ni nwǝ létsyese mɛ . ”
43007030	Nya bákplatsya bǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mámfo wǝ butidi , itsyise wǝ lefe mányo tɔ .
43007031	Fɛɛ kpǝ lǝ mǝ nti áfo wǝ bánɔ nyaso bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ díbǝǝ , uteyifo ayanisa ote enso nnya utidi ǝmfo díkeyifoo ? ”
43007032	Farisifɔ bamǝ ánɔ se sitiditu siamǝ nlɛ etiki nyamfo bɔtɛyi lǝ kawɛ lǝ mǝ nti lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ , nyaso mǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ átsya nya batsyese kedikǝtǝkɔ eto mba laase mfo bǝ besu bǝmuǝ Yesu baboko .
43007033	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nsi mɔɔkɛ mi lenti itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ ete muusinkli nsu nwǝ letsyese mɛ ɔflɔ .
43007034	Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ mɛ , itsyise kaka mɔɔkɛɛ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ”
43007035	Ete Yudafɔ eto beninǝ lɛtɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ benkǝ , “ Sieti nwǝ mfo laala nkǝ weesu fɛ boembunyǝ wǝ ? Lee , bubu ɔnlɛ nkǝ weedu usu Helafɔ eto kǝmǝ ka bo betidi nkpe bǝ lǝ ote Helafɔ bamǝ asa mfóo ?
43007036	Nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ mɛ , ’ nya ‘ Kaka mɔɔkɛɛ , biǝmbofo mfó bubǝǝ , ’ eto kasɔ ni be ? ”
43007037	Lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝ ni diyi nǝ nso bofe lǝ diyididi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu átaka úńyǝ nya óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utukuɛ lɛ utsyuǝǝ , utsyǝ ǝmǝ bǝ mɔ ɔflɔ lǝ ubǝ unǝ ntu .
43007038	Fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Utidi wǝ léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , ketukplo ka lǝǝtǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ utidi lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ eto ntuu , ebɔbɔdi butsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . ’ ”
43007039	Yesu átɛyi nyamfo itsyi lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ mba léfo wǝ bánɔ loofo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise éyo lefe nǝmfoo , bǝntǝ tɔ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ , se bántakasǝ tɔ Yesu betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ báboko wǝ diyǝnde esuǝ eso .
43007040	Se betidi bamǝ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bátɛyi benkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝ . ”
43007041	Babamba tsya átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nɛ . ” Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝǝ , ebofo Galilea butsyi ?
43007042	Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebutsyi Oka David eto kafo lǝ Betlehem eto umǝ kaka Oka David dísiǝ . ”
43007043	Lǝ nnya eso kabakǝfǝ édufǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ eto nti itsyi lǝ Yesu eso .
43007044	Bǝtsyuǝ ala bǝ bǝǝmuǝ wǝ , fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa méntidi wǝ .
43007045	Se mbalaase Disumuyo eto mba bákpe dísinkli besuu , Farisifɔ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ , bátɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bíǝmmuǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale beboko ? ”
43007046	Mfó nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Boannɔ tɔ kuutsyuǝ saa di etiki fe kase utidi ǝmfo didi kulefe ! ”
43007047	Farisifɔ bamǝ átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ úflu mi tsyaa , mi nsusu , ɔ́wɛ mi ókpe ?
43007048	Bíɔnɔ tɔ bɛnɔ biǝ beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ nye Farisinyǝ utsyuǝ áfɔ wǝ ɔ́nɔ ?
43007049	Kulefe , kulefe ! Ditiditu nǝmfo enyi Moses eto kɔfi eto kulesa . Nyaso Onanto eto ekudi tǝkǝko mǝ ! ”
43007050	Farisifɔ eto uninǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo Nikodemo , ébusu Yesu ɔflɔ únyǝ . Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ ,
43007051	“ Nyalɛ , bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ bokponko utidi lekpo bolo wǝ dikpi lefe nǝ eto lefe boannɔ tɔ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki nye batɔ wǝ lesa nǝ úyifo ? ”
43007052	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fintsya Galileanyǝ feni ? Dufǝ lǝ Anantotiki eto Ekue abe , ete ebote fǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kuutsyuǝ embɔbɔ utsyi lǝ Galilea . ”
43007053	( Nya utsyuǝ saa dídu úsu diyo . )
43008001	Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ édu úsu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ .
43008002	Kǝsiǝsǝ eto olesiǝ tuu , úsinkli úsu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo . Betidi bamǝ kenke ǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ , nya úsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti , útsyiko mǝ asa bote .
43008003	Mfóo , kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ lékpa usio utsyuǝ wǝ bǝmuǝ kɔni kɔni lǝ disǝnkpo ǝsuǝ báboko mfó . Nya bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
43008004	Bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bǝmuǝ usio ǝmfo kɔni kɔni lǝ disǝnkpo ǝsuǝ .
43008005	Lǝ Moses eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ boto wǝ okle aba bolo , ” lǝ bǝnyǝ etiki lǝ wǝ , “ Ntsyǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
43008006	Bátɔ wǝ nyamfo bǝ lǝ befi bato wǝ babe lǝ bayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ Yesu ǝbǝ kasɔ nya úfi wǝ lɛnimi útsyiko asa bɔwɔni lǝ kasɔnti .
43008007	Nya se bensi bǝńyǝ banlɛ wǝ etiki bɔtɔɔ , óbesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi nti eto nwǝ dímenyifo tɔ lebua unyǝǝ , di ututɛ lǝ oto wǝ leba . ”
43008008	Nya usi úbǝ kasɔ , ɔ́wɔni asa lǝ kasɔnti ku wǝ lɛnimi .
43008009	Se beninǝ bamǝ lɛnɔ nnya nkoo , mǝmblɛ kenke édu ɔni , ɔni , idu lǝ beninǝtidi ǝsuǝ . Isi íbu Yesu ku usio ǝmǝ mate nsi nyǝ mfó .
43008010	Yesu átakasǝ ǝsuǝ únyǝ nya ɔ́tɔ usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Boambe , se báfe ? Nyalɛ , mǝ kuutsyuǝ mémbu loolo fǝ dikpi ? ”
43008011	Mfó usio ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo lo , Bonamute . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mintsya lǝmbolo fǝ dikpi nɛ . Nyaso du esu . Fɛɛ mensisu eyifo lebua bio . ”
43008012	Yesu esi údi Farisifɔ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni kawunsiǝ eto diyǝnde . Utidi wǝ ke ntekǝko mǝǝ , wuunyǝ diyǝnde nǝ lǝǝtǝ utidi nkpǝ tinti nya wǝǝmbɔyɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ kulefe . ”
43008013	Farisifɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Alɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso nnya fanlɛ bɔtɛyi ǝmbǝ kalende saa . ”
43008014	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Owo lo , ite bǝ nlɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi kpe kalende , itsyise nyi kaka mintsyi , nya minyi kaka mintɔ . Fɛɛ mimii , binyi kaka mintsyi nye kaka mintɔ .
43008015	Mii , kawunsiǝ eto nsusu ǝsuǝ nnya biefi kakponko asa lekpo nɛ , fɛ mɔɔ , mankponko kuutsyuǝ lekpo .
43008016	Fɛɛ lǝ bǝ nyifo nkoo , mɔ lekpokponkpo ebɔyɛ lǝ sitinti eto kusu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise inni mɔ mate lookpo ni . Bomu Anto wǝ létsyese mɛɛ , ǝǝńyǝ mɛ kama .
43008017	Nya lǝ mi kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni bákpe bǝ , lǝ badansiɛ inuǝ eto kɛnyɛ akate lǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ bátɛyi kpe kalende .
43008018	Mɔɔ , meedi adansiɛ lǝ lesa nǝ maatɛyi ǝsuǝ , nya mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsya eedi adansiɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
43008019	Mfó bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se fǝ anto ǝmǝ nkpe ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Binyi mɛ nya binyi mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya . Lǝ bote ete bete mɛɛ , eni biote mɔ Anto tsya . ”
43008020	Yesu átɛyi nyamfo lǝ okokakokɔ se ɔnlɛ asa bote lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝmmuǝ wǝ , itsyise wǝ lefe mányo tɔ .
43008021	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mǝǝbǝ budu lǝ mi ɔflɔ , nya biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ . Nya kaka mintɔɔ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ”
43008022	Nyaso Yudafɔ bamǝ átɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔntɔ kalokɔ eso ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Biembofo kaka mintɔ bubǝ lee ’ ? ”
43008023	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mimii , kasɔ mfo eto betidi bini . Nya mɔɔ , ntsyi kato . Mi etsyi kawunsiǝ mfo , fɛɛ mɔɔ , mentsyi kawunsiǝ mfo .
43008024	Nyaso míntɛyi mi minkǝ biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya lǝ biamfo bɛnɔ biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ minii , biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ sitinti . ”
43008025	Bátɔ wǝ bǝ , “ Owoe feni ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ míntɛyi mi itsyi taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , ni ǝmǝ ete nɛ .
43008026	Nkpe etiki kpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nnya ele bǝ mfi nlo mi dikpi . Fɛɛ nwǝ létsyese mɛɛ , sitintitidi uni . Nya asa nnya minɔ mintsyiko wǝ ɔflɔɔ , nnya mimfi minlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
43008027	Mfóo , bánnɔ kasɔ bǝ Yesuu , Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko .
43008028	Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bebesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ katoo , nyafɛ biote biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ mini nɛ , nya meenyifo kulesa lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ mɔ Anto léte mɛ nkǝ ntɛyii , ni hã maatɛyi nɛ .
43008029	Nwǝ lekpe mɛ kɔtɔɔ , si ko mɛ . Wóanyani mɔ mate utsyǝ , itsyise meeyifo lesa nǝ lǝǝyuǝsǝ wǝ kafo lefe saa . ”
43008030	Nya se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo mmǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ba lɛnɔ ɔ́tɛyi nyamfoo , áfo wǝ bánɔ .
43008031	Nyaso Yesu átɛyi Yudafɔ ba léfo wǝ bánɔ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biyifo lǝ mɔ asatete ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ biyifo mɔ bakasebi sitinti nɛ .
43008032	Biote sitinti siamǝ , nya sitinti siamǝ ebutǝ bisiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
43008033	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham eto befluflu buni , nya bóendi tɔ ndomufɔ butǝ kuutsyuǝ saa tɔ búnyǝ ! Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ faatɛyi fǝnkǝ , bootǝ busiǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
43008034	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ utsyuǝ saa ke leeyifo lebuaa , uyifo ndomunyǝ utǝ lebua .
43008035	Ndomunyǝ aamfiani oyobi wǝ nkpe kedikɔ kulefe . Bomu oyosate eto ubii , wǝ kpe kedikɔ lefe saa .
43008036	Nyaso lǝ mɔ Onanto eto Ubi ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ bisiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ bisi lǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ sitinti nɛ .
43008037	Nyi miǝ Abraham eto bebi bini . Fɛɛ bela biǝ bialo mɛ , itsyise biamfo asa nnya maate mi bɛnɔ , eso .
43008038	Lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔɔ , ni maatɛyi nɛ . Nya mi tsyaa , lesa nǝ bɛnɔ bitsyiko mi anto ɔflɔɔ , ni bɛnlɛ buyifo nɛ . ”
43008039	Yudafɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham ni bo anto . ” Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Abraham eto bebi bini sitintii , eni biuyifo asa nnya Abraham díyifo seka .
43008040	Fɛɛ bela biǝ bialo mɔ nwǝ laatɛyi mi sitinti sia mínɔ mintsyiko Onanto ɔflɔ . Abraham ményifo nko .
43008041	Asa nnya mi anto kosate díyifoo , nya bɛnlɛ buyifo nɛ . ” Mfó bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bunni basɔnɔbi ! Anto ɔni nkpe bo , wǝ ni Onanto ! ”
43008042	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto ete ni mi antoo , eni biala mɛ . Itsyise Onanto ɔflɔ míntsyi mímbǝ mfo . Inni mɔ kosate eto lelabi ǝsuǝ mímbǝ . Bomu wǝ ni nwǝ létsyese mɛ .
43008043	Ntsyǝ eso biannɔ lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kasɔ ? Nnya ni bǝ bianla biǝ bianɔ ditiki nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi .
43008044	Mi anto Obonsam eto bebi bini , nya bela biǝ bieyifo wǝ lelabi . Idu taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , uyifo nwǝ laalo betidi . Nya woanla ditiki tinti nǝmǝ itsyise woantɛyi sitinti kulefe . Lǝ ɔtɛyi sidiaa , wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi kate . Itsyise nwǝ laatɛyi sidia uni , nya wǝ ni bidia kenke eto anto .
43008045	Fɛɛ mɔɔ se ini sitinti maatɛyi mi esoo , biamfo mɛ kanɔ .
43008046	Mi nti eto owoe loofo mɛ dikpi bolo nkǝ nyifo lebua ? Lǝ ntɛyi mi sitintii , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ ?
43008047	Utidi wǝ ni Onanto eto olee , aanɔ Onanto eto etiki . Nnya eso biannɔ Onanto eto etiki ni bǝ binni wǝ bale . ”
43008048	Yudafɔ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ bɔ́tɛyi boǝnkǝ Samarianyǝ feni nya lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝǝ , bɔ́tɛyi sidia ? ”
43008049	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua saa ǝntǝkǝko mɛ . Nlɛ mɔ Anto dibu butǝ , fɛɛ mi ǝntǝ mɛ dibu .
43008050	Mɔɔ , maambɛbɛ dibu kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nwǝ laabɛbɛ nkǝ betidi tɛsǝ mɛɛ , kpe . Wǝ ni nwǝ laakpo lekpo kayɛnko lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ .
43008051	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ utsyuǝ eetsyue mɔ asatete kotoo , wǝmbukpǝ kulefe ! ”
43008052	Yudafɔ átɛyɛ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Mfe fɛ buunyǝ boǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝ nɛ ! Abraham ǝkpǝ , nya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya díkpǝ , fɛɛ fǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi fǝ nwǝ ke ditsyue fǝ asatete kotoo , ǝmbukpǝ kulefe !
