43008053	Bubu feebu fǝ fǝ lɛmɔ fanso Boanto Abraham wǝ díkpǝ , fɛɛ ? Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya ǝkpǝ ! Owoe eto okle feebu fǝ wǝ feni ? ”
43008054	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ maatɛsɛɛ , nyalɛ mɔ atɛsǝ nyamǝ manle kulesa . Fɛɛ nwǝ laatɛsǝ mɛɛ , wǝ ni mɔ Anto . Wǝ ni nwǝ bíatɛyi biǝ wǝ ni mi Onanto nɛ .
43008055	Mii , binyi wǝ . Fɛ mɔɔ , nyi wǝ . Lǝ ntɛyi miǝ minnyi wǝǝ , nyalɛ moofiani odia fe mi ke , fɛɛ nyi wǝ , nya meetsyue wǝ ditiki koto .
43008056	Mi anto Abraham ǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ se ɔ́nɔ mɔ bubǝ eto asa . Nyaso úfi ǝnǝmi útǝkǝ lǝ mɔ bubǝ ǝsuǝ nya únyǝ disuǝyuǝ . ”
43008057	Yudafɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ámamfo tɔ alɛ fosi anɔ kulaa tsya , nya bɔtɛyi fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝ eyi Abraham ? ”
43008058	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , mɔɔ , mfe nkpe koko fɛ bále Abraham . ”
43008059	Ete básɛ abambi bǝ baato wǝ , fɛɛ Yesu ákula ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́bɔ údu lǝ Kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó .
43009001	Se Yesu díbǝ ófe ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ utidi utsyuǝ wǝ bále unǝmba .
43009002	Wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , owoe eto lebua dítǝ bále osani ǝmfo unǝmba ? Wǝ kosate eso lee wǝ antomǝ eto abua eso ? ”
43009003	Mfó Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni nwǝ mfo nye wǝ antomǝ díyifo lebua eso . Bomu bále wǝ nko bǝ lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ keyifo eto ǝsuǝale ote betidi .
43009004	Se bonkpe lǝ kalesiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ele bǝ buyifo keyifo butǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ . Kale ǝǝbǝ bolo nya kuutsyuǝ saa lensiembofo keyifo buyifo .
43009005	Lefenǝ eto lefe minsi minkpe lǝ kawunsiǝǝ , mɔ ni kawunsiǝ eto diyǝnde . ”
43009006	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi nko ólosǝǝ , ókpo ntufǝ lǝ kasɔ , ɔ́wɔ site úfi se údikiti wǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi ,
43009007	nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su lǝ esu ǝflǝ ntu lǝ Siloa eto Ditubiǝ ǝsuǝ . ” Siloa eto kasɔ ni nkǝ Bákpe wǝ . Nyaso osani ǝmǝ ésu úflǝ ntu bomǝ . Nya wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ , nya úsinkli úbǝ oto .
43009008	Wonko mba nkpe lǝ koyotsya ku betidi ba kenke díkǝnyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ asa bɔtɔɔ , átɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni osani ǝmfo ni nwǝ díkǝsiǝ lǝ mfó úkatɔ asa ? ”
43009009	Bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝ wǝ uni . Fɛɛ babamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo , inni wǝ uni . Bole ete ole wǝ . ” Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ kosate lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ uni ! ”
43009010	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ asa bunyǝ ? ”
43009011	Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ baakpo Yesu lɛwɔ sitǝ udikiti mɛ lǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ nsu mflǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ Siloa eto ditubiǝ . Nyaso nsu , nya se mímflǝ ǝnǝmi mínlosǝ ete míntsyiko asa bunyǝ . ”
43009012	Bátɔ wǝ bǝ , “ Sieti onkpe ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mante kaka onkpe . ”
43009013	Bákpa nwǝ eto ǝnǝmi léba kɔ ǝmǝǝ , bésuko Farisifɔ bamǝ ɔflɔ .
43009014	Diyi nǝ Yesu lɛnwɔ sitǝ údikiti lǝ unǝmba ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi fɛ ótsya wǝǝ , éyifo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
43009015	Nya Farisifɔ bamǝ tsya lɛtɔ osani ǝmǝ kase íyifo fɛ útsyiko asa bunyǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitǝ ɔ́nwɔ úfi údikiti mɛ lǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya mímflǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi ete míntsyiko asa bunyǝ . ”
43009016	Mfó nya Farisifɔ bamǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ díyifo nyamfo embofo Onanto ɔflɔ butsyi ! Itsyise weenyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ . ” Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ obuayifo ebofo ayanisa nyamfo eto okle buyifo kate ? ” Itǝ kǝsǝnsǝ édufǝ mǝ lenti .
43009017	Nyaso Farisifɔ bamǝ esi bátɔ osani ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ wǝ lɛsini fǝ ǝnǝmii , be ni fǝ nsusu itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? ” Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi uni . ”
43009018	Yudafɔ bamǝ mámfo bánɔ sitinti bǝ osani ǝmǝ ába ǝnǝmi fɛ usi útsyiko asa bunyǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bákpadi wǝ anto mǝ díbǝ .
43009019	Bátɔ mǝ bǝ , “ Mi ubisaibi ni nwǝ mfo ? Biǝ béle wǝ unǝmba , nya ntsyǝ iyifo fɛ omfe ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ mɔmɔ ? ”
43009020	Wǝ anto mǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Buyi boǝ bo ubi uni . Nya bunyi tsya boǝ bole wǝ unǝmba .
43009021	Fɛɛ bunyi kase íyifo fɛ omfe ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ . Nya bunyi futsyǝ tsya létsya wǝ ǝnǝmi nyamǝ . Bɛtɔ wǝ kosate lǝ ɔtɛyi mi itsyise wóobe ! ”
43009022	Wǝ antomǝ átɛyi nyamfo nko itsyise balɛ Yudafɔ sikpi bote , itsyise Yudafɔ átɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ utsyǝǝ ke lɛtɛyi nkǝ ófo Yesu ɔ́nɔ fe Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝǝ , boolǝkǝ wǝ betsyiko lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ .
43009023	Nyamfo eso wǝ antomǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wóobe , bɛtɔ wǝ kosate nɛ ! ”
43009024	Bákpadi nwǝ bále unǝmba ǝmǝ dinuǝfǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Te Onanto sikpi lǝ atɛyi bo sitinti ! Buyi boǝ utidi wǝ létsya fɛ mfó eyifo obuayifo ! ”
43009025	Osani ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , minnyi lǝ obuayifo ni osani ǝmfo lee unni . Lesa lɔni minyi mɔɔtɛyi ni bǝnkǝ , kɔɔ mba ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mfe nlɛ bunyǝ ! ”
43009026	Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be úyifo fǝ nya ntsyǝ ɔ́yɛ ótsya fǝ ǝnǝmi nyamǝ ? ”
43009027	Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mboka mi bɔtɛyi éfe , fɛɛ bianla biǝ biafo nnya . Beso bela biǝ bisi bianɔ nnya ? Lee , bela biǝ miitsya afiani wǝ bakasebii ? ”
43009028	Báka wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ete ni wǝ okasebi . Boo , Moses eto bakasebi buni .
43009029	Buyi boǝ Onanto édiko Moses etiki . Nya nwǝ mfo alɛɛ , boante kaka utsyi kulaa tsya ! ”
43009030	Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte ditiki nǝ eto okle ni nǝmfo ? Binyi kaka utsyi , fɛɛ wǝ lɛsini mɛ ǝnǝmi nɛ !
43009031	Buyi boǝ Onanto eentsyue babuayifo koto , fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ eesumu Onanto , nya weeyifo wǝ lelabii , weetsyue wǝ koto kanɔ wǝ olatoto .
43009032	Idu taa kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , bóannɔ tɔ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ átsya nwǝ bále unǝmba .
43009033	Lenni Onanto ɔflɔ utsyii , eni wǝmbofo kulesa buyifo . ”
43009034	Batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝǝ bále ku lebua fábe ku nii ! Nya fǝ bomu lela fǝ aate bo asaa ? ” Nyaso bála wǝ , bábɔnko lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ .
43009035	Yesu ánɔ nkǝ bála wǝ nyaso se únyǝ osani ǝmǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Áfo Utidi Eto Ubi ánɔ ? ”
43009036	Osani ǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nto , te mɛ futsyǝ uni , bǝ lǝ mfo wǝ nnɔ . ”
43009037	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ébunyǝ utidi ǝmǝ koko , nnyǝ wǝ ni nwǝ nlɛ fǝ etiki budinko mfo mɔmɔ nɛ . ”
43009038	Osani ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , mfo nnɔɔ ! ” Nya óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi úsumu wǝ .
43009039	Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo bǝ lǝ nkponko betidi lekpo , bǝ lǝ bǝnǝmba lǝ bǝnyǝ asa , nya mba lǝǝnyǝǝ , lǝ bafiani bǝnǝmba . ”
43009040	Farisifɔ ba díńyǝ mfo lɛnɔ nnya Yesu lɛtɛyii , átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ bɔtɛyi fanlɛ fǝ bo tsya ába ǝnǝmi lee ? ”
43009041	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ boba mi ǝnǝmi lebaa , eni biebudi dikpi , fɛɛ se biǝ bɛlɛ bunyǝ esoo , mi abua tǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
43010001	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke dímanyɛ lǝ lesamuyo eto kesie údufǝ lesamuyo nǝmǝǝ , bomu ɔ́yɛ kusu bamba saa údufǝ lǝ ni kafoo , eyifo uyu ku nwǝ laabiasǝ asa .
43010002	Nyaa , nwǝ ke laayɛ lǝ kesie kedufǝ lesamuyo nǝmǝ kafoo , wǝ ni nwǝ laayɛnko basamu tinti nɛ .
43010003	Nya nwǝ laase lesamuyo eto kesie aasini kesie eto siku kǝtǝ wǝ . Woakpadi basamu bamǝ lǝ mǝ aye nya baanɔ wǝ ɔkɔɛ nya woakpa mǝ kabɔnko .
43010004	Lǝ okpadi mǝ nya ɔyɛnko mǝ ɔbɔnkoo , woatɔ mǝ sɛtɔ kayɛnko mǝ nya bǝǝtǝkǝko wǝ kama itsyise beeyi wǝ ɔkɔɛ .
43010005	Bǝmbutǝkǝko kuutsyuǝ bamba kama . Bomu bootsyetsyi bedu itsyise benyi wǝ ɔkɔɛ . ”
43010006	Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo , fɛɛ bánnɔ nnya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ eto kasɔ .
43010007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ sitintii , mɔ ni kesie itǝ basamu bamǝ .
43010008	Betidi ba kenke lɛtɔ mɛ sɛtɔ bǝbǝǝ , beyifo beyu ku mba laabiasǝ asa . Fɛɛ basamu bamǝ méntsyue mǝ koto .
43010009	Mɔ ni kesie kamǝ . Lǝ utsyuǝ ayɛ lǝ mɛ udufǝ lǝ kafoo , wuunyǝ bofo . Wuudufǝ lǝ mfó ukabɔ , nya wuunyǝ didisa sɛɛ ukedi .
43010010	Uyuu , bubǝ ete woǝbǝ nkǝ lǝ uyu , olo utidi , obiasǝ asa . Mɔɔ , mbǝ miǝ lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ , nkpǝ bo lɛflɔ .
43010011	“ Mɔ ni utinti wǝ laayɛnko basamu , nwǝ lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ weefi wǝ nkpǝ utǝ lǝ wǝ basamu eto disi .
43010012	Utidi wǝ laayɛnko basamu wǝ baafo diyi eto kayo nya benni wǝ kosate eto balee , weetsyetsyi kedu lǝ unyǝ ukiti nlɛ bubǝ . Ukiti ǝmǝ eedufǝ mǝ lenti kǝmuǝ mǝ nya wǝǝsensǝ mǝ .
43010013	Utidi ǝmfo eetsyetsyi kedu itsyise diyi eto uyifoyifo ete uni . Nya basamu bamǝ eto bɔflɔ nye mǝ kasɛɛ aanka wǝ .
43010014	“ Mɔ ni utinti wǝ laayɛnko basamu . Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ nyi mɛɛ , nya mintsya nyi wǝǝ , nko ke mintsya nyi mɔ basamu , nya mǝǝtsya nyi mɛ nɛ . Nya míntɔnɔ miǝ mǝǝkpǝ lǝ mǝ disi .
43010015	
43010016	Nkpe basamu bamba ba lǝmbǝ lǝ lesamuyo nǝmfo tɔ . Ele bǝ nyɛnko mǝ tsya mboko , nya mǝ tsya lǝ banɔ mɔ ɔkɔɛ . Nya mǝmblɛ loofíani basamu eto ditsyukpa lɔni lǝ ɔyɛnkoyɛnko ɔni eto kalɔ .
43010017	“ Anto ǝmǝ aala mɛ , itsyise ntɔnɔ miǝ mǝǝkpǝ lǝ mǝ disi , bǝ lǝ nsinkli mbǝ nsiǝ nkpǝ bio .
43010018	Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mɔ nkpǝ bofo lǝ mɔ ani , bomu mɔ kosate dífi mu míntǝ miǝ mǝǝkpe . Nkpe ǝsuǝale bǝ moofo mu bufi kǝtǝ . Nya ǝsuǝale si ekpe mɛ bǝ nsinkli mfo mu . Nko ǝmǝ mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo nɛ . ”
43010019	Lǝ etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi mfo esoo , kabakǝfǝ esi kédufǝ lǝ Yudafɔ bamǝ nti .
43010020	Mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko wǝ . Ɔlɛ kumunǝ bukpǝ ! Beso ele bǝ besi betsyue wǝ koto fɛ ? ”
43010021	Fɛɛ babamba tsya átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nkpee , embofo etiki nyamfo eto okle bɔtɛyi ! Ntsyǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua luuyifo unǝmba si unyǝ asa fɛ ? ”
43010022	Lɛyɔlefee , nya beedi Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo Bufikakpe lǝ Onanto kɔni eto Diyi lǝ Yerusalem .
43010023	Yesu ákayɛ kafe lǝ Disumuyo eto lekpake nǝ baakpo Solomo eto Ablanase mfó .
43010024	Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ létsyilama wǝ , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Isu ese dimamfe lefe kon fookpe bo lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ esu ase ? Tɛyi bo sitinti siamǝ , lǝ fǝ ni Utidi ǝmǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ . ”
43010025	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo koko , tsya biamfo mɛ akanɔ . Asa nnya meeyifo lǝ mɔ Anto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , lɛ mɛ bulǝkǝ kate .
43010026	Fɛɛ biǝmbofo mɛ bɛnɔ , itsyise bientsyi mɔ basamu bamǝ nti .
43010027	Mɔ basamu eetsyue mɛ koto . Nyi mǝ , nya bǝǝtǝkǝko mɛ .
43010028	Ntǝ mǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya bemuukpǝ kulefe . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ lǝ mɔ kɔni .
43010029	Mɔ Anto wǝ dífi mǝ útǝ mɛɛ , kpe ale oso lesa saa . Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mǝ bofo lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto kɔni kulefe kulefe .
43010030	Anto ǝmǝ ku mɔɔ , eyifo bani . ”
43010031	Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ dísi básɛ aba bǝ bato wǝ .
43010032	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyifo nnyifo sɛɛ kpǝ bo mɔ Anto lékpe mɛ lǝ mi nti . Nya nte nnya eso bela biǝ biakpɔ mɛ aba ? ”
43010033	Yudafɔ bamǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni nnyifo sɛɛ bo féyifo eso boǝ boakpɔ fǝ aba . Bomu mbusiotiki nnya fédi eso ! Utidinini ete feni , fɛɛ éfi fǝ ǝsuǝ éyifo fe Onanto ! ”
43010034	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ mi kosate eto Kɔfi eto Kukue bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Beyifo fe bananto . ’
43010035	Buyi boǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue , eyifo sitinti itǝ lefe saa . Nya mfó Onanto lékpadi betidi ba léfo wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beyifo fe bananto . ’
43010036	Fɛɛ mɔɔ , Anto ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ mɛ nya ótsyese mɛ kawunsiǝ nɛ . Nya ntsyǝ eso fɛ biɔtɛyi biǝ ndi mbusiotiki lǝ nnya míntɛyi miǝ nyifo Onanto eto Ubi ?
43010037	Lǝ minlɛ mɔ Anto eto nnyifo buyifoo , nyalɛ biamfo mɛ bɛnɔ .
43010038	Fɛɛ lǝ nlɛ mu buyifoo , lǝ biamfo mɛ bɛnɔ tsyaa , ele bǝ befo asa nnya meeyifo bɛnɔ , bǝ lǝ bete lǝ bɛnɔ nnya kasɔ biǝ Anto ǝmǝ si lǝ mɛ , nya mintsya nsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝ . ”
43010039	Mfó tsyaa , besi bála bǝ bǝǝmuǝ Yesu , fɛɛ usi ɔ́bɔ lǝ mǝ nti údu .
43010040	Yesu esi úsu ɔ́yila Ketu Yordan úsu kaka Yohanes díyifo betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa tutɛ , nya ɔ́tsyimɛ mfó .
43010041	Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yohanes ményifo ayanisa saa óte . Fɛɛ lesa saa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ eyifo sitinti . ”
43010042	Nya betidi kpǝ lǝ mfó léfo wǝ bánɔ .
43011001	Osani utsyuǝ baakpo Lazaro wǝ dísiǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Betania ánɔ bufi . Wǝ ku wǝ bayimisio inuǝ ba baakpo Maria ku Marta dísiǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
43011002	Maria ǝmfo ni nwǝ dífi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi ókpo Bonamute Yesu lǝ akpa nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si wǝ akpa nyamǝ . Wǝ ɔyimisani ni Lazaro wǝ lɛnɔ bufi bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo nɛ .
43011003	Wǝ bayimisio bamfo átsyese Yesu kɛnyɛ bǝ , “ Bonamute , fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala ánɔ bufi ! ”
43011004	Se Yesu léfo kɛnyɛ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bufi bomfo enni bukpǝmfi itǝ wǝ , bomu iyifo nnya ǝsuǝ buufi babesǝ Onanto eto diye kato , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ babesǝ Onanto eto Ubi tsya kato . ”
43011005	Nyaa , Yesu ála Marta ku wǝ ɔyimisio ku Lazaro eto asa tinti .
43011006	Fɛɛ se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ ɔ́nɔ bufii , usi ɔ́kɛ mfó eyi ǝnuǝ okpe .
43011007	Nyamfo eto kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ businkli busu Yudea . ”
43011008	Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi lɛtɛyɛ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , kayinkǝnǝ ete Yudafɔ díkabɛbɛ kusu bǝ baakpɔ fǝ aba , nya fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ busi boesu mfó ? ”
43011009	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni lefosi abombosɔsɔ ǝnuǝ nkpe lǝ diyi eto kalekpakpa ǝsuǝ ? Lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ bɔyɛ lǝ kalekpakpa ǝsuǝǝ , weentusǝ itsyise ɔlɛ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto lekpasǝ bunyǝ .
43011010	Fɛɛ lǝ ketsye ɔnlɛ bɔyɛɛ , wuutusǝ itsyise lekpasǝ ǝmbǝ itǝ wǝ . ”
43011011	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , usi ɔ́tɛyi úkǝ nkǝ , “ Bo ɔyɛtsyuǝ Lazaro lɛ selabe , nyaso ntɔ wǝ kasanklisǝ kɔ . ”
43011012	Se bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ nkoo , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ selabe onlabee , nyalɛ yuuyuǝ wǝ . ”
43011013	Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ Lazaro ébukpǝ , fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ébu bǝnkǝ selabe tinti ɔ́tɛyi utsyiko .
43011014	Nyaso Yesu ákpasǝ mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lazaro ǝkpǝ .
43011015	Fɛɛ lǝ mi esoo , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bǝ mánkɛ lǝ mfó fɛ úkpǝ , bǝ lǝ befo bɛnɔ esoo . Nyaso bítǝ lǝ busu wǝ ɔflɔ mfó . ”
43011016	Mfó nya Toma wǝ baakpo Ɔfimfinyǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ bakaseyimitsyuǝ bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ butǝkǝko Oteasa busu bǝ lǝ busu bukpǝ ku wǝ ! ”
43011017	Lefe nǝ Yesu dísu údufǝ mfoo , ɔ́nɔ nkǝ bébikǝ Lazaro diyi nale ni diyi nǝmfó nɛ .
43011018	Idu lǝ Betania isu Yerusalem eyifo fe esunkpo ǝnuǝ seka .
43011019	Nyaso Yudafɔ kpǝ ǝbǝ mfó bǝ bǝǝbǝ bamansǝ Maria ku Marta lɛkɔ se mǝ ɔyimisani díkpǝ eso .
43011020	Se Marta lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu lɛ bubǝǝ , úsu nkǝ weesu otsyako wǝ , fɛɛ Maria ebu ɔkɛ lǝ diyo .
43011021	Marta átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ nnya ete fakɛ mfoo , eni mɔ ɔyimisani mǝnkpǝ !
43011022	Fɛɛ nnyi miǝ mɔmɔ kulaa tsyaa , lesa saa nǝ fɔɔtɔ Onantoo , wuutǝ fǝ ni . ”
43011023	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ɔyimisani ebotaka ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
43011024	Nya Marta lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ wootaka ubǝ nkpǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ lootaka lǝ Diyi Fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
43011025	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ bǝkpǝkpǝ eto botaka kǝńyǝ ku businkli kǝbǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ nkpǝ nɛ . Utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ úkpǝ kulaa tsyaa , wuusiǝ nkpǝ .
43011026	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke nsi nkpǝ nya ófo mɛ ɔ́nnɔ , embukpǝ kulefe . Afo nyamfo anɔ ? ”
43011027	Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , Bonamute . Mfo nnɔ miǝ fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , Onanto eto Ubi nwǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ wuubǝ kawunsiǝ . ”
43011028	Se Marta lɛtɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , úsu ókpadi wǝ ɔyimisio Maria , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ buɛɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa ǝmǝ ebubǝ nya ɔnlɛ fǝ disi bɔtɔ . ”
43011029	Se Maria lɛnɔ nkoo , ótaka mlǝ nya úsu wǝ katsyakokɔ .
43011030	Lefe nǝmfoo , Yesu méndufǝ tɔ umǝ kafo . Bomu usi úńyǝ lǝ kaka Marta díbǝ otsyako wǝ mfó .
43011031	Se Yudafɔ ba nsi lǝ diyo lǝ Maria ɔflɔ banlɛ wǝ lɛkɔ bomansǝ dínyǝ bǝ ótaka kplaa , mǝ tsya átaka bǝtǝkǝko Maria kama . Bébu bǝ kudi komǝ eti ɔntɔ lǝ usi usu uwi keku .
43011032	Se Maria dísu údufǝ kaka Yesu ńyǝǝ , óse akonki lǝ wǝ akɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ nnya ete fákɛ mfoo , eni mɔ ɔyimisani mǝnkpǝ ! ”
43011033	Yesu ǝnyǝ kase Maria ku betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ nlɛ nku . Ílǝ wǝ lǝ utu nya óla ɔ́wɔnɔ hũũ .
43011034	Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Sieti bíbikǝ wǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe . ”
43011035	Mfóo , Yesu éwi keku .
43011036	Nya Yudafɔ bamǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bebe kase ko óla wǝǝ ! ”
43011037	Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔ́sini unemba ǝnǝmi nya ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ . Beso wǝntǝ lǝ Lazaro lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ ? ”
43011038	Isi ílǝ Yesu tinti , nya ɔ́nyi úsu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ . Kudi komǝ eyifo dibiǝ lǝ koba kafo nya béfi leba béti ko kɛnyɛ .
43011039	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnyi leba nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . ” Mfó nya Lazaro ǝmǝ eto ɔyimisio Marta lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , wuukanyi mɔmɔ , itsyise mmi ni diyi nale se bébikǝ wǝ nɛ ! ”
43011040	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mántɛyi fǝ minkǝ lǝ áfo mɛ ánɔɔ , ebunyǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ? ”
43011041	Nyaso bányi leba nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Yesu ábesǝ ǝnǝmi kato óbe nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise eetsyue mɛ koto lǝ nkpadi fǝ .
43011042	Nyi miǝ eetsyue mɛ koto lefe saa . Fɛɛ mba ńyǝ mfo eso minlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyi nko , bǝ lǝ bafo banɔ bǝ fǝ lékpe mɛ kɔtɔ . ”
43011043	Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nkoo , ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ Lazaro , bɔ ǝbǝ ! ”
43011044	Nya ukpǝnkpǝ ǝmǝ lɛbɔ úbǝ ku kafia ka béfi bémini wǝ ǝsuǝ ku nka béfi bémini wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beyankli we bikǝ biamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ udu . ”
43011045	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yudafɔ ba díbǝ Maria ɔflɔ nya bǝnyǝ nnya Yesu díyifoo , eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ .
43011046	Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ édu bésu Farisifɔ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi mǝ lesa nǝ Yesu díyifo .
43011047	Nyaso Farisifɔ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ákpe disi ku Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko nya bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ buyifo ? Bebe ayanisa kpǝ nnya osani ǝmfo nlɛ buyifo kate !
43011048	Lǝ butǝ wǝ kusu ɔnlɛ nyamfo buyifo nkoo , utsyuǝ saa ebofo wǝ ɔnɔ . Nya Romafɔ luubǝ baba bo Disumuyo kɛnkɛ kamǝ ku kusǝ komǝ tsya ! ”
43011049	Mfóo , mǝ nti eto nwǝ baakpo Kayafa , wǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ lɛlɛ nǝmfoo , lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ asakasɔnɔnɔ lǝǝlǝ mi mmǝ !
43011050	Binyi tɔ biǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi ɔni kpǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto disi enso bǝ kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi tsylɔ lee ? ”
43011051	Lǝ sitintii , wóantɛyi nyamfo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto nsusu ǝsuǝ . Bomu fe nwǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ itǝ lɛlɛ nǝmfo esoo , Onanto áyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ nkǝ ɔtɛyi nyamfo , nnya ni katɛyikǝtsyǝ bǝ Yesu ebubǝ ukpǝ lǝ Yudafɔ kenke eto disi .
43011052	Inni bǝnkǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto disi mate ete . Bomu bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɔsɔ Onanto eto bebi ba kenke dísensǝ bankpo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ akpɔ nnya kenke lebo , beyifo bani .
43011053	Lǝ nyaso ídu dinǝmfo ǝsuǝ , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ dítsyiko esu bɔbɛbɛ kase bomuǝ Yesu lǝ balo wǝ .
43011054	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yesu ménsifo bɔyɛ kafe mmǝ lǝ Yudafɔ nti . Bomu údu úsu úsiǝ lǝ umǝbibi wǝ baakpo Efraim kaka lefi mfiminti . Mfó wonko wǝ bakasebi dísiǝ .
43011055	Lefe nǝmfoo , Yudafɔ eto Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi didife éboyo elo . Nya betidi kpǝ dítsyi kasɔ kamǝ eto akpɔakpɔ bésu Yerusalem lǝ besu bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ beyifo ǝsuǝflǝflǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ fɛ lɛ diyididi nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
43011056	Se bǝńyǝ lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝǝ , bákabɛbɛ Yesu nya bákatɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ bibu ? Nyi miǝ wǝmbofo diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ bubǝ , lee ntsyǝ ini ? ”
43011057	Lefe nǝmfóo , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ ébutǝ bote bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ yi kaka Yesu nkpee , lǝ ubǝ utǝ mǝ bote , lǝ besu bǝmuǝ wǝ .
43012001	Se ibu eyi akua lǝ bedi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyii , Yesu ésu Betania , kaka Lazaro wǝ Yesu létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ditsyi .
43012002	Mfóo , banwa ditsyitsyosa bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ udi . Marta ni nwǝ lɛwunsǝko mǝ lǝ lesa nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Lazaro tsya akɛ lǝ mba ku Yesu dídi lesa nǝmǝ nti .
43012003	Mfó ǝmǝ nya Maria dífi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi béyifo betsyiko lǝ nnya baakpo naadi ǝsuǝ , nya bofo koya tinti eto dituntu kplɛ tɔ úsu ókpo Yesu lǝ akpa . Nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si wǝ akpa . Bɔnyi fififi bomǝ éyi diyo nǝmǝ kenke .
43012004	Nya Yesu eto okasebi ɔni wǝ ni Yuda Iskariot , nwǝ luubǝ udu Yesu utǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ ,
43012005	“ Beso bánte nnuǝbi bomfo sika flubia alofa ǝtsyǝ befi atabi nyamǝ bǝtǝ bakombo ? ”
43012006	Fɛɛ inni lǝ kase Yuda dífi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ bakombo eto asa eso ɔtɛyi nyamfo nko . Bomu uyu uni . Wǝ ɔflɔ atabi eto otobe dítsyǝ , nya úkeyu atabi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ kǝlǝkǝ kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
43012007	Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Beyani wǝ kpoo . Bitǝ lǝ uyifo lesa nǝ woofo buyifo kǝtsyǝ itǝ mɔ kǝbikǝ .
43012008	Bakombo kpe lǝ mi ɔflɔ lefe saa . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , mǝmɔɔkɛ lǝ mi ɔflɔ lefe saa . ”
43012009	Se Yudafɔ kpǝ lɛnɔ bǝ Yesu kpe lǝ Betania , béti wǝ bésu mfó . Nya inni Yesu mate eso bésu mfó , bomu lǝ bǝnyǝ Lazaro wǝ Yesu létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ tsya .
43012010	Lǝ nyaso besumunyǝ ninǝ átsya béfi nsusu bǝ boolo wuntsya .
43012011	Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Lazaro ǝsuǝ esoo , Yudafɔ kpǝ lǝ kesumu bɔni kǝtǝnko Yesu kama .
43012012	Se kale dísiǝ , betidi eto ditsyukpa kplɛ nǝ díbǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔɔ , ánɔ bǝ Yesu lɛ Yerusalem bubǝ .
43012013	Nyaso béfi katodi nya bésu bǝ baatsyako wǝ . Bákafa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Hosiana ! Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! Bɛtɛsǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Atɛsǝ itǝ Israelfɔ eto Oka ! ”
43012014	Yesu ǝnyǝ ɔflimubi utsyuǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ wǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ ,
43012015	“ Biante sikpi mi Sion eto umǝ eto betidi ! Nyǝ fǝ Oka nsi lǝ ɔflimubi ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
43012016	Tutɛɛ , wǝ bakasebi mánnɔ nyamfo kasɔ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto díkatakasǝ Yesu utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ ku dibuu , nya fɛ bákloma bǝ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ etsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya nnya ni asa nyamfo kenke béyifo bǝtǝ wǝ nɛ .
43012017	Betidi ba díńyǝ mfó fɛ Yesu lékpadi Lazaro útsyiko kudi kafo lǝ ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝǝ , ésu bátɛyi lesa nǝ díbǝ mfó .
43012018	Nyamfo esoo , betidi kpǝ ésu bátsyako wǝ , itsyise bánɔ ayanisa nnya úyifo óte eso .
43012019	Mfó Farisifɔ bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bebe , kulesa anlɛ bɔlɛkɛ kǝtǝ bo ! Binyǝ biǝ kawunsiǝ kenke édu bésu bǝtǝkǝko wǝ ! ”
43012020	Grikifɔ bǝtsyuǝ tsya akɛ lǝ betidi ba dísu Disumuyo lǝ Yerusalem lǝ diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ nti .
43012021	Bésu Filipo wǝ dítsyi Betsaida lǝ Galilea ɔflɔ , nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto , bola boǝ boǝnyǝ Yesu . ”
43012022	Filipo ésu ɔ́tɛyi Andrea nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ dídu bésu bátɛyi Yesu .
43012023	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ babesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto diye kato .
43012024	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ lǝ banto lentabi nǝmǝ lǝ kasɔ dibuu , lentabi lɔɔni ete disi diudi . Fɛɛ lǝ dibuu , nya fɛ diɔnwɔ ebibi kpǝ nɛ .
43012025	Utidi wǝ lela wǝ kosate eto nkpǝǝ , ebonyansǝ mu . Fɛɛ nwǝ dikisi wǝ kosate eto nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ebɔlɔ mu utsyǝ itǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43012026	Utsyuǝ saa ke lela nkǝ weeyifo mɔ keyifoo , ele bǝ utǝkǝko mɛ , itǝ bǝ mɔ uyifoyofo ǝmǝ ebusiǝ lǝ kaka minsi . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke ni mɔ uyifoyifoo , mɔ Anto ebokpe wǝ dibu .
43012027	“ Mɔmɔɔ , ɛlɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ mɔ lɛkɔɛsi . Fɛɛ be ko ele bǝ ntɛyi ? Bɔtɛyi ele bǝ ntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Nto , mǝntǝ lǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle lǝ kǝtǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ lee ’ ? Owo lo ! Fɛɛ nyamfo eso mímbǝ kawunsiǝ , bǝ lǝ nnyǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle nɛ .
43012028	Nyaso Nto , tǝ lǝ babesǝ fǝ diye kato ! ” Nya ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi kato nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbóbesǝ ni kato koko . Nya nsi muuyifo nko . ”
43012029	Se betidi ba dińyǝ mfo lɛnɔ ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝǝ , mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ ɔsɔmi uni díkumi . Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ni lɛtɛyi wǝ lesaatsyuǝ . ”
43012030	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ eso ɔkɔɛ ǝmfó lɛbɔ , bomu mi eso .
43012031	“ Mɔmɔ ni lefe nǝ Onanto lookponko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi lekpo . Nya Onanto luutu kawunsiǝ kamfo eto ǝsuǝalenyǝ lǝ wǝ seka ǝsuǝ .
43012032	Fɛɛ lǝ betsyi mɛ lǝ kasɔ babesǝ katoo , muunǝ betidi kenke mboko mɔ ɔflɔ . ”
43012033	Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfoo , óte ukpǝ wǝ eto okle wǝǝbǝ bukpǝ .
43012034	Mfó nya sitiditu siamǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi eto kukue lɛ bo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , Utidi Wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyuǝ ebusiǝ nkpǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ bɔtɔyi fǝnkǝ boobesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ kato ? Owoe ni Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ mfo ? ”
43012035	Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Diyǝnde nǝmǝ si diɔkɛ lǝ mi nti itǝ lefe sɛkɛ ete . Se diyǝnde nǝmǝ nsi nkpe mi lenti esoo , bɛyɛ bɛtɔ , bǝ lǝ kale lǝ kayɛ mi bolo lǝ bidufǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nwǝ laayɛ lǝ ketuntuu , ante kaka ɔntɔ .
43012036	Nyaso se lekpasǝ nkpe lǝ mi ntii , befo lekpasǝ nǝmǝ bɛnɔ bǝ lǝ biyifo lekpasǝ eto betidi . ” Se Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nyamfo ólosǝǝ , údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ úsu ɔbiɔ .
43012037	Ite bǝ Yesu éyifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi óte tsyaa , bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
43012038	Fɛɛ nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ nko , bǝ lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe léfo ditiki nǝ bɔ́tɛyi ɔnɔ ? Nya owoe Bonamute ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale óte ? ”
43012039	Lǝ nyamfó eso bámfo bofo kanɔ , itsyise Yesaya esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
43012040	Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mba mǝ ǝnǝmi nya míninǝsǝ mǝ , bǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛyɛ asa bunyǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ nsusu lǝ bɔyɛ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ . Itǝ bǝmbɔtsyi bawuninsǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ mɛ , bǝ lǝ ntsya mǝ bufi . ”
43012041	Yesaya átɛyi nyamfo itsyise úbunyǝ Yesu eto diyǝnde kokoko , nya údi etiki utsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
43012042	Fɛɛ ite nko tsyaa , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ kpǝ áfo Yesu banɔ . Fɛɛ lǝ Farisifɔ bamǝ eso baamfo etiki nyamfo budi kabɔsǝǝ lekple betidi nɔ , bǝ lǝ bayɛ mǝ bola lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ eso .
43012043	Baala bǝ baafo betidi eto atɛsǝ enso atɛsǝ nya ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ .
43012044	Nyaso Yesu édi etiki ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke laafo mɛ kanɔɔ , inni mɔ mate ete ófo ɔ́nɔ . Bomu ófo nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya ɔ́nɔ .
43012045	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke lǝǝnyǝ mɛɛ , ǝǝnyǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya .
43012046	Mbǝ kawunsiǝ fe lekpasǝ , nya utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛ ɔnɔɔ , ensiembɔkɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ bio .
43012047	“ Lǝ utsyuǝ aanɔ mɔ ditiki nya weentsyue ni koto , mǝmbolo wǝ dikpi , itsyise mǝmbǝ miǝ maalo kawunsiǝ eto betidi dikpi . Bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ mmfo ntǝ mǝ .
43012048	Utidi wǝ kee lɛni mɛ nya wámmfo mɔ ditikii , kpe nwǝ lookponko wǝ lekpo . Etiki nya míndii , nya lookponko wǝ lekpo lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝmǝ nɛ .
43012049	Nyamfo eyifo sitinti itsyise mántɛyi kulesa lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛɛ , léte mɛ lesa nǝ ele bǝ ntɛyi ku kase ele bǝ ntɛyi ni .
43012050	Nya nnyi miǝ wǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝǝtǝ nkpǝ manlo . Nyaso lesa nǝ kee míntɛyii , ni ni lesa nǝ Anto ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ ntɛyi nɛ . ”
43013001	Ibu diyi lɔni fɛ lǝ bedi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ . Yesu áte nkǝ wǝ lefe éboyo bǝ udu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo usu wǝ Anto ɔflɔ . Úkala mba ni wǝ bale lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo , nya óla mǝ sitinti isu ese taa kalosǝkɔ .
43013002	Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi akɛ lǝ lesakedikɔ ku ditsyitsyo nǝmfó . Olo ǝmǝ ébusu údufǝ lǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi eto nsusu nkǝ lǝ udi wǝ okpe lǝ udu Yesu utǝ wǝ balo .
43013003	Yesu áte nkǝ wǝ Anto éfi ǝsuǝale saa útǝ wǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Uyi nkǝ útsyi Onanto ɔflɔ nya usinkli ɔntɔ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
43013004	Nyaso ótaka lǝ lesakedikɔ kamǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ awubunte kplɛ nnya kato útsyǝ nya úfi sebo ótsyasɛ lǝ nkɛ .
43013005	Úkuti ntu ókpo lǝ ɔkpɛ kplɛ utsyuǝ kafo nya útsyiko wǝ bakasebi bamǝ eto akpa buflǝ , ákasi nnya ku sebo sia ótsyasǝ lǝ nkɛ .
43013006	Se éyo Simon Petro ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , buflǝ fǝǝbǝ mɛ akpa lee ? ”
43013007	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Amannɔ tɔ lesa nǝ minlɛ buyifo mfo eto kasɔ , fɛɛ kamaa , ǝbɔnɔ nnya kasɔ . ”
43013008	Simon Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kulefe ! Mǝmbutǝ kusu miǝ lǝ ǝflǝ mɔ akpa kulefe . ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mǝmflǝ fǝ akpaa , nyalɛ ensiembuyǝ kedikɔ lǝ mɛ . ”
43013009	Simon Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nyalɛ mǝmflǝ mɔ akpa mate , bomu flǝ mɔ ani ku mɔ disi tsya ! ”
43013010	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke díkǝflǝ ntuu , ole . Nya weensihiã bǝ uflǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio , nnya lehiã ete ni bǝ uflǝ akpa . Itsyise wǝ kalebe saa ebole koko . Mi ǝsuǝ ébole , fɛɛ inni mimblɛ . ”
43013011	Yesu fe úyi nwǝ lǝǝbǝ wǝ bokpe lǝ ani , nyaso ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Inni mimblɛ kenke lele . ”
43013012	Se Yesu díflǝ mǝ akpa ólosǝǝ , úsinkli úfi wǝ awu ókpe , nya úsinkli úsu úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ kedikɔ kamǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ lesa nǝ mínyifo mi mfo eto kasɔ ?
43013013	Biakpadi mɛ biǝ Oteasa ku Onamute , nya ɛflɔ bǝ bekpadi mɛ nko . Itsyise wǝ mini nɛ .
43013014	Mɔ , nwǝ ni mi Onamute ku Oteasa ébuflǝ mi akpa . Lǝ nko inii , ele bǝ mi tsya flǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ eto akpa .
43013015	Ditsyǝbi dini mínyifo mínte mi , bǝ mi tsya lǝ biyifo fe kase mínyifo mínte mi .
43013016	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ uyifoyifo mamɔ oso wǝ Onamute . Nko ke ini bǝ ɔtɔyɛ mamɔ onso nwǝ lékpe wǝ kɔtɔ .
43013017	Se binyi sitinti siamfo esoo , Onanto ebokpo mi atsyɔ lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ sitintisu ǝsuǝ biyifo asa !
43013018	“ Inni mimblɛ eto etiki minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo . Nyi mba mínlǝkǝ lǝ mi nti . Fɛɛ ele bǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki bǝ itǝ fe kase báwɔni nnya bǝtsyǝ , ‘ Utidi wǝ lékpe kɔni lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni ku mɛ búdi lesaa , wǝ ni nwǝ létaka úńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ . ’
43013019	“ Nlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi katɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ , bǝ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ nko sitintii , biofo bɛnɔ biǝ Mɔ ni Nwǝ Mini .
43013020	Sitinti ini minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke lefo utidi wǝ míntsyesee , mɔ ófo . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛɛ , nwǝ létsyese mɛ uni ófo . ”
43013021	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi etiki nyamfo ólosǝǝ , ílǝ wǝ tinti lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Nya ɔ́tɛyi ókpasǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , mi nti eto ɔni ebudu mɛ utǝ . ”
43013022	Mfó nya Yesu eto bakasebi bamǝ dítsyi bawuninsǝ bábe mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ǝnǝmi itsyise íyifo mǝ yaa , nya bánte mǝ nti eto nwǝ Yesu nlɛ .
43013023	Bakasebi bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ Yesu laala tintii , ǝsiǝ ɔfi Yesu .
43013024	Lǝ nyaso Simon Petro áma ǝnǝmi ókpe okasebi ǝmǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tɔ wǝ futsyǝ ɔnlɛ . ”
43013025	Nyaso wuntsya étsyue kɛnyɛ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ buɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe ni futsyǝ ? ”
43013026	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ muubudi lesa nto kutu ntǝǝ , wǝ uni nɛ . ” Lǝ nyaso Yesu ébudi lesa sɛkɛ úfi óto kutu nya úfi útǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi .
43013027	Kase Yuda lefo lesa nǝmǝ koo , Obonsam ko dídufǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kɔse mlǝ lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ faala fǝ eeyifo . ”
43013028	Fɛɛ bafɛfɛ ba nsi lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó mánnɔ kasɔ lesa nǝ eso Yesu lɛtɛyi Yuda nko .
43013029	Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébu bǝ se ini Yuda díkalɛ mǝ otabitobe esoo , bɔtɛyi Yesu nlɛ wǝ nkǝ usu oya bikǝ bia boohiã itǝ mǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ eto budi oboko lee usu utǝ bakombo lesatsyuǝ .
43013030	Nya se Yuda léfo lesa nǝmǝ koo , ete ɔ́bɔ údu . Kǝtsyǝ tsya idi lefe nǝmfó .
43013031	Se Yuda dídu eto kamaa , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , bábesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto diye kato . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bábesǝ Onanto eto diye kato .
43013032	Lǝ bábesǝ Onanto eto diye kato ɛyɛ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ Onanto ebulǝkǝ Utidi Eto Ubi eto diyǝnde nǝ ǝsuǝ onkpe ote . Nya wuuyifo nkomǝ mɔmɔ mfoti .
43013033	“ Mɔ bebi , mensiembusiǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ ɛklɛ bio . Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mɔmɔ fe kase míntɛyi Yudafɔ eto beninǝ léfee miǝ , ‘ Kaka mintɔɔ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ’
43013034	“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi kɔfi fɔfɔ butǝ . Bela mi bǝtsyuǝ ! Kase minla mii , mi tsya la mi bǝtsyuǝ nko ke .
43013035	Lǝ bela bǝtsyuǝǝ , betidi ba tã ebɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bate bǝ mɔ bakasebi bini . ”
43013036	Simon Petro átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , se fantɔ ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kaka mintɔɔ , embofo mɛ butǝkǝko kesu mɔmɔ . Fɛɛ kamaa , ebutǝkǝko mɛ ǝbǝ mfó . ”
43013037	Petro átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , beso mǝmbofo fǝ butǝkǝko mɔmɔ kesu ? Muukpǝ lǝ fǝ disi faa ! ”
43013038	Mfó Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ebofo bukpǝ sitinti lǝ mɔ disi fɛ ? Sitinti , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ , fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ǝbɔni mɛ sitsyǝ , fǝ enyi mɛ kon . ”
43014001	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ mi lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Fe kase béfo Onanto bɛnɔɔ , befo mintsya bɛnɔ .
43014002	Lǝ mɔ Anto eto diyoo , nsiǝkɔ kpǝ kpe . Ntɔ lǝ nsu nlɔ nsiǝkɔ ntsyǝ mi . Nya mǝmbɔtɛyi mi nko , lenni nko ini .
43014003	Nya lǝ nsu nlɔ nsiǝkɔ ntsyǝ ntǝ mi nlosǝǝ , muusinkli mbǝ nkpa mi nsuko mɔ ɔflɔ , itǝ bǝ kaka minkpee , lǝ mi tsya lǝ bisiǝ mfó .
43014004	Biyi kusu ko ntɔ lǝ kaka mintɔ . ”
43014005	Toma átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bunyi kaka fantɔ . Nya ntsyǝ buuyifo bote kusu ko bɔɔyɛ bubǝ fǝ aflɔ ? ”
43014006	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni kusu komǝ , sitinti siamǝ ku nkpǝ bomǝ . Kuutsyuǝ saa embubǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ woanyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
43014007	Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔ ǝmǝ bimfi biinyi mɛɛ , bíote mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bifi biyi wǝ nya bíkǝnyǝ wǝ tsya . ”
43014008	Filipo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , te bo Anto ǝmǝ ete imi bo . ”
43014009	Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Filipo , kokooko ǝmǝ minkpe mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ete binyi mɛ tɔ ? Nwǝ ke díkǝnyǝ mɛɛ , ǝnyǝ mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya nɛ . Ntsyǝ eso fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Te bo Anto ǝmǝ ’ ?
43014010	Filipo , nyalɛ ámamfo ánɔ fǝ nkpe lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya wuntsya nkpe lǝ mɛ ? Etiki nnya míntɛyi mii , mentsyi mɔ kosate ɔflɔ . Anto wǝ nkpe lǝ mɛɛ , leeyifo wǝ kosate eto keyifo .
43014011	Befo mɛ bɛnɔ lǝ ntɛyi mi minkǝ , nkpe lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , nya wuntsya nkpe lǝ mɛ . Lǝ biamfo bɛnɔɔ , befo bɛnɔ lǝ ayanisa nnya meeyifo mate eso .
43014012	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , nwǝ ke léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , ebuyifo asa nnya meeyifo . Sitinti , wuuyifo asa nnya nso nko kulaa tsya , itsyise ntɔ lɔ mɔ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
43014013	Nya muuyifo lesa saa nǝ ke bɛtɔ lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ ntǝ mi , bǝ lǝ babesǝ Anto ǝmǝ eto diye kato ɛyɛ lǝ Ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
43014014	Lǝ bɛtɔ lesa saa lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , muuyifo ni ntǝ mi . ”
43014015	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ biala mɛɛ , biutsyue mɔ afi koto .
43014016	Mɔɔtɔ Anto ǝmǝ lǝ utǝ mi Ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ bamba wǝ luusiǝ ko mi lefe saa .
43014017	Wǝ ni Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ sitinti lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ kate . Fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto betidi ǝmbofo wǝ bunyǝ fɛ lǝ besu bǝtsyǝ wǝ lekpo . Fɛɛ mii , biyi Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ itsyise usi ko mi nya onkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
43014018	“ Lɛ ndu lǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , memoonyani mi mate ntsyǝ fe bakɔbebi . Bomu muusinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
43014019	Lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝǝ , kawunsiǝ eto betidi ensiembunyǝ mɛ . Fɛɛ mi ebunyǝ mɛ . Nya se minsi nkpǝ esoo , mi tsya ebusiǝ nkpǝ .
43014020	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , biunyǝ bitsyǝ lekpo biǝ nkpe lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , nya mi tsya nkpe lǝ mɛ , fe kase mintsya nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
43014021	“ Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laafo mɔ afi nya woeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , wǝ ni nwǝ laala mɛ nɛ . Mɔ Anto ebola nwǝ laala mɛ . Nya mintsya loola wǝ nya muulǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ nte wǝ . ”
43014022	Nya Yuda , wǝ lenni Iskariot , lɛtɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ntsyǝ fɛ ini bo mate ete fuulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ate , nya fǝmbulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ate kawunsiǝ eto betidi ? ”
43014023	Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke laala mɛɛ , wuutsyue ditiki nǝ maate koto , nya mɔ Anto loola wǝ . Nya mɔ ku mɔ Anto ǝmǝ luubǝ bɔsɔnɔ wǝ , busiǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ .
43014024	Utsyuǝ saa ke laanla mɛɛ , entsyue mɔ asatete koto . Nya asatete nnya bíkanɔɔ , enni mɔ kosate eto ale . Bomu mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ eto ale ini .
43014025	“ Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo kenke lǝ lefe minsi minkpe mi lǝ ɔflɔ .
43014026	Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ ni Ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ wǝ Onanto lootsyese lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , ebote mi lesa saa nya wooklomasǝ mi lesa saa nǝ míntɛyi mi .
43014027	“ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . Nya mɔ diyuǝ mimfi minlɛ mi butǝ . Inni lǝ kase kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝǝtǝ . Biǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ mi lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Nya biante sikpi .
43014028	Bɛnɔ se míntɛyi mi miǝ , ‘ Nlɛ budu lǝ mi ɔflɔ , nya muusinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ . ’ Lǝ nnya ete biala mɛɛ , eni biunyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ ndu ntɔ lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . Itsyise ɔmɔ oso mɛ .
43014029	Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo mɔmɔ fɛ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ , bǝ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ itǝǝ , lǝ befo bɛnɔ .
43014030	Mensiembofo mi etiki budinko kaklɛ itsyise kawunsiǝ kamfo eto oka lɛ bubǝ . Umbǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
43014031	Fɛɛ ele bǝ kawunsiǝ te nkǝ maala Anto ǝmǝ , nyaso meeyifo lǝ kase ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ nyifo . “ Mɔmɔɔ , bibǝ lǝ budu mfo . ”
43015001	“ Mɔ ni kudiyi tinti komǝ , nya mɔ Anto ni kudiyi komǝ eto ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ .
43015002	Waala mɔ kalɛ ka laannwɔ kǝlǝkǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nya nka laanwɔ ebibii , waalɔ ke ǝsuǝ lǝ kase ufiebi lɔɔsɔ okpo ke bǝ lǝ kafo bɔnwɔ kukɔnɔ .
43015003	Mimii , bɔ́ɔlɔ mi ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ koko tsya , ɛyɛ lǝ asa nnya mínte mi eso .
43015004	Bɛkɔ lǝ mɛ lǝ mintsya lǝ nyifo lɔni ku mi . Kuyi eto ɔlɛ ǝmbofo bɔnwɔ lǝ wǝ mate ǝsuǝ , woofo bɔnwɔ lǝ ɔlɛ ǝmǝ akɔ lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ . Nko ke biembofo ebibi bɔnwɔ lǝ biankɔ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
43015005	“ Mɔ ni kudiyi komǝ nɛ , nya mi ni ko kalɛ . Utidi wǝ ke lɛkɔ lǝ mɛɛ , nya mintsya lɛkɔ ku wǝǝ , ɛbɔnwɔ ebibi kpǝ . Itsyise biembofo kulesa buyifo lǝ mimbǝ lǝ mi .
43015006	Futsyǝ ke dimankɔ ku mɛɛ , booto wǝ bakpe fe uyilɛ nya wookoe ofiani ɔtɔni . Baakpa kalɛ kamfo eto okle kǝtsyǝ ditsyu kakpe lǝ ute katonsǝ .
43015007	Lǝ biyifo lɔni ku mɛ nya mɔ etiki tsya nkpe lǝ mii , bɛtɔ lesa saa nǝ ke lefe itǝ mi , ete biofo ni .
43015008	Mɔ Anto eto diyǝnde ni bǝ lǝ bɛnwɔ ebibi kpǝ , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nnya yuulǝkǝ ete bǝ biyifo mɔ bakasebi nɛ .
43015009	Maala mi fe kase mɔ Anto laala mɛ . Nyaso bitǝ lǝ mɔ lelabi lǝ lɛkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
43015010	Lǝ bitsyue mɔ afi kotoo , mɔ lelabi itǝ mi ebɔkɔ lǝ mi fe kase mintsya leetsyue mɔ Anto koto , nya mintsyimɛ lǝ wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
43015011	“ Nlɛ mi asa nyamfo bɔtɛyi bǝ lǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝ nkpe lǝ mɛɛ , lǝ lɛkɛ mi tsya lǝ ǝsuǝ lɛflɔ .
43015012	Kɔfi ko minlɛ mi butǝ ni nkǝ bela bǝtsyuǝ fe kase maala mi .
43015013	Lelabi nǝ utidi loofo bufi kǝtǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ enso kenke ni bǝnkǝ lǝ ufi wǝ nkpǝ utǝ lǝ mǝ disi .
43015014	Lǝ biyifo lǝ mɔ afi ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ biyifo mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ .
43015015	Mensiembokpo mi miǝ mɔ beyifoyifo mɔmɔ , itsyise nwǝ leeyifo utidi bamba eto keyifo aante asa nnya wǝ onamute leeyifo . Bomu maakpo mi miǝ mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ . Itsyise asa nnya kenke mínɔ mintsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔɔ , mbɔtɛyi mi nnya .
43015016	Inni mi díkǝlǝkǝ mɛ . Bomu mɔ dílǝkǝ mi . Nya nlǝkǝ mi miǝ lǝ bisu bɛnwɔ ebibi kpǝ , nya ebibi nnya biɔnwɔɔ , lǝ itsyǝ lefe saa . Itǝ bǝ lesa saa nǝ biɔtɔ Anto lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , wuutǝ mi ni .
43015017	Lǝ nyaso kɔfi ko minlɛ mi butǝ ni nkǝ bela mi bǝtsyuǝ . ”
43015018	Yesu ésukosǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi eekisi mii , bete biǝ mɔ baka bukisi nko .
43015019	Lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi binii , eni boola mi fe mǝ ke . Fɛɛ nlǝkǝ mi ntsyiko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi nti nyaso binsini mǝ bale . Nyamfo eso beekisi mi nɛ .
43015020	Bekloma ditiki nǝ míntɛyi mi minkǝ , ‘ Ndomunyǝ saa ammɔ kaso wǝ onamute . ’ Lǝ betidi ǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bete biǝ boońyǝ mi tsya lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ bétsyue mɔ etiki kotoo , bootsyue mi ale tsya koto .
43015021	Fɛɛ booyifo mi nyamfo kenke lǝ mɔ disi eso , itsyise benyi futsyǝ létsyese mɛ .
43015022	Lǝ nnya ete mǝmbǝ ntɛyi mǝ kulesaa , eni bǝmbolo mǝ lebua yifoyifo eto dikpi . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , béyifo lebua nya taflatsyɛ saa ensibǝ booto bǝ bánte .
43015023	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leekisi mɛɛ , eekisi mɔ Anto tsya .
43015024	Lǝ nnya ete ményifo keyifo ka kuutsyuǝ saa dímenyifo tɔ únyǝ lǝ mǝ ntii , eni bǝmbolo mǝ lebua yifoyifo eto dikpi . Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ asa nnya mínyifo , tsyaa balɛ mɔ ku mɔ Anto kenke bukisi .
43015025	Ele bǝ nyamfo bǝ itǝ nko bǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ mǝ kɔfi eto kukue ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko bǝ , ‘ Bukisi bimba ete békisi mɛ . ’
43015026	“ Lǝ nyasoo , mootsyese mi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ ni Ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ . Wǝ luulǝkǝ sitinti lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ote . Lefe nǝ utsyi Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ ubǝǝ , wuudi adansiǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ utǝ mi .
43015027	Mi tsya badansiɛ biudi bitǝ mɛ , itsyise bekpe lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ idu taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke .
43016001	“ Ntɛyi mi etiki nyamfo kenke bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bayɛ butǝ lǝ ani lǝ elo mi lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
43016002	Boolǝkǝ mi lǝ mǝ nti lǝ katsyakɔ , nya lefe ebubǝ nǝ lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ mi bolo tsyaa , wuubu nkǝ ɔlɛ Onanto busumu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
43016003	Betidi ebuyifo mi nyamfo eto okle , itsyise benyi mɛ nye Anto ǝmǝ tsya .
43016004	Bomu mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo ntɔnsǝ bǝ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ áyo bǝ beyifo nnya nkoo , lǝ bekloma biǝ ntɛyi mi nnya nko . “ Mántɛyi mi nyamfo lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ itsyise nkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ lefe nǝmfo .
43016005	Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , ntɔ lǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ mi kuutsyuǝ saa anlɛ mɛ bɔtɔ nkǝ sieti mintɔ .
43016006	Nya se míntɛyi mi nyamfoo , mi ketu eyi ku nkuɛnlo .
43016007	Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mi bǝ ndu lǝ mi ɔflɔ . Itsyise lǝ mensuu , Ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ ǝmǝ embubǝ mi ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ lǝ nsuu , mootsyese wǝ mi .
43016008	Nya lǝ ubǝǝ , wuulǝkǝ ote kawunsiǝ eto betidi ekpa wue bate bǝ bánya kusu lǝ lesa nǝ ni lebua ku lesa nǝ ni kasɛɛ yifoyifo ku lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto lekpo kpokpo .
43016009	Bembote lesa nǝ ni lebua itsyise bámfo mɛ bánɔ eso .
43016010	Nya boonyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo se banyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ komǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise ntɔ lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya biensiembunyǝ mɛ bio .
43016011	Nya bebote lesa nǝ ni lekpo kpokpo itsyise Onanto ébolo kawunsiǝ kamfo eto ǝsuǝalenyǝ ǝmǝ dikpi koko .
43016012	“ Asa kpǝ si ekpe nnya ele bǝ ntɛyi mi . Fɛɛ yooso mi butsyi mɔmɔ .
43016013	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ sitinti lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ kate ǝbǝǝ , diutǝ bete sitinti siamǝ kenke itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ . Nya wǝǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu wɔɔtɛyi mi lesa nǝ waanɔ ku nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ .
43016014	Wuutǝ babesǝ mɔ diye kato itsyise wuulǝkǝ lesa nǝ ófo utsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ ote mi .
43016015	Lesa saa nǝ ni Anto ǝmǝ eto lelee , eyifo mɔ lele . Nyaso míntɛyi mi minkǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ebufi lesa nǝ mintǝ wǝ ubǝ ote mi . ”
43016016	Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ibu sɛkɛ biensiembunyǝ mɛ bio , nya lǝ lefe sɛkɛ kama bisi biunyǝ mɛ . ”
43016017	Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɔ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya ɔ́tɛyi mfo eto kasɔ nkpǝ ? Ɔ́tɛyi bo nkǝ , Ibu sɛkɛ boensi embunyǝ wǝ bio . Nya sɛkɛ tsya lǝ nnya kamaa , busi buunyǝ wǝ . Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi bo tsya nkǝ , ‘ Itsyise ntɔ lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . ’
43016018	Nnya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Ibu sɛkɛ , ’ eto kasɔ ni be ? Bóannɔ lesa nǝ ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi eto kasɔ ! ”
43016019	Yesu áte nkǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ kpe bála lǝ batɔ wǝ . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ntɛyi minkǝ ibu sɛkɛ biensi embunyǝ mɛ bio , nya sɛkɛ lǝ nnya kamaa , bisi biunyǝ mɛ bio . Etiki nyamfo bɛnlɛ bɔlɛ kabe lǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ nti lee ?
43016020	Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ biuwi kaminsǝku , bilǝkǝ binǝntu . Fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto betidi luunyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Nya mii , nkuɛnlo ebumuǝ mi , fɛɛ mi nkuɛnlo bomǝ ebofiani disuǝyuǝ .
43016021	Lǝ usio labe kolee , woakɛ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ itsyise ɔlɛ kanyi bunyǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ óle ubi ǝmǝ ólosǝǝ , woata kanyi ka únyǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise wǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ nkǝ óle ubi ókpe lǝ kawunsiǝ .
43016022	Nko seka inte itǝ mi tsya nɛ . Mɔmɔɔ , bekpe lǝ nkuɛnlo ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ muunyǝ mi bio . Nya disuǝyuǝ luuyi mi akɔɛsi kenke , disuǝyuǝ nǝ eto okle kuutsyuǝ saa lǝmbofo bofo ketsyiko mi ani kulefe .
43016023	“ Lǝ diyi nǝmǝ ayoo , biembɔtɔ mɛ kulesa . Itsyise nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ lesa nǝ ke biɔtɔ mɔ Anto lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , wuufi ni utǝ mi .
43016024	Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , bíantɔ tɔ kulesa lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ . Bɛtɔ ete lǝ utǝ mi lǝ mi disuǝyuǝ lǝ lɛflɔ lelo .
43016025	“ Ndi mi etiki ɛyɛ lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lefe ebubǝ nǝ mensiembudi mi etiki nyɛnko lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Bomu muudi mi etiki wuee itsyi lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
43016026	Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayoo , bɛtɔ wǝ asa lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ . Minlɛ bɔtɛyi miǝ mɔɔ , mɔɔtɔ ntɛ mi .
43016027	Itsyise Anto ǝmǝ kosate aala mi . Waala mi itsyise mi tsya aala mɛ , nya béfo bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto ɔflɔ mintsyi mímbǝ .
43016028	Sitintii , Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ mintsyi mímbǝ kawunsiǝ , nya mɔmɔ nsi nlɛ budu lǝ kawunsiǝ kesu Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . ”
43016029	Nya wǝ bakasebi lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , efe alɛ etiki budi kakpasǝ wuee , insini lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ .
43016030	Mfe ko bote boǝ eyi lesa saa , nya yensife bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa si ɔtɔ fǝ etiki eto kasɔ . Nyamfo mate ǝtǝ bofo bɔnɔ boǝ Onanto ɔflɔ fétsyi . ”
43016031	Mfó Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔ alɛ befo bɛnɔ ?
43016032	Lefe lɛ bubǝ , nya díubǝ tsya lélo nǝ boosensǝ mi nya utsyuǝ saa luusu wǝ umǝ beyani mɔ mate bitsyǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ sitintii , yembuyifo mɔ mate . Itsyise Anto ǝmǝ si ko mɛ .
43016033	Ntɛyi mi nyamfo lǝ binyǝ diyuǝ se biyifo lɔni ku mɛ eso . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi ebutǝ binyǝ kanyi . Fɛɛ bińyǝ kekleke ! Itsyise mbutǝkǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kato ! ”
43017001	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nyamfo ólosǝǝ , óbesǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , lefe nǝmǝ éboyo . Besǝ fǝ Ubi eto diye kato bǝ lǝ fǝ Ubi tsya lǝ obesǝ fǝ diye kato .
43017002	Itsyise éfi ǝsuǝale kenke ǝtǝ wǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ǝsuǝ bǝ mba kenke féfi fǝtǝ wǝǝ , lǝ utǝ mǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43017003	Nya nkpǝ manlo ni bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bate fǝ , fǝ nwǝ hã mate ni Onanto kosate ǝmǝ nya lǝ bate Yesu Kristo wǝ fátsyese .
43017004	Mbesǝ fǝ diye kato nte lǝ betidi nti . Nya mínyifo keyifo ka fákpe mɛ lǝ kɔni fǝ nyifo lǝ kawunsiǝ mínlosǝ .
43017005	Mɔmɔɔ , Nto , besǝ fǝ Ubi eto diyǝnde kato lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi , diyǝnde nǝ ǝsuǝ mínkɛ ku fǝ fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ .
43017006	“ Ntǝ miǝ mba fǝlǝkǝ fǝtǝ mɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi ntii , te fǝ . Fǝ bale beni nya féfi mǝ fǝtǝ mɛ nya bétsyue fǝ ditiki koto .
43017007	Nya mɔmɔɔ , beyi bǝ lesa saa nǝ féfi fǝtǝ mɛɛ , etsyi fǝ ɔflɔ .
43017008	Mfi kɛnyɛ ka fǝtǝ mɛ fǝ nsu ntɛyi mǝ nsuko mǝ nya báfo ke . Nya beyi sitinti bǝ fǝ ɔflɔ mintsyi , nya fǝ ni nwǝ létsyese mɛ .
43017009	Nlɛ ola boto lǝ mǝ disi , minlɛ ola boto lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke eto disi . Bomu lǝ mba féfi fǝtǝ mɛ eto disi , itsyise fǝ kosate eto bale beni .
43017010	“ Mba kenke ni mɔ bale eyifo fǝ bale , nko ke fǝ bale tsya diyifo mɔ bale nɛ . Nya mɔ diyǝnde lébe kato ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
43017011	Mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ fǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Minsibǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo . Fɛɛ mǝǝ , besi bakpe lǝ ke . Anto Kɛnkɛ , fǝ kosate fi fǝ diye eto ǝsuǝale nnya fǝtǝ mɛ abe mǝ bǝ lǝ beyifo bani fe kase bo ku fǝ diyifo bani .
43017012	Lefe nǝ mínkɛ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔɔ , nlɛ mǝ wɛkɛkɛkɛkɛ nya mínse mǝ ɛyɛ lǝ diye nǝ fǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Nse mǝ , itǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mánnya lǝ mǝ nti , enso utidi wǝ ele bǝ onya kokooko , bǝ lǝ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ .
43017013	“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ fǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Ntɛyi nyamfo lǝ kawunsiǝ bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ beyi kenke lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi ku mɔ disuǝyuǝ nǝ minlɛ bunyǝ .
43017014	Mbe fǝ ditiki nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ mǝ , nya benni kawunsiǝ kamǝ eto bale fe kase mintsya lenni kawunsiɛ kamfo eto ole ke . Lǝ nyasoo , kawunsiǝ kamǝ eekisi mǝ .
43017015	“ Minlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ lǝkǝ mǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ . Bomu nlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ ase mǝ , ǝlǝkǝ mǝ etsyiko Obuale ǝmǝ eto ani .
43017016	Fe kase minni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto olee , nko ke mǝ tsya lenni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bale nɛ .
43017017	Yifo mǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ sitinti siamǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise fǝ ditiki nǝmǝ eyifo sitinti .
43017018	Ntsyese mǝ kawunsiǝ fe kase fintsya létsyese mɛ kawunsiǝ seka .
43017019	Lǝ mǝ esoo , nyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ ntǝ fǝ , bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ beyifo kɛnkɛ lǝ sitinti siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
43017020	“ Minlɛ nyamfo bɔtɔ kǝtǝ mǝ mate , bomu nlɛ bɔtɔ kǝtǝ mba kenke loofo mɛ banɔ ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mǝ bɔɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ .
43017021	Anto , nlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ ǝtǝ bǝ lǝ beyifo bani fe kase fankpe lǝ mɛ nya mintsya nkpe lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ . Tǝ lǝ beyifo bani ku bo bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝ bafo banɔ bǝ fǝ uni létsyese mɛ .
43017022	“ Ntǝ mǝ diyǝnde nǝ eto okle ke fǝtǝ bǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ lǝ beyifo bani fe kase bo fǝ diyifo bani .
43017023	Nkpe lǝ mǝ , nya fintsya nkpe lǝ mɛ . Tǝ lǝ beyifo bani kenke bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝ bate bǝ fǝ létsyese mɛ nya faala mǝ fe kase faala mɛ .
43017024	“ Anto , nla miǝ mba féfi fǝtǝ mɛ lǝ bǝsiǝ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ lǝ kaka minsi bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ mɔ diyǝnde , diyǝnde nǝ fǝtǝ mɛ itsyise ála mɛ fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ .
43017025	“ Anto Sɛɛ , kawunsiǝ eto betidi enyi fǝ , fɛɛ mɔ yi fǝ nya mba mfo tsya yi bǝ fǝ létsyese mɛ .
43017026	Ntǝ báte fǝ wuee , nya muutǝ besi bate fǝ eso nko , bǝ lǝ lelabi nǝ féfi fǝtǝ mɛɛ , lǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ nya lǝ mintsya lǝ nkɛ lǝ mǝ . ”
43018001	Se Yesu léto ola ǝmfo ólosǝǝ , wǝ ku wǝ bakasebi édu mfó nya báyɛ lǝ Kidron eto utukplo bésu kaka nnuɛbi eto eyi eto ɔkuɛ kɛkɛ utsyuǝ lɛkɛ . Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dídufǝ mfó .
43018002	Yuda wǝ dídu wǝ utǝǝ , áte mfó itsyise lefe kpǝǝ , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ála disi busu kakpe mfó .
43018003	Nyasoo , Yuda áyɛnko Romafɔ eto bamamanyǝ ku mba laase Disumuyo eto betsyuǝ , ba besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ létsyese nya ókpa mǝ úsuko ɔkuɛ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ . Bétsyi bemakǝ ku kakandiɛ ku atɛ .
43018004	Se Yesu léte asa nnya kenke lǝǝbǝ wǝ bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ɔ́bɔ úbǝ ótsyako mǝ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ? ”
43018005	Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ . ” Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ ni wǝ mfo . ” Yuda wǝ dídu wǝ útǝ tsya ńyǝ mǝ lenti .
43018006	Lefe nǝ Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ ni wǝ mfoo , ” bésinkli kama kama nya bédu bánɔ .
43018007	Usi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
43018008	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ́tɛyi mi koko minkǝ , nyǝ mɔ ni wǝ mfoo . Nyaso lǝ mɔ uni bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛɛ , bitǝ lǝ mbamfo lǝ bedu . ”
43018009	Ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nko , bǝ lǝ lesa nǝ úkatɛyi kokoo , lǝ ibǝ itǝ sitinti nkǝ , “ Nto , mányansǝ mba féfi fǝtǝ mɛ eto lɛ ɔni lǝ mǝnti . ”
43018010	Mfó Simon Petro dínǝ kalande nǝ untsyi úlǝkǝ lǝ akpatsya , nya ówe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto uyifoyifo eto kodianito úfǝ . Ndomunyǝ ǝmǝ eto diye ni Malko .
43018011	Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ kalande kamǝ akpe lǝ akpatsya kafo ! Bubu febu fǝ yanle bǝ nnǝ lesa nǝ nkpe lǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝ mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ ? ”
43018012	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Romafɔ eto bamamanyǝ eto ditsyukpa ku mǝ ɔtɔnkotɔnko ku Yudafɔ eto batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ ǝmuǝ Yesu lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ bákle .
43018013	Tutɛɛ , bákpa wǝ bésuko Annas ɔflɔ . Annas ǝmfo eyifo Kayafa eto usiǝanto . Nya Kayafa ǝmfo ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ díyifo kesumu eto keyifo lɛlɛ itǝ nǝmfó .
43018014	Kayafa ǝmfo ni nwǝ lɛlɛ Yudafɔ eto beninǝ kɔlɛ nkǝ ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ utidi ɔni kpǝ lǝ betidi ba tã eto kɛnyɛ .
43018015	Simon Petro ku okasebi bamba ǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama . Okasebi bamba ǝmfo eyifo Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto utidiyiyi , nyaso wǝ dítǝkǝko Yesu bésu Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto diyo ,
43018016	Fɛɛ Petroo , ǝńyǝ lǝ kesie . Okasebi bamba ǝmǝ ésinkli úbǝ údi etiki ku usiobi wǝ díńyǝ lǝ kesie kɛnyɛ mfó , nya útǝ nkǝ Petro tsya dufǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo .
43018017	Mfó nya usiobi ǝmǝ lɛtɔ Petro nkǝ , “ Fintsya , osani ǝmfo eto bakasebi eto ɔni fenii , lee ? ” Mfó Petro dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo , minni ! ”
43018018	Nya se lɛyɔ nlɛ mǝ esoo , beyifobi ku mba laase mfó átsyaka ute nya bǝńyǝ banlɛ bɔyifǝ . Nya Petro tsya lɛnyi úsu úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ mfó ɔnlɛ ute ǝmǝ bɔyifǝ .
43018019	Lefe nǝmfóo , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ákatɔ Yesu asa itsyi lǝ wǝ bakasebi ku asa nnya waate ǝsuǝ .
43018020	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Meedi betidi ba tã etiki lǝ obia lǝ kusǝ komǝ kenke eto ǝnǝmi lefe saa . Maate asa lǝ Disumuyo ku lǝ ntsyakɔ kaka Yudafɔ kenke lǝǝbǝ katsya . Méndi etiki saa kulefe lǝ kabiɔkɔ .
43018021	Nya beso ini mɔ fanlɛ etiki nyamfo bɔtɔ ? Tɔ betidi bamfo lesa nǝ míntɛyi mǝ . Beyi lǝsanǝ míntɛyi . ”
43018022	Se Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfo , mba laase mfó eto ɔni ko lɛsɔ wǝ lǝ kotosi nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ feebu fɛ feedi Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ etiki nko ? ”
43018023	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ndi etiki bua ǝtsyuǝǝ , tɛyi utsyuǝ saa mfo lǝ ɔnɔ lesa nǝ ini . Fɛɛ lǝ méndi etiki bua saa , beso fásɔ mɛ ? ”
43018024	Mfó nya Annas dífi Yesu wǝ disi ɔkɛ lǝ bokle lǝ ukuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ótsyese Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Kayafa ɔflɔ .
43018025	Lefe nǝmfóo , Simon Petro si uńyǝ mfó ɔlɛ ute bɔyifǝ . Nyaso bafɛfɛ ba díńyǝ mfó lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fintsya , ini osani ǝmǝ eto bakasebi eto ɔni fenii , lee ? ” Mfó Petro áni nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Owo lo , minni mǝ ɔni ! ”
43018026	Mfó nya Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto ndomunyǝ ɔni eto ɔyimi wǝ eto koto Petro léwe lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Inni fǝ uni mínyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ mfó lee ? ”
43018027	Petro esi útudi kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Owo lo ! ” Lamfolamfoo , nya ukusɛ dítǝ kɛnyɛ .
43018028	Olesiǝnto ǝmfóo , bákpa Yesu lǝ Kayafa eto diyo bésuko Romafɔ eto Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ eto kǝsiǝkɔ . Fɛɛ Yudafɔ bamǝ méndufǝ mfó , itsyise bánla bǝ bakpe mǝ ǝsuǝ kɔfiɔ fɛ lǝ bedi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ .
43018029	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Pilato ábɔ úbǝ ótsyako mǝ lǝ kesie kɛnyɛ mfó , nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kabua ka osani ǝmfo díyifo ? ”
43018030	Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Lenni kabua kplɛ kukǝtsyuǝ úyifo , eni boǝmbokpa wǝ boboko fǝ ɔflɔ . ”
43018031	Nyaso Pilato átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ bekpa wǝ bisuko lǝ mi kosate lǝ bisu bekponko wǝ lekpo lǝ mi kosate eto afi ǝsuǝ . ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝntǝ bo kusu bǝnkǝ bokponko kuutsyuǝ saa lekpo bolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi . ”
43018032	Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ nko bǝ lǝ lesa nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi itsyi lǝ ukpǝ wǝ eto okle wǝǝbǝ bukpǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
43018033	Mfó nya Pilato dísinkli úsu údufǝ wǝ lekanyo mfó , nya ókpadi Yesu ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ? ”
43018034	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ kosate ete nlɛ mɛ etiki nyamfo bɔtɔ lee , betidi bamba lɛtɛyi fǝ nko itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ ? ”
43018035	Pilato ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ebu fǝ Yudanyǝ mini ? Mi kosate eto betidi ku besumunyǝ ninǝ dífi fǝ bákpe mɛ lɛ kɔni . Be féyifo ? ”
43018036	Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ sekakedikɔ mentsyi kasɔ mfo . Lǝ nya ete mɔ sekakedikɔ dítsyi kasɔ mfo ini , eni mɔ batɔnkpe ebota mɛ disi bǝlǝkǝ mɛ betsyiko Yudafɔ eto ani . Fɛɛ mɔ sekakedikɔ mentsyi kawunsiǝ mfo . ”
43018037	Se ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nko , Pilato átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ Oka feni ? ” Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝ Oka mini . Nyamfo eso bale mɛ mímbǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ , bǝ lǝ mbǝ nlǝkǝ sitinti siamǝ nte . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke lǝǝtǝkǝko sitinti siamǝǝ , aanɔ lesa nǝ maatɛyi . ”
43018038	Pilato átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Nya be ni sitinti siamǝ ? ” Se Pilato lɛtɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , úsinkli úsu Yudafɔ ɔflɔ lǝ lekple nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mǝnnyǝ kabua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ nnya eso ele bǝ nlo wǝ dikpi .
43018039	Fɛɛ lǝ mi lekpa ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ éyo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi eto didifee , ele bǝ nlǝkǝ mba bákpe lǝ diyo eto ɔni ntǝ mi . Nyaso bela biǝ nyani Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ntǝ mi ? ”
43018040	Mfó nya mǝmblɛ léfã bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Inni nwǝ mfo , bomu Baraba ! ” Nya Baraba ǝmfo eyifo nwǝ létaka úńyǝ lǝ aba ǝsuǝ .
43019001	Nyaso Pilato ǝtǝ bákpa Yesu bédunko nya báblɛ wǝ fefe ku katambo .
43019002	Nya bamamanyǝ bamǝ dífi biyu eto kalɛmɛ béyifo lekpakpa béti wǝ lǝ disi . Nya béfi kafia sia béti wǝ fe Oka seka .
43019003	Nya lǝ bányi bésu wǝ ɔflɔɔ bákatɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu ! Yudafɔ eto Oka o-o ! ” Nya lǝ bátɛyi wǝ nkoo , bákanyi kafi wǝ kasɔ wǝ lǝ atosi .
43019004	Pilato esi ɔ́bɔ úsu sitiditu nǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ lekple nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe , mookpa wǝ mboko mi lǝ bete biǝ mǝnnyǝ kabua saa ka úyifo bǝ lǝ nlo wǝ dikpǝnkpi . ”
43019005	Nyaso Yesu ábɔ úbǝ lekple mfó , ku biyu eto lekpakpa lǝ wǝ disi nya onkpe awusia kǝntsyɛ . Mfó Pilato átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Nyǝ utidi ǝmǝ ńyǝ mfo ! ”
43019006	Se besumunyǝ ninǝ ku mba laase Disumuyo dínyǝ wǝǝ , báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ” Pilato átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kosate kpa wǝ bisuko , lǝ bisu bɛsɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Mǝnnyǝ lebua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nǝ eso moolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi . ”
43019007	Yudafɔ bamǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bokpe kɔfi ko léte nkǝ ele bǝ ukpǝ . Itsyise ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ uyifo Onanto eto Ubi . ”
43019008	Lefe nǝ Pilato lɛnɔ nnya bátɛyi mfoo , sikpi esi símuǝ wǝ sekpe .
43019009	Usinkli údufǝ lekayo nǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Se fetsyi ? ” Fɛɛ Yesu mǝntǝ wǝ mbuayɛ saa .
43019010	Pilato átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , bɔni fani fǝ embudiko mɛ etiki ? Lee enyi fǝ nkpe ǝsuǝale moofo butǝ miǝ bayani fǝ nye basɔ fǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ? ”
43019011	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Eni embɔkɛ ǝsuǝale saa lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ lenni Onanto dítǝ fǝ nnya . Nya ǝmǝ eso nwǝ dífi mɛ ókpe fǝ lǝ kɔni díyifo lebua enso fǝ nɛ . ”
43019012	Se Pilato lɛnɔ nyamfoo , ɔ́bɛbɛ kusu nkǝ eni lǝ oyani wǝ . Fɛɛ betidi bamǝ áfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ayani wǝǝ , nyalɛ ensini Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ ! Utsyuǝ saa wǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ úyifo oka , átaka úńyǝ lǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare ǝsuǝ ! ”
43019013	Se Pilato lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , ókpa Yesu ɔ́bɔnko nya úsiǝ lǝ lekpokpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ kaka baakpo bǝ leba eto kasɔ nya baakpo bǝ Gabata lǝ Hebri eto sele ǝsuǝ .
43019014	Diyi nǝmǝ éyifo fe kakɔmi eto lefosi ǝnuǝ eti lǝ diyi nǝ eto kǝsiǝsǝ boodi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyi . Nya Pilato lɛtɛyi betidi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mi Oka ! ”
43019015	Báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lo wǝ ! Lo wǝ ! Sɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ” Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bela biǝ nsɔ mi oka ǝmǝ mmanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ? ” Mfó nya besumunyǝ ninǝ dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ benkǝ , “ Bunsibǝ oka saa enso Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare ! ”
43019016	Se bátɛyi wǝ nkoo , Pilato áyani Yesu útǝ bamamanyǝ nkǝ basɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nyaso bákpa Yesu bédunko .
43019017	Bǝtǝ wǝ kosate étsyi wǝ uyi ǝmǝ úsu údufu kaka baakpo Ditidisi Ku Kalua . Baakpo mfó lǝ Hebri eto sele bǝ Golgata .
43019018	Mfó básɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Básɔ betidi inuǝ bamba tsya lǝ mǝ keyikabie bamba ǝsuǝ bakɔ ku wǝ , ɔni lǝ Yesu eto kǝmǝni nya unuǝfǝ lǝ wǝ kodiani .
43019019	Pilato áwɔni etiki ǝtsyuǝ útǝ béfi básɔ lǝ uyi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Yesu eto disi kato . Nnya báwɔni ni bǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ , Yudafɔ Eto Oka Ǝmǝ . ”
43019020	Yudafɔ kpǝ ákla etiki nyamfo , itsyise kaka básɔ Yesu bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie mantsyo ku umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ . Báwɔni asa nyamǝ lǝ Hebri ku Roma ku Griki eto bele ǝsuǝ .
43019021	Besumunyǝ ninǝ áni etiki nyamfo nya bátɛyi Pilato bǝnkǝ , “ Manwɔ ni fǝnkǝ , ‘ Yudafɔ eto Oka , ’ bomu wɔni fǝnkǝ , ‘ Utidi ǝmfo átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka . ” ’ ”
43019022	Mfó Pilato dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ míwɔnii , mbɔwɔni nlosǝ . ”
43019023	Se bamamanyǝ bamǝ lɛsɔ Yesu lǝ uyikabie bálosǝǝ , béfi wǝ awu nnya ókpe nya bésie nnya lǝ akpa ana . Nya utsyuǝ saa dífi lekpa lɔni . Fɛɛ wǝ awu ani ébu . Awu nyamfoo , bánka nnya kukalebe saa , bomu budi bédi nnya idu lǝ simuǝ isu ekpo lǝ akpa eti .
43019024	Bamamanyǝ bamǝ átɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boembusie awu nyamfo bǝtsyuǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ bokpo asa bɔsɛ lǝ bobe futsyǝ luudi lǝ bufi nnya butǝ wǝ . ” Nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ nko bǝ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti bǝ , “ Bésie mɔ awu bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya bákpo asa basɛɛ lǝ mɔ awu ǝsuǝ . ” Nya lǝ sitinti tsyaa , nko bamamanyǝ bamǝ díyifo nɛ .
43019025	Nya mba díńyǝ lǝ Yesu eto uyikabie komǝ ɔflɔ ni Yesu eto ambe ku wǝ ambe eto ɔyimisio ku Maria wǝ ni Klopa eto usiǝ , ku Maria Magdalenyǝ .
43019026	Se Yesu dínyǝ wǝ ambe ku wǝ okasebi wǝ eto asa waala tinti ńyǝ mfóo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ambe nkǝ , “ Mbe , nnyǝ fǝ ubi ! ”
43019027	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi okasebi ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ fǝ ambe . ” Nyaso idu lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , okasebi ǝmǝ ákpa wǝ úsuko wǝ diyo nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ ola .
43019028	Yesu áte nkǝ mɔmɔɔ , wóolosǝ lesa saa nǝ ele bǝ uyifo . Nya , bǝ lǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko esoo , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Utukɔɛ lɛ mɛ . ”
43019029	Lǝ mfóo , ɔlɔtsyi utsyuǝ ǝtsyǝ mfó wǝ béyisǝ ku nte bo dínyǝnki . Nyaso béfi sekuayɛbo bákpe lǝ nte bomǝ ǝsuǝ nya béfi bákle lǝ uyi utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo hisopo ǝsuǝ bábesǝ kato bǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ .
43019030	Se Yesu dínǝ nte bomǝ ólosǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , yóolo ! ” Nya óbokosǝ wǝ disi kasɔ , nya ɔ́ma kɛnyɛ .
43019031	Diyi nǝmfo eyifo Fida , nya ni kǝsiǝsǝ eyifo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi kplɛ itǝ Yudafɔ , nyaso bánla bǝ bekpǝnkpǝ kɛ bafaka lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ eyo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi mfó . Nyaso bátɔ Pilato bǝ utǝ mǝ kusu lǝ besu bǝfǝsǝ mǝ akpa lǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ betsyiko lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
43019032	Itǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ bǝfǝsǝ utidi tutɛ ku nwǝ nse eto akpa . Mǝ básɔ báfakasǝ lǝ keyikabie ǝsuǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ .
43019033	Fɛɛ se báyo Yesu ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ bǝ wǝ ébukpǝ koko . Nyaso bénsifǝsǝ wǝ akpa .
43019034	Bomu omamanyǝ ɔni éfi wǝ lefle óto wǝ lǝ lekpake . Lamfolamfo kɔtɔ ku ntu ko lɛbɔ .
43019035	Nwǝ dínyǝ asa nyamfo , wǝ dídi nnya adansiɛ bǝ lǝ mi tsya lǝ befo bɛnɔ . Nya nnya ɔ́tɛyi eyifo sitinti . Nya uyi wuee nkǝ sitinti ini ɔ́tɛyi .
43019036	Béyifo nyamfo bǝ lǝ nnya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ fe kase báwɔni bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛ wǝ dikubi lɔni kulaa tsyaa , bembufǝsǝ ni . ”
43019037	Nya báwɔni asa bamba bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi ebotakasǝ ǝnǝmi babe nwǝ eto lekpake báse lefle bédunsǝ . ”
43019038	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yosef wǝ ditsyi umǝ wǝ baakpo Arimatia , ǝbǝ ɔ́tɔ Pilato nkǝ lǝ oyani Yesu eto ɔkɔ utǝ wǝ . Yosef ǝmfo eyifo Yesu eto okasebi utsyuǝ . Fɛɛ wóanla nkǝ betidi te , itsyise úkate Yudafɔ eto beninǝ sikpi eso . Pilato átɔnɔ útǝ wǝ . Nyaso Yosef ǝbǝ ófo ɔkɔ ǝmǝ údunko .
43019039	Nikodemo wǝ lɛbiɔ úsu Yesu ɔflɔ ketsye kani tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yosef ǝmfo . Útsyi afa nnya beefi kalɔ ɔkɔ itǝ busu kebikǝ , fe uyudu ku afa nnya laanyi fifiifi baakpo bǝ alɔɛ , nya nyamblɛ eto kalende eboyo kilo awosi ǝtsyǝ , úsuko .
43019040	Betidi inuǝ bamfo éfi afa nyamfo bédiki Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya béfi kafia flubia ka lefo koya bémli wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase Yudafɔ díkalɔ ɔkɔ itǝ bubikǝ .
43019041	Nya ɔkɔɛ kɛkɛ utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ kaka bálo Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya lǝ mfóo , béku kudi fɔfɔ ko kafo bembikǝtɔ kuutsyuǝ bǝnyǝ .
43019042	Se diyi nǝmfo eto kǝsiǝsǝ luudi Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nya kudi komǝ tsya lɛfi mfó esoo , béfi Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bésu bébikǝ mfó .
43020001	Kɔsida eto kolensiǝnto se kale dímǝnsiǝ tɔ kaloo , Maria Magdalene ésu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ nya únyǝ nkǝ báminansǝ leba nǝ díti lǝ kudi komǝ kɛnyɛ mfó .
43020002	Nyaso útsyetsyi úsu Simon Petro ku okasebi wǝ Yesu laala ɔflɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝtsyǝ ǝbǝ bétsyi Bonamute bédunko lǝ kudi komǝ kafo . Nya bunyi kaka bétsyi wǝ bésu bǝtsyǝ ! ”
43020003	Mfó nya Petro ku okasebi ɔni ǝmǝ dídu bǝ beesu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ .
43020004	Mǝ inuǝ bamǝ étsyetsyi batɔ , fɛɛ okasebi ǝmǝ áfe Petro nya oka wǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ mfó budufǝ .
43020005	Úbǝ kasɔ útsyue ǝnǝmi óbe kudi komǝ kafo . Únyǝ mfia flubia bomǝ , fɛɛ wéndufǝ ko kafo .
43020006	Simon Petro wǝ dítǝkǝ kama ubǝǝ , áyɛ údufǝ kudi komǝ kafo nya únyǝ se mfia flubia bomǝ nkpo lǝ kudi kafo lǝ kasɔ mfó .
43020007	Fɛɛ béfi kafia ka béfi bákle Yesu disi bǝtsyǝ lete , ke mánkɔ ku mfia flubia fɛfɛ bomǝ . Bǝkǝnǝ ke bǝtsyǝ lete .
43020008	Mfó nya okasebi wǝ leka kudi komǝ ɔflɔ búdufǝ tsya dídufǝ ko kafo . Únyǝ asa nyamǝ , nya ófo ɔ́nɔ .
43020009	Tsya , fɛɛ bánnɔ tɔ kasɔ nnya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi nkǝ ele bǝ Yesu taka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nkpǝ .
43020010	Nyamfo eto kama nya bakasebi bamǝ dísinkli bésu oto .
43020011	Fɛɛ Maria ǝbǝ únyǝ lǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ kewi keku . Nya lefe nǝ úńyǝ mfó ɔnlɛ keku buwii , usi úbǝ kasɔ óbe kudi komǝ kafo .
43020012	Mfó únyǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe inuǝ ba nlɛ mfia flubia bensi lǝ kafo mfó . Ɔni si lǝ kaka Yesu eto disi dítsyǝ nya unuǝfǝ nsi lǝ wǝ akpa eti .
43020013	Bátɔ wǝ bǝ , “ Boambe , beso fanlɛ keku buwi ? ” Mfó nya Maria tsya dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bǝtsyǝ ǝbǝ bétsyi mɔ Onamute bedunko , nya mante kaka bétsyi wǝ besuko ! ”
43020014	Lamfolamfo se ɔ́tsyi ɔwuninsǝǝ , únyǝ se Yesu nyǝ mfó . Fɛɛ woante nkǝ Yesu uni .
43020015	Mfó Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Boambe , beso fanlɛ keku buwi ? Owoe fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ? ” Fɛɛ úbu nkǝ , nwǝ laabe mfó uni , nyaso ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , lǝ fǝ uni dítsyi wǝ fédunko , nyalɛ tɛyi mɛ kaka fétsyi wǝ fésuko lǝ nsu ntsyi wǝ ndunko . ”
43020016	Nya Yesu lékpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Maria ! ” Ɔ́tsyi ɔwuninsǝ útǝ ǝnǝmi Yesu nya ókpadi wǝ lǝ Hebri eto sele ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Rabuni ! ” Eto kasɔ ni Oteasa .
43020017	Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sinkli ayɛ mɛ butidi etɔ , itsyise ménsinkli tɔ nsu Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ kato . Bomu du esu atɛyi mɔ bayimi fǝ nsinkli ntɔ lǝ nwǝ ni mɔ Anto ku mǝ Anto , mɔ Onanto ku mǝ Onanto ɔflɔ . ”
43020018	Nyasoo , Maria Magdalenyǝ ésu ɔ́tɛyi bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ únyǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ asa nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ .
43020019	Kɔsida komǝ eto ditsyitsyo lefee , bakasebi bamǝ ákɔ besi lǝ diyo nya béti mǝ ǝsuǝ bákpe kekleke , se banlɛ Yudafɔ eto beninǝ sikpi bote eso . Nya Yesu díbǝ unyǝ lǝ mǝ ntinti , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . ”
43020020	Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , úfi wǝ ani ku lekpake óte mǝ . Ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ bakasebi bamǝ se bǝńyǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ eso .
43020021	Nnya kamaa , Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ létsyese mɛɛ , nko ke mintsya nlɛ mi botsyese nɛ . ”
43020022	Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , ɔ́wula ókpo lǝ mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ .
43020023	Lǝ bifi betidi eto abua bɛtsyɛ mǝǝ , Onanto éfi nnya ɔ́tsyɛ mǝ , fɛɛ mba eto abua bɛni bufi katsyɛɛ , Onanto tsya mémfi nnya ɔtsyɛ mǝ . ”
43020024	Lefe nǝ Yesu díbǝǝ , Toma , lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ bensi baakpo Ɔfimfinyǝǝ , mankɛ mǝ lenti .
43020025	Nyaso se úbǝǝ , bakasebi fɛfɛ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Búnyǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ . ” Mfó nya Toma lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mǝnnyǝ belakabi eto afabe lǝ wǝ ani bǝ lǝ mfi mɔ lɛnimi inkpe lǝ nnya kafo nya mimfi mɔ kɔni minkpe lǝ wǝ lekpakee , mǝmbofo nnɔ kulefe . ”
43020026	Kɔsida kɔni eto kamaa , bakasebi bamǝ esi bákɔ bési lǝ diyo kafo , nya Toma ákɛ mǝ lenti . Besi béti biku le diyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bakɛ . Tsya fɛɛ , Yesu ǝbǝ úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ntinti nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . ”
43020027	Nya ɔ́tɛyi Toma nkǝ , “ Bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ efi fǝ lɛnimi akpe mfo , lǝ abe mɔ ani . Lǝ efi fǝ kɔni akpe lǝ mɔ lekpake , lǝ ayɛ fǝ mamfokanɔ , nya lǝ afo anɔ ! ”
43020028	Tomasi ǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute ku mɔ Onanto ! ”
43020029	Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Se fǝnyǝ mɛ esoo , áfo ánɔ . Diyuǝ itǝ mba dímǝnyǝ mɛ , fɛɛ báfo bánɔ ! ”
43020030	Yesu esi úyifo ayanisa kpǝ óte lǝ wǝ bakasebi kpǝ eto ǝnǝmi nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ kukue komfo .
43020031	Fɛɛ báwɔni nyamfo bǝtsyǝ bǝ lǝ befo bɛnɔ biǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ku Onanto eto Ubi kosate ǝmǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ boofo kanɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , biunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
43021001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu esi úlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ bakasebi lǝ Tiberia eto Ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ . Nya nyǝ kase íbǝ .
43021002	Diyi lɔnii , Yesu eto bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ átsya besi . Mǝ ni Simon Petro ku Tomasi nwǝ tsya bensi baakpo Ɔfimfinyǝ ku Nataniel nwǝ ditsyi Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ ku Sebedeo eto bebi ku Yesu eto bakasebi bamba .
43021003	Mfó nya Simon Petro lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Meesu nta asabu lǝ mbǝ . ” Mfó nya mǝ tsya lɛtɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bontsya ebutǝkǝko fǝ busu . ” Nyaso bésu bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝsuǝ nya bédu bésu . Fɛɛ lǝ ketsye ka kenkee , bǝnlǝkǝ akpɛ saa .
43021004	Nya lefe nǝ kofe lela koǝ koatoo , Yesu ǝbǝ úńyǝ lǝ ditimbu nǝmǝ kɛnyɛ . Fɛɛ bakasebi bamǝ mǝnnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo .
43021005	Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bakosobi , bíǝnlǝkǝ akpɛ saa lee ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! ”
43021006	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beta mi asabu nyamǝ bekpo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto kodiani , lǝ binyǝ lesaatsyuǝ bilǝkǝ . ” Nyaso béyifo nko . Binǝ bia bǝlǝkǝ efui bǝǝ , bamfo asabu nyamǝ bunǝ kǝlǝkǝ .
43021007	Okasebi wǝ eto asa Yesu laala átɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Bonamute uni ! ” Se Simon Petro lɛnɔ nkǝ Bonamute unii , úfi wǝ awukɛntsyɛ ótsyasǝ lǝ nkɛ , itsyese úlǝkǝ nnya utsyǝ , nya ósa údufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ tuu .
43021008	Fɛɛ bakasebi fɛfɛ bamǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ balɛ bubǝ , balɛ asabu nnya díyi ku akpɛ bunǝ . Bántsyonko utuflɔ , yuutsyǝ fe akpalǝkǝlǝkǝ kolofa .
43021009	Se bábɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo bǝńyǝ kasɔɔ , bǝnyǝ se bátsyaka aka eto ute wǝ ǝsuǝ bákpe akpɛ ǝtsyuǝ . Abolo utsyuǝ tsya ǝtsyǝ mfó .
43021010	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi akpɛ ǝtsyuǝ nnya bílǝkǝ mɔmɔ beboko . ”
43021011	Mfó nya Simon Petro dísu údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ nya únǝ asabu nnya díyi ku akpɛ nnya lɛmɔ óboko ketu kɛnyɛ . Akpɛ nyamǝ eto etu ni kolofa awosi anɔ ǝtsyǝ . Ite bǝ akpɛ nyamǝ efui nko tsyaa , asabu nyamǝ mánla .
43021012	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bidi lesa . ” Fɛɛ bakasebi bamǝ eto kuutsyuǝ mámfo ɔkɔɛ bokpe katɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe feni ? ” Itsyise báte bǝ Bonamute uni .
43021013	Nyaso Yesu ésu mǝ ɔflɔ nya úfi abolo ǝmǝ útǝ mǝ . Nko ke úfi akpɛ nyamǝ tsya útǝ mǝ nɛ .
43021014	Nyamfo ni ditsyǝfǝ se Yesu dílǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ bakasebi se bátakasǝ wǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nɛ .
43021015	Se bédi lesa bálosǝ , Yesu átɔ Simon Petro nkǝ , “ Simon , Yohanes eto ubi , aala mɛ aso kase bafɛfɛ bamfo laala mɛ ? ” Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , Bonamute ! Fǝ kosate yi fǝnkǝ maala fǝ . ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lɛ mɔ basamubi ola . ”
43021016	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ dinuǝfǝ nkǝ , “ Simon , Yohanes eto ubi , aala mɛ ? ” Petro esi útǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , Bonamute ! Fǝ kosate yi fǝnkǝ maala fǝ . ” Mfó Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lɛ mɔ basamu ola ! ”
43021017	Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ ditsyǝfǝ nkǝ , “ Simon , Yohanes eto ubi , aala mɛ ? ” Bɔtɔ bomfo ǝlǝ Petro , itsyise ditsyǝfǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ni nǝmfo nɛ se Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Aala mɛ ? ” Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , eyi lesa saa . Nya fǝ kosate nyi fǝnkǝ maala fǝ ! ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lɛ mɔ basamu ola .
43021018	Sitinti minlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lefe nǝ fedi okosobii , ákafo kafia buti fǝ kosate kesu kaka ke fála . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ fákabee , ebobesɛ fǝ ani kato nya utidi bamba luubǝ okle fǝ kafia fɛ wookpa fǝ usuko kaka fanla fǝ eesu . ”
43021019	Yesu átɛyi nyamfo nko lǝ ufi ulǝkǝ ukpǝ wǝ eto okle Petro lǝǝbǝ bukpǝ wǝ luulǝkǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ote . Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . ”
43021020	Se Petro lɛtsyi ɔwuninsǝǝ , únyǝ se okasebi wǝ Yesu laala ńyǝ wǝ kama . Wǝ ni okasebi wǝ dísiǝ ɔkpiɔ Yesu , lǝ lefe nǝ békedi ditsyitsyosa fɛfɛ fɛ ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe luudu fǝ utǝ ? ”
43021021	Nyaso se Petro dínyǝ wǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ntsyǝ ini lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
43021022	Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nla miǝ usiǝ nkpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ muusinkli mbǝ bioo , be eka fǝ ela ? Fǝǝ , tǝkǝko mɛ ! ”
43021023	Etiki nyamfo ába ékpo lǝ mba ntǝkǝko Yesu kama nti bǝ okasebi ǝmfo ǝmbǝ bukpǝ . Fɛɛ Yesu mántɛyi wǝ nkǝ wǝǝmbukpǝ . Nnya ɔtɛyi ni nkǝ , “ Lǝ nla miǝ usiǝ nkpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ muubǝǝ , be eka fǝ ela ? ”
43021024	Wǝ ni okasebi wǝ nlɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ , nya wǝ tsya ni nwǝ lɛwɔni nnya utsyǝ nɛ . Nya buyi boǝ nnya ǝsuǝ údi adansiɛɛ , eyifo sitinti .
43021025	Yesu esi úyifo asa bamba kpǝ tsya . Lǝ nnya ete báwɔni nyamblɛ bǝtsyǝ lɔni lɔni lɔnii , mfo nnɔ miǝ eni bembunyǝ ekue nyamǝ eto kǝtsyǝkɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kenke kulaa tsya .
44001001	Mɔyimisani Tiofilo , lǝ mɔ kukue tutɛ ko míwɔnii , ntɛyi asa nnya kenke Yesu díyifo idu lǝ lefe nǝ útsyǝ wǝ keyifo ku asatete kasɔ isu ese lefe nǝ Anto Onanto díbǝ ókpa wǝ úsuko kato . Fɛ wookpa wǝ usuko katoo , Yesu áyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ óte asa wǝ batɔnkpe ba úlǝkǝ asa .
44001002	
44001003	Lǝ eyi fosi ana se úkpǝ ótaka kǝmiǝ , úlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte lǝ esu kpǝ nnya lete sitinti bǝ okpe nkpǝ . Mba dínyǝ wǝǝ , údi mǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ .
44001004	Se bǝbǝ bátsya bensii , ókpe mǝ kɔfi nkǝ , “ Biendu lǝ Yerusalem , bomu bisiǝ bikabe kusu itǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ míntɛyi mi mintɔnsǝ miǝ mɔ Anto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ wootsyese mi .
44001005	Yohanes alɛɛ , ntu te úfi úyifo betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ eyi asiani eto kamaa , Onanto ebufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ uflǝsǝ mi . ”
44001006	Lefe nǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ ku Yesu létsya bioo , bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , dimamfe foola fǝ atakasǝ Israel eto Sekadidi siamǝ ǝńyǝnsǝ bio , mɔmɔ lee ? ”
44001007	Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ bete lefe nye eyi nnya mɔ Anto lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ lesatsyuǝ ebubǝ itǝ .
44001008	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayo bǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ bǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , wuubǝ udufǝ mimblɛ kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ nya wuufi wǝ ǝsuǝale okpe mi nya biudi mɔ badansiɛ lǝ Yerusalem ku Yudea kenke ku Samaria idu isu ese kawunsiǝ eto nsekɔ ke . ”
44001009	Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato nya bǝńyǝ banlɛ wǝ bobe isu ese lefe nǝ údufǝ lǝ difule ǝsuǝ ónya lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
44001010	Nya se bǝńyǝ banlɛ kato bobe tũũ lǝ kase údu ɔ́ntɔɔ , lamfolamfo basani inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba nkpe awu flubia ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte mǝ ,
44001011	nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Galilea eto basani , beso bińyǝ bɛnlɛ kato bobe mǝ ? Yesu ǝmfo , wǝ bínyǝ Onanto dítsyi úsuko katoo , ebusinkli ubǝ fe kase bínyǝ ɔnlɛ budu kesu kato mmǝ . ”
44001012	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , batɔnkpe bamǝ ésinkli betsyi kɔtini ko baakpo Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ mfó bésu Yerusalem . Idu mfó ibǝ umǝ nti ebutsyǝ fe disunkpo eto ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kani eto kusu .
44001013	Se bédufǝ umǝǝ , bésinkli bésu kaka bakɛ lǝ abanslo kato . Mǝ mba lɛkɛ mfó ni Petro , Yohanes , Yakobo , Andreas , Filipo , Tomas , Bartolomeo , Mateo , Yakobo wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubisaibi , Simon wǝǝ léta mǝ kasɔ eto disi ku Yuda wǝ ni Yakobo eto ubisaibi .
44001014	Betidi bamfo ákatsya mlǝmlǝmlǝ ku besio bǝtsyuǝ ku Maria , Yesu eto ambe ku Yesu eto bayimisani fe ditsyukpa ákato ola ku nsusu bɔni .
44001015	Lǝ eyi nyamfó ǝsuǝ , bafokanɔfɔ ba eto leklabi lídi fe kolofa awosi ǝnuǝ ákatsya kato ola .
44001016	Mfó nya Petro létaka úńyǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , asa nnya báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , lǝ kase Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ɛyɛ lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ , lɛtɛyi utsyǝ itsyi lǝ Yuda wǝ lɛtɔnko betidi bǝmuǝ Yesuu , ǝbǝ itǝ .
44001017	Yuda éyifo mba lɛkɛ lǝ bo ditsyukpa nǝmfo eto ɔni , itsyise Yesu ǝlǝkǝ wǝ nkǝ wuntsya nyǝ kedikɔ lǝ bo keyifo kamfo kǝmiǝ . ”
44001018	Nyaa , béfi kabua ka úyifo eto atabi bésu báya kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ úsu úkpǝ . Kaka ófankli úbǝ ɔ́sɔ kasɔɔ , óba úsensǝ nya wǝ befonkǝ kenke lɛbɔ békpo lǝ kasɔ mfó .
44001019	Wǝ ukpǝ ǝmfo eto etiki ába ékpo lǝ Yerusalem itǝ betidi bata ánɔ nnya . Nyaso béfi kaka úkpǝ mfó bǝtǝkǝ bǝ Akeldama lǝ mǝ sele ǝsuǝ eto kasɔ ni bǝ Kɔtɔ eto Kasɔ .
44001020	Petro ésukosǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso báwɔni bákpe lǝ David eto Ǝsǝ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Beyani wǝ diyo bitsyǝ nya kutsyuǝ saa mǝnsiǝ lǝ ni ! ’ Besi báwɔni bǝ , ‘ Bitǝ lǝ utidi bamba lǝ usiǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo eto kɛnyɛ . ’
44001021	Nyaso ele bǝ utsyuǝ dufǝ bo nti fe futsyǝ luudi adansiɛ itǝ Bonamute Yesu itsyi lǝ wǝ botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ele bǝ uyifo futsyǝ lɛkɛ lǝbo nti idu lǝ lefe nǝ kenke bo ku Yesu díkatsyilama , idu lefe nǝ Yohanes lébe letsya itsyi lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ǝsuǝ ibǝ ese lefe nǝ Onanto léfo Yesu úsuko kato . ”
44001022	
44001023	Nyaso bǝlǝkǝ betidi inuǝ ba ni Matias ku Yosef wǝ baakpo Barsaba nya bensi baakpo wǝ tsya bǝ Yusto .
44001024	Nya báto ola bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , fǝ nyi utidi saa eto nsusu kǝmiǝ . Nyaso té bo ɔni lǝ betidi inuǝ bamfo eto nti , wǝ luusiǝ fe ɔtɔnkpe lǝ Yuda eto kɛnyɛ wǝ léyani údu úsu kaka dińyǝ itǝ wǝ . ”
44001025	
44001026	Nya lefe nǝ bákpo aba básɛ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ betidi inuǝ bamfo eto ɔnii , Matias ni nwǝ bǝlǝkǝ bákpe lǝ betidi lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
44002001	Nyaso se Pentekoste eto Diyi léyoo , bafokanɔfɔ kenke átsya lǝ kalebe kani kplo .
44002002	Lamfolamfoo , bánɔ kɔsɔ fe ufiebi kekleke eto bɔsɔ ditsyi kato . Nya ufiebi ǝmǝ díyi diyo nǝ kafo bakɛ kenke .
44002003	Nya lesatsyuǝ fe ute eto odiakami díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ mǝ utsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ .
44002004	Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dídufǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ ǝsuǝ , nya bétsyiko Onanto bɔtɛsǝ lǝ bele ate ate ǝsuǝ fe kase Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ dítǝ mǝ nkǝ bedi .
44002005	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó tututuu , Yudafɔ ba lǝǝtǝ Onanto dibu ba dítsyi kawunsiǝ eto ese ese ǝbǝ bakɛ lǝ Yerusalem .
44002006	Nyaso lefe nǝ bánɔ kudu kplɛ komfóo , betidi kpǝ ésu bátsya mfó . Iyifo mǝ yanii ku sikpi se mǝ utsyuǝ saa lɛnɔ banlɛ etiki budi lǝ wǝ sele ǝsuǝ .
44002007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , íyifo mǝ yanii ku sikpi nya bétsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya betidi ba kenke nlɛ etiki budi mfoo , inni Galileafɔ beni fɛ ?
44002008	Nya ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ bo utsyuǝ saa nlɛ etiki bɔnɔ lǝ bo bele ǝsuǝ ?
44002009	Bo mba ni Partiafɔ ku Mediafɔ ku Elamfɔ , ku mba dítsyi Mesopotamia ku Yudea ku Kapadokia ku Ponto ku Asia ku Frigia ku Pamfilia ku Egipte ku Libia eto lekpake nǝ lɛfi Kirene ku bafɔ bamba ba dítsyi Roma ku Yudafɔ ku betidi ba díkedufǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ditsyukpa ǝsuǝ
44002010	
44002011	ku Kretafɔ ku Arabiafɔ . Bomblɛ lɛ bɔnɔ se banlɛ Onanto eto asa kplɛ nnya ɔnlɛ buyifo bulǝkǝ kate lǝ bo bele ǝsuǝ ! ”
44002012	Kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ díńyǝ mfó mánnɔ eyifosa nyamǝ kasɔ . Íyifo mǝ yanii , nya bákatɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nnya díbǝ mfo eto kasɔ nkpǝ ? ”
44002013	Fɛɛ mba díńyǝ mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ ǝkǝmǝ mǝ ákatɛyi bǝ , “ Ntǝ ete békpǝ , inni kulesa ini kon ! ”
44002014	Mfó nya Petro létaka úńyǝ ku lefosi ɔnwɛ fɛfɛ bamǝ nya óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mi Yudafɔ ku mimba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem , nla miǝ bitsyue ato lǝ nkpasǝ mi lǝ bɛnɔ lesa nǝ díbǝ mfo .
44002015	Inni nte betidi bamfo díkpǝ fe kase bǝtsyuǝ díbu seka , itsyise olesiǝ eto abombo ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ete ni nyamfo nɛ .
44002016	Bomu lesa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ mfoo , eyifo lesa nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yoel lɛtɛyi utsyǝ kokooko nkǝ ,
44002017	‘ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ eyi fɛfɛ nnya luubǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muufi mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ nkpo lǝ utsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ , nya mi bebisaibi ku bebisiobi loobe mɔ ditiki letsya , nya mi bakosobi luunyǝ Onanto eto asakulakula , nya mi beninǝ tsya luusiǝ ala .
44002018	Ee , sitinti lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , muutǝ mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ yifǝ disiǝ lǝ mɔ beyifoyifo , besio ku basani kenke ǝsuǝ . Nya boolǝkǝ mɔ ditiki kɛnyɛ bate .
44002019	Nya muutǝ asa kplɛ kplɛ ku anyinsa bǝ lǝ difule ku kasɔ kenke utsyuǝ saa nyǝ . Biunyǝ kɔtɔ ku ute ku kuyuǝ kplɛ bɔ .
44002020	Kofe ebona tũũ , nya kofande eto ǝnǝmi lɔɔsɛ hǝǝ fe kɔtɔ , fɛ Bonamute eto diyǝnde eto diyi kplɛ nǝmǝ looyo .
44002021	Lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , boofo utsyuǝ saa ke lookpadi Bonamute eto diye , nya wɔɔtɔ bɔwunsǝkoo , wɔɔkɛ bofo . ” ’ ”
44002022	Petro esi údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Israelfɔ bɛnɔ etiki nyamfo . Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Nya óte nyamfo lefe nǝ ɔ́yɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale óte , nya úyifo asa kplɛ ku ayanisa kpǝ óte fe kase mi kosate nyi . Itsyisee , íbǝ lǝ mi nti mfo .
44002023	Nya Onanto lɛtɔnɔ faa lǝ wǝ ketsyue ǝsuǝ óyani wǝ útǝ mi nya bítǝ babuayifo lélo wǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bɛsɔ wǝ bémanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
44002024	Tsyaa , Onanto esi ótakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nya ɔ́bɔ útsyi lǝ ukpǝ eto ani , itsyise ukpǝ embofo wǝ buti kakpe .
44002025	Nyamfo Oka David lɛtɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ se Bonamute ńyǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani nya unsiko mɛ lefe saa esoo , mante kulesa sikpi .
44002026	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , disuǝyuǝ eyi mɛ ǝsuǝ , nyaso muufi atɛsǝ ntǝ wǝ lefe saa ! Ite bǝ utidi wǝ luukpǝ mini tsyaa , muusiǝ nkpǝ nkabe wǝ kusu .
44002027	Itsyise ǝmbutǝ kusu ukpǝ tǝkǝ mɛ kato . Nya fǝmbutǝ tsya bǝ fǝ ubi kɛnkɛ eto sinǝ bu .
44002028	Fǝ dítǝ mínte nkpǝ eto kusu itǝ lǝ nńyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi koo , muunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lefe saa . ’
44002029	“ Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , bo ona Oka David wǝ lefo diye ǝkpǝ nya bébikǝ wǝ nya wǝ kudi nkpe lǝ bo nti mfo eyo mmi .
44002030	Fɛɛ uyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi . Nyaso óte lesa nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ wootsyese David eto kafo eto ubi lǝ ubǝ udi seka lǝ David eto kɛnyɛ .
44002031	Se David léte nyamfo ɔtɔnsǝ esoo , ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ Kristo ebotaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ Onanto mányani wǝ utsyǝ lǝ ɔkɔmǝ , nya wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ tsya mémbu lǝ wǝ kudi kafo mfó .
44002032	Wǝ ni Yesu ǝmǝ Onanto létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nya ini etiki eto ɔnukualɛɛ , bomblɛ ni wǝ badansiɛ .
44002033	Wǝ Anto Onanto ábesǝ wǝ kato úsu unsi lǝ wǝ kodiani , nya ófo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ utsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ . Lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ , kanɔ mfoo , eyifo wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya úfi útǝ bo .
44002034	Ite bǝ inni David kosate létaka úsu kato mfó tsyaa , ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute Onanto ǝmǝ átɛyi mɔ Onamute ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Siǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani isu ese lefe nǝ moobokosǝ fǝ balo kasɔ ǝtǝkǝ mǝ akpa lǝ disinti . ” ’
44002035	
44002036	Nyaso nla miǝ mi Israelfɔ kenke te biǝnkǝ wǝ Anto Onanto ni futsyǝ dítǝ Yesu wǝ básɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bélo Onanto dítǝ ófiani Bonamute ku Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ . ”
44002037	Nya se betidi bamfo lɛnɔ Petro eto etiki nyamfoo , ílǝ mǝ lǝ akɔɛsi . Nyaso bátɔ Petro ku batɔnkpe fɛfɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bayimi , be ele bǝ buyifo ? ”
44002038	Nyaso Petro átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ mi utsyuǝ saa sinkli ɔyɛ abua buyifo , lǝ ofloma , lǝ ofo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ lǝ Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ , lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi wǝ abua ɔtsyɛ wǝ , lǝ ofo Onanto eto ǝtǝsa nnya ni Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ .
44002039	Nkomǝ eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ te itǝ mi ku mi bebi ku mba kenke ditsyi katsyontsyokɔ ku betidi ba kenke Bonamute bo Anto lookpadi bafiani wǝ bale . ”
44002040	Nnya kamaa , Petro édi adansiɛ údi mǝ etiki kpǝ nya ɔ́lɛ mǝ kɔlɛ , ɔ́lɛ mǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ kotonǝnǝ ko nlɛ bubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ bua kamfo eto betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
44002041	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , betidi kpǝ ba lɛnɔ Petro eto ditiki nǝmǝ áfo banɔ , nya bǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu , nya mǝ utú ébutsyǝ fe betidi akpi ǝtsyǝ . Mǝ dísu bákɔ diyi nǝmfo lǝ bafokanɔfɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
44002042	Béfi mǝ lefe bǝtǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ nya báte mǝ asa , nya bákato ola kǝtǝ Onanto , nya békedi lesa kakɔ tsya , nya bǝsiǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
44002043	Se batɔnkpe bamǝ díyifo ayanisa kpǝ esoo , íyifo betidi bamǝ yanii .
44002044	Nyaso bafokanɔfɔ lǝ mfo ákatsya lefe saa nya békesie mǝ asa kenke kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
44002045	Nya lǝ báte mǝ bikǝǝ , békefi atabi nnya bǝnyǝ késuko békesie , utsyuǝ saa lǝ kase éhiã wǝ ǝsuǝ .
