44002046	Nya békesu kátsya lǝ Anto Onanto eto Disumuyo diyi saa , nya bákatsya lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa kédi asa lǝ mǝ ayo ku disuǝyuǝ ku utu faa .
44002047	Nya bákatɛsǝ Onanto . Itǝ betidi ba tã ékebu mǝ . Nya diyi saa , Bonamute kǝtǝ betidi fɔfɔ ba bofo lǝ nkpǝ díkǝbǝ kákɔ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
44003001	Diyi lɔnii , Petro ku Yohanes ésu Onanto eto Disumuyo lǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ laato ola kǝtǝ Onanto . Iyifo fe kakɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ lefe .
44003002	Se báyo Disumuyo nǝmǝ eto kesie ka baakpo Kesie Ka Laanɔ Bobee . Mfó bǝnyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ léba onkpo lǝ kasɔ taa wǝ lelefe ke . Wǝ betidi éketsyi wǝ kǝbǝkǝtsyǝ mfo diyi saa bǝ lǝ úkatɔ asa lǝ betidi ba laayɛ kedufǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ .
44003003	Se únyǝ Petro ku Yohanes nlɛ bofe kédufǝ diyo nǝmǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ bǝtǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ .
44003004	Bále bǝńyǝ nya bábe wǝ tũũ , nya Petro lɛ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Be bo mfo ! ”
44003005	Nya utidi ǝmǝ létakasǝ ǝnǝmi útǝkǝ lǝ mǝ , ku nsusu nkǝ bǝǝbǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ butǝ .
44003006	Mfó nya Petro dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , atabi saa ente mɛ muutǝ fǝ ! Nyaso muutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ nte mɛ . Nlɛ fɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ Yesu Kristo Nasaretnyǝ eto diye ǝsuǝ minkǝ taka ǝńyǝ lǝ ayɛ edu ! ”
44003007	Nya Petro lɛkɔbe utidi ǝmfo eto kodiani nya útǝ nkǝ otaka uńyǝ . Nya lamfolamfoo , wǝ akpa ku bɛkplɔbɛ eto ekubi dímuǝ ale !
44003008	Nya óbe ósa úńyǝ lǝ wǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Mfó útsyiko bɔyɛ kesu kesinkli . Nya útǝkǝko mǝ údufǝ Disumuyo mfó , kayɛ kabé kasa katɛsǝ Onanto .
44003009	Betidi ba kenke lɛkɛ mfó , ǝnyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ bɔyɛ nya ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ .
44003010	Se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bǝtsyǝ lekpo bǝ wǝ ni futsyǝ díkǝsiǝ lǝ Kesie Ka Laanɔ Bobe kátɔ asa mfó . Nyaso íyifo mǝ yanii ku sikpi lǝ lesa nǝ béyifo bǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
44003011	Se osani ǝmǝ dímuǝ Petro ku Yohanes ɔnlɛ kekle lǝ lekpake nǝ baakpo Oka Solomo eto Lekpata nǝ nkpe lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo mfóo , betidi kpǝ étsyetsyi bésu mǝ ɔflɔ . Wǝ botsya éyifo mǝ yanii sekasitsyuǝ .
44003012	Nya se Petro dínyǝ betidi bamǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Israelfɔ , bǝ díyifo mi yanii lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ ? Nya beso bɛnlɛ bo bobe fe bo kosate eto ǝsuǝale ku Boanto eto sikpitete ǝsuǝ eso utidi emfo lɛyɛ ?
44003013	Nnya ni bǝnkǝ Onanto lébesǝ wǝ Usumubi Yesu kato . Onanto ǝmfo ni Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob tsya eto Onanto nɛ . Wǝ tsya nsi ni bo bana eto Onanto . Wǝ Ubi ni Yesu wǝ bífi bítǝ biǝ balo . Nya bɛni wǝ lǝ Pilato eto ǝnǝmi lǝ lefe nǝ bɛtɛyi biǝ binyi wǝ kulaa tsya , lǝ lefe nǝ Pilato wǝ léla nkǝ wóayani wǝ fɛ .
44003014	Bɛni utidi kɛnkɛ ku ɔsɛɛ , nya bɛtɔnɔ biǝ oyani uwudifɔ bomu lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
44003015	Bélo utidi wǝ lǝǝtǝ betidi nkpǝ . Nya Onanto dísinkli ótakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ! Nya bo kosate dínyǝ wǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi !
44003016	Ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝǝ , nya utidi wǝ lɛtsyini bɛnlɛ bunyǝ mfoo , dímuǝ ǝsuǝale nɛ . Nya se ófo Yesu ɔ́nɔ esoo , nnya dítǝ únyǝ bufitsyatsya fe kase mimblɛ nlɛ bunyǝ ku mi ǝnǝmi mfo nɛ .
44003017	“ Mɔ bayimi , nyi miǝ mi ku mi beninǝ éyifo nyamfo eto okloe ɛyɛ lǝ mante mante ǝsuǝ .
44003018	Fɛɛ Onanto ébɔtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ wǝ ubi Kristo , Utidi Wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebudi ohiã . Nko eso útǝ nkǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto lesa nǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ itǝ .
44003019	Nyaso bisinkli lǝ abuayifoyifo kama lǝ bitǝkǝko Onanto , lǝ uflǝ mi abua uwi . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , buinyǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale itsyi lǝ Bonamute ɔflɔ , nya wootsyese Yesu wǝ ni Kristo Wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
44003020	
44003021	Nko ini eso Yesu luusiǝ kato isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto lɔɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ fe kase útǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi bǝtsyǝ taa kɔ ke .
44003022	Fe kase Moses lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute Onanto ebulǝkǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ utsyiko lǝ mi nti fe kase útǝ mímbɔ . Nyaso bitsyuǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ ke wɔɔtɛyi mi koto .
44003023	Nyaso nwǝ ke lembutsyue unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝ kotoo , Onanto ebulǝkǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ betidi nti nya wɔɔtsylɔsǝ wǝ . ’
44003024	“ Lǝ sitintii , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kenke idu lǝ Samuel ɛntɔɔ , ébɔtɛyi asa nnya nlɛ bubǝ mfo mmi bǝtsyǝ .
44003025	Nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ eyifo mi ale . Nya mi tsya kpe kedikɔ lǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lékle ku mi bana ǝsuǝ . Fe kase ɔ́tɛyi Abraham nkǝ , ‘ Ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ufluflu ǝsuǝǝ , mookpo kasɔ eto betidi kenke atsyɔ . ’
44003026	Nyaso se Onanto dílǝkǝ wǝ Uyifoyifo Kristo ótee , tutɛ ótsyese wǝ mi ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ okpo mi atsyɔ , nya lǝ utǝ mi utsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔyɛ abua buyifo . ”
44004001	Lefe nǝ Petro ku Yohanes ńyǝ banlɛ betidi bamǝ etiki budii , Yudafɔ eto besumunyǝ ku Disumuyo eto mba laase mfó eto beninǝ ku Sadukifɔ tsya ǝbǝ mfó .
44004002	Se bánɔ bǝ Petro ku Yohanes ńyǝ mfó balɛ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu eto botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya nlɛ bote bǝnkǝ utidi wǝ díkǝkpǝ ebotaka ubǝ nkpǝǝ , kafo ányi mǝ tinti .
44004003	Nyaso bǝmuǝ mǝ . Nya se kale mfe nlɛ bolo esoo , béti mǝ bákpe le diyo isu ǝsǝ kǝsiǝsǝ .
44004004	Fɛɛ betidi kpǝ ba lɛnɔ mǝ etikii , báfo etiki sɛɛ nyamfo bánɔ . Mǝ utú ebuyifo fe basani akpi anɔ .
44004005	Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , ibǝ bǝ Yudafɔ eto bǝsuǝaletidi ku beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ákpe disi lǝ Yerusalem .
44004006	Bátsya ku Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Annas ku Kayafa ku Yohanes ku Aleksandro ku besumunyǝ ninǝ eto betidi tsya .
44004007	Nyaso bákpa Petro ku Yohanes bamǝ báboko mǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya bátɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe eto diye ku ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ bíyifo nyamfo ? ”
44004008	Petro wǝ díyi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale átaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bo bǝsuǝaletidi ku umǝ eto beninǝ ,
44004009	lǝ bela biǝnkǝ bianɔ lesa sɛɛ nǝ búyifo bútǝ utidi wǝ lɛtsyini mfo ku kase bótsya wǝǝ ,
44004010	bitǝ mɛ kusu lǝ ntɛyi mi ku Israel eto betidi kenke lesatsyuǝ . Yesu Kristo wǝ ditsyi Nasaret wǝ bítǝ básɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ , nya Onanto disi ótakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , wǝ diye ǝsuǝ nya utidi ǝmfo dímuǝ ale nɛ .
44004011	Nya Yesu ǝmfo ǝsuǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti . ’
44004012	Wǝ hã ni futsyǝ loofo utidi bulǝkǝ , itsyise wǝ hã ni futsyǝ Onanto dítǝkǝ diye nya útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ betidi ba tã nti , nkǝ utǝ utidi nkpǝ . ”
44004013	Se bǝsuǝaletidi ku beninǝ dínyǝ kase Petro ku Yohanes ba lenni bekuente nya bámfo bunǝ saa , nlɛ etiki budi ku ute ku ute ku ǝsuǝale nkoo , íyifo mǝ yanii . Nya bǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo sitinti bǝ mǝ ku Yesu áyɛ béyifo keyifo lǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
44004014	Nya se bǝnyǝ utidi ǝmǝ bátsya ńyǝ mfó lǝ mǝ ɔflɔɔ , kɛnyɛ ǝkpǝ mǝ , bánte lesa nǝ baatɛyi bio .
44004015	Nyaso bátɛyi mǝ bǝ banyi besu kama etɔ , nya mǝ hã dísiǝ mfó kefi nsusu lǝ lesa nǝ booyifo ǝsuǝ .
44004016	Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ bǝ , “ Be ele bǝ buyifo ku betidi bamfo ? Boǝmbofo bɔtɛyi boǝ lesa nǝ béyifo mfo enni ayanisa itsyise utidi saa wǝ nkpe lǝ Yerusalem yi nya ɔ́nɔ ditiki nǝmfo .
44004017	Bomu bǝ lǝ etiki nyamfo lǝ ɛyɛ bokpantsyaa , bitǝ lǝ bukǝ mǝ ato boǝ bensidi etiki saa lǝ Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ bio . ”
44004018	Nya bésinkli bákpadi mǝ báboko disikakpekɔ mfó nya bákpe mǝ kɔfi bǝ idu lefe nǝmfó ɛntɔɔ , bénsidi kutsyuǝ saa etiki nye báte kulesa itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ bio .
44004019	Nya Petro ku Yohanes dífe kɛnyɛ bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Mi kosate bibu nnya bebe biǝ nte nnya lɔɔkɛ Onanto ɔkɔɛ ? Bǝ buyifo lǝ mi kɔfi ǝsuǝ lee , lǝ Onanto eto kole ǝsuǝ ?
44004020	Bo alɛɛ , asa nnya búnyǝ ku bɔ́nɔɔ , boembofo kɛnyɛ boma lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kǝsiǝ kpoo nko . ”
44004021	Nyaso beninǝ bamǝ nlɛ disi bokpe mfó ǝnyǝnki bákpe nya békǝ mǝ ato kekleke nya báyani mǝ . Kase betidi bamǝ kenke díńyǝ mfo nlɛ Bonamute bɔtɛsɛ lɛ wǝ eyifosa esoo , beninǝ bamǝ mánte kusu ko bɔɔyɛ bǝnǝ mǝ koto .
44004022	Utidi ǝmǝ bátsya ébofo alɛ fosi ana ku kama .
44004023	Lefe nǝ báyani mǝ kamaa , Petro ku Yohanes ésu mǝ betidi bamǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi mǝ lesa nǝ betidi bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ lǝ disikakpekɔ kamǝ .
44004024	Nyaso bafokanɔfɔ lǝ mfó kenke átsya nya báto ola bǝtǝ Onanto bǝ , “ Bonamute , fǝ díyifo kato ku kasɔ ku lekpo ku asa nnya kenke nkpe lǝ nya .
44004025	Fǝ lɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ fǝtǝ bo Ona David wǝ ni fǝ Uyifoyifo dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Beso kawunsiǝ eto betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ nlɛ bunyenki kefi nsusu bua ?
44004026	Kawunsiǝ mfo eto baka átsya , báto ákpatsya , nya bǝsuǝaletidi lékpe disi béfi nsusu lǝ Onanto ǝmǝ ku Utidi Wǝ Ókpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
44004027	Ɔnukualɛ uni bǝ Herodes ku Pontio Pilato ku Israelfɔ ku mba lenni Israelfɔ átsya lǝ umǝ ǝmfó nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ fǝ Uyifoyifo Kɛnkɛ Yesu wǝ fákpo ɔhile fǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ .
44004028	Fɛɛ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale ku kobe ǝsuǝǝ , ábe fǝnkǝ lǝ batsyaa , beyifo lǝ asa nnya fétsyue fǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ .
44004029	Nya mɔmɔɔ , O Bonamute , be sikpi sia banlɛ bo bokpe , lǝ ǝtǝ bo fǝ beyifoyifo lɛkɔɛsi nǝ luutǝ boofo fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi .
44004030	Nnǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue lǝ atsya betidi , lǝ eyifo ayanisa kpǝ , lǝ fǝ Uyifoyifo Kɛnkɛ Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ . ”
44004031	Se báto ola bálosǝǝ , diyo nǝ kafo bankpe ko dítinkǝ nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ ǝsuǝ nya bétsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyi ku ǝsuǝale .
44004032	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo kenkee , bafokanɔfɔ kenke eyifo kɛnyɛ kani lǝ ditsyǝbi ku nsusu ǝsuǝ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa membu wǝ hã eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ eto disi , bomu mǝ lesa saa eyifo mǝmblɛ eto lele .
44004033	Nya batɔnkpe bamfo kenke dífi ǝsuǝale kplɛ bábe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ ditsya itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto eto atsyɔkpokpo kplɛ dísiǝ ko mǝ kenke .
44004034	Mǝ kutsyuǝ saa mánhiã kulesa , itsyise mba ayo nye nsɔ nkpee , efi asa nyamfo báte nya béfi atabi nnya bǝnyǝ ,
44004035	bésuko batɔnkpe bamǝ nya bésie nnya bǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ kase ińyǝ itǝ wǝ .
44004036	Lǝ mfóo , osani utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ mǝ nti baakpo Yosef , wǝ ni Lewinyǝ wǝ ditsyi kasɔ ka baakpo Kipro . Batɔnkpe bamǝ ǝtǝkǝ diye bǝ Barnaba , eto kasɔ ni nwǝ laakpe betidi otsyekle .
44004037	Úfi wǝ kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ óte nya úfi atabi nnya únyǝ úsuko batɔnkpe bamǝ .
44005001	Nya osani utsyuǝ tsya dísiǝ wǝ baakpo Ananias ku wǝ usiǝ Safira . Mǝ tsya éfi mǝ kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ báte .
44005002	Nya úfi atabi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ ɔ́kula fɛ úfi afɛfɛ óboko batɔnkpe bamǝ . Ditsyǝbi nǝmfo eyifo wǝ usiǝ Safira eto bote nya ɔ́tɔnɔ nkǝ beeyifo nko .
44005003	Nya Petro lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ananias , beso fǝtǝ Obonsam dítǝkǝ fǝ kato , nya útǝ fátɛyi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ sidia ? Nya féfi fǝ kasɔ ka fáte eto atabi ǝtsyuǝ fákula fǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ ?
44005004	Kasɔ kamǝǝ , fǝ kale keni fɛ fáte ke , nya atabi nnya báfo fǝ kayo tsya eyifo fǝ ale . Be dítǝ eso féfi nsusu bua bomfó eto okle ? Inni bo betidi bamfo fátɛyi sidia , bomu Onanto ! ”
44005005	Kase Ananias lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfo koo , lamfolamfo úduɔnɔ ókpo kasɔ , úkpǝ ! Nyamfo ǝtǝ sikpi kplɛ ǝmuǝ mba kenke lɛnɔ nnya .
44005006	Nya bakosobi ba lɛkɛ mǝ lenti dífi kafia beti wǝ nya béfi wǝ bésu bébikǝ .
44005007	Fe abombosɔsɔ ǝtsyǝ eto kamaa , wǝ usiǝ tsya ǝbǝ údufǝ mfó . Fɛɛ wóannɔ tɔ lesa nǝ díkǝbǝ .
44005008	Nya Petro lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Tɛyi mɛ , se fǝ ku fǝ usǝ dífi mi kasɔ bétee , atabi nnya kenke báfó mi kayo ni nyamfoo ? ” Nya usio ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , nyamblɛ nɛ . ”
44005009	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso fonko fǝ usǝ lékle kɛnyɛ bɛnlɛ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ boto kabe ? Bebe bakosobi ba dítsyi fǝ usǝ bésu bébikǝ ni mba mfo nɛ . Mǝ ke luutsyi fintsya besuko nɛ . ”
44005010	Lamfolamfo , wuntsya édu ɔ́nɔ nya úkpǝ . Nya se bakosobi bamǝ díbǝ bǝńyǝ se úkpǝ onlabee , bétsyi wuntsya bésu bébikǝ lǝ kaka bébikǝ wǝ usǝ ke .
44005011	Itǝ eso sikpi kplɛ ǝmuǝ mba kenke díkafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ ku betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ lesa nǝ díbǝ mfó .
44005012	Lefe nǝmfo kenkee , batɔnkpe bamǝ éyifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti . Bafokanɔfɔ ba lǝ mfóo , ákatsya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo kaka baakpo Solomo eto Lekpata .
44005013	Ite bǝ betidi bamba kpǝ éfi lelabi ku díbu bǝtǝ bafokanɔfɔ tsyaa , báte sikpi bámfo budufǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
44005014	Tsya fɛɛ betidi kpǝ , basani ku besio ésinkli lǝ nkpǝ bua bo bensi kama nya báfo Bonamute bánɔ .
44005015	Nya betidi lékpa mǝ befimfi bálabesǝ lǝ mǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kpakpaakpe kaka bébu bǝ Petro ebɔyɛ lǝ ɔlɛ botsyilama , lǝ wǝ koyo lǝ kokpo lǝ befimfi bamfó ǝsuǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ ale .
44005016	Nya betidi kpǝ lǝ kǝmǝ ka letsyilama Yerusalem lékpa mǝ befimfi ku mba awɔnɔ bua nlɛ bule báboko mǝ ɔflɔ nya bátsya mǝmblɛ bufi .
44005017	Nya Yudafɔ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ku wǝ betidi ba ni Sadukifɔ eto ditsyukpa lɛsɛsǝ ǝnǝmi kekleke lǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
44005018	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bǝmuǝ mǝ bákpe lǝ umǝ eto diyo .
44005019	Lǝ kǝtsyǝ kamfóo , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔ́sini diyo nǝmǝ eto siku nya úlǝkǝ mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
44005020	“ Bidu bisu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo lǝ bisu bidi betidi ba kenke etiki itsyi lǝ nkpǝ fɔfɔ bomǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
44005021	Nyaso se kale dísiǝǝ , lǝ kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe lɛtɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bésu bédufǝ Disumuyo mfó nya bétsyiko mǝ asa bote . Lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ ku wǝ betidi ákpadi Yudafɔ kenke eto beninǝ itǝ botsya nya bákpe betidi bǝtsyuǝ bǝ besu bǝlǝkǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ baboko .
44005022	Fɛɛ se bésu mfóo , bǝnnyǝ mǝ ! Nyaso bésinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ ,
44005023	“ Se búsuu , búnyǝ buǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto biku kenke ti , nya mba laase kesie ńyǝ mfó . Fɛɛ se bɔ́sini bikuu biamǝǝ , bóǝnnyǝ betidi bamǝ eto kuutsyuǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo . ”
44005024	Lefe nǝ mba laase Disumuyo nǝmǝ eto uninǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ bamfo lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , íyifo mǝ yanii tinti , itsyise bánte lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
44005025	Nyamfo eto kamaa , utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba bímuǝ békpe lǝ diyoo , bebe , nyǝ mǝ ńyǝ lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ banlɛ betidi asa botee ! ”
44005026	Lamfolamfoo , mba laase mfo eto uninǝ ku wǝ betidi édu bésu Disumuyo mfo bésu bǝmuǝ mǝ baboko . Fɛɛ se báte sikpi bǝ betidi bamǝ ebubǝ bato mǝ aba esoo , bǝnnǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
44005027	Se bákpa mǝ bésuko , bésu bǝńyǝnsǝ mǝ lǝ bakponkpo bamǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Usumunyǝ Ninǝ átɔ mǝ nkǝ ,
44005028	“ Bóantɛyi mi boǝnkǝ biensidi etiki bɛtɛyi kulesa itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝmfo ǝsuǝ ? Fɛɛ bíusensǝ wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ békpo lǝ Yerusalem kenke . Nya bela biǝ biefi wǝ ukpǝ eto dikpilolo bitǝkǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
44005029	Mfó nya Petro ku batɔnkpe bamba bamǝ dílǝkǝ kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝ , “ Etiki eto ɔnukualɛ ni bǝ Onanto ni futsyǝ ele bǝ butsyue koto , inni utidi .
44005030	Yesu wǝ bélo se bítǝ básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝǝ , bo bana eto Onantoo , ni nwǝ létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ nɛ .
44005031	Onanto ǝtsyǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ sediani lǝ kato kaka ni kakplɛkɔ kenke fe ɔtɔnkotɔnko ku Ofomfokǝtǝ itǝ lǝ Israelfɔ lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu batsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ .
44005032	Bo ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ , nǝ Onanto leefi kǝtǝ mba leetsyue wǝ koto ni mba ni ditiki nǝmfo eto badansiɛ . ”
44005033	Se bakponkpo bamǝ lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfo lǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ eto kɛnyɛɛ , kafo esi kányi mǝ tinti , nyaso báse nnya uyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ balo mǝ .
44005034	Fɛɛ Farisifɔ eto osani ɔni wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ bakponkpo bamǝ nti baakpo Gamaliel áni ko mǝ . Úyifo utidi wǝ betidi kenke díkebu tinti , nya úyifo afi eto oteasa tsya . Wǝ ni futsyǝ létaka uńyǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , bǝtǝ lǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ lǝ babɔ , fɛ lǝ befi nsusu lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
44005035	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Israelfɔ , bɛlɔ bebe sinini lǝ lesa nǝ bela biǝ bieyifo betidi bamfo !
44005036	Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefe mmǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛkɛ baakpo Teuda , wǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ uyifo fe uninǝ wǝ nkpe díbu onso . Betidi alofa ana dítǝkǝko wǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bálo wǝǝ , wǝ betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ ésensǝ , nya wǝ ditsyukpa nǝmǝ léba .
44005037	Lǝ nnya kamaa , lǝ betidi eto leklafee , Yuda wǝ ni Galileanyǝ ákpa betidi ókpo lǝ ǝsuǝ fe wǝ bǝtǝkǝkotsyuǝ . Nko ke se úkpǝǝ , wǝ bǝtǝkǝkotsyuǝ mfó ko dísensǝ .
44005038	Nyaso lesa nǝ minyǝ mɔɔtɛyi mi ko ni bǝ , beyani betidi bamfo . Lǝ asa nnya banlɛ bote nye asa nnya banlɛ buyifo eyifo mǝ kosate eto etsyuesaa , yǝmbɔklɛ fɛ yuusensǝ
44005039	Fɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto etsyuesa inii , boǝmbofo mǝ kusu buti . Lǝ boambe kukɔnɔ kulaa tsyaa , buubǝ bunyǝ boǝ bɔlɛ botaka kǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto Kosate ǝsuǝ ! ”
44005040	Bakponkpo bamǝ áfo Gamaliel eto nsusu bo útǝ mǝ . Nyaso bákpadi batɔnkpe bamǝ báboko mǝ nti , nya báblɛ mǝ . Nya besi bǝkǝ mǝ ato bǝ bensi tɛyi kulesa saa itsyi lǝ Yesu eto ditiki ǝsuǝ bio . Nya báyani mǝ bédu .
44005041	Se batɔnkpe bamǝ dídu lǝ lekpokakpokɔ bantɔɔ , bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , itsyise bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ Onanto ákla mǝ ókpe lǝ betidi ba baakpe kofani lǝ Yesu eto disi nti .
44005042	Nya diyi saa , bákate Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝme kátɛyi lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo ku ayo ayo kafe bǝnkǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
44006001	Lefe nǝmfo se bakasebi bamǝ dítsyiko bufuii , kǝnǝ ǝbǝ kédufǝ lǝ Yudafɔ ba laatɛyi Sigriki ku mba laatɛyi Sihebri eto nti . Nnya ni bǝ lǝ bésie diyi eto lesaa , díankayo mba laatɛyi Sigriki eto bakɔ besiǝ .
44006002	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ákpadi bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ kenke , nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yanlɛkɛ bǝ bobiasǝ lefe lǝ didisa siesie eto etiki ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ ele bǝ bufi bo lefe kenke butǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto budi .
44006003	Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , bayimi , betsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ bilǝkǝ basani ekuanse ba nyi kobe nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi ko mǝ . Buufi mǝ butsyǝ lǝ keyifo kamfo eto kɛnyɛ itǝ bǝ bofo lefe bɔkɛ itǝ olatoto ku Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe . ”
44006004	
44006005	Ditiki nǝmǝ álɛkɛ itǝ mǝmblɛ kenke , nyaso bǝlǝkǝ Stefano wǝ ni utidi wǝ nkpe bofokanɔ nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi ko wǝ lefe saa . Nya bǝlǝkǝ Filipo ku Prokoro ku Nikanɔ ku Timona ku Parmena ku nwǝ díkafiani Yudanyǝ wǝ baakpo Nikolas wǝ ditsyi Antiokia .
44006006	Bǝlǝkǝ betidi ekuanse bamfo báte batɔnkpe bamǝ . Nya báto ola bǝtǝkǝ mǝ ani lǝ disi itǝ keyifo kamǝ eto buyifo .
44006007	Lǝ nyaso Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ dísukosǝ busǝnsǝ kakpe . Nya bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Yerusalem dífui bakpe . Yudafɔ eto besumunyǝ kpǝ tsya átsyi báwuninsǝ báfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
44006008	Nyaso Stefano wǝ Onanto lékpo atsyɔ útǝ ǝsuǝalee , éyifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti .
44006009	Fɛɛ Yudafɔ ba díkafo mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ eto busiǝ ba dítsyi Kirene ku Aleksandria ku bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Kilikia ku Asia eto ditsyukpa étsyiko etiki bunǝ ku Stefano .
44006010	Fɛɛ mǝ kutsyuǝ saa mámfo buńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ kobe ko Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dítǝ wǝ eso .
44006011	Nyaso bákpe disi ku betidi bamba bǝ lǝ batɛyi bidia lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Bɔ́nɔ se úkedi etiki uńyǝ lǝ Moses ku Onanto tsya ǝsuǝ ! ”
44006012	Kɛnyɛlala kamfo ǝnǝ lefonyi lékpe lǝ betidi bamfo ku beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bamǝ kenke ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝmuǝ Stefano nya béfi wǝ bésuko bakponkpo eto ǝnǝmi .
44006013	Nya báboko betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba lékle kɛnyɛ bátɛyi sidia bǝnkǝ , “ Osani ǝmfo ékedi etitiki lefe saa kǝńyǝ lǝ Disumuyo Kɛnkɛ kamfo ku lǝ Moses eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
44006014	Nya bɔ́nɔ bǝ ɔ́tɛyi tsya nkǝ utidi ǝmǝ ditsyi Nasaret baakpo Yesu mfóo , átɛyi nkǝ wooba Onanto eto Disumuyo Kɛnkɛ kamfo nya woofloma akpa nnya Moses dítǝ bo ! ”
44006015	Nya mba kenke lɛkɛ lǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfó létakasǝ ǝnǝmi bákpo lǝ Stefano ǝsuǝ , nya bǝnyǝ bǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi ǝkǝyǝnde fe kato eto ɔtɔnkpe eto ale .
44007001	Nya Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lɛtɔ Stefano nkǝ , “ Etiki nnya banlɛ budi mfoo , sitinti ini banlɛ bɔtɛyi ? ”
44007002	Nya Stefano dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Boantomǝ ku mɔ bayimi , bitsyue koto kukɔnɔ lǝ bɛnɔ ! Diyǝnde eto Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte bo ona Abraham lǝ Mesopotamia eto kasɔ fɛ údu mfo úsu úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ ka baakpo Haran .
44007003	Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Taka lǝ edu lǝ kasɔ kamfo ku lǝ fǝ betidi ɔflɔ lǝ esu kasɔ ka moote fǝ ǝsuǝ ! ’
44007004	“ Nyaso údu lǝ wǝ kasɔ nya úsu úsiǝ lǝ Haran . Lǝ Abraham eto anto eto ukpǝ eto kamaa , nya Onanto lékpa wǝ óboko kasɔ ka binsi mfo mmi nɛ .
44007005	Onanto mémbudi kasɔ kamfo eto dikuku sɛkɛ saa útǝ Abraham fe wǝ kale , inni lɛ kokpa kɔni . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ɔtɔnsǝ nkǝ kasɔ kamǝ ebofiani wǝ ku wǝ befluflu eto kale , ite bǝ ibǝ ese lefe nǝmfóo , ubi saa mánkɛ wǝ .
44007006	Nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi wǝ ni nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ befluflu ebofiani bafɔ lǝ kasɔ ka lenni mǝ kalɛ ǝsuǝ . Boosiǝ mfo fe ndomufɔ nya boote mǝ ohiã itǝ alɛ alofa ana flɔflɔflɔ . ’
44007007	Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Moolo betidi ba díyifo mǝ mǝ ndomufɔ dikpi . Nya lǝ nnya kamaa , buudu lǝ kasɔ kamfó bǝbǝ basumu mɛ lǝ kaka mfo . ’
44007008	Mmǝǝ ini Onanto lékle kɛnyɛ ku Abraham ini lelolala eto kɛnyɛklekle nɛ . Nyaso Abraham ála Isak lelo lǝ diyi flamflale se bále wǝ . Isak tsya ála Yakob lelo , nya Yakob tsya léla lelo lefosi bebi inuǝ ba bále díbǝ báfiani Yudafɔ eto ese lefosi ǝnuǝ ba lefo diye .
44007009	“ Yakob eto bebi bamfo ásɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ mǝ ɔyimi Yosef ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝmuǝ wǝ báte fe ndomunyǝ lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝsiǝko wǝ ,
44007010	nya úlǝkǝ wǝ útsyiko kanyi ku bulǝ saa ǝsuǝ . Se Yosef lɛbɔ úńyǝ lǝ Egipte eto Oka Farao eto ǝnǝmii , Onanto ǝtǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ ku kobe , itǝ Oka ǝmǝ éfi wǝ útsyǝ nwǝ laabe Egipte eto kasɔ ku wǝ diyo ku bikǝ kenke .
44007011	“ Lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , kukpɛnsɛ kekleke ǝbǝ lǝ Egipte ku Kanan eto nsɔ kenke , nya ínǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kpǝ éboko . Bo bana mánkɛ didisa nǝ buudi .
44007012	Nya se Yakob lɛnɔ nkǝ didisa kpe lǝ Egipte , ókpe wǝ bebi ba ni bo bana ditutɛ nkǝ besu baya didisa baboko wǝ .
44007013	Lǝ mǝ dísu nuǝfǝǝ , Yosef ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ bayimi nya Egipte eto Oka tsya díbǝ óte Yosef eto bayimi bamǝ .
44007014	Lǝ nnya eso Yosef ákpe wǝ bayimi nkǝ besu bakpa wǝ anto Yakob ku wǝ betidi kenke ba diyifo fe betidi fosi akuanse ku ɛnɔ báboko .
44007015	Nyaso Yakob édu úsu Egipte kaka wǝ ku wǝ bebi díkpǝ .
44007016	Kamaa , bétsyi bǝkpǝnkpǝ bamǝ bésinkli bésuko umǝ wǝ baakpo Sikem bésu bébikǝ mfó . Bébikǝ mǝ lǝ kudi ko Abraham léya ku sika flubia eto atabi ǝtsyuǝ lǝ Hamɔ eto bebi ɔflɔ .
44007017	“ Se kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ka Onanto dítsyǝ útǝ Abraham eto lefe nlɛ boyoo , wǝ befluflu ba mfe nkpe lǝ Egipte ébole béfui tinti .
44007018	Kafɛfɛkɔɔ , Oka fɔfɔ wǝ dímante Yosef étsyiko seka budi lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ .
44007019	Farao emfo ǝlǝkǝ nsusu bua úyifo Abraham eto befluflu bamfo disiale nya úkisi mǝ tsya . Itǝ ɔ́hiɛ mǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ bebisambi ba bále lǝ ayo báto bákpe lǝ kase buukpǝ .
44007020	“ Lefe nǝmfo eto lefe nnya bále Moses nɛ . Nya bǝnyǝ bǝ úyifo ubi wǝ laanɔ bobe tsya . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , wǝ antomǝ éfi wǝ bákula afa ǝtsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ lǝ diyo .
44007021	Nya lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ bǝ bensiembofo wǝ bɔkulaa , bǝlǝkǝ wǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Farao eto ubisiobi dísu ɔ́kɛ wǝ nya úfi wǝ ófianisǝ wǝ kafo eto ubi .
44007022	Óbe wǝ nya békluǝsǝ wǝ fe Egiptenyǝ lǝ mǝ esu ku mǝ asayifofo ǝsuǝ . Nya óbe ófiani utidi wǝ lɛkɛ ǝsuǝale lǝ wǝ etikididi ku wǝ eyifosa kenke ǝsuǝ .
44007023	“ Se Moses léfo alɛ fosi anaa , íbǝ wǝ lǝ nsusu nkǝ lǝ usu obe kase banlɛ wǝ bayimi Israelfɔ buyifo .
44007024	Lǝ lefe nǝ úsu mfoo , únyǝ kase Egiptenyǝ nlɛ mǝ ɔni disiale buyifo . Esoo , úsu ɔ́wunsǝko wǝ ɔ́sɔ Egiptenyǝ ǝmfo ólo .
44007025	Moses ébu nkǝ wǝ kosate eto betidi ǝbɔnɔ kasɔ nkǝ Onanto ebɔyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úlǝkǝ mǝ , fɛɛ mǝ mánnɔ nnya kasɔ nko .
44007026	Kǝsiǝsǝǝ , únyǝ Israelfɔ inuǝ ba nlɛ bɔkpɔ . Úsu nkǝ lǝ usu okpla mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bebee ! Bayimi , bini ! Yanle bǝ bikakpɔ keyifo lesafimfi mi bǝtsyua nko ! ’
44007027	“ Nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ eto nwǝ nlɛ wǝ ɔyimi disiale buyifo dínǝ Moses útsyǝ kutsyǝ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be leka fǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Owoe dílǝkǝ fǝ bo ɔtɔnkotɔnko ku okponkpo lǝ bo etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ ?
44007028	Lee , ala fǝ aalo mɛ fe kase fálo Egiptenyǝ ǝmǝ kǝnǝ ? ’
44007029	Se Moses lɛ́nɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , útsyetsyi úsu ɔ́biɔ lǝ Midia eto kasɔ fe ɔfɔ . Nya mfó óle bebisaibi inuǝ .
44007030	“ Lǝ alɛ fosi ana eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ fe ute wǝ nlɛ biyu eto kuyi botonsǝ eto ditsyǝbi lǝ Sinai eto kɔtini ɔflɔ lǝ mfiminti mfo .
44007031	Se Moses dínyǝ nyamfo nkoo , íyifo wǝ naa . Nyaso lefe nǝ ɔ́nyi ɔ́fi nkǝ lǝ obe lesa nǝ inii , nnya Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ ábɔ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
44007032	‘ Mɔ ni fǝ banamǝ eto Onanto , Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob eto Onanto . ’ Moses étinkǝ ku sikpi eso wénsifo mfó bobe .
44007033	“ Onanto ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Lǝkǝ fǝ afokpa ! Itsyise kaka fǝńyǝǝ , kasɔ kɛnkɛ keni .
44007034	Mbunyǝ kase mɔ betidi nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ mfó . Mbɔnɔ mǝ bɔwɔnɔnɔ ku nku bo banlɛ kakpadi mɛ . Nyaso mbubǝ miǝ lǝ mbǝ nlǝkǝ mǝ . Bǝ , mookpe fǝ kɔtɔ lǝ Egipte ! ’
44007035	“ Moses emfo ni utidi wǝ Israelfɔ lɛ́ni nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Owoe dílǝkǝ fǝ bo ɔtɔnkotɔnko ku okponkpo lǝ bo etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ ? ’ Wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto létsyese nkǝ udi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ku mǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte lǝ ute wǝ díkǝnyǝ lǝ mfiminti mfó nɛ .
44007036	Ókpa mǝ betidi bamǝ údunko lǝ Egipte nya úyifo ayanisa úlǝkǝ asa kpǝ óte lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ ku lǝ Lekpo Sia eto kɛnyɛ ku lǝ lefe nǝ banyɛ lǝ mfiminti alɛ fosi ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
44007037	“ Moses ǝmfo ni nwǝ lɛtɛyi Israelfɔ nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebotsyese mi wǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi fe kase ótsyese mɛ , nya wuulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ mi kosate eto nti . ’
44007038	Wǝ ni nwǝ lɛtɔnko Israelfɔ ba lɛkɛ lǝ mfiminti mfó . Wǝ lɛkɛ mfó ku bo banamǝ . Wǝ ni nwǝ dídinko Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe etiki lǝ Sinai eto kɔtini ǝsuǝ . Wǝ nsi ni futsyǝ léfo Onanto eto ditiki nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ óboko bo .
44007039	“ Fɛɛ bo banamǝ mámfo Moses eto etiki nyamǝ nyaso bǝkǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ kutsyǝ nya bála bǝ eni lǝ beesinkli besu Egipte eto kasɔ .
44007040	Nyaso bátɛyi Aaron bǝnkǝ , ‘ Tsyǝ bǝfiǝ ba loofo bo bɔtɔnko ǝtǝ bo , itsyise boante lesa nǝ dísu íyifo Moses ǝmfo wǝ dínǝ bo ɔ́bɔnko lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ . ’
44007041	Lǝ nyaso báto ufiǝ fe onantsyui eto ubi . Wǝ bǝkǝtǝ kedi nya bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ diyi nǝmfo lǝ ufiǝ ǝmǝ béfi mǝ ani béyifo mfó eso .
44007042	Lǝ nyamfo eso Onanto étsyi kama ókpe mǝ . Nya oyani mǝ utǝ kofe ku kofande ku befandebi eto kesumu , fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ bɛnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kukue nkǝ , ‘ Israelfɔ , inni mɔ bélo bebuki bítǝ kedi lǝ alɛfosi ana nnya bɛkɛ lǝ mfiminti mfó .
44007043	Bomu Molok eto dibú ku Romfa eto befandebi bia béfianinsǝ bǝfiǝ ba bíkǝtǝ kedi nɛ . Lǝ nyaso muutǝ bǝmuǝ mi besuko kasɔ fãã lǝ Babilonia eto kama bisu bɛkɛ mfo . ’
44007044	“ Bo banamǝ étsyi Onanto eto diyo nya ɔ́tɔ , ɔ́yɛnko mǝ lǝ mfiminti kafo . Báto diyo nǝmǝ fe kase Onanto dílǝkǝ óte Moses nkǝ bato ni pɛpɛɛpɛ .
44007045	Kama kamaa , bo bana ba léfo diyo nǝmǝ betsyiko lǝ mǝ antomǝ ɔflɔɔ , étsyi ni ku mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ báyɛ ku Yosua , nya bésu báfo kasɔ kamǝ betsyiko lǝ ese nnya Onanto léla lǝ mfó se bántɔ . Nya lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ nti mfó isu ese Oka David eto lefe .
44007046	Onanto ála David eto asa tinti . Lǝ nnya eso David átɔ Onanto nkǝ utǝ wǝ kusu lǝ oto kǝsiǝkɔ utǝ wǝ , Yakob eto Onanto .
44007047	Fɛɛ Salomo ko díbǝ óto diyo nǝmǝ .
44007048	“ Fɛɛ Onanto Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke ǝnsiǝ lǝ ayo nnya kawunsiǝ mfo eto betidi léto . Onanto áyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
44007049	‘ Kato ni mɔ sekakedikɔ eto lekpomɛ , nya kasɔ ni mɔ akpa eto kǝtǝkǝkɔ . Lǝ nnya esoo , nte diyo nǝ eto okle footo ǝtǝ mɛ . Sie ni kaka ele bǝ nsiǝ ?
44007050	Lee , inni mɔ kosate díyifo asa nyamfo kenke ? ’ ”
44007051	Lǝ nyaso Stefano ési ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nke , “ Letotidi kon eto betidi bini ! Ntsyǝ bimbǝ bofokanɔ mǝ ! Bíti ato lǝ Onanto eto ditiki ǝsuǝ fe kase mi antomǝ díyifo . Lefe saa biataka kǝńyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
44007052	Nte Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba mi banamǝ dímǝńyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ? Bálo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba díbǝ bábe letsya taa kɔ bǝ Ɔsɛɛtidi Wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ lɛ bubǝ . Nya Ɔsɛɛtidi Wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝǝ , wǝ bɛni nya bíkǝ wǝ bítǝ bálo wǝ nɛ .
44007053	Mi ni mba léfo Onanto eto kɔfi ko útǝ mi ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe eto ani , fɛɛ bɛni bíentsyue ko koto ! ”
44007054	Se bánɔ etiki nnya Stefano lɛtɛyi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , kafo ányi mǝ tinti nya báyimi mǝ anyi ku lɛblɔfi .
44007055	Fɛɛ se Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsiko Stefano esoo , óbesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato fãã , nya únyǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ku Yesu wǝ ńyǝ lǝ wǝ sediani .
44007056	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Nnyǝ se kato lɛsini nya mínyǝ Utidi eto Ubi ǝmǝ se uńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto sediani ! ”
44007057	Nya báfã bembembe nya béti mǝ ato eto kafo nya bédufǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ .
44007058	Nya bǝnǝ wǝ bábɔnko lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ , nya bétsyiko wǝ aba . Nya mba ǝmǝ dínǝ wǝ bábɔnkoo , bǝlǝkǝ mǝ awukplɛ nnya bankpe bǝtsyǝ lǝ okosobi wǝ baakpo Saulo eto akɔ .
44007059	Nya lefe nǝ banlɛ wǝ aba bɔkpɔɔ , Stefano ákpadi Bonamute nya óto ola nkǝ , “ Bonamute Yesu , fo mɔ lɛwɔnɔ ! ”
44007060	Óse akonki nya ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , fi mǝ abua nnya béyifo mfo atsyɛ mǝ ! ” Nya se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , úkpǝ .
44008001	Lǝ lefe nǝ banlɛ Stefano boloo , Saulo ni futsyǝ díkǝdi ute kakpe mǝ . Diyi nǝmfo ke nya bétsyiko bɔkpɔ ku bafokanɔfɔ kate mǝ ohiã lǝ Yerusalem . Nya mǝmblɛ dítsyetsyi bésu Yudea ku Samaria eto lekpake . Fɛɛ batɔnkpe bamǝ alɛɛ , mǝmǝ akɛ lǝ mfó .
44008002	Nya mba léfo Yesu bánɔ eto bǝtsyuǝ ésu bétsyi Stefano bésu bébikǝ ku nkuɛnlo .
44008003	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Saulo ǝtǝkǝko nya úlǝ bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ kekleke nya údufǝ ayo kafo úkabɛbɛ basani ku besio ta kǝnǝ kǝlǝkǝ kakpe mǝ lǝ ayo .
44008004	Nya bafokanɔfɔ lǝ mfó ésensǝ bésu kalebe saa nya banlɛ Boanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe .
44008005	Nya Filipo wǝǝ , údu úsu Samaria nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝsuǝ .
44008006	Betidi kpǝ étsyue ato bánɔ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ budi itsyise bǝnyǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya úyifo eso báfo wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ .
44008007	Óla awɔnɔ bua kpǝ utsyiko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ , nya nkomǝ eto awɔnɔ bua nyamfó lékpo kudu bembembe fɛ bábɔ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ótsya mba eto ani ku akpa díkpǝ ku mba léba bákpo lǝ kasɔ tsya nya bátaka báyɛ .
44008008	Nyamfo esoo , disuǝyuǝ akɛ lǝ Samaria eto umǝ tinti !
44008009	Osani utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ Samaria baakpo Simon , uyifo utsyuǝ wǝ leeyifo afantosi eto afa . Lǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ nǝ léfe ǝsuǝǝ , uyifo utsyuǝ wǝ díkatsya betidi kekleke nya íkeyifo betidi yanii . Nya úkǝbú wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔkplɛnyǝ wǝ lefé lǝ wǝ eyifosa ku etiki nnya úkedi eso .
44008010	Samariafɔ eto bekpefi ku beninǝ kenke ékebu wǝ lǝ kase úkate ǝsuǝ keyifo eso . Le nnya esoo , béfi wǝ etikididi fe , “ Wǝ ni Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nya baakpo Ǝsuǝale Kplɛ . ”
44008011	Se úkeyifo afa éfo lefe kɛntsyɛ esoo , béfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise beetsyuǝ wǝ koto kanɔ wǝ etiki .
44008012	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , báfo Filipo eto ditiki nǝ ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi banɔ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi ku Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya basani ku besio kpǝ léfo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ .
44008013	Nya Simon ǝmǝ mfo tsya léfo ɔ́nɔ . Nya lefe nǝ ófo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmfoo , úkǝtǝkǝko Filipo kesu kalebe saa ka ɔntɔ . Nya lǝ ǝnyǝsa ku ayanisa nnya úkeyifo esoo , íyifo wǝ naa !
44008014	Nya lefe nǝ batɔnkpe ba lɛkɛ lǝ Yerusalem lɛnɔ bǝ Samariafɔ ébofo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔɔ , bákpe Petro ku Yohanes lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
44008015	Se bésu bédufǝǝ , báto ola lǝ bafokanɔfɔ fɔfɔ bamǝ eto disi bǝ lǝ bafo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ .
44008016	Nko ini nɛ itsyise isu ese lefe nǝmfoo , bámfo tɔ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ . Ntu ete bǝflǝsǝ mǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ .
44008017	Nyamfo esoo , Petro ku Yohanes éfi mǝ ani bǝtǝkǝ mǝ lǝ esi , nya mǝ tsya léfo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ .
44008018	Se Simon dínyǝ nkǝ lǝ batɔnkpe bamfo éfi ani bǝtǝkǝ mǝ lǝ esi koo , báfo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛɛ , úfi atabi nkǝ lǝ utǝ Petro ku Yohanes nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
44008019	“ Bitǝ mintsya ǝsuǝale nyamfo itǝ bǝ utsyuǝ saa ke mimfi ani mintǝkǝ lǝ ofo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ . ”
44008020	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ekudi itǝ fǝ ku fǝ atabi kenke ! Membu fǝ ebofo Onanto eto atɛsǝ boya ku atabi .
44008021	Embofo lekpa saa bokpa lǝ keyifo kamfo ǝsuǝ itsyise lɛkɔɛsi mankpa fǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
44008022	Lǝkǝ fǝ nsusu lǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ alɛ Bonamute lekpakpa . Ǝtsyǝnǝ wuufi fǝ abua ɔtsyɛ fǝ lǝ fǝ nsusu bua bufi lǝ asa nyamfo eto okle ǝsuǝ eso .
44008023	Itsyise nnyǝ miǝ akpe kǝnǝnsɛ kplɛ nya asa bua eto buyifo tsya eyi fǝ utu , nya fafiani ndomunyǝ itǝ lebua . ”
44008024	Nya Simon lɛtɛyi Petro ku Yohanes nkǝ , “ Beto ola bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa bitǝ mɛ bǝ kotonǝnǝ kekleke ko bɛtɛyi mfo eto okle embubǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
44008025	Nya lefe nǝ Petro ku Yohanes díkedi mǝ sedansiɛ nya bédi etiki itsyi lǝ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Samaria mfóo , báyɛ lǝ Samaria eto kǝmǝ kpǝ bédi mǝ etiki lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lefe nǝ besinkli bantɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
44008026	Itǝ Filipoo , Bonamute eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ dítsyi kato ǝbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ esu ɔnwɛdikueti lǝ mfiminti eto kusu ko lidu lǝ Yerusalem kɔntɔ lǝ Gasa . ”
44008027	Mfo ótaka nya ɔ́yɛ kusu komǝ . Lefe nǝ ɔ́ntɔɔ , ótsyako utidi utsyuǝ lǝ kusu nlɛ bubǝ . Utidi ǝmfo éyifo uyifoyifo ninǝ wǝ nsi lǝ Etiopia eto Besio eto Oka baakpo Kandake eto sekakedikɔ eto atabi eto kɛnyɛ . Uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo étsyi olakatokɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
44008028	Ɔ́tɔ lǝ oto nya unsi lǝ nkenke bo ɔtɔmini nlɛ bunǝ kafo , nya lǝ kase ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , úkakla asa itsyi lǝ Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
44008029	Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dídi Filipo etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yɛ mlǝ lǝ etu ɔtɔmini eto nkeke bomfó . ”
44008030	Filipo akɔse ɔ́yɛ útu wǝ nya ɔ́nɔ se uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo nlɛ asa bokla ketsyi ko lǝ Yesaya eto kukue ko ɔ́wɔni kafo . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Asa nnya fanlɛ bokla mfo anɔ nnya kasɔ ? ”
44008031	Nya uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo lo , ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ moofo nnya kasɔ bɔnɔ lǝ lefe nǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝmbǝ mfo loofo nnya kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mɛ ? ” Nyaso ɔ́lɛ Filipo lekpakpa nkǝ ubǝ udufǝ lǝ nkenke eto kufue komǝ kafo usiǝ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
44008032	Nya etiki nnya úkakla lǝ Kukue Kɛnkɛ eto Awɔnisa nnya nkpe mfó ni nkǝ , “ Bákpa wǝ báyɛnko fe kase baayɛnko osamu kesuko wǝ kalokɔ . Nya unsi kpoo fe osamu wǝ dímemfi nnya kulesa lǝ bákɔ wǝ bisǝ , nya wémfe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi kulesa .
44008033	Bákpe wǝ kofani , nya bǝntǝ ota wǝ ǝsuǝ disi . Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo kulesa bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ befluflu ǝsuǝ , itsyise bála wǝ nkpǝ diku lǝ kasɔ mfo . ”
44008034	Nya uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi Filipo nkǝ , “ Tɛyi mɛ , wǝ kosate Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya ɔnlɛ , lee utidi bamba utsyuǝ ? ”
44008035	Mmǝ nnya Filipo dítsyiko , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ asa lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ ǝsuǝ , nya úlǝkǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kasɔ ku kase ɛnlɛ bote itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
44008036	Nya se banyɛ lǝ kusu bantɔɔ , bésu báyo kaka ntu ntsyuǝ nńyǝ lǝ usunte ɔflɔ . Nya uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi Filipo nkǝ , “ Be , nyǝ ntu ntsyuǝ ! Beso fǝmbofo mɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ buyifo mfó ? ” Nya Filipo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ afo anɔ ku fǝ utu kenkee , ebofo mu bofo . ”
44008037	
44008038	Nya uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ miǝ Yesu Kristo ni Onanto eto Ubi . ” Nya útǝ nkǝ bǝńyǝsǝ ɔtɔmini eto nkenke bomǝ , nya bédufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ , nya Filipo díflǝsǝ wǝ ntu .
44008039	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bábɔ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Bonamute eto Lɛwɔnɔ ákpa Filipo dídunko , nya uyifoyifo ninǝ ǝmfo ménsinyǝ wǝ bio . Úsukosǝ wǝ kusu ko ɔnyɛ ku disuǝyuǝ .
44008040	Nnya kamaa , Filipo ǝńyǝ nkǝ uńyǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Asoto . Idu mfóo , óbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letysa lǝ kǝmǝ ka nkpe lǝ kusu mfó kenke isu ese lefe nǝ údufǝ Kaisarea eto umǝ .
44009001	Le lefe nǝmfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , Saulo áti kama Bonamute eto bafokanɔfɔ kekleke nkǝ lǝ olo mǝ . Nya úsu Yudafɔ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ɔflɔ .
44009002	Mfó úsu ɔ́tɔ nkǝ bǝtǝ wǝ ekue lǝ ufi ɔlɛ usuko Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ lǝ Damasko lǝ ɔkɛ ǝsuǝale umuǝ basani ku besio ba kenke díkafo Ditiki Sɛɛ eto kusu fɔfɔ komfo bánɔ lǝ okpa mǝ usuko Yerusalem .
44009003	Nya lefe nǝ Saulo díkanyi ɔfi Damasko ku wǝ nsusu bomfoo , dikunǝ diyǝnde ditsyuǝ ko dítsyi kato lékpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
44009004	Údu ɔ́nɔ nya ɔ́nɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ nlɛ wǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Saulo , Saulo , beso fanlɛ mɛ bɔkpɔnko kekleke nko ? ”
44009005	Nya Saulo lɛtɔ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , fǝ owoe uni ? ” Ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Yesu wǝ fanlɛ bɔkpɔnko kekleke uni .
44009006	Mɔmɔɔ , taka lǝ esu umǝ ǝmǝ . Bɔɔtɛyi fǝ lesa nǝ ele bǝ yifo . ”
44009007	Nya betidi bamǝ ku Saulo nyɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ mfó léle bǝńyǝ , bánte lesa nǝ baatɛyi . Bánɔ nkomǝ eto etikididi , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ kuutsyuǝ saa .
44009008	Nya lefe nǝ Saulo létaka úńyǝ fɛ úminkli ǝnǝmii , wénsifo bunyǝ . Nya bálɛ wǝ lǝ kɔni bákpa wǝ bédufǝnko Damasko eto umǝ .
44009009	Úsiǝ mfo eyi ǝtsyǝ wǝnńyǝ asa , wéndi lesa , wǝnnǝ kulesa .
44009010	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , okasebi wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ ákɛ lǝ Damasko wǝ baakpo Ananias . Bonamute ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ ókpadi wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ananias ! ” Nya ɔ́tɔnɔ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nnyǝ mɔɔ ! ”
44009011	Nya Bonamute lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ ayɛ lǝ kusu ko baakpo Kusutsyɔtsyɔ , nya lǝ esu Yuda eto diyo lǝ atɔ nwǝ baakpo Saulo wǝ ditsyi Tarso eto disi . Okpe mfo ɔlɛ ɔla boto .
44009012	Nya lǝ bulǝkǝkate bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , únyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Ananias wǝ díbǝ úfi ani útǝkǝ wǝ lǝ disi itǝ bǝ usinkli nyǝ asa . ”
44009013	Mfo nya Ananias dílǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , mbɔnɔ sesiasesia bulǝ bo eto okle utidi ǝmfo nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ bokpe lǝ Yerusalem !
44009014	Nya míkanɔ tsya bǝ ófo ǝsuǝale eto ekue utsyiko lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ ubǝ umuǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke lǝ Damasko ! ”
44009015	Fɛɛ Bonamute átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su lǝ esu eyifo lesa nǝ míntɛyi fǝ . Nnya ni bǝ mbulǝkǝ utidi ǝmfo miǝ lǝ udi mɔ ɔyɛkpa wǝ luufi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ usuko mba lenni Israelfɔ ku baka ku Israelfɔ kenke lǝ bate mɛ .
44009016	Mɔ kosate ebote wǝ kase sɔ̃ɔ̃ ele bǝ ɔyɛ udi ohiã lǝ mɔ disi . ”
44009017	Nyaso Ananias ésu údufǝ diyo nǝ Saulo lɛkɛ , nya úfi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔyimi Saulo , Bonamute Yesu wǝ dílǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte fǝ lǝ kusuu , wǝ Yesu kosate ke ni futsyǝ létsyese mɛ fǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ esinkli ǝnyǝ asa nnya lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝ disiǝko fǝ . ”
44009018	Lamfolamfoo , iyifo Saulo fe bufǝ bǝfǝ lesatsyuǝ nǝ nte fe akpɛ eto dikpǝ seka lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi nya útsyiko asa bunyǝ . Nya se ótaka uńyǝǝ , béyifo wǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ .
44009019	Nya se údi lesa ólosǝǝ , usinkli údufǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úmuǝ ale . Saulo ǝsiǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ lǝ Damasko itǝ eyi asiani .
44009020	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , údu úsu Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ úsu údi etiki úlǝkǝ óte nkǝ Yesu eyifo Onanto eto Ubi .
44009021	Iyifo mba kenke lɛnɔ wǝ ditiki nǝmfo yanii . Nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni utidi ǝmfo létsya ófe úkalo Yesu eto mba ntǝkǝko wǝ lǝ Yerusalem lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ ? Nya inni bubǝ úbǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ umuǝ bafokanɔfɔ usuko besumunyǝ ninǝ ɔflɔ ? ”
44009022	Nya Saulo dísukosǝ wǝ etiki sɛtɔ ókpasɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ sitinti ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi . Yudafɔ ba lɛkɛ lǝ Damasko mfó eto kuutsyuǝ mámfo kulesa bɔtɛyi kǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Ókpasɛ mǝ nkǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ .
44009023	Lǝ lefe kpǝ eto kamaa , Yudafɔ bamǝ átsya báse uyi bǝnkǝ boolo Saulo .
44009024	Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ itsyi lǝ ketsyue kamǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bákase umǝ ǝmǝ eto mbɔsie ketsye ku kakɔmi itǝ kase buunyǝ wǝ balo eso .
44009025	Nyaso lǝ ketsye kanii , Saulo eto bayɛnkotsyuǝ éfi wǝ bákpe lǝ ditsyitsya kafo nya báyɛko wǝ ku ukuǝ lǝ dibiǝ nǝ nkpe lǝ ofati ǝsuǝ úbǝ kasɔ ɔ́bɔ údu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
44009026	Se úsu údufǝ Yerusalem , óla nkǝ lǝ usu ɔkɔ ku bakasebi ba nkpe mfó . Fɛɛ bámfo bánnɔ bǝ uyifo okasebi eso mǝ tsya áte wǝ sikpi .
44009027	Nyaso Barnaba áwunsǝko wǝ ókpa wǝ úsuko batɔnkpe bamǝ ɔflɔ ɔ́teyi mǝ kase ótsyako Bonamute lǝ kusu , nya Bonamute dídi wǝ etiki . Usi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ kase Saulo dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte údi etiki lǝ kpakpaakpe itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ lǝ Damasko .
44009028	Lǝ nyasoo , báfo wǝ bákpe lǝ mǝ nti , ɔ́kɛ ku mǝ nya báyɛ bábé Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ lǝ Yerusalem .
44009029	Nya kama údi etiki nya ókpe kǝnǝ ku Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ba laatɛyi Sigriki , fɛɛ bábɛbɛ kusu bǝ lǝ balo wǝ .
44009030	Lefe nǝmfóo , se wǝ bayimi ba ni bafokanɔfɔ lɛnɔ nnya nkoo , bákpa Saulo bésuko Kaisarea nya bákpa wǝ bátsyese wǝ umǝ Tarso .
44009031	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , bafokanɔfɔ kenke ba lɛkɛ lǝ Yudea ku Galilea ku Samariaa , ála báwɔnɔ bǝsiǝ , sikpi eto bulǝ saa mensikɛ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bǝnyǝ sɛtɔsusu nya bǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute eto kototsyuetsyue ǝsuǝ , nya béfi mǝ ǝsuǝ bákpe lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale eto bɔwunsǝko ǝsuǝ .
44009032	Petro áyɛ ótsyilama nlebe kpǝ óbe bafokanɔfɔ kenke . Nya úsu únyǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Lida tsya .
44009033	Mfó úsu únyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Ainea wǝ nlɛ bufi nlabe lǝ kalebe kani , ani ku akpa díkpǝ alɛ mfamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
44009034	Nya se Petro dínyǝ wǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ainea , Yesu Kristo átsya fǝ bufi ! Taka ǝńyǝ lǝ ǝkǝnǝ fǝ belabeke ! ” Lamfolamfo Ainea átaka uńyǝ .
44009035	Nya se betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ Lida ku Saron eto kǝmǝ dínyǝ bǝ Ainea átaka ɔlɛ bɔyɛ kafe mfóo , bátsyi bawuninsǝ béfi ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ .
44009036	Usio utsyuǝ wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ akɛ lǝ Yopa wǝ baakpo Tabita nya lǝ Sigriki ǝsuǝ bǝ Dorkas eto kasɔ ni kafɛ . Úfi wǝ lefe kenke úyifo kasɛɛ kpǝ nya úyifo kafo ɛkpɛ útǝ bakombo .
44009037	Úbǝ ɔ́nɔ bufi nya úkpǝ . Se bǝflǝsǝ wǝ ntu bálosǝǝ , bésu bálɔ wǝ bákpo lǝ abanslo kato .
44009038	Lefe nǝmfó se bánɔ bǝ Petro ǝbǝ údufǝ Lida itsyise Lida mantsyo lǝ Yopa ɔflɔɔ , bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Yopa ákpe wǝ betidi inuǝ bǝ bakpa wǝ baboko Yopa akpa akpa .
44009039	Nyaso Petro ǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ nya útǝkǝko mǝ besu kaka balabesǝ wǝ kato . Nya bakɔbǝsiǝ ba nkpe mfóo , díńyǝ batsyilama Petro banlɛ nku buwi , nya béfi awu akpa akpa nya Dorkas léka lǝ wǝ nkpǝ lefe banlɛ wǝ bote .
44009040	Petro ǝtǝ nkǝ mǝmblɛ bɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya óse akonki óto ola . Nya útsyi ǝnǝmi útǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Tabita , taka ! ” Lamfolamfo úmǝnkli wǝ ǝnǝmi , nya kase únyǝ Petro koo , ótaka úsiǝ .
44009041	Nya Petro ǝnǝ kɔni utsyuǝ nya ɔ́wunsǝko wǝ ótaka únyǝ . Petro esinkli ókpadi bafokanɔfɔ ku bakɔbǝsiǝ bamǝ bǝbǝ , nya úfi wǝ ókpe mǝ lǝ ani ku nkpǝ .
44009042	Nya ditiki nǝmfo dísensǝ lékpo lǝ Yopa mfó , itǝ betidi kpǝ áfo Bonamute bánɔ .
44009043	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Petro ǝsiǝ lǝ Yopa mfó itǝ eyi kpǝ lǝ nwǝ baakpo Simon wǝ díkeyifo kubukikue eto keyifo mfó ɔflɔ .
44010001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , osani utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ Kaisarea eto umǝ wǝ baakpo Kornelio . Uyifo uninǝ utǝ Romafɔ eto bamamanyǝ eto ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Italiafɔ .
44010002	Uyifo utidi sɛɛ nya wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke díyifo mba leesumu Onanto . Utidi ǝmfo ákawunsǝko Yudafɔ eto bakombo , nya úkato ola lefe saa kǝtǝ Onanto .
44010003	Diyi lɔni lǝ ketsyitsyokɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ sekaa , únyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ . Únyǝ lǝ bulǝkǝkate ǝsuǝ bomǝ nkǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝbǝ , nya ókpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kornelio ! ”
44010004	Nya lefe nǝ Kornelio dínyǝ wǝǝ , óbe wǝ tũũ ku sikpi nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Onamute , be ini ? ” Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kase faato ola ku kase feeyifo kafo ɛkpɛ kǝtǝ betidi édufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ .
44010005	Kpe betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ besu Yopa lǝ besu bakpadi osani wǝ baakpo Simon wǝ bensi baakpo Petro baboko .
44010006	Okpe lǝ Simon wǝ nsi lǝ lekpo ɔflɔ wǝ leeyifo kubukikuǝ eto keyifo mfo . ”
44010007	Se Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo díduu , Kornelio ákpadi wǝ diyo eto betidi inuǝ ku bamamanyǝ eto mba laase wǝ tsya eto ɔni wǝ ni utidi sɛɛ .
44010008	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lesa nǝ díbǝ , nya ókpe mǝ nkǝ besu Yopa .
44010009	Se kale dísiǝ nya banyɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ nya ibu sɛkɛ lǝ bedufǝ Yopa mfóo , Petro ábe úsu diyo nǝ bankpe eto kato itǝ kakɔmi eto lefosi abombo ǝnuǝ eto olatoto .
44010010	Kukpɛnsɛ étsyiko wǝ bɔlɛ , fɛɛ mfe banlɛ lesa bonwa nɛ . Nya únyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ .
44010011	Únyǝ se kato lɛsini , nya únyǝ lesa nǝ fe kafia flubia kplɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka lɛmɔ , nya banlɛ kǝ lǝ esi ana nyamǝ ketsyi kato kanlɛ kasɔ bubǝ .
44010012	Lǝ kafia kamǝ kafo aakǝ bebuki akpa akpa ku bawa ku baklɔbɛ .
44010013	Mfó ɔ́nɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Petro , taka , lo lǝ edi ! ”
44010014	Fɛɛ Petro édi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Kulefe ! Bonamute , méndi tɔ kulesa nǝ Yudafɔ leekisi budi nyǝ ! ”
44010015	Ɔkɔɛ emfo esi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ Onanto díyifo kɛnkɛɛ , mantɛyi fǝ iyifo ekisisa ! ”
44010016	Únyǝ bulǝkǝ kate bomfo sitsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ . Nya ditsyǝfǝ kamaa , bétsyi kafia kamfo besuko kato .
44010017	Lefe nǝmfoo , ditsyǝbi nǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ léte mfó éyifo Petro yanii , nyaso ɔ́tɔ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Be nnya mínyǝ mfo lete , nnya kasɔ nkpǝ ? ” Lefe nǝmfo kee , betidi ba Kornelio lékpe mfó ǝbǝ bédufǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Nya se bǝnyǝ diyo nǝ banlɛ bɔbɔbɛɛ , bǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ ni kesie .
44010018	Nya bǝńyǝ banlɛ kaka Simon Petro nkpe disi bɔtɔ .
44010019	Nya se Petro dísiǝ úkǝbu disi itsyi lǝ bulǝkǝkate bo únyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ ídi wǝ etiki lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebe basani itsyǝ ǝbǝ balɛ fǝ bɔbɛbɛ .
44010020	Taka , muǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ esu ko mǝ . Mante sikpi ku mǝ butǝkǝko kesu . Mɔ uni létsyese mǝ . ”
44010021	Nyaso Petro ésu únyǝ mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni nwǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ . Bomfo buɛɛ . ”
44010022	Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Butsyi Kornelio wǝ ni Romafɔ eto omamanyǝ ninǝ ɔflɔ . Uyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ lǝǝsumu Onanto . Nya Yudafɔ kenke laala wǝ asa tinti . Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ okpe fǝ utidi lǝ ǝbǝ wǝ diyo lǝ ɔnɔ fǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki nya fanyɛnko . ”
44010023	Lǝ nyaso Petro átɔnɔ ókpa mǝ údufǝnko kaka onkpe nya ófo mǝ fe wǝ bafɔ útǝ bátsyimɛ wǝ ɔflɔ . Se kale dísiǝǝ , ótaka útǝkǝko mǝ . Nya bafokanɔfɔ ba ditsyi Yopa mfo eto bǝtsyuǝ dítǝkǝko mǝ bésu .
44010024	Bésu bédufǝ Kaisarea kǝsiǝsǝ . Lefe nǝmfóo , Kornelio ébokpo wǝ diyo eto betidi utsyǝ ku wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ bǝtsyuǝ nya bensi bensǝkǝ Petro eto bubǝ kedufǝ .
44010025	Kase Petro nlɛ diyo nǝmǝ budufǝǝ , Kornelio átsyako wǝ nya óse akonko lǝ Petro eto ǝnǝmi nya óbokosǝ wǝ disi kasɔ .
44010026	Fɛɛ Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ ! Mintsya utidi ǝtǝ mini . ”
44010027	Nya lǝ kase bantɔ banlɛ etiki budii , Kornelio ákpa wǝ úsuko kaka betidi fɛfɛ létsya bensi .
44010028	Nya Petro lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kosate yi biǝ bo Yudafɔ eto kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu nkǝ ndufǝ utidi wǝ lenni bo ɔni eto diyo nye nsu wǝ ɔflɔ kulaatsya . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte mɛ nkǝ membu kuutsyuǝ saa fe utidi wǝ dimeńyǝ utǝ lee menyifo kɛnkɛ .
44010029	Lǝ nyaso se fákpe fǝ bakpadi mɛɛ , mánni nya míntaka mímbǝ nɛ . Nya beso bɛnlɛ mɛ bokpadi ? ”
44010030	Kornelio átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fe eyi ana ni nnya léfee mmǝǝ , nya lǝ lefe nǝmfo sekaa , se minlɛ ola boto lǝ kakɔmi eto ǝtsyǝ eto lefe lǝ mɔ diyoo , lefua utidi utsyuǝ ko lɛbɔ úńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝnǝmi , okpe awu nnya díkǝyǝnde !
44010031	Ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Kornelio , Onanto ánɔ fǝ olatoto ku kase feeyifo kafo ɛkpɛ kǝtǝ betidi . Nyaso kpe betidi lǝ besu Yopa lǝ bakpadi nwǝ baakpo Simon wǝ bensi baakpo Petro wǝ nkpe lǝ Simon wǝ leeyifo keyifo kubukikue eto lǝ lekpo ɔflɔ baboko . ’
44010032	
44010033	Nko eso lamfolamfo mínkpe fǝ ɔtɔnkpe miǝ ubǝ okpadi fǝ lǝ ǝbǝ nya fintsya lekplatsya fátaka fákpe akpa kusu fǝbǝ nɛ . Nyaso bomblɛ si lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi mfo busǝkǝ fǝ bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ atɛyi bo ditiki nǝ Bonamute lɛtɛyi fǝ nkǝ batɛyi bo . ”
44010034	Nyaso Petro édi mǝ etiki nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo sitinti minkǝ Onanto aambe betidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ wǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
44010035	Bomu kusǝ saa eto utidi wǝ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kǝtǝ wǝ , keyifo kasɛɛ , wǝ waala nɛ .
44010036	Mfo nnɔ miǝ bɛnɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ óte Israelfɔ bǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni betidi kenke eto Onamute ǝsuǝǝ , boonyǝ diyuǝ .
44010037	Biyi lesa kplɛ nǝ díbǝ Israel eto kasɔ kenke idu lǝ lefe nǝ Yohanes lébe letsya lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ itsyi lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmɔ ǝsuǝ .
44010038	Nya bɛnɔ tsya kase Onanto lékpo Yesu wǝ ditsyi Nasaret ɔhile utsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ úfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ku ǝsuǝale útǝ wǝ . Nya ótsyilama úkeyifo asa sɛɛ , nya ótsya mba Obonsam díkelǝ kɛlɛkɛ mǝ ketsyiko lǝ bulǝ bomǝ ǝsuǝ itsyise Onanto ǝsiǝ ko wǝ .
44010039	“ Búdi adansiɛ lǝ asa nnya kenke úyifo lǝ Israel eto kasɔ ku Yerusalem . Mfó ǝmǝ básɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bálo nɛ .
44010040	Fɛɛ Onanto esi ótaka wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ óte betidi dínyǝ .
44010041	Fɛɛ inni betidi ba kenke dínyǝ wǝ . Bomu bo mba Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ budi wǝ badansiɛɛ , bo ni mba dínyǝ wǝ nɛ . Nya búdi nya búnǝ ku wǝ lǝ wǝ botaka kǝńyǝ eto kama .
44010042	Bo ni mba ótsyese nkǝ busu bɔtɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kalebe saa butǝ betidi nɛ . Nya lǝ bulǝkǝ bote boǝnkǝ , Onanto ni futsyǝ dílǝkǝ Yesu fe Okponkpo itǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ku kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke .
44010043	Nya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba kenke dídi etiki itsyi lǝ wǝ bǝnkǝ utsyuǝ saa kee léfo wǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , Onanto ebufi wǝ abua ɔtsyɛ wǝ lǝ Yesu eto diye eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . ”
44010044	Nya lefe nǝ Petro ńyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki nyamfo budii , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ áyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ mba kenke lɛkɛ mfo banlɛ Petro eto ditiki nǝmǝ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ !
44010045	Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba dítǝkǝko Petro betsyi Yopa bǝbǝ mfóo , etiki nyamǝ éyifo mǝ yanii ! Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ áyifǝ díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya ǝsuǝ .
44010046	Fɛɛ bǝmbofo bɔtɛyi bǝ inni nko ini . Itsyise bánɔ se banlɛ bele bamba kpǝ bɔtɛyi katɛsɛ Onanto . Nya Petro lɛtɛyi nkǝ ,
44010047	“ Betidi bamfo tsya áfo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ fe kase bo tsya lefo esoo , boǝmbofo bɔni boǝ boǝmbuflǝsǝ mǝ ntu . ”
44010048	Nyaso útǝ kusu nkǝ bǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , bálɛ Petro lekpakpa bǝ usiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ itǝ eyi asiani .
44011001	Yanklɛ fɛ batɔnkpe bamǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ bamba lǝ Yudea lɛnɔ bǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya ébɔtsyi báwuninsǝ báfo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ .
44011002	Nyaso lefe nǝ Petro dísinkli úsu Yerusalem eto umǝǝ , Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba lɛkɛ mfóo , mántɔnɔ ko wǝ . Nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
44011003	“ Beso fésu fásɔnɔ lǝ bafɔ ba dímanla alo nya fákpe kɔni lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni ǝsuǝ fédi lesa ku mǝ ? ”
44011004	Nyaso Petro ǝlǝkǝ etiki nyamfo kenke kasɔ óte mǝ nkǝ ,
44011005	“ Lǝ lefe nǝ minkɛ lǝ Yopa minlɛ ola botoo , nnyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ . Mfó mínyǝ kafia kplɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka banlɛ lǝ esi ana kétsyi kato banlɛ kǝ kasɔ bobokosǝ lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ .
44011006	Se minlɛ ola mímbee , nnyǝ bebuki akpa akpa eto kakle kpe lǝ kafia kamǝ kafo , batobuki ku betubuki ku mba laabɔdi lǝ kasɔ ku baklɔbɛ ákpo mfó .
44011007	Ete mínɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ nlɛ etiki budi katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Petro ! Taka , lo lǝ edi ! ’
44011008	“ Nyaso nlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Kula o-o ! Kulefe ! Bonamute , méndi tɔ kulesa nǝ Yudafɔ leekisi budi nyǝ . ’
44011009	“ Fɛɛ ɔkɔɛ ǝmfo esi údi etiki útsyi kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lesa nǝ Onanto diyifo kɛnkɛɛ , mantɛyi fǝ diyifo dimankpa . ’
44011010	“ Nnyǝ bulǝkǝkate bomfo sitsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ . Lǝ nnya kamaa , kafia kplɛ kamfo ka eto kafo bebuki bamfo nkpoo , bétsyi ke bábesǝ kato isu ese lefe nǝ kánya vĩĩ .
44011011	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó tututuu , betidi itsyǝ ba bákpe bǝ bakpa mɛ baboko Kaisarea ǝbǝ bédufǝ diyo nǝ minkɛ .
44011012	Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ ntǝkǝko mǝ lǝ busu . Mɔ bayimi ekua bamfo ditsyi Yopaa , ǝtǝkǝko mɛ busu Kaisarea búsu búdufǝ osani wǝ lekpe mɛ batɔnkpe ini Kornelio eto diyo .
44011013	Ɔ́tɛyi bo kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bɛbɛ utsyuǝ akpe Yopa lǝ usu ɔbɛbɛ nwǝ baakpo Simon Petro .
44011014	Wuudi mi etiki nnya luutǝ bǝ fǝ ku fǝ diyo eto betidi kenke luunyǝ bofo . ’
44011015	“ Fɛ míntsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyii , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ébubǝ dídufǝ mǝ mǝmblɛ kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase dídufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ kamǝ !
44011016	Nyamfo dítǝ mínkloma lesa nǝ Bonamute lɛtɛyi lefe nǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Sitinti Yohanes efi ntu uflǝsǝ betidi . Fɛɛ Onanto ebufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ uflǝsǝ mi . ’
44011017	Nya lǝ Onanto ǝtǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ ǝtǝsa nyamfo fe kase úfi útǝ bo lǝ lefe nǝ bófo Bonamute Yesu Kristo bɔ́nɔɔ , owoe mini bǝ lǝ mmfo Onanto kusu buti nko ? ”
44011018	Se bánɔ etiki nyamfoo , bénsite lesa nǝ bɔtɛyi . Bomu bátɛsǝ Onanto bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sitinti Onanto ǝtǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya kusu nkǝ batsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ . ”
44011019	Nya lefe nǝ asa nyamfo nlɛ bubǝ nkoo , bafokanɔfɔ ba dítsyǝtsyi bédu lǝ bulǝ bo dítu mǝ itsyi lǝ kase bálo Stefano ǝsuǝǝ , bésu bédufǝ Foinike ku Kipro ku Antiokia eto kǝmǝ . Nya bátsyilama banlɛ ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyi Yudafɔ hã .
44011020	Nya bafokanɔfɔ ba ditsyi Kipro ku Kirene dísu Antiokia bésu bátɛyi betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ Bonamute Yesu eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
44011021	Nya se Bonamute eto ǝsuǝale lɛkɛ ko mǝ esoo , bafokanɔfɔ ba dífi ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Bonamute ǝbǝ befui bakpe .
44011022	Lefe nǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , bátsyese Barnaba bǝ usu lǝ usu obe lesa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Antiokia .
44011023	Se úsu údufǝ mfó nya únyǝ kase Onanto lɛwunsǝ ko mǝǝ , únyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti nya usi ókpe mǝ nkɛale nkǝ bǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya lǝ bedi ɔnukualɛ bǝtǝ Bonamute ku mǝ utu kenke .
44011024	Barnaba eyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ nkpe bofokanɔ nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi ko wǝ tinti . Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bɔwunsǝko ǝsuǝǝ , bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ ǝbǝ befui bakpe .
44011025	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Barnaba ésu Tarso , úsu ɔ́bɛbɛ Saulo mfo .
44011026	Se únyǝ wǝǝ , ókpa wǝ bédu bǝbǝ Antiokia nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ dísiǝ mfó lɛlɛ wɔlɔlɔ . Bakɛ mfó bákate betidi kpǝ asa . Antiokia mfóo , nya betsyiko bafokanɔfɔ bokpo bǝ Kristofɔ nɛ .
44011027	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo tututuu , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bǝtsyuǝ etsyi Yerusalem bǝbǝ Antiokia .
44011028	Mfó mǝ nti eto ɔni wǝ baakpo Agabo , létaka uńyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ kukpɛnsɛ kekleke ebubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke . Nyamfo ǝbǝ ítǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ wǝ baakpo Klaudio nlɛ seka budi .
44011029	Nyaso bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ éfi nsusu bǝ baako asa lǝ befi batsyese bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ . Nya mǝ utsyuǝ saa léko kase woofo .
44011030	Nya se báko bikǝ biamǝǝ , béfi mi bǝtǝ Barnaba ku Saulo nya béfi mi bésu bǝtǝ Yudea eto bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ .
44012001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ , Oka Herodes ǝmuǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ lǝ ókpe mǝ bulǝ kekleke .
44012002	Útǝ balo Yakobo wǝ ni Yohanes eto ɔyimisani ku lesiabi .
44012003	Nya se únyǝ nkǝ nnya úyifo ákɛ Yudafɔ ɔkɔɛɛ , úmuǝ Petro tsya lǝ lefe nǝ beedi Abolo nnya Ǝyǝnkisǝsa Lǝmbǝ eto Diyi .
44012004	Se bǝmuǝ wǝǝ , bákpe wǝ lǝ diyo kaka mba laase diyo nǝmǝ eto ena ena eto akpa ana ba laafloma bǝtsyuǝ ńyǝ lefe saa banlɛ wǝ bose . Herodes eto nsusu ni bǝ lǝ ubǝ ufi wǝ utǝ betidi lǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ diyisɛɛ nǝ baakpo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto kama .
44012005	Nyaso mba laase mfó ákase Petro lǝ diyo nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ ákato ola kekleke ákalɛ Onanto lekpakpa lǝ wǝ disi .
44012006	Nya lǝ ketsye ka eto kǝsiǝsǝ ka Herodes díbu disi nkǝ wútǝlǝkǝ Petro lǝ diyo utǝ betidi bamǝǝ , Petro álabe selabe lǝ mba laase eto inuǝ eto nti . Nya bákpe wǝ lǝ kɔnyɔ kplɛ ko béfi batsyasǝ lǝ mǝ kosate eto ani ǝsuǝ . Nya fɛ mba laase mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ díńyǝ banlɛ siku siamǝ bose .
44012007	Akpaakpa koo , Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe ko lɛbɔ nya lekpasǝ léfo diyo nǝmǝ kenke . Nya Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe dífi wǝ kɔni útǝkǝ Petro lǝ lekpake ósanklisǝ wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Kɔse mlǝ lǝ ataka ǝńyǝ ! ” Kɔnyɔ kplɛ ko nkpe wǝ lǝ kɔni lɛsini kɔ́bɔ kókpo lǝ kasɔ .
44012008	Nya Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ awu ku afɔkpa akpe . ” Nya Petro díyifo nko . Nya Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ disi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ awu kɛntsyɛ akpe lǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
44012009	Nya Petro létaka útǝkǝko wǝ , nya ɔ́bɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo . Lefe nǝmfo kenkee , wánte lǝ lesa nǝ Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ nlɛ buyifo eyifo sitinti , úbu nkǝ kola ete ɔnlɛ busiǝ .
44012010	Nya báyɛ báfe mba laase eto ditsyukpa tutɛ ku bǝnuǝfǝ . Nya se báyo situ eto kesie kplɛ ka baayɛ kedufǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , siku siamǝ kosate ko lɛsini ǝsuǝ . Nya báyɛ lǝ kesie kamǝ tsya báfe . Nya se báyɛ bésu sɛtɔ sɛkɛɛ , Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ko lénya údu lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
44012011	Lǝ nnya kamaa , fɛ Petro léte lesa nǝ díbǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔ mbote miǝ sitinti ini bǝ Bonamute létsyese wǝ Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo nkǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ Herodes eto ani ku asa nnya Yudafɔ díbu bǝ booyifo mɛ tsya lǝ diyo nǝmfo kafo ! ”
44012012	Nya se únyǝ nnya díbǝ utsyǝ lekpoo , údu úsu Maria wǝ ni Yohanes Marko eto ambe eto diyo kaka betidi kpǝ létsya banlɛ ola boto .
44012013	Nya se Petro léyo diyo nǝmǝ eto kǝsiǝǝ , ɔ́sɔ siku siamǝ . Nya uyifoyifosiobi utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Roda ábɔ úsu nkǝ woabe futsyuǝ uni .
44012014	Se ɔ́nɔ Petro eto ɔkɔɛ utsyǝ lekpoo , únyǝ disuǝyuǝ ofensǝ ! Itǝ wánsini wǝ siku siamǝ , bomu útsyetsyi úsu wǝ betidi ɔflɔ úsu ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ Petro ǝbǝ uńyǝ lǝ siku kama .
44012015	Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntɔ disi lébia fǝ ? ” Nya usi úńyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nkǝ sitinti ini . Nyaso bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ ǝtsyuǝǝ , wǝ kato eto ɔtɔnkpe uni ! ”
44012016	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , Petro esi úńyǝ ɔlɛ kesie eto siku bɔsɔ . Nya lefe nǝ básini se nya bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , íyifo mǝ yanii .
44012017	Úyifo mǝ kɔni nkǝ bánkpo kudu . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ asa nnya díbǝ ku kase Bonamute díbǝ úlǝkǝ we utsyiko lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛtɛyi Yakobo ku bayimi bafɛfɛ asa nnya díbǝ . ” Nya udu mǝ lǝ ɔflɔ úsu kalebe bamba .
44012018	Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , íyifo mba laase mfó yaa , nya éboko bulǝ kpǝ . Bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se tutuutu Petro lefe mɔmɔ ? ”
44012019	Nya Herodes ǝtǝ bábɛbɛ wǝ tinti , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ . Útǝ bǝmuǝ mba laase diyo nǝmǝ bákpoko mǝ lekpo , nya útǝ nkǝ balo mǝ . Lǝ nnya kamaa , Herodes édu lǝ Yudea úsu úsiǝ lǝ Kaisarea itǝ lefe ditsyuǝ .
44012020	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Herodes ǝnyǝ ɔblɔ tinti ókpe Tiro ku Sidon eto betidi , nyaso bésu lǝ sitiditu ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ besu bǝnyǝ wǝ . Bésu bátɔ bɔwunsǝko betsyi lǝ Blasto wǝ ni Herodes eto nwǝ laabe diyo ɔflɔ bǝ ɔlɛ Herodes lekpakpa lǝ utǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo lǝ dibǝ lǝ mǝ inuǝ bamǝ ku Herodes eto nti . Ibǝ nko itsyise Herodes eto kasɔ bǝkǝnyǝ mǝ didisa ketsyiko .
44012021	Nya lǝ diyi nǝ Oka Herodes ditsyǝ mǝǝ , ókpe wǝ bekankǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ údi betidi bamǝ etiki .
44012022	Se údi etiki ólosǝǝ , betidi bamǝ áfa básɔ ani bǝtǝ wǝ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto Kosate eto ɔkɔɛ uni ! Inni utidi ! ”
44012023	Lamfolamfoo , Bonamute eto Ɔtɔnkpe ákpe Herodes bufi lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise wémfi atɛsɛ Onanto . Nya batsyini dídi wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke , nya úkpǝ .
44012024	Nya Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lɛyɛ letsyo , dísensǝ nya bafokanɔfɔ difui bakpe .
44012025	Nya lefe nǝ Barnaba ku Saulo lélosǝ mǝ keyifo ka bákpe mǝ bǝ besu beyifoo , bésinkli betsyi Yerusalem bǝbǝ nya bákpa Yohanes wǝ tsya baakpo Marko báyɛnko báboko .
44013001	Lǝ Antiokiaa , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bǝtsyuǝ ku bateasa ákɛ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ nti . Mǝ ni Barnaba ku Simon wǝ baakpo utidi naa ku Lukio wǝ ditsyi Kirene ku Manaen nwǝ ku Oka Herodes békluǝsǝ bakɔ taa mǝ sikpefi lefe ku Saulo .
44013002	Nya lefe nǝ banlɛ Bonamute bɔtǝsǝ nya bakɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝbǝ dídi mǝ etiki nkǝ , “ Bilǝkǝ Barnaba ku Saulo bitsyǝ itǝ keyifo ka eso mínkpadi mǝ . ”
44013003	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , beninǝ bamǝ ákle kɛnyɛ nya báto ola nya bǝtǝkǝ mǝ ani , nya bǝtsyǝ mǝ kusu .
44013004	Se Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ditsyǝ mǝ kusu lélosǝǝ , bésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Seleukia . Mfó béfi ɔklɔ báyila lekpo nǝmǝ bésu kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama eto umǝ wǝ baakpo Kipro .
44013005	Se bésu bédufǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Salamii , bésu Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ bésu bédi mǝ ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Nya Marko Yohanes díkǝko mǝ fe mǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ .
44013006	Se bédu mfóo , báyɛ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ bésu bédufǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Pafo . Mfó bátsyako Yudanyǝ wǝ ni ofate wǝ ni sedia eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ baakpo Bar-Yesu eto ubi .
44013007	Ofate ǝmfo ku Aba eto unyɛsiǝ wǝ baakpo Sergio Paulo eyifo bayɛtsyuǝ . Nko eto Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ǝmfo wǝ diyifo obesibe ákpadi Barnaba ku Saulo nkǝ bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ , itsyise óla nkǝ lǝ ɔnɔ Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
44013008	Nya se bésuu , ofate ǝmǝ wǝ baakpo tsya bǝ Elima lǝ Sigriki ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnǝ etiki ku mǝ . Óla nkǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ǝmfo eto nsusu utsyiko lǝ etiki nnya Saulo ku Barnaba lela bǝ beedi ǝsuǝ .
44013009	Fɛɛ Saulo wǝ tsya bensi baakpo Pauloo , ábe ofate ǝmfo ku lɛblɔfi kekleke . Nya úlǝkǝ óte wǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale nkǝ , “ Fǝ Obonsam eto ubi , eyifo odia ku nwǝ laawɛ betidi kakpe . Nya feekisi kasɛyifoyifo , nya faatsyi Bonamute eto ɔnukualɛtiki kawuninsǝ keyifo bidia !
44013010	
44013011	Bonamute ebutǝkǝ fǝ kɔni mɔmɔ nya wuutǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi ba , nya fensiembunyǝ kofe bio isu ese lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ eto kama ! ” Lamfolamfo lɛtɔntɔ eti Elima lǝ ǝnǝmi , nya wénsifo asa bunyǝ bio . Úkawunya ani kabɛbɛ utidi nkǝ lǝ ɔyɛnko wǝ .
44013012	Lefe nǝmfo se Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ǝmfó dínyǝ nyamfo nkoo , íyifo wǝ yanii , nya ófo Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmǝ ɔ́nɔ .
44013013	Nnya kamaa , Paulo ku mba ntǝkǝko wǝ ésu bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya bédu lǝ Pafo bésu Perge wǝ ni umǝnkplɛ wǝ nkpe lǝ Pamfilia eto kasɔ . Mfó nya Marko Yohanes dídu mǝ lǝ ɔflɔ úsinkli úsu Yerusalem .
44013014	Se bédu lǝ Pergee , bésu Antiokia , umǝnkplɛ wǝ nkpe lǝ Pisidia . Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , bésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya bǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti .
44013015	Lefe nǝ bákakla asa betsyiko lǝ Moses eto kɔfi eto kukue ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asawɔniwɔni bálosǝǝ , katsyakɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ǝtǝ Paulo ku wǝ bǝtsyuǝ bote bǝ , “ Bayimi , lǝ utsyuǝ kpe ditiki ditsyuǝ nkǝ woatɛyi lǝ ufi okpe bo nkɛalee , lǝ ubǝ ɔtɛyi . ”
44013016	Mfó Paulo létaka uńyǝ nya óte kɔni kato lete bǝ bedi kaa , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Israelfɔ ku mimba kenke ba lenni Israelfɔ ba leetsyue Onanto koto , bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ !
44013017	Israelfɔ eto Onanto ni nwǝ dílǝkǝ bo banamǝ nya ókpo mǝ atsyɔ . Nya úyifo mǝ kusǝ kplɛ eto betidi lǝ lefe nǝ bǝsiǝ kafɔle ka ni Egipte . Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ utsyiko Egipte ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
44013018	Óbe mǝ nya ókpa mǝ ɔ́yɛnko lǝ mfiminti itǝ alɛ fosi ana nnya bákɛ mfo .
44013019	Se ɔ́tsylɔsǝ ǝsǝ akuanse lǝ Kanan eto kasɔɔ , úfi mǝ kasɔ kamǝ utǝ Israelfɔ fe mǝ kedikɔ .
44013020	Nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ itǝ fe alɛ alofa ana awosi anɔ eto nti . “ Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto ǝtǝ mǝ bakponkpo ba dídi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ isu ese Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Samuel eto lefe .
44013021	Nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ utsyǝ oka utǝ mǝ . Nya Onanto dítǝ mǝ Kis eto ubi Saulo wǝ ditsyi Benyamin eto kafo , nya údi seka itǝ alɛ fosi ana .
44013022	Nnya kamaa , Onanto átakasǝ wǝ lǝ seka ǝsuǝ nya úfi David úsiǝsǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . David ǝmfo ni utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto dídi etiki utsyiko nkǝ , ‘ Yese eto ubi David ni utidi wǝ mɔ utu laala , itsyise wuuyifo lesa nǝ maala . ’
44013023	“ Nko ke ini bǝ Onanto áyɛ lǝ David eto kafo , nya úlǝkǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ ni Yesu utǝ Israelfɔ fe kase utsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ .
44013024	Nya fɛ Yesu luubǝǝ , Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ǝbǝ ɔ́tɛyi Israelfɔ kenke nkǝ batsyi mǝ nkpǝ bawuninsɛ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi bayɛ abua buuyifo lǝ uflǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
44013025	Lǝ lefe nǝ Yohanes eto keyifo nlɛ kalosɛkɔ bubǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamǝ nkǝ , ‘ Owoe bibu biǝ wǝ mini ? Mɔ ni nwǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobe le ? Owo lo ! Fɛɛ wǝ kpe lǝ kusu ɔlɛ bubǝ mɛ kama , nya mǝnńyǝtǝ bǝ nyankli wǝ afukpa eto kekue kulaa tsya ! ’
44013026	“ Mɔ bayimi , Israel bebi , mi mba ni Abraham eto bebi ku mimba lenni Yudafɔ fɛ biesumu Onanto , nkpǝ manlo eto bofo bomfo ǝbǝ itǝ bomblɛ kenke .
44013027	Betidi ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem ku mǝ beninǝ mámfo Yesu bánɔ bǝ wǝ ni mǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝmǝ . Nya bánnɔ kasɔ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ditiki nǝ baakla kate bo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi saa ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ bǝtǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto etiki ǝbǝ itǝ se bálo wǝ dikpǝnkpi eso .
44013028	Nya ite bǝ bǝnnyǝ kabua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , bátɛyi Pilato bǝ utǝ kusu lǝ balo wǝ .
44013029	“ Nya lefe nǝ békeyifo lesa nǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi utsyǝ itsyi lǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bálosǝǝ , bǝlǝkǝ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bésu bebikǝ .
44013030	Fɛɛ Onanto átakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ .
44013031	Nya lǝ eyi kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , úlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte betidi ba wonko mǝ lɛyɛ itsyi Galilea isu Yerusalem . Mǝ ni betidi ba nlɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Israel eto kusǝ nɛ .
44013032	“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , búbǝ mfo boǝ boefi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ boboko mi bǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ bo banamǝǝ , ǝbǝ itǝ bo , bo mba ni mǝ bebi . Nnya ni bǝ Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ Yesu si otaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nkpǝ . Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ David lɛwɔni lǝ wǝ kusǝnkue nuǝfǝ kafo nkǝ Onanto átɛyi itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Ubi feni . Nya mmii , mbofiani fǝ anto . ’
44013033	
44013034	Nya nyamfo ni lesa nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ botakasǝ ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ ni nkǝ wembubu lǝ kudi kafo . ‘ Mookpo fǝ atsyɔ nnya diyifo kɛnkɛ fe kase mínse uyi mintsyǝ miǝ mookpo David . ’
44013035	Nko usi ɔ́tɛyi lǝ David eto kusǝ bamba nkǝ , ‘ Mǝmbutǝ bǝ fǝ uyifoyifo kɛnkɛ ǝmfo kɛ lǝ kudi kafo ebú . ’
44013036	“ Ditiki nǝmfo manyɛ lǝ David eto kutsyǝ itsyise usiǝ nkpǝ úyifo Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ , nya ukpǝ nya bébikǝ wǝ ku wǝ bana mǝ nya wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ tsya díbú .
44013037	Fɛɛ nwǝ Onanto létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ mémbú lǝ kudi kafo .
44013038	“ Nyaso bayimi , bola boǝ bete lǝ ekpa bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu ǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya bábe abuabufikatsyɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ letsya bǝtǝ mi nɛ .
44013039	Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ lefo Yesu ɔnɔɔ , Onanto ebufi wǝ abua ɔtsyɛ wǝ nya weembolo wǝ dikpi . Nyamfo ni lesa lɔni nǝ Moses eto kɔfi dímamfo buyifo kulefe nɛ .
44013040	Nyaso bebe kukɔnɔ ! Biǝntǝ lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto etiki nnya bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ lǝ ɛyɛ bubǝ kǝtǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nko .
44013041	Itsyise Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe mimba lǝǝmǝ mɔ ditiki . Bitǝ lǝ iyifo mi yanii lǝ bǝtsylɔ ! Itsyise lesa nǝ minlɛ buyifo mmii , iyifo lesa nǝ biembofo bɛnɔ , lǝ utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ni kasɔ ote mi kulaa tsya . ’ ”
44013042	Se Paulo ku Barnaba nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ disikakpekɔ mfóo , betidi bamǝ átɛyi mǝ bǝ besi bǝbǝ bedi mǝ etiki nyamfo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyuǝ eto diyi nǝ luubǝ .
44013043	Nya lefe nǝ bésensǝ lǝ disikakpekɔ mfóo , Yudafɔ kpǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ ba léfiani Yudafɔ nya baate Onanto sikpi ba lɛkɛ lǝ disikakpekɔ mfóo , ǝtǝkǝko Paulo ku Barnaba . Batɔnkpe bamǝ édi mǝ etiki nya balɛ mǝ kɔlɛ bǝ bǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ le lefonǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
44013044	Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝ disi dítǝkǝko nǝmfóo , ibu sɛkɛɛ eni umǝ ǝmǝ kenke eto betidi ǝbǝ disikakpekɔ nǝmǝ lǝ banɔ Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
44013045	Nya lefe nǝ Yudafɔ eto beninǝ dínyǝ sitiditu sia díbǝ disikakpekɔ mfóo , básɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bétsyiko etiki bunǝ ku Paulo lǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ nya báka wǝ .
44013046	Fɛɛ Paulo ku Barnaba ákpe utu besi bédi etiki bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ele bǝ budi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo itǝ Yudafɔ bɔtɔnsǝ . Nya se bɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfo nya bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ bianla nkpǝ manlo bomfoo , búfi ni bɔlɛ mba lenni Yudafɔ butǝ .
44013047	Nyamfo ni kɔfi ko Bonamute dítǝ bo nkǝ , ‘ Nnyifo fǝ fe okandiɛ ntǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ bǝ lǝ efi bofo aboko kawunsiǝ eto lɛkpɔ saa . ’ ”
44013048	Nya lefe nǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ lɛnɔ lesa nǝ bátɛyi mfoo , bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , nya bátɛsǝ Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmǝ . Nya mba kenke Onanto dílǝkǝ itǝ nkpǝ manloo , áfo bánɔ .
44013049	Nya Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmǝ dísensǝ dísu kasɔ kamǝ kenke .
44013050	Fɛɛ Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ édi ute bákpe lǝ besio ba nkpe dibu ba leesumu Onanto ku umǝ eto beninǝ eto nti . Nya bétsyiko Paulo ku Barnaba bulǝ kǝńyǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bála mǝ babɔsǝ lǝ mǝ lekpake mfó .
44013051	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ banlɛ budu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , báflɛ utembu wǝ nkpo mǝ lǝ akpa bákpo lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ nnya léte bǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi áni mǝ . Nyamfo eto kamaa , bédu mfo bésu Ikonion .
44013052	Nya bafokanɔfɔ ba lɛkɛ lǝ Antiokia mfó dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti nya béyi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ .
44014001	Nya se bédufǝ Ikonion tsyaa , Paulo ku Barnaba ésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó . Nya se bátɛyi Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝǝ , mǝ nti eto betidi kpǝ áfo bánɔ .
44014002	Nya Yudafɔ ba dímamfo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bánɔɔ , ǝnǝ etiki ku mǝ nya bábiasǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto nsusu nya bǝtǝ bǝ bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Paulo ku Barnaba lǝ ǝsuǝ .
44014003	Fɛɛ batɔnkpe bamǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ itǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ ditsyuǝ ákate Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku ute . Nya Onanto tsya dílǝkǝ wǝ lefonǝ eto etiki eto sitinti óte ɛyɛ lǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya útǝ béyifo ǝsuǝ .
44014004	Ibǝ bǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi áma lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ , bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝkǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kama nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya dítǝkǝ lǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ eto kama .
44014005	Lǝ lefǝ ditsyuǝ eto kamaa , umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi betsyuǝ ba leeni Yudafɔ ku Yudafɔ ku mǝ beninǝ éfi nsusu bǝ bataka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ bakpɔ mǝ aba . Batɔnkpe bamǝ ánɔ mǝ ketsyue kamǝ , nya bétsyetsyi bédu bésu Likaonia eto kǝmǝ ka ni Listra ku Derbe ku kǝmǝ ka nkpe lǝ lekpake mfó .
44014006	
44014007	Nya bédi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfó .
44014008	Se bésu Listraa , osani utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ lɛtsyini taa lefe nǝ bále wǝ nya wámfo tɔ botaka kayɛ kulefe .
44014009	Úsiǝ mfó úkanɔ ditiki sɛɛ nǝ Paulo ńyǝ ɔnlɛ budi . Nya se Paulo lébe wǝ tũũ , únyǝ nkǝ ófo ɔ́nɔ nya wǝ bufi bomǝ luuyuǝ wǝǝ ,
44014010	Nyaso Paulo áfã bembembe ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ lǝ fǝ akpa ǝsuǝ ! ” Nya osani ǝmfo lésa ótaka úńyǝ nya útsyiko bɔyɛ kafe .
44014011	Se betidi ba díńyǝ mfó banlɛ ditiki nǝmǝ ato butsyue dínyǝ lesa nǝ Paulo díyifoo , báfã bembembe lǝ Likaoniafɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ bátɛyi nkǝ , “ Bananto beni ! Báyifǝ bǝbǝ bo nti fenkǝ betidi ! ”
44014012	Lǝ nyaso bǝtǝkǝ Barnaba diye bǝ Seus . Nya bǝtǝkǝ Paulo tsya bǝ Herme , itsyise wǝ ni futsyǝ díńyǝ nlɛ etiki budi nɛ .
44014013	Nya Seus eto usumunyǝ , nwǝ eto kesumukɔ ńyǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabanto mfóo , éfi banantsyui ku kaflawasi óboko nkǝ lǝ wǝ ku wǝ betidi bamǝ lǝ befi bǝtǝ batɔnkpe bamfo kedi lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabɔsie .
44014014	Nya lefe nǝ Paulo ku Barnaba lɛnɔ lesa nǝ baala bǝ beeyifoo , bǝnǝ mǝ kosate eto awu nnya bankpe báfuadi , nya bétsyetsyi bédufǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti . Mfó nya báfã
44014015	bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boantomǝ , be bɛnlɛ buyifo mfó ? Bontsya kasɔ kamfo eto betidi ete buni fe mi ke . Búbǝ mfo boǝ boefi ditiki sɛɛ nǝmfo boboko mi . Bisinkli bɛyɛ asa bimba nyamfo eto kakle buyifo lǝ bifi atɛsǝ bitǝ Onanto wǝ dítǝ bo nkpǝ . Wǝ ni futsyǝ díyifo kato ku kasɔ ku lekpo ku asa nnya nkpe lǝ nnya kenke !
44014016	Kɔɔ Onanto ǝtǝ kusu betidi kenke nkǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kase mǝ léla ǝsuǝ .
44014017	Tsya usi wǝǝlǝkǝ kate mi nkǝ okpe sitinti ɛyɛ lǝ asa sɛ nnya weeyifo kǝtǝ mi . Wǝǝtǝ mi ɔsɔmi ku bekelenkǝ lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya wǝǝtǝ mi edisa ku disuǝyuǝ tsya . ”
44014018	Ite bǝ bátɛyi mǝ nyamfo kenke tsyaa , ilǝ fɛ betidi bamfo lɛyɛ kedi kamfo mǝ butǝ .
44014019	Nya Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ditsyi Antiokia , umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ Pisidia ku Ikonion bǝbǝ bábiasǝ betidi bamfo eto nsusu , nya bátɔnɔ ku mǝ báto Paulo aba nya bákpi wǝ lǝ kasɔ bábɔnko lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ , nya bébu bǝ úkpǝ .
44014020	Nya lefe nǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba ńkpe mfo díbǝ bǝńyǝ batsyilama wǝǝ , ótaka nya usinkli úsu umǝ ǝmǝ . Nya se kale disiǝǝ , wǝ ku Barnaba édu bésu Derbe .
44014021	Nya besu bedi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ Derbe . Nya se betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ díkafo bánɔ , bési besinkli bésu Listra ku Ikonion ku Antiokia lǝ Pisidia eto kasɔ .
44014022	Mfoo , besi bákpe bafokanɔfɔ nkpe mfo nkɛale bǝ bǝnyǝ kekleke lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya bátɛyi mǝ tsya bǝ , “ Ele bǝ bunyǝ kanyi kpǝ fɛ lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
44014023	Lǝ nnya kama Paulo ku Barnaba tsya ǝlǝkǝ batɔnkotɔnko bǝtǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ kenke , nya lǝ olatoto kǝtǝ Onanto ku lǝ kɛnyɛklekle ǝsuǝǝ , béfi mǝ bákpe lǝ Bonamte wǝ báfo bánɔ eto ani .
44014024	Nya lefe nǝ bábɔ lǝ kǝmǝ ka nkpe lǝ Pisidiaa , bésinkli bésu Pamfilia eto kasɔ .
44014025	Nya batɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ Perge fɛ báfe bésu Atalia .
44014026	Mfó bǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ báyɛ bésu Antiokia , kaka eto batɔnkotɔnko díkefi batɔnkpe bamǝ bákpe lǝ Onanto eto ani itǝ keyifo ka bákalosǝ mɔmɔ .
44014027	Se bésu bédufǝ Antiokiaa , bákpadi bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfó kenke bǝtsyǝ ditsyu nya bátɛyi mǝ kusu ko báyɛ eto etiki . Nya bátɛyi mǝ asa nnya kenke Onanto lɛyɛnko mǝ béyifo ku kase ɔ́sini bofokanɔ eto kusu utǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ .
44014028	Nya bǝsiǝ lǝ Antiokia ku bafokanɔfɔ mfo itǝ lefe kɛntsyɛɛ ditsyuǝ .
44015001	Lǝ lefe nǝ Paulo ku Barnaba lɛkɛ lǝ Antiokiaa , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ditsyi Yudea ǝbǝ mfó nya bákate bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ asa nnya ni bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ bánla fǝ lelo fe kase Moses eto lekpa letee , embunyǝ bofo . ”
44015002	Paulo ku Barnaba ku betidi bamfo ǝnǝ ditiki nǝmfo ɛklɛ . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bǝtǝ bǝnkǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto bǝtsyuǝ tǝkǝko Paulo ku Barnaba lǝ besu Yerusalem lǝ mǝ ku batɔnkpe bamǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ ba nkpe lǝ mfó lǝ balɛ lelolala eto etiki nyamfo babe .
44015003	Nyaso se bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ dítsyǝ mǝ kusu bálosǝǝ , bédu bésu Foinike ku Samaria eto kǝmǝ nya bésu bǝnyǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfó . Bátɛyi mǝ bǝ mɔmɔɔ , mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya éfi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto , nnya ni bǝnkǝ mǝ tsya áfo bánɔ . Ditiki nǝmfo ákpe mǝmblɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
44015004	Nya se bésu bédufǝ Yerusalem , mǝ beninǝ bamǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ ku batɔnkpe bamǝ áfo mǝ kukɔnɔ . Nya Paulo ku Barnaba dífi mǝ kusu ko bésu eto amaniǝ bábɔ mǝ ku asa nnya kenke Onanto díyifo ɔ́yɛ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
44015005	Fɛɛ Farisifɔ ba díkafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ditsyukpa eto bǝtsyuǝ átaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ nti bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ele be bayimi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya la lelo nya lǝ beyifo lǝ Moses eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ . ”
44015006	Nyaso mǝ beninǝ ku batɔnkpe bamǝ átsya fe ditsyukpa nya bédufǝ lǝ ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
44015007	Nya lǝ katsyakɔ kamfóo , lǝ lefe nǝ bákalɛ etiki nyamǝ bábe ɛklɛɛ , Petro átaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bayimi , mi kosate yi biǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ mɛ taa kɔ utsyiko mi nti nkǝ ntɛyi betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bafo banɔ .
44015008	Nya Onanto wǝ nyi betidi eto utu kǝmiǝǝ , ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ ófo mǝ nya útǝ mǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ fe kase úfi útǝ bo tsya .
44015009	Wánkpe kabakǝfǝ lǝ bonko mǝ nti , nyaso ófo mǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya úfi mǝ abua ɔ́tsyǝ mǝ fe bo ke .
44015010	Nya mɔmɔɔ , beso biato Onanto kabe mmǝ ? Bo ku bo banamǝ mámfo bikǝ bia nkpe kalende butsyi ! Beso bɔnlɛ mi bufi ketsyisǝ bafokanɔfɔ mfo ?
44015011	Owo lo ! Nnya ni bǝ bófo bɔ́nɔ boǝ kase Onanto dínyǝ bo kaminsǝ nya ófo bo lǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝǝ , woofo mǝ tsya fe kase mǝǝtsya léfo bánɔ . ”
44015012	Lǝ nyasoo , mǝmblɛ kenke ésinkli báyɛ etiki budi nya bǝsiǝ bétsyue ato lǝ nnya Barnaba ku Paulo lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , Onanto áyɛ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ úyifo ayanisa kpǝ itǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ .
44015013	Lefe nǝ bákalosǝǝ , Yakobo tsya átaka úńyǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bayimi , bitsyue ato lǝ bɔnɔ .
44015014	Simon Petro éboklomasǝ bo ibǝ efe ditutɛ , lǝ kase Onanto dílǝkǝ wǝ lelabi óte betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ nya úlǝkǝ bǝtsyuǝ útsyiko lǝ mǝ nti nkǝ bafiani wǝ bale .
44015015	Nya ditiki nǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi bǝtsyǝ ǝbǝ ítǝ fe kase bawɔni bǝ Bonamute átɛyi nkǝ ,
44015016	‘ Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , muusinkli mbǝ nya muusinkli nto Oka David eto sekakedikɔ . Nya muusinkli nto asa nnya lébia mfó bǝ lǝ isinkli ɛlɔ itsyǝ kukɔnɔ .
44015017	Itǝ bǝ betidi ba díbu , ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke ba mínkpadi minkǝ bedi mɔ betidi ebubǝ mɔ ɔflɔ . Nko ini nɛ bǝ Bonamute éyifo lǝ lesa saa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ ǝsuǝ .
44015018	Onanto lɛtɛyi ditiki nǝmfo betidi léte taa kɔ ke . ’
44015019	“ Nyaso mɔ , Yakobo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ mfo nya béfi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onantoo , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ buti mǝ kusu lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
44015020	Bomu bitǝ lǝ bɔwɔni mǝ kukue buǝ bayɛ asa nnya beefi kǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi nnya lǝǝtǝ baanansǝ ǝsuǝ budi ku sɛsɔnɔdi ku bebuki ba báwaninsǝ simuǝ bálo ku kɔtɔ eto budi .
44015021	Itsyi taa kɔɔ , asa nnya Moses lɛwɔni utsyǝǝ , baakla nnya nya baatɛyi nnya lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi saa lǝ umǝ saa . ”
44015022	Nya batɔnkpe ku beninǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ kenke eto ditsyukpa lɛtɔnɔ bǝlǝkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ bǝ bǝtǝkǝko Paulo ku Barnaba besu Antiokia . Betidi inuǝ ba bǝlǝkǝ eyifo bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ . Mǝ ni Yuda wǝ bensi baakpo tsya bǝ Barsaba ku Sila .
44015023	Nya kukue ko bálɛ bésuko eto etiki nnya nkpe lǝ ko ǝsuǝ ni nkǝ , Bo , batɔnkpe ku beninǝ ba ni mi bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem , boǝ boǝsiǝsǝ mi , bo bayimi ba lenni Yudafɔ mba nkpe lǝ Antiokia ku Siria ku Kilikia .
44015024	Bɔ́nɔ boǝ bo mfo eto bafokanɔfɔ eto bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ mfó bǝbǝ bǝnǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ ku mi itsyi lǝ bo Yudafɔ eto lelolala eto lekpa ǝsuǝ . Nyaa , inni bo létsyese mǝ bǝ bǝbǝ batɛyi mi etiki nyamfo eto okle .
44015025	Nyamfo eso se bókpe disi bǝtsyuǝǝ , bɔlɛ beninǝ inuǝ lǝ bo nti botsyese ku bo bayimi lala Barnaba ku Paul ba díkefi mǝ nkpǝ bǝtǝ fǝ keditǝtǝ itǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
44015026	
44015027	Yuda ku Sila tsya ebɔtɛyi mi asa nnya bɔ́wɔni bokpe mfo .
44015028	Itsyise iyifo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto lelabi ku bo lele tsya boǝnkǝ yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ bufi Yudafɔ eto afi buyifo bitsyikǝ butsyisǝ mi enso asa nyamfo .
44015029	Bɛni asa nnya béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi ku kɔtɔ budi ku bebuki ba báwaninsǝ simuǝ bálo eto budi ku sɛsɔnɔdi . Lǝ biɔlɛ mi ǝsuǝ mǝǝ , lesa saa ebuyuǝ ko mi . Bisiǝ kukɔnɔ .
44015030	Nyaso batɔnyɛ bamfo áma kusu bésu Antiokia . Nya se bésu bédufǝǝ , bákpadi bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ kenke bǝbǝ bátsya . Nya béfi kukue ko bétsyiko Yerusalem mfó bǝtǝ mǝ .
44015031	Nya mba kenke lɛkɛ mfo ǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku nkɛale itsyi lǝ etiki nnya bákla lǝ kukue komǝ ǝso .
44015032	Nya se Yuda ku Sila díyifo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi esoo , bǝlǝkǝ asa kasɔ báte mǝ , bálɛ mǝ kɔlɛ , nya bákpe mǝ nkɛale .
44015033	Nya se bǝsiǝ mfó eyi asianii , bafokanɔfɔ bamǝ ǝtǝ mǝ kusu bǝ besinkli besu Yerusalem lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
44015034	Fɛɛ Sila nkǝ wuusiǝ mǝ lǝ ɔflɔ mfó .
44015035	Nya Paulo ku Barnaba dísiǝ lǝ Antiokia mfó nya mǝ ku babamba kpǝ ákɛ mfo bákate mǝ asa kedi mǝ etiki utsyi lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ .
44015036	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ kamaa , Paulo átɛyi Barnaba nkǝ , “ Tǝ lǝ busi busu bobe bo bayimi ba nkpe lǝ kǝmǝ ka kenke búkesu budi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfó ku nka bɔ́yɛ bófe lǝ bobe kase banlɛnko . ”
44015037	Barnaba átɔnɔ nya óla nkǝ lǝ okpa Yohanes nwǝ tsya besi baakpo Marko ɔyɛnko .
44015038	Fɛɛ Paulo mántɔnɔko wǝ kulaa ! Itsyise lefe nǝ mǝ ku wǝ dísu Pamfiliaa , Marko Yohanes ésikli lǝ mǝ kama údu , nya wǝnsiǝ bálosǝ mǝ keyifo .
44015039	Nyaso Marko Yohanes eto etiki nyamfo ǝbǝ ékpe mǝ inuǝ bamǝ kǝnǝ ɛklɛ , itǝ bǝ bésense lǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Barnaba ákpa Marko ɔ́yɛnko nya béfi ɔklɔ bésu Kipro .
44015040	Nya Paulo lékpa Sila ɔ́yɛnko , nya bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfó dífi mǝ bákpe lǝ Onanto eto ani fɛ bédu .
44015041	Nya báyɛ lǝ Siria ku Kilikia nya bákpe bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyuka nnya kenke nkpe mfó nkɛale .
44016001	Nya Paulo ku Sila dídu bésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Derbe , nya báyɛ mfo bésu Listra . Lǝ mfóo , bésu bǝnyǝ ofokanɔnyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Timoteo . Wǝ ambe éyifo Yudanyǝ wǝ díkafo Kristo ɔ́nɔ . Fɛɛ wǝ anto éyifo Grikinyǝ .
44016002	Bafokanɔfɔ kenke ba nkpe lǝ Listra ku Ikonion , ékebu Timoteo tinti .
44016003	Wǝ ni futsyǝ Paulo lela kekleke nkǝ lǝ okpa wǝ ɔyɛnko . Nyaso útǝ bala wǝ lelo fe kase Yudafɔ eto lekpa léte , itsyise Yudafɔ ba kenke nkpe lǝ lɛkpɔ nǝmfo yi bǝnkǝ wǝ anto éyifo Grikinyǝ .
44016004	Nya se báma kusuu , báyɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ka kenke nkpe mfó báfe , nya bátɛyi mǝ ketsyue ka batɔnkpe eto beninǝ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem dítsyue bǝtsyǝ . Nyaso bátɛyi mǝ bǝ lǝ beyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
44016005	Nyamfo eso betidi bamǝ ǝbǝ befui bakpe , nya nko ke tsya mǝ bofokanɔ tsya dimuǝ ale enso nɛ .
44016006	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , báyɛ bésu Frigia ku Galatia , itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ mǝntǝ mǝ kusu nkǝ bátɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ Asia eto kasɔ .
44016007	Nya lefe nǝ bésu bédufǝ Misiaa , bála bǝ lǝ besu Bitinia eto kasɔ . Fɛɛ mfó tsyaa , Yesu eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ mǝntǝ kusu nkǝ besu mfó .
44016008	Nyaso bésinkli báyɛ lǝ Misia eto kasɔ ɔflɔ nya bésu bédufǝ umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ lekpo ɔflɔ baakpo Troa .
44016009	Ketsye kamfóo , Paulo ǝńyǝ kǝlǝkǝkate . Únyǝ nkǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi Makedonia nya únyǝ ɔnlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ ákatɛyi nkǝ , “ Yila ǝbǝ Makedonia lǝ ǝbǝ mfo lǝ ǝbǝ awunsǝko bo o-o ! ”
44016010	Nya lǝ bulǝkǝkate bomfo esoo , búmuǝ ǝsuǝ akpa kpa nya búdu búsu Makedonia . Itsyise nyamfo lǝ bo bote nkǝ Onanto ála nkǝ lǝ otsyese bo lǝ busu bɔtɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfó .
44016011	Nyaso búsu búfi ɔklɔ lǝ Troa , nya bɔ́yɛ bófe búsu Samotrake . Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , búdu búsu Neapoli .
44016012	Se búdu mfóo , búsu búdufǝ Filipi wǝ ni Makedonia eto umǝ nkplɛ . Nya mfó tsya eyifo Romafɔ eto umǝ . Nya búsiǝ mfó itǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ .
44016013	Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , búdu lǝ umǝ ǝmfó búsu utuflɔ utsyuǝ kaka búbu boǝ mfó eto bediti aato ola kǝtǝ Onanto . Nya búsiǝ mfó bɔnlɛ besio ba díbǝ mfó Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyi .
44016014	Nya ɔni akɛ mǝ lenti baakpo Lidia Tiatira . Woate ago eto mfia nya uyifo utidi wǝ léfo Onanto ɔ́nɔ kekleke . Nya lefe nǝ unsi mfó ɔnlɛ etiki nya bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ato butsyuee , Onanto ásini wǝ nsusu nya ófo etiki nnya Paulo nlɛ budi mfó kenke ɔ́nɔ .
