44016015	Nya se wonko wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke léfo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝǝ , ɔ́lɛ bo lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Lǝ befo bɛnɔ biǝ mintsya eyifo Bonamute eto ofokanɔnyǝ sitintii , nyalɛ bibǝ bɛsɔnɔ lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ . ” Nya únǝnko bo ditiki nǝmfo isu ese lefe nǝ bɔ́tɔnɔ búsu bɔ́sɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
44016016	Nya diyi lɔni se bɔ́ntɔ lǝ ola katokɔɔ , bótsyako ndomunyǝ siobi utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ wǝ lǝǝnyǝ asa katɛyi . Nya woayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ keyifo atabi kǝtǝ wǝ banamute mǝ .
44016017	Nya usiobi ǝmfo dítǝkǝko bo ku Paulo kama kafã katɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi bamfo eyifo Onanto eto beyifoyifo , nya bǝbǝ mfo bǝ lǝ bate mi konantosu ko luutǝ Onanto tǝ mi nkpǝ . ”
44016018	Nko eto eyifosa ǝtsyǝ nko éfo eyi kpǝ . Nya se ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ díbe dílǝ Pauloo , útsyi ɔwuninsǝ nya údi lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi lǝ usiobi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bola lǝ Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ miǝ bɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ! ” Nya lamfolamfoo , lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ ko lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
44016019	Nya se wǝ banamute dínyǝ bǝ mǝ kudisu étii , bǝmuǝ Paulo ku Silas nya bǝnǝ mǝ bésuko umǝ ǝmǝ eto beninǝ ɔflɔ lǝ obia nti .
44016020	Nya bátɛyi lǝ obia nti mfó bǝnkǝ , “ Betidi bamfo eyifo Yudafɔ , nya bǝbǝ mfo banlɛ bo umǝ bobiasǝ .
44016021	Bǝbǝ mfo balɛ asa nnya díńyǝ lǝ Romafɔ eto afi ǝsuǝ bote . ”
44016022	Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyilama mǝ , nya bétsyiko Paulo ku Sila bunǝ kesuko sɛtɔ ku kama . Nya bakponkpo bamǝ dítǝ kusu bǝnkǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ bikǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bǝtǝ kusu bǝnkǝ bablɛ mǝ ku akete .
44016023	Lefe nǝ báblɛ mǝ báfo afabe lǝ ǝsuǝ tintii , béfi mǝ bésu bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo . Nya bátɛyi utidi wǝ laase mba bákpe lǝ diyo mfó bǝnkǝ ɔlɔ obe Paulo ku Sila kekleke .
44016024	Nya se bǝkǝ wǝ ato nko esoo , ókpa mǝ úsu ókpe diyo nǝmǝ eto kaka nso ale nya úti mǝ ókpe mfó , ókpe mǝ lǝ amana .
44016025	Nya lǝ ntsyǝnti lefe nǝ Paulo ku Sila lɛkɛ mfo bákato ola kǝtǝ Onanto nya banlɛ ǝsǝ busǝ katɛsǝ wǝ nya mba nkpe lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ku mǝ ǝkǝtsyuǝ ato .
44016026	Dikunǝ , kasɔ ko dítinkǝ kekleke , nya diyo nǝmǝ kenke tsya dítinkǝ itǝ bǝ diyo ni biku kenke ásini , nya amana nnya bákpe mba bákape lǝ diyo nǝmǝ dífǝsǝ ɛbɔ .
44016027	Se nwǝ laabe mba bákpe lǝ diyo lésanklii , únyǝ nkǝ ayo nyamǝ eto biku kenke ásini bite leya . Nyaso se úbu nkǝ mba bákpe lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kenke étsyǝtsyi béluu , úlǝkǝ wǝ lesiabi nkǝ lǝ olo ǝsuǝ .
44016028	Nya se Paulo dínyǝ lesa nǝ óla nkǝ lǝ uyifo ǝsuǝǝ , ófã ókpadi wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Menyifo nko ! Bomblɛ kenke kpe mfo . ”
44016029	Nyaso utidi ǝmfo ákpadi nkǝ befi okandiɛ baboko . Nya lǝ ketinkǝ ku difufu ǝsuǝǝ , úsu óse akonki lǝ Paulo ku Sila ɔflɔ .
44016030	Nya se ókpa mǝ ɔbɔnko lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Boantomǝ , be ele bǝ nyifo lǝ nyǝ bofo ? ”
44016031	Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fo Bonamute Yesu anɔ nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , ebunyǝ bofo itǝ fǝ ku fǝ diyo eto betidi kenke . ”
44016032	Nya bésu bátɛyi wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
44016033	Nya ketsye kamfo ke nya úsǝ mǝ afabe nnya báfo , nya wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke léfo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ .
44016034	Lǝ nnya kamaa , ókpa Paulo ku Sila úsuko wǝ diyo nya útǝ mǝ lesa bédi . Nya wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , itsyise báfo Onanto bánɔ .
44016035	Se kale dísiǝǝ , umǝ ǝmǝ eto bakponkpo ákpe wǝ bamamanyǝ nkǝ besu bátɛyi nwǝ laabe mba bákpe lǝ diyo eto uninǝ nkǝ , “ Nyani bafɔ bamǝ lǝ bedu . ”
44016036	Nyaso mǝ obebe ǝmfo átɛyi Paulo ku Sila bǝnkǝ , “ Bakponkpo bǝnkǝ nyani mi lǝ bidu . Nyaso bisu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
44016037	Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi bamamanyǝ bamfo bǝnkǝ , “ Bablɛ bo lǝ umǝ ta eto ǝnǝmi lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bánkponko bo tɔ lekpo nya béfi bo bésu bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo . Fɛɛ Romafɔ buni ! Nya mɔmɔɔ , beso bala bǝnkǝ beyu bǝlǝkǝ kaa lǝ budu bǝ lǝ betidi mante ? Kulefe ! Tǝ lǝ mǝ kosate lǝ bǝbǝ bǝlǝkǝ bo kusu ! ”
44016038	Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamfo ésinkli bésu bátɛyi bakponkpo bamǝ kɛnyɛ kamfo . Nya se bánɔ bǝ Paulo ku Sila eyifo Romafɔɔ , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti !
44016039	Lǝ nya mfo eso bésu bálɛ mǝǝ lekpakpa bǝyuǝsǝ mǝ kafo , fɛ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ lǝ aba eto diyo nǝmǝ . Nya bálɛ mǝǝ lekpakpa bǝ bédu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ lǝ besu kalebe bamba .
44016040	Nyaso Paulo ku Sila édu bésu Lidia eto . Mfó nya bésu bǝnyǝ bafokanɔfɔ bamba . Nya bési bákpe mǝ nkɛale enso , fɛ bédu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
44017001	Nya se bésu báyɛ lǝ Amfipoli ku Apoloniaa , bésu bédufǝ Tesalonika . Nya mfóo , Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ ákɛ .
44017002	Nya fe kase Paulo laala buyifoo , úsu mfó nkǝ lǝ úsu udi mǝ etiki lǝ disikakpekɔ kamǝ . Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝtsyǝ nya dítǝkǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , úsukate mǝ asa itsyi lǝ etiki nnya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa kɛnkɛ eto kukue ǝsuǝ .
44017003	Nya ókpasǝ mǝ bulǝ bo bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ Kristo ebubǝ unyǝ ku kase lǝ nnya kamaa , wootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nkpǝ . Paulo átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ eto etiki minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mfo ni Yesu wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nɛ . ”
44017004	Etiki nnya ókpasǝ óte mǝ mfó átsyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto nsusu bɔ́wuninsǝ , nya báfo bánɔ bǝtǝkǝko Paulo ku Sila . Nya Grikifɔ kpǝ ba laate Onanto sikpi ku besio kpǝ ba nkpe díbu tsya átsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ bǝtǝkǝko mǝ .
44017005	Fɛɛ Yudafɔ asɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso babɛbɛ betidi bua bǝtsyuǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ba bǝtǝ bǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi lǝ bataka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso bákpa betidi kpǝ ba lányǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi saa ǝsuǝ ku kudu besu batsyilama Yason eto diyo ku nsusu bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ Paulo ku Sila lǝ bakpa mǝ besuko umǝ ǝmǝ eto katsyakɔ .
44017006	Nya se bǝnnyǝ mǝ esoo , bǝmuǝ Yason ku bafokanɔfɔ bǝtsyuǝ nya bǝnǝ mǝ besuko katsyakɔ kamǝ . Mfó banlɛ bofa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔyɛ katsyilama kakpe bulǝ lǝ kalebe saa , nya bǝbǝ mfo tsya bǝ lǝ bakpe , bulǝ .
44017007	Nya Yason tsya léfo mǝ ókpe lǝ wǝ diyo . Nya betidi bamǝ létaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Roma eto Okankplɛ eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ asatete nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ oka bamba wǝ baakpo Yesu si okpe ! ”
44017008	Nya se bánɔ nyamfoo , betidi bamǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ǝnyǝnki nyanklaa .
44017009	Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ Yason ku wǝ betidi fo kayo fe mba díńyǝ mǝ kama fɛ lǝ bayani mǝ .
44017010	Nyaso diyi nǝmfo eto ketsyee , bafokanɔfɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ákpa Paulo ku Sila bétsyetsyiko bésuko Beroia . Nya se bésu bédufǝ mfóo , bésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ .
44017011	Mba lǝ Beroiaa , mǝ nsusu ásini lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ esó Tesalonikafɔ . Nyaso bétsyue ato bánɔ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya diyi saa , nya banlɛ budufǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ ǝsuǝ kabe lǝ etiki nnya Paulo nlɛ bɔtɛyi eyifo sitinti .
44017012	Itǝ eso mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ áfo bánɔ . Grikifɔ eto besio kpǝ ba nkpe díbu ku basani kpǝ tsya áfo bánɔ bátsyi bawuninsǝ .
44017013	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ Tesalonika lɛnɔ bǝ Paulo kpe ɔlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi lǝ Beroiaa , bésu mfó bésu bákpe kǝnǝ ku bulǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
44017014	Nyaso bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfoo átaka kpla bǝńyǝ nya bákpa Paulo bésuko lekpo kɛnyɛ . Nya íbu Sila ku Timoteo lǝ Beroia mfó .
44017015	Mba lékpa Paulo bayɛnko , áyɛnko wǝ bédufǝnko Atene . Se bétsyi mfo banlɛ bubǝǝ , Paulo ǝtǝkǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bǝbǝ batɛyi Sila ku Timoteo lǝ bakɔse bǝbǝ betu wǝ mfó .
44017016	Lefe nǝ Paulo lɛkɛ lǝ Atene unsi unsǝkǝ Sila ku Timoteo , iyifo lesa nǝ dílǝ wǝ tinti se únyǝ kase betidi bamfo dítsyǝ bǝfiǝ beesumu , nya umǝ ǝmǝ kenke díyi ku bǝfiǝ .
44017017	Lǝ nyasoo , úsu mfó nkǝ weesu udi Yudafɔ ku betidi bamba ba laate Onanto sikpi tsya etiki lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ . Nya diyi saa , úkedi mba úkǝnyǝ lǝ asi tsya etiki .
44017018	Nya lefe lɔnii , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ni Epikurofɔ ku Stoafɔ ba ni kawunsiǝ eto babesibe kplɛ ǝnǝ etiki ku Paulo nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Be kon utikidi wǝ leenyi kulesa ǝmfo nlɛ bɔtɛyi ? ” Nya babamba tsya lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Iyifo fenkǝ nsɔ bamba eto bǝfiǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko . ” Nya betidi bamfó édi etiki nko itsyise bánɔ bǝ Paulo édi etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ku wǝ botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ ǝsuǝ .
44017019	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bákpa wǝ bésuko kaka baakpo akpo lǝ Areopago ini umǝ eto beninǝ eto disikakpekɔ , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bola boǝ boate asafɔfɔ nnya fanlɛ bote mfo eto kasɔ .
44017020	Itsyise asa nnya fanlɛ bote eyifo bo yanii . Nyaso bola boǝ boanɔ nnya kasɔ . ”
44017021	Nya Atenefɔ kenke ku bafɔ ba nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfóo , eefi mǝ lefe kǝtǝ asafɔfɔ saa eto etiki bɔtɛyi ku nnya bɔnɔ .
44017022	Nyaso Paulo átaka únyǝ lǝ disikakpekɔ kamǝ lǝ betidi bamfó eto ǝnǝmi , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝǝ , nyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo miǝ mi Atenefɔɔ , biyifo betidi ba laala kesumu tinti .
44017023	Itsyise se minlɛ botsyilama kalɛ asa ola kabee , nya se mínyǝ mi nsumukɔɔ , nnyǝ kesumukɔ kani ka báwɔni bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kǝ leba ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝǝ , ‘ Búfi nyamfo bútǝ bo Anto wǝ bunyi . ’ Nya Anto wǝ binyi fɛ bɛnlɛ wǝ busumu mfoo , wǝ ǝsuǝ minla miǝ meedi mi etiki mɔmɔ nɛ .
44017024	“ Anto ǝmfo ni Bonamute wǝ diyifo kawunsiǝ , kato ku kasɔ ku asa nnya kenke nkpe lǝ ke . Nya woǝnsiǝ kpoo lǝ disumuyo fe nǝ kasɔ mfo eto betidi dífi mǝ ani báto .
44017025	Nya woanhiã bǝ udi kulesa itsyi lǝ betidi eto ani ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ keyifo tsya ǝsuǝ , itsyise wǝ kosate ni futsyǝ lǝǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa nkpǝ ku lesa saa nǝ baahiã .
44017026	Wǝ dílǝkǝ utidi saa ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ fe kɔtɔ kɔni eto bebi lǝ kasɔ kamfo kenke ǝsuǝ . Wǝ kosate dítsyǝ lefe ku kedikɔ útǝ mǝ tsya .
44017027	Nya Boanto dítsyue nyamfo utǝ bo betidi itǝ bǝ lǝ bɔbɛbɛ wǝ esu lǝ bunyǝ wǝ , ekpe bǝ lǝ sintintii , woantsyonko bo .
44017028	Itsyise fe kase mi mba laatɛyi akpa lɛtɛyii , ‘ Wǝ ni nwǝ nsi nkpǝ nyaso bo tsya nsi nkpǝ , nya bunsi nkpǝ ku wǝ nya boalabe selabe lǝ wǝ . ’ Nya baatɛyi tsya bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bɔ́bɔ butsyi lǝ wǝ . ’
44017029	“ Nya se buni Onanto eto bebi esoo , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ bubú boǝ Onanto ǝmfo te fe lesa nǝ bo betidi dífi sika sia nye siflubia nye kuyi nye leba búyifo ku bo ani nye lesaatsyuǝ nǝ baawoe nye lǝ ditsyǝbi saa ǝsuǝ .
44017030	Nya idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , Onanto mǝnnǝ utidi saa koto itsyise bánte wǝ eso . Fɛɛ mɔmɔ mfoo , úkǝ bo ato nkǝ bulǝkǝ bo ǝsuǝ lǝ asa nyamfo eto kakle ǝsuǝ lǝ butsyi ǝnǝmi butǝ wǝ .
44017031	Itsyise útsyǝ diyi nǝ utidi wǝ úlǝkǝ utsyǝ luubǝ okponko bo lekpo itsyi lǝ bo ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kɔtsyɔntsyɔsu ǝsuǝ Nya úlǝkǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ óte bo idu lǝ lefe ne ótakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nya unsi nkpǝ . ”
44017032	Nya lefe nǝ bánɔ bǝ Paulo edi etiki itsyi lǝ botakaketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝ bǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ ǝmǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝmǝ wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bola boǝ busi boanɔ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ utidi eto businkli kataka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
44017033	Nyaso se íbǝ nko esoo , Paulo édu mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
44017034	Fɛɛ betidi bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ nya bétsyi báwuninsǝ báfo bánɔ . Nya utsyuǝ uni ákɛ mǝ lenti wǝ díyifo Areopago eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Dionisio ku usio wǝ baakpo Damari ku babamba bǝtsyuǝ tsya áfo bánɔ .
44018001	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Paulo édu lǝ Atene úsu Korinto .
44018002	Mfó úsu únyǝ Yudanyǝ wǝ baakpo Akwila , nwǝ bále lǝ Ponto . Wǝ ku wǝ usiǝ Priskila étsyi Italia bǝbǝ mfó yanklɛ tɔ , itsyise kasɔ kamǝ eto Okankplɛ wǝ baakpo Klaudo átɛyi nkǝ Yudafɔ kenke du lǝ Roma . Paulo ésu úsunyǝ mǝ ,
44018003	nya úsiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ ɔnlɛ mǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ kubukikue kanka eto keyifo ka woeyifo kedi ǝsuǝ .
44018004	Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi saa , Paulo ékesu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya úkǝlǝkǝ asa kasɔ kate Yudafɔ ku Grikifɔ kenke itǝ lǝ bǝ lǝ batsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ .
44018005	Nya lefe nǝ Sila ku Timoteo dítsyi Makedonia bǝbǝǝ , Paulo ǝnyǝ lefe kpǝ úfi útǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bote ku ni kasɔlǝkǝlǝkǝ kate Yudafɔ bamǝ nkǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ tinti .
44018006	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ bamfó létaka bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nya bésie wǝ abie lǝ Yesu eto disi esoo , Paulo áflɛ sitǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bikpǝ nye benyaa , nyǝ mɔ ani , nyǝ mɔ akpa minyi nnya kulesa saa . Idu mɔmɔ mfoo , ndu ntɔ lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ ɔflɔ lǝ nsu ntɛyi mǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . ”
44018007	Nya se údu mfóo , úsu ɔ́kɛ lǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ wǝ baakpo Tito Yusto wǝ laate Onanto sikpi nya wǝ diyo nkpe lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ ɔflɔ .
44018008	Fɛɛ katsyakɔ kamǝ eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Krispo ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke áfo Bonamute bánɔ , nya béyifo mǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa . Nko ke , béyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa bǝtǝ bafokanɔfɔ kpǝ bamba tsya lǝ Korinto mfó nɛ .
44018009	Nya lǝ diyi lɔni eto ketsyee , Bonamute ǝtǝ Paulo ǝnyǝ kǝlǝkate ka ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi ! Nya mensinkli lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɔtɛyi eto kama .
44018010	Itsyise nsiko fǝ , nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo fǝ kabua buyifo . Betidi kpǝ kpe lǝ umǝ mfó ba ni mɔ bale . ”
44018011	Nyaso Paulo ǝsiǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmfo lɛlɛ lɔni ku kutsyǝ kedi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo kate betidi .
44018012	Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝtsyǝ Galio fe Roma eto Aba eto unyɛsiǝ lǝ Akaia eto kasɔɔ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ásɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ lebo nya báwoe etiki lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ nya bǝmuǝ wǝ bésuko lekpokakpokɔ .
44018013	Nya bátɛyi Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo lɛ betidi eto nsusu bobiasǝ nkǝ basumu Onanto lǝ kusu ko nńyǝ lǝ bo afi ǝsuǝ . ”
44018014	Nya kase Paulo nkǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ udi etiki koo , Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Galio ǝmfo ko dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyi Yudafɔ bamǝ nkǝ , “ Mi Yudafɔ bɛnɔ ! Lǝ bǝnkǝ etiki nnya bɛyɛnko béboko mfo eyifo etiki kekleke nnya léta kɔfi ibuu , nyalɛ mɔɔkɛ nnya lefe ntsyue mi etiki koto .
44018015	Fɛɛ se iyifo kǝnǝ itsyi lǝ etiki ku aye ku mi afi eto asa ini esoo , mi kosate su bɛtɛyi nnya . Bǝntsyǝ mɛ okponkpo lǝ mi asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
44018016	Nyaso óla mǝ ɔ́bɔnko lǝ wǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfó .
44018017	Nyaso betidi eto ditsyukpa nǝmfo ǝmuǝ Sostene wǝ ni mǝ katsyakɔ kamǝ eto ununǝ nya báblɛ wǝ lǝ lekpokpakpokɔ ɔflɔ mfo . Fɛɛ Galio mánkpe mǝ kɛnyɛ .
44018018	Paulo esi úsiǝ lǝ Korinto eto umǝ mfó éfo eyi kpǝ . Lǝ nnya kamaa , ókla bafokanɔfɔ bamfó nya wǝ ku Akwila ku Priskila léyila lekpo bésu Siria . Tsya fɛ úduu , Paulo ǝtǝ nkǝ bakpi wǝ disi lǝ Kenkrea itsyi lǝ ntamu bo óka utsyǝ eso .
44018019	Se úsu údufǝ Efesoo , óyani Priskila ku Akwila útsyǝ mfo . Nya wǝ dídu úsu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ lǝ úsu ɔlɛ asa obe ku Yudafɔ ba nkpe mfo .
44018020	Betidi álɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ɔkɛ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ sɛkɛ , fɛɛ wántɔnɔ .
44018021	Lǝ nyaso se ɔnlɛ buluu , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto atɔnɔɔ , muusinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ . ” Nya údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝsuǝ nya údu lǝ Efeso .
44018022	Se úsu údufǝ lǝ Kaisareaa , ófe úsu Yerusalem nya úsu úsiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ mfo . Nya usi ófe úsu Antiokia .
44018023	Se úsiǝ mfo sɛkɛɛ , usi údu ɔ́yɛ ɔbɔ lǝ Galatia ku Frigia . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , ótsyilama mfó kenke óbe bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ dikuku mfó , nya ókakpe mǝ nkɛale .
44018024	Nya Yudanyǝ utsyuǝ díbǝ Efeso . Wǝ ni Apolo . Bále wǝ lǝ Aleksandria . Nya uyifo utidi wǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ laafo etiki budi , nya unyi Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto kúkue eto etiki tsya .
44018025	Ekpe bǝ wɔ́ɔnɔ Bonamute eto diye ɔnɔ nya woedi etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ ku ute tsyaa , Yohanes eto ntu flǝsǝflǝsǝ eto etiki hã ete unyi .
44018026	Nya se úńyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ku wǝ utu ku ǝsuǝale lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó fɛ Priskila ku Akwila lɛnɔɔ , bákpa wǝ bésuko mǝ diyo bésu bǝlǝkǝ Boanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kasɔ kukɔnɔ báte wǝ nya báte wǝ asa bawunsǝ .
44018027	Nya se Apolo díbu disi nkǝ woesu Akaiaa , Efeso eto bafokanɔfɔ ésu báwunsǝko wǝ nya báwɔni kukue bátsyese bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Akaia mfó bǝ lǝ úbǝ mfóo , lǝ bafo wǝ kukɔnɔ . Se úsu údufǝ mfóo , ɔ́wunsǝko betidi kpǝ ba léfiani bafokanɔfɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
44018028	Nya óso Yudafɔ ani lǝ kase unǝ etiki ku ku ute lǝ betidi nti . Nya etiki nnya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , úfi úlǝkǝ óte ékpa wuee bǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
44019001	Lǝ lefe nǝ Apolo lɛkɛ lǝ Korintoo , Paulo tsya áyɛ lǝ akpa eto kusu nya úsu údufǝ lǝ Efeso . Mfo úsu únyǝ bafokanɔfɔ bǝtsyuǝ .
44019002	Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Idu lefe nǝ béfo bɛnɔɔ , bíofo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ? ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Be ni Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ fɛ ? Bóannɔ tɔ ni kulesa saa . ”
44019003	Nya usi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ nte ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa beyifo mi ? ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yohanes eto ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa . ”
44019004	Nya Paulo dílǝkǝ kasɔ óte mǝ nkǝ , “ Yohanes ǝflǝsǝ betidi ba ditsyi báwuninsǝ lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ele bǝ bafo utidi wǝ luubǝ lǝ wǝ kama banɔ . Nya utidi ǝmfo ni Yesu . ”
44019005	Nya se bánɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , bátɔnɔ nya úflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ .
44019006	Nya se nǝ Paulo dífi ani útǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝbǝ dísiǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ ǝsuǝ , nya bétsyiko bele bele bɔtɛyi nya bǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ báte .
44019007	Nya basani bamǝ eto utu lídi fe lefosi inuǝ .
44019008	Nya se Paulo dísu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔɔ , údi mǝ etiki ku ute lǝ afa ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ , úlǝkǝ asa kasɔ óte mǝ ku kasɔnɔnɔ nya ókplatsya kekleke lǝ kase wookpa mǝ nsusu usuko Onanto eto Sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ .
44019009	Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ méntsyue wǝ ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ ato nya báni bofokanɔ , nya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmii , bédi etiki bua nnya dińyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kusu sɛ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso Paulo édu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya ókpa bafokanɔfɔ ɔ́yɛnko nya bédu bésu Tirano eto suku eto diyo . Mfóo , nya ókatsyako mǝ diyi saa , kédufǝ lǝ etiki ǝsuǝ ku mǝ .
44019010	Itǝ alɛ ǝnuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́kɛ mfó óte mǝ asa . Nya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo dísensǝ ɛyɛ ísu Asia ku lekpake nǝmfó kenke . Nya mba ni Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ .
44019011	Nya Onanto dítǝ Paulo ǝsuǝale nnya úfi keyifo ayanisa .
44019012	Nya lǝ béfi wǝ ofiamɛ nye wǝ ǝsuǝ eto awu bétidi ufimfi utsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ koo , úkǝnyǝ bufitsyatsya , nya ékala awɔnɔ bua tysa kabɔnko lǝ betidi ba ǝsuǝ ɛkɛ .
44019013	Nya Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ba ni bafate ba laatsyilama idu kalebe isu kalebee , ébu bǝnkǝ boofo bɔyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ bala awɔnɔ bua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Nnla mi lǝ Yesu wǝ eto diye ǝsuǝ Paulo laayɛ kala mi mbɔsǝ lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ ! ”
44019014	Nya betidi ba nlɛ nyamfó eto okle buyifo éyifo bakosobi ekuanse ba ni Yudanyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ wǝ baakpo Skefa eto bebi .
44019015	Fɛɛ se bésu bǝ beedi lɛwɔnɔ bua ditsyuǝ etikii , lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ nnyi Yesu , nya minyi Paulo tsya . Fɛɛ mimii , bawoe bini ? ”
44019016	Nya utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo nsii , lɛblɛ mǝ ! Nya báfo afabe tinti , nya bétsyetsyi bábɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ leyaleya !
44019017	Nnya díbǝ mfó ésensǝ efia Efeso kenke itǝ bǝ Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke ánɔ nnya . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti , nya Bonamute Yesu eto diye disi lebe kato lekpe .
44019018	Nya mba lɛtsyi akɔɛsi báwuninsǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ díbǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ asa bua nnya béyifo kasɔ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi .
44019019	Nya mba ni bafate lǝ mǝ nti dífi mǝ afa eto ekue ku kekue ku bɛbɛ báboko nya bátonsǝ nnya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi mfó . Ekue ku asa nyamfo kenke eto koya ebuyifo fe sika flubia eto akpi fosi anɔ .
44019020	Nyamfo lǝ bote kase Bonamute eto ditiki dísensǝ ku ǝsuǝale , nya éfo mfo kenke .
44019021	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ léte Paulo nkǝ ɔyɛ usu Makedonia ku Akaia lǝ usu Yerusalem . Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ndufǝ mfóo , ele bǝ nyɛ nsu Roma tsya . ”
44019022	Nya ótsyese wǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ inuǝ , Timoteo ku Erasto nkǝ bákatɔ wǝ lǝ Makedonia lǝ ubǝ . Nya wǝ lɛtsyimɛ ɔkɛ kama lǝ Asia mfó itǝ lefe sɛkɛ .
44019023	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , bulǝ kplɛ ǝbǝ lǝ Efeso itsyi lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ Kristo nkǝ bǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ eso .
44019024	Nwǝ dínǝ bulǝ bomfo óboko ni utidi wǝ baakpo Demetrio wǝ ni ɔtsyuɛntsyuɛ wǝ leefi sika flubia katsyuɛ Artemi eto esumuyo kɛkɛ . Nya nnya bote kǝnǝ kutǝkǝ kpǝ kaboko wǝ ku wǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ .
44019025	Diyi lɔnii , Demetrio ákpadi batsyuɛntsyuɛ ba kenke bátsya nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bayimi , biyi biǝ buǝnyǝ kutǝkǝ kpǝ ketsyi lǝ bo keyifo kamfo ǝsuǝ .
44019026	Nya bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ , kǝnyǝ sitinti kase Paulo ǝmfo nlɛ bo keyifo kamfo bobiasǝ kakpe bo kofani , nya ɔnlɛ betidi kpǝ eto nsusu bobiasǝ nkǝ befiǝ eto asa nnya boeyifo kenke menyifo lesa nǝ ele bǝ bakpe disi kasɔ bǝtǝ ! Lǝ nyamfo eso bo bikǝtete ébubǝ kasɔ ! Nya inni Efeso mfo mate ni kaka nyamfo nlɛ bubǝ . Bomu ɛlɛ bubǝ lǝ Asia eto kasɔ kenke !
44019027	Nya inni bo mate eto keyifo ete lɔɔsɔɔ kasɔ ! Sitintii , Boambe Ufiǝ Kplɛ Artemi eto diyo ku wǝ dibu ebonya lǝ Asia mfo ku lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ! ”
44019028	Se bánɔ Demetrio eto etiki nyamfoo , ɔblɔ éfi mǝ nya bényenki tinti nya báfã bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Efoso eto Ambe Artemi ni Ufiǝ Kplɛ Kenke ! ”
44019029	Nya kudu ko bákpo dísensǝ kófo umǝ ǝmǝ kenke . Nyaso bátsya fe ditsyukpa nya bǝmuǝ Paulo eto bayɛtsyuǝ inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba baakpo Gaio ku Aristarko ba ditsyi Makedonia . Nya bákpa mǝ bésuko umǝ ǝmǝ eto katsyakɔ .
44019030	Nya Paulo tsya léla nkǝ lǝ wontsya lǝ usu mfo , fɛɛ bafokanɔfɔ fɛfɛ mántɔnɔko wǝ nko .
44019031	Nya lekpake nǝmfo eto beninǝ ba díyifo Paulo eto bayɛtsyuǝ tsyaa , léla ɔtɔnkpe bákpe wǝ bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ woensu mfó lǝ usu ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ okpe lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kulaa !
44019032	Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , diyo nǝmǝ kafo eyi ku kudu . Nya betidi ba díbǝ bátsya mfóo eto utsyuǝ saa ku wǝ lesa nǝ ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya mǝ nti kpǝ mánte lesa nǝ eso bǝbǝ mfo .
44019033	Nya Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ díkǝ Aleksandro bǝ usu unyǝ sɛtɔ lǝ okpasǝ lesa nǝ díbǝ . Nya Aleksandro lébesǝ ani kato nkǝ utsyuǝ saa yɛ kudu bokpo lǝ ɔtɛyi mǝ lesatsyuǝ .
44019034	Nya se betidi bamfo dínyǝ bǝ Yudanyǝ unii , besi betsyiko kudu bokpo kafa bembembe itǝ fe abombosɔsɔ ǝnuǝ . Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Efoso eto Ambe Artemi ni Ufiǝ Kplɛ Kenke ! ”
44019035	Efo lefe fɛ Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ninǝ wǝ nkpe mfo léfo mǝ bɔkɔnsǝ , nya údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , Efesofɔ , utsyuǝ saa lǝ mi nti yi nkǝ Efeso mfo ni Ufiǝ Kplɛ Artemi eto kǝsiǝkɔ . Nya wǝ kakpakɔ eto leba kɛnkɛɛ , áfankli ditsyi kato díbǝ kasɔ , nya lenkpe lǝ bo nti .
44019036	Nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ loofo ditiki nǝmfo sidia butǝkǝ . Nyaso biyuǝsǝ mi akɔɛsi nya bieyifo kulesa saa lǝ lɛblɔfi ǝsuǝ .
44019037	Itsyise betidi ba bímuǝ békpa béboko mfoo , bényu kulesa betsyiko lǝ Disumuyo nye babiasǝ bo Ufiǝ Artemi eto diye tsya .
44019038	Fɛɛ lǝ Demetrio ku wǝ batsyuɛntsyuɛ ǝnyǝ bǝ bakpe ditiki ditsyuǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bakponkpo kpe mfo . Nya bonkpe eyi nnya ǝsuǝ baakpo akpo . Lǝ béyifo kabua kǝtsyuǝ , boofo ke bulǝkǝ kate mǝ mfó .
44019039	Fɛɛ lǝ lesa bamba ditsyuǝ kpe bela biǝ biefi bisukoo , bitǝ lǝ bufi busuko umǝ eto beninǝ ɔflɔ .
44019040	Itsyise nyamfo lɛ bote fenkǝ bɔlɛ botaka kǝńyǝ lǝ Aba ǝsuǝ . Lǝ Romafɔ eto bamamanyǝ ǝbǝ bǝnyǝ mmi eto diyi nǝmfo eto asayifoyifoo , boǝmbofo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ , nya buunǝ bo koto . ”
44019041	Nya se ɔ́tɛyi etiki nyamfo nkoo , útǝ bésensǝ bédu .
44020001	Lefe nǝ bulǝ bomǝ díyuǝ kɛnyɛɛ , Paulo ákpadi bafokanɔfɔ bǝbǝ bátsya lǝ kalebe kani . Nya se ókpe mǝ nkɛale lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ólosǝǝ , ókla mǝ fɛ údu úsu Makedonia .
44020002	Se údu ɔntɔɔ , Paulo áyɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ka nkpe lǝ lekpake nǝmfó kenke nya údi mǝ etiki kpǝ úfi ókpe mǝ nkɛale fɛ úsu údufǝ Akaia .
44020003	Úsiǝ mfó fe afa ǝtsyǝ . Lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ ǝsuǝ bumuǝ nkǝ lǝ usu Siria , únyǝ útsyǝ lekpo nkǝ Yudafɔ ba nkpe mfó lǝ wǝ ukpǝ eto esu bɔbɛbɛ . Nyaso úfi nsusu bio nkǝ wesinkli usu ɔyɛ Makedonia .
44020004	Lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ buduu , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝnko wǝ . Betidi bamǝ ni Sopater wǝ dítsyi Beroia wǝ ni Piro eto ubi ku Aristarko ku Sekundo ba ditsyi Tesalonika ku Gaio wǝ dítsyi Derbe ku Tihiko ku Trofimo ba ditsyi Asia eto lekpake ku Timoteo .
44020005	Mba mfo átɔ̃ bo bǝ beesu bǝńyǝ bǝsǝkǝ bo lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Troa .
44020006	Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Nnamfokuã Eto Abolo Eto Eyididi eto kamaa , búfi ɔklɔ nya búdu lǝ Filipi , nya búsu bútu mǝ lǝ Troa lǝ eyi anɔ eto kama . Nya búsiǝ mfó éfo eyi akuanse .
44020007	Nya lǝ Kɔsida eto diyi tutɛɛ , bótsya lǝ kalebe kani boǝ lǝ budi Bonamute eto didisa lǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya se Paulo lǝǝbǝ budu kǝsiǝsǝ esoo , údi etiki ikulǝ isu taa ntsyenti .
44020008	Nya báto kakadiɛ kpǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ abanslo eto diyo nǝ ǝsuǝ bótsya mfó .
44020009	Nya se Paulo eto etiki nlɛ bukulǝ esoo , selabe éfi okosobi wǝ baakpo Eutiko lǝ lefe nǝ unsi lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto mfɛnsle ǝsuǝ . Ófankli utsyi lǝ abanslo eto botokǝtǝkǝ tsyǝfǝ mfó úbǝ ɔ́sɔ lǝ kasɔ . Nya se bésu bétsyi wǝǝ , bǝnyǝ bǝ úkpǝ .
44020010	Fɛɛ Paulo áyifǝ úsu kasɔɔ , úsu dikpefi nǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya úbǝ kasɔ ɔ́buta ni nya útsyi ni óboko wǝ akɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biankpo kudu ! Okpe nkpǝ ! ”
44020011	Nya mǝmblɛ dísinkli bésu kato mfó bésu bédi Bonamute eto lesa nǝmǝ . Lǝ nnya kama Paulo esi úsiǝ údi etiki isu ese kalesiǝsiǝ fɛ údu .
44020012	Nya se bákpa okosobi ǝmǝ ku nkpǝ besuko diyoo , ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ mǝ tinti .
44020013	Nya Paulo dífi akpa eto kusu úsu Aso . Fɛɛ lǝ kase útsyue ǝsuǝǝ , bo éfi ɔklɔ bɔ́tɔ wǝ sɛtɔ bǝ lǝ busu butsyi wǝ lǝ mfó .
44020014	Nyaso se úbǝ útu bo lǝ Aso mfóo , údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bonko wǝ kenke lídu búsu Mitilene .
44020015	Búdu lǝ mfó nya lǝ kǝsiǝsǝǝ , búsu bóyo Kio . Nya lǝ diyi nǝmfo eto kǝsiǝsǝ tsyaa , bóyo Samo.Lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , búsu búdufǝ Mileto .
44020016	Paulo mánla nkǝ bobiasǝ lefe kpǝ lǝ Asia mfó nyaso útǝ bókpia Efeso bófe , itsyise ɔlɛ bɔkɔse . Nya utsyue nkǝ lǝ woofoo , ele bǝ udufǝ Yerusalem lǝ Pentekoste eto diyi ǝsuǝ .
44020017	Nya se búsu búdufǝ Miletoo , ókpe batɔnkpe lǝ Efesofɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ mfó .
44020018	Nya se bǝbǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bayimi , mimblɛ ta yi kase minkɛ lǝ mi le nti lefe nǝ kenke minkɛ mfo ǝsuǝ , idu lǝ diyi tutɛ nǝ mímbǝ míndufǝ lǝ Asia eto kasɔ mfo ibǝ ǝsǝ mɔmɔ .
44020019	Binyǝ kase mímbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ míntǝ Bonamute , lǝ kanyi ku binǝntu ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kase bála bǝ balo mɛ eso .
44020020	Bɛlɛ ola bebe mɛ . Minni futsyǝ nkpe disiale . Bonamute eto asa nnya minyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nnya ni lesa nǝ mínte mi nɛ , nya mémfi kulesa nkula mi . Nte Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ betidi nti ku lǝ mi ayo .
44020021	Nya kalebe saa mínsuu , ntɛyi Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kekleke minkǝ bayɛ asa bua buyifo lǝ batsyi bawuninsǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto , lǝ bafo Bonamute Yesu banɔ .
44020022	“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ nsu Yerusalem , nya minnyi lesa nǝ lǝbǝ mɛ busu ketu mfó .
44020023	Fɛɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ka kenke mínyɛ mínfee , nyi miǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte mɛ nkǝ moolabee diyo nyǝ kanyi .
44020024	Fɛɛ meenfi mɔ nkpǝ fe lesa nǝ lefe itǝ mɛ . Lesa nǝ lefe itǝ mɛ ni bǝ nlosǝ keyifo ka Bonamute Yesu lékpe mɛ kɔni nkǝ nyifo . Nya keyifo ka ókpe kɔni nkǝ nsu nyifo ni bǝ ntɛyi betidi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
44020025	“ Nyasoo , nyi miǝ mimba kenke lɛnɔ mɔ asatete itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ensie embotsya ku mɛ bio .
44020026	Nyaso mmii , mǝǝtǝ mi bote minkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ áyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ eto kusuu , beembufi utidi ǝmfo eto kabua balo mɛ dikpi .
44020027	Sitintii , mémfi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kusu eto asa nkula mi .
44020028	Lǝ nnya esoo , bebe mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ . Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ díyifo mi mba ni batɔnkotɔnko bǝ lǝ bɛlɛ wǝ bebi ba Onanto dífi útǝ mi nkǝ bɛlɛ mǝ ola . Bɛlɛ mǝ kukɔnɔ , itsyise Onanto eto ubi dífi wǝ kɔtɔ ókpo kasɔ lǝ mǝ disi úfi úlǝkǝ mǝ utsyiko lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
44020029	Nnya minyi ekpa ko mǝ ni bǝnkǝ lǝ nyani mi ntsyǝǝ , betidi ebubǝ bataka bǝńyǝ bakpɔ mi bǝlǝ mi nya boosensǝ mi fe kase bekiti laakpɔ ku basamu kesensǝ mǝ .
44020030	Nya lǝ mi nti kulaa tsyaa , mi bǝtsyuǝ ébusinkli lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kama bawɛ mi , bákpa betidi kpǝ báyɛnko lǝ mǝ kosate eto bidiabidia eto asatete ǝsuǝ .
44020031	Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ bikabe lǝ bekloma kase mínkplatsya ku binǝntu lǝ mi disi nya mínte mi asa ketsye ku kakɔmi itǝ alɛ ǝtsyǝ nnya minkɛ mi lenti ǝsuǝ .
44020032	“ Nya mɔmɔ mfoo , mfi mi nkpe lǝ Onanto eto ani bǝ lǝ ose mi . Lǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ laawunsǝko betidii lǝ lekpe mi nkɛale lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bo luutǝ biunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ Onanto eto , fe mba úlǝkǝ ókpo atsyɔ utsyǝ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
44020033	Mánsɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa eto sika sia nye sika flubia nye bikǝlɛlɛ ǝsuǝ .
44020034	Mi kosate yi biǝnkǝ mɔ ani nyamfo mímfi mínyifo keyifo fɛ minlɛ budi nya mimfi minlɛ betidi ba lǝǝtǝkǝko mɛ bobe .
44020035	Nyifo nyamfo kenke lǝ mfi nte mi kase ele bǝ bukawunsǝ ko bakombo , nya lǝ bekloma ditiki nǝ Bonamute Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Asa butǝ ǝtǝ disuǝyuǝ enso bofo . ’ ”
44020036	Nya lefe nǝ Paulo dídi etiki nyamfo ólosǝǝ , óse akonki nya wǝ ku mǝ léto ola .
44020037	Nya mǝmblɛ lɛkɔbǝ wǝ bálɛ nya béwi nku itsyise balɛ budu lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ɔflɔ .
44020038	Nya nnya kulaa leso mǝ nkuɛnlo bokpe ni nnya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ bensiebunyǝ wǝ bio eso . Nya bákpa wǝ bésu bǝtsyǝ kusu lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó .
44021001	Nya se bǝtsyǝ bo kusu bálosǝǝ , búsu búdufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ nya bɔ́yila búsu Kos . Se kale dísiǝǝ , búsu búdufǝ Rodo nya búdu mfo búsu Patara .
44021002	Mfo nya búfi ɔklɔ wǝ ntɔ lǝ Foinike , nya búdu .
44021003	Se bɔ́ntɔɔ , búnyǝ Kipro eto kasɔ , nya bɔ́yɛ boofe mfo nya búdu bɔ́yɛ ukúe eto lekpake búsu búdufǝ Tiro lǝ Siria eto kasɔ . Nya búsu kaka boolǝkǝ bikǝ bia nkpe lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo .
44021004	Se bɔ́yifǝ búsu umǝǝ , búnyǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfó . Búsiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ eyi akuanse , itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ díkǝlǝkǝ óte bafokanɔfɔ bamfo lesa nǝ luubǝ lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ , nyaso bálɛ Paulo lekpakpa bǝ woensu Yerusalem lefe nǝmfó .
44021005	Fɛɛ se lefe nǝ ele bǝ budu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ léyoo , bafokanɔfɔ mfó ku mǝ besio ku bebi kenke ákpa bo esu bétsyǝ kusu lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ , nya bomblɛ lése akonki bóto ola .
44021006	Nya bútsyǝ bǝtsyuǝ esu fɛ búdufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya mǝǝ tsya dísinkli bésu mǝ ayo .
44021007	Se búdu lǝ Tiroo , búnyǝ lǝ Ptolemai . Mfo búsu búsiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfo , nya búsiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ diyi lɔni .
44021008	Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , búdu mfó búsu Kaisarea . Búsu bɔsɔnɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ eto otsyabe Filipo . Uyifo bawunsǝkotsyuǝ ekuanse ba bǝlǝkǝ lǝ Yerusalem eto ɔni .
44021009	Ɔkɛ bebisiobi ena ba lensi tɔ bǝsǝ . Beyifo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi .
44021010	Nya búsiǝ mfó eyi ǝtsyuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ bɔkɛ mfóo , Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Agabo étsyi Yudea úbǝ mfó .
44021011	Nya se úbǝ bo ɔflɔɔ , ónyankli abɔsu nya Paulo lékle lǝ nkɛ nya úfi óklǝ wǝ kosate eto ani ku akpa nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Nko ke Yudafɔ lookle abɔsu nyamfo eto osate lǝ Yerusalem nya boofi wǝ besu bakpe lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto beninǝ eto ani nɛ . ’ ”
44021012	Nya se bɔ́nɔ etiki nyamfóo , bo ku betidi ba nkpe mfó kenke álɛ Paulo lekpakpa boǝ wensu Yerusalem .
44021013	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi bo nkǝ , “ Beso bǝǝnlɛ nku buwi nya bɛnlɛ mɛ ani bolo mǝ ? Ntɔnɔ miǝ bakle mɛ lǝ Yerusalem , lǝ nsu nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eso . ”
44021014	Nyaso lefe nǝ búnyǝ boǝ boǝmbofo wǝ nsusu bɔtsyi kawuninsǝǝ , bóyani wǝ nya bɔ́tɛyi wǝ boǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute Yesu eto lelabi bǝ itǝ . ”
44021015	Lǝ eyi nyamfo eto kamaa , bomblɛ ǝmuǝ bikǝ nya búdu búsu Yerusalem .
44021016	Nya Kaisarea eto bafokanɔfɔ eto bǝtsyuǝ tsya dítǝnko bo . Bákpa bo besuko Kipro eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Mnason bǝ lǝ búsu bɔsɔnɔ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó . Uninǝ ǝmfo eyifo ofokanɔnyǝ koko .
44021017	Nya se búdufǝ Yerusalem bafokanɔfɔ nkpe mfó áfo bo kukɔnɔ tinti .
44021018	Se kale dísiǝǝ , Paulo ákpa bo nya búsu búnyǝ Yakobo ku Yerusalem eto bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ .
44021019	Nya se búsiǝsǝ mǝ bólosǝǝ , Paulo átɛyi mǝ asa nnya kenke Onanto lɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úyifo lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ nti .
44021020	Se bétsyue wǝ ato balosǝǝ , mǝmblɛ kenke átɛsǝ Onanto . Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔyimi lala , ǝnyǝ kase Yudafɔ akpi akpi kpǝ díkafo bánɔ nya banlɛ Moses eto afi lǝ kɔni kekleke .
44021021	Bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ fǝ lɛtɛyi Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ nlebe nlebe fǝ bensidi Moses eto afi ku bo akpayifoyifo , nya fátɛyi tsya fǝnkǝ mba ni Yudafɔ tsya mensila mǝ bebi alo .
44021022	Lǝ nyamfo eso be ele bǝ buyifo mɔmɔ ? Buyi boǝ bǝǝbǝ esu bɔbɛbɛ kǝbǝ . Itsyise bɔɔnɔ bǝ ǝbǝ ákpe lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo . ”
44021023	Nya bǝtǝ wǝ nsusu bǝnkǝ , “ Bokpe betidi ena bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bo mfo , ba díkaka ntamu .
44021024	Yɛnko mǝ esuko Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó nya lǝ fǝ nku lǝ bɛkpi mi esi nya lǝ awunsǝko mǝ lǝ bafo mǝ disikpinkpi eto kayo . Nyamfo luutǝ utidi saa nyǝ nkǝ sidia bátɛyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nyaso fintsya lɛ Moses eto kɔfi budi lǝ kɔni .
44021025	Nya bafokanɔfɔ ba lenni Yudafɔɔ , bɔ́ɔwɔni ekue bútǝ mǝ bɔ́tɛyi mǝ boǝ , bayɛ edisa nnya béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi ku kɔtɔ ku bebuki ba baawaninsǝ simuǝ kaalo eto sinǝ eto budi , lǝ bayɛ sɛsɔnɔ budi . ”
44021026	Nyaso se kale disiǝǝ , Paulo ákpa basani bamǝ nya bésu béyifo disikpinkpi eto lekpa nǝmǝ . Nyamfo eto kamaa , úsu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo úsu útǝ besumunyǝ bote eyi nnya kama fɛ disikpinkpi eto lekpa nǝmǝ loolo itǝ lǝ befi kedi eto bikǝ baboko lǝ beyifo keditǝtǝ eto lekpa lǝ mǝ disi .
44021027	Nya se íbu sɛkɛ lǝ eyi akuanse nyamǝ lǝ eyoo , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ étsyi Asia eti bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ Paulo lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfo . Nyaso bákpadi betidi bǝtsyuǝ básɔ lebo nya bǝmuǝ wǝ .
44021028	Nya bǝńyǝ mfó banlɛ kudu bokpo bǝnkǝ , “ Israel eto basani , bɛwunsǝko bo ! Osani ǝmfo ni nwǝ nlɛ botsyilama kate betidi kenke lǝ nlebe nlebe asa nnya ńyǝ lǝ bo betidi ku afi ku Disumuyo nǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Nya kama tsyaa , woakpa mba lenni Yudafɔ kedufǝnko Disumuyo nnya nlɛ bote nkǝ bákpe bo Yudafɔ eto kakɛnkɛkɔ kamfo kɔfiɔ ! ”
44021029	Bátɛyi nko itsyise lefe nǝ lefe mǝǝ , bǝnyǝ bǝ Paulo ku Trofimo wǝ ni Efesonyǝ balɛ bɔyɛ kafe lǝ Yerusalem . Lǝ nyaso béfi nsusu bǝ ókpa wǝ úsuko Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó .
44021030	Nyaso se banlɛ kudu bokpo nkoo , étakasǝ betidi kenke lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ nya bátaka ku kudu nya bétsyetsyi bésu bátsya lǝ kusumukɔ mfó . Bǝtsyuǝ ǝnǝ Paulo babɔnko lǝ Disumuyo nya béti biku kenke .
44021031	Nya lefe nǝ bála bǝ lǝ balo wǝǝ , Romafɔ eto bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ánɔ nkǝ Yerusalemfɔ kenke átaka bǝńyǝ balɛ bulǝ bokpe .
44021032	Lamfolamfo , ókpa bamamanyǝ ninǝ ku bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ ɔ́yɛnko nya bésu kaka banlɛ bulǝ bokpe mfó . Nya se mba ntɔnko mba nlɛ bulǝ bokpe dínyǝ bamamanyǝ bamfóo , báyɛ Paulo bɔblɛ .
44021033	Mfó nya ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmǝ dítǝ kusu nkǝ bǝmuǝ Paulo nya béfi amana ǝnuǝ bákpe wǝ . Nya fɛ ɔ́tɔ ɔ́nɔ utsyǝ eto okle utidi ǝmfo ni ku lesa nǝ úyifo .
44021034	Nya betidi bamfó eto utsyuǝ saa eto lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi lɛbɔ lete . Nya se bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo mámfo ditiki saa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi kasɔ bɔnɔ itsyi lǝ kudu ko betidi bamǝ nlɛ bokpo esoo , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ bakpa Paulo besu beti bakpe lǝ bamamanyǝ eto diyo .
44021035	Nya lefe nǝ báyo kesiee , ibǝ bǝ ele bǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ tsyi Paulo ku mǝ ani babesǝ kato itsyi lǝ lɛblɔfi kekleke nǝ sitiditu siamǝ dífi lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ eso . Nya bǝtǝkǝko mǝ ku kudu bembembe ku etiki bǝnkǝ , “ Belo wǝ ! ”
44021036	
44021037	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ baala bǝ befi wǝ besu beti bakpe lǝ diyoo , Paulo átɛyi bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ nkǝ , “ Ǝǝntǝ mɛ kusu lǝ ndinko fǝ etiki sɛkɛɛ ? ” Nya bamamanyǝ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bee ! Aanɔ Sigriki fɛ ? ”
44021038	Nya usi ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Inni fǝ ni Egiptenyǝ wǝ lékpa bewudifɔ akpi ana ba létaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Aba ǝsuǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ lǝ mfóo , nya bétsyetsyi bédu bésu mfiminti kafo ? ”
44021039	Nya Paulo dílǝkǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ , “ Yudanyǝ mini . Bále mɛ lǝ Tarso lǝ Kilikia eto kasɔ . Nya umǝ ǝmfóo , enni umǝ kɛkɛ . Lǝ nyasoo , lekpakpa tǝ kusu lǝ ndi ko betidi bamfo etiki . ”
44021040	Nyaso uninǝ ǝmfo átɔnɔ útǝ Paulo kusu nkǝ udinko mǝ etiki . Nya Paulo lɛbɔ úbǝ úńyǝ lǝ kesie eto atalakpoe mfo nya óbesǝ ani kato nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ bedi kã . Nya se bédi kãã , údi mǝ etiki lǝ Yudafɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
44022001	“ Boantomǝ ku bayimi ba letsya mfo , nlɛ mi taflatsyɛ boto ! Bitǝ kusu lǝ nkpasǝ mi etiki nyamfo lǝ bɛnɔ . ”
44022002	Nya lefe nǝ bánɔ bǝ Yudafɔ eto sele ɔnlɛ budii , bésinkli báyɛ kudu bokpo , betsyue wǝ ato . Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
44022003	“ Yudanyǝ mini , nya bále mɛ lǝ Tarso lǝ Kilikia eto kasɔ . Fɛɛ Yerusalem mfo mínsu suku . Gamaliel léte mɛ asa . Báte mɛ boantomǝ eto afi ku mǝ akpa kenke . Nya mímfi mɔ lɛkɔɛsi kenke míntǝ Onanto fe kase mi tsya nlɛ buyifo mmi .
44022004	Nya idu lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ntsyǝ kasɔ ku bafokanɔfɔ lǝ kusu fɔfɔ komfo ǝsuǝ butǝkǝko , nya mínla miǝ balo mǝ . Nyaso ḿmuǝ basani ku besio nkpe lǝ Aba eto diyo .
44022005	Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ku katsyakɔ kamǝ eto uninǝ saa ebudi nya minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo eto adansiɛ , itsyise mǝ díkawɔni ekue kǝtǝ mɛ bǝ nsunkeyifo asa nyamfo . Nya lefe nǝ míntɔ lǝ Damaskoo , bǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale bǝnkǝ nnyǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe mfóo , lǝ mmuǝ mǝ , lǝ nkle mǝ mfi mboko Yerusalem bǝ lǝ bǝnǝ mǝ koto .
44022006	“ Lǝ lefe nǝ mínyɛ míntɔ ibu sɛkɛ lǝ ndufǝ Damaskoo , iyifo fe kakɔmi eto lefosi abombo ǝnuǝǝ , lamfolamfo diyǝnde kekleke ditsyuǝ dítsyi kato díbǝ lékpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ !
44022007	Nya míndu mínɔ mínkpo lǝ kasɔ nya mínɔ se ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ nlɛ etiki budi kátɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Saulo , Saulo , beso fǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ mmǝ ? ’
44022008	“ Nya míntɔ mínkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , owoe feni ? ’ “ Nya usi údi mɛ etiki nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Yesu Nasaretnyǝ . ’
44022009	Nya betidi ba ku mɛ nyɛɛ , ǝnyǝ diyǝnde nǝmfo . Fɛɛ bánnɔ utsyǝ wǝ nlɛ etiki budinko mfo eto ɔkɔɛ .
44022010	“ Nya míntɔ wǝ minkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , be ele bǝ nyifo ? ’ “ Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Taka , lǝ esu Damasko . Mfó moote fǝ lesa nǝ mínlǝkǝ fǝ miǝ lǝ eyifo . ’
44022011	Diyǝnde kplɛ nǝmfo ába mɛ ǝnǝmi itǝ bǝ betidi ba bonko mǝ nyɛɛ , lɛkɔbe mɛ lǝ kɔni bálɛ fɛ búsu búdufǝ Damasko .
44022012	“ Nya , osani utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ baakpo Ananias . Uyifo utidi wǝ leebu Onanto tinti , nya woayɛ lǝ bo afi ǝsuǝ tsya . Nya Yudafɔ ba nkpe mfó kenke leebu wǝ tinti .
44022013	Utidi ǝmfo ǝbǝ úńyǝ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyimisani Saulo , sinkli ǝnyǝ asa ! ’ Lǝ nya koo , mɔ ǝnǝmi lékpa kɛ , nya mínyǝ wǝ !
44022014	“ Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Bo bana eto Onanto ni futsyǝ dílǝkǝ fǝ nkǝ laate wǝ lelabi , nya lǝ ǝnyǝ wǝ Ubi Kɛnkɛ lǝ ate wǝ tsya , lǝ anɔ wǝ etiki itsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
44022015	Ele bǝ fi nkomǝ eto ditiki nǝmfo esuko kalebe saa fe odansiɛ esu atɛyi betidi kenke lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ nya fanɔ tsya .
44022016	Nya mɔmɔɔ , kulesa mensi bu . Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ afo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa . Lǝ akpadi wǝ diye , lǝ uflǝ fǝ abua uwi . ’
44022017	“ Nyamfo eto kamaa , nsinkli nsu Yerusalem . Nya lefe nǝ mínsu Disumuyo minlɛ ola botoo , íyifo mɛ fe selabe minlɛ , nya mínyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ .
44022018	Mfó nya Bonamute kosate lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Kɔse lǝ edu lǝ Yerusalem , itsyise betidi ba nkpe mfo embutsyue fǝ ditiki nǝ fɔɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ koto . ’
44022019	“ Nya míntǝ mbuayɛ minkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , mǝmblɛ yi bǝnkǝ mɔ díkesu katsyakɔ isu katsyakɔ kesu kǝmuǝ bafokanɔfɔ nya mínkablɛ mǝ .
44022020	Lǝ lefe nǝ banlɛ Otsyabe Stefano boloo , mintsya átɔnɔ ku mǝ , nya bǝlǝkǝ mǝ awu kato bǝtǝ mɛ mínlɛ fɛ bákato wǝ aba kalo . ’
44022021	“ Nya Bonamute lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Taka , lǝ ama kusu itsyise kaka minlɛ fǝ botsyese atsyo tinti lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ nti ! ’ ”
44022022	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo kenkee , betidi bamfó ńyǝ kpoo banlɛ wǝ ditiki ato butsyuǝ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ údi wǝ ditiki nǝmfo ólosǝǝ , mǝmblɛ ákpo kudu bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Aa ! Lo wǝ ku wǝ ditsyǝbi kenke ! Yensile bǝ ɔkɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kon ! ”
44022023	Nya mǝmblɛ lekpo kudu bembembe ku lɛblɔfi bála mǝ awu lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bákpa utembu bǝsǝ wǝ , nya utembu ǝmǝ lébe kato ófo mfo kenke .
44022024	Nya Roma eto bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmǝ dítǝ nkǝ bákpa wǝ bedufǝnko diyo kafo lǝ bablɛ wǝ lǝ babɛbɛ lesa nǝ eso Yudafɔ bamfo nlɛ wǝ kudu bokpo .
44022025	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ bákle wǝ bǝǝbǝ wǝ bɔblɛɛ , Paulo átɔ omamanyǝ ninǝ ɔni wǝ dińyǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Kusu kpe bǝ bablɛ Romanyǝ wǝ bánkponko tɔ lekpo ? ”
44022026	Se uninǝ ǝmfo lɛnɔ nyafoo , úsu ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be biǝ bieyifo mfo mmǝ ? Osani ǝmfoo , Romanyǝ uni lo ! ”
44022027	Nyaso bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmfo dísu Paulo ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fanlɛ bɔtɛyi ? Romanyǝ feni ? ” Nya Paulo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee ! ”
44022028	Nya ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mintsya Romanyǝ mini . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , atabi kpǝ míntǝ fɛ mimfiani Romanyǝ ! ” Nya Paulo dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bio nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛɛ , mɔ anto ku ambe kenke eyifo Romafɔ . ”
44022029	Lamfolamfo se betidi ba bǝ bablɛ wǝ lǝ batɔ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki banɔ léte bǝ Romanyǝ unii , difufu ǝmuǝ mǝmblɛ kenke nya bányi besu kama . Nya lefe nǝ mǝ ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ léte nkǝ Romanyǝ unii , sikpi ǝmuǝ wǝ tinti , itsyise wǝ ni futsyǝ dítǝ kusu nkǝ bakpe wǝ lǝ amana ǝsuǝ .
44022030	Bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmfo ála nkǝ waate lesa nǝ díbǝ fɛ béfi etiki lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ . Nyaso se kale dísiǝǝ , ókpadi Yudafɔ eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ku mǝ bakponkpo kenke nya mǝmblɛ díbǝ bakɔ . Nya útǝ nkǝ banyankli Paulo nya bákpa wǝ báboko mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ bedufǝ lǝ wǝ etiki ǝsuǝ .
44023001	Lefe nǝ Paulo létsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmii , únyǝ Yudafɔ eto bakponkpo ba díkǝbǝ bensi lǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfó , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bayimi , mɔ lɛkɔɛsi anlɛ mɛ dikpi bolo lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ibǝ ese lǝ mmi eto diyi nǝ mfo . ”
44023002	Nya se Ananias wǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lǝ mǝ nti mfó lɛnɔ kase Paulo dítǝ mbuayɛ bomfoo , ɔ́tɛyi mba ńyǝ lǝ Paulo ɔflɔ mfo nkǝ basɔ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ .
44023003	Mfó Paulo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝbɔsɔ fǝ nko ke ! Fǝ nwǝ ni ofati wǝ bákua diflubi futututu ! Nte okponkpo wǝ eto okle fe ni mfo ? Nte kɔfi ko eto okle ǝsuǝ fáyɛ fanlɛ mɛ lekpo bokponko , fɛɛ fǝ ǝmǝ ke ńyǝ lǝ ko ǝsuǝ se fǝtǝ kusu fǝ basɔ mɛ ! ”
44023004	Nya mba díńyǝ lǝ Paulo ɔflɔ mfó lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke fanlɛ boka mmǝ ? ”
44023005	Lǝ nyasoo , Paulo ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , Israelfɔ , mánte nko minkǝ wǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke . Lǝ nko inii , eni méndi wǝ etiki nko . Itsyise bátɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , ‘ Mántɛyi etiki bua saa nnya dińyǝ lǝ mi batɔnkotɔnko ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
44023006	Nya Paulo ǝnyǝ nkǝ , betidi ba díbǝ bátsya mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ eyifo ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Sadukifɔ , nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya diyifo Farisifɔ . Lǝ nyasoo , ófã bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , Farisinyǝ mini ! Nya Farisinyǝ eto kafo bale mɛ bétsyiko ! Nyaso banlɛ mɛ lekpo bokponko mmi nɛ itsyise mfo nnɔ miǝ bǝkpǝnkǝ si bootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ bio ! ”
44023007	Nya lefe nǝ Paulo lɛtɛyi nko eto ditiki nǝmfo ólosǝǝ , dikunǝ kǝdiǝ ko dídufǝ lǝ etsyukpa ǝnuǝ nyamfo eto nti , nya báma lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ .
44023008	Itsyise Sadukifɔ aatɛyi bǝnkǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ǝnsiǝmbotaka , nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe ku awɔnɔ ǝmbǝ , fɛɛ Farisifɔ áfo nyamfo kenke bánɔ .
44023009	Mfo nya kǝdiǝ dídufǝ mǝ lenti nyanklaa . Mfo nya kɔfi eto bateasa ba ni Farisifɔ díńyǝ lǝ Paulo eto ditiki nǝmǝ eto kama bǝ ɔnukualɛ ɔ́tɛyi . Nya bákpo kudu bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boǝnyǝ lesa bua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ! Nya lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ditsyuǝ nye Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ nlɛ wǝ etiki budinkoo , be lebia lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
44023010	Mfóo , etiki eto kǝnǝ kamǝ ǝbǝ kakɛ ale tinti . Nyaso bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmǝ áte sikpi nkǝ boonǝ Paulo bésense nyasoo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bamamanyǝ nkǝ bakpa wǝ besu beti bakpe lǝ Aba eto diyo .
44023011	Nya diyi nǝmfo eto ntsyǝntii , Bonamute ǝbǝ Paulo ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo , kpe utu ! Fe kase fǝńyǝ fédi mɔ ditiki nǝmǝ eto adansiɛ lǝ Yerusalem , nko ke fuuńyǝ edi ni lǝ Roma tsya nɛ . ”
44023012	Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ áka ntamu bǝnkǝ bǝǝmbudi lesa nye bǝnǝ ntu isu ese lefe nǝ eto lefe balo Paulo !
44023013	Nya betidi bamfo ebuyifo fe betidi fosi ana ku kama .
44023014	Nya bésu besumunyǝ ninǝ kenke ku mǝ batɔnkotɔnko ɔflɔ nya bésu bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boka ntamu boǝnkǝ boembudi nye bunǝ kulesa isu ese lefe nǝ boolo Paulo .
44023015	Lǝ nyaso mi ku bakponkpo tɛyi bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko bǝ lǝ okpa Paulo oboko katsyakɔ mfó . Biyifo fenkǝ bela biǝ bisi biatɔ wǝ etiki nyamǝ eto lekpasǝ . Nya lǝ bakpa wǝ balɛ bobokoo , lǝ bolo wǝ lǝ kusu . ”
44023016	Nya se Paulo eto utitabo lɛnɔ etiki nya kenke bátɛyi mfo esoo , útsyǝtsyi úsu Aba eto diyo kaka bákpe Paulo nya úsu úyu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ etiki nya bátɛyi .
44023017	Nyaso Paulo ákpadi omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa okosobi ǝmfo esuko mi ununǝ ɔflɔ . Ɔyɛnko ditiki kekleke nkǝ lǝ ɔtɛyi wǝ . ”
44023018	Lǝ nya esoo , omamanyǝ ǝmǝ ákpa okosobi ǝmfo úsuko mǝ uninǝ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo wǝ bákpe lǝ diyo mfo lekpadi mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ nkpa dikpefi nǝmfo mboko fǝ ɔflɔ lǝ ɔtɛyi fǝ ditiki ditsyuǝ nǝ ɔnyɛnko . ”
44023019	Nyaso bamamanyǝ ninǝ kenke eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo ákɔbe okosobi ǝmfo lǝ kɔni nya ókpa wǝ usuko lɛkpɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fanyɛnko fǝ atɛyi mɛ ? ”
44023020	Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ákle kɛnyɛ ku mǝ beninǝ bǝnkǝ bǝǝbǝ balɛ fǝǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ akpa Paulo aboko katsyakɔ mfó kusɛɛ ku nsusu bǝ lǝ batɔ wǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ .
44023021	Fɛɛ mamfo mǝ etiki , itsyise mǝ betidi fe awosi ana ku kama ǝbɔbiǝ lǝ kusu komǝ kala wǝ kusu . Betidi bamfo akle kɛnyɛ bǝ boolo Paulo fɛ boodi lesa nye bǝnǝ ntu . Nyaso balɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ ɛɛyɛ lǝ fǝ . Boomuǝ ǝsuǝ besu babiɔ lǝ kusu mfo , itsyise balɛ kusu bobe bǝ ǝbɔtɔnɔ ǝtǝ mǝ nko . ”
44023022	Bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo ǝkǝ wǝ ato nkǝ , “ Mǝntǝ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa lǝ usi ɔnɔ ditiki nǝ fátɛyi mɛ mfo blɛmblɛ ! ” Nya útǝ okosobi ǝmfo kusu dídu .
44023023	Nyamfo eto kamaa , omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmfo ákpadi wǝ beninǝ inuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛbɛbɛ bamamanyǝ alofa ǝnuǝ ba luusu Kaisarea mmi ku kǝtsyǝ abombo ɔwɔnɔmbɛ . Bɛbɛbɛ betidi alofa ǝnuǝ ba tsya luutsyi afle ku betidi fosi akuanse ba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ batɔmini .
44023024	Bitǝ Paulo batɔmini lǝ usiǝ lǝ bekpa wǝ bɛyɛnko buɛ bisuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Felike ɔflɔ . ”
44023025	Nya ɔ́wɔni kukue kutsyuǝ nkǝ befi besuko unyɛsiǝ ǝmǝ nkǝ ,
44023026	Kukue komfo etsyi mɔ Klaudio Lisia ɔflɔ nya minlɛ ko bufi katsyese fǝ Boote kplɛ Felike minlɛ fǝ busiǝsǝ .
44023027	Yudafɔ dímuǝ utidi ǝmfo nya yoofo budi bǝ bala bǝ baalo wǝ fɛ mintǝ bamamanyǝ miǝ bafo wǝ , itsyise nnɔ bǝ Romanyǝ uni .
44023028	Nyaso nkpa wǝ nsuko mǝ katsyakɔ bǝ lǝ banɔ lesa nǝ uyifo .
44023029	Nnyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo minkǝ nnya eso bǝmuǝ wǝ mfo yɛ lǝ mǝ Yudafɔ eto afi ǝsuǝ nya inni bota kebu bo eso ele bǝ bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo nye balo wǝ .
44023030	Lǝ lefe nǝ utsyuǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ ǝnkǝ balɛ disi bubu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ balo wǝǝ , lamfolamfo mbu disi minkǝ lǝ nkpa wǝ mboko fǝ ɔflɔ nya lǝ ntɛyi mba wǝ ku mǝ lɛkɛ etiki miǝ befi kabua ka uyifo baboko fǝ ɔflɔ .
44023031	Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamfó eyifo lǝ lesa nǝ bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ketsye kamfóo , bákpa Paulo báyɛnko taa Antipatri .
44023032	Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , bamamanyǝ ba nyɛ lǝ akpa ésinkli bésu Aba eto diyokakpekɔ mfó , nya bǝtǝ mba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ batɔmini bǝ bayɛnko Paulo besuko Kaisarea .
44023033	Se bésu bédufǝǝ , bákpa Paulo ku kukue ko bǝtǝ mǝ mfo bésu bǝtǝ Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ ǝmǝ .
44023034	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ kukue komǝ boklaa , ɔ́tɔ Paulo kaka útsyi . Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Paulo etsyi Kilikiaa ,
44023035	usi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muudufǝ lǝ fǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ nnɔ nya kukɔnɔ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayo lǝ fonko betidi ba lɛkɛ etiki mfó ǝbǝ . ” Nya usi útǝ wǝ bamamanyǝ ba ńyǝ mfó nkǝ bákpa Paulo besu beti bakpe lǝ diyo nǝ Oka Herodes léto lǝ bakase wǝ .
44024001	Eyi anɔ eto kamaa , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Ananias ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku mǝ Otsyiami wǝ bákpo Tertulo ǝbǝ Kaisarea . Bǝbǝ Felike ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ babɔ wǝ kabua ka Paulo nlɛ buyifo .
44024002	Nya se bákpadi Pauloo , Tertulo ákpe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bo Ububutidi , lefe kpǝ ni nǝmfoo , diyuǝ akɛ bo lenti ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ kobe ku bote butsyue bo fefi fanyɛnko bo eso . Nya bunyǝ boǝ bɔtsyikawuninsǝ sɛɛ kpǝ tsya ǝbǝ lǝ bo kasɔ mfo kenke .
44024003	Nyamfo eso bo Yudafɔ kenke lɛ fǝ ani bɔsɔ .
44024004	Nya bɔlɛ fǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ boǝ lǝ bɔyɛ fǝ lefe bobiasǝǝ , lǝ etsyue ato anɔ etiki nya boǝbǝ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
44024005	“ Se bunyǝ wǝǝ , bunyǝ boǝ uyifo nwǝ laakpe bulǝ , nya woatsyilama kafe lefe saa akabiasǝ Yudafɔ eto nsusu lǝ kalebe saa lǝ kasɔ kamfo kenke bǝ lǝ bǝnǝ asa bua baboko lǝ bǝnyǝ Aba lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝ ni ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Nasaretfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko .
44024006	Nya búnyǝ tsya boǝ úkatsyilama kéyifo asa nnya dítǝ bǝ ókpe bo Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo kɔfiɔ fɛ búmuǝ wǝ . Bola boǝ eni boeyifo wǝ lesa nǝ díńyǝ itǝ asa bua nnya uyifo úńyǝ lǝ bo afi ǝsuǝ .
44024007	Fɛɛ bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ninǝ Lisia díbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ ófo , nya útǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ wonko mba lǝkǝ etiki bǝ lekpo eti lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi .
44024008	Nyaso ebofo wǝ bɔtɔ lǝ anɔ lǝ etiki nnya bɔ́tɛyi mfo eyifo sidia . ”
44024009	Nya Yudafɔ bamǝ kenke lɛkɔ bédi adansiɛ bátɛyi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ nnya kenke Tertulo lɛtɛyi bǝ iyifo ɔnukualɛ .
44024010	Nya lefe nǝ Aba eto unyɛsiǝ emfo diyifo Paulo kɔni nkǝ udi etikii , Paulo ǝtsyǝ kasɔ nkǝ , “ Anto , nnyi miǝ fǝ ni futsyuǝ laakpo akpo lǝ Yudafɔ nti alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo . Lǝ nyaso iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ bǝ ndi etiki nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi .
44024011	Yuuyifo fǝ bote bǝnkǝ iyifo fe lefosi eyi ǝnuǝ ni nyamfo se mímbǝ Yerusalem mímbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó bǝ lǝ ntǝ kedi .
44024012	Nya kuutsyuǝ mǝnyǝ se bonko kuutsyuǝ nlɛ etiki bunǝ nye mínkpe bulǝ saa lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó nye lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ tsya nnye lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo .
44024013	Nya betidi bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo kulesa bunyǝ kate sitinti , bǝ etiki nnya bátɛyi mfo eyifo sitinti .
44024014	Nyaa , ditiki nǝ ǝsuǝ mɔɔtɔnɔ ku mǝ ni bǝnkǝ nńyǝ lǝ boantomǝ eto Onanto eto bofokanɔ eto kusu ko mǝ bǝnkǝ iyifo ditsyukpa nǝ nńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nnya ni bǝ mmfo Moses eto kɔfi nnɔ kekleke ku asa nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ekue ǝsuǝ .
44024015	Mfi ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase mǝ tsya dífi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ bǝ betidi ba kenkee , bǝ basɛɛ ku babua tã ebotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ .
44024016	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mfi mɔ ǝsuǝale kenke nkpe bǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ nsusu nte lǝ nkpa lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto ku betidi kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
44024017	“ Alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo mensikɛ lǝ Yerusalem . Nya misinkli mimbǝ miǝ mufi ǝtǝsa ntǝ bakombo ba ni mɔ kosate eto betidi nya lǝ ntǝ Onanto kedi tsya .
44024018	Lǝ lefe nǝ mínyifo disikpinkpi eto lekpa mínlosǝǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝnyǝ mɛ lǝ Disumuyo mfó . Nya bonko mba laakpo kudu kakpe bulǝ saa mányɛ . Nya mɔ ǝmǝ tsya mánkpe bulǝ saa .
44024019	Yoofo budi bǝ Yudafɔ ba ditsyi Asia eto kasɔɔ , mǝ ele bǝ bebǝ fǝ ɔflɔ . Nya lǝ mɔ ku mǝ kpe etiki ǝtsyuǝǝ , nnya boolǝkǝ batɛyi nɛ .
44024020	Nnye betidi ba nsi mfóo , yoofo budi bǝ bɔɔtɛyi asa bua nnya eto dikpi nǝ bálo mǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ eto bakponkpo ninǝ ba lɛkɛ mfó fɛ bákponko mɛ lekpo .
44024021	Enso ditiki nǝ mímbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato míntɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ míńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi minkǝ , ‘ Mbǝ katsyakɔ mfo lǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ minkǝ mfo nnɔ minkǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ si bootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ ’ eso békponko mɛ lekpo ? ”
44024022	Nyaso Felike wǝ nyi kusufɔfɔtsyɔntsyɔ eto ditsyukpa nya ófo ditiki nǝmfo ɔ́nɔ tintii , átɛyi Yudafɔ bamfo nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bɛyɛ isu ese lefe nǝ bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ Lisia luubǝ fɛ lǝ nla ditiki nǝmfo nlǝkǝ . ”
44024023	Nya útǝ kusu nkǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ kpa Paulo usu okpe lǝ diyo . Fɛɛ balɛ wǝ ola kukɔnɔ , lǝ bǝtǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ba luubǝ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ wǝ nnye baboko wǝ asaa , kusu .
44024024	Lǝ eyi asiani ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , Felike ku wǝ usiǝ Drusila wǝ ni Yudanyǝ ǝbǝ , nya útǝ nkǝ bakpa Paulo baboko , nya údi mǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo eto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
44024025	Nya lefe nǝ unsi ɔnlɛ asa kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝ itsyi lǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ ku ǝsuǝ ola bɔlɛ ku Onanto eto lekpo kponkpo nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ kama kamaa , sikpi alɛ Felike tinti . Mfóo , nya Felike lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ edu . Nya lǝ nsi nkɛ lefe sɛɛ , muutǝ bakpadi fǝ bǝtǝ mɛ . ”
44024026	Nya se úbu nkǝ Paulo ebuyifo nte butsyuǝ utǝ wǝ esoo , úkakpe nkǝ bákakpadi wǝ lefe saa lǝ wonko wǝ lǝ bǝkǝdi etiki lǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
44024027	Lǝ alɛ ǝnuǝ eto kamaa , bǝlǝkǝ Felike bédunko nya báboko Porkio Festo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . Nya se Felike lɛbɛbɛ nkǝ Yudafɔ la wǝ asa esoo , útǝ kusu nkǝ Paulo si ɔkɛ diyo nǝmǝ mfó .
44025001	Eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama se Festo díbǝ údufǝ lǝ wǝ sininǝ kedikɔɔ , údu lǝ Kaisarea úsu Yerusalem .
44025002	Mfó nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ . Nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ
44025003	okpa Paulo oboko Yerusalem . Nya mǝ nsusu ni bǝnkǝ bɔɔbiɔ bǝsǝkǝ wǝ lǝ kusu . Nya lǝ ubǝ ɔlɛ bofee , lǝ balo wǝ .
44025004	Nya Festo lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo labe lǝ diyo lǝ Kaesarea . Nya mintsya luubǝ mfo lefe kliminti eto kama .
44025005	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ mi beninǝ lǝ bǝbǝ mfó lǝ bǝbǝ bǝlǝkǝ kabua ka úyifo bate . ”
44025006	Lǝ eyi mflamfla nye lefosi eto kamaa , Festo ésinkli úsu Kaesarea . Se kale dísiǝǝ , ókpadi Paulo eto lekpo nǝmfo .
44025007	Nya se Paulo díbǝ údufǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfóo , Yudafɔ ba ditsyi Yerusalem ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ bátsyilama wǝ nya báwe etiki kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bámfo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate ɔnukualɛ wǝ nkpe lǝ nnya .
44025008	Paulo édi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ményifo kabua saa nta Yudafɔ eto kɔfi nye Disumuyo nye Okankplɛ Kaisare eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ mbu . ”
44025009	Nya se Festo léla nkǝ lǝ Yudafɔ la wǝ asa esoo , ɔ́tɔ Paulo nkǝ , “ Ala fǝnkǝ eesu Yerusalem lǝ nsu nkponko fǝ lekpo nǝmǝ mfó ? ”
44025010	Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Owo . Iyifo mɛ kusutǝtǝ bǝnkǝ kasɔ kamfo eto Okankplɛ Kaisare kosate kponko mɛ lekpo nǝmfo . Fǝ kosate yi sitinti fǝnkǝ manta kɔfi sa mbu nyifo kabua sa lǝ Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ .
44025011	Lǝ nyifo lesa nǝ díńyǝ itǝ bǝ balo mǝǝ , mɔɔtɔnɔ miǝ balo mɛ ! Fɛɛ lǝ mánta kɔfi saa mbuu , yembutǝ kusu bǝ fǝ nye utidi bamba lǝ ufi mɛ utǝ betidi bamfo lǝ balo . Lǝ nyaso mfi mɔ etiki nlɛ butsyǝ lǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ǝnǝmi ! ”
44025012	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Festo ku wǝ beninǝ álɛ etiki nyamǝ bábe nya ɔ́tɛyi Paulo bǝnkǝ , “ Se féfi fǝ etiki fanlɛ Okankplɛ Kaisare butǝ esoo , ebusu Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ǝnǝmi . ”
44025013	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , Oka Agripa ku wǝ ɔyimisio wǝ baakpo Bernike ǝbǝ Festo ɔflɔ lǝ Kaisarea bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝsiǝsǝ .
44025014	Bǝsiǝ mfó eyi kpǝ nya Festo dífi Paulo eto etiki ɔ́tɛyi Oka ǝmfo nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ labe lǝ Aba eto diyo mfo , nya Felike léyani utsyǝ .
44025015	Lefe nǝ mínsu Yerusalem , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku mǝ batɔnkotɔnko átɛyi mɛ etiki nnya bála bǝtǝkǝ wǝ , nya bátɛyi mɛ bǝ ntǝ kusu lǝ balo wǝ dikpi .
44025016	“ Nya mínlǝkǝ kasɔ mínte mǝ miǝ Romafɔ eto kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ balo utidi dikpi fɛ lǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo . Ele bǝ bǝtǝ wǝ kusu lǝ wǝ ku betidi ba lɛkɛ etiki lǝ batsya batɛyi nya fɛ lǝ balo wǝ dikpi .
44025017	Lefe nǝ bǝbǝ mfo lǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , mintsya mémfi nnya ntsyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nnya kǝsiǝsǝ eto olesiǝǝ , ntǝ miǝ bakpa osani ǝmfo baboko mɔ lekpokakpokɔ .
44025018	Fɛɛ etiki nnya béfi lɛ wǝǝ , menyifo etiki bua nnya mímbu miǝ nnya boofi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
44025019	Asa nnya bátɛyi mfó eyifo etiki nnya ditsyi lǝ mǝ kafokanɔ ku utidi wǝ baakpo Yesu wǝ díkpǝ , nya Paulo , wǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ okpe nkpǝ ǝsuǝ !
44025020	Iyifo mɛ basaa nya mante kase mɔɔyɛ nla etiki nyamǝ . Lǝ nyaso ntɔ Paulo lǝ woola nkǝ woefi ditiki nǝmǝ usuko Yerusalem lǝ usu ulǝkǝ etiki nyamfo kɛnyɛ lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
44025021	Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi nkǝ óla nkǝ woefi wǝ etiki usuko Okankplɛ Kaisare lǝ udi , lǝ nyaso ntǝ miǝ beti wǝ bakpe lǝ diyo isu ese lefe nǝ mootsyese wǝ Okankplɛ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . ”
44025022	Nya Oka Agripa lɛtɛyi Festo nkǝ , “ Nla miǝ mɔ kosate lǝ nnɔ wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ . ” Nya Festo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛbɔnɔ ditiki nǝmfo kusɛɛ ! ”
44025023	Nya se kale disiǝǝ , Oka Agripa ku Berenike álɔkɔ ku bekankǝ bǝbǝ lekayo nya bédufǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfó . Nya bamamanyǝ ku umǝ ǝmǝ eto beninǝ dítǝkǝko mǝ bǝǝbǝ . Nya Festo dítǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bakpa Paulo baboko .
44025024	Nya Festo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Oka Agripa ku mi mba kenke díbǝ bétsya mfo , osani ǝmfo ni utidi wǝ Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem ku Kaisarea mfo kenke tsya léla bǝ balo !
44025025	Fɛɛ lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝǝ , wényifo kulesa nǝ dítǝ bǝ balo wǝ dikpǝnkpi . Fɛɛ wǝ ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ úfi wǝ etiki útǝ bo Okankplɛ . Nya mintsya mánni nko .
44025026	Fɛɛ be ni lesa nǝ ele bǝ nwɔni ntǝ bo Okankplɛ ǝmfo ? Itsyisee , wényifo tɔ kabua saa mǝ . Lǝ nyaso nkpa wǝ mboko mi ku fǝ Oka Agripa titlu , minkǝ lǝ bidufǝ lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ lǝ bete mɛ ditiki nǝ ele bǝ nwɔni ntsyese wǝ .
44025027	Itsyisee , yanlɛkɛ bǝ nkpa nwǝ bákpe lǝ diyo ntsyese kasɔ kamfo eto Okankplɛ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe mǝnnyǝ kabua ka úyifo ka mɔɔwɔni ntsyese wǝ . ”
44026001	Nya Agripa lɛtɛyi Paulo nkǝ , “ Kusu kpe bǝ di fǝ etiki . ” Lǝ nnya esoo , Paulo ábesǝ wǝ kɔni kato nya údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
44026002	“ Bo Oka Sɛɛ Agripa , disi ɛkpɛ kpe mɛ mmi bǝ moofo mɔ ditiki bulǝkǝ kate lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ nnya eso Yudafɔ dífi etiki lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
44026003	Itsyise nyi miǝ fǝǝ , eyi Yudafɔ eto kǝnǝ ka nkpe lǝ mǝ nti ku mǝ akpa kenke kukɔnɔ . Nyamfo esoo , minlɛ fǝ lekpakpa nɛ . Kpe utu lǝ anɔ mɔ etiki ǝtǝ mɛ .
44026004	“ Yudafɔ kenke yi kase mínlɛ mɔ ǝsuǝ ola idu lǝ mɔ sikpefi lefe lǝ mɔ umǝ ku lǝ Yerusalem tsya .
44026005	Lǝ bɔɔtɛyi ɔnukualɛɛ , nko seka mísiǝ nkpǝ fe Farisinyǝ itsyi taa mɔ sikpefi lefe nɛ . Nya Yudafɔ eto afi ku akpa kpe ale eso nsumu bamba saa eto ale kenke .
44026006	Lǝ nyaso ete béfi etiki nyamfo banlɛ butǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ lǝ kase mińyǝ minlɛ kusu bobe itǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lɛtɛyi bo bana mǝ utsyǝ eso .
44026007	Israelfɔ eto lefosi atobi ǝnuǝ nnya kenke lǝ bokplatsya kekleke kǝtsyǝ ku kakɔmi bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu ko minlɛ bobe mfo . Bo Oka Sɛɛ , nyamfo eso Yudafɔ nlɛ mɛ kɛnyɛ bola kǝtǝkǝ mɛ etiki lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
44026008	Beso ele bǝ ilǝ bǝ mi mba nkpe mfo kenke fo bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto aatakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ?
44026009	“ Lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , mfi nnya ntǝkǝ lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ miǝ muuyifo lesa saa nǝ moofo lǝ nńyǝ lǝ Yesu wǝ ni Nasaretnyǝ eto mba ntǝkǝko wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
44026010	Yudafɔ eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale bǝ mmuǝ betidi kɛnkɛ kpǝ nkpe lǝ diyo lǝ Yerusalem . Nya mba bálo lǝ mǝ nti tsyaa , íyifo mɔ lelabi bǝ ibǝ nko
44026011	Ntǝkǝko mǝ nya mínkpɔ mǝ nya mínte mǝ ohiã ɛyɛ isu kǝmǝ bamba ka letsyo kulaa tsya . Nya míntǝ miǝ beyifo mǝ asafimfi lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kenke . Nya míńyǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ku lɛblɔfi miǝ bedi mbusiotiki nnya dińyǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
44026012	“ Nko eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ minkɛ minyɛ mintɔ lǝ Damasko ku ǝsuǝale fe kase besumunyǝ ninǝ dítǝ mɛ .
44026013	Bo Oka Sɛɛ , kase minyɛ kusu lǝ kakɔmi eto lefosi ǝnuǝ lefee , nnyǝ diyǝnde nǝ lekpa lenso mfenti eto kofe ditsyi kato nya lékpo létsyilama bonko mba nyɛ bɔntɔ .
44026014	Nya mfó se bomblɛ dídu bɔ́nɔɔ , nnɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Saulo , Saulo , beso fǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nko ? Lǝ áta biyu kokpaa , fǝ kosate ete loofo lefabe . ’
44026015	“ Nya míntɔ wǝ minkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , owoe fe ni ? ’ “ Nya ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Yesu wǝ fanlɛ bɔkpɔnko kekleke .
44026016	Mɔmɔɔ , taka ǝńyǝ ! Se mínkǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ mínte fǝ esoo , muufi fǝ nyifo mɔ uyifoyifo . Ɛbɔtɛyi kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ mfo ku asa nnya muukǝlǝkǝ nkate fǝ .
44026017	Nya kaka minlɛ fǝ botsyesee , moose fǝ , nlǝkǝ fǝ ntsyiko lǝ fǝ betidi ku lǝ bele bamba tsya nti .
44026018	Muutǝ asini mǝ ǝnǝmi nnya luutǝ bǝ ebulǝkǝ mǝ etsyiko lǝ Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale ku ketuntu ka bankpe ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bafo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ku diyǝnde nǝ ǝsuǝ onkpe banɔ . Bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kǝsiǝkɔ kato fe mba úlǝkǝ óboko wǝ akɔ báfiani mba úlǝkǝ utsyǝ itsyise báfo mɛ bánɔ eso . ’
44026019	“ Lǝ nyasoo , Oka Agripa , nyamfo eso mányɛ buyifo lǝ nnya Onanto dílǝkǝ óte mɛ itsyi kato ǝsuǝ nɛ .
44026020	Ntsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi kate Damaskofɔ lǝ nnya kama Yerusalemfɔ , lǝ nnya kama Yudafɔ kenke ku mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya miǝ besinkli lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ lǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto , lǝ bate lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ bǝ bátsyi báwuninsǝ sitinti .
44026021	Nyamfo eso Yudafɔ dímuǝ mɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo nɛ . Nya bála bǝ eni baalo mɛ .
44026022	Fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ mǝ ani . Nyaso minsi minkpe nkpǝ minlɛ adansiɛ nyamfo budi kate mi beninǝ ku betidi kenke tsya nɛ . Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfoo , nnya tututu ni nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku nnya Moses lɛtɛyi bǝ yuubǝ itǝ nɛ .
44026023	Nnya ni bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebubǝ unyǝ kanyi . Nya wǝ ni utidi tutɛ wǝ lootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ , nya wǝ luunǝ diyǝnde oboko Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke . ”
44026024	Lamfolamfoo , Festo áfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Paulo , disi ábia fǝ ! Fǝ sikuente kplɛ siamǝ ábiasǝ fǝ disi ! ”
44026025	Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ububutidi Festo , disi mambia mɛ . Biemfi ditiki nǝmfo fe ayɛtiki . Etiki tinti minlɛ bɔtɛyi .
44026026	Sitinti , Oka Agripa yi etiki nnya minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo . Nyaso minlɛ wǝ etiki budinko ku utu faa nɛ . Mfo nnɔ miǝ nyamfo eto kulesa menyifo wǝ akulasa , uyi nnya lesa saa .
44026027	Oka Agripa , áfo nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi ánɔ ? Nyi miǝ áfo mǝ ánɔ . ”
44026028	Nya Agripa lɛtɔ Paulo nkǝ , “ Ala fǝ ntsyi nwuninsǝ mfiani Ukristonyǝ lǝ lefe kliminti nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ? ”
44026029	Nya Paulo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lefe kliminti dini o-o , lɛkɛntsyɛ dinii , nlɛ ola boto mmi minkǝǝ , mi mba nkpe mfo kenke tsyi bɛwuninsǝ fe mintsya kǝ . Fɛɛ biunyǝ kanyi bakpe mi amana fe kase mɔ nlɛ bunyǝ mǝ ! ”
44026030	Nya Oka Agripa ku Festo ku Bernike ku betidi bamba bamfó kenke létaka bǝńyǝ .
44026031	Nya se bataka bábɔ lǝ mfoo , bákpe disi lǝ Paulo eto ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo menyifo lesa saa bua nǝ ele bǝ balo wǝ nye bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo . ”
44026032	Nya Agripa lɛtɛyi Festo nkǝ , “ Eni boofo wǝ boyani lenni nya úkefi ditiki nǝmfo útsyǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare lǝ ǝnǝmi eso . ”
44027001	Nya lefe nǝ báse uyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ busu Roma lǝ Italiaa , bákpa Paulo ku mba bákpe lǝ diyo ku babamba bákpe lǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ baakpo Yulio eto ani . We ni Okankplɛ eto bamamanyǝ eto ditsyukpa eto uninǝ .
44027002	Nya búfi ɔklɔ wǝ dítsyi Adramitio nya útǝ ǝnǝmi Asia eto lekpake eti . Nya bo ku Makedonianyǝ wǝ baakpo Aristarko wǝ ditsyi Tesalonika dísiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ .
44027003	Nya lefe nǝ kale dísiǝǝ , bóyo Sidon eto lekpo kɛnyɛ . Mfó Yulio dítǝ Paulo kusu kafo faa nkǝ usu umǝ lǝ usu unyǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ itǝ lǝ bǝtǝ wǝ asa nnya wuufi ɔyɛ kusu .
44027004	Nya se busi búdu mfóo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝsuǝ nya lǝ kase ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛkɛ kɛnyɛ ale esoo , bɔyɛ Kipro eto Ɔnwɛdukue eti kaka bɔ́bɔ lǝ ufiebi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
44027005	Nya se bófe mfóo , bɔ́yɛ lǝ Kilikia ku Pamfilia eto lekpo kɛnyɛ , nya búsu búńyǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Mira lǝ Likia eto lekpake .
44027006	Lǝ mfó omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ nyɛnko bo ǝnyǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi Aleksandria ɔntɔ lǝ Italia eto kasɔ . Nya útǝ búsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
44027007	Nya lǝ eyi kpǝ eto kamaa , ílǝ fɛ búsu bóyo umǝ wǝ baakpo Knido . Nya lǝ ufiebi wǝ nlɛ bɔsɔ kekleke esoo , bóamfo bɔyɛ kesu sɛtɔ . Nyaso se búdufǝ Salmonee , bɔ́tsyi bɔ́yɛ búsu Kreta ɔflɔ kaka kasɔ kamǝ díti ufiebi ǝmǝ eso wánkɛ kɛnyɛ ale .
44027008	Disiale fɛ bɔ́yɛ búsu búdufǝ kaka baakpo Ɔklɔ eto Kǝńyǝnkɔ ka lɛlɛkɛ ka dimensitsyo ku umǝ wǝ baakpo Lasea .
44027009	Nya se búkedi eyi kpǝ lǝ kusu ko bɔnyɛ esoo , Yudafɔ eto kɛnyɛ leklefe ébofe . Nya bɔyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ebubǝ ɛkɛ ale eso . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Paulo álɛ mǝ kɔlɛ nkǝ ,
44027010	“ Boanto mǝǝ , nnyǝ minkǝ bo kusu bɔyɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ ǝbǝ ale bɔkɛ kaso , itsyise ɔklɔ ǝmfo ebudufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ , nya asa kpǝ ku betidi tsya ebɔtsylɔ . ”
44027011	Fɛɛ bamamanyǝ eto uninǝ ǝmfo áfo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto okanka ku ɔklɔ sate eto lesa nǝ bátɛyi ɔ́nɔ enso nnya Paulo lɛtɛyi .
44027012	Nyaso se ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kamǝ mánlɛkɛ itǝ lefe kentsyɛ se lɛyɔ lefe nlɛ bubǝ esoo , mba wǝ ku mǝ nyɛ kusu átɛyi bǝnkǝ bala bǝ baayɛ besu bedufǝ Foinike bomu . Mfoti ebɔlɛkɛ itǝ mǝ bɔkɛ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nǝmǝ . Itsyise Foinike eyifo umǝ lǝ Kreta eto kasɔ eto kaka kakɔlɔ kpǝ lǝǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ nnya leeti ufiebi kusu lǝ kofe eto diyo kedufǝkɔ eti .
44027013	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ufiebi sɛɛ utsyuǝ etsyiko bɔsɔ ketsyi Ɔnwɛdikue eti , nya iyifo fe yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ kusu bɔyɛ . Lǝ nyaso bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ nya bédu báyɛ lǝ Kreta ɔflɔ .
44027014	Fɛɛ lamfolamfoo , ufiebi bua utsyuǝ ko dítsyiko bɔsɔ itsyi lǝ kodiani eto lekpake itsyi lǝ Kreta eti .
44027015	Nya ɔ́sɔ útsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ óbesǝ kato . Bala bǝ lǝ yɔɔlɛkɛ lǝ batsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi bawuninsǝ besuko kasɔ eti , tsya bamfo . Nyaso báyani wǝ nya ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛsɔ útsyi wǝ ɔ́yɛnko .
44027016	Nya kama kamaa , búsu búnyǝ kabiɔnkɔ sɛkɛ kǝtsyuǝ lǝ kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama ka baakpo Kauda eto kutsyǝ kɔni . Nya disiǝale fɛ bófo bo ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ botsyasǝ lǝ ɔkplɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ bunsi .
44027017	Nya se bǝnyǝ bǝ bulǝ saa ensibǝǝ , béfi kekuǝ bákle ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ tsya . Báte sikpi bǝnkǝ ufiebi ebɔsɔ utsyi wǝ usu okpe lǝ kota eto kɔwunimi bua ǝsuǝ lǝ Libia eto lekpo kɛnyɛ . Nyaso bábokosǝ ufiebi nto mfia bo bátsyasǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . Lǝ nyamfo eso ufiebi ǝmǝ ǝnǝ wǝ ɔ́yɛnko .
44027018	Se kale dísiǝ fɛ ufiebi ǝmǝ dímanyɛ tɔ bɔsɔɔ , bétsyiko bikǝ bia nkpe lǝ wǝ kafo bulǝkǝ kato kakpe lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ .
44027019	Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bétsyiko ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto biyifokǝ kpǝ tsya bɔsɛ kato kakpe .
44027020	Lǝ eyi kpǝ nnya dítǝkǝǝ , ufiebi ǝmǝ ásɔ kekleke isi eso itǝ bǝ bóǝnyǝ kofe nye befandebi . Nya itǝ bǝ bo kpǝ ménsibe kusu boǝ busi bɔɔkɛ nkpǝ kon !
44027021	Nya lefe kpǝ ǝbǝ léfe bankɛ kɔni bendi lesa , mfó Paulo létaka úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , lǝ nnya ete bɛnɔ mɔ etikii , eni bóendu lǝ Kreta , enni asa nyamfo kenke mǝmbǝ itsyǝ bo mmǝ .
44027022	Nyaso nlɛ mi lekpakpa tinti minkǝ bekpe utu , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ebonya , fɛɛ bo kuutsyuǝ saa embukpǝ !
44027023	Itsyise kǝnǝ ku ketsyee , Onanto wǝ mbǝ mɛ ini wǝ meesumuu , wǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝbǝ úńyǝ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ .
44027024	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Paulo , mensite sikpi . Ele bǝ efi fǝ ditiki ǝsuko Kaisare ǝflɔ ! Itsyise Onanto kpe kafo ɛkpɛ , úńyǝ fonko mba nyɛ kusu kaminsǝ eso mi kutsyuǝ saa embonya . ’
44027025	Nyaso mɔ betidi , bimuǝ utu bɛlɛ ! Mfo Onanto nnɔ , lesa saa ebubǝ itǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi mɛ .
44027026	Fɛɛ ele bǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ su ɔsi lǝ kɔwunimi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama . ”
44027027	Nya ufiebi dísukosǝ bɔsɔ ketinkǝsǝ bo sɛtɔ ku kama lǝ Adria eto lekpo ǝsuǝ itǝ lefosi eyi ana . Nya lǝ lefosi diyi nale eto ntsyentii , bo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo ebu bǝnkǝ bɔɔnyi bafi kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
44027028	Mfo nya bésusu ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi bábe , nya bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi eyifo fe akpa kolofa akpafosi ǝnuǝ . Nya se besi báyɛ bésu sɛtɔ sɛkɛɛ , besi bésusu nya bǝnyǝ bǝ ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi eyifo akpa afosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ .
44027029	Nya se báte sikpi bǝnkǝ ufiebi ebɔsɔ utsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ usu ɔsɔ lǝ abansǝ ǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , báyani bitu bena bia nkpe kalende tinti lǝǝmuǝ ɔklɔ kǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ kalebe kani . Nya bǝńyǝ nya bákato ola kekleke bǝ kale lǝ kǝsiǝ mlǝ .
44027030	Nyaso se ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo léla bǝ lǝ betsyetsyi bedu esoo , bǝlǝkǝ ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ nya báko bátɛyi bǝnkǝ bála bǝ babe lǝ ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ sia bákpe bitu bia nkpe kalende ebofo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bumuǝ kǝtsyǝ .
44027031	Fɛɛ Paulo átɛyi bamamanyǝ ku mǝ uninǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ betidi bamfo mankɛ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmfo kafoo , biukpǝ . ”
44027032	Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamfo ála ukuǝ wǝ lɛkɔbe ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ ɔnlɛ , nya báyani wǝ bákpe lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ .
44027033	Nya lefe nǝ kale nlɛ busiǝǝ , Paulo álɛ mǝ lekpakpa nkǝ mǝmblɛ di lesa . Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Eyi lefosi ana nɛ se bɔkɛ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ nya mi kuutsyuǝ saa ménsifi tɔ kulesa okpe kɛnyɛ .
44027034	Lǝ nyaso nlɛ mi lekpakpa minkǝ , bidi lesatsyuǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale itǝ bǝ biembukpǝ . Itsyise lɛ ɔsɔsɔ ɔni embusiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . ”
44027035	Nyaso Paulo éfi didisa , nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani lǝ mǝmblɛ eto ǝnǝmi mfóo , úbudi lesa nǝmǝ ditsyuǝ údi .
44027036	Lamfolamfoo , utsyuǝ saa eto utu ǝsiǝǝ kasɔ nya mǝmblɛ dítsyiko lesa nǝmǝ budi .
44027037	Betidi ba lɛkɛ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo eyifo betidi alofa ǝnuǝ awosi akuanse ku ekua .
44027038	Nya se bédi bálosǝǝ , betidi bamǝ esi bǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ bia kenke díbu lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo bákpe lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ , itǝ bǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ átaka kalende .
44027039	Lefe nǝ kale dísiǝ kakpaa , bǝnnyǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ bǝtsyǝ lekpo mfó . Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ ɔklɔ eto ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kǝtsyuǝ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó kaka beebu bǝ yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ bayɛ lǝ besu bǝńyǝnsǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ .
44027040	Nyaso bala kekue ka lɛkɔbe bitu bia lǝǝmuǝ ɔklɔ kǝnyǝnsǝ , nya bányankli kekue ka lɛkɔbe ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto nnya laate wǝ kusu lǝ ɔlɛ bɔyɛ . Nya bábesǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto mfia bo ufiebi leetsyi itǝ lǝ ufiebi ǝmǝ lǝ unǝ mǝ ɔyɛnko usuko .
44027041	Nya se báyɛ bantɔɔ , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ésu ɔ́si lǝ kɔwunimi ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ wénsifo bɔyɛ bio . Nya se ufiebi tsya nlɛ bɔsɔ kǝkǝ wǝ kama esoo , óba úsensǝ kenke .
44027042	Nya se bamamanyǝ bamfo díbu bǝ mba bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo bamǝ ebutsyetsyi beduu , bǝlǝkǝ nsusu bǝ lǝ basɔ mǝ balo .
44027043	Fɛɛ se mǝ ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo léla nkǝ woafo Paulo lǝ nkpǝ esoo , wántɔnɔ ku mǝ . Nyaso útǝ kusu nkǝ nwǝ kee loofoo , lǝ basa bedufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bake babɔ .
44027044	Nya mba luubu tsyaa , lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto kǝtsyǝ ku lesa nǝ kee loofo mǝ butsyi kayɛnko lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ kabɔsǝ kesuko utuflɔ . Lǝ nyaso bomblɛ éyifo nko nya bɔ́bɔ búsu lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó , bo kutsyuǝ saa ménkpǝ .
44028001	Lefe nǝ bɔ́bɔ bófe lǝ bulǝ bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , búsu bóte boǝnkǝ mfó ni kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama baakpo Malta .
44028002	Nya kasɔ kamfo eto betidi léfo bo kukɔnɔ . Lefe nǝmfo eyifo ɔsɔmi ku lɛyɔ lefe , nyaso bátsyaka ute kplɛ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ bǝtǝ bo nya báfo bo kukɔnɔ .
44028003	Nya lefe nǝ Paulo nlɛ atɔni ǝtsyuǝ bɔsɛ lǝ ubǝ okpe lǝ ute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , owa utsyuǝ ko lɛbɔ lǝ atɔni nyamǝ nti itsyi lǝ ute ǝmǝ eto lɛyilabi eso , nya óbe ɔ́yɛ ókle Paulo eto kɔni .
44028004	Nya se mfó eto betidi dínyǝ bǝ owa ǝmfo faka lǝ wǝ kɔni ǝsuǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo eyifo nwǝ laalo betidi . Nyaso itǝ bǝ ɔbɔ utsyi lǝ lekpo eto ukpǝ kǝmiǝ tsyaa , bo Ufiǝ ɔnukualɛ embɔtɔnɔ nkǝ usiǝ nkpǝ . ”
44028005	Nya Paulo lɛwunya wǝ lǝ wǝ kɔni ókpe lǝ ute ǝmǝ kǝmiǝ nya kulesa saa ményifo wǝ tsya .
44028006	Nya betidi ba díńyǝ banlɛ wǝ bobee , díbu bǝ wɔɔfɔ nye wɔɔsɔ kasɔ ukpǝ lamfolamfo . Nya se bǝńyǝ bábe wǝ ɛklɛɛ fɛ kulesa mǝmbǝǝ , bétsyi mǝ nsusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ báwuninsǝ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ufiǝ utsyuǝ uni .
44028007	Nya kaka búsu bɔ́yifǝ mfóo , éyifo kasɔ ka lɛfi Oka Publio eto diyo . Nya oka ǝmfo tsya léfo bo ku disuǝyuǝ , nya óbe bo itǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
44028008	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo tututu , Publio eto anto ánɔ bufi . Atikesi ǝmuǝ wǝ , nya ɔnlɛ kafo boto tsya . Nya se Paulo dísu wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ diyo nya óto ola nya úfi ani útǝkǝ lǝ wǝǝ , bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ .
44028009	Se bánɔ bǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝǝ , befimfi ba kenke nkpe lǝ kasɔ kamǝ mǝmblɛ ábɔ bǝbǝ , nya Paulo létsya mǝ .
44028010	Nya lǝ eyifosa nyamfo esoo , bátsyɛ bo asa kpǝ . Nya se lefe léyo bǝ budu mfoo , báboko bo asa kpǝ bǝ bufi bɔyɛ kusu .
44028011	Búsiǝ mfó éfo afa ǝtsyǝ fɛ búdu . Lefe nǝ bɔnlɛ buluu , búsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ wǝ baakpo bǝnkǝ Bafimfi Eto Bǝfiǝ wǝ dítsyi Aleksandria wǝ díbǝ úńyǝ lǝ kasɔ kamfó lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nǝmǝ mfó .
44028012	Se búdu mfóo , umǝnkplɛ wǝ búsu búńyǝ ni Sirakusa . Nya búsiǝ mfo tsya eyi ǝtsyǝ .
44028013	Se búdu mfóo , bɔyɛ búsu búdufǝ Regio . Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , ufiebi sɛɛ etsyiko bɔsɔ ketsyi bo kama wǝ lɛwunsǝko bo , wǝ lékpa bo úsuko Puteoli lǝ diyi nuǝfǝ ǝsuǝ .
44028014	Nya mfóo , búsu búnyǝ mba bafokanɔfɔ bǝtsyuǝ , nya bálɛ bo lekpakpa bǝ busiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ eyi akuanse . Lǝ nyamfo eto kama se búdu mfóo , búsu búdufǝ Roma .
44028015	Nya se bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya lɛnɔ bǝ bokpe kusu bɔlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi faa ǝbǝ bákɔ lǝ bo lǝ Apia eto asi . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya díbǝ bákɔ lǝ bo lǝ kaka baakpo Nsɔnɔkɔ Ntsyǝ . Se Paulo dínyǝ mǝǝ , ɔsɔ Onanto ani , nya isi ékpe wǝ nkɛale enso .
44028016	Nya lefe nǝ búsu búdufǝ Romaa , bǝtǝ Paulo kusu bǝ úsiǝ kaka woala . Nya bǝtǝ kusu bǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ eto ɔni kase wǝ .
44028017	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ kamaa , Paulo ákpadi Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba nkpe lǝ mfó kenke bǝbǝ básɔ lebo . Se bátsyaa , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem dímuǝ mɛ nya befi mɛ bésu bǝtǝ Romafɔ eto Aba bǝnkǝ okponko mɛ lekpo lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe nǝ ményifo bo Yudafɔ eto kutsyuǝ saa kulesa nye ńta bo banamǝ eto lekpa saa mbu .
44028018	Romafɔ bamfó ákponko mɛ lekpo nya bála bǝ lǝ bayani mɛ . Itsyisee , bǝnnyǝ lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ balo mɛ nye balo mɛ dikpi fe kase Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ba dimuǝ mɛ lela .
44028019	Nya lefe nǝmfo se Yudafɔ bamfó dímantɔnɔ lǝ nyamfó ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɔnɔ nkǝ ntɛyi mǝ lǝ nla miǝ bakpa mɛ lǝ nsu nnyǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare kosate ɔflɔ . Nya yenyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ maala bo kasɔ eto betidi kɛnyɛ .
44028020	Nyamfo eso mínkpadi mi lǝ ndiko mi etiki nɛ . Itsyise Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ini Israelfɔ kenke eto nwǝ banlɛ kusu bobee , wǝ ni nwǝ mimfo minɔ miǝ wǝ ni nwǝ eso baakpe mɛ lǝ amana ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
44028021	Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bo alɛɛ , bóamfo tɔ kulesa itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bóamfo kukue nye kɛnyɛ bua saa lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ bayimi ba dítsyi Yudea bǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ .
44028022	Fɛɛ bola boǝ boanɔ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ fáfo fánɔ mfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise sintintii , baantɛyi kulesa sɛɛ sa itsyi lǝ ditsyukpa nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ku kalebe saa . ”
44028023	Nyaso bǝtsyǝ wǝ diyi lɔni , nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ . Mfo nya údi mǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ókpa mǝ nsusu úsuko kaka Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni asa bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Nya údi mǝ etiki idu lǝ olesiǝ isu ese lǝ ditsyitsyo lefe .
44028024	Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nti léfo wǝ bánɔ , fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ tsya dímamfo lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi banɔ .
44028025	Nya etiki nyamfo léboko kǝnǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya se banlɛ busǝnsǝ keluu , Paulo átɛyi mǝ etiki fɛfɛ nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Ɔnukualɛ uni bǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyɛ lǝ Yesaya ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi bo banamǝ bǝnkǝ ,
44028026	‘ Bisu bikatɛyi Yudafɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Biɔnɔ fɛ biǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ , nya buinyǝ nya biǝmbunyǝ fɛ bisu bete . ”
44028027	Itsyise betidi bamfo eto ketu kpe ale , nya mǝ ato etidi , nya béti mǝ ǝnǝmi tsya . Lenni nko innii , eni ele bǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi nnyǝ , nya mǝ ato tsya ebɔnɔ , nya mǝ nsusu tsya ebokpa kɛ̃ bǝ lǝ batsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ mɔ , Onantoo , lǝ ntsya mǝ . ’ ”
44028028	Nya Paulo lélosǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ntɛyi mi lǝ bete biǝnkǝ , ditiki nǝ Onanto luufi ofo betidi lǝ nkpǝǝ , béfi ni bésuko mba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya mǝǝ , boofo ni banɔ ! ”
44028029	
44028030	Nya Paulo lɛkɛ mfoó alɛ ǝnuǝ lǝ diyo nǝ ófo úkafó kayo , nya úkafo betidi ba kenke ba díkǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
44028031	Óbe Onanto eto sekakedikɔ letsya ku wǝ utu ku ǝsuǝale útǝ mǝ , nya óte mǝ asa nnya lɛyɛ lǝ Bonanto Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ménti wǝ kusu .
45001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto uyifoyifo , nya mini nwǝ bátsyese ku Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ mbé wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ letsyaa , mɔ ni nwǝ lɛwɔni kukue komfo nɛ .
45001002	Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ ote kawunsiǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
45001003	Katɛyiketsye kamfo etsyi lǝ Onanto eto Ubi wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Bále wǝ fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi wǝ ni Oka David eto kafo eto ubi .
45001004	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ óte betidi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nkǝ wǝ ni wǝ ubi wǝ ótakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ .
45001005	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ nya úfi bo úyifo wǝ batɔnkpe itǝ Kristo bǝ lǝ butǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝ bafo wǝ banɔ lǝ beyifo wǝ lelabi .
45001006	Nya mimba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya , eyifo betidi ba Onanto lékpadi nkǝ bibǝ befiani Yesu Kristo eto bale .
45001007	Nyamfo eso minlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi mba kenke nkpe lǝ Roma nya Onanto laala mi , nya ókpadi mi nkǝ , bibǝ befiani wǝ bale nɛ . Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
45001008	Ditutɛɛ , nyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nlɛ mɔ Onanto ani bɔsɔ lǝ mi disi , itsyise kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ánɔ kase béfo Onanto bɛnɔ .
45001009	Onanto wǝ eto keyifo meeyifo ku kafo faa , nwǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ maabe letsya itsyi lǝ wǝ ubi ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ luulǝkǝ ote nkǝ maanta mi ǝsuǝ kulefe lǝ nlɛ ola boto nɛ .
45001010	Nya lefe saa nǝ minlɛ ola botoo , maalɛ Onanto lekpakpa minkǝ lǝ iyifo wǝ lelabii , lǝ nyǝ kusu lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
45001011	Iyifo mɔ lelabi kekleke bǝ lǝ mbǝ nnyǝ mi lǝ nwunsǝko mi lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale .
45001012	Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ni bǝnkǝ lǝ bokpe bo ǝsuǝ nkɛale lǝ lefe nǝmfo kemiǝ , lǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ bokpe mɛ nkɛale , lǝ mintsya lǝ nkpe mi nkɛale .
45001013	Mɔ bayimi , nla miǝ bete biǝnkǝ iyifo mɔ ketsyue lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ yǝntǝ mɛ kusu nko . Iyifo mɔ lelabi bǝnkǝ nwunsǝko betidi lǝ bafo Kristo banɔ lǝ mi nti fe kase mínyifo lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ bamba nti .
45001014	Nko eto keyifo kamfo eyifo lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo ntǝ utidi saa , Grikifɔ ku mba lenni Grikifɔ , ku betidi ba nyi ekue ku mba lenyi ekue tsya .
45001015	Lǝ nyamfo eso maabɛbɛ kekleke bǝ mbǝ ntɛyi mi mba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo .
45001016	Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto bɔtɛyi anlɛ mɛ kofani , itsyise iyifo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nya lǝǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laafokanɔ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ . Yudafɔ ni betutɛ ba lɔɔnɔ fɛ mba lenni Yudafɔ lǝ bǝtǝkǝ .
45001017	Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝǝlǝkǝ kusu sɛɛ ko lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lelabi kate . Nya kusu sɛɛ komfo etsyi lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ idu lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Lǝ fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke ni ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ hã luusiǝ nkpǝ nɛ . ”
45001018	Onanto ǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ lɛblɔfi itsyi taa kato kate lǝ asa nnya dińyǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ku asa bua eto eyifosa nnya leeti betidi kusu bǝ lǝ bayɛ ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ kosate bote .
45001019	Wǝǝnyǝ ɔblɔ itsyise betidi ǝǝnyǝ Onanto eto asa nnya úyifo ketsye lekpo wuee . Itsyise Onanto kosate dílǝkǝ nnya wuee óte mǝ .
45001020	Itsyise idu lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto díyifo kawunsiǝǝ , asa nnya kenke úyifo utsyǝ lǝ kee , ǝǝlǝkǝ Wǝ ǝsuǝale manlo nnya boǝnnyǝ ku wǝ ditsyǝbi boǝnnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi kate . Nyaso kuutsyuǝ saa bio ǝmbofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ woamfo Onanto ɔnɔ .
45001021	Ite bǝ betidi yi Onanto tsyaa , beemfi dibu nǝ dińyǝ itǝ wǝ kǝtǝ wǝ . Nya baansɔ wǝ ani tsya . Lǝ nnya kɛnyɛɛ , asa bimba eto disi ete beebu . Nsusu sɛ saa ǝmbǝ mǝ nya mǝ nsusu leena tũũ .
45001022	Nya bǝǝnyǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ fe babesibe , fɛɛ bamumu beni .
45001023	Nya baayɛ Onanto wǝ ni nkpǝ kenke busumu , kefi atɛsǝ kǝtǝ asa bimba nnya lǝmbǝ nkpǝ . Beefi asa fe utidi nye baklɔbɛ nye bebuki akpa ana nye bebuki ba laakpi lǝ kasɔ fe owa eto okle kesumu bon .
45001024	Lǝ nyasoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nkǝ beyifo lesa nǝ kee baala . Nya beefi mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ keyifo asinsa ku afanisa ku mǝ betsyuǝ .
45001025	Nya beefi bidiatɛyitɛyi kǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Bomu lǝ kedi bufi kǝtǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛɛ , beefi ke kǝtǝ asa nnya Onanto ǝmǝ díyifo . Fɛɛ Onanto kosate wǝ dińyǝ utǝ atɛsǝ lefe saa , wǝ ele bǝ besumu nɛ . Ibǝ itǝ nko .
45001026	Asa nyamfo eto okle eto buyifo eso Onanto léyani betidi bamfó nɛ , nya beeyifo asa nnya ni mǝ sinǝ eto alasa nnya lǝǝnǝ mǝ kakpe lǝ afanisa ǝsuǝ . Nya besio kulaa tsya laayani basani ketsye kesu kalabeko mǝ besiotsyuǝ nnya lanyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ .
45001027	Nya nko ke ini bǝ mǝ basani tsya laayani besio ketsye nya beeyifo afanisa nyamfo eto okle kalabeko bǝtsyuǝ fe sisǝ ku sisiǝ seka . Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ǝnǝ mǝ koto ko dińyǝ itǝ mǝ lǝ mǝ ditsyǝbi bua nǝ baate mfo eso .
45001028	Nya se báni bǝ bembokase asa nnya dińyǝ itǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nkǝ béyifo asa nnya dimalɛkɛ léfo mǝ nsusu kenke . Nya beeyifo asa nnya yanle bǝ beyifo .
45001029	Nya asa bua saa yifoyifo eto okle lefo mǝ nkpǝ kenke . Nya asa bua nyamǝ ni nsusu bua fifi , kunǝnkpǝ ku kabua eto bɔbɛbɛ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ . Nnya disi iyi mǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ ni kǝnǝnsɛ , betidilolo ku ekiti kpɔnkpɔ ku bidiatɛyitɛyi ku kekisi ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ketikimadidi .
45001030	Nya beedi etiki bua kabiasǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto aye . Beyifo betidi ba leekisi Onanto . Baaka bǝtsyuǝ , nya baabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , nya baate ǝsuǝ . Nya baabɛbɛ kabua kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝǝmbu mǝ anto ku ambemǝ .
45001031	Beyifo betidi ba lenyi kasɛɛ lǝ kabua ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ kosate eto lesa nǝ baatɛyi tsyaa , beenyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Bakpe lefomfi nya bǝǝnnyǝ utidi kaminsǝ nya bankpe disiale .
45001032	Beeyi bǝnkǝ lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ nkoo , Onanto ebolo mǝ dikpi . Fɛɛ mfe bǝǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ mǝ asa bua nyamfo buyifo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya inni nyamfo mate , bomu beekeko betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo tsya .
45002001	Nyaso , mɔ ɔyimi , fǝ nlɛ betidi bamba lekpo bokponko ? Niǝ , niǝ , niǝ inii , ǝmbofo bɔtɛyi fǝ , fǝ yɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ álo fuutsyuǝ dikpii , nko ke foolo fǝ ǝsuǝ dikpi nɛ . Itsyise asa nnya beeyifoo , nnya okle ke fintsya leeyifo nɛ .
45002002	Buyi boǝ Onanto hã ni ɔsɛɛ nya okpe ǝsuǝale bǝ okponko betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle lekpo .
45002003	Nya lǝ fǝ mɔ ɔyimi , wǝ ni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi wǝ leeyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle lɛ betidi bamba dikpi boloo , ebu fǝ ebofo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ Onanto eto lekpokponkpo ǝsuǝ ?
