45002004	Nye ebu fǝ bimba ete ini bǝ Onanto leeyifo fǝ kafoɛkpɛ nya onkpe dibusǝ ku disuǝtsyǝ itǝ fǝ ? Enyi sitinti fǝ , Onanto eeyifo fǝ kafoɛkpɛ kamfo itsyise woala nkǝ woawunsǝko fǝ lǝ atsyi awuninsǝ .
45002005	Nya se fetidi ato , fáni fǝ ǝmbɔtsyi fǝ lɛkɔɛsi awuninsǝ esoo , fǝ kosate dítǝ Onanto lǝǝbǝ fǝ koto bunǝ kon lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ wookponko kawunsiǝ kenke lekpo tsyɔntsyɔ . Diyi nǝmfo nya wuulǝkǝ wǝ lefonyi ote nɛ .
45002006	Nya Onanto loobofo utsyuǝ sa kayo lǝ wǝ keyifo ka úyifo kumǝ ǝsuǝ .
45002007	Betidi ba laakpe otsyekle lǝ kasɛyifoyifo ǝsuǝ nya baabɛbɛ Onanto eto diyǝnde ku dibu ku nkpǝ manloo , Onanto ebutǝ mǝ nkpǝ manlo .
45002008	Fɛɛ betidi ba ini kǝdiǝ hã baabɛbɛ nya beentsyue ɔnuakualɛ ǝmǝ koto , nya baala asa bua buyifoo , Onanto ebunyǝ ɔblɔ okpe mǝ unǝ mǝ koto kekleke .
45002009	Betidi ba kenke difi asa buayifoyifo betsyi disii , ebudi ohiã nya boonyǝ kanyi . Yudafɔ luudi betutɛ , nya mba lenni Yudafɔ luutǝkǝ .
45002010	Fɛɛ mba leeyifo asa sɛɛ , Onanto ebutǝ mǝ kato eto diyǝnde ku dibu ku diyuǝsǝ . Yudafɔ luudi betutɛ , nya mba lenni Yudafɔ luutǝkǝ .
45002011	Itsyise Onanto ambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi fɛ woala etiki kǝlǝkǝ .
45002012	Betidi ba kenke dímante Mose eto afi fɛ béyifo abuaa , tsya ebukpǝ banya , ite bǝ Onanto embufi afi nyamǝ okponko mǝ lekpo tsyafɛ . Fɛɛ mba nyi Moses eto afi nyamǝ fɛ beeyifo asa buaa , Onanto ebokponko mǝ lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
45002013	Itsyise inni betidi ba leetsyue ato kanɔ afi nyamǝ ba luudi basɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Bomu , betidi ba leeyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ ni mba luudi basɛɛ nɛ .
45002014	Afi nyamfo ǝmbe mba lenni Yudafɔ , fɛɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kobetete ǝsuǝ mǝ kosate leeyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ eto etsyuesa ǝsuǝǝ , ínwǝ efiani kɔfi itǝ mǝ ite bǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝmbǝ mǝ tsya .
45002015	Ɛlɛ bote bǝ Onanto éfi asa nnya nkpe lǝ Moses eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ ókpe lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ akɔɛsi tsya lɛ bote nko . Nya lefe ditsyuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu aalo mǝ dikpi nye ǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ kasɛyifoyifo kate .
45002016	Nyamfo ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto luutǝ kusu Yesu Kristo kponko betidi kenke lekpo lǝ asa nnya baakula lǝ mǝ nsusu kenke kǝmiǝ fe kase Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ maabe letsya nlɛ bɔɔtɛyi .
45002017	Nya lǝ aakpadi fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝ Yudanyǝ , nya faayɛ lǝ Moses eto afi ǝsuǝ , nya faabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fǝ , fǝ eyifo Onanto eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ .
45002018	Eyi lesa nǝ Onanto laala , nya fenyi lesa nǝ ni lɛsɛ , fe kase fákase nnya lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
45002019	Eebu fǝ ǝsuǝ fe oteesu itǝ benǝmba nya feni lekpasǝ itǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ kutuntu .
45002020	Efi fǝ ǝsuǝ eyifo nwǝ leekulǝsǝ mba lenyi kobe nya faate asa mba ǝnǝ dimankpa tɔ . Eyi kukɔnɔ fǝ kobe ku ɔnukualɛ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nkpe lǝ Moses eto aafi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
45002021	Beso fǝ laate betidi bamba asa , fɛ faante fǝ ǝsuǝ asa nyamǝ ? Aabe letsya fǝ benyu nya fǝ kosate enyuu ?
45002022	Aatɛyi fǝ bankpo kusiǝ nye kusǝ , fɛɛ fǝ kosate nkpǝ ? Ǝfiǝsa aalɛ fǝ sɛsi , fɛɛ eeyu asa nnya beefi kakpa wǝ .
45002023	Aabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fǝ eyi Onanto eto afi , fɛɛ enyi fǝnkǝ , fǝǝ ke laata Onanto eto afi kebuu , ǝǝntǝ wǝ dibu ?
45002024	Lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Mi Yudafɔ eto eyifosa eso mba lenni Yudafɔ laakpadi Onanto diye bua . ”
45002025	Lǝ eeyifo lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , fǝ lelolala eyifo lesa nǝ nkpe kutǝkǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ eenyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ lelolala nǝmǝ eyifo lesa bimba .
45002026	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ , wǝ dímanla lelo eeyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebunyǝ wǝ fe utsyuǝ wǝ lela lelo .
45002027	Mɔmɔɔ , nwǝ lenni Yudanyǝ , fɛ weeyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ebokpe kofani fǝ Yudanyǝ wǝ laata kɔfi ko báwɔni bǝtsyǝ kebu ite bǝ bála fǝ lelo tsyafɛ .
45002028	Inni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ nnya boǝnyǝ futsyǝ ni Yudanyǝ tinti . Nya lelo eto bola kosate tsyaa , enni lesa nǝ ete ńyǝ itǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto keyifo ka betidi lǝǝnyǝ ketsye lekpo futsyǝ feni .
45002029	Bomu utsyǝ ni Yudanyǝ tinti ni futsyǝ wǝ laate lǝ wǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ nkǝ úfi wǝ lɛkɔɛsi útǝ Onanto . Inni nnya lɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia bála ɛyɛ lǝ kɔfikpekpe eto lekpa eto ditiki ǝsuǝ . Bomu nnya lɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nnya ini kawunsiǝ eto kuutsyuǝ wǝ laabesǝ utidi ǝmfo eto diye kato , bomu Onanto .
45003001	Nya lǝ ite nkoo , nte kutǝkǝ ko Yudanyǝ wǝ bála lelo luunyǝ enso mba lenni Yudafɔ ? Nte kutǝkǝ ko nke lǝ lelolala ǝsuǝ ?
45003002	Lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , kutǝkǝ kpe . Tutɛɛ , Yudafɔ eto ani nnya Onanto dífi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ ókpe .
45003003	Fɛɛ lǝ ibǝ bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ mámfo bánɔ ? Afo anɔ fǝ lǝ nyaso Onanto embuyifo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ ǝsuǝ ?
45003004	Kulefe ! Lǝ ibǝ bǝ utsyuǝ saa eeyifo odia kulaa tsyaa , te fǝ Onanto eeyifo lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ . Fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa saa aate bǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nya lǝ bakponko fǝ lekpoo , buutǝ fǝ lɛbɛ . ”
45003005	Lǝ bo etikididi ǝsuǝǝ , boatɛyi boǝnkǝ bo abua nnya boeyifoo , ǝǝtǝ bǝ betidi nyǝ asa sɛɛ nnya Onanto leeyifo ketsye lekpoo , ntsyǝ ini nnya tsya ? Lǝ nyasoo , bɔɔtɛyi boǝnkǝ yɛmbɔlɛkɛ bǝ Onanto nǝ bo kotoo ? Kulefe ! Fɛɛ nko bǝtsyuǝ leebu nɛ !
45003006	Nya lǝ Onanto eni nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝǝ , be ǝsuǝ wuunyǝ okponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lekpo ?
45003007	Bǝtsyuǝ aala bɔtɔ bǝ , “ Fɛɛ lǝ mɔ bidia bia maatɛyi ǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ɔnukualɛtiki kate wee , itǝ bǝ batɛsǝ wǝǝ , nyalɛ beso baalo mɛ dikpi bǝnkǝ utidi bua mini ? ”
45003008	Lǝ bufi nnya nkoo , boofo bɔtɛyi boǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtǝ lǝ bukeyifo asa bua lǝ asɛɛ lǝ ɛbɔ itsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . ” Fɛɛ betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bo abie busǝ kaka bo , nya banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ bo bomu nlɛ etiki budi nko . Betidi ba luufi nnya nkoo , bǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ Onanto lo mǝ dikpi .
45003009	Nya mɔmɔɔ , be boofo bɔtɛyi lǝ bomba ni Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ ? Bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ bo ale alɛkɛ eso mba lenni Yudafɔ eto alee ? Kulefe ! Itsyise mɔ́tɛyi ntɔnsǝ koko minkǝ kabua ébudi Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke tsya ǝsuǝ .
45003010	Itsyise nyamfo eto okle báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ bǝ wǝ eyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Lɛ ɔni kplo ǝmbǝ !
45003011	Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ wǝ lǝǝnyǝ kasɛɛ kǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝmbǝ wǝ laayɛ lǝ Onanto eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
45003012	Betidi ba kenke etsyi kama bakpe Onanto , nya mǝmblɛ kenke ébota bébu . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ wǝ leeyifo kasɛɛ . Lɛ ɔni kplon ǝmbǝ !
45003013	Mǝ akuɛlonlobi eyifo fe kudi ko lɛsini kɛnyɛ kunte . Nya mǝ kadiakami ńyǝ itǝ bidia bɔtɛyi . Nya mǝ nyɛ eyifo fe owa eto keni .
45003014	Nya mǝ nyɛ kenke diyi ekudi ku kalo kpinikpini .
45003015	Mǝ akpa aataka mlǝ mlǝ lǝ utidi eto bolo ǝsuǝ .
45003016	Bensi nkpǝ sɛɛ saa nya ini kanyinyǝnyǝ hã bǝǝnǝ kaboko .
45003017	Nya benyi kase ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
45003018	Nya mǝ ditsyǝbi ante bǝ baate Onanto sikpi . ”
45003019	Mɔmɔɔ , buyi boǝnkǝ lesa saa nǝ bátɛyi lǝ Moses eto afi ǝsuǝǝ , bátɛyi nnya bǝtǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ afi nyamǝ kalɔ , bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔyɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ , bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke kakɛ lǝ Onanto eto lekpokpo eto kalɔ .
45003020	Nyasoo , kuutsyuǝ saa embuyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ eso . Bomuu , lesa nǝ afi nyamfo leeyifo ni bǝ yǝǝlǝkǝ kate utidi nkǝ uyifo obuayifo .
45003021	Fɛɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úlǝkǝ óte nkǝ betidi eyifo basɛɛ , mányɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ . Afi ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝlǝkǝ nyamfo báte wuee .
45003022	Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ betidi ba léfo Kristo bánɔɔ , yifo basɛɛ . Úyifo nyamfo útǝ betidi ba kenke léfo Kristo bánɔ . Nya wóankpe kabakefe lǝ betidi nti .
45003023	Betidi baa tã eyifo kabua , nya bánnyi báfi Onanto eto diyǝnde blɛmblɛ kon .
45003024	Fɛɛ Onanto , ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu wǝ léfo kayo lǝ bo disi ǝtǝ nkǝ bofiani basɛɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ eso .
45003025	Onanto éfi Yesu útǝ fe kedi lǝ bo abua eto disi . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ befi bo abua batsyɛ lǝ bofo Kristo banɔ ko . Onanto éyifo nyamfo lǝ ufi ote bo nkǝ wǝ eyifosa yɛ lǝ kusu sɛ ǝsuǝ . Ɔkɛ dibusǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ , nya úfǝsɛ ǝnǝmi úti betidi eto abua nnya béyifo .
45003026	Úyifo nyamfo nkǝ lǝ ote bo lefe nǝmfo nkǝ wǝ kosate eyifo nwǝ diyifo ɔsɛɛ , nya weebu nwǝ léfo Yesu ɔ́nɔ tsya nkǝ wuuntsya eyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
45003027	Nya be ǝsuǝ boofo buńyǝ kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi ? Bumbǝ kulesa ! Bǝ boayɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ eso lee ? Owo , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto laalɔ bonko wǝ eto nti .
45003028	Itsyise buyi wuee boǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ bo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nya utidi laafiani ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , nya inni lǝ wǝ bɔyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ eso .
45003029	Nyee , Yudafɔ hã ete ni Onanto eto bale ? Nya unni mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya eto Onanto ? Ee , uyifo mǝ tsya eto ole .
45003030	Onanto ɔni kplo nkpe . Wǝ luubu Yudafɔ nkǝ beyifo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nko ke eso wuubu mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya basɛɛ , ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
45003031	Nyaso be nyamfo nlɛ bote ? Bote ɛnlɛ bǝ bóyani afi nyamǝ butsyǝ bǝ lǝ bofokanɔ lǝ bofo busiǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ ? Kulefe ! Inni nko , bomu bǝ lǝ bɔlɛ afi nyamǝ lǝ kɔni kekleke .
45004001	Be ni lesa nǝ boofo bɔtɛyi ketsyiko lǝ bo Ona Abraham ǝsuǝ boǝ únyǝ utsyǝ lekpo itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ?
45004002	Lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka úyifo ǝsuǝ eso Onanto dínyǝ nkǝ Abraham eyifo ɔsɛɛ , nyalɛ okpe keńyǝnkɔ woofo bɔtɛyi nko kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi . Fɛɛ umbǝ kǝńyǝnkɔ nko lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , itsyise inni Abraham eto keyifo inni únyǝ .
45004003	Itsyise lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kemiǝǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham áfo Onanto ɔ́nɔ . Lǝ nnya eso Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . ”
45004004	Lǝ utsyuǝ eyifo keyifoo , wǝ kayofofo eni atsyɛsa , bomu iyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
45004005	Fɛ lǝ utsyuǝ afo ɔnɔ nkǝ Onanto eeyifo utidi wǝ laante wǝ sikpi woafiani ɔsɛɛ , lǝ wóenyifo keyifo saa tsyaa , fɛ ini lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto eefi wǝ fe ɔsɛɛ .
45004006	Nko eso Oka David lɛtɛyi nkǝ utidi wǝ Onanto dibu nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ , fɛ yányɛ lǝ wǝ keyifo ka úyifo esoo , uyifo utidi wǝ baakpo atsyɔ . Oka David átɛyi nkǝ ,
45004007	“ Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba úfi mǝ abua ɔ́tsyɛ , nya úlǝkǝ mǝ utsyiko lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
45004008	Onanto ákpo atsyɔ utidi wǝ eto abua Bonamute dímanwɔni útsyǝ wǝ blɛmblɛ . ”
45004009	Nya atsyɔkpokpo eto etiki Oka David lɛtɛyi mfoo , mba léla alo ete luunyǝ ni nnya ? Kulefe ! Eka mba dímanla alo tsya , itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Abraham áfo Onanto ɔ́nɔ , nyaso Onanto léfo wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ nɛ . ”
45004010	Nya dimamfe ini Onanto dínyǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ nko ? Lefe nǝ Abraham dímanla tɔ lelo lee , lee lefe nǝ úkala lelo eto kamaa ? Inni lǝ lefe nǝ óla lelo . Bomu fɛ wóla lelo .
45004011	Lelolala eto lekpa nǝ Abraham díyifo mfóo , eyifo lekpotsyǝtsyǝ nǝ laate bǝ Onanto áfo wǝ . Itsyise wǝ bofokanɔ ǝtǝ bǝ Onanto áfo wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ fɛ óla lelo . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Abraham afiani mba léfo bánɔ kenke eto anto . Nya Onanto áfo mǝ nkǝ beyifo basɛɛ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bánla lelo kulaa tsya .
45004012	Abraham eyifo anto itǝ mba bála alo tsya . Fɛ inni fe kase bála alo eso , bomu bǝ besi nkpǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ fe kase Boanto Abraham dísiǝ fɛ óla lelo eso .
45004013	Onanto átɛyi kɛnyɛ utsyǝ útǝ Abraham ku wǝ kafo eto bebi nkǝ boodi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ fe benake . Wǝ kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ mfo manka kase Abraham lɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ eso . Bomuu , ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nko itsyise ófo Abraham fe ɔsɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso .
45004014	Nya lǝ ite bǝ mba leeyifo lǝ afi ǝsuǝ loofo Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto asaa , nyalɛ bofokanɔ mensi fe itǝ , ete kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ tsya ensi ǝmbɔkɛ nɛ .
45004015	Itsyise afi ǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kate . Fɛ lǝ afi ǝmbǝǝ , nyalɛ kɔfi botakebu tsya ǝmbɔkɛ .
45004016	Lǝ nyasoo , kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kamfo aka bafokanɔfɔ nya ini kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ itǝ Onanto eto betidi nya ini wǝ lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ betidi ba kenke ni Abraham eto kafo eto betidi . Nya inni mba Onanto dítǝ afi mate hã ete ni wǝ kafo eto betidi . Bomu mba léfo bánɔ tsya fe Abraham . Itsyisee , Abraham eyifo mba léfo bánɔ kenke eto anto .
45004017	Nya fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyii , “ Mfi fǝ ntsyǝ ese kpǝ eto anto . ” Nya kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kamfo díbǝ itǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Onanto ǝmfoo , wǝ Abraham léfo ɔ́nɔɔ , kpe ǝsuǝale itsyise wǝ lootakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ besinkli bǝbǝ nkpǝ . Nya wǝ lǝǝtǝ asa nnya dímankɛ kɔ lǝǝbǝ kakɛ !
45004018	Ite bǝ kusubebe si kɔkɛ tsyaa , Abraham esi úkabe kusu kokoko , nkǝ woofiani ese kpǝ eto betidi eto anto fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ kafo eto bebi tsya ebufui kpenkpenkpe fe befandebi . ”
45004019	Abraham ébobe ófo fe alɛ kolofa . Fɛɛ ani mánlo wǝ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ , ite bǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ébobe efe nya únyǝ nkǝ útǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ eto kotosi nya Sara tsya ébobe ófe ku bole .
45004020	Fɛɛ nyamfo mánlo wǝ ani lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Bomu ɔ́kɔbe Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ɔ́lɛ kekleke , nya ókpe nkɛale lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ bomfo ǝsuǝ nya úfi atɛsǝ útǝ Onanto .
45004021	Nya óte wuee nkǝ Onanto kpe ǝsuǝale woofo lesa nǝ ke ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ buyifo .
45004022	Nya lǝ bofokanɔ bo lɛkɛ wǝ esoo , Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ .
45004023	Nya inni wǝ mate ǝsuǝ ete báwɔni etiki nyamfo betsyiko bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . ”
45004024	Bomu eka bomba tsya Onanto dínyǝ nkǝ bo tsya eyifo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ kase bófo Onanto wǝ létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bɔ́nɔ eso .
45004025	Onanto ǝtǝ kusu bálo Kristo lǝ bo abua nnya búyifo eso . Nya Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bǝ lǝ wǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ bo basɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
45005001	Nya mɔmɔɔ , se Onanto díyifo bo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ bo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝtǝ diyuǝ édufǝ bonko wǝ nti ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
45005002	Nya se bófo Kristo bɔnɔ esoo , útǝ nkǝ bofo Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpe mɔmɔ . Nya bɔnlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ sitinti , itsyise bɔlɛ kusu bobe boǝ buunyǝ kesiǝkɔ lǝ Kristo ɔflɔ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
45005003	Lǝ nnya kamaa , boǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bɔlɛ kanyi bunyǝ itsyise buyi boǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto okle lǝǝtǝ boǝńyǝ kekleke nɛ .
45005004	Nya bo buńyǝ kekleke , ǝǝtǝ bo ditsyǝbi sɛɛ . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bunyǝ kusubebe .
45005005	Nya kusubebe komfo ǝntǝ boedi kofani . Itsyise Onanto áyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ útǝ bo ǝsuǝ útǝ nkǝ wǝ lelabi ba didufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ kenke .
45005006	Lefe nǝ diyifole saa dímensi fo bo bɔkɛɛ , Kristo ǝbǝ lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya úbǝ úkpǝ lǝ bo babuayifo eto disi .
45005007	Mɔmɔɔ , iyifo lesa nǝ nkpe ale bǝ utsyuǝ kpǝ lǝ utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ eto disi . Fɛɛ yoofo budi bǝ utsyuǝ ebofo bɔtɔnɔ nkǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ utidi wǝ lɛlɛkɛ eto disi .
45005008	Fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte bo wuee kase woala bo . Itsyise lefe nǝ bɔ́kɛ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝǝ , útǝ nkǝ Kristo kpǝ lǝ bo disi .
45005009	Nya se ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo eto kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ nya úyifo bo basɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , ukpǝ ǝmfo ebulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kplɛ ǝsuǝ eso .
45005010	Nya lǝ Onanto álɔ bonko wǝ nti ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ubi eto ukpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ búyifo wǝ balontidi mfóo , nyalɛ lefe nǝ bonko wǝ eto nti díkalɛkɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ bo kaminsǝ , úlǝkǝ bo kulaa tsya oso itsyise Kristo kpe nkpǝ .
45005011	Nya inni nyamfo mate ete , bomu buunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ku wǝ itsyise Onanto kosate , ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ Onanto álɔ bonko wǝ eto sete nti eso .
45005012	Lebua áyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ díbǝ kawunsiǝ , nya lebua nǝmǝ dínǝ ukpǝ léboko kawunsiǝ . Nyamfo esoo , ukpǝ lǝǝbǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise utsyuǝ saa éyifo lebua .
45005013	Lebua akɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ fɛ Onanto dítǝ bo Moses eto afi . Fɛ lǝ kaka afi lǝmbǝǝ , Onanto anlo utidi dikpi .
45005014	Fɛɛ idu lǝ Adam lefe ibǝ Moses eto lefee , ukpǝ ákaso ani kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi ku mba dímǝnyifo lebua fe kase Adam díyifo se wényifo lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝ . Nya Adam ǝmfo ńyǝ itǝ utidi wǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ .
45005015	Fɛɛ mǝ inuǝ bamǝ menyifo bani . Itsyise Onanto eto kafo faa eto etǝsa so Adam eto lebua nǝ úyifo . Adam ni utidi ɔni wǝ eto lebua nǝ úyifo eso betidi kpǝ díkpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ amɔ leso nya nko ke ini wǝ kafo faa eto ǝtǝsa itǝ betidi kpǝ tsya ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ nɛ , nya wǝ ni Yesu Kristo nɛ .
45005016	Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ku asa nnya lɛbɔ itsyi abua nnya utidi ǝmfo díyifo mankate . Itsyise abua dinǝ lekpokponkpo ku dikpilolo eboko nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ botakebu kpǝ eto kamaa , Yesu eto lefonǝ ǝtǝ bǝ betidi eyifo basɛɛ .
45005017	Ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝmfo eto lebua ǝsuǝ nya ukpǝ dítǝkǝ betidi kato nɛ . Nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , nya betidi ba kenke dínyǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ díyifo mǝ basɛɛ , bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ku sekakedidi enso kenke nɛ .
45005018	Nyasoo , se ɛyɛ lǝ lebua lɔni nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bálo betidi kenke dikpii , nko ke yɔɔyɛ lǝ kasɛɛ kani ǝsuǝ Onanto luufi ɔtsyɛ betidi nya wuutǝ mǝ lɛbɛ nɛ .
45005019	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kase utidi ɔni ǝmfo létaka úńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ditiki ǝsuǝ nya betidi kenke lefiani babuayifoo , nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ kase utidi ɔni ǝmfo dítsyue wǝ ditiki kotoo , Onanto ebutǝ betidi kpǝ fiani basɛɛ nɛ .
45005020	Se afi nyamǝ díbǝǝ , itǝ bǝ betidi ǝnyǝ mǝ abuayifoyifo bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nya se bǝnyǝ mǝ abua kpǝ nyamǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpoo , nko ke Onanto eto lefonǝ nye kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ka úfi útǝ bo tsya leefui kakpe nɛ .
45005021	Nyaso kase lebua dítǝ ukpǝ dídi betidi ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke ini bǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ebutǝ bǝnkǝ bofiani basɛɛ lǝ budufǝ lǝ nkpǝ manlo ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
45006001	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ busukosǝ bukeyifo abua bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ukǝtǝ bo wǝ lefonǝ kawunsǝǝ ?
45006002	Owo lo ! Kulefe ! Se búkpǝ itǝ lebua esoo , yensile bǝ butǝ lebua di bo ketu ! Beso ele bǝ busi busiǝ nkpǝ ekeyifo lebua ?
45006003	Lefe nǝ bófo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ buyifo bani ku wǝǝ , biyi biǝ ntu bo bǝflǝsǝ bo mfo ǝtǝ bǝ búyifo lɔni ku wǝ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
45006004	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ bomǝ esoo , ete bǝ bo tsya ǝkpǝ nya bébikǝ bo ku wǝ . Nya Onanto lɛyɛ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ ótakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ botaka busiǝ nkpǝ fɔfɔ bomǝ ku wǝ .
45006005	Nya se bonko wǝ díkeyifo bani lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke buyifo bani ku wǝ lǝ wǝ botaka ǝsuǝ nɛ .
45006006	Nya buyi boǝ básɔ bo ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Kristo itǝ bǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia laala abuayifoyifo lǝ sɛtsylɔ kenke bǝ bɔyɛ ndomufɔ budi kǝtǝ lebua bio .
45006007	Itsyise lǝ utidi ǝkpǝǝ , lebua ensiǝmbokɛ ǝsuǝale lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio .
45006008	Nya lǝ búkpǝ ku Kristo , bófo bɔ́nɔ boǝ buusiǝ nkpǝ ku wǝ tsya .
45006009	Buyi boǝ se Onanto létakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , woensiǝmbukpǝ bio . Ukpǝ ensibǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio .
45006010	Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝǝ , úkpǝ itǝ sɔni hã bǝ lǝ lebua ensiembutǝkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kato . Nya nkpǝ bo unsi mɔmɔɔ , usi mu ku Onanto .
45006011	Nya nko ke ele bǝ itsyǝ nɛ bǝ , mi tsya ǝkpǝ nya yanle bǝ lebua si ditǝkǝ mi kato . Nyaso ele bǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bitǝ Onanto lǝ mi lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
45006012	Nyaso biǝntǝ lǝ lebua fo lekpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia lǝǝbǝ bukpǝ mfo ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ lǝ sitǝkǝ mi kato lǝ asa bua buyifo ǝsuǝ .
45006013	Nye biǝntǝ kusu lǝ abua lǝ idi mi utu lǝ ǝsuǝ eto uyi eto kukalebe saa lǝ lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomu bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto fe betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ kemiǝ óboko nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Beyani mi ǝsuǝ eto kalebe saa bitǝ Onanto fǝnkǝ mba bǝlǝkǝ betsyiko ukpǝ kɛnyɛ baboko nkpǝ . Beyani mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mi uyifo asa sɛɛ eto keyifo .
45006014	Yanle bǝ lebua si ditǝkǝ mi kato bio diyifo mi eto onamute , itsyise binsibǝ lǝ afi kalɔ . Bomu bekpe lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ kalɔ .
45006015	Nya be bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ? Bǝ bunsibǝ lǝ afi kalɔ itsyise bokpe lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ kalɔ eso , nyaso ele bǝ bukeyifo abua ? Owo lo . Inni nko ini !
45006016	Biyi sintinti biǝ , lǝ bifi mi ǝsuǝ bekpe lǝ nwǝ eto keyifo bieyifo kalɔɔ , nyalɛ biyifo utidi ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo nye ndomufɔ . Lǝ lebua eto sele bianɔɔ , nnya laabɔ ketsyiko mfó ni ukpǝ . Lǝ Onanto eto sele bianɔɔ , nya laabɔ ketsyi mfó ni kasɛɛ yifoyifo .
45006017	Boasɔ Onanto ani , bǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bíyifo babuayifo , nya mɔmɔɔ , bifi mii lɛkɔɛsi kenke béfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mínte mi .
45006018	Nya bɛbɔ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ , béfloma nya biyifo ndomufɔ itǝ asasɛɛ buyifo .
45006019	Nlɛ mi etiki budi ɛyɛ lǝ kase betidi leedi ǝsuǝ , lǝ nlǝkǝ nyamfo kasɔ nte mi lǝ befo nnya kasɔ bɔnɔ . Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , béyani mi ǝsuǝ nya béfiani ndomufɔ bitǝ abua buyifo ku asa nnya dimankpa ku disiale eto asa bua saa eto okle buyifo . Nko ke ini bǝ mɔmɔɔ , bífi mi ǝsuǝ bífianisǝ ndomufɔ bitǝ asa sɛ buyifo nya ete bǝ biyifo mba leeyifo asa kɛnkɛ .
45006020	Lefe nǝ bíyifo ndomufɔ itǝ lebua , yánkle mi bǝ biyifo kasɛɛ .
45006021	Nya nte kutǝkǝ ko bínyǝ itsyi lǝ asa nnya bíkeyifo mfó nnya díyifo mi afanisa mɔmɔ ? Asa nnya , nyamfó kenke lǝǝnǝ kaboko ete ni ukpe .
45006022	Nya mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mi utsyiko lǝ lebua eto ani , nya bíbǝ bíyifo wǝ ndomufɔ . Kutǝkǝ ko bínyǝ se bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝ wǝ kenke nya bíyifo kɛnkɛ ni bǝ , lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , buinyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
45006023	Lebua eto kayofofo ni ukpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto ǝtǝsa nnya wǝǝtǝ bo kafo faa ni nkpǝ bo lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu wǝ ni Bonamute eto lɔniyifoyifo ku bo ǝsuǝ eso .
45007001	Sitintii , mɔ bayimi , bɛnɔ nnya mǝǝbǝ bɔtɛyi mfo eto kasɔ , itsyise mimblɛ yi afi nyamǝ . Afi aakle utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ nnya kalɔ lǝ lefe nǝ unsi nkpǝ hã ǝsuǝ .
45007002	Tǝ mfi nyamfo nte ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ . Usio wǝ nsi kusǝǝ , sisǝ ku sisiǝ eto kɔfi aakle wǝ kamanklasǝ lǝ wǝ usǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ osani ǝmǝ nsi nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ osani ǝmǝ ǝkpǝǝ , kɔfi komǝ mensikle usio ǝmǝ .
45007003	Nyaso lǝ usio ǝmfo esu usiǝ ko osani bamba lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ usǝ nsi nsi nkpǝǝ , betidi ebɔtɛyi bǝ okpo kusǝ . Fɛ lǝ usǝ ǝmǝ ǝkpǝǝ , kɔfi komǝ mensikle wǝ . Nya onkpe kusu wǝǝsiǝ kusǝ bamba nya wǝmbudi usǝnkpo .
45007004	Mɔ bayimi , nko ke ini itǝ mi tsya nɛ . Itsyise lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ɛlɛ bote bǝnkǝ bíkpǝ ku Kristo itsyise biyifo Kristo eto lekpa ditsyuǝ , nya biefiani mi bǝtsyuǝ eto bale . Nya mɔmɔɔ befiani wǝ , nwǝ bátakasǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ eto ole , bǝ lǝ biyifo keyifo sɛ ka luubǝ kutǝkǝ itǝ Onanto .
45007005	Lǝ lefe nǝ búsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nkpǝ eto lɛkɔɛnde ǝsuǝǝ , lebua eto lɛkɔɛnde nǝ kɔfi lǝǝnǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kakpee , ábesǝ bo abuayifoyifo kato ekpe . Nya asa nnya lɛbɔ lǝ nkpǝ bomfó siǝsiǝ ǝtǝ bo ukpǝ .
45007006	Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , se búkpǝ nya bɔ́bɔ lǝ asa nnya lékle bo itsyǝ esoo , afi nyamǝ ensibǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nnya eso boensiembuyifo kulesa ɛyɛ lǝ kusu koko ku ko kɔfi ǝsuǝ . Bomuu , bo eyifosa ebɔyɛ lǝ kusu fɔfɔ ko laayɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
45007007	Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bukatɛyi ? Boǝ , nyalɛ afi nyamǝ ǝbǝ kɔnɔɔ ? Inni nko ini ! Lǝ sitintii , ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ nya boǝnyǝ lesa nǝ ni lebua ketsye lekpo nɛ . Lǝ kɔfi komfo ete dímantɛyi nkǝ , “ Mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ utidi bamba eto asa ǝsuǝǝ , ” eni yoofo budi bǝ míntante kase basɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ sas ǝsuǝ .
45007008	Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lebua ǝnyǝ kusu lesanklisǝ kǝnǝnsɛ saa eto okle lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ kɔfi saa ǝmbǝǝ , eni lebuayifoyifo tsya ǝmbɔkɛ ǝsuale saa .
45007009	Mɔ kosate ǝsiǝ nkpǝ bomfo eto okle lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ nǝ mánte afi nyamǝ . Fɛ lefe nǝ mímbǝ mínte afi nyamǝ nya yénsitǝ mɛ kusu bǝ nyifo asa kpǝǝ , abuayifoyifo tsya átaka íńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nya mínyǝ miǝ nkpǝ .
45007010	Nya afi nnya eni ele bǝ itǝ mɛ nkpǝǝ , nnya bomu leboko mɛ ukpǝ nɛ .
45007011	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝǝ , abuayifoyifo ǝnyǝ kusu ɛwɛ mɛ ekpe nya élo mɛ .
45007012	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , afi alɛɛ , lesa kɛnkɛ ini fɛ , nya asa nnya yaate tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ , nya ɛnyɛ lǝ kusu sɛ ǝsuǝ , nya ɛlɛkɛ .
45007013	Nyalɛɛ , bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ lɛsa sɛ nǝmfo ni nǝ léboko mɛ ukpǝ ? Inni nko ini ! Bomu bǝ lǝ bunyǝ butsyǝ lekpo boǝ lebuayifoyifo eyifo lesa bua esoo , lebuayifoyifo ayɛ lǝ lesa nǝ nkpe kɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya dínǝ ukpǝ léboko . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lebuayifoyifo ǝlǝkǝ ni ditsyǝbi kosate léte .
45007014	Bomblɛ yi boǝ Kɔfi eyifo lɛwɔnɔ eto lesa . Fɛɛ nkpǝ bo minsi eyifo kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi eto nle , nya lebuayifoyifo diyi mɛ ǝsuǝ .
45007015	Maamfó asa nnya meeyifo kasɔ bɔnɔ . Itsyise lesa nǝ maala miǝ lǝ nyifoo , inni ni meeyifo . Bomu asa nnya meekisi sitintii , nnya ni nnya meeyifo nɛ .
45007016	Nya lǝ asa nnya maanla miǝ meeyifo nnya ni nnya meeyifoo , nyalɛ ɛlɛ bote bǝ ntɔnɔ miǝ afi nyamfo alɛkɛ .
45007017	Lǝ nyasoo , ɛlɛ bote bǝ inni mɔ kosate nlɛ lesa nǝmfo buyifo , bomu lebua nǝ nkpe lǝ mɛ ni nnya eso meeyifo nko .
45007018	Nya nyi lǝ mɔ kosate eto ǝsuǝ kemiǝ miǝǝ , lesa sɛɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ mɛ . Nya nlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ eso . Itsyise maala sitinti miǝ ele bǝ eni nyifo kasɛɛ , fɛɛ meenyifo nko .
45007019	Itsyise kasɛɛ ka maala miǝ meeyifoo , inni ke ni lesa nǝ meeyifo . Nya lebua nǝ bomu maanla miǝ meeyifo , nii ni nǝ meeyifo nɛ .
45007020	Nyaso lǝ meeyifo asa nnya maanla miǝ meyifoo , inni mɔ kosate lǝǝtsyǝ keyifo nnya . Bomuu , lebua nǝ nkpe lǝ mɛ leeyifo nnya .
45007021	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nsu nnyǝ lesakpa ditsyuǝ ntsyǝ lekpo . Lǝ nla miǝ meeyifo kasɛɛ , lebua hã meeyifo kekleke .
45007022	Lǝ kusu bambaa ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝ sitintii , Onanto eto afi aakpe mǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
45007023	Fɛɛ nnyǝ miǝ asa bamba nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ mɛɛ , aakpɔ lema ku lesa nǝ mɔ nsusu laate mɛ nkǝ ɛlɛkɛ . Nya lǝǝtǝ abuayifoyifo lɛbɔ lǝ mɛ nya yeeti mɛ kusu fe nwǝ bákpe lǝ diyo .
45007024	Mɔ ǝsuǝ kpe kaminsǝ tinti . Nya owoe luulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abua nya kɔ , nya laakpa mɛ kesuko ukpǝ kemiǝ mfo ?
45007025	Maasɔ Onanto ani , itsyise nnyǝ bulǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ ! Nya mɔmɔɔ , lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo nwǝ leeyifo lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝǝ , meeyifo lǝ lebua eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
45008001	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embolo mǝ dikpi .
45008002	Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , afi nnya nyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ lǝǝtǝ betidi nkpǝ , ǝtǝ nkǝ mbɔ lǝ afi nnya lǝǝnǝ utidi kakpe ku ukpǝ ǝsuǝ .
45008003	Lesa nǝ kɔfi ko Onanto dítǝ Moses dímamfo buyifo , se utidi lɛyɔkpɔ nya wóanfo ko budi esoo , nnya Onanto díyifo mɔmɔ nɛ . Ótsyese wǝ ubi fǝnkǝ utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ sia lebua laakpɔ nko . Úbǝ lǝ betidi eto abua eto disi nya úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi , nya útǝkǝ lebua kato nya úsensǝ lebua nǝ nsi lǝ bo eto ǝsuǝale .
45008004	Onanto éyifo nyamfo útǝ bo mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ kase Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ laala , inni lǝ kase ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ laala . Úyifo asa nyamfo kenke bǝ lǝbusiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ fe kase wǝ afi lete .
45008005	Betidi ba nsi nkpǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto ditsyǝbi fe kɔɔ , lǝ kase baalaa , mǝ nsusu si buteke lǝ asa nnya mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ laala ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mba nsi nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu teke lǝ nnya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ laalaa ǝsuǝ .
45008006	Utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝnyǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ku diyuǝsǝ .
45008007	Nya utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ hãa , uyifo Onanto eto olo , itsyise weentsyue Onanto eto afi koto . Nya lǝ sitinti , wǝǝmbofo nnya koto butsyue tsya kulefe .
45008008	Mba dítǝ bǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ tǝkǝ mǝ katoo , baamfo Onanto eto lelabi buyifo .
45008009	Lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ afo disiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ binsisi nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lɛkuɛnde ǝsuǝ , bomu fe kase Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laala . Nya lǝ Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ mamfo disiǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , nyalɛɛ unni Kristo eto ole .
45008010	Mɔmɔ lǝ wǝ Kristo afo disiǝ unsi lǝ mii , mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ebukpǝ lǝ lebua eso . Fɛɛ mi lɛwɔnɔ ebusi disiǝ nkpǝ itsyise Onanto eyifo mi basɛɛ eso .
45008011	Nya lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ létakasǝ Yesu ditsyiko ɔkɔmǝ si lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝ létakasǝ Kristo Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia luukpǝ mfoo , nkpǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eso .
45008012	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , keyifo ketsyuǝ abe bo lǝ ǝnǝmi ka ele bǝ buyifo , fɛɛ inni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo bunsi kayo , bǝ lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ se lelabi ǝsuǝ .
45008013	Lǝ bitǝkǝko bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , biukpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ belo mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi bua nǝmǝǝ , buisiǝ nkpǝ manlo .
45008014	Itsyise betidi ba Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laayɛnkoo , mǝ ni Onanto eto bebi nɛ .
45008015	Onanto mǝntǝ mi ndomufɔ eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bikate sikpi . Bomu útǝ mi Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ni bebi eto lele nya diǝtǝ boakpadi Onanto boǝ , “ Abba ” eto kasɔ ni , “ Nto lala . ”
45008016	Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ku bo awɔnɔ kenke lɛkɔ iyifo kɛnyɛ ka nlɛ bote bǝ buyifo Onanto eto bebi .
45008017	Nya lǝ buyifo wǝ bebii , nyalɛ buyifo mba leedi wǝ bikǝ . Nya bo ku Kristo ebudi Onanto eto bikǝ bɔkɔ . Nya fe kase búnyǝ kanyi fe Kristo , nko ke bo tsya luuyǝnle fe wǝ nɛ .
45008018	Lǝ mɔ dinyǝbi ǝsuǝǝ , sitinti lǝ befi kanyi ka bɔnlɛ bunyǝ mɔmɔ mfoo , kanle kulesa saa kon lǝ befi bakatesǝko ku diyǝnde ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Onanto luutǝ bunyǝ .
45008019	Asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke si ɛlɛ kusu bobe kekleke itǝ lefe nǝ Onanto luulǝkǝ wǝ bebi ote .
45008020	Nya Onanto eto asayifoyifo nyamfo kenkee , kpe lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ inni asa nyamfo mate ete dítǝ ibǝ nko , bomu Onanto kosate wǝ dítǝ kusu nko . Nya utǝ kusu nkǝ bǝnyǝ kusubebe bǝ
45008021	wuulǝkǝ asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ eto sedomu eto kabiasǝ eto ani lǝ bǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ , nya wuutǝ kusu nkǝ bǝyǝnde fe wǝ bebi ke .
45008022	Nya buyi boǝ ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke lɛ kanyi bunyǝ tinti , kakɔɛ fe usio wǝ nlabe kole .
45008023	Nya inni nyamfo mate ete , bomu bo mba Onanto dífi wǝ ditǝsa tutɛ nǝ ni wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ tsyaa , lɛ kanyi bunyǝ kukakɔɛ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ kemiǝ , nya buufi ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ kekleke boǝ Onanto lǝ ufi bo fe wǝ bebi lǝ butsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
45008024	Nya se bonkpe kusubebe komfo esoo , búnyǝ bofo . Fɛɛ asa nnya boǝnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmii , boensiabe nnya kusu . Itsyise kuutsyuǝ ensi ambe kusu kǝtǝ asa nnya mfi nkpe wǝ koko .
45008025	Fɛɛ lǝ bufi bo ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya boǝnnyǝtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ ele bǝ bokpe utu buɛɛ , bukabe nnya kusu .
45008026	Nya lǝ nko eto kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laawunsǝko bo kekleke nɛ , itsyise bumbǝ ale nya bunyi kase ele bǝ boto ola butǝ Onanto bɔyɛnko . Fɛɛ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ kosate laakɔɛ kalɛ lekpakpa kǝtǝ bo fe kase ińyǝ itǝ bo lǝ kusu ko boǝmbofo bulǝkǝ kate ǝsuǝ .
45008027	Nya Onanto wǝ nyi betidi eto ketu kemiǝǝ , yi lesa nǝ nkpe lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto nsusu ǝsuǝ tsya . Itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ aalɛ Onanto lekpakpa lǝ bo disi fe kase Onanto laala .
45008028	Buyi boǝ lesa saa nǝ Onanto leeyifoo , iyifo itǝ lɛlɛkɛsǝ itǝ betidi ba laala wǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ beyifo wǝ keyifo .
45008029	Nya betidi ba Onanto léte utsyǝǝ , úlǝkǝ mǝ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ bale wǝ Ubi itǝ bǝ wǝ Ubi lǝ udi ututɛ utǝ wǝ bayimi kpǝ bamǝ .
45008030	Lǝ nyaso mba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝǝ , mǝ ókpadi nɛ . Nya mba ókpadii , úyifo mǝ basɛɛ . Nya mba úyifo basɛɛ , mǝ ókpasǝ ǝsuǝ bǝyǝnde fe wǝ ke .
45008031	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ Onanto ńyǝ bo kamaa , owoe loofo buńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ?
45008032	Nya lǝ Onanto mánni wǝ Ubi bufi kǝtǝ bo , bomu úfi wǝ útǝ kedi lǝ bo disii , beso wǝmbufi asa nnya ta utǝ bo kafo faa ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ ?
45008033	Nya owoe luufi etiki lǝ Onanto eto betidi ba úlǝkǝ utsyǝ ǝsuǝ ? Onanto kosate ébulǝkǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bédi lɛbɛ .
45008034	Nya owoe loofo mǝ dikpi bolo ? Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ ! Kristo Yesu wǝ ni utidi wǝ díkpǝ , nya nnya nsi nso ni bǝǝ , wǝ ni nwǝ bátakasǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nya unsi lǝ Onanto eto kodiani nlɛ bofo kǝtǝ bo .
45008035	Nya owoe loofo lelabi nǝ nkpe lǝ bonko Kristo eto nti bola ? Kanyinyǝnyǝ lee bulǝ , lee ohiãtete , lee kukpɛnsɛ , lee leyasiǝsiǝ , lee sikpi bokpe , lee ukpǝ lee lesiabi eto kɛnyɛ ?
45008036	Ekpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Lǝ fǝ disi esoo , bokpe lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ ǝsuǝ diyi saa diyi . Nya beeyifo bo fe basamu ba bantɔɔ kalokɔ . ”
45008037	Nya lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , butǝkǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ kase Kristo laala bo eso .
45008038	Itsyise ékpako mɛ wuee bɛ kulesa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ luusǝnsǝ bo ku wǝ nti lǝ lelabi nǝ ufi utǝ bo eso . Ukpǝ nye nkpǝ lee kato eto batɔnkpe lee awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ , lefe nǝmfo lee nǝ luubǝ nye ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ditsyi kato fanloo nye lǝ kasɔ mfo nye lesa saa nǝ beyifoo , kulesa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ loofo bo nti bola kulefe ketsyiko lǝ Onanto eto lelabi nǝ úfi útǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu Bonamute ǝsuǝ .
45008039	
45009001	Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ , inni sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi , itsyise nyifo Kristo eto ole . Mɔ lɛkɔɛsi nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nsii , lɛ mɛ bɔtɛyi sitinti nkǝ minlɛ sidia bɔtɛyi .
45009002	Nnla miǝ bete biǝ ɛlɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ taa utu nya yɛnlɛ mɛ bufi tinti taa lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝǝ ?
45009003	Iyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ , lǝ yɔɔwunsǝ ko mɔ betidi ba bonko mǝ ni kusǝ kɔni eto betidi eto disii , muutǝ kusu bǝ Onanto kudi mɛ nkǝ woǝfǝ mɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ .
45009004	Itsyise mǝ ni Israel eto kusǝ ko Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ . Nya úfi mǝ uyifo wǝ bebi . Nya úlǝkǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde óte mǝ . Nya úlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ka ókle ku mǝ óte . Nya útǝ mǝ wǝ afi . Mǝ ni mba Onanto léte kase ele bǝ bayɛ besumu wǝ nɛ . Nya mǝ ni mba ókle kɛnyɛ ko utsyǝ .
45009005	Mǝ bana ni mba lefo aye , ba ni baseke , ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ ntii , nya Kristo lɛbɔ utsyi úbǝ fe kawunsiǝ eto utidi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ lefe saa bitǝ lǝ bufi atɛsǝ butǝ Onanto , wǝ ntǝkǝ lesa saa kato . Ibǝ itǝ .
45009006	Inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ eyifo kebimba , nya wényifo lǝ ke ǝsuǝ . Itsyise inni Israelfɔ kenke ni Onanto eto betidi .
45009007	Nya inni Abraham eto kafo eto bebi kenke ni Onanto eto bebi . Onanto atɛyi Abraham nkǝ , “ Mɔɔyɛ lǝ Isak ǝsuǝ mfɔnsǝ fǝ kafo eto bebi . ”
45009008	Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , inni Abraham eto bebi ba kenke ole ni Onanto eto bebi . Bomu Onanto eto bebi ni mba lefo wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ banɔ . Nya mbamfo woǝnyǝ fǝnkǝ Abraham eto bebi kosate nɛ .
45009009	Ditiki nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ ni nkǝ , “ Muusinkli mbǝ lɛlɛ amba mfiǝmato . Nya Sara ebole ubisaibi . ”
45009010	Nya inni nyamfo mate . Fɛɛ Rebeka tsya ále bafimfi ini bebisaibi itsyi lǝ anto ɔni hã wǝ ni bo ona Isak ǝsuǝ .
45009011	Fɛɛ Onanto kpe kusu ko woayɛ kǝlǝkǝ betidi . Nya fe kase ibǝ itǝ nkoo , Onanto átɛyi lesatsyuǝ utsyǝ fɛ bále bafimfi bamfo , fɛ lǝ bafimfi bamfo lǝ beyifo keyifo sɛɛ lee kabua saa . Nya kusu ko ǝsuǝ woayɛ mfo enni lǝ mǝ keyifo saa ǝsuǝ . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi Rebeka nkǝ , “ Ubi ninǝ ebofiani nwǝ luusumu dikpǝfile . ”
45009012	
45009013	Íbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nla Yakob , nya mínkisi Esau . ”
45009014	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi mɔmɔ ? Bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ Onanto eenyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ? Kulefe ! Inni nko inte kon .
45009015	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi Moses nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ maala miǝ muunǝ kafoo , wǝ muunǝ kafo nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ minla miǝ mǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝǝ , wǝ muunyǝ kaminsǝ nɛ . ”
45009016	Nyaso kase Onanto lǝǝnyǝ utidi kaminsǝǝ , aanyɛ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto lesa nǝ woala nye wǝǝyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomuu , itsyi lǝ kase Onanto kosate laabe lǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ .
45009017	Nya lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto átɛyi Egipte eto Oka Farao nkǝ , “ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ fǝ seka butsyǝ bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale nte betidi ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bǝ lǝ mɔ diye lǝ lɛyɛ letsyo bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lǝ banɔ . ”
45009018	Lǝ nyasoo , utidi wǝ Onanto laala nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝǝ , wǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ nɛ . Nya nwǝ waala nkǝ utidi atoo , wǝ wǝǝtǝ wǝǝtidi ato nɛ .
45009019	Mi bǝtsyuǝ ebɔtɔ mɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ite nkoo , beso Onanto nsi laalo utidi dikpi ? Owoe loofo botaka kǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lɛkɔɛle ǝsuǝ . ”
45009020	Nya owoe feni kon bǝ lǝ edi etiki ǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ? Dikplibi antɔ utidi wǝ léto ni nkǝ , “ Beso fɛ fáto mɛ mmǝ ? ”
45009021	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , utidi wǝ laato ekplibi kpe kusu woasɔ sɛfɔtǝ fe kase ke woala . Nya woofo sɛfɔtǝ sia ɔminansǝ bufi kato ekplibi ǝnuǝ , nya wuufi dikplibi lɔɔni nǝ óto , laanɔ bobe utsyǝ itǝ eyididi . Nya wuufi dikplibi nuǝfǝ utsyǝ itǝ ekubi bokpa kakpo .
45009022	Nya nko ke Onanto tsya díyifo nɛ . Woala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ lɛblɔfi ote mba ǝsuǝ únyǝ ɔblɔ , bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale . Fɛɛ woefi disuǝtsyǝ tinti kǝtǝ mba ɔnlɛ ɔblɔ bunyǝ kakpe lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe úkase uyi nkǝ wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ .
45009023	Nya nko ini bǝ óla nkǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ asa sɛɛ nnya nkpe lǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ kemiǝ ote mba woola nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ . Nya buyifo betidi ba ɔlɔ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ bubǝ bunyǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ .
45009024	Lǝ nyaso úlǝkǝ bo tsya , inni Yudafɔ mate . Bomu ku mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya .
45009025	Ɔ́tɛyi ekpa wuee lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Hosea eto kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba dímendi mɔ balee , mookpadi mǝ ‘ Mɔ betidi . ’ Nya kuse ko eto betidi maanlaa , mookpadi mǝ ‘ Mɔ balala . ’
45009026	Nya lǝ kaka tutuutu bátɛyi mǝ bǝ , Binni mɔ betidi , mfo ǝmǝ tutuutu bookpadi mǝ bǝ Onanto Wǝ Nsi Nkpe Lefe Saa eto bebi . ”
45009027	Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya ábe letsya bembembe útǝ Israelfɔ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ Israelfɔ fui kpenkpenkpe fe lekpo eto lɛwinimi tsyaa , mǝ nti esiani hã luunyǝ bulǝkǝ .
45009028	Itsyise Bonamute ebokponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lekpo mlǝ . ”
45009029	Nya yuubǝ itǝ fe kase Yesaya lɛtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ nkǝ , “ Lenni Bonamute Ǝsuǝaletidi Kenke díbu bo kafo eto bebi bǝtsyuǝ utsyǝǝ , eni bɔ́ɔtsylɔsɔ bo tsya fe Sodom seka , nya butsyǝ fe Gomora seka ! ”
45009030	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ini bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ? Nko ini bǝ betidi ba lenni Israelfɔ nya bennsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ díbǝ báfiani betidi ba ni basɛɛ mɔmɔ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnemi se báfo wǝ bánɔ eso .
45009031	Fɛɛ Israelfɔ ba léfo afi nyamǝ nya banlɛ bokplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ beyifo kasɛɛ , mámfo buyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bafiani basɛɛ .
45009032	Nya beso íbǝ nko ? Itsyise bányɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bafo kasɛɛ buyifo , bomu béfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ mǝ kosate eto eyisafa ǝsuǝ , nya bétusǝ lǝ Kristo wǝ nte fe leba nǝ ǝsuǝ utidi leetusǝ .
45009033	Fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ lǝ nyaso bétusǝ lǝ Kristo wǝ ni fe leba nǝ nte lǝ mǝ kusu ǝsuǝ fe kase inte lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Mfi leba nǝ luutǝ betidi tusǝ lǝ ni nlɛ butsyǝ lǝ Sion eto umǝ . Nya bɔɔtsyinini lǝ ni ǝsuǝ bedu banɔ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ke lefo wǝ ɔnɔɔ , wǝmbudi kafoni lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ kulefe . ”
45010001	Mɔ bayimi , iyifo mɔ lelabi nǝ ditsyi lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝ ku mɔ olatoto itǝ Onanto miǝ Yudafɔ lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo .
45010002	Nńyǝ mǝ kama nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝǝ , baakpe otsyekle sitinti lǝ Onanto busumu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ benyi kusu komǝ .
45010003	Itsyise bánte kusu ko Onanto laala nkǝ utidi yɛ lǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Bomu mǝ kosate lɛbɛbɛ mǝ kusu bǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eso bámbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ Onanto itǝ bǝ lǝ ote mǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ lǝ uyifo mǝ basɛɛ .
45010004	Itsyise Kristo díbǝ ófo ǝsuǝale lǝ Moses eto afi eto ani . Nya utidi saa léfo Kristo ɔ́nɔɔ , úyifo wǝ ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
45010005	Moses áwɔni asa utsyiko lǝ kase utidi leeyifo ɔsɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa wǝ leeyifo lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , afi nyamfo ebutǝ wǝ nkpǝ . ”
45010006	Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi itsyi lǝ kase utidi leeyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Mantɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝnkǝ , ‘ Owoe loobe usu Kato ? ’ Nya kasɔ ni bǝ , ‘ Owoe loobe usu Kato usu okpa Kristo oboko ? ’
45010007	Nya mantɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝnke , ‘ Owoe luudufǝ usu kasɔ mfo ke ? ’ Nya kɔsɔ ni bǝ , ‘ Owoe luusu ɔkɔmǝ usu oboko Kristo ku wǝ ? ’ ”
45010008	Bomu lesa nǝ ɛnlɛ bote ni bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ ebɔfi fǝ pɛɛ , nya lenkpe lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ ku fǝ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ . ” Nya nyamfo ni bofokanɔ eto ditiki nǝ bɔnlɛ letsya bobe nɛ .
45010009	Nya lǝ emenkli kɛnyɛ , fatɛyi fǝ Yesu ni Bonamute , nya fafo fanɔ lǝ fǝ lɔkɔɛsi kemiǝ fǝ Onanto átakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , Onanto ebutǝ fǝ nkpǝ .
45010010	Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ nya faafo kanɔɔ , nya feeyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nɛ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ ka fefi fǝlǝkǝ nyamfo fatee , nya ǝsuǝ fuunyǝ bofo nɛ .
45010011	Itsyise lǝ nyamfo seka ǝsuǝ nya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa wǝ léfo wǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , kofani ǝmbɔlɛ wǝ kulefe . ”
45010012	Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , letekɛkɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudanyǝ nti . Nya Onanto ni bomblɛ eto Onamute , nya wookpo betidi ba kenke laato ola kǝtǝ wǝ atsyɔ .
45010013	Fe kase enkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , “ Utidi saa wǝ laato ola kakpadi Bonamute eto diyee , ebunyǝ bofo . ”
45010014	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke dímamfo ɔ́nɔɔ , ntsyǝ woofo wǝ bokpadi katɔ wǝ lesa ? Nya utidi wǝ kee eto ditiki bámfo bábe ni letsyaa , ntsyǝ fɛ boofo wǝ bofo kanɔ ? Nya lǝ kuutsyuǝ mámbe ditiki nǝmǝ letsya bǝtǝ mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , ntsyǝ fɛ bɔɔnɔ ni ?
45010015	Nya lǝ bántsyese batɔnkpee , ntsyǝ boobe ditiki nǝmǝ letsya ? Báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Kase mba léboko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ díbǝ bédufǝ , aanɔ bobe tinti . ”
45010016	Fɛɛ inni mǝmblɛ kenke ni mba díkafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ . Itsyise Yesaya kosate átɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe léfo ditiki nǝ bóbe letsya ɔ́nɔ ? ”
45010017	Lǝ nyasoo , bofokanɔ yɛ lǝ ditiki nǝ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ditiki nǝmǝ bɔnɔ yɛ lǝ Kristo letsya bobe ǝsuǝ .
45010018	Fɛɛ lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɔ ni bǝǝ , sitinti ini bǝ Israelfɔ mánnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ ? Bánɔ ni fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bánɔ mǝ kudu lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke , nya mǝ ditiki dísensǝ dísu kawunsiǝ eto kasekɔ kenke . ”
45010019	Nya lǝ nsi ntɔ nnɔ miǝ nyalɛ Israel eto kusǝ mánnɔ ni kasɔɔ ? Moses kosate ni utidi tutɛ wǝ dítsyiko Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate katɛyi nkǝ , “ Muutǝ miǝ bɛsɛsɛ ǝnǝmi lǝ betidi ba lenni kusǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ betidibuki ba eto ǝnǝmi dimansini tɔ lǝ bǝtǝ binyǝ ɔblɔ . ”
45010020	Nya Yesaya esi ókpe ɔkɔɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ wuee nkǝ Onanto atɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi ba dímambɛbɛ mɛɛ , mɔmɔ bǝnyǝ mɛ . Nya mínlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ mínte betidi ba dímantɔ kulesa itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ bánɔ . ”
45010021	Fɛɛ lǝ Israelfɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nsensǝ mɔ ani ntsyǝ lefe nǝ ta , bǝ lǝ mfo betidi ba lembu kuutsyuǝ saa nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
45011001	Nyaso nlɛ bɔtɔ mɔmɔ miǝ nyalɛ Onanto áni wǝ Betidi ? Owo lo . Inni nko ini kulaa ! Mɔ kosate eyifo Israelnyǝ nya mini Abraham eto kafo eto ubi wǝ ditsyi Benyamin eto kafo .
45011002	Onanto manni wǝ betidi ba unyi , úlǝkǝ utsyǝ taa kasɔketsyikɔ ke . Nya biyi lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia átɛyi Onanto itsyi lǝ Israelfɔ eto disiale ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
45011003	“ Bonamute , betidi bamfo lélo fǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya bésensǝ fǝ kedi eto leba kenke ! Ini mɔ hã ni utidi wǝ díbu , nya banlɛ bɔbɛbɛ bǝ lǝ balo mɛ ! ”
45011004	Nte mbuayɛ bo Onanto dítǝ wǝ ? Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlǝkǝ betidi akpi akuanse ntsyǝ itǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ ba dímanse akonki bǝtǝ ufiǝ Baal . ”
45011005	Nko ke itsyǝ fe kase inte mɔmɔ nɛ . Israel eto betidi esiani bǝtsyuǝ ebu ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ eso .
45011006	Wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́yɛ úlǝkǝ mǝ , nya inni lesa nǝ béyifo eso úlǝkǝ mǝ . Nya lǝ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi lǝ mǝ keyifo ka banlɛ esoo , nyalɛ eni wǝ lefonǝ menyifo lefonǝ tinti .
45011007	Nyalɛ ntsyǝ nɛ ? Lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ Israelfɔ dífi kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ keklekee , bǝnnyǝ ni . Fɛɛ mba sɛkɛ Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ ǝnyǝ ni . Bafɛfɛ éti ato bǝtǝ Onanto eto bokpadi .
45011008	Fe nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nya kuninǝ dídi mǝ utu ku mǝ nsusu kenke . Nya ibǝ nko ibǝ ese taa mi eto bale tsya ǝsuǝ , beentsyue koto nya bǝǝnyǝ kulesa kǝtsyǝ lekpo . ”
45011009	Nyaso Oka David átɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ itǝ mǝ diyi saa eto lesa kedikɔ lǝ efiani uyibi wǝ bábio lǝ banɔ lǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ bédu bánɔ bédufǝ lǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝ .
45011010	Nya lǝ itǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ eba bǝ bensiembunyǝ kulesa bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nnya lǝ itǝ mǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ lǝ kafiani bitsyike itǝ mǝ lefe saa . ”
45011011	Nya maatɔ tsya minkǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ lɛtsyinini bédu bánɔɔ , bánya kenke nya bénsifo botaka keńyǝǝ ? Owo ! Inni nko ini ? Bomu itsyi lǝ mǝ botakebu esoo , mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya ǝbǝ bǝnyǝ bofo bǝ lǝ itǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsɛ mǝ lǝ Yudafɔ bakpɔ mɛ kutsyuǝsɛ .
45011012	Yudafɔ eto lebua nǝ béyifo eso Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ kawunsiǝ kenke nyǝ asa sɛɛ . Nya lefe nǝ Yudafɔ ku Onanto eto nti lebiaa , asa sɛɛ esi íbǝ , ílǝkǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto disi lǝ ntu nya báfo Onanto eto atsyɔkpokpo kpǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ botakebu áboko atsyɔkpokpo nyamfo eto okle kawunsiǝǝ , lǝ ibǝ bǝ Yudafɔ kenke esinkli bǝbǝ bakɔ ku Onantoo , wǝ atsyɔkpokpo nnya luubǝ ebufui ekpe tinti .
45011013	Nya mɔmɔ mimba lenni Yudafɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝmfo nǝ minyifo nwǝ bátsyese mi mfoo , bǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ keyifo eto bofe nte mi .
45011014	Nya ǝtsyuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , muutǝ ǝnǝmi ebɔsɛ mɔ betidi , bakpɔ kutsyuǝsɛ itǝ ǝtsyuǝ Onanto ebofo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
45011015	Itsyise se Onanto dílǝkǝ mǝ anii , diyuǝ ǝbǝ Onanto ku kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto nti . Nya be luubǝ lǝ Onanto esinkli ofo mǝ ? Yuuyifo fe kase utidi leekpe kesinkli kataka kǝbǝ nkpǝ !
45011016	Lǝ didisa eto kutsyǝ tutɛ ko befi bǝtǝ Onanto eyifo kɛnkɛɛ , nyalɛ didisa nǝmǝ kenke eyifo kɛnkɛ , Nko ke lǝ kuyi komǝ eto keyudu eyifo kɛnkɛ , nyalɛ ko kalɛ tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ .
45011017	Bála kuyi ko bétsyi eto kalɛ , nya béfi mimba lenni Yudafɔ ba nte fe dibutu eto kuyi ko bála bákle bámaklasǝ lǝ nko bétsyi eto ɔlɛ wǝ bála eto kɛnyɛ . Itǝ bǝ mi tsya ǝbǝ bɛlɛ kedi bunyǝ ketsyiko lǝ kuyitsyitsyi komǝ , ko ni Yudafɔ eto keyudu ɔflɔ .
45011018	Nyaso bebe sinini biǝ biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ uyilɛ wǝ bála ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ biyifo nkoo , ele bǝ binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpo biǝ inni mi ni ko uyudu . Bomu uyudu nlɛ mi lǝ nkpǝ nɛ .
45011019	Ebofo bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , “ Bála uyilɛ ǝmǝ bǝlǝkǝ bǝ lǝ befi fǝ bǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . ”
45011020	Nya nko ini nɛ . Fɛɛ biyi biǝ mǝ mamfokanɔ eso bála mǝ bǝlǝkǝ . Nya mi ǝnyǝ kafĩɔkɔ se befo bɛnɔ eso . Fɛɛ nyamfo anlɛ bote bǝ bebesǝ mi ǝsuǝ kato , bomu ele bǝ bikate sikpi .
45011021	Itsyise lǝ Onanto mǝnyǝ mǝ kaminsǝ ɔkɔbe Yudafɔ ba ni fe kuyi komfo eto ɔlɛ ɔlɛɛ , befo bɛnɔ biǝ wuunyǝ mi kaminsǝ ɔkɔbe mi ɔlɛ ?
45011022	Nyamfo lɛ bo bote kase Onanto lǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ ku kase wǝ ditiki nkpe ale . Okpe ale itǝ betidi ba dímentsyue wǝ koto , nya woefi wǝ lefonǝ kǝtǝ mi mba léfo wǝ bɛnɔ kekleke lefe saa . Lǝ bienyifo nkoo , Onanto ebola mi ulǝkǝ lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ .
45011023	Nya lǝ Yudafɔ tsya áyɛ mǝ mamfokanɔɔ , Onanto ebufi mǝ tsya okpe lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Onanto kpe ǝsuǝale bǝ usinkli otsyasǝ kuyi eto kalɛ lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ɛkɔbe ɛlɛ .
45011024	Mimba lenni Yudafɔ te fe kuyi ko ńyǝ lǝ dibutu , nya bála ko kalɛ bǝbǝ bákle bǝkǝ lǝ umǝ eto kuyi ko bétsyi ǝsuǝ . Israel eto kusǝ eyifo fe kuyi ko bétsyi . Eso imbǝ ale itǝ Onanto bǝ ufi kuyitsyitsyi komǝ eto kalɛ ka bála usinkliko ke otsyasǝ ukɔ lǝ nko ǝsuǝ bála ke , nya yɔɔlɛkɛ eso .
45011025	Mɔ bayimi , asa ǝtsyuǝ kpe nnya lɛkula mi nya minla miǝ mǝǝlǝkǝ nte mi bǝ yensikula mi lǝ bɛyɛ bubu biǝ biyi kobe tinti beso . Nnya ni bǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ eto atotitidi nnya bankpe embutsyǝ ɛklɛ . Bomu atotitidi nyamfo ebola lefe nǝ Onanto dínyǝ sitiditu sia woala lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto nti ólosǝ .
45011026	Nya kusu komfo ǝsuǝ yɔɔyɛ bǝ Yudafɔ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , “ Ofomfokǝtǝ ebutsyi Sion ubǝ , nya wuubǝ ulǝkǝ disiale saa lǝ Yakob eto kato eto bebi nti .
45011027	Nya kɛnyɛklekle kamfo ebɔkɛ lǝ bonko mǝ eto nti lǝ lefe nǝ minlǝkǝ abuayifoyifo lǝ mǝ nti . ”
45011028	Yudafɔ eyifo Onanto eto balo , itsyise bámfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mimba lenni Yudafɔ kpe kǝńyǝnkɔ . Fɛɛ se Onanto dílǝkǝ mǝ utsyǝ taa banamǝ lefe esoo , woala mǝ .
45011029	Itsyise lǝ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ nya úte mǝ wǝ lefonǝ ditsyuǝǝ , wǝmbofloma ni .
45011030	Nya mimba lenni Yudafɔɔ , béta Onanto bíbu lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛ mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ǝnyǝ mi kaminsǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto atotitidi esoo ,
45011031	nko ini bǝ lǝ kase Onanto dínyǝ mi kaminsǝ esoo , Yudafɔ ensientsyue Onanto koto mɔmɔ bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ mǝ tsya kaminsǝ .
45011032	Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi ba ta ani , nya mǝ atotitidi díti mǝ kusu iyifo fe diyo bákpe mǝ , lǝ itǝ bǝ unyǝ mǝmblɛ kaminsǝ .
45011033	Onanto amɔ tinti ! Nya asa sɛɛ kenke etsyi wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya sitintii , wǝ ni kobe nya unyi asa nnya kenke eto kemiǝ kukɔnɔ . kǝlǝkǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ . Nya kutsyuǝ sa ǝmbofo esu nya ǝsuǝ waayɛ keyifo wǝ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo esu nya ǝsuǝ wǝ ayɛ keyifo wǝ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ .
45011034	Nko eso báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe laanɔ Bonamute eto nsusu kasɔ ? Nya owoe ni wǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ ?
45011035	Owoe díkǝtǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ unyǝ bǝ lǝ ubǝ utsyǝ wǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ ? ”
45011036	Wǝ díyifo lesa saa , nya wǝ dímuǝ asa nnya kenke ɔnlɛ , nya wǝ ni lesa saa eto kalosǝkɔ . Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
45012001	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , se Onanto nlɛ bo kaminsǝ bunyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kafo ɛkpɛ tinti esoo , nlɛ mi lekpakpa sitinti miǝ , bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto fe keditǝtǝ seka nnya diyifo kɛnkɛ , nnya lǝǝyuǝsǝ wǝ kafo tsya lǝ mi nkpǝ bo binsi mfo eso . Nyamfo ni kase ele bǝ bɔyɛ busumu Onanto lǝ lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ nɛ .
45012002	Biensiǝ nkpǝ fe kase kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi lǝǝsiǝ mu . Bomu bitǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔtsyi mi nsusu ɔwuninsǝ lǝ befiani betidi fɔfɔ . Nyamfo luutǝ binyǝ lesa nǝ Onanto laala , ku lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ , nya diakɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛ nya lɛflɔ kenke tsya .
45012003	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka útǝ mɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , nlɛ mimblɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato enso kase ele bǝ itsyǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ mi nsusu lǝ bote bǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya utsyuǝ saa lǝ ukato wǝ ǝsuǝ ukabe lǝ wǝ bofakanɔ bo Onanto dítǝ wǝ eto ale ǝsuǝ .
45012004	Fe kase bonkpe ǝsuǝ ani nnya nkpe akpa akpa nnya leeyifo keyifo kani eto oklee ,
45012005	nko ke ini bǝ buyifo betidi kpǝ tsya . Buyifo utidi eto ǝsuǝ ani nnya ntsyi akpa akpa kpǝ nyamfo lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo eso , nya akpa akpa nyamǝ lɛkɔɔ bǝtsyuǝ iyifo utidi ɔni .
45012006	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bufi ǝtǝsa akpa akpa nnya Onanto dítǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ buyifo keyifo . Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ afo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto bulǝkǝkate eto ǝtǝsaa , ele bǝ obe ni letsya ku bofokanɔ bo nkpe wǝ .
45012007	Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ eto ǝtǝsa ni bǝ ɔwunsǝko betidi bamba eto keyifoo , ele bǝ uyifo ke ku kafo faa ka woofo . Lǝ asabote inii , ele bǝ ote asa nyamǝ fe kase woofo .
45012008	Lǝ betidi nkɛale kpekpe inii , ele bǝ okpe betidi nkɛale lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Lǝ kafoɛkpɛ buyifo kǝtǝ betidi inii , ele bǝ uyifo nnya ku kafo faa . Nya lǝ betidi bɔyɛnko tsya inii , ele bǝ ufi wǝ kobe kenke utǝ keyifo kamǝ eto buyifo , lǝ ɔtɔnko mǝ . Lǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ inii , ele bǝ unyǝ kaminsǝ ku wǝ utu kenke .
45012009	Bela mi betidi ku lelabi kenke . Bikisi lebua lǝ bɛkɔbe lesa sɛɛ bɛlɛ kekleke .
45012010	Bifi lelabi bitǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku utu faa fǝnkǝ bayimi ba léfo bánɔ . Nya bitǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ dibu enso mi ǝsuǝ .
45012011	Bienyifo sɛflɔ , bomu bekpe ɔtsyini lǝ mi keyifo ǝsuǝ . Bisumu Bonamute ǝmǝ ku mi utu kenke .
45012012	Se bɛnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ lesatsyuǝ esoo , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ keyifo saa ka bɛnlɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya binyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ . Nya bikato ola lefe saa .
45012013	Bɛwunsǝko mi bayimitsyuǝ ba léfo bánɔ ba asa nlɛ bohiã . Nya bifi kafo faa befo bafɔ .
45012014	Bɛtɔ Onanto lǝ okpo betidi ba laabɛbɛ mi kabua atsyɔ . Tɔ atsyɔkpokpo ǝtǝ mǝ , menkudi mǝ .
45012015	Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku mba nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ . Nya biwinko mba nlɛ buwi .
45012016	Biyifo bani ku mi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ . Biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , bomu bɛkɔ ani ku mba dimanle betidi lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nya mǝnyǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ fe nwǝ ni obesibe onso .
45012017	Lǝ utsyuǝ eyifo mi kabua biemfi kabua bɛtisǝ wǝ oko . Kplatsya lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ lǝ bitidi eto ǝnǝmi .
45012018	Bɛyɛ kusu saa ko luunǝ diyuǝ eboko mi ku betidi bamba eto nti .
45012019	Mɔ bayimi , biantisɛ utidi eto lebua oko kulefe . Bomu bitǝ Onanto kusu lǝ utǝ utidi ǝmǝ ni kayofofo utǝ mi . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni Onamute wǝ laatɔ kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ , nya mɔ ni futsyǝ lǝǝtǝ kayofofo . ”
45012020	Bomu lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , bátɛyi bo bǝ , “ Lǝ kukpɛnsɛ lǝ fǝ oloo , tǝ wǝ lesa lǝ udi . Lǝ utukuɛ lɛ wǝǝ , tǝ wǝ ntu lǝ unǝ . ” Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , akpa kutǝmbli akpo wǝ lǝ disinti , nye ǝtǝ kofani alɛ wǝ
45012021	Biǝntǝ lǝ kabua lǝ kedi mi utu , bomu bifi kasɛɛ buyifo bitǝkǝ lebua kato .
45013001	Ele bǝ utidi saa fi dibu utǝ Aba eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko . Itsyise aba saa ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale leni Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi . Nya Aba wǝ nsi mɔmɔɔ , Onanto dífi mǝ utsyǝ mfó .
45013002	Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ átaka uńyǝ lǝ Aba utsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto eto lesa nǝ útsyue útsyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ni ótaka uńyǝ nɛ . Nya betidi ba leeyifo nkoo , bǝǝnǝ kotonǝnǝ kaboko ǝsuǝ .
45013003	Betidi ba leeyifo kasɛɛ , aante Aba sikpi , bomu betidi buaa , mǝ laate asa sikpi nɛ . Lǝ bela biǝ biayɛ Aba sikpi botee , ele bǝ biyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ befo atɛsǝ .
45013004	Itsyise uyifo Onanto eto uyifoyifo wǝ laabɛbɛ fǝ kasɛɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ eeyifo kabua , nyalɛ te wǝ sikpi . Itsyise inni bimba ini bǝ bǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ! Onanto eto uyifoyifo uni . Nya uyifo utidi wǝ laabe nkǝ beyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nya wǝǝnǝ obuayifo saa koto .
45013005	Nyamfo eso ele bǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ batɔnkotɔnko . Nya inni lǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi mate nɛ luubǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eso , bomu lǝ fǝ lɛkɔɛsi nǝ loolo fǝ dikpi tsya eso .
45013006	Lǝ nyamfo tsya eso ele bǝ befo oko bitǝ mi kasɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko , itsyise Onanto eto keyifo banlɛ buyifo . Nya béfi mǝ lefe kenke bǝtǝ bǝ lǝ batɔnko betidi .
45013007	Nyasoo , befo oko bitǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ befo bitǝ . Lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto atabi ni nnya bensi bǝ lǝ befi bǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ bǝtǝǝ , bifi bitǝ . Lǝ oko unii , ele bǝ befo wuntsya . Lǝ futsyǝ ele bǝ bifi dibu bitǝǝ , bifi bitǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ atɛsǝ tsya ele bǝ idii , nyalɛ bifi atɛsǝ bitǝ .
45013008	Lǝ bisi utsyuǝ kayoo , manni ke bofo . Fo kemblɛ alosǝ . Fɛɛ kayofofo ka biusiǝ ka biembofo ke bofo kalosǝǝ , ke ni lelabi itǝ mi bayimitsyuǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ nkpe lelabi itǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , ete bǝ utsyue Onanto eto afi nyamǝ koto .
45013009	Afi nnya bǝtǝ bo lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mankpo kusiǝ nye kusǝ , manlo utidi , menyu , mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ kuutsyuǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ , ” nya lǝ befi afi nnya kenke bakɔɔ , eka lesa lɔni klon nǝ ni bǝ , “ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe fǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
45013010	Lǝ aala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , embuyifo wǝ kabua . Nyaso lelabi ni lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ afi nyamfo kenke nkpǝsǝ .
45013011	Besankli lǝ selabe ǝsuǝ ! Lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise biyi lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpe mɔmɔ . Lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto luulǝkǝ bo ebɔfi mɔmɔ enso lefe nǝ boto Kristo bofo kanɔ .
45013012	Ketsye lefe ébubǝ éfe , nya kale fe kalɛ busiǝ . Nyaso bɛyɛ ketsye eto asa buyifo , lǝ bifi amamawu nya dińyǝ itǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ lekpasǝ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ bekpe .
45013013	Bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ ola fe betidi ba laayɛ lǝ lekpasǝ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nya yenyifo udikpuu eto budi ku sitǝkpǝ ku asɔnɔdidi eto abua ku disialeyifoyifo eto asa ku ntimama ku kenǝmisɛ eto eyifosa .
45013014	Bomu bifi Bonamute Yesu Kristo bekpe fe awu , lǝ bilǝkǝ nsusu bitsyiko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa bimba nnya laakle mi lǝ ɔkɔɛ ǝsuǝ .
45014001	Befo mi utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ dimǝmmuǝ tɔ ale ku kafo faa bekpe lǝ mi nti . Biemfi kediǝ betsyako wǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ele bǝ uyifo lee yanle nǝ bǝ uyifo ǝsuǝ .
45014002	Utsyuǝ eto bofokanɔ ǝtǝ wǝ kusu bǝ ofo lesa saa budi , fɛ , bǝtsyuǝ ba eto bofokanɔ mǝmmuǝ tɔ alee , didisa nǝ bánkpesinǝ ni nǝ hã beedi .
45014003	Nya yanle bǝ utidi wǝ leedi lesa saa mfoo , nyǝ wǝ fe nwǝ dimǝnyǝ utǝ . Nya nko ini yanle bǝ nwǝ leekisi didisa ditsyuǝ tsya kpo nwǝ leedi lesa saa eto ǝnǝmi kasɔ . Itsyise Onanto áfo wuntsya lǝ nkpǝ .
45014004	Owoe feni bǝ lǝ akponko utidi bamba eto uyifoyifo lekpo ? Wǝ kosate eto Onamute eto ǝnǝmi eebe lǝ nwǝ mǝ ńyǝ kekleke utǝ wǝ lee , lee unńyǝ . Nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ tsya ebuńyǝ kekleke , itsyise Bonamute ebofo butǝ nkǝ uńyǝ kekleke utǝ wǝ .
45014005	Utidi utsyuǝ eebu nkǝ diyi ditsyuǝ afé leso abamba . Nya utsyuǝ tsya ǝǝnyǝ eyi nnya kenke nkǝ iyifo ani . Ele be utsyuǝ saa nyǝ nkǝ lesa nɛ weeyifo alɛkɛ .
45014006	Utsyuǝ saa ke leefi dibu kǝtǝ diyi dutsyuǝǝ , woeyifo nko kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu . Nya utidi utsyuǝ wǝ ke leedi didisa ditsyuǝ tsya , woedi ni kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu , itsyise woasɔ Onanto ani lǝ didisa nǝmǝ eto disi . Nya utidi wǝ lɛnni nkǝ woembudi lesa ditsyuǝ eto okle tsyaa , woeyifo nko kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu . Nya woasɔ Onanto ani .
45014007	Bo kuutsyuǝ saa ensi nkpǝ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ hã . Nya nko ke ini bǝ bo kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝnkpǝ kǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
45014008	Lǝ busi nkpǝǝ , busi mu itǝ Bonamute . Nya lǝ bukpǝ tsyaa , bukpǝ itǝ Bonamute . Nyaso lǝ busi o-o nye bukpǝ o-o , buyifo Bonamute eto bale .
45014009	Nyamfo eso sitintii , Kristo ǝkpǝ , nya usi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ bǝ lǝ ofiani Onamute utǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ku bǝkpǝnsiǝ kenke .
45014010	Beso ele bǝ lo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ dikpi ? Nyee , beso fǝǝnyǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fǝ wǝ mamflɔ ? Bomblɛ ebunyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ okponkobo lekpo .
45014011	Itsyise báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔninsa Eto Kukue Kɛnkɛ bǝ , “ Bonamute átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ lefe nǝ minsi nkpǝ mfoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kekleke minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ebose akonki utǝ mɛ . Nya utidi saa ebofo ɔnɔ nkǝ mɔ mi Onanto . ’ ”
45014012	Nyaso utsyuǝ saa lǝ bo nti ebulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
45014013	Lǝ nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔyɛ bo bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɛyi bǝ bamflɔ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ bose lesatsyuǝ uyi bǝ boembuyifo kulesa nǝ luuti kuutsyuǝ saa kusu lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ yembunǝ kuutsyuǝ ekpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ .
45014014	Se minsi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute Yesu esoo , nyi sitinti lǝ mɔ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ miǝ didisa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ laabiasǝ kuutsyuǝ . Fɛ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝnyǝ lesatsyuǝ fe lesa nǝ laabiasǝ wǝ , lesa nǝ ǝmǝ ebobiasǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
45014015	Lǝ eedi lesatsyuǝ nnya fenyi fǝ nnyakpe fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bulǝǝ , yenyifo lelabi fanlɛ bulǝkǝ kate wǝ . Mǝntǝ lǝ lesa nǝ feedi lǝ lebiasǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto bofokanɔ , itsyise Kristo ǝkpǝ lǝ wǝ disi tsya .
45014016	Nya biǝntǝ lǝ betidi bamba lǝ bakpe lesa nǝ mi nyi biǝ diyifo lesa sɛɛ , kɔfiɔ .
45014017	Itsyise lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ katoo , budi ku bunǝ manle kulesa . Bomu nnya ǝsuǝ inkpesǝ ni kasɛyifoyifo , diyuǝ ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝǝtǝ .
45014018	Itsyise nwǝ leesumu Kristo lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ Onanto laala nya betidi tsya lǝǝtǝ dibu nɛ .
45014019	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bokpe nkɛale saa boofo lǝ buyifo lesa nǝ laaboko betidi diyuǝ lǝ itǝ betidi lǝ babé disi lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
45014020	Bianyɛ lǝ didisa eso bebiasǝ Onanto eto keyifo . Edisa saa eyifo kɛnkɛ , fɛɛ yanlɛkɛ bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ didisa nǝ utidi luudi eso yuutǝ utsyuǝ dufǝ lǝ kabua ǝsuǝ .
45014021	Lesa sɛɛ ete ini bǝnkǝ , yɛ sinǝ nye nte nye lesa nǝ luunǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lekpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ budi nye bunǝ .
45014022	Nyaso tǝ lǝ lesa nǝ fafo fanɔ lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɛkɛ lǝ fǝ ku Onanto eto nti ete . Disuǝyuǝ aakɛ utidi lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi aanlo wǝ dikpi lǝ lesa nǝ úyifo alɛkɛ itǝ wǝ .
45014023	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ edi lesa nǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi dimǝntǝ wǝ kusuu , Onanto aalo wǝ dikpi lǝ udi ni , itsyise weentsyue lesa nǝ ófo ɔ́nɔ koto . Nya lesa saa nǝ béyifo dímanyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , eyifo lebua .
45015001	Bomba eto bofokanɔ díkǝmuǝ alee , ele bǝ bɔwunsǝko mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝtɔ ale bǝńyǝ . Nya yanle bǝ búyifo nya lɛlɛkɛ itǝ bo ǝsuǝ ete .
45015002	Lǝ nyaso ele bǝ bo nti eto utsyuǝ saa yifo lesa nǝ lɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nya luutǝ bǝ obe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
45015003	Itsyise Kristo kulaa tsyaa , inni lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úyifo . Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , Kristo átɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Aka nnya betidi laaka fǝǝ , ǝbǝ ékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
45015004	Nya asa nnya kenke báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni nnya bǝtsyǝ bǝ lǝ bokase asa lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bokpe lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ tsyaa , utsyuǝ saa lǝ uńyǝ kekleke ɛyɛ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto bɔwunsǝko bo nkpe itǝ bo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bunyǝ kusubebe .
45015005	Onanto wǝ laawunsǝko bo bǝ lǝ bofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi nyǝnyǝ saa ǝsuǝ , nya woakpe bo nkɛalee , lǝ utǝ lɔniyifoyifo lǝ lɛkɛ mi lǝ nti lǝ Kristo Yesu eto kama butǝnko ǝsuǝ .
45015006	Nya lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bufi ɔkɔɛ ɔni bebesǝ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto kato .
45015007	Lǝ nnya esoo , bisensǝ mi ani lǝ befo bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Kristo dísensǝ ani ófo mi . Biyifo nyamfo lǝ betidi lǝ batɛsǝ Onanto .
45015008	Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ Kristo ǝbǝ ófiani Yudafɔ eto usumunyǝ bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi Yudafɔ eto bana eto bana útsyǝ ote nkǝ ditiki nǝmfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ nya bǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
45015009	Nya bǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya lǝ batɛsǝ Onanto lǝ wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ eso . Báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔɔtɛsǝ fǝ lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto nti . Nya muusǝ ǝsǝ mfi ntɛsǝ fǝ diye . ”
45015010	Nya besi bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Mimba lenni Yudafɔ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku Onanto eto kusǝ . ”
45015011	Besi bátɛyi tsya bǝ , “ Mimba lenni Yudafɔ kenke bɛtɛsǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ . Nya mi ese ese eto betidi kenke bɛtɛsǝ wǝ . ”
45015012	Yesaya tsya esi ɔ́wɔni ɔlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Yese eto kafo eto ubi ebuke ɔbɔ . Nya wǝ ni utidi wǝ lootaka udi seka lǝ ese ese eto betidi ba kenke lenni Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya buufi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
45015013	Nlɛ lekpakpa miǝ Onanto wǝ ni bo kusubebe tǝ lǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ diyi mi ǝsuǝ kenke , nya lǝ binyǝ diyuǝ lǝ kase bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ , lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale lǝ itǝ bǝ mi kusubebe lǝ kobe kokpe mi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
45015014	Mɔ bayimi , mɔ kosate mfo nnɔ sitinti miǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo aba ekpo mi lǝ ǝsuǝ kenke . Nya biyi asa nnya kenke itǝ bǝ biofo mi bǝtsyuǝ asa bote lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
45015015	Mfí mɔ utu ntǝkǝ sitinti lǝ ni nya minwɔni asa kpǝ lǝ kukue komfo fe kaklomasǝ itǝ mi lǝ asa nyamfo ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ útǝ mɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
45015016	Itsyise úyifo mɛ nkǝ ntsyi nwuninsǝ nyifo Kristo eto uyifoyifo ntǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya lǝ nyifo kesumu eto keyifo ka ni bǝnkǝ mbe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ bǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝ mboko Onanto fe kesumu eto asa nnya nnya luudufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ , ini Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ díyifo nnya kɛnkɛ .
45015017	Lǝ nyamfo eso moofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ lǝ lesa nǝ Yesu Kristo díyifo ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka minlɛ buyifo kǝtǝ Onanto eso .
45015018	Mǝmbofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ kedi etiki lǝ lesatsyuǝ bamba ǝsuǝ enso nnya Kristo díyifo ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ hã . Utǝ nkǝ nnǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ mboko , bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ betsyue Onanto eto ditiki koto ɛyɛ lǝ lesa nǝ míntɛyi mǝ ku nǝ mínyifo ǝsuǝ tsya .
45015019	Nya úyifo nko ɛyɛ lǝ asa nnya mínlǝkǝ mínte ku ayanisa nnya bǝnyǝ mínyifo ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝalɛ ǝsuǝ eso . Lǝ nyaso ídu lǝ Yerusalem ɛyɛ etsyilama ísu Iliriko eto lɛkpɔ mfó , mbe Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya éfia kenke .
45015020	Ídu taa kɔ kenkee , íyifo mɔ lelabi kekleke minkǝ lǝ mbé Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ nlebe bo bánnɔ tɔ Kristo eto diye . Nya inni bǝ lǝ nto ntǝkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ bamba eto lesa nǝ útsyǝ kasɔ ku boto ǝsuǝ .
45015021	Bomu bǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kafo lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko bǝ , “ Betidi ba bántɛyi mǝ itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ lefe nǝ léfee , mǝ luunyǝ bǝtsyǝ wǝ lekpo bate wǝ nɛ . Nya mba tsya dimannɔ tɔ kulesa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfee , mǝ lɔɔnɔ wǝ kasɔ nɛ . ”
45015022	Keyifo ka minlɛ buyifo mfo ǝntǝ mɛ kusu nyaso maamfo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ nɛ .
45015023	Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , se mínkalosǝ mɔ keyifo lǝ lɛkpɔ nǝmfoo , nya se minlɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ lǝ alɛ kpǝ nnya léfe bǝ lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi esoo ,
45015024	mfi nsusu miǝ lǝ mbǝ nlɛ Spania bofee , lǝ nyɛ mi ɔflɔ . Nla miǝ maayɛ mi ɔflɔ lǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ mfó busu ǝsuǝ lǝ nsiǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ búnyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ eto kama bólosǝ .
45015025	Tsyafɛ mɔmɔɔ , ntɔ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ nsu nwunsǝko Onanto eto betidi ba nkpe mfó .
45015026	Itsyise iyifo bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Makedonia ku Akaia eto lelabi faa bǝ baako atabi ǝtsyuǝ lǝ befi batsyese bakombo ba nkpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
45015027	Iyifo mǝ lelabi kafo faa bǝ beyifo nko . Nya lǝ sitintii , beyifo bayodi lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ ! Itsyise lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ ǝnyǝ kedikɔ ku Yudafɔ eto lɛwɔnɔ eto asa sɛ ǝsuǝǝ , eyi fǝnkǝ ele bǝ mǝ tsya wunsǝko Yudafɔ ku mǝ asa nnya banlɛ bunyǝ ketsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
45015028	Nyaso lǝ nyifo keyifo kamfo nlosǝ nya bafo asa nnya bǝnyǝ basɔ leboo , muusu Spania nya mɔɔyɛ mi ɔflɔ mfó lǝ mfe ntɔ .
45015029	Nyi miǝ lefe nǝ muubǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , nyɛnko Kristo eto atsyɔkpokpo kenke nlɛ mi boboko .
45015030	Mɔ bayimi , nlǝ mi lekpakpa tinti lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto lelabi ǝsuǝ miǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ boto ola kekleke butǝ Onanto lǝ mɔ disi .
45015031	Beto ola bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko Yudea eto betidi ba ni mankokafɔ eto ani nya lǝ mɔ keyifo lǝ Yerusalem mfó lǝ kakɛ Onanto eto betidi mfó ɔkɔɛ bamǝ .
45015032	Nya lǝ Onanto atɔnɔɔ , muubǝ ndufǝ mi nti ku disuǝyuǝ , bǝ lǝ bomblɛ lǝ bola bɔwɔnɔ busiǝ .
45015033	Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝǝ , lǝ usiǝko mimblɛ kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
45016001	Nla miǝ mǝǝlǝkǝ bo ɔyimisio Foebe nte mi . Uyifo ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ utǝ Kenkrea lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti .
45016002	Nya nlɛ mi lekpakpa miǝ lǝ befo wǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ lǝ kusu ko dińyǝ itǝ Onanto eto betidi ǝsuǝ . Bitǝ wǝ bɔwunsǝko saa bo wɔɔtɔ utsyiko mi ɔflɔ , itsyise ɔ́wunsǝko betidi kpǝ ku mɔ ǝmǝ tsya .
45016003	Siǝsǝ Priska ku wǝ usǝ Akwila ba bomǝ diyifo mɔ beyifoyifotsyuǝ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
45016004	Bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝńyǝ bǝ boofo bukpǝ lǝ mɔ disi kulaa tsya . Nya inni mɔ mate ete nlɛ mǝ ani bɔsɔ , bomu ku betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa bamba ǝtsyuǝ kenke tsya .
45016005	Lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba laatsya lǝ mǝ diyo mfó tsya . Siǝsǝ mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala Epaineto wǝ ni ututɛ wǝ lɛtsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ ófo Kristo lǝ Asia eto kasɔ mfó .
45016006	Nya lǝ ǝsiese Maria wǝ díyifo keyifo kekleke útǝ mi ditsyukpa nǝmfó .
45016007	Siǝsǝ Androniko ku Yunia ba ni mɔ kusǝ eto betidi ba ni bonko mǝ bákpe lǝ aba eto diyo mfó . Betidi yi mǝ tinti fe mba baatsyese nkpe lǝ batɔnkpe nti . Nya bɔ́tɔ mɛ lǝ Kristo bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ .
45016008	Siǝsǝ Amplia wǝ maala tinti lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
45016009	Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Urbana wǝ ni bo uyifotsyuǝ ku ɔyɛtsyuǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lala Staki .
45016010	Siǝsǝ Apele wǝ bóto bóbe nya búnyǝ boǝ uńyǝ itǝ Kristo . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Aristobulo eto diyo eto betidi kenke ǝtǝ mǝ .
45016011	Siǝsǝ Herodion mɔ otokponyǝ ǝtǝ mɛ . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Narkiso eto diyo eto betidi ba dífi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Kristo .
45016012	Siǝsǝ besio ba ni Trifaena ku Trifosa ba diyifo Bonamute eto keyifo . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lala Persi wǝ ni usio ɔni wǝ tsya díyifo keyifo tinti utǝ Bonamute .
45016013	Siǝsǝ Rufo wǝ Bonamute dílǝkǝ fe wǝ ole ku wǝ ambe wǝ tsya lɛlɛ mɛ fe mɔ ambe ke .
45016014	Siǝsǝ Asinkrito , Flegon , Herme , Patroba , Herma ku mǝ bayimi bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
45016015	Siǝsǝ Filologo , Yulia , Nereo ku wǝ ɔyimisio , ku Olimpa ku Onanto eto betidi kenke ba nkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
45016016	Bisiǝsǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bɛkɔbe bǝtsyuǝ bɛlɛ lǝ Kristo eto kusu ǝsuǝ . Bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ eto etsyukpa kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o .
45016017	Mɔ bayimi , nlɛ mi kɔlɛ bɔlɛ kekleke minkǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ betidi ba lela bǝ beesensǝ mi nti . Kǝnyǝ lǝ asa nnya bóte mi ǝsuǝ kefi keti mi kusu . Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
45016018	Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto kaklee , beenyifo Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto keyifo . Bomu mǝ kosatee , mǝ alasa nnya beeyifo nɛ . Nya bakpe kɛnyɛ mlimlimli lǝ mǝ etikididi nnya baawɛ betidi ketitlisǝ asa kakpe mba lanlɛ kulesa bote .
45016019	Utidi saa ánɔ kase bietsyue Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ koto , lǝ nyaso mǝǝnyǝ disuǝnyǝ tinti lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lesa nǝ mimbɛbɛ mintsyiko mi ɔflɔ ni bǝ binyǝ lesa sɛɛ bitsyǝ lekpo . Nya lǝ befiani betidi ba lanla asa bua buyifo .
45016020	Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ , ebusǝnsǝ oba Obonsam kenke okpo , nya wuutǝ nkǝ bitǝkǝ wǝ kato lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
45016021	Timoteo wǝ ni mɔ uyifotsyuǝ nkǝ wǝǝsiǝsǝ mi . Nko ke ini Lukio tsya ku Yason ku Sosipatro ba bomǝ ni kusǝ kɔni eto betidi bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi .
45016022	Mɔ Tertio wǝ lɛwɔni kukue komfo ǝsiǝsǝ mi lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ .
45016023	Gaio wǝ lefo mɛ kafo faa ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laakpe disi mfo kenke bǝ bǝsiǝsǝ mi . Nya Erasto wǝ ni umǝ ǝmfo eto nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ mǝ atabi ku bo ɔyimisani Kwarto bǝ bǝsiǝsǝ mi .
45016024	Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
45016025	Nya mɔmɔɔ , bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛsǝ Onanto , wǝ loofó mi nkɛale bokpe nkǝ lǝ bińyǝ kekleke fe kase minlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ minlɛ bulǝkǝ kate itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo aka asa nnya bakula nya Onanto dílǝkǝ óte nya lɛkula bo alɛ kpǝ nnya léfe ǝsuǝ .
45016026	Fɛ , mɔmɔɔ , bǝlǝkǝ asa bate bǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke lǝ banɔ kasɔ fe kase wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ . Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa eto lelabi ni bǝnkǝ , ele bǝ babe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsya itǝ kawunsiǝ ka kenke lǝ bafo wǝ banɔ lǝ betsyue wǝ ditiki koto .
45016027	Ele bǝ bɔtɛsǝ Onanto wǝ hã ni obesibe idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ lefe saa ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Ibǝ itǝ .
46001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ mimfiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpee , mɔ ku bo ɔyimisani Sostene nlɛ mi kukue komfo bɔwɔni nɛ .
46001002	Bɔ́wɔni kukue komfo bɔlɛ Korintofɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bafiani wǝ betidi kɛnkɛ . Fe kase úyifo betidi ba kenke tsya lefo Bonamute Yesu Kristo banɔ . Wǝ ni bonko mǝmblɛ eto Onamute .
46001003	Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ ditǝkǝko mi .
46001004	Maasɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi lǝ wǝ lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ mi ɔyɛnko lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ eso .
46001005	Ídu lǝ lefe nǝ bíyifo lɔni ku Kristo , biobe lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ titlu lǝ etikididi ka ku kobe tete ǝsuǝ .
46001006	Yesu Kristo eto ditiki nǝmfo afo disiǝ lǝ miinti kukɔnɔ .
46001007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , lǝ lefe nǝ biinyǝ binsǝke Boanto Onanto bǝ utǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo kusu lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ otee , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa saa eyi mi ǝsuǝ .
46001008	Nya woose mi lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ nkǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝbǝ nkǝ woakponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bembolo mi dikpi .
46001009	Onanto wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ biyifo lɔni ku wǝ ubi Bonamute Yesu Kristo , wǝ ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ bioka bese nɛ .
46001010	Nyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale nya utǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kekleke fe mɔ bayimi bafokanɔfɔ miǝ lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bɛnɔ bǝtsyuǝ kasɔ itǝ bǝ kǝsǝnsǝ embɔkɛ mi lenti . Nya lǝ mi kɛnyɛ lǝ keyifo kani lǝ asa nnya biebu disi ketsyiko ku nsusu bo ǝsuǝ bese uyi .
46001011	Itsyise bayimi , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Klo eto diyo átɛyi mɛ bǝ kǝdiǝ kpe mi lenti mfó .
46001012	Lesa nǝ minlɛ ni bǝ utsyuǝ saa ku lesa nǝ ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi . Bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , “ Paulo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛ Apolo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Petro eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kristo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ”
46001013	Mɔɔtɔ mi miǝ nyalɛ boofo Kristo boba kakpe lǝ akpa akpa ? Nye Paulo ni nwǝ díkpǝ lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ lǝ mi disi ? Nye bǝflǝsǝ utsyuǝ ku ntu lǝ Paulo eto diye ǝsuǝ ? Owo lo !
46001014	Maasɔ Onanto ani bǝ ményifo kutsyuǝ saa ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ mi nti enso Krispo ku Gaio mate hã .
46001015	Nyaso kutsyuǝ saa , embofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ mɔ diye kpe lǝ mba diflǝsǝ wǝ ntu nti .
46001016	Mookloma miǝ ńyifo Stefana ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ntǝ wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi , nya mensikloma lǝ ḿflǝsǝ kuutsyuǝ bamba saa tsya ntu .
46001017	Kristo mántsyese mɛ nkǝ mbǝ nkeyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa kǝtǝ betidi . Bomu ótsyese mɛ nkǝ mbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi . Nya maanyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobetete eto kusu ǝsuǝ kabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Itsyise lǝ nyifo nkoo , nyalɛ Yesu Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eto ǝsuǝale ebuyifo ubimba .
46001018	Nyi kase betidi bamǝ eto ditsyǝbi ditǝ bǝ balɛ bukpǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Kristo eto ukpǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ eto etiki eyifo ebukisa lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ bomba Onanto lǝǝtǝ nkǝ bunyǝ bofoo , buyi boǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eyifo Onanto eto wǝ ǝsuǝale .
46001019	Lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ “ Mɔɔtsylɔsǝ babesibe eto kobetete . Nya muulǝkǝ nte miǝ bekuente eto etiki eyifo ǝsuǝale itǝ mi . ”
46001020	Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto babesibe ku bekuente ku betidi ba kpǝ nyɛ laafo etiki bunǝ kenke eyifo ebimbasa .
46001021	Onanto yi , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kobetete ǝsuǝ úyifo betidi nko , nkǝ lǝ bayɛ bɔyɛ lǝ mǝ kawunsiǝ eto kobetete ǝsuǝ bate wǝ . Nya wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ eto letsya boabe mfoo , nya woǝlǝkǝ eyifo ebukisa lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto aayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya woǝlǝkǝ betidi ba léfo bánɔ lǝ nkpǝ .
46001022	Yudafɔ aabɛbɛ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ ayanisa buyifo . Nya Grikifɔ , mǝ aala bɛ baate kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe .
46001023	Fɛ boo , Kristo wǝ básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie usuǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto letsya boabe . Nya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo laayɛ kedufǝ kelǝ Yudafɔ lǝ akɔɛsi . Nya betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya , laanɔ nya fe ebukisa .
46001024	Fɛɛ betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utǝ lǝ Yudafɔ ku Grikifɔ ntii , Kristo wǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ boabe letsya mfo , wǝ ni Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ku wǝ kobetete nɛ .
46001025	Itsyise lesa nǝ betidi lǝǝnyǝ bǝ iyifo Onanto eto ebukisaa , iyifo kobetete eso betidi eto ale . Nya Onanto eto eyifosa nya diyifo fe yɔkpɔɔ , kpe ǝsuǝale eso betidi eto ale .
46001026	Mɔ bayimi , fɛ Onanto lǝ ulǝkǝ mii , biokloma kase bítsyǝ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi ! Mi kpǝ mánte kobe nya bíankɛ ǝsuǝale saa . Nye bíambɔ bítsyi mmfo bo lɛkɛ dibu kafo saa .
46001027	Bomu Onanto étsyue úlǝkǝ betidi ba lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi leeninǝ nkǝ lǝ okpe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto babesibe kofani . Nya úlǝkǝ betidi ba dimanle kulesa lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi itǝ lǝ ufi okpe kawunsiǝ eto bǝsuǝaletidi bamfo kofani .
46001028	Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi ba dimanle kulesa lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto ǝnǝmi , nya beembu mǝ kakpe ku lesa nti nkǝ lǝ ɔyɛ lǝ mǝ usuǝ okpe betidi ba kawunsiǝ leebu bǝ mǝ ni mba nkpǝ dibu nya bankpǝ kalende kofani , se benni kulesa eso .
46001029	Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ kutsyuǝ saa embofo botaka keńyǝ kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
46001030	Onanto uni ditǝ kusu nkǝ biyifo bani ku Yesu Kristo . Nya Kristo ǝmǝ ni bo kobetete ko Onanto dífi útǝ bo . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ eso Onanto lǝǝnyǝ bo nkǝ bɔyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya bófiani Onanto eto betidi kɛnkɛ . Nya ófo kayo lǝ bo disi úlǝkǝ bo útsyiko abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
46001031	Nyamfo eso Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ laasɔ wǝ lɛkɔɛsii , ele bǝ ɔsɔ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi lǝ lesa nǝ Bonamute díyifo utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
46002001	Mɔ bayimi , lefe nǝ mímbǝ mi ɔflɔ miǝ lǝ mbé Onanto eto etiki kulakula tinti letsya nte mii , ményifo nko ku kɛnyɛ kamini nye lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe ǝsuǝ ntǝ mi .
46002002	Lefe nǝ mímbǝ mínkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ni mi etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo ete ǝsuǝ . Nya naya nsi nso kenke ni lǝ wǝ ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
46002003	Nyaso lefe nǝ mímbǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , mbǝ fe ɔsɔsɔbi . Nya sikpi dímuǝ mɛ ku ketinkǝ tsya .
46002004	Nya biunyǝ biǝ asa nnya mínte áte nko ke , yényifo fe utidi wǝ eto kɛnyɛ nkpe kobe nya únyi kobe . Bomu mɔ etiki nya mikǝdii , áte sitinti kase Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nkpe ǝsuǝale .
46002005	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , inni kawunsiǝ eto utidi eto kobetete ǝsuǝ bɛyɛ béte Kristo , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
46002006	Fɛɛ mɔ etiki nnya meedi , meedi nya kǝtǝ betide ba nyi kobe nya bekesu sɛtɔ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto asa kasɔnɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya yanka kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobetete nye bǝsuǝaletidi ba leedi seka lǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ nya banlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bonyansǝ .
46002007	Kobetete ko eto etiki minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfoo , etsyi lǝ Onanto eto kobe ko bákula betidi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto étsyue ketsyue kamfo útsyǝ kokoko nkǝ wuulǝkǝ bo fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ .
46002008	Kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bǝsuǝaletidi eto kuutsyuǝ mánte kulesa itsyi lǝ kobe komfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ nnya ete bátee , eni bánsɔ Bonamute le uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
46002009	Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnyǝ nye woannɔ tɔɔ , nya kuutsyuǝ saa mémbu tɔ disi utsyiko tsya nkǝ yuubǝ itǝ , nya tutuutu ni lesa nǝ Onanto dítsyue utsyǝ utǝ betidi ba laala wǝ nɛ . ”
46002010	Fɛɛ bo alɛɛ , Onanto dilǝkǝ wǝ asakulakula nyamfo lǝ lekple óte bo , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eedufǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ nya kaate , nya diate Onanto eto asakulakula kulaa tsya .
46002011	Fe kase utidi eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ hã nyi wǝ kemiǝ eto lesa saa itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nko ke ini bǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ hã nyi lesa saa itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nɛ .
46002012	Nya boo , inni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝtǝ beeyifo asa bua nkpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bote ǝtǝsa nnya bófo butsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , kafo faa , ni ni nnǝ nkpǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
46002013	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , inni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe eto asa nnya betidi laate bófo búfi bɔnlɛ mi etiki budi . Bomu asa nnya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ dílǝkǝ óte bo , nya ni asa nnya boǝlǝkǝ kate mba léfo Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nɛ .
46002014	Utidi saa wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo dímamfo disiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝmbofo ǝtǝsa nnya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lǝǝtǝ bofo . Nya utidi ǝmfó tsya ǝmbofo asa nyamfo kasɔ bɔnɔ , itsyise asa nyamfó eyifo wǝ ebukisa . Nyaso Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya utidi lɔɔyɛ fɛ wuunyǝ ǝtǝsa nyamfó utsyǝ lekpo kase efo koya .
46002015	Utidi wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lefo disiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ loofo lesa saa bunyǝ kǝtsyǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ wǝ alɛɛ , betidi embofo wǝ bunyǝ ketsyǝ lekpo nɛ .
46002016	Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa enyi lesa nǝ nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute eto nsusu . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya anté wǝ kulesa . ” Fɛɛ boo , Kristo eto nsusu kpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
46003001	Mɔ bayimi , mǝmbofo mi etiki budinko lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase muudinko betidi ba Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkafo dísiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu muudinko mi etiki fe betidi ba eto ǝnǝmi nsi ntǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ . Nya bisi biyifo ekpefi kɛkɛ lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
46003002	Mɔ asa nnya maate mii , eyifo nya diyuǝ imbǝ ale fe kase mintu lɛlɛkɛ itǝ bebifɔfɔ butǝ . Nya yenyifo asa nnya eto kasɔnɔnɔ nkpe ale fe kase inte itǝ utidi wǝ díkabe wǝ leedi asa nnya nkpǝ kalende seka . Nya ta mɔmɔ biambe tɔ itǝ lesa nǝ nkpǝ kalende budi .
46003003	Itsyise bisi bisi nkpǝ fe betidi ba difi mǝ nsusu bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo hã eto asa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ kenǝmisɛ si kakpe lǝ mi nti nya biǝdiǝ nniǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyamfo mate kulaa ate nkǝ bisi bisi nkpǝ itǝ kawunisiǝ kamfo eto asa .
46003004	Lǝ mi nti utsyuǝ esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , Paulo eto kama mintǝkǝ , ” nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , Apolo eto kama mintǝkǝ , ” bieyifo asa fe betidi ba kawunsiǝ kamfo eto eyifosa léfo disiǝ dinsi lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
46003005	Nya lǝ nyamfo kenke kamaa , owoe ni Apolo ? Nya owoe ni Paulo ? Onanto eto beyifoyifo ete buni . Nya bɔ́yɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ bofo bɔnɔ . Nya bo nti eto utsyuǝ saa nlɛnko keyifo ka Onanto dítǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo .
46003006	Mɔ ni dítsyiko keyifo kamǝ kasɔ fe kase beetsyi diyibibi . Nya Apolo lékpo ni ntu . Fɛɛ Onanto ni nwǝ dítǝ lébe lɛbɔ disi .
46003007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , utidi wǝ dítsyii , ku utidi wǝ lékpo ni ntuu , mǝmblɛ ményifo kulesa kinki . Nya Onanto bomu ni nwǝ díyifo , itsyise wǝ ni nwǝ dítǝ lébe lɛbɔ disi .
46003008	Bobakefǝ kubutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ utidi wǝ leetsyi kuyi ku nwǝ laakpo ko ntu nti . Onanto ni futsyǝ wǝ loofo mǝ kayo lǝ mǝ keyifo eto kɛnyɛ .
46003009	Itsyise buyifo beyifotsyuǝ lǝ keyifo kani ǝsuǝ . Nya boakɔ ani keyifo ke kǝtǝ Onanto . Nya biyifo Onanto eto ɔkuɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ bunyǝ bɔnlɛ keyifo . Nya bini diyo nǝ tsya Onanto léto .
46003010	Nya lǝ Onanto eto kǝtǝ ka útǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝtǝ mfiani fe diyo eto otonto sɛɛ . Nya mintsyǝ diyo nǝmǝ kasɔ lǝ leba ǝsuǝ . Nya utidi bamba díbǝ ɔnlɛ boto kǝtǝkǝ lǝ ni . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ dibǝ ɔnlɛ boto kǝtǝkǝ , ele bǝ ɔlɔ obe kase ɔnlɛ diyo nǝmǝ boto kayɛnko .
46003011	Itsyise Yesu Kristo ni leba nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto dífi útsyǝ diyo nǝmǝ kasɔ ele bǝ betidi be bato diyo nǝmǝ besukosǝ . Nya kuutsyuǝ bamba saa ensi embofo leba bamba bufi ketsyǝ ni kasɔ boto bio .
46003012	Bǝtsyuǝ ebufi sika sia nye siflubia nye aba nya nkpe koya , nye keyi nye sefa kato diyo nǝmǝ .
46003013	Fɛɛ lǝ diyo nǝ utsyuǝ saa léto alɛkɛ nye dianlɛkɛɛ , Kristo eto disumuyo nǝmǝ ni nnǝ luulǝkǝ lete nɛ . Itsyise lǝ disumuyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ute buufi bǝlǝkǝ utsyuǝ saa eto keyifo lǝ lekple bate . Ute ǝmfo ni nwǝ luubǝ ukedi keyifo saa obe , lǝ obe lǝ keyifo kamǝ alɛkɛ .
46003014	Lǝ utsyuǝ eto bikǝ bia úfi óto diyo nǝmǝ ǝńyǝǝ , lǝ ute áto ɔ́yɛ mfo ófee , otonto ǝmfó ebofo kayofofo .
46003015	Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ eto bikǝ bia úfi óto diyo nǝmǝ ato utee , wǝmbofo kayofofo saa . Fɛɛ wǝ kosate ebunyǝ bulǝkǝ fe nwǝ dítsyetsyi ɔ́bɔ lǝ ute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
46003016	Ele bǝ bete lǝ ekpako mi wuee biǝ mi kosate eyifo Onanto eto disumuyo . Nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
