46003017	Itsyise Onanto eto disumuyo eyifo kakɛnkɛkɔ , nya mi ni wǝ disumuyo nǝmǝ . Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ ata Onanto eto disumuyo nǝmǝ ubuu , Onanto ebɔtsylɔsǝ wuntsya .
46003018	Kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mi nti . Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti eebu wǝ ǝsuǝ fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto obesibee , ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ uyifo ubuki bomu lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝ bǝ woofiani obesibe tinti lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
46003019	Itsyise lesa nǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi leebu fe kobetetee , nyamfó eyifo ebukisa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Nyaso Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Babesibe eto asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ nya Onanto laayɛ kemuǝ mǝ lǝ kubu ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
46003020	Nya besi báwɔni bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto yi nkǝ babesibe eto nsusu bufi manle kulesa saa kon . ”
46003021	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , yanle bǝ utidi saa kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ lesa nǝ betidi loofo buyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ sitintii , lesa saa te mfó itǝ mi lɛlɛkɛsǝ .
46003022	Paulo nye Apolo nye Petro nye kawunsiǝ kamfoo , nye ukpǝ ku nkpǝǝ , mɔmɔ nye lefe nǝ luubǝǝ , asa nyamfo kenke eyifo mi ale .
46003023	Nyaa , biyifo Kristo eto bale . Nya Kristo tsya diyifo Onanto eto ole .
46004001	Utsyuǝ saa kǝǝnyǝ bo fe Kristo eto beyifoyifo ba béfi Onanto eto etiki kulakula lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , bákpe kɔni bǝ bɔlɛ nya ola .
46004002	Nya lesa nǝ lefé itǝ nwǝ laabe Boanto Onanto eto asa ǝsuǝ ni bǝ úyifo keyifo kamǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ .
46004003	Lǝ mɔ kutsyee , yǝnlǝ mɛ bǝ kuutsyuǝ kponko mɛ lekpo lǝ mɔ ditiki ǝsuǝ nye ɛyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe ǝsuǝ unyǝ nkǝ nta mbu . Maankponko mɔ ǝsuǝ lekpo kulaa tsya lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
46004004	Mɔ lɛkɔɛsi anlo mɛ dikpi saa . Fɛɛ nyamfo anlɛ bote nkǝ meenyifo kabua saa , eso mbɔbɔ mfe lǝ kabua ku lǝ mɔ etikididi kemiǝ . Itsyisee , Bonamute wǝ loofo mɛ lekpo bokponko nɛ .
46004005	Nyaso yanle bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kponko wǝ utsyuǝ lekpo isu ese lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu eto dibǝfe nǝmǝ leyo . Lǝ ubǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ lookponko utsyuǝ saa lekpo nɛ . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ luulǝkǝ asa bua kenke nnya lɛkula lǝ lekple ote nya wuulǝkǝ asa bua nya betidi nlɛ bubu tsya ote . Mfo nya Onanto lɔɔtɛsǝ utidi saa dińyǝ itǝ atɛsǝ .
46004006	Mɔ bayimi , bǝ lǝ befo asa nnya bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ɛyɛ lǝ mɔ ku Apolo ǝsuǝ kasɔ bɔnɔɔ , nwɔni nyamfo bǝ lǝ bebe bekase . Nya lǝ bekase asa nnya eto kasɔ etiki nyamfo nlɛ bulǝkǝ kate nya báwɔni bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bikeyifo asa bikayɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tlolololo . ” Lǝ nyamfo esoo , biembu betidi bǝtsyuǝ bakplǝnyǝ beso babamba .
46004007	Owoe díyifo fǝ nya fankpǝ kutǝkǝ fanso fuutsyuǝ ? Asa nnya nkpǝ fǝ kenkee , Onanto ni nwǝ dífi útǝ fǝ . Lǝ nko intee , beso faabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fenkǝ inni Onanto ni wǝ dítǝ fǝ asa nnya nte fǝ .
46004008	Lee asa nnya bela biǝ biakɛɛ , bíuńyǝ nyamblɛ kokoo ? Nye batabinyǝ bíkafiani ? Lee bíofiani baka lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bo lenni tɔ baka ? Ɛlɛkɛ ! Eni seka ele bǝnkǝ bikedi pɛfɛ bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ budi se ku mi !
46004009	Itsyise ele mɛ fenkǝ bo mba ni batɔnkpee , kesiǝkɔ ka Onanto dífi utǝ bo ni kafɛfɛkɔ . Nya buyifo fe betidi ba bálo dikpi bǝ lǝ balo mǝ lǝ mba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nya buyifo abesa nnya kawunsiǝ kenke ku Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ ńyǝ baanlɛ bobe .
46004010	Buyifo bamumu lǝ Kristo eso . Fɛɛ mi eyifo babesibe se biyifo bani ku Kristo eso ! Bo eyifo betidi ba lɛyɔkpɔ eso bumbǝ ale . Fɛɛ mii , biyifo mba nkpe ale . Buyifo betidi bimba lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ mii , bekpe dibu .
46004011	Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , boǝsiǝ kukpɛnsǝ ku utukuɛ . Nya bikǝ kpãã saa ǝmbǝ bo boalɛ . Nya betidi laablɛ bo . Nya bumbǝ kakɛkɔ saa boǝsiǝ .
46004012	Nya boeyifo keyifo kekleke kabe bo ǝsuǝ . Lǝ betidi ékudi boo , boo , boakpo mǝ atsyɔ . Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bǝǝtǝkǝko bo lǝ bate bo ohiãa , bo boakpe nkɛale .
46004013	Lǝ báka bo , boefi kafo buɛɛ eto etiki kǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ . Betidi ǝǝnyǝ bo fe kuku . Buyifo kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kuku ku ekubi ibǝ ǝsǝ mɔmɔ .
46004014	Minlɛ mi kukue komfo eto okle bɔwɔni bǝ lǝ mfi nkpe mi kofani . Bomu bǝ lǝ nlɛ mi kɔlɛ fe mɔ bebi lala seka .
46004015	Itsyise lǝ ite bǝ bekpe betidi akpi lefosi ba laalɛ mi ola kulaa tsya lǝ mi bofokanɔ eto nkpǝ bo binsi ǝsuǝǝ , bimbǝ antomǝ kpǝ . Itsyise fe kase binsi nkpǝ nya biyifo lɔni ku Kristo esoo , mɔ ni mi anto , se mɔ ni Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ boboko mi eso .
46004016	Lǝ nya esoo , nlɛ mi lekpakpa miǝ lǝ bitǝkǝko mɔ ditsyǝbi kama .
46004017	Nyamfo ǝsuǝ eso minlɛ Timoteo botsyese mi nɛ . Uyifo mɔ ubi lala wǝ leeyifo Bonamute Yesu eto keyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ . Wuubǝ oklomasǝ mi kase mǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe Kristo eto nle bo eto kusu mǝǝtǝkǝko . Nya nyamfo maate bafokanɔfɔ kenke kaka kee minsu .
46004018	Mi nti eto bǝtsyuǝ átaka bǝńyǝ abesǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kato eso mǝ bǝtsyuǝ fɛfɛ , itsyise bébu bǝnkǝ , mensi embusinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
46004019	Nya lǝ Bonamute Yesu átɔnɔɔ , muubǝ nyǝ mi lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Nya mɔ kosate muubǝnyǝ ǝsuale nnya betidi ba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nkpe , nya moobe lǝ inni etiki bimba banlɛ budii .
46004020	Itsyise Onanto eto sekadidi aanyɛ ku etiki bimba budi . Bomu yaayɛ ku ǝsuǝale .
46004021	Bela biǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ mbǝ nnǝ mi kato lee , lee mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ lelabi ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ ?
46005001	Nya mɔmɔɔ , betidi lɛ bɔtɛyi kpǝ bǝnkǝ , sɛsɔnɔdidi kpe lǝ mi nti . Nya mamfokanɔfɔ kulaa tsya anla nnya okle buyifo . Bátɛyi mɛ bǝnkǝ osani utsyuǝ ku wǝ anto eto usiǝ ákɔ okla .
46005002	Nya beso biate ǝsuǝ nko ? Keku bomu ele bǝ bikewi . Nya utidi wǝ díyifo nyamfo eto okle , ele bǝ bilǝkǝ wǝ lǝ mimba léfo bɛnɔ nti .
46005003	Ite bǝ ntsyo lǝ mi ɔflɔ nya boǝnyǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi tsyaa , nkpe lǝ mi nti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya se minkpe lǝ mi nti esoo , nlo utidi wǝ díyifo lebua nǝmfo eto okle dikpi
46005004	lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Lǝ betsya bisii , ele bǝ bete biǝ mintsya kpe mi lenti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale ebɔkɛ bo lenti .
46005005	Ele bǝ beyani utidi ǝmfo bitǝ Obonsam lǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ . Nya lǝ ukpǝ kula tsyaa , wǝ lɛwɔnɔ lǝ dinyǝ bofo lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu lookponko kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi lekpo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
46005006	Yanle bǝ bikabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato . Binyi biǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa sɛkɛ ete laatsyakasǝ ku nnamfo bo banwɔ nnya lǝǝtǝ boataka kabe kato ?
46005007	Bilǝkǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa , nnya ni lebua , bitsyiko lǝ mii nti . Nya biyifo nnamfo fɔfɔ bo bánwɔ , bo ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa lǝmbǝ , fe kase minyi miǝ bite seka sitinti . Itsyise bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi eboyo . Nya mɔmɔɔ , boolo bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Lesambi nǝ ni Kristo .
46005008	Nyaso , biǝntǝ lǝ budi bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi ku abolo nnya ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa koko nkpe , nnya nsusu bua ku asa bua boeyifo . Bomu bitǝ lǝ budi diyi nǝmfo ku abolo wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa lǝmbǝ nya lǝ bote boǝ boenyifo ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi . Bomu lǝ bɔyɛ ku Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ .
46005009	Nya lǝ kukue ko míwɔni mintǝ mi kafoo , ńtɛyi mi minkǝ bianyɛ ku betidi ba ni basɔnɔdi .
46005010	Mɔmɔɔ , inni betidi ba dimamfo banɔ ete minlɛ . Betidi ba minlɛ ni basɔnɔdi nya baasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ , mba ni beyu , leeyu betidi eto atabi kedi , ku mba lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi tsya . Nya lǝ atɛyi fǝ ǝǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kenke , ete bǝ ele bǝ lǝkǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kenke ǝsuǝ !
46005011	Bomu lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi ni bǝ nwǝ laakpo wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ ɔyimi wǝ díkafo ɔnɔ fɛ weedi sɛsɔnɔ nye onkpǝ kenǝmisɛ nye lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi nye laakpo betidi aye bua nye leekpǝ ntǝ nye leeyu , lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ . Nyanle bǝ fǝ ku wǝ kɔ ani lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni bidi lesa kulaa tsya .
46005012	Iyifo lesa nǝ lekpa bǝ , inni mɔ keyifo keni bǝ nkpo betidi ba lenni bafokanɔfɔ eto itiki eto lekpo . Bomu Onanto ni nwǝ lookpo mǝ etiki eto lekpo . Fɛɛ ele bǝ bokponko bafokanɔfɔ mǝ nti eto lekpo fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bela utidi bua bilǝkǝ lǝ mi katsyakɔ nti . ”
46005013	
46006001	Lǝ etiki edufǝ lǝ ofokanɔnyǝ ku wǝ utsyuǝ eto ntii , yanle bǝ ufi etiki nyamǝ usuko manfokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ nkǝ bedufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ wǝ . Bomu mi nti eto ɔni , wǝ ele bǝ udi etiki nyamǝ nɛ .
46006002	Biyi biǝ Onanto eto betidi ni mba lookponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo . Nya lǝ biyi biǝ mi ele bǝ bekponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpoo , ele bǝ befo budufǝ lǝ etiki wɛlɛwɛlɛ esuǝ bɛlɔ bitsyǝ .
46006003	Biyi wǝǝ biǝ bo bafokanɔfɔ bo ni mba lookponko kato eto batɔkpe lekpo . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ kawunsiǝ mfo eto etiki wɛlɛwɛlɛ , so bo ani ku bɔlɛ kabe .
46006004	Nyaso lǝ etiki nyamfo eto okle edufǝ mi lentii , ele bǝ bilǝkǝ betidi ba biembu kakpe lǝ kulesa nti kulaa tsya biǝ bedufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , enso bǝ bifi etiki nyamǝ bisuko lekple kalebe bamba .
46006005	Nlɛ mi etiki nyamfo bɔtɛyi bǝ lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mi . Nya bɔtɛyi bɛnlɛ biǝ obesibe saa ǝmbǝ mi mba lefo bɛnɔ nti wǝ loofo etiki nyamfo bɔlɔ ketsyǝ .
46006006	Fɛɛ lǝ ofokanɔnyǝ aakpa wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ usuko betidi bamba ba ni mamfokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ bedi mǝ etiki bǝtǝ mǝǝ , nyamfo alɛkɛɛ ?
46006007	Nsusu bo nkpǝ mi fɛ biefi mi ǝsuǝ kesuko lekpokakpokɔ aate nkǝ mi bofokanɔ mamflɔ kon . Fe nwǝ léfo ɔnɔ , lǝ utidi utsyuǝ áta fǝ ubu nya fǝmuǝ utu falɛ famankpe wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , yenyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ ensoo ? Nko ini bǝ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ efi fǝ lesatsyuǝ , mankpe utidi ǝmfo kɛnyɛ .
46006008	Fɛɛ mi kosate bomu ni bǝtsyǝ léta bibu . Nya bieyu mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto bike kulaa tsya .
46006009	Nya biyi sitinti biǝ betidi ba leeyifo asa bua embudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Bianwɛ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ sibuki ǝsuǝ ! Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo akuɛnsa , nye mba lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi nye leedi sɛsɔnɔ , nye basani ba laalabe ko mǝ basanitsyuǝ , nye mba leeyu , nye mba laasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ , nye mba lǝǝnǝ nte bo nkpǝ ale kǝkpǝ , nye baabiasǝ betidi eto aye , nye mba leefi betidi eto atabi lǝ ǝsuǝale kedi , mǝ nti eto kuutsyuǝ saa embudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
46006010	
46006011	Asa nyamfo mi bǝtsyuǝ díkeyifo kɔ . Fɛɛ Bonamute Yesu ébuflǝ mi asa bua úwui lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nya úyifo mi kɛnkɛ útǝ Onanto . Nya úsinkli ɔ́lɛkɛsǝ mi ku Onanto eto nti ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ku Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
46006012	Mi nti eto utsyuǝ ebɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nkpǝ kusu meeyifo lesa saa . ” Sitinti ini . Fɛɛ inni lesa saa lɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ . Moofo bɔtɛyi minkǝ , “ Nkpǝ kusu meeyifo lesa saa . ” Fɛɛ yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ lesa saa di mɛ utu .
46006013	Utidi bamba tsya ebofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Buyifo béyifo didisa itǝ kafo , nya kafo tsya nkpǝ itǝ didisa . ” Sitinti ini , fɛɛ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ nyamfo kenke eto lefe lǝ dibǝ lefe . Nya inni bǝ lǝ bufi bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bukeyifo akɔɛnsa eto asa eso ete . Bomu bǝ lǝ bufi nnya bukeyifo Boanto Onanto eto keyifo . Nya wuutǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ se .
46006014	Fe kase Onanto létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nko ke wootakasǝ bo tsya uńyǝnsǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nɛ .
46006015	Biyi biǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eyifo Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sitsyuǝ . Nya yanlɛkɛ bǝ efi Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sitsyuǝ akɔ ku utidi wǝ difi sɛsɔnɔdi uyifo wǝ keyifo .
46006016	Biyi tsya biǝ lǝ utidi éfi wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔkɔ ku nwǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi ǝsuǝ , uyifo ɔni ku wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ . Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ átɛyi ékpa wuee nkǝ , “ Mǝ inuǝ bamǝ ebuyifo bani lǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
46006017	Fɛɛ utidi wǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ omanklasǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝǝ , uyifo ɔni ku wǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
46006018	Biensiyifo abua ɛyɛ lǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi ǝsuǝ . Lebua bamba saa eto okle nǝ utidi díyifo , diammankla lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ utidi saa wǝ leedi sɛsɔnɔɔ , weeyifo lebua keńyǝ lǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ .
46006019	Biyi wuee biǝ , mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eyifo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nkpe lǝ mi eto kǝsiǝkɔ nya ini Onanto dífi wǝ útǝ mi . Inni mi mbǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
46006020	Itsyise Onanto áfo kayo kpǝ lǝ mi disi . Nyaso bifi mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bikeyifo asa nnya laakpe Onanto dibu .
46007001	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kukue ko bɛwɔni bítǝ mɛ eto etiki ǝsuǝǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ osani utsyuǝ si nkpǝ nya waanla nkǝ weefi kusiǝ , bete biǝ utsyue nnya kukɔnɔ .
46007002	Fɛɛ se sɛsɔnɔdidi lɛbɔ esoo , ele bǝ osani saa fi kusiǝ . Nya usio saa tsya lǝ usiǝ kusǝ .
46007003	Yanle bǝ osani ni nkǝ wǝǝmbɔkɔ okla ku wǝ usiǝ . Nko ke yanle bǝ usio ni nkǝ wǝǝmbutsyǝ wǝ usǝ okla .
46007004	Itsyise usio saa eto ǝsuǝ eni wǝ fate eto ale . Bomu iyifo wǝ usǝ tsya eto ale . Nko ke ini bǝ osani eto ǝsuǝ tsya eni wǝ fate eto ale . Bomu wǝ usiǝ tsya eto ale ini .
46007005	Lǝ mǝ nti eto ɔni aala nkǝ weesu wǝ utsyuǝ ɔflɔɔ , ele bǝ wǝ unuǝfǝ tɔnɔ utǝ wǝ enso bǝǝ , lǝ iyifo mǝ inuǝ bamǝ eto ketsyue ketsyuǝ ɛtɔnsǝ bǝ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti , fe itǝ olatoto seka esoo , fɛ yembutǝ kusu nɛ . Nya lǝ nnya kamaa , ele bǝ besinkli bǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe kase bísiǝ kɔ . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , biembudufǝ lǝ Obonsam eto bulǝ saa ǝsuǝ .
46007006	Nyamfo menyifo kɔfi minlɛ mi butǝ . Bomu nsusu butsyuǝ ete minlɛ mi butǝ .
46007007	Lǝ sitintii , nta nla miǝ utsyuǝ saa siǝ fe kase minsi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ku wǝ ditǝsa nǝ Onanto dítǝ wǝ . Utidi saa ku wǝ lele nǝ bǝtǝ wǝ .
46007008	Mɔmɔɔ , itǝ mba lemfi tɔ bǝsiǝ nye lensi tɔ bǝsǝ ku bakɔbǝsiǝ nye bakɔsee , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bisiǝ kusiǝ memfimemfi , kusǝ mǝnsiǝmǝnsiǝ fe kase minsii , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mi eso .
46007009	Fɛɛ lǝ biǝmbofo mi ǝsuǝ ola bɔlɛ kǝsiǝ lǝ asa nnya lookpe mi bulǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , biofo bǝsiǝ bufi nye besǝ busiǝ . Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ utsyu ǝmǝ eso bǝ okayɛ katsyilama kedi sɛsɔnɔ ukafe .
46007010	Nya mi bǝsǝ ku bǝsiǝ , kɔfi ko minlɛ mi bokpe mfo eni mɔ kole . Bomu , Boanto Onanto nlɛ mi ko bokpe . Nnya ni bǝ kusiǝ manni kusǝ .
46007011	Fɛɛ lǝ ɔ́ni wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ wǝ mate siǝ nye wǝ ku wǝ usǝ sinkli bǝsiǝ . Nya yanle bǝ osani tsya ni wǝ usiǝ .
46007012	Nya mi bafɛfɛɛ , nlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi , fɛɛ inni Bonamute eto kɔfi . Lǝ mi mba lefo bɛnɔ fi kusia ko dímamfo ɔnɔ nya usio ǝmǝ lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ bǝǝsiǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ manni wǝ .
46007013	Nko ke lǝ usio wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ utsyuǝ si kusǝ ko dímamfo ɔ́nɔ nya osani ǝmǝ lɛnɔ kasɔ nkǝ bǝǝsiǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝ , yanle bǝ usio ǝmǝ du lǝ osani ǝmǝ eto diyo .
46007014	Itsyise osani wǝ dímamfo ɔ́nɔ ǝmǝǝ , Onanto ebuyifo wǝ kɛnkɛ ɛyɛ lǝ usio wǝ léfo ɔnɔ ǝmǝ eso . Nya nko ke ini bǝ Onanto ebuyifo usio wǝ dímamfo ɔ́nɔ tsya kɛnkɛ lǝ wǝ usǝ wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ eso . Lenni nkoo , mǝ bebi embuyifo kɛnkɛ . Fɛɛ fe kase intee , Onanto eeyifo bebi bamǝ kɛnkɛ .
46007015	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi wǝ ni mamfokanɔnyǝ aala nkǝ wanyani nwǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝǝ , kusu kpe itǝ nko faa . Nya lǝ kusu komfo eto oklee ǝsuǝ , usio nye osani wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝǝ , kpe kusu weeyifo lesa nǝ kee ola . Onanto ákpadi bo nkǝ bubǝ busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
46007016	Nyaso fǝ usio wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝ , lǝ ǝsiǝ ku fǝ usǝ nkoo , etsyuǝ nǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ etsyiko lǝ lebua eto nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nko ke ini bǝ lǝ fǝ ofokanɔsani tsya ku fǝ usiǝ ǝsiǝ nkoo , etsyuǝ nǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ etsyiko lǝ lebua eto nkpǝ ǝsuǝ .
46007017	Lesa nǝ maate lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke nti , ni bǝnkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ usu sɛtɔ lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu ko Bonamute dítǝ wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kase unsi lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto lékpadi wǝ ǝsuǝ .
46007018	Lǝ ála lelo fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝǝ , nyalɛ sukosɛ nko . Nya lǝ ámanla tɔ lelo fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝ , mantɛyi tsya fǝ esi esu ala lelo .
46007019	Itsyise lǝ ála lelo nye ámanla leloo , nyamfo menyifo kulesa . Bomu nnya lefe ni kase ele bǝ boola lesa nǝ Onanto léte bo nkǝ buyifo , nnya ni lesa nǝ lefe nɛ .
46007020	Nyaso siǝ nkpǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi nǝ ǝsuǝ fakɛ fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝ .
46007021	Lǝ utidi bamba eto opanyǝ feni fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝǝ , nyamfo mǝnlǝ fǝ kon . Fɛɛ lǝ ayɛ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ fɔɔyɛ ayɛ utidi bamba eto opanyǝ budi nya lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , yɛ lǝ kusu komǝ ǝsuǝ .
46007022	Lǝ ndomunyǝ feni fɛ Bonamute lékpadi fǝǝ , eyifo Bonamute eto nwǝ nsi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyifo nwǝ nsi lǝ fǝ esuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ Bonamute lékpadi fǝǝ , afiani Bonamute ndomunyǝ .
46007023	Onanto áfo nya kayo kpǝ lǝ fǝ disi . Nyaso mensiyifo fǝ ǝsuǝ ndomunyǝ ǝtǝ utidi bamba saa .
46007024	Mɔ bayimi , mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa yifo lɔni ku Onanto lǝ utidi wǝ fedi ǝsuǝ fɛ bákpadi fǝ .
46007025	Mɔmɔɔ , itsyi lǝ nnya bɛtɔ itsyi lǝ mba lensitɔ bǝsǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mámfo kɔfi saa itsyi lǝ Bonamute ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ se Bonamute dínyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ nya únyǝ mɛ nwǝ dińyǝ utǝ esoo , nnyǝ mɔ nsusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
46007026	Lǝ utidi ebu obe nya unyǝ kase asa nlɛ ale bɔkɛ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ miǝ ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bǝ osani siǝ nko lǝ ɔyɛ kusiǝ bufi .
46007027	Nya lǝ éfi kusiǝǝ , mantɛyi fǝ aani wǝ . Nya lǝ émemfi tɔ kusiǝ , mantɛyi fǝ eesu abɛbɛ usio lǝ efi .
46007028	Fɛɛ lǝ ébufi kusiǝ , émenyifo kabua . Nya lǝ usio wǝ dímǝnsiǝ tɔ kusǝ esu usiǝ kusǝǝ , wényifo kabua saa . Fɛɛ nla minkǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ mi ntsyiko lǝ bulǝ bo leetu usǝ ku usiǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo ǝsuǝ .
46007029	Mɔ bayimi , lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi ni bǝnkǝ , lefe nǝ díbu mensi kulǝ . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , ele bǝ mimba mfi bǝsiǝ , siǝ nkpǝ fe bimfi bǝsiǝ .
46007030	Nya betidi ba bulǝ nlɛ butuu , beyifo fe bulǝ saa anlɛ mǝ butu . Nya mba lǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ , beyifo fe banlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ . Nya betidi ba laaya asaa , beyifo fe asa nnya baaya kenke eni mǝ kosate eto ale .
46007031	Nya mba difi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ bɔbɛbɛ betsyi lǝ disii , bemfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa nyamfó ǝsuǝ . Itsyise fe kase boǝnyǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ mɔmɔɔ , inni nko biubǝ bitsyǝ lǝ lefe kliminti nǝ luubǝ kama .
46007032	Nla miǝ bilǝkǝ mi nsusu bitsyiko lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise osani wǝ lemfi kusiǝǝ , eefi wǝ nsusu kǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ nya woakpe nkɛale keyifo lesa nǝ lɔɔkɛ Bonamute ɔkɔɛ .
46007033	Fɛɛ osani wǝ mfi kusiǝǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise woala nkǝ woeyifo asa nnya lɔɔkɛ wǝ usiǝ ɔkɔɛ .
46007034	Nko ini nɛ , bǝ okpe lǝ asakpa ǝnuǝ eto nti , lekpa nǝmfo ku nǝnse , ditsyuǝ saa lɛ wǝ bunǝ . Nya usio wǝ lensi kusǝ nye kebitɛ , eefi wǝ lefe kǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise woala nkǝ woefi wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke ku lɛwɔnɔ utǝ wǝ . Nya usio wǝ nsi kusǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ , itsyise woala nkǝ woeyifo asa nnya lɔɔkɛ wǝ usǝ ɔkɔɛ .
46007035	Nla miǝ lǝ nwunsǝko mi . Nyamfo eso meedi mi etiki lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Inni kɔfi saa mimfi minlɛ mi bokpe . Bomu nla miǝ lǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya biofo mi ǝsuǝ kenke bufi kǝtǝ lǝ Bonamute hã kenke ku mi ketu kenke .
46007036	Nya lǝ osani átɔ usio disi nkǝ weefii , nya únyǝ nkǝ bembofo busiǝ kpo eyo lefe nǝ beebuu , boofo bǝtsyuǝ bokpa . Nyamfo menyifo lebua .
46007037	Fɛ osani wǝ difi nsusu kekleke nkǝ weembufi tɔ usio ǝmǝ fɛ woofo busiǝ sɛkɛ , woofo ko bɔyɛ bokpa etɔ . Osani ǝmfo tsya éyifo ɛlɛkɛ .
46007038	Nyaso , osani wǝ dífi kusiǝǝ , eyifo ɛlɛkɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ǝmǝ dímemfi kusiǝ mfó . Wǝ ale alɛkɛ eso nwǝ .
46007039	Usio wǝ díkesiǝ kusǝǝ , umbǝ kusu unsi wǝǝsiǝ kusǝ bamba lǝ lefǝ nǝ wǝ usǝ nsi nsi nkpǝ . Nya lǝ usǝ ǝmǝ ǝkpǝ , nya fɛ woofo kusǝ bamba ko woala busiǝko nɛ . Fɛɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmǝ yifo nwǝ lefo ɔnɔ .
46007040	Nya lǝ nnya ete woofo busiǝ kusǝ mǝnsiǝ , eni weebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ enso nko . Nko mǝ mɔ nsusu nlɛ mɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ , nya mfo nnɔ miǝ iyifo Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto lelabi tsya .
46008001	Nya mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ maatɛyi mi lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ didisa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi ǝsuǝ . Boatɛyi boǝ bo utsyuǝ sa yi kobe . Fɛɛ buyi tsya boǝ kobe komfo ǝǝtǝ bǝ utidi abesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya woate ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lesa nǝ laakpe betidi nkɛale ni lelabi .
46008002	Utidi saa wǝ leebu nkǝ uyi lesaa , lǝ sitinti , unyi ni fe kase ele bǝ ote .
46008003	Fɛɛ utidi wǝ laala Onantoo , Onanto yi wǝ .
46008004	Nya nyamfo ni lesa nǝ minla miǝ maatɛyi mi itsyi lǝ didisa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ ǝsuǝ . Buyi boǝ asa nnya betidi díyifo bǝtsyǝ bǝtǝ kedii , eyifo asa bimba lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Itsyise buyi sitinti boǝ Onanto ɔni hã nkpe .
46008005	Lǝ betidi lɛ etikii , baatɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝfiǝ kpe lǝ kato nye kasɔ mfo nya bǝfiǝ akpa akpa bamfo fui ku mǝ banamute kula tsya .
46008006	Tsyafɛ boo , buyi boǝ Onanto ɔni hã ete nkpe . Wǝ ni Anto wǝ dílǝkǝ asa nyamfo kenke . Nya we ni nwǝ bunsi nkpǝ butǝ . Nya Bonamute ɔni hã wǝ nkpee , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo asa nnya kenke . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya bunsi nkpǝ nɛ .
46008007	Inni utidi saa nyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Asa nnya betidi dilǝkǝ bǝtsyǝ beesumuu , iyifo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ fe sitinti ini ibǝ ese lǝ mmi , bǝ lǝ bedi lesa nǝmfo eto oklee , beebu bǝ bǝfiǝ eto lesa dini bédi . Nya mǝ nsusu bo lǝmbǝ ale laalo mǝ dikpi bǝ edisa nyamfo ǝǝtǝ baabiasǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
46008008	Inni didisa nǝ boedi nǝ loobiasǝ bonko Onanto eto nti . Nya yembobiasǝ kulesa lǝ búdi ni . Nya nko ke ini boǝmbunyǝ kulesa lǝ budi lesa kuditsyuǝ .
46008009	Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu ko benkpǝ ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bɛyɛ utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale bunǝ kakpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ .
46008010	Bu abe lǝ utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale nyǝ fǝ nwǝ nyi nyamfo ni nwǝ ńyǝ nlɛ lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi budi lǝ difiǝyo . Wuntsya ebunyǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ udi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi mfó .
46008011	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ wǝ eto disi eso Kristo díkpǝ nya wǝ bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale átsylɔ lǝ fǝ lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ fe lɛsɛsa eso .
46008012	Lǝ ibǝ nkoo , nyalɛ alɛ fǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba ni bafokanɔfɔ bota kebu . Nya ǝtǝ fǝ mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale lǝ ikelǝ mǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi kemiǝ . Nya lǝ ibǝ nkoo , éyifo lebua alɛ Kristo bota kebu .
46008013	Nyaso lǝ lesa nǝ meedi ebutǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ uyifo lebua , mensiembudi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi kulefe lǝ kase yuunǝ mɔ ɔnyimitsyuǝ ekpe lǝ lebua kǝmiǝ eso .
46009001	Bibu biǝ mimbǝ kusu bǝ nyifo lesa nǝ maala ? Nye minni ɔtɔnkpe nya mǝnnyǝ Bonamute Yesu lee ? Nya inni mi ni eyibibi nnya lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ mɔ keyifo ka minyifo mintǝ Bonamute Yesu ǝsuǝ ?
46009002	Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bǝtsyuǝ embofo mɛ fe Bonamute Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe , mi áfo mɛ nko . Nya fe kase bíyifo lɔni ku Bonamute Yesu , nyamfó mate áte bǝnkǝ mi kosate lǝ nyamfo bulǝkǝ kate wuee biǝnkǝ nyifo Bonamute Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe .
46009003	Nya lǝ betidi aala bǝ bǝǝnǝ nko mɛ eto etiki lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nyamfo muufi nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ nɛ .
46009004	Ɛyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ bǝ bǝtǝ bo didisa ku ǝnǝsa nye ntu .
46009005	Itǝ kusu bǝ bo tsya yɛnko bo bǝsiǝ fe kase batɔnkpe bamba ku Bonamute Yesu eto bayimisani ku Petro tsya leeyifo .
46009006	Lee mɔ ku Barnaba mate ete ele bǝ buyifo keyifo bobe bo ǝsuǝ ?
46009007	Omamanyǝ kuutsyuǝ enyifo keyifo kafo wǝ ǝsuǝ wǝ kayofofo . Nya ɔkuɛmfo saa , kpe kusu weedi bidikǝ bia únyǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Nya nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ bebuki kpe kusu bǝ unǝ mmintu bo beeke betsyiko lǝ bebuki bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
46009008	Minlɛ asa nyamfo bɔtɛyi ɛyɛ , lǝ asa nnya betidi eto nsusu dinyǝ bǝ ɛlɛkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nko ini lesa nǝ kɔfi nlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ .
46009009	Boakla lǝ Moses eto afi eto kukue esuǝ bǝ , ubuki wǝ fakpa fesuko keyifo ɔnlɛ keyifo kǝtǝ fǝǝ , mankle wǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ uńyǝ ɔlɛ keyifo . Fɛɛ inni bebuki bamfo tinti ǝsuǝ nya Onanto nlɛ etiki budi .
46009010	Bo ǝsuǝ eso Onanto nlɛ ditiki nǝmfo bɔtɛyi nɛ . Lǝ sitintii , bo eso báwɔni ditiki nǝmfo nɛ . Utidi wǝ lekpe bidikǝ ku utidi wǝ lǝǝfǝsǝ nye lǝǝlǝkǝ bidikǝǝ , eeyifo nko ku nsusu nye kusubebe nkǝ utsyuǝ saa ebunyǝ bidikǝ biamǝ eto bitsyuǝ udi .
46009011	Boto lɛwɔnɔ sɛɛ eto eyibibi bokpe lǝ mi nti . Nya lǝ mi tsya efi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto bikǝ bitǝ boo , ebiasǝ lesa ǝtsyuǝ ?
46009012	Le betidi bamba ǝǝnyǝ kusu kenyǝ kutǝkǝ kutsyuǝ ketsyi lǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , nyalɛ ele bǝ bo nyǝ kutǝkǝ kpe enso mǝ kulaa tsya . Fɛɛ boo , boanyɛ lǝ kusu komfó bǝ lǝ bunyǝ kulesa lǝ mi ɔflɔ . Bomu bufi lesa saa butǝkǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ itǝ lǝ Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ lɛyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ disensǝ disu kalebe saa .
46009013	Biyi wuee biǝnkǝ betidi ba leeyifo keyifo lǝ Onanto eto disumuyoo , mfó bǝǝnyǝ mǝ didisa ketsyiko nɛ . Nya betidi ba leefi mǝ keditǝtǝ eto asa kesu kǝtǝkǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , nnya ǝtsyuǝ bǝǝtǝ mǝ fe mǝ kedikɔ nɛ .
46009014	Nko ǝmǝ ke ini sitinti bǝ Bonamute dítǝ kɔfi nkǝ betidi ba laabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝme letsya be kǝtǝ betidii , letsya bobe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ele bǝ bedi lesa nɛ .
46009015	Fɛɛ ménfi kusu komfo nyifo keyifo saa ntǝ ǝsuǝ . Nye bɔwɔni minlɛ mi kukue komfo bǝ lǝ ntɔ lesatsyuǝ ntsyiko mi ɔflɔ ? Lǝ nyamfó esoo , lǝ nkpǝ kulaa tsya alɛkɛ itǝ mɛ eso . Itsyise manla miǝ lesanǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ mɛ kusu bǝ mbesǝ ǝsuǝ katoo , utidi utsyuǝ yɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ uyifo nnya etiki bimba .
46009016	Yǝntǝ mǝ kusu bǝ nkabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato bǝ maabe ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya eso . Boanto Onanto ebunǝ mɛ koto lǝ mambe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi !
46009017	Lǝ nnya ete iyifo bǝ mɔ kosate ete dílǝkǝ keyifo kamfo mintǝ mɔ ǝsuǝǝ , eni moobe kusu miǝ ele bǝ bafo mɛ kayo lǝ nnya disi . Fɛɛ iyifo keyifo ka Boanto Onanto dílǝkǝ utǝ mǝ nkǝ ele bǝ nyifo . Itsyise iyifo keyifo ka Onanto dífi mɛ utsyǝ lǝ ke kɛnyɛ .
46009018	Nya nte kayo ka baafo mɛ lǝ ke disi ? Kayofofo ka mǝǝnyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ni maabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya kafo faa . Nya membunyǝ kayofofo saa lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ meedi ǝsuǝ .
46009019	Kusu saa asini kutǝ mɛ se mimbǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ kalɔ eso . Fɛɛ nyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ fe utidi wǝ leeyifo betidi ba tã eto keyifo bǝ lǝ nnǝ betidi kpǝ moko Boanto Onanto .
46009020	Lǝ nlɛ keyifo lǝ Yudafɔ ntii , mǝ ǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe Yudanyǝ bǝ lǝ itǝ bǝ moofo mǝ bunǝ kaboko Boanto Onanto . Itǝ bǝ mimbǝ lǝ Moses eto kɔfi kalɔ tsyaa , mǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ nko seka ku mba leetsyue wǝ kɔfi koto lǝ lefe nǝ minkpe lǝ mǝ nti itǝ lǝ mfo mǝ bunǝ kǝtǝ Boanto Onanto .
46009021	Nko ke meeyifo ku betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya nɛ . Nya mǝǝsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti fe utidi wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ . Nya meentsyue Yudafɔ eto kɔfi koto itǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝǝntǝ Bonamute Boanto Onanto . Nyamfo aante bǝ ntaka ńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ itsyise lǝ sitintii , Kristo eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ nya meetsyue koto nɛ .
46009022	Lǝ nkpe lǝ mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale ntii , meeyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ fe mǝ ke bǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝ mboko Boanto Onanto . Meeyifo ǝsuǝ kakatesǝ ko betidi ba eto nti minkpe itǝ lǝ nyɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ nnǝ betidi mboko Boanto Onanto .
46009023	Meeyifo asa nyamfo kenke itǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso bǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝ laabɔ ketsyiko lǝ ni keyifo buyifo ǝsuǝ .
46009024	Biyi wuee biǝ betidi kpǝ lǝǝkǝ ketsyetsyi etsyi . Fɛɛ mǝ nti utidi ɔni hã lǝǝtǝkǝ kato kenyǝ nnya kayofofo . Nyaso bitsyetsyi nko ǝmǝ itǝ lǝ bitǝkǝ kato lǝ binyǝ nnya kayofofo .
46009025	Utidi saa wǝ lǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ weesu ketsyetsyii , waabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kakase lesa nǝ baate wǝ ku nnya esu kenke bǝ lǝ ofo kato butǝkǝ kafo lekankpakpa nǝ laanklɛ fɛ laa bia . Fɛɛ boo , boǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofo lekpakpa nǝ lǝmbobia kulefe .
46009026	Nyamfo eso meetsyetsyi sidididi kesu sɛtɔ bǝ lǝ nsu nla ukuǝ wǝ nkpǝ sɛtɔ . Nya nyifo utidi wǝ laalɔ kabe fɛ woato kekpe nya maanto kekpe waata kebu .
46009027	Mǝǝtǝ miǝ kekpe lɛ mɛ , bǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ inyǝ kanyi saa eto okle . Itsyise lǝ mbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsya ntǝ betidi bamba nya bubǝ botsya bokatesǝ ǝsuǝ bobee , mannla miǝ bǝlǝkǝ mɛ lenti bǝ mǝnyǝ ntǝ kayofofo !
46010001	Mɔ bayimi , nnla miǝ bekloma lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bo bana ba dítǝkeko Moses ǝsuǝ . Lɛsɔmiloku lɛyɛ ko mǝ , nya lése mǝmblɛ kenke . Nya báyɛ lǝ ditumbukplɛ sia eto nti bafe .
46010002	Onanto éfi lɛsɔmiloku ku ditumbukplɛ sia úyifo fe mǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa fe betidi ba dítǝkeko Moses kama seka .
46010003	Mǝmblɛ edi Lɔwɔnɔ eto didisa nǝmǝ tutuutu ,
46010004	nya bǝnǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto ntu bomǝ tsya ke . Bǝnǝ ntu betsyiko lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ eto kobansǝ nǝ lɛyɛnko mǝ lidufǝnko mfo . Nya kobansǝ komǝ ni Kristo ǝmǝ kosate .
46010005	Lefe nǝmfó kemiǝ kulaa tsya , Onanto mǝnnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ mǝ kpǝ eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyasoo , bǝkpǝ lǝ ntɛnti .
46010006	Asa nyamfo nnya ele bǝ bunyǝ bokase asa bǝ lǝ abua buyifo eto kamini lensiǝmbɔkɛ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe bo bulǝ ,
46010007	nye bufi ǝsuǝ butǝ bǝfiǝ busumu eto asayifoyifo fe mǝ ke . Nyamfo eto okle Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi bamfo álo bebuki , bédi bǝnǝ ku sitǝkpǝ ku sɛsɔnɔdidi eto asa , nya báke béwui ǝfiǝkǝ . ”
46010008	Yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ bola asɔnɔsa buyifo fe kase mǝ betidi díyifo , nya betidi akpi fosi ǝnuǝ akpi ǝtsyǝ díkpǝ lǝ diyi lɔni ǝsuǝ .
46010009	Nya biǝntǝ lǝ boto Boanto bobe . Nko ibǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ díyifo nya bawa dínǝ mǝ nya békpǝ .
46010010	Nya yanle bǝ botaka buńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase mǝ bǝtsyuǝ díyifo , eso nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nkpe ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale lɛtsylɔsǝ mǝ .
46010011	Nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ bufi bokase kobe . Nnya bǝ báwɔni nnya bǝtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bufi bɔlɛ bo kɔlɛ . Itsyise lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpǝ mfoo , eboyo kalosǝkɔ .
46010012	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leebu nkǝ uńyǝ keklekee , be kukɔnɔ nkǝ weedu ɔnɔ .
46010013	Lesa saa nǝ laato fǝ kabee , nnya okle ebofo bubǝ lǝ utidi saa ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eeyifo lǝ wǝ katɛyi ketsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wookpe fǝ nkɛale bǝ lǝ afo bunyǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ke nlɛ fǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ , nya yemboso fǝ ǝsuǝale , bǝ lǝ afo bunyǝ kekleke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Lefe nǝ lesatsyuǝ nlɛ fǝ bɔkpɔnkoo , Onanto ebutǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ efi ǝnyǝ lǝ asa nyamfo kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woote fǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ fǝ ɔyɛ abɔ afe lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
46010014	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ bǝfiǝ busumu saa ǝsuǝ .
46010015	Nlɛ mi etiki budi fe betidi ba nyi kobe . Nyaso bitsyue asa nya maatɛyi mi mfo koto lɛ bɛnɔ .
46010016	Lɛkɔbe nǝ boefi kasɔ Onanto anii , ńyǝ itǝ Boanto eto kɔtɔ . Nya abolo nnya boedi lǝ bɔlɛ Boanto eto lesa kɛnkɛ budii , aate bǝ bo ku Kristo eyifo bani .
46010017	Ite bǝ bufui tsyaa , lǝ sitintii , buyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni kplo . Itsyise abolo ani ete ini boedi .
46010018	Bibu Israel bebi ba leedi lesa nǝ befi bǝtǝ Onanto kedi , beyifo bani ku Onanto . Itsyise wǝ uni befi asa bǝtǝ kedi lǝ wǝ keditǝtǝ eto leba ǝsuǝ .
46010019	Nya mɔmɔɔ , bubu fanlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ bǝfiǝ ba befi ani batoo , nya mǝǝtsya eyifo Onanto kosate ? Nye lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ kedi bǝtǝ asa bamba , nyamfo eyifo lesa tinti ditsyuǝ ?
46010020	Owo lo ! Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi , nya ni bǝ , asa nnya béfi bǝtǝ kedi lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto aba ǝsuǝ , befi nya bǝtǝ kedi bǝtǝ awɔnɔ bua , inni Onanto . Nya manla miǝ biyifo bani ku awɔnɔ bua nyamfo .
46010021	Yanlɛkɛ bǝ binǝ asa itsyi lǝ Boanto eto lɛkɔbe kafo nya bisi bisu binǝ itsyi lǝ awɔnɔ bua tsya eto lɛkɔbe kafo . Yanle bǝ edi lesa lǝ Boanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya esi esu edi lesa lǝ awɔnɔ bua eto kedikǝtǝkɔ tsya .
46010022	Nye bela biǝ Boanto lǝ unyǝ ɔblɔ okpe bo ? Biembu disi biǝ bokpe ǝsuǝale beso wǝ .
46010023	Baatɛyi lekpa bǝnkǝ , “ Kusu kpe bǝ buyifo lesa saa . ” Sitinti ini . Fɛɛ inni lesa saa lɛlɛkɛ bǝ buyifo . Kusu kpe bǝ buyifo lesa saa , fɛɛ inni lesa saa laaboko bo kutǝkǝ .
46010024	Yanle bǝ nwǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ bɛbɛ wǝ maate hã eto kasɛɛ , bomu ele bǝ ɔbɛbɛ kasɛɛ utǝ wǝ utsyuǝ tsya .
46010025	Bekpe kusu biaya sinǝ saa sia banlɛ bote lǝ asi kayimi . Nya yanhiã bǝ lǝ bɛtɔ bɛnɔ sinǝ sia eto okle sini fɛ lǝ beya .
46010026	Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kawunsiǝ ku asa nnya nkpe lǝ ke kenkee , Boanto eto ale ini . ”
46010027	Lǝ manfokanɔnyǝ utsyuǝ akpadi fǝ nkǝ bǝ lǝ bidi lesa nya fatɔnɔ fesu , lesa nǝ ke dii , di ni nya mantɔ kulesa anɔ lǝ disa nǝmǝ eyifo kɛnkɛ lee dienyifo .
46010028	Bomu lǝ utidi utsyuǝ atɛyi fǝ nkǝ befi lesa nǝmǝ bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi , mendi ni . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto lɛkɔɛsi lembulǝ wǝ nɛ .
46010029	Itsyise inni fǝ nwǝ lidi lesa nǝmǝ eto utu eso yuukǝlǝ bomu nwǝ nse . Utidi utsyuǝ ebofo bɔtɔ nkǝ , “ Beso lǝ nkpe kusu meeyifo lesa ǝtsyuǝ fɛ ini utidi bamba yookpe bulǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsii , nya ele bǝ nyɛ lesa nǝmǝ buyifo ?
46010030	Lǝ nsɔ Onanto ani lǝ lesa nǝ míndi ǝsuǝǝ , beso ele bǝ utidi bamba bu nkǝ nta mbu lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ se minsɔ Onanto ani ? ”
46010031	Fɛɛ kloma fǝnkǝ lesa saa nǝ utsyuǝ leeyifo nye leedi nye lǝǝnǝǝ , ele bǝ uyifo nnyamblɛ kenke bǝ lǝ befi dibu bǝtǝ Onanto .
46010032	Bienyifo kulesa nǝ luuńyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ nye mba lenni Yudafɔ nye Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa ǝsuǝ .
46010033	Biyifo fe kase meeyifo lesa saa . Maabe kusu miǝ mǝmbuyifo kulesa nǝ luuńyǝ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ . Mambe kusu itǝ mɔ lɛlɛkɛsǝ , bomu itǝ lesa nǝ lɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ utsyuǝ saa bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ bulǝkǝ .
46011001	Bebe lǝ bekase mɔ ditsyǝbi fe kase mintsya laabe Kristo eto lele .
46011002	Maatɛsǝ mi itsyise biakloma mɛ lefe saa nya biakloma asa nnya minte mi nya biayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
46011003	Fɛɛ nla miǝ bekloma wuee biǝ , Kristo eyifo utidi saa eto disi . Nya usǝ tsya eyifo disi itǝ usio . Nya Onanto ni disi itǝ Kristo .
46011004	Nyaso osani wǝ laato ola nye laabe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ letsya lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo nya úfi lesatsyuǝ úti disi , wǝǝntǝ Kristo dibu .
46011005	Nya usio wǝ laato ola nye laabe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ letsya lǝ Disumuyo nya weemfi ofiamɛ keti disii , wǝǝntǝ wǝ usǝ dibu . Nya letekɛkɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ ku usio wǝ lɛkpi disi nya wanlɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ ola eto nti .
46011006	Lǝ usio ǝmfo mémfi ofiamɛ úti disi , nyalɛ ete bǝnkǝ ɔ́kpi disi . Nya se iyifo afanisa bǝnkǝ usio kɔ disi nye ɔkpi disi esoo , ele bǝ ufi ofamɛ uti disi .
46011007	Yanle bǝ osani fi kulesa uti disi lǝ Disumuyo itsyise Onanto éyifo osani lǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto dibu kate . Fɛ kusiǝ wǝǝ , ǝǝlǝkǝ osani eto dibu kate .
46011008	Itsyise Onanto mánka usio buyifo ketsyiko osani ǝsuǝ . Bomu usio úyifo útsyiko lǝ osani ǝsuǝ .
46011009	Nya inni usio eso Onanto díyifo osani . Bomu osani eso Onanto díyifo usio .
46011010	Nya lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ esoo , ele bǝ usio fi ofiamǝ uti disi lǝ ete bǝ okpe lǝ osani eto kalɔ .
46011011	Nya lǝ bo bofokanɔ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝǝ , usio ǝnsiǝ lete lǝ osani ǝsuǝ , nya osani tsya ǝnsiǝ lete lǝ usio ǝsuǝ .
46011012	Itsyise fe kase bǝlǝkǝ usio betsyiko lǝ osani ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke ini bǝ usio tsya lele osani nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ nyamfo kenkee , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi .
46011013	Mi kosate bu bebe lǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ usio ńyǝ ukato ola lefe nǝ eto lefe weefi kulesa uti lǝ disi ?
46011014	Fe kase Onanto díyifo kawunsiǝ , nyamfo mate lɛ bo lasatsyuǝ bote . Yanlɛkɛ bǝ osani yani wǝ disi utsyǝ diyi nya sɛwɔni nyoma . Iyifo afanisa .
46011015	Fɛɛ lǝ usio eto sɛwɔni ekulǝ seyoma nkoo , iyifo dibu itǝ wǝ . Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ wǝ sɛwɔni sia dikulǝ fe lesa nǝ díti wǝ disi .
46011016	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝnǝ etiki lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ ete mɔɔtɛyi wǝ ni bǝ bo Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke ensibǝ kusumu eto ketsyue bamba saa enso nkamfo .
46011017	Nya lǝ asa nnya minlɛ muulǝkǝ kate nte mfo ǝsuǝǝ , inni atɛsǝ ini mǝǝbǝ mi butǝ . Itsyise lǝ mi botsya lǝ Onanto eto kesumu ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ mi botsya ǝsuǝ eni lesa sɛ . Bomu asa bua nso bɔbɔ ketsyi mfó .
46011018	Itsyise ditutɛ , nnɔ bǝ lǝ betsya fe bafokanɔfɔɔ , biama mi ǝsuǝ lǝ akpa akpa . Nya iyifo mɛ fe nyamfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ .
46011019	Kusu kuni bǝ kǝnǝ dufǝ mi lenti bǝ lǝ ilǝkǝkǝ mba ni bafokanɔfɔ ba ni banikualɛtidi lǝ mi nti ete bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo .
46011020	Nya lǝ bétsya fe ditsyukpaa , inni Bonamute Yesu eto didisa kɛnkɛ nǝ bibǝ kedikɔ .
46011021	Itsyise lǝ bibǝ bekpe disii , biǝnnyǝ kǝsiǝkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ fɛ utsyuǝ saa leefi wǝ lesa kedi . Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ kukpɛnsɛ aalɛ bǝtsyuǝ nya bǝtsyuǝ lǝǝnǝ nte kekpǝ .
46011022	Nya bimbǝ ayo bǝ lǝ bisiǝ lǝ nnya kafo lǝ bidi binǝ ? Nye bola bela biǝ biǝnǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bekpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ , ku lǝ bekpe bakombo ba nkpe lǝ bo nti kofani . Be ele bǝ ntɛyi mi ? Bɔtɛsǝ ele bǝ ntɛsǝ mi lǝ nyamfo eso lee ? Owo lo !
46011023	Itsyise lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko lǝ Bonamute Yesu ɔflɔɔ , ni ni nnǝ minte mi nɛ . Nya lǝ ketsye ka ǝsuǝ fɛ boofi wǝ bakpee kɔni , úfi abolo ,
46011024	nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto anii , úbudi nnya nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muufi ntǝ Onanto kedi lǝ mi disi . Befo lǝ bidi lǝ bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
46011025	Nko ke ini lǝ didisa nǝmǝ eto kamaa , úfi lɛkɔbe nǝme nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lɛkɔbe nǝmfo ni Onanto eto ketsyue fɔfɔ ka mɔ kɔtɔ úfi óse uyi . Nya lefe saa nǝ biunǝ lǝ ni , binǝ lǝ bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
46011026	Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ lefe saa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmfo kafoo , bɛlɛ Bonamute Yesu eto ukpǝ bokloma isu ese lefe nǝ usi wuubǝ .
46011027	Nyaso utidi saa wǝ luudi Bonamute Yesu eto lesa nǝmfo nye wuunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmfo kafo lǝ kusu ko dimantsyɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ebote bǝ uyifo lebua se wǝǝntǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku kɔtɔ dibu eso .
46011028	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa to wǝ ǝsuǝ obe kukɔnɔ fɛ lǝ udi abolo nye unǝ utsyiko lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto lɛkɔbe kafo .
46011029	Itsyise lǝ wante lesa nǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ni fɛ udi abolo nyamǝ nye unǝ utsyiko lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmǝ kafoo , weedi nya wǝǝnǝ lekpokponkpo kaboko ǝsuǝ .
46011030	Nyamfo dítǝ bǝ mii nti eto betidi kpǝ ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale nya bǝtsyuǝ diyifo befinfi . Nya kpǝ tsya díkpǝ nɛ .
46011031	Nya lǝ bote kobe nya butsyiko bo ǝsuǝ budufǝ kobee , yuutǝ bǝ Onanto embokponko bo lekpo .
46011032	Fɛɛ Bonamute Yesu aakponko bo lekpo nya wǝǝnǝ bo koto bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔyɛ bo bɔtsylɔsǝ ku manfokanɔfɔ .
46011033	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , lǝ betsya biǝ biedi Bonamute Yesu eto lesaa , binyǝ bisiǝkǝ utsyuǝ .
46011034	Nya lǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛ utsyuǝǝ , ele bǝ udi lǝ wǝ diyo bǝ lǝ Onanto wankponko mi lekpo lǝ betsya fe ditsyukpa seka . Nya lǝ etiki bamba kpe , lǝ mbǝ mfóo , bɔɔlɛ nnya bobe .
46012001	Nya mɔmɔɔ , lǝ asa nnya leka Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa ǝsuǝ , mɔ bayimi , nnla miǝ bete ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝ nkpe lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
46012002	Biyi wuee biǝ lefe nǝ bíante tɔ Onanto , bítǝ asa nnya lǝmbǝ nkpǝ kédi mi nya bíkesumu asa nyamfó nya bénya kusu komǝ .
46012003	Nya ele bǝ bete biǝ utidi saa wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ , ǝǝbǝmbofo etiki budi nkǝ , “ Mbusiotidi ni Yesu . ” Nko ke tsya ini bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu ni Boanto , ” lenni Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
46012004	Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝǝtǝ ǝtǝsa kpǝ , fɛɛ Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ ete diini .
46012005	Esu kpǝ kpe nnya ǝsuǝ boeyifo keyifo kǝtǝ Bonamute , fɛɛ Bonamute ɔni ǝmǝ ete uni nɛ .
46012006	Nya nyifo akpa akpa akpa tsya kpe , fɛɛ Onanto ɔni ǝmǝ ete lǝǝtǝ ǝsuǝle utsyuǝ saa weeyifo ke .
46012007	Ǝtǝsa nnya utsyuǝ saa nkpee , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ni nwǝ dítǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nyamǝ bǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke lǝ bakɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto kutǝkǝ .
46012008	Utsyuǝǝ , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ weedi etiki budi ku kobe ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya utsyuǝ tsyaa , Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ uyi etikibudi ketsyiko lesa nǝ unyi ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝ .
46012009	Nya obamba kpe bofokanɔ kekleke ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo ke ǝsuǝ . Nya utsyuǝǝ , okpe ǝtǝsa nnya weefi katsya bufi ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝ .
46012010	Utidi bamba aafo ayanisa buyifo kate . Nya utsyuǝǝ , lǝ kase wuudi Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ . Nya utidi bambaa , bǝ lǝ unyǝ awɔnɔ akpa akpa utsyǝ lekpo . Nya utsyuǝ , bele bele eto bɔtɛyi . Nya obamba tsyaa , bele bele eto kasɔ bulǝkǝ .
46012011	Asa nyamfo kenke , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ eto eyifosa ete ini . Lɛwɔnɔ ni leesie ǝtǝsa nyamǝ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa ɛyɛ lǝ kase waala ǝsuǝ .
46012012	Kristo eyifo utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto uyi wǝ nkpe ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete lete kpǝ . Etidisuǝ ani ete ini tsya ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete letee , lɛkɔ iyifo ani .
46012013	Nko ke ini lǝ bomba ni Yudafɔ ku ǝsǝ bamba eto betidi ku betidi ba ni ndomunyǝ ku betide ba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ tsya eto nti nɛ . Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝ ete béfi béyifo bo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpaa , ni ǝmǝ díyifo bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni nɛ . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ eto ntu ete béfi bǝtǝ bomblɛ dínǝ nɛ .
46012014	Itsyise etidisuǝ ani eenyifo utidi . Bomu ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete lete kpǝ béfi bákɔ fɛ íyifo utidi ɔni .
46012015	Lǝ kokpa átɛyi nkǝ , “ Se minni kɔni esoo , mǝmbɔkɔ ku ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamǝ , ” nyamfo anlɛ bote sitinti nkǝ kuni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ .
46012016	Nya lǝ koto tsya nkǝ , “ Se minni dinǝmi esoo , mǝmbɔkɔ ku ǝsuǝ nyamǝ , ” nnya tsya anlɛ bote sitinti nkǝ kuni ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ .
46012017	Nya lǝ ǝsuǝ nyamǝ kenke ete ni dinǝmii , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ diɔnɔ lesatsyuǝ ? Nya lǝ koto mate tsya inii , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ fɛ kɔɔnɔ asa eto bɔnyi ?
46012018	Fɛɛ lǝ bɔlɛ ola bobee , buunyǝ boǝ Onanto efi akpa lete lete úyifo utidi eto dimu nǝmǝ fe kase wǝ kosate lela nkǝ utsyǝ .
46012019	Lǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa lɔni ete ni utidii , ntsyǝ wuutsyǝ !
46012020	Fɛɛ fe kase boǝnyǝ , akpa nyamǝ fui . Tsya utidi ɔni ete uni .
46012021	Fɛɛ se inni ɔni ete unii , dinǝmi embofo kɔni bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Manhiã fǝ lǝ mɔ kulesa ǝsuǝ . ” Nya nko ke disi tsya lembofo kokpa bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Manhia fǝ lǝ mɔ kulesa kǝmiǝ . ”
46012022	Lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ , akpa nya nte fe nnya lǝmbǝ ale saa , nnya bomu lǝ bǝ imbǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , boǝmbofo kulesa buyifo .
46012023	Nya akpa nya boembu kakpe lǝ kulesa kemiǝ , nnya bomu buunyi bǝ ele bǝ bɔlɛ ola nɛ . Nya akpa nnya laannɔ bobe bǝ bulǝkǝ bote betidi lǝ bǝnyǝǝ , nnya boalɛ ola kalɔ kalɛ kukɔnɔ nɛ .
46012024	Nya boenyifo nko kǝtǝ akpa nnya betidi lǝǝnyǝ lefe saa . Fɛɛ Onanto dífi nnya ɔkɔ ku akpa nyamfó nko nya útǝ nkǝ bufi dibu butǝ akpa nnya bomu boǝnyǝ boǝ bǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa .
46012025	Nyamfo te nko bǝ lǝ ntimama lǝ boyɛ bɔkɛ lǝ akpa nyamǝ nti . Bomu lǝ akpa nyamfo kenke lǝ ifi lɔniyifoyifo itǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
46012026	Nya lǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ lǝ kanyi bunyǝǝ , ǝsuǝ nyamǝ kenke ǝǝnyǝ kanyi nya ǝsuǝ eto akpa bamba tsya lǝǝnyǝ kanyi . Nya lǝ batɛsǝ lekpa ditsyuǝǝ , ǝsuǝ eto akpa nyamfo kenke ǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
46012027	Nyaso mimblɛ lɛkɔ biyifo Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamǝ nya mi utsyuǝ saa eyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ nyamǝ eto lekpa lɔni .
46012028	Nya betidi ateate ba Onanto dífi ókpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti ni tutɛɛ , batɔnkpe bamǝ , nya dinuǝfǝ , bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , nya ditsyǝfǝ , bateasa , fɛ mba leeyifo ayanisa . Nya mba nkpe ǝsuǝale laatsya bufi nye laawunsǝko betidi nye batɔnkotɔnko nye mba laatɛyi bele bele .
46012029	Inni betidi ba kenke ni batɔnkpe nye bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nye bateasa . Nya inni utsyuǝ saa nkpe ǝsuǝale laafo ayanisa buyifo kǝlǝkǝ kate .
46012030	Nya inni utsyuǝ saa nkpe ǝsuǝale laafo bufi botsya nye laafo belebele bɔtɛyi nye laafo belebele kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate .
46012031	Nyamfo esoo , bifi mi akɔɛsi bitǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya nkpe kutǝkǝ enso ǝsuǝ . Asa nnya nkpe kutǝkǝ enso nyamblɛ kenke ni nnya muubǝ nte mi mfo nɛ .
46013001	Lǝ nnya ete moofo bele bele bia betidi ku Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ kenke latɛyi nya maanla betidii , mɔ etiki nnya meedi kenke eyifo efufu fe kase lǝ basɔ tsyɛnsi eto kakpɛ laale .
46013002	Nya lǝ nlǝkǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ nte nya maanɔ asakulakula kasɔ nya minyi asa nnya kenkee , nya minkpe bofokanɔ bo moofo bufi kanyi atini ketsyiko lǝ nnya kǝnyǝkɔ fɛ mimbɛ lelabii , minni kulesa .
46013003	Nya lǝ mfi mɔ bikǝ bia nte mɛ kulaa tsya ntǝ bakombo nya mintǝ miǝ batonsǝ mɛ kulaa tsya fɛ mimbɛ lelabii , minni kulesa kon .
46013004	Lelabi kpe dibusǝ nya lenkpe kafoɛkpɛ . Diansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi nya diambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya diate ǝsuǝ .
46013005	Lelabi entidi ato nya dianta asa kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ nye dinyǝ ɔblɔ . Nnya lelabi emfi nsusu bua lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ .
46013006	Nya diǝnnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa bua ǝsuǝ . Bomu diǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
46013007	Lelabi ǝntǝ disi lǝ bofokanɔ ku kusubebe ǝsuǝ nya diǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ bulǝ saa bulǝ ǝsuǝ .
46013008	Lelabi ǝmbǝ kasekɔ . Onanto eto kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kpe , fɛɛ ekpe ke kalokɔ . Bele akpa akpa bɔtɛyi tsya kpe , fɛɛ biubǝ mi kasekɔ . Kobetete kpe sitinti , fɛɛ ko lefe ebubǝ efe .
46013009	Itsyise kobetete ku kɛnyɛ lǝkǝlǝkǝ eto kǝtǝ ka Onanto dítǝ bo , mamflɔ .
46013010	Fɛɛ lǝ lesa nǝ lɛflɔ kenke abɔ dibǝǝ , lesa nǝ dimamflɔ ensi ǝmbɔkɛ .
46013011	Lefe nǝ minyifo dikpefi , nkǝdi etiki nya mínkanɔ asa kasɔ nya mínkebu disi fe dikpefi . Mɔmɔ wǝ minkabee , ekpefisa nyamfo mensile mɛ kulesa .
46013012	Asa nnya boǝnyǝ mɔmɔɔ , iyifo flufluflu fe kase boǝnyǝ lesa lǝ ahuhɔɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya kama fɛ buunyǝ nnya wuee , ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi . Nya lesa nǝ minyi mɔmɔɔ , mankpako mɛ elo . Fɛɛ kamaa , muubǝ nyǝ lesa saa nya yeokpa wuee fe kase Onanto nyi mɛ mɔmɔ kenke .
46013013	Sitintii , asakpa ǝtsyǝ ni nnya nkpe mfo . Nya nyamfo ni bofokanɔ ku kusubebe ku lelabi . Fɛɛ nnya nso lǝ nnya nti kenke ni lelabi .
46014001	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ lelabi lǝ diyifo lesa nǝ mi utsyuǝ saa lɔɔbɛbɛ kekleke nkǝ lǝ ɔkɛ . Nya bifi mi ǝnǝmi bitǝkǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa ǝsuǝ . Nya ǝtǝsa nnya nso bofe kenke nibǝ lǝ afo Onanto eto ditiki sɛɛ kɛnyɛbulǝkǝ .
46014002	Utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , weedi etiki ku betidi , bomu Onanto ni nwǝ weedinko etiki . Itsyise utidi kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔnɔ nnya kasɔ , nya lǝ etikididi ǝsuǝ waatɛyi asa ketsyi lǝ asakulakula ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ
46014003	Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ betidi , waawunsǝ ko mǝ nya waakpe mǝ nya woakpe mǝ nkɛale nya wǝǝyuǝsǝ mǝ utu .
46014004	Utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele bia eto kasɔ betidi laanɔɔ , wǝ ǝsuǝ ete waawunsǝko . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lǝtǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ , waawunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpǝnǝ kenke .
46014005	Iyifo mɔ lelabi lǝ mimblɛ ebofo bele bele bɔtɛyi . Fɛɛ lǝ biofo Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ betidii , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ mɛ eso . Itsyise utidi wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ betidii , kpe kutǝkǝ eso utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , siankpa utidi utsyuǝ kpe wǝ loofo asa nnya woatɛyi kasɔ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ mba nti onkpǝ mfo , itǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lǝ bafo kasɔ bɔnɔ .
46014006	Nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ nya minlɛ bele bele bele bia kuutsyuǝ saa laannɔ biɔtɛyii , nte kutǝkǝ ko biunyǝ lǝ nnya esuǝ ? Biembunyǝ kutǝkǝ saa , enso lǝ nlǝkǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kasɔ ntemi , nye minte mi lesa ǝtsyuǝ , nye minlǝkǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kɛnyɛ minte , nye minte mi asa ǝtsyuǝ .
46014007	Bu abe asa nnya buasɔ nye buefǝ nya ǝsuǝ nkpǝ lembǝ fe kakpatsyaku nye osanku nya lembofo ǝsǝ bufǝ lǝ nnya kosate ǝsuǝ . Ntsyǝ yuutǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ebɔnɔ lǝ ote kusǝ ko banlɛ bufe lǝ utidi wǝ leefe kakpatsyaku nye osanku ǝmfó , amfo nnya bufǝ kukɔnɔ bǝ lǝ afo kusǝ komǝ eto ɔkɔɛ bɔnɔ wuee ketsyǝ lekpo ?
46014008	Nya lǝ utidi wǝ leefe kakpatsyaku amfo ke bufǝ kakpadi asa nyamǝ kukɔnɔɔ , ntsyǝ yuutǝ bǝ betidi fo ǝsuǝ bumuǝ itǝ lema ?
46014009	Nko ke ete ini bǝ utidi di etiki lǝ sele sitsyuǝ ǝsuǝ sia betidi lembofo lesa nǝ woatɛyi kasɔ bɔnɔ . Bomu wuubǝ uyifo fe ufiebi wǝ lénya údufǝ lǝ difule ǝsuǝ , nya kasɔnɔnɔ lǝmbǝ .
46014010	Bele kpǝ kpe lǝ kawunsiǝ , sele kusitsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ sia lǝmbǝ kasɔnɔnɔ .
46014011	Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ annɔ sele sia maatɛyi eto kasɔɔ , ete mfiani ɔfɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , nya wǝ tsya áfiani ɔfɔ lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ .
46014012	Se ǝnǝmi lɛsɛ mi lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa bofo ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsɛ mi lǝ befo ǝtǝsa nnya lɔɔwunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ luunǝ mǝ isuko sɛtɔ enso .
46014013	Nya utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , ele bǝ ɔtɔ Onanto lǝ utǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa bǝ lǝ ofo nnya woatɛyi kɛnyɛbulǝkǝ .
46014014	Itsyise lǝ nyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ nto ola , mɔ lɛwɔnɔ ete nlɛ olaa , fɛɛ inni lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
46014015	Nyaso be ele bǝ nyifo ? Mooto ola ku mɔ lɛwɔnɔ kekleke , fɛɛ mooto ola ku mɔ nsusu tsya . Nya muusǝ ǝsǝ ku mɔ lɛwɔnɔ , fɛɛ ǝsǝ nnya muusǝ ebutsyi taa mɔ nsusu kemiǝ tsya .
46014016	Nya lǝ ǝńyǝ alɛ Onanto ani bɔsɔ itsyi lǝ fǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ kee , ntsyǝ yuuyifo fɛ utidi wǝ ńyǝ fǝ lǝ akɔ mfo lɔɔnɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fɛ wɔɔtɛyi nkǝ fǝ olatoto lǝ ibǝ itǝ fe kase fanlɛ Onanto ani bɔsɔ se woannɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó ?
46014017	Nya lǝ fǝ ani nnya faasɔ Onanto alɛkɛ kula tsya , betidi bamba embunyǝ kutǝkǝ saa betsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
46014018	Maasɔ Onanto ani bǝ meedinko Onanto etiki lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ enso mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa .
46014019	Fɛɛ lǝ bo katsyakɔɔ , moola miǝ maatɛyi etiki anɔ nnya eto kasɔ betidi lɔɔnɔ lǝ mfi nnya nte betidi asa enso bǝ nkǝdi etiki kpǝ lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ sia betidi laannɔ kasɔ .
46014020	Mɔ bayimi , bienyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe bekpefi lǝ mi disibubu ǝsuǝ . Bomu biyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe beninǝ lǝ mi disibubu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ abua eto esu ǝsuǝǝ , biyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe bekpefi seka .
46014021	Nya lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , Boanto Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Muudi etiki ku mɔ Kusǝ eto betidi ɛyɛ lǝ betidi ba laatɛyi bele bele ǝsuǝ . Nya muudi etiki ɛyɛ lǝ bafɔ eto kɛnyɛ ǝsuǝ , Fɛɛ bembutsyue mɔ ɔkɔɛ koto . ”
46014022	Nyaso bele bele bɔtɛyi eyifo lesatsyuǝ bulǝkǝkate manfokanɔfɔ fɛɛ inni itǝ bafokanɔfɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝǝ , nnya ni lesa nǝ muufi nte bafokanɔfɔ asa nnya inni itǝ mamfokanɔfɔ .
46014023	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , lǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke eto utsyuǝ saa etsyiko etiki budi lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ nya utidi utsyuǝ bamba kpe mfo lǝ mi nti nye betidi ba mamfokanɔfɔ nkpe mi lǝ ntii , biǝnyǝ biǝ bɔɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ disi abia mi fe bebuki ?
46014024	Fɛɛ lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa eyifo Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi nya utidi bimba nye utidi wǝ mamfokanɔnyǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ údufǝ lǝ mi ntii , wuunyǝ wǝ lebua utsyuǝ lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ lesa nǝ wɔanɔ eso . Asa nnya woanɔ eboté wǝ nkǝ Onanto ebokponko wǝ lekpo .
46014025	Nya wǝ kosate ebulǝkǝ asa nnya lɛbiɔ enkpe lǝ wǝ lǝ lekple nya woobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ ɔtɛsǝ Onanto ɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitinti , Onanto kpe mi lenti ! ”
46014026	Mɔ bayimi , nla miǝ matɛyi lesatsyuǝ nǝ nkpe lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ mi disikakpekɔ . Lǝ betsya biǝ biato olaa , utsyuǝ kpe kusǝ ko waala nkǝ wǝǝsǝ , nya utsyuǝ kpe lesatsyuǝ waala nkǝ waate . Nya utsyuǝ tsya ala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lesatsyuǝ ote . Nya utsyuǝ tsya kpe kɛnyɛ lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ , nya utsyuǝ tsya ala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ asa nyamfo kasɔ . Fɛɛ bebe biǝ biyifo asa nyamfo kenke bǝ ɛwunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ .
46014027	Lǝ utsyuǝ kpe kɛnyɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka ola nkǝ waatɛyi lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝǝ , utidi fe inuǝ nye itsyǝ hã te ele bǝ bedi etiki nnya nkpe mǝ ɔni , ɔni . Nya ele bǝ bǝnyǝ uti bamba wǝ tsya luulǝkǝ asa nyamǝ bátɛyi mfó eto kasɔ .
46014028	Nya lǝ mba mfó wǝ luulǝkǝ nnya kasɔɔ , utidi wǝ nlɛ etiki mfó , ele bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ wǝ ku Onanto hã lǝ bedi etiki lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
46014029	Betidi inuǝ nye itsyǝ ba lefo etiki ǝtsyuǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ ebefo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ katɛyi nnya le mba dibu lǝ bedufǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ babe kukɔnɔ .
46014030	Nya lǝ mba nkpe lǝ katsyakɔ mfó eto utsyuǝ áfo kɛnyɛ ketsyuǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔɔ , ele bǝ utidi wǝ nlɛ etiki budi mfo yɛ wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ budi lǝ utǝ utidi ǝmǝ kusu .
46014031	Mimblɛ kenke ebofo mi kɛnyɛ ka bɛnyɛnko bɔtɛyi ɔni ɔni itǝ bǝ utsyuǝ saa ebofo lesatsyuǝ nnya lookpe wǝ ǝsuǝale .
46014032	Betidi ba lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ aafo ǝsuǝ bunwǝ kalɛ lǝ etiki nnya budi ǝsuǝ .
46014033	Itsyise Onanto aala nkǝ buyifo asa lǝ kusu ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Kase seka inte lǝ Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke ntii ,
46014034	ele bǝ besio di kãã lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ . Bomuu , ele bǝ babokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe kase Onanto eto kɔfi laate . Nya bǝmbǝ kusu bǝ lǝ bedi etiki .
46014035	Nya lǝ bala bǝ baatɔ lesatsyuǝ eto kasɔ banɔɔ , mǝ bǝsǝ ele bǝ batɔ lǝ mǝ ayo . Itsyise iyifo afanisa bǝ usio ńyǝ ukedi etiki lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ .
46014036	Nye , bɔtɛyi bɛnlɛ bǝ mi ɔflɔ Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ dítsyi dibǝǝ ? Nye mi ɔflɔ ete ditiki nǝmǝ díbǝ leyoo ?
46014037	Lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ eebu nkǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi unii , nye okpe Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsaa , ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ ote nkǝ , nya minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi eyifo kɔfi itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
46014038	Nya lǝ utidi ǝmǝ áni ditiki nǝmfoo , ele bǝ mi tsya ni wǝ .
46014039	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bifi mi kusubebe kenke bitǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛlǝkǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ bienti mba laatɛyi bele bele kusu .
46014040	Nyaso ele bǝ biyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
46015001	Mɔ bayimi , mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ bekloma ditiki sɛɛ nǝ mímboko mi béfo . Ditiki nǝ béfo bɛnɔ nya bińyǝ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ kekleke lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
46015002	Nya nyamfó ni ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku ni letsya nǝ mímbe míntǝ mi nɛ . Ditiki nǝ mǝ ebutǝ mi nkpǝ lǝ bɛlɛ ni kekleke , le inni nko mi bofokanɔ eyifo ebimba .
46015003	Lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko Boanto Onanto ɔflɔɔ , ni ke mímfi míntǝ mi nɛ . Nya nyamfo ni lesa nǝ mímfo ku koya kpǝ enso kenke bǝ Kristo ǝkpǝ lǝ bo abua eto disi fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kemiǝ .
46015004	Nya bébikǝ wǝ , nya Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama , nya ubǝ unsi lǝ nkpǝ fe kase bawɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
46015005	Nya ulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Petro ku batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ .
46015006	Nyamfo eto kamaa , wǝǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte mba ditǝkǝko wǝ ba eso betidi lofa anɔ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ si besi nkpǝ mmi , ite bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébukpǝ koko .
46015007	Nya nyamfo eto kamaa , úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Yakobo ku batɔnkpe bamǝ kenke .
46015008	Nya lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte mintsya , mɔ nte fe utidi wǝ bále lǝ lefe nǝ dímanyo ǝsuǝ .
46015009	Itsyise mɔ ni batɔnkpe kenke nti eto nwǝ nso bɔfɛ . Nya mǝńyǝ ntǝ bǝ bakpo mɛ bǝ ɔtɔnkpe kulaa tsya , etsyise ntǝkǝko Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa kama nte mǝ ohiã .
46015010	Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ esoo , nyifo utidi wǝ mini mmi . Nya wǝ lefonǝ eto asa nnya útǝ mɛ , ǝbǝ kutǝkǝ . Nya mínyifo keyifo kekleke enso batɔnkpe bamba ba ǝsuǝ kulaa betidi dífi ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ nya inni lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nya lɛwunsǝko mɛ mímfo nyamfo buyifo .
46015011	Nyaso lǝ mɔ ni lɛtɛyi mi lesaatsyuǝ o-o , nye mǝ lɛtɛyi mi o-o , lesa lɔni nǝmǝ ete bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ . Nya nyamfo ni nnya béfo bɛnɔ nɛ .
46015012	Mɔmɔ se bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi boǝ Onanto átakasǝ Kristo úńyǝnsǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝǝ , beso ini bǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , Onanto ensiembotakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ oboko nkpǝ bio ?
46015013	Lǝ nko ini sitintii , nyalɛ Onanto mántakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ .
46015014	Nya lǝ Onanto mántakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ sitintii , nyalɛ nnya letsyabebe ǝmbɔkɛ kutǝkǝ itǝ mi . Nya mi bofokanɔ tsya eyifo bimba .
46015015	Nya nte lesa nǝ nsi lookpe bo nkɛale lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe inni sidia bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ boǝ ótakasǝ Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ sitinti ini bǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ aantaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ nkpǝǝ , nyalɛ wátakasǝ Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ .
46015016	Nyaso lǝ sitinti ini bǝ baatakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nyalɛɛ , bete biǝ wantakasǝ Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ .
46015017	Nya lǝ Onanto mántakasǝ Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ sitintii , nyalɛ mi bofokanɔ ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa , nya bisi benkpe lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ .
46015018	Nya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ mba léfo Kristo bánɔ ba díkpǝ tsya ánya .
46015019	Nya lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nkpǝ eso ete bufi bo kusubebe butǝkǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ bo nkpǝ kpe kaminsǝ enso lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi nti .
46015020	Fɛɛ ɔnukualɛ ini bǝnkǝ Onanto átakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ . Nya wǝ ni utidi tutɛ wǝ létaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ lǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ nti nnya nlɛ bo uyi bose nkǝ mba kenke díkekpǝ si bootaka .
46015021	Itsyise fe kase ukpǝ lɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ úbǝ kawunsiǝ , nko ke ini bǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ebotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni hã ǝsuǝ nɛ .
46015022	Fe kase betidi kenke ɛyɛ lǝ Adam ǝsuǝ lǝǝkpǝ se beyifo lɔni ku wǝ esoo , nko ke ini tsya bǝ Onanto ebotakasǝ betidi ba díkekpǝ kenke bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo eso .
46015023	Fɛɛ Onanto ebotakasǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu ko Onanto kosate ditsyue utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Kristo ni ututɛ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝ bio ǝsuǝǝ , mba dífi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Kristoo , mǝ usi wootakasǝ uńyǝnsǝ nɛ .
46015024	Lǝ nnya kamaa , kalosǝkɔ ebubǝ . Nya Kristo ebɔtsylɔsǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale saa , betidi ba nsi lǝ ndikɔ ndikɔ kɛnyɛ ku mba nkpǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale saa eto okle . Nya Kristo luufi sekakedikɔ siamǝ okpe lǝ Onanto wǝ ni Anto eto ani .
46015025	Itsyise ele bǝ Kristo di seka isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto luufi wǝ balo kenke okpe lǝ Kristo eto akpa kalɔ .
46015026	Nya olo fɛfɛ wǝ eto ditsyǝbi wɔɔtsylɔsǝ ni ukpǝ .
46015027	Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto éfi asa kenke ókpe lǝ wǝ akpa kalɔ . ” Nya ekpa wuee bǝ lǝ bátɛyi bǝ asa kenkee , nyamfo anlɛ bote bǝ Onanto wǝ dífi asa nyamfo ókpe lǝ Kristo eto akpa kalɔ tsya bébu wǝ bakpe lenti .
46015028	Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto difi asa nnya kenke ókpe lǝ Kristo kalɔ ólesǝǝ , wǝ Kristo wǝ ni Onanto Eto Ubi ǝmǝ ebufi wǝ ǝsuǝ okpe lǝ Onanto ǝmǝ eto kalɔ bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ udi seka lǝ asa nnya kenke ǝsuǝ .
46015029	Mɔmɔɔ , itsyi lǝ betidi ba laafo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ǝsuǝ , lǝ betidi ba díkekpǝ koko eto disi , be ni diyifobi nǝmǝ eto kasɔ ? Nya be nkpe lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Lǝ sitinti ini fe kase bǝtsyuǝ laatɛyi bǝnkǝ bensiembotakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝǝ be ini eso ele bǝ bǝflǝsǝ betidi bamǝ ntu lǝ mba díkekpǝ bafe eto disi ?
46015030	Nya bo mba ni batɔnkpe tsya nkpǝ ? Beso bo tsya eto nkpǝ nkpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ lefe saa ?
46015031	Mɔ bayimi , ukpǝ eto bulǝ tǝkǝko mɛ diyi saa nǝ kale disiǝ ! Nya maabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato kǝtǝ ukpǝ lǝ mi disi itsyi lǝ kase buyifo bani ku Bonamute Kristo Yesu eso . Nyaso mǝǝlǝkǝ nyamfo kate wuee nɛ .
46015032	Fɛɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nsusu ǝsuǝ eso ete mínkpɔ ku betidi ba nte fe bebutubuki lǝ Efesoo , be ni kutǝkǝ ko mínyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Nya lǝ betidi ensiembotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ sitintii , nyalɛ biyi biǝ iyifo fenkǝ , buyifo fe kase lekpa ditsyuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ budi lǝ bunǝ , itsyise kusɛ ete boǝ bǝkpǝ nɛ . ”
46015033	Biǝntǝ lǝ bawɛ mi bakpe . Sɛyɛtsyuǝ bua eto betidi aabiasǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ eto ole .
46015034	Bisinkli bifi nsusu lǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ , lǝ bɛyɛ asa bua buyifo . Nlɛ mi etiki budi wuee bǝ lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mi , itsyise mi bǝtsyuǝ enyi Onanto .
46015035	Utsyuǝ ebɔtɔ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ bunsi bootakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ nya ntsyǝ boosinkli bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ ? Nya nte ǝsuǝ nnya eto okle lɔɔkɛ mǝ ? ”
46015036	Mi betidi eto bamumu ! Lǝ ato diyibibi lǝ kasɔɔ , dienkǝ kafiani lesa nǝ nkpe nkpǝ lǝ díembu lǝ sitǝ ǝsuǝ .
46015037	Nya lesa nǝ bétoo , edisa eto dibibi ete yeedi fe lentabi nye edisa ǝtsyuǝ eto dibibi ete dini . Nya inni lesa nǝmǝ eto uyibi ni nnya bífi békpe lǝ kasɔ fɛ diabe .
46015038	Onanto ǝtǝ diyibibi nǝmǝ ditsyǝbi nǝ ke woala . Wǝǝtǝ diyibibi saa ku ni uyi eto okle nǝ lɛlɛkɛ itǝ ni .
46015039	Nya asa nnya kenke nkpe nkpǝǝ , ǝtsyuǝ saa ku nnya ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ . Betidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kpe lete . Nya nko ni bebuki tsya eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . Baklɔbɛ tsya eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kpe lete nya ketu eto sinǝ tsya ǝsuǝnkpe lete .
46015040	Kato eto asa kpe . Nya kasɔ mfo eto asa tsya nkpe . Asa nnya nkpe kato eto ǝsuǝ eto bɔnɔ bobe kpe lete lǝ nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfo eto ǝsuǝ eto bɔnɔ bobe .
46015041	Kofe ku ko diyǝndebi ku kofande tsya eto diyǝndebi nkpe lete . Nya befandebi tsyaa , mǝ diyǝnde kpe lete . Nya lǝ befandebi nti kulaa tsyaa , letekɛkɛ kpe lǝ mǝ diyǝndebi ǝsuǝ .
46015042	Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto lootakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nya boosinkli bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ nɛ . Lǝ bebikǝ utidi eto sinǝǝ , siyifo lesa nǝ luubu ebia . Nya lǝ batakasǝ wǝ baboko nkpǝǝ , weensi embukpǝ .
46015043	Lǝ bebikǝ wǝǝ , weensiannɔ bobe nya wǝǝyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bátakasǝ wǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , woanɔ bobe nya woakɛ ǝsuǝale .
46015044	Lefe nǝ bebikǝ wǝǝ , uyifo kawunsiǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia díkpǝ . Nya lǝ batakasǝ wǝ baboko nkpǝ , uyifo lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝ . Lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ǝsuǝ kpee , nyalɛ bete biǝ lɛwɔnɔ kemiǝ eto ǝsuǝ tsya kpe .
46015045	Itsyise ekpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Utidi tutɛ wǝ ni Adam , Onanto uni diyifo wǝ nya útǝ wǝ nkpǝ fe kawunsiǝ eto utidi . ” Nya Adam fɛfɛ ǝmfoo , wǝ ni Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ nɛ .
46015046	Inni lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ bo lǝǝtǝ boeyifo asaa , laatɔ . Bomu ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ laatɔ̃ . Nya kama fɛ lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpǝ kemiǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ .
46015047	Adam tutɛ wǝ Onanto díyifoo , úlǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko sitǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Adam nuǝfǝ alɛ , kato utsyi úbǝ .
46015048	Nya betidi ba nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfoo , mǝ eyifo fe utidi wǝ bulǝkǝ betsyiko lǝ kasɔ eto sitǝ hã ǝsuǝ . Nya mba beyifo itǝ katoo , mǝ tsya eyifo fe utidi wǝ ditsyi katoo , úbǝ .
46015049	Fe kase bunte fe utidi wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ kasɔ mfo eto ditsyǝbii , nko ke ini bǝ utidi wǝ ditsyi kato ubǝǝ , ebutǝ nkǝ bofo wǝ ditsyǝbi nɛ .
46015050	Mɔ bayimi , nyamfo eto kasɔ lǝkǝlǝkǝ ni bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ ni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku kɔtɔɔ , ǝmbofo kedikɔ bunyǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Nya lesa nǝ laabiaa , embofo kedikɔ bunyǝ lǝ lesa nǝ laambia ǝsuǝ .
46015051	Bɛnɔ akulasa nyamfo . Inni bomblɛ kenke luukpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ bǝfǝ kakpatsyaku fɛfɛɛ , bɔɔtsyi bomblɛ eto ditsyǝbi bawuninsǝ . Nya wuuyifo nnya nko lǝ dinǝmisɔsɔ lɔni kplo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ kakpatsyaku fɛfɛ ǝfǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ɔboko nkpǝ itǝ bensiembukpǝ kulefe . Nya woofloma bo ditsyǝbi kenke .
46015052	
46015053	Itsyise lesa nǝ labiaa , ele bǝ lefloma ku nǝ lambia lǝ dibǝ lefo lǝ nǝ labia eto kɛnyɛ . Nya lesa nǝ lǝǝkpǝ tayaa , woofloma ni lǝ nǝ lǝǝnkpǝ lǝ dibǝ lefo lǝ ni kɛnyɛ .
46015054	Nyaso lǝ asa nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ nko nya baafloma asa nnya laabia isu nnya lensiambiaa , nyalɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bátsylɔ ukpǝ eto ditsyǝbi butǝkǝ wǝ kato ! ” ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
46015055	Nya báwɔni tsya balɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ O Ukpǝ , sieti fǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ nte ? Nya se fǝ ǝsuǝale eto obé ǝmǝ faata bo nte ? ”
46015056	Ukpǝ ǝǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale nya woata bo obé ɛyɛ lǝ lebuayifoyifo eso . Nya ǝsuǝale nnya lebua lǝǝnyǝ etsyi lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
46015057	Fɛɛ boasɔ Onanto ani . Wǝ uni ditǝ nkǝ butǝkǝ lebua kato ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ !
46015058	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi lala , bińyǝ kekleke , biǝntǝ disi . Nya bińyǝ kekleke lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ lefe saa . Itsyise biyi biǝ kulesa ǝmbǝ bǝ biuyifo ni lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto keyifo ǝsuǝ ka luuyifo kebimbale .
46016001	Mɔmɔɔ , bɛwɔni mɛ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ atabi nnya bela biǝ biako lǝ bifi bisu bɛwunsǝko Onanto eto betidi ba nkpǝ lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ɛlɛkɛ bǝ biyifo nya eto okle míntɛyi Galatiafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ miǝ beyifo .
46016002	Nya lǝ Kɔsida saa Kɔsida eto diyi ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa muǝ ǝsuǝ utsyǝ ku lesa nǝ woofo boko itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ ofo bunyǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ yembusu iyifo bǝ bako oko ǝmǝ lekolɛwɛ lǝ lefe nǝ mínkǝ míndufǝ mi ɔflɔ mfó .
46016003	Nya lǝ mbǝ ndufǝǝ , mɔɔwɔni kukue nkpe lǝ betidi ba bilǝkǝ lǝ kɔni , ko boofi balɛ bayɛnko ku mi ǝtǝsa nnya befi bantɔnko lǝ Yerusalem .
46016004	Nya lǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ mintsya suu , nyalɛ bonko mǝ ebɔyɛ busu .
46016005	Mɔɔyɛ Makedonia fɛ mooyo mi ɔflɔ , itsyise ele bǝ nyɛ mfó fɛ lǝ mbǝ .
46016006	Iyifo mɛ fe muudi eyi asiani lǝ mi ɔflɔ mfó . Ditsyuǝ mɔɔkɛ lǝ mi ɔflɔ ku lɛyɔ lefe . Lǝ nnya kamaa , biɔwunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ kusuyɛyɛ ǝsuǝ kesu kaka ke elǝ bǝ nsu .
46016007	Manla miǝ maakpɔ mbǝ nyɛ mi ɔflɔ ete . Bomuu , moola miǝ maakɛ lǝ mi ɔflɔ itǝ lefe sɛkɛ ditsyuǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝtǝ mɛ kusu nko .
46016008	Mɔɔkɛ lǝ Efeso mfo isu ese lǝ Pentekoste eto diyi ǝsuǝ .
46016009	Kusu sɛɛ asini mɛ tinti lǝ mfó , bǝ nyifo keyifo ka nkpe kutǝkǝ tinti , ite bǝ betidi ba ńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ fui itsyi lǝ keyifo ka meeyifo ǝsuǝ eso .
46016010	Lǝ Timoteo ǝbǝ udufǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , bebe biǝ befo wǝ kukɔnɔ . Itsyise Bonamute eto keyifo tsya ete ɔnlɛ buyifo fe mɔ ke .
46016011	Yanle bǝ mi kuutsyuǝ saa ńyǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ubu wǝ sikpefi . Bomu befo wǝ , lǝ bɛwunsǝko wǝ bǝ lǝ wǝ kusu bɔyɛ ǝsuǝ ku diyuǝ bǝ lǝ usi usinkli ubǝ mɔ ɔflɔ buɛɛ . Itsyise nlɛ wǝ kusu bobe miǝ wǝ usinkli ubǝ ku bo bayimisani lefo banɔ .
46016012	Mɔmɔɔ itsyi lǝ bɔyimi Apolo eto etiki ǝsuǝǝ , mbɔlɛ wǝ kola kekleke miǝ ubǝ mi ɔflɔ ku wǝ bayimi bǝtsyuǝ . Fɛɛ woantɔnɔ tɔ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ tɔ . Fɛɛ mfo nnɔ miǝ lǝ lefe ǝtǝ wǝ kusu koo , wuubǝ .
46016013	Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ , lǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Bekpe utu lǝ binyǝ kekleke .
46016014	Nya biyifo mi keyifo saa ku lelabi .
46016015	Biyi Stefana ku wǝ diyo eto betidi . Mǝ ni betidi tutɛ ba lɛtsyi bawuninsǝ báfo bánɔ lǝ Akaia eto kasɔ eto lekpake mfó . Nya béfi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝkawunsǝko mba eto ǝsuǝ bákpasǝ . Mɔ bayimi , nlɛ mi lekpakpa minkǝ
46016016	bitǝ kusu faa batɔnkotɔnko bamfo ku babamba ba laawunsǝko mǝ lǝ mǝ keyifo lǝ batɔnko mi .
46016017	Yiafo mɛ disuǝyuǝ bǝ Stefana ku Fortunato ku Akaiko ǝbǝ bedufǝ , nya eyifo mɛ fe mi ini minyǝ .
46016018	Bǝtǝ bǝ insi nyǝ ǝsuǝale fe kase bákpe mi ǝsuǝale . Nya betidi bamfo eto oklee , inyǝ bǝ bitǝ mǝ dibu sitinti nɛ .
46016019	Bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ Asia eto kasɔ eto lekpake mfo kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi ! Akwila ku Priskila ku mǝ mbaa laatsya lǝ mǝ diyo bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi kukɔnɔ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ .
46016020	Bo bayimi ba nkpe mfo kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o ! Bɛbuta bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bisiǝsǝ bǝtsyuǝ fe bayimi lala .
46016021	Mɔ , Paulo kosate , dífi mɔ kɔni minlɛ nyamfo bɔwɔni kǝsiǝsǝ mi .
46016022	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanla Bonamutee , yoole wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . O Bonamute , bǝ !
46016023	Bonamute Yesu eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
46016024	Mfi mɔ lelabi tinti nlɛ mimblɛ kenke butǝ lǝ Kristo Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ . Ibǝ itǝ .
47001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ mimfiani Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpee , mɔ ku bo ɔyimisani Timoteo nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi , Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nkpe lǝ Korinto ku betidi ba kenke Onanto eto betidi lǝ Akaia eto kasɔ kenke .
47001002	Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
47001003	Bitǝ lǝ bufi atɛsɛ butǝ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto . Wǝ ni anto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ , nya woawunsǝko bo .
47001004	Waamansǝ bo lɛkɔ lǝ bulǝ saa bo leetu bo , itǝ bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ bofo bo bǝtsyuǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ mǝ bulǝ saa kǝmiǝ . Nya fe kase Onanto laawunsǝ ko boo , nko ke ele bǝ bo tsya wunsǝko bo betidi ba nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ nɛ .
47001005	Itsyise fe kase boǝnyǝ kanyi kpǝ fe nka eto okle Kristo tsya dínyǝǝ , nko ke ini bǝ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristoo , Onanto tsya laamansǝ bo lɛkɔ sitinti nɛ .
47001006	Lǝ báte bo ohiãa , báte bo ohiã bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ omansǝ mi lɛkɔ , lǝ ofo mi lǝ nkpǝ . Lǝ bámansǝ bo lɛkɔɔ , bámansǝ bo lɛkɔ itǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ omansǝ mi lɛkɔ bǝ lǝ befo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ mi kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto okle ǝsuǝ fe kase bo tsya leeyifo lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto okle seka kǝmiǝ .
47001007	Kulesa saa embofo bo kusubebe lǝ mi disi butinkǝsǝ , itsyise fe kanyi ka biǝnyǝ fe bo ke sekaa , nko ke Onanto loomansǝ mi lɛkɔ fe kase úkamansǝ bo tsya lɛkɔ seka .
47001008	Bayimi , bola boǝ bete bulǝ bo eto okle dítu bo lǝ Asia eto kasɔ kukɔnɔ . Kanyi ka búnyǝ ákɛ ale itǝ bo tinti itǝ bǝ bóensibe kusu boǝ bɔɔkɛ nkpǝ kulaa tsya .
47001009	Lǝ sitintii , iyifo bo fe dikpǝnkpi bálo bo ! Fɛɛ nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ nko bǝ lǝ bufi bo kusubebe butǝkǝ lǝ Onanto wǝ laatakasǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kaboko nkpǝ ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ bo mate eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
47001010	Úlǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ kplɛ kǝmiǝ . Nya unsi wuukǝlǝkǝ bo tsya lefe saa . Sitintii , wǝ ini bɔnlɛ kusu bobe boǝ usi wuulǝkǝ bo tsya kokoko ,
47001011	lǝ kase biato ola lǝ bo disi eso . Itsyise lǝ betidi kpǝ aato olaa , Onanto ebɔnɔ mǝ olatoto nya betidi kpǝ lɔɔsɔ wǝ ani lǝ kase ɔ́wunsǝko bo eso .
47001012	Lesa nǝ eso boabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato ni bǝnkǝ bo akɔɛsi anlo bo dikpi , itsyise bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ betidi kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nya bo ku mi eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ áyɛ lǝ Onanto eto kusu ǝsuǝ , nya kawɛ lǝmbǝ lǝ nnya kǝmiǝ . Inni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobetete ǝsuǝ buufi bunsi nkpǝ ku mi nko , bomu lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ku wǝ ǝsuǝale nnya ǝsuǝ bútǝkǝko eso .
47001013	Asa nnya biofo bokla kanɔ kasɔɔ , nnya hã ete boawɔni kǝtǝ mi nɛ . Nya ite bǝ asa nyamfo eto ǝtsyuǝ eto kasɔ ete bɛnɔ mɔmɔ tsyaa , mfo nnɔ miǝ biubǝ bɛnɔ bo kasɔ belosǝ kenke , nya yuutǝ bǝ biofo ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ lǝ bo disi , nya bo tsya loofo ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ lǝ mi disi lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
47001014	
47001015	Lǝ nnya mimfo nyamfo kenke minɔ nko esoo , minka nsusu búlǝkǝ miǝ eni lǝ nka mi ɔflɔ bɔyɛ bǝ lǝ mi disuǝyuǝ lǝ diyifo sinuǝ .
47001016	Tutɛɛ , eni lǝ mbǝ nyɛ mfó lǝ ntɔ lǝ Makedoniaa , ku lǝ nlɛ businkli nlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝ lǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ nsu Yudea .
47001017	Se mínlǝkǝ mɔ nsusu miǝ lǝ nyifo nkoo , bote nyamfo nlɛ bǝ meenyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ? Nya bote nyamfo nlɛ bǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nsusu meefi keyifo asa fe utidi wǝ laatsyi wǝ nsusu kawuninsǝ mlǝmǝmlǝ katɛyi nkǝ , ee ku owo lǝ lefe lɔni nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝ ?
47001018	Bomu fe kase Onanto laatɛyi ɔnukualɛɛ , nko ke ini lesa saa nǝ bɔ́wɔni bótsyese mi ni nɛ . Nya inni fe kase utidi laakpɔ katɛyi nkǝ ee kesinkli katɛyi nkǝ owo , inni .
47001019	Onanto eto Ubi Yesu Kristo eto ditiki nǝ mɔ ku Silvano ku Timoteo lébe letsya bútǝ mii , inni nwǝ laatɛyi nkǝ ee usi ɔtɛyi nkǝ owo tsya . Bomu uyifo nwǝ eto ditiki ni ee lefe saa .
47001020	Itsyise Onanto eto kɛnyɛ saa ka ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝǝ , ǝbǝ itǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo eso boatɛyi ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ boǝnkǝ , “ Ibǝ itǝ nko . ” Bǝ lǝ bufi atɛsǝ butǝ Onanto .
47001021	Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ bo ku mimblɛ kenke yifo bani ku Kristo nya wǝ kosate dílǝkǝ bo útsyǝ nkǝ buyifo wǝ kekyifo .
47001022	Wǝ ni nwǝ dítǝkǝ bo léba útsyǝ úfi óte nkǝ wǝ mbǝ bo lefe saa , nya úfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ókpe bo lǝ akɔɛsi fenkǝ lekpotsyǝtsyǝ itǝ lǝ asa nnya kenke buubǝ boofo butsyiko lǝ wǝ ani .
47001023	Onanto ni adansiɛ lǝ mɔ ku mi nti nkǝ kaminsǝ mínyǝ mi eso mínnyɛ Korinto busu nɛ .
47001024	Inni bǝnkǝ lǝ bufi lesa nǝ bofo bɔnɔ bɔnyinkǝ mi bokpe eso , itsyise mi bofokanɔ fe dińyǝ kekleke koko . Nyaso bɔnlɛ keyifo buyifo ku mi bǝ lǝ binyǝ disuǝyuǝ nɛ .
47002001	Nyaso nyifo mɔ nsusu minkǝ mensiembubǝ mi ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ mbǝ nló mi ani .
47002002	Itsyise lǝ mbǝ nló mi anii , owoe nsi lɔɔkɛ wǝ lookpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ , enso mimba mǝ ke mintǝ ani léló mfó ?
47002003	Nyaso míwɔni kukue kekleke nkomǝ míntsyese mi nɛ , itsyise mánla miǝ lǝ mbǝ mfó , yuutǝ buitǝ bǝ ani ló mɛ . Fɛɛ mi ni betidi ba ele bǝ bekpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ nɛ . Nya mfo nnɔ miǝ lǝ nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝǝ , mi tsya ǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ nkomǝ ke .
47002004	Sitintii , kukue ko míwɔni míntǝ mi mfóo , nwɔni ko lǝ bulǝ kpǝ ku lǝ binǝntu ǝsuǝ . Nya mánwɔni ko bǝ lǝ itǝ ani lǝ eló mi kutsyuǝ , bomu bǝ le binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpo kase maala mi sitinti eso .
47002005	Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ útǝ ani áló utsyǝǝ , inni mɔ mate ete úyifo nko . Bomu boofo bɔtɛyi lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ boǝ bomblɛ kenke utǝ ani léló . Fɛɛ manla miǝ boǝkǝ wǝ kotomɛ bosonsǝ .
47002006	Kase mi kpǝ díkǝnǝ utidi ǝmfo koto lǝ mi ntii , ǝsiǝ itǝ wǝ .
47002007	Nyaso bifi lesa nǝ úyifo bɛtsyɛ wǝ lǝ bekpe wǝ nkɛale bǝ lǝ ɛyɛ wǝ bulǝ lǝ eló wǝ ani kenke .
47002008	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ mi lekpakpa miǝ bekpe wǝ nkɛale lǝ bilǝkǝ bete wǝ biǝ bisi biala wǝ sitinti .
47002009	Nwɔni mi kukue komfo itsyise nla miǝ lǝ mfi nto mi mbe miǝ bińyǝ kekleke ku lǝ bietsyue asa nnya kenke maate mi koto lefe saa .
47002010	Lǝ bífi utsyuǝ eto botakebu bɛtsyɛ wǝǝ , mintsya éfi ntsyɛ wǝ . Nya lǝ mfi botakebu butsyuǝ ntsyɛ lǝ butsyuǝ kpe bǝ ele bǝ mfi ntsyɛ kulaa tsyaa , lǝ mi eso mímfi míntsyɛ lǝ Kristo eto ǝnǝmi .
47002011	Nnyifo nyamfo nko lǝ kase Obonsam lǝmbotafa mi , itsyise buyi wǝ kobe .
47002012	Se mínsu míndufǝ Troas eto Umǝ miǝ lǝ nsu mbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya itsyi lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ miǝ Bonamute ébɔsini kusu itǝ keyifo kamǝ lǝ mfó .
47002013	Fɛɛ ílǝ mɛ tinti itsyise mǝnnyǝ mɔ ɔyimisani Tito mfó . Lǝ nyaso ntɔ kusu nya mímfe mínsu Makedonia .
47002014	Fɛɛ boasɔ Onanto ani ! Nya ɛyɛ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristoo , Onanto aayɛnko bo lefe saa fe ndomufɔ ba lǝǝtǝkǝko Kristo lǝ wǝ katobutǝkǝ eto bɔyɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto aayɛ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ kabe Kristo letsya kate kawunsiǝ kenke fe kase nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi eto ufiebi laayɛ katsyo kesu kalebe saa .
47002015	Itsyise buyifo fe ufiebi wǝ laanyi fififi wǝ Kristo dífi útǝ Onanto wǝ leesensǝ kesu betidi ba nyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ itǝ bofo ku mba nyɛ lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ ntɔ lǝ bonya ǝsuǝ .
47002016	Itǝ betidi ba lembunyǝ nkpǝ manloo , buyifo fe ufiebi wǝ laate mǝ bǝ bonya eto ole beni . Fɛɛ betidi ba luunyǝ bofoo , buyifo fe ufiebi wǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ manlo itǝ mǝ . Nya lǝ sitinti , owoe loofo keyifo kamfo eto okle buyifo ?
47002017	Bunte fe betidi kpǝ ba laafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kayɛnko fe bikǝ bia baate lǝ asi . Fɛɛ se ini Onanto dílǝkǝ bo esoo , buyifo bani ku Kristo nya boedi etiki lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi fe Kristo eto beyifoyifo .
47003001	Bote nyamfo nlɛ nkǝ busi bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ bɔtɛsɛ ? Fe kase inte itǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ sekaa , isi ehiã kukue bofo ketsyiko mi ɔflɔ nye kaboko mi itǝ bo bulǝkǝ kate ?
47003002	Mi kosate ni kukue ko nkpe bo , ko bákawɔni bákpe lǝ bo ketu kǝmiǝ itǝ le utsyuǝ saa loofo bote ku lǝ okla .
47003003	Ekpa wuee bǝ Kristo kosate lɛyɛ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ nya útǝ nkǝ bofo bɔnɔ . Nyaso mi ni kukue ko ɔ́wɔni . Inni awɔnisa eto ntu úfi ɔ́wɔni asa nyamfo . Bomu Onanto Eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi nkpǝ eto ǝsuǝalǝ úfi ɔ́wɔni nnya . Nya wánwɔni nnya lǝ aba ǝsuǝ fe kase úyifo nnya lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ , bomu lǝ betidi eto ketu kǝmiǝ .
47003004	Boofo bɔtɛyi nko boǝ bokpe kǝńyǝkɔ ka Onanto dítǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ eso .
47003005	Bumbǝ kɛnyɛ boofo bɔtɛyi boǝ bokpe ǝsuǝale lǝ bo ǝsuǝ boafo keyifo kamfo buyifo . Bomu ǝsuǝale nnya nkpe bo etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ .
47003006	Wǝ ni nwǝ díyifo nkǝ bɔkɛ ǝsuǝale lǝ bofiani kɛnyɛklekle fɔfɔ kamǝ eto batɔnkpe . Nya kɛnyɛklɛklɛ fɔfɔ kamfo anyɛ lǝ afi koko nnya báwɔni bǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu kayɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise afi nya báwɔni bǝtsyǝǝ , aaboko ukpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝǝtǝ nkpǝ .
47003007	Onanto eto afi nnya báwɔni kokoko mfóo , eyifo etiki nnya báwɔni bǝtǝkǝ lǝ aba ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ béfi nnya bǝtǝ betidi , Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝtǝ bǝ Moses eto ǝnǝmi ǝyǝnde . Nya íte bǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝlǝkǝ ibu lǝ Moses eto ǝnǝmi tsyaa , Israel bebi mámfo buńyǝ kabe wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya lǝ afi nnya laafo bo dikpǝnkpi bolo ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ete ku Onanto eto diyǝnde nkoo ,
47003008	nya lɛ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto lɛbɔbi eto diyǝnde so ditutɛ famfamfa .
47003009	Nya lǝ kɔfi koko ko laalo utidi dikpǝnkpi áfo diyǝnde nǝmfo eto okle butǝ , ele bǝ bote boǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ leeyifo bomba leeyifo kasɛɛ eto diyǝnde eboso ditutɛ eto lele kenke .
47003010	Bɔlɛ bɔtɛyi nko itsyise diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ nkpe mfo mɔmɔɔ , éyifo dinyǝndǝ nǝ lɛkɛ kɔ fe lɛni .
47003011	Nya lǝ lesa nǝ lɛkɛ itǝ lefe kliminti ǝnyǝ diyǝnde nǝmfo eto oklee , nyalɛ lesa nǝ nte itǝ manlo manlo eto diyǝnde eboso famfamfa . Ni diyǝnde so nǝmfó kon .
47003012	Nya se bonkpe kusubebe lǝ lesa fɔfɔ nǝ lǝmbǝ kalokɔ esoo , nyaso boedi etiki saa wuee ku ɔkɔɛ nɛ .
47003013	Nya bunte fe Moses wǝ dífi ofiamɛ úti wǝ ǝnǝmi itǝ lǝ Israel bebi lǝ buunnyǝ bǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde nǝ lɛkɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛ bɔni kalo .
47003014	Sitintii , mǝ nsusu mányɛ etsyo , ibǝ ese lǝ mi . Ite fe ofiamɛ wǝ mfo eto okle si uti mǝ lǝ nsusu lǝ balɛ kɔfi koko eto kukue komfo eto ditiki bokla . Itsyise lesa nǝ hã luutǝ bǝlǝkǝ ofiamɛ ǝmfó bato bakpe ni lǝ utidi lǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ okpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ .
47003015	Sitinti ibǝ ese taa mmii , lǝ balɛ Moses eto afi eto kukue eto etiki nyamfo boklaa , iyifo fe ofiamɛ ǝmǝ si uti mǝ lǝ nsusu .
47003016	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi átsyi ɔwuninsǝ úfi ǝsuǝ útǝ Bonamutee , ófiamɛ wǝ leeti wǝ nsusuu , aasini nya waanɔ etiki nyamǝ kasɔ .
47003017	Nya mɔmɔɔ , Bonamute wǝ bɔnlɛ bokpadi mfo , ni Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nɛ . Nya kaka Bonamute eto Lɛwɔnɔ nkpee , ǝǝtǝ kusu itǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ eto busiǝ .
47003018	Nya bomba mblɛ kenke ba kulesa saa enti bo lǝ ǝnǝmi bɔnlɛ Bonamute eto diyǝnde nǝmǝ bulǝkǝ kate wuee . Balɛ bo bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ kǝtsyǝ lǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bo diyǝnde nǝmǝ nlɛ kato bobe kakpe . Bonamute ǝmǝ ni Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nlɛ nyamfo buyifo nko nɛ .
47004001	Onanto lǝ wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dífi keyifo kamfo ókpe bo lǝ kɔni . Lǝ nyaso ani anló bo lǝ ke buyifo ǝsuǝ .
47004002	Búlǝkǝ ato lǝ asabiɔmbiɔ ku afanisa saa buyifo ǝsuǝ . Bɔ́ni awɛsu saa ku Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ . Bomu boǝlǝkǝ ɔnukualɛ kate . Boǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo lekpa wuee lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi itǝ utsyuǝ saa ebunyǝ bo ditsyǝbi sɛɛ utsyǝ lekpo .
47004003	Nya lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ boabé letsya mfo eyifo akulasa itǝ betidi betsyuǝǝ , bete biǝ mba nyɛ lǝ konyasu ǝsuǝ ete iyifo akulasaa itǝ .
47004004	Nya betidi bamfó mámfo bánɔ itsyise kawunsiǝ kamfo eto olo , Obonsam , éti mǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya weeti mǝ kusu bǝ baamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ eto lekpasǝ nǝ mǝ bunyǝ . Lekpasǝ nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ditsyi Kristo eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ wǝ ni Onanto kosate eto ditsyǝbi .
47004005	Boambe bo kosate eto ǝsuǝ letsya kǝtǝ mi , bomu Yesu Kristo ni nwǝ eto ditiki boabé letsya kǝtǝ mi boǝ wǝ ni Bonamute . Nya bo eyifo beyifoyifo itǝ mi lǝ Yesu eto disi eso .
47004006	Onanto wǝ lɛtɛyi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ nkǝ , “ Lekpasǝ yǝnde lɛbɔ ditsyi ketuntu ǝsuǝ , ” ke ni Onanto wǝ dítǝ nkǝ wǝ lekpasǝ yǝnde lǝ bo ketu kǝmiǝ lǝ ditǝ nkǝ bunyǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde nǝ nlɛ buyǝnde lǝ Yesu Kristo eto ǝnǝmi butsyǝ lekpo .
47004007	Fɛɛ bomba léfo asafokoya nyamfo itsyi Onanto ɔflɔɔ , te fe sɛfɔte eto ekplibi . Nya ite nko lǝ ilǝkǝ eté sitinti bǝ , inni bo ɔflɔ ǝsuǝale kplɛ kenke nyamǝ ditsyi , bomu itsyi Onanto ɔflɔ .
47004008	Boǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ bulǝ bomǝ aanso bo ani . Yaakpe bo nsusu bulǝ , fɛɛ yaanló bo ani .
47004009	Balo kpǝ ǝǝtǝkǝko bo , fɛɛ Onanto aanyani bo kǝtsyǝ . Ite bǝ baayinkǝ bo kakpe lǝ kasɔ tsyaa , bambiasǝ bo .
47004010	Lefe saa , bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝǝnyǝ kanyi ka laale Yesu eto ukpǝ eto okle . Bǝ lǝ nkpǝ bo bunsi , lǝ bole Yesu eto nle .
47004011	Lǝ sitintii , nkpǝ bo bunsi kenke kpe lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ kǝmiǝ lǝ Yesu eto disi eso bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ Yesu eto nkpǝ eto ditsyǝbi lǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo lǝ bo .
47004012	Lǝ mmǝ esoo , ukpǝ lɛ keyifo lǝ bo lefe saa , fɛɛ nkpǝ lɛ keyifo lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
47004013	Báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ , nyaso mímbe wǝ letsya nɛ . ” Nko ke ini bǝ bo tsya áfo bɔ́nɔ eso bóbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya nɛ .
47004014	Nya buyi boǝ Onanto wǝ létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝǝ , wǝ ǝmǝ ke ebotakasǝ bo tsya ku Yesu oboko nkpǝ nya wookpa bo ku mi kenke oboko wǝ ǝnǝmi .
47004015	Mi lɛlɛkǝsǝ eso asa nyamfo kenke nte nko . Nya kase mba Onanto nlɛ wǝ lefonǝ bote nlɛ bufui kakpe , ebutǝ bǝ mǝ lɛninsɔ lǝ lebe kato lekpe bǝ lǝ befi batɛsǝ Onanto .
47004016	Lǝ nyamfo eso boǝntǝ ani laalo bo , lǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ lɛ buku kulaa tsyaa , buyi boǝ bo lɛwɔnɔ kǝmiǝ eto nkpǝ lɛ boto kǝtǝkǝ lefe saa .
47004017	Nya kanyi sɛkɛ ka bɔnlɛ bunyǝ mɔmɔɔ , embutsyǝ ɛklɛ , bomu bɔlɔ kanlɛ bo ǝsuǝ kǝtsyǝ itǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ . Boǝmbofo ni bufi katesɛ ko kanyi saa .
47004018	Inni asa nnya boǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ boefi bo ǝnǝmi kǝtǝkǝ , bomu lǝ asa nnya boǝnnyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya asa nnya boǝnyǝ ku ǝnǝmi te itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ ete . Nya nnya bo ǝnǝmi lembofo bunyǝǝ , te itǝ lefe saa .
47005001	Nya lǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia ni dibú nǝ kafo boǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo abaa , bokpe diyo bamba lǝ Onanto eto Umǝ kato . Nya diyo nǝmfoo , wǝ kosate dífi wǝ ani óto , nya diuńyǝ lefe saa .
47005002	Nya lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ bunsi lǝ kasɔ mfo lǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝǝ , boala kawɔnɔ . Nya boabe kusu kekleke boǝ lǝ bofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto umǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ .
47005003	Nya lǝ bofo kato eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo , yensiembutsyǝ fe busi leya .
47005004	Nya se bunsi lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto sinǝ eto dibú kafo , busi boala kawɔnɔ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya inni bǝnkǝ bola boǝ lǝ bɔbɔ lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu bola boǝ lǝ bofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto sinǝ buti lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ sinǝ sia lǝǝnkpǝ lǝ sefo nsia lǝǝkpǝ eto kɛnyɛ kenke .
47005005	Onanto ni nwǝ lɛlɔ bo utsyǝ itǝ nko eto bofloma bomfo eto bubǝ . Nya úfi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ bo fe lesa nǝ bufi bɔnlɛ kusu bobe uyi bose itǝ asa nnya kenke ɔ́lɔ utsyǝ bo eto bubǝ .
47005006	Nyamfo eso bonkpe ɔkɔɛ lefe saa nɛ . Nya buyi boǝnkǝ lǝ bokpe lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo ǝsuǝ , boanyotɔ Bonamute ɔflɔ nye wǝ ǝnǝmi .
47005007	Nya nkpǝ bo bunsi mfoo , busi mu lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya inni lǝ lesa nǝ bo ǝnǝmi kǝnyǝ lǝ bote ini .
47005008	Bokpe ɔkɔɛ tinti nya enkpe bo ɔkɔɛ enso lǝ boyani ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo butsyǝ lǝ budufǝ Bonamute eto ku bo ǝnǝmi bomu .
47005009	Nya lesa nǝ bɔnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ enso kenke ni bǝ , bokpe mfo o-o , bokpe lǝ Onanto eto umǝ o-o , ele bǝ buyifo lesa nǝ luudufǝ wǝ ǝnǝ .
47005010	Itsyise ele bǝ bomblɛ bɔ lɔ Kristo eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ okponko bo lekpo . Nya utsyuǝ saa loofo kayo ka dinyǝ itǝ lǝ nkpǝ bo usiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Kase keni o-o , kabua keni o-o , Kristo ebofo wǝ kayo ɛyɛ lǝ nkpǝ bo úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ kamfo kɛnyɛ .
47005011	Se bunyi boǝ ele bǝ bote Bonamute ǝmǝ sikpii , eso boakplatsya kefi nya kakpe betidi bamba ǝsuǝ bǝ mǝ tsya yifo nko . Onanto wǝ yi kase bunte kenke nya mfo nnɔ miǝ mi tsya yi bo ditsyǝbi taa utu kǝmiǝ .
47005012	Inni bǝnkǝ busi bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ bɔtɛsǝ kate mi , bomu bɔlɛ bokplatsya boǝ boǝtǝ mi lǝ bebesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ bo disi eso . Nnla miǝ binyǝ kǝńyǝnkɔ befo mbuayɛ butǝ betidi ba leefi ǝsuǝ eto dinyǝsa kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , nya inni bǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ eso .
47005013	Lǝ iyifo bǝtsyuǝ fe betidi ba disi lebia bunii , nyalɛ itsyi lǝ keyifo ka boeyifo ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto wǝ boala eso . Nya lǝ disi mambia boo , ite nko itǝ mi lɛlɛkɛsǝ .
47005014	Kristo eto lelabi nǝ onkpe itǝ bo eyi bo ǝsuǝ . Nya se ekpako bo boǝ utidi ɔni ete díkpǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto disi esoo , nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ bomblɛ díkpǝ .
47005015	Kristo ǝkpǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto disi bǝ lǝ mba nsi nkpǝ , mensisiǝ nkpǝ itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nye mǝ lelabi . Bomu lǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ itǝ Kristo wǝ díkpǝ lǝ mǝ disi esoo , wǝ batakasǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ .
47005016	Nya lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , boensiemfi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi eto kɛnyɛ kakponko kuutsyuǝ lekpo . Ite bǝ bókponko Kristo lekpo lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , mɔmɔɔ , boesienyifo nko .
47005017	Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ ku Kristo éyifo banii , útǝ nkǝ ofiani utidi fɔfɔ . Nya wǝ utidi eto ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ ébubǝ lefe . Nya lɛfɔfɔ ébubǝ lefo lǝ ni kɛnyɛ .
47005018	Onanto ni nwǝ díyifo asa nyamfo kenke . Nya úlǝkǝ asa nnya lébiasǝ bo ku wǝ nti bǝ lǝ buyifo bani ku wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝ ke ni nwǝ dífi keyifo kamfo ókpe bo lǝ ani nkǝ lǝ bunǝ betidi bamba boboko wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ ɔlɔ mǝ ku wǝ nti bafiani bahɔ .
