50001013	Itǝ nyasoo , bamamanyǝ ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekayo mfo ku betidi bamba kpǝ ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekayo mfo ǝnyǝ bǝtsyuǝ lekpo bǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo itsyise nyifo Kristo eto uyifoyifo eso .
50001014	Ɛwunsɛ ku nyamfoo , mɔ bokpe lǝ diyo esi itǝ bafokanɔfɔ kpǝ esi bakpe utu bawunsǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bensiate sikpi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi ku ute .
50001015	Lǝ sitintii , mǝ nti betidi eto bǝtsyuǝ aayɛ lǝ kutsyuǝsɛ kpɔkpɔ ǝsuǝ kedi Kristo eto ditiki nǝmǝ kate , nya baala bǝ baatanko mɛ lǝ ni bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ eeyifo nnya ku nsusu sɛɛ .
50001016	Lelabi dítǝ betidi eto lekpa nuǝfǝ nǝmfo bǝ babe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya mmǝ , itsyise beyi bǝnkǝ bokpe Onanto lékpe mɛ nke nta Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ disi .
50001017	Fɛɛ betidi eto lekpa tutɛ ábe Kristo letsya lǝ kusu ko ǝmǝ boonyǝ kutǝkǝ kǝtǝ mǝ suǝ eso , nya inni lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , bomu bǝ lǝ beyifo nko lǝ kanyi ka minlɛ bunyǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo lǝ kabe kato kaso .
50001018	Fɛɛ nyamfo menyifo kulesa . Nya ni bǝ utsyuǝ abe Kristo letsya lǝ sidia , sidia ǝsuǝ o-o , lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ o-o , mɔ alɛɛ , bǝ bábe Kristo letsyaa , nnya mate aakpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ .
50001019	Nya muusukosǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝmǝ bunyǝ itsyise nyi miǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mi olatoto ǝsuǝ ku lǝ bɔwunsǝko bo laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , boolǝkǝ mɛ lǝ diyo .
50001020	Nnya ǝsuǝ mimfi ǝnǝ mintǝkǝ ku minlɛ kusu bobe kekleke ni bǝ medi kofani lǝ mɔ keyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomu bǝ lefe saa , ku lǝ titlu mɔmɔɔ , lǝ nkpe nkɛale ku mɔ ǝsuǝale kenke , bǝ muunǝ dibu mboko Kristo , lǝ nkpe nkpǝ o-o nye lǝ bukpǝ mínkpe tsya .
50001021	Nya be ni nkpǝ ? Lǝ mɔ kutsyǝǝ , nnya ni bǝ lǝ nsi nkpǝ ntǝ Kristo . Nya lǝ nkpee , nnya bomu luusi yooboko mɛ kutǝkǝ eso nɛ .
50001022	Lǝ nnya ete minsi muusiǝ nkpǝǝ , eni muuyifo keyifo ka luubǝ kutǝkǝ . Fɛɛ mante nnya ele bǝ mfi lenti , ukpǝ lee nkpǝ .
50001023	Mɔ nsusu áma lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Eni moola tinti miǝ maabɔ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo nsu nsiǝ lǝ Kristo ɔflɔ , itsyise nyamfo alɛkɛ eso famfamfamfa .
50001024	Fɛɛ lǝ mi esoo , efe bǝ nsi nsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo .
50001025	Se mimfo nyamfo minɔ nko esoo , nyi miǝ muusiǝ lǝ mimblɛ kenke ɔflɔ nsukosǝ nyifo bo kenke minlɛ buyifo bǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ , lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
50001026	Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ bioo , biunyǝ kusu bebesǝ ǝsuǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ bǝ biyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu eso .
50001027	Lesa nǝ lefé mɔmɔ ni bǝnkǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bo dinyǝnko mba léfo Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ . Itǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ o-o , mǝmbǝ o-o , lǝ nnɔ ntsyiko lǝ mi ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ku nsusu ǝsuǝ nya bińyǝ kɛnyɛkani lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ disi bota .
50001028	Biante mi balo sikpi . Bomu bińyǝ ku utu kekleke . Nyamfo loote mǝ bǝ mǝ ebonya bedufǝǝ kasɔ nya mi ebutǝkǝ mǝ kato , itsyise Onanto nwǝ nlɛ bɔkpɔ kǝtǝ mi , ebutǝ bitǝkǝ kato .
50001029	Itsyise bǝtǝ mi kusu bǝ bisumu Kristo inni bǝ lǝ befo wǝ bɛnɔ ete eso , bomu bǝ lǝ binyǝ kanyi tsya lǝ wǝ disi eso .
50001030	Nya mɔmɔɔ , bɛkpɔnko mɛ lema nǝmǝ . Lema nǝmǝ bínyǝ míkakpɔ kɔ ǝmǝ ete nɛ . Nya fe kase bɛɛnɔ , ni ǝmǝ ke ete minsi minlɛ bɔkpɔ nɛ .
50002001	Mfo nnɔ miǝ mi nkpǝ bo benkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , ǝtǝ bínyǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wǝ lelabi lǝǝyuǝsǝ mi ketu . Biyifo bani ku wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ , nya bɛnlɛ mi ǝsuǝ wɔkɔkɔkɔɔkɔ lǝ kafoɛkpɛ ku kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
50002002	Nnya lǝ nko ini sitintii , nyalɛ muukǝnko mi miǝ bitǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ nsusu bɔni ku lelabi lǝ lɛkɛ bo nya lǝ biyifo lɔni lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ku disibubu ǝsuǝ .
50002003	Bienyifo kulesa nǝ lete mɔ mate hã eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ nye ǝsuǝ katobǝsǝbesǝ eto ditsyǝbi . Bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , nya bibu betidi bamba fe balɛkɛ baso mi .
50002004	Nya bɛbɛbɛ betidi bamba eto kasɛɛ , inni fǝ mate eto lɛlɛkɛsɛ ete .
50002005	Bitǝ lǝ nsusu bo lɛkɛ Kristo Yesu , lǝ bɔkɛ mi tsya .
50002006	Nnya ni bǝ ite bǝ okpe Onanto eto ditsyebi tsyaa , wóemfi nnya lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nkǝ lǝ okate ku Onanto .
50002007	Bomu lǝ wǝ kosate eto lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , úfi lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ útǝ kafo faa , nya úyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ usumutidi . Nya úbǝ bále fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi .
50002008	Utidi eto ditsyǝbi lɛkɛ wǝ nya óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya ɔ́yɛ lǝ kototsyuetsyue eto kusu ǝsuǝ úsu taa ukpǝ kǝmiǝ , ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
50002009	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ábesǝ wǝ kato ka nso kenke , nya úfi diye nǝ nso bɔmɔ kaso diye saa útǝkǝ wǝ .
50002010	Nya lǝ bakpadi Yesu eto diyee , ele bǝ asayifoyifo nnya kenke nkpe kato ku kasɔ ku nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔnti se akonki bǝtǝ wǝ .
50002011	Nya mǝmblɛ luufe kɛnyɛ batɛyi bǝ Yesu Kristo ni Bonamute , bǝ lǝ befi batɛsǝ Onanto wǝ ni Boanto .
50002012	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , fe kase bietsyue mɛ koto lefe saa , ite bǝ mimbǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ mɔmɔ tsyaa kulaa , isi efe bǝ bitsyuǝ koto beso . Bekplatsya kekleke lǝ bifi sikpitete ku ketinkǝ biyifo keyifo ka diyǝnko mi bulǝkǝ .
50002013	Itsyise Onanto lɛ keyifo lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lefe saa nkǝ lǝ yuutǝ bɛtɔnɔ bitsyue asa nnya útsyue utsyǝ koto .
50002014	Biankpe kǝnǝ nye beto taflatsyǝ lǝ kulesa buyifo ǝsuǝ .
50002015	Itǝ bǝ lǝ kawunsuǝ biabia ka diyi ku abuayifoyifo mfoo , mii , biyifo Onanto eto bebi ba lekpa nya beele ku dikpilolo saa lǝmbǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ biyǝnde lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto nti fe kase befandebi lǝǝyǝnde lǝ kato seka .
50002016	Befo ditiki nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ nǝmǝ bɛlɛ kekleke , bǝ lǝ Kristo eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , moofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ katɛyi minkǝ méntsyetsyi bimba nye ményifo keyifo bimba .
50002017	Mi bofokanɔ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ ku mi keyifoyifoyifo te fenkǝ keditǝtǝ kǝtǝ wǝ . Eni mɔ kɔtɔ bokpo lǝ kasɔ ekɔko keditǝtǝ kamfo . Nya lǝ ibǝ nkoo , yɔɔkɛ mɛ ɔkɔɛ nya muunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ku mi mblɛ .
50002018	Nko ke ini nɛ bǝ mi tsya nyǝ disuǝyuǝ beto keyudu ku mɛ nɛ !
50002019	Lǝ Bonamte atɔnɔɔ , yɛmbɔklɛ , mootsyese Timoteo mi ɔflɔ , bǝ lǝ usinkli ubǝ ɔtɛyi mɛ kase asa nte lǝ mi ɔflɔ , lǝ nsi nyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
50002020	Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mimbǝ kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ leefi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ mɔ ku mi etiki ǝsuǝ fe wǝ .
50002021	Nya bafɛfɛɛ , utsyuǝ saa lɛ wǝ lɛlɛkǝsǝ ete bobe , nya inni nnya ni Yesu Kristo eto kusu eto ale .
50002022	Fɛɛ mi kosate yi biǝ Timoteo alɛɛ , ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ uni utǝ mɛ , kase wǝǝkǝnko mɛ lǝ keyifo kamǝ ǝsuǝ fe ubi ku anto itǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto busǝnsǝ ǝsuǝ .
50002023	Nyaso nlɛ kusu bobe miǝ , lǝ nyǝ kase asa nyamǝ luubǝ itsyǝ ku mɛ koo , mootsyese wǝ mi ɔflɔ mlǝ .
50002024	Nya mfo nnɔ tsya miǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ kosate ebutǝ mɛ kusu nkǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ .
50002025	Mbu tsya miǝ ele bǝ ntsyese bo ɔyimi Epafrodito mi ɔflɔ , wǝ díńyǝko mɛ kekleke lǝ Onanto eto keyifo ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ni mi ɔtɔyɛ wǝ bétsyese mɔ ɔflɔ biǝ ubǝ ɔwunsǝko mɛ .
50002026	Se unyi nkǝ bɛnɔ biǝ ǝsuǝ abia wǝ esoo , ílǝ wǝ tinti nya óla kekleke nkǝ wǝǝbǝ unyǝ mimblɛ .
50002027	Lǝ sitintii , ɔ́nɔ bufi kekleke ibu sɛkɛ lǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝnyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ , nya inni wǝ mate bomu ku mɔ tã . Lenni nko eni mɔ kanyinyǝnyǝ eto bitsyikǝ eboso mɛ ani ku butsyi .
50002028	Nyamfo kulaa eso minla miǝ matsyese wǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ binyǝ wǝ , lǝ binyǝnko wǝ disuǝnyǝ , nya mintsya loola nwɔnɔ mɔ utu siǝ kasɔ sɛkɛ .
50002029	Nyaso befo wǝ ani ǝnuǝ , binyǝko wǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ . Bitǝ betidi bamfo eto okle dibu .
50002030	Itsyise ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ nya untǝ kpǝ lǝ Kristo eto keyifo ka nkǝ woawunsǝko mɛ lǝ nyifo ka biamfo mǝ bɔwunsǝko nyifo eso .
50003001	Kafɛfɛkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ biyifo bani ku Bonamute . Yenlǝ mɛ bǝ nsi nwɔni asa nyamfo ke ntsyese mi , itsyise nyamfo luutǝ buinyǝ kekleke nɛ .
50003002	Bɛlɛ ola bińyǝ bikabe babuayifo bamfó ba leeyifo asa fe bakpa , betidi ba lǝǝńyǝ kekleke bǝ bala ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ , ini lelolala .
50003003	Bo ni mba léfo lelolala eto lekpa inni mǝ , itsyise boesumu Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya boǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ se buyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu eso . Nya boemfi ǝsuǝ butǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bola eto lekpayifoyifo .
50003004	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ebu nkǝ woofo ǝsuǝ bufi kǝtǝ lelolala eto lekpa buyifoo , eni mɔ bomu ele bǝ mfo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lekpayifoyifo eto asa ntǝ ǝsuǝ nso .
50003005	Mɔɔ , se bále mɛ eto diyi flamfla lee , nnya bála mɛ lelo nɛ , Israelnyǝ tinti mini nya mbɔ ntsyi lǝ Benyamin eto kafo . Hebrinyǝ kosate kosate wǝ eto anto ni Hebrinyǝ tinti wǝ mini nɛ . Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo Farisinyǝ .
50003006	Nya lǝ kǝtsyuǝfifi lǝ Yudanyǝdidi ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kekleke itǝ bǝ ntǝkǝko Kristo eto bafokanɔfɔ kama nte mǝ ohiã tinti . Nya lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , dikpilolo saa ǝmbɔkǝ lǝ mɛ itsyise , nyifo lǝ ko ǝsuǝ tinti .
50003007	Fɛɛ lǝ kutǝkǝ kutsyuǝ akɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ itǝ mɛ kɔ ǝmǝ tsyaa , mɔmɔɔ , lǝ Kristo esoo , efiani asa bimba nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa itǝ mɛ .
50003008	Sitintii , mfi nyamfo kenke fe asa nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa , itsyise mbǝ nyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo miǝ Kristo Yesu hã ni Bonamute nya nyamfo afe mɛ eso asa fɛfɛ kenke . Lǝ wǝ esoo , ntó lesa saa nkpe nya mimfi asa fɛfɛ kenke fe kuku eto ekubi bǝ lǝ Kristo lǝ oka mɛ kɔni bonko wǝ lǝ buyifo bani ,
50003009	lǝ mfi mɔ ǝsuǝ kenke ntǝ wǝ . Nyasoo , minsini ɔsɛɛ itǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ asayifoyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ kɔfi komǝ kalɔ . Kasɛɛ ka ni lǝ Kristo bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ hã moofo buyifo . Kasɛɛ ka Onanto hã lǝǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
50003010	Nya lesa nǝ minla ni bǝ lǝ nte Kristo ku ǝsuǝale nnya dítǝ ótakasǝ wǝ utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ . Nya lǝ nnyǝ kanyi ku wǝ , lǝ nyifo lɔni ku wǝ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ ,
50003011	ku kusubebe bǝ Onanto ebotakasǝ mintsya utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ oboko nkpǝ .
50003012	Minlɛ bɔtɛyi minkɛ mbutǝkǝ kato nye mbɔflɔ nlo . Bomu nlɛ bokplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ mfo kayofofo ka Kristo Yesu luufi utǝ mɛ . Itsyise Kristo Yesu éyifo mɛ nkǝ mfiani wǝ ole .
50003013	Lǝ sitintii , mɔ bayimi lala , mamfo nnɔ miǝ mɔ kɔni éboka kayofofo kamǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ minlɛ bokplatsya lǝ nyifo ni lǝ nta nnya díkafe ǝsuǝ le mfi ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ nnya nte sɛtɔ eto kɔniboka ǝsuǝ .
50003014	Nyaso meetsyetsyi bebembe bǝ lǝ nsu nsa usunklu ǝmǝ nyila , bǝ lǝ mfo kayofofo ka Onanto lékpadi mɛ nkǝ mbǝ mfo lǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu eso .
50003015	Bitǝ lǝ nsusu bomfo lǝ bɔkɛ bomba díkabe lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe nsusu bamba ntsyuǝ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ nyamfo ote mi ekpa wuee .
50003016	Niǝ , niǝ , nniǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ bɔyɛ busu sɛtɔ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ búkayɛ ibǝ ese mɔmɔ .
50003017	Mɔ bayimi , bebe mɔ eyifobi ǝsuǝ bɛyɛ . Bɛlɛ ola bebe mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ ǝsuǝ fe kase búsiǝ bote mi seka .
50003018	Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo sesia , sesia mfe nya mɔmɔɔ , nsi nlɛ mi nnya bɔtɛyi ku binǝntu miǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ eto nkpǝ bo bensi ǝtǝ beyifo balo itǝ Kristo eto ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
50003019	Betidi bamfo eebudufɛ lǝ kanyimanlo manlo eto ute ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mǝ kafo ni mǝ onanto . Nnya ni afanisaa , nnya ǝsuǝ bomu bǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ nya befi mǝ nsusu bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ .
50003020	Fɛ , bo alɛɛ , bo umǝ ni kato nya buńyǝ bɔnlɛ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo kusu bobe bǝ lǝ utsyi kato ubǝ .
50003021	Wǝ loofloma bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia lǝmbǝ ale uyifo se fe wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia nkpe lǝ dinyǝndǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ǝsuǝalǝ nyamǝ ke ǝsuǝǝ , wuunǝ lesa saa okpe lǝ wǝ kɔfi kalɔ .
50004001	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi lala ba lefe bitǝ mɛ , ba minla miǝ mǝǝkǝnyǝ . Biakpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti nya maasɔ lɛkɔɛsi kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ mi disi . Mɔ bayimi lala , nko ele bǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ nɛ .
50004002	Nlɛ Ewodia ku Sinteke lekpakpa miǝ bɛnɔ bǝtsyuǝ kasɔ lǝ besinkli bisiǝ fe bayimisio lǝ Bonamute eso .
50004003	Nya mi tsya ba ni mɔ beyifotsyuǝ lalaa , nla miǝ bɛwunsǝko besio bamfo . Itsyise béyifo keyifo kekleke báwunsǝko mɛ bǝ lǝ busǝnsǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku Klemens ku mɔ beyifotsyuǝ bamba kenke ba eto aye nkpe lǝ Onanto eto Nkpǝ eto Kukue kafo .
50004004	Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lefe saa bǝ biyifo bani ku Bonamute ǝmǝ . Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi bio miǝ binyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
50004005	Bɛkɛ disuǝtsyǝ bitǝ utsyuǝ saa . Itsyise Bonamute ǝmǝ eto dibǝfe ebɔfi .
50004006	Biǝnsiǝ bikala kawɔnɔ lǝ kulesa ǝsuǝ , bomu bikato ola bikǝtǝ Onanto lǝ lesa saa nǝ lehiã mi ǝsuǝ , bikasɔ wǝ ani itsyi taa mi ketu kǝmiǝ ke .
50004007	Nya Onanto eto diyuǝ nǝ nso kawunsiǝ eto utidi eto kasɔnɔnɔ saa , lǝ lɛlɔ mi ketu ku nsusu ditsyǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
50004008	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , bitǝ lǝ lesa nǝ nso kɔnɔ ku nnya dińyǝ itǝ atɛsǝ lǝ iyi mi nsusu kǝmiǝ , nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ni ɔnukualɛ , lesa saa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ dibu , lesa saa nǝ ni lɛsɛɛ , lesa saa nǝ lekpa , lesa saa nǝ laanɔ bobe ku lesa sa nǝ dinyǝnko utidi nɛ .
50004009	Bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ lǝsanǝ békase ku béfo bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ , itsyi lǝ mɔ etikididi ku mɔ eyifosa tã ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝ lǝ usiǝko mi .
50004010	Lǝ mɔ lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute ǝsuǝǝ , iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti bǝ lǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ kamaa bisi bɛlɛ bulǝkǝ kate mɛ biǝ bifi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ bɛni mɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ , bomu kusu ete yǝntǝ bǝ bilǝkǝ bete nko .
50004011	Nya inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ lesaatsyuǝ ahiã mɛ , bomu mbókase lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ ku lǝ kalebe saa miǝ lesa nǝ kee nte mɛɛ , dufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ .
50004012	Nya lesa nǝ ini bǝ lesa hiã fǝ ku lesa nǝ ini bǝ , lǝsa tsyǝ fǝ eso kase fahiãa , mbokase kobe komfo . Itǝ bǝ lǝ kalebe saa ku lefe saa nyi kase muusiǝ nkpǝ , imi mɛ o-o , kukpɛnsǝ lɛ mɛ o-o , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mɛ . Lǝ ite mɛ kpǝ o-o nye elonko mɛ tsya .
50004013	Ǝsuǝale nnya Kristo ditǝ mɛɛ , nnya lǝǝtǝ maafo nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝ nɛ .
50004014	Fɛɛ bíyifo ɛlɛkɛ tinti bǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ bulǝ kǝmiǝ .
50004015	Nya mi Filipifɔ kosate yi biǝ idu lefe nǝ míndu lǝ Makedoniaa , nya mítsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe kasɔɔ , mi hã ni bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nlɛ mɛ bɔwunsǝko , kǝtǝ mɛ asa . Kutǝkǝ mínyǝ o-o , bɔsɔ ɛsɔ mɛ o-o , mi hã ni mba díkǝnko mɛ .
50004016	Lefe nǝ minkɛ lǝ Tesalonika kulaa tsyaa , se mínhiã bɔwunsǝko , bɛwunsǝko mɛ lefe kpǝ .
50004017	Nya inni ǝtǝsa minhiã itsyi mi ɔflɔ eso , bomu kutǝkǝ ko mi luunyǝ bɛyɛnko lǝ ǝtǝsa nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
50004018	Béfo mɛ kayo kenke . Nya béfo mɛ kayo besonsǝ kase ele be itsyǝ . Ǝtǝsa nya kenke bétsyese mɛ bɛyɛnko lǝ Epafrodito ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ éka mɛ kɔni . Ǝtǝsa nyamfo eyifo fe keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya laanyi fifififi befi bǝtǝ Onanto nnya dídufǝ wǝ ǝnǝ nya ékpe wǝ disuǝyuǝ .
50004019	Nya bo Onanto kosate ebutǝ mi ǝtǝsa nnya kenke loohiã mi ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu eto setabikɛ ku diyǝnde kplɛ nǝmǝ esuǝ .
50004020	Bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛsǝ Boanto Onanto itsyi manlo isu manlo kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
50004021	Mǝǝsiǝsǝ mba ni Onanto eto bebi ba ni Kristo Yesu eto bale kenke o-o . Nya bayimi ba nkpe lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mfo tsyaa , bǝ bǝǝ siǝsǝ mi o-o !
50004022	Betidi ba kenke léfo Onanto bánɔ nkpe mfo ǝsiǝsǝ mi kukɔnɔ , titlu mba nkpe lǝ Roma eto Okankplɛ eto diyo .
50004023	Lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
51001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ketsyue ǝsuǝ eso mimfiani Kristo Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpee , boko bo ɔyimisani Timoteo wǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni .
51001002	Bufi ko bɔlɛ bo bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Kolose ba díkafo Kristo bánɔ sitinti butǝ . Bɔlɛ Onanto wǝ ni bo Anto bɔtɔ boǝ lǝ ufi wǝ lefonǝ ku diyuǝ utǝ mi .
51001003	Lefe saa lǝ bɔlɛ ola botoo , boasɔ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto ani lǝ mi disi .
51001004	Itsyise bɔ́nɔ kase béfo Kristo Yesu bɛnɔ ku kase biala mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke .
51001005	Lefe nǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ tinti nǝmǝ leka mi ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , bɛnɔ kusubebe ko nkpe lǝ ni . Yanso mi bofokanɔ ku lelabi teke lǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobe balɔ bǝtsyǝ mi lǝ Onanto eto kato ǝsuǝ .
51001006	Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lɛ bobe kakpe nya lɛnlɛ ebibi bɔnwɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ kenke , fe kase díyifo lǝ mi tsya ǝsuǝ seka , idu lefe nǝ bɛnɔ kase Onanto lǝǝnǝ utidi kafo nya bɛnɔ ni kasɔ tututu .
51001007	Bɛnɔ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝmfo eto etiki ɛyɛ lǝ bo uyifotsyuǝ lala Epafra wǝ díyifo Kristo eto keyifo ku ɔnukualɛ lǝ bo kɛnyɛ .
51001008	Wǝ díbǝ ɔ́tɛyi bo lelabi nǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ dífi útǝ mi .
51001009	Lǝ nya esoo , idu lǝ lefe nǝ bɔ́nɔ mi kɔsɔɔ , búkato ola lefe saa lǝ mi disi katɔ Onanto boǝ , ufi wǝ bote ku lelabi eto nsusu okpe mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ kobe kenke ku kasɔnɔnɔ ka Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lǝǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
51001010	Itǝ lǝ befo nkpǝ busiǝ fe kase Bonamute ǝmǝ laala nya lǝ bofo wǝ lelabi buyifo lefe saa . Lǝ mi nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ buyi ku kasɛyifoyifo ku Onanto eto bote kakpe .
51001011	Onanto lǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nnya ntǝkǝ ǝsuǝale saa kato okpe mi lǝ befo buńyǝ lǝ bulǝ saa eto kɛnyɛ ku dibusǝ . Lǝ bifi disuǝnyuǝ ku lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto wǝ dítǝ bɔ́flɔ bofo kedikɔ bunyǝ lǝ nka ɔ́lɔ útsyuǝ wǝ betidi lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
51001012	
51001013	Wǝ dílǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ ketuntu eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya ókpa bo oboko wǝ Ubi lala eto sekakedikɔ .
51001014	Nwǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ búnyǝ bofo itǝ úfi bo abua ɔ́tsyɛ bo .
51001015	Kristo eto ditsyǝbi ǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto wǝ boǝnyǝ ku ǝnǝmi eto ditsyǝbi kate . Ɔkɛ fɛ béyifo asayifoyifo saa kenke .
51001016	Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ wǝǝ , nya Onanto díyifo asa nnya kenke nkpe kato ku kasɔ , nnya bǝǝnyǝ ku nnya bǝnnyǝ , ɛkɔ lǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale kenke , banamute , baka ku ǝsuǝalefɔ saa tsya eto okle . Onanto éyifo kawunsiǝ kenke ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ itǝ wǝ .
51001017	Kristo akɛ fɛ Onanto díyifo lesa saa , nya ɛyɛ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku wǝǝ , nya lesa saa dínyǝ ni kǝńyǝnkɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ nɛ .
51001018	Wǝ ni disi itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nnya ni bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ . Wǝ ni kaka diǝnyǝ ni nkpe ketsyiko . Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ ni ututɛ nya wǝ ni nwǝ létaka utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , bǝ lǝ udi ututɛ lǝ asa nnya kenke nti .
51001019	Iyifo Onanto eto lalabi nkǝ ditsyǝbi nǝ tutuutu nkpe wǝǝ , lǝ lɛkɛ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ tsya .
51001020	Isi iyifo wǝ lelabi tsya nkǝ lǝ uyifo bani ku kawunsiǝ kenke , nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfo ku nnya nkpe kato kenke . Ubi ǝmǝ eto kɔtɔ ko ókpo kasɔ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie esuǝǝ , ko dínǝ diyuǝ nǝmfo leboko nɛ .
51001021	Kɔ kabia ákɛe lǝ mi ku Onanto eto nti , nya bikisi wǝ lǝ mi nsusu kǝmiǝ lǝ abua nnya biyifo eso .
51001022	Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , úsikli ófo mi kafo faa , ɛyɛ lǝ uyikabie eto ukpǝ wǝ Ubi díkpe lǝ mi disi eso . Ɛyɛ lǝ ukpǝ ǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya Onanto dísinkli ɔ́lɔ mi utsyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi fe mba bǝflǝsǝ ntu nya keni nye dikpilolo saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , lékpa kɛnkɛ seka .
51001023	Nyaso efe tinti bǝ befo buńyǝ bɛlɛ mi bofokanɔ lǝ kɔni kekleke . Bunte kekleke lǝ bofo bunyǝ sitinti , nya boembu lǝkǝ bo nsusu butsyiko lǝ kusubebe ko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ dinǝ léboku bo ǝsuǝ . Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bábe letsya bǝtǝ kawunsiɛ eto asayifoyifo kenke , nnya eto uyifoyifo mɔ Paulo díbǝ ófiani .
51001024	Mɔmɔ , iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ bǝ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ mi disi eso . Nya kanyi ka minlɛ bunyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ mfoo , lɛ mɛ bɔwunsǝko bǝ lǝ mflɔsǝ Kristo eto kanyi útǝ nkǝ nyǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ ni wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto disi .
51001025	Onanto átsyese mɛ nkǝ mfiani wǝ uyifoyifo bǝ lǝ mbe wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ mi ku betidi ba kenke lǝ banɔ kasɔ ekpa wuee .
51001026	Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eyifo lekulasa kɔɔ , nya úkǝlǝkǝ óte wǝ betidi .
51001027	Onanto eto ketsyue keni bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ akulasa nyamfo ote wǝ betidi lǝ bate , akulasa fo asi nya diyi ku atɛsɛ mfo . Nya akulasa nyamfo ni bǝ Kristo nkpe lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ itǝ mi tsya nkpe kedikɔ lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
51001028	Nya Kristo ǝmfo bɔnlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa nɛ , nya lǝ kobe saa ǝsuǝ boalɛ mǝ kɔlɛ kate mǝ asa bǝ lǝ bokpa mǝ utsyuǝ saa busuko Onanto eto ǝnǝmi fe mba diyifo bani ku Kristo ba díkabe baflɔ seka .
51001029	Nyamfo eto otsyekle mimlɛ kakplatsya ku ǝsuǝale nnya kenke Kristo leefi kakpe mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ keyifo lǝ mɛ nɛ .
51002001	Nla miǝ bete lekplatsya nǝ minlɛ lǝ mi ku Laodikeafɔ ku betidi ba kenke bo ku mǝ dimantsya tɔ ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi bote bǝtsyuǝ eto disi .
51002002	Meeyifo nko bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ lǝ beyifo bani tsya ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . Isi ensoo , itǝ kase boofo asa kasɔ bɔnɔ kukɔnɔ , bǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo Onanto eto asakulakula ǝmǝ ni Kristo . Nyamfo ni bikesinɔke bia lefo koya tinti .
51002003	Kristo ni safui sia laasini Onanto eto kobe ku kobetete eto akulasafo koya nyamfo .
51002004	Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkɛ biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe ku etiki eto kǝnǝ bimba niǝ niǝ niǝ ete fe ɔnukualɛ kpe lǝ nnya tsya .
51002005	Itsyise ite bǝ bɛnlɛ mɛ bunyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , nkpe lǝ mi nti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , nya iyifo mɛ disuǝnyuǝ lǝ kase bɛkɔ binyǝ kekleke lǝ mi Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso .
51002006	Kase befo Kristo Yesu ku mi lɛkɔɛsi kenke fe mi Onamutee , biyifo bani ku wǝ nko .
51002007	Bitǝ lǝ keyudu lǝ kǝńyǝ kedufǝkɔ katsyo lǝ wǝ , fe kuyi eto keyudu leedufe lǝ kasɔ . Beto mi nkpǝ bitǝkǝ lǝ wǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale fe kase báte mi . Lǝ biyi ku lɛninsɔ itǝ Onanto lefe saa .
51002008	Nyaso bebe biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ mi uyifo mi ndomufɔ ɛyɛ lǝ betidinini eto kobetete bimba ko nyɛ lǝ akpa nya báyani bǝtsyǝ betidi ku kawunsiǝ eto awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale eto kate ka lanyɛ lǝ Kristo eto asatete eto esu ǝsuǝ .
51002009	Itsyise Onantotidi eto ditsyǝbi kɛnkɛ nǝ lɛflɔ akɛ lǝ Kristo eto ǝsuǝale eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ utidididi eto ditsyuǝbi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
51002010	Nya se buyifo bani ku wǝ , wǝǝ ni disi itǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale saa ku awɔnɔ eto baka saa , ete bǝ bo nkpǝ tsya aflɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
51002011	Se buyifo bani ku Kristo eso biyifo fe mba bála lelo , inni lǝ kase kawunsiǝ eto betidi leeyifo , bomuu ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mi ɔbɔnko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abuayifoyifo eto ǝsuǝale eto kalɔ . Nyamfo ni lelo nǝ bála mi ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
51002012	Itsyise lefe nǝ bǝflǝsǝ mi ntuu , bébikǝ mi ku Kristo , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , bátakasǝ mi bǝńyǝnsǝ ku Kristo lǝ mi bofokanɔ eso , lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nyamǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ nwǝ ni létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ .
51002013	Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfee , bíkpe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ mi abua nnya bíyifo eso , itsyise biedi Yudafɔ ba dímankɛ lǝ kɔfi kalɔ . Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ébokpa mi óboko nkpǝ kǝmiǝ ku Kristo . Onanto éfi mi abua kenke ɔ́tsyɛ mi .
51002014	Ótsya ɔfiɔ lǝ kayo ka búsiǝ ku nnya afi nnya kenke lékle bo úlǝkǝ bo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kenke ɔ́sɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Kristo .
51002015	Nya lǝ uyikabie komfo ǝsuǝǝ , Kristo ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́bɔnko lǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ku baka saa eto kalɔ nya ótsyilamako mǝ ókpe mǝ kofani nya úlǝkǝ mǝ óte fe ndomufɔ ba óso ani utǝkǝ mǝ kato .
51002016	Nyaso biǝtǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ okpe mi afi lǝ lesa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ lee biembudi nye buinǝ ǝsuǝ , nye nnya ni eyi sɛɛ lee , lǝ kofa fɔfɔ abe lee nye Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
51002017	Nyamfo kenke eyifo nnya nkpe kama ɛnlɛ bubǝ eto koyo ete ! Nnya eto koyo bɛnlɛ bunyǝ ni Kristo kosate .
51002018	Biǝntǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi kuutsyuǝ wǝ laatɛyi nkǝ utǝtǝ kato itsyise wǝǝnyǝ ǝnǝtǝkǝtǝkǝ eto kǝlǝkǝkate , ba laayinkǝ betidi kakpe lǝ kawɛ eto ǝsuǝ bokosǝbokosǝ kasɔ ku kato eto batɔnkpe eto bɔsumu ǝsuǝ lǝ balo mi dikpi . Asa bimba ku utidi eto nsusu lǝkǝlǝkǝ ete ini . Lǝ bitǝkǝko utidi ǝmfo eto okle eto kamaa , biemunyǝ asa nnya eto kama bɛnlɛ bɔti .
51002019	Nwǝmfo eto okle ménsikɔ uyifo lɔni lǝ Kristo , wǝ nwǝ ni disi utǝ utidi ǝmǝ . Wǝ ǝsuǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto nlokɔ ku wǝ ǝmǝ eto umu kenke tsya nkpǝsǝ , wǝ ɔflɔ wǝǝnyǝ lesa sɛɛ saa , nya woabe fe kase Onanto laala .
51002020	Se bíkpǝ ku Kristo esoo , bɛbɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale kalɔ . Beso binsi biǝtǝ baakpe mi afi fe bisi bekpe lǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ kalɔ seka ?
51002021	Beso biesikeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ baatɛyi mi bǝnkǝ bienyifo nyamfo eto keyifo ku biandia nǝmǝ bebe nye bientidi nǝ nse ?
51002022	Asa nnya eto afi bákpe mi mfo eyifo asa nnya lǝ beyifo nnya keyifo balosǝ koo , iyifo ebimbasa nnya lensibe kutǝkǝ saa . Afi nyamfo kenke eyifo betidi eto ketsyue ku asatete ete .
51002023	Ele fe asa nnya bátɛyi mi mfo te fe kobe kutsyuǝ kpe lǝ nnya nya iyifo fe bǝlǝkǝ nnya betsyiko lǝ Onanto eto ketsyue ka útsyue utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Yǝǝtǝ bǝ utidi bokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sine nyǝ kanyi nnya luutǝ ola Onanto oso ku ofo ǝsuǝ bumuǝ kalɛ . Fɛɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo anwunsǝko kuutsyuǝ bǝ lǝ oso wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto alasa ani .
51003001	Se ini botakasǝ Onanto létakase mi ku Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ esoo , bɛti asa nnya nkpe kato kama kaka Kristo kosate nsi lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto kodiani .
51003002	Bitǝ mi nsusu lǝ butǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya nkpe kato mfó ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ asa nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfo .
51003003	Itsyise se bíkpee , mi nkpǝ efi bokpe lǝ Kristo eto nle ǝsuǝ bo lɛbiɔ bonkpe lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ tsya .
51003004	Mi nkpǝ kosate eyifo nkpǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ wɔɔbɔ bǝnyǝǝ , mi tsya ebɔbɔ ku wǝ nya buinyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
51003005	Nyaso belo kasɔ mfo eto asa eto nkpǝ bo nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ fenkǝ asɔnɔdidi , asinasayifoyifo , ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto kamininyǝnyǝ , kǝnǝnsɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔkɛ ǝsuǝ sia diyifo ufiǝsumusumu .
51003006	Asa nyamfo eto okle ǝǝnǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kaboko mba ditidi ato lentsyue wǝ koto ǝsuǝ .
51003007	Lǝ nkpǝ bo bísiǝ kɔ ǝsuǝǝ , mi tsya éyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle .
51003008	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , ele bǝ bɛyɛ asa nyamfo kenke eto kakle buyifo nnya ni ɔblɔnyǝnyǝ , lefonyi , kabua bɔbɛbɛ kǝtǝ fǝ utsyuǝ , aka ku etikibua saa didi .
51003009	Se bíkǝlǝkǝ mi ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ ku ni eyifosa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ esoo , biesitɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bidia bio .
51003010	Bifi békpe lǝ ditsyǝbi fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ mɔmɔ . Nya ditsyǝbi fɔfɔ nǝmfo ni wǝ Onanto kosate eto ditsyǝbi nǝ ɔnlɛ bufi kakpe lǝ mi lefe saa , lǝ bébé bisu sɛtɔ bǝ lǝ bibǝ bete wǝ bɛwunsǝ .
51003011	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kaba kǝfǝ saa ensibǝ lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ ku mba ni Yudafɔ , mba bála alo ku mba bánla alo , bafɔ ku mba dimankpa ǝsuǝ , ndomufɔ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ nti . Mǝmblɛ kenke eyifo bani lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ , nya Kristo nkpe lǝ mǝmblɛ kǝmiǝ .
51003012	Mimblɛ eyifo Onanto eto betidi , nya óla mimblɛ nya úlǝkǝ mimblɛ uyifo wǝ kosate eto bale . Lǝ nyasoo , bifi ditsyǝbi nǝ dińyǝ ditǝ nkomǝ seka bɛyɛnko ǝsuǝ . Nya ni kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , kafoɛkpɛ , ǝsuǝ kasɔ bokosǝbokosǝ , diyuǝsǝ ku disuǝtsyuǝ .
51003013	Bitsyǝsuǝ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ , lǝ bifi bɛtsyɛ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ utsyuǝ áta wǝ utsyuǝ ubu . Ele bǝ bifi bɛtsyɛ bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Bonamute dífi ɔtsyɛ mi .
51003014	Ɛwunsǝ lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , bifi lelabi bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ , itsyise ni laakɔ lesa saa kalɛ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ keyifo mǝ bani nɛ .
51003015	Kristo eto diyuǝ nǝ wǝǝtǝ , lǝ didi seka lǝ mi ketu ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo eso Onanto lékpadi mi ɔkɔ biyifo bani nɛ . Lɛ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , bɛsɔ Onanto ani .
51003016	Bitǝ lǝ Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ , nǝ lefo koya tinti lǝ diyi mi ketu kǝmiǝ . Bete bǝtsyuǝ asa , bɛlɛ bǝtsyuǝ kɔlɛ lǝ kobe ǝsuǝ . Bifi Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ǝsǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsǝ bitǝ lɛninsɔ Onanto lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ .
51003017	Nyaso bitǝ lesa saa nǝ biɔtɛyi nye buiyifoo , lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu ǝsuǝ , le bifi lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ diye ǝsuǝ .
51003018	Mi besensiǝ , bebokesǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ mi bese , itsyise nko dińyǝ itǝ bǝ biyifo fe Kristo eto bafokanɔfɔ nɛ .
51003019	Nko ke , mi bǝsiǝfi tsyaa , bifi lelabi bitǝ mi bǝsiǝ . Nya bienyifo mǝ disiale .
51003020	Mi bebi , bitsyue anto ku ambe mǝ koto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo laakɛ Onanto ɔkuɛ nɛ .
51003021	Mi bebiantomǝ , biankpe mi bebi lɛblɔfi bǝ lǝ ani lǝ nyanlo mǝ .
51003022	Mi ndomufɔ , bitsyuǝ mi banamutemǝ koto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ lefe nǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ete , bǝ lǝ batɛsǝ mi lǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ eso , bomuu , biyifo ke ku mi ketu kenke lǝ dibu biǝtǝ Bonamute eso .
51003023	Nya keyifo saa biuyifoo , biyifo ke ku kafo faa fe Bonamute bɛnlɛ ke buyifo kǝtǝ inni utidinini saa .
51003024	Bekloma biǝ Bonamute ebofo mi kayo fe kayofofo ka ɔ́lɛ utsyǝ utǝ wǝ betidi . Itsyise Kristo ni Onamute wǝ bɛnlɛ busumu .
51003025	Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ luuyifo kabuaa , ebunyǝ kayofofo itǝ kabua ka weeyifo . Itsyise Onanto aakponko utsyuǝ saa lekpo lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ .
51004001	Mba ni banamute , bɛlɛ mi ndomufɔ ba leeyifo mi nyifo ola lǝ kusu sɛɛ ko dińyǝ itǝ ǝsuǝ . Bekloma biǝ mi tsya kpe Onamute wǝ nkpe kato .
51004002	Bianyɛ ola boto kǝtǝ Onanto lefe saa . Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bɛlɛ ola boto lǝ bifi lɛninsɔ bikǝtǝ Onanto .
51004003	Beto ola lǝ bo tsya eto disi , bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔsini bo kusu lǝ bofo Kristo eto ditiki nǝ diyifo lekulasa kɔɔ , nǝ eso minlabe lǝ aba eto diyoo , letsya bobe kǝlǝ ni kate .
51004004	Beto ola bǝ lǝ mfo lekulasa nǝmfo bulǝkǝ kate lǝ lekpa wuee fe kase ele bǝ nyifo .
51004005	Bɛyɛ ku mamfokanɔfɔ lǝ kobe ǝsuǝ , lǝ biyifo kusu saa ko lɔɔsini kutǝ mi eto keyifo fe kase efe itǝ .
51004006	Bidi etiki ku dibu , bǝ lǝ lɛlɛkɛ bɔnɔ ku koto lefe saa , lǝ bete kase buitǝ etiki eto mbuayɛ sɛɛ itǝ utsyuǝ saa .
51004007	Bo ɔyimisani Tasiko lala , wǝ nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ku uyifoyifotsyuǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ , eebɔtɛyi mi lesa saa nǝ nlɛ mɛ bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfo .
51004008	Nyamfo eso minlɛ wǝ botsyese mi ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ɔtɛyi mi bo mfo eto etiki saa nya lǝ okpe mi otsyekle tsya .
51004009	Onesimo wǝ ni bo ɔyimi lala wǝ bofobɔnɔ nwǝ ni mi nti eto ɔnii , tsya akɔ ku wǝ balɛ bubɛ . Bɔɔtɛyi mi lesa saa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ mfo eto etiki .
51004010	Aristarko nwǝ boko wǝ nlabe lǝ diyo mfo ku Marko wǝ ni Barnaba eto ɔyimisani bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o ! Bóotǝ mi bote koko bǝ lǝ Marko ǝmfo ǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ , bisensǝ ani befo wǝ kafo faa .
51004011	Yosua wǝ bensi bakpo Yusto tsya ǝǝsiǝsǝ mi . Mǝ itsyǝ bamfo hã ni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba nlɛ keyifo ku mɛ itǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ kamǝ nɛ . Beyifo bawunsǝkotsyuǝ tinti bǝtǝ mɛ .
51004012	Epafra wǝ ni mi nti eto ɔni wǝ ni Kristo eto uyifoyifo tsya nkǝ wǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o . Woato ola kekleke lefe saa lǝ mi disi katɔ Onanto nkǝ lǝ binyǝ kekleke , lǝ bɛflɔ lǝ kototsyuentsyue Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
51004013	Moofo wǝ kɛnyɛ budi lǝ keyifo kekleke ka weeyifo kǝtǝ mi ku betidi ba nkpe lǝ Laodikea ku Hierapoli .
51004014	Bo ɔyimitsyuǝ lala ofala kplɛ Luka ku Dema bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o .
51004015	Boǝsiǝsǝ bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Laodikea ku Bɔyimisio Nimfa ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laakpe disi lǝ wǝ diyo o-o .
51004016	Lǝ bekla kukue komfo belosǝǝ , bifi ko betsyese bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nkpe lǝ Laodikea lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bakla . Nko kee , mi tsya lǝ bekla kukue ko míwɔni míntǝ Laodikea eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa tsya .
51004017	Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi Arkipo biǝ lǝ okpe otsyese lǝ olosǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ka úfi ókpe wǝ lǝ ani mfó .
51004018	Mɔ , Paulo , kosate dífi mɔ kɔni minlɛ kǝsiǝ kamfo bɔwɔni katsyese mi . Nya bianta ǝsuǝ biǝ nsi nlabe lǝ aba eto diyo . Nlɛ Onanto bɔtɔ miǝ utǝ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
52001001	Mɔ , Paulo , ku Silvano ku Timoteo bo lɛwɔni kukue komfo bɔnlɛ mi mba ni Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto bale lǝ Tesalonika butǝ . Nya bɔnlɛ ola boto kǝtǝ Boanto Onanto katɔ wǝ lefonǝ ku diyuǝ kǝtǝ mi .
52001002	Boasɔ Onanto ani lǝ mimblɛ eto disi . Nya lefe sa lǝ bɔlɛ ola botoo , boalɛ wǝ lekpakpa lǝ mi disi .
52001003	Nya boanyɛ Boanto Onanto bɔtɛyi lǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ keyifo ka bɛnlɛ buyifo eso . Boatɛyi wǝ tsya kase bɛnlɛ betidi lelabi butǝ , nya bɛnlɛ kusu bobe kekleke itǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo .
52001004	Bo bayimi , buyi boǝnkǝ Onanto aala mi tinti nya úlǝkǝ mi fe wǝ bale .
52001005	Nya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ búbǝ bɔ́tɛyi mii , menyifo ditiki fufu nǝ ete bóboko mi . Bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale nya nlɛ ni ǝsuǝale bulǝkǝ kate bǝ nya béfo bɛnɔ eyifo sitinti . Bínyǝ kase bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ lǝ mi nti , nya búyifo nko itǝ lǝ mi lɛkɛsǝ eso .
52001006	Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , mi tsya áfo nnya binsi bo ku Bonamute eto nkpǝ bomǝ . Ite bǝ bɛlɛ kanyi bunyǝ tsyaa , béfo ditiki nǝmfo ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dítǝ mi .
52001007	Lǝ nyamfo eso bafokanɔfɔ nkpe lǝ Makedonia ku Akaia eto kasɔ kenkee , lɛ bobe kakase asa ketsyiko mi ɔflɔ .
52001008	Fɛɛ inni Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmfo ete dísǝnsǝ ditsyi mi ɔflɔ dísu Makedonia ku Akaia kenke . Bomu mi Onanto bofokanɔ tsya ébusǝnsǝ isu kalebe saa . Nya insi ni bo nsi lɔɔtɛyi kulesa , itsyise betidi ba tã ébɔnɔ nya .
52001009	Nya mǝ kosate nlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ kase béfo bo lǝ lefe nǝ búbǝ mi ɔflɔ ku kase bisinkli bɛyɛ bǝfiǝ kedi butǝ , nya bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝ Onanto wǝǝ hã nkpe nkpǝ .
52001010	Nya biińyǝ binsǝkǝ wǝ Ubi Yesu wǝ ótakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nya úbǝ usiǝ nkpǝ ku Onanto , nya wuutsyi Onanto eto kato ubǝ . Yesu ǝmfo hã loofo bo bofo ketsyiko kotonǝnǝ ko Onanto luutǝ babuayifo kenke .
52002001	Mɔ bayimi , mi kosate yi lesa nǝ eso búbǝ mi ɔflɔ , nya bo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ ményifo bimba .
52002002	Nya biyi kase búnyǝ kanyi nya banlɛ bo boka kakpo bo ǝnǝmi kasɔ lǝ Filipi fɛ bubǝ boyo mi ɔflɔ lǝ Tesalonika mfó . Ite bǝ bǝlǝ bo lǝ mi mfó tsya , Bonamute ákpe bo nkɛale nya bɔ́tɛyi mi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
52002003	Nya kɔlɛ ko bɔ́nlɛ mi bɔlɛɛ , mentsyi lǝ bo mantebutsyuǝ nye lǝ nsusu bua saa nye lǝ bɔwɛ kuutsyuǝ saa bokpe .
52002004	Bomu Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ bɔtɛyi minlɛ . Nya lesa nǝ ele bǝ bɔtɛyi mi lefe saa dini nǝ Onanto lela nkǝ buyifo nɛ . Itsyise wǝ kosate ǝnyǝ tutɛtutɛ nkǝ buńyǝ butǝ bǝ bɔtɛyi mi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Nya yentsyi lǝ kase betidi léla , bomu lǝ kase Onanto wǝǝ nyi utudi saa eto lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ léla .
52002005	Biyi biǝ inni kawɛ eto etiki búfi bóboko mi . Nya bóantɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ bunyǝ kutǝkǝ itsyi lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto kosate ebudi bo odansiɛ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
52002006	Boantɔ atɛsǝ itsyi lǝ mi ɔflɔ nye betidi bamba ɔflɔ . Ite bǝ bokpe kusu fe Kristo eto batɔnkpe bǝ lǝ bɔbɛbɛ bo lɛlɛkǝsǝ bǝ bufi lesa saa butǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa ,
52002007	bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ fe kase ubiambe laabe wǝ bebi ku lefonǝ .
52002008	Se boala mi sitinti esoo , iyifo bo lelabi boǝ mi tsya lǝ bɛnɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Nya inni Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ mate . Bomu bufi bo nkpǝ tsya bútǝ lǝ mi disi , itsyise befo koya tinti bitǝ bo .
52002009	Mɔ bayimi , bekloma biǝ lefe nǝ búbǝ mi ɔflɔ búbǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfóo , bókplatsya bóto diwi ketsye ku kakɔmi búyifo keyifo itǝ bǝ , bóǝmfi bo ǝsuǝ buyifo bitsyikǝ butǝkǝ lǝ mi kutsyuǝ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ .
52002010	Mi kosate ku Onanto ebudi bo adansiɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ kase bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ mi mba dikafo bɛnɔ nti . Búyifo lesa saa kukɔnɔ . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
52002011	Biyi tsya biǝ bɔ́lɛ mi utsyuǝ saa fe kase ubianto laalɛ wǝ bebi ola wɛkɛkɛkɛ .
52002012	Bókpe mi nkɛale , bómansǝ mi lɛkɔ nya búkalɛ mi kɔlɛ kase biusiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ itǝ bǝ Boanto Onanto ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise wǝ kosate wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ lǝ binyǝ bofo lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ ku diyǝnde kenke .
52002013	Nya eso ele bǝ bɔsɔ Onanto ani tsya ni bǝnkǝǝ , lefe nǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfoo , bíemfi ni fe ditiki bimba . Bomu béfo ni fenkǝ Onanto eto ditiki . Ɔnukualɛ ini bǝ wǝ ditiki dini . Nya íkaboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ tsya lǝ mi mba díkafo bɛnɔ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ .
52002014	Mɔ bayimi , asa nnya díbǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ mfóo , nya ke ni lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ Onanto eto betidi ǝsuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kasɔ nɛ . Nya kanyi ka bínyǝ lǝ mi betidi eto anii , nko kǝ íbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kasɔ eto betidi ba léfo Yesu bánɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ani nɛ .
52002015	Yudafɔ bamfó álo Bonamute Yesu ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya nya báte bo tsya ohiã . Mǝ eyifosa átaka ińyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya bátaka ku sikpi bǝńyǝ betidi ba tã lǝ ǝsuǝ .
52002016	Bákplatsya bǝ lǝ beti bo kusu bǝ boatɛyi mba lenni Yudafɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Lǝ nyaso mǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝbǝ ifui ékpia efe isu eyo kaka mɔmɔɔ , ísu ínǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eboko mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
52002017	Mɔ bayimi , yoofo eyi asiani se búdu lǝ miǝ ɔflɔ . Tsya bekpe bo lǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . Nya bokplatsya lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ boofo , lǝ bubǝ botsya ku mi ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi tsya yǝntǝ kusu .
52002018	Bóla boǝ lǝ busi bubǝ bunyǝ mi . Nya mɔ , Paulo , kosatee , nyɛ esu saa nya moofo bǝ lǝ mfo bubǝ . Fɛɛ obuale ǝmǝ mǝntǝ kusu .
52002019	Nla tinti miǝ lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi , itsyise bufi bo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ lǝ mi . Nya mi ni bo disuǝyuǝ , itsyise mi ku bafokanɔfɔ bamba ni bo kutǝkǝ ko eso boofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu luubǝ bio .
52002020	Sitintii , mi ni bo lɛmɔ ku bo disuǝyuǝ nɛ .
52003001	Nya se ɛnlɛ bo bulǝ se boensinyǝ mi tɔ esoo , bóse nya uyi boǝ bo inuǝ lǝ bɔtsyimɛ lǝ Atene .
52003002	Nya bótsyese Timoteo lǝ ubǝ okpe mi nkɛ alɛ , nya lǝ ɔwunsǝ ko mi lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Uyifo bo ɔyimisami wǝ laawunsǝko bo lǝ kanantoyifo ku Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ eto bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ .
52003003	Bo nsusu ni bǝnkǝ boanla bǝ bulǝ ku kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ elo mi kuutsyuǝ saa ani . Mi kosate fe biyi koko biǝ bulǝ ku kanyibunyǝ ni nnya leetu nwǝ ke ntǝkǝko Kristo .
52003004	Biokloma biǝ lefe nǝ bɔkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , bútǝ mi bote katɔnsǝ boǝnkǝ bulǝ kpǝ ebutu mi . Nya fe kase binyii , íbǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
52003005	Nyamfo eso míntsyese Timoteo minkǝ ubǝ obe lǝ bisi bińyǝ keklǝkǝ lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mmuǝ utu nnɔ . Nya mɔ sikpitete ni bǝnkǝ ǝtsyuǝ oboale ǝmǝ ébubǝ óbiasǝ mi nsusu itǝ bǝ bo bokplatsya kenke ǝbǝ íyifo bimba .
52003006	Nya se Timoteo dísinkli ubǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi bo ku disuǝyuǝ nkǝ bisi bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi bofokanɔ ku mi lelabi itǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ insi enso . Ɔ́tɛyi bo tsya nkǝ biakloma bo tinti nya bɛnlɛ kusu bobe biǝ biǝnyǝ bo fe kase bo tsya nlɛ bola boǝ boǝnyǝ mi .
52003007	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , ite bǝ bɔlɛ kanyi bunyǝ nya asa nyamfo lekle bo tsyaa , mi bofokanɔ aakpe bo disuǝyuǝ kǝyuǝsǝ bo ketu .
52003008	Se bɔ́nɔ kase bińyǝ kekleke lǝ Bonamute eto bofokanɔ esuǝǝ , mfe fɛ nkpǝ fɔfɔ dídufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
52003009	Boǝmbofo Onanto ani bɔsɔ yooyo disuǝyuǝ nǝ bɔnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ mi disi eso .
52003010	Bɔlɛ Boanto Onanto lekpakpa bɔlɛ ketsye ku kakɔmi boǝ utǝ lǝ busi botsya lǝ bokpe mi nkɛale lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
52003011	Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , Boanto Onanto kosate ku Bonamute Yesu lǝ basini bo kusu bǝ lǝ bofo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ .
52003012	Nya Bonamute lǝ utǝ kusu bǝ mi lelabi itǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi bamba lǝ difui lekpe fe kase boala mi ke . Nya lǝ bela betidi bamba tsya fe kase boala mi .
52003013	Nyamfo luutǝ Boanto Onanto lookpe mi ǝsuǝale , ulǝkǝ mi utsyiko lǝ Obonsam eto esu kenke ǝsuǝ nya lǝ uyifo mi kɛnkɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi isu ese diyi nǝ Bonamute Yesu luusinkli ubǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ku wǝ mba kenke diyifo kɛnkɛ .
52004001	Mɔ bayimi , mɔ ditiki fɛfɛ nǝ minla miǝ malɛ mi lekpakpa lǝ ntɛyi ni bǝ , bisiǝ nkpǝ bo lɔɔkɛ Boanto Onanto ɔkɔɛ fe kase bóte mi . Bɛlɛnko nko kekleke , tsya bɔlɛ mi nkɛale bokpe lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bisi biyifo beso nko .
52004002	Itsyise biyi asa nnya bote mi ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
52004003	Onanto aala nkǝ biyifo mi ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ asɔnɔdidi kenke ǝsuǝ .
52004004	Ele bǝ usǝ ku usiǝ te kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo diyifo kɛnkɛ ku lǝ dibu ǝsuǝ .
52004005	Nya biǝntǝkǝko ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto kamini bisiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba laante Onanto sikpi .
52004006	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kuutsyuǝ saa mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto usiǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ usu ota wǝ ubu . Bɔtɛyi mi nko bunyǝ nya bɔlɛ mi ato bukǝ kekleke boǝnkǝǝ , Bonamute ebunǝ mba lǝǝyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle koto kekleke .
52004007	Onanto ákpadi bo nkǝ buyifo betidi kɛnkɛ . Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bulǝkǝ bo ǝsuǝ butsyiko lǝ asinsa ǝsuǝ .
52004008	Nyaso lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ ani buyifo lǝ etsyuesa nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , inni betidi ǝsuǝ ótaka úńyǝ . Bomu Onanto , nwǝ leefi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kǝtǝ mi , eto ǝsuǝ ótaka úńyǝ .
52004009	Nya lǝ lelabi itǝ mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔɔ , yensife bǝ bɔwɔni kulesa butǝ mi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Itsyi Onanto ébote mi kase ele bǝ bela mi bǝtsyuǝ koko .
52004010	Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , sitinti ini bǝ biala mi bayimitsyuǝ ba kenke díkafo banɔ ba nkpe lǝ Makedonia eto kasɔ kenke . Nya bunsi bɔnlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lekpakpalɛlɛ ǝsuǝ boǝnkǝ biyifo beso nko .
52004011	Bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bobokosǝ ǝsuǝ , nya utsyuǝ saa eto ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ , nya bifi mi ani biyifo keyifo bɛbɛbɛ lesa nǝ biudi fe kase bɔ́tɛyi mi bofe .
52004012	Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ mba dímamfo banɔɔ , ebubu mi nya biemukpese lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ itǝ lesa nǝ loohiã mi .
52004013	Mɔ bayimi , bola boǝ bete ɔnukualɛ itsyi lǝ betidi ba díkekpe ǝsuǝ , itǝ bǝ lǝ bɛyɛ nku buwi nku ku kaminsǝ fe betidi ba lǝmbǝ sɛtɔ saa .
52004014	Bofo bɔnɔ boǝ Yesu ǝkpǝ nya usi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ . Nya Onanto luutǝ Yesu kpa mba ǝmǝ oboko ku wǝ lǝ wǝ bubǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
52004015	Lesa nǝ Bonamute lɛtɛyi , ni ǝsuǝ buuńyǝ bɔɔnlɛ mi bɔtɛyi boǝǝ , bo mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute eto businkli kǝbǝ lefee , boǝmbɔtɔ mba díkekpe kato busu .
52004016	Lǝ lefe nǝmfo o-o , bɔɔnɔ Bonamute eto bubǝ eto kulu ku ɔkɔɛ eto boto . Boɔnɔ Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ninǝ kenke eto ɔkɔɛ . Nya buufǝ Onanto eto kakpatsyaku . Nya Bonamute kosate lɔɔyifǝ utsyi kato ubǝ . Nya betidi ba lefo Kristo baanɔ fɛ bǝkpǝǝ , mǝ loka botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ .
52004017	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto ebokpa bomba dibu nsi nkpǝ nya wookpa bo usu ɔkɔ ku betidi ba letaka busu botsyako Bonamute kato . Nya buusiǝ ku Bonamute isu manlo manlo .
52004018	Nyaso bifi etiki nyamfo bemansǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɛkɔ .
52005001	Mɔ bayimi , yamfe bǝ nsi nwɔni mi kulesa itsyi lǝ lefe nye eyi nnya asa nyamfo luubǝ .
52005002	Itsyise mi kosate yi sitinti biǝ Bonamute eto diyi nǝ wuubǝ ebuyifo fe kase uyu laabɔ lǝ wǝ kabiakɔ ku ketsye ,
52005003	kǝbǝ keyu utidi . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ utidi saa nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ lesa saa tǝ buɛ ku diyuǝǝ , lefe nǝmfo ni lefe nǝ lesabua nǝ banlɛ kusu bobee nya diǝbǝ kasɔ lǝ nti nɛ . Diubǝ fe kase kalelefo lǝǝnǝ ofonlɛ . Kalebe saa butsyetsyi kesu ǝmbǝ .
52005004	Fɛɛ , mɔ bayimi , mimii binsibǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Nyaso yanle bǝ diyi nǝmǝ bǝ lefua mi fe kase uyu leeyifo .
52005005	Itsyise mimblɛ kenke kpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nya buunte fe betidi ba leefi mǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe lǝ abua ǝsuǝ keyifo asa kakula .
52005006	Nyaso biensitǝ lǝ selabe lǝ sifi mi bilǝkǝ ato fe mba leennyi Bonamute . Bomu bitǝ lǝ buńyǝ kekleke lǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ .
52005007	Itsyise mba laalabe selabee , ketsye baalabe se . Nya mba ba nlɛ ntǝ bukpǝ tsyaa , kǝtsyǝ nya beekpǝ mu nɛ .
52005008	Fɛ bo mba nkpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ butǝkǝ ǝnǝ kukɔnɔ . Le bufi bo bofokanɔ ku bo lelabi bukase ǝsuǝ fe kase lɛkɔɛsibi eto situ eto awu laawunsǝ ko bamamanyǝ . Nya lǝ bufi bo ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ Boanto Onanto eto bofokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase omamanyǝ eto disi eto lema ankpakpa laafo wǝ lǝ nkpǝ .
52005009	Itsyise Onanto mǝnlǝkǝ bo itǝ wǝ lefonyi nɛ nlɛ bubǝ . Bomu bǝ lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ lǝ bunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
52005010	Yesu ǝmfo ǝkpǝ lǝ bo disi bǝ lǝ busi nkpǝ o-o , bukpǝ o-o , buusiǝ ku wǝ lǝ wǝ dibǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
52005011	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bikakpe nkɛale lǝ bikawunsǝko bǝtsyuǝ fe kase bɛnlɛ buyifo mɔmɔ .
52005012	Bo bayimi , bɔlɛ mi lekpakpa bǝ bifi dibu kpǝ bitǝ mi batɔnkotɔnko ba laakplatsya kate mi Kristo eto nkpǝ busiǝ eto esu .
52005013	Bela mǝ lǝ bibu mǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ko ǝsuǝ banlɛ mi bokpa akanyǝnko eso . Lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bisiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
52005014	Nnya kamaa , bo bayimi , bola tinti boǝ bɛlɛ kɔlɛ mba lanlɛ otsyekle bokpe . Bekpe mba laate sikpi nkɛale . Bɛwunsǝ ko mba lehiã bɔwunsǝ ko . Nya lǝ bifi dibusǝ bitǝ utsyuǝ saa .
52005015	Bɛlɔ bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝmfi kabua ofo kabua kayo . Bomu lefe saa , bikeyifo kasɛɛ bikǝtǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi ba kenke .
52005016	Bitǝ lǝ diyuǝ lǝ lɛkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
52005017	Biǝntǝ lǝ ani lǝ elo mi lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝ .
52005018	Nya bifi lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nyamfo ni lesa nǝ Onanto nlɛ bɔtɔ ketsyiko lǝ mimba kenke ntǝkǝko Yesu Kristo nɛ .
52005019	Bienti Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kusu lǝ mi nti .
52005020	Biemfi lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kɛnyɛ fe lesa bimba .
52005021	Bomu bekplatsya lǝ bɛbɛbɛ ɔnɔkualɛ wǝ nkpe lesa saa nǝ biɔnɔ lǝ bifi kasɛɛ ka nkpe lǝ nnya kekleke .
52005022	Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ lebua saa ǝsuǝ .
52005023	Nya bɔlɛ Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ bo diyuǝ saa bɔtɔ bǝ lǝ uyifo bo kɛnkɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ose mi lɛwɔnɔ ku nsusu ku mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kenke bǝ bemunyǝ kabua saa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo nsi luubǝ .
52005024	Nya Onanto wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ befiani wǝ balee ebɔwunsǝko mi isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Itsyise lesa nǝ ke ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ wuuyifoo , weeyifo ni .
52005025	Mɔ bayimi , bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bo disi .
52005026	Bilǝkǝ kafo faa bɛbuta lǝ bisiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ .
52005027	Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti fe nwǝ ńyǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto kɛnyɛ minkǝ bekla kukue komfo bete bafokanɔfɔ kenke .
52005028	Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝ ko mi .
53001001	Mɔ , Paulo , ku Silvano ku Timoteo bo lɛwɔni kukue komfo butǝ mi mba ni bo Boanto Onanto ku Banamute Yesu Kristo eto bale lǝ Tesalonika .
53001002	Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ minkǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diyuǝ ku lefonǝ lǝ disiǝ ko mi .
53001003	Mɔ bayimi , ele bǝ bɔsɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi . Lǝ nyaso ɛlɛkɛ bǝ bukato ola , kasɔ wǝ ani bǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ busi bɔkɛ ale boso ku mi lelabi tsya lǝ difui lekpe enso .
53001004	Nyamfo eso boakpo mi diye sɛɛ lǝ mba lefo Onanto banɔ nti . Iyifo bo lɛmɔ nya boatɛsǝ mi itsyise bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ nya bɛnlɛ otsyekle bokpe lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe banlɛ mi bulǝ kakpɔ mi ku kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ eso .
53001005	Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ Onanto aakpo akpo lǝ kusutsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya wuutǝ mi kǝsiǝkɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kasɔ bɛnlɛ kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ eso .
53001006	Onanto ebuyifo lesa nǝ lɛyɛ . Nya wuunǝ mba nlɛ mi bulǝ kenke koto .
53001007	Nya wuutǝ nkǝ bo ku mi mba kenke nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ buunyǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ sɛɛ . Onanto ebuyifo nyamfo lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe nkpe asuale kplɛ lɔɔbɔ betsyi kato ku ǝsuǝale .
53001008	Buunǝ betidi ba lǝǝmbu Onanto nya bámfo Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ banɔɔ , koto .
53001009	Nya Bonamute loola mǝ udunko lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya bǝǝmbunyǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku wǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ ku mǝ ditsyǝbi bua nǝmǝ .
53001010	Asa nyamfo ebubǝ itǝ lǝ diyi kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu luusinkli ubǝ . Nya lǝ diyi nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , bafokanɔfɔ kenke ebutǝkǝko wǝ ku atɛsǝ eto ǝsǝ ku kudu . Nya miitsya ǝbɔkɛ mǝ lenti , itsyise béfo wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi mfó bɛnɔ .
53001011	Nyamfo eso boato ola lǝ mi disi lefe saa nɛ . Nya boalɛ bo Onanto lekpakpa boǝ lǝ utǝ lǝ mi nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ bokate ku mi bokpadi bo ókpadi mi . Nya lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ ɛwunsǝ ko mi lǝ itǝ mi nsusu sɛɛ bo lookpe mi nkɛale bǝ lesa saa nǝ biuyifo lǝ mi wǝ bofokanɔ esoo lǝ ibǝ itǝ kukɔnɔ .
53001012	Bɔlɛ asa nyamfo bɔtɔ kǝtǝ mi ku lekpakpalɛlɛ bǝ lǝ babesǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye kato ɛyɛ lǝ mi eso . Nya wuuntsya lǝ obesǝ mi diye kato lǝ wǝ ku Onanto eto kafoɛkpɛ eso .
53002001	Mɔ bayimi , itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto businkli kǝbǝ bio ku bo bɔkɔ botsyanko wǝ .
53002002	Biǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ile mi nsusu nye ekpe mi bule , lǝ nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ Bonamute eto dibǝyi ébubǝ koko . Ǝtsyuǝ biubu bǝ ébɔ lǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate nye bo asatete nye etiki nnya bɔ́wɔni bútǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
53002003	Biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwuɛ mi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ kon . Itsyise Bonamute eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝmbubǝ tɔ isu ese lefe nǝ usialetidi ǝmǝ lootaka uńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya obuale ǝmǝ lǝǝbǝ bɔtsylɔ lǝ ute luulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ote .
53002004	Nya wootaka uńyǝ nkǝ lǝ uti Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale kusu lǝ ote nkǝ wǝ hã ni awɔnɔ kenke eto ǝsuǝaletidi . Nya wootaka ubǝ usiǝ lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo nya wuuyifo wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , fe wǝ ni Onanto .
53002005	Bíakloma biǝ lefe nǝ minkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ntɛyi mi asa nyamfo kenke .
53002006	Fɛɛ lesatsyuǝ leeti asa nyamfo kusu nkǝ yǝǝbǝ tɔ mɔmɔ . Nya mi kosate yi lesa nǝ ini . Nya obuale ǝmǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lekple lǝ wǝ lefe ayo .
53002007	Nya disiale eto asa nnya banlɛ buyifo kakula kokoko efe ɛlɛ bubǝ . Nya asa nnya luubǝǝ , ǝmbubǝ tɔ isu ese le fe nǝ Onanto dilǝkǝ nwǝ diti obusle ǝmǝ kusu .
53002008	Nya lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto ebulǝkǝ obuale ǝmǝ ote . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu luubǝǝ , wuufi wǝ kɛnyɛ eto ufiebi ku wǝ diyǝnde otonsǝ wǝ obiasǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi kenke .
53002009	Usialetidi ǝmǝ bǝ ku Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale , nya wuuyifo bidia eto ayanisa akpa akpaa ote .
53002010	Nya betidi ba kenke lɔɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , ebonya kenkee , wɔɔyɛ lǝ disiale ku kɔwɛsu saa bǝ lǝ ɔwɛ mǝ okpe . Boonya itsyise bamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ Onanto lete mǝ bǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ banɔ .
53002011	Nyamfo eso Onanto eboyani mǝ utǝ kawɛ eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bafo bidia banɔ .
53002012	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , Onanto ebolo mǝ dikpi , itsyise bamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ . Bomu bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
53002013	Mɔ bayimi , ele bǝ bokasɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi eso . Buyi boǝ woala mi sitinti . Mi ni betidi tutɛ Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ binyǝ bofo . Úfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ úflǝ mi abua úwi nya béfo ɔnukualɛ bɛnɔ .
53002014	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo budi ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ákpadi mi nkǝ bibǝ befo diye fe kase Bonamute Yesu Kristo léfo .
53002015	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , bińyǝ kekleke lǝ bɛkɔbe ɔnukualɛ eto asatete nnya bóte mi lǝ bo kukue ko bɔ́wɔni ku etiki nnya búdi mi , bɛlɛ nya kɔni kekleke .
53002016	Nyaso bɔlɛ bɔwunsǝko bɔtɔ ku lekpakpalɛlɛ itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ku Boanto Onanto wǝ laala bo , nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ ókpe bo nkɛale nya útǝ bo kusubebe tinti .
53002017	Bɔlɛ wǝ lekpakpa buǝnkǝ , utǝ mi ǝsuǝale lǝ okpe mi utu wǝ nkpe osa , bǝ lǝ bidi etiki ku lǝ biyifo asa sɛɛ lefe saa .
53003001	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , bekloma lǝ bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bo disi , itǝ bǝ lǝ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo lǝ disǝnsǝ disu nlebe ku dibu fe kase miitsya seka .
53003002	Nya lǝ bɛtɔ Boanto Onanto tsya biǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ betidibua ku besialetidi eto ani ǝsuǝ , itsyise inni betidi ba tã léfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bánɔ .
53003003	Bonamute eyifo ɔnukualɛtidi , uuńyǝ mi kama , ookpe mi nkɛale nya woobe mi bǝ olo Obonsam ǝmbutǝkǝ bo kato .
53003004	Bonamute ǝtǝ bufi bo utu butǝkǝ lǝ mi bǝ bɛlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ esu nya bote mi ǝsuǝ , nya buyi boǝnkǝ biofo buyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ enso .
53003005	Bɔlɛ Bonamute lekpakpa bǝ ɔsini mi ǝnǝmi lǝ binyǝ lǝ bete kase wǝ , Kristo laakpe bo nkɛale ku kase Onanto laala bo .
53003006	Mɔ bayimi , bɔlɛ mi kɔfi bokpe kekleke lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ boǝ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ bayimi ba ni baflɔ nya banlɛ buyifo lǝ bo asatete ǝsuǝ .
53003007	Mi kosate biyi kukɔnɔ biǝ ele bǝ biyifo keyifo fe kase buyifo , itsyise bóenyifo sɛflɔ lefe nǝ bɔ́kɛ mi lenti .
53003008	Bóamfo bɔwunsǝko itsyi lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ɔflɔ bǝ bóamfo kayo . Bomu búyifo keyifo kekleke ketsye ku kakɔmi bǝ bo bobǝ ményifo bitsyikǝ itǝ kuutsyuǝ saa .
53003009	Inni nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ bumbǝ kusu boatɛyi mi bǝ bebe bo eso . Bomu bóla boǝ bekase kase ele be beyifo keyifo .
53003010	Biokloma biǝ lefe nǝ bɔkɛ mi lentii , bókpe mi kɔfi boǝnkǝ utidi wǝ ke laani nkǝ woǝmbuyifo keyifoo , mendi tsya .
53003011	Bɔlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi itsyise bɔlɛ bɔnɔ boǝ baflɔ bǝtsyuǝ kpe mi lenti nya ini mǝ bayimitsyuǝ eto ketikima hã te baayɛ kedi .
53003012	Bɔninko betidi bamfo ditsyǝbi nǝmfo kekleke lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ be fi mǝ ani beyifo keyifo bedi .
53003013	Fɛɛ mii , bayimi , biǝntǝ lǝ ani lǝ elo mi lǝ lesa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ .
53003014	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ nkǝ woǝmbuyifo lǝ ditiki nǝ bɔtɛyi mi lǝ kukue ko mfoo , bitsyǝ wǝ lekpo nya lǝ bilǝkǝ wǝ lǝ mi nti , lǝ kofami lǝ kɔlɛ wǝ .
53003015	Tsyaa bienkisi utidi ǝmǝ . Bomu ele bǝ bɛlɛ wǝ kɔlɛ fe mi ɔyimi seka .
53003016	Bɔlɛ Bonamute kosate wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ bǝ lǝ utǝ mi kǝmiǝ eto diyuǝsǝ lǝ mi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ . Lǝ Bonamute lǝ ɔlɛ mimblɛ kenke ola .
53003017	Mɔ , Paulo , kosate uni nlɛ etiki fɛfɛ nye nkla bomfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi ku mɔ kɔni . Iyifo mɔ kosate eto lɛnimi eto awɔnisa fe kase maawɔni kakpe lǝ mɔ kukuewɔniwɔni saa kalɔ .
53003018	Bɔlɛ ola boto boǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo lǝ ɔlɛ mi mblɛ kenke ola lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
54001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto nwǝ ótsyese ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobee , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni .
54001002	Nya mimfi minlɛ fǝ Timoteo botsyese . Eyi fǝ eyifo mɛ fe ubi lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso minlɛ Bonamute Onanto Ku Boanto Yesu bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ mǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ lǝ kǝtǝkǝko fǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ lǝ bǝtǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
54001003	Nla miǝ lǝ esi ǝsiǝ lǝ Efeso mfó fe kase míntɛyi fǝ lefe nǝ mínyɛ mfo mímfe mintɔ lǝ Makedonia . Nnya ni bǝ eyi fǝnkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ lǝ mfo ba nlɛ asa nnya loobiasǝ nsusu itsyi lǝ bo asatete lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Ele bǝ ani komǝ nye ala betidi bamfo bǝ lǝ bayɛ nya kakloe buyifo .
54001004	Tɛyi mǝ lǝ bayɛ lefe bobiasǝ lǝ akokosatete ku bakoko eto ntsyikɔ eto katobobesǝ ǝsuǝ . Asa nyamfo eto okle bote akpe kǝnǝ lǝ betidi nti . Nya yaanyɛ lǝ Onanto eto nsusu ǝsuǝ . Nsusu bo nyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ hã ele bǝ bote .
54001005	Nya lesa nǝ lefe bǝ biyifo ni bǝ ele bǝ bola bo bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ ku kafo faa , ku utu wǝ lǝmbolo bo dikpi lǝ asa buayifoyifo saa ǝsuǝ . Nya ele bǝ bo bofokanɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ tsya yifo sitinti .
54001006	Fɛ betidi bǝtsyuǝ étsyi kama bakpe asa nyamfo . Nyaso bányɛ kusu sɛɛ komfo . Nya bǝǝnǝ etiki bimba nya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ .
54001007	Baala bǝ baatsyi bawuninsǝ bafiani Mose eto kɔfi eto bateasa . Fɛɛ mǝ bamǝ kosate mannɔ etiki nyamǝ kasɔ tsya . Beedi etiki kekleke itsyi lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛ mǝ bamǝ kosate maannɔ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi kasɔ .
54001008	Bomblɛ kenke yi boǝ Mose eto kɔfi komǝ alɛkɛ , fɛɛ ele bǝ bǝtsyue ko koto fe kase boate ko .
54001009	Nya ele bǝ bukakloma tsya boǝǝ , inni betidi sɛɛ eso béyifo afi kǝkǝ mǝ ato , bomu mba ditidi ato baata Onanto eto afi kebu ku mba leeyifo asa bua ku mǝ kakle ba eto nkpǝ diyi ku abuayifoyifo . Mǝ ni betidi ba lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ saa , mba laalo mǝ antomǝ ku ambemǝ ku mba ni bewudifɔ .
54001010	Mba ni betidi ba leedi asɔnɔ ku basani ba laalabeko mǝ basanitsyuǝ . Mǝ ni betidi ba leeyu betidi bamba kǝmuǝ kate ku mba ni badia ku mba laasɔ akɔɛsi nye kakpadi asa katɛyi bidia . Nya ku mba kenke ba dímamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto asatete bánɔɔ , mǝ ni mba baanlɛ ato nyamfo bukǝ nɛ .
54001011	Boonyǝ asa nnya minlɛ bote lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ béfi bákpe mɛ lǝ kɔni bǝ nte itsyi diyǝnde eto Onanto wǝ boatɛsǝ nte ɔflɔ .
54001012	Mǝmbofo Bonamute Yesu Kristo ani bɔsɔ lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya ufi utǝ mɛ nkǝ lǝ mfo keyifo kamfo buyifo eso . Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , úfi ke ókpe mɛ lǝ ani . Itsyise únyǝ mɛ nya uunyi nkǝ mǝmbutsyetsyi ke nyani wǝ ntsyǝ .
54001013	Ite bǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefee , nńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ etikibuadidi ku lǝ aka ǝsuǝ fɛ mímbǝ míntsyi mɔ lɛkɔɛsi minwuninsǝ , Onanto ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ . Itsyise lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , mámfo wǝ nnɔ tɔ nya mánte lesa nǝ mínkeyifo tsya .
54001014	Bonamute ǝnǝ mɛ kafo tinti nya útǝ mɛ bofokanɔ ku lelabi se buunyǝ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Yesu Kristo .
54001015	Ditiki nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo eyifo etiki eto ɔnukualɛ , nya ele bǝ utidi saa fo ɔnɔ . Kristo Yesu wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , díbǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo nkǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ babuayifo . Nya mɔ ni obuayifo kenke enso lǝ babuayifo nti .
54001016	Fɛɛ Onanto dínyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ nkǝ lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mɔɔ ni obuayifo kenke enso ǝsuǝǝ , Kristo Yesu lǝ utǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ bǝ okpe lelabi nǝ eso woefi katsyɛ babuayifo ba lefo wǝ banɔ . Lǝ nya esoo , wuutǝ mǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ kulefe tsya .
54001017	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bukatɛsǝ bo Oka wǝ nkpe kato wǝ boǝnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi wǝǝ hã ni Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya lǝ bukabesǝ wǝ Onanto wǝ leenkpǝ eto diye kato lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ .
54001018	Mɔ ubi Timoteo , keyifo ku afi nnya mimfi mintǝ fǝ mfoo , eka asa nnya bo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛ́tɛyi itsyi le fǝ ǝsuǝ . Lɛ etiki nyamfo kɔni kekleke fe bemake , ebutǝkǝ kabua kato lǝ lema nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
54001019	Lɛ fǝ bofokanɔ kɔni kekleke , tǝ bǝ fǝ utu manlo fǝ dikpi . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dímǝntsyue mǝ ketu eto kɔlɛ kotoo , mǝ dídu bánɔ banyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ nɛ .
54001020	Nya lǝ mǝ ntii , ni Himeneo ku Aleksandro . Nnǝ mǝ ato lǝ se mímfi mǝ míntǝ Obonsam bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ wǝ ani . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bakase bǝ bayɛ etiki bua budi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
54002001	Lesa tutɛ nǝ moola miǝ bete ni bǝ bikato ola bikǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bikalɛ wǝǝ lekpakpa kasɔ wǝ ani lǝ betidi ba tã eto disi . Bikǝfi mi ku mǝ mblɛ eto ahiã bikǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
54002002	Nya bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ baka ku betidi ba kenke ntɔnko betidi bǝ lǝ bomblɛ lǝ bɔkɛ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ kalebe saa . Itǝ bǝ lǝ bobokosǝ bo ǝsuǝ kasɔ butǝ Onanto nya bufi dibu butǝ utsyuǝ saa .
54002003	Olatoto eyifo lesa nǝ laakɛ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Onanto ɔkɔɛ .
54002004	Itsyise ola nkǝ utsyuǝ saa te wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ote ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ bǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ nkpǝ .
54002005	Lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , Onanto ɔni ete nkpe . Nya Ofomfokǝtǝ tsya ɔni ete nkpe . Wǝ ni utidi wǝ baakpo Kristo Yesu . Wǝ ni futsyǝ laalɔ bonko Onanto eto nti .
54002006	Wǝ ni fuutsyuǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi eto disi . Yesu éyifo nyamfo sitinti bǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ nkǝ woofo utǝ wǝ betidi kenke eto lefe eboyo .
54002007	Nyamfo eso Onanto lékpe mɛ fe wǝ ɔtɔnkpe ku wǝ oteasa . Nyamfo menyifo bǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ wǝ dílǝkǝ mɛ fe oteasa nkǝ lǝ mbǝ nlǝkǝ wǝ bofokanɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nte betidi ba lennitɔ Yudafɔ .
54002008	Lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ saa , nla minkǝ basani besǝ mǝ ani kato bato ola ku ketu ka lekpa kɛnkɛ . Nya ɔblɔ nye kǝnǝ saa mankɛ mi lǝ nti .
54002009	Nla tsya miǝ besio lɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ bikelɛlɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ete bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bobokosǝ . Inni bǝ bakle mǝ esi ku sika eto bikǝ akpa akpa nya lefo koya kpǝ nya loote bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ .
54002010	Bomuu , ele bǝ mǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ te bǝ beyifo besio ba laate Onanto sikpi .
54002011	Nya ele bǝ usio saa bokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ okase asa , lǝ busiǝ kpo ǝsuǝ .
54002012	Minlɛ mǝ kusu butǝ minkǝ baté basani asa nye bǝtǝkǝ basani kato . Bomu ele bǝ bǝsiǝ kpoo , betsyue koto .
54002013	Itsyise Adam ni futsyǝ Onanto leka buyifo fɛ úlǝkǝ Eva utsyiko lǝ wǝ .
54002014	Nya inni Adam ni nwǝ olo ǝmǝ lɛwɛ , bomu usio ǝmǝ ni nwǝ ɔwɛ . Nya útǝ úyifo lebua .
54002015	Nya lǝ usio ebuńyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ku lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ nya wuusiǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ nya woobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , wɔɔyɛ lǝ kanyi ka nkpe lǝ ubilele ǝsuǝ ɔbɔ ofe .
54003001	Ɔnukualɛ uni , baatɛyi bǝnkǝǝ , lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woeyifo bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ete bǝ woala nkǝ woeyifo keyifo sɛɛ .
54003002	Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ bulǝ saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , uufi kusiǝ kɔni , uyifo obesibe , ɔkɛ dibusǝ , ɔlɛ ǝsuǝ ola , nya betidi leebu wǝ . Ɔkɛ kafoɛkpɛ kafo bafɔ nya uyifo oteasa sɛɛ .
54003003	Yanle bǝ uyifo utǝkpǝ , nya woankpɔ ekiti . Ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ diyuǝ , nya woenyifo nwǝ lǝǝnǝ etiki , nya woansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ tsya .
54003004	Ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ laalɛ wǝ diyo eto betidi ola , nya wǝǝtǝ nkǝ wǝ bebi tsyue ditiki koto lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
54003005	Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ kpe wǝ leenyi kase woobe wǝ diyoo , ntsyǝ wɔɔyɛ obe Onanto eto betidi ba wɔɔyɛnko ?
54003006	Yanle bǝ uyifo nwǝ léfo Onanto ɔnɔ fɔfɔ kase woembobesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ote ǝsuǝ , lǝ ubǝ udu ɔnɔ , nya Onanto luunǝ wǝ koto fe kase únǝ olontidi ǝmǝ koto .
54003007	Ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ nkpe diye sɛɛ lǝ mba dímamfo banɔ tsya eto ǝnǝmi , nya luutǝ bǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua saa bakpe wǝ kofani bǝ lǝ obuale ǝmǝ lǝ unyǝ wǝ umuǝ .
54003008	Nko kǝ ini bǝ wǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ tsyaa , ele bǝ mǝǝ tsya yifo betidi ba nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya baalɛ keyifo ola kekleke . Ele bǝ beyifo betidi ba lǝǝnnǝ ntǝ kǝkpǝ , nya baansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ tsya .
54003009	Ele bǝ beyifo bǝtsyuǝ léfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ báboko mfo banɔ kekleke ketu ka laanlo mǝ dikpi .
54003010	Nya ele bǝ beto mǝ ditsyibi bebe fɛ . Nya lǝ bǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ beyifo bawunsǝkotsyuǝ .
54003011	Ele bǝ mǝ bǝsiǝ tsya , yifo besio ba nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya benyifo betidi ba leedi betidi eto ntikima . Bomu ele bǝ beyifo besio ba leekpǝ ntǝ , nya beeyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ .
54003012	Be fǝ , bawunsǝkotsyuǝ bamfo eto utsyuǝ saa fi kusiǝ kɔni kplon , nya woalɛ wǝ bebi ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke ola .
54003013	Nya bawunsǝkotsyuǝ ba nlɛ mǝ keyifo olaa , mǝ kosate ebunyǝ dibu ku kǝńyǝsǝ sɛɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nya bɔɔkɛ utu bedi etiki lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ kate betidi bamba .
54003014	Nlɛ bobe bǝ yǝmbɔklɛ muubǝ nyǝ mi . Fɛɛ nlɛ asa nyamfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ bǝ lǝ minlɛ bubǝ mlǝǝ , lǝ efo fǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ ate lesa nǝ ele bǝ yifo fe ɔtɔnkotɔnko lǝ Onanto eto bebi nti . Nya mǝ ba ni Onanto wǝǝ nkpe nkpǝ eto bebii , mǝ ni omayi itǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
54003015	
54003016	Onanto eto ditiki kɛnkɛ nǝ bǝlǝkǝ bátee , kpe kalende tinti nya kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo bɔni nko . Nya ni bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute ǝbǝ bale fe kawunsiǝ eto utidi . Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ uyifo kɛnkɛ . Nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe dínyǝ wǝ . Nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ báte lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke nti . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ . Nya Onanto dítsyi wǝ úsuko kato lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
54004001	Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte bo ókpasǝ nkǝ , fɛ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ looyoo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ebɔbɔ lǝ bofokanɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bǝtǝkǝko bidia eto awɔnɔ nnya mba luufi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ obuale ǝmǝ eto asatete .
54004002	Bidia eto asa betidi bamfo laate , nya buufi mǝ disiale eto asatete bakula , itsyise mǝ akɔɛsi ǝkpǝ fe situ ku ute béfi bátonsǝ nnya , bǝmbǝ ɔnukualɛ .
54004003	Mǝ laate bǝ yanle bǝ betidi fi kusiǝ . Nya baatɛyi bǝnkǝ yanle bǝ bedi edisa ǝtsyuǝ eto okle tsya . Fɛɛ Onanto wǝ díyifo edisa kenke utsyǝ nkǝ mba léfo wǝ ditiki banɔ bentekǝko wǝǝ , lǝ bedi ku lɛninsɔ .
54004004	Nya sitintii , asa nnya kenke Onanto díyifoo , alɛkɛ . Nyaso yanle bǝ utidi saa kisi didisa kuditsyuǝ . Bomu ele bǝ bafo ditsyuǝ saa ku olatoto ku lɛninsɔ .
54004005	Itsyise Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ ku bo lɛninsɔ lǝǝyifo didisa nǝmǝ kɛnkɛ .
54004006	Lǝ até fǝ bayimitsyuǝ asa nyamfoo , nya ǝsuǝ fɔɔyɛ afiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔwunsǝko sɛɛ nɛ . Lǝ nya féfi bofokanɔ eto etiki nyamǝ ku asatete fékluǝsǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , nyamfo luutǝ fǝ ǝsuǝle nɛ .
54004007	Nyaso lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ amamosa nnya betidi laatɛyi nya dimanyɛ lǝ konantosu nya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa . Nya kase konantosu lǝ ǝtǝkǝko ko kekleke .
54004008	Ǝsuǝ eto bunǝ itǝ ale bɔkɛ alɛkɛ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ , tsya Anantotiki bufi kekulǝsǝ ǝsuǝ ku nya bokase kpe kutǝkǝ eso nyamblɛ kenke . Itsyise yuutǝ fǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo ku lǝ kǝkpǝma eto nle tsya .
54004009	Nyamfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ wǝ ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa fo ɔnɔ .
54004010	Nyamfo eso bɔnlɛ keyifo kekleke nya bɔnlɛ kanyi saa bunyǝ nɛ . Itsyise bo kusubebe tǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ manlo bo Onanto wǝ ni betidi ba tã eto Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mba luunyǝ wǝ bofokǝtǝ ni mba léfo wǝ bánɔ .
54004011	Nyamfo ni asa nnya ele bǝ te mǝ nɛ .
54004012	Mǝntǝ lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fe amamflɔ itsyise eyifo okosobi eso . Bomuu , fiani ditsyǝbi sɛɛ itǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ etikididi ku fǝ ditsyǝbi ku fǝ lelabi itǝ betidi ku fǝ bofokanɔ ku fǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ busiǝ tsya ǝsuǝ .
54004013	Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ akakla Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝkǝtǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke . Nyaso lǝkǝ nya kasɔ lǝ ate mǝ asa nyamǝ isu ese lefe nǝ muusinkli mbǝ .
54004014	Nya manyɛ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa nnya úfi útǝ fǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba dítǝkǝ fǝ anii , eto keyifo buyifo .
54004015	Tǝ lǝ fǝ nsusu lǝ butǝkǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ alɛ nko ekeyifo itǝ lǝ betidi ba tã lǝ bǝnyǝ lǝ fǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ bo fensi eto sɛtɔsusu .
54004016	Lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ ku asa nnya faate . Nyǝ kekleke lǝ keyifo ka fanlɛ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , ebulǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ku betidi kenke ba laanɔ fǝ ditiki etsyiko lǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝ .
54005001	Meyenki akpe nye manlɔ osani wǝ ni fǝ sininǝ ǝtsyǝ ku kudu . Bomu lǝkǝ asa kasɔ ate wǝ ku utu buɛɛ fe fanto seka . Lǝ bakosobi fe bayanisani .
54005002	Lɛ besio ba lebe banso fǝ fe fambe mǝ . Nya lǝ alɛ mbitɛ tsya fe fǝ bayimisio , nya lǝ alɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ .
54005003	Bakɔbǝsiǝ ba lǝmbǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝǝ , lɛ mǝ kukɔnɔ ku dibu .
54005004	Fɛ lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpe bebi nye bǝflufluu , tǝ lǝ bebi bamǝ lǝ bakase tutɛ , bakase kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ diyo eto betidi ku mǝ mba léle mǝ ola fe kase mǝ bofokanɔ eto keyifo lete . Ele bǝ bedi betidi ba lǝǝtsyǝ mba léle mǝ kɔlɛ . Nyamfo lǝǝdufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ nɛ .
54005005	Nya ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ lǝmbǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ saa , ufi wǝ kusubebe utǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ lǝ ukato ola ukǝtǝ Onanto ketsye ku kakɔmi itsyise ohiã wǝ bɔwunsǝko .
54005006	Fɛɛ ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ leedi sɛsɔnɔɔ , umbǝ nkpǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , ite bǝ usi nkpǝ tsya .
54005007	Di mǝ etiki ǝkǝ mǝ ato itsyi lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nye betidi bamba lembudi mǝ ketikima .
54005008	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti áni nkǝ woǝmbɔlɛ wǝ diyo eto betidi ola kukɔnɔɔ , nyalɛ te fǝ ɔ́ni wǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu komǝ , nya wǝ etiki abia eso utidi wǝ dimamfo ɔnɔ kulaa tsya .
54005009	Memfi ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ dimamfo tɔ alɛ fosi akua eto diye akɔ ku bakɔbǝsiǝ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nkpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti . Nya nnya nsi nso ni bǝǝ , ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ ditsyukpa mǝmfo nti di usio ni kusǝ kɔni hã úkǝsiǝ .
54005010	Uyifo nwǝ betidi laakpadi diye sɛɛ lǝ kase unsi nkpǝ sɛɛ eso . Ele bǝ udi usio wǝ nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ wǝ dínǝ wǝ bebi kukɔnɔ nya onkpe kafoɛkpɛ itǝ bafɔbofo . Ele bǝ uyifo usio wǝ nkpe kafo ɛkpɛ itǝ wǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ . Nya woawunsǝ ko betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , ufi nkpǝ bo kenke unsi itǝ kasɛɛ eto buyifo .
54005011	Bakɔbǝsiǝ ba dimamfo tɔ alɛ fosi akuaa , mǝmfi mǝ aye akɔ lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ eto ditsyukpa nǝmfo nti . Itsyise lǝ kusǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔkɔɛ , boosinkli lǝ Kristo kama besu bǝsiǝ bese fɔfɔ .
54005012	Nya nyamfo ebutǝ bata kakle ka nkpe lǝ mǝ ku Onanto nti bebu itǝ bedi dikpi .
54005013	Lǝ nnya kamaa , boofiani baflɔ bakatsyilama betidi eto ayo kedi etiki bimba nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ . Nya nnya nsi lebia enso ni bǝǝ , bookakpadi betidi aye bua kedi mǝ ketikima katɛyi etiki nnya dimamfe .
54005014	Nyasoo , nla miǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bamfo eto kakle siǝ bese lǝ bale bebi lǝ bǝsiǝ babe mǝ ayo bomu . Nyamfo ebutǝ bǝ bembuyifo asa nnya dimǝńyǝ itǝ nya luutǝ bo balo kusu bǝ bǝkedi etiki bua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
54005015	Itsyise bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébusinkli bésu bǝtǝko Obonsam .
54005016	Lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpe lǝ usio wǝ díkafo banɔ eto diyoo , ele bǝ obe mǝ ɔlɛ mǝ ola , itǝ bǝ mǝ bitsyikǝ ǝmbubǝ itǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ kusu bǝ bafokanɔfɔ mfó eto ditsyukpa ebofo bakɔɛsiǝ bamba ba lǝmbǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ ola bɔlɛ .
54005017	Nya bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba nlɛ mǝ keyifo kamǝ olaa , ele bǝ bǝtǝ mǝ kayofofo ka disu sɛtɔ eto sinuǝ . Titlu mba laate asa fɛ bensi beedi betidi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ tsya .
54005018	Itsyise bátɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Eto Kukue Kɛnkɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Mankle onantsyui wǝ laafodi kamɔ kǝtǝ fǝ eto kɛnyɛ lǝ ɔlɛ keyifo . ” Besi bátɛyi tsya bǝǝ , “ Ele bǝ uyifoyifo saa nyǝ wǝ kayofofo itsyi lǝ keyifo ka ɔnlɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
54005019	Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔlɛ ɔtɔnkotɔnko utsyuǝ kɛnyɛ bolaa , mamfo nnya anɔ isu ese lefe nǝ ɛflɔ betidi inuǝ ku kama .
54005020	Nya betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ buaa , lǝkǝ mǝ até lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti lǝ ǝkǝ mǝ ato lǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nyamfo luutǝ bafɛfɛ te sikpi nɛ .
54005021	Nyaso nlɛ fǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ lǝ Onanto ku Kristo ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke eto ǝnǝmi minkǝ lɛ nyamfo ola kukɔnɔ lǝ ayɛ betidi eto ǝnǝmi bobe bǝ lǝ esu ala utsyuǝ aso utsyuǝ .
54005022	Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ , mankpɔ lǝ ani butǝkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ kanantoyifo buyifo . Nya makɔko babuayifo saa , bomu lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lebuayifoyifo saa ǝsuǝ .
54005023	Nya se kafo eto bufi nkpe fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , mantɛyi fǝ ǝkǝnǝ ntu fufu ete . Yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ ǝkǝnǝ nte sɛkɛ sɛkɛ fe kofa seka .
54005024	Betidi bǝtsyuǝ eto abua nnya beeyifo amfo bɔbiɔ nyaso yǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ dikpididi kate koko . Fɛ bǝtsyuǝǝ , kama kama fɛ mǝ asabuayifoyifo tsya lǝǝbǝ kabɔ bǝǝnyǝ .
54005025	Nko kǝ ini bǝ asasɛyifoyifo tsya ǝmbofo bɔbiɔ , nya nnya lɛbiɔ tsya ebubǝ ɛbɔɔ lekple utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
54006001	Tɛyi bafokanɔfɔ ba ni ndomufɔ kenke fǝnkǝ ele bǝ babokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ banamute lǝ keyifokɔ , bǝ betidi saa embudi etiki bua saa itsyi lǝ Onanto ku bo bofokanɔ eto asatete ǝsuǝ .
54006002	Nya ndomufɔ eto banamute ni bafokanɔfɔɔ , mántaka bǝńyǝ lǝ banamute bamǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ eto sɛyimididi bataka . Bomu ele bǝ babokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ bawunsǝko mǝ kulaa enso . Itsyise betidi ba baanlɛ bɔwunsǝko mfoo , beyifo mba lefo Yesu banɔ . Nya mǝ ku mǝmǝ kenke eyifo wǝ bale ba woala tinti . Nyamfo ele bǝ te mǝ lǝ akpe mǝ nkɛale lǝ beyifo ele bǝ beyifo lǝ bakpe mǝ nkɛale .
54006003	Utidi wǝ ke laate asa bamba nya laanlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , utsyǝ ǝmǝ lɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ unyi kulesa . Iyifo etiki bunǝ bimba ku kǝdiǝ ku bulǝ bimba ete woakpe . Nyamfo lǝǝtǝ betidi kǝnǝnsɛ , ndiǝkpekpe ku abiesese , ku nsusu bua bufi lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ nɛ .
54006004	
54006005	Nya bǝǝnǝ etiki kǝntsyɛɛ lefe saa . Betidi bamfo eto okle eto nsunsu ebukpǝ nya bensiyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ . Mǝ nsusu ete ni bǝnkǝ bǝǝtǝkǝko Ditiki Sɛɛ nɛ mǝ kama lǝ bayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bafiani batabinyǝ . Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko mbamfo eto okle ǝsuǝ .
54006006	Fɛɛ lǝ utidi akpe ɔtsyini kekleke lǝ Onanto eto bɔsumu ǝsuǝ nya asa nnya nte wǝ tsya dídufǝ wǝ ǝnǝǝ , uyifo otabinyǝ .
54006007	Itsyise fe kase bále boo , bóanlɛ kulesa boboko kawunsiǝ . Nya lǝ bukpe tsyaa , boǝmbufi kulesa busuko .
54006008	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bikǝ ku edisa nya ntǝ bo lǝ imi bo .
54006009	Fɛɛ betidi ba laasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ bikǝ eto bɔkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ leedufǝ lǝ Obonsam eto uyibi wǝ obio utsyǝ mǝ nɛ . Nya beetsyiko asa bimba buyifo , nya beefi kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔbɛbɛ kakpimi lǝ ǝsuǝ nya baabiasǝ mǝ nkpǝ itǝ bǝǝkpǝ kanya kulaa .
54006010	Itsyise ǝnǝmi bɔsɛsǝ lǝ atabi bɔbɛbɛ ǝsuǝ laayɛnko asa bua kpǝ eto buyifo . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ kǝnǝsɛ lǝ atabi eto bɔkɛ eso áyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu . Nya mǝ nkpǝ kenke édufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ .
54006011	Nya se feyifo utidi wǝ dífi fǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ Onanto esoo , lǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ asa bua nyamfo kenke eto buyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ efi fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ . Tǝkǝko Boanto Onanto lǝ bofokanɔ ku lelabi ǝsuǝ . Kɛ dibusǝ lǝ alɛ betidi buɛɛ .
54006012	Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ bofokanɔ eto keyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ akpe nkɛale lǝ ǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo manlo . Nkpǝ bomfo eso Onanto lékpadi fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fáfo wǝ bokpadi eto bofokanɔ fáte lǝ mba díkafo babɔ ku babamba eto ǝnǝmi nɛ .
54006013	Nya lǝ Onanto wǝ diyifo lesa saa ku Kristo wǝ dífǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ úlǝkǝ wǝ bofokanɔ óte lǝ Pontio Pilato eto ǝnǝmii , nlɛ mɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ bufi kǝtǝ fǝ , ini mɔ kɔfi .
54006014	Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ lɛ asa nyamfo ola kase kuutsyuǝ lǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo luusinkli ubǝ .
54006015	Nya Onanto ebutǝ Yesu Kristo sinkli ubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ . Onanto ni nwǝ nso kenke ku ni nwǝ fate nlɛ seka budi lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , nya uni baka kenke eto oka . Nya lesa saa laakpo wǝ Bonamute Onanto . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ boatɛsǝ .
54006016	Wǝ fate insi nkpǝ itsyise wǝǝkpe kulefe kulefe . Nya wǝǝyǝnde itǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo buńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ . Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ wǝ tɔ unyǝ nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝmbofo wǝ ǝnǝmi bobe . Nya atɛsǝ ku ǝsuǝale ni wǝ ale lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ .
54006017	Tɛyi mba nkpe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ fǝnkǝ , bambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ mi , bikǝ bia lalo ǝsuǝ . Bomu befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . Wǝ uni lǝǝtǝ bo lesa saa kafo faa nkǝ lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
54006018	Tɛyi mǝ fǝ bekeyifo kasɛɛ nya luutǝ boofiani batabinyǝ bǝnyǝ atsyɔkpokpo lǝ nnya buuyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ bǝkǝtǝ betidi asa kafo faa .
54006019	Lǝ beyifo nkoo , balɛ bikǝ bia lambia bɔɔlɔ kǝtsyǝ itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kama ka nlɛ bubǝ . Lǝ nya ǝsuǝ boonyǝ nkpǝ tinti bǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
54006020	Timoteo , be fǝ alɔ asa nnya Onanto dífi útǝ fǝ ǝtsyǝ kukɔnɔ . Memfi fǝ ǝsuǝ akpe lǝ eyifosa bimba ku etikinǝnǝ bimba ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ǝsuǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ laayɛ kawɛ betidi fe mba ni babesibe .
54006021	Itsyise bǝtsyuǝ efi bǝ beyi asa nyamfo . Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ bányansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu . Nlɛ Onanto bɔtɔ miǝ ufi wǝ lefonǝ obe mi .
55001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝ mimfiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpe , wǝ nlɛ letsya bobe itsyi lǝ nkpǝ bo buunyǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ lǝ bo ku wǝ eto lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɛni kǝtǝ fǝ .
55001002	Mɔ ubi lala Timoteo , nlɛ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Kristo Yesu bɔtɔ miǝ mǝ lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko fǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ , lǝ bǝtǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
55001003	Maasɔ Onanto wǝ meesumu fe kase mɔ banamǝ díyifo ani . Nya meeyifo nko ku mɔ utu wǝ laanlo mɛ dikpi ǝsuǝ . Nya , masɔ wǝ ani ketsye ku kakɔmi kalɛ wǝ lekpakpa lǝ fǝ disi lǝ nlɛ ola boto .
55001004	Nya lǝ nkloma binǝntu bia féwii , mala tinti miǝ mǝǝnyǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ iyuǝ mɛ .
55001005	Maakloma bofokanɔ kekleke bo nkpe fǝ . Bofokanɔ bo eto okle lɛkɛ fǝ ewu Lois ku fambe Eunike mǝ . Mfo nnɔ miǝ fintsya kpe mu okle .
55001006	Nsusu bomfo eso minlɛ fǝ kukue komfo bɔwɔni bǝ lǝ alɛ kekleke ǝtǝsa nnya Onanto dítǝ fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ mímfi ani míntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mínto ola .
55001007	Itsyise lɛwɔnɔ nǝ Onanto dítǝ boo , ǝǝntǝ boate sikpi . Bomuu , útǝ bo lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝtǝ boǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale , ku lelabi , ku ǝsuǝ eto lɛkɔɛle kato butǝkǝ tsya .
55001008	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mǝntǝ lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ fǝ bǝ ǝńyǝ alɛ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bɔtɛyi nye lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ fǝ lǝ mɔ disi nwǝ bákpe le diyo lǝ Kristo eto disi . Bomuu , fintsya ńyǝ kekleke lǝ ǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ wǝ disi lǝ ǝlǝkǝ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ate . Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ afo nyamfo buyifo .
55001009	Onanto ni nwǝ dítǝ bo nkpǝ nya ókpadi bo nkǝ bofiani wǝ betidi . Inni lǝ bo kasɛɛ ka búyifo eso . Bomuu , iyifo wǝ Onanto eto nsusu ku kafo ɛkpɛ ka úfi útǝ bo eso . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nya búnyǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝmfo fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ kulaa tsya .
55001010	Nya mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ébulǝkǝ nyamfo óte bo ekpa wuǝ lǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ Kristo Yesu ǝmfo eto bubǝ ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ni futsyǝ léso ukpǝ ku eto ǝsuǝale ani . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , óboko bo nkpǝ bo kalosɛkɔ lǝnsiembɔkɛ kulefe .
55001011	Onanto efi mɛ uyifo nwǝ loobe wǝ letsya ku ɔtɔnkpe ku wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eto oteasa .
55001012	Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , nya minlɛ kanyi bunyǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ kofani annlɛ mɛ . Itsyise mfo nnɔ sitinti , nya nyi utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ mɔ bofokanɔ nkpe . Nya nyi tsya miǝ woose mɛ ku nya kenke mimfi minlɛ bokpe lǝ wǝ ani isu ese lǝ Diyi nǝmǝ .
55001013	Lɛ etiki sɛɛ ku nnya kenke mínte fǝ kukɔnɔ kekleke , nya lǝ ayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Fo nya anɔ kekleke nya lǝ eyifo lɔni ku Kristo Yesu lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
55001014	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale nya nkpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ alɛ asa sɛɛ nya kenke béfi bǝtǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ .
55001015	Eyi fǝ Asiafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ kenke édu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , nko ke ni Figelo ku Hermefene tsya lídu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ nɛ .
55001016	Nlɛ Bonamute lekpakpa miǝ unyǝ Onesiforo ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kaminsǝ itsyise yéanlɛ wǝ kofani bǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo . Bomuu , úńyǝ ko mɛ nnya ɔ́wunsǝ ko mɛ tinti .
55001017	Nya lefe nǝ úbǝ Romaa , ótsyilama kenke ɔ́bɛbɛ mɛ isu ese lefene eto lefe únyǝ mɛ .
55001018	Nlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ lǝ wǝ Lekpoyi ǝsuǝ . Fǝ kosate yi esu kpǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔ́wunsǝko mɛ lǝ Efeso .
55002001	Nya fǝ , mɔ ubi , kpe nkɛale ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ bo bǝ bookpe lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
55002002	Nya lǝ asa nnya fánɔ bǝ nte lǝ betidi kpǝ eto ǝnǝmii , nko kǝ ele bǝ fintsya fi akpe lǝ betidi ba léfobanɔ eto ani bǝ lǝ befi besu bate betidi bamba tsya .
55002003	Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ fe kase omamanyǝ sɛɛ lǝǝńyǝ , ǝtǝ Kristo Yesu .
55002004	Omamanyǝ wǝ ńyǝ sitinti itǝ wǝ keyifoo , woola nkǝ wǝ eyifosa lǝ ekpe wǝ uninǝ disuǝyuǝ . Nyaso woǝnsiǝmbufi ani okpe lǝ betidi ba lenni bamamanyǝ eto asa nnya beeyifo ǝsuǝ .
55002005	Nko ini nɛ bǝ fɛ nwǝ leetsyetsyi lǝ udi ututɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo lǝ afi nnya baakpe ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ .
55002006	Ɔkuɛmfo wǝ leeyifo keyifo ku otsyekle lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛɛ , wǝ ni futsyǝ laaka wǝ bidikǝ bia budi nɛ .
55002007	Bu disi lǝ etiki nnya minlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi mfo kenke laabe , itsyise nyi minkǝ Bonamute ebutǝ anɔ nyamblɛ kenke kasɔ .
55002008	Kloma Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu wǝ Onanto létakasǝ úńyǝnsǝ utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ fe kase Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo nlɛ bote .
55002009	Nnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ maatɛyi eso . Nya bakpe mɛ lǝ amana kulaa tsya fe utidi wǝ leeyifo asa bua . Fɛɛ Onanto eto etiki alɛɛ , bǝmbofo ni kusu buti !
55002010	Lǝ nyamfo eso maafo lesa saa akamini itǝ Onanto eto betidi ba ukǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo bo ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu mate ǝsuǝ lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bunyǝ nkpǝ manlo eto disuǝyuǝ .
55002011	Ɔnukualɛ uni baatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ búkpe ku wǝǝ , bo tsya ebusiǝ nkpǝ ku wǝ .
55002012	Lǝ bofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ saa ǝsuǝǝ , buudi seka ku wǝ . Lǝ bɔni wǝǝ , wuntsya ebɔni bo .
55002013	Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bɔ́yɛ bofokanɔ lǝ wǝ kula tsyaa , wǝǝ , ǝmbɔyɛ buyifo lǝ kɛnyɛ ka utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise wǝmbɔni wǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe . ”
55002014	Kaklomasǝ mǝ asa nyamfo nya lǝ ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ bayɛ etiki bunǝ . Itsyise kasɛɛ saa aambɔ le nya ǝsuǝ . Bomu asa nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ yaabiasǝ mba laanɔ nya . Mǝ bofokanɔ ebɔyuɛ .
55002015	Lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ Onanto utǝ fǝ kayofofo sɛɛ . Yifo fǝ keyifo kukɔnɔ bǝ kofani lǝ kɔyɛ fǝ bɔlɛ . Bomu yifo utidi wǝ laate Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ kosate ǝsuǝ .
55002016	Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ akuɛntiki ku asa bimba bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto oklee , yǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ nsusu ketsyiko lǝ Onanto sikpibote ǝsuǝ famfamfa .
55002017	Asa nyamfo eto okle bote ale lefabe nǝ leenkpǝ nǝ laanyi kpitikpitikpiti . Nya betidi inuǝ ba léte asa nyamfo eto kakle ni Himeneo ku Fileto .
55002018	Banya kusu itsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , nya banlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto nsusu bobiasǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ nkpǝ eto lefe ébubǝ éfe .
55002019	Fɛɛ Onanto eto diyo eto leba nǝ ǝsuǝ óse ofati úńyǝnsǝǝ , ni nsi ńyǝ . Nya leba nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́wɔni etiki nya lǝǝbǝ mfo nkǝ , “ Bonamute yi betidi ba ni wǝ bale nya , ” nya “ Utidi wǝ laatɛyi nkǝ ɔlɛ Bonamute busumuu , ele bǝ usinkli lǝ asa bua buyifo kama . ”
55002020	Lǝ diyo kplɛ saa , kedikpɛ akpa akpa lǝǝtsyǝ mfo . Befi sika sia béyifo kǝtsyuǝ kǝtsyuǝ ku sika flubia . Nya kǝtsyuǝ tsya sitǝ beefi baato kǝ fɛ nka baawoe tsya nkpe . Beeyifo kakpɛ kamfo lǝ esu esu ǝsuǝ , kǝtsyuǝ itǝ eyi sɛɛ eto budi eto keyifo . Nya kǝtsyuǝ tsya itǝ diyi saa eto keyifo buyifo .
55002021	Nyaso lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ asa bua ǝsuǝ nya uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛɛ , ofo koya utǝ Bonamute fenkǝ kakpɛ ka baalɔ bǝǝtsyǝ itǝ eyisɛdidi . Itǝ bǝ boofo wǝ bufi itǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa buyifo .
55002022	Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ bakosobi eto alasa bimba butǝkǝko ǝsuǝ . Nya yifo lesa saa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ǝsiǝ bofokanɔ eto nkpǝ sɛɛ , lǝ akala betidi , nya lǝ ǝsiǝ nkpǝ kpoo ku mǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Yifo asa nyamfo ku mba nsi nkoǝ sɛɛ , laato ola ku ketu ka lekpa bǝ ɔwunsǝko mi .
55002023	Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ ebukitiki ku etiki bimba budi ǝsuǝ , itsyise kǝdiǝ ete asa nyamfo eto oklee , lǝǝnǝ kaboko .
55002024	Nya yanle bǝ Bonamute eto usumunyǝ , lǝ ukǝdiǝ kǝdiǝ . Bomu ele bǝ ukǝyifo kafoɛkpɛ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa , udi oteasa sɛɛ , nya uyifo utidi wǝ diyuǝ .
55002025	Nya betidi ba laataka kǝnyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ ofo asa kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝ ku utu buɛɛ . Nya ditsyuǝ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ batsyi lɛkɔɛsi bawuninsǝ lǝ bafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
55002026	Lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu ebɔsini bǝ lǝ bani Obonsam wǝ dífi mǝ úyifo mba leyifo wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
55003001	Tsyǝ nyamfo lekpo fǝǝ , lǝ eyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝǝ , lefe nǝ lɔɔkɛ ale ebubǝ .
55003002	Betidi ebola asa nnya luutǝ mǝ hã eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ nya boola atabi . Boobesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya bookǝnǝ ǝsuǝ . Booyifo betidi ba luukaka , betidi kedi etiki bua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya booyifo mba lembubu mǝ antomǝ ku ambemǝ . Booyifo mba lǝǝntsyǝ kɔlɛ ku betidi ba lǝmbofo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ tsya .
55003003	Booyifo betidi ba lǝǝmbɔkɛ lefonǝ itǝ betidi bamba ku mba ba lǝǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ kaminsǝ . Booyifo betidi ba laatɛyi bidia kalɛ betidi lǝ kafo kabiasɛ mǝ aye ku betidi ba lǝǝmbǝ disuǝtsyǝ kabuasǝ asa . Nya mǝ ǝnǝmi ǝmbunyǝ , bankpe disiale . Nya mǝ ni betidi ba laanla asa sɛɛ nɛ .
55003004	Mǝ ni betidi ba leedu mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya mǝ ni betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ ete ni babesibe ku betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ hã ni bakplɛ banso ku betidi ba laala kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kamini enso Onanto .
55003005	Betidi bamfo eto okle ákplatsya kate bǝ mǝ ni betidi sɛɛ , fɛɛ bámfo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale bǝ bɔkɛ lǝ mǝ nkpǝ bo bensi ǝsuǝ . Nǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi bamfi nti .
55003006	Itsyise betidi bamfo eto okloee , beeyu kedufǝ lǝ betidi eto ayo kabiasǝ besio ba eto nsusu lǝmbǝ ale . Besio bamfó eto abua eyifo bitsyike itǝ mǝ itsyise beyifo abua akpa akpa nnya laakpa mǝ kakpe lǝ abua kpǝ ǝsuǝ .
55003007	Besio bamfo eto kakle aakase asa lefe saa , tsya bamfó etiki nyamǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ sitinti kulefe .
55003008	Kase ɛyɛ fɛ Yane ku Yambre letaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Mose ǝsuǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , kusu komfo ǝsuǝ ke bidia eto bateasa bamfo tsya lɛyɛ bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Asa bua nya betidi bamfo nlɛ buyifo afo mǝ nsusu kenke , itǝ bǝ bányansǝ mǝ bofo kanɔ eto ɔnukualɛsu .
55003009	Fɛɛ betidi bamfo eto okle ǝmbǝ sɛtɔ buusu , itsyise mǝ sɛmumu sia nkpe mǝ ebɔbɔ ete utidi saa nyǝ fe mba nlɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo nko , fe kase ibǝ lǝ Yane ku Yambre ǝsuǝ .
