55003010	Fɛ fǝǝ , ébunyǝ nya feenyi mɔ asatete , mɔ nkpǝ bo minsi , mɔ nsusu ku mɔ bofokanɔ , kase maakplatsya , kase maala betidi , ku kase mǝǝmuǝ utu kalɛ lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ .
55003011	Eyi kase bǝtǝnko mɛ , bákpe mɛ bulǝ , mínyǝ kanyi lefe nǝ mímbǝ Antiokia ku Ikonion ku Listra . Kloma ohiã kplɛ wǝ báte mɛ . Fɛ lǝ nnya amblɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Bonamute ǝlǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ nnya kǝmiǝ .
55003012	Ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝǝ , betidi ba kenke lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , boonyǝ kanyi nya bookpe mǝ bulǝ bǝńyǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
55003013	Fɛɛ Betidi bua ku bidiabidia eto bateasa mǝǝ , kato ko mǝ asa bua buyifo loobe fe kase baanlɛ betidi bɔwɛ kakpe ke . Nya mǝ kosate tsya betidi bamba ebukawɛ mǝ kakpe .
55003014	Nya fǝǝ , nla miǝ lǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ asa nnya fákase nya fáfo fánɔ tsya ǝsuǝ kekleke . Itsyise eyi betidi ba ɔflɔ fákase nya .
55003015	Idu lǝ fǝ sikpefi lefe kee , áte Kukue Kɛnkɛ eto Awɔnisa eto etiki nya díbǝ yɛwunsǝko fǝ fafiani obesibe , lǝ nyaso bofokǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ fánɔ .
55003016	Ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya bɔyɛɛ buunyǝ asa nnya kenke baawɔni baakpe lǝ Kukue Kɛnkɛ eto Asawɔniwɔni kǝmiǝ . Nya ɛlɛkɛ itǝ asatete ku bunyenki kakpe utidi ku kɔlɛlɛ ku bunǝfofo itǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ .
55003017	Báwɔni nya nko bǝ lǝ utidi saa wǝ difi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ Onanto ebɔflɔ nya yɔɔlɔ wǝ itsyǝ itǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa buyifo .
55004001	Nnyǝ lǝ Onanto ku Kristo Yesu wǝ luusinkli ubǝ okponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi ku bǝkpǝnkpǝ akpo eto kɛnyɛ . Nya se wuusinkli ubǝ bio lǝ wǝ Sekadidi ǝsuǝ esoo , nlɛ fǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ kekleke minkǝ ,
55004002	bekpe kɔni o-o , bimbǝ kɔni o-o tsyaa , bilǝkǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kɛnyɛ bete . Bɛlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ , nya binyɛnki bekpe mǝ , lǝ bekpe mǝ nkɛale . Nya lǝ alɛ asakasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝǝ , tsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ efi utu buɛ ku disuǝtsyǝ até mǝ .
55004003	Itsyise lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ lefe nǝ betidi lensiǝmbɔtɔnǝ bǝ bǝǝtsyue ato banɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Bomu boola bǝ baanɔ bateasa bamba ba lɔɔtɛyi mǝ etiki nya eto okle boola bǝ baakanɔ .
55004004	Bootsyiko kama butsyi kakpe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo kǝtǝko etiki tsyuɛntsyuɛ eto kama .
55004005	Nya fǝǝ , lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ ayɛ lǝ kusu ko lɛlɛkɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ ekakpe ale lǝ kanyi saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyifo keyifo kamǝ fe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto nwǝ laabe ni letsya . Nya lǝ eyifo fǝ keyifo kukɔnɔ fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko .
55004006	Itsyise mɔɔ , mɔ nkpǝ fe bɔlɛ kalosǝkɔ bubǝ nya boofi mɛ fe keditǝtǝ . Nya lefe tsya boyo bǝ mfe ndu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo .
55004007	Nkpɔ bɔkpɔ sɛɛ nya mínlosǝ mɔ keyifo fe nwǝ leetsyetsyi etsyi sɛɛ . Nya minlɛ mɔ bofokanɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ .
55004008	Nya idu mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ebutǝ mɛ kayofofo sɛɛ ka nlɛ bote nkǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ fe nwǝ lefo ɔnɔ eto kayofofo ka bálɔ bǝtsyǝ itǝ mɛ . Iyifo kayofofo sɛɛ ka Bonamute wǝ laakpo lekpo lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ luutǝ mɛ lǝ duyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya inni mɔ mate ete loofo ni , bomu bonko betidi bamba ba kenke tsya díkǝfi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto bubǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
55004009	Yɛ kusu saa foofo lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ .
55004010	Itsyise Dema edu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ lǝ usu utǝkǝko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ lǝ Tesalonika . Nya Kreskee , usu Galatia nya Tito dísu Dalmatia .
55004011	Luka hã dibu onkpe mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo . Nyaso kpa Marko lǝ bibǝ , itsyise uuyifo ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ tinti utǝ mɛ .
55004012	Ntsyese Tihiko Efeso .
55004013	Nya lǝ alɛ bubǝ , fo mɔ lɛyɔlefe eto awu nya míyani mintsyǝ lǝ Karpo ɔflɔ lǝ Troia aboko mɛ . Nya lǝ efi mɔ ekue titlu nya béfi kubukikue béyifo tsya aboko .
55004014	Aleksandro wǝ ni ɔtsyuɛntsyuɛ eyifo mɛ kabua tinti . Nya Bonamute ebofo wǝ kayo lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ .
55004015	Nyaso fintsya ńyǝ kekleke lǝ abe kukɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise ótaka uńyǝ lǝ bo asa nnya bɔnlɛ bote ǝsuǝ kekleke .
55004016	Lefe nǝ bákpadi mɛ ditutɛ lǝ lekpo etii , kutsyuǝ sa mámfo bubǝ kǝńyǝ mɛ kama lǝ etiki nyamǝ eti , bomu báyani mɛ bǝtsyǝ bédu . Fɛɛ nlɛ Onanto lekpakpa minkǝ wǝǝnnǝ mǝ koto lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
55004017	Fɛɛ Bonamute ǝńyǝ mɛ kama nya ókpe mɛ nkɛale nya dítǝ mimfo Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe kǝtǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ mfo . Nya Bonamute dílǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ .
55004018	Bonamute ebulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ kabua saa ǝsuǝ , nya wookpa mɛ ɔyɛnko buɛ buɛ isu ese lefe nǝ mindufǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kato . Diyǝnde eto atɛsǝ bufi bɔnlɛ Wǝ butǝ idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
55004019	Mǝǝsiǝsǝ Priska ku Akwila ku Onesiforo eto diyo eto betidi kenke .
55004020	Erasto si okpe lǝ Korinto . Trofimo tsya lɛ bufi , nyaso nyani wǝ ntsyǝ lǝ Mileto .
55004021	Kpe ǝsuǝ ku nkɛale lǝ ǝbǝ etu mɛ mfo fɛ lɛyɔlefe lǝ eyo . Eubulo ku Pude ku Lino ku Klaudia ku bayimi fɛfɛ kenke bafokanɔfɔ kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ kukɔnɔ !
55004022	Bonamute lǝ usiǝko fǝ , nya nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ɔlɛ mi ola lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
56001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Onanto eto usumunyǝ ku Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpe , mɔ ni futsyǝ nlɛ fǝ kukue komfo bɔwɔni . Onanto dílǝkǝ mɛ nya ótsyese mɛ nkǝ nsu nwunsǝko wǝ betidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ eto bafobanɔ lǝ nyɛnko mǝ lǝ bafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ lǝ bo bafokanɔsu ǝsuǝ .
56001002	Bofokanɔsu komfo dítǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ nkpǝ manlo bo ǝsuǝ bófo bɔ́nɔ nɛ . Nya Onanto wǝ lǝmbɔwɛ bo kosatee , wǝ lɛtɛyi ditiki nǝmfo útsyǝ fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ .
56001003	Wǝ dílǝkǝ nkpǝ manlo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo óte bo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ kosate lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ufi okpe mɛ lǝ ani nya mimfi minlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ betidi . Boanto Onanto wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ , wǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ mbe ni letsya nɛ .
56001004	Mɔ olala Tito , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ itsyise eyifo mɔ ubi tinti lǝ bofokanɔ bɔni bo ǝsuǝ bonkpe eso . Nya nlɛ Boanto Onanto ku Kristo Yesu wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ lekpakpa bǝ ɔlɛ fǝ ku lefonǝ ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ utǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
56001005	Nyani fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ Kreta ku nsusu bǝ lǝ alɔ lesa saa nǝ díbu bɔlɔkǝtsyǝ ǝtsyǝ . Nya lǝ umǝ saa , lǝkǝ batɔnkotɔnko ba loofo buńyǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto kɛnyɛ fe kase míntɛyi fǝ miǝ yifo .
56001006	Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnkoo , yanle bǝ etiki bua saa kɛ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ mfi kusiǝ kɔni hã . Nya wǝ bebi tsya eyifo bebi ba léfo banɔ kekleke , nya beenyifo mba ditidi ato , nya beebu mǝ antomǝ .
56001007	Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko wǝ laabe Onanto eto keyifoo , yanle bǝ bǝnyǝ nye befi etiki bua saa lǝ wǝ nye ukabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nye kafo kanyi wǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝ . Nya yanle bǝ udui utekpe , nya yanle bǝ okakpɔ ekiti kekleke nye ukasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi tsya lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ .
56001008	Ele bǝ ofo bafɔ bofo , keyifo kafoɛkpɛ nya woala asa sɛɛ nya woalɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ ola . Nya ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya uyifo kɛnkɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , nya wooyɛ lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
56001009	Ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ nlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kɔni kekleke fe kase bofokanɔ eto kusu leté . Nya kusu komfo ǝsuǝ hã ele bǝ wuukayɛ bǝ lǝ okpe betidi bamba tsya ute lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ ofo mba laataka kǝńyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ eto botakebu bulǝkǝ kate mǝ .
56001010	Itsyise betidi kpǝ kpe ba nlɛ betidi bɔwɛ nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ku mǝ ebukisa buyifo . Nya mba nso asa nyamfo kenke buyifo , mǝ ni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ .
56001011	Efe bǝ taka ǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ asa nyamfo eto okle eto bote ǝsuǝ , itsyise asa nyamfo ǝǝnǝ bulǝ kakpe lǝ diyo eto betidi eto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya se ini atabi asa buabote eto bateasa bamfo lǝǝnyǝ ketsyiko le nya ǝsuǝ esoo , nyaso banlɛ asa bua nyamfo bote nɛ .
56001012	Nya Kreta eto utidi ɔni wǝ ni mǝ unyǝlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kretafɔ , bidia baatɛyi mi lefe saa nya beeyifo mba laabiasǝ asa kakpe fe bebuki , nya bedikpũ beni nya bankpe sɛflɔ tsya . ”
56001013	Asa nya unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmfo lɛtɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nyaso bikǝ mǝ ato bǝ lǝ bayɛ ditsyǝbi bua nǝmfo bote itǝ lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ buyifo sitinti .
56001014	Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ ato betsyiko lǝ Yudafɔ eto etikitsyuɛntsyuɛ ku betidi ba eto asatete nnya lanyɛ lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
56001015	Betidi ba kenke diyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛɛ , mǝ eyifosa tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ betidi ba diyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ betidi bua nya bámfo banɔ ɔflɔɔ , kulesa menyifo kɛnkɛ . Mǝ esibubu ku mǝ ketu eyi ku asa bua , lǝ nyaso bǝǝmbofo nya ni asɛ lekpo butsyǝ ketsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
56001016	Mǝ kosate aatɛyi bǝ beebu Onanto , fɛɛ mǝ eyifosa mante nko . Beyifo betidi ba laabiasǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nya beembu kulesa nya bǝǝńyǝ bǝtǝ lesa sɛɛ saa buyifo .
56002001	Fɛ fǝǝ , te asa nnya nyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
56002002	Te basani eto beninǝ kenke bǝ ele bǝ bebu mǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ bakafo mǝ lɛkɔɛle ani boso ku bǝtǝ ǝnǝ lefe saa . Nya lǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , balɛ mǝ bofokanɔ kɔni kekleke , lǝ bala mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , nya lǝ bakpe nkɛale ku lǝ bakɛ dibusǝ tsya .
56002003	Nko ke ini itǝ besioninǝ tsya nɛ , te mǝ kase ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo dinyǝ itǝ besio ba diyifo kɛnkɛ . Yanle bǝ bakakpadi betidi aye bua . Nya yanle bǝ bǝnǝ nte bǝkpǝ tsya . Bomu ele bǝ bate betidi ditsyǝbi sɛɛ .
56002004	Nya ele bǝ baté besiobitɛ ba nsi bese kase ele bǝ bala mǝ bese ku mǝ bebi tsya .
56002005	Nya ele bǝ bate mɛ kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola , nya ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo diyifo kɛnkɛ , nya lǝ beyifo bǝsiǝ ba laalɛ mǝ bese ola kukɔnɔ , mba leebu mǝ bese . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua saa iitsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ditsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
56002006	Nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ ele bǝ lǝ ayɛnko bakosobi bamǝ tsya lǝ akpe mǝ nkɛale lǝ kase ele bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola .
56002007	Lǝ asa nyamfo kenke eto kamaa , ele bǝ yifo fǝ ǝsuǝ futsyǝ eto ditsyǝbi ele bǝ utidi saa be lǝ okase utsyiko . Nya lǝ ǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ akate asa ku ɔnukualɛ .
56002008	Be kukɔnɔ lǝ ekedi betidi etiki ku lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ bǝmbunyǝ kabua saa itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nya luutǝ bǝ fǝ baló tsya ɛmbɔtɛyi kabua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mǝ .
56002009	Ele bǝ ndomufɔ bokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ banamute . Nya ele bǝ mǝ eyifosa kpe mǝ banamute disuǝyuǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Nya yanle bǝ bǝnǝnko mǝ etiki .
56002010	Yanle bǝ beyu mǝ tsya , bomu ele bǝ baté mǝ bǝnkǝ betidi sɛɛ beni , nya beeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ mǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ buunyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo bǝ bo asa nnya boate iitsyi lǝ Boanto Onanto wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝǝ , eyifo asa sɛɛ .
56002011	Itsyise Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ lefonǝ onkpe óte bo , bǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke nyǝ dilǝkǝ .
56002012	Onanto eto kafoɛkpɛ kamǝ lɛ bo bote nkǝ , bulǝkǝ bo ato butsyiko lǝ nkpǝ bua busiǝ ku kawunsiǝ eto asa bimba kama butǝkǝko ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ele bǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , nya lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ , lǝ buyifo ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ǝsuǝ
56002013	Kusu komfo buufi bukabe sɛtɔ itǝ diyi kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ búfi bo kusubebe bútǝkǝ nɛ . Diyi nǝmfo ni diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ bo Onanto Ɔkplɛnyǝ , bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo eto diyǝnde lɔɔbɔ utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
56002014	Úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ lǝ bo disi , bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ bo abua saa ǝsuǝ lǝ bofiani betidi kɛnkɛ ba ni wǝ kosate eto bale , nyaso bíala bǝ biekeyifo kasɛɛ hã nɛ .
56002015	Te asa nyamfo ku ǝsuǝale nya Onanto dítǝ fǝ , nya lǝ akpe nkɛale betidi ba kenke laanɔ fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kekleke , nya lǝ ǝnyǝnki akpe mba lanlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tsya . Nyaso mǝntǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kusu lǝ unyǝ fǝ olosǝ .
56003001	Klomasǝ mǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ bakloma lǝ babokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kǝtǝ mǝ batɔnkotɔnko ku aba lǝ bǝtsyue mǝ ditiki koto , nya lǝ bekeyifo kasɛɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
56003002	Tɛyi mǝ fǝnkǝ bankatɛyi betidi eto kabua . Bomu beyifo sɛhɔ ku utsyuǝ saa lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ku utsyuǝ saa . Nya lǝ bekebu utidi saa lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
56003003	Fɛɛ bo ǝmǝ tsya ébuyifo ebukisa bunyǝ ku ato titli , nya bóta bubu kɔ ǝmǝ . Nya ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abua yifoyifo butǝkǝko tsya diyi bo ǝsuǝ kɔ . Nya búfi bo lefe bútǝ disialeyifoyifo , asabuyifo ku kǝnǝminsɛ , nya betidi díkisi bo nya bo tsya díkisi mǝ .
56003004	Fɛɛ lǝ lefe nǝ Boanto Onanto , bo Ofomfokǝtǝ , dílǝkǝ wǝ kafoɛkpɛ ku lelabi óte boo ,
56003005	ófo bo lǝ nkpǝ . Inni lǝ bo kasɛɛ ka búyifo eso , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto lǝ wǝ kosate eto kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise útǝ nkǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ bǝ didufǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo esi dítǝ besinkli bále bo nya dítǝ bo nkpǝ fɔfɔ , nya díflǝ bo itǝ bǝ buyifo kɛnkɛ .
56003006	Onanto efi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ bo kpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
56003007	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ esoo , bonko wǝ eto nti ǝbǝ bɔlɛkɛ itǝ eso bontsya ditiki ǝbǝ búnyǝ nkpǝ manlo bo bɔnlɛ kusu bobe .
56003008	Ditiki nǝmfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nya nla miǝ lǝ afo nya kekleke . Nya betidi ba díkafo Onanto banɔɔ , ele bǝ befi mǝ lefe bǝtǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo nya looboko kutǝkǝ itǝ betidi ba kenke .
56003009	Mǝǝnnǝ etiki ku utidi lǝ asa bimba ǝsuǝ . Mambiasǝ lefe lǝ betidi eto ketsyikɔ bokla kate ǝsuǝ , mǝndiǝ kǝdiǝ lǝ efi Mose eto afi eto etiki eyifo kǝnǝ eto etiki . Asa nyamfo kenke ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa .
56003010	Kǝ ato utidi wǝ laakpe ntisensǝsensǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti sinuǝ . Lǝ nnya kamaa , yani wǝ .
56003011	Eyi fǝ utidi ǝmfo eto oklee , lebua edi wǝ ǝsuǝ nya wǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ kate , nya ókalo wǝ ǝsuǝ dikpi .
56003012	Lǝ ntsyese fǝ Artema nye Tihikoo , yɛ kusu saa ǝsuǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ lǝ Nikopoli . Itsyise mfó mimfi nsusu miǝ mɔɔkɛ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nɛ .
56003013	Kplatsya lǝ ayɛ kusu saa lǝ awunsǝko Zena wǝ ni afi eto ukuente ku Apolo bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ mǝ kusu komǝ busu . Nya laabe fǝ bakɛ lesa saa nǝ baahiã .
56003014	Ele bǝ mba dikafo baanɔ kasé kase boofi mǝ lefe kenke bǝtǝ asasɛyifoyifo nya looboko kutǝkǝ itǝ mǝ . Nya kamaa , ele bǝ bafo betidi bamba tsya bɔwunsǝko lǝ bayɛ aflɔsa .
56003015	Bayimi ba kenke nkpe mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ . Fintsya siǝsǝ bayimi mba dikafo baanɔ ba nkpe mfó ǝtǝ bo . Onanto lǝ ɔlɛ mimblɛ kenke lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
57001001	Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ nlabe lǝ Aba eto diyo lǝ Kristo Yesu eto disi , ɛyɛ lǝ letsya nǝ mímbe wǝ eso ku bo ɔyimi Timoteo , bo nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ Filemon bo uyifotsyuǝ lala , bo ɔyimisio Apia ku bo ɔyɛtsyuǝ ku uyifotsyuǝ Arkipo ku bafokakɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laatsya lǝ fǝ diyo .
57001002	
57001003	Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Onanto wǝ ni Boanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
57001004	Ɔyimi Filemon , maakloma fǝ lefe saa lǝ mɔ olatoto ǝsuǝ . Nya maasɔ Onanto ani lǝ fǝ disi .
57001005	Itsyise maanɔ kase faala Onanto eto betidi ku kase fáfo Bonamute Yesu fánɔ .
57001006	Maato ola minkǝ bo sɛyɛtsyuǝ ku fǝ fe bafokanɔfɔɔ , eboboko kasɔnɔnɔ enso lǝ bonti . Itǝ ínǝ atsyɔkpokpo kenke nnya nkpe lǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo ǝsuǝ .
57001007	Ɔyimi lala , lelabi nǝ nkpe fǝ ǝtǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ kpǝ ku nkɛalekpekpe ! Ǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ mba kenke lefo Onanto banɔ eto ketu .
57001008	Se minyifo fǝ ɔyimisani ɛyɛ lǝ sɛyɛtsyuǝ sia ǝsuǝ bonkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ esoo , eni moofo fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ yifo lesa nǝ ele bǝ yifo . Tsyaa , se maala fǝ esoo , nla miǝ maalɛ fǝ lekpakpa bomu . Ite bǝ mɔ ni Paulo wǝ ni Kristo Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe . Nya mɔmɔɔ , nyifo nwǝ béti bákpe lǝ diyo lǝ wǝ disi eso .
57001009	
57001010	Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa lǝ Onesimo wǝ díkafiani mɔ kosate eto ubi eto disi lǝ lefe nǝ bakpe mɛ lǝ amla lǝ aba eto diyo .
57001011	Ite bǝ wǝ diye eto kasɔ ni kutǝkǝ tsyaa , kɔɔ utidi ko ete udi , wánkɛ kutǝkǝ saa utǝ fǝ . Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , okpe kutǝkǝ útǝ bonko fǝ ta .
57001012	Mɔmɔɔ , nsinkliko wǝ nlɛ fǝ botsyese . Iyifo mɛ fe mɔ kosate eto utu minfi minlɛ fǝ botsyese .
57001013	Eni moola miǝ ɔkɛ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo lefe nǝ eto lefe minlabe lǝ diyo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso , bǝ lǝ ofo mɛ bɔwunsǝko lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ .
57001014	Fɛɛ manla miǝ maanyinkǝ fǝ nkpe miǝ lǝ awunsǝko mɛ . Bomu moola miǝ iyifo lesa nǝ ditsyi fǝ utu kǝmiǝ , diyifo fǝ lelabi . Nyaso membuyifo kulesa nǝ dimenyifo fǝ lelabi .
57001015	Ditsyuǝ nnya eso Onesimo dídu lǝ fǝ ɔflɔ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ nǝmfo ni bǝ lǝ ofo busikli kǝbǝ kǝsiǝ fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ itǝ lefe nǝ ta .
57001016	Nya mɔmɔɔ , unsini ndomunyǝ fufu , bomu oso ndomunyǝ . Uyifo ɔyimi lala lǝ Kristo eso . Ofo koya utǝ mɛ tinti . Fɛɛ itǝ fǝǝ , ofo koya utǝ fǝ oso , itsyise uyifo fǝ ndomunyǝ fe utidinini , nya unsi uni ɔyimisani lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ .
57001017	Nyaso lǝ ǝǝnyǝ mɛ fe fǝ uyifotsyuǝ , sinkli afo wǝ fe kase foofo mɔ kosate .
57001018	Lǝ óta fǝ ubu nye unsi fǝ kayo kǝtsyuǝ , bu kǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
57001019	Mɔ , Paulo , kosate difi mɔ kɔni míwɔni nyamfo minkǝ moofo fǝ ke . Fɛɛ manla miǝ maaklomasǝ fǝ miǝ esi mɛ fǝ nkpǝ eto koya .
57001020	Nya mɔ ɔyimi , tǝ lǝ nnyǝ kutǝkǝ sɛkɛ ntsyi lǝ fǝ ɔflɔ , lǝ Bonamute eso ete . Yifo nyamfo nko lǝ lekpe mɛ lǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ .
57001021	Nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ ku bofokanɔ miǝ ebuyifo lǝ lesa nǝ mintɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya ni bǝ ebuyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya uusi eso nko kulaa tsya .
57001022	Lǝ nnya kamaa , lɔ kasɔnɔkɔ ǝtsyǝ mɛ mfó . Itsyise mfo nnɔ miǝ Onanto ebɔnɔ mimblɛ eto olatoto utǝ bayani mɛ nsinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
57001023	Epafra , wǝ bonko nkpe lǝ Aba eto diyo lǝ Kristo Yesu eto disi esoo , nkǝ wǝsiǝsǝ fǝ !
57001024	Nko ke ini Marko ku Aristarko ku Dema ku Luka ba ni mɔ keyifo eto bawunsǝkotsyuǝǝ , tsya bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ !
57001025	Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ kenke .
58001001	Koko lefee , Onanto édi bo banamǝ etiki sesia sesia sesia , nya lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ .
58001002	Fɛɛ lǝ eyi fɛfɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , údi bo etiki ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ , nya wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ udi wǝ bikǝ kenke nɛ .
58001003	Ubi ǝmfo dílǝkǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde óte nya Onanto eto ditsyǝbi tututu nkpe wuntsya . Nya úfi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kplɛ nǝmǝ úmuǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ɔnlɛ . Se úflǝ bo abua kenke úwii , úsu úsiǝ lǝ Onanto , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke , eto kodiani kato .
58001004	Onanto eyifo wǝ ubi ɔkplɛ enso wǝ batɔnkpe , fe kase wǝ diye nǝ Onanto dítǝ wǝ nso mǝ lele .
58001005	Itsyise Onanto mántɛyi wǝ batɔnkpe eto kuutsyuǝ saa nkǝ , “ Fɛ ni mɔ Ubi . Mmii , minle fǝ . ” Nye Onanto mántɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ ɔtɔnkpe saa ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Muudi wǝ Anto , nya wuuyifo mɔ Ubi . ”
58001006	Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto léla nkǝ woatsyese wǝ Ubi tutɛ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke ebusumu wǝ . ”
58001007	Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi lǝ wǝ batɔnkpe ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eeyifo wǝ batɔnkpe fe ufiebi , nya wǝ kato eto besumunyǝ bamfó fe ute eto kadiakami . ”
58001008	Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto , fǝ sekakedikɔɔ , kalosǝkɔ embɔkɛ lǝ se kulefe kulefe ! Fǝ sekakedidi lǝ fǝ betidi ǝsuǝ ebuyi ku kasɛyifoyifo .
58001009	Aala kasɛyifoyifo nya feekisi kabuayifoyifo . Nyamfo eso Onanto , fǝ Onantoo , dílǝkǝ fǝ , nya úfi disuǝyuǝ nǝ nso nǝ útǝ fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ kenke útǝ fǝ . ”
58001010	Usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ , Bonamute , fǝ ni nwǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ díyifo kasɔ , nya féyifo kato ku fǝ kosate eto ani .
58001011	Asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ efe . Fɛɛ fǝ ebubu akɛ lefe saa . Asa nyamfo kenke ebobia isensǝ fe kase mfia laala kafiani afianku .
58001012	Ebukǝnǝ nnya fe kase bǝǝkǝnǝ awu ku mfia itǝ bofloma . Fɛɛ fǝǝ , nko ete fuutsyǝ nɛ , embofloma , nya fǝ nkpǝ embolo kulefe . ”
58001013	Nte ɔtɔnkpe wǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Siǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani , isu ese lefe nǝ muufi fǝ balo nkpe fǝ kalɔ bafiani nnya ǝsuǝ fuutǝkǝ akpa ” ?
58001014	Nyalɛɛ , bawoe ni kato eto batɔnkpe fɛ ? Mǝ ni awɔnɔ nnya leesumu Onanto nya woakpe mǝ atɔ nkǝ besu bawunsǝko mba ele bǝ bafo lǝ nkpǝ manlo .
58002001	Nyamfo eso ele bǝ bɔlɛ ɔnukualɛtiki nnya bɔ́nɔ ola kekleke nɛ . Lenni nkoo , boonya kusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
58002002	Kɛnyɛ ka Onanto eto batɔnkpe dítǝ bo banamǝǝ , eyifo ɔnukualɛ , nya lǝ utsyuǝ úta úbu nye útidi ato lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , bǝnǝ wǝ koto sitinti fe kase íńyǝ itǝ .
58002003	Nyalɛɛ , ntsyǝ boofo butsyetsyi lǝ kotonǝnǝ eto kɛnyɛ , lǝ bɔni koto butsyue akafo Ditiki Sɛɛ kplɛ nǝmfo ? Bonamute kosate leka bofo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɔtɛyi tutɛ tutɛ , fɛ mba kenke lɛnɔ ni lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ tsya díbǝ bátɛyi ni báse uyi bǝtǝ bo bǝ , diyifo ɔnukualɛ .
58002004	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto kosate tsya édi nnya adansiɛ ku ɔnukualɛ , lǝ nyaso úyifo ayanisa ku ayanisa lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , nya úsie Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa útǝ lǝ kase waala ǝsuǝ .
58002005	Onanto mémfi kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ ka lǝǝbǝ bubǝ ka ǝsuǝ bɔnlɛ etiki budi ókpe lǝ batɔnkpe kalɔ .
58002006	Fɛɛ Anantotiki eto lekpa ditsyuǝ édi nnya adansiɛ ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Be ni utidi , O Onanto , bǝ fǝ ǝnǝmii , lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nko ? Be ko ni utidinini bǝ lǝ aalɛ wǝ ola nko ?
58002007	Ábokosǝ wǝ kasɔ itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ enso Onanto eto batɔnkpe . Fɛɛ ǝbǝ éfi diyǝnde kplɛ ku dibu étsyisǝ wǝ fe lekankpakpa .
58002008	Nya fǝtǝ údi seka lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . ” Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ Onanto éyifo utidi nkǝ udi seka lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ nya nyamfo lɛ bote wuee bǝnkǝ , lesa saa banlɛ . Tsya lǝ kase intee , bɔnlɛ tɔ bunyǝ kase utidi nlɛ seka budi lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ .
58002009	Fɛɛ Yesu ǝmfoo , wǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ bábokosǝ kasɔ fe okpe lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kalɔɔ , itǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ukpǝ lǝ utsyue saa eto disi . Bɔlɛ wǝ bunyǝ mɔmɔ nwǝ béti ǝtǝsa ku dibu kenke eto lenkpakpa , ɛyɛ lǝ ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eso .
58002010	Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ Onanto wǝ díyifo nya woalɔ lesa saa kǝtsyǝǝ , tǝ Yesu lǝ ɔflɔ ɛyɛ lǝ kanyi ka únyǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ unǝ bebi kpǝ oboko lǝ bǝnyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Yesu ni nwǝ lookpa mǝ usuko nkpǝ manlo kǝmiǝ .
58002011	Wǝ lǝǝflǝ abua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ kewui , nya wǝ ku mba ǝsuǝ bǝflǝ abua béwui , anto ɔni uni mǝ . Nyaso yenyifo Yesu afanisa bǝ ókpadi mǝ nkǝ wǝ bayimi .
58002012	Woatɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Mɔɔtɛyi mɔ bayimi lesa nǝ féyifo . Nya mɔɔtɛsǝ fǝ lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ . ”
58002013	Usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Muufi mɔ kusubebe ntǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . ” Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ku bebi ba Onanto dífi útǝ mɛ . ”
58002014	Se betidi ba woakpadi nkǝ bebi ni betidi ba lɛbɔ betsyi lǝ sinǝ ku kɔtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu kosate ǝbǝ ófiani fe mǝ nnya úsiǝ nkpǝ fe mǝ ke . Úyifo nyamfo nko bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ Obonsam wǝ nkpe ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale .
58002015	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ulǝkǝ mba kenke lɛkɛ lǝ sidomu ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ nnya báte ukpǝ sikpi eso .
58002016	Nya ekpa bǝ inni Onanto eto batɔnkpe úbǝ kawunsǝko kɔ , bomu Abraham eto bebi eto bebi .
58002017	Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ , ele bǝ ofiani fe wǝ bayimi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ofiani ominsǝnyǝtidi ku nwǝ leesumu Onanto lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lǝ utǝ kedi lǝ betidi eto abua eto disi .
58002018	Nya se wǝ kosate dínyǝ kanyi nya báto wǝ bábe esoo , woofo mba nkpe lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ bɔwunsǝko .
58003001	Mɔ bayimi lala lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ , mi mba Onanto tsya lékpadi ! Bibu Yesu bebe , nwǝ Onanto létsyese nkǝ ubǝ ofiani Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lǝ bofokanɔ bo bonkpe ǝsuǝ .
58003002	Úyifo wǝ keyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ útǝ nwǝ dílǝkǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo wǝ keyifo fe kase Moses díyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto diyo .
58003003	Beefi dibu kǝtǝ nwǝ léto diyo kaso diyo nǝ báto kosate . Nko ke Yesu nkpe dibu kplɛ enso Moses nɛ .
58003004	Itsyise diyo saa kpe ni otonto . Fɛɛ Onanto ni nwǝ léto lesa saa .
58003005	Moses éyifo uyifoyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ lǝ Onanto eto diyo . Nya ɔ́tɛyi asa nnya ǝsuǝ Onanto luubǝ udi etiki utsyiko lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝǝ , ɔ́tɔnsǝ .
58003006	Fɛɛ Kristo eyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ fe Onanto eto Ubi wǝ nsi lǝ Onanto eto diyo eto kɛnyɛ . Bo ni wǝ diyo nǝmǝ nɛ , lǝ bokpe utu nya bofo bɔnɔ kekleke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobe .
58003007	Nnya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii ,
58003008	bientidi ato fe kase ítsyǝ lǝ mi banamǝ eto lefe , nya bátaka bǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase báto mɛ bábe lǝ mfiminti mfó .
58003009	Mfó nya báto mɛ bábe , lǝ babe lesa nǝ muuyifo , ite bǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya mínyifo lǝ alɛ fosi ana ǝsuǝ .
58003010	Lǝ nnya eso nnyǝ ɔblɔ nkpe betidi bamǝ . Nya míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Baamfo mɛ akanɔ , nya baani beentsyue mɔ afi koto . ’
58003011	Lǝ nyaso kafo ányi mɛ nya mínka ntamu míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntǝ tǝ mǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kulefe ! ’ ”
58003012	Mɔ bayimi bafokanɔtsyuǝ , bebe sinini biǝ mi nti eto kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔkɛ lɛkɔɛsi bua nya wǝmbɔkɛ bofokanɔ bǝ wǝǝmbɔtsyi kama okpe Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ .
58003013	Bomuu , bɛlɛ mi bǝtsyuǝ kɔlɛ diyi saa fe kase Mmii ǝmǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ leka mi . Lǝ itǝ bǝ biǝmbɔwɛ mi ǝsuǝ bekpe lǝ lebua lǝ befiani mba ditidi ato .
58003014	Itsyise buyifo bani ku Kristo lǝ bɔlɛ bo bofokanɔ lǝ kɔni kekleke isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ fe kase bútsyiko kasɔ .
58003015	Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii , bientidi ato fe kase ítsyǝ lǝ mi bana mǝ eto lefe , nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . ”
58003016	Bawe ni betidi ba lɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? Mba kenke Moses lékpa ɔ́yɛnko utsyiko Egipte eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ .
58003017	Nya bawoe Onanto dínyǝ ɔblɔ ókpe itǝ alɛ fosi ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ ? Mǝ ni betidi ba díyifo lebua ba díkpǝ lǝ mfiminti .
58003018	Bawoe ǝsuǝ Onanto léka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Kulefe , bembudufǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ eni míntǝtǝ mǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ . ” Bawoe ɔnlɛ ? Mba létaka bǝńyǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
58003019	Bunyǝ boǝ lǝ nnya eso bámfo kasɔ kamǝ budufǝ , itsyise bámfo banɔ .
58004001	Mɔmɔɔ , se kusubebe nsi nkpe bo bǝ buunyǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ wǝ Onanto dítsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ útsyǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ bobe kukɔnɔ bǝ , yǝǝmbǝ bǝ mi kuutsyuǝ saa mamfo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ wǝ útsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ útsyǝ .
58004002	Itsyise bátɛyi bo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ fe kase bátɛyi mǝ tsya . Bánɔ kɛnyɛ kamǝ , fɛɛ yényifo mǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise se banɔ nii , bámfo ni bánɔ tsya .
58004003	Fɛɛ bomba léfo bɔ́nɔɔ , búdufǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kamǝ , ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ . Ite fe kase ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ , “ Kafo ányi mɛ nya mínka ntamu míntsyǝ miǝ , ‘ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntatǝ mǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ kulefe ! ’ ” Ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nko ite bǝ wǝ kosate eto keyifo álo , idu lǝ lefe nǝ úyifo kawunsiǝ ólosǝ fɛ .
58004004	Itsyise lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni asa ǝtsyuǝ itsyi lǝ diyi kuansele ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto ǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ diyi kuansele ǝsuǝ lǝ keyifo saa buyifo ǝsuǝ . ”
58004005	Besi bátɛyi ditiki nǝmfo bǝ , “ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntatǝ mǝ bafo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ ! ”
58004006	Mba leka Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔ́nɔ mámfo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ , itsyise bámfo ni banɔ . Fɛɛ itǝ bǝtsyuǝǝ , kusu si kokpe bǝ bafo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ .
58004007	Bǝlǝkǝ nyamfo báte itsyise Onanto esi útsyǝ diyi bamba nǝ baakpo Mmi . Alɛ kpǝ lǝ nnya kamaa , fɛ údi etiki utsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto nnya búkatɛyi bofe bǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii , bientidi ato . ”
58004008	Lǝ nnya ete Yosua lɛyɛnko betidi bamǝ bédufǝ lǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝǝ , eni Onanto ménsidi etiki kama kama utsyiko lǝ diyi bamba ǝsuǝ .
58004009	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bamba si lekpe itǝ Onanto eto betidi fe diyi kuansele nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto dítsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
58004010	Itsyise nwǝ kee léfo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝǝ , ebutsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto keyifo kenke ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto dítsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ wǝ kale ǝsuǝ .
58004011	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bokplatsya lǝ bofo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmfo , bǝ lǝ bo kuutsyuǝ saa mentidi ato lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ fe kase béyifo .
58004012	Itsyisee , Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kpe nkpǝ nya lɛnlɛ keyifo kekleke , nya lenkpe kobe lenso lesiabi nyɛ nnuǝ . Diala lesa saa kǝlǝkǝ lǝ nsusu ku lɛwɔnɔ kǝmiǝ , isu ese taa ǝsuǝ eto ntsyakɔ ku dikubi ku afɔ eto katsyakɔ eto nti nya diakpo utidi eto nsusu ku utu kǝmiǝ kasɛɛ kukɔnɔ .
58004013	Asayifoyifo saa menyifo akulasa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Wǝǝnyǝ asayifoyifo saa tɛnklɛɛ nya ekpa wuee lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ ele bǝ bo utsyuǝ saa tǝ wǝ nkpǝ eto nkunta .
58004014	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ bo bofokanɔ bo boǝlǝkǝ kate kekleke . Itsyise bokpe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ ni Yesu , Onanto eto Ubi wǝ díkatɔ bo úsu kato úsu úńyǝ lǝ Onanto kosate eto ǝnǝmi .
58004015	Bo Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke enni nwǝ lǝǝnnyǝ bo kaminsǝ , se bumbǝ ale eso . Bomu bokpe utidi wǝ báto babe lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ fe bo ke . Fɛɛ wényifo lebua saa .
58004016	Lǝ nyaso bitǝ lǝ buńyǝ bembe , lǝ bɔnyi bɔfi Onanto eto lekankpomɛ kaka buunyǝ wǝ lefonǝ . Mfó wuunyǝ bo kaminsǝ bunyǝ wǝ lefonǝ nǝ lɔɔwunsǝko bo lǝ lefe nǝ ke ehiã bo .
58005001	Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke saa , betidinini nti ete bǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ ketsyiko , nya bǝǝtsyǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ uńyǝ lǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto eto kesumu ǝsuǝ , lǝ utǝ wǝ kedi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ abua eto bufikatsyɛ .
58005002	Se wǝ kosate , lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝmbǝ ale lǝ okla ǝsuǝ esoo , okpe disuǝtsyǝ kǝtǝ mba lenyi kusu ko ǝsuǝ ele bǝ bayɛ eso baata kebu .
58005003	Nya se wǝ kosate lǝmbǝ ale lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ele bǝ utǝ kedi , enni lǝ wǝ betidi hã eto abua eto disi te bomuu , lǝ wǝ kosate tsya eto abua eto disi .
58005004	Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝnlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke kefi dibu nǝ laamankla lǝ ni kǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto hã laakpadi utidi , keyifo wǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke fe kase ókpadi Aaron seka .
58005005	Nko ǝmǝ ke , Kristo mémfi Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto dibu útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , bomu Onanto lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Ubisaibi fe ni . Mmi mínle fǝ . ”
58005006	Usi ɔ́tɛyi lǝ kalebe bamba tsya nkǝ , “ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo fe Melkisedek eto okle . ”
58005007	Se Yesu dídi utidi lǝ kasɔ kamfoo , óto ola ku lekpakpalɛlɛ kekleke ku bofa bembembe ku binǝntu útǝ nwǝ loofo wǝ bulǝkǝ ketsyiko ukpǝ kǝmiǝ . Nya se óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya woate Onanto sikpi esoo , Onanto ánɔ wǝ olatoto .
58005008	Ite bǝ uyifo Onanto eto Ubi tsyaa , lǝ wǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ ókase kase baabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ .
58005009	Se Onanto díyifo wǝ nwǝ lɛflɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ ólosǝǝ , úbǝ úyifo wǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ mba kenke leetsyue wǝ koto laayɛ kǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
58005010	Wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuubǝ ofiani Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke fe Melkisedek eto okle .
58005011	Etiki kpǝ kpe bo lǝ kɛnyɛ bo ele bǝ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ , fɛɛ nnya bɔtɛyi kpe bulǝ , itsyise bɛnlɛ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ mlǝmlǝmlǝ .
58005012	Lefe kpǝ ákɛ bǝ eni befiani bateasa , fɛɛ bisi behiã utsyuǝ bǝ lǝ ote mi asa tutɛ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe ele bǝ bidi lesa nǝ nkpe ale , isi efe bǝ bɛyimi mmintu .
58005013	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ ɔyimi mmintuu , esi uyifo ubisambi wǝ lenyitɔ lesa nǝ ni lɛsɛ nye lebua .
58005014	Lesa nǝ nkpe alee , eyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ itǝ mba díkabe ɛyɛ lǝ buyifokǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ , loofo lekpo butsyǝ lǝ nǝ ni lɛsɛ ku lebua eto nti .
58006001	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ lǝ bobé lǝ asatete ǝsuǝ , lǝ bɔbɔ lǝ asatete tutɛ nnya bófo itsyi lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ni bǝnkǝ bɔtsyi bo akɔɛsi bɔwuninsǝ bɔbɔ lǝ abua ǝsuǝ ku nyifo bo lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa ku lǝ Onanto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
58006002	Báte mi asa lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ , anitǝkǝtǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ , lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ eto businkli kataka kǝbǝ nkpǝ ku lǝ lekpokponkpo fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
58006003	Bitǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ ! Nya nyamfo ele bǝ buyifo lǝ Onanto atɔnɔ nkǝ busu sɛtɔ nɛ .
58006004	Itsyise ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ mba léfo bánɔ kɔ nya bésinkli kamaa , besinkliko mǝ baboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ eto kusu ? Kɔɔ bákɛ lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ , bádia kato eto ǝtǝsa babe nya báfo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale .
58006005	Báte lǝ asa nnya díkǝbǝ éfe ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto eto ditiki alɛkɛ nya bǝkǝnyǝ kutǝkǝ ko nkpe lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya nkpe lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝ ǝsuǝ .
58006006	Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , báni mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ! Esoo , yɔɔkɛ ale bǝ besi bǝnǝ mǝ baboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise besi balɛ Onanto eto Ubi bɔsɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ , kǝnǝ wǝ kakpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
58006007	Onanto aakpo atsyɔ kasɔ ka lǝǝnǝ nsɔmintu bo laani kakpo lǝ ke , ka leeke eyi ku sefa nnya laalɛkɛ itǝ mba eso baafo ke kakpe bidikǝ .
58006008	Fɛɛ kasɔ ka leeke biyu ku kanyii , kaanlɛkɛ kǝtǝ kulesa , kakpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto ebukudi ke nya wootonsǝ ke ku ute .
58006009	Fɛɛ balala , lǝ búdi etiki mmǝ tsyaa , bófo mi bɔnɔ boǝ lǝ mi kutsyǝ alɛɛ , buyi boǝ béfo atsyɔkpokpo sɛɛ nnya loofo mi lǝ nkpǝ .
58006010	Onanto enni nwǝ lanyɛ lǝ kusutsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ . Weembota keyifo ka bíyifo nye lelabi nǝ bítǝ wǝ lǝ lɛwunsǝko bo bítǝ nya binsi bɛnlɛ butǝ bafokanɔfɔ bamba .
58006011	Bo lelabi itǝ mi ni bǝnkǝ mi utsyuǝ saa lɛ nnya kekleke nko isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ , bǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobee , le ibǝ itǝ nko .
58006012	Boanla boǝ biyifo sɛflɔ , bomu lǝ biyifo asa fe bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe dibusǝ bǝ lǝ bafo lesa nǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útǝ mǝ .
58006013	Lefe nǝ Onanto dítsyǝ Abraham kɛnyɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi óse uyi nkǝ , wuuyifo lǝ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Se kuutsyuǝ lǝmbǝ lɛmɔ onso wǝ esoo , úfi wǝ kosate eto diye úńyǝnsǝ kama .
58006014	Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ kɛnyɛ butsyǝ minkǝ , mookpo fǝ atsyɔ , ntǝ fǝ befluflu kpǝ . ”
58006015	Nya se Abraham lɛkɛ dibusǝ , úmuǝ utu ɔlɛ esoo , únyǝ asa nnya kenke Onanto dítsyǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
58006016	Betidi aakpadi asa nnya lɛmɔ enso mǝ kosate eto diye lǝ befi bala etiki nnya bátɛyi , lǝ befi bala etiki nnya tã .
58006017	Nyamfo eso Onanto lékpadi asa úfi óse wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ uyi nɛ , bǝ lǝ ekpako mba luubǝ bafo wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ wuee bǝ wǝ ketsyue amfloma kulefe .
58006018	Onanto áyɛ lǝ esu ǝnuǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ni kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ku asakpadikpadi nnya lantsyi kawuninsǝ , nya bembufi batɛyi sidia tsya , nya bomba díkǝnyǝ kabiɔkɔ lǝ wǝ , bonkpe kusubebe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ bɔkɔbe nnya bɔlɛ kekleke ku kusubebe ko eto kɛnyɛ bǝtsyǝ bo .
58006019	Kusubebe ko nkpe bo mfo eyifo fe lesa nǝ dímuǝ bo nkpǝ butsyǝ kekleke . Nya kusubebe komfo aakpia kafia ka nti Disumuyo eto sɛtɔ kafe kedufǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ kǝmiǝ .
58006020	Mfó ǝmǝ Yesu díkatɔ úsu lǝ bo kɛnyɛ fe ɔtɔusu seka . Wǝ díbǝ ofiani fe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Melkisedek eto okle isu ese manlo manlo .
58007001	Melkisedek ǝmfo édi seka lǝ Salem , nya úyifo usumunyǝ útǝ Onanto wǝ ntǝkǝ kato fanlo fanlo . Ɔ́bɔ ótsyako Abraham lǝ lefe nǝ útsyi lema nǝ úsu ɔ́kpɔ nya útǝkǝ baka ena ba létsyilama mfó kato . Melkisedek ǝmfo ésu ótsyako wǝ nya ókpo wǝ atsyɔ .
58007002	Nya Abraham dítǝ wǝ bikǝ bia ɔkɛ utsyiko mfó eto lekpafosile . Tutɛɛ , diye Melkisedek eto kasɔ ni Kasɛyifoyifo eto Oka . Nnya kama se údi Salem eto Oka esoo , wǝ diye eto kasɔ ni Diyuǝsǝ eto Oka .
58007003	Bánwɔni kulesa bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ wǝ anto nye ambe nye lǝ wǝ ketsyikɔ ǝsuǝ nye wǝ leleyi lee lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ . Uyifo fe Onanto eto Ubi , nya úyifo usumunyǝ ídu lǝ ketsyikokɔ isu kalosǝkɔ .
58007004	Bebe kase úyifo utidi wǝ lefo diye . Abraham wǝ ni bo ona wǝ léfo diye éfi bikǝ bia útsyiko kamato eto lekpafosile kulaa tsya útǝ wǝ !
58007005	Nya mɔmɔɔ , bǝtsyǝ kɔfi ko dítǝ kusu bǝnkǝ , Lewi eto befluflu di besumunyǝ . Baafo bikǝ bia Israel bebi ba ni mǝ betidi eto lekpafosile lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ , ite bǝ mǝ betidi bamǝ tsya eyifo Abraham eto befluflu tsya fɛ .
58007006	Melkisedek ǝmfo ményifo Lewi eto kafo eto ubi , tsyaa ófo lekpafosile utsyiko lǝ Abraham ɔflɔ , wǝǝ ni utidi Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ nya ókpo wǝ atsyɔ tsya .
58007007	Ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝ , utidi wǝ laakpo atsyɔ kpe kalende oso utidi wǝ bákpo atsyɔ .
58007008	Lǝ besumunyǝ eto kutsyǝǝ , mba laafo asa eto lekpafosilee , eyifo besumunyǝ ba lǝǝkpǝ . Lǝ Melkisedek eto kutsyǝǝ , ófo lekpafosile nǝmǝ fe usumunyǝ , fɛɛ wǝ nsi nkpǝ manlo fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi .
58007009	Nya boofo bɔtɛyi kulaa tsya boǝ Lewi wǝ laafo lekpafosile nǝmfoo , ɔ́yɛ lǝ Abraham eto kutsyǝ ófo asa eto lekpafosile nǝmfo útǝ Melkisedek .
58007010	Itsyise lefe nǝ Abraham létsyako Melkisedek nya útǝ wǝ asa eto lekpafosile nǝmfo , bánle tɔ Lewi , usi ɔ́kɛ lǝ wǝ ona eto kɔtɔ kǝmiǝ .
58007011	Lewi bebi eto besumunyǝdidi ǝsuǝ nnya kɔfi lɛyɛ kubǝ itǝ Israel bebi nɛ . Nya lǝ nnya ete Lewi bebi eto besumunyǝdidi lɛflɔɔ , eni yensife bǝ usumunyǝ bamba eto okle si ubǝ , nwǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ Melkisedek eto okle eto kutsyǝ ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ Aaron eto kutsyǝ .
58007012	Lǝ besumunyǝdidi eto kutsyǝ átsyi kɔwuninsǝǝ , ele bǝ kɔfi ko nyɛnko ko tsya tsyi kɔwuninsǝ .
58007013	Nya Bonamute wǝ ǝsuǝ bátɛyi asa nyamfo betsyikoo , étsyi lekpake bamba nǝ eto utidi kuutsyuǝ dímendi tɔ usumunyǝ unyǝ .
58007014	Ékpa wuee bǝ bále wǝ lǝ Yuda eto kafo , nya Moses mánkpo kafo kamfo eto diye ókpe lǝ mba luudi besumunyǝ nti .
58007015	Etiki nyamfo esi ekpa eso , lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe usumunyǝ bamba eto okle fe Melkisedek disi úbǝ údufǝ .
58007016	Utidi ǝmfo ǝbǝ ófiani usumunyǝ wǝ dímanyɛ lǝ utidi eto afi ku bunǝ ǝsuǝ , bǝ ofiani usumunyǝ lǝ diyo nǝ leedi ǝsuǝ , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya eto nkpǝ lǝmbǝ kalokɔ kulefe ǝsuǝ .
58007017	Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nyamǝ átɛyi ekpa wuee nkǝ , “ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo fe Melkisedek eto okle . ”
58007018	Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ bǝlǝkǝ kɔfi koko komǝ bǝtsyǝ kutsyǝ itsyise kumbǝ kɛnyɛale nya koǝńyǝ kutǝ kulesa .
58007019	Itsyise Moses eto kɔfi mamfo kulesa nǝ lɛflɔ buyifo . Nya mɔmɔɔ , bǝtǝ bo kusubebe fɔfɔ ko lɛlɛkɛ konso , nya bɔɔyɛ lǝ ko ǝsuǝ bɔfi Onanto enso .
58007020	Ɛwunsǝǝ , Onanto aká ntamu ɔ́wunsǝ lǝ usumunyǝdidi fɔfɔ ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Kɔɔ Onanto mánka ntamu ɔ́wunsǝ lǝ usumunyǝdidi ǝsuǝ .
58007021	Fɛɛ se Yesu léfiani usumunyǝǝ , Onanto áka ntamu útǝ wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute áka ntamu , nya wǝmbɔtsyi wǝ kɛnyɛ ɔwuninsǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo . ’ ”
58007022	Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ Yesu ǝbǝ ófiani nwǝ ńyǝ kɛnyɛklekle kamfo kama , ka lɛlɛkɛ kanso .
58007023	Bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ bamba tsya ǝbǝ . Besumunyǝ ba kɔ éfui tinti , nya bánkaklɛ lǝ mǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise békekpǝ .
58007024	Fɛɛ se Yesu , wǝ nsi nkpǝ itǝ manlo manlo esoo , wǝ keyifo fe usumunyǝ amfloma ani kesu utidiamba ɔflɔ .
58007025	Lǝ nyasoo , woafo mba lǝǝbǝ Onanto ɔflɔ lǝ nkpǝ lefe saa ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kosate ǝsuǝ , itsyise usi nkpǝ lefe saa ɔlɛ bofokǝtǝ mǝ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
58007026	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ele bǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ fe Yesu kɛ bo . Nwǝ diyifo kɛnkɛ , nya kabua saa lǝmbǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woambiasǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ bǝlǝkǝ lete lǝ babuayifo nti , wǝ bábesǝ kato fanlofanlofanlo .
58007027	Yanhiã kulaa bǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ɛmfo eto oklee , kǝtǝ Onanto kedi lefe saa , tutɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto disi esoo , nnya kama lǝ betidi bamba eto disi eso , fe kase besumunyǝ ninǝ kenke fɛfɛ leeyifo . Uyifo nyamfo diyifo lɛwɛ itǝ lefe nǝ kenke lǝ lefe nǝ úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ .
58007028	Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , Moses eto kɔfi komǝ ǝtsyǝ betidinini ba dímamflɔɔ , besumunyǝ ninǝ kplɛ , fɛɛ Onanto eto ntamu bo óka lǝ Moses eto kɔfi komǝ kamaa , ǝtsyǝ wǝ Ubi Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ úyifo lɛflɔ itǝ lefe nǝ kenke .
58008001	Nnya kenke bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ete ni bǝnkǝ , bokpe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo eto okle , wǝ nsi lǝ Ɔkplɛnyǝ Kenke eto lekankpomɛ eto kodiani lǝ kato .
58008002	Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo eesumu lǝ kakɛnkɛkɔ ka ni Disumuyo tinti ka Bonamute díyifo , inni betidi díyifo .
58008003	Bǝtsyǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke saa bǝ lǝ ufi ǝtǝsa saa ku bebuki utǝ Onanto . Nyaso ele bǝ bo usumunyǝ tsya kɛ lesaatsyuǝ nǝ uufi utǝ kedi .
58008004	Nya lǝ kasɔ mfo ete onkpee , eni wǝ ǝmbuyifo usumunyǝ , itsyise besumunyǝ ba lǝǝtǝ kedi lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi eto kusuu , fe bakpe koko .
58008005	Keyifo ka beeyifo fe besumunyǝ mfo eyifo nka nte beeyifo lǝ Onanto eto kato eto koyo ete . Nko esoo , lǝ lefe nǝ Moses nkǝ woato disumunyoo , Onanto lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fǝnkǝ eyifo ni lekateko ku ditsyǝbi nǝ báte fǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ . ”
58008006	Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , bǝtǝ Yesu kesumu eto keyifo ka ntǝkǝ mǝ kale kato , fe kase kɛnyɛklekle ka útsyue lǝ wǝ betidi ku Onanto eto ntii , alɛkɛ kaso nka kɔ , itsyise wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto asa alɛkɛ eso asa nnya nkpe lǝ nka kɔ .
58008007	Lǝ nya ete kulesa dimambia lǝ kɛnyɛklekle tutɛ kamǝ ǝsuǝ , eni yensife itǝ kǝnuǝfǝ kamfo .
58008008	Fɛɛ Onanto ǝnyǝ kabua lǝ wǝ betidi ǝsuǝ se ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe lɛ bubǝ se mɔ , fǝ Onamutee , lookle kɛnyɛ fɔfɔ ku Israel eto betidi ku Yuda eto betidi .
58008009	Kɛnyɛklekle kamfo embutsyǝ fe nka mínkle ku mǝ bana mǝ , lǝ lefe nǝ mínkɔbe mǝ minlɛ lǝ kɔni nya mínkpa mǝ mímbɔnko lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ . Itsyise béntsyue mɔ kɛnyɛklekle kamǝ koto . Nyaso míntsyi kama mínkpe mǝ nɛ . Mmǝ Bonamute nlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ !
58008010	Mɔmɔɔ , nyǝ kɛnyɛ ka mookle ku Israel eto betidi lǝ lefe nǝ lǝǝbǝ mǝ . Muufi mɔ kɔfi nkpe mǝ lǝ mǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . Nya mɔɔwɔni ko nkpe lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ . Muuyifo mǝ Onanto , nya mǝǝ tsya ebuyifo mɔ betidi .
58008011	Nya mǝ kuutsyuǝ ensi embote wǝ utsyuǝ kulesa nye wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ tɛyi nkǝ bete Bonamute ǝmǝ . Itsyise mǝ utsyuǝ saa ebote mɛ idu lǝ dikpefi isu ese lǝ uninǝ ǝsuǝ .
58008012	Nya muufi mǝ abua nnya kenke béyifo ntsyɛ mǝ . Nya mensiembokloma mǝ abua nya béyifo kulefe . ”
58008013	Se Onanto lídi etiki utsyiko lǝ kɛnyɛklekle fɔfɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ete kasɔ bǝ nka kɔ eyifo kakoko . Nya lesa saa nǝ lefiani lekoko nǝ lesibǝ kutǝkǝǝ , ǝmbɔklɛ fɛ dionya kenke .
58009001	Kɛnyɛklekle tutɛ eto afi ákɛ kesumu eto afi , nya béyifo kasɔ mfo eto Disumuyo tsya bǝtsyǝ .
58009002	Béyifo Kafia eto Mpatampa Kɛnkɛ nya bésie ni lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ ku kafia . Baakpo sɛtɔ eto lekpa bǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ . Mfó bǝńyǝnsǝ okandiɛ eto keyi ku kesumu eto ɔpunu wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝǝtǝkǝ abolo nnya beefi kǝtǝ Onanto kedi .
58009003	Lǝ Disumuyo eto kaka befi kafia bala eto kamaa , ni kaka baakpo Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke .
58009004	Mfó béfi sika sia eto ɔpunu wǝ ǝsuǝ baatonsǝ lifui ku kɛnyɛklekle eto lelaka nǝ befi sika sia beti batsyilama bǝtsyǝ . Nya kɛnyɛklekle eto lelaka nǝmǝ kafoo , bákpe asa nnya ni sika sia eto okase utsyuǝ wǝ eto kafo bákpe didisa nǝ baakpo mana , ku Aaron eto uyilɛlɛ wǝ díkǝ ku afanto , ku aba blɛkɛtɛ ǝnuǝ nya ǝsuǝ báwɔni Onanto eto afi bǝtǝkǝ .
58009005	Lǝ lelaka nǝmǝ eto kato báwe Onanto eto asa nnya nkpe nkpǝ baakpo bǝ Kerubi eto ditsyǝbi bǝtǝkǝ ba nlɛ Onanto eto diyǝnde bulǝkǝ kate . Mǝ mbamba eto koyo éti kaka bǝǝnyǝ betidi kaminsǝ kefi mǝ abua katsyɛ mǝ . Fɛɛ boǝmbofo etiki budi mfo kǝlǝkǝ asa nyamfo kenke kasɔ kate mɔmɔ .
58009006	Nko ini bétsyue asa nyamfo bǝtsyǝ mfó nɛ . Besumunyǝ bamǝ eedufǝ Disumuyo tutɛ kamǝ diyi saa kesu keyifo mǝ kesumuyifo mfó .
58009007	Kǝmiǝ eto Disumuyo nǝmǝǝ , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke hã nkpe kusu weedufǝ mfó lɛlɛ sɔni hã . Nya lǝ ɔtɔɔ , ele bǝ ufi ubuki eto kɔtɔ usuko mfó usu utǝ Onanto kedi lǝ wǝ ku kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi eto abua nnya béyifo lǝ mǝ mante mante ǝsuǝ eto disi .
58009008	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ se sɛtɔ eto Disumuyo nǝmǝ nsi nte koo , yǝntǝ kusu bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kpia mfó ofe udufǝ lǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke kǝmiǝ .
58009009	Nyamfo eyifo asabulǝkǝ kate ǝtsyuǝ itǝ utidi taa mmi , lǝ mmi eto kesumu ǝsuǝ . Ite bǝ bǝǝtǝ ǝtǝsa ku keditǝtǝ eto asa nyamfo lǝ ketsyue kamfo eto kusu ǝsuǝ tsyaa , nyamfo ǝntǝ bǝ nwǝ nlɛ Onanto kesumu butǝ eto lɛkɔɛsi laakpa kenke .
58009010	Itsyise nyamfo kenke nyǝ lǝ budi ku bunǝ ku akpa eto etsyuesa kpǝ kpǝ , nnya lɛyɛ lǝ utidi eto ǝsuǝ bokpasǝ eto esu ǝsuǝ ete . Béyifo etsyuesa nyamfo kenke itǝ utidi isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto luubǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kusu fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ .
58009011	Fɛɛ Kristo ebubǝ koko fe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke itǝ asa sɛɛ nya díkǝbǝ . Uyifo usumunyǝ lǝ Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝ lɛmɔ , nya lɛflɔ lenso Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝ kɔ . Dienyifo dibu nǝ utidinini dífi wǝ ani uyifo eto kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ dienyifo kasɔ kamfo eto asayifoyifo .
58009012	Lefe nǝ Kristo dídufǝ disumuyo nǝ mǝǝ , ɔ́yɛ lǝ ni ofe lɔni kplo , údufǝ lǝ kaka ni Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke . Nya wémfi bate nye banantsyui eto kɔtɔ uyifo fe keditǝtǝ , bomu wǝ kosate eto kɔtɔ itǝ lefe nǝ ta ! Nya úyifo nko bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ utǝ bo nkpǝ manlo .
58009013	Weefi bate ku banantsyui eto kɔtɔ ku onantsyui eto lɛkpɔ nǝ baatonsǝ eto ntɔ beefi kese lǝ nwǝ eto ǝsuǝ dimanle itǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ele , iyifo wǝ kenkɛ .
58009014	Lǝ nyamfo eyifo sitinti , nyalɛ ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ bǝ Kristo eto kɔtɔ bomu embokpasǝ bo esuǝ eso nko ! Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa ǝsuǝǝ , úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe keditǝtǝ ka lɛflɔ utǝ Onanto . Wǝ kɔtɔ ebuflǝsǝ bo akɔɛsi itsyiko lǝ akpa bimba eto eyifosa nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa bǝ lǝ busumu Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa .
58009015	Nyaso Kristo ni nwǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle fɔfɔ kamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dínyǝ lǝ bo kɛnyɛ ófo útǝ bo , bǝ lǝ betidi ba Onanto lékpadi lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo eto kedikɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ . Nyamfo ebofo bubǝ kǝtǝ itsyise utidi ɔni wǝ díkpee , dílǝkǝ abuayifoyifo nnya lɛkɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle koko eto lefe úwui , bǝnyǝ bufikatsyɛ .
58009016	Lǝ kase yǝǝbǝǝ , lǝ utidi mǝnkpǝǝ , beensensǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto kukue eto bikǝ .
58009017	Lǝ utidi wǝ dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ si usi nkpǝǝ , bǝmbofo utidi ǝmǝ eto bike busǝnsǝ .
58009018	Lǝ nnya eso béfi kɔtɔ bákpe ǝsuǝale kɛnyɛklekle koko kamǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
58009019	Tutɛɛ , Moses ábe letsya úlǝkǝ aklesa nnya nkpe lǝ kɔfi komǝ óte kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi . Nya úfi bate ku banatsyui eto kɔtɔ otsyakasǝ ku ntu ku basamu eto bisǝ sia ku afantosi nnya laanyi fififi fɛ úfi úse lǝ kɔfi eto kukue ku betidi bamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
58009020	Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni kɔtɔ ko Onanto dífi ose kɔfi ko utǝ bo uyi nkǝ butsyue ko koto . ”
58009021	Nko ke Moses dífi kɔtɔ komǝ úsǝ lǝ Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝmǝ ku asa nnya kenke béfi béyifo kesumu kamǝ nɛ .
58009022	Sitinti lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ kɔtɔ beefi kǝflǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ bankpo kɔtɔɔ kasɔɔ , beemfi lebua katsyɛ .
58009023	Ińyǝ itǝ bǝ béyifo nkomǝ eto akpa nyamfo lǝ befi bakpasǝ asa nnya lele kato eto ale ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ asa nnya ni kato eto ale eto kutsyǝ , befi keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya lekpa ǝsuǝ enso kasɔ mfo eto alee , bákpasǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
58009024	Itsyise Kristo mensu kakɛnkɛkɔ ka befi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi eto ani beyifo , ka ni kakɛnkɛkɔ kato eto okle ete . Bomu úsu kato kosate , kaka woala kǝńyǝ kǝtǝ bo lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
58009025	Kristo ménsu mfó nkǝ lǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ kedi sesia sesia lǝ bo disi , fe kase Yudafɔ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke leedufǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke mfó keyifo lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ ku ubuki eto kɔtɔ , ko lenni wǝ kosate eto kole .
58009026	Lǝ nko ini , eni yoofe bǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ , unyǝ kanyi sesia sesia idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ ke . Bomu kase inte mɔmɔ , Kristo ǝbǝ lɔni kplo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ eto eyi nyamfo lǝ ufi wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ utǝ fe kedi lǝ ulǝkǝ lebua uwui , lǝ bo disi .
58009027	Onanto dítsyǝ nnya nkǝ utidi kpǝ sɔni kplo , nya lǝ nnya kamaa , bakponko wǝ lekpo .
58009028	Nko ke ini Kristo dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi sɔni kplo , itǝ betidi kpǝ eto bofo ketsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Wuusinkli ubǝ dinuǝfǝ , insini lǝ lebua eso , bomu bǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ mba nsi banlɛ wǝ kusu bobe itǝ nkpǝ manlo .
58010001	Yudafɔ eto kɔfi komǝǝ , asa sɛɛ nnya nlɛ bubǝ eto koyo ete kuni , inni asɛ nnya kosate lǝǝbǝ bubǝ ini . Nyaso kɔfi komǝ embofo bɔyɛ lǝ keditǝtǝ ka beeyifo lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ keyifo betidi ba laanyi kafi Onantoo , baflɔ balo kulefe .
58010002	Lǝ nnya ete boofo betidi ba nlɛ Onanto busumu buyifo kɛnkɛnkɛ babɔ lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝǝ , eni mǝ ketu ensiembolo mǝ dikpi bio , nya keditǝtǝ saa ebolo .
58010003	Fɛɛ keditǝtǝ lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ nyamfo aaklomasǝ betidi mǝ abuayifoyifo hã te .
58010004	Itsyise bate ku banantsyui eto kɔtɔ embofo abua buflǝ kewui lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ .
58010005	Lǝ nyamfo eso fɛ Kristo luubǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Ámanhiã keditǝtǝ ku asatǝtǝ , bomu éyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
58010006	Bebuki botonsǝ kǝtǝ kedi ku lebuayifoyifo eto asatǝtǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , aankpe fǝ disuǝyuǝ .
58010007	Nya míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ mɔɔ , mbǝ miǝ meyifo fǝ lelabi fe kase bawɔni lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ kɔfi eto Kukue kǝmiǝ . ’ ”
58010008	Tutɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ámanhiã keditǝtǝ ku asatǝtǝ , bebuki botonsǝ kǝtǝ kedi ku lebuayifoyifo eto keditǝtǝ . ” Nya yǝnyuǝsǝfǝ kafo tsya , ite bǝ kɔfi komǝ áte nkǝ beyifo nko fɛ .
58010009	Mfó ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ mfo . Mbǝ miǝ meeyifo fǝ lelabi . ” Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya kɔ útsyǝ kutsyǝ . Nya úfi Kristo eto keditǝtǝ útsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ .
58010010	Se Yesu Kristo díyifo lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kase úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ útǝ sɔni kplo itǝ afe nnya ta esoo , Onanto ákpasǝ bo ǝsuǝ lǝ nnya eso .
58010011	Diyi saa , Yudafɔ eto usumunyǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo . We efi ǝtǝsa nyamǝ ke kǝtǝ kedi lefe saa , ite bǝ yembofo abua nyamǝ buflǝ kewui tsya .
58010012	Fɛɛ se Kristo díbǝ útǝ kedi kani kamǝ hã lǝ abua eto disi itǝ lefe nǝ kenke ólosǝǝ , úsu úsiǝ lǝ Onanto eto kodiani .
58010013	Mfó unsi mɔmɔ idu isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto luufi wǝ balo okpe lǝ wǝ nkpakalɔ .
58010014	Kristo efi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi ditǝ lɛwɛ , nya úyifo mba eto ǝsuǝ bákpasǝ lɛflɔ beyifo kɛnkɛ isu manlo .
58010015	Nyaa , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ nya ote wee nkǝ ,
58010016	“ Nyǝ kɛnyɛ ka mookle ku mǝ lǝ eyi nnya lǝǝbǝ mmǝ kama . Muufi mɔ kɔfi nkpe lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ . Nya mɔɔwɔni nya lǝ mǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . ”
58010017	Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mensi embokloma mǝ abua ku mǝ eyifosa bua saa . ”
58010018	Lǝ befi asa nyamfo bátsyɛɛ , yensiembofe bǝ , besi bǝtǝ kedi lǝ abua eto disi .
58010019	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , bokpe kusu buedufǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke kamǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eso .
58010020	Itsyise ɔ́sini kusu fɔfɔ utǝ bo , ko ni nkpǝ eto kusu ɛyɛ lǝ kafia ka béti lǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke eto kɛnyɛ mfó ka ńyǝ itǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ .
58010021	Bokpe Usumunyǝ Kplɛ wǝ nsi lǝ Onanto eto diyo nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
58010022	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔnyi bɔfi Onanto ku sitinti eto utu , ku bofokanɔ kekleke ku akɔɛsi nnya bǝflǝ éle kɛnkɛnkɛ bǝlǝkǝ betsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ ku ntu bo keni saa lǝmbǝ bǝ bo akɔɛsi ensi aalo bo dikpi .
58010023	Bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ nnya bofo bɔnɔ , bɔnlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ nya boǝlǝkǝ katee lǝ kɔni kekleke , itsyise Onanto wǝ ditsyǝ bo kɛnyɛɛ , eyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ .
58010024	Bitǝ bukebu disi lǝ bukakpe bo bǝtsyuǝ otsyekle lǝ lɛyimila ku nkpǝ sɛɛ busiǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
58010025	Biǝntǝ lǝ bɔyɛ disikakpekɔ busu fe kase bo nti eto bǝtsyuǝ leeyifo seka . Bomu bitǝ lǝ bokpe bǝtsyuǝ nkɛale enso , se binyi biǝ Bonamute eto Diyi nǝmǝ fe lɛlɛ bɔnyi kafi .
58010026	Fɛɛ lǝ buyi ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ , fɛ busi butsyǝ bɔnlɛ asa bua buyifo , nyalɛ keditǝtǝ saa ensibǝ ka dulǝkǝ abua iwui itǝ bunyǝ bufikatsyɛ bio .
58010027	Bomu nya lesa saa nǝ luubu ni bǝ Onanto ookponko bo lekpo , nya wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mba létaka bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ditefɛnku nǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ ale !
58010028	Utsyuǝ saa ke dímentsyue Moses eto kɔfi kotoo , bolo baalo wǝ kaminsǝ mǝnyǝmǝnyǝ , lǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo balo wǝ dikpi lǝ badansiɛ inuǝ nye itsyǝ eto kɛnyɛ kama .
58010029	Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ nwǝ laani Onanto eto Ubi , nwǝ lǝǝntǝ dibu Onanto eto kɛnyɛklekle eto kɔtɔ ko díflǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ nya waaka lefonǝ eto Lɛwɔnɔ ? Ntsyǝ fɛ kotonǝnǝ kekleke kutsyuǝ eto okle lembunyǝ kutǝ wǝ !
58010030	Itsyise buyi nwǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Muutsyǝ nnya kɛnyɛ . Mɔɔ , maatisǝ oko . ” Nya owoe tsya lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ebokponko wǝ betidi lekpo . ”
58010031	Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ nwǝ luudufǝ lǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe nkpe eto lefonyi ǝsuǝ .
58010032	Bekloma kase ítsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mmǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde díkabɔ lékpo mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bulǝ kpǝ dítu mi , fɛɛ bulǝ bomǝ mǝntǝkǝ mi kato .
58010033	Lefe ditsyuǝ , baaka mi kulaa tsya lǝ betidi nti nya beeyifo mi disiale , nya lǝ afe bamba ǝtsyuǝ tsyaa , beebu mi kakpe lǝ mba ǝsuǝ banlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo kakpe eto nti .
58010034	Bińyǝ kanyi ku mba befi bakpe lǝ aba eto diyo . Nya lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ mi balɛ mi bikǝ bafo lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ tsyaa , yǝnlǝ mi itsyise bete biǝ bisi bekpe bikǝ bia lefo koya enso mi , bia lembobia kulefe .
58010035	Lǝ nyaso biǝntǝ lǝ elo mi ani itsyise yuunǝ kutǝkǝ kpǝ eboko mi .
58010036	Ele bǝ bekpe dibusǝ lǝ biyifo Onanto eto lelabi lǝ befo lesa nǝ útsyǝ kɛnyɛ utsyǝ mi .
58010037	Itsyise fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyii , “ Ibu sɛkɛɛ , lǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ ubǝ udufǝ , wǝǝmbofe kama ku bubǝ .
58010038	Mɔ utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ , ebunyǝ bofokanɔ usiǝ nkpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ utsyuǝ etsyi kama okpe mɛɛ , membunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
58010039	Fɛɛ boo , bunni betidi ba leetsyi kama kakpe bo bofakanɔ bǝ lǝ bonya . Bomu boo , bófo bɔ́nɔ , nya Onanto léfo bo .
58011001	Lǝ akpe bofokanɔɔ , eté bǝ akpe kusubebe kekleke itǝ lesa nǝ fanlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ . Ite bǝ anlɛ ni bunyǝ tsya .
58011002	Bofokanɔ dítǝ Onanto dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bo bana ǝsuǝ lǝ kokolefe .
58011003	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nya bɔ́nɔ kasɔ boǝ Onanto éyifo kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ . Nya úyifo nnya utsyiko lǝ lesa nǝ dimankɛ bǝnyǝ kɔ ǝsuǝ .
58011004	Bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ nya Abel dífi asa nnya lɛlɛkɛ enso Kain eto ale útǝ Onanto kedi eso Onanto dínyǝ wǝ nwǝ leeyifo kasɛɛ . Onanto áfo wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya ɔ́yɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ údi wǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . Ite bǝ Abel ékpe tsyaa , wǝ bofokanɔ si bɔlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
58011005	Ɛyɛ lǝ Enok eto bofokanɔ esoo , weenkpe . Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato . Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ wǝ , itsyise Onanto étsyi wǝ usuko kato . Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , fɛ útsyi Enok úsuko katoo , wǝ asa édufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ .
58011006	Kuutsyuǝ eto etiki embudufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ , lenni ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ ke lǝǝbǝ Onanto ɔflɔ , ele bǝ ofo ɔnɔ nkǝ Onanto kpe nya wǝǝtǝ mba laabɛbɛ wǝ lǝǝnyǝ wǝ .
58011007	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Onanto díkǝ Noa ato kekleke itsyi lǝ asa nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ nya wǝǝnnyǝ tɔ unyǝ ǝsuǝ . Útsyue Onanto koto nya ówe lelaka eto ɔklɔ nǝ léfo wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi lǝ nkpǝ . Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ bomfo ǝsuǝ Noa ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke édi dikpi . Nya ófiani ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nya únyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
58011008	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Abraham lɛnɔ Onanto eto bokpadi bo ókpadi wǝ nkǝ usu kasɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ nkǝ wuufi utǝ wǝ fe wǝ kedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Údu lǝ wǝ kasɔ úsu kaka wánte kulaa tsya .
58011009	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , úsiǝ fe ɔfɔ lǝ kasɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . Úsiǝ lǝ ebu fe Isak ku Yakob ba léfo kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
58011010	Abraham ákabe kusu itǝ umǝnkplɛ wǝ báto bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto kosate léto .
58011011	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ite bǝ Abraham wǝ díkabe ófee , léfiani anto nya Sara wǝ díkabe ofiani uninǝsia tsya lɛlɛ kafo , Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ Abraham fiani ubianto itsyise uyi nkǝ Onanto wǝ dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ , éyifo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ ǝsuǝ .
58011012	Ite bǝ Abraham obobe uku tsya , ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝmfo ǝsuǝ , nya befluflu kpǝ lɛbɔ betsyi fe befandebi nkpe kato , fe kase lekpa eto kɔwunumi ko bǝmbofo lǝ lekpa kɛnyɛ .
58011013	Betidi bamfo kenke ǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝkpǝ . Bámfo asa nnya Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ . Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ nya famfamfamfa nya bǝtǝ nya edufǝ nya batɛyi bǝnkǝ sitinti bafɔ ku mba nyɛ kusu ete beni lǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ .
58011014	Nya betidi ba latɛyi asa nyamfoo , ǝǝlǝkǝ kate wuee bǝnkǝ balɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ mǝ kosate eto kǝmǝnsɔ .
58011015	Lǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ bétu ete banlɛ bɔbɛbɛɛ , eni bátafo businkli kesu mfó .
58011016	Bomuu , bákabe kusu itǝ kasɔ ka lɛlɛkɛ kanso nkamfó . Ke ni Onanto eto kato . Nyamfo eso yaanlɛ Onanto kofani lǝ bakpadi wǝ bǝ mǝ Onanto nɛ , itsyise ɔ́lɔ umǝnkplɛ utsyuǝ útsyǝ itǝ mǝ .
58011017	Ɛyɛ lǝ Abraham eto bofokanɔ eso lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto léto wǝ óbee , ite bǝ Abraham ni nwǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ utsyǝ tsyaa , ɔ́tɔnɔ lǝ ufi wǝ ubi ɔni kplo Isak utǝ Onanto kedi .
58011018	Ite bǝ Onanto ébɔtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ubi Isak ǝsuǝ nya fuunyǝ befluflu kpǝ ba míntɛyi míntsyǝ . ”
58011019	Abraham éfi nnya nkǝ , Onanto ebofo wǝ ubi Isak botakasǝ ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kaboko nkpǝ . Nya fe kase íbǝǝ , Abraham ésinkli ófo Isak fe ɔkɔmǝ útsyi úbǝ .
58011020	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Isak lékpo Yakob ku Esau atsyɔ itǝ sɛtɔ sia nlɛ bubǝ .
58011021	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya Yakob le lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ bukpǝǝ , ókpo Yosef eto bebi atsyɔ , nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto se úkpǝsǝ lǝ uyi wǝ waalɛ ǝsuǝ .
58011022	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ se Yosef dínyǝ nkǝ wǝ dikpǝfe éboyoo , údi etiki utsyi lǝ Israel bebi eto budu lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ kase ele bǝ beyifo ku wǝ ɔkɔ .
58011023	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso Moses eto antomǝ dífi wǝ bákula lǝ afa ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ se bále wǝ . Bǝnyǝ bǝ úyifo dikpefi nǝ laanɔ bobe nya bánte sikpi ku oka ǝmǝ eto kɔfi bota kebu ǝsuǝ .
58011024	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya Moses lɛni nkǝ bánkpadi wǝ bǝ Oka Farao eto ubisiobi eto ubi lefe nǝ úkabé .
58011025	Iyifo wǝ lelabi nkǝ lǝ unyǝ kanyi ku Onanto eto betidi enso bǝ unyǝ kamini lǝ lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti .
58011026	Úbu nnya óbe nkǝ lǝ bakpé wǝ kofani lǝ Kristo eto disii , ɛlɛkɛ famfamfamfa eso kedi ka wuunyǝ lǝ utǝkǝko Egipte eto kasɔ eto asa nnya wuunyǝ kama . Itsyise úfi wǝ ǝnǝmi utǝkǝ lǝ kutǝkǝ ko Onanto luutǝ wǝ lǝ sɛtɔ́ ǝsuǝ .
58011027	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ bomǝ esoo , údu lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ nya wǝánte oka ǝmǝ eto kafo ka lɔɔnyi wǝ sikpi . Nya fenkǝ únyǝ Onanto wǝ bo ǝnǝmi lǝmbofo bunyǝ , ɔ́ni nkǝ wembusinkli kama .
58011028	Bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ nya útsyǝ Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto lekpa kasɔ lefe nǝ béfi kɔtɔ bese lǝ biku ku keyi ǝsuǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ díbǝ ólo Egiptefɔ eto ubisaibi ninǝ saa lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ nya yanlɛ bǝ utidi Israelfɔ eto bebi saa .
58011029	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya dítǝ Israel bebi léfo Lekpo Sia bɔyila fe kasɔnti fufu ǝsuǝ bákayɛ nɛ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Egiptefɔ lekplatsya bǝ baayila ni , ntu bomǝ étsyiko mǝ búdunko .
58011030	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ , se Israel bebi lɛyɛ bátsyilama kafati ka báto batsyilama Yeriko eto umǝ eyi akuansee , nnya dítǝ kafati kamǝ léba kákpoo kasɔ nɛ .
58011031	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nyaso bánlo Rahab wǝ ni otsyetɔ mfó fe kase bálo mba dimamfo Onanto banɔ . Itsyise ófo Israelfɔ eto betidi ba bátsyese ba dísu mfó bésu bátsyilama béyu kasɔ kamǝ bábe kukɔnɔ .
58011032	Be tsya ele bǝ nsi ntɛyi mi ? Lefe kpǝ ǝmbǝ mɛ bǝ lǝ ndi etiki ntsyiko lǝ Gideon , Barak , Samson , Yefta , David ku Samuel ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ .
58011033	Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , bákpɔ nsɔ kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ mǝ kato . Béyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ nya bǝnyǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto dítsyǝ útǝ mǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝ díti batsyata eto nnyɛ .
58011034	Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛninsǝ etefɛnku kplɛ nnya díkatonsǝ asa . Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛbɔ báfe lǝ lesiabi eto kɛnyɛ lǝ lema ǝsuǝ . Ite bǝ betidi bamfó kenke mankɛ ǝsuǝale saa tsya , Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale ! Bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale fe bamamanyǝ ba lɛkɛ ale kekleke , nya bǝtǝkǝ bafɔ eto bamamanyǝ bamǝ kenke kato .
58011035	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , besio léfo mǝ batokpenyǝ ba díkpǝ disi bǝbǝ nkpǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝǝ , lɛnni bǝ betidi mǝnlǝkǝ mǝ betsyiko lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ka ǝsuǝ bákɛ , bomu bála bǝ lǝ bǝkpǝ , bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ bo nso kɔnɔ .
58011036	Bákpe bǝtsyuǝ kɔfiɔ nya báblɛ mǝ ku keyibi . Nya bákpe bǝtsyuǝ lǝ amena nya beti mǝ bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo .
58011037	Bákpɔ bǝtsyuǝ aba nya bákpe bǝtsyuǝ tsya eku ǝnuǝ ku nlande , nya báto bǝtsyuǝ ku asiabi bálo . Nya béfi basamu ku bate eto ekue bémini mǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyɛ bákafe itsyise kulesa mǝntsyǝ mǝ . Nya betidi lékpe mǝ bulǝ , nya bǝnyǝ kanyi tinti .
58011038	Lǝ mǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ bo bǝsiǝ esoo , kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi mámfo mǝ . Nyaso bákayɛ bákafe lǝ mfiminti ku atiniku ku kanyinyǝnyǝ fe mba bála lǝ mǝ nsɔ , nya bákɛ lǝ aba kalɔ ku lǝ ǝbiǝ lǝ kasɔnti .
58011039	Ite bǝ bátɛsǝ betidi bamfo kenke ba bákpe bofokanɔ tsyaa , bámfo kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lɛ́tɛyi útsyǝ mǝ .
58011040	Itsyise Onanto ǝnye asa bamba nya lɛlɛkɛ enso útsyǝ bo . Nya lǝ bo mankɛ mǝ lǝ ntii , bembuyifo mǝ báflɔ balo .
58012001	Lǝ nyaso se bonkpe bamanyǝ kpǝ bamfo ba letsyilama bo nya banlɛ bo otsyekle bokpe esoo , bitǝ lǝ bulǝkǝ asa nnya leeti bo kusu ku lebua nǝ laakpa bo kekleke kalɛ lefe kpǝ buwui . Nya lǝ butsyetsyi etsyi nnya nte bo sɛtɔ ku unyǝ , kama bebe mankɛ .
58012002	Bitǝ lǝ bo ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ Yesu hã ǝsuǝ . Wǝ hã ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ bo bofokanɔ nkpǝsǝ itsyi lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Se óte disuǝyuǝ nǝ nte sɛtɔ wuunyǝ esoo , ókpe utu únyǝ kanyi lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya wémfi kofani ko wuudi lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ kulesa . Nya mɔmɔɔ , úsu usi lǝ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ɔflɔ lǝ wǝ kodiani .
58012003	Bibu Yesu bebe , lǝ kanyi ka únyǝ lǝ babuayifo ba dínyǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto ani , bǝ lǝ ani lǝ ɛyɛ mi bolo lǝ bitǝ disi .
58012004	Ite bǝ bɛlɛ lema bɔkpɔ ku lebua tsyaa , yányo kaka ele bǝ bɛkpɔ lǝ bakpo mi kɔtɔ lǝ kasɔ tɔ .
58012005	Nye biota ǝsuǝ Onanto eto lɛkɔmansǝmansǝ eto etiki nnya ɔ́tɛyi úfi ókpe mi nkɛale fe wǝ bebi ? Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Ubi , tsyue ato nya memfi Bonamute eto bunǝtǝtǝ fe asa bimba . Nya mǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ fǝ lǝ unyǝki okpe fǝ .
58012006	Itsyise nwǝ Bonamute laalaa , wǝ wǝǝnǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya nwǝ tsya woafo fe ubii , wǝ wǝǝnǝ koto nɛ . ”
58012007	Bifi mi kanyi saa ka biǝnyǝ fe Onanto nlɛ mi bunǝ butǝ fe wǝ bebi . Ubi utsyuǝ kpe bǝ anto ǝǝnǝ wǝ ?
58012008	Lǝ bǝǝnnǝ mi fe kase bunyi boǝ bǝǝnǝ ubi saa , nyalɛ bienyifo wǝ bebi tinti . Etǝ bǝ biyifo fe bebi ba anto dímamfo seka .
58012009	Lǝ bo betidinini eto antomǝ seka lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bǝǝnǝ bo nya boebu mǝ tsya lǝ nyamfo eso . Ntsyǝ eso yanle bǝ bobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ enso butǝ Onanto wǝ ni bo Anto lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ busiǝ nkpǝ !
58012010	Bo kasɔ mfo eto antomǝ ǝǝnǝ bo itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ fe kase bǝnyǝ bǝ iińyǝ itǝ bo . Fɛɛ Onanto wǝ ǝǝnǝ bo fe kase ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bo bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ bunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ sɛkɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
58012011	Bunǝtǝtǝ utidii , aankɛ kutsyuǝ kamini , bomu yeefi wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ nnya kamaa , mba bǝtǝ bunǝ nkoo , ǝǝtǝ beeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
58012012	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bekpe mi ani ku akpa nnya leetinkǝ ale , lǝ bitǝ ǝsuǝale fɔfɔ lǝ idufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
58012013	Bilǝkǝ esu nnya lekpa lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mba eto akpa lǝmbǝ ale lǝ bafo bɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝ bentusǝ . Bomu lǝ bǝtǝkǝko mi kama lǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale balosǝ .
58012014	Bekplatsya bǝ lǝ diyuǝ lǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mi ku betidi kenke eto nti , nya lǝ bekplatsya lǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ . Itsyise kuutsyuǝ saa embunyǝ Bonamute lǝ wenyifo kɛnkɛ .
58012015	Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ eto kusu manya mi . Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biǝntǝ kuutsyuǝ saa tǝ lǝ binyǝ ɔblɔ kekleke bǝ inǝ bulǝ eboko betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bafiani babuayifo .
58012016	Bebe biǝ mi kuutsyuǝ saa mamfiani ɔsɔnɔdi nye fe nwǝ lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ fe Esau seka , wǝ dífi wǝ sininǝdidi ófloma ku didisa eto ɔkpɛ ɔni hã .
58012017	Kama kama fe kase binyii , ɔ́bɛbɛ ku binǝntu nkǝ eni lǝ ofo wǝ anto eto atsyɔkpoko . Fɛɛ wátɔnɔ útǝ wǝ , itsyise wámfo kusu saa bunyǝ lǝ ofloma lesa nǝ úkeyifo útsyǝ .
58012018	Itsyise inni Sinai eto kɔtini ko utidi loofo bunyǝ ketidi ɔflɔ bíbǝ , fe kase Israel bebi díyifo . Mfó ketuntu suu ka diti kpii , nya ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ kekleke nkpe , fɛɛ kɔtɔni komǝ nlɛ bunyǝ diadiadia .
58012019	Kakpatsyaku ka nlɛ bufǝ ku ɔkɔɛ wǝ nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi mfó lɛ bole , nya mba nlɛ nya bɔnɔ álɛ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ bensila bǝ baanɔ kolesa nko bio .
58012020	Itsyise bembofo buńnyǝ kanɔ kɔfi ko nlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ubuki uni kulaa tsya wǝ eto kokpa ditidi kɔtini komǝǝ , bakpɔ wǝ aba balo . ”
58012021	Lǝ sitintii , nya bǝlǝkǝ báte mfó kpe sikpi tinti bǝ Moses kosate átɛyi nkǝ , “ Sikpi ko dímuǝ mɛ , nya mintinkǝ ! ”
58012022	Bomu mi alɛɛ , Sion eto kɔtini komǝ ɔflɔ bíbǝ . Bíbǝ Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ eto umǝ wǝ ni Yerusalem kato ku wǝ batɔnkpe ba bembofo bokla ba lekpe disi mfo ɔflɔ .
58012023	Bíbǝ disuǝyuǝ eto disikakpekɔ ku Onanto eto bebininǝ ba eto aye báwɔni bakpe lǝ Onanto eto kukue kato ɔflɔ . Bíbǝ bińyǝ lǝ Onanto , kawunsiǝ kenke eto okponkpo ku basɛɛ ba béyifo lɛflɔ eto awɔnɔ eto nti .
58012024	Nya mfó bíbǝ Yesu wǝ laafo kǝtǝ lǝ kakle fɔfɔ kamǝ ɔflɔ kaka kɔtɔ ko ókpo lǝ bo disi luunǝ asa sɛɛ kpǝ eboko nnya nso Abel eto kɔtɔ .
58012025	Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ bianni nwǝ nlɛ mi etiki budinko eto ɔkɔɛ . Itsyise lǝ mba dímentsyue koto nwǝ léboko mǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo mámfo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ mǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ bo mba bátɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi kato ebofo butsyetsyi lǝ ni kɛnyɛ ?
58012026	Lefe nǝmfó wǝ ɔkɔɛ étinkǝsǝ kawunsiǝ kenke . Fɛɛ mɔmɔ útsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ nkǝ , “ Bioo , mǝǝbǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ butinkǝsǝ . Nya inni nko mate tsya , bomu muutinkǝsǝ kato tsya nwunsǝ . ”
58012027	Ditiki nǝmfo bǝ , “ Bioo ” lǝ bote bǝ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ asa nnya dítinkǝ nnya ni asa nnya úyifo uwui lǝ nnya kǝńyǝnkɔ . Nya asa nnya dímentinkǝǝ , ebubu itsyǝ .
58012028	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔsɔ ani bǝ sekakedikɔ ka lembofo butinkǝ áka bo kɔni . Lǝ nnya esoo , bítǝ lǝ bufi dibu ku sikpitete busumu wǝ lǝ kusu ko lɔɔkɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛ ǝsuǝ .
58012029	Itsyise bo Onanto ǝmǝ eyifo ute wǝ laatonsǝ lesa saa .
58013001	Bitǝ lǝ sɛyimila lǝ siyi mi ǝsuǝ fe bayimi .
58013002	Bianni bafɔ bofo , itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , bǝtsyuǝ áfo Onanto eto batɔnkpe , fɛɛ bánte nko .
58013003	Bekloma mba bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo tsya fe mba mi ku mǝ nlabe mfó . Nko kee , bekloma mba banlɛ ohiã bote fe mi ku mǝ banlɛ ohiã bote .
58013004	Usǝ ku usiǝ siǝ nkpǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ , nya ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa fi dibu utǝ kǝsiǝ . Nya kuutsyuǝ mamfe wǝ utsyuǝ kama , itsyise Onanto ebokponko mba leedi asɔnɔ , kakpo kusǝ nye kusiǝ lekpo .
58013005	Mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi tsya lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ lesa nǝ nte mi lǝ didufǝ mi ǝnǝ . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mǝmboyani mi ntsyǝ kulefe , nya membulǝkǝ ato lǝ mi ǝsuǝ tsya kulefe . ”
58013006	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛyi taa bo ketu kǝmiǝ boǝ , “ Bonamute ni mɔ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ , nyaso mǝmbote sikpi . Be utiditsyuǝ loofo mɛ buyifo ? ”
58013007	Bekloma mi batɔnkotɔnko ba dísiǝ ba lɛtɛyi mi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Bekloma kase bǝsiǝ nkpǝ ku kase báfo Onanto bánɔ lǝ bɛyɛ le mǝ kayɛkɔ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
58013008	Yesu Kristo aamfloma kulefe . Fe kase útsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , nko ke unte mɔmɔ ku lefe nǝ luubǝ kenke tsya nɛ .
58013009	Biǝntǝ lǝ asatete akpa akpa nnya lǝmbǝ disi ku akpa lǝ ɛwɛ mi ekpe lǝ benya kusu . Onanto eto lefonǝ hã laakpe bo nkɛale , nya inni afi nnya lɛyɛ lǝ lesadidi ǝsuǝ . Mba laayɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ ǝǝnnyǝ bɔwunsǝko nye kutǝkǝ ketsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
58013010	Boo , bokpe kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba nǝ ǝsuǝ asa nnya boedi , nya mba lǝǝtǝ kedi lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ , yanle bǝ bedi betsyiko lǝ bo ole .
58013011	Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ eefi ubuki eto kɔtɔ kedufǝnko kaka ni Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke . Mfó weesu kǝtǝ kedi katɔ bufikatsyɛ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto abua eto disi . Fɛɛ baatonsǝ bebuki eto sinǝ siamǝ lǝ kabanto .
58013012	Mmǝ kenke seka ini bǝ Yesu tsya ǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabanto bǝ lǝ uflǝ betidi eto abua uwui ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ .
58013013	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ busu botsyako wǝ lǝ kabanto mfó lǝ bakpe bo kofani faa , fe kase bákpe wuntsya kofani .
58013014	Itsyise umǝ saa ǝmbǝ bo lǝ kasɔ mfo wǝ luutsyǝ lefe saa manlo manlo . Bomu bunyǝ bɔlɛ kusu bobe itǝ umǝ wǝ luubǝ .
58013015	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ bufi atɛsǝ fe keditǝtǝ bukǝtǝ Onanto lefe saa . Nya ni nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ mba léfo wǝ diye bánɔ eto kɛnyɛ .
58013016	Bianta asa sɛɛ buyifo kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ bɔwunsǝko ǝsuǝ . Itsyise ite fe keditǝtǝ ka eto okle laakpe Onanto disuǝyuǝ .
58013017	Bitsyue mi batɔnkotɔnko koto lǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ mǝ itsyise mǝ nlɛ mi kakla bobe lefe saa nɛ , itsyise ele bǝ bǝlǝkǝ nya kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ . Lǝ bitsyue mǝ kotoo , booyifo mǝ keyifo ku disuǝyuǝ , fɛɛ lenni nkoo , kuulǝ mǝ ku buyifo nya lǝmbǝwunsǝko mi .
58013018	Bikato ola lǝ bo disi . Buyi boǝ bo akɔɛsi akpa wuee , itsyise bola boǝ boeyifo kasɛɛ lefe saa .
58013019	Nya nlɛ mi lekpakpa kekleke miǝ lǝ beto ola biǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ utǝ kusu lǝ nsinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ mlǝ .
58013020	Nlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝ , wǝ létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu wǝ ni basamu eto ɔyɛnkonyǝ kplɛ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle manlo eto kɔtɔ komǝ ǝsuǝ ,
58013021	lǝ ufi asa sɛɛ kenke utǝ mi kafo faa bǝ lǝ befo wǝ lelabi buyifo . Lǝ eyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ uyifo lesa nǝ nkpe wǝ ɔkɔɛ lǝ bo nti . Wǝ ale lǝ idi diyǝnde kplɛ idu manlo isu manlo ǝsuǝ ! Ibǝ itǝ .
58013022	Mɔ bayimi , nlɛ mi lekpakpa tinti miǝ lǝ bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ kɔlɛ ko minlɛ mi bɔlɛ itsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise kukue kliminti ete miwɔni minlɛ mi botsyese .
58013023	Nla miǝ mǝǝtǝ mi bote miǝ bǝlǝkǝ bo ɔyimi Timoteo lǝ Aba eto diyo . Lǝ wuubǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mlǝǝ , bonko wǝ ebubǝ bunyǝ mi busiǝsǝ .
58013024	Bisiǝsǝ mi batɔnkotɔnko kenke ku Onanto eto betidi bamfó kenke bitǝ bo . Bo bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Italia kenke tsya ǝsiǝsǝ mi .
58013025	Lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ kenke .
59001001	Mɔ , Yakobo , wǝ ni Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto uyifoyifo nlɛ mi Onanto eto betidi ba kenke disensǝ bankpo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto akpa nyamǝ kenke busiǝsǝ .
59001002	Mɔ bayimi , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bulǝ kpǝ lete , lete lɛ mi butu .
59001003	Itsyise biyi biǝnkǝ lǝ bulǝ lɛ mi butu nya mi bofokanɔ dítǝ befo buńyǝ lǝ mu kɛnyɛɛ , nyamfo ebutǝ biofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ bulǝ saa eto kɛnyɛ .
59001004	Bitǝ lǝ mi bofo buńyǝ kekleke disimǝntǝmǝntǝǝ , lǝ ekpa mi ɛyɛnko bǝ lǝ bɛflɔ belo kenke , bǝ kulesa saa ensiebofe itǝ mi .
59001005	Fɛɛ lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ ebu dímamflɔ lǝ kobetete ǝsuǝǝ , ɔtɔ Onanto nya wuufi utǝ wǝ , itsyise Onanto eefi asa kǝtǝ utidi saa kafo faa lǝ kafoɛkpɛ ǝsuǝ .
59001006	Fɛɛ lǝ alɛ ola boto katɔ wǝ lesatsyuǝǝ , ele bǝ fo wǝ anɔ fǝ wuutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ mǝ , manyaki wǝ . Itsyise utidi wǝ kayakii , uyifo fe lekpo eto utuwa ufiebi laasɔ ketsyi katsyilamako .
59001007	Utidi wǝ nte nko , mi mba eto nsusu lafloma mlǝ mlǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ɔnlɛ buyifo ǝsuǝǝ , membu nkǝ woofo kulesa utsyiko lǝ Bonamute ɔflɔ .
59001008	
59001009	Lǝ Onanto abesǝ ɔyimi okombo wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝ katoo , ele bǝ unyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
59001010	Nko ke ini itǝ otabinyǝ wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝ nɛ , bǝ lǝ Onanto ábokosǝ wǝ kasɔɔ , ele bǝ unyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Itsyise otabinyǝ eto nkpǝ ebubǝ bofe fe kase efukpokpo laalo lǝ ofa ǝsuǝ kakpo lǝ kasɔ .
59001011	Lǝ kofe ato kobe kɛnyɛ keklekee , koafa kakpo lǝ sefa eto esi ǝsuǝǝ , itǝ efukpokpo nyamǝ aylɔbe , kaalo kakpo lǝ kasɔ nya katsylɔ . Nko ke ini itǝ otabinyǝ tsya wǝ lookakplatsya lǝ wǝ keyifoyifo ǝsuǝ kekleke fɛ ubǝ ukpǝ nɛ .
59001012	Onanto ebokpo atsyɔ nwǝ ke lékpe utu uńyǝ kekleke lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ nya útǝkǝ bulǝ nye kabua kamǝ kato . Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ wuunyǝ kayofofo ka nkpe , ini bo Onanto luufi utǝ mba laala wǝ .
59001013	Lǝ utsyuǝ edufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝǝ , wantɛyi nkǝ Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi . Itsyise kulesa embofo Onanto boto kabe lǝ uyifo lebua , nya wǝ tsya emfi lebua kanto kuutsyuǝ kabe .
59001014	Bomu utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto alasaa , nnya laawɛ wǝ kǝnǝ wǝ kakpe lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ nɛ .
59001015	Nya lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto alasa nyamfo alɛ kafoo , kaale lebuayifoyifo . Nya lǝ lebuayifoyifo nǝmǝ abee , diale ukpe .
59001016	Mɔ bayimi , biǝntǝ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe .
59001017	Asa sɛɛ nnya nkpe bo kenke ku ǝtǝsa nnya lɛflɔ kenke boǝnyǝǝ , etsyi Boanto Onanto wǝ díyifo kato eto ǝnyǝlesa ɔflɔ . Nya woamfloma kakpe ketuntu fe kase úyifo kofe ku kofande leeyifo .
59001018	Onato áyɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto lelabi ǝsuǝ , nya úlǝkǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ɔnukualɛtiki ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ budi betutɛ lǝ wǝ asayifoyifo kenke nti .
59001019	Mɔ bayimi lala , bekloma lǝ bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . Bɛkɔse lǝ bitsyue ato mlǝ lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ etiki budi , fɛɛ bitsyǝsuǝ lǝ etikididi ku ɔblɔnyǝnyǝ mlǝ mlǝ ǝsuǝ .
59001020	Itsyise ɔblɔ ǝntǝ utidi leeyifo kasɛɛ ka Onanto laala nkǝ uyifo .
59001021	Nyaso bilǝkǝ ani bitsyiko lǝ asinsa saa yifoyifo ku nkpǝ bua saa eto okle busiǝ ǝsuǝ . Bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ Onanto bǝ lǝ befo wǝ ditiki nǝ ókpe mi lǝ akɔɛsi , nnya ni loofo utǝ mi lǝ nkpǝ nɛ .
59001022	Bianwɛ mi ǝsuǝ biǝ bɛlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔnɔ ete , bomu bifi ni bekpe lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
59001023	Itsyise nwǝ laanɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ete fɛ weenyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝǝ , akate ko utidi wǝ lǝǝnyǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ahuhɔɛ ǝsuǝ kǝnyǝ kase unte . Fɛɛ lǝ kokpa lǝkǝlǝkǝ kedu mfo koo , woatasuǝ kase unte .
59001024	
59001025	Fɛɛ nwǝ leebu disi lǝ kɔfi ko lɛflɔ koǝtǝ utidi lǝsiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nya woalɛ ola keyifo lǝ ko ǝsuǝ inni bɔnɔ te waanɔ koo , Onanto ebokpo wǝ atsyɔ lǝ lesa saa nǝ weeyifo ǝsuǝ .
59001026	Lǝ utsyuǝ eebu nkǝ nwǝ leesumu Onanto uni , fɛ woanlɛ wǝ odiakami ola lǝ etikididi ǝsuǝǝ , ɔwɛ ǝsuǝ nya wǝ kesumu ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa .
59001027	Kesumu ka nyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , ka Boanto Onanto lǝǝnyǝ nkǝ kakpa nya botakebu saa lǝmbǝ lǝ muu , ni mbo mfo nɛ bǝ , balɛ bakɔbebi ku bakɔbǝsiǝ ba nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ ola , nya lǝ balɛ ǝsuǝ ola , bǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ betsyiko lǝ kawunsiǝ eto abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
59002001	Mɔ bayimi , fe mba lefo Bonamute Yesu Kristo , wǝ nwǝ ni Diyǝnde eto Onamute bɛnɔɔ , yanle bǝ bikabe betidi eto ǝnǝmi ku mǝ nyǝnkɔɔ , bikeyifo asa .
59002002	Boefi boǝ betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ mi katsyakɔ . Ɔni eyifo ɔkplɛnyǝ wǝ nti kafia kplɛ ka lefo koya nya onkpe sika sia eto lɛsukpɛ lǝ lɛnimi , nya unuǝfǝ wǝ ni okombo nti lefianku .
59002003	Békpasǝ ǝnǝmi bítǝ ɔkplɛnyǝ ǝmǝ nya béfo wǝ ku dibu , bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝnkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , bǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ kakplɛkɔ mfo . ” Nya bɛtɛyi okombo ǝmǝ biǝkǝ , “ Fǝǝ ńyǝ mmǝǝ , nye bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔnti lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mfo . ”
59002004	Lǝ biyifo nkomǝǝ , nyalɛ eni nsusu bua ini bífi béla etiki bílǝkǝ , békpe kabakefe lǝ betidi nti nɛ ?
59002005	Bɛnɔ ! Mɔ bayimi lala , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ bakombo lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo nkǝ bafiani lɛwɔnɔ eto bakplɛnyǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ , lǝ bǝnyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ ka úlǝkǝ utsyǝ itǝ mba laala wǝ .
59002006	Fɛɛ mii , biembu bakombo nya biakpe mǝ kafani . Inni batabinyǝ bomu laanyinkǝ mi kakpe kasɔ ? Inni mǝ lǝǝnǝ mi kesuko akpokakpokɔ ?
59002007	Nya inni bakplɛnyǝ bamfo laatɛyi kabua ketsyiko dibu eto diye nǝ béfi bǝtǝkǝ mi se béfiani Kristo eto bafokanɔfɔ ?
59002008	Lǝ biyifo lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ tututu , fe kase báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe fǝ ǝsuǝ sekaa , ” ete eyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ nɛ .
59002009	Fɛɛ lǝ biabe betidi eto ǝnǝmi fɛ bieyifo asaa , nyalɛ biyifo lebua . Nya kɔfi komǝ tsya lélo mi dikpi fe babuayifo .
59002010	Utsyuǝ saa ke léta kɔfi kɔni ubuu , údi dikpi , óta nyamblɛ kenke ubu .
59002011	Itsyise nwǝ lékpe kɔfi komǝ nkǝ , “ Mankpo kusiǝ nye kusǝ . ” Wǝ ke lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Manlo utidi nɛ . ” Nyaso lǝ émendi sɛsɔnɔ fɛ fálo utidii , ete bɛ áta kɔfi ebu .
59002012	Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bo etikididi ku bo eyifosa lǝ ilǝkǝ ete bǝ kɔfi ko dítǝ bófo bunsi lǝ bo ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ko kefi Onanto luufi okponko bo lekpo tsya nɛ .
59002013	Itsyi lǝ lekpokponkpo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embunyǝ kaminsǝ kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ lǝǝnnyǝ wǝ utsyuǝ kaminsǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto embolo dikpi nwǝ lǝǝnyǝ wǝ utsyuǝ kaminsǝ .
59002014	Mɔ bayimi , lǝ mi utsyuǝ nkǝ okpe bofokanɔ fɛ wǝ eyifosa lǝnlǝkǝ nnya kate nkoo , nte kutǝkǝ ko uunyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Wǝ bofokanɔ bomfo ebofo wǝ bulǝkǝ ?
59002015	Bifi nnya biǝ , bayimisani nye bayimisio bǝtsyuǝ kpe ba mfia léla mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nye bǝmbǝ lesa nǝ looyo mǝ budi ekemi .
59002016	Nte kasɛɛ ka nkpe lǝ nnya lǝ mi ɔni átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ , mi ǝsuǝ lǝ iyifo kpankpa , lǝ bidi bimi , ” fɛ biambɛbɛ asa nnya lefe itǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto nkpǝkɛkɛ bitǝ mǝǝ , nte kutǝkǝ ko nkpe lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ?
59002017	Nyaso lǝ bofokanɔ mate kpe utsyuǝ nya keyifo sa dimankɔ lǝ mu , wǝ bofokanɔ bomǝ eyifo bufufu .
59002018	Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ ebɔtɛyi bǝ , “ Utidi ɔni kpe bofokanɔ , nya obamba tsya leeyifo keyifo . ” Mɔ mbuayɛ ni nkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ ate mɛ kase utsyuǝ lɔɔkɛ bofokanɔ fɛ weenyifo keyifo sɛɛ . Muulǝkǝ mɔ bofokanɔ nte wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo sɛɛ ka meeyifo ǝsuǝ . ”
59002019	Afo anɔ fǝ Onanto ɔni ete nkpe ? Nko ini sitinti nɛ . Fɛɛ kloma fǝ awɔnɔ bua tsya áfo banɔ nko , nya baate sikpi , ketinkǝ .
59002020	Ɔmumu ! Ala fǝ nlǝkǝ nte fǝ bǝ bofokanɔ bo keyifo sɛɛ saa dímakɔkoo , eyifo bofokanɔ fufu ?
59002021	Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ bo Ona Abraham díyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ? Ɛyɛ lǝ lesa nǝ úyifo eso nɛ , itsyise úfi wǝ ubi Isak úsu útǝkǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ufi wǝ utǝ Onanto kedi .
59002022	Bɛnlɛ bunyǝ ? Wǝ bofokanɔ ku keyifo lɛkɔ iyifo lɔni . Nya keyifo ka úyifo lɛkɔ nya fɛ wǝ bofokanɔ lɛflɔ bolo nɛ .
59002023	Itǝ etiki nnya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ itǝ bǝ , “ Abraham áfo Onanto ɔnɔ , nya lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ esoo , Onanto ákpe wǝ dibu fe utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ . ” Nyaso Onanto dífi wǝ fe wǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ nɛ .
59002024	Bíunyǝ mɔmɔ ! Onanto ǝnnyǝ utidi eto bofokanɔ mate ete kebu wǝ bǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ , wǝ keyifoyifoyifo ka laakɔko mu eso . Nya inni lǝ kase ófo ɔ́nɔ eso ete .
59002025	Nko ǝmǝ ke eso Onanto léfo útǝ Rahab , otsyetɔ ǝmǝ nɛ . Wǝ ku Onanto eto nti ǝbǝ ɛlɛkɛ ɛyɛ lǝ kase ófo Israelfɔɔ eto batɔnkpe ba laabiɔ kabe asa lǝ wǝ diyo , nya ɔ́wunsǝko mǝ báyɛ kusu bamba bétsyetsyi bédu eso .
59002026	Nyaso ekpa wuee be fe kase lǝ utidi eto ǝsuǝ eyifo lesakpenkpe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝmbǝ lǝ nii , nko ini lǝ eyifosa saa mankɔkoo , bofokanɔ tsya ekpe .
59003001	Mɔ bayimi , biǝntǝ lǝ mi nti eto betidi kpǝ lǝ bafiani bateasa . Buyi buǝ bo mba ni bateasaa , Onanto ebokponko bo lekpo kekleke lǝ diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ eso utsyuǝ saa .
59003002	Itsyise bomblɛ kenke aata kebu . Fɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ kpe wǝ laanta kebu lǝ lesa nǝ waatɛyi ǝsuǝ nyalɛ utidi ǝmfo aflɔ nya waafo wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke tsya bɔlɛ kukɔnɔ .
59003003	Boefi situ kakle ɔtɔmimi eto kɛnyɛ bǝ lǝ utsyue bo koto bǝ lǝ bɔyɛnko wǝ busuko kaka kee boala .
59003004	Bibu ɔklɔ kplɛ wǝ ufiebi kplɛ laafo se bukǝ kayɛnko lǝ lekpo ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ wǝ ɔyɛnkoyi kɛkɛ ete laaka wǝ kayɛnko . Nya baaka wǝ kayɛnko kesuko kaka kee okanka ǝmǝ lela nkǝ weesuko ko .
59003005	Nko ke ini odoakami tsya nɛ . Ite bǝ ɔfɛ tinti lǝ etidisuǝ kǝmiǝ tsyaa , wǝ ǝsuǝ utidi laayɛ kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ eyifosa kplɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ . Bebe kase ini bǝ ute eto odiakami kɛkɛ te lǝtǝ kusǝmbia kplɛ lǝǝnyǝ ute kaato .
59003006	Nko seka odiakami tsya nte fe ute nɛ . Uyifo fe kawunsiǝ ka diyi ku lebua eto asa nnya nkpe lǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nti . Woanansǝ ǝsuǝ eto uyi ǝmǝ kenke nya woatsylɔsǝ bo nkpǝsiǝsiǝ . Fɛɛ wǝ kosate , ute manlo kosate laato ute kakpe lǝ wǝ nya woanyǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ flaflafla .
59003007	Utidi áfo bebutubuki buyuǝsǝ , nya wǝǝtsyǝ mba tsya nkpe sisenle ku baklɔbɛ ku mba laakpii kasɔ ku akpɛ ku abamba kenke .
59003008	Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa mámfo tɔ odiakami eto nkpǝ buyuǝsǝ . Uyifo obuale wǝ bembofo binyinkǝ kakpe , wǝ diyi ku keni ka laalo utidi fe owa eto keni .
59003009	Boefi wǝ katɛsǝ Bonamute ku Boanto Onanto . Boefi wǝ kekudi bo bayimitsyuǝ , utidi wǝ beyifo lǝ Onanto eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ .
59003010	Aninsɔtiki ku ekuditikii , nyamblɛ aabɔ ketsyi lǝ kɛnyɛ kamǝ ke ǝsuǝ . Mɔ bayimi , yanle bǝ nyamfo tsyǝ nko nkpǝ .
59003011	Ditubiǝ kuditsyuǝ aanyifǝ ntu bo nkpe kamini kesi kaayifǝ mbo nkpe mba .
59003012	Mɔ bayimi , kototsyabi ebofo lɛbɛsi bɔnwɔ ? Nye aketekubi eto ukue nwɔ kototsyabi eto awɔnsa ? Nko ke ditubiǝ nǝ laayifǝ mbantu lǝmbofo ntu bo nkpe kamini bɔyifǝ tsya nɛ .
59003013	Owoe ni obesibe ku nwǝ laanɔ asa kasɔ lǝ mi nti ? Ufi nkpǝsiǝsǝ sɛɛ ulǝkǝ nyamfo ote lǝ wǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ , nya uyifo nnya ku ǝsuǝ kasɔ bokosǝbokosǝ ku lǝ kobe ǝsuǝ .
59003014	Fɛɛ lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ biasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ , lefonyi nkpe mi , nya mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa laabɛbɛ wǝ mate eto lɛlɛkǝsǝǝ , biantɛyi sidia bela ɔnukualɛ kɛnyɛ , bifi mi bebesǝ ǝsuǝ kato biǝ biyi kobe .
59003015	Kobe komfo eto okle mentsyi kato , bomu kawunsiǝ mfo eto kole kuni , kunni nko nyɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ bomu nko nyɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝsuǝ .
59003016	Itsyise kaka kutsyuǝsɛ kpɔnkpɔ ku mɔ hã eto ale lǝ ɛlɛkɛ nkpee , kǝnǝ ku asa buayifoyifo saa eto okle hã laakɛ mfo .
59003017	Fɛɛ tutɛɛ , kobe ko ditsyi kato akpa , kuyi ku diyuǝ , disuǝtsyuǝ ku sɛyɛmitsyuǝ kasɔnɔnɔ , kuyi ku kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , nya koawɔ ebibi sɛɛ . Koannla ntisensense lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ , nya bǝtsyuǝ mamfokanɔ ku kawɛ saa ankɛ lenti .
59003018	Betidi ba laakpla bǝtsyuǝ nti , kǝnǝ diyuǝ kaboko lǝ betidi ntii , aato eyibibi nnya eto awɔnsa ni nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ .
59004001	Be lǝǝnǝ amakpɔnkpɔ ku niǝ kakpe mi lenti ? Yeetsyi lǝ mi kǝnǝnsɛ lǝ nkpǝdidi eto alasa nnya nlɛ mi bɔkpɔnko lǝ kǝmiǝ lefe saa ǝsuǝ .
59004002	Biabɛbɛ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ , fɛɛ biǝmbofo mi bɔkɛ . Nyaso bialo bǝtsyuǝ . Biabɛbɛ asa kekleke , fɛɛ biamfo nnya bunyǝ , nyaso biǝdiǝ niǝ kakpɔ bǝtsyuǝ . Biankɛ lesa nǝ biabɛbɛ , itsyise biantɔ Onanto biǝ utǝ mi nnya .
59004003	Nya lǝ bɛtɔ Onanto asa tsyaa , biamfo nnya , itsyise biantɔ nnya ku nsusu sɛɛ , biatɔ asa kǝtǝ mi ǝsuǝ mate . Asa nnya biufi bekpe ǝsuǝ disuǝyuǝ hã biatɔ .
59004004	Biyifo betidi ba lendi ɔnukualɛ ! Binyi biǝ mba difi mǝ ǝsuǝ beyifo sɛyɛtsyuǝ ku kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nkpǝdidi eyifo Onanto eto balo ? Nyaso fǝǝ ke lela fǝnkǝ ǝlǝkǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo sɛyɛtsyuǝǝ , éfi fǝ ǝsuǝ éyifo Onanto eto olo .
59004005	Biembu biǝnkǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝmbǝ lǝ Anantotiki nnya lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ Onanto dífi ókpe lǝ boo , eyifo lɛwɔnɔ nǝ laakpɔ sitsyuǝsɛ kekleke lǝ bo disi . ”
59004006	Fɛɛ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ wǝǝtǝ boo , kpe ale leso kulaa . Fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nyamǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝǝńyǝ lǝ mba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ wǝǝtǝ wǝ lefonǝ mba laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . ”
59004007	Lǝ nyasoo , bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ Onanto . Bińyǝ lǝ Obonsam lǝ ǝsuǝ , ete wuutsyetsyi udu lǝ mi ɔflɔ .
59004008	Bɛyi bɛfi Onanto , ete wuutsya ebɔyi ɔfi mi . Biflǝ mi ani , mi mba ni babuayifo . Biflǝ abua bilǝkǝ lǝ mi akɔɛsi , mi mba eto nsusu laafloma lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ !
59004009	Binyǝ kanyi lǝ mi akɔɛsi , befa bembembe , biwu keku . Befloma mi simǝmǝmǝ lǝ sefiani nkuwuiwui , lǝ mi disuǝyuǝ lǝ diyifo kpɔminii .
59004010	Bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ , ete woobesǝ mi kato .
59004011	Mɔ bayimi , biendi ditiki nǝ dińyǝ itǝ lǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nwǝ laatɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ ditiki nǝ dimatsyɛ nye ditiki fimfi , nye laakpoko wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lekpoo , aatɛyi ditiki nǝ dimanlɛkɛ ińyǝ lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ , nya waakponko kɔfi komǝ lekpo . Lǝ kɔfi komǝ faakponko lekpoo , nyalɛ ǝmǝnyifo nwǝ leeyifo lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ , bomu ko okponkpo feni .
