59004012	Onanto hã ni nwǝ laakpe afi nya uni okponkpo tsya . Wǝ hã loofo bofo kǝtǝ utidi nye ɔtsylɔsǝ wǝ tsya . Owoe feebu fǝ wǝ feni fɛ faakponko fuutsyuǝ lekpo ?
59004013	Mɔmɔɔ , bitsyue koto bɛnɔ , mimba laatɛyi biǝkǝ , “ Mmi nye kusɛɛ , buusu kusu umǝ nkplɛ utsyuǝ nya budi fe lɛlɛ lɔni mfó , buuyifo nyifo bɔkɛ atabi kpenkpe . ”
59004014	Biyi lesa nǝ luubǝ kusɛɛ ? Mi nkpǝ te fe kuyuǝ ko laabɔ itǝ lefe kliminti , kesinkli kanya .
59004015	Lesa nǝ ele bǝ bɛtɛyi ni bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛ Bonamute atɔnɔ bonkpe nkpǝǝ , buyifo nǝmfo nye nǝmǝ . ”
59004016	Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , biaka kase kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato . Ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ bomfo kenke manlɛkɛ .
59004017	Lǝ nya esoo , nwǝ ke nyi lɛsɛ ele bǝ uyifo fɛ ɔni weenyifo nii , aata kebu keyifo lebua .
59005001	Nya mɔmɔɔ , mi batabinyǝ bɛnɔ ! Biwi nku bɛsɔ ani kɛnyɛ lǝ bulǝ kplɛ bo lǝǝbǝ mi butu ǝsuǝ .
59005002	Mi betabikǝ ábia nya balɛ dídi mi awu ku mfia bábiasǝ kenke .
59005003	Mi sika sia ku sika flubia áto nkanda nya nyamfo luudi sedansiɛ ińyǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nya yotonsǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ fe ute seka . Bɛbɛbɛ bikǝ bińyǝnsǝ léto lǝ eyi fɛfɛ nyamfo .
59005004	Bebee ! Beyifoyifo ba díyifo keyifo bǝtǝ mi lǝ kakuɛɛ , bɛni bíamfo mǝ nyo . Bidi kaa bɛnɔ kase banlɛ mminsǝku buwui bembembee ! Nya mba dífǝsǝ bɛkuɛnkɛ bǝtǝ mi fɛ bɛni bíamfo mǝ nyo eto kudu díkayo Boanto Onanto Ɔkplɛnyǝ ǝmǝ eto kotoo .
59005005	Mi nkpǝ bo binsi lǝ kasɔ mfo eyi ku nkpǝdidi ku disuǝyuǝnyǝnyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ . Nya bíyifo mi ǝsuǝ bísiǝ ayinkua itǝ diyi nǝmǝ itǝ bolo .
59005006	Bélo betidi ba dímanta mi bebu dikpi , nya bélo mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bántaka bǝńyǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya .
59005007	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bifi disuǝtsyǝ lǝ bekpe utu buɛɛ bińyǝ isu ese lefe nǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ luubǝ bio . Bebe kase ɔkuɛmfo nkpe disuǝtsyǝ ! Bebe kase woǝńyǝ buɛɛ kǝsǝkǝ bɛkuɛnkǝ kpenkpe bia wǝǝbǝ bunyǝ ketsyiko lǝ wǝ kasɔ , nya wǝǝńyǝ buɛɛ kǝsǝkǝ ɔsɔmi eto bɔni lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
59005008	Nko ele bǝ mi tsya muǝ utu bɛlɛ nɛ . Biǝntǝ lǝ ani elo mi , itsyise Bonamute ǝmǝ eto dibǝfe bio eboyo elo .
59005009	Mɔ bayimi , biǝndiǝ niǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ , bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔyɛ mi lekpo bokponko . Itsyise okponkpo ǝmǝ eto bubɛ bɔfi .
59005010	Mɔ bayimi , bekloma Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lébe ditiki nǝ mǝ letsya lǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ eti diye ǝsuǝ . Bitǝ lǝ bobe kase bǝnyǝ kanyi nya bǝmuǝ utu balɛɛ , lǝ bokase asa lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
59005011	Boakpo betidi bamba boǝ mba bakpo atsyɔ , itsyise bǝńyǝ bembe lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ . Biɔnɔ kase Hiob dímuǝ utu ɔlɛ ku kase Onanto léfo wǝ nnya layo lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Itsyise Bonamute kpe kafoɛkpɛ nya woǝnyǝ utidi kaminsǝ .
59005012	Mɔ bayimi , ditiki kekleke nǝ mɔɔtɛyi mi ni bǝnkǝ biankpadi asa , kato keni o-o , kasɔ keni o-o , nye lesa bamba saa dini o-o , biankpadi . Lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ kpee , bɛtɛyi biǝ ee . Nya lǝ dimbǝǝ , bɛtɛyi biǝ oowo , lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔyɛ mi dikpi bolo .
59005013	Lǝ utsyuǝ kpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ nye ɔnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ mi ntii , oto ola utǝ Onanto . Lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝǝ , usǝ atɛsǝ eto ǝsǝ .
59005014	Lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ lɛ bufii , bekpadi bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto beninǝ lǝ bato ola lǝ wǝ disi , lǝ bediki wǝ nuǝbi lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ .
59005015	Ola wǝ báto lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ǝbotsya ufunfi ǝmǝ , nya Bonamute lootakasɛ wǝ , nya lufi wǝ abua ɔtsyɛ wǝ .
59005016	Nyaso bilǝkǝ mi abua kasɔ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ beto ola lǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ eto disi lǝ binyǝ bufitsyantsya . Utidi sɛɛ eto olatoto kpe ǝsuǝale nya weeyifo keyifo tinti .
59005017	Elia éyifo utidi fe kase bo tsya ni . Se óto ala kekleke nkǝ ɔsɔmi yɛ bɔnii , ɔ́yɛ bɔni lǝ alɛ ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ ǝsuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
59005018	Lǝ nnya kamaa , usi óto ola , nya Onanto dítǝ ɔsɔmi lɛni nya bidikǝ lɛlɛkɛ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ .
59005019	Mɔ bayimi , lǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ kama lǝ ɔnukualɛtiki nǝmǝǝ , bekplatsya lǝ beekpa wǝ beboko ,
59005020	bekloma biǝ utsyuǝ saa ke lookpa obuayifo utsyiko lǝ kabuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ obokoo , wuutǝ obuayifo ǝmǝ nyǝ nkpǝ ku abua kpǝ nnya úyifo eto bufukatsyɛ .
60001001	Kukue komfo etsyi mɔ , Petro , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpe ɔflɔ . Nlɛ ko bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mimba ni Onanto eto betidilǝkǝlǝkǝ ba dísensǝ bísu benkpe fe bafɔ lǝ Ponto , Galatia , Kapadokia , Asia ku Bitinia eto nsɔ ǝsuǝ .
60001002	Anto Onanto kosate dílǝkǝ mi ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . Nya itǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lékpasǝ mi ǝsuǝ biyifo betidi kɛnkɛ bǝ lǝ bitsyue Yesu Kristo koto , lǝ befi wǝ kɔtɔ bǝflǝ mi lǝ bele . Lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ difui disiǝko mi lefe saa .
60001003	Bitǝ lǝ bɔsɔ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto ani . Lǝ wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ kplɛ ǝsuǝǝ , útǝ bo nkpǝ fɔfɔ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ótakase Yesu Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ eso . Nyamfo ǝtǝ bo kusubebe fɔfɔ ko lɛflɔ .
60001004	Lǝ nyasoo , bɛlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ kedikɔ eto atsyɔkpokpo fokoya ko Onanto lɛlɔ utsyǝ lǝ kato itǝ wǝ betidi ke lembobia , ka lemboto kɔti , ka lǝmbɔflɛ tsya .
60001005	Kedikɔ kamfo luudi mi kale , mimba ɛyɛ lǝ bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ bálɔ mi bǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ itǝ bofokǝtǝ lǝ nkpǝ bo buulǝkǝ bate lǝ lefe fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
60001006	Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ , ite bǝ biunyǝ kanyi lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ botokabe kpǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
60001007	Nnya ni bǝ lǝ befi bato mi babe bǝ befo bɛnɔ sitinti . Fe kase baato sika sia laafo bobia kabe lǝ utee , nko ke bǝǝbǝ mi bofokanɔ bo lefo koya bonso sika kulaa tsya boto kabe lǝ ute ǝsuǝ , lǝ befi babe bǝ buutsyǝ itǝ lefe saa . Nyamfo ebutǝ Onanto atɛsǝ mi obesǝ mi kato ufi dibu utǝ mi lǝ diyi nǝ Yesu Kristo lɔɔbɔ ubǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ .
60001008	Ite bǝ biǝnyǝ wǝ tɔ binyǝ tsyaa , biala wǝ . Se bɛnnlɛ wǝ bunyǝ mɔmɔ tsyaa , béfo wǝ bɛnɔ nya mi disuǝyuǝnyǝnyǝ nso bulǝkǝ katɛyi .
60001009	Kase béfo wǝ bɛnɔ esoo , itǝ bǝ Onato ǝtǝ nkǝ mi kakla nyǝ nkpǝ .
60001010	Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lébe letsya itsyi lǝ kase Onanto lǝǝbǝ mi ǝtǝsa butǝǝ , átɔ bánɔ nya báfefe kekleke lǝ kase Onanto lǝǝbǝ mi bofo lǝ nkpǝ .
60001011	Báfefe bǝ lǝ bate itsyi lǝ lefe nǝ yuubǝ ku kase yǝǝbǝ bubǝ . Lefe nǝmfo ni lefe nǝ Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nlɛ kɔni bote , kǝlǝkǝ kate kanyi ka Kristo ele bǝ unyǝ ku diyǝnde nǝ luutǝkǝ nnya kama .
60001012	Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bamfo nkǝ inni itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto kutǝkǝ eso banlɛ keyifo , bomu itǝ mi . Bédi etiki betsyiko asa nnya mba nlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe kǝtǝ mi mɔmɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ Onanto létsyese itsyi kato eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Onanto eto batɔnkpe kulaa tsya ála kokoko bǝ eni lǝ bate lesaatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ .
60001013	Nyaso bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itǝ keyifo . Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ bikabe kusu kekleke itǝ Onanto eto atsyɔkpokpo nnya wuutǝ mi lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu Kristo lɔɔbɔ bǝnyǝ .
60001014	Bitsyue Onanto eto ditiki koto nya biǝntǝ lǝ asa nnya díkǝnǝ mi kakpe lǝ abua ǝsuǝ kɔ , lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto ditiki dímankpako mi tɔɔ , lǝ isi eso mi ani mɔmɔ .
60001015	Bomuu , fe kase Onanto wǝ lékpadi mi nte kɛnkɛɛ , mi tsya tsyǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ lesa saa nǝ biuyifo ǝsuǝ .
60001016	Itsyise báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Biyifo kɛnkɛ , itsyise nyifo kɛnkɛ . ”
60001017	Biakpadi wǝ biǝ Boanto lǝ bɛlɛ ola boto kǝtǝ Onanto wǝ laambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ ɔlɛ lekpo bokpo ku utidi lǝ lesa nǝ utsyuǝ saa díyifo ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyasoo , fe bafɔ lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bisiǝ mi nkpǝ fɛfɛ bifi dibu bitǝ Onanto .
60001018	Itsyise biyi kayo ka Onanto léfo lǝ mi disi fɛ úlǝkǝ mi utsyiko lǝ nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ bo béfo bitsyiko lǝ mi banamǝ ɔflɔ . Inni lesa nǝ boofo bobiasǝ fe sika sia lee sika flubia seka .
60001019	Bomu iyifo Kristo eto kɔtɔ ko lefo koya , wǝ díyifo fe Lesamubi nǝ lebua saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , lékpa lɛflɔ kenke Onanto dífi útǝ kedi lǝ mi disi .
60001020	Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ utsyǝ fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ óte lǝ eyifɛfɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ mi disi eso .
60001021	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝmfo ǝsuǝ esoo , béfo Onanto bɛnɔ . Nya wǝ ni futsyǝ létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ nya útǝ wǝ kedikɔ ka nkpe dibu kanso kenke . Lǝ nyamfo eso béfo Onanto bɛnɔ , nya bífi mi kusubebe bítǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
60001022	Nya se bitsyue ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ koto , ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ békpasǝ mi ǝsuǝ biǝ biola mi bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ esoo , ele bǝ bela mi bǝtsyuǝ itsyi taa mi utu kǝmiǝ ke .
60001023	Onanto ǝtǝ mi nkpǝ fɔfɔ eto businkli kale . Inni utidi wǝ leekpe dísinkli óle mi , bomu nwǝ leenkpe kulefe léle mi ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ditiki nǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa ǝsuǝ .
60001024	Itsyise Anantotiki átɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi kenke te fe sefa seka . Nya mǝ kɔlɔkɔ kenke te fe sefa eto efukpokpo seka . Nya se efukpokpo laaylɔbe kalo kewui .
60001025	Fɛɛ Onanto eto ditiki te lefe saa . ” Ditiki nǝmfo ni Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ bábe letsya bǝtǝ mi nɛ .
60002001	Nyaso bisinkli bɛyɛ asa bua saa eto okle buyifo . Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ sediatɛyitɛyi , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ , kutsyuǝsɛkpɔnkpɔ , ku utidi eto diyebiasǝbiasǝ ǝsuǝ .
60002002	Bela Onanto eto ditiki tinti nǝmǝ fe kase bebisambi laala mmintu kekleke bǝ lǝ bebe bekpe lǝ mi bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto laala .
60002003	Itsyise Anantotiki átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mi kosate ebunyǝ kase Bonamute nkpe kafo ɛkpɛ . ”
60002004	Bibǝ Bonamute ɔflɔ . Wǝ ni nkpǝ eto leba nǝ batonto lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kulesa nti , fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ ni utsyǝ nkǝ lefo koya tinti lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
60002005	Mi tsya eyifo fe aba nnya nkpe nkpǝ , nyaso bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto lǝ oto lɛwɔnɔ eto diyo . Diyo nǝmfo kafo biɔkɛ fe besumunyǝ kɛnkɛ , nya biɔyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto Lɛwɔnɔ eto kedi ka lɔɔkɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛ .
60002006	Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlǝkǝ leba nǝ lefo koya , nya mimfi ni míntǝkǝ lǝ Sion eto diyo eto kaka nso bofe . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ loofo wǝ ɔnɔɔ , wembudi kofani kulefe . ”
60002007	Nya leba nǝmfo áfo koya tinti lǝ mimba lefo wǝ bɛnɔ ɔflɔ , nya lǝ mba dímamfo wǝ banɔ ɔflɔɔ , ele bǝ bate bǝnkǝ , diyifo “ Leba nǝ batonto lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔ , fɛɛ ni bomu díbǝ léfiani leba nǝ léfo koya lenso kenke nɛ . ”
60002008	Nya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto lekpa ditsyuǝ tsya átɛyi nkǝ , “ Diyifo leba nǝ luutǝ betidi tusǝ , lǝ ni bedu banɔ . ” Bétusǝ lǝ ni itsyise bámfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ . Nko ini Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ yuubǝ itǝ mǝ nɛ .
60002009	Fɛɛ mii , biyifo betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ fe besumunyǝ ba laatɛsɛ wǝ wǝ ni oka , ku kusǝ kenke ko bákpo atsyɔ , Onanto eto betidi ba bǝlǝkǝ bǝtsyǝ bǝ babe Onanto eto eyifosa kplɛ nyamǝ letsya . Nya ókpadi mi utsyiko lǝ ketuntu kamǝ kǝmiǝ óboko wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
60002010	Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfee , bíenyifo Onanto eto betidi fɛ mɔmɔɔ , biyifo wǝ betidi . Fɛ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , báante Onanto eto kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ fɛ mɔɔ , biofo wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ .
60002011	Mɔ balala , nlɛ mi kɔlɛ bɔlɛ fe mba ni bafɔ ku mba nyɛ kusu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo minkǝ , bilǝkǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ etidisuǝ eto alasa bua nnya nlɛ lema bɔkpɔnko mi lefe saa ǝsuǝ .
60002012	Bisiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ bamamonyǝ ba nti benkpe bǝ lǝ bédi etiki bua lǝ mi ǝsuǝ bǝ biyifo babuayifo tsyaa , kamaa , lǝ bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo kasɛɛ ka bíyifo bítsyǝ itǝ lǝ batɛsǝ Onanto lǝ wǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛ nǝmǝ .
60002013	Lǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ esoo , bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ betidi eto aba saa ke bǝtsyǝ lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ ku Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ wǝ ni uninǝ kenke ,
60002014	ku aba eto bǝnyɛsiǝ ba útǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bǝnǝ babuayifo koto nya lǝ batɛsǝ betidi ba leeyifo kasɛɛ tsya .
60002015	Itsyise Onanto aala nkǝ biti mba ini ebukitiki ete beedi eto nyɛ lǝ asa sɛɛ nya bieyifo eso .
60002016	Bisiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba nsi lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ biemfi mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ busiǝ bomfo biyifo asa bua . Bomu bisiǝ nkpǝ fe Onanto eto ndomufɔ seka .
60002017	Bitǝ utidi saa dibu . Bela mi bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ . Bete Onanto sikpi . Nya lǝ bitǝ Okankplɛ tsya dibu .
60002018	Mimba ni beyifoyifoo , bebokosǝ mi ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ mi banamute lǝ bibu mǝ tsya . Nya inni banamute ba nkpe kafo ɛkpɛ nya baala mi ete , bomu mba leeyifo mi disiale tsya .
60002019	Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ kusu ko dimantsyɛ ǝsuǝ fɛ ini lǝ Onanto eto disi eso uńyǝ keklekee , Onanto ebokpo wǝ atsyɔ .
60002020	Lǝ bíyifo kabua nya lǝ nnya eso bǝnǝ mi kotoo , nte atɛsǝ nnya biunyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Fɛɛ lǝ bíyifo kasɛɛ nya bínyǝ kanyi lǝ ke buyifo esuǝǝ , Onanto ebokpo mi atsyɔ lǝ nnya disi .
60002021	Nya nyamfo ni nnya Onanto lela nkǝ bikeyifo nɛ . Itsyise Kristo kosate ǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ mi disi nya óte mi nkǝ bɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kayɛkɔ .
60002022	“ Wényifo lebua saa , nya wántɛyi sedia saa tsya . ”
60002023	Se báka wǝǝ , wánka kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ . Se báte wǝ ohiã wénkudi wǝ balo saa . Bomu úfi lesa saa útǝ Onanto wǝ laakpo lekpo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ .
60002024	Kristo kosate léfo bo abua útsyi , úsu úkpe lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Úyifo nyamfo nko bǝ lǝ bɔbɔ butsyi lǝ bo abua ǝsuǝ lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ butǝ kasɛyifoyifo . Úfi afabe nnya ófo ótsya mi bufi .
60002025	Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , kɔɔ bíyifo fe basamu ba lénya kusu . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ákpa mi óboko bǝ bitǝkǝko nwǝ laayɛnko mi ku nwǝ laase mi ɔflɔ .
60003001	Nya mi besio tsyaa , nko ele bǝ bebokosǝ mi ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ mi bese . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ lǝ mǝ utsyuǝ mámfo ɔ́nɔ tsyaa , wuufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso . Nya inni bǝ ele bǝ bɛtɛyi mǝ kulesa kulaa tsya .
60003002	Bomu mǝ kosate ebunyǝ kase mi ditsyǝbi lekpa nya bébokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ .
60003003	Biǝnlǝkǝ mi bɔnɔbobe bete lǝ asa nnya biakpe nye kase biakle esi nye atsyabi nnya biakpe kefi kalɔkɔsǝ ǝsuǝ .
60003004	Bomuu , bɛlɔkɔsǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ku alɔkɔsǝsa nnya luutǝ bǝ ditsyǝ kpoo nya diyuǝ buɛɛ tsya . Kɔlɔkɔ komfo ambia kulefe nya kofo koya tinti lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
60003005	Nkomǝ seka besio kɛnkɛ ba dísiǝ kɔ , ba dífi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝǝ , lébokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ bese nnya iyifo kɔlɔkɔ itǝ mǝ nɛ .
60003006	Nko ke Sara tsya dítsyue Abraham koto nya ókpo wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ onamute . ” Mi tsya afiani Sara ǝmfo eto bebisiobi lǝ biyifo asa sɛɛ , nya sikpi laanlɛ mi lǝ kulesa saa ǝsuǝ .
60003007	Nko ke ini itǝ mi bese tsya nɛ , bitǝ lǝ asakasɔnɔnɔ lǝ ɛkɛ lǝ mi ku mi bǝsiǝ nti , binyǝ mǝ fe mba lǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale fe mi . Bitǝ mǝ dibu itsyise mi ku mǝ ta Onanto léfo utǝ nkǝ bibǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , kulesa embuti mi olatoto kusu lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
60003008	Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , bitǝ lǝ mimblɛ eto nsusu lǝ buyifo bɔni , utidi eto asa lǝ ɛlɛ mi kaminsǝ , bela bǝtsyuǝ fe bayimi , biyifo kafoɛkpɛ nya lǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
60003009	Biemfi lebua befo lebua kayo , nye bukudi lǝ bukidi eto kɛnyɛ . Bomu bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa lǝ utǝ mǝ atsyɔkpokpo , itsyise nyamfo Onanto ditsyǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bibǝ bɛkɛ se ókpadi mi nɛ .
60003010	Fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyii , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke lela nkǝ wǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ unyǝ mu kamini , nya lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ kɛntsyɛɛ , wǝǝntǝ lǝ ditiki bua saa lǝ lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nya yanle bǝ ɔtɛyi sidia tsya .
60003011	Ele bǝ ɔyɛ lebua buyifo lǝ uyifo kasɛɛ , nya lǝ ɔbɛbɛ diyuǝ ku wǝ utu kenke .
60003012	Itsyise Bonamute ǝǝtǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ mba leeyifo kasɛɛ ǝsuǝ , nya woanɔ mǝ olatoto . Fɛɛ mba ni babuayifoo , waataka kǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
60003013	Lǝ biakplatsya keyifo kasɛɛ , owoe lookpe mi bulǝ ?
60003014	Fɛɛ lǝ efe bǝ nyǝ kanyi lǝ kasɛɛ ka feyifo eto disi esoo , nyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Biante mǝ sikpi , nya biǝntǝ kulesa lǝ ilǝ mi .
60003015	Bomu bifi dibu bitǝ Kristo lǝ mi akɔɛsi lǝ bitǝ wǝ dibu fe mi Onamute . Nya biofo mi ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate utsyuǝ saa wǝ lela nkǝ woanɔ itsyiko lǝ kusubebe ko ǝsuǝ benkpe . Nya lǝ biyifo nko ku disuǝtsyǝ ku ǝsuǝ kasɔ bokosǝbokosǝ .
60003016	Biyifo nnya ku utu wuee , bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ aka mi lǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ bo binsi lǝ Kristo esoo , lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mǝ lǝ nnya bátɛyi ǝsuǝ .
60003017	Itsyise ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ nyǝ kanyi lǝ kasɛɛ ka feeyifo eso lǝ nyamfo eyifo Onanto eto lelabi , enso bǝ lǝ kabua eso .
60003018	Itsyise Kristo wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ , ékpe lǝ betidi ba ni babuayifo eto disi dikpe lɛnwɛ itǝ lefe nǝ kenke , bǝ lǝ ofó bo bokpa kesuko Onanto ɔflɔ . Bálo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ Onanto lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ átakasǝ wǝ úbǝ nkpǝ .
60003019	Nya lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , úsu óbé Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ letsya útǝ bekpenkpe ba béti bákpe lǝ edi kafo mfó .
60003020	Mbamfó ni betidi ba dímentsyue Onanto eto kɔlɛ koto lǝ lefe nǝ ɔkɛ dibusǝ utǝ mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Noa díkawe wǝ ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ nɛ . Betidi esiani ba ni mflamfla ba dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafoo , mǝ báfo lǝ nkpǝ se ntu bomǝ díyi nɛ .
60003021	Nyamfo eyifo ditsyǝbi nǝ nlɛ bo bote kase ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lekateko ntuyiyi bomfóo , mɔmɔ laafo bo lǝ nkpǝ . Yenyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto keni buflǝ kewui bomuu , iyifo kɛnyɛklekle ku Onanto , kɛnyɛklekle ka lekpa nya ketsyi taa bo akɔɛsi kǝmiǝ ke . Onanto aafo bo lǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo eto botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ eso .
60003022	Kristo ǝmfo ni nwǝ dísu kato nya unsi lǝ Onanto eto sediani , wǝ nlɛ seka budi lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke ku kato eto bǝsuǝalenyǝ ku ǝsuǝale nnya nkpe kenke ǝsuǝ .
60004001	Nyaso se Kristo dínyǝ kanyi lǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , mi tsya fi wǝ nsusu bomfo ke eto okle bekpé mi ǝsuǝ nkɛale , itsyise utsyuǝ saa ke lǝǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ensifi ǝsuǝ kakpé lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
60004002	Lǝ nyaso idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bisiǝ mi nkpǝ fɛfɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ nnya laalɛ utidi ɔkuɛ ǝsuǝ .
60004003	Kɔɔ bísiǝ nkpǝ bíyifo asa fe bamamonyǝ ɛklɛ tinti . Nkpe bo bísiǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfó áyɛ lǝ setsyetɔ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ , ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ , sitekpe , sidikpũũ , budi ku bunǝ eto ake eti susu ku sifiǝsumu eto eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
60004004	Nya se biensiankɔ ani ku mǝ keyifo mǝ eyifosa kpǝ nnya lǝmbǝ kasɔnɔnɔ esoo , yeeyifo mǝ yanii nya baaka mi .
60004005	Fɛɛ yuubǝ ibǝ bǝ buulǝkǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto wǝ lookponko mba nsi nkpǝ ku bekpenkpe akpo .
60004006	Nyamfo eso Kristo ábe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bǝtǝ bekpenkpe tsya , ite bǝ Onanto ákponko mǝ lekpo fe kase baakponko utidinini saa lekpo tsyaa , bǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe kase Onanto nsi seka .
60004007	Asa nnya kenke eto kalosǝkɔ boyo elo . Nyaso bińyǝ bikabe kusu lǝ bɛlɛ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , bǝ lǝ befo ola boto .
60004008	Fɛɛ nnya nso bofe enso kenke ni bǝ bikala bǝtsyuǝ kafo faa . Itsyise lelabi ǝǝtǝkǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto kabua kpǝ ka uyifo kato .
60004009	Befo mi bayimitsyuǝ kafo faa , bɔwɔnɔnɔ saa mankɛ .
60004010	Mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa áfo ǝtǝsa ate ate itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ . Nya fe unyɛsiǝ sɛɛ saa wǝ laalɛ ǝtǝsa ate ate nyamfo ola kǝtǝ Onantoo , biyifo ǝtǝsa nyamfo eto keyifo , bǝ lǝ ibǝ kutǝkǝ itǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ .
60004011	Lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ Anantotiki budii , udi nnya fe kase Onanto dítǝ wǝ nkǝ udi nnya utǝ betidi . Nya lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ kesumu eto keyifoo , uyifo ke ku ǝsuǝale nnya Onanto dífi útǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo ke ǝsuǝ , itǝ lǝ befi atɛsǝ bǝtǝ Onanto lefe saa ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo , wǝ eto ale ni diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝalǝ idu manlo isu manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
60004012	Mɔ bayimi lala , kase banlɛ mi boto kabe bɛnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ keklekee , yenyifo mi naa bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ bɛnnlɛ kusi bobe kǝtǝǝ , mǝǝmbǝ tɔ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ inyǝ .
60004013	Bomu lǝ nyamfo esoo , binyǝ disuǝnyuǝ bǝ mi tsya lɛ kanyi bunyǝ fe Kristo ke seka , bǝ lǝ ɔbɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , mi tsya ebofo disuǝnyuǝ bunyǝ kato keyuluu .
60004014	Binyǝ disuǝnyuǝ lǝ betidi áka mi se bintǝkǝko Kristo eso . Itsyise diyǝnde eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ni Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ siko mi .
60004015	Lǝ mi utsyuǝ ǝǝnyǝ kanyii , yenyifo bǝ uyifo uwudifɔ , uyu , obuayifo , nye nwǝ laakpe ditiki nǝ dimanle wǝ kɛnyɛ eso .
60004016	Fɛɛ lǝ biǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ mi bafokanɔfɔ esoo , biǝntǝ lǝ ɛlɛ mi kofani . Bomu bǝsɔ Onanto ani bǝ Kristo eto diye teke fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
60004017	Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo elo bǝ betsyiko lekpokponkpo nǝmǝ kasɔ , nya Onanto eto betidi ǝsuǝ yuutsyǝ kasɔ itsyiko . Lǝ betsyiko kasɔ itsyi lǝ bo ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ mba dímamfo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ ?
60004018	Bawɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ite mǝǝ , bǝ yɔɔkɛ ale fɛ betidi sɛɛ lǝ bǝnyǝ bofoo , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ babuayifo ba dímamfo banɔ ? ”
60004019	Lǝ nyasoo , mba lǝǝnyǝ kanyi ka diyifo Onanto eto lelabii , lǝ mǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bakpe lǝ nwǝ díyifo mǝ lǝ kɔni kenke , nwǝ leeyifo lefe saa lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ .
60005001	Mɔ kosate nwǝ ni bafokanɔfɔ eto uninǝ lǝ mi ntii , nla miǝ maalɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto beninǝ ba nkpe mi lenti kɔlɛ . Mɔ kosate ǝnyǝ kase Kristo dínyǝ kanyi , nya lǝ bǝlǝkǝ wǝ batee , muunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ kǝmiǝ . Nla miǝ maatɛyi mi minkɛ ,
60005002	bɛlɛ Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ béfi bákpe mi lǝ kɔni bǝ bebe ola ku kafo faa , fe kase Onanto lɛtɔ utsyiko mi ɔflɔ . Bienyifo keyifo kamfo bǝ lǝ bifi bɛbɛbɛ kutǝkǝ ko dimǝnńyǝ itǝ , bomu biyifo ke ku kesumu seka .
60005003	Bienyifo ke bidi sɛkplɛ lǝ mba béfi bákpe mi kalɔ ǝsuǝ , bomu bete ditsyǝbi sɛɛ itǝ basamu eto etsyukpa nnya nkpe mi kalɔ .
60005004	Nya lefe nǝ Kristo , Nwǝ Laayɛnko Basamu eto Uninǝ Kenke luubǝǝ , lǝ uti mi lekankpakpa kosate nǝmǝ , nǝ ni nǝ laambia kulefe .
60005005	Nko ke ini itǝ mi lekososa tsya nɛ , bǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ bafokanɔfɔ ninǝ ba eto kalɔ benkpe . Mimblɛ kenke bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝǝńyǝ lǝ mba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ woawunsǝko mba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . ”
60005006	Nyaso beboksǝ mi ǝsuǝ kasɔ bɛkɛ lǝ Onanto eto kɔni kekleke komǝ kalɔ , bǝ lǝ obesǝ mi kato lǝ wǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
60005007	Bifi mi asa nnya kenke laakpé mi bulǝ bekpe lǝ Onanto eto ani , itsyise wǝ laalɛ mi ola .
60005008	Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ , bisiǝ bikabe kusu . Mi olo Obonsam lɛ botsyilama kafa , kato ɔkɔɛ fe tsyata , nya ɔnlɛ utidi bɔbɛbɛ nkǝ lǝ usǝnsǝ ɔyimi .
60005009	Bifi bofokanɔ kekleke bińyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , se binyi biǝ mi bayimi bafokanɔfɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke tsya kpé lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo ke eto okle ǝsuǝ .
60005010	Fɛ lǝ binyǝ kanyi kamfo itǝ lefe kliminti kamaa , Onanto , nwǝ eto lefonǝ lǝmbǝ kalokɔ , wǝǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ bibǝ binyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde manlo nǝ diyifo lɔni ku Kristoo , wǝ kosate ǝbɔflɔsǝ mi , okpe mi nkǝ ale lǝ binyǝ kekleke .
60005011	Wǝ ni ǝsuǝale idu manlo isu manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
60005012	Nlɛ kukue kliminti komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi ɛyɛ lǝ Silvano wǝ mimfi fe ɔyimi wǝ lefo ɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nla miǝ maakpe mi nkɛale ku nnya mɔ kosate dínyǝ miǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ kosate nǝmǝ ni nǝmfo . Nyaso bińyǝ kekleke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
60005013	Mi bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ ba tsya Onanto dílǝkǝ lǝ Babilonia eto kasɔ ku mɔ ubi Marko bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o .
60005014	Bɛbuta bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bisiǝsǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ eto lelabi . Diyuǝsǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ ba kenke diyifo bani ku Kristo .
61001001	Mɔ , Simon Petro , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto uyifoyifo ku ɔtɔnkpe , mɔ ni nwǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mimba ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto ku Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo eto kasɛyifoyifo ǝsuǝǝ , dítǝ bínyǝ bofokanɔ bo lefo koya fe bo bole bomfo eto okle .
61001002	Onanto lǝ usi unǝ mi kafo eso mmǝ , nya lǝ utǝ mi diyuǝ kpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mi Onanto ǝmǝ ku Bonamute Yesu eto bote ǝsuǝ eso .
61001003	Onanto éfi wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝale útǝ bo lesa saa nǝ loofe itǝ bo faa lǝ bo nkpǝ ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bofó nkpǝ busiǝ fe bafokanɔfɔ . Úyifo nyamfo itsyise buyi wǝ nwǝ lékpadi bo nkǝ bunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ kosate eto diyǝnde ku kasɛɛ kǝmiǝ .
61001004	Onanto áyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ útǝ bo ǝtǝsa kpaa nnya lefo koya , nnya eto kɛnyɛ útsyǝ bo , bǝ lǝ bofó bɔyɛ lǝ ǝtǝsa nyamfo ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ bo ǝsuǝ butsyiko lǝ asa bua nnya laalɛ utidi ɔkɔɛ kabiasɛ wǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ǝsuǝ . Bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ bubǝ bofiani mba luunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ Onanto eto ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ kǝmiǝ .
61001005	Lǝ nsusu sɛɛ bomfo ǝsuǝ esoo , bekpe otsyekle saa biofó lǝ bifi kasɛyifoyifo bɛwunsǝko ku mi bofokanɔ . Nya lǝ bifi kobetete bɛkɔ lǝ kasɛyifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
61001006	Nya lǝ bifi ǝsuǝkatotǝkǝtǝkǝ bɛwunsǝko kobetete , lǝ bifi utukpekpe bɛwunsǝko ǝsuǝkatotǝkǝtǝkǝ , lǝ bifi Onanto sikpitete bɛwunsǝko utukpekpe .
61001007	Sɛyimila wunsǝko Onanto sikpitete , nya lǝ lelabi lǝ lɛwunsǝko sɛyimila .
61001008	Ǝtsyǝbi nyamfo lefe itǝ mi nɛ nya lǝ nyamblɛ kenke aka mi kɔni nya yefo disiǝ isiǝ lǝ mii , yuutǝ mi eyifosa ebokpa wuee , nya yɔɔbɔ kutǝkǝ se binyi Bonamute Yesu Kristo eso .
61001009	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ǝmbǝ ditsyǝbi nǝmfoo , nyalɛ utidi ǝmfo ǝnnyǝ asa kukɔnɔ , eso weemunyǝ asa lǝ katsyontsyokɔ . Itǝ bǝ ótasuǝ nkǝ Onanto ǝflǝ abua nnya úyifo kɔ bewui .
61001010	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bekplatsya lǝ bińyǝ kekleke eso kɔ , itǝ lǝ Onanto eto bokpadi bo ókpadi mi nya úlǝkǝ mii , menyifo ebimbale , nya lǝ biyifo nkoo , nyafɛ biemubǝ kama lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
61001011	Lǝ biyifo nkoo , biunyǝ kusu wuee bidufǝ Bonamute ku Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo eto seka kedikɔ manlo siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
61001012	Ite bǝ bíyi nyamfo koko nya bíkabɔ keyudu lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , nyifo nnya minkǝ muukaklomasǝ mi asa nyamfo lefe saa .
61001013	Nya se minsi minkpe nkpǝ koo , yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ nkaklomasǝ mi asa nyamfo nya lǝ nkasanklisǝ mi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
61001014	Nyi minkǝ ibu sɛkɛ lǝ mbɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo ǝsuǝ fe kase Bonamute Yesu Kristo lɛtɛyi mɛ okpasǝ .
61001015	Mɔɔbɛbɛ kusu saa ko ǝsuǝ biokakloma asa nyamfo lefe saa lǝ mɔ ukpǝ kama ntsyǝ .
61001016	Etiki nnya bɔ́tɛyi mi itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto businkli kǝbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ ǝsuǝǝ , menyifo etiki woenwoe . Bo kosate dínyǝ wǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi lǝ wǝ sɛkplɛ ǝsuǝ .
61001017	Búńyǝ mfó lǝ lefe nǝ Anto Onanto dífi dibu ku diyǝnde útǝ wǝ . Nya ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ útsyi diyǝnde kenke eto Onanto ɔflɔ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ nwǝmfo ni mɔ ubi lala , wǝ ǝsuǝ mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ nɛ . ”
61001018	Bo kosate lɛnɔ ɔkɔɛ ǝmfo lɛbɔ utsyi kato , lǝ lefe nǝ bɔ́kɛ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ kɔtini kɛnkɛ komǝ ǝsuǝ .
61001019	Nyamfo eso busi bófo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto etiki nnya bábe letsya bǝtsyǝ enso nɛ . Bekplatsya lǝ bɛlɛ letsyabebe nǝmǝ fe okandiɛ wǝ nlɛ buyǝnde lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ , isu ese lǝ kolensiǝnto ko kalesiǝsiǝ eto sefandebi luubɛ siyǝnde lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ .
61001020	Lesa nǝ lefe ele bǝ binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpo ni bǝnkǝ , kuutsyuǝ saa antaka mmǝ ete ulǝkǝ Onanto eto katɛyikǝtsyǝ ka nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ wǝ kosate eto kobetete ǝsuǝ .
61001021	Itsyise Onanto eto katɛyikǝtsyǝ eto ditiki saa méntsyi lǝ utidi kuutsyuǝ eto lelabi ǝsuǝ díbǝ . Bomu Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyɛ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ bátɛyi kɛnyɛ ka ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ kǝbǝ bǝtsyǝ .
61002001	Fe kase bidiabidia eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛkɛ lǝ betidi nti kɔɔ , nko ke bidiabidia eto bateasa lɔɔbɔ bakɛ mi lenti nɛ . Bɔɔyɛ lǝ awɛsu bate bidiabidia eto asa nnya laabiasǝ betidi eto bofokanɔ . Nya bɔɔni Bonamute wǝ dílǝkǝ mǝ kulaa tsya . Mǝ eyifosa nyamfo ebutǝ batsylɔsǝ ǝsuǝ mlǝ .
61002002	Betidi kpǝ ebutǝkǝko mǝ nkpǝ bua siǝsiǝ kama , nya lǝ bateasa eto eyifosa esoo , betidi ebɔtɛyi asa bua bǝńyǝ lǝ kɔnukualɛsu komǝ ǝsuǝ .
61002003	Se bateasa bamǝ dífi kǝnǝnsɛ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ atabi bɔbɛbɛ ǝsuǝ esoo , boowoe etiki nnya ni bidiabidia befi bǝnyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ , Onanto ébolo mǝ dikpi koko , nya úkǝmuǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ mǝ bɔtsylɔsǝ !
61002004	Onanto mémfi ɔ́tsyɛ wǝ batɔnkpe ba léta wǝ bebu . Bomu okpé mǝ lǝ amana óto mǝ ókpe lǝ ute kǝmiǝ lǝ kaka lena tũũ isu ese lefe nǝ okponko mǝ lekpo .
61002005	Nko ke Onanto dímǝnyǝ betidi ba dísiǝ nkpǝ kɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ǝsuǝ kaminsǝ se báni nkpǝ sɛɛ busiɛ eso . Bǝntǝ Onanto dibu esoo , útǝ ɔsɔmi áni nya ntu díyi bófo kawunsiǝ kenke nya betidi lɛtsylɔ . Ini Noah wǝ lébe nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ letsya útǝ betidi bamǝ ku bitidi ekuanse bamba ba Onanto dílǝkǝ hã díbu .
61002006	Onanto álo Sodom ku Gomora dikpi nya útǝ ute lɛtsylɔsǝ imǝnkplɛ inuǝ nyamfó kenke káfiani ntɔ , úfi óte lesa nǝ luutu betidi ba lɛni bǝ bembufi dibu bǝtǝ wǝ .
61002007	Onanto ǝlǝkǝ Lot wǝ ni utidi sɛɛ , nwǝ betidi bamfó eto nkpǝ bua siǝsiǝ díkelǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi .
61002008	Utidi sɛɛ ǝmfo ákɛ lǝ mǝ nti lefe saa . Ɔ́nɔ nnya kenke nlɛ bubǝ , nya únyǝ nnya ku wǝ ǝnǝmi tsya , itǝ bǝ betidi bamfó eto nkpǝ bua siǝsiǝ bomǝ ǝkǝlǝ wǝ tinti lǝ lɛkɔɛsi .
61002009	Nyamfo lɛ bote kase Boanto laafo betidi sɛɛ bulǝkǝ ketsyiko lǝ botokabe bo ǝsuǝ bankpe ku kase waalɔ babuayifo kǝtsyǝ itǝ lefe nǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛ looyo itǝ mǝ kotonǝnǝ .
61002010	Nya mba wuunǝ koto enso ni mba lǝǝtǝkǝko ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ biabia eto nkpǝsiasiǝ kama nya baani beentsyue Onanto eto afi koto . Bidiabidia eto bateasa bamfo kpé ale nya bembu kulesa ku diyǝnde eto ǝsuǝalǝ nnya nkpe kato bomuu , baaka mǝ kulaa tsya .
61002011	Fɛɛ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba nkpe ǝsuǝalǝ nya bankpe kɛnyɛale banso bidiabidia eto bateasa bamfo kulaa tsya anla ǝsuǝale nnya nkpe kato kɛnyɛ , kaaka mǝ lǝ Boanto eto ǝnǝmi .
61002012	Betidi bamfo eto okle te fe bebutubuki ba lenyi kobe ba boofo bumuǝ kalo , nya bǝǝńyǝ lǝ lesa saa nǝ bannɔ kasɔ ǝsuǝ nya beedi etiki bua saa eto okle . Bɔɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ fe kase baalo bebutubuki seka .
61002013	Boonyǝ kanyi fe kase bǝtǝ betidi dínyǝ kanyi ke . Beedi nkpe keyifo lesa saa nǝ ke baala lǝ nkɔminti tsya itsyise beefi nnya fe lesa nǝ lookpe mǝ disuǝyuǝ . Beyifo mba leeyifo afanisa ku mba leeyifo asa nnya laannɔ bobe . Baakɔ ku mi mba nlɛ eyi budi nya bǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ mǝ asa bua nnya beeyifo ǝsuǝ .
61002014	Bakpé disǝnkpo eto ǝnǝmi nya beeyifo lebua lefe saa nya yennlǝ mǝ . Baawɛ betidi ba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale kakpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ . Mǝ ketu emmi kulefe . Onanto ékudi betidi bamfo sitinti !
61002015	Báyani kususɛ bǝtsyǝ nya bánya kusu ! Bǝǝtǝnko Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi Baalam wǝ ni Boer eto ubi eto ditsyǝbi kama . Waala atabi nnya wuunyǝ lǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
61002016	Lǝ nyaso Onanto ǝyǝnki ókpe wǝ lǝ lebua nǝ úyifo ǝsuǝ . Wǝ Baalam kosate eto ɔflimu édi wǝ etiki lǝ utidi eto ɔkɔɛ ǝsuǝ nya úti wǝ kusu lǝ disibiabia eto asa nnya ɔnlɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ .
61002017	Betidi bamfo eyifo fe etubiǝ nnya lensianyifǝ ntu , fe asɔmiloku nnya ufiebi lekpa ɔnyɛko . Onanto ébu kǝsiǝkɔ utsyǝ mbamfo eto okle lǝ ketuntu tũũ kǝmiǝ .
61002018	Beedi etiki bimba kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato . Nya beedi akɔɛntiki nnya laabiasǝ utidi ǝsuǝ , kawɛ mba nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ betidi ba nsi nkpǝ bua ǝsuǝ eto nti kakpe .
61002019	Bidiabidia eto bateasa bamfo ǝǝtsyǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ bǝnkǝ bootǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ buusiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe mǝ kosate nsi nkpǝ bo loobiasɛ mǝ bafiani ndomufɔ , itsyise lesa nǝ eto kalɔ fankpee , aafiani ni ndomunyǝ .
61002020	Lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bate Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Ofomfokǝtǝǝ , nya bǝnǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝlǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya laanansǝ etidisuǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo , nya yanklɛ fɛ asa nyamǝ disinkli ibǝ imuǝ mǝ itǝkǝ mǝ katoo , bǝǝbǝ kǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , laabia kaso mbo bǝsiǝ kɔ .
61002021	Lǝ nnya ete betidi bamfo dímante kulesa itsyi lǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ eto kusu ǝsuǝǝ , eni ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mǝ , eso bǝ lǝ bate kusu sɛɛ komǝ fɛ lǝ besinkli lǝ kɔfi kɛnkɛ ko Onanto lékpe mǝ eto kama .
61002022	Lesa nǝ díbǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ete wuee lesa nǝ akpa nyamfo nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ , “ Okpa esinkli ɔlɛ wǝ kala budi , ” nya “ Okplako wǝ bǝflǝsǝ ntu kukɔnɔ esinkli úsu ɔlɛ kota boke . ”
61003001	Mɔ bayimi lala , nyamfo ni kukue nuǝfǝ ko minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi nɛ . Lǝ ekue ǝnuǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nkplatsya miǝ lǝ nsi nnǝ mi nsusu nsuko asa sɛɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ ekpako mi wuee .
61003002	Nla miǝ lǝ nklomasǝ mi etiki nya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mǝ , ku lesa nǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ lété mi itsyi lǝ Bonamute we ni Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
61003003	Tutɛɛ , bitǝ lǝ ekpako mi wuee biǝ , lǝ eyi fɛfɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ebubǝ ba difi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto afanisa yifoyifo . Boomǝ mi .
61003004	Nya bɔɔtɔ mi bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ nkpǝ , sieti onkpe ? Itsyise idu lefe nǝ bo bana mǝ díkpe ibǝ ese mmi , nko ete asa nsi nte fe kase itsyǝ taa lefe nǝ Onato díyifo kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
61003005	Beyi fɛ betsyǝ báni ɔnukualɛ mǝ bǝ etiki te Onanto didi nya úyifo kato ku kasɔ . Wǝ ke dítǝ kasɔ lɛbɔ ketsyi lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ nya kabɔ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ kankpe .
61003006	Nya ɛyɛ lǝ ntuyiyi ǝsuǝ nya Onanto lɛtsylɔsǝ kawunsiǝ ka kɔ kenke .
61003007	Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ ke dimuǝ kato ku kasɔ kanlɛ nya ɔnlɛ ke bɔlɔ kǝtsyǝ itǝ ke botonsǝ . Ɔ́lɔ mǝ utsyǝ itǝ diyi nǝ wookponko betidi ba laante Onanto lekpo batsylɔsɛ mǝ .
61003008	Mɔ bayimi lala , bianta ǝsuǝ biǝnkǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , letekɛkɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ diyi lɔni ku alɛ kɔkpi eto nti . Lǝ wǝ ɔflɔɔ , nyamblɛ akate iyifo ani .
61003009	Lǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto nsusu ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto annlɛ bɔkɔse lǝ kɛnyɛ ka utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Inni nko ini . Bomu ɔlɛ ǝsuǝ butsyǝ ku mi itsyise waanla nkǝ batsylɔsǝ kuutsyuǝ saa . Fɛɛ ola nkǝ utsyuǝ saa tsyi ɔwuninsǝ lǝ ɔyɛ abua buyifo .
61003010	Fɛɛ Bonamute eto diyi nǝmǝ ebubǝ fe kase uyu lǝǝbǝ . Diyi nǝmfoo , lǝ ɔkɔɛ kɛnɛnɛnɛ eto bɔbɔ ketsyi kato ǝsuǝ asa nnya nkpe kato ebonya . Nya asa nnya nkpe kato kenke looto ɛtsylɔ nya asa nnya kenke nkpe lǝ kasɔ loonya .
61003011	Se asa nyamfo kenke loobia mmǝǝ , nte betidi ba eto okle ele bǝ bidi ? Ele bǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bo diyifo kɛnkɛ lǝ bifi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto .
61003012	Nya lǝ kase binsi bǝnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Onanto eto diyi nǝmǝ bekplatsya lǝ dibǝ mlǝ . Diyi nǝmfoo , kato kenke looto katsylɔ , nya ute loolonsǝ kato eto ǝsuǝale kenke ebiasǝ .
61003013	Fɛɛ boo , buunyǝ bukabe kusu itǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka úsyǝ . Kato fɔfɔ ku kasɔ fɔfɔ ka luubǝ kaka kasɛyifoyifo sɔ̃ɔ̃ lɔɔkɛ mfó kenke .
61003014	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , se bífi mi kusubebe kenke bítǝkǝ lǝ diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , bekplatsya lǝ biyifo mi ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ , kabua saa mankɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , lǝ bɛkɛ lɛ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ .
61003015	Ele bǝ bifi kase Bonamute dífi dibusǝ útǝǝ , fe kusu ko útǝ mi nkǝ lǝ bafo mi lǝ binyǝ bulǝkǝ fe kase bo ɔyimi lala Paulo lɛwɔni útǝ mi ɛyɛ lǝ kobe ko Onanto dítǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
61003016	Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ waatɛyi lǝ wǝ ekue nnya kenke waawɔni katsyese mi lǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Asa ǝtsyuǝ nnya waawɔni katsyese kpé ale nyaso betidi ba lenyi ku mba lǝnńyǝ kekleke lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , eefi kasɔlǝkǝlǝkǝ ka dimamflɔ kǝtǝ nnya fe kase beeyifo lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto nlebe ntsyuǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ baatsylɔsǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
61003017	Fɛɛ , mɔ balala , bifi biyi nyamfo koko . Nyaso bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ bǝ babuatidi saa embɔwɛ mi bakpe lǝ mǝ abuayifoyifo saa ku mǝ esubuayɛyɛ ǝsuǝ . Manla miǝ lǝ beta bibu lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ !
61003018	Bomu bisukosǝ lǝ bebe lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ eto bote ǝsuǝ . Wǝ boǝtǝ dibu idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
62001001	Bɔlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi , ko nyɛ lǝ Nkpe eto ditiki nǝ nsi nkpǝ itsyi ta kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ ke ǝsuǝ . Bɔ́nɔ etiki itsyi lǝ ni ǝsuǝ nya búkǝnyǝ ni ku bo ǝnǝmi tsya . Sitinti ini bǝ búnyǝ ni ku bo ǝnǝmi nya búkǝtidi ni ku bo ani tsya .
62001002	Se Onanto dílǝkǝ ditiki nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ le lekpelee , búnyǝ wǝ nya búdi etiki itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bóbe letsya lǝ nkpǝ manlo bo nkpe lǝ wǝ , nya onkpe lǝ Anto Onanto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . Nya Onanto dílǝkǝ wǝ óte bo tsya .
62001003	Lesa nǝ búkǝnyǝ nya bɔ́nɔɔ , ni bɔnlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ mi nɛ , bǝ lǝ mi tsya lǝ bibǝ bɛkɔ ku bo lǝ lɔniyifoyifo nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpe ku Anto ǝmǝ ku wǝ ubi Yesu Kristo .
62001004	Nyaso bɔnlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi , bǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝ bɔnlɛ bunyǝǝ , lǝ lɛflɔ lelo .
62001005	Mɔmɔɔ , ditiki nǝ bɔ́nɔ butsyiko lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya búfi ni bɔnlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ mi ni nkǝ Onanto ni diyǝnde , nya ketuntu saa lǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ .
62001006	Nyaso lǝ bɔlɛ bɔtɛyi boǝ buyifo bani ku wǝ , fɛ busi bunsi nkpǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ bɔlɛ sidia bɔtɛyi lǝ bo etiki ku lǝ bo eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
62001007	Fɛɛ lǝ busi nkpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ fe kase unsi lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ ete bǝ busi lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ ku bo bayimitsyuǝ . Nya Yesu Kristo wǝ ni wǝ Ubi eto kɔtɔ ǝflǝ lebua saa lebua lǝ bo ǝsuǝ kúwi .
62001008	Lǝ bɔ́tɛyi boǝ lebua saa ǝmbǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ , bɔ́wɛ ǝsuǝ nya bɔnnlɛ ɔnukualɛ bɔtɛyi .
62001009	Fɛɛ lǝ bulǝkǝ bo abua kasɔ butǝ Onantoo , wɔɔyɛ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ uyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ utǝ bo , wuufi bo abua ɔtsyɛ bo , uflǝ nnya uwui lǝ bo .
62001010	Fɛɛ lǝ bɔni boǝ lebua saa mbǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ bútǝkǝ Onanto sidia , nya wǝ ditiki ǝmbǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
62002001	Mɔ bebi lala , nlɛ nyamfo bɔwɔni katsyese mi bǝ lǝ bienyifo lebua . Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ éyifo lebuaa , bokpé utsyuǝ wǝ lǝǝńyǝ lǝ bo kɛnyɛ kalɛ Onanto lekpakpa kǝtǝ bo . Wǝ ni Yesu Kristo wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ ǝmǝ .
62002002	Nya Kristo kosate ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto laayɛ kefi bo abua katsyɛ bo . Inni bo mate eto ale ete woefi katsyɛ , bomu kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi eto ale .
62002003	Lǝ butsyue Onanto eto afi kotoo , eté bǝ buyi wǝ .
62002004	Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyi wǝ , ” fɛɛ woenyifo lǝ wǝ afi ǝsuǝǝ , utsyuǝ ǝmfo eyifo odia . Nya ɔnukualɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ .
62002005	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke leetsyue wǝ ditiki koto , wǝ lelabi itǝ Onanto ni nǝ lɛflɔ nɛ . Bitǝ lǝ ntɛyi mi kase boate boǝ buyifo bani ku Onanto nya ni benkǝ ,
62002006	utsyuǝ saa ke laatɛyi nkǝ uyifo ɔni ku Onanto , ele bǝ usiǝ nkpǝ fe kase Yesu Kristo dísiǝ .
62002007	Mɔ balala , nnya minlɛ bɔwɔni katsyese mi enni kɔfi fɔfɔ . Bomu kɔfi koko ko nte taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke . Kɔfi koko komfo eyifo nko fákanɔ taa kɔ .
62002008	Fɛɛ kɔfi ko minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi mfoo , lǝ sitinti kuyifo kɔfɔfɔ itsyise ko ɔnukualɛ yɛ lǝ Kristo ku mi tsya ǝsuǝ . Itsyise ketuntu kamǝ lɛ bofe nya diyǝnde nǝmǝ kosate fe lɛlɛ buyǝnde .
62002009	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke laatɛyi nkǝ okpé lǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ weekisi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , si okpé lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ ibǝ ese mɔmɔ .
62002010	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke laala wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ , kpé lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ , nya kulesa ǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ nǝ luutǝ bǝ utsyuǝ bamba dufǝ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ .
62002011	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ leekisi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , kpé lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ , nya ɔnyɛ lǝ ke kǝmiǝ . Nya unyi kaka ɔntɔ , itsyise ketuntu kamǝ ǝtǝ óba ǝnǝmi .
62002012	Mɔ bebi lala , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi lǝ bete biǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto éfi mi abua ɔtsyɛ mi .
62002013	Antomǝ , mi minlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ nɛ itsyise biyi Kristo wǝ nsi nkpǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ǝmǝ . Nya nko ǝmǝ ke minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi bakosobi nɛ itsyise bítǝkǝ Obuale ǝmǝ tsya kato .
62002014	Nya mi , mɔ bebi lala , nlɛ mi kukue komfo bɔwɔni itsyise biyi Anto ǝmǝ . Mi antomǝ , mi minlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ itsyise biyi Kristo wǝ nsi nkpǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ǝmǝ . Nya mi bakosobi , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ itsyise bekpé ǝsuǝale , nya Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ mi nya bíkǝtǝkǝ Obuale ǝmǝ kato .
62002015	Biemfi lelabi bitǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo nye kulesa nǝ nkpe lǝ ke , itsyise utsyuǝ saa ke laala kawunsiǝ kamfoo , anla Anto ǝmǝ .
62002016	Lesa saa nǝ ni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto lele ni fe asa bua nnya laalɛ utidi ɔkɔɛ , asa bua nnya betidi lǝǝnyǝ nya nnya akɛ mǝ ɔkɔɛ ku lesa saa nǝ nkpe lǝ kawunsiǝ nǝ ǝsuǝ utidi laabesǝ ǝsuǝ katoo , nyamfo eto kuditsyuǝ mentsyi Anto ǝmǝ flɔ . Bomu nyamblɛ etsyi kawunsiǝ mfo .
62002017	Kawunsiǝ kamfo ku kǝ asa nnya laalɛ utidi ɔkɔɛɛ , ǝbǝ ɛlɛ bofe . Fɛɛ nwǝ leeyifo lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , ebusiǝ nkpǝ lefe saa .
62002018	Mɔ bebi lala , kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kalosǝkɔ eboyo kalo ! Nya fe kase bátɛyi mii , bíɔnɔ biǝ Kristo eto olo ǝmǝ ébubǝ , nya mɔmɔɔ , Kristo eto balo kpǝ ébubɛ bakpe . Nyaso buyi boǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ ebɔfi .
62002019	Lǝ sitintii , betidi bamfo ǝmbǝ lǝ bo ditsyukpa nǝmfo ǝsuǝ , nyaso bábɔ bo lǝ nti nɛ . Lǝ bo betidi kosate benii , eni besi bakpé lǝ bo nti . Fɛɛ mǝ budu lǝ bo nti lɛ bote nkǝ mǝ nti eto kuutsyuǝ menyifo bo ole .
62002020	Fɛ mii , Kristo éfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ ókpé mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya mimblɛ kenke nyi ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
62002021	Inni lǝ kase binnyi ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ eso minlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɔwɔni katsyese mi , bomu se binyi ni eso . Nya binyi tsya biǝ sidia saa eni Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
62002022	Nya owoe ni odia ǝmǝ ? Odia ǝmǝ ni nwǝ lɛni nkǝ Yesu eni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Utidi ǝmfo eto okle tututu ni Kristo eto olo nɛ . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ lɛni Onanto ku wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ nɛ .
62002023	Itsyise nwǝ ke lɛni Ubi ǝmfo áni Anto ǝmǝ tsya . Nwǝ ke léfo Ubi ǝmǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , áfo Anto ǝmǝ tsya .
62002024	Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ ditiki nǝ béfo idu taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ eyo mɔmɔɔ , edufǝ mi lǝ akɔɛsi kenke . Nya lǝ bɛlɛ nnya kukɔnɔɔ , nyalɛ biusiǝ nkpǝ lǝ Ubi ǝmǝ ku Anto ǝmǝ eto lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
62002025	Nya nkpǝ manlo bomfo ni kɛnyɛ ka Kristo dítsyǝ nkǝ wuufi utǝ bo nɛ .
62002026	Nlɛ nyamfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi itsyi lǝ betidi ba loola bǝ baawɛ mi bakpé eso .
62002027	Fɛ mimii , Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ókpo lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , áfo disiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ kenke . Lǝ nyasoo , yensife bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ usi ote mi kulesa bio . Itsyise wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ aate mi lesa saa . Nya asa nnya diate eyifo ɔnukualɛ nya sidia saa lǝmbǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Nyaso bitsyue koto lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ léte mi lǝ bisiǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo ǝsuǝ .
62002028	Nko ini nɛ , mɔ bebi lala , biyifo lɔni ku Kristo bǝ lǝ lefe nǝ ɔɔbɔ ubǝǝ , biofo bɔbɔ kǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi ku utu wuee kofanimante lǝ Diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
62002029	Lǝ biyi biǝ Kristo eyifo ɔsɛɛ , ele bǝ befo bɛnɔ biǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , eyifo Onanto eto ubi .
62003001	Bebe kase sɔ̃ɔ̃ Anto Onanto laala bomba léfo Yesu bɔ́nɔɔ . Nyaso waakpadi bo nkǝ wǝ bebi nɛ . Nya boyifo Onanto eto bebi sitinti . Nnya eso kawunsiǝ eto betidi lenyi bo ni bǝnkǝ , benyi Onanto .
62003002	Mɔ bayimi lala , mɔmɔɔ , buyifo Onanto eto bebi . Fɛɛ betidi ba eto okle buubǝ bofiani , Onanto mǝnlǝkǝ óte bo tɔ . Fɛɛ buyi buǝ lefe nǝ Kristo luubǝǝ , buutsyǝ fe wǝ ke seka . Itsyise buunyǝ wǝ fe kase unte sitinti .
62003003	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke nkpe kusubebe komfo lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , aalɔ wǝ ǝsuǝ kǝtsyǝsǝ kɛnkɛ fe kase Kristo tsya diyifo kɛnkɛ .
62003004	Utsyuǝ saa ke leeyifo lebua , aata Onanto eto kɔfi kebu . Itsyise lebua eyifo Onanto eto kɔfi bota kebu .
62003005	Nya biyi biǝ bubǝ Kristo díbǝ nkǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝǝ , lebua saa ǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
62003006	Nyaso utsyuǝ saa ke nsi nkpǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnsiǝ nkpǝ keyifo lebua . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ keyifo lebua , lǝ bote nkǝ wǝnnyǝ tɔ Kristo , nya taa mɔmɔ kulaa tsya wante wǝ tɔ .
62003007	Mɔ bebi lalaa , biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpé . Utsyuǝ saa ke leeyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ fe kase Kristo diyifo ɔsɛɛ nɛ .
62003008	Utsyuǝ saa ke nsi nkpǝ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝǝ , eyifo Obonsam eto ole . Itsyise Obonsam éyifo lebua taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ kamǝ ke . Nyamfo eso Onanto eto Ubi díbǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ nkǝ lǝ obiasǝ Obonsam eto eyifosa bua nyamǝ .
62003009	Utsyuǝ saa ke ni Onanto eto ubii , ǝnsiǝ nkpǝ keyifo lebua . Itsyise Onanto eto ditsyǝbi kpé lǝ wǝ . Wǝmbofo busiǝ keyifo lebua se Onanto ni wǝ Anto eso .
62003010	Letekɛkɛ nǝ nkpe lǝ Onanto eto bebi ku Obonsam eto bebi nti ni bǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ ke leenyifo kasɛɛ nye waanla wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , eni Onanto eto ubi .
62003011	Kɛnyɛ ka bɛnɔ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ni bǝnkǝ , ele bǝ bola bǝtsyuǝ .
62003012	Yanle bǝ butsyǝ fe Kain , nwǝ didi Obonsam eto ubi , nya ólo wǝ ɔyimisani . Nya beso Kain lelo wǝ ? Ólo wǝ itsyise wǝ Kain eto eyifosa mányɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya wǝ ɔyimisani eto eyifosa áyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ eso .
62003013	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , yenyifo mi naa lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi ekisi mi .
62003014	Buyi boǝ bɔ́bɔ lǝ ukpe kǝmiǝ bubǝ busi lǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Buyi nko itsyise boala bo bayimitsyuǝ . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanla wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ si nkpǝ lǝ ukpe eto ǝsuǝale kǝmiǝ .
62003015	Utsyuǝ saa ke leekisi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ , uyifo uwudifɔ . Nya mi kosate yi biǝ uwudifɔ saa ǝmbǝ nkpǝ manlo lǝ wǝ .
62003016	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya bunyi lesa nǝ ni lelabi nɛ , nya nnya ni bǝ Kristo éfi wǝ nkpǝ útǝ lǝ bo disi . Nyaso ele bǝ bo tsya fi bo nkpǝ butǝ lǝ bo bayimitsyuǝ eto disi .
62003017	Lǝ utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe kɔnikalende ǝnyǝ nkǝ lesa ahiã wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fɛ wánwunsǝko wǝ bomu útsyi kama ókpé wǝǝ , ntsyǝ woofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ woala Onanto ?
62003018	Mɔ bebi lala , biǝntǝ lǝ bulǝkǝ lelabi bote lǝ kɛnyɛ fufu eto etiki ǝsuǝ ete . Bomu bitǝ lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ .
62003019	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , boote boǝ buyifo ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ eto bale , nya buunyǝ kǝnyǝkɔ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
62003020	Lǝ bo akɔɛsi alo bo dikpi kulaa tsyaa , buyi boǝ Onanto amɔ oso bo akɔɛsi , nya unyi lesa saa .
62003021	Nyaso , mɔ bayimi lala , lǝ bo akɔɛsi manlo bo dikpii , bokpe kǝnyǝkɔ ku nkɛale lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
62003022	Boafo lesa nǝ boatɔ ketsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ itsyise boetsyue wǝ afi nyamǝ koto nya boeyifo lǝ wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
62003023	Kɔfi ko ókpe bo ni nkǝ bofo wǝ ubi Yesu Kristo bɔnɔ lǝ bola bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Kristo lɛtɔ utsyiko bo ɔflɔ .
62003024	Utsyuǝ saa ke leetsyue Onanto eto kɔfi koto ǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ ku Onanto , nya Onanto tsya lǝǝsiǝko wǝ . Nya lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ Onanto dífi útǝ bo esoo , buyi boǝ Onanto si ko bo .
62004001	Mɔ bayimi lala , biamfo utsyuǝ saa wǝ laatɛyi nkǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ si lǝ wǝ bɛnɔ . Bomu beto mǝ bebe lǝ bete lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ . Itsyise bidia , bidia eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi éboba bákpo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalebe saa .
62004002	Nya kase fɔɔyɛ ate lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ ni bǝ utsyuǝ saa laatɛyi nkǝ Yesu Kristo ǝbǝ kawunsiǝ fe utidinini , kpé Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ .
62004003	Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke dímamfo ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu ǝbǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo fe utidininii , eto lɛwɔnɔ mentsyi Onanto ɔflɔ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eyifo Kristo eto olo eto lɛwɔnɔ . Bɛnɔ biǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ebubǝ . Nya mɔmɔɔ , díubǝ lekpé lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo koko .
62004004	Fɛɛ , mɔ bebi lala , biyifo Onanto eto bale nya bítǝkǝ bidiabidia eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kato itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ nkpe lǝ mii , kpé kɛnyɛale leso mba ni kawunsiǝ mfo eto betidi eto lɛwɔnɔ .
62004005	Se ini kawunsiǝ mfo betsyi esoo , kawunsiǝ mfo eto asa ǝsuǝ ete beedi etiki ketsyiko , nya mba ditsyi kawunsiǝ mfo leetsyue mǝ koto .
62004006	Fɛ boo , Onanto eto bale buni . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ nyi Onantoo , eetsyue bo ditiki koto , nya nwǝ ke leni Onanto eto olee , entsyue bo koto . Nyamfo ni kase boǝnyǝ kǝtsyǝ lekpoo , Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ni ɔnukualɛ eto lele ku nǝ ni bidiabidia eto lele .
62004007	Mɔ bayimi lala , bitǝ lǝ bola bǝtsyuǝ . Itsyise lelabi etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laala utidii , eyifo Onanto eto ubi , nya unyi Onanto tsya .
62004008	Nya utsyuǝ saa ke laanla betidii , enyi Onanto . Itsyise Onanto eyifo lelabi .
62004009	Kusu ko Onanto lɛyɛ úlǝkǝ wǝ lelabi ote bo ni bǝ ótsyese wǝ Ubi lala ɔni ǝmǝ kplo lǝ kawunsiǝ , bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ bunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
62004010	Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya bóte lesa nǝ ko ni lelabi nɛ . Inni lǝ kase boala Onanto bomu bǝ waala bo nya ótsyese wǝ Ubi nkǝ lǝ ɛyɛ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ufi bo abua batsyɛ bo .
62004011	Bayimi lala , lǝ mmǝ ni kase Onanto léla boo , nyalɛ ele bǝ bola bo bǝtsyuǝ .
62004012	Kuutsyuǝ mǝnyǝ tɔ Onanto unyǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ boala bǝtsyuǝǝ , Onanto eyifo ɔni ku bo , nya ɔflɔsǝ wǝ lelabi lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
62004013	Buyi sitinti boǝ bokpé lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya wuutsya nkpe lǝ bo , itsyise úfi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ bo .
62004014	Búnyǝ nya búfi nnya bóbe letsya butǝ bǝtidi bamba boǝ Onanto átsyese wǝ Ubi nkǝ lǝ ubǝ ofiani Ofomfokǝtǝ itǝ kawunsiǝ kenke .
62004015	Lǝ utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ote nkǝ Yesu eyifo Onanto eto Ubii , ete bǝ Onanto kpé wǝ ǝsuǝ nya wuutsya nkpe lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
62004016	Nya bunyi nya bófo lelabi nǝ Onanto dífi útǝ bo bɔ́nɔ . Onanto eyifo lelabi , nya nwǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , si nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ ku Onanto nya Onanto tsya nsi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ ku bo .
62004017	Nyamfo eso ele bǝ lelabi flɔ lǝ bofo ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise bo nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo akateko Kristo eto nle .
62004018	Sikpitete saa ǝmbǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . Bomu lelabi nǝ lɛflɔ aala sikpitete katsyese kama . Nyaso nwǝ laate asa sikpi eto lelabi mamflɔ lelo , itsyise sikpitete ku kotonǝnǝ ayɛnko bǝtsyuǝ .
62004019	Boala Onanto itsyise wǝ leka bo bola .
62004020	Lǝ utsyuǝ aatɛyi nkǝ waala Onanto fɛ weekisi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ , odia uni . Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanla wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ wǝ wǝǝnyǝ ku ǝnǝmi , ntsyǝ woofo Onanto wǝ wǝǝnnyǝ ku ǝnǝmi bola ?
62004021	Kɔfi ko Kristo dítǝ bo ni nkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke laala Onanto , ele bǝ ola wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ tsya .
62005001	Betidi ba kenke lefo banɔ bǝ Yesu ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝǝ , eyifo Onanto eto bebi . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke laala antoo , ala wǝ ubi tsya .
62005002	Nyaso lǝ boala Onanto nya boeyifo lǝ wǝ afi ǝsuǝǝ , eté bo boǝ boala Onanto eto bebi tsya .
62005003	Lǝ buyifo lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ boala wǝ . Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝ buyifoo , enni lesa nǝ nso ale bɔkɛ .
62005004	Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ ni Onanto eto ubi , ǝtǝkǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kato . Nya boafo nyamfo buyifo ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
62005005	Nya owoe loofo kawunsiǝ kato butǝkǝ ? Nwǝ hã te léfo ɔnɔ́ nkǝ Yesu ni Onanto eto ubi .
62005006	Yesu Kristo ni utidi wǝ díbǝ kawunsiǝ lǝ ntu ku kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ntu ɛyɛ lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ǝsuǝ ku kɔtɔ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpe ǝsuǝ . Wǝǝmbǝ lǝ ntu mate ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ ntu ku kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kosate lɛ adansiɛ budi kate nkǝ nyamfo eyifo sitinti , itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ eyifo ɔnukualɛ .
62005007	Badansiɛ itsyǝ nkpe .
62005008	Mǝ ni Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ , ntu bomǝ ku kɔtɔ komǝ . Nya mǝ itsyǝ bamǝ lɛ adansiɛ ani budi .
62005009	Bofo utidi eto adansiɛ bɔnɔ , fɛɛ Onanto eto adansiɛ kpé kɛnyɛale kaso , nya wǝ dídi adansiɛ nyamfo itsyi lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ .
62005010	Nyaso utidi wǝ ke lefo Onanto eto Ubi ɔnɔɔ , waafo asa nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ ɔnɔ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ke dímamfo Onanto ɔ́nɔɔ , ǝǝnyǝ Onanto fe odia etsyise wámfo sedansiɛ sia údi lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ ɔ́nɔ
62005011	Nnya ɔ́tɛyi ni nkǝ , útǝ bo nkpǝ bo lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ .
62005012	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ léfo Onanto eto Ubi ɔ́nɔ , nkpǝ bomfo éboka mi kɔni nkoko . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ dímamfo Ubi ǝmǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , embǝ nkpǝ bomfo .
62005013	Nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔnɔ kǝtǝ mimba léfo Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ bɛnɔ lǝ bete biǝ nkpǝ manlo éboka mi kɔni .
62005014	Boakpé utu , kefi ǝnǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onantoo ǝsuǝ boǝ lǝ bɔtɔ wǝ lesaatsyuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , woanɔ nnya .
62005015	Waanɔ lefe nǝ ke bɔtɔ wǝ asa , nya se bunyi nko esoo , buyi tsya boǝ wǝǝtǝ bo lesa nǝ bɔtɔ wǝ .
62005016	Lǝ utsyuǝ ǝnyǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ ɔnlɛ lebua ditsyue nǝ lǝǝnnǝ ukpe kaboko buyifoo , ele bǝ oto ola utǝ Onanto wǝ luutǝ wǝ nkpǝ . Mba leeyifo lebua nǝ lǝǝnnǝ ukpe kaboko eto etiki ni nyamfo nɛ . Fɛɛ lebua ditsyuǝ kpe nǝ lǝǝnǝ ukpe kaboko . Inni lebua nǝmfo eto okle eto disi minlɛ miǝ bato ola .
62005017	Lesa saa nǝ lanyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ buyifo eyifo lebua , fɛɛ abua ǝtsyuǝ kpé nya lǝǝnnǝ utidi kakpe lǝ ukpe ǝsuǝ .
62005018	Buyi boǝ utsyuǝ saa ke ni Onanto eto ubii , enyifo lebua , itsyise Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ aabe wǝ , nya obuale ǝmǝ amfo wǝ kabua saa buyifo .
62005019	Buyi boǝ Onanto eto bale buni , fɛɛ kawunsiǝ kenke kpé lǝ obuale ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝale kalɔ .
62005020	Buyi boǝ Onanto eto Ubi ǝbǝ , nya útǝ bɔ́nɔ asa kasɔ nya lǝ bote Onanto tinti ǝmǝ . Busi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku wǝ ni sitinti ku wǝ Ubi Yesu Kristo . Nwǝmfo ni Onanto tinti ǝmǝ , lǝǝtǝ bo nkpǝ manlo nɛ .
62005021	Nyaso , mɔ bebi lala , bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ bǝfiǝ eto keditǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
63001001	Kukue komfo etsyi mi bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto uninǝ ɔflɔ kutǝ fǝ usio wǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ bebi ba maala tinti . Enni mɔ maate laala mi , bomu ku mba tã nyi ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ laala mi sitinti .
63001002	Itsyise ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ eyi bo lǝ ǝsuǝ nya diɔkɛ lǝ bo isu ese manlo .
63001003	Boanto Onanto ǝmǝ ku Yesu Kristo , Anto eto Ubi ǝmǝ lǝ bǝnǝ bo kafo nya lǝ bǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ , bǝtǝ bo diyuǝ , bo mba laala bo bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
63001004	Iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti se mínyǝ miǝ fǝ bebi bǝtsyuǝ si nkpǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase Anto ǝmǝ lɛtɔ utsyiko bo ɔflɔ .
63001005	Mmǝ eso minlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni katsyese mi , Ambe Ububutidi , bǝ bola bǝtsyuǝ . Nyamfo enni kɔfi fɔfɔ minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi , bomu iyifo kɔfi ko bófo itsyi taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke .
63001006	Lelabi eto asa nnya minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi ni nkǝ ele bǝ buyifo lǝ Onanto eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ . Nya kɔfi komfo , fe kase mimblɛ kenke lɛnɔ idu taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ni bǝnkǝ , mimblɛ siǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ .
63001007	Betidi ba laawɛ betidi kpǝ ébɔbɔ batsyilama kawunsiǝ . Mǝ ni betidi ba laatɛyi bǝnkǝ Yesu Kristo mǝmbǝ kawunsiǝ mfo fe utidinini seka . Nwǝ laawɛ betidi ǝmǝ , eyifo Kristo eto olo .
63001008	Nyaso bebe mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ bǝ nnya bekplatsya bɛnlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝǝ , manya , bomu bǝ lǝ binyǝ nnya kayofofo ka lɛflɔ .
63001009	Utsyuǝ saa ke dímanlɛ Kristo eto asatete nyamǝ lǝ kɔni bomu óté asa bambaa , Onanto ensiko wǝ . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke lɛlɛ Kristo eto asatete lǝ kɔni , Anto ǝmǝ ku Ubi ǝmǝ tsya si ko wǝ .
63001010	Nyamfo esoo , lǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ nya ɔnnlɛ asateete nyamfo lǝ kɔnii , biamfo wǝ lǝ mi ayo , nya biǝntǝ wǝ diyuǝ eto edufǝ .
63001011	Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ loofo wǝ utǝ wǝ diyuǝ eto edufǝǝ , éyifo ani ku wǝ lǝ wǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
63001012	Nkpe asa kpe nya ele bǝ ntɛyi mi , fɛɛ manla miǝ lǝ nwɔni nya lǝ kukue ǝsuǝ ntsyese mi . Bomu nlɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ budi etiki ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi butǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bo disuǝyuǝ nǝmǝ lǝ lɛflɔ .
63001013	Fǝ ɔyimisio wǝ tsya Onanto dílǝkǝ eto bebi bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ .
64001001	Ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala Gaio , mɔ bafokanɔfɔ eto uninǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ . Maala fǝ lǝ sitinti eto ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
64001002	Mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala , nlɛ ola boto miǝ lǝ lesa saa lǝ lɛlɛkɛ ditǝ fǝ nya lǝ akɛ ǝsuǝale . Nyi miǝ ite fe kase fǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
64001003	Nnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti se bafokanɔfɔ eto bayimitsyuǝ díbǝ bátɛyi mɛ kase fanlɛ ɔnukualɛtiki nǝmǝ kekleke lǝ kɔni fe kase fálɛ ni kɔ seka ke .
64001004	Se mínɔ bǝ mɔ bebi lɛ nkpǝ busiǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛtiki nǝmǝ eto kusu ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
64001005	Mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala , eyifo nwǝ leeyifo kasɛyifo kǝtǝ fǝ bayimi bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ , lǝ bafɔ beni kulaa tsya .
64001006	Bǝbǝ bátɛyi bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa mfo kase fala mǝ . Nyaso nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa lǝ awunsǝko mǝ lǝ bakɛ mǝ asa nnya loofe itǝ mǝ fe kase ińyǝ itǝ Onanto eto keyifo bǝ lǝ besukosǝ mǝ kusu ko banyɛ sɛtɔ .
64001007	Itsyise bǝtsyǝ kasɔ mǝ kusu bɔyɛ kafe lǝ Kristo eto keyifo ǝsuǝ nya bámfo bɔwunsǝko saa betsyiko lǝ mba lenni bafokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ .
64001008	Mmǝ eso ele bǝ bafokanɔfɔ wunsǝko betidi bamfo eto okle . Nyamfo loote bǝ buyifo bani ku mǝ lǝ keyifo kǝtǝ Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
64001009	Nwɔni kukuǝ kutsyuǝ ntsyese bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ , fɛɛ Diotrefo wǝ léla nkǝ weedi mǝ ɔtɔnkpe mfó anla nkǝ wetsyue lesa nǝ maatɛyi koto .
64001010	Lǝ mbǝǝ , muulǝkǝ lesa saa nǝ úyifo nte , asa bua nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ bo ǝsuǝ ku bidia bia waatɛyi . Fɛɛ nyamfo mǝnsiǝ tɔ , wǝǝmbofo bayimi ba ni bafokanɔfɔ ku kafo faa lǝ bǝbǝ mfó . Nya weeti mba laala bǝ baafo mǝ kusu nya waala nkǝ waala mǝ ulǝkǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ nti .
64001011	Mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala , mǝntǝkǝko lebuayifoyifo kama . Bomu tǝkǝko kasɛyifoyifo kama . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo kasɛɛ eyifo Onanto eto ole . Fɛɛ nwǝ leeyifo asa buaa , mánte tɔ Onanto .
64001012	Utsyuǝ saa eedi etiki sɛɛ ketsyiko lǝ Demetrio ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ kosate eedi etiki sɛɛ ketsyiko lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bo ǝmǝ tsya lɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya eyi fǝ lesa nǝ boatɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ .
64001013	Asa kpǝ kpe ele bǝ ntɛyi fǝ , fɛɛ manla miǝ maawɔni nnya ntsyese fǝ .
64001014	Bomu nla miǝ mǝǝbǝ fǝ ɔflɔ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ nya lǝ budi etiki butǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi .
64001015	Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝnko fǝ . Fǝ bayimitsyuǝ lǝ mfo kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ . Mǝǝsiǝsǝ bayimitsyuǝ saa kukɔnɔ .
65001001	Kukue komfo etsyi mɔ , Yuda , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔyɛ ku Yakobo eto ɔyimisani ɔflɔ , itǝ mba Onanto lékpadi ba nsi nkpǝ lǝ Anto Onanto eto lelabi ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto bobe ǝsuǝ .
65001002	Onanto eto kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , diyuǝ ku lelabi lǝ disiǝko mi kenke , lebé lekpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
65001003	Mɔ bayimitsyuǝ lala , iyifo mɔ lelabi kekleke miǝ eni nwɔni kukue ntǝ mi itsyi lǝ kase Onanto léfo bomblɛ lǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nsusu bamba esi búbǝ mɛ nkǝ efe bǝ nwɔni kukue komfo ntǝ mi mlǝ lǝ mfi nkpe mi nkɛale bǝ lǝ beta bofokanɔ eto kusu komǝ disi kekleke . Bofokanɔ bo Onanto dífi útǝ wǝ betidi lɔni kplo .
65001004	Itsyise betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba laante Onanto sikpi ábiɔ bédufǝ lǝ mi nti , betidi ba laatsyi Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝmǝ kawunisǝ , bǝ lǝ ekate itǝ mǝ nkpǝ bua bo bensi ǝsuǝ . Betidi bamfo áni bo Okankplɛ ɔni kplo ǝmǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Bonamute . Lefe kpǝ nǝ díbǝ lefe mǝǝ , Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ átɛyi itsyǝ dikpilolo nǝ bákafo ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
65001005	Ite bǝ biyi nyamfo kenke tsyaa , nsi nla miǝ meedi mi etiki itsyi lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ Israelfɔ utsyiko Egipte eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tsylɔsǝ mba dímamfo wǝ bánɔ kenke .
65001006	Bekloma biǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba dímankɛ lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya bǝtǝ mǝ kalɔɔ , nya báni mǝ nsiǝkɔ bo Onanto dítǝ mǝ , nya ókle mǝ lǝ amana ǝsuǝ óto ókpe lǝ ketuntu kamǝ kǝmiǝ kaka úfi mǝ útsyǝ isu eyo Diyi Kplɛ Fɛfɛ nɛ ǝsuǝ boolo mǝ dikpi .
65001007	Bekloma Sodom ku Gomora ku kǝmǝ ka letsyilama mfó ǝsuǝ , ba eto betidi díyifo fe batɔnkpe ba dísiǝ nkpe bua seka ku lǝ sɛsɔnɔdi eto nkpesiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nnya esoo , Onanto dífi ute manlo ótonsǝ mǝ bǝ lǝ iyifo kotonǝnǝ eto bulǝkǝ kate eto ditsyǝbi .
65001008	Nkomǝ ke betidi bamǝ mfo lǝǝnyǝ kǝlǝkǝkate bo lǝtǝ beeyifo lebua kǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kula tsya ǝsuǝ . Bǝǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya beedi etiki kǝńyǝ lǝ kato eto asa nnya nkpé dibu ǝsuǝ .
65001009	Kato eto Ɔtɔnkpe Ninǝ Mikael kula tsya ményifo nko . Lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ ku Obonsam lékpe dinyǝfi lǝ futsyǝ loofo Moses eto ɔkɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Mikael méntsyue Obonsam kɛnyɛ ku aka . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute lǝ uyǝnki okpe fǝ ! ”
65001010	Fɛɛ betidi bamfo eto oklee , lesa nǝ ke eto kasɔ bannɔ koo , baaka nya beekudi katsyese . Nya asa nnya benyi ɛyɛ lǝ kolebe ǝsuǝ fe kase bebuki tsya nyi sekaa , nnya ni lesa nǝ tututu laatsylɔsǝ mǝ nǝ .
65001011	Mbɔbuɛ itǝ mǝ ! Itsyise kusu ko ǝsuǝ Kain lɛyɛɛ , ko ǝsuǝ ke mǝ tsya lɛyɛ nɛ . Lǝ atabi esoo , mǝ tsya lǝ kǝnǝnsɛ ǝsuǝ áyɛ lǝ kusu bua fe Balam ke , bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya bátsylɔsɛ mǝ fe Kora seka ke .
65001012	Lǝ betsya lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ biǝ biedi Bonamute eto didisaa , mǝ afanisa yifoyifo aabiasǝ mi botsya bomǝ . Baate ǝsuǝ nya beedi kemi lǝ kase ke baala ǝsuǝ . Mǝ ǝsuǝ eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ hã ete baabɛbɛ . Bete fe asɔmiloku nnya laanni ɔsɔmi nya ufiebi laasɔ nnya ketsyi kedunko . Nya beyifo fe eyi nnya laannwɔ lǝ nnya lɛwɔfe , nnya díyifo fe béku ku keyudu bákpo lǝ kasɔ nya nyamblɛ kenke díkpǝ ékoe . Nya bente fe befandebi bia nlɛ botsyilama bia Onanto lɛlɔ kalebe útsyǝ útǝ lǝ ketuntu eto ketuntu ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe manlo .
65001013	Beyifo fe ufiebi wǝ laasɔ lǝ lekpo ǝsuǝ nnya yǝǝtǝ mǝ afanisayifoyifo laakpɔ kabe kato fe lekpo eto efukpɔkpɔ seka .
65001014	Betidi bamfo ǝsuǝ Henok wǝ ni Adam eto kafo kuansele eto ubilele dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyɛ útsyǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute ku wǝ batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ akpi akpi ebubǝ .
65001015	Nya ookponko betidi ba kenke lekpo . Ookponko betidi ba leentsyue koto lǝ asa bua nnya kenke béyifo ku lǝ etiki bua nnya betidi ba leentsyue wǝ koto mfo dídi bǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ tsya eso . ”
65001016	Betidi bamfo eedi etiki kawɔnɔnɔ kalo betidi bamba dikpi . Beefi nsusu lǝ asa bua ǝsuǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya bǝǝtǝko mǝ kosate et alasa bua ǝsuǝ , kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya beedi etiki ku kɛnyɛ minimini kawɛ betidi bǝ lǝ bayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝǝnyǝ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔbɛbɛ .
65001017	Fɛɛ mɔ bayimi , bekloma etiki nnya Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto batɔnkpe lɛtɛyi mi lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ .
65001018	Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ eyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ebɔbɔ bǝbǝ bedi etiki bǝkǝmǝ mi nya booyifo lesa saa nǝ baala lǝ Onanto membukabe ǝsuǝ . ”
65001019	Mǝ ni betidi ba laakpe kǝsǝnsǝ lǝ betidi nti , ba ini mǝ ǝsuǝ eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ ete baabɛbɛ , nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lǝmbǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
65001020	Fɛɛ mi , mɔ bayimii , bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝkǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale muǝmuǝ lǝ mi bofokanɔ kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ . Beto ola bɛyɛnko lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
65001021	Bifi mi ǝsuǝ bekpe lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobe bǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ebunyǝ mi kaminsǝ utǝ mi nkpǝ manlo .
65001022	Lǝ nyamfo esoo , binyǝ mba eto bofokanɔ dimǝmuǝ tɔ ale kaminsǝ .
65001023	Bǝtsyuǝ ba nlɛ budufǝ lǝ ute ǝsuǝǝ , binǝ mǝ bilǝkǝ , nya bǝtsyuǝ tsyaa , binyǝ mǝ kaminsǝ , tsya fɛɛ lǝ sikpitete ǝsuǝ . Nya bikisi mǝ ditsyǝbi bua nǝ nte fe ǝsuǝ eto bikǝlɛlɛ bia diyi ku asinsa nnya loofo mi bobiasǝ .
65001024	Nya wǝ nwǝ loofo mi bɔkɔbe kalɛ lǝ wǝ ani nya biemutusǝ bidu bɛnɔɔ , lǝ uyifo mi kɛnkɛ bǝ kabua saa mankɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bisu bɛbɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi .
65001025	Wǝ ni Onanto ɔni kplo wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , diyǝnde , sɛkplɛ , lɛmɔ ku ǝsuǝale itǝ wǝ idu lǝ lefe nǝ léfe , ku mɔmɔ isu manlo ! Ibǝ itǝ .
66001001	Kukue komfo eto asa eyifo asa nnya Onanto dítǝ nkǝ Yesu Kristo lǝkǝ ote beyifoyifo lǝ nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Kristo ǝtǝ Yohanes wǝ ni wǝ uyifoyifo áte nyamfo lǝ lefe nǝ ótsyese Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ ɔflɔ .
66001002	Nya Yohanes lɛtɛyi asa nnya kenke únyǝ . Nyǝ nyamfo ni kɛnyɛ ka ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ ku ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝ Yesu Kristo dílǝkǝ óte .
66001003	Disuǝyuǝ itǝ nwǝ lookla kukue komfo , nya disuǝyuǝ itǝ betidi ba tsya lɔɔnɔ Onanto eto katɛyikǝtsyǝ eto etiki nyamfo nya bootsyue asa nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ kukue komfo koto . Itsyise lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ asa nyamfo luubǝ ebɔfi .
66001004	Mɔ Yohanes uni lɛwɔni kukue komfo minlɛ mi bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa akuanse nnya nkpe lǝ Asia eto lekpake nǝmfo botsyese . Lefonǝ ku diyuǝ nǝ ditsyi Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ mɔmɔ , wǝ dísiǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ , wǝ nsi nlɛ bubǝ , lǝ usiǝko mi lefe nǝ kenke . Nko ke awɔnɔ akuanse nnya ńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ eto ǝnǝmi
66001005	ku Yesu Kristo wǝ ni ɔnukualɛ odansiɛnyǝ wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ tutɛ nya uni kasɔ mfo eto baka kenke eto oka wǝ ntǝkǝ kato eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . Waala bo , nya úlǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ bo abua ǝsuǝ ku wǝ kɔtɔ .
66001006	Nya útsyǝ sekakedikɔ útǝ bo , úyifo bo besumunyǝ lǝ busumu wǝ Onanto ku Anto ǝmǝ . Yesu Kristo eto ale ni diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale idu manlo isu manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
66001007	Bebe ! Utǝkǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ ɔlɛ bubɛ ! Utsyuǝ saa ebunyǝ wǝ ku mba léto wǝ afle kenke tsya . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ebuwi kaminsǝku bembe ku binǝntu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ! Ibǝ itǝ .
66001008	Bonamute Onanto , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ku kaalosǝkɔ , wǝ nkpe mɔmɔ , wǝ lɛkɛ taa ketsyikokɔ , wǝ nsi nlɛ bubǝ . ”
66001009	Mɔ Yohanes , mi ɔyimi wǝ dítǝkǝko Yesu ku mi , nya biakpe utu kakplatsya lǝ disuǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ kǝnyǝ kanyi ka leetu mba ni wǝ sekakedikɔ kamǝ eto bale . Béti mɛ bakpe lǝ kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama baakpo Patmos itsyise mbe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ku ɔnukualɛ wǝ Yesu dílǝkǝ óte eso .
66001010	Lǝ Bonamute eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ áyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ mɛ , ete mínnɔ ɔkɔɛ wǝ léle bembembe fe kakpatsyaku eto kakle lǝ mɔ kama eti .
66001011	Ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , “ Wɔni lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ ǝtsyǝ nya lǝ efi kukue komfo atsyese bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nnya nkpe lǝ kǝmǝnkplɛ ekuanse kamfo . Ke ni Efeso , Smirna , Pergamo , Tiatira , Sardis , Filadelfia , ku Laodikea . ”
66001012	Nya lefe nǝ míntsyi míwunisǝmiǝ lǝ mbe futsyǝ nlɛ mɛ etiki budinkoo , nnyǝ sika sia eto kakandiɛyi ekuanse .
66001013	Nnyǝ lǝ ke nti lesa nǝ lele utidi eto ditsyǝbi nǝ nkpe awukɛntsyɛ nnya dikulǝ ekpo wǝ lǝ nkpato nya seka eto abɔsu nkle wǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi .
66001014	Wǝ disi eto sewɔni eflubi futututu fe osamu eto sele nye olokotuku nya wǝ ǝnǝmi nlɛ buyǝnde fe ute wǝ nlɛ buńyǝ .
66001015	Wǝ nkpato lɛ buyǝnde fe ayiwa nnya bǝlǝkǝ lǝ ute bási lele nya wǝ ɔkɔɛ eto nnya nlɛ bɔbɔ lele ketu eto ntu bo ditsyi koba kato bɔnlɛ boto lǝ ditumbu kasɔ eto kudu .
66001016	Utidi ǝmǝ ákɔbe befandebi bekuanse ɔlɛ lǝ wǝ kodiani . Nya lesiabi nyɛ nnuǝ yayaya lɛbɔ dítsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . Nya wǝ ǝnǝmi kenke nlɛ buyǝnde fe nkɔminti eto kofe .
66001017	Se mínyǝ wǝǝ , ndu nnɔ lǝ wǝ akɔ fe utidi wǝ díkpe . Úfi wǝ kodiani útǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi ! Mɔ ni Ututɛ ku Ɔfɛfɛ .
66001018	Mɔ ni nwǝ nsi nkpe nɛ ! Ńkpe , fɛ mɔmɔɔ , nsi nkpe idu isu manlo manlo . Nkpe ǝsuǝale lǝ ukpe ku bekpenkpe eto kawunsiǝ ǝsuǝ .
66001019	Nyaso wɔni asa nnya fǝnyǝ , asa nnya nkpe mɔmɔ ku nnya luubǝ kama tsya ǝtsyǝ .
66001020	Akulasa nnya nkpe lǝ befandebi akuanse nnya fǝnyǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani ku sika sia eto kakandiɛ eto keyi ekuanse kamǝ ni bǝnkǝ befandebi bekuanse biamǝ ni Onanto batɔnkpe itǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa akuanse nyamǝ . Nya iyi ekuanse nyamǝ ni etsyukpa akuanse nyamǝ . ”
66002001	Mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi mɔ Yohanes nkǝ , “ Wɔni etiki nyamfo atsyese Efeso eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝnkǝ , Mɔ , Yesu , nwǝ nlɛ befandebi bekuanse lǝ kodiani , nya ɔnlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ sika sia eto kakandiɛ eto keyifo ekuanse nti eto etiki ni nnya nlɛ bubǝ mfo nɛ .
66002002	Nnyi keyifo ka fékeyifo , nyi kase fákplatsya ku kase fákpe dibusǝ ku kase fákpe nkɛale fǝnyǝ kanyi . Nnyi miǝ aanla babuyifo tidi eto asa . Áto mba laakpo mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ batɔnkpe abe , fɛɛ benni , nya fǝnyǝ fǝ beyifo badiantidi .
66002003	Nyi miǝ akpe dibusǝ nya fǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ mɔ disi nya ani mánlo fǝ .
66002004	Fɛɛ kabua ka minyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ni bǝnkǝ , ensi anla mɛ mɔmɔ fe kase fákala mɛ kɔ .
66002005	Nyaso kloma kaka fǝtǝkǝ fɛ fáfankli fetsyi ǝsuǝ . Tsyi awuninsǝ lǝ ǝtsyǝ fe kase fǝtsyǝ kɔ . Nya lǝ tsyi awunisǝ lǝ fǝ abua ǝsuǝ , lǝ inni nko muubǝ ntsyi fǝ okandiɛ eto uyi ǝmǝ lǝ wǝ kǝnyǝkɔ
66002006	Fɛɛ nnya ni fǝ afele ni bǝnkǝ , leekisi asa nnya Nikolatia eto betidi leeyifo fe kase mintsya leekisi nya .
66002007	Lǝ akpe atoo , nyalɛ tsyue ato lǝ anɔ lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi . Mba ditǝkǝ kato , muutǝ mǝ kuyi ko lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ ko ńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ɔkpɔ kafo eto eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ miǝ bedi . ”
66002008	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Wɔni kukue komfo atsyese Smirnafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝ , Mɔ , Yesu , wǝ ni ututɛ ku ɔfɛfɛfɛ , wǝ díkpe fɛ usi ótaka útsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , nlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyi minkǝ ,
66002009	Nnyi kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ ko ohiã wǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ sitinti , biyifo batabinyǝ . Nnyi asa bua nnya mba bǝ mǝ ni Yudafɔ fɛ benni Yudafɔɔ , laatɛyi kefi kabiasǝ mi . Bomu beyifo mba nkpe lǝ Obonsam eto ditsyukpa nti .
66002010	Biante kanyi saa ka biǝbǝ bunyǝ sikpi . Bitsyue ato lǝ bǝnɔ . Obonsam eboto mi bǝtsyuǝ obe , utǝ bǝ beti mi bǝtsyuǝ bakpe lǝ aba eto diyo , biunyǝ kanyi itǝ eyi lefosi . Bidi ɔnukualɛ bitǝ mɛ lǝ ibǝ bǝ balo mi kulaa tsya , nya muutǝ mi nkpǝ manlo eto lekankpakpa fe mba dítǝkǝ kato .
66002011	Lǝ bekpe atoo , nyalɛ bɛnɔ lesa nǝ Lǝwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi ! Mba luutǝkǝ lebua kato , embudufǝ lǝ ukpǝ nuǝfǝ manlo manlo ǝsuǝ . ”
66002012	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Wɔni kukue ǝtǝ Pergamo eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe nkǝ , Mɔ , Yesu , wǝ nkpe lesiabi nyɛ nnuǝ yayaya eto etiki ni nkǝ ,
66002013	Nnyi kaka binsi , kaka Obonsam dítsyǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ . Befo mɛ bɛnɔ kekleke . Nya bianyani mi bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ lǝ lefe nǝ bálo Antipa kulaa tsya , wǝ didi mɔ etiki lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ kaka Obonsam nsi .
66002014	Fɛɛ nkpe etiki sɛkɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Bekpé betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mi nti ba ntekeko Balam eto asatete . Utidi ǝmfo ni nwǝ léte Balak kase ɔɔwɛ Israel bebi okpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́wɛ mǝ ókpe bédi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi , nya bédi sɛsɔnɔ .
66002015	Nko kee , mi bǝtsyuǝ tsya ntǝkǝko Nikolatiafɔ eto asatete kama .
66002016	Bisinkli lǝ mi abua kama ! Lenni nkoo , yǝmbɔklɛ muubǝ mi ɔflɔ nya muufi lesiabi nǝ nkpe mɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ nkpɔnko betidi bamfó lema .
66002017	Lǝ bekpe atoo , nyalɛ bɛnɔ lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi . Mba ditǝkǝ katoo , muutǝ mǝ manna eto didisa kulakula nǝmǝ ditsyuǝ . Muutǝ mǝ utsyuǝ saa tsya lebaflubia nǝ ǝsuǝ báwɔni diye fɔfɔ nǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lenyi bǝtǝkǝ enso nwǝ hã léfo ni . ”
66002018	“ Wɔni kukue komfo atsyese Tiatira eto bafokanɔfɔ eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝnkǝ , Kɛnyɛ kamfo etsyi Onanto eto Ubi wǝ eto ǝnǝmi nlɛ bunyǝ fe ute seka , nya wǝ akpa nlɛ buyǝnde fe ayiwa nnya bási ele kɛnkɛ .
66002019	Nyi keyifo ka feyifo . Nyi kase fala mɛ , fǝ bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ ku fǝ kesumu lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ ku dibusǝ nǝ nkpe fǝ , nyi miǝ alɛ bokplatsya mɔmɔ kaso kɔ .
66002020	Fɛɛ nnya minyǝ lǝmbǝ kɔnɔ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ni bǝnkǝ bítǝ usio wǝ baakpo Isabel , wǝ nkǝ uyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kusu ɔnlɛ asa bote mɔ beyifoyifo , kanyansǝ mǝ kusu kedi asɔnɔ , nya beedi edisa nnya béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi .
66002021	Ntǝ wǝ lefe miǝ ɔtsyi ɔwuninsǝ lǝ ɔyɛ abua buyifo , fɛɛ ɔ́ni nkǝ wǝmbɔyɛ wǝ sɛsɔnɔdi .
66002022	Lǝ nnya esoo , muutǝ unyǝ kanyi lǝ wǝ belabeke biamǝ ǝsuǝ nya mba laakpo wǝ ebunyǝ kanyi sitinti . Muuyifo nyamfo nko lǝ bantsyi bawuninsǝ bayɛ asa bua nyamfo buyifo ku wǝ .
66002023	Moolo mba ntǝkǝko wǝ tsya lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke tsya lǝ bate bǝ nyifo nwǝ nyi utsyuǝ saa eto nsusu kǝmiǝ ku wǝ alasa . Moofo utsyuǝ saa kayo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ eyifosa eto kɛnyɛ .
66002024	Fɛɛ mi Tiatirafɔ fɛfɛ ba dímamfo wǝ asatete bua nyamǝ , mimba dímankase wǝ asatete nnya baakpo bǝ Obonsam eto asakulakula nnya eto kǝmiǝ letsyo , bɛnɔ , mensimbutsyisǝ mi bitsyike bamba saa .
66002025	Fɛɛ isu ese lefe nǝ muubǝ , bɛkɔbe lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ kɔni kekleke bɛlɛ .
66002026	Nya mi bǝtsyuǝ ba luutǝkǝ lebua kato nya bɔɔlɛnko nko isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , muutǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale fe kase mímfo mintsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔ . Muutǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale bedi seka lǝ ese ese ǝsuǝ , ‘ Bedi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ku kɔni ale , baba mǝ besense bakpo fe kase baaba ekplibi seka . ’
66002027	
66002028	Muutǝ bǝyǝnde fe kolensiǝnto eto sefandebi ke tsya .
66002029	Lǝ bekpe atoo , nyalɛ bitsyue koto lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi . ”
66003001	“ Wɔni etiki nyamfo atsyese Sardisfɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝnkǝ , Mɔ nwǝ nlɛ Onanto eto awɔnɔ akuanse ku befandebi bekuanse lǝ kɔni nlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ . Nyi keyifo ka fanlɛ buyifo , nyi miǝ afo diye bǝ esi nkpǝ , fɛɛ ebukpǝ fɛ fanyɛ !
66003002	Nyaso taka lǝ akpe ǝsuǝ nkɛale fɛ lǝ ekpe alo kenke . Itsyise nyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo miǝ nnya fékeyifo mamflɔ tɔ elo lǝ mɔ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
66003003	Nyaso kloma lesa nǝ báte fǝ ku lesa nǝ fánɔ , tsyue nnya koto lǝ etsyi fǝ nkpǝ awunisǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ ǝmansankli atsyi awuninsǝǝ , muubǝ fǝ ɔflɔ fe uyu seka , nya fǝmbote lefe nǝ muubǝ .
66003004	Fɛɛ betidi esiani lǝ mi nti lǝ Sardis ebu ba dímanansǝ tɔ mǝ awu . Bookpe awu flubia bǝtǝkǝko mɛ , itsyise mǝ dińyǝ itǝ bǝ beyifo mɔ bale .
66003005	Utsyuǝ saa ke luutǝkǝ lebua kato , okpe awu flubia fe mǝ kee , membulǝkǝ wǝ aye lǝ mba nsi nkpǝ eto kukue komǝ kafo . Muudi wǝ adansiɛ lǝ mɔ Anto ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke eto ǝnǝmi miǝ uyifo mɔ bale .
66003006	Lǝ bekpe atoo , nyalɛ bitsyue koto lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi . ”
66003007	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Wɔni nyamfo atsyese Filadelfia eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝnkǝ , Nwǝmfo eyifo ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ nya wǝ ditiki eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Wǝ nlɛ Oka David eto ǝsuǝale eto safui sia lǝ ɔsini siku sitsyuǝǝ , kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ wǝ loofo se buti . Nya lǝ uti see , kuutsyuǝ saa embofo se bɔsini .
66003008	Nyi keyifo ka feeyifo . Nyi miǝ akpé ǝsuǝale sɛkɛ tsya , áfo mɔ asatete nya fámani mɛ . Nsini kusu ntsyǝ fǝ sɛtɔ ko kuutsyuǝ saa lǝmbofo buti .
66003009	Lɔ abe ! Betidi bǝtsyuǝ kpe ba nkpe lǝ Obonsam eto ditsyukpa ǝsuǝ nya baakpo mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ Yudafɔ , fɛɛ benni Yudafɔ , badia beni . Muuyifo mǝ bǝbǝ base akonki lǝ fǝ akɔ . Muutǝ mǝmblɛ te bǝ maala fǝ .
66003010	Nya se bitsyue mɔ etiki koto , nya bíńyǝ kekleke bínyǝ kanyi saa eto okloe esoo , muulǝkǝ mi ntsyiko lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ eto bulǝ kekleke eto lefe nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ǝsuǝ ka buufi bato kasɔ mfo eto betidi kenke babe .
66003011	Nlɛ bubǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Bɛkɔbe lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ lǝ kɔni bɛlɛ kekleke bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embɔlɛ lesa nǝ ni mi kayofofo ofo .
66003012	Muuyifo nwǝ luutǝkǝ kato , oseke lǝ mɔ Onanto eto Disumuyo eto diyo . Uńyǝ mfó lefe nǝ kenke nya bembudi wǝ bewui kulefe . Mɔɔwɔni mɔ Onanto eto diye ku mɔ Onanto eto umǝnkplɛ , Yerusalem fɔfɔ , wǝ lɔɔbɔ utsyi mɔ Onanto ɔflɔ kato ubǝ kasɔ ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ . Mɔɔwɔni mɔ diye fɔfɔ tsya ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ .
66003013	Lǝ bekpe atoo , nyalɛ bɛnɔ lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa bɔtɛyi . ”
66003014	Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Wɔni ǝtǝ Laodikea eto bafokanɔfɔ eto Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe fǝnkǝ , Nwǝ ni ibǝ itǝ wǝ ni nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ku nwǝ laatɛyi Onanto eto ɔnukualɛɛ , wǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ Onanto díyifo asa nnya kenkee , eto etiki ni bǝ ,
66003015	Nyi keyifo ka féyifo nya minyi miǝ ǝmǝnyuǝ nya famamfo ute tsya . Fɛɛ eni nla miǝ yuǝ nye fo ute .
66003016	Fɛɛ se feyifo lentilenti , fǝmǝnyuǝ nye famamfo ute esoo , muutufǝ fǝ nwui lǝ mɔ kɛnyɛ .
66003017	Aatɛyi fǝ , ‘ Otabinyǝ mini , bike kpé mɛ nya kulesa manhiã mɛ . ’ Fɛɛ enyi fǝ uminsǝtidi ku ohiãfɔ , utidi wǝ dimamflɔ , unǝmba ku nwǝ nyɛ leyaleya feni .
66003018	Nyaso nlɛ fǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ minkǝ ya sika sia lɛlɛkɛ , sia báyinklisǝ lǝ ute etsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ afiani otabinyǝ , ya kafia flubia lǝ eti bǝ lǝ ayɛ leya bɔyɛ kakpe fǝ ǝsuǝ kofani . Ya ǝnǝmi eto afa akpo lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ǝnyǝ asa kukɔnɔ .
66003019	Betidi ba maalaa , mǝ mǝǝyǝnki kakpe kǝnǝ koto nɛ . Nyaso fo ute lǝ akɔse atsyi lɛkɔɛsi awunisǝ lǝ fǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
66003020	Nɔɔ ! Nńyǝ lǝ kesie nlɛ siku bɔsɔ . Lǝ utsyuǝ anɔ mɔ ɔkɔɛ nya ɔsini mɛ sikuu , muudufǝ wǝ diyo nya bonko wǝ lookpe kɔni lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni budi lesa .
66003021	Utsyuǝ saa ke lɛkpɔ utǝkǝ lebua kato , muutǝ kusu usiǝ lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ lǝ kaka minsi lǝ mɔ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ , fe kase míntǝkǝ kato nya minsi lǝ mɔ Anto eto lekankpomɛ ɔflɔ seka .
66003022	Lǝ bekpe ato , nyalɛ bɛnɔ lesa nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bɔtɛyi . ”
66004001	Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , nsi nyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ nya mínyǝ siku sia básini bǝtsyǝ leya lǝ Onanto eto . Nya mfó mínɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bole fe kakpatsyaku nsi nlɛ bufǝ katɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Bǝ kato mfo , lǝ nlǝkǝ nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ kama nte fǝ . ”
66004002	Lamfolamfo , Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ áyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ mɛ nya mínyǝ lekankpomɛ ditsyuǝ kato mfó nǝ ǝsuǝ utsyǝ nsi .
66004003	Nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ lǝ buyǝnde fe yaspa ku sardis eto aba nnya lefo koya nya kɔlɛsensǝ ko nlɛ buyǝnde fe emeralda eto leba seka létsyilama lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ .
66004004	Bétsyue akankpomɛ awosi ǝnuǝ ana tsya nya létsyilama lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ , nya beninɛ fosi ǝnuǝ ana tsya ba nkpe awuflubia , nya benti sika sia eto akankpakpa nsi lǝ akpomɛ nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
66004005	Nya ofamfa ku ɔsitoto eto kɔsɔ lɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Atɛ akuanse nlɛ bunyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ . Nyamfo ni Onanto eto awɔnɔ akunse nyamǝ nɛ .
66004006	Nya lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ akpa wuee , fe lekpo befi ahũhuɛ beyifo . Asayifoyifo nya nkpe nkpǝ , nya dikǝ ǝnǝmi kpenkpenkpe sɛtɔ ku kama , ńyǝ etsyilama lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto akpake nnya ta kenke
66004007	Etutɛ ále tsyata . Ǝnuǝfǝ ale ɔtrɔmu . Ǝtsyǝfǝ kpe ǝnǝmi fe utidi . Nya anale ale kɔlikpo ko nlɛ bufunini .
66004008	Asa nnya nkpe mfó eto ǝsuǝ saa kpe mbamba akua akua , nya ǝnǝmi diyi nnya etsyilama kalebe saa , nya ɛnlɛ ese busǝ lefe saa katɛyi nkǝ , “ Kɛnkɛ , kɛnkɛ , kɛnkɛ ni Bonamute Onanto wǝ ni ǝsuǝalenyǝ lefe nǝ ta , wǝ nsi nkpe mɔmɔ , wǝ dísiǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ , wǝ nsi nlɛ bubǝ . ”
66004009	Asa nnya nsi nkpe mfó eese atɛsɛ , dibu ku lɛninsɔ eto ese itǝ nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa isu lefe saa .
66004010	Lǝ beyifo nkoo , beninǝ fosi ǝnuǝ ǝna bamǝ aataka kakpoo kasɔ lǝ nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ eto ǝnǝmi kesumu wǝ ke ni nwǝ nsi nkpe itǝ lefe manlo manlo nya bǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ akankpakpa kǝtsyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ kese ese katɛyi nkǝ ,
66004011	“ Bonamute ku bo Onanto ! Fǝ dińyǝ itǝ atɛsɛ ku dibu ku ǝsuǝale . Itsyise fǝ diyifo asa nnya ta kenke , nya fǝtǝ fǝ mǝmblǝ siǝ nkpǝ bo lɛflɔ lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
66005001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ kukue kutsyuǝ ko bǝkǝnǝ ko nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ nlɛ lǝ wǝ kodiani . Báwɔni asa lǝ ko lekpake nǝ ku nnɛ , nya béfi sitǝ eto etinsa beti ko kɛnyɛ lǝ akpa akuanse .
66005002	Mfó mínyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kplɛ utsyuǝ wǝ léto ɔkɔɛ bembembe ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni nwǝ dińyǝ utǝ bǝ ufǝ sitǝ eto etinsa siamǝ lǝ ɔsini kukue komfo ? ”
66005003	Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ kutsyuǝ saa lǝ kato lee kasɔ lee lǝ ɔkɔmǝ wǝ loofo kukue komǝ bɔsini lǝ obe ko kafo .
66005004	Nwi keku tinti se bámfo kutsyuǝ saa bunyǝ wǝ díńyǝ utǝ bǝ umǝnkli ko lǝ okla .
66005005	Mfó ǝmǝ nya beninǝ bamǝ eto ɔni lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Mensiwi keku . Bee ! Yesu wǝ baakpo Tsyata wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ Yuda eto kusǝ , ɔkplɛnyǝ wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu , wǝ dítǝkǝ kato , wǝ dińyǝ utǝ bǝ ɔsini sitǝ eto etinsa akpa akuanse nya béfi béti kukue komǝ eto kɛnyɛ nɛ . ”
66005006	Lǝ nnya kamaa , nnyǝ Lesamubi nǝ nńyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto ntinti , nya asa ana nnya nsi nkpe mfó ǝmǝ létsyilama wǝ ku beninǝ bamǝ . Nya íyifo fe bolo bálo lesamubi nǝmǝ . Aakpɛ akuanse ńyǝ ni lǝ disi ku ǝnǝmi akuanse , nya ni Onanto eto awɔnɔ akuanse nnya bátsyese kawunsiǝ kamǝ kenke .
66005007	Lesamubi nǝmǝ ésu ófo kukue ko nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ nlɛ lǝ wǝ kodiani .
66005008	Kase ófo kukue komǝǝ , asa ana nnya nsi nkpe nyamǝ ku beninǝ fosiǝnuǝ ena bamǝ ákpo kasɔ lǝ lesamubi nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Mǝ utsyuǝ saa lɛ osanku ku sika eto ɔkpɛ lǝ kɔni . Kakpɛ kamǝ éyi ku lufui nnya ni Onanto eto betidi ba lefo banɔ eto olatoto .
66005009	Bése kusǝ fɔfɔ ko nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Aflɔ ǝtǝ bǝ afo kukue komǝ , nya bǝ lǝ efe sitǝ eto etinsa ekuanse sia nti lǝ kukue komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Itsyise bálo fǝ , nya ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ bufi kǝtǝ kedi eto ukpe ǝsuǝǝ , áfó betidi kpǝ eto disi eto kayo ǝtǝ Onanto . Betidi bamfo etsyi ese ese , bele bele , nsɔ nsɔ , ku kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke .
66005010	Éyifo mǝ báfiani besumunyǝ eto sekakedikɔ ba leesumu bo Onanto , nya boodi seka lǝ kasɔ kamfo . ”
66005011	Nya se minsi mímbe , nnyǝ kato eto batɔnkpe akpi , akpi ku awo , awo ba lǝmbǝ leklabii , ńyǝ batsyilama lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ku asa ana nnya nkpe nkpǝ nyamǝ ku beninǝ bamǝ .
66005012	Nya banlɛ ese busǝ bembembe bǝnkǝ , “ Lesamubi nǝ bálo ǝńyǝ ditǝ bǝ , lɛkɛ ǝsuǝale , setabikɛ , kobe , bofobuyifo , dibu , diyǝnde ku atɛsǝ . ”
66005013	Nya mínɔ se asa nnya kenke Onanto díyifo nkpe kato ku kasɔ mfo , kasɔ kǝmiǝ ku lekpo kafo ku asa nnya kenke nsi nkpǝ nlɛ ese busǝ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomǝ ǝsuǝ ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ , mǝ mbǝ atɛsǝ , dibu , diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale idu manlo isu manlo . ”
66005014	Nya asa ana nnya nsi nkpǝ léfo bátanɔ bǝ , “ Ibǝ itǝ . ” Nya beninǝ bamǝ lékpo lǝ kasɔ , nya bésumu Onanto ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ .
66006001	Nya mínyǝ se Lesamubi nǝmǝ dífǝ sitǝ eto etinsa tutɛ nyamǝ ɔ́sini kukue komǝ nya mínnɔ se asa ana nnya nsi nkpǝ eto ani léto ɔkɔɛ íkumi fe ofamfa seka ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ”
66006002	Mbe , nya mínyǝ ɔtɔmli flubia utsyuǝ . Nwǝ nsi lǝ wǝ lɛ sifie lǝ kɔni nya bǝtǝ wǝ lekankpakpa ditsyuǝ . Úsiǝ lǝ wǝ nya ɔ́bɔ fe omamanyǝ wǝ lǝǝtǝkǝ kato ntɔ kato kǝtǝkǝkɔ .
66006003	Nnya kamaa , Lesamubi nǝmǝ ǝfǝ lɛsini sitǝ eto etinsa eto etinsa nuǝfǝ nyamǝ nya mínnɔ asa ana nnya nsi nkpǝ eto unuǝfǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ”
66006004	Nya ɔtɔmini bamba wǝ lɛsɛ lɛbɔ úbǝ . Bǝtǝ nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ unǝ lema oboko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝ balo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Bǝtǝ wǝ lesiabi nyɛ nuǝ nǝ lɛmɔ .
66006005	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Lesamubi nǝmǝ ǝfǝ sitǝ eto etinsa tsyǝfǝ nyamǝ nti lǝ wǝ kukue komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Mfó mínɔ se asa ana nnya nsi nkpǝ eto ǝtsyǝfǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ” Nya se mímbee , nnyǝ ɔtɔmini naa bamba nya nwǝ nsi lǝ wǝ lɛ nseni lǝ kɔni .
66006006	Nnɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ wǝ nte fe bɔbɔ ɔ́bɔ utsyi lǝ asa nnya nsi nkpǝ ɔflɔ wǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kamɔ eto ɔkpɛ tɔ itǝ diyi lɔni eto kayofofo nya antabi eto ɛkpɛ itsyǝ ńyǝ itǝ diyi eto kayofofo . Fɛɛ mambiasǝ nnuǝbi ku wain eto eyi nnya ńyǝ mfó ! ”
66006007	Nya kama nnya Lesamubi nǝmǝ dífǝ sitǝ eto etinsa nale . Nya mínɔ asa nnya nsi nkpǝ eto anale didi etiki ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ”
66006008	Lǝ mbe mfó , nnyǝ miǝ ɔtɔmini wǝ nte fe ntɔ eto ditsyǝbi nńyǝ . Baakpo nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ wǝ bǝ ukpe . Nya utidi bamba tsya tǝkǝko wǝ kama baakpo ɔkɔmǝ . Bǝtǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ balo kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto lekpa nale , ɛyɛ lǝ lema , kukpɛnsɛ , bufi ku ɛyɛ lǝ bebutubuki ba lǝǝmuǝ betidi ǝsuǝ .
66006009	Se Lesamubi nǝmǝ dífǝ sitǝ eto etinsa nɔnde , ńyǝ awɔnɔ ǝtsyuǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto lǝba nǝmǝ kalɔ , mba bálo eto awɔnɔ , se bǝbǝ Onanto eto leba nǝmǝ kalɔ , mǝ ni mba bálo se bábé Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya nya bédi ni ɔnukualɛ eso .
66006010	Awɔnɔ nyamǝ áfã bembebe ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , eni ǝsuǝalenyǝ kenke , ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ ku ɔnukualɛnyǝ . Nte lefe nǝ eto lefe ko , fookponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo , ǝnǝ mba lélo bo koto ? ”
66006011	Bǝtǝ mǝ utsyuǝ saa awu flubia kɛntsyɛ ókpe , nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ besi babe mǝ kusu sɛkɛ isu ese lefe nǝ eto lefe bálo mǝ beyifotsyuǝ ku mǝ bayimi eto sitiditu kenke balosǝ fe kase bálo mǝ tsya .
66006012	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ se Lesamubi nǝmǝ difǝ sitǝ eto etinsa lǝ lekpa kuande ǝsuǝ , kawunsiǝ kenke étinkǝ kekleke , nya kofe lɛyɛ bofa nya lesa saa lena sũũ fe kafia na , nya kofande lɛsɛ hǝǝ fe kɔtɔ .
66006013	Befandebi , álo bitsyi kato bibǝ bɛsɔ kasɔ fe kase eyibibi mambemambe laalo kakpo lǝ kasɔ lǝ ufiebi asɔ kekleke .
66006014	Difule ánya lamfolamfo fe kase bǝǝkǝnǝ kukue seka nya kɔtini saa ku kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama lɛnyi lǝ nyǝnkɔ .
