66006015	Mfó nya kawunsiǝ eto baka , Aba bamamanyǝ ninǝ , batabinyǝ ku bǝsuǝalenyǝ , ku betidi ba kenke , ndomufɔ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ , difi mǝ ǝsuǝ bákula lǝ ǝbiǝku ku abanse kalɔ ku lǝ atini ǝsuǝ .
66006016	Báfa bákpadi atini ku abanse bǝ , “ Beba bekpo bo lǝ ǝsuǝ biti bo bekpe itsyi lǝ nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ eto ǝnǝmi ku lǝ Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto lɛblɔfi eto ǝnǝmi .
66006017	Itsyise Onanto ku Lesamubi bamǝ eto lǝblɔfi eto diyi nǝmǝ eboyo ! Nya owoe loofo bunyǝ lǝ nnya ǝnǝmi ? ”
66007001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , ńnyǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ena bǝtsyuǝ ba nyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto esi ana nyamǝ ba lɛkɔbe kefiebi ǝna kamǝ banlɛ , beti kefiebi kamǝ bǝ kayɛ bɔsɔ lǝ kasɔ , lǝ lekpo nye lǝ eyi ǝsuǝ .
66007002	Nya minsi minyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ kofekatokɔ ɔnlɛ kato bobe , nya Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ eto lekpotsyǝsa ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ . Onanto ditǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ beyifo lesafimfi kasɔ ku lekpo ,
66007003	nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bienyifo lesafimfi kasɔ , lekpo nye eyi saa , isu eyo lefe nǝ buufi sitǝ eto etinsa butsyǝ Onanto eto beyifoyifo eto nto lekpo . ”
66007004	Nya bátɛyi mɛ bǝnkǝ betidi ba béfi Onanto eto sitǝ eto etinsa bǝtsyǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ nto eto leklabi ebuyifo betidi akpi kolofa awosi ana ana ( 144,000 ) . Betidi bamfo étsyi Israel eto lefosi mfo nuǝ kafo .
66007005	Betidi lefosi akpi ǝnuǝ étsyi Israel eto kafo ǝsuǝ . Mǝ ni Yuda , Ruben , Gad , Aser , Naftali , Manase , Simeon , Lewi , Isakar , Sebulon , Yosef ku Benyamin .
66007006	
66007007	
66007008	
66007009	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , ńyǝ sitiditu kplɛ ditsyuǝ nǝ eto betidi kuutsyuǝ lembofo bokla ! Betsyi kasɔ saa , ese saa , bele tɛyi tɛyi saa , betidi betidi saa eto okle , nya bǝnyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi , nya bankpe awuflubia , nya banlɛ bekabe lǝ ani .
66007010	Nya báfa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bofokǝtǝ etsyi Boanto Onanto wǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ ɔflɔ ! ”
66007011	Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke bǝńyǝ batsyilama lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ku beninǝ bamǝ ku asa ana nyamǝ , nya batɔnkpe bǝmǝ difusǝ ǝnǝmii kasɔ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi , besumu Onanto ,
66007012	katɛyi nkǝ , “ Ibǝ itǝ ! Atɛsǝ , diyǝnde , kobe , lɛninsɔ , dibu , ǝsuǝale ku kakplɛkɔ lǝ idi bo Onanto ǝmǝ eto ale idu manlo isu manlo ! Ibǝ itǝ ! ”
66007013	Beninǝ bamǝ eto ɔni átɔ mɛ nkǝ , “ Bawoe ni betidi ba nkpe awu flubia kɛntsyɛ mfo ? Nya se bétsyi ? ”
66007014	Mfó nya mintɛyi mǝ miǝ , “ Bonamute , minnyi . Fǝ nyi . ” Mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Mba mfó ni betidi ba dínyǝ kanyi kekleke fɛ bábɔ báfe . Bǝflǝ mǝ awu éle futufutu lǝ Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ .
66007015	Nyasoo , bǝǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lekakpomɛ nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi kesumu wǝ ketsye ku kakɔmi lǝ wǝ Disumuyo . Itsyise nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ebota mǝ disi lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
66007016	Kukpɛnsɛ nye utukuɛ esi ǝmbɔlɛ mǝ kulefe . Nya kofe nye utefofo saa ensiembufi mǝ .
66007017	Itsyise Lesamubi nǝ nkpe lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto ntinti mfóo , ebɔlɛ mǝ ola , obe mǝ . Wookpa mǝ ɔyɛnko usuko kaka nkpǝ eto ntu bo laayifǝ lefe saa nkpe . Nya Onanto tsya lɔɔsi mǝ binǝntu saa lǝ ǝnǝmi . ”
66008001	Se Lesamubi nǝmǝ dífǝ sitǝ eto etinsa sia nti lǝ lekpa kuansele ǝsuǝǝ , ídi kanana lǝ kato itǝ fe lebombosɔsɔ eto kutsyǝ .
66008002	Nnya kamaa , nnyǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ekuanse ba lǝǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , nya útǝ mǝ nkpatsyaku nkuanse .
66008003	Nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba wǝ lɛlɛ sika sia eto dikplibi nǝ kafo baatonsǝ lufui kɔnii , lɛbɔ úńyǝ lǝ leba nǝ ǝsuǝ bǝǝtǝ kedi ɔflɔ . Bǝtǝ wǝ lufui kpǝ bǝ ufi ɔkɔ ku Onanto eto betidi ba kenke eto olatoto ǝsuǝ lǝ ufi utǝ kedi lǝ sika sia eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba nǝ ńyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
66008004	Se banlɛ lufui nǝmǝ botonsǝǝ , ni kuyuǝ ko nlɛ boto kabɔ lǝ dikplibi nǝmǝ kafo ákɔ ku Onanto eto betidi eto olatoto ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi eto ani isu Onanto ɔflɔ .
66008005	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ǝlǝkǝ ute lǝ Disumuyo eto leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ úfi úyisǝ lufui eto dikplibi nǝmǝ nya úsǝ wǝ ókpo lǝ kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Se úyifo nkoo , nnɔ se kato díkumi bembembe , nya kato léto ɔsi , nya kasɔ dítinkǝ .
66008006	Mfó nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe ekuanse ba nlɛ nkpatsyaku dímuǝ ǝsue bǝ beefǝ mǝ nkpatsyaku bomǝ .
66008007	Onato eto ɔtɔnkpe tutɛ ǝmǝ éfe wǝ kakpatsyaku . Lamfolamfo , etubankli ku ute wǝ létsyaka ku kɔtɔ ábɔ ékpo lǝ kasɔ nya étonsǝ kawunsiǝ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ , nya eyi eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ léto . Fɛɛ sefaa , semblɛ kenke áto .
66008008	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe nuǝfǝ tsya éfe wǝ kakpatsyaku . Nya lesa nǝ lele kɔtini kplɛ ko nlɛ ute bunyǝ lɛbɔ nya báto ko bákpe lǝ lekpo kǝmiǝ . Nya lekpo eto ntu bomǝ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ léfiani kɔtɔ .
66008009	Nya akpɛ ku bebuki ba nkpe lǝ ntu bomǝ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ kenke díkpe . Nya ntu eto efue nnya ntǝkǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ lébia .
66008010	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe tsyǝfǝ éfe wǝ kakpatsyaku . Mfó nya sefandebi kplɛ sitsyuǝ sia nlɛ ute bunyǝ fe lɛtɛ léfankli sitsyi kato sídufǝ lǝ ntu bo laabɔdi ku mbo ni ntuyifǝyifǝ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ .
66008011	Baakpo sefandebi siamǝ bǝ Kalokatakata . Ntu eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ áfiani ntu bo nkpe kalo , nya betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ díkpǝ itsyise bǝnǝ ntu bomǝ eso .
66008012	Mfó nya ɔtɔnkpe nale dífǝ wǝ kakpatsyaku . Ítǝ bǝ kofe eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ , kofande eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ ku befandebi eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ , nnya ǝtsyuǝ saa eto diyǝnde eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ áni . Lǝ nyaso ketsye ku diyi eto lekpasǝ nǝ laakɛ eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ áni .
66008013	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , se minyǝ minlɛ bobe , ńnyǝ kɔlikpo kplɛ kutsyuǝ se kɔnlɛ bufunini kato fanlo , kafe katɛyi ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe katɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbɔbɔɛ , mbɔbɔɛ , mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ betidi ba luubu besiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe fɛfɛ itsyǝ ba luubu luufe mǝ nkpatsyaku ntsyǝ bomǝ . ”
66009001	Mfó Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe nɔnde dífe wǝ kakpatsyaku . Nya mínyǝ sefandebi sitsyuǝ ditsyi kato síbǝ sɛsɔ lǝ kasɔ , nya béfi ukpe kǝmiǝ eto dibiǝ nǝ lena sũũ eto safui bǝtǝ se .
66009002	Sɛsini ukpe kǝmiǝ eto dibiǝ kplɛ nǝmfo nya kuyuǝ ko nte fe ditefɛnku ǝsuǝ kɔ́bɔ kutsyii , díti kofe eto ǝnǝmi ku ko diyǝnde itǝ difule kenke lena sũũ lǝ kuyuǝ ko lɛbɔ kutsyi lǝ dikpǝmbiǝ nǝmǝ eso .
66009003	Bekpese áló betsyi kuyuǝ komǝ ǝsuǝ bǝbǝ bákpo lǝ kasɔ nya Onanto dítǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale fe bakpoe ba laata seka .
66009004	Bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , bambiansǝ afanto nye seefa nye kuyi saa enso betidi ba Onanto dímǝntǝkǝ mǝ leba lǝ mǝ nto .
66009005	Bǝtǝ bekpese bamǝ kusu bǝ bate betidi bamǝ ohiã itǝ afa anɔ , fɛɛ banlo mǝ . Lǝ bata utidi , yeefi fe kanyi ka fuunyǝ lǝ okpoe ata utidi seka .
66009006	Lǝ afa anɔ nyamfo nti , bɔɔbɛbɛ ukpe bǝ beekpe , fɛɛ bembunyǝ wǝ bekpe . Boola bǝ beekpe , fɛɛ ukpe ebutsyetsyi udu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
66009007	Bekpese bamǝ eto ditsyǝbi te fe batɔmli ba léto akpatsya itǝ lema bɔkpɔ . Béti mǝ akpakpa nnya lele sika sia eto akankpakpa lǝ mǝ esi . Nya mǝ ǝnǝmi lele betidi eto ǝnǝmi .
66009008	Mǝ disi eto sewɔni ekulǝ fe besio eto sele , nya mǝ anyi lele tsyata eto ale .
66009009	Nya béfi asa ǝtsyuǝ nnya nte fe bitu eto awu nnya leeti lɛkɔɛsibi bákpe . Kudu ko nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi lǝ mǝ mbamba ǝsuǝ ale nkeke bo batɔmini lǝǝnǝ kpǝ bo batɔmini nlɛ bunǝ bantɔnko lǝ lema .
66009010	Bekpese bamfo kpé kǝkǝ ku kabé bo laata fe okpoe eto ale , nya bankpe ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ kǝkǝ ǝsuǝ boofo bufi keyifo utidi lesafimfi itǝ afa anɔ .
66009011	Bakpé Oka wǝ nlɛ seka budi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ni ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nsi lǝ ukpe eto dibiǝ eto kɛnyɛ mfó . Wǝ diye ni Abadon lǝ Sihibri ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ Sigriki ǝsuǝ , Apolion eto kasɔ ni nwǝ laabiasǝ asa .
66009012	Kanyinyǝnyǝ kplɛ tutɛ ébubǝ káfe . Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnuǝ bamba si bɔlɛ bubǝ .
66009013	Nnya kama , nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kuande dífǝ wǝ kakpatsyaku . Nya mínɔ se ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ sika sia eto Disumuyo eto leba nǝ ńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
66009014	Ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ átɛyi Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kuande ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Benyankli batɔnkpe ena ba bákle bǝtsyǝ lǝ Ketukplɛ Frate ɔflɔ ! ”
66009015	Mfo báyankli batɔnkpe ena bamǝ . Bálɔ mǝ bǝtsyǝ nya bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ lebombosɔsɔ nǝmǝ , diyi nǝnǝ , kofa komǝ ku lɛlɛ nǝmǝ bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ balo kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ .
66009016	Bátɛyi mɛ bǝ bamamanyǝ ba nsi lǝ batɔmli dimuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnyǝ itǝ lema bɔkpɔ eto utu . Beyifo awo alofa ǝnuǝ .
66009017	Nya lǝ ǝnǝtǝtǝ eto kǝlǝkǝkate eto bunyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ batɔmli bamǝ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Bakpe lɛkɔɛsibi eto bitu eti awu nya nlɛ buyǝnde fe ute eto lɛsɛbi seka ku safir eto leba eto diyǝndebi ku ǝtsyuǝ lɛsɛ fe dikusɛmfɔ eto kasiakɔ seka . Batɔmli bamǝ eto esi eyifo fe tsyata eto disi seka , nya ute kuyuǝ ku ute ku etenkli eto aba nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyiko lǝ mǝ nnyɛ .
66009018	Nya kanyinyǝnyǝ eto akpa ǝtsyǝ nyamfo , ini ute , kuyuǝ ku ute eto leba nǝ ditsyi lǝ batɔmli bamfo eto nnyɛ lelo kawunsiɛ eto betidi eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ kenke .
66009019	Batɔmli eto ǝsuǝale nyamfo ábɔ itsyi lǝ mǝ nnyɛ ku mǝ kǝkǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ kǝkǝ eyifo fe bawa ku esi nnya beefi keyifo betidi asafimfi .
66009020	Betidi fɛfɛ ba kenke dímenkpe ɛyɛ lǝ kanyi kamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ménsinkle lǝ asa nnya mǝ kosate dífi ani béyifo eto busumu kama . Bénsinkli lǝ awɔnɔ bua , sika sia ku sika flubia , bitu sia , abambi ku eyi nnya báwoe , nnya lǝǝnnyǝ , laanyɛ nye laannɔ eto busumu kama .
66009021	Bántsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ mǝ betidilolo , asabɔtɔkanɔ , sɛsɔnɔdi ku mǝ kuyu ǝsuǝ .
66010001	Nnya kamaa , nnyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kplɛ utsyuǝ wǝ lɛyifǝ utsyi kato úbǝ kasɔ . Okpe lǝ difule ǝsuǝ nya kɔlɛsensǝ letsyilama wǝ lǝ disi . Wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛ buyǝnde fe kofe seka nya wǝ akpa nte fe ute eto ala nnya ńyǝ kasɔ .
66010002	Ɔlɛ kukue kɛkɛ kutsyuǝ ko básini lǝ kɔni . Úfi wǝ kodianikpa útǝkǝ lǝ lekpo ǝsuǝ , nya úfi wǝ kǝmǝnikpa útǝkǝ lǝ kasɔ ǝsuǝ .
66010003	Mfo nya óto ɔkɔɛ bembembe fe tsyata seka . Nya se ófã nkoo , bánɔ bukumi sekuanse eto ɔkuɛ kato .
66010004	Lefe nǝ mínɔ bukumi bomfoo , nla lǝ nwɔni asa nnya mínɔ ntsyǝ . Fɛɛ nnɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi kato lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ti akulasa nnya bukumi sekuanse siamǝ lɛtɛyi ǝtsyǝ , manwɔni nnya ǝtsyǝ . ”
66010005	Ete mínyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nńyǝ lǝ kasɔ ku lekpo ǝsuǝ lébesǝ wǝ kodiani kato .
66010006	Nya óka ntamu lǝ Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa , wǝ díyifo kato ku nnya nkpe kasɔ mfo ku asa nnya nkpe lǝ ke , lekpo ku asa nnya nkpe lǝ ni eto diye ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe biasǝbiasǝ saa ensibǝ .
66010007	Nya lǝ ɔtɔnkpe kuansele ǝmǝ efe wǝ kakpatsyaku koo , ete Onanto eto ketsyue kulakula ka bábe letsya bǝtǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba ni wǝ beyifoyifo ebubǝ itǝ . ”
66010008	Lǝ nnya kamaa , ɔkɔɛ wǝ ditsyi kato dídinko mɛ etiki esi ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Su afo kukue kɛkɛ ko básini bǝtsyǝ nkpe lǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nńyǝ lǝ lekpo ku kasɔ ǝsuǝ eto kɔni . ”
66010009	Mfó nya mínsu ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya míntɛyi wǝ minkǝ ufi kukue kɛkɛ komɛ utǝ mɛ . Ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Fo lǝ ayimi ko . Kɔɔkɛ kalo lǝ fǝ kafo , fɛɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ kɔɔkɛ kamini fe bablɔ seka . ”
66010010	Mmfo kukue kɛkɛ komǝ lǝ wǝ kɔni , nya míyimi ko , nya kɔkɛ kamuni fe bablɔ lǝ mɔ kɛnyɛ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ mímmini ko mínlosǝǝ , kɔkɛ kalo lǝ mɔ kafo kǝmiǝ .
66010011	Lǝ nnya kamaa , ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ átɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ esi abe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ǝtǝ ese kpǝ , betidi kpǝ , bele bele ku baka kpǝ . ”
66011001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto éfi uyi wǝ lele nwǝ beefi kesusu asa utǝ mɛ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Su esusu mɔ kedikǝtǝkɔ ku leba nǝ ǝsuǝ bǝǝtǝ kedi ku lǝ akla betidi ba nlɛ busumu lǝ kedikǝtekɔ mfó .
66011002	Fɛɛ mensusu diyo nǝmǝ eto lekpata , itsyise béfi mfo bǝtǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ . Mǝ lǝǝbǝ botaka kǝńyǝ lǝ umǝ kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ afa fosi ana afa ǝnuǝ .
66011003	Mootsyese mɔ badansiɛ inuǝ ba lɔɔkɛ lǝ nkumfia ǝsuǝ babé mɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya itǝ eyi kɔkpi alofa ǝnuǝ awosi akua ( 1,260 ) nyamfó . ”
66011004	Bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi inuǝ bamfo ni nnuǝbi eto eyi ǝnuǝ ku kakandiɛyi inuǝ nnya ńyǝ lǝ kawunsiɛ eto Onamute eto ǝnǝmi nɛ .
66011005	Lǝ utsyuǝ ala nkǝ weeyifo mǝ kabuaa , ute aabɔ ketsyi lǝ mǝ nnyɛ katsylɔsǝ mǝ . Nyaso utidi wǝ ke laala nkǝ weeyifo mǝ kabuaa , kusu komfo ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ balo wǝ nɛ .
66011006	Bakpe ǝsuǝale baafo ɔsɔmi kusu buti bǝ woanni lefe nǝ banlɛ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe . Bakpe ǝsuǝale tsya lǝ etubiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ nya bootǝ bǝ ntu bomǝ fiani kɔtɔ . Bakpe ǝsuǝale tsya bǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ate ate bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ kee baala ǝsuǝ .
66011007	Lefe nǝ ke babé Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya balosǝǝ , ubutubuki kplɛ wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ dikpembiǝ kplɛ nǝmǝ ubǝǝ , ebɔkpɔnko mǝ utǝkǝ mǝ kato olo mǝ .
66011008	Mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kpenkpe siamǝ ebolabelǝ obia lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ bǝtǝkǝ diye kulakula bǝ Egipte nye Sodom eto obia . Mfo básɔ mǝ Onamute lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ nɛ .
66011009	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ebutsyi ese saa ese , nlɛ saa nlɛ , bele tɛyitɛyi saa beletɛyitɛyi ku kawunsiǝ eto betidi ba tã bǝbǝ babe mǝ bakɔ nya bǝmbɔtɔnɔ bǝ bebikǝ mǝ .
66011010	Nya kaawunsiǝ eto betidi ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ betidi inuǝ bamfo eto ukpe eso . Booto keyudu , bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ asa , itsyise Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi inuǝ bamfo ekpe esoo , lǝ kanyi kpǝ ka bǝnǝ baboko betidi ǝsuǝ eso .
66011011	Lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ kama , ufiebi wǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ ǝbǝ údufǝ lǝ mǝ nya bátaka bǝńyǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ ! Sikpi ǝmuǝ mba kenke dínyǝ mǝ tinti .
66011012	Nnya kamaa , bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi inuǝ bamǝ ánɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ wǝ lɛbɔ útsyi kato wǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ kato mfo ! ” Kase mǝ balo ńyǝ banlɛ mǝ bobee , bédufǝ lǝ lɛsɔmiloku ǝsuǝ nya dítsyi mǝ disuko kato .
66011013	Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ tututuu , kasɔ étinkǝ kekleke nya umǝ eto lekpafosile léba lékpo kasɔ muɛmuɛmuɛ , nya betidi akpi akuanse díkpe . Sikpi ǝmuǝ betidi fɛfɛ bamǝ nya bátɛsǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe kato eto diye !
66011014	Kanyinyǝnyǝ nuǝfǝ ébubǝkafe , fɛɛ kǝtsyǝfǝ teke kama ɛlɛ bubǝ kitikpo .
66011015	Lǝ nnya kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kuansele éfe wǝ kakpatsyaku , nya mínɔ kakɔɛ bembembe lǝ kato ka nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kawunsiǝ kamfo eto sekakedikɔ áfiani Boanto Onanto ku Wǝ Nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ eto kale , nya wuudi seka idu manlo isu manlo ! ”
66011016	Mfó ǝmǝ nya beninǝ fosi ǝnuǝ ena ba nsi lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi lǝ mǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lékpo kasɔ béfusǝ ǝnǝmi nya bátɛsǝ Onanto
66011017	banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute wǝ ni ǝsuǝalenyǝ kenke , wǝ nkpe nya ɔkɛ ! Bɔasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise éfi fǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ nya fétsyiko seka budi .
66011018	Kafo ányi betidi ba dímamfo fǝ bánɔ . Lefe nǝ ele bǝ lǝkǝ fǝ lɛblɔfi ate eboyo . Lefe nǝ ele bǝ bakponko bekpenkpe lekpo eboyo . Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ lǝ afo fǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba ni fǝ beyifoyifo , bamǝ kayo sɛɛ , ku fǝ betidi kenke ba nkpe dibu itǝ fǝ , bakplɛnyǝ ku betidi wuewue ta kenke . Nya lefe eboyo bǝ lǝ atsyɔlɔsǝ betidi bua ba lélo fǝ betidi lǝ kawunsiǝ . ”
66011019	Básini Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kɛnkɛ ka kato , nya mínyǝ kɛnyɛklekle eto lelaka nǝmǝ mfó . Nya difule léto ɔsi díńyǝ ute ku kudu kplɛ . Kato ékumi nya kasɔ dítinkǝ nya etubankli kplɛ kpǝ lélo .
66012001	Mfo nya ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ éte lǝ difule ǝsuǝ.Usio utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe awu nnya nte fe kofe seka , dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte . Ómankli kofande uńyǝ nya lekankpakpa nǝ béfi lefo befandebi binuǝ béyifo nti wǝ lǝ disi .
66012002	Usio ǝmǝ lɛ kafo . Kafo kamǝ lɛ wǝ bunǝ , nya se kafo nlɛ wǝ bunǝ esoo , úkafa bembembe .
66012003	Ekpinsa bamba esi ɛbɔ lǝ difule bio ! Owa kplɛ wǝ nkpe sikpi , lɛsɛ , nkpe esi akuanse ku akpɛ lefosi , nya wǝ disi saa ntsyi lekankpakpa tsya lɛbɔ .
66012004	Úfi wǝ uke únǝ befandebi eto lekpa tsyǝfǝ utsyiko difule nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ kato ókpo lǝ kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nnya kamaa , ótaka uńyǝ lǝ usio ǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ nkǝ lǝ ole ubi ǝmǝ koo , lǝ umuǝ wǝ ɔmini .
66012005	Nya usio ǝmǝ léle osaibi , wǝ luudi seka lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ , ku situ eto oka eto uyi . Fɛɛ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ étsyi ubi ǝmǝ údunko mlǝ úsuko Onanto ku wǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
66012006	Usio ǝmǝ étsyetsyi úsu mfim nti kaka Onanto lɛlɔ kǝsiǝkɔ utsyǝ wǝ , kaka bɔɔlɛ wǝ ola itǝ eyi kɔkpi kɔni eyi alofa ǝnuǝ eyi fosiakua ( 1,260 ) .
66012007	Mfo nya lema díbǝ lǝ kato . Nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ninǝ kenke wǝ baakpo Mikael lɛtɔnko Onanto eto batɔnkpe bátaka lema lǝ owa kplɛ ku wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ ǝsuǝ nya batsyaka lema .
66012008	Bǝtǝkǝ owa kplɛ ku wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ kato , nya bénsitǝ wǝ ku wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ kusu bǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ kato mfó bio .
66012009	Bála owa kplɛ ǝmǝ bǝlǝkǝ lǝ kato mfó . Wǝ ni owa koko kplɛ ǝmǝ baakpo olo ǝmǝ nye Obonsam nɛ , wǝ lɛwɛ kawunsiǝ kenke okpe nɛ . Nya bála wǝ ku wǝ batɔnkpe kenke bátsyese kasɔ mfo .
66012010	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nya mínɔ ɔkɔɛ kplɛ utsyuǝ lǝ kato nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , Onanto eto bofokǝtǝ utidi ebubǝ ! Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ku sekadidi ebubǝ . Wuulǝkǝ wǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ eto ǝsuǝale ote . Itsyise bǝlǝkǝ nwǝ díkala bo bayimi kɛnyɛ ketsye ku kakɔmi kǝtǝ Onanto báto bákpe itsyi kato .
66012011	Bǝtǝkǝ wǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kɔtɔ ku ɔnukualɛtiki nnya ǝsuǝ bábe letsya . Itsyise bátɔnɔ faa bǝ bookpe nya béfi mǝ nkpǝ bǝtǝ fe keditǝtǝ seka .
66012012	Nyaso binyǝ disuǝyuǝ mimba nkpe kato mfo ! Fɛɛ mǝǝtǝ kasɔ ku lekpo mbɔbɔɛ ! Itsyise Obonsam áyifǝ úbǝ mi ɔflɔ ku lɛblɔfi . Itsyise uyi nkǝ lefe sɛkɛ hã dibu itǝ wǝ . ”
66012013	Se owa kplɛ ǝmǝ dínyǝ utsyǝ lekpo nkǝ bála wǝ báto bakpe lǝ kasɔ mfóo , ɔ́ti usio wǝ léle osaibi ǝmǝ kama .
66012014	Nya béfi kɔlikpo eto mbaba kplɛ nuǝ bǝtǝ wǝ lǝ ufunini usu kaka wɔɔkɛ lǝ mfiminti kaka bɔɔlɛ wǝ ola itǝ alɛ ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ bǝ lǝ ɔbɔ ofe lǝ owa kplɛ ǝmǝ eto ani .
66012015	Lǝ nnya kamaa , owa kplɛ ǝmǝ ala ntu kpenkpenkpe ntsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bɔbɔdi fe ketu kplɛ busu butsyi usio ǝmǝ budunko .
66012016	Fɛɛ kasɔ áfo kǝtǝ usio ǝmǝ nya kéminkli kɛnyɛ kámini ntu boǝ kenke owa kplɛ ǝmǝ léla .
66012017	Ete owa kplɛ ǝmǝ dínyǝ ɔblɔ kekleke ókpe usio ǝmǝ , nya údu úsu nkǝ weesu ɔkpɔnko usio ǝmǝ eto befluflu ba díbu ba leetsyue Onanto eto etiki koto nya báfo ɔnukualɛ wǝ bǝlǝkǝ bate mǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ bánɔ .
66012018	Nya owa kplɛ ǝmǝ díńyǝ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó .
66013001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ ubutubuki utsyuǝ nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi lekpo kǝmiǝ . Okpe esi akuanse ku aakpɛ lefosi . Lɛɛkpɛ saa tsyi lekankpakpa . Nya báwɔni mbusiotiki nnya ńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ disi saa ǝsuǝ .
66013002	Ubutubuki ǝmǝ ale ɔkplɛle , nya wǝ akpa te fe ukiti eto ale , nya wǝ kɛnyɛ te fe tsyata eto kale . Owa kplɛ ǝmǝ éfi wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝale , wǝ lekankpomɛ ku wǝ sekadidi eto ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ útǝ ubuki ǝmfo .
66013003	Ubutubuki ǝmǝ eto disi lɔni te fenkǝ léfo dikpemfabe kekleke ditsyuǝ , fɛɛ lefabe nǝmǝ ébukpe . Nyamfo éyifo kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke naa , nya bǝtǝkǝko ubutubuki ǝmǝ kama .
66013004	Betidi ésumu owa kplɛ ǝmǝ , itsyise kúfi ko ǝsuǝale kútǝ ubutubuki ǝmfo . Bémusu ubuki ǝmǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe nte fe ubutubuki ǝmfo ? Nya owoe loofo wǝ bɔkpɔnko ? ”
66013005	Bǝtǝ ubutubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝale údi emutiki nya lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ , nya ditǝ únyǝ ǝsuǝale itǝ afa fosi ana afa ǝnuǝ .
66013006	Útsyiko Onanto eto diye , wǝ kǝsiǝkɔ ku betidi ba kenke nsi lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ kato bukudi .
66013007	Bǝtǝ wǝ kusu bǝ ɔkpɔnko Onanto eto betidi lǝ utǝkǝ mǝ kato , nya besi bǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ ese saa ese , betidi saa betidi , bele saa bele ku kafo saa kafo ǝsuǝ .
66013008	Nya betidi ba kenke nsi lǝ kasɔ mfo ebusumu wǝ enso betidi ba hã eto aye báwɔni fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ bákpe lǝ nkpǝ eto kukue ko ni Lesamubi nǝ bálo eto bale .
66013009	Nwǝ ato nkpee , lǝ ɔnɔ .
66013010	Utidi wǝ ele bǝ bǝmuǝ , boomuǝ wǝ . Nya nwǝ tsya ele bǝ balo ku lesiabi tsyaa , ele bǝ balo wǝ nko . Nyamfo esoo , mi Onanto eto betidi , ele bǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ nya lǝ bidi ɔnukualɛ bitǝ wǝ .
66013011	Mfo minsi mínyǝ ubutubuki bua bamba wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi kasɔ . Ukǝ aakpɛ ǝnuǝ lǝ disi fe lekposubi eto ale , fɛɛ údi etiki fe owa kplɛ ǝmǝ seka .
66013012	Ófo ǝsuǝale kplɛ nnya nkpe wǝ utsyiko lǝ ututɛ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ , nya úyifo nnya keyifo lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Útǝ nkǝ betidi ba nsi kasɔ mfo ku ke betidi kenke lǝ besumu ubutubuki bua tutɛ ǝmǝ wǝ bǝtǝkǝ dikpemfabe kekleke fɛ díkǝkpǝ .
66013013	Ubutubuki nuǝfǝ ǝmfo éyifo ayanisa kplɛ . Útǝ ute kulaa tsya ábɔ utsyi kato úbǝ kasɔ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
66013014	Ɔ́wɛ betidi ba kenke nsi lǝ kasɔ lǝ ayanisa nnya bǝtǝ wǝ kusu bǝ uyifo lǝ ubutubuki tutɛ eto ǝnǝmi eso . Ubuki ǝmǝ átɛyi kawunsiǝ eto betidi nkǝ bato ubutubuki bua wǝ eto disi bǝtǝkǝ lefabe ku lesiabi fɛ ɔkɛ nkpǝ eto ditsyǝbi lǝ befi bakpe wǝ dibu .
66013015	Bǝtǝ bǝ ubutubuki bua nuǝfǝ ǝmǝ nkpe ǝsuǝale mfoo , wɔnɔ nkpǝ okpo lǝ ubukitonto tutɛ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ofo etiki budi nya lǝ utǝ lǝ balo betidi ba kenke lembusumu wǝ .
66013016	Ubutubuki ǝmǝ ǝtǝ nkǝ bǝtǝkǝ betidi ba kenke , betidi wuewue ku beninǝ , batabinyǝ ku bakombo , ndomufɔ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ leba lǝ mǝ kodiani lee lǝ mǝ nto .
66013017	Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo lesa bote lee oya lǝ bǝntǝkǝ wǝ leba nǝmfo , ini ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ eto diye nye leklabi nǝ nyǝ itǝ wǝ diye .
66013018	Ditiki nǝmfo atɔ itǝ kobetete . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ asa kasɔ bu ubutubuki bua eto leklabi nǝmfo obe . Itsyise leklambi nǝmfo ńyǝ ditǝ utidi eto diye . Ni leklabi ni alofa akua awosi akua akua ( 666 ) .
66014001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ Lesamubi nǝmǝ se dinyǝ lǝ Sion eto kɔtini ǝsuǝ . Nnyǝ betidi akpi kolofa awosi ana ana ( 144,000 ) ba eto nto bawɔni wǝ diye ku wǝ Anto ǝmǝ eto diye bǝtǝkǝ , nya bǝńyǝ wǝ lǝ akɔ .
66014002	Ete mínɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi kato fe ntu bo nlɛ boto lǝ ketsyue kplɛ nye ofamfa seka bembembe . Ɔkɔɛ wǝ minɔ esi ole fe betidi nlɛ kasanku bɔsɔ .
66014003	Betidi akpi kolofa awosi ana ana bamǝ ńyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ , asa ana nya nsi nkpǝ ku beninǝ bamǝ . Balɛ kusǝ fɔfɔ ko mǝ hã lekase busǝ . Lǝ betidi kenke ntii , mǝ hã ni mba dinyǝ bofo nɛ .
66014004	Mǝ ni basani ba lɛlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ betsyiko lǝ sɛsɔnɔdi ǝsuǝ . Mǝ ni mba dítǝkǝko Lesamubi nǝmǝ kaka ke lɛntɔ . Mǝ disi báfo kayo nɛ lǝ betidi nti nya mǝ ni betidi tutɛ ba befi bǝtǝ Onanto ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ nɛ .
66014005	Bantɛyi tɔ sidia bǝnyǝ , nya bǝnyǝ tɔ kabua saa lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnyǝ .
66014006	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bufunini kabe kato fanlofanlo ku nkpǝ manlo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itǝ betidi ba nkpe kasɔ eto lekpake saa , ese saa , bele saa ku nsɔ saa nsɔ .
66014007	Ófá ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bibu Onanto lǝ bɛtɛsǝ wǝ sɛkplɛ siamǝ ! Itsyise lefe éboyo bǝ okponko kawunsiǝ kenke lekpo . Bisumu wǝǝ diyifo kato ku kasɔ , lekpo ku ntu bo laayifǝ saa eto okle ! ”
66014008	Onato eto ɔtɔnkpe nuǝfǝ ǝtǝkǝko ututɛ nya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Oba o-o ! Babilonia wǝ lefo diye ǝmǝ aba sitinti ! Útǝ betidi kenke ba díkpe nte ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi eto lebua ǝsuǝ ǝkpǝ nte fe bunǝ bǝnǝ mu bǝkpǝ ! ”
66014009	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe tsyǝfǝ ǝtǝkǝko betutɛ inuǝ kama nya ɔnlɛ bofa bembembe katɛyi nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke lusumu ubutubuki ǝmǝ ku wǝ awesa nyamǝ nya utǝ bǝtǝkǝ leba lǝ wǝ kato nye lǝ wɛ kɔni ,
66014010	ebunǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi ku wǝ lefonyi kekleke nǝmǝ fe nte bo nkpe ale lɛkɔbetɔ nǝ béfi bákpo lǝ wǝ lɛblɔfi ǝsuǝ ! Boofi ute ku ute eto leba bǝtǝkǝ mba diyifo nyamfo bǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi .
66014011	Ute wǝ nlɛ mǝ botonsǝ eto kuyuǝ ko nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamɛ ǝsuǝ ebukabe kato idu manlo isu manlo . Nya lefe saa , ketsye ku kakɔmii , betidi ba dísumu ubutubuki ǝmǝ ku wɛ awesa ku mba ǝsuǝ wǝ diye eto leba ntǝkǝ embɔkɛ diyuǝ kulefe .
66014012	“ Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ mba ni Onanto eto betidi nya beetsyue Onanto eto etiki koto nya báfo Yesu banɔ , ńyǝ kekleke lǝ mǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
66014013	Nya mínɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ kato ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Wɔni nyamfo ǝtsyǝ bǝ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bákpo betidi ba diyifo bani ku Bonamute fɛ békpe atsyɔ ! ” Nya Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ léfo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Ee , bootsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ mǝ nyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya boonyǝ mǝ kayofofo . ”
66014014	Nnya kamaa , nnyǝ asɔmiloku flubia ǝtsyuǝ , nnya ǝsuǝ lele utidi eto ditsyǝbi nsi . Úti sika eto lekankpakpa lǝ disi nya ɔnlɛ sɛyikpɛbe sia nkpe kobe lǝ kɔni .
66014015	Mfó nya ɔtɔnkpe bamba utsyuǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ kafo nya ófã bembembe ótsyese nwǝ nsi lǝ asɔmiloku nyamǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bike biamǝ lefodife éboyo , nyaso fi fǝ sɛyikpɛbe lǝ afodi bidike biamǝ itsyise kasɔ eto bidike biamǝ eboyo lefodife ! ”
66014016	Nya nwǝ nsi lǝ lɛsɔmiloku nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwunya wǝ sɛyikpɛbe siamǝ ofia nya ófodi kawunsiɛ eto bɛkuɛnke biamǝ kenke .
66014017	Nnya kama , nnyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ , nya wǝ tsya nlɛ sɛyikpɛbe sia nkpe kobe .
66014018	Nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba tsya wǝ nsi lǝ ute eto kɛnyɛ , lɛbɔ utsyi kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba mfó úbǝ . Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo áfã ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe ɔ́tɛyi ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nlɛ sɛyikpɛbe nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ sɛyikpɛbe sia nkpe kobe lǝ alɛ nte eto eyibibi nnya nkpe lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ kafo , itsyise eyibibi nyamǝ ebobe itǝ bɔlɛ . ”
66014019	Nyaso Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ awunya wǝ sɛyikpɛbe siamǝ ofia nya ɔlɛ ebibi nyamǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ókpo lǝ kaka bǝǝkǝ eyibibi eto ntu kakpo ka ni Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
66014020	Nya béké eyibibi nyamǝ lǝ kaka ǝsuǝ beeke eyibibi eto ntu kakpo ǝmǝ lǝ umǝmflɔ , nya kɔtɔ lɛbɔ kɔ́bɔdi fe esunkpo lofa ǝnu sɔ̃ɔ̃ lǝ dikulǝbi ǝsuǝ nya kotsyo tsya fe akpa anɔ .
66015001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nsi nnyǝ ǝnyǝsa kplɛ bamba kato nnya díyifo ǝnyǝsa nnya lɛkɛ ale . Nnyǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ekuanse ba lɛkɔbe kanyinyǝnyǝ akuanse fɛfɛ banlɛ , itsyise nnya dílǝkǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi fɛfɛ éte nɛ .
66015002	Nya mínyǝ lesa nǝ nte fe ahuhɔɛ eto lekpo nnya letsyaka ku nte wǝ lɛsɛ hee . Nnyǝ betidi ba tsya dílǝkǝ ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku wǝ asawenwe nyamǝ ku nwǝ eto diyee , aklansa dílǝkǝ éte . Bǝńyǝ lǝ ahuhɔɛ eto lekpo nǝmǝ nya banlɛ kasanku ka Onanto dítǝ mǝ .
66015003	Nya banlɛ Moses , Onanto eto uyifoyifo ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kusǝ busǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute Onanto , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke , ntsyǝ fǝ eyifosa lɛmɔ iyifo yanii mmǝ ! Ǝse nnya kenke eto Oka , nya fǝ asayifoyifo lɛflɔ nya fǝ etiki diyifo ɔnukualɛ .
66015004	Owoe loofo buńyǝ fǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi nya wǝmbote fǝ sikpi , O Bonamute , nya wembufi atɛsǝ utǝ fǝ dinye ? Itsyise fǝ hã diyifo kɛnkɛ , nya kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke luubǝ bǝtǝ fǝ dibu . Itsyise bǝlǝkǝ fǝ asasɛ yifoyifo bate utsyuǝ saa ǝnyǝ . ”
66015005	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , ńnyǝ se Kedikǝtǝkɔ lǝ kato ku kaka ni Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke lǝ mfó lɛsini nte .
66015006	Nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe ekuanse ba nlɛ kanyinyǝnyǝ akuanse nyamǝ lɛbɔ betsyi lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ . Bakpe awu flubia nya nlɛ buyǝnde nya béfi sika sia eto kekue bákle mǝ akɔɛsi .
66015007	Mfo nya asa ana nyamǝ nsi nkpǝ eto ɔni dífi sika sia eto ekplibi akuanse nnya díyi ku Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ manlo manlo eto lɛblɔfi útǝ batɔnkpe ekuanse bamǝ .
66015008	Nya kuyuǝ ko lɛbɔ kutsyi lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale nyamǝ diyi Disumuyo nǝmǝ kenke , nya kuutsyuǝ saa mamfo Disumuyo nǝmǝ budufǝ ese lefe nǝ efimbi akuanse nya batɔnkpe ekuanse bamǝ lébokodibǝ éfe .
66016001	Mfó minɔ ɔkɔɛ bembembe utsyuǝ lɛbɔ utsyi Disumuyo nlɛ batɔnkpe ekuanse bamǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛwuninsǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi eto ɛkpɛ ekuanse nyamǝ bekpo lǝ kawunsiǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
66016002	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe tutɛ ǝmǝ esu ɔwuninsǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ǝmǝ okpo lǝ kawunsiǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ afabe nya nkpe kɛnyɛ ale , leefi , abɔ ekpo lǝ mba ubutubuki ǝmǝ eto leba ntǝkǝ ku mba disumu wǝ awenwesa .
66016003	Nya ɔtɔnkpe nuǝfǝ lɛwuninsǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ókpo lǝ lekpo ǝsuǝ , nya ntu bomǝ lɛtsyi bɔwuninsǝ bofiani fe betidi kpenkpe eto kɔtɔ seka , itǝ bǝ asa nnya nkpe nkpǝ lǝ lekpo nǝmǝ kenke ekpe .
66016004	Nya ɔtɔnkpe tsyǝfǝ lɛwuninsǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ókpo lǝ ntu ku etubiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ nya nyamblɛ léfiani kɔtɔ .
66016005	Mfo mínɔ se ɔtɔnkpe wǝ laabe ntu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ O ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ , fǝǝ nsi nkpǝ idu taa kokolefe ke , fǝ akpokponkpo kenke aayɛ lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ lo !
66016006	Betidi bamfo ákpo fǝ betidi ku fǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kɔtɔ kasɔ . Nyaso fǝtǝ mǝ kɔtɔ fǝ bǝnǝ nɛ . Kotonǝnǝ komfo ǝńyǝ kutǝ mǝ tinti ! ”
66016007	Mfo mínɔ ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute Onanto , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke ! Fǝ lekpokponkpo yɛ lǝ kɔtsyɔntsyɔsu ku lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
66016008	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe nale áwuninsǝ nnya nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ǝsuǝ ókpo lǝ kofe eto ǝnǝmi ǝsuǝ nya Onanto dítǝ ko ǝsuǝale nkǝ otonsǝ betidi ku ko utefofo .
66016009	Ute eto ǝsuǝale átonsǝ mǝ nya békudi Onanto eto diye . Onanto kpé ǝsuǝale lǝ kanyi kamfo ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ báni bǝ bǝmbɔtsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ batɛsɛ wǝ sɛkplɛ .
66016010	Ɔtɔnkpe nɔnde ǝmǝ áwuninsǝ nnya nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ókpo lǝ ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ eto lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ . Kale ko léna lǝ ubutubuki ǝmǝ eto sekakedikɔ kenke nya betidi lɛyimi anyi lǝ kanyi ka banlɛ bunyǝ eso .
66016011	Nya betidi bamǝ díkudi Onanto wǝ nkpe kato lǝ kanyi ka banlɛ bunyǝ lǝ afabe nyamǝ eso . Tsyaa , báni bǝ bǝmbɔtsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
66016012	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kuande ǝmǝ áwuninsǝ asa nnya nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ǝsuǝ ókpo lǝ Ketukplɛ Frate ǝsuǝ . Ketu kamǝ ákpi kǝtǝ baka ba ditsyi kofekatokɔ kusu lǝ bayɛ bafe .
66016013	Mfó nya mínyǝ awɔnɔ bua ǝtsyǝ nnya nte fe asasa lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ owa kplɛ ǝmǝ , ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku bidiabidia eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝ eto nnyɛ .
66016014	Beyifo awɔnɔ bua nnya leeyifo ayanisa . Awɔnɔ bua etsyǝ nyamfo leesu kakpadi kawunsiǝ eto baka kakɔ itǝ lema bɔkpɔ lǝ Boanto Onato , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke ǝmǝ , eto Diyi Kplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
66016015	“ Bɛnɔ ! Muubǝ fe uyu seka ! Disuǝyuǝ itǝ nwǝ luutǝkǝ ǝnǝ nya umuǝ ǝsuǝ utsyǝ ku wǝ awu bikelɛlɛ wǝmbɔyɛ leyaleya okpe wǝ ǝsuǝ kofani lǝ betidi nti . ”
66016016	Mfó nya awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ lékpa baka bamǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ kaka baakpo Armagedon lǝ Hebri eto sele ǝsuǝ .
66016017	Nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe kuansele ǝmǝ lɛwuninsǝ nya nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔkpɛ ǝmǝ kafo okpo lǝ difule ǝsuǝ . Ete ɔkɔɛ kplɛ utsyuǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝ nte lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Elo o-o ! ”
66016018	Mfóo , difule ko ditsyiko ɔsi boto , kafa kekumi nya kasɔ ditinkǝ kekleke . Kasɔ butinkǝ kamfo eto okle mǝmbǝ tɔ kǝnyǝ idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ .
66016019	Umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ ába lǝ akpa ǝtsyǝ , nya ese ese eto kǝmǝnkplɛ léba . Onanto ákloma Babilonia kplɛ nya utǝ únǝ nte útsyiko lǝ wǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmǝ kafo wǝ lɛblɔfi nǝmǝ eto nte .
66016020	Nsɔ bo ntu letsyilama kenke ánya vi , nya atini kenke tsya lénya .
66016021	Etubankli kplɛ kplɛ fe nkedibo awosi anɔ seka áni itsyi kato ibǝ ɛblɛ betidi . Mǝ dikudi Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ etubankli nyamǝ eto kɛnyɛ ale ǝme eso .
66017001	Mfo batɔnkpe ekuanse bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ nlɛ kakpɛ ekuanse dibǝ ɔtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Bǝ lǝ nte fǝ kase boonǝ ɔsɔnɔdi koto . Uyifo umǝnkplɛ wǝ bato bǝnyǝnsǝ lǝ ntu bɔdibɔdi kpǝ ɔflɔ .
66017002	Nya kawunsiǝ eto baka laa labe ko wǝ fe kase utsyuǝ leesu ɔsɔnɔdi ɔflɔ , nya kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto le bua buuyifo te fe kase bǝǝnǝ nte kekpe seka . ”
66017003	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nya ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lékpa mɛ úsu ko mfiminti . Mfó minyǝ usio utsyuǝ nsi lǝ ubutubuki sia utsyuǝ wǝ aye nya báwɔni bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ kenke diyifo aka itǝ Onanto . Ubuki ǝmǝ kpe esi akuanse ku akpɛ lefosi .
66017004	Usio ǝmǝ kpe awu nya diyifo tũũ asiasia kpakpa akpa nya balɔkɔsǝ wǝ ku sika sia ku aba ku atsyabi nya lefo koya nya ɔnlɛ sika sia eto kɔpo lǝ kɔni ko diyi ku asa nnya laanɔ bobe ku asinsa úńyǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi ǝsuǝ .
66017005	Bawɔni lɛkulaye bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kato nǝ eto kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ Umǝnkplɛ Babilonia , Ɔsɔnɔdi kenke eto ambe ku asa nnya beekisi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ambe .
66017006	Nya minyǝ usio ǝmǝ mfo wǝ dikpǝ nte ku Onanto eto betidi eto kɔtɔ ko únǝ ku mba bálo eto kɔtɔ itsyise bǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama eso . Se minyǝ wǝǝ , iyifo mǝ yanii tinti .
66017007	Mfo nya ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɔmɛ nkǝ , “ Beso iyifo fǝ yanii mǝ ? Muulǝkǝ akulasa nya nkpe lǝ usio ǝmfo ku ubutubuki esi akuanse ku aakpɛ lefo wǝ ǝsuǝ unsi nte fǝ .
66017008	Ubutubuki ǝmfo ébusiǝ nkpǝ uńyǝ , fɛɛ unsisi . Ola nkǝ eni lǝ ɔbɔ utsyi lǝ ukpe eto dibiǝ kplɛ nǝmǝ kafo udu , nya lǝ bátsylɔsǝ wǝ . Betidi ba disiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ ba eto aye báwɔni bakpe lǝ nkpǝ eto kukue fɛ Onanto diyifo kawunsiǝ , yuuyifo mǝ naa lǝ bǝnyǝ ubutubuki ǝmǝ . Itsyise úsiǝ nkpǝ uńyǝǝ , fɛ unsibǝ , nya usi wuubǝ bio .
66017009	“ Nyamfo ahiã itǝ kobe ku kasɔnɔnɔ . Esi akuanse nyamǝ ńyǝ itǝ atini akuanse nya ǝsuǝ usio ǝmǝ lǝǝsiǝ . Beyifo baka ekuanse tsya .
66017010	Baka ɛnɔ bamǝ ébusiǝ nkpǝ bǝnyǝ , ɔni si lǝ lekpomɛ , nya ɔfɛfɛ mǝmbǝ tɔ . Lǝ ubǝǝ , lefe kliminti hã ete wuusiǝ .
66017011	Nya ubutubuki wǝ dísiǝ nkpǝ ibǝ efe fɛ unsisii , wǝ kosate eyifo oka flamflale wǝ ni ekuanse bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ bantɔɔ katsylɔsǝkɔ .
66017012	“ Aakpɛ lefosi nya fǝnyǝǝ , eyifo baka lefosi ba eto sekadidi fe dimanyo tɔ . Fɛɛ bootǝ mǝ kusu bedi seka itǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni ku ubutubuki ǝmǝ .
66017013	Nsusu bɔni ete nkpe baka lefosi bamǝ , nya boofi mǝ ǝsuǝale ku mǝ kɛnyɛbusiǝ bǝtǝ ubutubuki ǝmǝ .
66017014	Bɔɔkpɔnko Lesamubi nǝmǝ ku wǝ betidi ba bákpadi , ba ulǝkǝ , mba léfo wǝ banɔ ntǝkǝko wǝ , ebutǝkǝ mǝ kato , itsyise wǝ ni banamute eto Onamute , ku baka eto oka . ”
66017015	Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ tsya atɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Ntu bo fǝnyǝ bo ǝsuǝ ɔtsyetɔ ǝmǝ nsi , eyifo ese ese , betidi betidi , nle nle ku bele bele .
66017016	Aakpɛ lefosi nyamǝ fǝnyǝ ku ubutubuki ǝmǝ , ebukisi otsyetɔnyǝ ǝmǝ . Bɔɔlɛ lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ bafo , usiǝ leyaleya . Bɔɔyimi wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya bootonsǝ sinǝ sia dibu ku ute .
66017017	Itsyise Onanto éfi nyamfo okpe mǝ lǝ utu kǝmiǝ nkǝ lǝ beyifo lesa nǝ wǝ ala ǝsuǝ . Nya útǝ nkǝ beyifo bani lǝ befi mǝ sekadidi bǝtǝ ubutubuki ǝmǝ , isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto eto etiki luubǝ itǝ
66017018	usio wǝ fǝnyǝ mfo , eyifo umǝnkplɛ wǝ nlɛ seka budi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto baka ǝsuǝ . ”
66018001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , nńyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe bamba utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi kato ɔnlɛ kasɔ bubǝ . Okpe ǝsuǝale tinti nya wǝ diyǝnde díyǝnde lékpo lǝ kawinsiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
66018002	Ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Óba o-o ! Babilon wǝ léfo diye sitinti nso aba kenke ! Ófiani awɔnɔ bua kenke eto ɔkplɛ eto kabiɔkɔ . Mfó nya baklɔbɛ bua saa eto okle ba bendi kenke nsi nɛ .
66018003	Itsyise kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ǝnǝ wǝ nte bo nkpe ale ini nnya wǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi eto lebua dínǝ éboko . Kawunsiǝ eto baka álabeko wǝ , nya kawunsiǝ eto mba laasa asi léfiani batabinyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ setsyetɔ kekleke siamǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
66018004	Nya minsi mínɔ ɔkɔɛ bamba ditsyi kato nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ betidi , bɛbɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ bibǝ ! Bǝ lǝ bɛyɛ wǝ abua nnya ɔnlɛ buyifo buyifo . Kase biǝmbɔkɛ lekpake lǝ kotonǝnǝ ko luubǝ lǝ wǝ betidi ǝsuǝ .
66018005	Itsyise wǝ abua etsyue itǝkǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ ísu ítidi taa kato , nya Onanto laakloma wǝ esu bua nyamǝ .
66018006	Biyifo wǝ fe kase wuntsya díyifo mi eto kɛnyɛ . Tisǝ wǝ oko sinuǝ lǝ nnya úyifo mi eto kɛnyɛ . Lɛkɔbe nǝ kafo békuti nte bo nkpe ale bǝtǝ fǝǝ , kuti ni sinuǝ ǝtǝ wǝ .
66018007	Bitǝ lǝ unyǝ kanyi , lǝ ɔkɛ lǝ lɛwɛnlo ǝsuǝ fe kase inyǝ itǝ , lǝ wǝ kɔlɔkɔ kekleke ku nkpǝ minimini bo údi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise wǝǝsiǝ katɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Besio eto Oka mini mfo . Minni ɔkɔsiǝ nya membusiǝ nkewi keku kulefe ! ’
66018008	Mmǝ eso bule bo ni kanyinyǝnyǝ ebutu wǝ diyi lɔni . Wuudufǝ lǝ kanyi ka ni bufi , ukpe ku kukpɛnsɛ kplɛ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Bonamute Onanto wǝ laakponko wǝ lekpoo eyifo ǝsuǝalenyǝ .
66018009	“ Lǝ kawunsiǝ eto baka ba dídinko wǝ sɛsɔnɔ , nya bédi nkpǝ ku wǝ ǝńyǝ ute wǝ nlɛ wǝ botonsǝ eto kuyuǝ ko nlɛ botakaa , boofa bewi nku bǝtǝ wǝ .
66018010	Boonyǝ kɔsɛsɛ ke lǝ sikpe sia dímuǝ mǝ lǝ kanyi ka bǝnyǝ ɔnlɛ bunyǝ esoo , batɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mbɔbuɛ ! Mbɔbuɛ ! Umǝnkplɛ Babilonia ! Lebombosɔsɔ lɔni ete béfi bǝnǝ fǝ koto mǝ ! ’
66018011	“ Mba laasa asi kplɛ ba nkpe lǝ kasɔ kamǝ tsya éwi nku bǝtǝ wǝ , ílǝ mǝ itǝ wǝ itsyise kuutsyuǝ saa ensianya fǝ bike .
66018012	Kuutsyuǝ saa anya mǝ bike bia ni sika sia ku siflubia , atsyabi ku aba nnya lefo koya , mfia sia , nkufia ku mfia bo lǝǝyǝnde , eyi akpa akpa eto kakle ku nnya laanyi fififi , ku asa nnya béfi atonyi ku eyi nnya lefo koya , bitu ku situnaa ku aba nnya lefo koya béyifo tsya .
66018013	Nya ɔklɔ eto bike bamba nsi ni diyikpe nǝ laanyi fififi baakpo sinamɔn ku asa fififi ate ate nnya beefi keyifo ɔklɛ . Nuǝbi bo laanyi fififi , uyudu ku lifui , nte ku nnuǝ , bloblo eto nnamfo ku edisa , batobuki ku banantsyui , batɔmini ku nkenke kplɛ bo leetsyi bike , ndomufɔ ku betidi ba buufi bǝtǝ kedi kulaa tsya .
66018014	“ Mba laasa asi átɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Babilonia ! Asa sɛɛ nnya fábɛbɛ fǝtǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya lɛbɔ fǝ lǝ ani mmǝ nɛ . Fǝ setabikɛ ku sisuǝlɔ tsya ánya , ensiebunyǝ nnya kulefe . ’
66018015	Mba laasa asi ba léfiani batabinyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ biketete ǝsuǝǝ , ebuńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ famfamfa itsyise báte sikpi bǝ bofo lekpa lǝ wǝ kanyi ka ǝsuǝ . Boofa nya buwi kamisǝ ku batǝyi bǝnkǝ ,
66018016	‘ Mbɔbɔɛ ! Mbɔbuɛ , umǝnkplɛ wǝ lefo diye . Umǝ wǝ bálɔkɔsɛ ku mfia flubia ku nsia eto aflanka , nya bálɔkɔsɛ wǝ ku sika sia ku aba ku atsyabi nnya lefo koya ni nwǝmfo nɛ .
66018017	Fɛɛ lǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni kama , setabi siamfo kenke áfiani abiabia ! ’ “ Ntu eto efue eto beninǝ kumba nyɛ kusu lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ , mba laaka ntu eto efue ku mba laasa asi lǝ ntu eto efue ǝsuǝ ǝkǝnǝ bǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ .
66018018	Nya báfá ku keku se bǝnyǝ umǝ ǝmǝ nlɛ ute bunyǝ eto kuyuǝ , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Umǝnkplɛ saa mensikɛ tɔ wǝ lekateko nwǝ mfo ! ’
66018019	Mfó bákpa utembu bákpo lǝ mǝ esi , béwi kaminsǝku bátɛyi sitinti bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mbɔbɔɛ , mbɔbɔɛ boǝtǝ umǝ wǝ lefo diye mfo . Wǝ ni umǝnkplɛ wǝ efue kplɛ nnya laayɛ lǝ lekpo ǝsuǝ eto basate lɛyɛ bakɛ atabi ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ setabikɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni ǝsuǝǝ , áfiani umǝbaba .
66018020	O mimba nkpe kato kenke , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ mi Onanto eto betidi kenke ku wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku Kristo eto batɔnkpe ! Itsyise Onanto ákponko wǝ lekpo ólo wǝ dikpi lǝ nnya úyifo mi eso ! ’ ”
66018021	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , nńyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nkpe ale utsyuǝ dítsyi kobansǝ kplɛ kutsyuǝ nya óto ko ókpe lǝ lekpo katɛyi nkǝ , “ Mmǝ ke booto Babilonia eto umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ basɔ lǝ kasɔ bembembe , nya bensiembunyǝ wǝ bio kulefe nɛ .
66018022	Nya bensiǝmbɔnɔ kasanku , katlowoe ku nkpatsyaku eto kɔsɔ lǝ fǝ kulefe ! Bensiembunyǝ ani eto kɔsi eto uyifoyifo saa lǝ fǝ bio . Nya bensimbɔnɔ ǝkuǝ saa eto kɔsɔ lǝ fǝ bio .
66018023	Bensiembunyǝ kakandiɛ eto buyǝnde lǝ fǝ bio . Nya bensiembɔnɔ kusiǝkpakpa eto ese tsya lǝ fǝ . Fǝ mba laasa asi ni bǝsuǝalenyǝ kenke lǝ kawunsiǝ , nya ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ kasayifoyifo ǝsuǝ fawɛ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke fakpe !
66018024	Bǝnǝ Babilonia eto umǝ koto itsyise bǝnyǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku Onanto eto betidi ku mba kenke bálo lǝ kasɔ mfo eto kɔtɔ ko bákpo lǝ kasɔ mfo eso ! ”
66019001	Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , nnɔ kudu kplɛ ko lele sitiditu kplɛ eto kɔsɔ kato ko nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! Bofokǝtǝ , diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale eyifo bo Onanto eto ale !
66019002	Itsyise woakpo lekpo lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , kala etiki kǝlǝkǝ lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ . Olo otsyetɔsio bua wǝ nlɛ kawunsiǝ bobiasǝ ku wǝ sɛsɔnɔdi dikpi . Onanto ǝnǝ wǝ koto itsyise ólo Onanto eto beyifoyifo . ”
66019003	Nya besi báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! Kuyuǝ ko nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi lǝ ute wǝ létonsǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ lɛ bɔbɔ isu manlo manlo ! ”
66019004	Beninǝ fosi ǝnuǝ ena bamǝ ku asa nnya nsi nkpǝ ena nyamǝ ákpo kasɔ nya bátɛsǝ Onanto wǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ibǝ itǝ nko ! Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! ”
66019005	Ete ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lɛbɔ útsyi lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bɛtɛsǝ bo Onanto , mi wǝ beyifoyifo , ku betidi ba ta , bakplɛnyǝ ku betidiwewe kenke ba laate wǝ sikpi . ”
66019006	Nnya kamaa , nnɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ fe sitiditu eto ole nye nwǝ lele ketu eto ntu bo nlɛ boto ketsyi ketsyue kato kakpo lǝ ditumbu ǝsuǝ , nye fe ofamfa wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi kato seka , wǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! Itsyise Bonamute , bo Onanto Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke , ni oka .
66019007	Bitǝ lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ , bobesǝ wǝ kato , nya bufi atɛsǝ butǝ wǝ ! Itsyise Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kusiǝkpakpa eto diyi nǝmǝ eboyo , nya wǝ kusiǝ komǝ dílɔ wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyǝ itǝ diyi nǝmǝ .
66019008	Béfi aklala flubia nnya lele eto awu nnya nlɛ buyǝnde bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ okpe . ” Nya aklala flubia nnya lele ǝmǝǝ , eyifo Onanto eto betidi eto asa sɛɛ yifoyifo .
66019009	Mfó nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Wɔni nyamfo ǝtsyǝ . Disuǝyuǝ itǝ mba bákpo báboko Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kusiǝkakpakɔ eto lesakedikɔ . ” Nya ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ disi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyamfo eyifo Onanto kosate eto kɛnyɛ eto etiki . ”
66019010	Mfó mínse akonki lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ miǝ lǝ nsumu wǝ , fɛ ɔtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Menyifo nko ! Uyifoyifo ete mini fe fǝ ke ku fǝ bayimi ba léfo Yesu eto ditiki bánɔ ke . Onanto ete ele bǝ busumu ! ” Itsyise ɔnukualɛ eto asa nnya Yesu dílǝkǝ ótee , nnya ni lesa nǝ lékpe Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nkɛale nɛ .
66019011	Lǝ nnya kamaa , nnyǝ se kato lɛsini kenke nya mínyǝ ɔtɔmli flubia utsyuǝ . Baakpo nwǝ nsi lǝ wǝ bǝ Nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ku Ɔnukualɛnyǝ . Woakpo lekpo kayɛnko lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ woakpɔ lemma kayɛnko lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ .
66019012	Wǝ ǝnǝmi éyifo fe ute wǝ nlɛ buńyǝ nya unti akankpakpa kpǝ lǝ wǝ disi . Báwɔni diye ditsyuǝ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ nǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lenyi enso wǝ kosate hã .
66019013	Ókpé awu nnya bédi bákpé lǝ kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ . Wǝ diye ni Onanto Eto Ditiki Nǝmǝ .
66019014	Nya kato eto bamamanyǝ ba nkpe awu nya lɛlɛkɛ iflubi nnya ele , nya bensi lǝ batɔmli flubia ǝsuǝ ntǝkǝko wǝ kama .
66019015	Útsyi lesiabi nyɛ nnuǝ yayaya lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nǝ wuufi ɔkpɔnko , ese ese utǝkǝ nnya kato . Wuufi situ eto uyi udi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ , nya wɔɔnwɔ wain eto ebibi ulǝkǝ nte lǝ mu kawakɔ lǝ Onanto Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto lefonyi ku lɛblɔfi kekleke ǝsuǝ .
66019016	Nya báwɔni diye ditsyuǝ lǝ wǝ awu nnya onkpe ku lǝ lekpabu ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , Baka eto Oka ku Banamute eto Onamute .
66019017	Lǝ nnya kamaa , nnyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ kofe ǝsuǝ , ófa bembembe ókpadi baklɔbɛ ba kenke leefunini kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bɛkɔ lǝ bidi Onanto eto ditsyitsyosa kplɛ nǝmǝ !
66019018	Bibǝ bɛyimi baka , bamamanyǝ ninǝ , bamamanyǝ , batɔmini ku betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ , betidi ba kenke , ndomufɔ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ , bakplɛnyǝ ku betidiwewe eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ! ”
66019019	Nya mínyǝ ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku kasɔ mfo eto baka ku mǝ bamamanyǝ lɛkɔ bátaka lema lǝ Nwǝ nsi lǝ ɔtɔmini ku wǝ bamamanyǝ ǝsuǝ .
66019020	Fɛɛ bǝmuǝ ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku bidiabidia eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ díyifo ayanisa ǝmǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Ayanisa nyamfó béfi bawɛ betidi ba ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ eto leba nteke ku mba lésumu ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ eto ditsyǝbiwenwe bákpé . Béfi ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku bidiabidia eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi bamǝ báto bakpe ku nkpǝ lǝ ute eto aba nya nlɛ bunyǝ lǝ ditumbu klinklaa kplɛ nǝmǝ kafo .
66019021	Nya nwǝ nsi lǝ ɔtɔmini ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lélo bamamanyǝ fɛfɛ ku lesiabi nǝ lɛbɔ ditsyi lǝ nwǝ nsi lǝ ɔtɔmi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya baklɔbɛ bamǝ kenke díbǝ bétsyuebi sinǝ sia ke boofo butsyuebi kamini .
66020001	Nya mínyǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ditsyi kato ɔnlɛ bɔyifǝ kǝbǝ kasɔ nya ɔnlɛ dikpǝmbiǝ eto safui ku kɔnyɔ ko ditidi kutsyuǝ lǝ kɔni .
66020002	Úmuǝ owa kplɛ ǝmǝ , wǝ nkpe taa kokolefe ke wǝ baakpo Obonsam nye Olo ǝmǝ , nya úmuǝ wǝ ókpe lǝ amana itǝ alɛ kɔkpi .
66020003	Onato eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ áto wǝ ókpe lǝ dikpembiǝ nǝmǝ kafo , nya úti ni kɛnyɛ kpã ku sitǝ , itǝ lǝ ɔyɛ kusu bunyǝ kabɔ kawɛ ese ese eto betidi isu ese lefe nǝ alɛ kɔkpi nyamǝ díbǝ éfe . Nya kama fɛ boolǝkǝ wǝ amana ǝsuǝ sɛkɛ nɛ .
66020004	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ akankpomɛ ǝtsyuǝ , nya bǝtǝ mba nsi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ bakpo akpo . Mǝ ni betidi ba bálo eto awɔnɔ se bédi adansiɛ bǝtǝ Yesu ku Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso . Báni bénsumu ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku wǝ ditsyǝbi wenwe nye bǝtǝkǝ wǝ leba lǝ mǝ nto nye mǝ ani . Bátaka bǝsiǝ nkpǝ nya bédi seka ku Kristo itǝ alɛ kɔkpi .
66020005	Nyamfo ni bekpenkpe eto botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ tutɛ nɛ . Bekpenkpe fɛfɛ mámtaka bǝbǝ nkpǝ fɛ alɛ kɔkpi komǝ léyo .
66020006	Diyuǝ ku Onanto eto atsyɔkpokpo kplɛ itǝ betidi ba dínyǝ kedikɔ lǝ bekpenkpe eto botaka kǝńyǝ tutɛ bomfo kǝmiǝ . Ukpe nnuǝfǝ ǝmbɔkɛ ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ , bomu booyifo Onanto ku Kristo eto besumunyǝ nya buudi seka ku wǝ itǝ alɛ kɔkpi .
66020007	Nya lǝ alɛ kɔkpi komǝ ayoo , nya fɛ boolǝkǝ Obonsam lǝ diyo nǝmǝ nɛ .
66020008	Nya wuusu kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ kenke usu ɔwɛ betidi okpé , ba ni Gog ku Magog . Wookpa mǝ utsyǝ ditsyu itǝ lema bɔkpɔ , nya boofui fe lekpo eto kɔwunimi .
66020009	Bésense bakpo lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke nya bátsyalama kaka Onanto eto betidi nsi wǝ ni wǝ umǝkplɛ lala ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ ute áyifǝ utsyi kato úbǝ ótonsǝ mǝmblɛ kenke .
66020010	Nya Obonsam ǝmǝ lɛwɛ mǝ ókpee , béfi wǝ báto bákpe lǝ ute ku ute bambi eto ditumbu klinklaa kplɛ nǝmǝ kafo kaka báto ubutubuki bua ǝmǝ ku bidiabidia eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝ bákpe . Mfó boonyǝ kanyi ketsye ku kakɔmi itǝ manlo manlo .
66020011	Nya kamaa , nnyǝ lekankpomɛ kplɛ flubia ditsyuǝ ku nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ni . Kasɔ ku kato étsyetsyi bánya lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi nya bésinyǝ mǝ bio .
66020012	Nya mínyǝ bekpǝnkpe kpǝ , bakplɛnyǝ ku betidiwewe ńyǝ lǝ lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Básini ekue , nya besi básini kukue kɔni , ko ni mba nsi nkpǝ eto kukue . Bákponko bekpenkpe bamǝ lekpo , utsyuǝ saa lǝ kase úsiǝ nkpǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ ekue nyamǝ kafo .
66020013	Lekpo ǝlǝkǝ bekpenkpe ba nkpe lǝ ni óboko , nya ukpe ku ɔkɔmǝ tsya dílǝkǝ bekpenkpe ba nkpe lǝ mǝ bǝtǝ . Nya Onanto lékponko utsyuǝ sa lekpo ɛyɛ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
66020014	Nnya kamaa , béfi ukpe ku ɔkɔmǝ báto bákpe lǝ ute eto ditumbu klinklaa kplɛ nǝmǝ kǝmiǝ . Ute eto ditumbu klinkla kplɛ nǝmǝ ni ukpǝ nuǝfǝ nɛ .
66020015	Utsyuǝ saa wǝ eto diye báwɔni bákpe lǝ nkpǝ eto kukue komǝ kafoo , béfi wǝ báto bákpe lǝ ute eto ditumbu klinklaa nǝmǝ kafo .
66021001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , nnyǝ kato fɔfɔ ku kasɔ fɔfɔ . Itsyise kato tutɛ ku kasɔ tutɛ ébubǝ kafe nya lekpo tsya lénya .
66021002	Ete mínyǝ Umǝ kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ , wǝ ni Yerusalem fɔfɔ , ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ kato ɔnlɛ kasɔ bubǝ . Nya bálɔkɔsɛ wǝ kukɔnɔ fe okafɔ itǝ wǝ usǝ eto bokpa seka .
66021003	Nya mínɔ ɔkɔɛ kplɛ utsyuǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lekankpomɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ wǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebee ! Mɔmɔɔ , Onanto eto kǝsiǝkɔ ébubǝ kakpé lǝ betidi nti mfo . Wuusiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya boofiani wǝ betidi . Onanto kosate ebusiǝko mǝ nya wuuyifo mǝ Onanto .
66021004	Nya wɔɔsi mǝ binǝntu kenke lǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya ukpe tsya ensiǝmbɔkɛ . Nko ke ini itǝ bolo kǝsiǝ , nku buwi ku kanyinyǝnyǝ tsya nɛ . Akokosa kenke ébubǝ efe . ”
66021005	Ete nwǝ nsi lǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebee ! Mbusinkli nyifo asa nnya kenke afɔfɔ . ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Wɔni nyamfo ǝtsyǝ , itsyise iyifo etiki nnya diyifo sitinti nya utsyuǝ saa loofo bofo kanɔ . ”
66021006	Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa saa aflɔ . Mɔ ni ututɛ ku ɔfɛfɛ , ketsyikokɔ ku kalosǝkɔ . Utsyuǝ saa ke utukɔɛ nlɛɛ , muutǝ wǝ kusu unǝ nkpǝ eto ntu bo laayifǝ ketsyi ditubiǝ ǝsuǝ nya wǝmbofo kayo saa .
66021007	Utsyuǝ saa ke ditǝkǝ kato ebofo nyamfo utsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ . Muuyifo wǝ Onanto nya wuuyifo mɔ ubi .
66021008	Fɛɛ betidi ba laate asa sikpi , mba leedu bǝtsyuǝ kǝtǝ , mba leeyifo asinsa , mba laalo betidi ku batsyetɔnyǝ ku bafate , ku mba leesumu bǝfiǝ , ku badia kenke , eto kǝsiǝkɔ ni ditumbu klikla kplɛ nǝ nlɛ bunyǝ ku ute eto aba kafo . Nyamfo ni ukpe nuǝfǝ nɛ . ”
66021009	Nya kamaa , Onanto eto batɔnkpe nlɛ ɛkpɛ ekuanse ka díyi ku kanyinyǝnyǝ ka nkpe kɛnyɛale ekuanse fɛfɛ eto ɔni ǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Bǝ , lǝ nte fǝ Okafɔ wǝ ni Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto kusiǝ . ”
66021010	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ áfo disiǝ lǝ mɛ nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ditsyi mɛ usuko kɔtini ko letaka fefe eto kato . Óte mɛ Yerusalem , umǝnkplɛ kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ lɛbɔ utsyi Onanto ɔflɔ kato ɔnlɛ kasɔ bubǝ .
66021011	Nya ɔnlɛ buyǝnde ku Onanto eto diyǝnde . Umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ ǝyǝnde fe leba nǝ lefo koya tinti . Dite fe Yaspa eto leba seka nya lekpa wuee fe ahuhɔɛ seka .
66021012	Báto ofati wǝ ditidi nya otaka bátsyilama wǝ , nya bákpe lefosi mbɔsie nnuǝ lǝ wǝ . Nya Onanto eto lefosi batɔnkpe inuǝ ńyǝ lǝ mu nnyɛ . Báwɔni Israel eto lefosi atobi ǝnuǝ nyamǝ eto aye bǝtǝkǝ lǝ nsie bomǝ ǝsuǝ .
66021013	Nsie ntsyǝ lǝ kofekatokɔ , ntsyǝ lǝ ɔnwɛ kato , ntsyǝ nkpe lǝ ɔnwɛ dikue nya ntsyǝ nkpe lǝ diyo kedufǝkɔ eti tsya .
66021014	Bákpe lefosi aba ǝnuǝ lǝ kasɔ fɛ báto umǝ ǝmǝ eto kafati bǝńyǝnsǝ . Nya báwɔni Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto aye bǝtǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
66021015	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ dídinko mɛ etikii , lɛ sika sia eto esususa nnya wuufi ususu umǝ ǝmǝ ku wǝ nsie bomǝ ku kafati lǝ kɔni .
66021016	Akpɔ ana nkpe umǝ ǝmǝ , nya wǝ akpake eto kekulǝ ku lɛblɛbe lekate . Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ésusu umǝ ǝmǝ ku esususa nyamǝ , nya unyǝ nkǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto lekpa lɔni ekulǝ esunkpo kɔkpi alofa anɔ . Nya umǝ ǝmǝ eto dikulǝ , lɛblɛbe ku botaka akate pɛpɛɛpɛ .
66021017	Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ésusu ofati ǝmǝ tsya , nya únyǝ nkǝ wǝ ditidibi eyifo akpa alofa ǝnuǝ lefosi akpa akua ɛyɛ lǝ esususa nnya ɔnlɛ ǝsuǝ .
66021018	Aba nnya béfi báto ofati ǝmǝ ni yaspa , nya béfi sika sia nso bɔlɛkɛ , sia lekpa fe ahuhuɛ seka báto umǝ ǝmǝ kosate .
66021019	Nya béfi aba nya léfo koya akpa akpa bálɔ umǝ ǝmǝ eto aba nnya kasɔ ǝsuǝ báto kafati kamǝ bǝtǝkǝ . Kasɔ eto leba tutɛ ni nǝ baakpo yaspa . Dinuǝfǝ ni nǝ baakpo sapir . Ditsyǝfǝ ni nǝ baakpo yalkedon , nya lenale ni nǝ baakpo smaragdo .
66021020	Lɛnɔnde ni nǝ baakpo sardonik , nya lekuande baakpo sardis . Akuansele baakpo krisolit , nya leflamflale baakpo beril . Lɛwɔnɔmbǝle baakpo topas . Lefosile baakpo krisopra . Lefosi ɔnwɛ baakpo yanikint , nya lefosi unuǝfǝ baakpo ametist .
66021021	Umǝ ǝmǝ eto lefosi nsie nnuǝ eyifo lefosi aba ǝnuǝ nnya lefo koya . Leba kplɛ béfi béyifo kesie saa nɛ . Sika sia lefo koya béfi bálɔ umǝ ǝmǝ eto usunte kplɛ , nya ebunyǝ asa wuee ayɛ lǝ sika siamǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase bǝǝnyǝ asa lǝ ahuhuɛ ǝsuǝ seka .
66021022	Nya mǝnnyǝ Disumuyo saa lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ , itsyise Bonamute Onanto Ǝsuǝalenyǝ ǝmǝ ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ ni wǝ Disumuyo .
66021023	Kofe nye kofande eto bofa nye buyǝnde manfe itǝ umǝ ǝmǝ , itsyise Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝǝyǝnde kakpo wǝ nya Lesamubi nǝmǝ ni wǝ okandiɛ .
66021024	Kawunsiǝ eto betidi ebɔyɛ lǝ ni buyǝnde ǝsuǝ , nya kasɔ eto baka ebufi mǝ setabikɛ baboko wǝ .
66021025	Nya bembuti umǝ ǝmǝ eto nsie ku lefe , itsyise kale tsya embona lǝ wǝ .
66021026	Ese , ese eto betidi kenke ebufi mǝ sɛkplɛ ku mǝ setabikɛ bǝbǝ baboko mfó .
66021027	Fɛɛ kɔfiɔ eto kulesa embedufǝ lǝ wǝ kulefe . Nya badia ku mba leeyifo afanisa embudufǝ lǝ wǝ . Bomu mba eto aye báwɔni bákpe lǝ Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto nkpǝ eto kukue komǝ kafoo , mǝ hã luudufǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ nɛ .
66022001	Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ áte mɛ ketu ka lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ eto ntu . Ketu kamǝ aabɔdi ketsyi lǝ Onanto ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ . Ntu bomǝ akpa kɛnkɛnkɛ fe ahuhuɛ .
66022002	Nya bɔnlɛ bɔbɔdi lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ eto obia kplɛ . Nya lǝ ke etukpenkpe ǝnuǝ nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nkpǝ eto kuyi ńyǝ , nya kuanwɔ kofa saa kofa . Ko afanto eyifo afantosi itǝ ese ese eto betidi kenke .
66022003	Bembunyǝ kulesa nǝ Onanto díkudi lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ . Onanto ku Lesamubi nǝmǝ eto lekankpomɛ ebɔkɛ lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ , nya wǝ beyifoyifo luusumu wǝ .
66022004	Boonyǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi nya wǝ diye luutǝkǝ lǝ mǝ nto .
66022005	Kale ensi embolo mfó . Nya bembohiã kakandiɛ nye kofe , itsyise Bonamute Onanto ebudi mǝ diyǝnde nya boodi seka isu manlo manlo .
66022006	Mfó nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Ɔnukualɛ eto etiki ni nyamfo nya boofo nya bofo kanɔ sitiniti . Nya Bonamute Onanto wǝ leefi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ kǝtǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , wǝ ni létsyese wǝ ɔtɔnkpe nkǝ ote wǝ beyifoyifo asa nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . ”
66022007	“ Bebe ! Muubǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Disuǝyuǝ itǝ mba leetsyue etiki nnya bábe letsya lǝ kukue komfo kǝmiǝ koto . ”
66022008	Mɔ Yohanes , mɔ ni nwǝ lɛnɔ nya mínyǝ asa nyamfo kenke . Nya lefe nǝ mínyǝ nya mínɔ nnya mínlosǝǝ , nse akonki lǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ dílǝkǝ asa nyamfo óte mɛ eto akɔ miǝ lǝ nsumu wǝ .
66022009	Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Menyifo nko ! Mintsyaa , uyifotsyuǝ mini fe fǝ ku fǝ bayimi ba ni Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku mba kenke leetsyue etiki nnya nkpe lǝ kukue komfo koto . Onanto mate ete ele bǝ sumu . ”
66022010	Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , “ Menfi bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto etiki nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ kukue komfo akula , itsyise lefe nǝmǝ eboyo lelo nyamfo kenke luubǝ itǝ .
66022011	Utsyuǝ saa ke leeyifo asa buaa , sukosǝ lǝ ukeyifo asa bua , nwǝ ke leeyifo asinsa sukosǝ lǝ ukeyifo asinsa , nwǝ kee leeyifo kasɛɛ , sukosǝ lǝ ukeyifo kasɛɛ , nwǝ kee diyifo kɛnkɛ , usukosǝ lǝ uyifo nwǝ diyifo kɛnkɛ . ”
66022012	Yesu nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Muubǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ ! Muubǝ ku kayofofo ka dińyǝ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ keyifo ka úyifo kumǝ .
66022013	Mɔ ni Ututɛ ku Ɔfɛfɛ , Kasɔ Ketsyikokɔ ku Kaalosǝkɔ .
66022014	“ Disuǝyuǝ itǝ betidi ba dumuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ fe kase bǝǝflǝ bikǝ kɛnkɛ kǝtsyǝ . Mǝǝ dunyǝ kusu bedi nkpǝ eto kuyi komǝ eto eyibibi nɛ , nya bɔɔyɛ lǝ kesie kamǝ bedufǝ lǝ kato eto umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ lafo .
66022015	Nya mba luunyǝ lǝ ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ kama ba ni mba leeyifo afanisa , mǝ ni betidi ba ni bafate , mba ni batsyetɔ , mba laalo betidi , mba lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi ku betidi ba ni badia ba laawɛ betidi kakpe lǝ etiki ku lǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
66022016	“ Mɔ , Yesu , ni nwǝ létsyese mɔ ɔtɔnkpe miǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ asa nyamfo ote mi bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke . Mɔ ni kuyi eto ote kplɛ ǝmǝ wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu . Mɔ ni kolensiǝnto eto sefandebi sia lǝǝyǝnde . ”
66022017	Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ku okafɔ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ” Nya nwǝ ke nlɛ nnya bɔnɔ tsya tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ” Nya nwǝ ke utukɔɛ nlɛɛ , ubǝ . Nya nwǝ ke nlɛ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ bɔbɛbɛɛ , ubǝ ofo mu unǝ , kayo saa mamfo mamfo .
66022018	Mɔ Yohanes lɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ etiki nnya nkpe lǝ kukue komfo kafoo ato bukǝ kekleke miǝ utsyuǝ saa ke luufi lesatsyuǝ okpé lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebufi kanyinyǝnyǝ ka báwɔni bakpé lǝ kukue komfo utǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kotonǝnǝ .
66022019	Nya lǝ utsyuǝ tsya ǝlǝkǝ lesatsyuǝ utsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embutǝ unyǝ kayofofo ka báwɔni bákpe lǝ kukue komfo ǝsuǝ . Weebunyǝ kedikɔ ka untǝnyǝ lǝ nkpǝ eto kudiyi komǝ ǝsuǝ ku lǝ umǝ kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ tsya ǝsuǝ .
66022020	Nwǝ nlɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ee , muubǝ lǝ leefe kliminti ǝsuǝ ! ” Ibǝ itǝ . Bonamute Yesu , bǝ !
66022021	Bonamute Yesu eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko utsyuǝ saa .
